Text:
mwangonde khansala wachinyamata akamati achinyamata atsogoleri mawa ambiri amaganiza nkhambakamwa chabe achinyamata lusubilo mwangonde akukwaniritsa akupherezetsa mawuwa osati pongolota adzakhala kutsogolera kumene yawo yakwana dailes banda adacheza mwangonde khansala wachinyama yemwe akuimira jumbo ward mumzinda wa mzuzu motere   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi masomphenya mwangonde tikudziweni   ndine lusubilo mwangonde ndili zaka 27 zakubadwa ndinabadwa mbanja la ana asanu ndine wachinayi kubadwa ndimachokera mmudzi mwa mwamalopa kwa paramount chief kyungu mboma la karonga sindili pabanja pakadalipano 
  mbiri ya maphunziro anu yotani maphunziro anga pulaimale ndidachitira kusukula yapulaiveti ya viphya mumzinda wa mzuzu asekondale ndidachitira phwezi boys mboma la rumphi ndili diploma ya accounting pakadalipano ndikupanga digiri chartered accounting kusukulu ya malawi college of accountancy mca 
  mudayamba zandale kuyambira ndili wachichepere zaka 12 ndakhala ndikukhala mumaudindo utgogoleri ichi china mwa zinthu zomwe zidandilimbikitsa ndikhoza kudzapambana pazisankho chachikulu chomwe chidandichititsa ndilowe ukhansala chidali chakuti ndinkafuna kupereka mpata kwa azitha kuyankhula zakukhosi kwawo polimbikitsa demokalase chitukuko 
  ntchito mukugwira zomwe munkayembekezera eya ndiponso ndinkayembekezera zambiri 
  masomphenya anu otani pandale ndine munthu wokhulupirira mulungu ndili chikhulupiriro choti amene adzandionetsere zomwe ndikuyera tsogolo langa 
  zinthu zina zomwe mumachita chiyani pambali ukhansala ndikakhala sindikugwira ntchito yaukhansala ndimakhala ndikuchita bizinesi zina ndimakhala ndili kusukulu komwe ndikuchita maphuro anga digiri kuonjezera pamenepo ndili bungwe lomwe ndidayambitsa anzanga la centre for participatory democracy lomwe limalimbikitsa demokalase 
  zomwe mwakwanitsa zotani ndathandiza ntchito yopala misewu ya kudera la moyale itheke misewuyi yakhala yaitali osapalidwa ndidathandiziranso ochita malonda ayambe mashopu anjerwa kusiya kumangira matabwa zigwagwa ndidakwanitsanso kukaimirira khonsolo ya mzuzu ku nyumba ya malamulo ndaonanso ntchitoyi yandithandiza momwe ndimaonera zinthu ndimakumana osiyanasiyana omwe amandiphunzitsa zinthu zambiri
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mcp siidakhutire kalembera chipani cha malawi congress party mcp chati ndime yachiwiri ya kalembera wa zisankho yayenda poyerekeza yoyamba mec iganizire zobwereranso mmaboma omwe yadutsamo kale kaamba koti ambiri sadalembetse 
  wa bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec jane ansah wati wokhutira mmene kalembera wayendera mgawo lachiwiri 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka ansah zinthu zayenda kalembera wa mgawoli amachitikira mmaboma dowa ntchisi mchinji nkhotakota 
  malingana lipoti lomwe mec yatulutsa mwa 1 048 080 omwe limayembekezera kulembetsa 875 138 ndiwo alembetsa 
  chiwerengerochi chikutanthauza mwa 100 aliwonse omwe amayenera kulembetsa 83 ndiwo alembetsa zomwe zachititsa mlembi wa mcp maurice munthali kupempha mec ibwererenso mmabomawo 
  pali chosekerera apa tiyenera kuyandikira kwenikweni ku chiwerengero cha omwe tidayenera kuwalembetsa zomwe zachitika apa zikusonyeza poyera ambiri sadalembetse choncho mec iyenera kubwereranso mmabomawo adatero munthali 
  mlembiyu adati ufulu wa demokalase kusiya munthu zimakhala zodandaulitsa 
  wa bungwe la human rights defenders timothy mtambo akugwirizana mcp kalemberayo adzachitikenso kaamba koti munthu ufulu wovota 
  wa bungwe la national initiative for civic education nice trust ollen mwalubunju adati zinthu mgawo lachiwiri zasintha kwambiri poyerekeza loyamba 
  pali kwakukulu mgawo loyamba timanena za 73 100 aliwonse tikunena za 83 100 aliwonse zikutanthauza zinthu zikusintha adatero mwalubunju 
  pazaganizo lobwereranso mmaboma momwe kalemberayu wachitika kale mwalubunju adati mpofunika kudikira kaye mec iwone mmene zinthu zitayendere mmaboma 
  malingana kalata ya mec yomwe yasayinidwa woyanganira zisankho sam alfandika mwa onse omwe alembetsa mgawo lachiwiriri 462 925 amayi 411 706 abambo 
  ansah adati zinthu zasintha kwambiri mgawoli poyerekeza mmene zidaliri mgawo loyamba mmaboma kasungu dedza salima 
  mavuto akulu omwe takumana nawo kuwonongeka kwa zipangizo zogwirira ntchito kusowa kwa dizilo wa ma generator athu zipangizo zoyendera mphamvu ya dzuwa sizimagwira ntchito moyenera potengera mmene nyengo ilili 
  mavutowa tawapezera njira zake moti kukubwera konseku ayembekezere kalembera wabwino adatero 
  ansah adati mec siidapange chiganizo nkhani yobwereranso mmaboma momwe yadutsamo kale
Label: POLITICS

Text:
bungwe la manepo lapempha boma liganizire achikulire mliri wa coronavirus bungwe loyanganira achikulire la malawi network of older persons organisation manepo lapempha boma liganizire achikulire pomwe likuyika ndondomeko zokhudza nthenda ya covid-19 
 kudzera kalata yomwe bungwe la manepo latulutsa wa bungweli andrew kavala wati kusowa kwa malamulo okhazikika oteteza achikulire kukupitilira kuyika anthuwa chiopsyezo cha nkhanza zosiyanasiyana 
 wapemphanso boma mabungwe pakhale njira zabwino zofalitsira mauthenga covid-19 nawo achikulire afikiridwe mauthenga okhudza njira zabwino zopewera mliriwu 
 za kuno ku malawi zimasala achikulire ichi chiopsezo chachikulu ku matenda covid-19 kwa amenewa anatero kavala 
 apempha boma liyike malamulo amphamvu oteteza achikulire kwa omwe amawaphwanyira ufulu
Label: HEALTH

Text:
ndale zogawanitsa miyambo zanyanya si zachilendonso kumva andale adzetsa ziwawa pamwambo wachikhalidwe lamulungu kudali gwiragwira kokhazikitsa mwambo wag ulu la ayao lomwe likutchedwa chiwanja cha ayao 
  pamwambowo wothandizira wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino saulos chilima adamunjata pomuganizira zokaikitsa 
   csos in pay back our money campaign   govt to review genset deal   govt moves to audit firearms othandizira chilima pakati adamangidwa pochita zokaikitsa anthuwo ati adali mphatso yochoka kwa chilima adalephera kupereka cha zovuta zina 
  zimachitika patangotha mwezi patabukanso chisokonezo pamaliro themba la mathemba chikulamayembe mboma la rumphi   mpungwepungwe udadza pamene ampingo adalandidwa chimkuzamawu pamene amapereka mpata kwa chilima mtsogoleri wa zipani zotsutsa lazarus chakwera alankhule 
  nakonso ku mwambo wa gonapamuhanya wa atumbuka kwakhala kukuchitika zisokonezo zodza andale kwa zaka ziwiri zotsatizana 
  mmalo mopitira zomwe ayitanidwira andalewo amafuna kupikisana ku miyamboyo salola kugonjerana 
  polankhulapo mchitidwewo kadaulo wa ndale sukulu ya ukachenjede ya university of livingstonia george phiri adati vuto lalikulu limabwera okonza miyamboyo amapereka gawo lalikulu kwa andale   phiri adapereka chitsanzo cha mwambo wa kulamba omwe achewa amakonza mdziko la zambia komwe kumapita andale sapatsidwa mphanvu 
  adati zimathandiza kumaloko kusakhale mpikisano kudzionetsera pakati zipani 
  achikhalidwe azionetsetsa mwambowo uli mmanja mwawo osati kuwapatsa andale adalongosola phiri 
  adatinso vuto lina limadza maka andalewo akatenga gawo lalikulu popereka thandizo lokonzera mwambo wa mtunduwo 
  tiyeni tisiye zomachita ndale paliponse zikuononga chikhalidwe tizilekanitsa zinthuzi adatero phiri 
  naye mbusa macdonald sembereka yemwe wa akuluakulu omwe adakonza mwambo wa chiwanja cha ayao adati vuto la andale loti amafuna kudzionetsa wa mndani ku miyambo yachikhalidwe 
  sembereka adati andalewo amaphangira ku zochitikazo mpaka kuononga miyambo ya chikhalidwe 
  khalidwe ili silikuthandiza chikhalidwe chathu 
  tikuwapempha asamapezerepo mpata wotsatsa malonda miyamboyo adatero sembereka 
  adatinso andalewo ngofunika kulolerana imeneyo adapereka chitsanzo cha mtsogoleri wopuma wa lino joyce banda yemwe wa wa chiyao sadakhale nawo 
  anthufe tikungoyenera kudziwa chikhalidwe nchachikulu kuposa ndale ndale zikufunika kulamulilidwa chikhalidwe adatero sembereka 
  wapampando wa gulu losunga chikhalidwe cha achewa kanyama phiri adati gululo limakana kutengapo gawo ndale malamulo ochokera kwa gawa undi sawavomereza kutero 
  phiri adati popewa andale kuwasokonezera zachikhalidwe chawo gululo amakakumana kwa gawa undi basi 
  palibe cholakwika kuwaitana andalewo mpofunika kukhazikitsa ndondomeko zoti azitsatira akafika pamalowo adatero phiri 
  naye gogo chikalamba gondwe yemwe amakonza mwambo wa atumbuka wa gonapamuhanya omwe wakhala ukukumana mazangazime cha andale adati gulu lawo tsopano lidaika ndondomeko zomwe andalewo amatsatira popewa chisokonezo 
  komabe tinene zambiri tikayandikira yosankha atsogoleri andalewo amalowerera ndithu cholinga choti awadziwe adatero gondwe 
  adati gulu lake lidawauza andalewo akamapita ku mwambo wa gonapamuhanya azikangoonera osati kuchitapo ndale
Label: POLITICS

Text: nanga wapolisi ataphofomoka masiku ano sichikhala chachilendo kuona apolisi atakwera galimoto mosayenera ntchito yawo nkuonetsetsa malamulo akutsatidwa pamsewu apolisiwo ndiwo amakhala oyamba kuphwanya malamulowo kodi wamba atakwera galimoto achitira apa apolisi sangakalowe kozizira mwinatu iwowa mphamvu kuposa lamulo

Text:
kusamvetsetsana kwabuka ku mwanza kusamvetsetsana kwabuka pakati ku mphete mboma la mwanza ofesi ya dc wa bomali cha nyumba ya mphunzitsi pasukulu ya mphete imene kampani yokonza njani ya vale logistics idagwetsa 
  malinga mlembi wakomiti yoyendetsa ntchito za pasukulu ya mphete allan gaviyawo mchaka cha 2012 kampani ya vale logistics adagwetsa nyumba ya mphunzitsi imodzi pasukulu ya mphete inali pamalo pomwe payenera kudutsa njanji yomwe ikudutsa mdziko muno ku mozambique 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc gaviyawo adati kampaniyi idalonjeza kuwapatsa mderali ndalama zokwana k1.5 miliyoni amangire nyumba ina pamalo zomwe mderali adakana ponena ndalamayi siinali yokwana kumangira nyumba ina yamakono yomwe inagwetsedwayo yomwe inali mphatso kwa mderali kubungwe la european union 
  zitachitika kampaniyo idalonjeza kupereka k12.7 miliyoni yoti nyumba ina imangidwe zomwe anthuwa adagwirizana nazo popeza amayembekezera ndalamayi ikanakwanira nyumba ziwiri zamakono za amphuzitsi mmalo mwa imodzi 
  mderali anadabwitsika poona ndalamazi zinakapelekedwa kuofesi ya dc yomwe idabwera kudzamanga nyumbayo aku mphete sakukhutisidwa nyumba yomwe ofesi ya dc wa boma la mwanza yamanga pasukulu ya mphete pakuyerekeza ndalama yomwe idaperekedwa yomangira nyumbayi adatero 
  wapampando wa khonsolo ya mwanza moses walota adati makhansala anzake mbomali atakayendera nyumbayo adakhumudwa momwe nyumbayo ayimangira sadakhutisidwe ndimamangidwewo 
  walota wanena ataona analembela kalata bwanankubwa wa boma la mwanza yomuunikira zolakwika zomwe mankhansalawa anapeza panyumbayi zoti zikonzedwe nyumbayi isanaperekedwe kwa aku mphete mmboma la mwanza mpaka lero kalatayo siinayankhidwe zolakwika nyumbayo sizinakonzedwebe 
  poyankhapo pankhaniyi dc wa boma la mwanza gift lappozo wavomereza nzoona kontilakitala yemwe adapatsidwa ntchitoyi wayithawa atagwira ntchito yosasangalatsa kumapeto kwenikweni kwantchitoyi bwanankubwayu adati padakalipano ofesi yake ikuunikanso bwinobwino mgwirizano omwe anagwirizana kontilakitayu asanapeze wina oti amalizitse ntchitoyi wakana kontilakitayu adapatsidwa ndalama zonse zokhudza ntchitoyi amalipidwa mzigawo akamaliza chigawo chilichonse chantchitoyi moyenerera 
  lapozo adati kusamvetsetsana komwe kulipo pakati ofesi yake aku mphete kwadza cha kusadziwa momwe ofesi ya bwanankubwa imachitira pogwira ntchito zimenezi komwe anthuwa alinako ndiponso chokuti anthuwosakufuna kumva kufotokoza komwe akhala akufotokzeredwa ofesi ya dc pazankhaniyi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
kwaya ya st james chilomoni yakwanitsa zaka 40 wolemba sylvester kasitomu wp content uploads/2019/09 chilomoni.jpg alt= width="427 height="391 />tchalitchi la st james chilomoni ku blantyre kwaya ya st james ya m`parish ya chilomoni arkdayosizi ya blantyre yayamikira mamembala ake omwe akhala akutumikira kwayayi kwa yaitali kamba ka kakudzipereka kwao potukula maimbidwe kwayayi 
 wapampando wa kwayayi ezekiel lokote ndiwo alankhula mwambo wa msembe ya ukaristia yothokoza mulungu kwayayi yakwanitsa zaka makumi anayi 40 chiyikhazikitsireni 
 ati mamembalawa achita zazikulu kwayayi kwa yaitali zomwe ati zathandiza kwambiri potuluka mayimbidwe kwayayi 
 ifeyo tinachiona cha nzeru tikonze mwambowu pofuna kuwathokoza mamemba athu kaamba ka ntchito yomwe agwira poonetsetsa mayimbidwe mukwayayi akhalepo kwa zaka 40 zapitazi mwa mamembalawa akwanitsa zaka 30 akuimbira mulungu mukwayayi zomwe ndizonyaditsa polankhulapo mwa omwe atumikira kwayayi kwa zaka zochuluka betti banda anayamba kwayayi zaka zochepa mpaka zomwe zachititsa moyo wawo wamapempero usinthike 
 ndinayamba kwaya imeneyi ndiri zaka 10 ndaimba kwayayi kwa zaka makumi atatu zomwe ndizopindulitsa moyo wanga wa uzimu kaamba koti pamene kwayayi ikukula inenso ndikukula muuzimu anatero banda 
 kwaya st james yomwe inayimbira misa yolandira mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika lonse papa yohane paulo wachiwiri yemwe anayendera lino chaka cha 1989 inakhazikitsidwa chaka cha 1979
Label: RELIGION

Text:
wamalonda avulazidwa ku bt titha masamba wa zaka 31 akumva ululu wadzaoneni ayende akuyenera agwirire ndodo sangagone chafufumimba chammbali chagada moyo wamtendere watha 
  akuti adamuphera tsogolo lake masamba kumva ululu kwake akuti izitu zili chonchi cha bala lomwe lili pabondo lake la kumanja lomwe lidasokedwa kuchipatala pambuyo pokhapidwa chikwanje 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi ulendo wa mayiyu wokagulitsa mandasi 7 july womwe udabweretsa mavutowa pomwe omwe akuwaganizira ogwira ntchito kukhonsolo ya mzinda wa blantyre city rangers amene adamuchita chiwembu pomulanda malonda ake kumuvulaza chikwanje 
  masamba akuti atangomwalira amuna ake 2007 adayamba geni yogulitsa mandasi azisamalira banja lake la ana awiri malo amene amagulitsira malonda akewo akuti ku cold storage kamuzu stadium mumzindawu 
  mwa zonse patsiku la ngozilo adauyatsa ulendo wokapha makwacha cold storage pali njanje ndiye ndidaika malonda anga chapafupi msewu womwe umadutsa pamwamba njajeyo ndikataye madzi ndisadalowere ku cold storage adatero masamba 
  pamene ndimati ndikatenge malondawo ndidangoona galimoto ya city yoyera mmbalimu idali ya sefa idadzaima pomwe padali mandasiwo adali mgalimotomo adatsika natenga beseni la mandasilo adandigwira ndidawauza angotenga mandasiwo asalimbane nane zidakanika 
  mayiyu yemwe akukhala ku makhetha mumzindawu akuti anthuwo adamubudulira malondawo mosakhalitsa zodabwitsa zidamuchitikira 
  adatulutsa chikwanje adandikhapa nacho pabondopa kaamba ka ululu apo sindikumbukanso chomwe chidachitika ndidangozindikira ndili pabedi kuchipatala ku queens cha mma 4 koloko madzulo adatero 
  akuti adazindikiranso k4 500 yomwe adamanga pansalu yake palibe 
  idali ndalama yomwe ndimati ndiwatumizire agogo anga ku dedza agogowa amadaliranso akafuna thandizo adatero 
  chichitikireni cha mayiyu akungobuula ululu kwake geni sangachitenso moyo tsopano wasanduka wovuta 
  mneneri wa khonsolo ya blantyre anthony kasunda akuti wangomva za nkhaniyi akufufuza kaye ngatidi adali antchito amene adachitira chipongwe mayiyu 
  ndikudabwa chifuma malo amene mayiwa akukamba sitifikako ndiye zikundidabwitsa zatheka mayiwa avulazidwe amene akuti akhonsolo ya blantyre adatero kasunda amene akuganiza mwina angakhale omwe achita 
  pamene kasunda akufufuza moyo wa masamba uli pachiswe ana ake akudalira asake chakudya cha tsiku tsiku zofunikira kusukulu 
  andiphera tsogolo tikadya ndiye ndachita geni nawo mpamba udathera kuchipatala chochita chikundisowa adalira mayiyu pocheza naye kwake
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
aphungu adzuma kagawidwe ka makuponi ganizo la boma loyamba kugawa makuponi ogulira zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo mupologalamu ya sabuside lalandilidwa maganizo osiyanasiyana pakati aphungu ku nyumba ya malamulo mafumu amalawi 
  kauniuni wa tamvani wapeza pomwe boma lili maganizo oyamba kugawa makuponiwa mchigawo cha kummwera maganizo makamaka polingalira mvula ili pakhomo mzigawo zonse 
   escom in free for all fuel scam   wait gets longer   secrecy over party funders lachinayi lapitali mudali chisokonezo mnyumba ya malamulo ku lilongwe pomwe aphungu amafuna boma lilongosole momveka cholinga choyamba kugawa makuponi kummwera 
  nkhani inakula mnyumba ya malamulo ya makuponi phungu wa kumadzulo kwa boma la mzimba harry mkandawire ndiye adatokosa nkhaniyi ponena mboma lake akufunika makuponi ogulira zipangizo zaulimi msanga mvula idagwa kale akudikira kudzala 
  nchifukwa chiyani mwasankha kuyambira kummwera pomwe mvula yayamba kale mmaboma ambiri mzigawo zonse pamenepa pali mafunso ambiri ofunika mulongosole adatero mkandawire 
  adakhazikike aphungu ambiri adaimirira pofuna kuonetsa kusakhutira kwawo ganizoli mpaka nduna ya zachuma goodall gondwe yemwe amayankha mmalo mwa nduna ya zamalimidwe allan chiyembekeza adavomereza ndondomeko ya sabuside idalakwika 
  gondwe adati ganizo loyamba kugawa makuponi ku mmwera lidadza polingalira zambiri mvula imayambira mchigawochi pakudza 
  si pali mangawa alionse ayi tikudziwa chaka chaka mvula imayambira kummwera ikamabwera nchifukwa tidaganiza zoyambira kumeneko adatero gondwe 
  yankholi silidagwire mtima aphunguwo adadzudzula boma cholephera kukonzekera mokwanira mupologalamuyi 
  wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe omwe amakhudzidwa nkhani za ulimi wa civil society agriculture network cisanet tamani nkhono mvula adati nchizolowezi kuyambira kummwera kugawa makuponi chaka chino chokha ndondomeko ikadasintha 
  adati boma lachedwa pachilichonse mundondomekoyi ndiye sipakufunika za mmbuyo kupeza njira zomwe zingagwirizane momwe zinthu zilili 
  chiyambireni boma silidakonzekere ndondomekoyi pena pake tikhoza kuwamvetsetsa pali mavuto zachuma adadziwa kalekale zimenezi amayenera njira adatero mvula 
  adati chomwe boma likadachita nkuthamangitsa chilichonse makuponi afikire mmadera onse mvula ikamayamba alimi asadzazingwe yothaitha 
  akuganiza poti yatha kale mavuto zachuma apo akadapanga zoti makuponi apezeke msanga alandire mzigawo zonse msanga 
  kunjaku kuli kale njala sitisamala chaka cha mawa kukhoza kudzakhala zovuta zenizeni alimi ambiri amadalira sabuside mmadera momwe amalima kwambiri mvula idagwa kale sali ku mmwera adatero mvula 
  paramount chief lundu wa mboma la chikwawa adati mmadera ambiri mchigawo cha pakati mvula idagwa kale akungoyembekeza kubzala 
  adati kuchedwetsa makuponi kupangitsa adzalandire mochedwa zomwe zingachititse mbewu zawo zidzasemphane mvula momwe zidalili chaka chatha 
  akadangoti tochepa tomweto agawe lonse mzigawo zonse abzaleko osati mchigawo chimodzi chokha sitikudziwanso makuponi enawo afika liti adzafika angati adatero lundu 
  paramount chief kyungu wa ku karonga adati kwa nkhani padakalipano chakudya osati makuponi momwe akunenera 
  adati mvula sidanunkhire mmaboma ambiri mchigawochi ndiye palibe kanthu komwe angayambire chachikulu apeze chakudya basi adatero kyungu 
  t mkanda wa ku mulanje adati wokondwa makuponi afika tsopano mdera lake akudikira mvula ikagwa akabzale mbewu mminda mwawo
Label: FARMING

Text:
alosera mvula kugwa mochuluka nthambi yoona za nyengo ya department of climate change and meteorological services dccms yati mvula yamphamvu ikhala ikugwa kwa masiku angapo motsatizana 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu uwu ungakhale mpumulo polingalira momwe mbewu zafotera mminda lingakhale tsoka polingalira mvulayo ingachulukitse zidalili chaka chatha mmadera 
  mchikalata chosonyeza momwe nyengo ikhalire masiku angapo akudzawa nthambiyo idati mvula yamphamvuyi ikhala ikugwa lonse pafupifupi sabata yatuthu kuyambira lachinayi lapitali 
  kaamba ka ngamba chimanga china chidanyala mphepo yomwe ikuomba mmadera osiyanasiyana ipangitsa mvula yamphamvu kwambiri izigwa makamaka kuyambira lamulungu 17 january 2016 mmadera ambiri ayembekezere nyengo yotentha masana panthawiyi idatero nthambiyi mchikalatacho 
  wa nthambiyo jolam nkhokwe adati mmasiku angapo apitawa mvula adayeserako mmadera mchigawo chapakati kumpoto pomwe mmadera kumwera mvulayi imagwa monyentchera 
  mneneri wa nthambiyo ellen kululanga adati nzosadabwitsa ndimo zimakhalira kukakhala mphepo ya el nino momwe azanyengowa adalengezera kumayambiriro mvula 
  malawi mmphepete mwa zigawo ziwiri za africa kumwera kummawa zomwe zimapangitsa kabweredwe ka mvula kazisiyana mvula imavutirako mchigawo cha kumwera kaamba kakuti chili mbali ya kumwera kwa africa 
  chigawo cha kumpoto chomwe chili kumbali ya kumawa kwa africa mvula imachulukirapo moti mphepo imeneyi ya el nino madera kumwera mvula ivutirapo pomwe kumpoto madera pakati zinthu zikhalako adatero kululanga 
  ogwira ntchito zotukula ulimi mmaboma osiyanasiyana adatsimikizira nyuzipepala ya the nation ngamba yomwe idagwayi yaononga mbewu zambiri mmadera osiyanasiyana 
  mwa omwe adatsimikizira wachiwiri kwa oyendetsa ntchito za blantyre add aggrey kamanga otukula ntchito zaulimi mboma la machinga palichi munyenyembe omwe adati mvula idadula alimi nkhawa
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
kuchoka kwa phoya kutisokoneza atero mmadera osiyanasiyana msabatayi ati kuchoka kwa phungu wa chipani cholamula cha dpp mdera la ku mmawa mboma la blantyre henry phoya kwasiya mafunso ambiri mmitu yawo zomwe ati zingawasokoneze podzavota mchaka cha 2014 
  anthuwa ati kuchokako kukusonyeza kuchipani cholamula kwavunda zomwe ati zawachititsa kakasi aone komwe angadzaponye voti yawo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc katswiri wa za mbiri ya kale chijere chirwa wati andale amachokachoka mzipani zawo kuyambitsa chipani chawo kotero sizikuyenera kusokoneza 
  adati kuchoka kwa phoya ukhale mwayi wa chipani cha dpp apeze atsopano omwe angamange chipanicho 
  phoya lachiwiri adalengeza walowa chipani cha mcp adalengeza msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe udachitikira ya mtsogoleri wa chipanichi john tembo 
  pomwe phoya amalengeza nkhaniyi wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa chipani cha udf ken msonda adalengeza wasiya ndale akukalera ana 
  mwa anthuwo florence kamvamtope wa mmudzi mwa kanyumbaaka kwa t nsamala mboma la balaka wati kuchoka kwa phoya kupita kumcp kukulozera pena pake paola ku dpp polingalira phoya adali msalamangwe kuchipaniko 
  sitinganene kupita ku mcp kungabweretse chitukuko zingotisokoneza mavotedwe tikusowa chipani chomwe tingachione chithandiza adatero kamvamtope 
  frank chibambo wa mmudzi mwa chibwana kwa t chikulamayembe mboma la rumphi adati zikuonetsa ku dpp kwaipa 
  apa pakuoneka pali chikaiko kuchipani cholamula zoti amalimbikitsadi ufulu wa demokalase zikundipatsa nkhawa kodi zikhala zolongosoka sakukhulupirira chibambo 
  chirwa akuti munthu akatuluka chipani chipanicho chikuyenera kutengerapo mwayi pounguza kupeza omwe angapititse patsogolo chipanicho 
  phoya adachotsedwa kuchipani cholamula ndiye ufulu kupita kuchipani chilichonse yomwe adatsutsana lamulo loletsa kutengera chiletso boma ogwira ntchito mboma 
  tikatengera demokalase padalibe cholakwika uli kuchipani cholamula utha kumaperekerabe maganizo osemphana adatero chirwa 
  poyankhapo phoya wati asadandaule adziwa zoona zake posakhalitsapa 
  sitikuvota mawa ndiye tikhala tikulankhula anthuwa adziwe zingapo ndigwira ntchito yomwe akufuna 
  boma lingabwere mabilu omwe sakomera amalawi tiona tithana nawo aboma akabweretsa zokomera tiwathandiza zikhale zosakomera ndiye zioneka adatero 
  phoya adali phungu kuchipani cha udf 1999 mpaka 2004 adakhalapo nduna muulamulirowo 
  adalowa hipani cha dpp adakhalaponso nduna muulamuliro wa chipanicho
Label: POLITICS

Text:
ulimi wa njuchi ofesi yonona kodi ulimi wa njuchi mudayamba liti ulimiwu ndidayamba 2017 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu nanga chidakukopani nchiyani nditalingalira mozama ndidaona ulimi wa njuchi sulira zinthu zambiri kulima kugula feteleza mankhwala zina zochuluka utheke chinthu china chomwe chidandikopa nchoti masiku ano akukonda kugwiritsa ntchito uchi chotsekemeretsa kusiyana shuga malingana zovuta zosiyanasiyana za mthupi choncho ndidaona msika ndiosasowa ndalama yake ndiyolemelera 
  manduwa uchi wanga ndiika mmabotolo kodi ulimiwu mukuuchitira ku balaka lilongwe blantyre 
  kodi muli mingoma ingati ndidayamba mingoma 10 padakali yafika 130 ku balaka kuli mingoma 70 ku lilongwe 50 ku blantyre 10 
  nanga mumapeza uchi wochuluka mngoma uliwonse ikakhala miyezi yozizira ndimapeza makilogalamu 30 mngoma uliwonse pomwe yotentha umatsika kufika 20 uchi umachuluka nyengo yozizira tikamafika nthawiyi njuchi zimakhala zapanga chakudya chokwanira cholinga choti zizingokhala mnyumba mwawo muja ndikumadya chinthu china chomwe chimachititsa uchuluke motere nchoti timakhala tikuchokera nyengo ya mvula yomwe zipangizo zogwiritsa ntchito popanga uchi madzi maluwa zimakhala zochuluka 
  kodi mukagulitsa mumapeza ndalama zochuluka mngoma umodzi mngoma umatulutsa k100 000 zikavutitsita k60 000 
  kodi misika ya uchi mumaipeza motani msika wa uchi wosasowa alimi tilipo ochepa akuugwiritsa ntchito ndiochuluka makampani ochuluka akhala akundipeza ndiziwagulitsa uchi cha kuchuluka kwa makasitomala anga sindingakwanitse cha ichi ndimaukonza mmabotolo ndikumagulitsa ndekha kwa 
  kodi upangiri wa ulimiwu mudauphunzira palibe yemwe adandiphunzitsa komwe ndidakaphunzira ulimi wa njuchi ndili mwana ndimakonda kufula njuchi choncho lunsoli lidangokhala landilowerera 
  nditapita ku lilongwe ndidaona akuchita ulimiwu pogwiritsa ntchito miphika mateyala nditaonetsetsa momwe amachitira maganizo woyamba kukhoma mingoma adandibwerera ndidachita mwayi pamene bungwe la world vision lidandipatsa bisinesi yoti ndiwapangire mingoma choncho imeneyo ndidaphunzira zinthu zambiri zokhudzana ulimiwu   kodi zinthu zotani zomwe zimafunika ulimiwu zinthu zofunikira kwambiri ulimiwu malo mingoma mlimi amayenera akhale malo womwe chilengedwe chokwanira mitengo madzi 
  alibe malo woterewa akufunitsitsa atachita ulimiwu akuyenera abzale mitengo yokula msanga mapapaya moringa akhoza chitsime njuchi zizipeza madzi mosavuta malowa akuyenera akhale wotalikirana nyumba za mosachepera masentimita 100 ulimiwu sulira malo aakulu ekala imodzi yokha mlimi ukhoza kuchitapo zazikulu 
  tafotokozani mwachidule momwe mumachitira ulimiwu choyambirira timapaka phula mkati mwa mngoma wathu pakhomo timitengo tomwe timasanja pamwamba mingoma ija phula limathandizira kukopanga njuchi mngoma muja choncho zikamva fungo lake zimalowa nkukhazikika tikachoka apo timamangirira mngoma wathu ku nthambi za mtengo pogwiritsa ntchito mawaya omwe timawapakanso phula tikatero timati tamaliza timayenera tiziyendera mingoma ija kufikira njuchi zitalowa ndikukhazikika zinthu nyerere kangaude mbewa zimadana njuchi choncho chimodzi mwa icho chikapezeka mngoma palibe chomwe mlimi angaphule alimi akapeza zoterezi mngoma amayenera achotse 
  nanga mukamangirira mingoma mumatenga yotalika mukolole timakolola pakapita miyezi itatu zina imafika 6 malingana momwe njuchi zikuchitira 
  kodi mavuto wotani omwe mumakumana nawo ku ulimiwu vuto lalikulu ku ulimiwu kusowa kwa chilengedwe cha ichi ndikulimbana ndikubwezeretsa chilengedwechi ndicholinga choti ulimiwu upite patsogolo
Label: FARMING

Text:
la ghana latsekula malo opemphelera president wa la ghana nana akufo adodo watsekula malo opempherera omwe anatsekedwa pofuna kupewa kupatsirana kwa kachilombo koyambitsa nthenda ya covid-19 mdzikolo 
 walengeza za nkhaniyi- akufo addo malipoti wailesi ya bbc ati malowa matchalitchi mizikiti osaposa 100 omwe akuloredwa kumasonkhana yosapitilira ola limodzi 
 omwe akusonkhana mmalo opemphelerawa apemphedwa kupitiliza njira zopewera kupatsirana matendawa motalikirana kuvala chotchinga kukamwa mphuno mask pomwe akupemphera 
 mwazina presidenti yu wati kuwonjezera apo ophunzira mchaka chomaliza ayambanso kupitiriza maphunziro mzipata zolowera mdzikolo zikhalabe zotseka 
 ganizoli ladza pomwe chiwerengero cha opezeka nthendayi chaima 8,060 omwe kuphatikizapo 36 omwe amwalira nthendayi

Text:
chilengedwe chibwerere ku mwanza mapiri nkhalango madambo mbulanda adagwetsa mitengo kuotcha makala lero nkhani yasintha 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu pangonopangono boma la mwanza layamba kuvala kubisa kusambuka kwake komwe kudadza pootcha makala 
  pulogalamu yolimbana kwa nyengo yomwe ikutchedwa enhancing community resilience programme ecrp ndiyo ikusintha maonekedwe bomalo maboma 
  bungwe la centre for environmental policy and advocacy cepa lomwe labweretsa kusinthako 
  pulogalamuyi imalimbikitsa atsatire njira zosiyanasiyana zomwe zingawatukule uko akusamala nkhani zachilengedwe 
  alibe yootcha makala kheli mkazi kutulutsa mbuzi mwa zinthuzi ulimi wa ziweto wa kumunda kugwiritsa ntchito mbaula zamakono bizinesi njira zamakono zakalimidwe mtayakhasu kulowa magulu obwereketsana ndalama banki mkhonde 
  amene akuyanganira momwe pulogalamuyi ikuyendera paboma ku bungwe la cepa stephen chikuse akuti chochita nkovuta mitengo isakazidwe 
  alibe zochita alibe popezera ndalama kungowauza siyani kudula mitengo si zimveka kuwapezera chochita tikuchitira adatero chikuse 
  zasintha mabanja ambiri pakhomo james kheli wa mmudzi mwa sudala kwa senior chief kanduku tsopano mwana alirenji 
  nzeru za cepa lero kheli mbuzi 10 wayamba kukolola matumba 50 chimanga kuchoka 15 kheli banja lake wabzala mitengo 300 akupanga ulimi wa mleranthaka munda wa chinangwa momwe akupha ndalama 
  ndikulipirira mwana wa folomu 3 telemu k20 000 ndamanga nyumba ya malata ndagula wailesi mpando wa pamwamba adatero kheli 
  yopanga makala ankachitira kale alibe zonse amakhala kumunda kubusa banja lake limakhala kumsika kugulitsa mandasi momwenso akupha ndalama 
  akufotokozera mkazi sineliya kale amadalira makala lero nkhani idasintha kale timapeza ndalama pootcha makala lero tili njira zambiri zopezera ndalama adatero 
  pulogalamu ya ecrp idakhazikitsidwa christian aid concern universal discover thandizo la ndalama limachoka ku uk irish boma la norway k21 biliyoni ndiyo idaikidwa 
  nkhani ya kheli chitsanzo chabe cha zomwe zikuchitikanso mmaboma nsanje chikwawa mulanje thyolo mwanza machinga balaka salima dedza kasungu karonga komwe cepa ikugwiramo ntchito

Text:
chikondi cha nkhwangwa dpp udf akumana pachisankho chachibwereza ubale wa pakati chipani cholamula cha dpp chotsutsa cha udf mnyumba ya malamulo womwe umaoneka ukhala wa mpakana imfa kuwalekanitsa wayamba kuwonekera mawanga ake zipanizi zanenetsa aima payekha mchisankho cha makhansala chachibwereza chikubwera mwezi wamawawu 
  kasaila aona za mchipani chake mneneri wa chipani cha dpp francis kasaila wauza tamvani palibe mgwirizano uliwonse pakati zipani ziwirizi kunja kwa nyumba ya malamulo momwe ambiri amaganizira 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc polankhua lachitatu lapitali kasaila adati pachisankho chomwe chichitike 25 august chipani chilichonse chili pachokha aimiriri adzakumana maso maso 
  aona za mchipani chake mgwirizano womwe ulipo wothandizana mnyumba ya malamulo basi osati kunja chipani chilichonse chipanga ganizo pachokha kuimitsa munthu ayi palibe zoimitsa munthu kuimira zipani ziwirizi adatero kasaila 
  naye mneneri wa chipani cha udf ken ndanga adati chipani chawo chikupanga zake pankhani yokhudza chisankho chachibwerezachi 
  ndanga adati pakalipano atsogoleri chipani cha udf mmaboma akuyendetsa zonse zokhudza kukonzekera chisankhochi kulikulu adzalandira maina omwe adzaimire chipanichi posachedwapa 
  palibe mgwirizano uliwonse wokhudza za chisankho ubale nku nyumba ya malamulo basi kunja kuno zake moti kukutsimikizirani pachisankhochi tidzaimitsa makandideti athu adatero ndanga 
  katswiri wa za malamulo edge kanyongolo adati mgwirizano wa zipanizi sukuwamanga sadasayinirane paliponse adangokambirana basi 
  adati zipanizi zili ufulu wosankha odzaziyimirira odzaimirira wawo popanda chiletso chilichonse 
  palibe chowamanga mgwirizano sudalembetsedwe zili eni ake kukambirana kumvana chimodzi adatero kanyongolo 
  mneneri wa bungwe loyendetsa zisankho mdziko muno la malawi electoral commission mec sangwani mwafulirwa adati bungweli silikhudzidwa kasankhidwe ka opikisana nawo pachisankho 
  sitilowerera nawo pankhani imeneyo chomwe timayangana nchakuti opikisana nawo ankhale chizindikiro basi kaya akuima payekha kaya akuyimira chipani mgwirizano akuyenera chizindikiro adatero mwafulirwa 
  chipani cha udf chidasankha kugwira ntchito chipani cha dpp mnyumba ya malamulo nkhaniyi idachititsa mabungwe zipani zina zipemphe sipikala wa nyumbayi achotse aphungu 11 udf potsatira gawo 65 la malamulo lino mpakana sipikalayu sadagamule chilichonse pankhaniyi 
  gawoli limati phungu yemwe adali mchipani china panthawi yakusankhidwa kwake adzasiya udindowu walowa chipani china chomwe chilinso mnyumba yomweyi 
  mwa akuluakulu mabungwe omenyerera ufulu wa billy mayaya adalembera kalata sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo richard msowoya aphunguwo adaphwanya gawo 65 ndiye achoke mnyumbayi 
  mneneri wa chipani cha mcp jessie kabwila naye adati mpovuta aphunguwo akhalebe mnyumbayi mbali yawo yeniyeni sikudziwika 
  chipani cha udf chidakana aphungu ake asintha chipani adangoganiza zogwira ntchito chipani cholamula cha dpp basi 
  chilengezereni nkhaniyi chipani cha udf chidalandidwa ufulu woyankhapo pankhani za boma chipani chotsutsa boma mnyumba ya malamulo 
  mec idatulutsa ndondomeko ya momwe chisankho cha chibwereza cha mmadera 5 chidzayendere ikuyenera kumaliza kulandira zikalata za odzapikisana nawo 28 july uno 
  mwafulirwa adati zokonzekera zonse zikuyenda ayembekezere chisankho chapamwamba bungweli lili ndalama zochepa zoyendetsera chisankhochi 
  chisankho chonse chimafunika k400 miliyoni tili k141 miliyoni palibe chogwedeza chilichonse zonse zidzayenda bwinobwino adatero mwafulirwa 
  mmadera momwe muchitike chisankhochi luchenza dera la pakati ku zomba msikiti ku mangochi chibanja ku mzuzu khwawa mboma la karonga
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
akana nyau yogwiririra senior chief lukwa mwa mafumu akuluakulu achewa mdziko muno yemwenso amayankha pankhani za mafumu wati munthu yemwe khothi mboma la dedza lidamupeza wolakwa pamlandu wogwiririra si wagulewamkulu momwe adakonzera zioneke 
  khothi la dedza lomwe wogamula adali first grade magistrate enett banda lidapeza lazaro maxwell wa zaka 19 wolakwa pamlandu wogwiririra mtsikana wa zaka 14 atadzizimbaitsa gulewamkulu asadziwike lidagamula akagwire ndende yakalavulagaga kwa zaka 8 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka achewa amalemekeza gulewamkulu gule wa mizimu malingana apolisi mbomali maxwell adavomera mlanduwo mbwalolo woimira boma pamlanduwo inspector wedson nyondo adapempha bwalololo lipereke chilango chokhwima kwa wopalamulayo kaamba koti woyimbidwa mlanduyo adanyozetsa chikhalidwe cha achewa 
  mpofunika kulingalira munthuyu wanyazitsa chikhalidwe cha achewa chomwe eni ake amateteza kuyambira kalekale kotero nkofunika kumpatsa chilango chokhwima zotere zisamachitikechiteke adatero nyondo 
  poperekapo maganizo ake pankhaniyi senior chief lukwa adati munthu yemwe adachita si wagulewamkulu yemwe amadziwika gule wa mizimu munthu wazifukwa za mtopola wofuna kunyazitsa achewa 
  lukwa umenewo mtopola uwu ndiye timati mtopola mdziko muli khalidwe lolemekezana kulemekezerana miyambo zikhulupiriro zoyenera mchewa weniweni sangachite zimenezi ameneyu munthu wongofuna kuononga mbiri yabwino ya achewa adatero lukwa 
  adati khothi lomwe lidagamula mlanduwo lidachita kumulanga chotero anzeru zangati zakezo atengerepo phunziro lolemekeza mitundu miyambo 
  malingana umboni udaperekedwa mbwalo la milandulo 8 mwezi womwe uno maxwell mnzake wina yemwe sadatchulidwe adadziveka gulewamkulu pomwe adakumana msungwana wogwiririridwayo patchire lina lomwe limalekanitsa midzi ya bowazulu kalipande 
  umboniwo udapitirira kenena msungwanayo atangodutsana gulewamkuluyo maxwell adayamba kumuthamangitsa atamugwira adamukokera patchire nkumugwiririra 
  poti wogwiririrayo adali mchigoba msungwanayo adati munthu woyambirira kumuganizira adali maxwell adakhala akumuvutitsa amamufuna chibwenzi amamukana nkhaniyi itafika kukhothi sadataye kuvomera mlanduwo 
  mlandu wogwiririra mwana wamngono umatsutsana ndime 138 ya malamulo ogamulira milandu munthu akapezeka wolakwa chilango chake chachikulu zaka 14 akugwira ntchito yakalavula gaga kundende 
  maxwell amachokera mmudzi mwa chatondeza pomwe msungwanayo amachokera mmudzi mwa kalipande kwa t chilikumwendo mboma la dedza
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
gwengwe akufuna milandu ya katangale izitha wapampando wakomiti ya ya malamulo yowona za ndondomeko ya zachuma sosten gwengwe wati magulu osiyanasiyana akuyenera kugwirana manja ntchito yolimbana wakatangale mdziko muno 
 nkhani tikayiyamba izitha gwengwe gwengwe yemwenso phungu wa ya malamulo wa dera la lilongwe nsonzi north wauza radio maria malawi kusiyirana komwe kukumakhalapo nkhani zakatangale komwe kukuchititsa nkhani zambiri zokhudza katangaleyu zisamaoneke tsogolo lake 
 pamenepa wapempha magulu onse okhudzidwa azigwilana manja kuchoka pomwe nkhani yakatangale yayamba mpaka kumapeto kufikira olakwa atalandira chilango 
 nkhani tikayiyamba izitha bwinobwino mpaka olakwa atalandira chilango choyenera kaamba koti nkhanizi zimakhudza tonse malawi ndiye kofunika tigwirizane chilungamo chidziwoneka anatero gwengwe 
 mwazina gwengwe wati mchitidwewu ulekeledwa lino likhalabe likumana mavuto umphawi kaamba kakusakazika kwa ndalama za boma mosakhala
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
fetereza wa makuponi akusowa atero pamene alimi kalikiliki kuthira fetereza wachiwiri mminda mwawo tamvani yapeza fetereza wa makuponi akusowa mmidzi ina alimi sadagulebe 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc msabatayi alimi ochokera mmaboma dedza chitipa nkhotakota chiradzulu atsimikiza fetereza adangofika kamodzi kokha atatha alimiwo adalonjezedwa fetereza wina afika posakhalitsa ilo lidangokhala loto la chumba kufikira pomwe timalemba nkhaniyi nkuti maso kunjira 
  mneneri wa unduna wa zamalimidwe sara tione wati ndizabodza fetereza wafikira madera onse 
  mwina ndifufuze kaye ndikudziwa fetereza adafika madera onse alimi agula kale adatero tione 
  malinga wa bungwe la mgwirizano wa alimi la famers union of malawi fum felix jumbe ndondomeko zatsopano zikumalangiza alimi azithira fetereza pomwe akubzala mbewu 
  fetereza wachiwiri athirenso pomwe chimanga chili masamba asanu 
  malinga jumbe alimi omwe achedwa kuthira fetereza wachiwiri akuthira akuti awa mavuto aakulu kwa alimi 
  wilfred ngonya wa mmudzi mwa mkombanyama kwa t mwaulambia mboma la chitipa amalima chimanga soya munda wa chimanga wokula yekala imodzi theka wathira fetereza amakolola matumba khumi kupanda fetereza akuti zimabweretsa mavuto kwa matumba anayi satuluka 
  adalandira kuponi fetereza ndiye vuto mmudzi mwawo akuti 500 ndiwo adalandira makuponi omwe adagula sakuposa 200 
  makuponi tidalandira novembala fetereza amabwera disembala atangotha ameneyo adati abwera wina mpaka lero tikungosunga makuponi 
  ndimathira fetereza wachiwiri chimanga chili masamba awiri chimanga chili masamba asanu boma litiganizire aka ndikoyamba kuno kukumana vutoli adatero ngonya 
  nako ku dedza kwa t tambala akuti mwa mafumu 42 sadalandire fetereza gulupu lodzanyama ikuvomereza zafika lekaleka 
  kumeneko fetereza akuti amafikira mma admarc atatu mayani kafwafwa mphonde ozungulira mayani ndiwo adagula 
  zakumunda tsopano taiwala tsiku lililonse tikumakaswera ku admarc timve zenizeni za fetereza palibe chikuchitika adatero lodzanyama 
  wina wa admarc kumeneko yemwe tidalankhulana naye adakana kulemba udindo dzina ponena amawakaniza adatsimikiza za nkhaniyo 
  disembala tidalandira matumba 7 168 matumbawa amati afikire madera onse kuno adatha osaposera theka ndiwo adagula adati tilandira fetereza wina tisadafike januwale mpaka adatero mkuluyo 
  nako ku nkhotakota akuti zidachitikanso motero gulupu mgomba ya kwa t mangachanzi mbomalo yati fetereza adafika disembala sadagule 
  adati fetereza afika posakhalitsa kuli zii chimanga chili mmawondo chosathira fetereza ndakhala ndikupita kwa bwanamkubwa wathu chomwe amanena nkuti fetereza afika adatero mgomba 
  jumbe wati boma lichite machawi pothandiza alimi zisokoneza ulimi 
  alimiwa sikuti akunama boma likutsutsa lipite mmudzi mwa chisaka t mwadzama mbomalo komwe alimi sadagule fetereza ndidali komweko alimi akudandaula adatero jumbe 
  adati alimi akangopeza feterezayo akuyenera asakanize wanthaka wobereketsa yatha kale 
  mndondomeko ya chaka chino ya zipangizo zotsika mtengo boma lachipani cha pp kudzera mwa mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda lidaonjezera chiwerengero cha alimi omwe apindule ndondomekoyi kuchoka 1.4 kufika 1.5

Text:
mec   ilowa pansika by slyvester kasitomu bungwe lowona za chisankho mdziko muno la malawi electoral commission mec lalengeza likhala likugulitsa wina mwa katundu wa bungweli yemwe wakhala asakugwira ntchito kwa yaitali 
 bungweli lalengeza kudzera chikalata chomwe latulutsa mneneri wa bungwe li sangwani mwafuliwa wati malawi asakhale nkhawa yoti katundu yemwe akugulitsayu yemwe angwiritsidwa ntchito chisankho chomwe chinachitika mdziko muno mwezi watha ponena 
 mwafulirwa tatsata dongosolo loyenera katundu yemwe tikugulitsayu yekhayo yemwe samagwira ntchito anagwiritsidwa ntchito zisankho zomwe zinachitika mdziko muno zaka zapitazi anatero mwafulirwa 
 mwazina ati pogulitsa katunduyi atsata njira zoyenera zakagulitsidwe ka katundu wa boma 
 mwafulirwa tigulitse katunduyi tatsata dongosolo loyenera tiwatsimikizire malawi onse tikudziwa za chigamulo cha khothi bungwe la mec timalemekeza malamulo lino choncho katundu amene akugulitsidwayu palibe amene akukhudzidwa milandu yomwe ili kukhothi anthandiizira ntchito yokonzera chisankho cha 21 may 
 mwafulirwa amemeza mabungwe omwe si aboma atsogoleri zipani zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno adzafike tsiku la malondali adzaone katundu yemwe akugulitsidwayu 
 bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno ati lakonza zogulitsa katunduyi yemwe sakugwira ntchito amangowonongeka ku malo osungira katundu wa bungweli

Text:
kuyamba kwa zipolowe malipoti mdziko la south africa akhala akumveka mfumu ya wa chizulu gooodwill zwelithini ndiyo idakolezera moto pamene idalankhula mzika za mmaiko zibwerere kwawo ponena zikuwaphangira ntchito malipotiwo adati pamsonkhano wina ku polonga mdzikolo mfumuyo idati achilendo mene amatchedwa makwerekwere ku south africa apakire tawo nkubwerera kumudzi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc malipotiwa atangomveka obwera akhala akuona zakuda mzika za mdzikomo oposa 7 aphedwa mwa awiri mdziko muno kuvulazidwa 
  utsi sufuka popanda moto lolemba zwelithini adakana pamene amalankhula pabwalo la moses mabhida ataitanitsa mafumu mamulumuzana onse mdzikomo adati atolankhani ndiwo sadamumvetse zomwe ankanena 
  maiko mabungwe africa akhala akudzudzula zomwe zikuchitika mdzikolo 
  la nigeria nalo lidayamba kusala nzika za la south africa moti pofika lachitatu ofesi ya kazembe wa south africa ku nigeria adaitseka ku zimbabwe wailesi za mdzikolo zidasiya kuimba nyimbo za mdziko la south africa pamene ku mozambique nzika zina za mdziko la south africa zidachitidwa chipongwe galimoto zina za ku south africa zidatenthedwa 
  ku malawi adachita zionetsero lachiwiri pamene adakapereka chikalata cha madandaulo kwa kazembe wa la south africa

Text:
amabungwe akukonzanso zogwirira ntchito limodzi pozindikira mutu umodzi susenza denga mabungwe omwe si aboma omwe akugwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno kuphatikizapo za maufulu kayendetsedwe ka boma ati cholinga chokhazikitsa kulimbikitsa mgwirizano pakati pawo azitha kugwira ntchito limodzi pofuna kutumikira wa amalawi zofuna zawo 
  mwa akuluakulu mabungwe omenyera ufulu wa kudzudzula zolakwika pakayendetsedwe ka zinthu mcdonald sembereka adatsimikizira tamvani mabungwe angapo avomera kale kulowa nawo mumgwirizanowu posachedwapa uyamba kugwira ntchito yake 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka cholinga chathu nchimodzi basi oyimirira amalawi kuonetsetsa zinthu zikuyenda amalawi sakuvutika kuphwanyiridwa maufulu osiyanasiyana taganiza poona momwe zinthu zayamba kuyendera mdziko muno adatero sembereka 
  katswiri wa zamalamulo ndale blessings chinsinga wati zomwe akulingalira mabungwewa zingatheke pokhapo atasintha khalidwe magwiridwe ntchito zawo athe kuongolera kudzudzula kayendetsedwe ka zinthu mdziko muno 
  tamvani itamufunsa maganizo ake lingaliro la mabungwewa chinsinga adati ganizoli labwino pachitukuko tsogolo la lino mabungwewa ntchito yomema amalawi awakhulupirirenso potengera momwe zinthu zakhala zikuyendera mmbuyomu 
  ganizo labwino lovuta kukwaniritsa kuyamba nkuyamba pali kusagwirizana pakati mabungwe eni ake mukhoza kutsimikiza potengera momwe ntchito za mabungwewa zakhala zikuyendera makamaka pokonza zionetsero adatero chinsinga 
  adati amalawi ambiri adataya chikhulupiriro mchaka cha 2011 pomwe atsogoleri mabungwe adamema zionetsero za lonse mapeto ake adaphedwapo patangopita pangono mabungwewa adakhala chete 
  zionetsero za 2011 ndizo zidali nsanamira ya mabungwe yosonyeza mphamvu kugwirizana mtima wofunadi kuthandiza zomwe zidachitika zija zidagwetsa ulesi waukulu moti ambiri alibenso nazo chidwi zochita za amabungwewa adatero chinsinga 
  adati chofunika apa nkuyamba apanga imodzi yomwe ingaonetse cholinga chawodi nchimodzi apo ayi palibe chomwe angapindulepo 
  sembereka wanenetsa mgwirizano wa ulendo uno ukhala wosiyana migwirizano ina yonse mmbuyomu kaamba koti zake zikhala zakupsa zomanga zotengera maganizo kudalira zokambirana mmalo mongolozana zala 
  amalawi omwe alankhula tamvani ati chimawagwetsa ulesi kwambiri nchakuti atsogoleri mabungwewa sachedwa kutembenuka akalonjezedwa kupatsidwa maudindo mboma lolamula 
  lameck silungwe wa ku chitipa adati nzokhumudwitsa amabungwe amakokomeza omenyera ufulu kudzudzula pomwe boma likulakwitsa mapeto ake amaoneka iyi njira yopemphera maudindo mboma 
  atsogoleri angati mabungwe omwe adapereka chiyembekezo mwa amalawi kenako nkutseka pakamwa amalawiwo akuwafuna kwambiri ochuluka oti mwina enafe sitingathe kuwalakatula onse zimenezi ndizo zimagwetsa ulesi adatero silungwe 
  masozi banda wa mboma la nkhata bay naye adati adali chiyembekezo chachikulu kwa amabungwe zomwe adachita mchaka cha 2011 kenako adaona wagwiritsidwa ntchito nkutayidwa wopanda phindu 
  ambiri tidalolera kupita kukapanga zionetsero mmizinda cha chikhulupiriro patangotha miyezi yochepa chabe atsogoleri ambiri adayamba kulowera kosiyanasiyana kutisiya manja mkhosi adatero banda 
  naye manuel sajiwa wa mboma la lilongwe adati akhoza mabungwewa pokhapokha ataonadi pali cholinga chenicheni osati kufuna kupanga phokoso longolambulirapo njira yopezera maudindo 
  zimayamba chonchi amabwera pangonopangono nkumatitsimikizira akudzatitsogolera timenye nkhondo ya ufulu wathu posakhalitsa umangomva ochepa makamaka iwowo mmaudindo kenako zii adatero sajiwa 
  zitachitika zionetsero za 2011 zomwe adatsogolera akuluakulu mabungwe oima paokhawa ambiri adaphedwa pazipolowe zomwe zidabuka pakati apolisi pomwe apolisi adaletsa kuononga katundu wa eni 
  patangotha miyezi yochepa chichitikireni atsogoleri mabungwe adapatsidwa maudindo mboma latsopano la pp zidakhalangati zasokoneza mgwirizano wa mabungwewa omwe adayamba kugwira ntchito paokhapaokha 
  mwa akuluakulu mabungwe omwe adalandira maudindo kuchoka mchaka cha 2011 sembereka yemwe adapatsidwa udindo wa mlangizi wa pulezidenti pankhani za mabungwe mboma la joyce banda wa chipani pp dorothy ngoma womenyera ufulu yemwe adapatsidwa udindo woyanganira za uchembere wabwino mboma lomwelo la pp mboma latsopano la dpp mwa amabungwe omwe adakhala chete atapatsidwa udindo mabvuto bamusi yemwe mlangizi wa pulezidenti zamabungwe omwe si aboma
Label: POLITICS

Text:

 amalankhula ku domasi parish mwambo wa misa yotsegulira nyumba ya sisteri chipani cha our lady of mercy chomwe achikhazikitsa kumene dayosiziyo 
 ati asisteriwa afika ku parishiyi adzatumikire choncho akhristu nawo akuyenera kuwasamalira njira zosiyanasiyana 
 tisangowona asisteri abwera kuzatitumikira anachitira abraham asisteri amasowa kusamalidwa chitetezo chawo kuwathandiza ntchito yawo agwire bwinobwino anatero ambuye tambala 
 ambuye tambala ati okondwa kufika kwa asisteriwa dayosiziyi kaamba koti athandiza kupeputsa ntchito yomwe ili dayosiziyi 
 ndine okondwa kwambiri linali khumbo lathu akhristu kwa yaitali tikhale asisteri ntchito ya mmunda mwa ambuye yakula ansembe sakanatha pawokha kufikira onse utumiki womwe abweretsa kuno ndikuwona wofunika kwambiri anatero ambuye tambala

Text:
tidangoonana koyamba basi kukumana kudziko la eni nkudziwana mumachokera kumodzi chinthu chonyaditsa kwambiri moti kwa chinansi chimayambira pomwepo atakhala amachokera mzigawo zosiyana kwawoko 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi nkhani yathu lero ya wonder msiska wochokera mboma la karonga yemwe akugwira ntchito kuwayilesi ya staryomwe idaphathikana kanema ya timveniyemwe pabanja hazel silekile naye wa ku karonga akugwira ntchito kukampani ya betams ltd 
  sadzalekana wonder hazel kutsimikiza thupi limodzi awiriwa adakumana ku britain mchaka cha 2008 komwe onse adapitira maphunziro adakaphana maso kumwambo wa chinkhoswe cha mmalawi wina nkukondana pomwepo 
  zidangochitika takondana basi ndikhulupirira momwe mulungu adakonzera choyamba tonse tidapitira maphunziro kenako nkuganiza zopita kumwambo wa chinkhoswe komwe tidakakumana adatero wonder 
  adati atakumana kuchinkhosweko sipadatenge ubwenzi uyambe mpaka kugwirizana za banja komweko 
  kusiyana omwe amadikira tchuthi akapange chinkhoswe kwawo wonder hazel akuti chinkhoswe chawo chidachitikira ku mangalande komweko ku sutton coldfied mchaka cha 2009 
  si udali mwano kudzitama ayi tinkafuna timaliziretu zomwe tidapitira kumeneko panthawi yomweyo tionetse tidakondanadi titabwerera kumudzi ku malawi mpomwe tidayamba za mwambo waukulu wa ukwati adatero wonder 
  ukwati wa awiriwa udachitikira mumzinda wa blantyre mchaka cha 2012 atabwerako ku mangalande mphatso ya ana aakazi awiri 
  wonder adanenetsa atakhalanso mwayi wina wosankha wachikondi akhoza kubwereza chisankho chake mtima udakhazikika hazel khumbo lake kudzasungana naye mpakana kalekale 
  hazel adati kwa wonder ndiye mbali imodzi ya thupi lake sangagwedezeke chilichonse mwa adapeza mwamuna wachikondi wachilungamo 
  akuti akakhala kaya nkutchito pakhomo ngakhalenso saona chomulekanitsa mwamuna wakeyu naye chiyembekezo cha banja lapamwamba lotsogola latsogolo lowala
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:

 papa amalankhula lachitatu kwa omwe anasonkhana bwalo la st peters square ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican

 wati zidani zimadzetsa nkhondo zotsatira zake zimakhala zoipa kwambiri imfa kuwonongeka kwa zinthu 
 mchaka cha 1939 la germany linayamba nkhondo la poland zomwe zinachititsa maiko britain france alowelerepo polimbana la germany zomwenso zinayambitsa nkhondo ya padziko lonse pambuyo nkhondo yoyamba ya padziko lonse yomwe inatha mchaka cha 1919

Text:

 wati wodekha kumabweretsa chiyanjano pakati pamene mkwiyo umabala chisokonezo kugawikana

Text:
boma ku cape maclear sakumvana nkhani ya malo hotela wolemba thokozani chapola kusamvana kwabuka pakati boma mmudzi wa chembe mdera la cape maclear mboma la mangochi nkhani ya malo amene pamangidwe hotela ya pamwamba 5 star hotel 
 zadziwika mkumano omwe akuluakulu ku unduna wa zokopa khonsolo ya boma la mangochi anachititsa pokumana mderali kuwafotokozera za chitukukochi 
 anthuwa anayankhula poyera sakufuna kuchoka malowa kaamba koti umoyo wawo wa tsiku tsiku amadalira nyanjayi apempha boma likufuna hotelayi liwonetsetse isakhudze malo amene anthuwa akukhala 
 ifeyo tili nsomba kungotichotsa kumadzi kuno kukatisiya ku mtunda basi pompo tifa sitikukana chitukuko chinthu chabwino chizapindulira tomwe chomwe tikupempha chakuti asatisamutse kuno iwowo akufuna hotel yo amange awonetsetse isakhudze ammudzife anatero richard zatha yemwe mwa mzika za derali 
 pamenepa apempha akuluakuluwa abweretse chitsanzo cha maonekedwe hotelayi sketch map mulingo wa malo amene itenge 
 tawauza atiuze kukula kwa malo amene akufuna akanika kutero ndiye chimene tawapempha chakuti akamazabweranso ulendo wina azabweretse maonekedwe hotela imeneyi idzakahala yowoneka izafuna malo aakulu tidziwiretu itakhudze mdera lino anatero zatha 
 polankhulapo pakutha msonkhanowu bwanamkubwa wa boma la mangochi mbusa moses chimphepo wati okondwa mderali atulutsa madandaulo awonetsetsa achite momwe anthuwa akufunira 
 chimene chandisangalatsa chakuti kuno chitukukochi sakuchikana sakufuna project imeneyi iwachotse ku dera kuno pamene tisanamvetsaetsane kukula kwa malo omwe akufunidwawo ndiye zimenezo tidikira akatswiri abwere azayeze malo amene afunidwewo pamene tizawadziwitsenso anatero mbusa chimphepo 
 ntchito ya yomweyi inakanikanso mzaka za pakati 2013 2015 pamene kampani ya motaengil imkafuna hotela yapamwamba ku monkeybay mdera la masasa kaamba koti sanamvane maganizo eni derali
Label: SOCIAL

Text:

  mneneri wa chipani cha peoples party pp ken msonda wa chipani cha udf ken ndanga kudzanso womenyera ufulu wa unandi banda apempha bungweli likonze zinthu msanga zipani zonse zikhale chikhulupiriro bungweli 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka msonda sitikukondwa nazo zimezi ndemanga za akuluakuluwa zikudza pamene kubungweli kwachitika zingapo kulephereka kwa zisankho zachibwereza mmadera asanu kusokonekera kwa ndalama kutumizidwa kutchuthi kwa akuluakulu bungweli mokakamizidwa pamene bungweli likutha masiku opanda wapampando chimwalirireni mwadzidzidzi amene adali mtsogoleri maxon mbendera 
  msonda adati zomwe zikuchitika ku mec zikuonetseratu bungweli silikugwira ntchito mokomera zipani zotsutsa 
  kutumiza ogwira ntchito kutchuthi nkhani yabwino tidziwe momwe ndalama zoposa k15 miliyoni zidasowera vuto lathu kuimitsa zisankho zapaderazi zisachitike 
  sitikukondwa nazo zikuonetseratu bungweli likunjenjemera boma ichi nchipongwe zisankho zapadera zisachitike tadandaula nazo adatero msonda 
  adati kusachititsa zisankho zapaderazi kuwaphwanyira ufulu maderawo ntchito zachitukuko zakumtima kwawo sizingapherezere kaamba kosowa wokatula nkhawa zawo ku nyumba ya malamulo kukhonsolo 
  naye ndanga adati chikuwadandaulitsa si kuimitsidwa kokha kwa zisankho chachibwereza zingakhudze chisankho cha 2019 
  ntchito yochititsa chisankho simangochitika tsiku limodzi ndondomeko yomwe imachitika kwa yaitali nanga poti kulibeko ntchito igwirika tikudandaula nazo adatero ndanga 
  mogwirizana akulu zipani ziwirizi banda adati kutumizidwa kutchuthi kwa akuluakulu kusowa kwa mtsogoleri wa bungweli nkhani yodandaulitsa 
  mwachidule zikutanthauza tilibe bungwe loyendetsa zisankho bungweli limakhalapo lili mtsogoleri omuthandizira ndiye bungwe lilipo akudabwa banda 
  wa nthambi yoona za chuma kubungweli linda kunje akuti asadandaule zonse zilongosoka 
  palibe chovuta zipani zisadandaule adatero kunje 
  malamulo zisankho amati pasadutse miyezi itatu dera lisadachititse chisankho chopeza mtsogoleri chichokereni chimwalirireni mtsogoleri amene adalipo kunje aadati akudziwa za komabe sangachitire mwina 
  inde taphwanya lamulo sitingachitire mwina pali zifukwa zomveka zomwe zatilepheretsa kuchititsa zisankhozi adatero kunje
Label: POLITICS

Text:
tinkaimba limodzi kwaya mdalitso suoneka pakudza munthu umangozindikira walandira mphatso osadziwa yachoka malingana ntchito zomwe ukuchita momwe mvula zakale adanenera ntchito iliyonse ili mphotho yake 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kudzipereka komwe adachita joseph kaluwa victoria mdala kaluwa mchaka cha 2014 posankha kutumikira mulungu mnjira ya kwaya patchalitchi ya mpingo wa chikatolika wa don bosco ku lilongwe kudawalunjikitsira kumoyo wina wopambana 
  awiriwa akuti amaimba kwaya limodzi kenako adagwa mchikondi atakhutitsidwa adalengedwa adzakhale limodzi adabadwira kukulira mbali ziwiri zosiyana za lino la malawi 
  joseph victoria tsiku la ukwati wawo ndinkasangalala tikamaimba ndikamamva ake nthetemya china chomwe chidanditenga mtima nchakuti amakonda kupemphera kutumikira kutchalitchi adatero joseph 
  adati adayesetsa awiriwa akhale pachinzake cha mchimwene mlongo kwa miyezi yokwana 6 ataona akhoza kungobwera nkuphumitsa adaganiza zomasuka mwa mphamvu ya mulungu yomwe idawakumanitsa zinthu zidatheka 
  joseph adaonjeza panthawiyo nkuti atangomaliza maphunziro ake zowerengera ndalama asadayambe ntchito victoria adali akadali pasukulu sadawerenge pozindikira mulungu adzawatsogolera 
  tidalimba mtima tidasangalala makolo abale athu adatithandiza kwambiri mpaka tidapanga chinkhoswe chidali cha mnyumba pambuyo pake tidamanga ukwati woyera omwe tidakadalitsira ku tchalitchi ya don bosco 29 september 2015 adatero joseph 
  victoria adati sadalabadire zoti panthawiyo joseph samagwira ntchito iliyonse iyeyo adakonda munthu osati chuma adali wokondwa kwambiri makolo ake atavomereza chibwenzicho 
  adati loto limodzi lokhala banja la ulemu lowopa mulungu momwe zilili pano.n pemphero langa ndilakuti zipitirire momwe zilili ndili pabanja lokoma kwambiri ndimakonda mwamuna wanga kwambiri ana anga atatu adatero victoria 
  joseph amachokera ku nthalire mboma la chitipa akugwira ntchito ku nthambi yolondoloza za momwe ndalama zikuyendera ya financial intelligence unit victoria amachokera kwa t kwataine ku ntcheu akugwira ntchito ku nthambi ya za nkhalango mboma
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:

  mkuluyu adati akaona zizindikiro za matendawa kutuluka misonzi pafupipafupi kuyabwa kufiira maso zizindikiro zina azithamangira ku chipatala akapimidwe madotolo

Text:
bishop tambala appeals for concerted efforts for unity by all pastoral agents 
 by judith sonkho bishop of zomba diocese rt rev george desmond tambala has urged all groups discharging pastoral duties in the diocese to be united in all areas for the benefit of the church 
 rt rev tambala was speaking at zomba cathedral during the feast of presentation of the lord and the commemoration of world day of consecrated life 
 bishop tambala said among others unity brings in effectiveness in all missions of the church 
 rt rev george desmond tambala bishop of zomba diocese there is strength in unity it contributes in the effectiveness of all missions of the church by bringing together your resources talents and gifts the church benefits lot bishop tambala said 
 commenting on what the bishop said fr harvey chikumbu of the capuchin echoed that unity was brought by jesus christ himself during the time he was leaving his disciples he advised them to be one meaning unity therefore the church has to emulate it 
 unity was brought by jesus christ himself during the time he was leaving his disciples he advised them to be one meaning unity therefore in the catholic church we have different charisms that have to be shown in different areas there are different orders in the church some are working in hospital schools and some are working hand in hand with the people in the field therefore all these have different works in the church and at the end all these become one which is the body of christ concluded fr chikumbu the eucharist celebration mass brought together all the pastoral agents in the diocese and celebrates their unity
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
boma latipaka mafuta pakamwa ogwira ntchito mboma ati boma lawapaka mafuta pakamwa powalonjeza malipiro akwera k61 k100 iliyonse kuyambira mwezi wa march malipirowo sanakwere boma lidalonjezera 
  auzatamvanimsabatayi malipiro akwera pomwe sadakwere atinso magiledi afanana kakwezedwe kakusiyana pomwe adakaphulabe njerwa zamoto 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc boma ogwira ntchito mbomawa adagwirizana za malipirowa mmwezi wa february chaka chino pomwe antchitowa adachita zionetsero sabata ziwiri pokakamiza boma lisunthe malipiro 
  amati bomali likweze k67 k100 iliyonse boma lidati likwanitsa kukweza k61 mgwirizanowo udati omwe amalandira ndalama zochepetsetsa ndiwo alandire k61 nambalayo izichepa mpaka kufika k5 kwa bwana kwambiri mboma 
  mphunzitsi wina yemwe mgiledi l-4 kusukulu ina mboma la ntcheu wati kumeneko aphunzitsi adakhalirana pansi aone momwe alandirira malipiro 
  amene talandira giledi l-4 giledi imeneyi ndiyo yotsikitsitsa kwa aphunzitsi malipiro athu akwera k2 000 pomwe asintha k500 sadawawonjezere kalikonse 
  omwe talandira bwinofe amene tikulimba ntchito tikutengedwa tikulandira kusiyana anzathu maphunziro asokonekera kale zonse tikungokambirana zimenezi kusiya kuphunzitsa adatero mphunzitsiyo yemwe ankalandira k29 000 
  ogwira ntchito kuchipatala akuti malipiro akwera pomwe adakali pakale 
  giledi yathu timalandira k26 000 zawayendera pomwe alandira k34 000 palibe chasintha tikusowa tifunsa ndani adatero wina 
  malinga wapolisi wina wapolisi yemwe amalandira ndalama zotsikitsitsa ndiconstableyomwe k32 000 malinga kwa malipiro maconstableena awakwezera k1 000 
  zikuvuta kuzimvetsa palibe akwezapo apa momwe zinthu zakwerelamu sangakweze malipiro k1000 moyo wamavuto ukupitiriza sizichepetsabe wa ziphuphu pakati apolisi adatero wapolisiyo akuvomerezana wapolisi wina yemwe amati malipiro ake sadasinthe 
  kwa mamesenjala zinthu akuti zili pomwe aona ulemerero kukwera mtengo kwa malipiro omwe tidacheza nawo ku depatimenti yoona zolowa kutuluka ya immigration adati malipiro akwera kuchoka k19 000 akadulidwa msonkho kufika k31 000 
  ayi bolani kusiyana poyamba adatero mesenjala wina akugula mandasi kumeneko 
  wa bungwe loona ufulu wa ogwira ntchito mboma la civil servants trade union mctu elijah kamphinda banda sadakane kuvomereza za nkhaniyi ponena mgwirizano omwe anthuwa boma adapanga ukuwonedwabe 
  bvutoli litha loona poti makonzedwe ake othamanga kwambiri poganizira za ntchito zomwe zidaima pomwe timakakamiza boma likweze malipiro komabe pokambirana mbali zonse zidagwirizana wolandira k18 000 adutse k29 000 zidachikadi 
  panopa zokambirana zili mkati malingana mgwirizano wa mbali ziwirizi pofunuka kuthetsa zolakwika za malipirowa july adzakhale atsopano adatero kamphinda 
  adafotokozapo momwe kuwonjezerako kudachitikira mwachitsanzo wolandira zochepa adaonjezeredwa k11 000 kutanthauza mwa ndalama zimenezi k3 300 yapita ku msonkho munthuyu watsala k7 700 basi timanena ndife akapolo msonkho 
  adatinso bungwe lawo lidzanena chomwe lingachite zokambiranazi sizingathe potsindika pofika july zonse zikhala zitayera 
  mneneri wa boma moses kunkuyu wati oimira ogwira mbomawa omwe amakambirana boma amayenera kufotokozera za momwe malipirowo akhalire asadayambe kusangalala malipiro akwera 
  omwe amayenera kulandira k61 omwe akulandira ndalama zochepetsetsa malipirowo amanka nasintha malinga giledi yomwe munthu aona malipiro asintha asadabwe ndizo tidagwirizana adatero kunkuyu 
  pankhani yoti akulandira malipiro osiyana giledi imodzi adati imeneyo ndiye yoyenera kukhalira pansi ndikuona pavuta pati omwe amaimira anthuwa bwezi atabwera nkhaniyi ndikupeza pomwe padakhota zotere zichitike

Text:

 sitisekelera mchitidwewu navicha navitcha awuza radio maria malawi padakalipano unduna wawo mogwirizana magulu okhudzidwa akuchita chotheka mayiyu athandizidwe 
 achipongwe adadula zala zamayiyu yemwe wakhungu la chi alubino 
 ndikufuna ndinene sitisekerera yemwe akuchitira nkhanza akhungu la chialubino onnse akapezeka tiwamanga alandile chilango kaamba koti akuchitazi nzoipa kwambiri kwa anthuwa antero navitcha

Text:
malawi mumdima wa dzaoneni la malawi laona mdima womwe sudaonekepo chilandirireni ufulu wodziyimira palokha madera akukhala masiku awiri magetsi osayaka kwina ndiye mpaka kumatha masiku atatu akangoyaka pena sakumatha ola upeza azima kale
