Text:
nkhoma yakhumudwitsa dpp utm zipani za democratic progressive party dpp utm zati zakhumudwa kalata yomwe sinodi ya nkhoma ya mpingo wa ccap yatulutsa sabata yatha 
  kalatayo yomwe siidatchule dzina la mtsogoleri ikufotokozera akhristu ampingowo munthu woyenera kudzamuvotera 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kaliati nkhoma   yalakwa kalatayo ikuti mtsogoleri woyenera kumuvotera yemwe wodzadzidwa mzimu woyera wangwiro wokonda chitukuko wosasankha potengera mitundu yawo yemwe chidwi chothana katangale 
  nduna yofalitsa nkhani henry mussa adati mpingowo usaiwale mmbuyomu nawonso udakhudzidwa nkhani za ziphuphu katangale 
  mchaka cha 2014 mwa ogwira ntchito ku sinodi ya nkhoma adanyambita k61 886 389.11 ya ntchito zachitukuko   boma la america ndilo lidapereka ndalamazo kudzera bungwe lake la chitukuko la united states agency for international development usaaid 
  mlembi wa nkhoma nthawiyo mbusa vasco kachipapa adavomera zinthu zidalakwika sinodiyo idabweza ndalamazo 
  membala wa mpingo chipembedzo chilichonse chili ufulu wopikitsana nawo mpando uliwonse wa ndale choncho nkulakwa mpingo uzisiyanitsa ndiwoyera kuposa anzawo kalata yomwe boma latulutsa yasayinidwa mussa yatero 
  ndunayi idati za sinodiyo zangokolanakolana mkalatayo 
  naye mlembi wa utm patricia kaliati adati zomwe yachita sinodiyo pouza mamembala ake atsogoleri woyera poyerekeza anzawo nkulakwa nzogawanitsa 
  tikayamba kufukulana kodi pakhala zabwino mtsogoleri tiyambe kumuunika mbiri yake kodi woyera mtima apezekapo momwe ikulankhulira sinodiyo zinazi tiyeni tiziweruza mtima wangwiro adatero kaliati 
  adati sinodi mpingo idayenera kuuza nkhosa zake zisafooke mmapemphero kupembedzera lino zisankho zidzayende osati kubzala mbewu zamipatuko mitima mwawo 
  mkalata yake sinodi ikuti boma silikuonetsa chidwi pofufuza kuphedwa kwa mnyamata wa ku polytechnic robert chasowa mwa akuluakulu anti corruption bureau acb issa njauju buleya lule yemwe amakhudzidwa nkhani yodzembetsa mwana wachialubino 
  mbusa wamkulu sinodiyo mbusa bizwick nkhoma adati mpingo umalembera akhristu ake kalatayo osati chipani chilichonse choncho sangayankhe zomwe chipani chilichonse chikulankhula
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mafumu ku zambia akulowerera kwa mkanda   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   pamene nkhani ya mpungwepungwe wa nyanja ya malawi pakati lino la tanzania ili mkamwamkamwa nawo mafumu la zambia pakalikiriki kugawira malo mbali ya lino kwa mfumu mkanda mboma la mchinji 
  malinga mfumu mkanda mkangano wa malo kumalire lino zambia udayamba zaka za mma 1970 
  mkanda adauzatamvanimsabatayi mzakazi kumaloku kwakhala kukufika akuluakulu boma ochokera ku chipata mdziko la zambia blantyre lilongwe kukakambirana zothana mpungwepungwewu 
  mchaka cha 1998 1999 kudabwera aboma kudzakambirana vutoli likadalipo ndithu akugulitsa malowa chanje mkandamateyo yemwe mwana wa agogo yemwe adatsalira ku zambia ya chitaganya cha rhodesia nyasaland idatero mfumuyi 
  iyo idati mfumu chanje yalowerera maesiteti ochulukirapo mpale chimwamkango chimwemwe mthyolasenje chankhungu pomwe mkandamateyu amamvetsa kusiya kulowereraku akauzidwa kutero 
  kuno milandu ya malo simatha timangokhalira kukangana anzathu ku zambia omwe ativutitsa kwabasi iwowa sakulemekeza mabikoni omwe adaikidwa kumaloku mkanda adatero 
  adati zakhudza ake omwe akusowa malo olima 
  polankhulapo pankhaniyi dc wa boma la mchinji yamikani chitete adati ofesi yake yakhala ikulandira madandaulo kwa eni maesiteti omwe alowereredwawa 
  mwezi wa may kunabwera kudzadandaulanso za nkhaniyi tinawauza tifikako mavoti patatu akadutsa choncho anzanga ku chipata tipitako lachisanu dzulo chitete adatero 
  bwanamkubwayu adati mmbyomu kumaloku kudapitidwanso pamodzi bwanamkubwa wa boma la chipata atawalankhula anthuwo adachoka mokakamizidwa apolisi dzikolo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
chimulirenji apempha boma mipingo ziyendere limodzi wolemba thokozani chapola /wp content uploads/2019/09 chimulirenji.jpg alt= width="456 height="340 />wapempha mgwirizano wa boma mipingo chimulirenji wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino everton chimulirenji wati boma mipingo zikuyenera kugwirana manja potukula lino 
 chimulirenji amalankhula lero ku st lukes college of nursing ku malosa mboma la zomba mwambo wopereka ma diploma unamwino uzamba kwa okwana 176 omwe atsiriza maphunziro awopa college yi ati boma liwonetsetsa ophunzira omwe akutsiriza maphunziro azipeza ntchito mosavuta ubale wa boma mpingo wa kalekale omwe amatithandiza kukwaniritsa masomphenya athu choncho tikupempha ubale umenewu upitilire chitukuko chipite patsogolo anatero chimulirenji 
 mmawu ake bishop wa anglican dayosizi ya uppershire brighton malasa wati chikhulupiliro anamwino azamba atsopanowa akagwira ntchito yawo moyenera 
 tawaphunzitsa mokwanira moyenera chiyembekezo chathu akagwira ntchito ytawo moyenera mmadera muli monse momwe akuyembekezeka kukagwiramo ntchito anatero bishop malasa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
afuna chitukuko chofanana mmadera aphungu ntchito za chitukuko mmadera oyimiriridwa aphungu ku nyumba ya malamulo chiyamba kufanana tsopano ntchito yodulanso malire ikachitika 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka bungwe loyanganira zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec lati ntchitoyi tsopano ikungodikira katswiri wochokera kunja yemwe adzaigwire 
  zonse zatheka tsopano tikungodikira katswiri yemwe achokere kunja kudzagwira ntchito yodulanso malirewa katswiriyu sitikumudziwa atumizidwa akuluakulu bungwe la commonwealth chidatero chikalata chomwe bungweli lidatulutsa 
  mneneri wa bungwe la sisankho mdziko muno sangwani mwafulirwa adati kudulanso malirewa kuthandiza aphungu onse 193 azikhala madera ofanana chiwerengero chofanana cha 
  madera pakalipano aakulu kwambiri pomwe aangono kwambiri ndiye poti aphungu amagwira ntchito imodzi madera akhale ofanana ntchito ikhalenso chimodzimodzi adatero mwafulirwa 
  adati mwachitsanzo dera la chigawo cha pakati mboma la lilongwe ndicho chili chachikulu kwambiri oponya voti 126 115 pomwe dera la chilumba cha likoma ndicho chochepetsetsa ovota 6 933 basi 
  pali kusiyana kotereku ndalama za chitukuko zomwe aphungu amalandira zotukulira madera zimakhala chimodzimodzi kutanthauza ndalama zomwezo kwina zikuthandiza ochuluka kuposa kwina 
  zinthu zili choncho palinso nkhani yosintha ndondomeko ya kayendetsedwe ka chisankho yomwe kauniuni wa malamulo akale adachitika komiti yomwe imachita kauniuniyu idatulutsa kale zotsatira zake 
  imodzi mwa zikuluzikulu mndondomeko yatsopanoyi yakuti aphungu asamakhale malire boma lililonse lizikhala chiwerengero cha aphungu potengera chiwerengero cha mbomalo 
  mwafulirwa adati bungwe la mec silinganenepo kanthu za tsogolo la ntchito yodulanso madera aphungu potengera malamulo atsopanowa pokhapokha nthambi ya zamalamulo idzanene yomaliza 
  nzoonadi ndondomeko yatsopanoyi idapangidwa sidaperekedwe kunthambi ya zamalamulo law commission zonse zidzidziwika nthambiyi ikadzanena maganizo ake panopa tiyeni tibatsata zomwe zilipo adatero mwafulirwa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
muluzi wamema aku machinga adzavotere mutharika mtsogoleri wa chipani cha united democratic front udf atupele muluzi wapempha mboma la machinga adzavotere professor peter mutharika chisankho cha president chomwe chikuyembekezeka kuchitika 23 mwezi uno 
 muluzi msonkhano wokopa muluzi walankhula misonkhano yake yokopa wanthu yomwe wachititsa mbomalo wati mbomalo akuyenera kudzavotera mtsogoleri wa mgwilizano wu kaamba koti amene kuthekera kothandiza ntchito zolimbimbikitsa ufulu weniweni wa demokalase chitukuko cha lino 
 mwa zina misonkhano yi muluzi kukayendera mnyamata amene anavulala chipolowe chomwe chinachitika mbomalo pomwe mbomalo anatsekera njira kuyamba kulimbana mtsogoleri wa chipani cha utm dr saulos chilima asadutse mdelaro 
 pamenepa muluzi wapempha apolisi afufuze za momwe apolisi zachitetezo cha dr chilima yemwe wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino anagwilira ntchito zawo zokhazikitsa bata malowa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
papa akana kugona hotela yodula ku mozambique wolemba thokozani chapola 9/06 pope in romania.jpg 301w sizes="(max width 526px 100vw 526px />papa ulendo wa mmbuyomu mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco akuti wakana kukakhala ku hotela yapamwamba kwambiri paulendo wamasiku atatu ocheza mdziko la mozambique mwezi ukudzawu 
 wailesi ya vatican kulikulu la mpingowu yagwira mau bishopu antonio juliasse ferreira sandramo wakulikulu lo yemwe wanena mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolikayu wakana ndandanda wa mahotela pamwamba omwe akulukaulu omwe akuyendetsa dongosolo laulendowu mdziko la mozambique anatumiza ku likululo nthumwi za papa ulendowu zisankhe ati papa sakufuna malo apamwamba kwambiri 
 papa akuyembekezeka kukayendera la mozambique kuyambira 4 mpaka 6 mwezi wa mawa
Label: RELIGION

Text:
bwanankubwa wa boma la chitipa wamwalira covid-19 bwanamkubwa wa boma la chitipa humphreys kapalamula gondwe wamwalira kaamba ka nthenda ya covid-19 
 mneneri wa unduna woona za maboma aangono chitukuko cha madera akumidzi mushawase mughogho watsimikiza za nkhaniyi polankhula radio maria malawi 
 wati thupi la bwanamkubwayu layikidwa kale mmanda madzulo lero ku zolozolo mzinda wa mzuzu 
 humpreys gondwe amwaliradi coronavirus zambiri zinenedwabe padakalipano malirowo ayikidwa lero lomwe ku zolozolo motsatira ndondomeko za chipatala anatero mughogho 
 pali chiopsezo ma ofesi bwanankubwayu atha kutsekedwa muthiridwe mankhwala othandiza kupewa kachilombo ka coronavirus 
 zadza pamene patsala masiku ochepa chabe kuchitike chisankho cha mtsogoleri ma ofesi bwanamkubwa mboma lililonse amayenera kugwiritsidwa ntchito powerengera ma voti
Label: HEALTH

Text:
ngamba iopsezanso chaka chinounduna chaka chatha kudali kakasi pankhani ya ulimi mvula itadula pomwe mbewu zambiri maka chimanga zimamasula zidachititsa alimi ambiri asakolole mokwanira moti njala idalowa kale 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu vutoli lidagwa kaamba ka mvula ya njomba makamaka potsatira kwa nyengo unduna wa zamalimidwe mthirira chitukuko cha madzi wachenjeza zomwe zidaoneka chaka chatha zingathe kuchitikanso chaka chino mmadera 
  mlimi kudandaula kufota kwa mmera mmunda chaka chatha undunawu wati potengera zomwe apeza nthambi ya zanyengo madera akhoza kulandira mvula yokwana pomwe ayi zikhoza kuchititsa mvula idzadule msanga mmadera 
  polingalira alimi ambiri amadalira ulimi wa mvula undunawu wati alimi amalize msanga kukonza minda yawo mvula ikangogwa adzabzale mbewu mvula yoyambirira 
  pali chiyembekezo chakuti madera akhoza kulandira mvula yochepa zomwe zingapangitse ngamba mkati mwa nyengo ya mvulayi zikhoza kupangitsa mvula isiye msanga chidatero chikalata chomwe udatulutsa unduna wa malimidwe sabata yathayi 
  undunawu wati pofuna kuthana vuto lomwe lidaoneka chaka chatha mvula itadula mosayembekezera alimi amalize kukonza minda yawo mwachangu 
  undunawu watinso alimi alingalire kubzala mbewu zocha msanga atsatire njira ya kasakaniza njira zamalimidwe zamakono zosunga nthaka chinyontho chonde kuphimbira nthaka 
  undunawu watinso pomwe ntchito zakumunda zikuyenda alimi akangalikenso nkukolola madzi mvula ingadzadule mdera lawo adzakhale madzi okwanira mthirira omwetsa ziweto 
  polingalira za chakudya cha ziweto mtsogolo muno undunawu wati alimi omwe ziweto akumbukire kubzala nsenjere mitundu ina ya udzu chinyezi chikakhathamira mnthaka asadzavutike nyengo ya chilimwe 
  alimi atsatire zimenezi udindo wathu woonetsetsa mdziko muno muli chakudya chokwanira ukwaniritsidwe chaka chatha alimi adadzidzimutsidwa sadayembekezere zomwe zidachitika 
  si tayamba cha phunziro la chaka chatha ayi tidayamba kalekale kulimbikitsa alimi azikonzeka yabwino nkumadikira mvula ikangogwa azithamangira kumunda kukabzala adatero mlembi wamkulu muundunawu erica maganga
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
boma litemera ziweto 10 000 pofuna kuthana mliri wa matenda zilonda za m mapazi mmkamwa ngombe omwe agwa mboma la chikwawa boma lakonza zopereka katemera ku ziweto zoposa 10 000 mchigwa cha shire posachedwapa 
  mlembi wa unduna wa zamalimidwe ulimi wamthirira chitukuko cha madzi erica maganga watsimikizira uchikumbe boma laitanitsa kale mankhwala katemerayu kuchoka kudziko la botswana 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc pakalipano mankhwala mnjira akhala akufika tsiku lina lililonse ntchito yopereka katemera iyambike adatero maganga lolemba 
  adati boma lachita machawi poitanitsa katemerayu pofuna matendawa asafalikire mmadera pofuna kuteteza ntchito zina za ulimi ulimi wa mkaka 
  boma lidakhazikitsa chiletso cha malonda kutulutsa kulowetsa ziweto mboma la chikwawa zitatsimikizika mbomali mudagwa mliri wa matendawa omwe pachizungu amati foot and mouth disease 
  unduna wa zamalimidwe ulimi wamthirira chitukuko cha madzi udatsimikiza za mliriwu womwe akuti udasautsa pamalo osambitsirapo ngombe mthumba omwe mgawo loyanganira za ulimi la mitole epa 
  mchikalata chomwe maganga adasayinira sabata yatha undunawu udati chigodola cha ngombe nthenda yovuta kwambiri imagwira ziweto ngombe mbuzi nkhosa nkhumba zakutchire njati 
  potsirapo ndemanga pamliriwu wachiwiri kwa woyendetsa ntchito za zaumoyo wa ziweto ulimi wa ziweto dr patrick chikungwa adati nthendayi yowopsa kwambiri yalekereredwa imafala msanga 
  nthendayi imafala kudzera mumpweya kukhudzana kudya msipu womwe uli tizilombo virus toyambitsa matendawa adatero chikungwa adaonjezera kunena anthunso atha kufalitsa tizilombo ta nthendayi kudzera mzovala nsapato adati alimi asade nkhawa boma likuchita zothekera nthendayi isafalikire madera 
  adati zizindikiro za nthendayi kuchucha malovu matuza mkamwa pakati zikanamba za miyendo zomwe zimapangitsa ngombe izivutika poyenda 
  mlimi aona zizindikirozi chomwe ayenerea nkupatula ziweto zodwalazi zisakhudzane zimene sizinakhudziwe nthendayi chikungwa adalangiza
Label: FARMING

Text:
msoliza kayuni share spoils   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi ernest msoliza and osgood kayuni fought to draw in an eight round welterweight bout at obrigado leisure centre in mzuzu on saturday 
  the mzuzu based boxer msoliza failed to make use of home advantage against kayuni who had an upper hand in the first three rounds 
  osgood kayuni backed by home support msoliza upped the tempo in the fourth round with flurry of punches but his seasoned opponent held 
  following saturdays bout kayuni now has record of 30 fights with 22 wins lost five and three draws 
  on the other hand msoliza has 11 fights with seven wins two losses and two draws 
  speaking after the bout msoliza claimed he was robbed of victory the bout was good but i am not happy with the results i dominated most of the rounds but i am surprised that the judges have settled for draw i have been robbed of victory said msosliza 
  msoliza surprisingly kayuni also claimed to have been robbed 
  i have been hearing that judges here favour mzuzu based boxers and i have proved it today i just ca nt understand how they settled for draw this is not good for the sport lamented kayuni 
  in supporting bouts laston kayira beat alexander likande while lomelu mwakhwawa beat wilfred nyambose ruth chisale defeated violet nyambose 
  joe nyirongo who promoted the fights said he was impressed with the performance and pledged to continue organising bouts in the city 
  the fights went on well i am happy with the results i feel judges have the mandate to rule who has carried the day i promise to continue supporting boxing i am here to stay i want to make sure that i assist the government in putting malawian boxers on the global map said nyirongo 
  mzuzu district sports officer olga mshali said her office will make sure that boxing is supported just like any other sporting activity in the city she then appealed to the corporate world to emulate what nyirongo is doing in supporting boxing
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
bishop apempha abwenzi amalitiri akonde masacramenti wolemba thokozani chapola /uploads/2019/09 bishop stima.jpg 319w sizes="(max width 459px 100vw 459px />bishop stima akhristu amayenera adziyeretse alandire zaulere zochuluka episcope wa dayosizi ya mangochi ambuye mortfort stima alimbikitsa abwenzi maritiri aku uganda akhale zitsanzo zabwino kwa pokonda moyo wa ma sacramenti 
 ambuye stima alankhula lero loweruka pamene anatsogolera mwambo wa misa yothokoza mulungu kaamba kowayendetsa mamembala bungwe la abwenzi amalitiri aku uganda ulendo wawo wa mdziko la uganda 
 ati munthu amene amapita ku malo oyerawa akuyenera okonzekera akapeze zaulere zochuluka 
 pamwambowu bungwe la abwenzi amalitiri ku uganda lapereka mabatire awiri ku radio maria malawi malinga wapampando wa gululi grace kalanda achita pothokoza ntchito imene wailesiyi imagwira pofalitsa mauthenga okhudza ulendo wa ku uganda 
 mmawu ake woyendetsa ntchito za radio maria malawi louis phiri ayamikira bungweli kaamba ka chidwi chake pothandiza wailesiyi zosowa zake
Label: RELIGION

Text:
likodzo limatha magazi mthupi likodzo matenda amodzi amene akapanda kuzindikiridwa msanga akhoza kupha munthu amayamwa magazi 
  michael luhanga amene katswiri matenda likodzo kuofesi ya zaumoyo ku zomba adati likodzo limafala munthu amene likodzolo wakodzera mmadzi nkhono zimene zimanyamula tizilombo ta nthendayi tikhudzanso munthu wina amene alibe likodzo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kupewa kukodzera mmadzi chimbudzi patchire madzi mvula akakokolola zimenezi kukathira mumtsinje ndiye onse amene akugwiritsa ntchito madziwo pachiopsezo chotenga likodzo adatero luhanga 
  luhanga ya mvula yofunika kusamala malinga luhanga likodzo lilipo la mitundu iwiri la mmatumbo la mchikhodzodzo 
  zizindikiro zooneka maso munthu likodzi kukodza timadontho ta magazi makamaka akamamaliza kukodza adatero luhanga 
  kupatula kutha magazi mthupi likodzo limachititsanso ana azikula monyentchera ana amakula opanda nzeru kusabereka kwa amayi khansa ya khomo la chiberekero kutupa kwa kapamba chiwindi kudzadza kwa madzi mmimba 
  akaona akukodza magazi azithamangira kwa alangizi zaumoyo kudera lawo kuchipatala matendawo asanayale maziko mthupi mwawo adatero luhanga 
  katswiriyu adati amene pachiopsezo chachikulu chotenga likodzo ana amakonda mmadzi akuda mvula amene amalima mpunga kumadambo mbewu zina amene pachiopsezo chotenga likodzo 
  tikulangiza azigwiritsa ntchito zimbudzi akafuna kudzithandiza kukodza chimbudzi paliponse koopsa masiku ano mvula adalangiza luhanga 
  walangizanso likodzo lochizika wodwala amapatsidwa mankhwala praziquantel amene amathaniratu likodzo mthupi
Label: HEALTH

Text:
president al sisi akumana ziwonetsero zoyamba wolemba thokozani chapola mw wp content uploads/2019/09 al sisi.jpg alt= width="524 height="366 />malamulo atsopano akumulora kulamulira la egypt mpaka 2030 al sisi apolisi mdziko la egypt agwiritsa ntchito utsi wokhetsa msozi pothamangitsa omwe zionetsero zotsutsana ulamuliro wa mtsogoleri wa dzikolo abdul fattah al sisi 
 anthuwa ati akufuna al sisi atule pansi udindo pomuganizira akukhudzidwa katangale yemwe akuchitika mboma 
 malinga malipoti wailesi ya bbc ziwonetserozi zoyamba kuchitika chimusankhireni udindowu mchaka cha 2014 padakalipano asanu omwe amangidwa ziwonetserozi 
 mchaka cha 2013 al sisi anatsogolera asilikali dzikolo pothetsa ulamuliro wa mtsogoleri woyamba mbiri ya democracy ya dzikolo mohammed morsi 
 chisankho cha mchaka cha 2018 president al sisi anapambana 97 percent kaamba koti panalibe munthu wachikoka kwambiri yemwe amapikisana naye 
 mwezi wa april chaka chino mdziko la egypt anachita voti anasankha malamulo dzikolo asinthe athe kulora president al sisi udindowu mpaka chaka cha 2030
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mafumu okwezedwa jb padzuwa zasolobana kumpando wa chifumu pamene mafumu atsopano amene adakwezedwa mtsogoleri wakale joyce banda ayamba kuona mbonawona 
  tikunenamu mafumu akuluakulu alembera boma lichotse mafumuwa poti adakwezedwa kulongedwa mosatsata ndondomeko yake zikuchitika pamene mafumu atsopanowa alowa mwezi wachinayi asakulandira mswahara 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc ndalembera unduna wa maboma angono achotse mafumu amene adakweza mdera langa awa magulupu nyakwawa zomwe zilipo 76 adawakweza pazifukwa za ndale t kabunduli ya mboma la nkhata bay yatemetsa nkhwangwa pamwala 
  woyanganira nkhani za mafumu unduna wa zamaboma angono lawrence makonokaya wati sadalandire kalata ya kabunduli wati mfumuyi ikatumire kalatayo kwa dc wa boma lake afikitse kuundunawu 
  zikudza mkwezakweza womwe banda adachita zaka ziwiri zomwe wakhala akulamula lino chipani chake cha pp zakazi banda adakweza mafumu 40 000 
  ku nkhata bay kabunduli akuti mafumuwa amakwezedwa mosatsata ndondomeko zomwe zidachititsa adye khonde magulupu ake 14 ndikulembera undunawu uchotse mafumu atsopanowa 
  sikuti mafumu onse madera zidayenda mafumu 76 amene kulongwedwa kwawo kukudabwitsa adatero kabunduli amapatsa ufumu oti si mbadwa za boma lino ogwira ntchito mboma olondera kunkhalango alangizi zaulimi atsogoleri chipani 
  akuti magulupu nyakwawa zakale akhala akumudandaulira za mafumu atsopanowo 
  mafumu akalewa akaitanitsa chitukuko amadabwa sakubwera kuwafunsa umadzidzimuka kumva adapatsidwa ufumu mavuto ambiri kodi inuyo angakulembereni munthu wina muofesi yanu osakudziwitsani akudabwa kabunduli yemwe akuti sadauzidwepo boma pokweza mafumuwo 
  ndale ndidalemba kalata april kudandaulira boma lapitali sadandiyankhe ndalembanso kalata kupempha boma latsopanoli lichotse mafumuwa adatsimikiza kabunduli amene wati kalatayo idatumizidwa 27 june 
  mmadera mwanza thyolo machinga mavutowa akuti sadachulukire zilili ku nkhata bay 
  mafumu mmabomawa akuti mavuto amene ayanga kumeneko kusalandira mswahara maka kwa mafumu atsopanowa 
  senior chief nthache ya mboma la mwanza yati kumeneko mafumu onse 50 amene adakwezedwa mdera lake akuyenda mayomayo mwezi uno wachinayi 
  mafumu akale onse akulandira bwinobwino atsopanowa ndiye sakupeza kanthu adatero nthache 
  senior chief kawinga wa mboma la machinga akuti kumenekonso kuli mdima maka mafumu atsopanowa omwe alipo 93 mdera lake 
  makonokaya akuti mafumu atsopanowa sadaikidwe pamndandanda woti ayambe kulandira ndalama akudikirira ndondomeko ya zachuma ya 2014/15 yomwe sidaperekedwe ya malamulo 
  pakhala pali kukolana pakati mtsogoleri wa mafumu kaamba koti mphamvu zonse zili mmanja mwake zokweza kuchotsa mfumu 
  kodi kugwebanaku kungathe kadaulo pandale kuonetsetsa mphamvu zikupita kwa augustine magolowondo akuti mavutowa azichitikabe mpaka sitidapezebe udindo weniweni wa mafumu pamene lino likutsata ndale za demokalase 
  tili lamulo lokhudza mafumu lomwe lidakhazikitsidwa 1967 panthawi imene lamuloli limakhazikitsidwa lino nkuti lili pansi ulamuliro wa chipani chimodzi nchosadabwitsa lamuloli limatenga mafumu mbali imodzi ya boma kuiwala boma limayendetsedwa ndale watero magolowondo 
  wati mavutowa akula kwambiri lero andale amagwiritsa ntchito mafumu zida zopititsira patsogolo zofuna zawo 
  mafumu adyera amatengerapo mwayi wosatayana andalewo awaganizire tionetsetse udindo wa mafumu pokozanso malamulo athu mpungwepungwe wotere sudzakhalapo akutero magolowondo
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:
radio maria malawi yatsegulira mariatona mwambo otsekulira mariatona ku radio maria malawi wachitika lero ku likulu la wailesiyi mboma la mangochi 
 mwambowu watsekulidwa utayimitsidwa kaye masiku apitawa cha kubuka kwa mliri wa covid-19 
 miyambo iyi siyichitika mariatonayu director wailesiyi joseph kimu ati wailesiyi yachita kaamba koti imadalira thandizo la igwire ntchito zake pamene mwa zina imagwiritsa ntchito mwambo wa mariatona pomwe omvera amawonjezera kudzipereka kwawo popereka thandizo lawo ntchito zawailesiyi zidzipita patsogolo 
 mwachizolowezi chaka chaka timachita mariatona kupempha chithandizo kwa popeza malamulo amatiletsa malonda ambiri wailesi mmalo mwake njira iyiyi yomwe timapezera chithandizo anatero kimu 
 apempha akhritsu akufuna kwabwino atenge mbali pothandiza wailesiyi popeza mariatnayu asiyana wa zaka za mbuyomu adalira kwambiri ma pologalamu pawailesi osati kuyenda mma parish
Label: RELIGION

Text:
idali ya nkhomaliro wina mtolankhani wina namandwa wa zamalonda kokasungitsa ndalama ndiko adawonana nkutsimikiza chauta adawalenga kudzakhala limodzi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi umu mudali 2012 pomwe agnes chinyama yemwe kwawo kwa mchere t kapeni mboma la blantyre ankagwira ntchito kunthambi yofalitsa nkhani ya malawi news agency 
  andy agnes tsiku la ukwati wawo apa andy tango ngalawa yemwe amachokera kwa kapenuka t kamenyagwaza ku dedza ankagwira ntchito ku arkay plastics awiriwa adakumana mbanki momwe amakatapa ndalama zokagulira nkhomaliro 
  agnes akuti adazindikira andy adali naye potengera momwe amamuyanganira poti uku kudali kuwonana koyamba mate adauma mkamwa mpakana onse adatuluka mbankimo 
  la chauta likalemba lalembadi moti tsiku lomwelo awiriwa adakumananso pamalo odyera steers mumzinda wa blantyre uku nkomwe adayamba kulankhulana ubwenzi wa macheza chabe nkuyamba 
  titakumana ku steers adandipatsa moni tidacheza uku tikudya nkhomaliro yathu umu mudali april chinzake chimayenda kufikira mwezi wa june pomwe adandifunsira chibwenzi chenicheni chidayambika mwezi wa august adatero agnes 
  chibwenzichi chidatha zaka ziwiri 2 march 2014 adamanga unkhoswe womwe udakathera muukwati woyera 30 august chaka chomwecho 
  tidakadalitsira ukwati wathu kutchalitchi cha bethsaida pool international madyerero ake adali ku chimaliro gardens mumzinda wa blantyre adatero agnes 
  akuti adamukonda andy kaamba ka moyo wodzichepetsa wachikondi woopa mulungu wokhulupirira kupemphera 
  ndimakonda banja langa kwambiri moti zonse ndikakhala ndimapemphera mulungu atisunge banja lanthu lipitirire lopambana loopa chauta adatero agnes 
  naye andy akuti atangomuona agnes mbankimo mtima udagunda mwachilendo amasiyana naye atamaliza zomwe mmenemo ankamva wataya mwala wa golide 
  ndidadzitenga wolephera kwambiri nditatuluka mbankimo moti nditakumana nayenso ku lunch ndidadziuza mumtima chondigwera chindigwere na apa pokha ndilankhula naye basi adatero andy 
  adati atamupatsa moni koyamba adaona agnes munthu wosadzikweza momwe amachitira asungwana kuyankha mothimbwidzika adadzilonjeza yekha achilimika mpaka atengeretu namwaliyo 
  awiriwa andy akupitiriza ntchito yake ku arkay plastics komwe akugwira woyanganira zamalonda pomwe agnes akugwirabe mtolankhani ku star magazine ku south africa
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
cama ma rasta asemphana za zionetsero chetechete sautsa zabvumbulukadi pali mangawa aakulu pakati pagulu lotsatira chikhulupiriro cha chirasta mabungwe omenyera maufulu mdziko muno 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zavumbuluka kuyambira pomwe bungwe loyanganira za ufulu wa ogula malonda la consumers association of malawi cama lidalengeza padzakhala ziwonetsero 17 januwale zosonyeza mkwiyo amalawi nawo za chuma za boma la joyce banda 
  gulu la ma rasta lotchedwa rastafari for unity in malawi motsogozedwa wawo charles liwomba yemwe amadziwika ras judah i lati mabungwe amakonda kuwafuna akakhala vuto loti awathandize akapeleka madandaulo kumabungwe salandira thandizo lililonse 
  judah i anauza atolankhani sabata yatha ku lilongwe gulu lawo lakana pempho la cama loti ma rasta adzachite nawo zionetserozo gulu lawo likuwona amabungwewo amangofuna kuwagwiritsa ntchito nkuwataya zinthu zikayenda sakufuna adzavutikenso momwe zinaliri 20 julaye 2011 
  adati gulu lawo linapereka kalata yopempha boma liwaganizire zinthu zina zomwe zimawavuta pamoyo wawo kudzera ku bungwe loona za maufulu la malawi human rights commission mhrc yomwe wapampando wa bungwe la cama john kapito amatsogolera bungwelo sanathandizidwe 
  mwa zina zomwe ma rasta ankafuna boma liwapangire kulola ana gulu lawo okhala tsitsi litalilitali lopotana aziloledwa kuphunzira limodzi anzawo msukulu za boma boma livomereze kulima ndikuchita malonda fodya wamkulu wa chamba 
  vuto lomwe lilipo ndilakuti amaona ma rasta otsalira kwambiri sichoncho nafenso ndianthu ofunika tsono tisamaoneke pokhapokha pakakhala vuto takhala tikupempha boma liunikeko mwa mavuto omwe timakumana nawo mabungwe omwewo satithandiza ndiye tiwathandiza anatero judah i. 
  kapito wauza nyuzipepala ya the nation zomwe ma rasta anenazo ndizabodza wati bungweli silinapemphe munthu bungwe lililonse lidzatengepo mbali pazionetsero omwe ndiogula malonda akumva nawo kuwawa ndimomwe zinthu zikuyendera 
  adatsutsanso zomwe judah i adanena bungwe la cama lidati ma rasta achite nawo zionetsero adzapatsidwa k400 000 
  bungwe lathu silinapempheko munthu bungwe lililonse lidzachite nawo zionetsero sitinapemphe bungwe loyanganira za maufulu aanthu ogwira ntchito la malawi congress of trade union mctu ndiye ndani anatero kapito
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
aphungu avuta tsikulo wenela padali ziii moti ojiya osolola osenza onse adali khumakhuma ndalamatu ndalama zalowa ku silent ndiye sakuyenda 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu basi ya lilongwe imatenga tsiku lonse idzadze ambirinso kunenerera nchifukwa chake ndidangoganiza zolowera malo aja timakonda wenela 
  ndidakapeza abiti patuma gervazzio akumvera nyimbo ya lucius 
  poti sitima imaphweka akamayendetsa wina 
  sindikudziwa nyimboyo adaika chiyani abiti patuma adali bize pafoni yake 
  abale phungu uyunso ndiye amangokhalira facebook taonani lero akuti sakufuna kukwezeredwa ndalama ndidakuuzani kale uyu wokonda kuvina kanindoyu amangofuna azimumvera 
  mwaiwala zija ankanena zolodza azungu osakaza la mulanje phiri mwamuiwala ngwanthabwala basi adatero abiti patuma 
  zoona chomwe ndikudabwa nchakuti kodi phunguyu akutokota facebook mmalo mwa pagulu la aphungu anzake ndikuona nzeru zikumuchepera chingerezi ndiye vuto kwa regisrator sic ameneyu adayankhira gervazzio 
  abale anzanga kunena zoona wamisala adaona nkhondo vuto limakhala lakuti sadathawe adakhala limodzi mmudzimo iyetu adafera limodzi onse 
  kodi iyeyo akulankhula facebook amutamandire malipiro atakwezedwa iyeyo angakane chiphimbammaso ichi basi ndidailowerera 
  zonse zili apo aphunguwa akutionjeza wenela ndalamatu zalowa ku silent ndiye wina azifuna mamiliyoni pamwamba mamiliyoni anzake 
  ndiye ndinamva wina akunena amalandira zosaposa k250 000 bodza momwe awa amayendera kumalandira maalawansi ochuluka aziti akulandira zochepa awa mulungu adzachititse nthaka iwameze tsiku lina adatero abiti patuma 
  usiku wa tsikulo ndidalota maloto odabwitsa ndidalota nditapita ku nyumba ya malamulo mlendo wa phungu wathu wenela mr water bouncer mzungu wathu 
  kutuloko ndidaona nyumbayo idapita patsogolo kwambiri adali kulankhula phungu wina amene adakhalapo msirikali woimba mabatcha 
  indetu ndinena aphungu anzanga lafika pena tatukuka onani tili ma tablet ma laptop mafoni touch zida zina tikulephera kuzigwiritsa ntchito kulibe wi fi adali kutero wathupi lakeyo 
  musandifunse wi fi nchiyani sindingakuuzeni nanga ndichite kukuuzani njira imene angalumikizire makina mafoni ku internet popanda chingwe ndimayesatu tsitsi la mbuu mgodi wa nzeru apa zikuoneka zina mukalandira ndalama zankhaninkhani tsono mukufunanso internet yaulere mmalo moti mumenyere ufulu internet ikhale yaulere kwa ana asukulu mubwereratu koimba mabatcha kuusirikali adamuyankha phungu wina 
  ndidadzidzimuka
Label: POLITICS

Text:
madise walangiza makomishonala atule pansi maudindo mwa akatswiri nkhani za malamulo mdziko muno dr sunduzwayo madise walangiza makomishonala bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno la malawi electoral commission mec atule pansi maudindo 
 dr madise yemwenso mphunzitsi wa za malamulo ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor amayankhula pothilirapo ndemanga zomwe wanena wa ma commissioner bungwe la mec dr jean mathanga msonkhano wa atolankhani lachiwiri pomwe sangatule pansi udindo pokhapokha contract yake itatha 
 odziwa ntchito mdziko muno si okha madise awuza ma commissioner ntchito yomwe akugwira siyawo yothandidza wa malawi choncho sipofunika akakamilire kugwira ntchito 
 akuyenera kudziwa ntchitoyi yotumikira malawi zavuta yawavuta ofesi ya ukamishonalayo osati alephera iwowo munythu ayi anatero dr madise 
 pamenepa dr madise atinso makomishonalawa akakamirebe kudzayendetsa chisankho chikubwerachi ndiye padzakhalanso mpungwepungwe sadzawakhulupiliranso 
 apapa kukakamiraku akungopereka mpata wa mpungwepungwe winanso mdziko muno odziwa ntchito si okha ayi akanasiya maudindo ayendetsenso anatero dr madise
Label: POLITICS

Text:
athotha mwana wina mmudzi mwa nchada kwa t nthondo ku ntchisi amulamula alipe mkazi mwana wamkazi wa zaka 17 chipepeso cha k2 000 chomuganizira ankafuna kugonana mwanayo mwezi wathawu 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zamvekanso msungwanayo sakuoneka komwe kaamba koti bamboyo wamumasula si mwana wakenso kaamba koti adakana kugonana naye 
  bamboyo wakana zoona ponena abale mkazi ndiwo akumupekera nkhaniyi pofuna kumuipitsira mbiri 
  mtsikanayu omwe sitiwatchula pofuna asamuzindikire msungwanayu atsimikiza za nkhaniyi ati mwana wawoyo adasowa mwezi watha 21 may ati pochoka adauza mnzake yemwe amacheza naye ake amuuza achoke pankhomopo amakana nawo zachisembwere 
  mayiyo wati march mwanayo adawadandaulirapo akewo amamupempha azigonana nawo adzamukwatira mtsogolo atafotokozera mchemwali wawo wamkulu adawawuza nkhaniyo asaipupulumire 
  wati mwezi wa april msungwanayo adakadandauliranso ake aakuluwo bambowo adamulondola kubafa komwe amasamba nkumuuza agonane mwanayo adawaopseza akuwa satuluka kubafako 
  ulendo wachiwiriwu udatiopsa tidakatula nkhaniyi kwa amfumu omwe adatiitanitsa kukakamba nkhani amuna anga adawalamula apepese mwanayo ineyo k2 000 adatero msungwanayo 
  adati sakudziwa chomwe amafuna pamwanayo ambiri akuganiza amafuna kupanga chizimba 
  takhala mbanja kwa zaka 27 tili ana anayi atatu aamuna wamkazi yekhayu panopa fomu 4 pasukulu ina kuno akaweruka amagulitsa mugolosale kumsika sindiwasangalatsa akanangondiuza akufuna akwatire mkazi wina mwanayo adakakhala chitsiru bwenzi akumagona naye osadziwa adatero mayiyo 
  wawo mayiyo adavomereza april mwanayo adawapezadi kwawo kuwadandaulira akewo adamutsatira kubafa akusamba kumuuza akalola kugona nawo athetsa banja ake amukwatire 
  ulendo woyamba atandiuza ake ndimaona zamasewera ulendo uwu ndidadziwa nkhani yake inali ndidawafotokozera ake tikadandaule kwa mfumu adatero mayiyo 
  mfumu pitala kangoma yomwe idaweruza nkhaniyi yatsimikiza zidachitikadi mpaka msungwanayo sakuoneka mmudzimo 
  wati nkhaniyi panopa ili mmanja mwa apolisi omwe akuthandiza kufufuza komwe kuli mtsikanayo 
  bamboyo adati ili bodza lamkunkhuniza 
  nkhani imeneyi ndinaimva sindikufuna kuyaluka nchifukwa chake ndinangokhala chete ndikudziwa zonsezi zikuchokera kwawo kwa akazi anga sitigwirizana nawo adatero mkuluyu pouza mtolankhani wa msangulutso aamfunsa amve mbali yake palamya 
  adatinso abale mkazi wakewo amusemeranso chinyau china ponena adatukwana apongozi ake 
  apolisi ku ntchisiko akuti afufuze kaye za nkhaniyi asanaperekepo ndemanga iliyonse
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
boma likutengera malawi kumtoso pamene nkhani ya malamulo oyendetsera zisankho ili mkamwamkamwa womenyera ufulu wa john kapito wati nkhani za magetsi madzi kulowa pansi kwa chuma zofunika ziunikidwe mozama nyumba ya malamulo yomwe yayamba dzuloyi 
  kapito amathirirapo ndemanga pankhani yomwe yamanga nthenje yoti aphungu nyumbayo sakambirana malamulo azisankho kaamba koti nduna sizidathe kuwaunika 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kayendetsedwe ka chisankho sikasintha aphungu akapanda kukambirana malamulo atsopano zakwiyitsa mabungwe omenyera ufulu wa centre for the development of people cedep centre for human rights and rehabilitation chrr omwe adapempha aphungu anyanyale nkhumano wa nyumbayo mpaka boma litaika pamndandanda wa zokambirana malamulo atsopano oyendetsera zisankho 
  kapito akuti nkhaniyo ili yofunikira kwambiri mavuto magetsi madzi kulowa pansi kwa chuma zinthu zofunika kuthana nazo mwachangu 
  ambiri akupanga phokoso kwambiri malamulo oyendetsera zitsankho nzoona malamulowo ofunika pali nkhani zina zofunika kwambiri zomwe sakuzitchula tiyeni tiunike vuto la magetsi madzi chuma omwe akhudza miyoyo ya amalawi ambiri adatero kapito 
  adati kulimbikira nyumbayo ikambirane malamulo azisankho nkusiya mavutowa nchimodzimodzi kumasunga ndalama zogulira galimoto pamene ana ake akusowa chakudya zovala athamangitsidwa fizi ku sukulu 
  padakali komiti yoona zokambirana za nyumbayo yatsimikiza pali malamulo 6 omwe aphungu akambirane kapito wati sakuonapo lamulo lomwe lingathandize amalawi mwachangu potengera mavuto omwe akukumana nawo 
  ndaunika malamulo onse omwe pamndandanda woti nyumbayo ikambirane palibe lamulo lomwe lithane vuto la magetsi madzi kukweza chuma cha lino 
  billy mayaya yemwe wodziwika kwambiri pankhani yomenyera ufulu wa wati boma likutengera amalawi kumtoso posaika malamulo zisankho pamndandanda wa zokambirana 
  nzomvetsa chisoni andale amafuna panthawi yovota apange zofuna zawo amayangana kumbali adatero mkuluyu 
  mayaya adati malamulo zisankho ndime yoyamba yoonesetsa amalawi akulamulidwa omwe akuwafuna 
  imodzi mwa nkhani zikuluzikulu zomwe zili lamulolo nkuonetsetsa boma lililonse mukhale dera lomwe amayi okhaokha azipikitsana pampando wa phungu 
  omwe akhala akumenyera ufulu wa amayi akuti boma likulakwa kaamba kosatengera malamulowo ku nyumba ya malamulo 
  mwa amayi omwe amamenyera ufulu wa amayi emmie chanika adati vuto la amalawi nkuyanganira vuto mpaka likule momwe mwana amayanganira chilonda mpaka chikule nkufika potukusira 
  amalawi zitsanzo tili nazo za maiko omwe adapatsa amayi mpata lero akuchita nanga tidzapereka liti mpata kwa amayi adafunsa chanika 
  adati ambiri sachitapo kanthu pankhani zaphindu zotukula miyoyo ya amayi nkhani zopanda pake 
  mabungwe cedep chrr adapempha aphungu anyanyale nkhumano ya nyumba ya malamulo mpaka boma litabweretsa nyumbayo malamulo zisankho 
  wa cedep gift trapence wa chrr timothy mtambo adapempha boma lichite zofuna za potengera malamulowo ku nyumbayo 
  bungwe la public affairs committee pac lomwe posachedwapa limachititsa misonkhano yokambirana za malamulowo lati silidayembekezere boma lingawadyetse njomba yotere 
  mwa zina malamulowo akuti mtsogoleri yemwe wachita zisankho azilumbilitsidwa pakatha masiku 30 patsiku loulutsa zitsakho azipeza mavoto oposa theka la omwe adaponya mavotiwo malamulowo akufunanso mboma lililonse mukhale dera lomwe amayi okhaokha azipikitsana pampando wa phungu 
  malamulowo akufuna bungwe loyendetsa zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec lizipatsidwa ndalama zokwanira ntchito zake ziziyenda
Label: POLITICS

Text:
kwaterera kwa ntenje mwanunkha mmudzi mwa ntenje kwa t machinjiri mboma la blantyre komwe osungitsa chitetezo mmidzi community police adatibulidwa nkumangiriridwa pamtengo kumanda komwekonso adawakumbitsa manda 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza kuonjezera apo apolisi omwe amati akasungitse bata kumeneko adabwerako akulikumba la mtondo wadooka kuthawa okwiya malinga gulupu ntenje wa deralo 
  mmene timalemba nkhaniyi nkuti achitetezo mmudzimu akubisala mtchire pamene akulandira chithandizo pachipatala cha limbe 
  akulephera chovulazidwa mmatako story ntenje yemwe nkhaniyi idachitika mmudzi mwake adati zidachitika pamene anthuwo amaganizira achitetezowo adapha munthu 
  gulupuyu akuti lidali lachinayi 1 october pamene mmudzimo ankathamangitsa mnyamata wina amene amamuganizira waba thumba la chimanga kwa agogo ake 
  adamugwira adayamba kumumenya achitetezo cha mmudzi ndiwo adamulanditsa asavulazidwe adakamutsekera muofesi adaimbira apolisi ya bangwe adzamutenge adatero ntenje 
  adati pamene imakwana 4 koloko madzulo apolisi adali asadafikebe 
  adatiuza alibe mafuta kenaka poti tikamuone munthuyo tidapeza wamwalira adatero ntenje 
  lamulungu 4 october mwambo wa maliro udayamba khamu la ammudzimo akuti lidayamba kunena achitetezo mmudzi ndiwo adapha malemuyo 
  mwa achitetezowo davie story adati anthuwo adafika kwake namugwira cha mma 8 koloko mmawa 
  adandigwira kuphatikizaponso anzanga awiri amene timagwira nawo ntchito ya chitetezo cha mmudzi adatitengera kwa wapampando wathu tidakapeza atcheyawo atathawa ndiye adatenga mkazi wawo 
  adatitengera kumanda komwe adatikumbitsa manda titamaliza adayamba kutikwapula nkutimangirira pamtengo adatero story 
  ntenje adati panthawiyo adaimbira apolisi abwere apolisiwo akuti adalipo anayi atafika kumandako okwiyawo adayamba kunola zikwanje athane nawo 
  zinthu zidavuta adaitana apolisi atafika enawo tidayesera kukamba okwiyawo awamasule pamtengo achitetezowo zomwe zidatheka adatero ntenje 
  akutsitsira mmanda bokosi la maliro mphekesera idamveka anthuwo amafuna achitetezowo awaponyere mdzenjemo nkuwakwiriria limodzi chitandacho 
  story amene akukanika pansi cha kuvulazidwa mmatako adafotokoza malodzawo motere adati tonse 5 tigone limodzi malemuwo amati atiponyera mdzenjemo zitavuta apolisi adayamba kutithawitsira komwe adaimika galimoto yawo 
  ntenje adati apolisi adathira utsi wokhetsa misozi komabe sizidaphule kanthu adatha phazi kusiya mmudzimo muli chipwirikiti 
  apa mpamene anthuwa adapita kukagwetsa ofesi ya achitetezowo kukayatsa nyumba ya wapampando wawo kuphatikizapo nyumba ya story 
  wapampandoyo damiano dindi amene adalankhula pafoni msangulutso ku nsanje komwe amati akubisala adati palibe chomwe wapulumutsa mnyumba mwake 
  akazi anga mmanja mwa apolisi komwe akutetezedwa mwana wanga wapita kwa achibale ineyo ndili mtchire pansi mtengo wa bulugama mboma la nsanje sindikudziwanso mmudzi mwa ndani adatero dindi 
  kolowera kwandisowa mutu wanga sukugwira mnyumbamo mudali k280 000 ya bizinesi komaso katundu wanga yense wapita 
  mneneri wa polisi ya limbe pedzisai zembeneko adatsimikizira msangulutso za nkhaniyi adati womwalirayo dzina lake adali nyadani dankeni 
  zembeneko adati kafukufuku pankhaniyi adali mkati adzalankhula zambiri akamaliza zofufuza zawo 
  pakalipano palibe amene wamangidwa kaamba ka kumwalira mwadzidzidzi kwa dankeni adatero mneneri wa polisiyu
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
agundidwa akuthawitsa katundu wakuba wina wagundidwa galimoto ku mzuzu pomwe amathawitsa mapaketi awiri khofi omwe amamuganizira adaba mzuzu coffee den 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi bamboyo yemwe laston kaunda wa zaka 32 wochokera mmudzi mwa chiphanzi t nkumbira mboma la nkhata bay 
  mneneri wapolisi mumzinda wa mzuzu patrick saulosi adati mnyamatayo adapita ku coffee den mmawa wa lachiwiri sabata yatha nsuweni komwe adakanyamula mapaketi khofiwo 
  woganiziridwayo akutuluka coffee den muja adatuluka mapaketi awiri khofi osalipira mnyamata wogwira ntchito pamalopo ataona zomwe kaunda adayamba kumuthangitsa adafotokoza saulosi 
  saulosi adati yomwe kaunda amafuna kuoloka nsewu galimoto idamuomba adavulala kwambiri mwendo 
  iyeyo kuchipatala cha mzuzu central hospital mch akangotuluka kuchipatalako atengedwa apolisi pamlandu wakuba adatero saulosi 
  saulosi adati kaamba ka kuchepa kwa mlanduwo palibe wapolisi amene akudikirira kaunda kuchipatala podikirira mlandu 
  msangulutso utapita kuchipatalako udakumana kaunda yemwe akadali mchipatala kulandira thandizo 
  kaunda adati sakukumbukira chilichonse chomwe chidachitika patsikulo adali ataledzera kwambiri 
  sindikudziwa chomwe chidachitika ndidangozindira ndili kuchipatala kuno adayankha motero
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
papa wasankha amayi awiri mmaudindo akuluakulu ku vatican mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wasankha amayi awiri mmaudindo akuluakulu ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican 
 malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa wasankha dr rafaella vincenti woyanganira nkhokwe yosungira mabuku yomwe imatchedwa vatican apostolic library wasankha professor antonella alibrandi membala wa bungwe lothana wozembetsa ndalama lotchedwa vatican financial information authority 
 malinga likulu la mpingo wa katolika dr vincenti adakhalapo mlembi wa vatican apostolic library pamene professor alibrandi membala wa bungwe la maloya mdziko la italy lotchedwa milan bar association iyenso president wa bungwe la za chuma aphunzitsi za malamulo association of economics and law professors membala wa bungwe la chi katolika la za malamulo union of catholic jurists 
 nkhokwe yosungira ma buku vatican apostolic library idakhazikitsidwa mchaka cha 1475 papa sixto wa 4 imodzi mwa nkhokwe za kale kwambiri la pansi nkhokwe yochititsa chidwi yomwe ili zolembalemba zambiri za mtengo wa patali za make dzana 
 ndipobungwe lothana wozembetsa ndalama la vatican financial information authority adalikhazikitsa papa benedicto wa xvipa 30 december mchaka cha 2010
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
achenjeza zobzala chinangwa cha matenda katswiri oona za tizilombo toononga toyambitsa matenda ku mbewu wa kunthambi ya kafukufuku ya bvumbwe research station dr donald kachigamba wati alimi apewe kubzala mbewu ya chinangwa chomwe chikuonetsa zizindikiro za matenda 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu pamene mvula ikugwa madera imagwa mocheperako alimi padakalipano kalikiliki kubzala mbewuyi adzapeze chakudya ngakhalenso kugulitsa 
  kachigamba adati matenda chinangwa omwe azunguza kwambiri mmaiko ambiri africa kuphatikizapo malawi khate cassava mosaic oola cassava brown streak 
  matenda khate amapangitsa masamba chinangwa kukwinyana pomwe matenda kuola amapangitsa mtengo wa chinangwa kuoneka okandikakandika chinangwa chenichenicho chimaola mkati mwake adatero katswiriyu 
  khate la chinangwa limachititsa masamba kukwinyika adalangizanso mbewu zina zayamba kuonetsa zizindikirozi pamene zili mmunda mlimi akuyenera kuzizula kuzitaya zikadali zazingono zisakhale gwero la matendawa ku mbewu zina 
  katswiriyu adaonjeza kachilombo kotchedwa gulugufe oyera komwe kamafalitsa matendawa mmunda wa chinangwa 
  gulugufeyu payekha sioopsa kuipa kwake kwakuti amafalitsa matendawa mmunda wa chinangwa choncho chofunika kungoonesetsa mmunda mulibe matenda adatero katswiriyu 
  oona za mbewu za gulu la chinangwa mbatata kunthambiyo miswell chitete adati matendawa ofunika kuwapewa kupanda kutero mlimi akhonza kupeza zokolola zochepa kwambiri 
  alimi akuyenera kupewa matenda chinangwa mwa matendawa mwachitsanzo khate limatha kupangitsa chinangwa chisabereke nkomwe kotero mlimi akhonza kungotaya mphamvu zake pachabe adatero mkuluyo 
  mphatso jalasi yemwe bizinesi yolima kugulitsa mbewu ya chinangwa mboma la zomba wati matendawa akupangitsa mbewu ya chinangwa ikhale yoperewera adati kuperewera kwa mbewuyi komwe kunamupangitsa ayambe kulima kugulitsa mbewu ya chinangwa 
  adati akuvutika achulukitse mbewu ya chinangwa yopirira ku matendawa siichita kuchigawo cha kummwera 
  pali mbewu yopirira ku matendawa mbewuyi ndiyosankha madera yowawa kotero pakufunika mbewu yosawawa yosasankha madera adatero jalasi
Label: FARMING

Text:
makhansala awiri khonsolo ya ntcheu alowa utm mtsogoleri wa chipani cha utm yemwenso wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino dr saulos chilima wapempha mboma la ntcheu adzavotere mgwirizano wa tonse alliance lino lipite patsogolo 
 dr chilima omwe akuzayimira wachiwiri kwa dr lazarus chakwera chisankho chomwe chikubwerachi amayankhula paulendo wawo woyimayima omwe amachititsa lachisanu mboma la ntcheu 
 chilima kutsindika umodzi mwa misonkhano yomwe anachititsa awuza pamodzi anzawo agwirizana adzakhazikitse thumba la ndalama zokwana75 billion yomwe cholinga chake chidzakhala kuthandiza mmaboma onse kupeza ngongole zopangira mabusiness osiyanasiyana 
 boma lililonse lizapatsidwa 1 billion thuma lothandiza ozungulira bomalo kutennga ngongole anatero dr chilima 
 atinso azamalizitsa bwalo la zamasewero nsewu wa tsangano mwanza zomwe zinayima kusitsa fetereza kupereka malipiro kwa athu oyambira zaka 65 kupita mtsogolo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
ndale zikuwononga ufumu mafumu angapo ati zipani zolamula zimaononga mbiri ntchito ya mafumu powakweza popanda kuyanganira mbiri ya ufumuwo khalidwe la mfumuyo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc ndemangazi zatuluka lachinayi 27 sepitembala ku hotelo ya victoria mumzinda wa blantyre pomwe bungwe loona za malamulo la malawi law commission likupitiriza kumva maganizo osiyanasiyana pantchito yokozanso malamulo okhudza mafumu 
  ku msonkhanowo womwe unasonkhanitsa mafumu akuchigawo cha kummwera ku zomba chiradzulu blantyre neno mwanza nsanje mafumuwo boma lisiye kukweza mafumu popanda akubanja ake mafumu ozungulira bwanamkubwa wa bomalo 
  apa nduna ya maboma aangono chitukuko cha kumudzi grace zinenani maseko yati nzosangalatsa mafumu ndiomasuka kuperekera maganizo kotero zithandiza pomwe malamulo akuunikidwa zingapo zisinthe 
  malamulo adziko lino okhudza ufumu omwe adakonzedwa 29 disembala 1967 amapereka mphamvu kwa mtsogoleri wa lino malinga gawo 4 1 atha kuloza mfumu paramount chief senior chief 
  apa t mlauli ya mboma la neno yomwe idali ku zokambiranako idati lamulo ili likuyenera kukonzedwa 
  adati pali mafumu omwe khalidwe lawo silikondweretsa mafumu oyandikana nawo omwe amawalamula kotero zikuyenera zidziwunikidwa mfumu isadakwezedwe 
  mlauli wati zimatheka mfumu mdera mwake mopanda ntchito iliyonse yachitukuko kumakwezedwa 
  zalowa ndale adatinso mtsogoleri akakhala mphamvu zokweza mfumu mosafufuza zimasokoneza mfumuyo amagwira ntchito mokomera chipani cha boma lolamula 
  ulemerero uwu umakhala wa yochepa boma lina likabwera samadzawonedwa adawonjezera mlauli 
  t mbenje ya mboma la nsanje idati ufumu umayenera kusankhidwa mbumba ya ufumuwo masiku ano ndale zasokoneza chilichonse 
  chitsanzo kuno tili nkhani ya ufumu wa mfumu yayikulu tengani omwe wasokonekera andale mokuti mikangano idakali mkati mikangano yotere ingathe chilichonse chitamasiidwa kubanja 
  bwanamkubwa mafumu oyandikana mfumuyo abanja akuyenera adzitenga mbali kukwezedwa kwa mfumu adatero mbenje 
  naye sub t nkagula ku zomba adati mfumu iliyonse imayenera ikwezedwe ake amene amaona momwe ikugwirira ntchito yake mmudzimo 
  akavomereza adzitumiza uthenga kwa mafumu oyandikana bwanamkubwa osati boma lidzingokweza mosadzera mwa mbalizi idatero 
  naye womenyera ufulu wachibadwidwe billy mayaya wati andale masiku ano akumakweza mfumu pazifukwa zandale osati zoti zipindulire onse 
  iyi nkhani yoti tikambirane boma lisamakweze mafumu zakhala zikuchitikira ganizo la mafumuwa lilibwino adatero mayaya 
  asiye ndale maggie banda yemwe walemba mayeso fomu 4 akukhala mmudzi mwa msisya kwa t mbelwa mboma la mzuzu wati andale asiyedi kukweza mafumu mafumu otero akumasiya ntchito yawo nkuyamba kugwira yachipani 
  boma la dpp lidakweza mafumu ochepa omwe akuwonana boma la pp mutha kuonanso boma la pp lakweza kale mafumu ake zalowa ndale adatero banda 
  limbani kaombe wa mmudzi mwa kachepa kwa t likoswe mboma la chiradzulu wati ufumu wawonongeka cha andale kotero padzikhala kufufuza 
  mkhalapampando wa bungwe lomwe likuchita kafukufukuyu justice anaclet chipeta adati unduna wa maboma angono ndiwo wapereka ntchitoyi 
  adati okhutira momwe mafumu akuperekera maganizo 
  ntchitoyi ichitika zigawo zonse zadziko lino
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:
beam trust ikufuna kuchotsa chitozo kwa mabanja osabereka wolemba glory kondowe bungwe la beautify malawi trust lati mdziko muno akuyenera kuleka kuchitira nkhanza omwe akulephera kupeza mphatso ya mwana ati ponena zimene zimangopezeka zikuchitika pakati pawo 
 mwa akulu akulu bungwe li emma mabvunde omwe anena kwa azibambo azimayi omwe anasonkhana bwalo la mfumu yayikulu bwananyambi mboma la mangochi komwe mwazina amawafotokozera zaudindo nawo ponetsetsa sakutengapo gawo lotonza omwe akukomana mavuto ku sabereka mdelaro ndikulimbikitsa omwe vutoli azifulumira kukaonana madototolo 
 poyankhulapo mabvunde ati nkhaniyi yatuluka chamayi wafuko lino getrude mutharika chinawakomela nkhaniyi ituluke amayi ambiri amanyozeka abale amzawo komaso amuna zomwe zimawapangitsa asa atuluke ndikugwira nawo ntchito za mdziko kuopa kutozedwa chosalidwa pankhani yachitukuko 
 malinga mabvunde amayiwa amakumanaso nkhaza zosiyanasiyana kutha kwa banja kumenyedwa kusalidwa nkhani ya chitukuko 
 mabvunde amatozedwa zomwe mbuyomu zimawapangitsa akanena kwandani nde kubwera kwa bungweri tikuona anthuwa ayamba kumasuka kumabwera poyera ndikufotokoza mavuto zomwe mbuyomu zimapangitsa kubwedzeretsa chitukuko mbuyo malawi muno ndetiyeni tizindikire kuwalimbikitsa dzika zathu zomwe tigwirane manja pankhani yachitukuko mdziko muno
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
ras chikomeni sizidamukomere pofika lachisanu ras chikomeni chirwa adali yakaliyakali kusakasaka k2 miliyoni akapereke ku bungwe loyendetsa chisankho la malawi electoral commission mec   zimadza pamene bungwelo lidabweza chirwa ponena adali asadapereke ndalamayo adali asadasayinitse mmaboma 9 chomwe chomuyenereza china    chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka chikomeni ake akuti alibe chilichonse   komabe chirwa adati siwokondwa zomwe mec idachita zidaonetsa olemera okha amene akuyenera kuimira pulezidenti wa   ndinabwera kudzaonetsa ufulu wanga akundikana ndine wosauka sindingakwanitse kupeza ndalama imeneyo ndiye poti ndine wosauka andikanira adatero chirwa   zidachititsa bungwe la centre for human rights education advice and assistance chreaa lilowere kubwalo lamilandu kukatenga chiletso mec ilandire mapepala chirwa   wa chreaa chikondi chijozi adati k2 miliyoni nchimodzimodzi kukaniza chirwa asapikisane nawo mpando wa pulezidenti 
  ndalama zachuluka uku ndikuletsa osauka asapikisane nawo olemera okha adatero chijozi   lachisanu kudalinso zoseketsa pamene mec idabwezanso smart swira wochokera mboma la chitipa amene amafuna kupikisana nawo   swira atafika ku holo ya comesa adaseketsa adalibe wachiwiri amati wathamangira kuchipatala mwana amene amati akudwala   wa mec jane ansah adakana kulandira makalata swira ponena sadalembetse mkaundula wa zisankho alibe chizindikiro mmalawi   swira adati pachipanda mec kumubweza bwezi atakwapula onse amene akupikisana nawo mpandopo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
cwo yagawira ansembe zipangizo zozitetezera ku coronavirus mpingo wa katolika arkidayosizi ya blantyre wayamikira bungwe la amayi achikatolika la catholic women organisation cwo kamba kopereka thandizo la zipangizo zotetezera ansembe ku nthenda ya covid-19 
 tamani awonetsa chitsanzo chabwino vicar general arch dayosiziyi boniface tamani alankhula ku nyumba ya asembe opuma ya st james ku limbe cathedral pomwe amayiwa amapereka thandizoli 
 tamani ati okondwa amayiwa athandiza ansembe maka padakalipano pomwe chiwerengero cha opezeka nthenda yi chikukwera mdziko muno 
 ati zithandiza ntchito zopereka chitetezo chokwanira kwa ansembewa ku kachilomboka 
 amayiwa awonetsa chitsanzo chabwino ma mask amenewa atithandiza ansembe tigwire ntchito yathu moyenera pamene tikukapereka ma sacrament zina anatero tamani 
 lucy vokhiwa wapampando wa bungwe la amayi achikatolika la catholic women organisation arch dayosiziyi yemwenso wapampando wa bungweli mdziko muno tinagwiritsa ntchito luso lathu amayi tinatolera nsalu za cwo kuzisoka zikhale ma mask zomwe tazapereka panozi 
 pamenepa alimbikitsa amayi achikatolika mmadayosizi onse mdziko muno atengepo mbali pogwiritsa ntchito luso lawo njira zosiyanasiyana pofalitsa nthenga wa kapewedwe ka coronavirus
Label: HEALTH

Text:
ambuye msusa alimbikitsa chikondi pakati akhristu nyengo ya pasaka akhristu mpingo wakatolika arkidayosizi ya blantyre awapempha alimbikitse chikondi nyengo ino ya pasaka 
 arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosiziyi ambuye thomas luke msusa alankhula pambuyo misa ya chikondwelero cha pasaka imene anatsogolera ku limbe cathedral arkidayosiziyi 
 msusa tiwonjeze mapemphero atsindika ponena maziko abwino chikhristu agona chikondi kotero kulimbikitsa kumene kumakondweretsa mulungu 
 tiwonetse moyo wa chikhristu chathu pokondana kugwirizana kuthandiza amene ovutika tikuyenera tikhale achifundo anatero ambuye msusa 
 mwazina ambuye msusa alimbitsa mtima akhristu asawope nthenda ya covid-19 alimbike mapemphero ponena pameneyesu wagonjetsa imfa ndiye agonjetsanso matendawa 
 apemphanso apitilire malangizo omwe boma lapereka nkhani yokhudza nthendayi
Label: RELIGION

Text:
anjatidwa kamba koba mankhwala chipatala cha thyolo apolisi ku thyolo amanga amuna awiri powaganizira anaba mankhwala ndalama zokwana 500 thousand kwacha chipatala cha boma la thyolo 
 awiriwa george nankhuni ogwira ntchito ku chipinda chosungira kugawira mankhwala wina mlonda 
 mneneri wa apolisi ku thyolo amosi tiwone wati awiriwa amangidwa lachiwiri kafukufuku yemwe anachitika chipatalacho 
 wati oganiziridwawa awatengera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa komwe akayankhe milandu ya kuba malo ntchito kupezeka mankhwala opanda chilolezo
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
akapeza thanthwe pokumba manda zimatha zochitika kumanda nzambiri yokumba manda palibe yomwe adzukulu amakhaula kwambiri kuposa pamene apeza thanthwe dzenjelo lisadathe sipakhala kusiya akayambe pena uwu sumakhala ulesi mwambo momwe zimayenera kukhalira steven pembamoyo adacheza gulupu mtwambwa wa ku lilongwe yemwe akulongosola za mwambowu motere   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mtwambwa kumakhala kuwayesa azimu mfumu tiuzeni ndinu yani ndine gulupu mtwambwa ya mdera la t kalumba wathu wa achewa 
  mfumu kumanda kumachitika zambiri adzukulu akamakumba chidandipatsako chidwi nchakuti akapeza mwala mmalo mokwirira nkukumba pena amapitiriza kodi nchifukwa chiyani mwambo uja sangayerekeze kusiya dzenje loyambayamba nkuyambiranso lina akhoza mlandu waukulu mmudzi moti akhoza kulipitsidwa chindapusa chachikulu kusamutsidwa kumene mmudzi atapanda kugonjera chigamulo cha akuluakulu 
  mlandu wanji umenewu umenewu mlandu wolowetsa mphepo mmudzi timakhulupirira kuyamba kukumba dzenje nkulilekeza panjira kuli kukumba dzenje osaikamo maliro zomwe zimapangitsa azipululuka mizimu yakwiya mwainamiza kukubwera mwa ana 
  si zongokhulupirira nanu achewa si zongokhulupirira ayi zimachitika mutayenda kuno mpaka kufufuza mmanda simungapeze dzenje loyamba kukumbidwa lomalizika kukumbidwa losaikamo mtembo zimenezi sizingatheke mfumu ya mmudzi momwe mungachitike zotere yokha imadziwiratu ikhoza pamoto waukulu 
  nanga thanthwelo likakhala lalikulu basi adzukuluwo adziwa momwe achitire dzenjelo lipitirire basi mpaka lithe uthenga ukamabwera kumudzi nyumba yatha kumanda likhale dzenjelo lakwanadi momwe chikhalidwe chimanenera 
  si chilango kwa adzukulu chimenechi ayinso palibe za chilango kodi tiwalanga abweretsa zovuta iwowo munthu akamati akulowa mgulu la adzukulu amadziwiratu ntchito yomwe azikagwira kumeneko ndiye zonsezi amazidziwa kale sizikhala zachilendo akakumana nazo 
  kapenatu mwina mumaona malo angamathe msanga ndinu nkhakamira moti monse muja simukumvabe timatsatira mwambo momwe umayenera kukhalira ifensotu tidakhalako adzukulu zimenezi tidakumanapo nazo sikuti zayamba lero tidazipeza zikupitirira zidzakhalako mpaka kalekale 
  nanga akakhala akumba poti padaikidwa kale munthu apa pokha akhoza kufotsera nkuyamba pena mafumu adziwitsidwe akhale umboni nzosavuta mizimu singakwiye poti nayo imadziwa alakwitsa pamalopo padali kale nyumba ya wina

Text:
chakwera chenjeraapm mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika lachinayi adachenjeza mtsogoleri wa chipani cha mcp lazarus chakwera ponena akukolezera zipolowe za ndale 
  chakwera polankhula mtolankhani wathu mutharika atangotha kulankhulako adati mutharika ayenera kutulutsa umboni zoti akudzetsa mpungwepungwe 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka polankhula ku wa amalawi potsatira mpungwepungwe wabuka pamene otsatira mcp akhala akuchita zionetsero mmizinda ya lilongwe blantyre maboma kasungu dowa nkhotakota mutharika adati chakwera achenjere kulekerera otsatira mcp zionetsero kukhonza kuchititsa mwazi ukhetsedwe 
  zomwe ndinene zikhoza kuphwasula mutharika adayamba motero ndamvetsedwa chakwera sakufuna za chisankho za demokalase pobweretsa chisawawa akufuna amalawi atenge boma kupyolera muziwawa sizitheka 
  mutharika adadza tsiku limene apolisi adaponya utsi wokhetsa misonzi ku maofesi mcp pomwe chakwera amakambirana kazembe wa la america virginia palmer amene akumaliza ntchito yake mdziko lino wakhala akukumana atsogoleri osiyanasiyana zidachitikanso pomwe apolisi adamanga otsatira mcp 19 kuphatikizapo phungu wachipanicho mumzinda wa lilongwe alfred jiya 
  mutharika adadzudzula chakwera ponena akuchita pomwe adakatulanso nkhani yotsutsana chisankho kubwalo la milandu padakalipano khoti lapadera lakhazikitsidwa pomwe oweruza milandu asanu akuyembekezeka kugamula zotsatira za chisankho cha 21 may zingavomerezedwe ayi 
  mmawu ake chakwera adati ayankhapo nkhaniyi bwinobwino pakufunika umboni akusokoneza ndiye 
  abwere umboni sindinena zambiri mpaka nditakonzeka adatero 
  chisokonezo chidayamba pomwe bungwe la mec lidalengeza mutharika ndiye adapambana chisankhocho motsatana chakwera kenako mtsogoleri wa utm party saulos chilima   msabatayi otsatira mcp adachita zionetsero makamaka ku lilongwe komwe mwa zina adathamangitsa ogwira ntchito mboma kulikulu la boma ku capital hill mumzindawo adachita bwalo la milandu lidaluzanitsa milandu ya mcp utm party ponena yofanana 
  aneneri zipani ziwirizo maurice munthali joseph chidanti malunga adati wokonzeka kuyendetsa limodzi milanduyo 
  katswiri za malamulo edge kanyongolo adagwirizana zipani ziwirizo pokamangala kukhoti malamulo amalola zipani kutero sakukhutira momwe chisankho chayendera adatinso otsatira mcp ufulu wochita zionetsero akutsatira ndondomeko 
  pali nkhani zina zomwe oweruza akaziona nzofunika bwalo lapadera amazitumiza kwa wa makhoti yemwe amaziunikanso payekha akakhutira amakhazikitsa khoti la oweruza osachepera atatu omwe amaweruza nkhaniyo watero kanyongolo 
  wachiwiri woyanganira za kampeni mcp george zulu yemwenso phungu wa chipanicho kumwera cha kummawa kwa mzinda wa lilongwe adati gululo lidzachoka ku capital hill mutharika akadzatula pansi udindo 
  akhoti njira zawo zomwe amatsata pankhani zoterezi alekeni azigwira ntchito yawo 
  nafenso kuno tikutsata njira yathu tizibwera kuno tsiku lililonse la ntchito kusapezeke munthu ogwira ntchito mmaofesi boma adatero zulu 
  kanyongolo adatsimikiza nkhani yomwe ili mukhoti zomwe akuchita otsatira chipani cha mcp anzawo sizikukhudzana 
  nkhani ziwiri zosiyana khoti azipitiriza kuyendetsa nkhani yomwe ili mmanja mwawo 
  awanso ufulu wawo potengera malamulo kupanga chionetsero motsatira ndondomeko adatero kanyongolo 
  woyanganira zofalitsa nkhani ku unduna wa zofalitsa nkhani gedion munthali adati ufulu onena zakukhosi sukukhudzana kutseketsa maofesi boma zikutanthauza kuimitsa boma kusokoneza osalakwa kuononga katundu wa boma 
  kuimitsa ntchito za boma kuzunza osalakwa kugenda galimoto kuphwanya katundu wa mmaofesi sizikukhudzana kunena za kukhosi uwu uchigandanga adatero munthali 
  padakalipano landuwo uweruzidwa healey potani michael tembo ivy kamanga dingiswayo madise redson kapindu akhala chigamulo chake onse adzabwera pamodzi chigamulo chimodzi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
papa walimbikitsa chikondi kulemekezana mbanja mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wati chikondi kulemekezana zofunika mbanja 
 papa francisco walankhula lachisanu misa yomwe anatsogolera ku likulu la mpingo ku vatican lomwe tsiku loganizira ma banja lonse 
 15 may chaka chilichonse tsiku loganizira ma banja lonse international day of families 
 mmawu ake misa yomwe anatsogolera tsikuli mtchalichi lalingono la casa santa marta papa francisco watsindika kufunika kodzamitsa moyo wa chikondi chenicheni kufunika kolemekezana pofuna kukometsa moyo wa banja 
 lero tsiku lomwe lonse la pansi likuganizira ma banja tiyeni tipempherere ma banja onse akule mchikondi cha ambuye kulemekezana ufulu zikhazikike mma banja onse la pansi watero papa francisco misayo 
 mchaka cha 1993 bungwe la united nations lidakhazikitsa tsiku la 15 may likhale tsiku loganizira ma banja onse la pansi cholinga chofuna maiko mabungwe azitha momwe ndondomeko zosiyana siyana zoyendetsera maiko zikhudzira moyo wa banja
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
mec ikufunakusinthatsiku la chisankho pavuta chisankho chichoke mwezi wa may kupita september bungwe loyendetsa chisankho la malawi electoral commission mec lidapemphera komitiya nyumbaya malamulo yoona zamalamulo 
  wa mec jane ansah sabata yatha adapempha komitiyo ilingalire za ganizoli 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka adati zikudza mwezi wa may ndiwozizira usiku umatalika kuposa tsiku zimene zingachititse kulephera kuvota malinga malamulo chisankho chiyenera kuchitika sabata yachitatu mwezi wa may kusinthako kungachitike pachisankho cha 2019 ndiye mtsogoleri wadziko lino peter mutharika akhala pampandowo miyezi 4 yoonjezera 
  mneneri wachipani chotsutsa cha malawi congress party mcp ezekiel chingoma wabungwe losanthula zandale la institute for policy interaction ipi rafiq hajat ati izonzosatheka 
  chingoma lachinayi adati malawi atopa ndiboma la dpp sadakonzeke mpaka akhalebe ndinthawi yaitali asadachotse chipanicho mboma 
  ndizachilendo kumva masiku akufuna asinthidwe mwezi wa may sidziko lonse limakhala nyengo yozizira akufuna achitenji mcp takana zimenezo adatero 
  hajat adamema zipani mabungwe akane ganizo la mec ponena ntchito yosintha tsiku siyophweka 
  popanga tsiku padali mbali zonse zofunikira zimene zidapezeka apange lamulo kutanthauza pali ndime tsikuli lisinthe sindikuona kufunika kwake amabungwe zipani akane adatero hajati 
  kadaulo malamulo edge kanyongolo akuti ganizo la mec losintha tsikuli ndilochitika 
  ndizotheka palibe chovuta adatero kanyongolo 
  chofunika nkhaniyo ipite ku nyumba ya malamulo ikakambidwe aphungu apo ayi phungu wina athakukaiyambitsa kumeneko aikambirane 
  adati aka sikoyamba nkhaniyi kuchitika sindikulakwitsa 1999 zotere zidachitika nachonso chipani cha republican party rp chidatengera mec kubwalo lamilandu pankhani yomweyi palibe chachilendo ndiponso palibe chosatheka ndizotheka atafuna adaonjeza kanyongolo 
  adati maiko amangotchu latsiku la chisankho osati mpaka tsiku lenileni lochititsa chisankho kodi patsiku lachisankho kutachitika chivomerezi mungapite kukavota nchifukwa anzathu sakhala tsiku lenileni adatero 
  mneneri wa chipani cha udf ken ndanga adati sadalondoloze zokambirana zomwe zimachitika pakati mec azipani kotero sangaike mlomo 
  komabe ndanga adati tilankhule mlembi wa chipanichi kandi padambo amene foni yake samayankha 
  nakonso ku dpp sikudachokere pamene francis kasaila yemwe wolankhulira chipanichi samayankha foni yake 
  malinga wamgwirizano wa mabungwe okhudzidwa ndikuyendetsa zachisankho la malawi electoral support netwrok mesn steve duwa adati ganizo losinthalo lidadza atakambirana mec
Label: POLITICS

Text:
ambuye ziyaye apempha achinyamata amasuke posankha utumiki wawo arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya lilongwe ambuye tarcizio ziyaye wapempha achinyamata mpingo wa katolika akhale ufulu wosankha utumiki wa kumtima kwawo 
 ambuye ziyaye anena ku maula cathedral mwambo wa malumbiro ku zonse sister mary umukonde madeya chipani cha poor clares 
 ziyaye pali kuyitanidwa kosiyanasiyana ati arkidayosizi yawo yakhazikitsa njira zosiyanasiyana zomwe zingathandizire kukopa achinyamata ambiri kuyamba moyo wa utumiki mpingo 
 sindingayembekezere onse abwere kuno pali kuyitanidwa kosiyanasiyana tsono kuno ku nyumba ya mapemphero atsikana abwere kuzathandiza kupitisa mpingo patsogolo anatero ambuye ziyaye 
 ati akugwiritsa ntchito njira zosiyana zoyinana zokopera achinyamata nsembe za misa wailesi achinyamatawa azisirira kapempheredwe kawo
Label: RELIGION

Text:
mafumu ayamikira kuyamba kwa ziphaso mafumu mdziko muno ati kuyamba kwa ntchito yopanga kupereka ziphaso zosonyeza unzika chiyambi chopititsa patsogolo ntchito za chitukuko zosiyanasiyana kaamba koti njira imodzi yotsekera manga katangale 
  dzana lachinayi mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika adatsegulira ntchitoyi mumzinda wa lilongwe pomva maganizo mafumu tamvani idapeza ntchitoyi ikomera wa amalawi 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kachindamoto tikuyamika mwa zina mafumu adati zitupazi zithandiza woba mankhwala mzipatala kutulutsa kulowetsa katundu mwachinyengo kuthithikana mmisika maukwati osalongosoka zichepe 
  timadandaula usana usiku chaka chaka mankhwala samalimba mchipatala cha dedza si kuchipatala kokha ayi ku admarc kokagula chimanga kuthithikana mmisika chosazindikirana 
  ambiri mwa omwe amapindula ochoka kunja kaamba koti pozindikira akuchita zachinyengo amalawirira nkukakhala oyambirira kulandira thandizo amalawi akamabwera amapeza mankhwala atha malo mumsika atha ngakhalenso chimanga chimene ku admarc chatha idatero mfumu yayikulu kachindamoto ya mboma la dedza lachinayi 
  mfumu mlauli ya ku neno komwe kufupi malire malawi mozambique kudzera ku mwanza idati mafumu kumeneko adali pachipsinjo chachikulu pankhani yokhudza milandu ya malo kaamba kamaukwati osadziwika 
  amangochoka uko nkudzafunsira mkazi kuno ndiye poti padalibe zitupa kumakhala kovuta kuwazindikira bola akangodziwako midzi ingapo nkumanamizira amachokera kumeneko mapeto pake banja likavuta zimavuta kuweruza kwake akudza amapezeka alanda malo adatero mlauli 
  inkosi khosolo ya mboma la mzimba idati chitupa nchitetezo choyamba kwa munthu kaamba poti kulikonse angapite amatha kumuzindikira 
  timachitira pangozi munthu ukasowa kumene ukakhala chitupa amakuzindikira msanga nkukuthandiza adatero khosolo
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:
wobwerera lili pululu amwaliranso ku zomba zimene zachitika mmudzi mwa makoloni kwa t mwambo ku zomba masiku apitawa nzoda mutu wa zaka 28 amene adabwerera kumanda sabata ziwiri zapitazo bokosi la maliro lomwe adagoneka mtembo litayamba kunjenjemera wamwaliranso atangokhala kwa masiku anayi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi mfumu ya mmudzimo woyandikana nyumba atsimikizira msangulutso lachiwiri lapitali za malodzawa ati mmudziwo akuganiza zachitikazi nzamasalamusi 
  wojambula wathu kufanizira mmene zidakhalira tsiku limene tamara faliji adauka kwa akufa patrick matemba yemwe adaona zododometsazi zikuchitika adauza msangulutso tamara faliji adagwa kwake masana 11 august 
  sitikudziwa chomwe chidachitika adangogwa tidamutengera kuchipatala cha makwapala health centre komwe adatiuza wamwalira adatero matemba 
  monica mbewe namwino wa pachipatalachi yemwe adatsimikiza za imfayo poyamba adauza msangulutso zomwe wodwalayo amaonetsa zidasonyeza wamwalira 
  adafika moyo ndidayamba kumupatsa thandizo patatha mphindi 30 ndidaitanidwanso amene amamuyanganirawo ndikaone zomwe akuchita panthawiyo amaonetsa zizindikiro zoti wawalira 
  pamtima sipamagunda thupi lidangolobdoka diripi ya madzi mankhwala idasiya kuyenda apa zidasonyeza wamwalira moti ndineyo ndidalembera wamwalira adatero namwinoyu 
  nyakwawa makoloni potsimikiza za nkhaniyi idati itamva za malirowo idalamula ayambe kukonzekera zoika maliro mawa lake 
  mawa lake adzukulu adakumba manda mmudzimu adakhoma bokosi mwambo wa maliro utatha tidanyamula zovuta ulendo kumanda idatero mfumuyi 
  makoloni adati adadabwa kuona bokosi likugwedera atangofika kumanda 
  apa nkuti mwambo wakumandako utangoyamba titsitsire bokosi mmanda ndidalamula bokosilo litsekulidwe 
  titatsekula tidaona wakufayo akutuluka thukuta amadziwongolawongola adatero makoloni 
  adati mwambo udathera panjira adakwirira dzenje la mandalo nabwerera woukayo komwe kudaitanidwa ampingo wina wa pentecost amupempherere 
  pakulowa kwa tsikulo akuti mayiyo adakwanitsa kudya phala movutikirabe 
  amangovumata ameze ndiye kudali kovuta komabe adadya pangono adatero matemba 
  kulankhula ndiye adasiyiratu pamasiku onsewo amangodya phala 16 august adadzuka wolefuka adasiya kudya kenaka mpamene timamva wamwaliranso 
  tidakhulupirira ulendowu adamwaliradi mkhwapa mudali mutazizira samatulukanso thukuta tidakaika maliro 17 august adatero makoloni 
  mfumuyi yati ikuganiza zomwe zidachitikazo zidali zamasalamusi akukhulupirira imfa ya mayiyo wina adaikapo 
  chilowereni ufumu zotere sindidazionepo ineyotu ndikuti ndidali pomwepo ndidadzionera zonsezi zikuchitika ndinadabwa nazo ndikukaika zotere zingangochitika alipo amene akukhudzidwa mpaka mayiyu afe imfa yotere idatsindika mfumuyi 
  akuti malirowo atangochitika adzukulu adamenya gogo ake womwalirayo pomuganizira akukhudzidwa imfa yachilendoyo
Label: WITCHCRAFT

Text:
zionetsero zaima zikwizikwi adabwerera manja mkhosi kuchoka mmalo zionetsero lachitatu 28 august 2019 atauzidwa zionetserozo zalephereka kaamba ka chiletso cha khoti la supreme mumzinda wa blantyre 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka chitetezo chidali chokhwima   zionetsero zomwe human rights defenders coalition hrdc adakonza kukachitira mmabwalo ndege mzipata zonse za lino kwa masiku atatu kuyambira lachitatu mpaka dzulo lachisanu 
  titaunika za opempha chiletso chigamulo nchoti kwa masiku 14 kuyambira lachitatu 28 august 2019 kusachitike chionetsero cha uliwonse panthawiyi mbali ziwiri ya boma hrdc zikumane nkukambirana momwe angadyerere ufulu wawo wopanga zionetsero pasapezeke munthu wolankhula zomwe zingasokoneze mlandu wa chisankho chikutero chiletsocho 
  pakucha lachitatu kudaonetsa adasemphana uthengawo adayamba kukhamukira mmalo omwe hrdc idalengeza mudzayambira zionetserozo 
  mmawa momwe apolisi asilikali adali mbwee mmizinda kufuna kuonetsetsa atsatira chigamulo cha khoti la supreme sizidakomere omwe adakonzekera kuonetsa mkwiyo wawo 
  kodi amenewa chikuwaopsa nchiyani akunjenjemera okhaokha akadatisiya tipange zionetsero bwinobwino mesa ufulu wathu bomalitu likutiponderedza kwambiri adatero mathews kawinga yemwe amakhala ku mtandire mumzinda wa lilongwe 
  pulogalamu ya zionetserozi idagwedeza moti lachitatu mabizinesi ambiri maofesi adali otseka poopa zomwe zakhala zikuchitika pazionetsero zina pomwe amatengerapo mwayi nkumathyola maofesi sitolo za nkumaba 
  zionetsero zomwe zikuchitika mdziko muno nzofuna kuchotsa wapampando wa malawi electoral commission mec jane ansah amalawi akuti sadayendetse chisankho chathachi 
  hrdc yatsimikizira amalawi akatha masiku 14 omwe khothi lapereka zionetserozo zidzapitilira mopanda mantha aliwonse akuopsezedwa 
  mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika adalamula apolisi asilikali ankhondo adzagwiritse ntchito mphamvu zida njira iliyonse zionetsero zisadzachitike 
  mutharika adalankhula pamwambo wotsegulira sitima za nkhondo ku mangochi 20 august 2019 akadaulo ndale malamulo adati mutharika adalakwitsa kuteroko nkuponderedza ufulu wa omwe uli mmalamulo omwe adalumbira adzalemekeza
Label: POLITICS

 mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolikayu wakonza zokacheza mdziko la thailand kuyambira 20 mpaka 23 november 2019 pali chokenzero chakuti akadzatha kucheza mdzikomo adzamalizira ulendo wu pokachezanso mdziko la japan

Text:
awiri afa pochokera ku interview ya zaumoyo awiri afa wavulala modetsa nkhawa njinga ya moto yomwe anakwera itaphonya msewu kukagwera ku phompho ku changalume barracks mboma la la zomba 
 omwalirawo gulu limodzi awa achinyamata osaka ntchito mmalawi malingana mwa okhudzidwa ngoziyi sellina bomani omwe wa bungwe la tikondane positive living support organisation tipoliso mbomalo mwa omwe afa ngoziyi yemwe amayendetsa njingayi benson machira winayi mirriam ganizani mwa atsikana awiri omwe anakwera njingayi amene wavulala ngoziyi ellen samson
