Text:
mbs iletsa mafuta mtimachubu amalawi amene akhala akukazingira mafuta mmachubu tsopano ayenera kupeza njira ina bungwe loyesa zopangidwa zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno la malawi bureau of standards mbs laletsa mafutawa amene azigulitsa azengedwa mlandu 
  wa bungweli davlin chokazinga adati sikukhala zonyengerera pokwaniritsa pofuna kuteteza miyoyo ya amalawi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc amene akugulitsa mafutawo adziwe tithana naye talanda kale mavenda ku mulanje adatero 
  chokazinga adati mafutawo angabweretse matenda pamoyo wa munthu kotero nchifukwa adaganiza asapezekenso mdziko muno 
  adati akuchita potsata malamulo katundu ogulitsidwa mdziko muno ayenera wabwino wosapereka chiopsezo ku miyoyo ya 
  ganizo la mbs ladzidzimutsa amene amagulitsa mafutawa pamene adati boma akuluakulu bungweli awapatse chochita asadaletse kugulitsako 
  gift majongoti yemwe akuti amagulitsa chigubu cha malita 20 patsiku pamsika wa mbayani mumzinda wa blantyre wati apa boma lamutsekera mpita 
  ndili ana mkazi kumudzi amadalira ndiwatumizire thandizo feteleza zina zonsezitu zikuchokera mgeni imeneyi kuletsa kwa boma imfa yanga yomwe palibe chomwe ndingachite chindibweretsere ndalama akufuna kuletsa ndiye atipezere zochita adatero majongoti 
  adati pali ambiri amene sangakwanitse kugula mafuta okwera mtengo taganizani amabwera k20 tiwagulitse mafuta andalamayi timawayezera lero amenewa mukawauze akagule mafuta k1 000 angakwanitse adazingwa majongoti 
  si ogulitsa okha nawo ogula akuti mbs ikuwaika kumpeni sangakwanitse kugula mafuta amene otsika mtengo kuposa oyezawa 
  mwa anthuwa clara nyandula wa mmudzi mwa maduwani t nkaya ku balaka polankhula tamvani pafoni adati banja lake limadalira mafutawa sapezanso mtengo wina wogwira 
  mwezi ndimagwiritsira ntchito malita awiri amene timagula mtengo wa k600 lita akaletsa ndiye akutiganizira kumene adafunsa motero nyandula 
  adati boma liyenera kuwaganizira akadya zokazingira mafuta ake amakhala oyezetsawo 
  modester chimpando wa kwa manje kwa t kapeni mboma la blantyre adati zisachitike apweteka osauka 
  sindikukana mafuta enawa chiopsezo pamoyo wamunthu chofunika nchakuti akufuna kuletsa ndiye aonetsetse mafuta abwinowo akugulitsidwa motsika mtengo mlingo wochepa akwanitse kugula 
  sizitero ndiye akhala akukonza akuika miyoyo ya ovutikitsitsa pamoto adatero chimpando 
  sizikusintha ganizo la chokazinga pamene akuti akuyenera kusankha moyo imfa 
  moyo imfa chabwino chili moyo ndiye tipitirirabe ganizo lathu akhale moyo adatero chokazinga 
  chokazinga akuti moyo wodula kotero avomereze kodi kutaya k20 ndikuti ukataye ma miliyoni kuchipatala chabwino nchiyani adziwe moyo wathu wodula kuposa mafuta amene akugulawo 
  pachifukwa chilichonse sitikubwerera mmbuyo kugwira amene akugulitsa mafutawa simafuta abwino kumbali ya ukhondo wa munthu adatero chokazinga 
  adati ntchitoyi sikuti ayamba lero adangozimirira adaonjeza bungwe lawo lalembera makampani amene akumapanga mafutawa alekeretu 
  atha kupanga mafuta mafutawo akuyenera kuvomerezedwa mafutawo akhale uthenga onse akabweretsa mavuta kwa tione kolowera chomwe chikuchitika mafutawa nchakuti palibe uthenga wa amene akupanga munthu atamwalira mafutawa tingasowe koloza kaamba ka nchifukwa tikuletsa adatero chokazinga 
  kumbali ya matenda amene mafutawa angabweretse chokazinga akuti sakuona matenda amene angabwere mafutawa si abwino moyo wa munthu chinthu sichili chingabweretse matenda osiyanasiyana mosatchula amodzi chinthucho sichoyenera pamoyo wa munthu 
  wati mafuta angathe kugulitsidwira mmasacheti akhale wodinda yemwe akupanga mafutawo akuyenera kuvomerezedwa bungwe lawo 
  naye wa bungwe loona ufulu wa ogula la consumers association of malawi cama john kapito adati mbs yachita kuletsa mafutawa 
  takhala tikuwauza mbs aletse mafutawa ayamba kuletsa ndiye zili ogula adziwe ndithu mafutawa siabwino mafuta abwino amene amapakilidwa pali zizindikiro za kampani yomwe ikupanga zikativuta ifeyo ugula tikaone kodandaula 
  sitikusangalala akugula zinthu zonyasa zimenezi amene akugulitsa alekeretu kodi bizinesi ndiye kugulitsa zoipa izitu mapeto ake tidzalola chamba azigulitsanso akuchita bizinesi adatero kapito 
  mafutawa amagwiritsidwa kwambiri akumudzi maka cha kutchipa kwake
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
african airlines yataya 400 million dollars kaamba ka coronavirus bungwe lowona za maulendo ndege kuno ku africa la african airlines lati lawononga ndalama zokwana 4 hundred million za ku america chiyambireni mliri wa kachilombo ka coronavirus mdziko la china kuyambira mwezi wa february chaka chino 
 malipoti awailesi ya bbc ati zadza kutsekedwa kwa mabwalo andege mmaiko akuno ku africa njira imodzi yofuna kupewa kufala kwa kachilomboka kaamba koti maiko ambiri malonda la china 
 ziri chomwechi komwe kumafikira ndege zonse kuno ku africa mdziko la ethiopia adakagwirabe ntchito zawo ponyamula mdzikolo kupita kubwera mdziko la china mmizinda yonse isanu ya mdzikolo 
 polankhulapo wa bungwe la international air transport association iata raphael kuuchi wati ntchito za malonda zomwe zimayenda zayima kaamba ka kuletsedwa kwa maulendo apandege mmaiko akuno ku africa kupita kubwera mdziko la china 
 mayiko omwe aletsa maulendo ndenge la china south africa tanzania mauritus morocco rwanda kenya 
 padakali nthendayi yafikira mmaiko egypt tunisia morocco algeria nigeria senegal kuno ku africa
Label: ECONOMY

Text:

 malinga wapampando wa tchalitchili edmond kamwana ganizoli ladza kuchuluka kwa chiwerengero cha akhristu tchalitchili 
 ati padakalipano tsiku la mapemphero akhristu akumapemphelera panja kaamba ka kuchepa kwa tchalitchili 
 powonjerapo gloria kamwana omwe wapampando wa bungwe la amayi tchalitchili ndiwosangalara kufika kwa radio maria malawi ku derali 
 ndikuthokodza radio maria malawi imasisimutsa osiyanasiyana woti si mpingo wakatolika 
 wailesi imeneyi imodzi mwa ma wailesi omwe imatimvetsa kukoma chotcho tsiku lina mukadzafuna kubwera mudzatidziwe tidzakonzekera wailesiyi izipitiliza mvetsa kukoma anatero kamwana

Text:
boma likukhazikitsa misika ya zakudimba boma lili mkati momanga malo ogulitsira zokolola zakudimba njira imodzi yochulukitsira phindu lomwe alimi amapeza pogulitsa zokolola zochokera ulimi wamthirira 
  ntchitoyi gawo limodzi la ntchito yotukula ulimi wamthirira pokonzanso masikimu 11 mchigawo cha zaulimi cha blantyre agricultural development division add 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc woyanganira ntchito yotukula zipangizo za ulimi wamthirira cosmos luwanda wati misikayi yomwe ilipo 6 imangidwa ku neno kuchigwa cha mtsinje wa shire 
  wati ntchitoyi yomwe ikugwirika thandizo la ndalama zokwana 12 biliyoni kwacha ku african development bank adb imanga manthu wa misika mumzinda wa lilongwe komwe kutakhale zipangizo zapamwamba zotha kusungira ndiwo zamasamba zipatso kwanthawi yaitali 
  cholinga cha misikayi kulumikiza alimi ogula mosavuta adatero luwanda 
  woyanganira ntchito yomanga msika wa zokolola za kudimba wa chikwawa khama kammwamba adati malowa adzakhala malo osungira zokolola malo otsukira zokolola magetsi madzi apampopi zimbudzi zamakono 
  misikayi izidzagulitsa zokolola mwachipiku kwa amalonda ochokera kutali adindo oyendetsa masikimu amene azidzayendetsa misika imeneyi adatero kammwamba 
  padakalipano ntchito yokonza masikimu amene mupolojeikiti imeneyi ili mkati masikimuwa akuyembekezeka kuyamba kugwira ntchito yawo usanafike mwezi wa june chaka chamawa
Label: FARMING

Text:
zipani zakonzeka kusankha makomishona mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika wauza zipani za ndale nthambi yoyanganira ogwira ntchito makhoti judicial service commission apereke maina omwe akuona akhonza makomishona bungwe loyendetsa zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec wapampando 
  zikutsatira kutula pansi mpando kwa yemwe adali wapampando wa bungwe la mec jane ansah polingalira mphamvu za makomishona onse zikutha 5 june 2020 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc adalembera zipani mutharika malingana mneneri wa mutharika mgeme kalilani mtsogoleri wa linoyo wapanga pofuna kubungwe la mec kusakhale mphako mphamvu za makomishona enawo zikatha 
  apulezidenti sadapereka yeniyeni yoti mainawo abwere polingalira tikuthamangitsana yachisankho cha pulezidenti tikuyembekeza zipani amakhoti apereka msanga mainawo adatero kalilani 
  malingana malamulo wapampando wa mec amasankhidwa komiti ya makhotiyo mneneri wa nthambi ya makhoti agness patemba watsimikiza zoti nthambiyo yalandira kalata youzidwa ipereke dzina 
  kalata yatipeza komiti ya makhoti ikumana iunike momwe zikhalire zikhala zachangu potengera makomishona afunika pachisankho chikudzachi adatero patemba 
  khothi lidagamula 3 february 2020 chisankho cha pulezidenti chichitikenso potsatira umboni omwe udaperekedwa pamlandu woti chisankhocho sichidayende 
  saulos chilima wa utm party lazarus chakwera wa mcp ndiwo adakasuma bungwe la mec lidasokoneza chisankho cha 21 may 2019 litalengeza peter mutharika wa dpp ndiye adapambana 
  khothilo lidaperekanso mphamvu ku nyumba ya malamulo iunike makomishona nkuthekera kopitiriza ntchito nyumbayo idapeza makomishona onse adalakwa pantchito yawo idawunikira achoke pabwere 
  katswiri ndale george phiri wati mutharika wapanga kupereka mpata kuzipani zipereke maina makomishona wati naye apange machawi akalandira mainawo 
  wati uwu ukhonzanso mwayi poti aphungu nyumba ya malamulo akhala akukumana posachedwa ndiye zikhonza ubwino makomishonawo akawakambiranetu ku nyumbayo 
  zangochitika zakhala zipani zikapereka maina pulezidenti nkuvomereza nyumba ya malamulo ikhala mpata owakambirana isadayalule tipha mbalame zingapo mwala umodzi adatero phiri 
  malamulo zachisankho 2018 amalola zipani zomwe zili aphungu 10 mwa 100 aliwonse kutanthauza pafupifupi aphungu 19 kupita mtsogolo mnyumbayo kupeleka maina makomishona 
  apa zikusonyeza mnyumbayo zipani za dpp mcp ndizo zili nkutuekera kopeleka maina makomishona mec 
  mneneri wa dpp nicholas dausi watsimikiza chipanicho chalandira kalata youzidwa chipereke maina makomishona atsopano 
  talandira tipanga momwe pulezidenti anenera tisankha angapo nkuwaunika kenako nkusankhapo maina omwe akufunikawo nkupeleka adatero dausi 
  mneneri wachipani cha mcp maurice munthali wati chipani cha mcp chidakonzeka kalekale kusankha makomishona atsopano icho chimakanitsitsa makomishona akalewa adzayendetsenso chisankho 
  tipereka maina mosavuta nzomwe takhala tikuyembekeza yonseyi adatero munthali
Label: POLITICS

Text:
tikolola chimanga chochulukanduna nduna ya zamalimidwe kuonetsetsa mdziko muno muli chakudya chokwanira peter mwanza yati undunawu ukulosera chaka chino lino likolola chimanga chochuluka ndikukhala china chapadera 
  polankhula lachitatu mumzinda wa lilongwe pomwe amafotokozera atolankhani za kholola wa chaka chino ndunayi yati malinga zolosera lino lingapate matani 740 000 chimanga apadera chaka chatha lino lidapeza matani oposa 500 000 apamwamba 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zolosera za ndunayi zikudza pomwe zadziwika dedza madera kuchigawo cha kumpoto kwa lino mvula yachita njomba alimi pachiopsezo mwina galu wakuda awayendera kumeneko 
  zoloserazo zingatheke ndiye lino likhala chakudya chambiri chapadera lino limafuna matani achimanga 2.6 miliyoni 
  mwanza adati ichi chisonyezo chabwino lino lapata chimanga chambiri chapadera adati boma liyesetsa njira ya zipangizo zotsika mtengo lino lipate chakudya chambiri 
  mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda polankhula atangokwanitsa chaka akulamulira ku lilongwe adati madera omwe akhudzidwa njala ochepa kotero boma liyesetsa ulimi wa mthirira uyambike njala ithe mdziko lino 
  2012 lino lidapeza matani 3.624 miliyoni chimanga chapadera adali matani 566 552 pomwe 2011 tidakolola matani 3.8 miliyoni chapadera matani 1.2 miliyoni 
  padakali boma kudzera mwa banda lalengeza kale ndondomeko ya makuponi ipitirira omwe adzalandire makuponiwa 1.5 miliyoni nambalayi idakwezedwa pomwe banda adayamba kulamula kuchoka 1.4 miliyoni
Label: FARMING

Text:

Text:
la bahamas lilonjeza kuthandiza mzika zake zokhudziwa ngozi ya mphepo wolemba sylvester kasitomu http://www.radiomaria.mw/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/bahamas-300x168.jpg alt= width="837 height="469 > la bahamas lati likuyesetsa kuchitapo kanthu pofuna kuthandiza omwe akhudzidwa mphepo ya mphanvu yomwe inaomba sabata yathayi 
 malipoti wailesi ya bbc ati zadza madandaulo omwe okhala chilumba cha abaco akhala akunena boma la dzikolo likulephera kuthandiza omwe akhudzidwawa 
 padakali 43 omwe afa chiyambireni mphepoyi pali chiyembekezo choti chiwerengero cha omwe afa mdzikolo chitha kukwera kaamba koti nthito yopumutsa omwe akhudzidwa idakali nkati 
 polankhulapo nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani mdziko la bahamas carl smith boma la dzikolo likuchita chothekera pofuna kuthandiza omwe akhudzidwa mphepoyi kudzera ku ndondomeko yoona za ngozi zogwa madzidzidzi ya national emergency management agency nema tikuyesetsa tifikire onse omwe akhudzidwawa cholinga choti apeze malo okhala chakudya zina kudzera ndondomekoyi anatero smith 
 chiwerengero cha nyumba zomwe zagwa chilumba cha abaco chafika 90 percent zomwe zikuchititsa mazanamazana asowe pokhala kaamba ka vutoli 
 la bahamas lakhudzidwa mphepo yamphanvu kwa maulendo okwana asanu chaka cha 2016 zomwe zakhala zikudzetsa imfa za ochuluka kwambiri kuonongeka kwa katundu nyumba
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
lamulo lothandiza kupeza mauthenga mosavuta liyamba kugwira ntchito posachedwa kazako unduna wa zofalitsa nkhani watsimikizira amalawi lamulo lothandiza kupeza mauthenga mosavuta la access to information ati liyamba kugwira ntchito posachedwapa 
 kazako anavota zinthu zisinthe nduna undunawu gospel kazako omwe anena polankhula radio maria malawi 
 ati mtsogoleri w adziko lino anasayinira kale lamuloli ulamuliro wa chipani cha dpp omwe amalepheretsa lamulori liyambe kugwira ntchito yake 
 vuto la lomwe limayendetsedwa mabanja awiri atatu anayi limakhala limeneli umboni ndiwa lamulo limeneli la acces to information nyumba ya malamulo inavomereza president anasayinira mabanja ake ochepa anangoganiza lisayambe kugwira ntchito zomwe zoyipa kwambiri anatero kazako 
 pamenepa kazako ati mtsogoleri wa lino lazarus chakwera waonetsa kale chidwi choti lamuloli liyambirenso kugwira ntchito wati boma lomwe lilipo padakalipano lilibe chilichonse choti libise choncho lamuloli liyamba kugwira ntchito
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:

  maphunziro otani nanga uchitanso ziti kupatula mpira ndadutsa fomu 4 moti ndikufuna ndipange za umekaniki posakhalitsapa ndipitanso kusukulu ndimafunitsitsa ntchitoyi kupatula mulungu adandidalitsa luso la mpira

Text:
papa wakhazikitsa chaka cha faustina kalendala ya mpingo mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wakhazikitsa chaka faustina woyera kalendala ya mpingo 
 malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican zadziwika kudzera kalata yomwe bungwe lowona za chipembedzo ma sakramenti ku likulu la mpingo ku vatican latulutsa tsiku lolemba 18 may 
 chithunzithunzi cha faustina woyera kalatayo yati papa francisco wakhazikitsa tsiku la 5 october kalendala ya mpingo wa katolika likhale chaka cha faustina woyera 
 bungwe loona za chipembedzo ma sakramenti kulikulu la mpingo ku vatican congregation for divine worship and the discipline of the sacraments lomwe limatsogoleredwa cardinal robert sarah lolemba 18 may lalengeza papa francisco wakhazikitsa chaka cha maria faustina kowalska kalendala ya mpingo liturgical calendar 
 malinga kalata ya bungweli papa francisco wakhazikitsa tsiku la 5 october chaka chilichonse chaka cha faustina woyera 
 chochititsa chidwi nkhaniyi nchakuti nkhaniyi yadziwika 18 may tsiku lomwe mpingo umakumbukira papita zaka 100 pamene papa yohane paulo wachiwiri woyera anabadwa ku poland papa yohane paulo wachiwiriyu yemwe adakhazikitsa faustina woyera mchaka cha 2000 
 faustina adabadwa mchaka cha 1905 ku poland anamwalira mchaka cha 1938.iye adali asisitere chipani cha amayi maria chifundo sisters of our lady of mercy faustina adali kusinkhasinkha za chifundo cha mulungu chotumphuka kudzera mwa ambuye yesu 
 mapemphero osiyana siyana chifundo cha mulungu lamulungu la chifundo cha mulungu divine mercy sunday zipatso za moyo wa faustina woyera yemwe virgo
Label: RELIGION

Text:

Text:
zomba diocese yalimbikitsa atumiki ake kupulumutsa miyoyo ya akhristu ku covid-19 episkopi wa dayosizi ya zomba ambuye george desmond tambala ati atumiki mpingo udindo waukulu wopulumutsa miyoyo ya omwe akuwatumikira ku nthenda ya covid-19 
 tambala atumiki udindo wothandiza kapewedwe ka nthendayi episkopi yu wayankhula lachiwiri ku thondwe pastoral centre pomwe anatsogolera gulu la ansembe asisiteri abulazala amu dayosizi yi maphunziro tsiku limodzi omwe anakonzedwa cholinga chofuna kumvetsa nkhani zokhudza nthenda yi 
 ambuye tambala ati anaona kofunika atumiki alandire uthenga woyenera wokhudza nthendayi nawonso athe njira zoyenera zopewera matendawa akathe kuthandiza omwe akuwatumikira mmadera 
 ansembe asisteri abulazala amakhala zambiri choncho iwowa udindo waukulu wowathandiza anthuwo kapewedwe ka nthendayi yomwe yabwera movuta kwambiri tinakonza maphunzirowa amvetse kaye za nthendayi kenako akathandize mmadera momwe akukhala anatero ambuye tambala 
 masiku apitawa ambuye tambala anapemphanso akhristu mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno asataye mtima apemphere zolimba papezeke amene akwanitse kupeza mankhwala ochizira nthendayi
Label: HEALTH

Text:
mbweee kumtsutso makandideti 11 amene adasonkhana ku mtsutso wa atsogoleri usiku wa lachiwiri msabatayi alonjeza zodzasintha moyo wa akumudzi makandidetiwa akulepherabe kunena zomwe adzachite zomwe alonjezazo zidzachitike 
  zikuoneka atsogoleriwo amangonena okoma pokopa mwachitsanzo mtsogoleri adalonjeza moyo wa akumudzi udzasintha powonetsetsa wakumudzi chochita osanena akumudziwo azidzachitanji chomwe chidzasinthe moyo wawo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc boma la ppm lidzaonetsetsa banja lililonse kumudzi lili chochita zomwe zidzachepetse umphawi mavuto ambiri tili nawo vuto umphawi kungothetsa umphawi ndiye zambiri zakonzedwa adatero mark katsonga mogwirana george nnesa wa tisintha alliance 
  kuwalonjeza akumudzi zokoma chonchi sizidayambe lero 1994 bakili muluzi adakhazikitsa vision 2020 ponena pofika chaka cha 2020 malawi adzakhala akudzidalira payekha zomwenso zidzasinthe moyo wa akumudzi 
  kufika kwangotsala zaka 6 umphawi ukupitirizabe kusasantha akumudzi kuchoka panthawiyo pabwera maboma dpp pp omwenso amalonjeza mwakuya moyo wa akumudzi ndiwo udzayanganidwe kwambiri 
  poyankhapo zomwe boma lawo lidzachite zakagwiritsidwe ntchito ka zinthu zaboma ogwira ntchito mboma atsogoleriwa adatha kukamba ndondomeko zomwe boma lilipo likutsata zakubedwa kwa ndalama mboma 
  james nyondo wa national salvation front nasaf yemwe poyankha amatha kuphwasula ndondomeko zomwe maboma apita akhala akutsata lilipoli adati vuto zinthu mobisa tili vuto loti mboma mulibe chilungamo kusachita zinthu moti amalawi adziwe.mavuto lino adayamba 1994 tisabisenso adatero 
  mukavotera nyondo ndiye ndalama iliyonse izidzatsatidwa.kungoba ndalama kaya k20 yeniyeniyi udzanjatidwa ukaseweze kundende zaka zosachepera 20 
  atsogoleriwa adadzudzulanso zipani polowetsa ndalama kasankhidwe ka ogwira ntchito mboma 
  davis katsonga wa chipani cha pfuko akuti vuto zonse amakhala mtsogoleri 
  pulezidenti akukana kuwulula chuma chake ndiye kwa ogwira ntchito mboma angatani?ineyo ndidzayesetsa ndidzakhale chitsanzo adatero katsonga 
  mfundoyi idavomerezedwanso friday jumbe wa new labour party nlp kamuzu chibambo wa petra 
  lazarus chakwera wa mcp mogwirizana atupele muluzi wa udf john chisi wa umodzi helen singh wa united independent party uip adati adzaonetsetsa amene akusankhidwa mmaudindo mboma akhale amaphunziro okwanira posatengera kochokera chipani 
  tidzakhala amene mbiri yawo ndiyabwino adatero singh pamene peter mutharika wa dpp adati boma lake lidzapana akuluakulu aboma pamene ayenda afotokoze ndalama katundu amene wagwiritsidwa ntchito 
  atsogoleriwa amene ludzu losintha momwe zinthu zikuchitikira mboma adalonjezanso nkhani ya migodi idzatsatidwa chidwi amalawi azidzapeza phindu 
  muluzi adati adzaonetsetsa malawi ikutenga k30 k100 iliyonse ya phindu lomwe boma tidzapeze jumbe adati malawi izidzatenga k49 k100 iliyonse singh akuti k51 k100 idzakhala ya lino 
  adatinso adzaonetsetsa amene mdera lomwe mukukumbidwa migodi ndiwo adzakhale oyambirira kupindula kuonetsetsa apeza akadaulo enieni amene amatsatira momwe ntchitoyi imagwirikira 
  amene ntchito yokumba migodi ikuchitikira tidzawamangira misewu yabwino magetsi adzakhalapo sukulu zipatala osati kumangowasiyira mabwenje adatero chibambo mogwirizana singh chakwera 
  sadafotokoze bwinobwino zomwe adzachite lino lasiya kudalira thandizo la maiko akunja atsogoleriwa adalonjezabe zodzachoka munsinga yongodalira thandizo lakunja 
  mtsutso womaliza uchitika lachiwiri likudzali ku comesa hall mumzinda wa blantyre wa bungwe loona ufulu wa atolankhani la misa malawi anthony kasunda yemwe akutsogolera mtsutsowu akuti uwu mwayi amalawi amve zomwe atsogoleri akonza 
  munthu ukamalembedwa ntchito umayenera ufunsidwe mafunso.pano amalawi akuyenera akufunseni mafunso asadakulembeni ntchitoyi kwa amene sadabwere zili kwa amalawi kuweruza adatero kasunda 
  sizikudziwikabe mtsogoleri wa lino yemwe adzaimire pp adzakhale nawo pamtsutsowu mtsutso woyamba adakana sangakhale nawo

Text:
mayor apempha red cross iphunzitse first aid wolemba sylvester kasitomu /wp content uploads/2019/09 kapombosola.jpg alt= width="388 height="470 />wavomereza za kufunika kwa first aid kapombosola banda meya wa mzinda wa zomba khansala benson bulla lachiwiri wapempha bungwe la malawi red cross society liphunzitse mmadera ambiri za first aid anthuwa adzithandidza anzawo akamvulala asanawatengere kuchipatala 
 wayankhula kwa jali mboma la zomba pamwambo womwe bungwe la malawi red society lidakonza wa first aid day 
 khansala bulla yemwe mlendo wolemekezeka mwambowo wapemphanso bungwe la malawi red society liphunzitse akaidi mndende za lino zamomwe angathandizilane pomwe wina wavulala ndendezi 
 tikudziwa zipatala zathu zamutalimutali kusowa kwa makhwala mzipatalazi kwakula khumbo lathu pakhomo pali ponse pakhale muthu modzi yekha yemwe aphunzitsidwe mmene ngathandizire muthu akavulala asanapite ku chipatala anatero bula 
 poyankhulapo pamwambo wu wa zaumoyo ku bungwe la malawi red society mdziko muno dan kapombosola banda anavomeleza zakufunika kwa maphunziro okhudza kaperekedwe ka thandizo loyambilira kwa omwe avulala 
 kutengera ndikufunika kwa chithandizo choyambirira koti timapewa kuluza moyo wa muthu kaamba kotalikira chipatala zimatha kutheka muthu wakomoka athu amalephera kumpatsa chithandizo kaamba kosowa upangiri wa mmene angamuthandizire antero kapombosola banda 
 bungwe la malawi red cross limathandiza popereka maphunziro kwa adziwe njira zomwe angamuthandizire munthu amene wadwala mwadzidzidzi wachita ngodzi apewe infa zodza kaamba kaamba kosowa chisamaliro chokwanira
Label: HEALTH

Text:
parish ya ntaja yalonjeza kupitiriza kuthandiza radio maria parish ya st marys ntaja dayosizi ya mangochi yati ipitiriza kudzipereka pothandiza radio maria malawi 
 mfumu parishiyi beato mathyola anena pakutha mwambo wa misa ya thandizani radio maria yomwe yachitika lero ku parishiyi 
 mathyola mwambo wa perekani perekani ati radio maria malawi ikusowa zambiri kotero okonda wailesiyi akuyenera kupitiriza kuyithandiza ntchito zake zofalitsa nthenga wabwino zipitilire kuyenda 
 akhristu udindo kuthandiza radio maria ipite patsogolo mikwingwirima yomwe tikukumana nayo isatilepheretse kuthandiza wailesiyi yomwe ikugwira ntchito zotamandika kwambiri pogawa mulungu anatero mathyola 
 polankhulapo woyendetsa ntchito za radio maria malawi louis phiri ayamikira akhristu parishiyi kaamba ka chidwi chomwe nacho pothandiza wailesiyi 
 tikudziwa matenda covid-19 abweretsa mavuto ambiri chuma alimba mtima kuthandiza wailesiyi limeneli likhale phunziro kwa maparishi asawilingule pothandiza wailesiyi anatero phiri 
 pamwambowu akhristu ku st marys parish ku ntaja athandiza wailesiyi ndalama zoposera 3 hundred and 6 thousand kwacha
Label: RELIGION

Text:
papa wati chaka chino akacheza ku iraq mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisko wati akacheza mdziko la iraq chaka chino 
 malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa francisko walankhula lachitatu polandira gulu la akhristu katolika ochokera mdziko la iraq kulikulu la mpingo ku vatican 
 papa umodzi mwa maulendo ake utumiki mmawu ake papa francisko wati amakhala mdziko la iraq tsiku tsiku kudzera mmapemphero cha nkhondo mavuto omwe mdzikolo akukumana nao wati ndicholinga chake akacheza mdzikolo chaka chino 
 lachitatu papa francisko watsimikizira gulu la akhristu katolika ochokera mdziko la iraq za mapemphero ake malinga nkhondo mavuto osiyanasiyana omwe mdziko la iraq akukumana nao 
 wauzanso gulu la katolikawo cholinga chake akacheza mdzikolo chaka chino 
 kwa yaitali papa francisko wakhala akufunitsitsa kukacheza mdziko la iraq mpaka likulu la mpingo ku vatican silidatsimikizebe za ulendowu ungachitike 
 mmwezi wa december mchaka cha 2018 mlembi wa wa likulu la mpingo ku vatican secretary of state cardinal pietro parolin adakacheza mdziko la iraq 
 ulendo wa papa francisko wa mdziko la iraq ungatheke adzakhala papa woyamba kukacheza mdzikolo
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
kwezani ndalama ku umoyomhen mavuto zaumoyo mmalawi muno ndiye osayamba odwala kuthinana mzipatala mankhwala kusowa madotolo ochepa zipatala zotalikana wa bungwe la malawi health equity network mhen george jobe wati mavuto onsewa akudza lino silikuyika k15 ya k100 ya ndondomeko ya zachuma ku ntchito zaumoyo 
  jobe adati maiko africa kuphatikizapo malawi adasainira pangano ku abuja 2001 ndalama zoika ku zaumoyo zisamachepere k15 k100 iliyonse maiko adasayinira panganolo limene adalilimbikitsa bungwe loona zaumoyo padziko lonse la world health oragnisation who 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mzipatala zina mumakhala kuthinana kwambiri kafukufuku wa tamvani wasonyeza zaka zapitazi ndondomeko ya zachuma mdziko muno yakhala ikupereka ndalama zosaposa k8.70 k100 iliyonse pandondomeko imene tikuyendera kudayikidwa ndalama zochepetsetsa kuposa zaka zonse 
  jobe adati zikudzetsa mavuto kusowa kwa mayendedwe ma ambulansi chiwerengero cha ogwira ntchito kutalikana kwa zipatala kusowa mankhwala 
  amene adaphunzira ntchito za chipatala ambiri akusowa ntchito adatero jobe 
  adati pmaiko adagwirizananso pamayenera makilomita 8 kuchoka pachipatala china kukafika china posachedwapa mtundawu udatsitsidwa kufika makilomita 5 la malawi silikwanitsabe 
  misewu yake yomvetsa chisoni zomwe zimakhudzanso nkhani ya mayendedwe ma ambulansi osowa mzipatala akapezeka umva palibe mafuta adatero 
  adati vuto lalikulu kasamalidwe kayendetsedwe ka ntchito poyeza kupereka mankhwala kwa odwala 
  mankhwala boma limagula makamaka okhudzana malungo amachokera kwa maiko otithandiza omwe malamulo adatero 
  adati athandiziwo akapereka mankhwalawo amereka limodzi zida zoyezera ndiye zina chochuluka kwa odwala chipatala sayeza amangogwiritsa ntchito zizindikiro 
  adaonjeza akabwera otithandiza amapeza mankhwala atha zoyezera zikadalipo tsono amavuta apereke mankhwala msanga 
  mneneri wa unduna wa zaumoyo andrian chikumbe adalephera kupereka ndemanga nkhaniyi tamvani atamugogodera kuyambira lachiwiri 
  mneneri wa unduna wa zachuma alfred kutengule adati boma la malawi limalephera kukwaniritsa zinthu zina chakuchepekedwa 
  chilungamo nchakuti mapezedwe athu ngovutirapo timayenera kukambirana anzathu otolera misonkho tiwone momwe tingagawire kochepa komwe atolelako nchifukwa chake zina timalephera adatero kutengule 
  zili choncho amalawi amene akusautsika kwambiri patatha zaka zoposa 50 chilandirire ufulu wathu 
  mwa amene tidacheza nawo adandaula za kuthinana kuchipatala kusowa mankhwala kuyenda mtunda wautali mwa mavuto amene amakumana nawo
Label: HEALTH

Text:

Text:
msilikali wa ndende anjatidwa ku zomba wolemba thokozani chapola apolisi ku zomba lachinayi agwira msilikali wina wogwira ntchito ku ndende ya zomba pomuganizira amathandizira mkayidi wina kulowetsa ma simukadi foni ya mmanja ndendemo 
 wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mchigawo chakumvuma inspector joseph sauka wofalitsa nkhani za ndende mdziko muno supretendent chimwemwe shawa atsimikiza za kumangidwa kwa msilikali wa ndendeyu steven chinganda 
 inspector sauka wati apolisi anamva mphekesera yoti akumabera powalembera mauthenga phone zawo za mmanja kuwanamiza awina mphotho 
 ati anayamba kufufuza za nkhaniyi adapeza mkayidi wina dzina lake goodson mandala yemwe akugwira ukayidi ku ndende ya zomba anamupeza ma simukadi airtel okwana makumi asanu limodzi 60 
 wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mchigawo chakummawayu wati mukufufuza kwawo anapeza ma simukadi onsewa olembetsedwa chiphaso cha unzika cha jafali kaphula yemwe amalembetsa mkazi wa mkayidiyu 
 sauka wati atafufuzabe anapeza steven chinganda yemwe msilikali wolondera akayidi ku ndende ya zomba yemwe amatumikira kukasiya ma simukadi kwa mkayidiyu ndendeyo 
 padakalipano steven chinganda awatsekulira mlandu wolowetsa zinthu zoletsedwa ku ndende kugwiritsa ntchito ofesi yake molakwika

Text:
malonjezo ayamba kuoneka boma latsopano la tonse alliance layamba kukwaniritsa mwa malonjezo ake panyengo ya kampeni pomwe akadaulo osiyanasiyana ayamikira atinso boma lisadzabwerere mmbuyo 
  kukwaniritsidwa kwa malonjezowo kudayamba kuoneka lachiwiri mnyumba ya malamulo pomwe nduna yatsopano ya zachuma felix mlusu idalengeza bajeti yoyembekezera ya k722.4 biliyoni 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc chakwera adalumbira lamulungu mlusu watcha bajetiyo dzina loti kutukula ntchito zaulimi zipangizo zotsika mtengo mtengo wa fetereza watsika kufika k4 495 thumba la 50 kg mwalonjezo alimi 3.5 miliyoni ndiwo akuyembekezeka kupindula 
  mdziko muno muli mabanja odalira ulimi okwana 4.2 miliyoni ndondomeko yakale ya sabuside inkakomera alimi 900 000 1.5 miliyoni akachuluka 
  mbajetiyo boma lakonza zokwenza poyambira ndalama za malipiro apamwezi kuchoka k35 000 kufika k50,000 kukwenza malipiro oyambira kudula msonkho munthu yemwe amalandira k35 000 tsopano malipiro ake awonjezekera k15 000 yomwe ndiyokwanira kugula matumba atatu fetereza mtengo wa k4 495 nkukhalakonso zolipilira wonyamula fetelezayo.malipiro kukutanthauza chimodzimodzi kukweza malipiro oyambira kudula msonkho kufika k100 000 kupangitsa apulumutse k17 500 yomwe kale amadulidwa kutanthauza nawo akhoza kugula matumba atatu fetereza ndalamayo 
  zili nkuthekera kogwedeza mapezedwe ndalama za boma akadaulo za msonkho zachuma agwirizana nayo nkhaniyi 
  kadaulo wazachuma gowokani chijere chirwa wati nkofunikira kwambiri boma lapanga momwe lapangiramu potengera umphawi wa wati kangachepe komwe azipulumutsa nkochuluka akagwiritsa ntchito 
  naye kadaulo zamisonkho emmanuel kaluluma wati kukwenza malipiro oyambira kudula msonkho kukhudze katoleredwe ka misonkho boma lapanga kuganizira 
  misonkho imeneyo ndiyofunikadi palibe nzeru kutolera ndalama kwa nkuwasiya alibe pogwira afa njala adatero kaluluma 
  mubajetiyo boma laonjezera ndalama za thumba la ngongole za achinyamata kuchoka k15 biliyoni kufika k40 biliyoni lati pofika mchaka cha 2021 likhala litatsegula mwayi 600 000 wa ntchito 
  kadaulo kayendetsedwe ka zinthu mdziko makhumbo munthali wati boma layamba pokwaniritsa malonjezo ubale umakoma nchilungamo kukhulupilika 
  mukakumbukira tikucheza za kampeni ndidanenapo andale azilonjeza zinthu zomwe angakwanitse zomwezo zimadzasanduka adani mtsogolo maka kampeni ina sadazikwaniritse adatero munthali 
  naye george phiri wodziwa za ndale wati boma likamapanga zinthu zokomera ake zinthu mdziko zimayenda silichedwa kutukuka 
  tamverani amadziwa andale amasintha miyoyo yawo akakhala pampando ndiye munthuyo asade kukhosi pamafunika naye azimvako kukoma kwa dzikolo momwe layambira bomali adatero phiri 
  akadaulowa adagwirizana yoti bola bomali lisasinthe momwe layambiramu likatero atsimikiza andale zawo nzimodzidi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
aphungu aunguza njira zokhaulitsira auve uve wanyanya mdziko muno zafika poti wina akalowa nazo kundende nyumba ya malamulo yati nyansi zamgonagona zomwe zili mmakhonsolo osiyanasiyana zikubweretsa fungo loipa zikuika moyo wa pachiwopsezo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka pachifukwa ichi aphungu ku nyumbayi agwirizana zoti akambirane zokhazikitsa malamulo omwe azipereka mphamvu zonjata munthu wopezeka akuchita utchisi 
  nkhaniyi idalandiridwa manja awiri aphungu osiyanasiyana phungu wa pakati mboma la lilongwe lobin lowe ataiyambitsa lachinayi mnyumbayi 
  lowe adati nzokhumudwitsa fungo loipa lili ponseponse mmakhonsolo kaamba koti akuluakulu ake amalephera kuchotsa zinyalala zoipa zochoka mmakampani mmafakitale zikumathera mmitsinje 
  adati zikuchitika kaamba koti palibe lamulo loletsa uve momwe zimakhalira mmaiko 
  vuto loti tilibe malamulo mmaiko anzathu nchifukwa chake amangotaya zinyalala chisawawa kukodza kumene amangokodza momwe afunira palibe chilango chilichonse chomwe angalandire adatero lowe 
  phungu wa ku mpoto cha ku madzulo kwa boma la salima jessie kabwila adavomereza ponena chomvetsa chisoni kwambiri nchakuti akuluakulu amaphunziro akuchita nawo uve woterewu 
  adati uve wotere kuulekerera ukhoza kusokoneza ntchito zokopa alendo kaamba koti obwera amafuna malo zinthu zaukhondo kuopa woyandikana nawo nyumba 
  lipoti loyamba likusonyeza adayamba kugonana ana akewo mchaka cha 2014 kutanthauza wina zaka 6 pomwe wina adali zaka 4 namwaza adatero 
  chiyambireni zolaulazi mkuluyo akuti wakhala akuopseza ana akewo asadzayerekeze kutsina khutu za nkhaniyi poti amati tsoka chimanga chilinda moto anawo adatopa uvewo 
  namwaza adati aka si koyamba mkuluyo amveke mbiri yomwa mazira akewo 
  akuti wa anawo yemwe mkazi adawapezapo mwezi wa october chaka chino akuluwo mwana wa zaka 7 akupanga naye zadama banjalo lidakambirana za nkhaniyo idangofera mmazira 
  akutitu atakambirana bamboyo adapepesa adaopseza mayiyo akadzangoyerekeza kuulula adzamukhaulitsa ndiye cha mantha adakhaladi chete adatero namwaza 
  adati november 22 pomwe oyandikana nawo nyumba adalimbikitsa mayiyo kukanena nkhaniyi kupolisi 
  namwaza adati anawo adapita nawo kuchipatala cha kasungu komwe adakawayesa akalandire thandizo nkoyenera apolisi akuyembekezera zotsatira 
  tsiku lomwe mwanayo adakaulula za khalidwe la bamboo akewo lomwe bwalo la milandu la magisitireti mumzinda wa blantyre lidagamula eric aniva fisi wa ku nsanje akagwire ndende zaka ziwiri 
  magulu osiyanasiyana makamaka omenyera ufulu sadakondwe chigamulochi ponena chochepa chosakwanira kuthetsa khalidwe lophwanya ufulu wa amayi asungwana 
  mwa omwe adadzudzula chigamulochi wa bungwe la malawi human rights resource centre mhrrc emma kaliya yemwe adati chigamulochi nchosaopsa kwa abambo akhalidweli 
  mkuluyu amachokera mmudzi mwa chiswe mfumu chikumbu mboma la mulanje apolisi ati adzaonekera kukhothi kafukufuku akatha
Label: POLITICS

 watsimikiza za nkhaniyo daudi wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo sub inspector amina tepani daudi watsimikiza za nkhaniyi wati alondawa jafali matola zaka 72 idrissah ngochela zaka 66 zakubadwa 
 apolisiwa ati anadziwitsidwa mlonda yemwe amasintha anzakewa ntchito mmamawa pomwe anawapeza akutaya magazi kaamba kovulazidwa akubawa 
 ndizoona apolisi kuno ku mangochi tikuyangana omwe aba katundu okwanira 3.5 million apha alonda awiri estate ya lilimbe anatero daudi 
 atinso apolisi ambomalo adakasakasakabe anthuwo mbomalo cholinga choti akayankhe milandu yomwe apalamulayi
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
njovu ipha mlenje tsoka sasimba akanadziwa mlenje sakadapita kunkhalango ya liwonde kukasaka mozemba masiku apitawo 
  patrick maya wa zaka 52 amachokera mmudzi mwa chipala senior chief kawinga mboma la machinga adasamukira mmudzi mwa wadi senior chief liwonde komwe amakhala banja lake adafa njovu itamuponda 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka malinga mchimwene wa maya maxwell makina adali chizolowezi chosaka mozemba pogwiritsanso ntchito agalu ake mnkhalango ya liwonde 
  makina adati tsiku la tsokali maya adalowa mkhalangoyi komwe sadabwererenso 
  adati nkhani ya kusowa kwake idawapeza abalewa mmudzi mwa chipala lamulungu lapitali akukhulupilira mlenjeyu adaphedwa khirisimisi 
  thupi lake lidapezeka lamulungu 27 december litaonongeka kale moti tidangosunga patchire pomwepo makina adatero 
  wachiwiri kwa mneneri wapolisi kuchigawo cha ku mmawa otilia watsimikiza za imfayi

Text:

Text:
othawa nkhondo ku mozambique asamukira ku neno bungwe lothandiza othawa kwawo pazifukwa zosiyanasiyana la unchr layamba kusamutsa othawa nkhondo ku mozambique kupita ku luwani mboma la neno 
  anthuwa omwe akuthawa nkhondo yapachiweneweni amafikira kumisasa yongoyembekezera mmaboma ku nsanje chikwawa mwanza neno omwe achita malire la mozambique 
   escom in free for all fuel scam   wait gets longer   secrecy over party funders bungwe la unhcr lidayamba kusamutsa othawa nkhondowa sabata ziwiri zapitazi pamene 81 adawapititsa ku luwani mboma la neno kumalo omwe amangodikirirapo ku nsanje 
  mwa othawa nkhondo ku mozambique ulendo wa ku luwani wofalitsa nkhani kubungweli mmalawi muno kelvin shimoh adati cholinga chawo othawa nkhondowa akhale malo amodzi komwe angakalandire thandizo lokwanira 
  adati pali pafupifupi okwana 11 000 omwe athawa nkhondo ku mozambique chiwerengerochi chikuyemebezeka kukwera kwambiri 
  ku kapise mboma la chikwawa kuli pafupifupi 10 000 akuyembekezeranso kusamutsidwa kupita ku luwani komwe kuli malo abwino okhala olandirira thandizo la mankhwala sukulu zoti ana omwe ambiri azikaphunzirako 
  wina wa bungwe lomweli la unhcr woona za chitetezo cha othawa kwawo elsie bertha mills tettey wapemphanso la malawi onse asawasale anthuwa powaganizira achiwembu 
  kafukufuku wathu wapeza othawa nkhondowa pachipsinjo choopsa ataya katundu wawo abale aphedwa akuona mwa apulumuka atazunzidwa adatero mills tettey 
  wayamikiranso bungwe la unicef pachithandizo chomwe likupereka kwa anthuwa nkhondowa makamaka ana pankhani zowambikitsa apitirizebe maphunziro
Label: POLITICS

Text:
anatchezera chikondi amatero agogo   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndine mtsikana wa zaka 20 ndili kukoleji ndili chibwenzi chomwe tidagwirizana tidzamange banja mtsogolo muno mnzangayu amati akufuna adzandidziwire mbanja akayamba kundigona panopa atha nane filimu ndiye akuti poti iyeyu munthu pena zimavuta ndiye akuti akufuna apeze mkazi woti azigonana naye popewa kugonana inyeyo adzandikwatire kodi kumeneku kukonda ndithandizeni agogo nditani 
  ndine l lilongwe wokondeka l bwenzi lakolo munthu wachilungamo inde chilungamo chake chaonjeza munthu wotere osamukhulupirira kamberembere iyeyu wanena chinthu chanzeru kwambiri pakalipano musamagonane chofukwa akuopa akatero atha nawe chilakolako wakudziwa akuti akufuna apeze mkazi wina wapambali azikapumirako poti munthu nanga iwe wakuuza nawe utha kupeza wina woti uzicheza naye kunjaku kwaopsatu ndiye wina azipanga dala zachibwana zimene akunenazo si zoona ayi wachilungamo iyenso ayenera kupirira kuchilakolako cha thupi kufikira tsiku lomwe mudzalowe mbanja adayamba kale zogonana akazi umenewo sadzausiya ndiye kunena zoona mwamunayo sali woyenerera naye banja alibe chikondi chenicheni iwe amati mbuzi ikalawa mchere sigwirika safuna zoyezetsa anatchereza ndakhala ndili pachibwenzi mtsikana wina kwa chaka chimodzi timakondana kwambiri ndine mkhristu ndikhulupirira sibwino kumagonana wachikondi wako musadalowe mbanja lomanga ndakhala ndikumva malangizo oti masiku ano kukayezetsa magazi musanaganize zolowana mnzangayu nditamuuza zimenezi adati zimenezo ndiye ayi kumufunsa chake adati ineyo ndikudzikaikira ndipite ndikayezetse osati iyeyo akuopa chiyani mj lilongwe odi mj akuopadi chiyani ameneyo pati bii pali munga akale timatero chilipo chimene akuopa akanakhala bwinobwino si bwenzi akuchita kukanira patalitali toto pita wekha kudziwa mmene munthu ulili usanalowe mbanja chinthu chabwino kwambiri makamaka masiku ano pamene kuli mliri wa kachilombo ka hiv aids mundimvetse bwinobwino pamenepa si munthu akapezeka hiv ndiye sayenera kukwatira kukwatiwa ayi munthu ufulu wokhala pabanja zimakhala kudziwa mmene mthupi mwako mulili pofuna kukonza tsogolo la banja lanu wina apezeka kachilombo matenda kumphasa mumadziwa chochita pofuna kudziteteza nonse mukhale moyo wathanzi mukufuna mwana mbanja mwanu madotolo amadziwa njira zokuthandizirani mwana wanu asatenge nawo kachilomboko chachikulu chikondi pakati panu pali chikondi palibe mantha mufotokozereni wokondedwa wanuyo zimenezi amvetsetse akumenyetsa nkhwangwa pamwala musiyeni ameneyo muyangane wina amene angakumvetsetseni pankhani yoyezetsa magazi 
  nsalu ya lekaleka anatchereza mwamuna wanga takhala pabanja zaka ziwiri yonseyi takhala tikugwiritsa ntchito njira zolera mwamuna wanga amati yoti tikhale mwana sinakwane titoleretolere kaye tisadzavutike tikadzakhala mphatso ya mwana mnyumba mwathu kunena zoona zimene amati titoleretolere kaye sindikuziona kunjaku ndiye akumatiseka kumatinyogodola sitibereka ndiye ndatopa nazo zimenezi

Text:
one man demo wenela tsikulo wenela padaterera zidaliko nkhani idavuta ija tidaiyamba sabata yatha inde iyi nkhani yophana chisawawa makamaka kwa abale athu achialubino 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu zikumvekazi zidandikumbutsa zomwe ndidamvapo mmbuyomu manyasa kalelo ankaponyera kuphompho odwala khate kuja ku zomba mitembo yawo inkapezeka mumtsinje wa namitambo nanga lero zoona kuphanaku zatani abiti patuma adali pafoni amangodzuma uku tidali tikuonera kanema 
  zoona cnn bbc al jazeera onse akunja akufalitsa za nkhanza tikuchitirana tokhatokhazi kodi ndiye azungu abweranso kuno kwathu kudzatisiyira enafe ma dollars ma rands zina zotero adafunsa 
  zonsezi moya pete anzake izitu sizikadafika apa akadalimbana nazo koyambirira komwe kuja nkhani zikangokhudza united nations amnesty international umangodziwiratu mwaiwala adathana gogo uja ndani adatero gervazzio 
  zoona ndikumbuka masiku amenewo ndili kwathu kwa kanduku tinkamva bungwe la amnesty international lidalimbikitsa zinthu kuno zisinthe makamakanso cha kumangidwa kwa andale popanda kuphedwa kumene 
  mwaiwalanso muja un idavutira ya mfumu mose zoti munthu ngwamakani kuiwaliratu adatero abiti patuma 
  chomwe ndikudabwa nchakuti lino lidaliko kuyambira kale zachuluka chomwechi ya moya pete ndidafunsa 
  palibe adandiyankha adangoti duuu posakhalitsa adatulukira wina chibadwire iyetu adanyamula chikwangwani cholemba osapha tonse tidayangana kumbali 
  abiti patuma adathawira kukauntala adatenga chikwama chake pomwe amasungitsapo nkusololamo chovala chamkati chofiira 
  chonde atate amamangatu zoyenda bunobunozi amene samangidwa ngwamisala basi tavalani basi tilibetu ndalama zogulira nthochi tizikakuonani akakunjatani adatero abiti patuma 
  kaya uyu ndidamuonapo kaya nkhope yake yosasowa 
  tangoganizani kuyenda malipsata mukuchitako paparazzi akatola zithunzi nkuika munyuzi mwana wanu nkuona ulemu wanu ukhalaponso adatero gervazzio 
  nkhope yakeyo si yosowa kaya ndidamuona ameneyu kodi uja adali bwenzi lonenepa zedi ankalimbirana mnyamata wa magitala uja tonse takwiya chonde zomationetsa filimu zolaula masanasana takana akapanda kukutenga apolisi tiitanitsa censorship board adatero abiti patuma 
  mwamaliza ndakwiyatu kwambiri ndine legistrator ntchito yanga yopanga malamulo apapatu aphungu boma timayenera kubweretsa group areas act nkhaniyi ikuposa nkhani ya njala adatero uja thovu likukha 
  dekhani achimwene anzanu enatu adayamba matukutuku chomwechi adakathera atapezeka satifiketi ya 8 adalibe adafunsa abiti patuma 
  kaya ameneyu ndidamuonapo atavala bulauzi phwanyamchenga zingamukhale kaya mundipha kaya mundidya ndivula basi adafuna kuchotsa kabudula wamkati adapatsidwa abiti patuma uja
Label: POLITICS

Text:
zavutanso ku mozambique othawa nkhondo ayamba kufika mdziko muno zavutanso ku mozambique nkhondo ya pachiweniweni pakati otsatira chipani cholamula cha frelimo chotsutsa cha renamo yagundikanso nzika zina za mdzikomo zayamba kuthawa nkhondo kukhamukira mdziko muno pofuna kupulumutsa miyoyo yawo 
  zili choncho mtendere sadaupezebe ambiri akugona kumimba kuli pepuu alibe zovala zofunda pokhala 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc umu momwe zilili mmudzi mwa kapise kwa senior chief nthache mboma la mwanza komwe kwaunjikana nzika za dzikolo 
  dc wa bomali gift rapozo watsimikiza zawathina masamalidwe nzikazo kuofesi kwawo kulibe chakudya matenti oti asamalire anthuwa pamsasa pomwe afikirapo 
  zikatere maso amakhalano kuboma litithandize chakudya malo oti anthuwa akasungidwe ndiye tagwira njakata tilibe chakudya adatero rapozo polankhula tamvani kumayambiriro sabatayi 
  othawa nkhondowa akuti adayamba kufika mdziko muno 5 july pofika lolemba lapitali nkuti 678 atafika mmudzi mwa kapise 
  mdziko la mozambique mudabuka nkhondo ya pachiweniweni mchaka cha 1977 patangopita zaka ziwiri chithereni nkhondo yomenyera ufulu wa dzikolo mchaka cha 1975 
  nkhondo ya pachiweniweniyo idatha 1992 chisankho choyamba cha matipate chidachitika 1994 chipani cha frelimo ndicho chidapambana 
  malinga kafukufku wathu intaneti mmene nkhondoyo imatha nkuti 1 miliyoni atataya miyoyo yawo pophedwa asirikali boma zigawenga za renamo kunyentchera matenda osiyanasiya malungo kamwazi likodzo khate 500 000 adalibe pokhala 5 miliyoni adali atathawira maiko akapeze mpumulo 
  la malawi ndilo linkasunga othawa nkhondo ku mozambique oposa maiko onse oyandikana nawoanthu osachepera 1 miliyoni adasungidwa kumisasa mmaboma nsanje chikwawa mwanza maboma ku nsanje kokha kudali nzika za ku mozambique 200 000 kuposa chiwerengero cha eni nthaka mbomalo 
  la malawi lidali pamavuto aakulu zachuma kuonngeka kwa chilengedwe kaamba kosunga othawa kwawowa lidachitabe chamuna kuonetsa umunthu powapatsa zithandizo zosiyanasiyana ayiwale kwawo zomwe zidasangalatsa bungwe la united nations ndinso maiko akunja 
  chodabwitsa nchoti pankhondo ya pachiweniweniyo boma la malawi pansi ulamuliro wa pulezidenti wakale malemu dr hastings kamuzu banda linkathandizira mbali zonse za frelimo renamo 
  posafuna kuonetsa kukondera mwamseri kamuzu ankagwiritsa ntchito apayoniya malawi young pioneers kuthandizira renamo pomwe ankatumiza asirikali ankhondo malawi army kuthandizira frelimo pofuna kuteteza katundu wa boma la malawi amene ankadzera mdzikolo 
  bata mtendere zidayamba kukhazikika mdzikomo pofika mchaka cha 2013 ziwawa zidayambiranso mpaka lero mtendere weniweni ukusowekera moti kumenyana pakati otsatira zipani za frelimo renamo kwabukanso 
  mdzikomo akhala akupempha mtsogoleri wawo filipe nyusi yemwe wangotha miyezi 6 chilowereni mboma achite machawi pokambirana afonso dhlakama mtsogoleri wa renamo pofuna kuthetsa kusagwirizanako 
  msabatayi nyusi adauza nyumba zofalitsa nkhani mdzikomo achita chotheka kukambirana dhlakama pofuna kukhazikitsa bata mdzikomo 
  kusamvana kwa mbalizi kwachititsa wamba maka amene akukhala ku mkondezi malo amene achita malire lino akhale akapolo pamene akuwayatsira nyumba kuphedwa zomwe zachititsa athawe mdzikomo kukabisala mmaiko oyandikananawo malawi 
  komabe kusamala anthuwa kukuoneka kovuta kudziko la malawi lomwe kumayambiriro chaka chino lidali mavuto kusefukira kwa madzi lomwe lidachititsa alephere kukolola chakudya chokwanira 
  chipani cha renamo chimakana chidagonja mchisankho cha 2014 zomwe zachititsa zipani ziwirizi zikhale pachimkulirano 
  kaamba ka dhlakama wakhala akuopseza ayambiranso mtopola womwe ubutse nkhondo mdzikomo pokhapokha dandaulo la chipani chake litamveka 
  usiku wa loweruka lathali dhlakama adauza nyumba ina youlutsira mdzikomo asirikali ankhondo okwana 53 aphedwa kale chiyambireni mwezi wa june 
  kelvin sentala wa bungwe la united nations high commissioner for refugees unhcr wati bungwe lawo likudziwa anthuwa alowa mdziko muno adakana kufotokoza zambiri ponena mneneri wawo monique ekoko yemwe foni yake simayankhidwa ndiye angalankhulepo 
  nduna yoona za mdziko atupele muluzi sadayankhe foni yake kangapo konse tamvani idayesera kumuimbira
Label: POLITICS

Text:
chipatala cha boma chitsekedwa loweruka miyoyo ya pafupifupi 50 000 ozungulira chipatala cha mkanda health centre mboma la mchinji imaikidwa pachiopsezo loweruka sichitsekulidwa patsikulo mosemphana dongosolo la unduna wa zaumoyo 
  mneneri wa unduna wa zaumoyo adrian chikumbe adauza msangulutso lolemba chipatalacho chimayenera kutsekulidwa loweruka lomwekuchoka mmawa mpaka ya nkhomaliro kuposera apo madotolo amayenera kusamala odwalika zedi matenda obwera mwadzidzidzi 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka zili choncho chipatalachi chimalandiranso odwala mzipatala zina zazingonozingono 5 omwe akafika pamalopa pachiweru amakhala kakasi 
  kafukufuku wathu wasonyeza chipatalachi sichimatsekulidwa loweruka woyanganira pamalopa yemwe sitimutchula dzina amapemphera tsikulo 
  kusatsekulidwa kwa chipatalachi kukuchititsa mwa ofuna thandizo kupita kuzipatala zomwe si zaboma kapenanso chipatala cha tamanda chomwe chili mdziko la zambia 
  wina yemwe adakana kutchulidwa dzina adati mwana wa zaka 12 amene adafika naye pachipatalapo kumapeto kwa 2015 adamwalira kaamba kosowa chisamaliro adati adapita mwanayo akuonetsa zizindikiro za malungo lachisanu itadutsa 11 koloko usiku dotolo adakana kuwathandiza usikuwo 
  adakana kudzuka patadutsa maola awiri mwanayo adamwalira apa tidapempha mlonda akawauze mwanayo watisiya atithandize adangomuuza tizipita kumudzi adatero bamboyo wina mwa okhudzidwa vutoli yemwe mphunzitsi sukulu ya sekondale mderalo adati wabwererapo kawiri konse mchaka chathachi pachipatalachi 
  ulendo wina mwezi wa october ndidabwerera mwana wanga wa zaka yemwe amadwala mphumu chifuwachi chitakwera cha mma 7 koloko usiku wa loweruka ndidathamangira kuchipatala komwe ndidapezako awiri odwala akudikirira adatero 
  adaonjeza atabwera wa pachipatalapo adawanyengerera awathandize adangowalembera enawo azipita chipatala cha kuboma 
  mwana wanga adakanitsitsa kumulemba mpaka adatibweza adatero munthuyo yemwe wakana kutchulidwa dzina 
  adapita kuchipatala cholipira komwe adalipira k4 500 
  wa komiti ya kayendetsedwe ka chipatalacho ya health advisory committee hac thomas bisiketi adatsimikiza odwala saonedwa patsikulo mbali ya amayi obereka yokha yomwe imakhala ikugwira ntchito 
  wachipatalapo sagwira ntchito patsikuli hac timaoona momwe zipatala zonse zaboma satsegula loweruka adatero bisiketi 
  malinga wapampando wa komiti ya chitukuko kwa mderali anorld chitedze chipatalachi chakhala chisakutsekula pachiweru kwa zaka tsopano 
  adati chipatalachi chili ogwira ntchito asanu okha omwe atatu aiwo anamwino awiri olembera odwala 
  wachipatalachi amatiyankha amapita kutchalitchi pachiweru chipatala satsekula timadabwa sauza omutsata azithandiza patsikulo adatero 
  popheramphongo mfumu mkanda idati kafukufuku wasonyeza chipatalachi sichitsekulidwa pachiweru odwala ochokera mzipatala zazingono zozungulira deralo kazyozyo kaligwazanga gumba amawapatsa bedi podikira lolemba 
  odwala akabwera lachisanu samawaona tsiku lomwelo iwowa amapatsidwa bedi mpaka lolemba sitikudziwa nkutani chaka chatha tidapempha atichotsere tangodabwa wagoneranso nzeru zatha idatero mfumuyo 
  iyo idati masiku mkuluyo amatha kungothandiza owadziwa munthu akamkomera mtima 
  adati nkhaniyi idakafika ku likulu kwa bomalo adamkhazikako bwalo pamaso akuluakulu boma dotolo wamkulu wa bomalo yemwe adasamukira ku boma lina
Label: HEALTH

Text:
papa wati mulungu amafalikira ponseponse mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wati mulungu mphavu yofalikira ponseponse 
 papa francisko papa walankhula lachitatu bwalo la saint peters square ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican 
 polankhula kwa omwe anasonkhana bwaloli papa francisco wati mpingo wakhala ukukumana mavuto osiyanasiyana kuyambira ya apostoli maka pofalitsa uthenga wa yesu khristu komabe mau mulungu akhala akufalikira ponseponse 
 pamenepa wati zikusonyeza mphamvu yodabwitsa yomwe mau mulungu alinayo yotha kufikira pena paliponse 
 wati zimenezi zikusonyeza palibe angamangire mpanda mulungu
Label: RELIGION

Text:
okhuzidwa apempha chisankho cha aphungu chichitikenso gulu la okhudzidwa la concerned citizens lati likufuna bwalo la za malamulo lomwe linagamula chisankho cha president chichitikenso mdziko muno ligamulenso chisankho cha aphungu akunyumba ya malamulo chichitikenso pamodzi chisankhochi 
 gululi lomwe lili oposa 180 lalembera kalata bwalo la high court ku lilongwe kupempha chisankho cha president chatsopano chichitike limodzi cha aphungu akunyumba ya malamulo kamba koti bungwe la mec lomwe bwalo la zamalamulo linati linalakwitsa kayendetsedwe ka chisankho cha president mmwezi wa may chaka chatha lomwenso linayendetsa chisankho cha aphungu ya malamulo 
 gululi lati kutheka bungweli lidalakwitsa zonse chisankhochi latinso malamulo lino amati chisankho cha president aphungu ya malamulo chidzichitika limodzi osankhidwa adzikhala udindo kwa zaka zisanu 
 mzika ya malawi chisankho cha president chichitike limodzi cha aphungu aphunguwa akuyenera kugwira ntchito zaka zisanu zomwe zikusonyeza aphunguwa akapitiriza agwira ntchito zaka zisanu chimozi komwe kuli kuphwanya malamulo lino anatero mwa anthuwo 
 pogwirizana gululi zomwe lachita pokamangamala ku bwalo la milandu ku zomba ati malamulo aphunguwa amayenera zaka zisanu akugwira ntchito choncho chikachitika chisankho cha president chokha ndiye aphungu anasankhidwa chaka chatha wa agwira zaka zisanu chimodzi 6 zomwe kuphwanya malamulo lino
Label: POLITICS

Text:
tetezani kukokoloka kwa nthaka biyo njira zotetezera nthaka kumadzi othamanga zili mbwee katswiri wa zanthaka kusukulu yaukachenjede ya chancellor college dr jimmy namangale wati biyo mmalo momwe mumadutsa madzi njira yabwino yopewera ngalande mmunda 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu polongosolera uchikumbe sabata ino katswiriyu adati mmalo momwe mumadutsa madzi makamaka mmunda zaka zikamapita mumasanduka ngalande kutanthauza nthaka yomwe idali pamenepo idanka kwina madziwo 
  adati mlimi akalekelera osachitapo kanthu zotsatira zake munda umaonongeka zimachititsa mitsinje madambo omwe amasunga madzi omwe akadagwira ntchito ya mthirira zikwiririke 
  biyo wopangidwa miyala amateteza nthaka ku madzi othamanga ili limodzi mwa mavuto omwe alimi ambiri amalekerera chimodzi mwa zifukwa zomwe zabwezeretsa ulimi mmbuyo zimaoneka palibe chomwe chikuchitika chaka chilichonse gawo lochepa lokha la nthaka ndilo limapita 
  zimakhala zikuchitika chaka chaka podzazindikira mmunda mumakhala mutadzadza ngalande mitsinje adatero namangale 
  katswiriyu adati njira yodalirika yopewera zoterezi nkuyika biyo mmalo momwe mumadutsa madzi liwiro la madzi oyendawo lizichepa biyo amathandiza kuwakha nthaka yomwe imayenda madzi 
  paupangiri adati biyo savuta kukonza kwake nzoyenerera upangiri wa alangizi pogwira ntchitoyi pamakhalanso ukadaulo wapadera miyala yopangirayo ilimbe isadzakokoloke 
  biyo amateteza nthaka ku madzi oyenda makamaka othamanga mudziwa masiku ano mvula ikangogwa pangono madzi amathamanga kwambiri chosowa poimira malingana nkuti mitengo chilengedwe zidatha adatero namangale 
  mkuluyu adati pokhapokha mavuto awa atathetsedwa ngozi zina kusefukira kwa madzi kukokoloka kwa mbewu zisanduka nyimbo ya chaka chilichonse nthaka idzafika potheratu kutsala thanthwe basi 
  mogwirizana zimene adanena namangale katswiri wina wa zanthaka ku bunda dr patson nalivata adati pomwe alimi akuyesayesa njira zosiyanasiyana zobwezeretsera chonde mnthaka mpofunikanso azitsatira njira zoteteza kukokoloka kwa nthakayo 
  adati palibe tanthauzo lililonse chaka chaka alimi azikhala ntchito yokokera chonde mmanyowa osachiteteza chisakokolokenso
Label: FARMING

Text:
mulanje yadya wani chitukuko boma la mulanje ladya wani pogwiritsa ntchito ndalama za thumba la chitukuko mdera la phungu la constistuency development fund cdf pulogalamu yosanthira momwe thumbali likugwiritsidwira ntchito mmaboma 14 lino ya kalondolondo yapeza 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zidadziwika lachiwiri pamsonkhano wounikira momwe ntchito za chitukukozi zidayendera mbomali udachitikira ku hapuwani village lodge mbomalo 
  malinga kafukufuku amene bungwe la womens legal resource centre wolrec lomwe limagwira ntchito mogwirizana kalondolondo magawo 73 mwa 100 aliwonse ntchito zachitukuko mmadera aphungu 9 mbomalo adatha 
  wa kalondolondo jephter mwanza adati adakhutira momwe ntchito zachitukuko zayendera ku mulanje 
  zambiri mwa ntchito za chitukuko ku mulanje zakhala pangono kutha apa zili poyerekeza maboma amene kwamangidwa zinthu zosalingana ndalama zomwe zidaperekedwa adatero mwanza 
  bwanamkubwa wa boma la mulanje jack nguluwe adati zinthu mosabisa ndiko kwachititsa ndalama za cdf zisalowe mmatumba mwa 
  chaka chilichonse dera la phungu limapatsidwa k7 miliyoni yogwirira ntchito za chitukuko zingonozingono 
  amaganiza boma likapereka ndalamazo zimapita kwa phungu akhoza kusolola sizili choncho zimafika kuofesi kwathu phungu amangonena ntchito za chitukuko zimene mdera lake akufuna ofesi yathu ndiyo imagula katundu malisiti onse timasunga timawapereka kwa makomiti owona zachitukuko adatero nguluwe 
  phungu wa dera lapakati mbomalo kondwani nankhumwa adati mgwirizano ndiwo ukufunika chitukuko adatsagana phungu wa kumpoto mbomalo stephen namacha wa kumwera cha kummawa ben bonongwe 
  popanda mgwirizano palibe chitukuko timagwira ntchito limodzi osatengera uyu wotsutsa wachipani cholamula ndizo zathandiza chitukuko mboma lino chipite patsogolo adatero nankhumwa
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
agumula chiliza nkutengamo alubino adaikidwa mmanda 27 may mchaka cha 2000 zodabwitsa zachitika 17 october 2015 pamene olusa agumula chiliza kuthawa mafupa 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndizo zachitika mmanda kwa mkanda t kalolo mboma la lilongwe komwe afukula maliro alubino amene adaikidwa mmanda zaka 15 zapitazo 
  malinga t kalolo mandawo adagonekapo john mphoka yemwe adabadwa 1952 adamwalira 25 may 2000 kuikidwa 27 
  malinga kalolo malemuwo adali amtundu wa chi alubino zomwe zikupereka maganizo kwa mfumuyi alipo mdera lawo amene akukhudzidwa nkhaniyi 
  nanga munthu tidamuika zaka 15 zapitazo ndiye alendo iwowo adziwa pamenepa tidakwirirapo munthu wa chi alubino alipo konkuno amene akukhudzidwa komabe tikufufuza kalolo adatero lachitatu 
  kalolo adati adazindikira malemuwo abedwa lolemba pamene mmudzimo mudagwa thambo lakuda adati pamene adzukulu amati akakumbe nyumba yoti malemuwo akagone pamene adaona malodzawo 
  pamene timafuna kukumbapo padayandikana pomwe tidagoneka malemuwo ndiye mwambo wokumba udasokonekera kaye pamene tidathamangira kukadziwitsa apolisi adatero 
  pamalopo akuti padangotsala bulangete lokha bokosi lidali litawola kale apolisi atadzafukula akuti adapeza mafupa 22 angonoangono mafupa onse adatengedwa achiwembuwo 
  mneneri wapolisi mumzinda wa lilongwe kingsley dandaula adati nkhaniyo yoona akuyenera alandire lipoti kwa apolisi kuderalo 
  tamvadi za nkhaniyi tikudikirabe apolisi kuderalo atipatse zomwe apeza tidziwe momwe nkhaniyi ikuyendera adatero dandaula 
  tili nkhani yonga iyi chisoni chidagwira ammudzi mwa nyundo kwa t mwansambo mboma la nkhotakota pamene adafukula mafupa pamene amalima mmunda 
  malinga mneneri wapolisi ya nkhotakota williams kaponda zidachitika esiteti ya basal pamene amalima mmundamo 18 october 
  anthuwo adali akugwira ntchito yolima mmundamo adadzidzimuka pamene adatema fupa podabwa adakauza bwana wawo amene adadzatidziwitsa adatero kaponda 
  kaponda adati pamodzi achipatala adathamangira kumundako komwe adakapeza mafupawo zidatsimikizika adali amunthu amene akumuganizira adamwalira mchaka cha pakati 2013 2014 
  wina komweko akuti wazindikira zovala za malemuwo adali amuna ake amene adasowa
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
red cross imangira nyumba mabanja 600 mabanja 600 mwa mabanja omwe adakhudzidwa kusefukira kwa madzi achita mphumi bungwe la red cross litalonjeza lithandizapo zipangizo zomangira nyumba kwa mabanja 
  woyanganira ntchito zothandiza okhudzidwa ngozi zodza mwadzidzidzi kubungweli ku malawi joseph moyo ndiye adanena wati thandizolo liyamba kuperekedwa kunja kukayera 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc madzi osefukira adagumula nyumba zambiri nyengo yothandiza zinthu zakudya zovala mankhwala ikupita kumapeto tsopano ndiye tili mkati mokonzekera gawo lina lomwe kuthandiza mabanja okwana 600 zipangizo zomangira nyumba zamakono adatero moyo 
  adati bungweli likufuna kuthandiza makamaka mmaboma momwe mudagwa vuto la kusefukira kwa madzi nyumba zomwe zingapirire ku chigumula cha madzi mtsogolo muno vutoli likachitika lisamakhudze ochuluka 
  mwa zina moyo adati bungweli lidzapereka mwaulele malata misomali simenti kuthandiza popanga mapulani nyumba zomwe akatswiri zomangamanga adzatsimikize zingapiriredi chigumula 
  tikuyangana madera nsanje chikwawa phalombe komwe vutoli limagwa chaka chaka cholinga chathu nchakuti mtsogolo muno tisadzaonenso zomwe zawoneka chaka chino maanja ochuluka chonchi nkumasowa pokhala ayi adatero moyo 
  adati polingalira vuto lomwe limakhalapo mmidzi thandizo limeneli likamabwera bungweli silidzatengapo mbali posankha mabanjawo mafumu eni mudzi adzasankhana okhaokha adzangobweretsa thandizolo 
  moyo adati bungweli lidzapitirizabe kuthandiza okhudzidwawo mnjira zina mankhwala chakudya makamaka kwa omwe minda mbeu zawo zidakokolokeratu madzi pachiopsezo chakuti akhudzidwa njala 
  katundu wambiri kuphatikizapo ziweto nyumba zidakokoloka madzi osefukira okhudzidwa akusungidwa mmisasa momwe mavuto matenda adayamba kale kuvuta ambiri akuti adzasowa pogwira akamadzawachotsa kumisasako 
  wachiwiri kwa woyendetsa ntchito zothana mavuto ogwa mwadzidzidzi nthambi yolimbana mavuto amtunduwu gift mafuleka adati oposa 900 000 ndiwo adakhudzidwa madzi osefukira kuyambira mwezi wa january 
  adapempha akufuna kwabwino asatope kupereka thandizo lopita kwa anthuwa omwe ana asukulu omwe adayamba aima kuphunzira
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:

 dr chilima wanena msonkhano wa atolankhani womwe chipanichi chinachititsa mzinda wa lilongwe ziwawa ndale zomwe omwe akuganiziridwa chipani cholamula cha democratic progressive dpp akhala akuchitira zipani zotsutsa boma mdziko muno wati kuwopsezana ndale kumachititsa alephere kampeni kuvota momasuka zomwe wati njira imodzi yobera chisankho
