Text:
bungwe la srwb latseka ofesi zake cha coronavirus bungwe lomwe limagawa madzi mchigawo chakummwera la southern region water board srwb latseka ofesi zake kuyambira lero mpaka 4 august kamba ka mliri wa coronavirus 
 zatsekedwa imodzi mwa ofesi za srwb wofalitsa nkhani za bungweli rita makwangwala watsimikidza za nkhaniyi wati zimenezi zikutanthauza akhala sabata ziwiri asakugwira ntchito 
 kudzera chikalata chomwe bungweli latulutsa ganizoli ladza kaamba koti mwa ogwira ntchito ku bungweli wapezeka kachilombo ka coronavirus imeneyi njira yopewera kufala kwa kachilomboka pakati ogwira ntchito 
 chikalatachi chatinso onse ofuna kugula madzi adzigwiritsa ntchito njira yogulira madzi kudzera lamya ya mmanja yomwe airtel money tnm mpamba kapenanso kudzera ku bank
Label: HEALTH

Text:
three arrested in 7 million fake land deals police in lilongwe have arrested three men for fraudulently selling other peoples plots of land 
 the suspects who include deposed group village head allegedly swindled three people out of k 7 1 million in their latest fake land deals 
 they are said to have been previously arrested on similar charges and they are on court bail 
 the suspectsblessings chiipila manase chipala and deposed group village head chapata real name frank kachitsekoare said to have been selling fake lands to unsuspecting buyers 
 the three used to pose as agent land owner and group village head in their scam in kaphiri six miles by pass and kalumba areas 
 the latest fraud however came to light when original landowners showed up to lay claim on the same portions of land 
 the duped buyers reported to chitsime police unit leading to the arrest of the suspects on thursday they have since been charged with fraud other than false pretence contrary to section 319 of the penal code 
 the section says any person who by deceit or other fraudulent means obtains property from any person shall be guilty of an offence and shall be liable to imprisonment for seven years the suspects will be taken to court soon to answer their relevant charge 
 chiipila 43 is from kalumba village kachitseko 39 comes from chapata village and chipala 32 hails from mlewa village all under traditional authority kalumba in lilongwe 
 meanwhile police are calling on any other people who may have fallen victims to the scam to report to the police
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
ankawerenga nkhani mij okha marcfarlane mbewe wa capital radio adachiritsidwa awa makumanidwe mnyamatayu lisa lamya mtolankhani wa yoneco fm yfm 
  nkhaniyi idayamba 2014 apo nkuti lisa akugwira ntchito ku mij fm kumeneko namwaliyu ankawerenga nkhani 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka lero mwana evan macfarlen lisa mwina amangomva namwaliyo akamawerenga nkhani kwa marcfarlane zimamupatsa uthenga wina 
  ake ozuna chingerezi chake chothyakuka zidanditenga mtima adatero marcfarlane ndidafunitsitsa nditapalana naye ubwenzi mwachangu ndidamusaka facebook ndidamutumizira pempho akhale mnzanga 
  macheza akuti adayamba mnyamatayo atapempha nambala lisa adamukaniza 
  ndidaponya mapeto ake adandipatsa nambalayo adatero 
  apo zidayamba kusongola mathero ake kudali kukumana pamene zenizeni zidaumbidwa 
  lero lisa akubwekera posankha mnyamatayu marcfarlane ndidamukonda wanthabwala zedi koposa zonse amakonda kupemphera idatero njoleyo 
  pamene marcfarlane akuti lisa mkazi wokoma mmaso wakhalidwe 
  awiriwa mwana wa miyezi isanu dzina lake evan ukwati akuti apangitsa chaka chikudzachi chinkhoswe ndiye chidali 5 march 2017 
  marcfarlane woyamba mwa ana atatu wa kwa chimaliro mboma la thyolo lisa woyamba mwa ana awiri wa kwa ben chauya ku ntcheu
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
khama ndiye yankho   poweta ngombe zamkaka kuchionetsero cha zaulimi cha national agriculture fair ku trade fair grounds mumzinda wa blantyre peacewell edward mlanga wochokera kwa senior chief somba mboma la blantyre adachita mphumi kupeza chikho atapambana alimi anzake onse omwe adabwera kuchionetserochi ulimi udapatsa chidwi mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika yemwe adatsegulira chionetserochi kodi chinsinsi cha mlimiyu nchotani esmie komwa adacheza naye motere chidakopa paulimi wanu kuchionetserochi nchiyani   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu choyambirira ngombe yomwe ndidapita nayo kuchionetseroku imaoneka ya thanzi yoti imatulutsa mkaka wochuluka adadzionera okha 
  ngombe za mlanga zakwana 16 tsopano ngombe zanu zimatulutsa mkaka wochuluka imodzi imatulutsa mkaka wosachepera malita 35 tsiku 
  chinsinsi chanu muzipeza mkaka wochuluka chagona pati zakudya zokwanira za kasakaniza madzi wokwanira tsiku lililonse 
  mumadyetsera zakudya zanji kuonjezera udzu omwe ndimadyetsera zonse mzaka za mmbuyomu ndimadyetsera chakudya chogula cha ngombe chotchedwa dairy marsh nditaona chakwera mtengo kwambiri ndidasiya mmalo mwake ndidayamba kugula zotsalira popanga mowa ku kampani ya carlsberg zotchedwa spent green ndichotsikirapo mtengo kusiyana chakudya cha kusitolo pamwezi ndimagula cha k135 000 pomwe chogulacho chikwane pamafunika ndalama yosachepera k200 000 kuonjezera apa ndimadyetseranso madeya nandolo chimanga 
  mutasiya kugwiritsa ntchito dairy marsh mkaka sunatsike ayi ndithu udakali chimodzimodzi 
  mumazipatsa chakudya chochuluka tsiku alangizi adatiuza ngombe iliyonse tiziyipatsa chakudya chokwana makilogalamu 200 mukudziwanso sizocheza munthu ufike pamenepa kotero zambiri ndimabwerera makilogalamu 170 ngombe iliyonse 
  nanga madzi amakhala wochuluka madzi ndiye sindinganene ndimaonetsetsa azikhalamo zonse adandilumikizira mapaipi madzi ku makola kotero momwera muli mipopi yomwe ndimangotsegula ndikaona atsika 
  munayamba liti kuweta ngombe za mkaka ndidayamba 2000 ngombe imodzi kenako mchaka chotsatiracho ndidagulanso ina basi pamenepo zinadzichulukitsa zokha zina zimaswa mapasa 
  mmaweta ngombe za wanji zija zimadziwika dzina loti friesian 
  zilipo zingati zilipo 16 zomwe tikukama 7 bwenzi zitapotsera pamenepa zina zimatha kuswa mapasa ndimapatitsakonso 
  muli za mphongonso ayi zitenge bere timaitana alangizi adzadzipatsire umuna wa wa ngombezi tisasakanize 
  chidakupangitsani muyambe ulimiwu nchiyani anga adadwala kuchipatala adawauza azimwa mkaka tsiku lililonse kotero ndidailowa ntchito yogula mkaka wa mmapaketi kenako ndidaganiza zongogula ngombe ya mkaka ndizingokama nkumawapatsa tsiku lomwelo ndidayamba kukama ngombeyi imatulutsa mkaka wodzadza ndowa tsiku umandichulukira choncho wina ndinkangogawa kwa mmudzimu posakhalitsa mnzanga wina adanditsina khutu akupanga ndalama pogulitsa ku kampani ya lilongwe dairy yomwe imabwera ku blantyre konkuno nkumagula kotero ndidayamba kuperekera kumeneko chaka chachiwiri ndidaonjezera ina phindu lomwe ndimapeza lidandipangitsa ndilimbikire kwambiri mpomweno ndidakhazikika 
  phindu lanji lomwe mwakhala mukupeza ku mkaka ndidagula malo ndikumangapo nyumba ziwiri zopangitsa lendi ndagula malo wokwana nyumba zomwe malata ake ndagula kale ndikuphunzitsa ana anga awiri ku poly ndidagawirakonso abale anga ngombezi omwenso akuthandizikira njira zosiyanasiyana mmakomo mwawo kunena pakhomo panga ndiye sitisowa kanthu 
  mumakagulitsa mkaka wanu kuyambira lamulungu mpaka lachisanu ndimakagulitsa kwa amwenye mtauni mtengo wa k180 lita wotsalawo ndimakagulitsa ku bulking group pamtengo wa k160 lita loweruka ndimakagulitsa kwa mzungu wina ku nyambadwe mtengo wa k400 lita
Label: FARMING

Text: anatchezera akuti tibwererane anatchereza ndinali pambanja mwamuna wa ku nsanje ndili naye mwana ndikati tiyeni tikaone kwanu amangoti tidzapitabe chikhalireni palibe tsiku limodzi lomwe abale ake anabwerapo pakhomo pathu ndiponso banja lathu losagwirizira chinkhoswe kumudzi kwathu mwanuna wangayu amakananso kukaonako panopa tinasiyana samagona mnyumba mowa samwa fodya sasuta ndiye panopa akukakamira tibwererane apo bii ndimupatse mwana ineyo ndikukana gogo ndithandizeni nditani pamenepa mwati mudali pabanja banja lanu padalibe chinkhoswe ndiye lidaali banja lotani lodziwa awiri nokhanu apa mukuchita kudabwa kwawo kwa mwamuna wanu sadabwerepo pakhomo panu tsiku limodziakadabwerapo akukudziwani munasiyana mwati akukakamira mubwererane pachifukwa chiti mwachidule ndinene mmphechepeche mwa njovu sapita kawiri kubwererana mwamuna wotere kuli galu kubwerera kumasanzi akepalibe chanzeru watsimikiza amakukonda nawenso umamukondabe ulendo uno muyesetse akwawo akwanu akumane kukambirana pakhale dongosolo lenileni chinkhoswe kenaka ukwati wovomerezeka mbali zonsezonse pokhapo ndiye mutha banja osati zachibwana zimene mudachita kupatsana mwana kenaka wina aziti tibwererane apo bii undipatse mwana wanga banja si masanje chonde zikomo natchereza    chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi akuthawathawa anatchereza mwezi wa april 2011 ndinapeza mwamuna sindinagonane naye kufikira 6 july 2012 pamene tinakaonekera kwa makolo tonse tsiku limneli andiuza tigonane ndinawauza tikayezetse kaye hiv adakana ponena blood donor choncho ndisawakaikire zinatheka titasiyana tsiku limenelo adandiuza tikadziwe komwe amagwira ntchito ku zomba nditapita andiuza ndisabwererenso tiyambiretu banja ndinakana ndidabwerera patapita masiku adabwera amalume kudzafunsira mbeta zinatheka pambuyo pake tidayamba banja posakhalitsa ndidaima mwanunayu adandiuza mmamawa azidya phala nsima izikhala ya mgaiwa chodabwitsa chinali choti phala likafika patebulo limasintha lobiriwira green kuwafunsa samandiyankha zomveka nditalimbikira anandionetsa mabotolo awiri momwe munali zinthu za ufa za green anakana kundiuza ntchito yake ati sizimandikhudza tsiku lina ananditenga tikayezetse magazi titafika kumneko anandiyeza ndekha ati adyezetsa kale anandipeza kachilombo ka hiv kuyambira tsiku lomwelo anandiuza banja latha ndizipita kwathu ndinakatula nkhaniyi kwa amalume palibe chikuchitika nditani m zikomo m sindidziwa kachilombo ka hiv mudatatenga sindikukaika mwamuna wanuyo amene adakupatsirani kachilomboko zikuonetseratu uku akudziwa hiv ndatero cha zochita zakeakuonekeratu alibe chilungamo mzochitika zake nanga timabotolo ta mankhwala obiriwira amathira mphalato ntachiyani nanga amakana kukayezetsa ninji mwapezeka hiv akuti banja latha zoona ndithu iyeyo adali walungalunga akadatha kuchitapo china chake kuonetsa wakhumudwa inuyo amene mwamupatsira kachilomboko pali malamulo mdziko muno oti wina akapatsira mnzake kachilombo ka hiv mwadala ameneyo mlandu ndithu pitani nayoni nkhaniyi kwa odziwa malamulo akuthandizeni
Label: RELATIONSHIPS

Text:
mwana wa zaka 13 mavuto osakata ikakuona litsiro mvula siyikata mwambiwu wapherezera msungwana wina wa sitandade 7 yemwe sitimutchula dzina pasukulu ina ku chikwawa 
  zidadziwika achipatala atamupeza msungwanayo chinzonono mabomu potsatira kumuyeza wina atamugwirira kochapa mwanayo adapezekanso kachirombo ka hiv anzake ngakhalenso abale ake akumusala mpaka kukana kudya naye mbale imodzi ngakhalenso naye cha momwe mthupi mwake mulili 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mwanayo lero chidwi cha sukulu chikuzilala pamapeto pake aphunzitsi akuti chidwi cha mwanayo yemwe zaka 13 pamaphunziro chikulowa pansi kupereka chiopsezo choti angalephere kukwaniritsa loto lake lodzakhala woimira pamilanduloya 
  mavuto mwanayo adafika pena 21 january chaka chino pomwe adapita kukachapa mmalo mopita madzi othirira madimba nzimbe za kampani ya illovo mbomalo   apo nkuti mmudzi mwa mwanayo mulibe mjigo 
  kenaka mwanayo akuti adangomva tswereee wina kutulukira mumzimbe tsidya linalo nkudumphira mmadzimo akungofuna kusambira adasambira mpaka kuoloka kufika tsidya lomwe kudali mwanayo 
  adandiopseza mpeni 
  adati ndisakuwe adati andipha kenaka adavula malaya adanena nanenso ndivule ndigone pansi mwanayo adafotokoza atazyolika 
  adaonjeza amene wochokera mmudzi mwawo ndiye adamuchita chipongwecho   ndinkamva kupweteka ndinkangolira pansipansi ndimaopa mwanayo adafotokoza lolemba lapitali pomwe mtolankhani wathu adalowera ku chikwawa akamve zovuta zimene zadza kaamba ka kusefukira kwa madzi 
  mwanayo yemwe nzime mbanja la ana atatu adati bamboyo adatenga zachipongwezo atamaliza adamuuza mwanayo asakauze 
  kuchapa kudathera panjira adati atafika kunyumbako sadauze ake zankhaniyo atapita kusukulu adakauza aphunzitsi ake amene adatengera nkhaniyo kwa makolo kupolisi 
  apo mpamene bamboyo kennedy chiseko wa zaka 36 yemwe amakhalanso mmudzi mwa mwanayo adanjatidwa 
  nkhaniyi ndiyo mwanayo adakanena popereka umboni pamaso gladstone chirundu yemwe 11 march adagamula chiseko akasewenze zaka 8 kundende atamupeza wolakwa pamlandu wogwirira mwana mosemphana gawo 138 la malamulo lino 
  komatu mwanayo akadamuyeza kaye adapatsidwa kachirombo koyambitsa matenda edzi achipatala amupatse mankhwala ochotsa hiv pasanathe maola 72 pamene anagwiriridwa nchifukwa chiyani sizinachitike malinga mneneri wapolisi ku chikwawa foster benjamin padalibe danga loti nkutero nkhani ya mwanayo idafika kupolisi patadutsa maola 72 
  pokauza aphunzitsi ake wachitidwa chipongwe nthawiyo idali itadutsa adatero 
  malinga aphunzitsi amwanayo atamva za kugwiriridwa kwake adathamanga naye kuchipatala komwe zidasonyeza adagwiriridwadi adawauza apitenso atapitanso patatha milungu iwiri achipatala adapeza adali matenda opatsirana pogonana chinzonono mabomu kachirombio koyambitsa matenda edzi 
  malinga lamulo limene nyumba ya malamulo idakhazikitsa chaka chatha lokhudza matenda edzi nkovuta kupereka umboni woti wakuti ndiye adapatsira wina kachirombo ka hiv choncho aphungu adachotsa yonena amene akukaikiridwa adapatsa wina kachiromboka azizengedwa mlandu   kuchoka yomwe mwanayo adauzidwa chipatala kachiromboka mpaka lero moyo wakhala wodzadza mavuto
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
osadziwika avulaza ma monita chipani cha utm ku mulanje omwe sakudziwika avulaza mamonitor chipani cha utm malo ochitira kalembera wa chisankho mdera la kumwera kwa boma la mulanje 
 anathawitsidwa apolisi kaliati malinga ofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo gresham ngwira anthuwa atavulazidwa ku polisi kukadandaula akuluakulu chipanichi omwe patricai kalioati bon kalindo anafikanso ku polisiko akamve mmene zakhalira 
 akuti anayamba kuwowoza akuluakuluwa kuwatsekera njira zomwe zinachititsa apolisi aponye utsi wokhetsa msonzi kubalalitsa anthuwo omwe ndima monitors achipani cha utm avulazidwa malo olembetsera kalembera wa chisankho omwe sakuziwika atsogoleri anafika ku polisi adzawaone posakhalitsa kunabwera gulu la lomwe linayamba kuwawowoza atsogoleriwo anatero ngwira
Label: POLITICS

Text:
phungu adandaula kuchepa kwa ndalama zokonzera miseu ya mmizinda wolemba sylvester kasitomu a.mw/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/jiya-170x170.jpg 170w sizes="(max width 307px 100vw 307px />jiya misewu yambiri ikufunika kukonzedwa phungu wa dera la pakati mzinda wa lilongwe alfred jiya wadandaula kuchepetsedwa kwa ndalama zokonzera miseu ya mmizinda ya lino 
 phungu yu wati ndondomeko ya za chuma ya 2019 mpaka 2020 boma laika padera ndalama zokwana 2.2 billion kwacha zigwire ntchito yokonza misewu ya mmizinda ya lilongwe blantyre zomba mzuzu zomwe wati zochepa poyerekeza mmene ntchito yomanga misewu imakhalira 
 ati ntchito ya aphungu kuonetsetsa chaka chaka pasakhale mavuto miseu ya mmizinda yomwe ndiyofunika kwambiri sikufunika yoonongeka 
 pali miseu yambiri yoti simadusika ya mvula nseu wa masafu kupita zebra wakumagwero kufika ku 23 ina yambiri miseu yi ikufuna kukonzedwanso nde achepetsa ndalama nde akunena miseu ikhalebe yoonongeka zomwe ndizokhudza kwambiri anatero jiya 
 mwazina ati boma silichitapo ayesetsa kupeza njira yolikakamiza lithandizepo poonetsetsa misewuyi yakonzedwa nyengo ya budgetiyi isanadutse
Label: TRANSPORT

Text:
mamembala hrdc atuluka bungwelo omwe akuti okhudzidwa bungwe la hrdc ati atuluka bungweli kamba ka zomwe ati zikuchitika ku bungwelo 
 kudzera msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe anthuwa anachititsa lero mzinda wa lilongwe anthuwa akuti akuona bungwe lomenyera ufululi likulowetsa ndale ntchito zake zomwe ati sizoyenera bungwe lowona za maufulu lidzichita 
 mwa anthuwa yemwe wati adali msungichuma wa bungweli mboma la karonga chifundo kapesa wati atsogoleri bungwe la hrdc akugwiritsa ntchito bungweli pofuna kupeza chikoka cha zomwe wati zosayenera wati mmalo mwake akhala pambuyo mgwirizano wa zipani za dpp udf 
 wati sakuwadziwa anthuwo trapence nkhani yomwe tsiku la lero timapereka inali yakuti tatuluka hrdc tawona ku hrdc kuli zolakwika tinayesetsa kukambirana sizinatheke kamba koti bungwelo lomenyera ufulu silikuchita moteromo anatero kapesa 
 wapampando wa bungwe la hrdc gift trapence wati ku bungwe lawo kulibe udindo wa msungi chuma wati odabwa 
 wauza radio maria malawi akudziwa anthuwa achita kutumidwa chipani cha dpp ayipitse mbiri ya bungwe lawo ati awuza maloya achitepo kanthu nkhaniyi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
amayi adandaulira boma za hiv edzi bungwe la mgwirizano wa achipembedzo zipani zandale mabungwe omwe siaboma la public affairs committee pac layamba kuunikanso momwe gawo 65 la malamulo oyendetsera lino lingagwirire ntchito 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc msonkhanowu womwe udayamba lachiwiri mpaka lachitatu msabatayi udachitikira ku hotelo ya sunbird mount soche mumzinda wa blantyre 
  malinga bishop montfort stima yemwe adatsegulira msonkhanowo adati cholinga cha msonkhanowo kupeza momwe lamuloli lingagwirira ntchito muulamuliro wa demokalase 
  gawoli limapereka mphamvu kwa sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo kuchotsa phungu yemwe walowa chipani china kudera lake kumayenera kuchitikenso chisankho 
  gawoli lakhala vuto mdziko muno pomwe aphungu akhala akulowa zipani zina osachotsedwa uphungu 
  zotere zikachitika mbali ina ikapempha sipikala achotse phunguyo akhala akukatenga chiletso kubwalo lamilandu kuletsa sipukalayo asamuchotse pampando 
  pomwe mtsogoleri wakale wa lino bingu wa mutharika adatuluka mchipani cha udf ndikukayambitsa dpp 2005 aphungu ambiri adachoka ku udf nkhani ya gawoli ndiyo idatenga malo palibe phungu yemwe adakhudziwa 
  atamwalira mutharika aphungu ambiri adachoka ku dpp ndikukalowa chipani cha mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda cha pp 
  apa malinga stima nchifukwa pali msonkhanowu akambirane ndikupeza yankho gawoli
Label: HEALTH

Text:
radio maria malawi celebrates 20th anniversary in broadcasting evangelisation by thokozani chapola radio maria malawi member of 71 radio marias of the world family in the whole world and 22 countries in africa was launched on 24th august 1999 in mangochi by the then bishop of mangochi diocese of the catholic church the late allessandro assolari 
 reaching this far the radio organized an event marking its 20th anniversary in the broadcasting industry where evangelization has been its main agenda the event took place today the 28th of september at the radios premises in the lakeshore district 
 in his message national coordinator for radio maria malawi louis phiri says that the radio has so far done its part in changing peoples lives spiritually 
 our job has been evangelization and we believe in these 20 years we have done our part in bringing back lost souls to god our father he said 
 phiri said that despite several challenges that the radio has been facing like debts that it has been falling into to facilitate its operations in 20 years the radio has managed to build sub studios in 5 dioceses out of all the 8 dioceses of the catholic church in the country plus its main broadcasting house in mangochi diocese 
 we do not have studios only in chikwawa and karonga dioceses but we have in all the 6 dioceses we have transmitters everywhere in the country which makes our evangelization reach all people in the country as well as outside the country because we are also streaming live on the internet said phiri 
 however phiri has pleaded with well wishers to help the station for the success of the 20th anniversary celebrations 
 radio maria malawi uses volunteers as its main human resource for running the airwaves as one of the longest serving volunteers of the station emmaunel kaliati explains the radio has tried to sharpen the spiritual life of its volunteers 
 personally radio maria malawi has made me to become mature person and to become prayerful person because as we are here we are told prayer comes first said kaliati 
 in his remarks one of the radios listeners based in blantyre pax lucius chimtengo says that the radio throughout its 20 years of evangelization has tried to bring back lost christians bring back love in families that were almost dead and it has taught him some things that he would nt know 
 without radio maria personally i would nt know the meaning of miracles radio maria has also mended some families that were on the verge of ending because of its homily this has also made some catholics that went out of the church to come back into the church it has also helped christians from other churches in bringing them closer to christ said chimtengo 
 however chimtengo has urged his fellow listeners and all people of good will to continue with helping the radio in cash or kind so that it continues with its job of evangelizing to the masses
Label: RELIGION

Text:
okhudzidwa nsewu wa chingale sanalandirebe chipukuta msonzi omwe akhudzidwa ntchito yokonza nsewu wa lirangwe chingale machinga gawo loyamba la ntchitoyi apempha boma lichite changu kuwapatsa chipukuta misonzi apeze malo okhala 
 malinga mfumu kalalichi 2 ya mmdera la mfumu mlumbe mboma la zomba iyo yokhudzidwa kwambiri kamba koti chiyambire cha ntchitoyi yomwe tsopano yadutsa masiku ake omalizira gawo loyamba palibe amene walandira chipukuta misonzi 
 sanalandirebe nde tikusowa akatsiriza ntchitoyi tizakafunsa za ndalama zathu inatero mfumu kalalichi 
 wati anthuwo athandizidwa kajanga poyankhapo za nkhaniyi mneneri kubungwe loona za misewu la roads authority portia kajanga ati zolembalemba zonse zokhudza chipepeso zili mmanja mwa bungwe loona zamalo akamaliza awapatsa chipukuta misonzi boma silikuyenera kutero kamba ka malamulo 
 kajanga ati anthuwa ndalamazi apatsidwa kaamba kongomveredwa chisoni kaamba koti malamulo amaletsa kupepesa omwe amanga kulima gawo limodzi la nsewu
Label: TRANSPORT

Text:
mwayi kuthima kwa magetsi pomwe akudandaula za kuthimathima kwa magetsi akusimba lokoma adapatirapo mwayi wabanja 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu victor mpunga yemwe 28 december 2015 adapanga chinkhoswe mary makhiringa akuti adayamba kulankhulana pagolosale pomwe mary amakagula chakudya atachita ulesi kusonkha moto magetsi atathima 
  victor mary adakumana pagolosale victor akuti zambiri amakonda kucheza pagolosale yamnzake pomwe mary amakhala amangomezera malovu msungwanayu akamadutsa popita ndikuchokera kuntchito 
  akuti mwayi udapezeka tsiku lina madzulo magetsi atathima pamenepo mary akuchokera kuntchito mmalo mosonkha moto aphike nkhomaliro adangoganiza zokagula chakudya pagolosaleyo nkuti victor pomwepo 
  ndidangoti bowa bwanga yomweyo nkuyambitsa macheza ndimaona andinyoza malinga mmene amaonekera ayi ndithu tidacheza bwinobwino mpaka chinzake chidayamba adatero victor 
  adati chinzakecho padali polowera chabe patangotha pangono chibwenzi chidayamba mpaka makolo kudziwitsidwa nkuyamba kupanga dongosolo la chinkhoswe 
  adati ulemu amamusangalatsa kwambiri cha mawonekedwe khalidwe luntha pofuna kupanga chinthu salola kupanga chinthu chomwe sakuchimvetsetsa zomwe amaona mphamvu 
  mary adati kwa chachikulu nchakuti mulungu adamulozera mwamuna yemwe amayembekezera moti chiyembekezo chakuti adzakhala pabanja lokoma losangalatsa kwambiri 
  ndimamukonda kwambiri victor mwamuna wachitukuko munthu uja oti akaganiza kunena chinthu amayesetsa mpaka chichitike basi ndiye ndimadziwa nkuthekera kwakukulu adatero mary 
  awiriwa akuti akuyembekezera ukwati woyera chaka chino cha 2016 zokonzekera zili mkati

Text:
tomato wabooka bembeke   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi   alimi ku bembeke mboma la dedza ayamba kufupa tomato wawo pamene wachoka mtengo wa k6 000 dengu kufika k1 000 
  zikuchitika cha kuchuluka kwa tomato amene akufika pamsikawu zomwe zachititsa opita ku lilongwe ku blantyre azigula tomatoyu 
  kutapa kutaya tomato kusamala malinga mwa alimiwa akisa magugu mwezi wa march amagulitsa dengu mtengo wa k6 000 watsikiratu 
  tikungofupa tomato taganizani dengu lomwe timagulitsa k6 000 miyezi yangothayi lero latsika likupita mtengo wa k1 000 zikavuta akumagula mtengo wa k500 
  taononga ndalama zambiri tomatoyu tilime mapeto ake tangoyamba kufunano kwa mopweteka kwambiri tomato amene mumamuona pamsikawu sachoka adatero magugu 
  kulira kwa magugu mwina kungathe ganizo lomwe mkonzi wa pulogalamu ya ulimi wa lero excello zidana yemwe mlangizi wa zaulimi akunena vuto alimiwa amayamba kulima asadapeze msika alimi asadalime adziyamba aona msika momwe ulili kumatchera nyengo yake zimathandiza idziwe yomwe mbewuyo imagulika 
  zidana akuti bwinonso alimiwa aziyangana msika wina zinthu zavuta choncho upite madera upeza alimi akupha makwacha mbewu yomweyo ayende misika ina ndithu akasimba mwayi adatero
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
milandu yachepa ku blantyre milandu yosiyanasiyana mzindawa blantyre yatsika kuchoka 328 february chaka chatha kufika 204 mwezi omwewo chaka chino atero apolisi 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa polisi mzindawo dorrah chathyoka adati iyi nkhani yosangalatsa 
  kutanthauza milandu yomwe amapalamula yatsika 37.8 100 iliyonse iyi nkhani yabwino kutsimikizira ntchito yomwe apolisi blantyre akugwira usiku usana adatero chathyoka 
  adati polisi yawo idakhazikitsa ndondomeko zothana ndiupandu zomwe zayamba kubala zipatso 
  mwazina ndikuyendayenda komwe apolisi akuchita mmadera onse akumavala zovala za polisi zovala zawamba tithane upandu adatero 
  izitu zikumachitika usiku usana pamene tikumayenda galimoto njinga kuyenda wapansi takhazikitsanso zipata mmisewu tikumatola onse amene akuyenda yosaloledwa popanda chenicheni adaonjeza chathyoka 
  adati zinanso zomwe achita ndikupanga ubale wabwino pakati apolisi okhala mumzinda wa blantyre 
  tidakhazikitsa polisi yammadera tikulankhulana kugawana maganizo pafunika kutero 
  chathyoka adati kudzera mnjira zotere apolisi akumanjata owaganizira kupalamula mlandu mosavuta pamene akumawatsina khutu 
  akupemphedwa apitirize kupanga ubale wabwino polisiwa nkhani yabwinoyi ichitika kwa yotalikirapo 
  cholinga kupanga blantyre wokomera adatero
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
lengwe national park idzetsa mavuto malo olima by thokozani chapola 2019/07 lengwe np.jpg 367w sizes="(max width 820px 100vw 820px />mbali imodzi ya lengwe national park mmidzi ya mtambawatherere njobvuyalema kwa mfumu ngabu mboma la chikwawa ayamba kuthawira mdziko la mozambique kaamba kosowa malo olima 
 malinga mderali lomwe loyandikana nkhalango yosungirako zakutchire ya lengwe amaletsedwa kulima nkhalangoyi momwe mokhamo momwe muli malo olima ati kaamba koti nkhalango yotetezedwa mfumu ya derali yati anthuwa kwa yaitali akhala akulima nkhalangoyi kufikira zaka ziwiri zapitazo pomwe oyanganira nkhalangoyi anayamba kugwira wopezeka akulima nkhalangoyi malinga mfumuyi anthuwa akagwidwa akumalipilitsidwa ndalama za nkhaninkhani akapezeka akulima mmalowa zopmwe ati zakwiyitsa kwambiri mdera lake 
 abusa kukadyetsa ngombe anagwidwako pomwe mbuyo monsemu timapitako bwinobwino abusa wa alipiritsidwa 80 sauzande atuluke ku polisi zimenezi zomwe zakwiyitsa kuyamba kupita mdziko la mozambique mwina mkukapezako malo olima kudyesera ziweto inatero mfumu chagaka 
 apempha mabungwe omenyera ufulu wa athandize mderali apezeko mtendere 
 trapence boma lichitepo kanthu polankhulapo wachiri kwa wapampando wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe omwenyera ufulu wa mdziko muno human rights defenders coalition gift trapence ati boma likuyenera kukambirana anthuwa kuwapezera malo olima 
 akusowa polima ndiye pali vuto ndiye bomalo liyenera liyesetse likambirane mafumu derali nawonso apeze malo okhala kulimapo anatero trapence 
 polankhulapo mneneri unduna wa zachilengedwe mphamvu za magetsi migodi sangwani phiri ati sayenera kulima ku malowa kaamba koti malowa otetezedwa boma azisungirako basi 
 malo aliwonse omwe otetezedwa akapezekamo kulakwira malamulo boma zikawavulaza adzabweranso ku boma liwapepese ifeyo tikulephera kusamalira nkhalangoyo choncho tikuteteza kuteteza miyoyo ya anthuwo anatero phiri 
 lengwe national park inakhazikitsidwa mchaka cha 1970 kwa yaitali akhala akulima nkhalangoyi yomwe ili zochuluka kuphatikizapo yotchuka kwambiri ya nyala
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
tidakhulupirirana tsiku loyamba chikondi chidayambira kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college komwe dennis lupenga akuti atakumana sheila chimphamba mchaka cha 2013 pomwe onse maphunziro adakhulupirirana tsiku lomwelo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu awiriwa adamaliza maphunziro sheila amagwira ntchito muofesi ya mapolojekiti mkonzi wa mapologalamu kuwayilesi ya zodiak pomwe dennis kampani yake ya zamakina internet 
  dennis akuti ubale wa awiriwa udayamba 9 april chaka chokumanacho awiriwa tsopano thupi limodzi cha 2013 atauza njoyelo mwachindunji akufuna kumukwatira osati za chibwenzi momwe ambiri amayambira 
  ndidalibe yotaya nkumati ndili pachibwenzi sheila adandigwiriratu mtima ndidalibeso yoti ndimuone kaye ayi adatero dennis 
  akuti uku kudali kusukulu mmaganizo mwawo mudalibe za chibwenzi akungoyembekezera tsiku lodzalowa mbanja panthawi yonseyi sadasiye makolo abale mumdima pozindikira ubale wawo sudali wachibwana 
  titakambirana tidadziwitsa abale makolo azidziwa timazindikira pokangopita pangono tiwafuna atimangire chinkhoswe kutigwira pomwe tikukalowa mbanja adatero dennis 
  akuti adakhala choncho mpaka chaka cha 2014 9 august pomwe adamanga chinkhoswe nkuyamba kukonzekera ukwati omwe udachitika 2 april ku tchalitchi cha katolika cha maula madyerero adali ku peak gardens mumzinda wa lilongwe 
  sheila mkazi wanzeru wokongola wachilungamo wodzisamala woopa mulungu adandiwonetsa chikondi chenicheni momwe makolo anga adandionetsera adatero dennis 
  dennis mwamuna wolimbikira wodzichepetsa wachikondi wachilungamo 
  amandilimbikitsa ndikakhala chofooka amandiphunzitsa kuthana zokhoma adatero sheila
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
bungwe la tc lachititsa maphunziro ozindikiritsa adindo za malamulo ogwiritsa ntchito ana mminda ya fodya akuti ungachepe adindo atatsatira moyenera malamulo omwe adakhazikitsidwa oyendetsera ulimi wa fodya mdziko muno 
 mwa akuluakulu bungwe lowona za ulimi malonda fodya mdziko muno la tobacco commission tc hellings nason omwe anena pambuyo maphunziro ozindikiritsa adindo mwa malamulowa 
 nason mchitidwewu ukukula mchigawo chapakati cha lino adindo akuyenera kuchitapo kanthu zithe 
 zina zomwe zili mmmalamulo amenewa zinafunikira tizifotokozere kwa amene akhoza kuthandizira lamulo liyambe kugwira ntchito moyenera mafumu amene amakhala kumidzi amene angakwanitse kuwafotokozera anatero nason 
 poyankhulapo komishonala owona za milandu samawat chisale anadandaula milandu yochepa yokha yomwe imafika ku polisi maphunzirowa athandizira adziwe za malamulo
Label: FARMING

Text:
zipani zikufuna machawi chisankho zipani zandale zati bungwe loyendetsa zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec lichititse msanga chisankho chobwereza kudera la kummwera cha ku mmawa kwa lilongwe akuderari akhale phungu owayimirira ku nyumba ya malamulo 
  zikutsatira chigamulo cha bwalo lalikulu la apilo chisankho cha phungu wa deralo chichitikenso litaunika dandaulo la yemwe ankayimirira chipani cha malawi congress party mcp ulemu msungama chisankhocho sichidayende 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo richard msowoya watsimikiza chigamulochi deralo tsopano lilibe phungu 
  bwalo lomwe lagamula lalikulu mdziko muno kutanthauza kulibenso komwe nkhaniyo ingalowere apa zikutanthauza kuderako kulibe phungu nchifukwa chake kuchitikenso chisankho adatero msowoya 
  pachisankho cha 20 may 204 bungwe la mec lidalengeza bentley namasasu yemwe ankayimira chipani cha democratic progressive party dpp ndiye adapambana msungama adakamangala kubwalo la milandu za chigamulochi 
  wachiwiri kwa mlembi wa chipani cha mcp eisenhower mkaka adati bungwe la mec lisakoke nkhaniyo kuthamangitsa chisankhochi mderalo akhale phungu owayimilira ku nyumba ya malamulo mneneri wa chipani cha peoples party pp noah chimpeni adati mec iyambirepotu kusakasaka ndalama zopangitsira chisankhochi omwe adagwirizana mneneri wa chipani cha udf ken ndanga 
  apa mec iyambiretu kusakasaka ndalama zopangitsira chisankhochi munthawi yake ikwaniritse ntchito yake malingana malamulo adatero ndanga 
  chikalata chomwe mec idatulutsa lachitatu chidati pali z ofunika kutsata chisankhochi chisadachitike 
  aka kakhala koyamba chisankho cha uwu chichitike mumbiri ya malawi motero tikuyenera chigamulochi malamulo oyendetsera chisankho akutinji chidatero chikalatacho 
  mneneri wa bungwelo sangwani mwafulirwa adati malamulo sanena yeniyeni yofunika kutenga chisankho chotere chichitike mmalo mwake akhoza kugwiritsa ntchito lamulo lomwe limati pasadathe masiku 60 
  mwafulirwa adatinso mwa zina bungweri likufunika lisake ndalama zopangitsira chisankhochi mundondomeko ya chuma ya 2016 mpaka 2017 mulibe pologalamu yachisankhochi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
dayosizi ya mangochi yapereka ndondomeko zatsopano zopewera covid-19 mpingo wa katolika dayosizi ya mangochi walangiza akhristu ake njira zatsopano zomwe akuyenera pochita mapemphero potsatira kupitilira kufala kwa mliri wa coronavirus mdziko muno 
 walemba kalatayo bishop stima kalata yomwe yalembedwa yasayinidwa episkopi wa dayosiziyi ambuye montfort stima yapempha akhritsu njira zina zowonjezera pamene akupitilira njira zomwe mpingo boma linakhazikitsa kale zina mwa njira zatsopanozi kuvala chotchingira kukamwa mphuno pamene akuchita mwambo wa nsembe za misa 
 zina monganso malo odutsa pamene akuchita mwambo wa mapemphero kupewa kugwiritsa ntchito ma fan kugwiritsa ntchito sopo kulolini pamene akukonza mmalo opempherera motarikirana ma mita awiri kusamba mmanja sopo 
 ambuye stima kudzera kalatayi yomwe alembera ansembe asiteri akhristu eni ake ati miyambo ya nsembe ya misa idzichitika kosapitirira ola limodzi akhristu apewe kupereka mphatso pamanja kulandilira ukalistiya mmanja ati pakuyenera ndondomeko yabwino yokhazikika pamene akhritsu akutuluka tchalitchi apewe kugundana gundana 
 pomaliza kalatayi yaimitsa mwa masakramenti sakrameneti la ubatizo zinamwali za mpingo maphunziro akatikisimu wa ana 
 zili chomwechi episkopiyu wapereka chilorezo kwa masakramenti motsatira ndondomeko zopewera mliriwu ma sacramentiwa la kulapa kudzodza ukwati pomwe akuti opereka olandira ma sacramentiwa onse adzivala chotchingira kukamwa mphuno azitsatira ndondomeko zonse zomwe mpingo boma lakhazikitsa pomaliza ambuye stima apempha akhristu akonde njira zozitetezerazi kulikonse kumalo oti si kutchalitchi
Label: HEALTH

Text:
ecm ipempha alemekeze lamulo podikira chigamulo alemba chikalatacho mwa maepiskopi katolika ku malawi bungwe la ma episkopi mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la episcopal conference of malawi ecm lapempha mdziko muno alemekeze lamulo pamene akuyembekezera chigamulo cha bwalo la milandu nkhani yokhudza chisankho cha president 
 ma episkopiwa anena kudzera chikalata chomwe atulutsa lero chomwe achilemba otsogolera akuti ambuye mundipange chida chodzetsa mtendere omwe omwe ananena francis wa ku assis woyera 
 ati padakali pamene akhristu ayamba nyengo ya advent kofunika apitirize bata zomwe zikugwirizana uthenga omwe anatulutsa mwezi wa june chaka chino 
 ma episkopiwa alangiza mdziko muno chigamulochi chikadzabwera sichidzawakomera azavomereze kutsutsana nacho mwamtendere motsata malamulo lino 
 apempha apewe kuchitira nkhanza pofuna kuwawopseza apewe kufalitsa nkhani zabodza zokhudza nkhani yomwe ili ku bwalo la milandu maka kudzera masamba mchezo makina internet zomwe zingadzetse mpungwepungwe kusokoneza mtendere mdziko muno 
 pamenepa ma episkopiwa apempha nthambi zonse za mpingowu nyumba zofalitsa nkhani za mpingowu zibwere njira zowakonzekeretsa kuzavomereza chigamulo cha bwalo la milandu pofuna kupititsa patsogolo mtendere mgwirizano mdziko muno 
 ma episkopiwa ati apitilira kupemphelera chilungamo mtendere kukhululukirana mgwirizano mdziko muno apempha akhristu mpingowu achite chimodzimodzi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
chitetezo chaphwasuka chitetezo chaphwasuka akuberedwa kumenyedwa kuchitidwa zachipongwe zambiri akaitanitsa apolisi akuti akumatenga abwera zina sabwera zikukhumudwitsa mafumu 
  wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa polisi mdziko muno thomeck nyaude watsutsa nkhaniyi wati apolisi akalandira uthenga sanyozera amathamangira komwe kwavutako 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kawinga kulankhula mtolankhani wathu akutuluka ku chipatala cha mwaiwathu t nyambi ya mboma la machinga yati chidodo cha apolisi ndicho chikuchititsa azilanga okha akagwira munthu yemwe akumuganizira wamtopola 
  nyambi amathirira ndemanga nkhani yoti okwiya adazunza atolankhani bbc ku karonga powaganizira anamapopa 
  adamenya atolankhaniwo kuwalanda zipangizo zawo kuswa galimoto yawo zidachitika kwa maola oposa 7 apolisi sadatulukire 
  nako ku machinga akuba adathira machaka mfumu kawinga nkuibera ndalama zoposa k1 miliyoni akuti apolisi sadalanditse mfumuyo adadziwitsidwa 
  nyaude watsutsa wati ambiri sadziwitsa apolisi zikawathina ndife sitigwiritsira ntchito mphamvu zamatsenga timadalira kuuzidwa sadatiuze ndiye tigwira ntchito wati nkhani ya atolankhani bbc idakhota atolankhaniwo sadawadziwitse akutsikira mmidzi ya karonga 
  adangopita kuderako osatidziwitsa amangoganiza zinthu zili ndiye masiku ake si anowa 
  atolankhaniwo dariud gregory barzagan ahmed hussein divela prince anus asamoah adathambitsidwa olusa mdera la malema pamene amalemba nkhani zokhudzana matsenga 
  adatsogozedwa mtolankhani wa mdziko muno henry mhango komabe sizidasinthe kanthu pamene ammudziwo adaloza zala atolankhaniwo anamapopa 
  nkhani zomwe amalembazonso zidali zosavuta alumikize nkhani zopopa magazi amayenera atidziwitse tikhale tikuponyako maso adatero nyaude 
  nkhani ya kuvulazidwa kwa mfumu kawinga yomwe idalephera kuthandizidwa apolisi nyaude wati palibe amene amayembekezera zichitika 
  palibe amayembekezera zichitika kudalinso kovuta tidziwe tikalanditse mfumu yathu tidakauzidwa tidakathandiza tiyeni tidalirane adatero nyaude 
  wa bungwe loona za ufulu wachibadwidwe wa la centre for human rights and rehabilitation chrr timothy mtambo wati vuto apolisi boma amene akulephera kuteteza 
  takhalapo nkhani zopopa magazi kupha achialubino zomwe samakhutira momwe apolisi amagwirira ntchito nchifukwa chake akumalanga okha zotere zikachitika adatero mtambo 
  adati mavutowa akudza apolisi akulephera kugwira ntchito azithandizira kubweretsa chitetezo 
  tili nkhani zambiri zomwe mutu sudziwika chomwe timamva akufufuza izitu zomwe alibenso chikhulupiriro polisi yathu adatero 
  padakali mfumu kawinga yatulutsidwa mchipatala cha mwaiwathu ku blantyre komwe yakhalako sabata 
  mfumuyi idaomberedwa pamwendo kawiri kukhapidwa chikwanje paphewa pamkono kumenyedwa chitsulo pamwendo 
  polankhula tamvani sabata yatha kawinga adati akubawo adaomberanso mlonda kuvulaza mwana 
  zimachitika atandibera k1 miliyoni 200 euros adaphwanyira galimoto ziwiri adatero
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
chipani cha dpp chati chiyamba misonkhano yakathithi posachedwa mlangizi wa president nkhani za ndale francis mphepo wati chipani cha democratic progressive dpp chikhala chikuchita misonkhano yokopa mwakathithi posachedwapa 
 mphepo tikutsatira zomwe president wathu anatiuza mphepo anawuza radio maria malawi pakali chipani cha dpp chikutsatira zomwe adanena president mutharika zoti asamakhale mothinana pofuna kupewa kachirombo ka coronavirus 
 mphepo padakali wachiwiri kwa pulezidenti mutharika chisankho cha pulezidenti chobwereza chomwe chikudzachi atupele muluzi akungopanga misonkhano yoyimayima pofuna kungocheza 
 tikutsatira zomwe president wathu professor arthur peter mutharika adanena titsatire njira zopewera mliri umenewu wa coronavirus ndiye sikuti tangokhala ayi tiyambapo kamepni yeneiyeni posachedwapa anatero mphepo 
 mwapadera mphepo apempha atsogoleri ndale amvere malangizo unduna wa zaumoyo kapewedwe mliri mwa coronavirus pamene akuchita misonkhano yokopa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
tizipatsana ulemu moyendamu abambo anyamata pali makhalidwe omwe mukuyenera kusiya makhalidwe onyasa otopetsa otonza amayi atsikana 
  zomati muntu wamkazi akudutsa poteropo abambo anyamata nkumayangana mwachidwi chachipongwe mukumusilira munthuyo nzoipa 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu amayi atsikana ufulu oyenda mosasowetsedwa mtendere mayanganidwe otero aja 
  ndiye pali miluzi ija mmalizaliza kulizira amayiwa kaya anzanu pofuna nawo achite chidwi kaya mtsikana amene akudutsa 
  aja simutha kuugwira mtima mpaka mkono wanu ugwire mtsikana kaya mosamulemekeza 
  palinso timamoni tosadziwika tija mmapereka mmisewumu mmakhala kumachemerera kunyoza ziwalo za amayi atsikana akamadutsa 
  nchifukwa chiyani simutha kupita pagulu la nkungosamala za nokha osalabadirako za chimavuta nchiyani kuona munthu wa nkumupatsa ulemu omwe mmapatsa abambo anyamata anzanu chifukwatu miluziyi mamoni kugwirana zinazi simupangira abambo anzanu 
  ndithu mmaganiza munthu wamayi amanka mliyendamu mumugwire kumukuwa kaya kumuyankhulitsa zosadziwika chimakupatsani danga loti muzisowetsa amayi mtendere nchiyani ili khalidwe lonyasa lochokera mmaganizidwe aja oonera amayi atsikana pansi kumawayesa omwe mukhoza kuwazunguza mmene mungaganizire
Label: CULTURE

Text:
la malawi silimayenera chikondwelero cha zaka 55   mvula by richard makombe wa akatswiri nkhani za ndale mdziko muno wati sanagwirizane ganizo la boma lochita chikondwelero chokumbukira lino lakwanitsa zaka 55 lili ufulu wodzilamulira pomwe boma likusowa ndalama zogwiritsira ntchito poyendetsera zina mwa ntchito zake 
 mvula ndalama za chikondwelero akanatha kugwiritsa ntchito zina zofunikira kwambiri katswiriyu humphreys mvula wauza radio maria malawi pomwe lino loweruka limachita chikondwelero lakwanitsa zaka 55 za ufulu odzilamulira 
 mvula ati momwe zinthu zilili padakali boma limayenera kuganiza mozama potenga ndalama za chikondwelerochi ndikugwiritsa ntchito kugula mankhwala mzipatala mavuto omwe achuluka mdziko muo 
 lino likukumana mavuto zachuma padakali mpungwepungwe nkhani za ndale choncho kunali koyenera kukonza kaye mavuto amenewa osati kuononga ndalama chikondwelero pomwe atsogoleri ndale sakukondwa momwe zinthu zikuyendera mdziko muno anatero mvula 
 mvula apempha mtsogoleri wa lino apeze njira ndikukambirana atsogoleri otsutsa athetse mpungwepungwe omwe ukuchitika mdziko muno nkhani za ndale 
 padakali bungwe la human rights defenders coalition lakhala likukonza ziwonetsero zosagwirizana momwe zisankho zinayendera 21 may chaka chino mwa zina likufuna wapampando wa bungwe la malawi electoral commission justice dr jane ansah atule pansi udindo 
 ziwonetserozi zomwe zakhala zikuchitika mmizinda ikuluikulu yonse ya lino akhala akuononga katundu wa ochita malonda kuphatikizapo akuluakulu ndale 
 la malawi linalandira ufulu odzilamulira 6 july mchaka cha 1964 chaka chilichonse la malawi limachita chikondwelerochi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
ulendo wa chisankho wapsa zipani zina zati bungwe loyendetsa chisankho la malawi electoral commission mec liyenera kukwaniritsa zomwe lidalonjeza sabata yatha chisankho cha 2019 chidzayenda mosakondera mbali 
  mec idakhazikitsa ulendo wa chisankho chimene chidzakahalepo 21 may 2019 lonjezo limodzi palibe kukondera 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka wachiwiri kwa mlembi wamkulu wa chipani cha malawi congress mcp eisenhower mkaka adati lonjezo lotereli limanenedwa zonse kumayambiriro kwa ulendo kuno pamapeto pake zimaoneka zina 
  tili chikhulupiliro ulendo uno mec isunga lonjezo lake tiziyanganira lonjezoli akulikwaniritsa motani vuto ndiloti timamva lonjezo lomwelomwelo zonse kumapeto timaona zina adatero mkaka 
  mneneri wa chipani cha peoples party pp noah chimpeni wati nkhawa yawo ili pakusasunga lonjezo kwa bungwe la mec lomwe zambiri limawoneka limapereka mpata waukulu ku mbali ina 
  zonse amatero sitidaonepo umboni oti akwaniritsa lonjezoli akunena za chilungamo ndiye awonetsetse chipani chilichonse chizikhala mpata ofanana mbc osati olamula okha ayi adatero chimpeni 
  adati pakhalenso ndondomeko yoonetsetsa azikhala mpata wa msonkhano kulikonse komwe wafuna zina misonkhano ina amayiletsa yothaitha ponena kumaloko kukupita mtsogoleri wa 
  chipani cha united democratic front udf chati aka sikoyamba chipanichi kumva lonjezo lotere ku bungwe la mec chomwe chimavuta nkukwatitsa lonjezoli zochitika 
  mneneri wachipani cha udf ken ndanga adati chipani chawo chimafuna ntchito zooneka maso osati chabe 
  sikoyamba kumva amenewa kuchoka pakamwa mec zakhala zikunenedwa chimavuta nkukwaniritsa mawuwo nkhani ntchito osati timakhala tikuona zochitika adatero ndanga 
  mlembi wamkulu wa chipani cha alliance for democracy aford christopher ritchie wati chipani chawo chitsatira ndondomeko zomwe mec yakhazikitsa nacho chiyembekezera mec kukwaniritsa mbali yake mwa lonjezo 
  paliponse pamafunika chilungamo zinthu ziyende aford timakhulupilira chilungamo choncho titsatira ndondomeko nawonso akwaniritse zomwe alonjeza osati tidzawone zina kumapeto adatero ritchie 
  mec idatsegulira ulendowu 20 february 2018 zipani za ndale zati kupatula zokonzekera zina zina maso lonjezo lomwe bungweli lidapereka chisankhocho chidzakhala chopanda zitopotopo 
  wapampando wa mec jane ansah adalonjeza chisankho cha 2019 chidzakhala chokomera bungwelo lilibe mbali iliyonse yoti mwina azikayika pangadzakhale kukondera 
  bungwe la mec ndilodzipereka kuchititsa chisankho cha mtendere chokomera paulendo onse mpaka kumapeto pakhala chilungamo zinthu pamtetete sitidzasekerera ogwira ntchito ku mec opanga zautambwali adatero ansah 
  adati bungwelo likuyembekezeranso mgwirizano kwa onse okhudzidwa chisankho chomwe chikudzachi zikatero nalo bungwe la mec lidzayesetsa lisaopsezedwe kutumidwa mbali mphamvu iliyonse 
  ansah adati makomo mec akhala otsegula paulendo onse bungwelo lidzalandira kuchitapo kanthu dandaulo lililonse lomwe okhudzidwa angadzabweretse mosaona nkhope 
  zipani zina za ndale zati zamva lonjezoli maso ake akhala akuyanganitsitsa mec zione komwe lonjezoli lizilowera mpaka komwe likathere 
  bungwe loona za kayendetsedwe ka ndale za zipani zambiri la centre for multiparty democracy cmd lati paulendowu mpofunika kugwirana manja pakati mbali zosiyanasiyana tikafike 
  wapampando wa bungwelo kandi padambo adati magulu zipani za ndale nyumba zofalitsa nkhani boma makamaka oyanganira thumba la chuma akuyenera kutengapo mbali kwambiri 
  ku mbali ya boma mpofunika kupereka ndalama zoyendetsera chisankho zokwanira yabwino adatero padambo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
atentha nyumba ya mfumu yawo ku dedza apolisi mboma la dedza akusakasaka omwe achita zaupandu potentha nyumba za mfumu kapesi ya mdera la mfumu yayikulu kachere mbomalo ati pokwiya zimene achita powagulitsira malo makolo ku khonsolo ya bomalo 
 wachiwiri kwa ofalisa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo sergeant cassim manda watsimikiza za nkhaniyi 
 wati aupanduwo poyamba anakumana bwanamkubwa wa mbomalo kuwadandaulira za nkhaniyi sanamvane 
 anthuwo pambuyo pake anagoganiza zokachitira zamtopola onse omwe amakhudzidwa nkhaniyi kuphatikizapo mfumuyi anatero manda 
 padakalipano onse omwe akukhudzidwa nkhaniyi omwe rodrick kapesi mmudziwo kudzanso daveston mandalawe omwenso group village headman memezeya ndinso dalison magwaza omwe mlangizi wa amfumu ayamba mwamathantha ati powopa mwina zamtopolawo atha kuwachita chiwembu
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
agumula nyumba   pokaikira masalamusi mbuto ya kalulu idakula ntadzaonani mwambiwu udapherezera lachiwiri ku lilongwe pomwe okwiya ku mtsiriza adagumula nyumba ya banja lina ati powaganizira amazembetsa mmatsenga 
  anthuwo sadalekere pomwepo kuotcha galimoto lapolisi lomwe apolisi adakwera akateteze banja la malunga amene adaotcheredwa nyumbayo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mneneri wa likulu la apolisi james kadadzera watsimikiza za chipolowecho wati apolisi agwira 20 omwe akuwaganizira akukhudzidwa chipolowecho 
  kadadzera tilibe lipoti awa tawagwira poyambira kafukufuku ofuna kupeza chenicheni chomwe chidachitika pakumveka nkhani zosiyanasiyana mphekesera ikukhudza za masilamusi adatero 
  polankhula msangulutso omwe adaona zikuchitika adati banjalo amalikaikira limasowetsa mmatsenga patsikulo munthu wina yemwe amalira momvetsa chisoni adawauza mulungu adamuonetsa vumbulutso akupephera mbale yemwe adasowa akusungidwa mnyumbamo 
  mwa anthuwo enifa kaira adati mphekeserayo itamveka adayamba kusonkhana panyumbapo uku akukalipa eni nyumbayo atulutse onse omwe amawasunga mmatsenga 
  kudali khamu la ana akulu okalamba kufuna kuonetsetsa mnyumbamo mutuluka chiyani eni nyumbayo ataona zinthu zikuonjeza adamuuza odandaulayo alowe mnyumbamo akayangane mbale wakeyo naye sadatuluke mpaka apolisi adafika adatero 
  kaira adati apolisi atafika adathamangira mnyumbamo potuluka adatenga odandaulayo eni nyumbayo nkuwakweza galimoto ya polisi azipita nawo sadakondwe nazo adayamba kugenda apolisiwo nkuwayatsira galimotoyo 
  mwana wamkulu wa mnyumbamo mwayi malunga wa zaka 24 yemwe adali pakhomo pomwe zimachitika adati zomwe anthuwo adachita lidali dumbo chabe poti mderalo safunira banjalo zabwino 
  adati pomwe zonse zidayamba mma 3 koloko masana akupuma amamvera phokoso la kutulo osadziwa kukuchitika chiyani mpaka pomwe ake adamudzutsa akaone zomwe zikuchitika kunja 
  malunga adati atatuluka panja adaona khamu la likusokosa uku likuloza nyumbayo pakati pawo pali munthu wa mtsikana akulira uku akuti akufuna mbale yemwe mnyumbamo 
  pokana milandu tidamupatsa mwayi woti alowe mnyumbamo ayangane paliponse adafufuzadi osapeza kanthu kenako tidangoona wagwa nkukhala wakomoka mpaka pomwe apolisi amafika adatero malunga 
  adati apolisiwo akuti azinyamuka munthuyo makolo ake adayamba kuwakuwiza kenako kugenda apolisiwo adaliza galimoto yawo asadafike patali anthuwo adayiyatsa nkuthawa 
  mnyamatayo adati anthuwo adayamba kugenda nyumba yawo mpaka kuswa magalasi onse chitseko adakanganula malata mbali imodzi nkugwetsa mpanda wa njerwa kuzula chitseko cha mpandawo nkunyamula 
  zidali zachidziwikire kwinako zidalowa kuba basi osati zomwe amanenazo mpaka munthu yemwe amati tikusungayo sadamupeze adatero 
  kadadzera adati chodabwitsa nchakuti apolisi alibe lipoti lokhudza munthu yemwe akuti adasowayo atachita chipikisheni mnyumbamo sadapezemo munthu wosonyeza amasungidwa mobedwa
Label: WITCHCRAFT

Text:
jb asabisalire kwa amphawi za kuyenda pambali poyenda kunja banda akukhaliranso kugawa ngombe nyumba kukweza mafumu mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda wamenyetsa nkhwangwa pamwala ponena zivute zitani sangasiye kuyendera mmidzimu wati zikafika povutitsitsa atha kukwera kabaza mwa omwe athirapo ndemanga mtsogoleriyu kuphatikizapo akuluakulu odziwa za mmene chuma cha boma chukuyendera apempha mtsogoleriyu asinthe maganizo 
  loweruka lapita banda adauza pabwalo la kalambo mumzinda wa lilongwe sasiya kuyendayenda ndiyo njira yomwe akuthandizira akumudzi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi adati pathine azikwera kabaza njinga ya hayala afikire abale ake ovutika zikutsutsana zomwe boma lake kudzera mwa nduna ya zachuma maxwell mkwezalamba lidalengeza layamba laimitsa kaye maulendo nduna akukuakulu ogwira ntchito mboma kuphatikizapo pulezidenti mwina chuma cha boma chingabwerere mchimake 
  bungwe la catholic commission for justice and peace ccjp sabata yatha lidadandaula maulendo mtsogoleriyu ponena njira imodzi yowonongera chuma cha lino bungweli lidati pamene pulezidentiyu wayenda mdziko mommuno akumaononga k10 miliyoni patsiku 
  mneneri wa boma brown mpinganjira akuti sakudziwa ndalama zomwe zikuwonongeka adati atiuzabe pambuyo kukumana akuluakulu zachuma 
  ngatidi zoona ulendo wa pulezidenti woyendera ake mdziko mommuno umadya ndalama zokwana k10 miliyoni patsiku atati azigwiritse ntchito ina ikhoza kuthandiza pachitukuko chomwe chingapindulire ochuluka 
  mwachitsanzo mndondomeko ya zachuma cha boma ya 2013/2014 boma lidapatula k7 miliyoni nkuika mthumba la local development fund ldf zothandizira pantchito ya chitukuko cha mmidzi mdera la phungu pachaka 
  mwezi wa october wokha pali umboni woti mtsogoleriyu adachititsa misonkhano yosachepera 17 mdziko muno 
  nduna ikaperekeza mtsogoleriyu imalandira k45 000 patsiku alawansi wachiwiri kwa nduna amalandira k39 600 wothandizira nduna k15 000 madalaivala achitetezo amapindira mthumba k6 000 malinga malipiro amamulumuzanawa amene adaunikidwanso november 2012 malipirowa amagunda papakulu zochitikazo zikuchitikira kunja kwa lilongwe 
  lachiwiri lapitali mmidzi ya chamba msanganiza khunju kamtukule jiya ina kwa senior chief somba mboma la blantyre adauza tamvani pamoto cha kusowa kwa chimanga feteleza wa makuponi mankhwala mzipatala 
  amene adalankhula tamvani tidawapeza atagona admarc ya mbame pomwe ankadikirira chimanga feteleza 
  mwa anthuwo ephraim kabichi wa mmudzi mwa kamtukule adati atha kusangalala pamene mtsogoleriyu wayenda amene akuthandizika ochepa ndalama zikugwiritsidwa ntchitozo zambiri zomwe zikadapindulira ambiri 
  sabata ino yachitatu sindidagule feteleza feteleza adangobwera kamodzi kokha kuchipatala kulibe mankhwala chimanga chidasowa kalekale kuno ndalamayo itha kuthandiza tonse kuno 
  wa bungwe loona momwe nkhani zachuma zikuyendera la malawi economic justice network mejn dalitso kubalasa wati pulezidenti banda akungobisala pachipande 
  ndalamazo zithanso kuposa k10 miliyoni pamene wayenda ndalama zimenezi zikuthandiza angati tione zimenezi 
  tili mavuto ambiri kusowa mankhwala mzipatala momwe chuma chathu chilili adatero kubalasa nkuonjezera zikuchitika pamene chaka chamawa lino lili chisankho ndiye nzosakaikitsa cholinga cha maulendowo ndale zokopa adzavotere mtsogoleriyu chipani chake cha pp osati akumudzi ndiwo akupindula nawo 
  katakwe pandale blessings chinsinga akuti nyumba ya malamulo ndiyo ingathane kuyendayenda kwa banda 
  kodi ndalama zimenezi akuzitenga mufunse yankho likhala loti zikuchokera mndondomeko yomwe idavomerezedwanso nyumba ya malamulo ndiye tikuyenera kuona ndalama zomwe zikupita kuthumba lomwe mtsogoleri azigwiritsira ntchito adatero chinsinga 
  sabata yatha bungwe la ccjp lidauza atolankhani lakwiya maulendo banda ogawa ngombe kukweza mafumu akumaononga zambiri kwa ochepa 
  zosamveka boma liziononga k10 miliyoni pokagawa ngombe ziwiri za ndalama pafupifupi k400 000 mtsogoleri asiyire ntchitoyi kwa akuluakulu kuunduna wa zamalimidwe adatero mlembi wa bungweli peter chinoko 
  banda adati maulendowa azichitikabe panganolo likuloleza maulendo ofunika okha
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mtambo wati mec ikhazikitse ndondomeko zabwino mtsogoleri wa gulu la ndale la citizens for transformation cft timothy mtambo wati pakuyenera ndondomeko zabwino chisankho chomwe chikhudzachi onse omwe akutenga nawo gawo adzakhutire zotsatira zake 
 amalankhula msonkhano wa atolankhani lachiwiri ku lilongwe pomwe anatsindika zakufunika kwa chisankho chomwe chikudzachi 
 mtambo wa nrb atule pansi udindo mtambo wati mwachitsanzo ndondomeko zina zomwe bungwe loyendetsa chisankho la mec lidagwiritsa ntchito poponya chisankho cha chaka chatha zikuyenera kusinthidwa pakhale njira zatsopano zomwe ati zitha kuthandiza pasakhale zokayikitsa 
 pamenepa mtambo ati ndizokhumudwitsa pakhala pali mphekesera zoti ana achichepere akulembetsedwa kaundula wa bungwe la nrb cholinga chofuna kubera chisankhochi wati wabungweli mackford somanje atule pansi udindo wawo 
 wa nrb atule pansi udindo cholinga chawo chosokoneza chisankho osati kuthandiza malawi tikupempha njira zomwe zakhazikitsidwa zikonzedwenso anatero mtambo 
 anawonjezera ponena chisankho chomwe chikudzachi sicheyenda pokhapokha makomishonala bungwe la mec atule pansi maudindo

Text:
zakudya za ziweto zasowa mboma la nsanje ziweto ngombe nkhosa mbuzi zili pamoto cha kusowa kwa chakudya 
  kwauma tchire atentha imeneyi zaka zonse ziweto akuti zimadalira kumtsinje wa ruo komwe zimakadya bango nsenjere udzu wauwisi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc chaka chino cha madzi osefukira ruo wabweretsa mchenga wambiri zomwe zachititsa bango udzu wauwisi ukwiririke mulibemo msipu ulionse 
  malinga gulupu manyowa ziwetozi zikudalira makoko chimanga nthochi zikonyo mwinanso mango 
  ziweto zambiri zikumasonkhana pansi mitengo ya mango akamathyola zidyeko cha kusowa chakudya ziweto zambiri zaonda adatero manyowa 
  alangizi amalangiza zikatere alimi amayenera azikhaliratu atapanga zakudya za ngombe mbuzi azizipatsa ino 
  manyowa akuti mmudzi mwake palibe munthu amene adapanga zakudyazo cha mavuto madzi amene adakumana nawo 
  palibe amene adapanga zakudya za ziweto kodi mmene zidalili kuno ungamupeze munthu akupanga zakudya za ziweto mlimi adali chiyembekezo ziweto zizikadyera kumadzi zikhalira zonse osadziwa mchenga wotere adaonjeza

Text:
sinodi ya nkhoma ikudana zochotsa mimba asadzasainire banda sinodi ya nkhoma ya mpingo wa ccap yati kuloleza amayi azichotsa mimba kolakwika nkhanza uchimo usatana pamaso mulungu kuchotsa moyo wa munthu 
  zonena za mpingowu zadza pamene mtsutso ukukula malamulo lino asinthidwe amayi azichotsa mimba angafune padakali malamulo lino amaletseratu kuchotsa mimba kupatula pomwe madotolo atanena kusunga mimbayo moyo wa mwana yemwe akuyembekezera uli pachiopsezo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc chikalata cha mpingowo chimene adachisayina mbusa vasco kachipapa mbusa brian kamwendo chidati moyo umayambika pamene mphamvu ya ya zikumana nkupanga mwana imapitirira yonse imene mimba mpaka mwana kubadwa kukula mpaka kufa kumwalira 
  choncho kuchotsa pathupi nkulakwira malembo oyera chikalatacho chidatero 
  padakali bungwe lounikira malamulo la malawi law commission likukonza bilo yokhudza zochotsa mimba biloyo aphungu ku nyumba ya malamulo atakaivomereza idzakhala lamulo lololeza kuchotsa mimba 
  chikalatacho chidati aphungu asakalole adasankhidwa ateteze miyoyo ya 
  tikupemphanso mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda yemwe mzimayi aphungu angaloleze lamulolo adzakane kusainira zitero chidatero chikalatacho 
  unduna wa zaumoyo wati kuchotsa mimba kumadzetsa mavuto boma limaononga k300 miliyoni chaka chilichonse pothandiza amayi amene adakachotsa mimba mobisa pogwiritsa ntchito njira zodziwa okha

Text:
papa wakhazikitsa thumba la ndalama zothandizira mabanja okhudzidwa coronavirus mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wakhazikitsa thumba la ndalama zothandiza mabanja omwe akuvutika kamba ka mliri wa coronavirus 
 malinga malipoti vatican radio papa wakhazikitsa thumbali lithandize dayosizi ya rome mdziko la italy 
 wati akudziwa pali mabanja omwe ntchito zawo zatha kamba koti ntchito za chuma zalowa pansi mmalo ambiri ogwilira ntchito malinga mliri wa coronavirus 
 pambali pokhala mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco episkopi wa dayozsizi ya rome 
 kudzera mkalata yake ya 9 june 2020 yomwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika latulutsa zadziwika papa francisco wakhazikitsa thumba la ndalama zothandiza mabanja dayosizi ya rome omwe ntchito zawo zatha kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus 
 papa francisco waika ndalama zokwana 1 million euros zomwe 850 million kwacha ku thumbali lomwe akulitchula jesus the divine worker fund 
 mkalata yofotokoza za thumbali wati akudziwa pali mabanja omwe zithandizo zina nzina sizingawafikire amenewa omwe thumba lomwe wakhazikitsali liyese kuwafikira ndikupepusa mavuto imeneyi mpaka anthuwa adzafike poti zinthu zayamba kuwayendera 
 papa francisco wapempha mabungwe akufuna kwabwino athandize kuponya kangachepe ku thumbali mwapadera wapempha ansembe akhale oyamba kuponya kangachepe ku thumbali 
 papa francisco wathokoza kudzera mkalata yake ntchito zabwino zomwe zikuchitika dioceseyi zothandiza omwe akuvutika ya mliri wa coronavirus 
 mmawu ake potsatira kukhazikitsidwa kwa thumbali cardinal angelo de donatis yemwe vicar general wa diocese ya rome wayamikira papa francisco cha ganizoli wati ayetsetsa cholinga cha papayu chikwaniritsidwe 
 miyezi ingapo yapitayi papa francisco adakhazikitsa thumba la ndalama zothandiza mliri wa coronavirus mmaiko osiyana siyana woyamba ndalama za nkhaninkhani ku thumbali kuonjezera apo wakhala akupereka ku maiko osiyana siyana thandizo la zipangizo za mchipatala iyi ya mliri wa coronavirus
Label: HEALTH

Text:
mcp yatiphunzitsa zambiri nkhani idali mkamwamkamwa miyezi ingapo yapitayi ya msonkhano waukulu wa chipani cha mcp zimakaikitsa kumsonkhanowo kukamangidwe zolemekeza maganizo 
  chikaiko chidakula pamene mphekesera zidali mbweee makamaka chipanicho chitalephera kuchititsa msonkhanowo mwezi wa april 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc chikaikocho chidakula zitamveka chipanicho chikufuna makamaka amene angobwera kumene mchipanimo asapikisane nawo pa\mpando wa pulezidenti komiti yapadera ndiyo idapereka mwayi onse onse amene adapereka maina akhoza kupikisana nawo 
  nkhani imodzi imene idatsalira idali yakuti john tembo amene malamulo amamuletsa sangaime nawo adaimira kale chipanichi kawiri naye amafuna kupikisana nawo 
  nthumwi za kumsonkhanowo zitafunsidwa angakambirane zosintha malamulowo zidakana kwa mtuu wagalu zikudza pomwe zipani zina cha udf zidasintha malamulo mwana wa mtsogoleri wakale wadziko lino bakili muluzi atupele aimire chipanichi 
  poyamba atupele sakadapikisana nawo malamulo amaletsa amene sadakwane zaka 35 asapikisane nawo nthumwi zidasintha malamulowo atupele aime 
  yosankha atsogoleri itakwana nthumwizo zidasankha amene amaoneka alendo kuposa nkhalakale za chipanicho zikungosonyeza demokalase ya mchipani yayala nthenje mcp 
  chomwe tingalangize atsogoleri chipanichi akhale okhwima mundale kumulandira kusakhale kugawanikana zidalili tembo atangogonjetsa gwanda chakuamba 2003
Label: POLITICS

Text:

  chikalatachi chati masiku asanu awiri omwe bungwe la human rights defenders coalition hrdc anatenga chiletso choyimitsa ganizoli unali mpata oti boma likonze ndondomeko zoyenera pokonzekera mbindikirowu 
 boma lalephera njira zina zomwe zingapangitse nthendayi isafale kwambiri mdziko muno kulephera kukhazikisa komiti yoti iwunike za nthendayi chatelo chikalatacho 
 padakalipano judge kenyatta nyirenda yemwe amamva nkhani yokhudza chiletsochi wati azapereka chigamulo chake nkhaniyi lachitatu likudzali

Text:

Text:
akhristu alumikizana pothandiza atumiki bungwe la akhristu eni ake arkidayosizi ya blantyre lati likufuna kulimbikitsa ntchito zotukula arkidayosizi yi kusamalira atumiki amu mpingo wu 
 wapampando wa akhristu arkidayosizi yi joseph kachala ayankhula pomaliza msonkhano omwe nawo loweruka 29 february ku limbe cathedral mzinda wa blantyre 
 ntchito yawo kuwonetsetsa akhristu akudziwa udindo wawo pothandiza mpingo atumiki mpingowu asisitere ansembe abulazala ambiri 
 timakambirana akhristu tikuyenera kuwonetsetsa atumiki mpingowu akusamalidwa moyenera mmoyo wawo wa thupi azititumikira mopanda chowabwezeretsa mmbuyo anatero kachala

Text:
amukwenya ponena   olumala agalu banja lina lapempha woyanganira za maphunziro mmaboma phalombe mulanje thyolo divisional education managerdem athane mphunzitsi wina amene akumuganizira adanena ana olumala pasukulu ya sekondale ya phalombepo agalu 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kalata yomwe tapeza yatumizidwanso kwa wachiwiri kwa woyendetsa maphunziro ana olumala wa sukulu ya phalombe wa bungwe la amene vuto la kumva la malawi national association for the deaf manad wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe olumala la federation of disability organisations in malawi fedoma 
  malinga kalatayi mpunzitsiyo akuti adachita 2 february pamene banjalo lidapita kukaona mwana wawo 
  kalatayo yomwe walemba mwa pabanjapo bettie chumbu yati patsikulo atafika pasukulupo adakumana wophun zirayo adali ophunzira anzake mavuto osiyanasiyana achibadwidwe 
  sukuluyi malinga mphunzitsi wamkulu james kamphonje ili ophunzira azilema zosiyanasiyana achialubino osamva osalankhula onse pamodzi akuti alipo 15 
  chumbu adati akucheza ophunzirawo mpamene mphunzitsiyo adatulukira botolo la mowa lili mmanja nkunena amene adawakwiyitsawo 
  adati mukuchita chiyani agaluwa adatero chumbu akuti adamufunsa mphunzitsiyo zomwe ankatanthauza ponena amenewo akuti adabwereza mawuwo amvekere yes these are dogs inde awa agalu 
  gwen mwamondwe yemwe ankayendetsa galimoto yomwe adakwera chumbu popita kusukuluko hussein chindamba yemwe adatsagana nawo paulendowo adatsimikiza za nkhaniyi ponena adayesetsa kuuza mphunzitsiyo zomwe wayankhula zidali zopanda mutu ayenera kupepesa akuti zidakanika mpaka ana asukulu ndiwo adalowererapo nkumududa pamalopo 
  lachiwiri msangulutso utafuna kumva mbali ya mphunzitsiyo adangoti tilankhulane cha mma 5 koloko ndiyankhepo titamuimbira kangapo sadayankhenso foni 
  kumbali yake kamphonje adati nkhaniyi ili pakati banja lodandaula mphunzitsiyo mbali ziwirizi zikukambirana 
  chomwe ndikudziwa nchakuti banja lodandaulalo likukambirana malikebu zomwe agwirizane timva kwa adatero mphunzitsi wamkuluyu amene adakana kulankhulapo zambiri 
  titamufunsa chumbu akukambirana mphunzitsiyo adati nkhani tidaisiya mmanja mwa akuluakulu ndiye palibe choti tiyambe kukambirana mphunzitsiyu wakhala akundiimbira foni tikambirane 
  mafoni amene akuimba sindikuwayankha mmalo mwake adanditumizira uthenga wapafoni ndikupepesa mundikhululukire ndikukudikirirani ndidzapepese pamaso chonde ndikhululukireni sizidzachitikanso mulungu akudalitseni 
  woyanganira maphunziro mmaboma thyolo mulanje phalombe christopher nauje adati akudikira lipoti kwa banja lolakwiridwa ndidalankhuladi palamya abanja lodandaula pankhaniyi ndidawauza atumize dandaulo lawo kuofesi yathu polemba kalata panopa ndikudikirabe kalatayo ndiye sindingayankhepo kanthu adatero nauje 
  woona za maphunziro olumala muunduna wa zamaphunziro david njaidi adatsimikiza walandira dandaulo kubanja lodandaula wati akhala pansi aone chomwe angachite 
  apa chatsala nchakuti tikambirane tipereke zomwe tapeza zomwe tingachite mphunzitsiyo adatero njaidi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
pezani umuna wa ngombe yokhala ngombe za makolo yapita k1 500 yokha alimi akhoza kupeza umuna wa ngombe za makono 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu zonse zikutheka kusukulu ya zaulimi ya mikolongwe komwe kukupezeka mbewu za ngombe zamkaka za friesian holstein ndiye palinso wa ya ngombe zamkaka za brahman zomwe za wa wa jersey zomwenso za mkaka zimatulutsa wambiri malinga yemwe amayanganira nthambi yosunga umuna wa ngombe kusukuluyo innocent mboma njira yogula umuna yachidule yosamala yotchipa alimi akuyenera njirayi akufuna mitundu ina ya ngombe 
  james molende kukolola umuna kwa ngombe ya wa friesian madera ambiri ugule ngombe ya mphongo mtengo wotsikitsitsa k150 000 ngombe imodzi mtengo woti mlimi sangakwanitse 
  nchifukwa chake tikugulitsa umuna alimi asavutike umuna wa k1 500 wokha angathe kukakweretsa ngombe imodzi kamodzi kokha ngombe yatenga bele adatero mboma adati umunawu ungakweretsedwe kwa ngombe ya ulionse mwana amene akabadweyo akakhala wa wa umuna omwe adagula 
  kaya ngombe yake ya wanji umuna umenewu ukagwirabe ntchito mwana wobadwayo adzatenga ake 
  adati umuna umatengedwa lolemba lachinayi sabata iliyonse alimi angathe kupita kusukuluyo tsiku lililonse umunawo akaupeza 
  pobwera akuyenera kutenga potengera fulasiki umunawo usafe si alimiwa timangowagulitsa timawaphunzitsa momwe angasungire momwe angakweretsere ngombe yawo adatero mboma 
  adati patsiku amakolola umuna wochuluka mamililita 10 kwa ngombe imodzi akaugawa angathe kukweretsa ngombe zazikazi pafupifupi 100

Text:
libya yakhululukira akayidi 400 la libya lamasula akayidi okwana 4 hundred okhala ndende zamdzikolo pofuna kuchepetsa kuthinana apewe kufala kwa kachilombo ka coronavirus mndende za mdzikolo 
 malipoti wailesi ya bbc ati libya lokhalo lachiluya lomwe lawonetsa chidwi pomasula akayidiwa kuwateteza asapatsirane kachilomboka 
 la libya lachita pofunanso kugwirizana maiko omwe achitapo kale kanthu pomasula akayidi mdende za mmaiko saudi arabia brahrain iran syria egypt 
 mwa akayidi omwe atulutsidwawa omwe anapalamula milandu nkhani za ndale ochepa kuyerekeza omwe anapalamula milandu ina mdzikolo 
 magulu omenyera maufulu mdzikolo ayitanidwa akalandire abale omwe anamangidwa omwe gulu la omwe amasulidwawa
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
cwo ilimbikitsa ukhondo msika wa ndirande wolemba thokozani chapola wapampando wa bungwe la amayi chikatolika mdziko muno lucy vokhiwa lachisanu lapitali walimbikitsa amayi achikatolika mdziko muno za ubwino wodzipereka ntchito zosamalira madera 
 vokhiwa ndiwo alankhula msika waukulu wa ndirande mdzinda wa blantyre pamene amayi arch dayosizi yi anatsogolera ntchito yosesa msika wu 
 zomwe tachitazi zomwe tinagwirizana msonkhano wathu waukulu wa amayi achikatolika lonse umwene timati wucwo nkhani yakuti amayi achikatolika titengepo mbali posamalira madera athu amene tikupezeka anatero vokhiwa 
 ati ntchito ya mtunduwu yachitikanso kale mmizinda ya mzuzu lilongwe pomwe amayi mzinda wa mzuzu anakasesa ku chipatala chachikulu cha mzindawo pomwe amayi mzinda wa lilongwe anakasesa msika waukulu wa mzindawo 
 polankhulanso wapampando wa komiti yoyendetsa ntchito za msika wa ndirande chancy widoni anayamikira amayiwa kamba kosamalira malowa 
 tiwathokoze kwambiri amayi mpingo wa katolika amene abwera kuzasamalira msika wathu unali onyasa kwambiri cha ntchito yawo msikawu waoneka kwambiri anatero widon 
 apemphanso mabungwe magulu akufuna kwa athandizire ntchito za ukhondo msikawu omwe ati ovuta kwambiri

Text:
kudali ku presbyterian church of malawi kudali kuphwanya mafupa ku dream centre assemblies of god mumzinda wa blantyre loweruka 2 may pamene faith mussa amamanga ukwati bwenzi lake brenda chitika 
  brenda kanjole ka mmudzi mwa sikoya kwa t chikumbu mboma la mulanje wachinayi kubadwa mbanja la ana asanu 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi faith amene adatchuka kwambiri nyimbo ya desperate akuti ubongo udasokonekera pamene adaona njoleyi lamulungu 2009 pomwe mnyamatayu adapita kumpingo wa brenda wa presbyterian church of malawi pcm mumzinda wa blantyre kukatsitsimuka 
  faith adatsitsimuka zenizeni kusalalanso kwa njoleyi kudaziziritsa mtima tsikulo mulungu adamupatsadi chosowa chake 
  ndili mtchalitchimo foni idaitana ndiye ndidapita panja kukayankha ndili panjapo kulankhula pafonipo ndidaona namwaliyu chapakataliko akutonthoza mwana adatero faith 
  faith mussa kuimbira namwali kanyimbo kachikondi maso adali panamwali khutu lidali pafoni samasunthika pena brenda akuti amathawitsa diso lake asaphane maso mnyamatayu faith samasunthika 
  zidatanthauza kanthu kena mumtima mwa faith nkhani yonse idakambidwa patangotha mwezi 
  titaweruka mchimwene wanga tidaperekeza brenda ndinene apa mwana amatonthozayo sikuti adali 
  poyamba brenda amacheza mbale wanga ndiye pamenepa ndidadziwiratu ndikuyenera kuchitapo kanthu adatero faith 
  pangonopangono awiriwa adakhazikitsa macheza faith sadachedwetse kugwetsera oti adzalumikize awiriwa banja 
  padatha kuli zii za yankho tidakaika 28 august 2009 ndidangolandira foni kundiuza wagwirizana zomwe ndidamuuza adatero faith wachiwiri kubadwa mbanja la anyamata atatu 
  brenda adati faith munthu wochezeka wachikondi woopa mulungu chinsinsi chathu chidali kukonda mulungu nditaona faith munthu wokondanso kupemphera ndidadziwa mwamuna ameneyu adatero brenda    tags kudali ku presbyterian church of malawiudali kuphwanya mafupa ku dream centre assemblies of god mumzinda wa blantyre loweruka 2 may pamene faith mussa amamanga ukwati bwenzi lake brenda chitika
Label: RELIGION

Text:

  apa ndidayamba kuzitolera paja zionetsero ndiye zangoti mbweee zisandikhudze zidzandikhudza mukadzakonza chionetsero chonena mukufuna adona hilida abwerera kuno ku wenela oipa athawa yekha amodzi mwa omwe adandisiyira atate anga ndidatero 
  za adona hilida usachite kukamba iwotu asirikali akuluakulu ku germany amene adazunza ayuda zaka zapitazo nkhondoyo itangotha asirikaliwo adali kuthawa mdzikolo kukagwidwa ku brazil mpaka adatero abiti patuma 
  ukutanthauza akusiyana nelson mandela yemwe adayamba moyo wothathawa kunja asanakhale paulemerero inetu sindikudabwa amabwera zinthu zodabwitsa pajatu ndiwo adationetsa nzotheka otsutsa kubera chisankho adationetsanso kusolola mwakathithi nkotheka wina aomberedwepo ndidatero 
  mmaso mwanga ndimaona wina pompano wenela amene ankakonda kupachika litaka la nsalu paphewa ati mudzi wonse udziwa palibe zitenje zochuluka kuposa wenela 
  abale anzanga laipa ili kunjaku kwaopsa zedi 
  zoona moya pete alemba ntchito munthu wosamudziwa polingalira palibenso amadziwa ntchito kuposa akuluwa phindu lawo ndimalephera kulimvetsa pajatu masiku ano upeze ntchito yapamwamba uyenera kudziwana akuluakulu palibe cha mahala adatero gervazzio wadzuka kutulo

Text:
boma lati litseka sukulu zophwanya malamulo nyengo ya covid-19 unduna wa zamaphunziro wachenjeza eni sukulu zomwe sizaboma zisiye kupitiliza maphunziro patamveka mphekesera zoti sukulu zina zikugwirabe ntchito zawo zophunzitsa ana mozemba mkatikati mwa mliri wa nthenda ya covid-19 
 tilanda ziphaso zawo susuwele banda nduna ya zamaphunziro yomwenso mwa mamembala komiti yapadera yowona za matendawa mdziko muno dr william susuwele banda omwe anena paulendo omwe anayendera chipatala cha ntcheu cholinga chofuna kukaona momwe chipatalachi chikukonzekelera polimbana nthendayi 
 ndunayi yati sukulu zopezeka zikuchita zilandira chilango cholandidwa ziphaso zawo zoyendetsera bizineziyi 
 tamva sukulu zina zikupitilira kuphunzitsa ana mozemba ndiye sitilimbana nawo kwambiri chimene tichite tingowalanda chiphaso chawo sadzatsegulanso sukulu zawozo anatero dr banda 
 polankhulapo nkhani yokonzekera kulimbana nthenda ya covid-19 wa pachipatala cha ntcheu dr isaac mbingwani wati ayika ndondomeko zoyenera athane nthendayi 
 padakalipano boma lati lidakalingalirabe momwe lingathandizire mzika za lino zomwe zili mdziko la south africa omwe akuti akufuna kubwera mdziko muno kamba ka mavuto omwe akukumana nawo mdzikomo
Label: HEALTH

Text:

Text:

Text:

Text:

 ati kudziwa nambala ya anthuwa kuzithandiza boma lidzitha kuwafikira anthuwa moyenera thandizo losiyanasiyana lokhudza miyoyo yawo 
 unduna umenewu ukugwira ntchito zake kwambiri sitipeka mwachitsanzo panopa timapereka mtukula pakhomo pomwe padakali timapereka kwa mabanja 28 800 tufuna tizidziwa tikufikiradi ovutikisitsa mmalawi muno anatero makungwa
