Text:
khama lipindula paulimiphungu zambiri chomwe chimasowa paulimi ndimasomphenya alimi ambiri amangolingalira zoti ndikakolola chaka chino ndidzalimanso chaka cha mawa mmalo moti azilingalira chaka chino ndalima chaka chamawa ndidzakhale pena phungu wa yamalamulo wa ku mpoto kwa boma la mangochi benedicto nsomba ndichitsanzo chabwino pankhaniyi adayamba mlimi ochulukitsa mbeu nkusuntha kufika pogulitsa mbeu kampani yakeyake yopanga mbeu steven pembamoyo adacheza naye motere nsomba mbewu zanga nzovomerezeka boma ndikudziweni olemekezeka 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndine benedicto chambo mwanena kale ndine phungu wa ku nyumba ya malamulo woimira kumpoto kwa boma la mangochi ya malamuloko ndilinso mukomiti ya zaulimi pandekha ndimalima kwambiri 
  mulinso kampani yopanga mbewu kodi mbiri yanu yotani za inetu ambiri sakhulupirira ayi ndidayamba zaulimi mlimi wochulukitsa mbewu pansi gulu la association of smallholder seed multipliers action group mchaka cha 2005 nditachitapo ulimiwu ndidasuntha nkuyamba kugulitsa mbewu nditatsegula chambo agro- dealers ku mangochi komweko ndagulitsa mbewu mpaka kufika pomwe ndimatsegula kampani yanga yopanga mbewu ya pindulani seed company 
  chiyambi chake nchotani mchaka cha 2010 ndidaona kuperewera kwa mbewu za gulu la nyemba pamsika ndiye ndidaganiza zoyamba kupanga mbeuzi ndapangapo mbewu za mgulu la nyemba kwa zaka ziwiri mpaka kufikira mchaka cha 2013 pomwe ndidaonjezera nkuyamba kupanganso mbewu ya chimanga kufikira 
  muli msika wa mbewu zanu kwambiri mbewu zanga zimodzi mwa mbewu zomwe alimi ambiri akukonda zimamera kubereka mwapamwamba kwambiri mwinanso boma lidavomereza mbewu zanga moti zili mupologalamu ya zipangizo zotsika mtengo ya sabuside apa ndikutanthauza mbewu ina yomwe alimi alime musabuside ya mgulu la nyemba chimanga yopangidwa kampani yanga ya pindulani 
  mumapanga mbewu yochuluka pachaka poyamba penipeni ndidayamba matani 10 okha ndimanka ndikukwera pangonopangono mpaka ndidakula ndithu chaka chino ndapanga matani 340 mbewu zosiyanasiyana za mgulu la nyemba ndinso matani 150 chimanga chamakono chopirira ku ngamba chomwe boma akatswiri akulimbikitsa ndili wokondwa mbewu zonsezi zidatengedwa mupologalamu ya sabuside 
  mbewu zanu mumazitenga si njere iliyonse yomwe ili mbewu 
  nzoona si njere iliyonse ungabzale nkumati mbewu ndili alimi anga ochokera kudera langa omwe ndimagwira nawo ntchito ndimawapatsa mbewu achulukitse ndimawagula pamtengo wabwino njira imodzi yowatukulira alimi ambiri panopa kudera kwanga adatukuka moti amangamanga nyumba zamakono za malata kumeneko ntchito imeneyi 
  tinene mudaima pambewu zamitundu iwiriyi basi ayi ndiye mutu wasiya kuganiza lingalirani komwe ndikuchokera kudzafika ndiye ndiimire pakalipano tikuchita kafukufuku wa mbewu za mtedza nyemba zoyenera mthirira zomwe zotsatira zake zikatuluka tikhala tikulimbikitsa alimi azichita ulimi wamthirira wa mbewuzi kupatula apo tikuchitanso katupe wa mbewu zamakono za chinangwa mbatata zamthirira moti ntchito imeneyi yakhala pangono kutha tiyambe kugulitsa mbewu yake 
  eni makampani opanga kugulitsa mbewu amadandaula za akamberembere omwe amakopera mbewu zawo nkumaononga mbiri yawo kaya mudakumanapo nazo zotere zimenezo nzoona akamberembere alipodi chimachititsa kwambiri ogwira ntchito kumakampaniko omwe osakhulupirika ndiwo amatenga mapaketi nkumakagulitsa kwa akamberemberewo aziikamo mbewu yachinyengo komabe pobwerera kufunso lanu zimenezi sitidakumanepo nazo tidapanga njira yoti mapepala umboni aja amati seal oika mkati mwa paketi timapanga tokha ndiye olo atapeza mapaketi athu seal ikhoza kuwasowa 
  alimi ambiri amakakamira pamodzimodzi zaka nkumapita mungawauzenji nkhani masomphenya basi kumaona patali kodi ineyo lero ndili nanga mawa ndidzakhale pati mlimi akakhala maganizo otere zinthu zimayenda amayesetsa maloto ake aja akwaniritsidwe asafere mmalere china pamafunika kulimba mtima pochita zinthu ukakhala mantha ndiye sizingakuyendere mpangono pomwe 
  kupatula kuyendetsa kampani ya mbewu pali china chokhudza ulimi chomwe mumapanga ndili sikimu zingapo ku mangochi komwe ndimachitirako ulimi wamthirira wa mbewu zosiyanasiyana ndidalemba alimi oposa 1 500 nkuwagawira malo musikimumo azilima akakolola ndimawagula mbewuzo pamtengo wabwino zina zimakhala zawo zakudya pakhomo mwezi wa october alimi adakolola nyemba zambiri ndidawagula zonse pamtengo wa k600 pakilogalamu moti ambiri ndalama savutika nyengo yachisangalaloyi
Label: FARMING

Text:
abambo aku mthawira alandira maphunziro banki mkhonde kwa yoyamba chikhazikitsireni bungwe la umodzi wa abambo lomwe la catholic men organisation ku mthawira parish arkidayosizi ya blantyre mchaka cha 2013 loweruka 30th november 2019 linakonza maphunziro akayendetsedwe kusungisa kubwereketsa ndalama kuzera ku ma banki am`mudzi 
 maphunziro amenewa anachitikira ku tchalitchi la maria mfumukazi ya mtendere kwa chikapa yomwe mthambi ya parishi ya mthawira 
 maphunzirowa anasamira zolinga zikuluzikulu kufuna kupereka ukadaulo wa kayendetsedwe kabwino ka dongosolo losungitsa kubwereketsa ndalama kudzera ku banki nkhonde kukhazikitsa njira zabwino zopewera mavuto amene magulu oterewa akhala akukumana nawo kulandana katundu wina walephera kubweza ndalama yomwe anabwereka 
 mwa abambo aku nthawira parish pambuyo maphunziro banki mkhonde mau ake wapampando wa bungweli ku parish ya mthawira martin chiwaya cholinga chachikulu cha bungweli kulimbikisa umoyo wa uzimu wa abambo mpingo wakalolika ndikofunikanso kuwunikilanso moyo wawo wa thupi makamaka kumbali ya chuma pozindikira munthu thupi mzimu pamodzi 
 abambo akuyenela kukulanso moyo wawo wakuthupi makamaka chuma amene amayenela kutsogolera mawanja pachuma anatero chiwaya 
 maphuzirowa omwe tsiku limodzi anakwanisa kubweretsa pamodzi abambo ambiri mparishiyi 
 maphuzirowa ofunika kwa abambo posayanganira njira yomwe apeze ndalama kugwira ntchito bizinezi anawonjedzera motero chiwaya 
 pothilirapo ndemanga wachiwiri wa pampando wa tchalitchi la chikapa lovewell vikho maphuzirowa ofunika kwambiri athandiza abambowa akwanitse udindo wawo wosamalira mabanja makamaka pachuma 
 ndizofunika kwambiri abambo azikhalira pamodzi ndikumakhalira limodzi kukambilana zabwino zoyendetsera kuzipezera chuma anatero vikho 
 mwa zina maphunziro oterewa akhalenso akuchitika ku parish zina zopezeka arkdayosizi ya blantyre cholinga chofikira abambo ochuluka opezeka arkidayosiziyi
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
dpp ikutolera   nambala zovotera ziyangoyango chisankho achipani cha dpp akuti akutolera nambala za ziphaso za unzika zovotera kwa amene adalembetsa   zikuchitika ku phalombe mulanje balaka ntcheu kasungu mchinji rumphi 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu akulemba nambala za ziphaso mlembi wa dpp greselder jeffery mneneri nicholas dausi adakana kuikapo mlomo nkhaniyi mdindo wina mchipanicho wauza tamvani lachitatu iyi njira yomwe akhazikitsa apeza mavoti ambiri pachisankho chikudzachi 
  lolemba enelesi nyandula wa mmudzi mwa bamba mdera la mfumu phambala ku ntcheu adauza mtolankhaniyu achipani cha dpp adabwera mmudzi mwawo kudzatolera nambalazo 
  akufuna nambala za ziphaso zathu kodi tiwapatse adafunsira nzeru nyandula akuti nzokhudzana zisankho zikudzazi apereka kale nambala zawo 
  adati mantha mwina sadzapeza mwayi wodzavota poganizira mwina voti yake yaponyedwa kale   gavanala wa dpp mchigawo cha kummwera mbomalo jeremiah lilani adavomera akutolera nambalazo popeza wauzidwa akulikulu kwa chipani chawo 
  lilani adati dpp ikutolera nambala za omwe akonzekera kudzavotera chipanicho may 21   tidziwe amene adzativotere tikatolera nambalazo tikumawaika mmaeliya momwe akuyenera adatero   titamufunsa adzadziwa munthuyo wavotera chipanicho gavanalayo adati chikhulupiriro choti anthuwo sadzawaputsitsa podzavota 
  kungotolera nambala kokhako azidziwiratu chipani chovotera cha dpp tikukhulupirira sadzatipusitsa adatero lilani 
  bungwe loyendetsa chisankho la malawi electoral commission mec ladzudzula mchitidwewu   mwa akuluakulu mec jean mathanga lachitatu adati ofesi yake yamva zoti akutolera manambala za palibe amene wadandaula ku bungwelo 
  adati kutenga nambala ya chiphaso cha munthu wina mlandu malingana gawo 24 ndime 3 4 5 ya malamulo oyendetsera zisankho lino wopezeka wolakwa ayenera kukaseweza zaka 7 mndende 
  palibe mlandu kungotenga nambala ya chiphaso komabe funso loti kodi akufuna akatani nazo ukuku kungosokoneza mitu odzavota tikuyenera kuchitapo kanthu msanga adatero mathanga 
  adati amene nambala yake yatengedwa chiphaso chake chidataika kupsa asadandaule adzavotabe 
  uthenga umveke nonse amene ziphaso zanu adakutengerani zidasowa nambala yanu atenga muli mwayi wodzavota patsikulo dzapiteni mukavote adatero 
  mathanga adati amene watenga chiphaso nambala ya mnzake sangathe kuigwiritsa ntchito povota   vutoli lafalikira paliponse sibongile machinjiri wa mmudzi mwa lunguzi mdera la mfumu lundu ku blantyre adati adauzidwa apereke nambala yake ya unzika sadamufotokozere chake 
  adatenga nambala ya chitupa changa poyambapo amati atipatsa chakudya mpaka lero palibe chomwe chachitika adatero machinjiri 
  enock mangola wa zaka 70 wa mmudzi mwa mishoni mdera la mfumu mabuka ku mulanje adati nambala za zatengedwa kale mderalo 
  sitikudziwa chomwe akufuna apange nazo zayamba kutiopsa adatero mangola 
  wa zophunzitsa mbungwe la nice mchigawo cha kummwera enoch chinkhuntha adati bungwe lawo lamva za nkhaniyo akufufuza 
  tikudziwa akuchita pongofuna kuzunguza ovota 
  akufuna aziona wina akatenga nambala yawo ndiye adzadziwa momwe wavotera ayi voti ya chinsinsi adatero chinkhuntha 
  adati mwa amene akhala akutolera nambalazo mafumu uwu mlandu sitikugona tikufufuza adanenetsa 
  malinga moir walita mkandawire yemwe amatsogolera bungwe loima palokha ku rumphi zikuchitika ku mlowe chiweta zunga old salawe 
  adati nkhaniyo itamveka adakadziwitsa bungwe la nice mpaka lero palibe chachitika   wa nice mboma la rumphi mollen zgambo adati akufufuza umboni ayitengere pena nkhaniyi   gulupu zinkambani ya ku nkhamenya mboma la kasungu idati mchitidwewu adayamba kalekale mderalo 
  adati mafumu adakumana nkukambirana za mchitidwewu adagwirizana zothana wina wopezeka akutolera nambala za   mariko zinenani wa mdera la mfumu kalumo ku ntchisi adati zikuchitika sakudziwa chipani omwe akuchita 
  anthuwo amati tipereke nambalazo ponena akufuna atilembe tilandire zipangizo zotsika mtengo mpaka lero sitidaone yankho lake adatero zinenani   bungwe la mec lidalemba 6.8 miliyoni ndiwo akaponye voti
Label: POLITICS

Text:
apereka ambulansi ku bangwe katika yatha miyezi iwiri kwa kanthawi makamaka amayi oyembekezera akhala akuvutika mayendedwe popita ku chipatala cha bangwe clinic mumzinda wa blantyre omwe amavutikawa omwe akukhala ku mpingwe mvula kumaloko sikufika ma minibasi kaamba koipa kwa msewu 
  mavutowa tsono angakhale mbiri yakale pomwe anthuwa alandira minibasi ambulance yomwe idziyenda kumeneko zinthuzi zaperekedwa yemwe amakonza masewero nkhonya amiyendo justice katika

Text:
msika wa osewera watentha pamene matimu kopumira kukonzekera ndime yachiwiri ya 2015 tnm super league msika wa osewera wafika potentha pamene matimu kalikiriki kugula kugulitsa osewera ncholinga chofuna mligiyi ikayamba mndime yachiwiri 
  tiyamba timu yomwe ikuteteza ligiyi yomwenso ikutsogola mapointi 32 iyi big bullets yomwe padakalipano ikukambirana timu ya mzuni fc itenge mnyamata womwetsa zigoli wa ku burundi aimable niyikiza amene tikukamba kukampu ya bullets 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc timuyi ikufunanso itenge mnyamata wosewera pakati kutimu ya azam yamikani chester timu yakeyi ikukaniza wosewerayu sali pamalonda 
  bullets yatenganso chisomo mpachika wosewera kumbuyo mtimu ya dedza young soccer timu yake ikukaniza kumugulitsa ponena bullets ikumufuna ndiye iwapatse sankhani mkandawire yamikani fodya 
  tipite ku silver strikers yomwe yakanika kutenga goloboyi wa mighty be forward wanderers richard chipuwa mmalo mwake yatenga bester phiri yemwenso amagwirira pagolo ku wanderers 
  padakalipano wanderers yatchaja silver ipereke k2 miliyoni pokana silver itenge wosewerayu pangongole 
  silver yatenga kale john banda yemwe adali pangongole ku young soccer ku evirom pamtengo wa k500 000 timuyi ikufunanso kutenga mnyamata wosewera kumanzere chakumbuyo kwa epac dalitso mwase pamtengo wa k2 miliyoni 
  nayo wanderers ikufuna kutenga boston kabango ku epac pamtengo wa k3 miliyoni silver fisd wizards nawonso maso mnyamata yemweyu 
  wanderers bullets akulimbirananso chester yemwe azam ikukanitsitsa kugulitsa wanderers yaonetsanso chidwi kufuna kutenga kelvin hara dave mwalughali george hawadi hastings banda george kasambara kutimu ya chilumba barracks timuyi ikukana sakuwagulitsa osewera 
  timuyi ikufunanso itenge john lanjesi wa civo pamtengo wa k4.5 miliyoni 
  azam tigers yatenga kale abraham kamwendo ku blantyre united yatoleranso osewera achisodzera pamene moyale yatenga komani msiska yemwe akutsogola zigoli ku chilumba 
  red lions yagula wosewera wapakati wa zomba united stanley dube 
  mphunzitsi wa timuyi collins nkuna akuti wakhala akuyendayenda mmidzimu wapeza osewera ambiri mboma la salima 
  civo united sikumveka ikusaka osewera mitunda iti timuyi yaitanitsa josophat kwalira ku dedza young soccer 
  wizards yatola godfrey masonda fisd ikufunanso kugula precious msosa ku wanderers 
  msikawu utsekedwa 18 september usiku ligiyi isanayambirenso 19 september
Label: SPORTS

Text:
asemphana maganizo zoletsa masacheti pali kusemphana maganizo kulengeza kwa boma laletsa mowa wa mmasacheti amalawi akhala akuthudzulira 
  pamene mafumu akugwirizana ganizoli akuti palakwika boma libweze moto 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc msonkhano wa nduna 16 february udavomereza zoletsa mowawu 
  kuletsaku kumatsatira chigamulo cha bwalo la milandu lomwe lidati nthambi yoona katundu wopangidwa mdziko muno akukhala wa pamwamba la malawi bureau of standards siyilidalakwe kuletsa makampani wotcheza mowawo kuleka kutero 
  nkhaniyi yabwerera kukhoti pamene makampani amene amafulula mowawu atengera nkhaniyi kubwalo lalikulu kusaka chigamulo china 
  kulengeza kwa bomaku kudadzetsa mpungwepungweena akudana lingaliroli pomwe akugwirizana nalo 
  mwachitsanzo msabatayi amene wakhala akumenya nkhondo yoletsa mowawu jefferson milanzi wa bungwe la young achievers for development yad adafuna kupandidwa anyamata ku zingwangwa mumzinda wa blantyre polimbikira mowawu uletsedweretu 
  adalipo pafupifupi 15 omwe amati ndinene chimene mowawu wandilakwira adati athana nane cholimbikitsa nkhondo yoletsa mowawu adatero milanzi amene akuti adathamangira kupolisi ya soche mumzindawu kukadandaula 
  nawonso mafumu adauza tamvani msabatayi palakwika kuletsa mowawu achinyamata amapezerapo phindu pogulitsa mowawu 
  senior chief nthache mboma la mwanza akuti achinyamata ambiri mmidzimu akhala akupha makwacha ochuluka pogulitsa mowa wa mmasachetiwu 
  zoletsa mowa wa mmasachetizi ndiye ziwonjezera umphawi wathu wakalewu ndiye achinyamata azitani ngatitu kuli bizinesi yomwe imawapatsa ndalama zochuluka achinyamata kumudzi kuno ndiye mowawu adatero nthache pouza tamvani 
  nthache adati si mowa wokha wa mmasacheti umasokoneza achinyamata kotero sakuona choletsera 
  kuli mowa wa kachasu womwenso mowa woipa kwambiri kuli mtonjani amasuta chamba ndiye si masacheti okha amene vuto boma liganizepo pamenepa adatero nthache amene adati samwa mowawu 
  t mwakaboko wa mboma la karonga nayenso adagwirizana nthache pamene adati kumeneko akukatamuka bizinesi ya mowa wa mmasacheti 
  mwakaboko akugwirizana ganizo logulitsira mowawu mmabotolo kulekana kuletseratu kutcheza mowa wotere akuti zikhudza bizinesi ya ambiri kumudzi 
  t kabunduli wa ku nkhata bay akugwirizana ganizo la boma loletsa masacheti ponena achinyama ambiri asokonekera chakumwa chaukalichi 
  achita ambiri akufa kusokonekera cha masacheti aiwalatu kuletsanso mabotolo pulasitiki amenewonso aletse mowawu usaonekenso adatero kabunduli 
  pali chiopsezo chachikulu makampani ambiri amene amapanga mowawu angathe kutseka cha phindu lochuluka lomwe amapeza akagulitsa mowawu 
  pamene makampaniwa akutseka bomanso litaya ndalama zankhaninkhani zomwe limapeza makampaniwa akakhoma msonkho 
  mneneri wa boma kondwani nankhumwa adauza atolankhani sabata yatha maso boma posamala miyoyo yambiri yomwe ikusokonekera mowawu osati phindu lomwe boma likupeza 
  mneneri unduna wa zaumoyo henry chimbali adati nkhaniyi ikukhudzanso unduna wawo mowawu umakhala mavuto amene umabweretsa munthu wamwa 
  chimbali akuti mowawu umachititsa chiwindi chilephere kugwira ntchito yake umayambitsa matenda shuga diabetes 
  si mavuto okhawa mowawu umayambitsa mitundumitundu ya matenda khansa okhudza ubongo adatero chimbali amene adati mdziko muno 8 100 aliwonse osaposa zaka 25 amamwa mowawu 
  mabungwe akhala akunena ndibwino boma lipeze ndondomeko zothana kumwa mowa moposera muyezo 
  2012 la zambia lidaletseratu mowawu lidalanda zitupa za makampani amene amafulula mowawu kubweretsa mowawu mdziko lawo yemwe adali nduna ya zamaboma angono nthawiyo nkandu luo adati boma lidabwera ganizolo cha zotsatira zoipa zomwe mowawu udabweretsa mdzikomo 
  ndunayo idati ganizolo lidadzanso boma litafunsa mbali zonse za dzikolo mowawu mdzikolo umatchedwa tujilijili pamene mdziko muno timangoti masacheti ndunayo idati munthu amene apezeke akugulitsa kufulula mowawu adzaseweza kundende kwa zaka ziwiri
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
bande athokoza dera lake pomuvotera wolemba sylvester kasitomu phungu wa dera la ku mvuma kwa mdzinda wa blantyre john bande wayamikira mdera li kamba komukhulupilira kumusankhanso mpando wa phungu wa ku nyumba ya malamulo chisankho cha 21 may iyeyo ya misonkhano yokopa wanthu mdziko la south africa kukalandira thandizo la makhwala 
 bande alankhula ku tchalitchi la chikapa la mparish ya nthawira arch dayosizi ya blantyre pomwe tchalitchili limakondwelera nkhoswe yake yomwe maria mfumukazi ya mtendere 
 ati amderali anawonetsa kuwakhulupilira powasankha ayimire derali phungu wakunyumba ya malamulo akudwala kotero adzipereka ntchito zotukula delaro 
 pamene timachita campaign ndinali ndiri ku chipatala mdziko la south africa ndithokoze mulungu kaamba koti ndikupeza tsopano ndiponso anandikhulupirira panalibepo ndipemphe akhristu anzanga tigwirane manja popempherera mtendere mdziko muno maka nkhani za ndale zomwe sizikuyenda anatero bande 
 bande omwe oyima paokha chisankhochi anapeza mavoti pafupifupi 26 thousand pomwe amene amapikitsa naye kwambiri alex chimwala chipani cha dpp anapeza mavoti osachepera 6,000 zomwe zikusonyeza anawakhulupilira kwambiri atha kuwathandiza ntchito zotukula dera la ku mvuma kwa mzinda wa blantyre
Label: POLITICS

Text: ndimamupitirira wawa gogo ndili zaka 17 ndi[po pali mnyamata wina wa zaka 20 yemwe akundifuna ndimamukonda vuto lakuti iyeyo wamfupi kuposa ndimachita manyazi ndikamayenda naye ndimulole c zikomo c sindikuonapo vuto loti musamulolele kutalika kukhale nkhani chikondi chimachoka mumtima sichiyenera kuona wina wamtali wamfupi woonda wonenepa woona wosaona zina zotero chabwino nchiyani mudzapeze mnyamata wamtali kukuposani alibe chikondi mwamuna ameneyu yemwe amakukondani nanunso kumukonda muloleni ameneyo basi

Text:
ofesi ya zaumoyo ku blantyre yati ilimbikitsa chitetezo cha antchito ake ofesi yowona zaumoyo mzinda wa blantyre yati yokonzeka kulimbana kachilombo ka coronavirus popereka zipangizo zokwanira zozitetezera ku matendawa kwa omwe akugwira nchito zachipatala mzindamo 
 kawalazira tiyenera kuteteza miyoyo ya ogwira ntchito zachipatala malingana wa zaumoyo mzinda wu dr gift kawalazira ofesiyi yakhazikitsa njira zabwino pofuna kuteteza ogwira ntchito zachipatala omwe akuthandiza omwe akhuzidwa nthenda ya covid-19 
 ati chipatala cha queen elizabeth komwe azachipatala azithandizidwa akhudzidwa nthendayi pomwe onse azikasamalidwa ku chipatala cha kameza mzinda omwewo wa blantyre 
 choyamba tiyenera kuteteza miyoyo ya ogwira ntchito zachipatala mzinda wa blantyre atumikire moyenera choncho chipatala cha queen elizabeth central chomwe chizithandiza anthuwa onse okhala mzindawu azithandizidwa kwa kameza komwe kuli sukulu ya anamwino ya kamuzu college of nursing anatero kawalazira 
 pamenepa dr kawalazira chiwerengero cha odwala matendawa chikamachuluka akafikira msukulu zosiyana siyana cholinga chopeza malo okwanira osamalira odwalawa
Label: HEALTH

Text:
wla yalowelerapo nkhani za nkhanza bungwe la women lawyers association mogwirizana bungwe la chanco gender justice clinic lolemba layamba ntchito yodziwitsa mzinda wa zomba malamulo okhudza nkhani za nkhanza za mbanja 
 poyankhula zochitikazo mwa akuluakulu bungwe la women lawyers association professor ngeyi kanyongolo wati cholinga cha zochitakazi kuthandiza amene nkhawa nkhani za malamulo okhudza nkhanza za mbanja 
 professor kanyongolo yemwenso mphunzitsi wa za malamulo ku chancellor college wati ino pomwe la malawi likukamba nkhani ya masiku 16 othetsa nkhanza za pakati amayi abambo magulu awiriwa abwera pamodzi pofuna athandidze amvetse momwe nkhani za malamulo zimayendera 
 tili street law clinic yomwe cholinga chake kuthandiza amene akukumana nkhanza kuwadziwitsa malamulo nkhani zimenezi amati anatero kanyongolo 
 polankhulanso president wa chancellor college gender justice clinic ku nthambi ya za malamulo kilayibi chinsinsi kasinja wati akufunitsitsa kupereka uphungu wa zamalulo kwa pofuna kuthetsa nkhanza zomwe amayi amakumana nazo 
 tikumbukire nawo masiku amenewa pofunika kuchitapo kanthu pothetsa nkhanza ma lawyer timadziwa za malamulo wamba samadziwa zimenezi anatero kasinja
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
kapito adzudzula kukweza mitengo patangotha sabata bungwe la malawi energy regulatory authority mera litakweza mitengo ya magetsi mafuta agalimoto madera maka kumidzi zinthu akuti zayamba kale kukwera mtengo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mmaderawa ku chikhwawa mitengo yogayitsira maulendo galimoto akuti yakwera kwambiri 
  kukwera mitengo kwa zinthuku kukutsutsana zomwe bungwe la mera lomwe limayanganira za magetsi mafuta lidanena kukwera kwa mafuta magetsi sikuchititsa zinthu zikwere mtengo 
  bungweli lidakweza mitengo yogulira mafuta magetsi lachinayi sabata yathayi bungweli lidati kuyambira lachisanu 9 novembala petulo azigulitsidwa k606.30 kuchoka k539.00 lita dizilo adati azigulitsidwa k509.90 kuchoka k434.30 lita

  apa ati boma litsitse mtengo wa mafuta magetsi lipeze njira zoti katundu yemwe wayamba kale kukwera mtengo atsike 
  anthuwa omwe abizinesi ati akuchita bizinesi komabe malinga kukwera mtengo kwa zinthu kovuta azipeza phindu zomwe akuchita 
  macleod banda wa mmudzi mwa maide kwa t maseya mboma la chikhwawa mlimi wa mpendadzuwa akuti kumeneko zigayo maulendo zakwera 
  thini la malita 15 timagayitsa k120 lili k150 zigayo zoyendera magetsi tikafuna kulowa mtawuni kuno timakwera lole timalipira k900 mafuta atangokweramu akweza kufika k1 200 k1 300 
  kuno amalima mpunga amapita nawo ku limbe thumba la makilogalamu 50 amatilipitsa k300 tikulipira k500 adatero banda yemwe adatinso boma lichitepo kanthu 
  abdul sapala yemwe amameta ku mbayani mumzinda wa blantyre wati pamwezi amapeza k11 000 
  nyumba yomwe akumeteramo akuti amalipira k5 000 nyumba yomwe amakhalanso amalipira k6 000 
  apa ndiye ndalama yanga yatha ndikuyenera kusamala banja enanso kumudzi akuyangana pobwera kuntchito ndimalipira k150 ndalama yomwe ndimapeza siikuphula kanthu adatero sapala yemwe amatchajanso mafoni molipitsa 
  chipinda chometerachi akuti akukweza mtengo cha magetsi nyumbanso akweza minibasi akweza zomwe zikuvuta tsono titani ndalama yomwe ndimagwiritsira ntchito ndiyomwe ndimapeza ndikatchaja mafoni yomwe siimakwananso k5000 pamwezi adawonjezera sapala 
  adati atakweza mtengo wometera kuchoka k100 sangabwerenso wati boma lichitepo kanthu 
  amadu kawonga yemwe amagulitsa makala kwa chemusa mumzindawu wati kukwera mtengo kwa magetsi mafuta agalimoto kukutanthauza mavuto kwa 
  kajumbo kakangono ka makala timagulitsa k40 ndikakweza mtengo sangamagule phindu sindikulipeza komwe timakapikula makalawa nakonso akweza mtengo 
  ndalama zomwe ndikupeza pamwezi siimakwana k10 000 ndikuyenera ndisamale banja kumudzinso akudikira pamwezi ndilipire nyumba madzi magetsi omwe akweranso mtengo boma lidakatsitsako mtengo wa magetsi mafuta agalimoto zinthu zikhale zotchipa kwa adatero mkuluyu 
  wa bungwe loona ufulu wa ogula la consumers association of malawi cama john kapito wati zomvetsa chisoni zinthu zikumka ziyipirayipirabe 
  wati zikuchitika boma lataya ake pomwe akumva ululu kaamba ka kukwera mtengo kwa zinthu 
  kapito watinso akuyenera adziwe ufulu wawo atha ziwonetsero zosonyeza kukhumudwa kusayenda kwa zinthu 
  tikhala tikufotokozera atha ziwonetsero zokhumudwa kukwera mtengo kwa zinthu adatero kapito 
  nduna yofalitsa nkhani moses kunkuyu wati nzoona zinthu mmadera zaipa asade nkhawa chuma chikangoyamba kuyenda mavuto onse atha 
  miyezi 18 yomwe tidanena pali chiyembekezo zinthu ziyamba kuyenda adatero kunkuyu yemwenso mneneri wa boma
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
aonjezera masiku katemera wa oyanganira zaumoyo unduna wa zaumoyo dr charles mwansambo wati ntchito yopereka katemera wa chikuku wa rubella idayenda padali mavuto amene adachititsa aonjezera masiku opereka katemerayo 
  kuyambira 12 mpaka 16 june boma lidapereka katemerayu padali mavuto ntchitoyo idayenda 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka ntchito iliyonse imakhala zokolakola moti padali mavuto amene adachititsa ana asabaidwe zidachititsa tionjezere ndalama ya katemerayu adatero mwansambo 
  adaonjeza katemerayo wofunika kwambiri 
  wa bungwe la zaumoyo la malawi health equity network mhen george jobe adati ndiwokhutira momwe ntchitoyo idayendera 
  adati ntchito idayenda kwambiri moti tiyamike magulu onse omwe adatengapo mbali adagwira ntchito yotamandika ameneyu katemera ofunika kwambiri 
  malingana mneneri wa unduna wa zaumoyo adrian chikumbe sitalaka ya aphunzitsi imene idaliko sabata yatha idapereka mpata kwa ana omwe amangokhala apite kukalandira katemerayu mwaunyinji 
  zidachitika kutulo chikonzero chathu chidali chopereka katemera kwa ana pafupifupi 8 miliyoni pofika lachitatu sabata ya katemerayo ana 80 100 aliwonse adali atabayitsa adatero chikumbe 
  potengera chiwerengero chomwe adapereka chikumbe zikutanthauza mmasiku atatu okha katemerayu ana 6.4 miliyoni mwa ana 8 miliyoniwo adali atalandira kale katemerayo ana 1.8 miliyoni ndiwo amayenera kulandira katemera mmasiku awiri otsalira 
  chikuku rubella nthenda yomwe imagwira yopumira imatulutsa zidzolo mthupi lonse zizindikiro za chimfine kutentha thupi kuchucha mamina kutsokomola imafala popatsirana kudzera mumpweya 
  malingana tsamba la zaumoyo la internet chikuku rubella chimayamba kachilombo ka wa virus komwe nkovuta kuthana nako kwake kotero mwana akadwala amayenera kupatsidwa mpata wokwanira wopuma asamasewere anzake 
  tsambali likusonyezanso ana 90 mwa 100 omwe sadalandire katemera amakhala pachiopsezo chotenga matendawa zimachititsa unduna wa zaumoyo kukhazikitsa nyengo ya katemerayu
Label: HEALTH

Text:
malawi adalimba nazo chaka chatha ululu kulavulagaga kupala moto kudalipo mchaka chomwe changothachi momwe akadaulo mnthambi zosiyanasiyana akunenera padalibe popumira kubanika kokhakokha 
  malinga akadaulo zamaufulu zaumoyo oyimira ogula kugwiritsa ntchito zinthu zosiyanasiyana amalawi adawawulidwa makamaka mmene ogulitsa zinthu amakwezera mitengo mmene ntchito zina zaumoyo ufulu wa magetsi madzi zidayendera mchaka changothachi 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka madzi moyo mnyamatayu sakadachitira mwina kupeza njira yomwera madzi ku nkhotakota za umoyo chaka cha 2015 chaka choyamba chomwe tidaona odwala mchipatala akudya kamodzi patsiku osatengera kuchuluka kwa makhwala omwe akulandira pavuto lawo 
  chaka chomwechi ndicho kudali chionetsero cha anamwino azamba nkhani yoti boma silikuwalemba ntchito adachita kumaliza maphunziro ntchitoyi panyengo yomwenso ogwira ntchito zachipatala operewera 
  malingana wa anamwino azamba dorothy ngoma cholinga cha chionetserochi chidali kupempha boma lilembe ntchito achipatala omwe adamaliza maphunziro libweze ganizo loti odwala azidya kamodzi patsiku 
  adatinso nkhani ina yodandaulitsa idali kusowa kwa mankhwala mzipatala zomwe zidachititsa osauka asakhale mwayi wolandira thandizo loyenera akadwala 
  chomwe nchakuti anamwino azamba onse omwe sadalembedwe ntchito alembedwe chilinganizo choti odwala azilandira chakudya kamodzi mzipatala chibwezedwe munthu wodwala chakudya chokwanira mankhwala agwire ntchito mthupi adatero ngoma 
  wa bungwe loyanganira za ufulu wa nkhani za umoyo charles nyirenda adati kafukufuku yemwe bungweli lidachita mzipatala zingapo mdziko muno adaonetsa mankhwala mzipatalazi mudalibe zaumoyo peter kumpalume adati mankhwala adasowa mzipatala kaamba ka oipa mtima omwe amaba mankhwala nkumakagulitsa posaganizira miyoyo ya 
  ndunayi idalonjeza akuti ithana onse omwe akukhudzidwa zachinyengo cha uliwonse muundunawu 
  za maufulu nkhani ina yomwe idakhoma misomali yowawa pamitu amalawi ya maufulu omwe akatswiri akuti sadalemekezedwe momwe zimayenera kukhalira 
  malingana mwa akuluakulu oyanganira za maufulu billy mayaya maufulu ambiri adaphwanyidwa ufulu wa maalubino omwe akuti amaphedwa kuchitidwa nkhanza za dzaoneni 
  adatinso ufulu wina wolandira nthandizo la mankhwala akadwala chakudya 
  mayaya adatinso mchakachi boma lidaonetsa kusalabadira maganizo zofuna za makamaka mmene lidagulitsira banki ya boma ya malawi savings magulu osiyanasiyana atayesetsa kuletsa 
  mkuluyu adatinso ufulu wa atolankhani udaponderedzedwa kwambiri mchakachi boma lidalonjeza lidzapititsa patsogolo ufulu wa atolankhani azidzatha kufufuza kuulutsa nkhani popanda kusokonezedwa 
  mwachitsanzo wayilesi ya zodiak idaletsedwa kulowa ya boma kuli zochitika pomwe wailesi nyuzipepala zina zidaloledwa kumeneku nkuwaphwanyira ufulu wotola kuulutsa nkhani adatero mayaya 
  nduna yofalitsa nkhani za boma jappie mhango adati mpofunika kumpatsa yoti alingalire zonsezi asadayankhepo kalikonse poyankha atsekeretu maenje onse 
  magetsi madzi oti madzi moyo adasanduka nthano mchaka chimenechi polingalira mavuto omwe adalipo mpaka kufika pomamwa madzi mzitsime zithaphwi mipopi imakhala youma zambiri 
  malinga akuluakulu makampani opopa kugawa madzi osiyanasiyana vutoli lidakula kaamba ka vuto la magetsi omwenso adamvetsa kuwawa amalawi 
  madzi timachita kupopa mphamvu ya magetsi ndiye magetsi kulibe simungayembekezere tipopa madzi okwanira nchifukwa mumaona madzi pena atuluka pena asiya adatero mwa akuluakulu makampaniwa alfonso chikuni wa lilongwe water board 
  wa bungwe loyanganira za ogula kugwiritsa ntchito zinthu zosiyanasiyana john kapito adati kulanda madzi magetsi chilango chowawa kwambiri potengera ndalama zomwe anthuwa amapereka kumakampaniwa 
  chodabwitsa nchakuti mabilu madzi magetsi mmene alili kukwera chonsecho zambiri kumakhala kulibe amangokhalira mumdima kumwa madzi osalongosoka adatero kapito 
  ambiri makamaka mabizinesi adandandaula kuthimathima kwa magetsiwa kudasokoneza bizinesi moti adataya katundu wambirimbiri yemwe adaonongeka panyengo yomwe kudalibe magetsi 
  za makhalidwe kapito adati moyo mchakachi udawawa zedi potengera momwe mitengo ya zinthu imakwerera pomwe mapezedwe ndalama adali ovuta kwambiri 
  adati kusakolola kwa chaka chatha kuvuta kwa malonda fodya mabala cashgate zina mwa zomwe zidachititsa mmatumba mwa muume sizidamange buleki ya kakwenzedwe ka mitengo ya katundu 
  kunena zoona amalawi adamva ululu mchaka chimenechi ndalama zimasowa si momwe zinthu zimakwerera mtengo kayendetsedwe ka chuma nako kadali kodwalitsa mutu zimangokhala palibe woyendetsa adatero kapito 
  adati chodandaulitsa kwambiri nchakuti mayankho omwe ankaperekedwa pamavuto onsewa sadali ogwira mtima mmalo mwake zimakhala kunyogodola omva kale kuwawa 
  chiyembekezo 2016 akuluakuluwa adati amalawi akufunika zakupsa mchaka chomwe tayambachi cha 2016 momwe zinthu zimayendetsedwera chaka chatha kupatula ndale kayendetsedwe ka boma 
  kapito adati chiyembekezo chaka chino boma lichita chotheka kafukufuku wokwanira kuweruza milandu ya cashgate maiko omwe adanyanyala kuthandiza lino abwererenso 
  mayaya naye adati boma likhwimitse ndondomeko zotetezera maufulu makamaka maalubino ana amayi omwe zambiri amakhala kunsonga ya nkhanza zosiyanasiyana
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
ati boma lisabweze ndalama ku fdh otsata mmene zinthu zikuyendera mdziko muno aopseza akonza zionetsero boma limvere zonena za banki ya fdh libwezeko k1.1 biliyoni mwa ndalama k9.5 biliyoni zomwe adagulitsira banki ya malawi savings bank msb 
  sabata yatha zidadziwika banki ya fdh yalembera boma libweze ndalamazi ponena padali zingapo zomwe sadaunikire panthawi yogulitsanayo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka boma lakana kale silibweza ndalamazo zomwenso zasangalatsa othirira ndemanga ndalamazi zisaperekedwe 
  wa bungwe lomenyera ufulu wa ogula la consumers association of malawi cama john kapito wati boma lichite zomwe likulankhula 
  zimatere lero akutiuza sabweza ndalamazo pamene kuseri apanga kale tazionapo zotere zikuchitika pogulitsa bankiyi timati sagulitsa atatitsimikizira satero mapeto ake tidamva agulitsa 
  lero boma litha kutilimbitsa mtima sabweza ndalamazo mawa mumva abweza kale tikupempha chonde boma lisatero adatero kapito 
  adati boma liganizire zinthu sizili mdziko muno kumbali ya chuma kulakwa ndalama zipite mnjira zotere 
  panopa tili pantchito yopeza ma triliyoni bajeti ya lino ndiye tingapereke ndalamazi akhala pamavuto iyi misonkho yathu adaonjeza kapito 
  july 2015 boma lidagulitsa msb amalawi ambiri adachenjeza lisagulitse bankiyi mathero ake boma lidagulitsabe bankiyi pamtengo wa k9.5 biliyoni 
  winanso womenyera ufulu wachibadwidwe martha kwataine wati zomwe zikuchitikazi kubera amalawi boma lisayerekeze 
  banki idagulitsidwa pamtengo wotsika kale lero akuti tibwezenso ndalama zina zoona ichitu nchibwana amalawi tisalole zimenezi boma libweze ndalamazi kumbali osadziwa ndiye timema amalawi tichite zionetsero uku nkutitengera pamgongo adatero kwataine
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
tidacheza nawo mchaka cha 2015 tamva zikhulupiriro miyambo mbiri zosiyanasiyana za maderanso osiyana lero bobby kabango akutibweretsera macheza ochepa amene nkhani yake idatekesa 
  afisi ogulitsa ku dedza   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka nkhani iyi idadzidzimutsa ambiri kumva pali wina amene akugulitsa afisi adati fisi wamkazi ndiye amadula pamtengo wa k9 000 ati akakuswera pamene wamphongo amapanga k8 000 
  mkuluyu njale biweyo wa mmudzi mwa masakaniza kwa t kaphuka mboma la dedza 
  biweyo adati ntchito ya afisiwo kuteteza usiku kusakira kukwera muli paulendo adati fisi ndege yapansi yomwe imathamanga kwambiri 
  pamene timacheza naye mkuluyu nkuti afisi awiri adati adawagulitsanso adali nawo asanu 
  adati adayamba 1965 kuweta afisi ntchito yake akuti ya ulonda kudzera mtchitoyi adapeza nawo afisiwa amene amamuthandiza pantchito yake komwe kukukhala mkuluyu adatilozera ampingo wina womwenso ukutetezeka fisi wamkazi 
  dzina la kachindamoto lidabwera   chaka chimenechi tidacheza senior chief kachindamoto wa mboma la dedza amene adatifotokozera momwe dzina lake lidabwerera 
  mfumuyi idati chidyaonga ankamenya nkhondo kwambiri sankaopa azungu amene ankamenya nawo nkhondoyo adagonja chidyaonga poona momwe mkuluyu akumenyera nkhondo adangomutcha dzina la chidyaonga 
  mfuti itulutse chipolpolo mukaomba nchifukwa cha wonga ukayaka umaphulika phuu ndiye ankalimbana zimenezi adangoti chidyaonga kutanthauza akumadya wonga wa mfuti 
  kachindamoto nayenso sankaopa nkhondo iyeyu sankaopa zitavuta maka ngakhalenso moto amapanga nawo mwakutimwakuti mukumvera dzinalo 
  thupi sayandikira ngombe   mkazi amene thupi lake la moto akuti sayenera kuyandikira ngombe khola lake kuopetsa kuzibalalitsa thupi lake la moto ndimalinga zikhulupiriro za angoni achigawo chapakati kumva kwa kuchigawo cha kumpoto kwa lino akuti mkazi sayandikira ngombe kuopetsa asulutsa zizimba pakholalo 
  tidacheza nyakwawa chimpeni ya kwa t phambala mboma la ntcheu adati thupi la amene adathera msinkhu wayamba kumwezi limakhala loopsa ku ngombe 
  adati ameneyu saloledwa adutse pakati ngombe zija zikamayenda zikamawetedwa salolanso alowe mkhola lake sangazikuse sangakame kutsekera pakhomo sangalowe mkhola kukachotsa ndowe 
  nyakwawayi idati imakhulupirira ngombezo zimabalalika zimayamba kugona mthengo 
  kusakatula malongedwe ufumu wa chitumbuka   apa tidacheza nyakwawa chibochaphere ku nkhamanga kingdom mboma la rumphi atangolongedwa ufumu 
  adati polonga ufumu wa chitumbuka pamakhala timiyambo tina tomwe wolongedwa ufumu ayenera kutsata choyamba dzina likadziwika la amene alowe ufumu dzinalo limayenera lipite kwa sawira chikulamayembe akalivomereze mwamwambo kwa sawira supita chimanjamanja kukwapatira kangachepe mmanja kumeneko timati kuluvya chitumbuka
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
mtsutso masiku chisankho mtsutso wabuka za masiku chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa lino chomwe chikuyembezeka kuchitika may 19 chaka chino 
  pamene akuti masiku okwanira akutsutsa kaamba koti chisankho chimalira zambiri 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc jane ansah mtsogoleri   wa mec chisankhochi chikuyenera kuchitika may 19 2020 potsatira chigamulo cha khothi choti chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa lino chichitikenso mmasiku 150 february 3 2020 litapeza chisankho cha may 21 2019 sichidaye 
  katswiri wa ndale george phiri wati masikuwa ndiwokwana kuchititsa chisankho 
  kupanda kupanga chisankho mmasikuwa ndiye kunyozera chigamulo cha khoti 
  chofunika nkusankha akuluakulu oyendetsa zisankho mmasiku 10 akudzawa pambuyo pake kuchititsa kalembera mmasiku 30 kwinako nkosavuta zambiri akuzidziwa kale adatero phiri 
  wa bungwe la malawi electoral justice network mesn steve duwa adati masiku 78 ndiosakwanira 
  bungwe loyendetsa zisankho likuyenera akuluakulu atsopano pali ndondomeko zina zomwe ziyenera kutsatidwa watero duwa 
  komiti ya ku nyumba ya malamulo yoona zosankha mmaudindo mboma ya public appointments committee pac idapempha mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika achotse ntchito akuluakulu malawi electoral commission mec omwe adayendetsa zisankho za may 21 2019 kaamba koti adasokoneza zinthu 
  mec idapepha khoti lionjezere masiku ochititsa zisankho lidakana
Label: POLITICS

Text:
atatu afa ngozi ziwiri ku ntcheu atatu afa avulala modetsa nkhawa ngozi ziwiri zomwe zachitika masiku osiyananso mboma la ntcheu 
 malinga wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo sub inspector hastings chigalu ngozi yoyamba yachitika usiku wa lachiwiri msika wa biriwiri msewu wochoka ku dedza kupita ku ntcheu pomwe galimoto inawomba oyenda pansi omwe amawoloka nsewu wu 
 ngozi inayi yachitika usiku wa dzulo mlatho wa mtsinje wa liwazi omwe uli msika wa kasinje nsewu wochoka ku balaka kupita ku salima pomwe galimoto ya wa truck inaphonya nsewu kugwera mtsinjewu 
 zoonadi pali ngozi yomwe inachitika zulo usiku lachitiatu yomwe imakhuza galimoto ya br8698 yomwe amayendesa moses chikolosa azaka 30 anawomba atatu biriwiri trading centre anafera ku chipatala anatero sub inspector chigalu 
 atinso nsewu omwewu munachitikaso ngozi ina ya galimoto yomwe amayendetsa davie malamba zaka 69 galimotoyo inagwera mtsinje zomwe zinapangitsa mwa 6 omwe anatenga 5 avulale wamwalira 
 mwazina sub inspector chigalu wapempha oyendetsa galimoto azikhala chidwi nsewu apewe ngozi
Label: TRANSPORT

Text:
maliro chisangalalo mwambo wa chikondwerero choti lino latha zaka 53 lili ufulu wodzilamurira lidasanduka chisoni pomwe ana 7 adamwalira pokanganirana kulowa mbwalo la za masewero la bingu national stadium kumene kumayenera kuchitika mpira waulere 
  zidadziwika pomwe mtsogoleri wa lino adatsogolera amalawi mapemphero wolingalira za ufuluwo ku bingu international convention centre bicc pomwe woyendetsa mwambowo mbusa timothy nyasulu adalengeza za omwalirawo adapempha akhale chete kwa mphindi imodzi polemekeza mizimu ya omwalirawo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka wapolisi kuthandiza mwa ana ku bns nduna ya zamalonda mafakitale joseph mwanamvekha yemwenso adali wapampando wa komiti yoyendetsa mwambowo adatsimikiza za imfa ya anthuwo mapemphero mkati adati oposa 40 adavulala pangoziyo nthambi yofalitsa nkhani za boma lidati 65 adamwalira 
  mutharika gertrude mutharika adakazonda amene adavulala chipwilikiticho ku kamuzu central hospital 
  mutharika adati boma lokonzeka kuthandiza pangoziyi 
  la malawi limakumbukira latha zaka 53 pamene mtsogoleri wa lino dr hastings kamuzu banda adakwanitsa kupeza ufulu kwa angerezi amene adayamba kulamulira lino mzaka za mma 1890 john chilembwe mwa amalawi oyambirira kufuna kumenyera ufuluwo adamwalira 1915 
  zikondwerero za chaka chino zinalipo kuyambira lachitatu 5 july pomwe asilikali achitetezo adayenda mmizinda ya blantyre zomba mzuzu 
  chikondwerero chimayenera kufika mponda chimera masewero nyasa big bullets silver strikers amene amayembekezeka kuchitika kumalo ngoziyo 
  komatu galimoto za chipatala zapolisi zidali kukangalika kuthandiza ovulala zisawawazo 
  polankhula tamvani zisangalalozo zisanachitike amalawi adati dzikoli latha zaka 53 likudzilamulira maloto amene adalipo pomenyera ufulu wa lino 
  yemwe adakhalapo sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo sam mpasu adati mmalawi wa zaka 53 panayi zina zasintha pangono zina sizinasinthe pomwe zina zaima kubwerera mmbuyo 
  wati kunena mosapsatira zaka 53 sizidabweretse kwenikweni paulamuliro kayendetsedwe ka maufulu mdziko muno 
  mwa zina adati ulamuliro wa kamuzu banda udayesera kubwezeretsa ulimi mchimake pamene adakhazikitsa makampani otulutsa zinthu zina kunja zimene ulamuliro wa atsamunda zimakapangidwa kunja zina sizikuyenda 
  adapereka zitsanzo za makampani sucoma yomwe inkakonza shuga malawi cotton yomwe inkaomba nsalu british american tobacco yomwe inkapanga ndudu zina mwa zotsimikiza lino lisanaladire ufulu mpasu adati zonsezi zinkabwera kunja alimi ochuluka amene ankazilima mdziko muno ankatumiza kunja adali atsamunda 
  kamuzu adayesetsanso kulimbikitsa msika wa mbewu kudzera ku admarc adaonetsetsa manyamulidwe mbewu ngosavuta kudali sitima za panjanji zomwe zimanyamula katundu mtengo otsika kupita ku misika watero mpasu 
  wa bungwe loyanganira za momwe maphunziro akuyendera mdziko lino george jobe wati pakutha zaka 53 malawi amayenera ntchito za umoyo za pamwamba motsatira chiyenerezo cha bungwe lalikulu loyanganira zaumoyo la world health organisation who mmalo mwake zinthu zambiri sizikuyenda 
  mpaka sitidayambe kukwaniritsa mlingo wa who oti k15 k100 iliyonse mbajeti izikhala ya za umoyo chiwerengero cha ogwira ntchito za chipatala chikadali chotsika kwambiri poyerekeza omwe dokotala amawona tsiku watero jobe 
  kupatula zaumoyo wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe zamaphunziro benedicto kondowe wati sizoona zaka 53 zingathe ana asukulu makamaka kuma yunivesite nkumakhala pakhomo miyezi yambiri cha mavuto msukulu zawo 
  wati zaka zonsezi atsogoleri amayenera atapanga njira zothandizira kalendala ya sukulu kuyambira ku pulayimale mpaka ku yunivesite isamasokonekere kutereku nkulowetsa maphunziro pansi 
  posachedwapa aphunzitsi adali sitalaka nkhani ya maphunziro tikunena ophunzira mma yunivesite sadatsegulire chitsekereni miyezi ingapo yapitayo nkhani yake kayendetsedwe adatero kondowe
Label: CULTURE

Text:
lamulo la ufiti kwachedwa udyo kuchedwa kwa ntchito yosintha lamulo lokhudza zaufiti kukuchititsa okalamba amene akuwaganizira mfiti apitirire kuzunzidwa kuphedwa atero mabungwe 
  polankhula msangulutso padera padera wa bungwe limene limati kulibe ufiti la association for secular humanism ash george thindwa wa bungwe losamalira achikulire la friends of the elderly mike magelegele ati kuchedwa kwa ntchitoyi kukuchititsa nkhanza kwa okaikiridwa ufiti zipitirire 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka akuchulukira akuzuzidwa mpaka kuphedwa chowakaikira ufiti nthambi yapadera younikira zosintha malamulo okhudza zaufiti ya special commission on review of the witchcraft act yakhala ikumva maganizo zosintha malamulowo ikuyembekezeka kumaliza zonse july chaka chino ntchito yofufuzayi idayamba zaka 10 zapitazo 
  thindwa adati ntchitoyi ikuchedwa cha ndondomeko yomwe bungwe lofufuzalo likutenga akusowa thandizo mmalo molunjika zaufiti athetse vuto afika mpaka kukambirana za chipembedzo cha satana 
  adati zili apo nkhalamba zina zikuvutitsidwa kuphedwa pachabe palibe umboni wa ufiti 
  malinga thindwa lamulo latsopano la ufiti likuyenera kulunjika poti wonena mnzake mfiti aziyankha mlandu wothera kundende osapatsidwanso mpata wopereka chindapusa 
  amangowanamizira agogo mfiti awalande minda adatero thindwa 
  magelegele adati bungwe lake lakhudzidwa cha kuchedwa kwa ntchitoyi ambiri ataya miyoyo yawo 
  tikupempha boma tigwirane manja poyesetsa zinthu zisinthe adatero magelegele 
  adatinso chiyambireni chaka chino paphedwa agogo 8 zomwe zikungoonetsa ntchito ndiyaikulu 
  lino likugwiritsa ntchito lamulo la chitsamunda lomwe lidakhazikitsidwa 1911 loti kulibe ufiti pomwe ntchitoyi ikuyenda pangonopangono nkhono agogo akupitirira kuvutika 
  komatu akadaulo malamulo kaganizidwe mafumu akukhulupilira mchitidwewu ukhonza kuchepa lamuloli lingakhazikitsidwe mwa changu 
  mwa katswiri kaganizidwe pachipatala cha amisala cha st john of god ku mzuzu ndumanene sulungwe adati agogo ambiri amaphedwa chodwala nthenda yoiwala zimene zimachititsa akamafunsidwa mafunso pamene akukaikiridwa ufiti amayankha zosemphana 
  adati mwa agogowa amaiwala dzina la mudzi wawo kumene akawapeza obalalika chomwecho amati mfiti kuwachita chipongwe 
  choncho adapempha omwe akukonza lamulolo ayesetse kuteteza agogowa 
  polankhulapo wachiwiri kwa woyendetsa ntchitoyi clotilda sawasawa adavomereza agogo alubino ana amene pampani nkhani zokhudzana kukayikiridwa ufiti 
  sawasawa adavomerezanso ntchitoyi yakhala isakuyenda mwachangu chosowa ndalama 
  ndalama zoyendetsera ntchitoyi zakahala zikutivuta choncho sizimayenda kwenikweni tiyesetsa kuthamangitsa zinthu pofika mwezi wa july chaka chino tikhale titamaliza kutolera maganizo adalongosola motero 
  mwa okhudzidwa nkhanizi chistopher ndovi yemwe wa chi alubino adauza msangulutso wakhala akuvutitsa wachichepere 
  padali ina mnzanga ankafuna yochokera kumbuyo kwa khosi langali tsitsi langa la pankhongo akapangire mankhwala 
  zidafika povuta mpaka kumanditsatira agogo anga ndiwo adanditeteza adalongosola ndovi 
  nayo mfumu mwenemsuku yochokera mboma la chitipa idati zoona agogo ana ndiwo akukhudzika kwambiri zaufiti 
  adati ana ambiri akumaulula agogo ndiwo akuwaphunzitsa ufiti pena agogowa amalephera kudzifotokoza pomwe zina amavomera ndithu
Label: WITCHCRAFT

Text:
yamikani headmaster fodya wa bullets dzina la yamikani fodya lawanda uyutu mnyamata wokankha chikopa kutimu ya flames ku big bullets iyeyu wapatsidwa maina osiyanasiyana kaamba ka luso lake lomwe ochemerera mpira akuliyamikira mwa dzina lake bobby kabango akumva za mbiri yake 
  fodya mulungu akakonza palibe angatsutse tikambire za mbiri yako   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi ndimachokera ku balaka ndine wa nambala 7 kubadwa mbanja la ana 8 ndinenso wokwatira ndili mwana dzina lake favour 
  ku bullets udabwerako liti   ndidafika mumzinda wa blantyre 2009 nthawiyo nkuti kutangoyambika chikho cha presidential cup ndiye adaona luso langa mpaka kundiitanira kutimuyi 
  udalandiridwa   kundirandira kudali kupeza mwayi wosewera padavuta ndidapeza osewera ambiri ku training sindimapeza mwayi kutulutsa timu yonseyo mwayi wolowabe sumapezeka 
  nanga umasewera malo ati nthawiyo ndimasewera pakati malo amene ndimasewera ku young soccer ya ku dedza 
  zidatani uyambe kumbuyo idangokhala pulani ya mulungu kochi wa timuyi panthawiyo meke mwase adandifunsa za malo amene ndimasewera ndiye ndidangoti kumbuyo basitu kuyamba kudali komweko 
  zidayamba kukuyendera mchaka chanji 2010 chaka chimenechi ndidasankhidwanso wosewera amene wachita kumbuyo kuchoka nthawiyo mpaka 2013 ndiye zidavuta ndidavulala msana 
  wafala paliponse luso lako kodi mankhwala mbale wanga mulungu akakonza palibe amene angatsutse pamene sizimayenda ndimalimbikirabe tsiku lina zidzayende palibe mankhwala mphamvu yake basi si nzeru zanga chifundo chake cha mulungu 
  malo amene ukusewera ku flames umalimbirana francis mlimbika kodi simuchitirana nsanje francis mbale wanga ndimamupatsa ulemu ndimakondwera naye dziwani nayenso mulungu adamupatsa luso lusolo lili la mulungu ndani ndimuchitire nsanje kodi ukungotchula za mulungu uli mpingo wanji mbale wanga palibe munthu amene sadziwa kumwamba kuli mulungu wakuba amadziwa tili mmasiku omaliza palibe chomwe tingachite palibe malembo amati samanga nyumba omangayo amanga pachabe nchifukwanso ndimatsogoza mulungu pazonse ndikupemphera mpingo wa seventh day adventist 
  ukutchulidwa maina osiyanasiyana kodi mainawa adabwera tili ku cosafa onenerera mpira amanditchula soul brother ati cha tsitsi langali limafanana oimba gulu la soul brothers kumeneko kunoko andipatsa dzina loti headmaster ndimapisira malaya 90 minitsi 
  kodi sumeta chiyani nanga kupisiraku ndimasangalala osewera mpira akale amene samameta wamba mametedwe alerowa kudalibe amapisira ma jersey makabudula adali aangono zimenezi zimandisangalatsa ndimamukumbukira chisomo kamulanje amene adandiuza zambiri za malo amene ndimasewera aja pamene amachoka ku bullets ndidanena ndikufuna ndidzapange chinthu chomwe ndidzamukumbukire nacho

Text:
muli mafunso mmanifesito dpp chipani cha dpp chatulutsa manifesito ake lamulungu 7 april amene akufotokoza zomwe chipanichi chakwaniritsa mzaka zisanu zathazi zomwe chipange chisankhidwenso may 21   zambiri zomwe dpp yasanja zomwenso chidalonjeza pokonzekera chisankho cha 2014    wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu chipanicho chasiya zina zomwe sichidakwaniritse 2014 kuchepetsa mphamvu za mtsogoleri wa kukozanso la nsanje mwazina   manifesito dpp akubwera pamene chipani cha mcp utm atulutsa kale zomwe achite atasankhidwa   dpp yati akangochipatsanso zaka zina zisanu chithetseratu katangale mdziko muno ntchito yomwe ati adayamba kale kuigwira 2014   pothandizira mfundoyo dpp yati idzamanga kuchotsa ntchito amene adzapezeke akuchita ziphuphu   yatinso idzakhazikitsa khoti lapadera lothana milandu ya katangale yomwe ilinso mmanifesito mcp   chipanicho chati chikapatsidwa zaka zina zisanu chidzatsitsa mtengo wa feteleza lonse ndondomeko ya zipangizo zotsika mtengo yomwe ilipo idzakhalapobe   chatinso amene alibe malo wolimapo boma lidzawapatsa ndalama zomwe adzasankha chomwe adzachite nazo 
  chipanicho chalonjezanso ntchito yomalinga nyumba zamakono kwa osauka achikulire idzapitirira   chipanicho chatinso chidzaonetsetsa amalawi ndiwo akupanga bizinesi mmidzi osati obwera   akunja akuti azizapanga mabizinesi mmatauni mokha mmizinda mpamba wa pafupifupi us$250 000 k185 miliyoni womwe adzabwere nawo kunja bizinesi yosaposera k50 miliyoni idzapatsidwa kwa amalawi okha apange   chipanichi chatinso chidzaonetsetsa dotolo akuthandiza 5 000 osati 33 000 zilili akuti zichitika mzaka zisanu zikudzazi   msukulu zonse za ukachenjede akuti ophunzira azizagwiritsira ntchito intaneti yaulere   mwa zina manifesto dpp ati mzaka zisanu zikubwerazo chipanicho chidzapereka ndalama zokwana $ 3.5 biliyoni k2.5 thililiyoni zotukulira ntchito za mtengatenga mphamvu za magetsi ulimi wa mthilira maphunziro umoyo zokopa alendo zotumizirana mauthenga mwa njira za makono zomwe zidzapititse patsogolo chuma cha lino 
  chipani cha dpp chati chidzaika pafupifupi k2.7 thililiyoni yomangira zinthu zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno chaka cha 2019 mpaka 2024   dpp ikuti idzamanga msewu wamakono ku mzuzu kudutsa lilongwe mpaka kufika ku blantyre   chipanicho chatinso chidzagula madesiki kwa ophunzira onse msukulu zonse mdziko muno   akadaulo ndale ati manifesito chipani cha dpp avuta kuwakhulupirira zambiri zomwe akukamba zomwe adalonjezanso 2014 chalephera kukwaniritsa   george phiri wa ku sukulu ya livingstonia mneneri wa malawi political science association andrew mpesi ati sangawerenge manifesito dpp diso limodzi lokha kuunikiranso zomwe akwaniritsa mzaka zisanu zapitazo   chitsanzo 2014 adalonjeza adzathana ziphuphu zaka zisanu zatha pafupifupi tsiku lililonse nyuzipepala zikuvumbulutsa katangale amene akuchitika mbomamu panonso akukamba zothetseratu ziphuphu ndiye mbali iyi zivuta kukhulupirira kwake adatero mpesi   vuto la manifesito chipani cholamula mkuti amayangana kaye zomwe achita zomwe akulonjeza adaonjeza   kuona kwa phiri adati manifesito amene dpp yaphika sakusiyana omwe idatulutsa mchaka cha 2014   adati zambiri zomwe alukamo zomwe alephera kukwaniritsa kuyambira 2014   panopa zivuta kuwakhulupirira kodi chinthu achilephera kukwaniritsa mzaka zisanu panopa ndiye akwanitse kuchikwaniritsa adadabwa phiri 
  adati dpp idataya mwayi kukachita nawo mtsutso womwe ukadawapatsa danga kufotokozera pamene padavuta akwaniritse masomphenya momwe akwaniritsire ulendo uno   phiri akuganizanso palibe chisinthe dpp ingapambane pachisankho cha may 21 manifesito sakunena momwe adzakwaniritsire zomwe adazilephera   ndikuona manifesito utm ndiwo akufotokoza motsatirana mcp nkhani zomwe asanja zomwe akukumana nazo akufotokoza momwe adzakwaniritsire   2014 dpp idalonjeza pofika 2019 sipadzapezeka mwana akuyenda mtunda woposera makilomita kupita kusukulu zomwe sizidatheke   chidatinso chidzapereka chitetezo kwa munthu 2014 25 achialubino aphedwa 11 akusowa nkhani zokhudza anthuwa zafika 153 
  chipanichi chidatinso mzaka zisanu chidzamanga nyumba 10 000 za apolisi sizidatheke
Label: POLITICS

Text:
makwaya amayi akuyenera kulimbikitsidwa makwaya amayi arkidayosizi ya blantyre awapempha apitirize kudzipereka pofalitsa mthenga wabwino momwe makwaya achinyamata amachitira 
 wowona luso la nyimbo kwaya ya amayi ya st marys ku limbe cathedral arkidayosiziyo steve amidu alankhula pakutha maphunziro tsiku limodzi omwe kwayayi inakonzera mamembala ake 
 ati anakonza maphunzirowa cholinga chofuna kulimbikitsa kwayayi idzichita potsogolera miyambo yosiyanasiyana ya chipembezo izichita mipikisano yosiyanasiyana ya makwaya mdziko muno 
 makwaya amayi akuyenera kulimbikitsidwa mayimbidwe apite patsogolo azichita potsogolera mapemphero mtchalitchi nthawiya festival anatero amidu 
 mmawu ake wapampando wa kwayayi ellena abobolera kudzera maphunzirowa adzindikira akuyenera olimbikira achidwi cholinga choti azichita zonse

Text:
akulowelera malo khonsolo ya ntcheu khonsolo ya boma la ntcheu yadandaula omwe akuti akulowelera malo khonsoloyi mmisika ya bomalo 
 wapampando wa nthambi yowona zachuma ku khonsoloyi ezara mike wauza radio maria malawi zimenezi zikusokoneza ntchito yotolera ndalama za misonkho zomwenso zikuchititsa ogwira ntchito ku khonsoloyo akhale yaitali osalandira malipiro 
 ina mwa misika ya mboma la ntcheu mike wati khonsoloyo imayenera kutolera ndalama zosachepera 180 million kwacha chaka padakalipano akukwanitsa kutolera 97 million kwacha yokha 
 mmbuyomu akhala akuvutika alandire ndalama zawo penanso kumatha mwina miyezi 12 asanalandire tsopano padakalipano tayamba kuzikonza zinthuzo miyezi yapitayi alandira bwinobwino ndlaama zawo anatero mike 
 poplankhulapo wapampando wa msika wa pengapenga mbomalo lenard zamimba ati mafumu omwe akuyambitsa vutoli kaamba koti akumafuna kusonyeza umwini wa malo omwe boma
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
man sentenced 18 years ihl for sleeping with niece mangochi senior resident magistrate court on friday has convicted and sentenced 41 year old man to 18 years imprisonment with hard labour for an offence of sleeping with his niece 
  state prosecutor elias chitsulo told the court that edwin was staying with his elder brother in one compound but in different houses at village muonda in capemaclear traditional authority namkumba in mangochi district 
 in october 2019 the convicts elder brother left his 15 year old daughter in his house with her step mother for fishing this angered the wife who instead snatched the girls beddings as punishment for her fathers sins in the night the girl sought refuge in her uncles house which was just few metres away from her house on first night the girl shared the same bed with her uncle who is single untill morning without being defiled 
 from the second to eighth night the convict defiled the girl several times each night upon arrival on ninth day her father stopped the girl from spending nights with her uncle thereafter the step mother noticed some changes in the body of the girl that prompted her to invite elder women for questioning 
 the girl was taken to monkey bay community hospital for check up where it was revealed that the girl is pregnant appearing before court edwin pleaded not guilty to charges levelled against him that prompted the state to parade five witnesses who testified beyond any reasonable doubt that made court to find him guilty in mitigation edwin asked court for leniency citing the girl tempted him by spending nights on his bed 
 in submission the state prayed for stiff penalty citing that as an uncle convict had an obligation of protecting the girl but he choose otherwise and he indicated that what the convict did is contrary to section 138(1 of the penal code 
 passing the sentence senior resident magistrate joshua nkhono concurred with the state hence he was slapped the convict with 18 years imprisonment with hard labour as deterrent to other would be offenders 
 edwin 41 comes from village muonda in traditional authority nankumba in mangochi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
miyezi inayi idutsa mafumu osalandira mswahala nyakwawa magulupu akudandaula matumba abooka kaamba koti patha miyezi inayi asakulandira mswahala

  pali ndalama zomwe sizidaperekedwe za mwezi wa march basi adatero maseko

  nyakwawa mussa ya kwa sta amidu kwa t kalembo mboma la balaka akuti kumeneko akhala akufunsa kwa omwe amabweretsa malipiro palibe amalongosola chomwe chikuchitika 
  sizili malipiro athu ochepa tikuyenera kulandira adatero mussa 
  gulupu kapochi wa kwa t zilakoma mboma la nkhata bay wati kumenekonso malipirowa sadalandire kwa miyezi inayi 
  ntchito zachitukuko tayimika kaye tifufuze za malipiro athu tidakagwada kwa gogocharo nawonso akuti sakudziwa zomwe zikuchititsa tisamalandire malipiro athu tikupempha boma litithandize adatero kapochi 
  mafumu enanso ku balaka ntcheu omwe adati tisawatchule maina adatsimikiza za nkhaniyi ati palibe chomalimbikira ntchito zakumudzi chikhalirecho sakulandira malipiro 
  muulamuliro wa dpp malemu bingu wa mutharika adati mafumuwa azikalandirira ndalama kubanki afanane ogwira ntchito mboma 
  zidasinthadi mafumu adayamba kulandirira malipirowo kubanki kusiya njira yomakalandirira kwa dc njirayi mafumuwa maka magulupu nyakwawa adaidandaula ponena akuyenda mtunda wautali kukatenga malipiro ochepa adati malipirowo akungothera kukwerera basi matola 
  chaka chatha mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda adalamula mafumuwa ayambenso kulandira pamanja chisinthireni mafumuwa akhala akudandaula malipiro akumachedwa 
  padakalipano magulupu akulandira k5 000 pomwe nyakwawa k2 500 pamwezi 
  mafumu akhala akudandaula malipirowa akuchepa boma liwaonjezere zinthu zakwera kugwa kwa ndalama ya kwacha 
  ogwira ntchito mboma adakwezeredwa malipiro mafumuwa sadaone

Text:
obera malova akuchuluka akapsala obera achimata amapepala powalonjeza ntchito zomwe chikhalirecho palibepo akuchulukirabe mmizinda apolisi unduna wa zantchito akulimbana mchitidwewu 
  kumapeto mwezi wathawu 29 august apolisi mboma la mchinji adagwira yohane chimkumbi wa zaka 32 wa mmudzi mwa ndeleya kwa t mamvere pomuganizira adadya ndalama zokwana k87 000 atanamiza achinyamata 6 awalemba ntchito mbungwe lake adati ayambe wapereka k10 000 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa apolisi mbomali rome chauluka adati mkuluyu akuti adauza achinyamatawo pali bungwe lotchedwa young advocacy lomwe likufuna oti liwatumize mmadera osiyanasiyana kukagwira ntchito 
  munthuyu adangobwera nkuyamba kuuza achinyamata pali mwayi wa ntchito ndiye mwina ulovawu akusakasaka mwayi wa ntchito kotero atawauza apereke k10 000 adangoona mwayi wapezeka adatero chauluka 
  akuti amati akamufunsa amanena masitetimenti osiyanasiyana oti akungodikira mabwana ake amumasule kulemba achinyamatawo ataona payamba kutentha adathawa kuderalo adatero chauluka 
  sabata zingapo zapitazo tamvani idasokolotsa nkhani ya akamberembere omwe amanka mmizinda kukhoma zikalata zoti akufuna achinyamata omwe akusowa ntchito atafufuza adapeza nkhani yake idali yomweyi yofuna kuwabera 
  wapampando wa bungwe loyendetsa mabungwe achinyamata la national youth council of malawi nycom aubrey chibwana adati vutoli lingathe achinyamata atakhala mtima wongogwira ntchito modzipereka asadamalize maphunziro cholinga choti asadzavutike kupeza ntchito mtsogolo
Label: ECONOMY

Text:

 papa walankhula popitiriza kutsindika zomwe walemba chikalata chake cholimbikitsa baibulu pafupipafupi 
 wati zambiri amawerenga baibulo pamene asowa chochita zomwe wati sizoyenera kutero akhristu akuyenera kudzikonzekeretsa pomwe akufuna mau ochokera buku loyera 
 pamenepa papa anapitiriza kupereka chitsanzo cha ophunzira ake yesu omwe zambiri akafuna buku loyera amayamba aziyeretsa eni 
 mwa zina papa analimbikitsa akhristu omwe anasonkhana bwalo la st peters square zida zamphamvu zolalika uthenga wa ambuye ponseponse

Text:
hrdc yapempha boma liyimitse chiganizo cha lockdown bungwe lomenyera ufulu wa mdziko muno la human rights defenders coalition hrdc lati boma liyimitse kaye ganizo lake loletsa kuyendayenda ntchito zawo lockdown pachingerezi lipereke kaye tsatanetsatane wa mmene lithandizire nthawiyi 
 wachenjeza boma trapence boma lidalengeza kuyambira pakati usiku wa loweruka 18 mwezi uno mpaka pakati usiku wa 9 may chaka chino asayendeyende omwe masiku 21,pofuna kuchepetsa kufala kwa nthenda ya covid-19 
 polankhula msonkhano wa atolankhani lero mmawa wapampando wa bungweli gift trapence wati bungweli lawuza kale maloya ake apite ku bwalo la milandu lilowelerepo nkhaniyi ponena boma ladya mfulumira polengeza za ganizoli lisadaike zothandizira osauka yosayendayendayi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
wogona mwana pofuna mfumba agwidwa ndani adanena chizimba cha mfumba kugona mwana wako zachitika ku dedza komwe apolisi anjata wa zaka 49 pomuganizira adagona mwana wa zaka 17 achulutse zokolola 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc tikunena akuti mkuluyu wapha kale ngolo ziwiri za chimanga pomwe zaka zapitazi ankakolola osakwana ngolo imodzi yomwe wati wangokolola theka chabe la mundawo 
  njondayi levison dickson ya mmudzi mwa chimalira kwa t kachere mbomalo akuti ili ana asanu 6 amuna awiri akazi anayi idagona nayeyu akuti mthunzi wa miyezi isanu 
  mneneri wapolisi ya dedza edward kabango wati dickson adauza apolisi adapita ku mozambique kukasaka mfumba yoti ulimi wa mtedza chimanga soya nyemba uzimupatsa zokolola zamnanu 
  adati kupatula kutsira fetereza kusamalira zokolola zake pamayenera mfumba igwire ntchito adauza apolisi akuchita zimenezi zikuwayendera adatero kabango 
  mneneriyu adati mkuluyu atafika mdzikolo adakumana nganga yomwe idamutemera mterawo chizimba chake kudali kukapumira pamwana mpaka mwanayo atakhala pathupi 
  ntchito yokwaniritsa chizimbacho akuti idayambika january chaka chino akuti mlimiyu adamasuka mkazi nkuti kwa apongozi ake komwe amachereza matenda 
  kabango wati mkazi wa mkuluyu atabwera adadabwa momwe msungwanayu amaonekera amaonetsa zizindikiro zoti pathupi 
  mayiwo adamupanikiza adaulula ake ndiwo mwini wa pathupipo adawauza bambowo adamuuza agone nawo akolole zochuluka 
  mayiwo atadzatifotokozera 25 may tidanjata mkuluyu adavomereza adagonadi mwanayo kumunda akolole dzinthu dzochuluka adatsindika kabango 
  woganiziridwayu adakawonekera kubwalo la milandu lachinayi lapitali komwe adavomera mlanduwo 
  chilango cha mlanduwu kukakhala kundende zaka zisanu zimatengera momwe mlandu wakhalira malamulo amati msungwanayo adali wosaposa zaka 16 woganiziridwayo akaseweze moyo wonse zakazi zingasinthe momwe woweruza mlandu angagamulire adatero kabango
Label: WITCHCRAFT

Text:
amayi akhale odzidalira wa bungwe la beautify malawi trust beam trust gertrude mutharika walimbikitsa amayi mdziko muno akhale odzidalira pachuma 
  mutharika adalankhula masiku apitawa pomwe amakhazikitsa tsiku lokumbukira ntchito za mabizinesi la world entrepreneurship day mdziko la amerika.stevggg   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mutharika adati beam trust ikufuna kulimbikitsa amayi kutengapo gawo lalikulu pantchito za mabizinesi njira imodzi yowalimbikitsira kudziyimira paokha 
  tayika ndondomeko zingapo zomwe cholinga chake nkupititsira amayi atsikana mmabizinesi beam trust ilimbikitsanso amayi atsikana kutengapo gawo lalikulu pantchito zolimbikitsa ukhondo mmatauni mizinda adatero 
  adatsindika kusowa mpamba woyambira bizinesi chikole ndiye mavuto amene amayi asungwana omwe akufuna kuyamba mabizinesi akukumana nawo africa 
  choncho adapempha mabungwe omwe mabanki aganizire kufewetsa zawo amayi atsikana adzitha kupeza ngongole mosavuta 
  mwa atsogoleri omwe adakhala nawo pamsonkhanowo mkazi wa pulezidenti wa ku namibia penehupifo pohamba wa bungwe la un foundation cathy calvin
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
wofuna kuba alubino amusinthira mlandu yemwe akuimbidwa mlandu wofuna kuba alubino cholinga chomupha zidamuthina lachiwiri lapitali kubwalo la milandu la majisitireti ku mzuzu pomwe boma lamusinthira mlandu 
  tsopano phillip ngulube wa zaka 21 akuyankha mlandu wofuna kupha munthu womwe waukulu kuposa wozembetsa munthu cholinga chofuna kumupha 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi wa kulimandi ngulube kumanzere pambuyo pokaonekera kukhotiwa kulimandi ngulube kumanzere pambuyo pokaonekera kukhoti ngulube angapezeke wolakwa pamlandu watsopanowu akhoza kukakhala kundende moyo wonse 
  ngulube adavomera mlandu woyambawu september 15 pomwe adakaonekera kubwaloli koyamba mlandu watsopanowu waukana 
  ndikukana ndinkafuna kumupha mtsikanayu zoona zake zoti ndinkamufuna banja basi adauza bwaloli 
  yankholi lidadzi dzimutsa majisitireti gladys gondwe woganiziridwayu ankangoyenera kunena akuuvomera kuukana mlanduwu 
  komabe woweruzayu adalemba waukana poti woimira boma pamlanduwu ayenera kupereka umboni mwatsatanetsatane cholinga cha woyankha mlanduwu chidali kupha chibwezi chakecho 
  wapolisi woimira boma pamlanduwu christopher katani adalonjeza abweretsa mboni zisanu ziwiri pamene bwaloli lidzakumanenso september 30 zina mwa mbonizi mswahili yemwe akuti adatsatsidwa malonda mwalubinoyo kuphatikizapo mtsikana mwini wakeyo 
  malinga mneneri wa apolisi mchigawo cha kumpoto maurice chapola oimira boma pamlanduwu aganiza zosintha poyesayesa ozunza maalubino azilandira zilango zokhwima pofuna kuthetsa mchitidwewu 
  bwalo la milanduli lidamva ngulube yemwe amagwira ntchito ya uphunzitsi modzipereka pasukulu ya pulaimale ya mongo adafunsira mbeta mtsikana wachialubino wa zaka 17 cholinga chofuna kumuba akamugulitse pamtengo wa k6 miliyoni 
  kupha kugulitsa achialubino makamaka ana wayamba kukula mdziko muno pamene boma la tanzania laletsa usinganga mdzikomo womwe akuti wapangitsa maalubino ambiri aphedwe ofuna zizimba 
  ku tanzania maiko kuvuma kwa africa amakhulupirira ziwalo za munthu wachialubino zizimba zopangira mankhwala ochulukitsira chuma mwayi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
pms yapempha makolo asamalire ana ofesi yowona za mabungwe utumiki wa papa ya pontifical mission societies pms yapempha makolo mpingowu athandize ana kutenga nawo mbali maphunziro mpingowu kudzera radio maria malawi 
 wa ku ofesiyi vincent mwakhwawa anena pambuyo program ya ya anawa radio maria 
 ati maphunzirowa anawakonza anawa adzipitiriza kuphunzira za katikisimu wa katolika kudzera wailesi poyanganiranso anawa anasiya kukumana mmatchalitchi mwawo kamba kofuna kuwateteza ku matenda covid-19 omwe akufala kamba kopatsirana kachilombo ka coronavirus 
 tikulimbikitsa makolo onse omwe amakhala ana adziwalimbikitsa ukhondo apewe kuyendayenda anatero makhwawa 
 apempha akufuna kwabwino athandize program ya ana imeneyi yapawailesi athokoza onse omwe akuthandiza padakali
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
boma lilangiza alimi kulima mbewu zakasakaniza wolemba sylvester kasitomu boma lalangiza alimi ayambe ulimi wa kasanikaniza pofuna kuthana mavuto odza kamba ka kwa nyengo 
 nankhumwa alimi asamangodalira kulima chimanga basi nduna ya zaulimi ulimi wa mthilira chitukuko cha madzi kondwani nankhumwa amayankhula lachitatu mwambo wa chaka chino okumbukira chakudya lonse amwe unachitikira kwa bvumbwe mboma la thyolo 
 ati unduna wawo waika ndondomeko zapadera zowafikira alimi mbeu zoyenera zomwe akuyenera kulima potengera madera padakalipano pomwe mvula ikugwa mwa njomba kaamba ka kwa nyengo 
 choyambirira tikulimbikitsa alimi asamngodalira mbewu chimanga chokha zithanso kulima mbewu zina chinangwa ntedza zomwe zimabereka mvula yochepa anatero nankhumwa 
 polankhulapo mthumwi ya bungwe la food and agriculture organization mdziko lino ku bungwe la mmaiko onse dr zijune cheign wati wokhutira momwe boma lamalawi likuchitira pankhani za chakudya 
 mwazina ati ziri chomwechi pakufunika kuchitapo kanthu maka pakasungidwe ka chakuya kulimbikitsa zakudya za magulu 
 mwambo wakumbukira chakudya wa chaka chino umachitika mutu woti machitidwe athu tsogolo lathu zakudya zopatsa nthanzi fuko lopanda njala
Label: FARMING

Text:
chaola wati agwira ntchito boma la tonse alliance phungu wa ya malamulo mdera la ntcheu bwanje north nancy chaola mdoka wati agwira ntchito boma adzikhala kumbali ya boma nyumba ya malamulo ikamakumana 
 mdoka sindikufuna udindo ayi chaola yemwe phungu woyima payekha mboma la ntcheu wanena polankhula radio maria malawi 
 wati wachita potsatira zomwe anawuza mdera lawo ya misonkhano yokopa 
 sindinachite pofuna kupatsidwa mpando uliwonse ayi phungu woyima payekha ndili ufulu osankha mbali yomwe ndizigwira nayo ntchito anatero mdoka 
 atinso mafumu mdera lawo asangalala atamva adzigwira ntchito boma
Label: POLITICS

Text:
bungwe la tipoliso lati akumudzi akupereweredwa mauthenga coronavirus bungwe la tikondane positive living support organisation tipoliso lati lapeza madera ambiri akumidzi mdziko muno sanaphunzitsidwebe mokwanira momwe angazitetezere ku kachilombo ka coronavirus 
 wa bungweli sellina bomani anena loweruka ku chipini mdera la mfumu mulumbe mboma la zomba pomwe bungweli limapereka zipangizo za ukhondo kwa mafumu sukulu za mkombaphala kwa ochita bizinezi ya njinga za kabaza pofuna aziteteze ku mliriwu 
 ati kofunika ananso nawo aphunzitsidwe njira zaukhondo zopewera kachilomboka 
 kuno kwa t mulumbe tapereka mabeseni mapelo sopo cholinga chothandizira kupewa kufara kwa matenda coronavirus komaso tapereka kwa mafumu zina mwa zipangizozi anatero bomani 
 atinso anayitana zaumoyo mwambowu cholinga choti athandizire kupereka mauthenga amenewa potengera derali ku chigwa mauthenga ofunikirawa safika yake 
 patsikuli bungweli lapereka zipangizo zosambira mmanja kwa mabanja okwana 362 mderalo mmawu ake group village headman kamoto inayamikira bungweli kaamba ka thandizoli lomwe yati lithandiza kulimbikitsa ukhondo mdera lake kulandira chithandizo ichi taona boma lathandiza kwambiri zina mwa zipangizozi zithandiza poweruza milandu anatero gulupu kamoto 
 atinso zomwe alandirazi ziwathandiza choti boma la zomba linachita malire blantyre komwe kagwa nthendayi kwambiri
Label: HEALTH

Text:

Text:
azula mitanda kumanda wina wa mmudzi mwa mikayeli kwa mfumu zulu mboma la mchinji walaula atakazula mitanda mitumbira isanu abale malemu sadamalize kupereka ngongole ya mabokosi omwe adatenga kwa mkuluyo 
  mneneri wa apolisi mbomalo kaitano lubrino watsimikiza za nkhaniyo wati apolisiwa adamanga robert phiri wa zaka 21 pamlandu wopezeka kumanda kusakaza zinthu 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka lubrino adati malinga banja limodzi lokhudzidwa la alfonso sankhani wa zaka 60 wa mmudzi omwewo phiri yemwe amagwira ntchito yokhoma mabokosi adakongoza banjalo mabokosi awiri 
  banjalo lidaperekako ndalama pangono za mabokosiwo adalonjeza zinazo adzamalizabe adatero lubrino 
  adatinso 21 mwezi uno phiri adapita kumanda mmudziwo komwe adakachotsa mitanda pamitumbira isanuyo kuphatikiza ya sankhani kupita nayo kwa mabanja ofedwawo 
  uku adawaonetsa mitandayo nkuwauza amubwenzere ndalama zake zomwe zidatsalazo adatero lubrino

Text:
khonsolo ya zomba isankha olondoloza chitukuko wolemba thokozani chapola khonsolo ya boma la zomba yayamba ntchito yosankha oyanganira zitukuko mmadera mafumu aakulu onse mbomalo 
 polankhula chisankhochi mfumu mlumbe yalangiza adindo atsopanowa apewe kukondera ntchito yawo apemphanso aphungu ya malamulo makhansala azigwiritsa ntchito ndalama za chitukuko zomwe amalandira ponena pali zitukuko zina zomwe zimalephereka kaamba koti adindowa asokoneza ndalamazi 
 ndale amayima chulu kulengeza achita chakuti pomwe zabodza zomwe akaupanga ndalewa akutipha kumudzi zomwe zikuchititsa dera langa la zomba changalume lisatukuke 
 ananenapo atsegulira police unit bridge sukulu ya sekondale zonsezo zili za bodza zenizeni palibe chomwe chamngidwa olo chimodzi chomwe inadandaula motero mfumu mlumbe 
 polankhulapo yemwe wasankhidwa kumene udindowu mdera la mfumu mwambo frederick naoje alonjeza agwira ntchito yawo posayangana chipani 
 ntchito yanga yolondoloza chitukuko ndip ndiwonetsetsa pasakhale tsankho apindule chitukuko chilichonse chomwe chingabwere ku dera kuno anatero naoje
