Text:
mzika ya la ghana injatidwa itapezeka mankhwala ozunguza bongo wolemba thokozani chapola adiomaria.mw/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/adarkwa.jpg 607w sizes="(max width 240px 100vw 240px />wapezeka mankhwala ozunguza bongo adarkwa apolisi ku bwalo la ndege la kamuzu mzinda wa lilongwe amanga wina wa mdziko la ghana kaamba kopezeka mankhwala ozunguza bongo otchedwa apomorphine 
 mneneri wa apolisi ku bwalo la ndegeli sub inspector sapulani chitonde watsimikiza za nkhaniyi polankhula radio maria malawi 
 mankhwala ozunguza bongo otchedwa apomorphine omwe apezeka mayiyo wati mayiyu sally adarkwa wa zaka 45 zakubadwa anafika mdziko muno masiku anayi apitawo lero pomwe amabwelera mdziko la kwawo atafika bwalo la ndegeli apolisi anamupeza mankhwalawa omwe olemera 5.2 kilograms 
 mayiyu yemwe amayembekezeka kukwera ndenge ya south african airways ananjatidwa malo chipikisheni omwewo akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa 
 zikudza patangopita maola khumi awiri apolisi omwewanso atamanga mzika ya la nigeria pamene imafuna kudutsitsa mankhwala ozunguza bongo otchedwa cocaine 
 padakalipano wa apolisi woona za mabwalo ndenge mabvuto chiumbuzo achenjeza mabwalo ndege si malo odusitsira zinthu zosayenera
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
msika wa fodya utsekulidwa april misika ya fodya mdziko muno ikhoza kutsekulidwa sabata yachiwiri ya mwezi wa mawa atero akuluakulu bungwe lowona za fodya mdziko muno la tobacco control commission tcc 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka fodya mbewu imene lino limagulitsa kunja kubweretsa ndalama zimene zimathandiza ntchito zina za boma 
  msika wa fodya wa okushoni polankhula lamya ku lilongwe lachiwiri wa tcc albert changaya adati masikuwa ndiwongoganizira chabe popeza zokambirana zili mkati 
  apa changaya adachenjeza alimi misikayi ikatsekulidwa asamalitse onyamula fodya omwe akumachita utambwali pobera alimi 
  adati onyamula fodya achinyengowa adabera alimi pafupifupi k1.4 biliyoni chaka chatha 
  mwa onyamula fodya amanama malo omwe atengako fodyayu uli mtunda waufupi potchula dera lakutali cholinga chofuna kuba kafukufuku yemwe adapanga akatswiri athu odziwa kulondoloza zachuma adapeza mchaka chatha choka k1.4 biliyoni idapita changaya adatero 
  apa adanenetsa anthuwa adziwe kwawo kwatha bungweli lili kalikiliki wokhazikitsa ndondomeko zatsopano zothana mchitidwewu 
  tizigwiritsa ntchito nambala za zitupa za alimi zomwe chingerezi timati zoning apa tizidziwa dera lomwe fodyayu akuchokera wonama azidziwika changaya adatero adati bungweli likukumana onyamula fodyawa sabata yamawa akambirane za ndondomeko zomwe zakhazikitsidwa pokonzanso zinthu 
  changaya adati tcc laletsanso bungwe limodzi loyanganira alimi lomwelonso lonyamula fodya 
  sabata zapitazi woyanganira kampani ya auction group mchigawo cha kumpoto joseph kawinga adauza gulu la alimi akuluakulu fodya ochokera mchigawocho mwa onyamula fodya amatenga fodya kwa alimi kungomusiya mmalo osungira katundu mumzinda wa mzuzu mmalo mokasiya kumsika wa fodya 
  kawinga adati cha kukhalitsa kwa fodyayu mnyumbazi anthuwa amaluza ziphaso zoperekera fodya amakonzanso ziphaso zawo za bodza 
  mwamwayi ziphaso zabodzazi zomwe nambala zake sizigwirizana nambala za zitupa zenizeni za kumsika wathu wa fodya timazidziwa sitilola fodyayu agulitsidwe popereka chiletso mpaka zonse zitalongosoka adatero kawinga 
  adapempha alimi chaka chino ayesetse kupeza owanyamulira fodya okhulupirika oti akafikitsa mabelo kumsika wa fodya 
  wa alimi akuluakulu fodya mchigawochi harry mkandawire adati bungwe la tcc lichirimike pokonzanso ndondomekozi
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
khrisimasi ya maluzi kwangotsala masiku anayi chisangalalo cha khrisimasi chifike pachimake ochita bizinesi zosiyanasiyana akudandaula sizikudziwika nyengoyi yafikadi malingana momwe akuvutiramalonda 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ochita malonda mmisika ikuluikulu ya mmizinda ya mzuzu lilongwe blantyre ati pomafika zino mzaka zammbuyomu bizinesi zawo zimayenda kwambiri moti amapikula katundu kawiri katatu pasabata chaka chino akuti zimenezo kulibeko 
  msitolo zikuluzikulu za shopright malonda sakuyenda kwenikweni omwe adapikulira katundu mwezi wa november mpaka lero akadagulitsa yemweyo malonda akuvuta zoti december malonda amayenda ayi ndithu osadziwika nkomwe adatero mlembi wa ochita malonda mumsika wa mzinda wa mzuzu justin hara pocheza tamvani lachitatu 
  adati momwe zikuonekera alibe ndalama ndalama nazo akuopa akazisakaza adzavutika malingana momwe chuma chikuyendera 
  tikuganiza ambiri akulingalira za mafizi akwerawa akuti akaona momwe chuma chikuyendera akuda nkhawa akadya ndalama adzakhala pamavuto aakulu magulitsidwe ake akungokhala talowa kale january adatero hara 
  wa pampando wa msika waukulu mumzinda wa lilongwe george banda adati zikuoneka chaka chino mumsika nzamalodza zomwe sizidachitikepo nkale lonse 
  malonda asanduka muja amachitira minibasi kuthamangira munthu kunjira kumukokera pamalonda kutanthauza bizinesi yafika povuta zikumatheka mpaka kuweruka momwe adabwerera ndithu adatero banda 
  mkuluyu adapereka tsatanetsatane wa momwe ochita malondawa amatcherera bizinesi zawo polinganiza katundu yemwe amakonda akumudzi apantchito zomwe adati sizikutheka chaka chino 
  timatchera mwezi wa november timapikula zomwe amakonda akumudzi timayembekezera tikalowa december katundu ameneyu amakhala atatha ambiri akumudzi amadzaguliratu zinthu azikagwira ntchito zina 
  tikamalowerera mkati mwa december timakapikula za apantchito mtawuni ambiri tikadali katundu woyambirirayo adatero banda 
  kaphidigoliyu sadasiye kummwera komwe akuti nako zinthu sizikuyenda momwe zimakhalira mmbuyomu 
  wapampando wa ochita malonda mumsika waukulu ku blantyre himon amanu adati nyengo ino mumsinkawu mumakhala gulu la mundipondera mwana chaka chino akuyenda mosacheukacheuka 
  zinthu zatembenukiratu palibe chikuyenda afumbata ndalama zawo sakufuna kuononga ayi adatero amanu 
  zonsezi nchifukwa cha kuchepa mphamvu kwa ndalama ya kwacha 
  chaka chino chokha kuchoka march ndalama ya kwacha yagwa kuchoka k435 posinthanitsa ndalama ya amerika ya dollar kufika k612 mwezi uno wa december 
  kuchepa mphamvu kwa ndalamayi kwadza chakuti lino silikugulitsa malonda kumaiko akunja mokwanira kupatula fodya shuga tiyi thonje mbewu zina palibe malonda omwe lino likudalira akhazikitse kwacha pansi 
  malingana odziwa za chuma mphamvu ya ndalama imakhazikika likupanga katundu wabwino yemwe maiko akumukhumba 
  la malawi limadalira mabungwe maiko akunja omwe amapereka thandizo la ndalama zomwe zimapangita ndalama ya kwacha isakhale pendapenda 
  ndiye pomwe mabungwewa adati asiya kuthandiza lino kaamba ka kusolola ndalama mboma mavuto akhala aakulu mdziko muno 
  chinanso chomwe chikupangitsa ndalama ya kwacha iguge chakuti la amerika chuma chake chikuyenda kwambiri zomwe zapangitsa ndalama ya dollar ikhale yamphamvu kuposa ndalama zina ndalama ya pound 
  zapangitsa maiko ambiri osauka akhale pachiopsezo chuma chawo sichikuyenda 
  bungwe la international monetary fund imf lomwe limodzi la mabungwe omwe amathandiza lino ndalama msabatayi lati la malawi liyenera kukhwimitsa ndondomeko ya zachuma chake osolola ndalama asiye 
  bungwelo latinso boma lichepetse kusakaza ndalama pazinthu za zii zopanda mutu kuonjezera boma likuyenera kuchitapo kanthu zinthu zitsike mtengo poonetsetsa pali zabwino zoongolera chuma 
  bungwe la amipingo la public affairs committee pac lati asaiwale cholinga cha chikondwererochi poganizira zosakaza ndalama 
  wapampando wa bungweli mbusa felix chingota wati nyengoyi yokumbukira kubadwa kwa mpulumutsi yesu khrisitu osati kungolingalira zonjoya basi 
  inde nyengo yachisangalalo akuyenera kusangalala asaiwale cholinga cha chisangalalocho amapezeka chisangalalo chomwecho avulala nacho mwinanso kutaya nacho moyo mmalo mopata moyo mwa yesu khrisitu adatero chingota

 ambiri amati munthu akapita ku ndende amawona malo olangirako ochimwa zomwe sizoona boma likufuna liphunzitse ku ndende malo osainthirako makhalidwe kaganizidwe ka osati kuwazunza akasinthika kutuluka ku ndende atha kukakhala mzika zodalillika za lino anatero dausi

Text:
tikulumirabe ana chakudya masiku ano pomwe matenda edzi afala mwa nkhani nkhani pakufunika kuonetsetsa zinthu zina zomwe timachita makamaka mokhudzana ana 
  mwachitsanzo tili chizolowezi chosendera nzimbe ana akakhala ana oti mano akungoyamba kumera tikasenda nzimbe inja timailumalumanso isamuvute kutafuna kuonjezera apo timakondanso kuwalumira ana chakudya china mango magwafa zina zotero 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc sitimangochitira ana athu abale anzathu enanso oti tangokumana nawo zikuchitika tsiku tsiku

  nzimbe chimodzi mwa chakudya chomwe zina chimachekacheka mkamwa choncho nkosavuta mabalawa atulutse magazi omwe akhonza kukumana magazi mkamwa mwa mwana mwanayonso atadzicheka kapenanso bala nkamwa

  anawa msinkhu ogairidwa chakudya motere kusenderedwa nzimbe sadziwa kunja kuno kuli matenda amtunduwu sangadziwe kuopsa kwa matendawa angawapewe 
  choncho nkoyenera amene tikudziwa za titengepo gawo lalikulu poteteza miyoyo ya anayi posaiika pachiopsezo chotenga kachirombo ka edzi munjira zogairana chakudya poyesetsa tigwiritse ntchito zida mpeni mmalo mwa mano

 botomani omwenso phungu waku nyumba ya malamulo mdera la zomba chisi ati nyumba 112 zomwe zidawonongeka mphepo ya mkuntho mderalo atsimikizira mdera lawo boma lipereka chisamaliro chokwanira chokudya kwa okhudzidwawo poyankhulapo mwa omwe nyumba yawo idasasuka denga laston kachingwe akwa group village headman chingondo mbomalo ati adakumana ngozi yampheyi madzulo apa 7 november pomwe malata nyumba yawo adachoka mphepo khoma la nyumba lidawagwera kuwavulaza mutu

Text:
apolisi aphunzira kagwiridwe ka ntchito yawo polisi ya nkhotakota yakhala yoyamba kuphunzitsidwa za momwe angagwirire ntchito yawo panthawi ya zipolowe zionetsero 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc maphunzirowa akudza poyanganira chisankho cha pulezidenti makhansala aphungu ku nyumba ya malamulo cha chaka chamawa 
  panthawiyi pamakhala zingapo zotsamwitsa mwina kunyanduka posagwirizana zotsatira zomwe zatuluka kusamvetsetsa momwe zina zachitikira 
  apolisi ndiwo amakhala kalikiliki kukhazikitsa bata pasakhale zipolowe zonse zithere mokomera mbali zonse motsatira chilungamo 
  malinga mneneri wa polisiyo kaitano lubrino ganizolo lidabwera wa apolisi mdziko muno loti dzonzi 
  cholinga nchakuti apolisi onse mdziko muno aphunzitsidwe za momwe angachitire panthawi ya ziwawa pomwe akufuna zionetsero 
  polisi yathu yakhala ya mwayi ndiyo yayamba kuphunzitsidwa za maphunzirowa maphunzirowa adachitika lachinayi june 4 adatero lubrino 
  apolisi 40 adachita nawo maphunzirowo omwe mwazina amaphunzira za momwe angagwiritsire zida zawo yake yomwe angagwiritsire zidazo

Text:
boma la zomba likuchita zaumoyo wolemba thokozani chapola wa zaumoyo mboma la zomba dr raphael piringuwati boma la zomba likuchita ntchito za uchembere wabwino 
 dr piringu amalankhula kwa mtolankhani wathu amene amafuna kudziwa momwe ntchito za umoyo zikuyendera mbomali padakalipano 
 ati chaka chino yekha amene wafera ku chipatala chachingono amayi atatu omwe afera ku chipatala chachikulu cha bomalo yobereka zomwe zikusonyeza ntchitoyi ikuyenda kusiyana momwe zinalili chaka chatha zaka zina zapitazo 
 zaka za mbuyomu ntchito ya uchembere wabwino imavuta pomwe amapezeka amayi ambiri akufera ku zipatala zazingono yobereka zinthu zasintha kwambiri tikuchita anatero dr piringu 
 ati nayo ntchito yoyeza amayi khansa ya khomo la chiberekero yapitanso patsogolo mbomalo 
 mwazina dr piringu ati ntchito zonse za umoyo zikuyenda mbomalo pali zovuta zina zomwe zochepa chabe
Label: HEALTH

Text:
eu world bank dismiss atupele baum i hope this clarifies it the european union eu and the world bank yesterday distanced development partners from remarks by united democratic front udf presidential candidate atupele muluzi purporting that donors will only resume budget support if there will be regime change in the may 20 tripartite elections 
  atupele the youngest of the 12 presidential candidates told rally in mzuzu on sunday that alongside his running mate godfrey chapola they met representatives of the international monetary fund imf the world bank and other development partners last friday 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi he claimed the development partners told opposition leaders they would only support the budget if there is change of government 
  said atupele on friday dr godfrey chapola and i met with world bank international monetary fund imf and malawis donor partners who told us openly that if we do nt change government this year then we will revert to zero deficit budget 
  today the government of malawi has already started to put in place zero deficit budget and you all know what this means the problems we encountered will come back to haunt us if we continue with this government they donors have told us openly that because of cashgate issues of theft and economic mismanagement they will not inject any money if things do nt change 
  but in written response to questionnaire from the nation to verify atupeles claims eu head of delegation alexander baum said whereas he did not personally listen to atupeles address disbursement of budget support is based on macro economic stability as assessed by the imf and the public finance management related assessments of fiduciary risks 
  said baum the malawi government has implemented number of actions but many actions necessary to fix the public finances are still work in progress each partner assesses its fiduciary risks and takes decisions on this basis 
  there are no political criteria linked to budget support in malawi other than what we call the fundamental principles i.e. human rights democracy etc there is consequently not link to specific government and i have doubts that any colleague from the international partners would have said something different i hope this clarifies it 
  in an earlier interview zeria banda who is responsible for communications at the world bank african regional office said when the world bank met with udf members nothing was said regarding elections 
  she said we met with leaders of various political parties including pp peoples party mcp malawi congress party and udf to share our perspectives on the state of the economy and how to sustain reforms for more meaningful economic development we also discussed agricultural reforms we did not touch elections or results thereof 
  malawis national budget is financed 40 percent by donors on the recurrent expenditures and 80 percent on development expenditure last november the countrys major donors under the common approach to budget support cabs to which baum is co chairperson announced the withholding of $ 150 million in budget support in protest over plunder of public resources at capital hill widely known as cashgate 
  last week an imf mission from washington led by tsidi tsikata said the imf will wait for the elections before it releases $ 20 million about k8.4 billion disbursement into the government purse as part of the extended credit facility programme 
  tsikata also said the mission had proposed to return to lilongwe in june to confirm the recommendations agreed before submitting report to the imf management and executive board
Label: POLITICS

Text:

 wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa apolisi mboma la nkhotakota sergeant paul malimwe wati awiriwa omwe emmanuel chisandule zaka 24 zakubadwa forwad mudekwa zaka 42 zakubadwa

 tinanagwira mzika ziwiri za la zimbabwe omwe ananyamula matumba 66 amankhwala ozunguza bongo zomwe zina chitika mbanda kucha wapa 31 august omwe anagwiritsa nseu wa m5 wa nkhotakota salima pambuyo potsinidwa khutu mzika zakufuna kwabwino tinamanga road block yongoyembekezerapo zomwe zinapangitsa tiwagwire mosavuta anatero sergeant malimwe 
 powonjezerapo malimwe apempha malawi akufuna kwabwino apitilize kutsina khutu apolisi pankhani zikulu zikulu anthuwo azimangidwa kukayankha milandu kubwalo la milandu

Text:

 mfumu parishi yi samson kumkumbira ndiwo alankhula lamulungu pambuyo podalitsa nyumba imene bungweri lamangira banja lina lovutika ku chilinde 1 mzinda wa lilongwe 
 ati zomwe achinyamatawa achita zonyadisa kwambiri kaamba koti apereka chitsanzo chabwino chikondi chosaona nkhope poti athandiza munthu amene sali wa mpingo wawo 
 polankhulapo francis berekanyama omwe wapampando wa bungwe la ycw ku parish yi mulungu wakwaniritsa khumbo la gulu lawo lomwe nawo lofuna kumangira ovutika nyumba 
 nkhoswe yathu yosefe woyera amatiphunzitsira ifenso tikutsata mapazi ake pokhala achifundo okonda ntchito za manja anatero berekanyama 
 malinga berekanyama ntchito yomanga nyumbayi yatenga ndalama zokwana 650,000 achinyamatawa alonjeza apitiliza kuthandziza mayiyu mavuto awamangira nyumbayi

Text:
st augustine parish yati ipilira kuthandiza achinyamata mmasewero achinyamata ku parish ya augustine woyera dayosizi ya mpingo wakotolika ya mzuzu awalimbikitsa azikhala otanganidwa nkhani zotukula mpingo wu mdziko muno 
 mlangizi wa achinyamata parish yi samuel nawasha anena loweruka bwalo la za masewero la st augustine pomwe achinyamata mma zoni onse anayi mparishi yi anakumana malo amodzi masewero olimbitsa thupi mpira zina zambiri 
 ndondomekoyi inakhazikitsidwa ambuye john ryan omwe episkopi wa dayosiziyi cholinga chofuna kulimbikitsa achinyamata azikhala otanganidwa zinthu zina pofuna kupewa makhalidwe oyipa omwe angamachite kaamba kosowa zochita 
 program imeneyi muyambitsi weniweni ambuye ryan omwe mwini wa dayosizi ino pofuna kuwapatsa chisamaliro chapadera moyo wawo wauzimu wa wa thupi anatero nawasha 
 mmau ake mwa achinyamata omwe anachita zamasewerowo jonas muhango anayamikira dayosiziyo kamba ka chikonzerochi zomwe wati zithandiza achinyamatawa ozipereka mpingo kudziwana omwe dayosizi yomweyi amakhala maparish

Text:
papa wapereka ambulance kwa ovutika mzinda wa rome mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wapereka galimoto ya wa ambulance izitumikira osauka osowa pokhala 
  malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa wapereka galimoto ya wa ambulanceyi lamulungu 31 may 2020 
 galimoto ya wa ambulanceyi izithandiza popereka chithandizo cha chipatala kwa osauka osowa pokhala omwe amapezeka atagona mmisewu ya mzinda wa rome 
 galimoto ya wa ambulanceyi yomwe ya makono yokhala zipangizo za chipatala izithandiza popereka thandizo la msangamsanga la chipatala kwa osauka osowa pokhala omwe kawiri kawiri amapezeka atagona mmisewu ya mzinda wa rome 
 papa francisco anadalitsa galimoto ya wa ambulanceyi asadaipereke kwa cardinal konrad krajewski yemwe woyendetsa ntchito za chifundo za ofesi ya papa amatchulidwa papal almoner mchingerezi 
 malinga kalata yomwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika latulutsa galimoto ya wa ambulanceyi aipatsa kale malembo oti scv kuimira vatican city state kusonyeza imodzi mwa galimoto za kulikulu la mpingo ku vatican 
 galimoto ya wa ambulanceyi aipatsa dzina la modesta valenti yemwe adamwalira 31 january 1983 mzimayi yemwe adalibe pokhala kugona mmisewu tsiku lomwe adamwalira atadzidzidwa kwambiri amasowa chithandizo cha kuchipatala omwe adali mgalimoto ya wa ambulance ina adakana kumuthandiza ati nsabwe
Label: HEALTH

Text:

Text:
maufulu ayamikira mcp akatswiri andale kudzanso mabungwe oimira ufulu wa mdziko muno ayamikila chipani chachikulu chotsutsa boma cha malawi congress party mcp powonetsa chitsanzo chabwino kwambiri potsata ndale za demokalase posankha mmaudindo kupyolera mnjira yovomelezeka ya chisankho 
  chakwera wachiwiri ku manja limodzi mkazi monica akuluakulu kumsonkhanowo mmiyezi iwiri yotsana ya july kudzanso august chaka chino mcp yachititsa zisankho zigawo za kumwera pakati mmenemo chaika atsopano mmipando yosiyasiyana oyendetsa chipanichi mzigawozo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc katswiri wa ndale ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya university of malawi chigawo cha chancellor college mustapha husseni ati zomwe ikuchita mcp ndiye zoyenera zofunika kwambiri ulamuliro wa demokalase mchipani 
  chipanichi mpofunika kuchiyamikira pazomwe chikuchitazi chikuchita ndale zololerana za intraparty democracy tingoti asaleke zimenezi kumeneku ndiye kulimbitsa chipani mnjira yoyenera atero husseni 
  malinga mneneli wa mcp jessie kabwira chipanichi chichititsanso chisankho chonga chomwechi ku chigawo cha kumpoto ati akuchita zimenezi chipanichi chikhale cholimba ndicholinga chakuti pomadzafika ya chisankho chachikuru chosankha prezidenti wadziko aphungu kudzanso makhansala 2019 chidzakhale cha mphamvu kwambiri mmadera onse adziko lino 
  wa centre for the deveopment of people cedep gift trapence sadabise mau kukhosi ponena zimenezi sizachilendo ai kaamba kakuti ndikofunikiradi kutero maka poyanganila eni ake zipani za ndale wamba omwe ndiwochuruka 
  zotsatira zake nzakuti zinthu zikamayenda motero ambiri amakhala nacho chikhulupiliro chipani choterocho amadziwa pakutero icho chikutsatsa njira zabwino za democracy ndiponso sizifunika mchipani mokhamo ai lonse adatero trapence 
  nawonso timothy mtambo centre for human rights and rehabilitation chrr potsilira ndemanga afotokoza mcp yawonetsa kukhwima nzeru ndale za demokalase poika mmaudindo mchipanichi kudzera mnjira yovomelezeka yachisankho 
  zoonadi iyi njira yabwino kwambiri kusiyana ndikungoloza chala kumangosankhana pakamwa pokha kuwonjezera pamenepa tikupempha zisathere maudindo angonoangono okhawa ai wa pulezident otere zidzikhalanso chimodzimodzi pamenepa sitikunena mcp yokha ai zipani zonse za ndale mdziko muno atero mtambo 
  mtambo anatinso ndizodabwitsa mcp yomwe inkakanitsitsa kubweretsa ndale za demokalse ulamuliro wa chipani chimodzi lero lino ikuposa zipani zina pokhala patsogolo kuwonetsa chitsanzo chabwino ndale za zipani zambiri mdziko muno 
  mtambo anadzudzulanso omwe akuti zikuchita zipani zina mdziko muno posankha mwana kaya mchimwene wa pulezident wa chipanicho mulowa malo pomwe mtsogoleriyo akutula pansi udindo 
  mdziko muno muli ufulu wakuti wina akhoza kupikisana nawo udindo wina uliwonse komabe okhala waufumu osiilana udindo muzipani za ndale ukukhumudwitsa kuwopseza chitetezo cha ndale za democray 
  zoterezi sizabwino nkamodzi komwe zitheretu apatu sitikunena muchipani cha ndale chokha ai lonse la malawi tisawumilize zomwe mwina sakufuna alekeni otsatila chipani asankhe okha munthu yemwe akumufuna kuwatsogolera mchipanimo ndiye tikawonetsetsa kunena mwa chilungamo poyelekeza zipani zina zimenezo sitinaziwone pakali mcp pachifukwachi ndithu tikuwayamikira kuwalimbikitsa zimenezi apitilize adatero mtambo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
maudindo ayamba kuchucha mboma pomwe mtsogoleri wa lino yemwe wangosankhidwa kumene lazarus chakwera wayamba kusankha adindo mbom ku nyumba ya malamulo zinthu zasadabuzika 
  chakwera adayamba nkusankha nduna zisanu zomwe wachiwiri saulos chilima nduna ya mapulani zachuma woyanganira za ogwira ntchito mboma felix mlusu nduna ya zachuma 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc adakana unduna msishakuchoka adasankhanso richard chimwendo banda nduna ya chitetezo cha mdziko modecai msisha nduna ya za malamulo chilungamo ndinso chikosa silungwe mlangizi wamkulu wa boma malamulo msisha adakana udindowo 
  pambali awa chakwera adasankhanso prince kapondamgaga woyanganira ogwira ntchito ku nyumba ya boma zangazanga chikhosi mlembi wamkulu wa boma janet banda wachiwiri 
  chakwera adati pali chikonzero choti asankhe nduna zosaposa 30 pomwe nduna zosachepera 12 zikhale amayi 
  ku nyumba ya malamulo nako kudachitika pelete pomwe omwe adali kutsogolo lero kumbuyo omwe atsogolera akutsatira 
  maudindo mnyumbayo adasintha moti yemwe adali mtsogoleri wa nyumba yonse kondwani nankhumwa mtsogoleri wa mbali yotsutsa boma pomwe chimwendo banda yamwe adali mbali yotsutsa boma mtsogoleri wa nyumba yonse akukhala mpando oyambilira mnyumbayo 
  bright msaka wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dpp nankhumwa simon vuwa kaunda wokhazikitsa bata kumbali ya dpp pomwe mary navicha wachiwiri 
  john chikalimba mtsogoleri wa chipani cha pp noah chimpeni okhazikitsa bata ku mbali ya pp pomwe ackson kalaile banda wachiwiri kwa chimpeni 
  tsopano nyumbayi ikukonzekera zosintha utsogoleri wa makomiti zigwirizane momwe malamulo akagwiridwe kantchito mnyumbayo amanenera malinga malamulowo apampando makomiti sayenera ochokera kuchipani cholamula choncho makomiti onse amene wapampando wachipani cha mcp tsopano asintha 
  chimwendo banda adati mtsogoleri wa nyumba yonse aonetsetsa aphungu akutsatira malamulo nyumbayo zochokera mnyumbayo zizikhala zokomera 
  paja nkhani ya tsogolo lowala ndiye kuwalako kukuyenera kuyambira kwa adindo choncho ndionetsetsa ndigwire ntchito aphungu onse titumikire amalawi adatero chimwendo banda
Label: POLITICS

Text:
namrukhunua nyumba ya chilhomwe kalelo makolo adali njira zawo zochitira zinthu azisangalala wotetezedwa alhomwe nawo zimene makolo adayambitsa zina zimapitirirabe mpaka steven pembamoyo adacheza wotsata chikhalidwe cha alhomwe mumzinda wa lilongwe fustafu mbewe adacheza motere   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc wa alhomwe pali akuti namurukhunua kodi tanthauzo lake nchiyani imeneyi nyumba yozungulira yomwe makolo wa chilhomwe adayambirira kalelo nkumakhalamo kanyumba kameneka kamakhala kakangono kamakhala kopanda chipinda 
  pomanga amagwiritsa ntchito zipangizo zanji timagwiritsa ntchito mitengo tsekera khonje zilambe matope namgoneka zokhala zilambe amalukira mipando masiku ano enanso amagwiritsa ntchito misomali chitseko chimakhala cha kaphe kabala mtengo omwe umapingasa pachitseko 
  ndiye mwati imakhala nyumba yaingono mumakhala angati mmenemo namrukhunua mumakhala awiri banja pali wachitatu ndiye mwana wa mnyumbamo pali ambiri amamanganso tinyumba tambiri pamodzimodzi banja limodzi katundu yense wakukhitchini ziwiya za madzi madengu ufa amakhala mnyumba momwemo 
  pomanga zimakhala pamalo akasosapo bwinobwino amatenga chingwe mitengo nkuyamba kuyeza muja amachitira akafuna nkhokwe akakwanitsa kupimako amazika mitengo mmphepetemo ndikuyamba kuphoma matope akamaliza amafolera tsekera nkukonza chitseko 
  pachibale pawo akalakwirana nkhani zake zimayenda ndanena kale pachibale amamanga nyumba zawo pamodzimodzi kupatula makolo omwe amamanga patali pangono poonekera ndiposavuta kufikapo pakachitika mapokoso amakauza makolo olo zili za mbanja amauza ankhoswe ndikukamba zikalephera ndiye zimakafika kwa amfumu athandizepo 
  nanga amuna chilhomwe zida zawo chiyani alhomwe zida zawo chikwanje chimakhala ngowe nsompho nkhwangwa mpeni omwe amautchinjiriza kachikwama kopangidwa chikopa cha mpeni wa mlhomwe suonekera chisawawa amaubisa umatuluka pokhapokha ukufunika ugwire ntchito 
  alhomwe ntchito yawo chiyani alhomwe amakonda kulima mbewu zomwe amakonda kulima kwambiri kalongonda chinangwa nandolo mbatata nzimbe chimanga mapira tchana chakudya chawo chodalilika nsima zipatso amakondanso nandolo osakaniza makaka 
  nanga mavalidwe amayi chilhomwe amakonda kuvala nsalu andiloko iyi siketi yaitali yomwe amati makisi bulauzi mpango amakonda kusokera nsalu ya biliwita yakuda abambo amakonda kabudula malaya osokedwa nsalu ya khaki 
  tangomalizani mwa magule otchuka chilhomwe 
  pali magule tchopa sekhere jiri povina tchopa amavala zikopa za amaberekera tinthu tokhala kumsanaku mmiyendo muli mawerewesa oti azipanga kaphokoso povina povina sekere amavala mikanda paliponse mkhosi momwe amadzikongoletsa nkhope yonseyi jiri gule yemwe amavinidwa usiku kuli mwezi amavina amuna akazi mwachidule magule ndiye alipo ambiri osangalatsa wa alhomwe

Text:
papa wayamikira bungwe lowona zapamadzi kamba kofalitsa mthenga wabwino wolemba thokozani chapola diomaria.mw/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/francis.jpg 308w sizes="(max width 300px 100vw 300px />papa francisko mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika lonse papa francisco lolemba wayamikira bungwe la international maritime association kamba kodzipereka pofalitsa uthenga wabwino kwa okhala nyanja zikuzikulu lonse 
 papa walankhula kudzera uthenga wpakanena watumizira mamemba bungweli omwe mkati msonkhano wawo wa nambala khumi chimodzi 11 mdziko la taiwan 
 muuthenga wo mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika yu papa francisco wafuniranso zabwino mamembala bungwe li ndikuwalimbikitsa asatope kudzipereka ntchito zawo cholinga choti onse okhala ku madera ku nyanjadzi azitha kupeza uthenga wabwino mosavuta 
 bungwe la international maritime association analikhadzikitsa mchaka cha 1969 cholinga choti lidzithandiza kufalitsa uthenga wabwino kwa okhala mmadera ku nyanja zikuluzikulu lonse moti mwa zina ku msonkhanowu awunikira momwe bungwe li lagwilira ntchito zake zaka 50 zapitazi 
 msonkhano wu wayamba lero 21 udzatha 25 october 2019
Label: RELIGION

Text:
mpira wa nkhodzo za pusi mawa ku sudan muli kanthu kokakatula sizasi mumzinda wa omudurman ku sudan mawali pamene timu ya big bullets iphaphalitsane al hilal mumpikisano wa caf 
  iyi mndime yachiwiri yomwe matimuwa afika asadadzabwerezane kamuzu stadium mumzinda wa blantyre 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi bullets idanyamuka mdziko muno lachitatu pabwalo landege la kamuzu international airport mumzinda wa lilongwe ulendo wa ku sudan 
  kochi wa timuyi nsanzurwino ramadhan adatenga osewera 17 paulendowo 
  kochiyo adatenga vincent gona chimwemwe kumkwawa magoloboyi otchinga kumbuyo sankhani mkandawire miracle gabeya pilirani zonda ian chinyama bashir maunde yamikani fodya 
  osewera pakati adaatenga james chirapondwa fischer kondowe dalitso sailesi victor limbani jaffalie chande henry kabitchi kutsogolo kuli tizgobere kumwenda mussa manyenje 
  timu ya al hilal achiyamba kale pokankha chikopa bullets siyikuyenera kutengera al hilal kumtoso maliro njoka chifuwa timuyi idafikapo mndime yomaliza ya mpikisanowu 1987 1992 
  timuyi yomwe idakhazikitsidwa 1930 mumzinda wa omudurman chaka chatha idafika mmasemifainolo mpikisanowu akatu ka chisanu kufika mndimeyi 
  iyo yakhalapo akatswiri ligi ya mdziko la sudan ya sudan premier league champions ka 27 
  pofuna kuthambitsa bullets timuyi idathotha mphunzitsi patrick aussems wa ku belgium timuyi itagonja 1 0 kmkm mumpikisanowu 
  al hilal idapha 2 0 kmkm pakwawo koyenda idaphikidwa 1 0 timuyi yalemba mphunzitsi wa ku serbia milutin micho sredrojevic amene amaphunzitsa timu ya uganda 
  zonse zili mawa masana matimuwa asadadzabwerezane kamuzu stadium bullets idatulutsa club fomboni ya ku comoros 3 2 
  bullets isadanyamuke ulendowu yapuntha caps united ya ku zimbabwe 2 1 idatibula mafco fc 3 0 awa adali masewero okonzekera mpira wa mawa 
  malinga ramadhan kukonzekeraku nkokwanira akukhulupirira mawa al hilal iwona zakuda pakwawo 
  tidali mavuto angapo pamasewero amene tidali nawo fomboni takonza nokha mwawona momwe tachitira mmasewero amene tasewera posachedwapa adatero ramadhan ponyamuka mdziko muno
Label: SPORTS

Text:
apolisi alandira uphungu paziphuphu bungwe lolimbana wa ziphuphu katangale la anti corruption bureau acb laphunzitsa apolisi mumzinda wa mzuzu za momwe angapewere mchitidwewu 
  malingana kafukufuku yemwe lidachita bungwe la centre for social research 2013 nthambi ya polisi ya road traffic and safety services lidapezeka ndiyo ili patsogolo polandira ziphuphu za katangale mdziko muno 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kafukufukuyo adapezanso nthambi ya road traffic commission nayo ili patsogolo mchitidwewu 
  mwa akuluakulu olimbana mchitidwewu kubungwe la acb patrick mogha adati adachiona chofunika awaphunzitse apolisi madera ozungulira pankhani za ziphuphu athandize kuchepetsa mchitidwewu 
  tidaona chinthu chanzeru tiwaphunzitse polisi za momwe angapewere kudziteteza kumchitidwe wakatangale ziphuphu tidazindikira pochita mchitidwewu sadziwa akulakwira malamulo akubwezeretsa chitukuko cha mmbuyo adatero mogha 
  mogha adaonjeza chikhulupiriro akaphunzitsa apolisi zithandiza kuchepetsa mchitidwewu 
  wachiwiri kwa komishonala wa polisi yemwenso wa nthambi yoonetsetsa apolisi akuchita zinthu moyenera professional standards unit esther wandale adati cholinga chothana wa katangale ziphuphu pakati apolisi ati chikhulupiliro zinthu zisintha 
  cholinga chathu kulimbikitsa apolisi athu azikhala otsata malamulo odalirika zikhoza kutheka pokhapokha akudziwa katangale chiyani kwenikweni adatero wandale 
  mwa oyendetsa galimoto zahayala taxi happy soko adati akuona maphunzirowa athandiza kuchepetsa wa ziphuphu katangale pamsewu 
  idadati apolisi omwe amathandiza kulimbikitsa mchitidwewu pamsewu akadakhala amatsatira malamulo moyenera si bwezi oyendetsa galimowo akuchita mchitidwewu 
  maphunzirowa athandiza ndikuona akadaphatikizanso zikadathandiza kuthana vutoli mwachangu adatero soko
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
6 atsopano apezeka coronavirus wamwalira nambala ya omwe apezeka kachilombo ka coronavirus akuti yafika 23 potsatira kupezekanso kwa asanu 6 kachilomboka mdziko muno 
 walengeza za nkhaniyi namarika mlembi wa unduna wa za umoyo dr dan namarika watsimikiza za nkhaniyi msokhano wa atolankhani mdzinda wa blantyre wati awiri mwa wa afika kumene mdziko muno maiko akunja 
 padakalipano undunawu walengezanso mwa atsopano omwe anapezeka nthendayi mzinda wa lilongwe wamwalira undunawu wati malemuyu analinso mavuto zaumoyo 
 zimenezi zikutanthauza chiwerengero cha amene apezeka kachilomboka mdziko muno tsopano chakwera kuchoka ka 17 kufika 23 pomwe atatu mwa amwalira atatu enanso anachira
Label: HEALTH

Text:

  wati nkothekanso kukhalanso zomwe maiko amatcha masankho apakatikati 
  apa wati sikulakwira malamulo kumupempha pulezidenti atule pansi udindo naye amakhala liwu ganizolo 
  wati pulezidenti atha kuchoka potula pansi udindo mwa yekha achotsedwa potsatira malamulo oikika 
  mwa zina adati malamulo amapereka mpati wokakamiza pulezidenti zingapo 
  adatinso zionetsero zokakamiza pulezidenti atule pansi udindo nkololedwa mmalamulo adziko lino 
  victor sangula wa mmudzi mwa kasitoma kwa t liwonde mboma la machinga wati boma silifuna kuvomereza mavuto omwe adza mdziko muno abwera kaamba kosafuna kukambirana 
  wati nkutheka boma limaganiza msonkhanowo ungalephereke ilo silipezeka 
  sangula wati mutharika atule pansi udindo satero mavuto mdziko muno apitirirabe 
  assam banda wa mmudzi mwa manjeza kwa t kadewere mboma la chiradzulu wati kusapezeka kwa mbalizi kungaunikireponso za udani omwe ulipo pakati paboma amabungwe 
  wati mavuto zachuma ndale omwe mdziko muno ndiwo angakakamize mutharika akapume 
  mfumu ina ya mboma la zombayomwe yapempha tisaitchule dzina imasuke polankhulayati mnyumba muli kusamvana pamafunika kukambirana osati kuchotsa wa mnyumbamo 
  iyo yati boma lidaphonya mwayi posapezeka kuzokambiranako komwe ati kukadapezeka mayankho mavuto omwe achuluka mdziko muno 
  boma lidalakwa apa zikutanthauza mavuto omwe mdziko muno sangathe boma likukana zokambirana idatero mfumuyi 
  t nthache ya mboma la mwanza yati bungwe la pac lidawalambalala kuzokambiranazo kotero apempha bungweli lichititse msonkhano wina omwe udzaitanitse mutharika mafumuwa 
  mfumuyi yati atsogoleri midzi akaitanidwa kuzokambirana eni msonkhanowo amayenera akonze mayendedwe pac sachite 
  iyo yati mafumu amakhulupirira kukambirana adali chile kukakhala nawo pazokambiranazo 
  nthache wati sakupeza choti mutharika atulire pansi udindo zimenezi zingayambitse ziwawa zomwe zingathere mnkhondo 
  nkhondo ya ku mozambique idayambika motere pomwe padalibe kumvana kwa boma adzavutike kumudzi akutero nthache 
  wati pac ichititse msonkhano wina womwe udzameme mafumu mutharika
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
kufumuka si kulakwa olemekezeka nkhani ili mkamwamkamwa panopa yoti nduna ya zaulimi mthirira chitukuko cha madzi george chaponda kudzanso wa bungwe la admarc foster mulumbe atule pansi maudindo komiti yomwe pulezidenti peter mutharika wakhazikitsa ifufuze za nkhani ya chimanga chomwe boma lidagula kudziko la zambia igwire ntchito yake 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu chaponda wanenetsa satula pansi udindo nduna nayenso mulumbe wati sanenapo kanthu pankhaniyi chaponda wati sakuonapo chomwe adalakwa akukhudzidwa nkhani yogula chimanga kudziko la zambia chipulumutse kunjala yomwe yagwa mdziko muno 
  zomwe zikumveka nzakuti pakukhala padalowa chinyengo malinga mmene malonda chimangawo adayendera zili choncho mmalo mongogula chimangacho motchipa ku zambia cooperative federation zcf ogulitsa chimanga ku zambia boma la malawi kudzera ku bungwe la admarc lidaganiza zogula chimangacho pamtengo wodula pogwiritsa ntchito kampani yomwe si ya boma la zambia yotchedwa kaloswe commuter and courier limited mkhalapakati 
  chogwiritsa ntchito kampaniyo pogula chimanga chokwana matani 100 000 boma la malawi lidasakaza ndalama zokwana k26 biliyoni zomwe lidakongola kubanki ya eastern and southern african and development lomwe limadziwikanso pta bank 
  achikhala adangogula chimangacho ku zcf boma likadagwiritsa ndalama zokwana pafupifupi k15 biliyoni basi zikutanthauza boma la malawi lidasakaza ndalama zokwana pafupifupi k9.5 biliyoni zapamwamba pogula chimangacho kudzera kukampani ya kaloswe commuter and courier limited ho zichulukirenji ndalama funso nkumati padali chanji chosankhira njira yogula chimanga pamtengo wokwera chomwechi pomwe njira idalipo yopezera chimangacho pamtengo wotsika apa mpamene pakhota nyani mchira nchifukwa chake amalawi ambiri kuphatikizapo mabungwe osiyanasiyana akuganiza pena pake payenera padalowa chinyengowina ayenera adanyambitapo kena kake ndikukumbukira ina yake joe manduwa yemwe adali wachiwiri kwa nduna ya zaulimi ya bakili muluzi ankayankha mlandundaiwala pangono udali mlandu wanji poti kale limene lija manduwa mwa yekha adatula pansi mpando wonona ponena ankafuna chilungamo chioneke bwinobwino pamlandu posatengera wavala ministerial jacket jekete ya uminisitala 
  mwina chaponda mulumbe akadatengerapo phunziro zomwe adachita manduwa potula pansi udindo zofufuza ziyende myaa popanda zokayikitsa zopingapinga ofufuzawo sawapeza kulakwa zomwe zidachitikazo sindikukayika pulezidenti mutharika adzawabwezera pantchito zawo zofufuzazo zikadzatha
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
flames iyamba zokonzekera lolemba mphunzitsi wamkulu wa timu yayikulu ya lino ya flames meke mwase watulutsa ndandanda wa osewera omwe atumikile timuyi pomwe ikuyembekezeka masewero ake timu ya burkina faso mpikisano wa maiko amuno africa wa african cup of nations 26 march 2020 mdziko la burkina faso 
 watulutsa mndandanda wa osewera mwase polakhula lero msonkhano wa atolakhani omwe unachitikira ku maofesi bungwe loyendetsa mpira mdziko muno la fam ku chiwembe mzinda wa blantyre mwase wati osewerawa akuyenera kuyamba zokonzekera zawo lolemba 2 march 2020 timuyi isanachite masewera ake opimana mphanvu timu ya la zambia 
 mwa osewera omwe mphunzitsiyi wawayitana koyamba paul ndovi wa timu ya mafco komaso mphatso magaleta yemwe amasewera timu ya ntopwa chiwerengero chonse cha osewera akuno kumudzi omwe mphunzitsiyu wawayitana ku zokonzekerazi okwana 31 
 mwazina mwase wati alimbikitsa osewerawa adzachite masewero ake timu ya burkinafaso
Label: SPORTS

Text:
dipo la chithyolakhola limawawa pazovuta munthu akakwatira mkazi mongozemba osatsata ndondomeko amati wathyola khola ikafika yoti munthu otere alongosole banja amalipitsidwa madipo osiyanasiyana kwa makolo malume mkaziyo limodzi mwa madipowo limatchedwa chithyolakhola steven pembamoyo adacheza gogo eveline posiano ku mchinji za dipoli 
  choyamba agogo talongosolani dipo chiyani   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu dipo chidule cha malipiro tidziwa malipiro amaperekedwa mwaufulu mokakamizidwa kutengera cholinga cha malipirowo kupereka malipiro dipo mokakamizidwa pamakhala pali mlandu pomwe dipo la mtendere sipakhala mlandu 
  chindapusacho chimapitanso kwa amfumu chabwino tikukamba za dipo la chithyolakhola limeneli dipo lanji ili limodzi mwa madipo milandu mlandu umakhala wokhudzana za banja chodzadzidwa nchinyamata zina amangotengana nkukwatirana osadziwitsa makolo mwambo imakwana yoti zinthu zilongosoledwe ndiye pamenepo pamavuta 
  kuvuta kwake kotani chomwe chimachitika nchoti potengana mudangobana pachikhalidwe chathu pokwatira mkazi mwamuna amayenera kupeleka dipo lomwe amati chimalo ili limakhala dipo lomverera poyerekeza mwatsata mwambo mwalemekeza makolo tikakhala achewa imakhala nkhuku yomwe amati ya chinkhoswe ndalama yokwana kugula nkhukuyo pakakhala zoonjezera ndiye zimakhala zongogwirizana pakati mabanja awiriwo sizikhala chithyolakhola 
  tsopano timve za chithyolakhola 
  chithyolakhola ndilo dipo lowawa kwambiri akuchikazi ampangira chipsera mtima udawaderera poyamba potenga mwana wawo osawadziwitsa amafuna ukhale mantha uli wankhanza mwana wawoyo ukamusamale dipolo silipita kwa makolo amalume okha ayi amfumu udaphotchola mmudzi mwawo choncho nawo amayenera kupepesedwa akawonkhetsa zonse zomwe ukuyenera kulipira chithyolakhola pokha umadziwanso akulangadi 
  nanga utaona zanyanya sungangomusiya mkaziyo poti masiku ano achinyamata alibe mantha umunthu mwina zikhoza kutheka taganizirani poti nthawiyi yadza chazovuta mwina mosakuluwika mkazi wamwalira mwadzidzidzi ndiye sungakayike kwanu akwawo osavomereza ukapita naye kwawoko amakati akufuna munthu wamoyo yemwe udaba utathyola khola lawo apa ouma mtuma amati sitiyika kaye maliro mpaka mlandu ukambidwe zonse zoyenera zichitikiretu ndiyetu chithyolakhola chake amanena choti ukhaule akudziwa uli msampha osapeweka pamenepa abale ako amatha kukuthawa mukakumana wovuta wosamvetsa pachilungamo chake sikukhala kuvuta kungoti amadziwa mukangoika maliro mwina uthawa basi apusa 
  nanga akakhala mkaziyo sudakamutenge kwawo adadzangokulowera mnyumba yekha mpomwe pamafunika kudziwa kutsata mwambo pamenepo iweyo mwamuna ukudziwa mwambo wakwanu ukuyenera kulingalira zotsatira za kukhalira limodzi kwanuko choyenera nkuuza akwanu adzamuthamangitse walephera kutero wekha apo ayi umakauza akwanu atsatire kwawo kwa mkaziyo kukafotokoza chomwe chachitika akuluakuluwo amagwirizana chochita apa umakhala watsata mwambo walemekeza makolo mkaziyo pokawagwadira apa sipakhala za chithyolakhola ayi 
  nanga mkazi oti adzakutulira wamuchimwitsa zimakhala bwa kukutulira mkazi kuli chisinsi chimodzi osakana ukudziwa mkaziyo udamuchimwitsadi ndiwe chomwe amafuna makolo nkuchoka manyazi kotero amangofuna zinthu zilongosoke mimbayo isadaonekere patali apa mumangokambirana za dipo la chimalo miyambo ina sipakhala dipo la chithyolakhola kenako mumapanga chinkhoswe nkutengana zinazo nkumakazionera kubanja komweko 
  lamulo latsopano lokhudza za mabanja limati mwamuna mkazi akangokhalira limodzi kokwana miyezi isanu basi banja lakwana kodi apa munthu sungatetezedwe ku chithyolakhola choti mudziwe nchoti chikhalidwe chidakhalako kuyambira kalekale malamulo asadabwere kupatula nzika za timayenera malamulo malamulo nawo sadabwere kudzaononga chikhalidwe zomwe mukunena nzamukhothi zachikhalidwe zimathera pabwalo la anfumu mkanyumba komata mmenemo mulibe malamulo mukune nawo ndiye siyani kuganiza mobwerera mmbuyo poti mudapita kusukulu ndiye zachikhalidwe mulibe nazo ntchito makolo anu tidakulira momwemu mwabadwira momwemu tsono tiyeni tilemekeze chikhalidwe
Label: CULTURE

Text:
chipatala cha vatican chasiyanitsa ana omwe anabadwa ophatana chipatala cha likulu la mpingo wa katolika lonse chachita opareshoni atsikana awiri omwe anabadwa mophatikana 
 malinga malipoti vatican radio chipatala cha ana cha bambino gesu mzinda wa rome mdziko la italy chakwanitsa kupanga opareshoni atsikana awiri omwe anabadwa mophatikana atsikanawa 
 ana ake pambuyo powalekanitsa atsikanawa ku chipatala china mdziko la central african republic chomwe papa francisco adachiyendera mchaka cha 2015 
 ervina prefina atsikana omwe adabadwa zaka ziwiri zapitazo adabadwa ophatikana matupi 
 kwa chaka chathunthu madokotala akhala akuwapima atsikanawa maka apeze njira ya yoti nkuwathandizira choncho athe payekha osadalira ziwalo za thupi la mzake 
 poyamba anawo amawoneka chonchi malipoti ati woyendetsa chipatala cha ana cha bambino gesu cha likulu la mpingo wa katolika lonse vatican chomwe chili ku rome mdziko la italy mariella enoc ku bangui mdziko la central african republic komwe kulinso chipatala cha ana chomwe chimalandira thandizo ku vatican papa francisco adayendera chipatalachi pomwe anakacheza mdzikolo mchaka cha 2015 
 atawaona anawa enoc anaganiza zowatumiza anawa moperekezedwa anawa ku rome 
 masiku apitawa madokotala anawapanga opareshoni yowasiyanitsa matupi yomwe malipoti akuti inayenda 
 naye wa anawa wati anawa moti akusewera zonse zomwe ana akuti nao anawa akufuna adzakhale madokotala adzathandize 
 mmawu ake wa anayu wati akuthokoza osiyana siyana omwe agwira ntchito yotamandikayi mwa njira ya padera papa francisco cha chithandizo chomwe akupereka kwa ana osiyana siyana 
 opareshoni ya anawa akuti inali ya maola 18 madokotala anamwino opitirira 30 omwe anagwira ntchitoyi 
 ervina prefina anabadwa 29 june mchaka cha 2018 tsiku lomwe mpingo wa katolika lonse umachita chaka cha petulo paulo oyera
Label: HEALTH

Text:
sukulu za katolika 7 zitsekulidwa mkangano wa hijab watha pali chiyembekezo chakuti sukulu zisanu ziwiri za mpingo wa katolika zomwe zinatsekedwa cha kusamvana nkhani ma hijab omwe ophunzira achisilamu amafuna adziloredwa kuvala kumutu msukulu ati zitha kutsekulidwa pamene sukulu zina zidzatsekulidwe nthenda ya covid-19 ikadzatha 
  oyanganira maphunziro msukuluzi dayosizi ya mangochi felix masamba ati zili chomwechi potsatira zokambirana zomwe nazo atsogoleri osiyanasiyana zamaphunziro msukuluzi 
 anenanso pamene amakumana magulu aphunzitsi mafumu magulu oyendetsa sukuluzi sukulu ya sekondale yoyendera ya st marys mboma la machinga 
 tikugwirizana kwambiri mafumu okondwa zimenezi tagwirizana tikatsekulira sukuluzi sipapezekanso ophunzira ovala hijab mafumu alonjeza ayitanitsa msonkhano kuwafotokozera makolo sukulu ikazayamba mwana azabwera kholo lake kuzasayinira samavala hijab natero masamba 
 mmawu ake senior group village headman chileka yati mderalo agwirizana zakuti sukuluzi zikatsekulidwa pasapezeke ophunzira wovalanso chovala chotchedwa hijab ponena akuyenera malamulo sukulu osati chipembedzo
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
com ipereka mipando matebulo 563 msukulu ku mangochi wolemba thokozani chapola ndo-kumanzere-ndi-a-mzunga-kumanja.jpg 1080w sizes="(max width 427px 100vw 427px />dr mipando kumanzere kupereka tebulo kwa mzunga kumanja sukulu ya ukachenjede yosula madokotala mdziko muno ya college of medicine yapereka mipando matebulo okwana 563 msukulu za mboma la mangochi 
 polankhula popereka thandizoli wa sukuluyi dr mwapatsa mipando ati apereka thandizoli pofuna kuthokoza mderali kaamba koti malo amene ophunzira kusukulu ya ukachenjedeyi amakakhala njira imodzi yophunzira za ntchito yawo 
 patha zaka 27 pomwe sukulu ya ukachenjedeyi inayamba kugwira ntchito mderali komwe ophuzira ake amakakhalako kwa sabata kuphunzira moyo wa kafukufuku wosiyanasiyana 
 talandira katundu watsopano ku boma choncho tinawona katunduyi yemwe timagwiritsa ntchito kale wabwinobwino tizapereke kunoko kwa omwe takhala tikugwirako ntchito kwa zaka 27 osati kuzangowapempha tizachiteko research zina basi ayi nafenso tiwathandize zomwe tili nazo aantero dr mipando 
 apempha makampani mabungwe awathandize kukonzetsa katundu yemwe woonongeka akufunitsitsa ataperekanso ku sukulu zina athandizire ophunzira kulimbikira maphunziro 
 sukulu zomwe zalandira zipangizozi za mikombe miwawe lungwena zomwe zikupezeka zone ya st joseph mdera la mfumu namabvi mbomalo 
 dr mipando tipitiriza kuthandiza polankhulapo mwa akuluakulu kuofesi yoona za maphunziro mbomalo noel mzunga thandizoli lithandiza kuchepetsa mavuto kusiyira sukulu panjira mderali 
 ndife okondwa kwambiri thandizoli mbuyomu ana amalembera mayeso pansi zomwe zomvetsa chisoni kwambiri ana amasiya sukulu amawona akapita ku sukulu akakhala pansi pomwe kunyumbanso amakhala pansi ndiye zomwe talandirazi zikhala chilimbikitso kwa anawa anatero mzunga 
 apempha aphunzitsi ophunzira makolo okhala mmidzi yozungulira sukuluzi atenge gawo posamalira katunduyu 
 kupatula mipando matebulo zomwe zaperekedwa kwa ophuzira college of medicine yaperekanso mipando tebulo zapamwamba za ofesi ya mphunzitsi wamkulu ofesi ya aphunzitsi ayikamo mipando yokwana 15 sukulu iliyonse mwa sukulu zitatuzi
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
mpoya akhazikitsa thumba la ndalama zolipilira ana sukulu phungu wa m`dera la mtonya m`boma la zomba nedson mpoya wati komiti yomwe isankhidwe iyendetse thumba ia ndalama zolipilira ana osowa sukulu fizi m`sukulu bursary m`derali iwonetsetse yalemba ana oyenera 
 mpoya omwe amayimira chipani cha udf m`delaro wati ndalama zimenezi constituency development fund cdf choncho oyang`anira thummali phungu waku nyumba ya malamulo choncho wa akuyenera kuonetsetsa pasankhale kukondera katangale posankha ana ovutikawa omwe azilipilipiridwa sukulu komitiyi 
 mwazina wachenjezanso omwe akumagulitsa ma form ogwilitsira ntchito yolembera ophunzirawa akkapezeka alandila chilango popeza ma form wa aulele 
 chomwe ndikufuna kutanthauza kwambiri tidagozindikira ma form atabwera ku ma constituency kwanthu kuno ndiye timafusa maform wa abwera anatero mpoya 
 mpoya ati ndondomekoyi si momwe adakonzera poyamba ati zakhala chomwechi choti zinthuzi zangochitika mwadzidzidzi
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
papa wayamikira akayidi ndende ya padua mdziko la italy mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wathokoza akayidi ndende ya padua mdziko la italy 
 papa umodzi mwa maulendo ake oyendera akayidi malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican anathokoza akayidiwa pokonza mapemphero njira ya mtanda ya chaka chino zomwe wati zawonetsa ukulu wa mulungu pakati pawo 
 pamenepa papa wati apitiriza kupemphelera akayidiwo mulungu adziwatetedza njira zosiyanasiyana pomwe ku ndendeko
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
dct ikuthana woba mankhwala bungwe la development communication trust dct lati ndilokhutira momwe ntchito zake za project ya titeteze umoyo wabwino yomwe akuyitcha influencing citizen participation against drug pilferage yayambira mboma la mangochi 
 mwa akulu akulu mbungwe li mbomalo zione mayaya mkanda omwe anena pomwe bungwe li limafotokozera adindo zachitukuko za momwe ntchito za bungwe li zakhala zikuyendera chiyambireni mwezi wa february chaka chino mbomalo 
 ati momwe bungwe li lawonera zikusonyeza mdera la mfumu yayikulu chilipa komwe akugwirako ntchito yi tsopano ayamba kudziwa za udindo wotetedza miyoyo yawo nkhani za umoyo zina zambiri 
 ntchitoyi yapereka mphamvu liwu kwa nkhani yokhudza mankhwala mzipatala akumatha kuwulura omwe amagula kugulitsa mankhwala mosavomerezeka anatero mkanda 
 ati padakalipano ntchitoyi yapita patsogolo kwambiri yathandiza kukweza umoyo wa mdera la chilipa mboma la mangochi
Label: HEALTH

Text:
president morales wathawira mdziko la mexico wolemba thokozani chapola -content uploads/2019/11 morales.jpg alt= width="265 height="355 />wapita mdziko la mexico president morales patangodutsa tsiku limodzi mtsogoleri wa la bolivia evo morales atatula pansi udindo wavomera kupita mdziko la mexico cholinga choti atetezedwe potsatira ziwonetsero zomwe zikuchitika mdzikolo 
 malipoti wailesi ya bbc ati pulezidenti morales polankhula tsamba lake la twitter wati akumva kuwawa akuchoka mdziko lake wanenetsa abweleranso mphamvu mdzikolo 
 padakali woona za chitetezo mdzikolo wauza asilikali dzikolo achite ubale apolisi omwe asemphana otsatira chipani cha morales 
 mdziko la bolivia akhala akuchita ziwonetsero zosonyeza kusakondwa zotsatira za chisankho chomwe chinachitika mdzikolo mwezi watha pomwe pulezidenti morales anapambana kachinayi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
nkhawa ikulirakulira pankhani ya zaumoyo mabungwe omwe si aboma ati mavuto mgonagona omwe akuoneka nkhani za umoyo mdziko muno umboni wakuti chipani cholamula cha democratic progressive dpp sichikukwaniritsa zomwe chidalonjeza pomwe chinkachita misonkhano yokopa achivotere pachisankho cha chaka chatha 
  kuperewera kwa ogwira ntchito zaumoyo kusowa kwa mankhwala kusowa kwa chakudya ganizo la boma lochepetsa chakudya chomwe limapereka kwa odwala mzipatala mwa mavuto omwe mabungwewa ati akula padakalipano 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka anamwino kukapereka madandaulo ku nyumba ya malamulo wa bungwe loona za ufulu wa nkhani za umoyo charles nyirenda wati zomwe boma likupanga pochita zinthu modzidzimukira msampha waukulu miyoyo ya 
  nyirenda mwa oimira mabungwe amene athirapo ndemanga zomwe zikuchitika mdziko muno makamaka pankhani ya za umoyo wa womwe uli pachiswe cha mikwingwirima yomwe unduna wa za umoyo akukumana nayo 
  adati mmene zinthu zikuyendera pankhani za umoyo tsogolo lenileni silikuwoneka kukadakhala boma likadangopanga imodzi nkuikhazikitsa osati kuvinavina 
  poyamba nkhani imene idavuta yakuti azilipira mzipatala yomwe idatsutsidwa mpaka kuzilala akuti odwala azidya kamodzi patsiku mankhwala mzipatala sakupezeka akumawauza akagule okha tsono apa zikusiyana pati nkulipira kuchipatala adatero nyirenda 
  adati chidali chanzeru kuyamba kulipiritsako bola ovutika odwala azidya chakudya chokwanira mankhwala azigwira ntchito mthupi 
  mwa omenyera maufulu mdziko muno gift trapence adati boma likuyenera kuyankhapo nkhawa zomwe kudzera kumabungwe akupereka mdziko muno lidawalonjeza kukonza mavuto amene akukumana nawowo 
  apa nkhani yoti boma lichitepo kanthu msanga lidalonjeza lokha asadalisankhe ndiye zisakhale akupempha ayi akungokumbutsa zomwe adalonjezededwa adatero trapence 
  mavutowatu akudza patangotha pafupifupi chaka miyezi 6 kuchoka pomwe chipani cha dpp chidayamba kulamula chitapambana pachisankho cha mwezi wa may 2014 
  chisankho chisadachitike chipanicho chidalonjeza chidzatukula nkhani zaumoyo poonetsetsa chiwerengero cha ogwira ntchito zaumoyo chokwanira mankhwala akupezeka mzipatala kutukula moyo wa ogwira ntchito zachipatala kuchepetsa imfa zokhudza uchembere 
  malonjezowo choncho boma lidaplephera kulemba ntchito madotolo 51 amene adamaliza maphunziro kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya college of medicine chonsecho bungwe la zaumoyo padziko lino la world health organisation who limati madotolo 23 alionse ayenera kuthandiza 10 000 ku malawi madotolo awiri amathandiza odwala 100 000 
  posachedwa amalawi zikwizikwi mboma la rumphi adayenda ulendo wokapereka madandaulo kwa dc wa mbomalo pokhudzidwa odwala akulandira chakudya kamodzi patsiku pomwe akumwa mankhwala ofunika chakudya chokwanira 
  ulendo wokapereka zodandaula za chakudya udakonzedwa mgwirizano wa mabungwe omwe si aboma mbomalo wapampando wa mgwirizanowo eunice banda adati zomwe zikuchitikazi zikusonyeza boma likulephera kukwaniritsa lonjezo 
  kutengera zomwe adalonjeza pulezidenti sadzalola munthu kumwalira njala tikuona zomwe zikuchitikazi zikusonyeza kulephera kukwaniritsa lonjezolo adatero banda 
  adati si zoona munthu yemwe akulandira mankhwala aziperewera chakudya mthupi mwake mankhwala amagwira ntchito chakudya 
  poona sizikuwayendera pantchito yawo anamwino adakaperekanso chikalata chawo ku nyumba ya malamulo pozizwa ganizo la boma lakuti anamwino amene adalembedwa kale ntchito akayesedwenso 
  mchikalata chawo anamwinowo adadandaula za momwe ntchito za umoyo zalowera pansi mdziko muno momwe umoyo wa amalawi wakhudzidwira zomwe adati gwero lake kusalingalira nkhani za umoyo pakati atsogoleri 
  mchikalatachi adatinso okhudzidwa boma likulephera kulemba madotolo anamwino omwe adamaliza maphunziro chonsecho ogwira ntchito zachipatala ochepa zomwe zimachititsa ntchito yawo iziwawa 
  nduna ya zachuma chitukuko goodall gondwe ati pali mpumulo kumbali nkhani ya chiwerengero cha madotolo anamwino maiko omwe amathandiza lino avomereza boma likhoza kugwiritsa ntchito ndalama zina zomwe zidali za ntchito yolimbana malungo chifuwa chachikulu matenda edzi polemba ntchito madotolo anamwino omwe lidalephera kuwalemba

 ansembe pafupifupi 65 otumikira arch dayosizi yi omwe achita nawo msonkhanowo komwe mwa zina akumbutsana za mwezi wa wapadera wa chibalalitso extra ordinary missionary month

Text:

  matenda mphere amakhudza khungu la munthu amayambika kachilombo kakangono kamene kamapezeka muchakudya mchingerezi   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kachilomboka kamatchedwa mite asayansi amakatcha sarcoptes scabiei

  matendawa amafala kachilomboko kapita pakhungu la munthu wina amafala kwambiri pamene munthu amene wakhudzidwa matendawa wakhudzana mnzake pogonana mosadziteteza 
  matendawa amafala kwambiri moti 2010 oposera 100 miliyoni padziko ndiwo adakhudzidwa matendawa

  kukandaku kumafika palekaleka usiku pamene ukugona kuyabwakutu kumachitika tizilombo tija timakhala tikuyendayenda mthupimo 
  matendawa amafalanso posinthana zovala zopukutira mukasamba zofunda matendawa angathe pathupi la munthu kwa masiku atatu osapatsira munthu 
  kugwiritsira ntchito mankhwala permethrin ivemectin kumachepetsa kufala kwa matendawa mpaka lero palibe mankhwala amene amachiza matendawa 
  munthu wa ukhondo kungathandize usadwale matendawa zomwe achipatala amalimbikitsa muyenera kumasamba zovala zizikhala zochapa malo ogona akhale okonzedwa

Text:

Text:

  malinga kuonongeka kwa sitimayo kwachititsa chiyembekezo chimene anthuwo adali nacho kwa miyezi 10 pomwe sitimayo imakozedwa chilowe mmadzi akuya 
  moyo ukuvuta likoma sitimayo si ikuyenda ntchito za chitukuko zaimiratu cha vuto la mayendedwe adatero mkumpha 
  sitimayo idafa sabata zapitazo cha mavuto zidachitika sitimayo itangoyenda maola ochepa patatha miyezi 10 akuikonza kukonzako kudadya us$2 miliyoni zoposa k800 miliyoni 
  mneneri wa kampani yoyendetsa sitimayi ya malawi shipping company adati ayambanso kuikonza zitsulo zina zikafika mdziko muno 
  tikuyembekeza zitsulo zimene kampani ya barloworld ipeze sitimayi iyambanso kuyenda ikangokonzedwa adatero msowoya

Text:
t bwananyambi alowa mmanda wolemba thokozani chapola 9/10 bwananyambi.jpg alt= width="733 height="412 />amalimbikitsa maphunziro atsikana t bwananyambi mfumu bwananyambi ya mboma la mangochi yomwe yamwalira ku chipatala cha queen elizabeth central mdzinda wa blantyre yalowa mmanda 
 mlembi wa bungwe la mafumu mboma la mangochi t chowe imfayi yadza kaamba ka nthenda yothamanga magazi 
 t chowe auza radio maria malawi boma la mangochi lataya munthu wofunikira kwambiri kumbali yokweza maphunziro aatsikana 
 mdera lake lonse ana aakazi samalekera sukulu panjira amathetsa maukwati ana achichepere timakapemphako mzeru choncho tisowa mzeru zawo anatero t chowe 
 t bwananyambi yemwe mfumu yokhayo yaikazi mboma la mangochi ayikidwa mmanda ku likulu lawo ku ndumundu ku namwera mboma la mangochi 
 polankhulapo mfumu ya wa chiyao paramount chief kawinga yati wachiyao wataya munthu ofunikira kwambiri chitukuko cha deralo ponena mfumuyi inalinso patsogolo kulimbikitsa ntchito zakusasiyana pakati amayi abambo mbomalo 
 munthu amene amagwiritsa ntchito umayi polimbikitsa amayi akhale mmaudindo osiyanasiyana chitsanzo chabwino mp lilian patel amalimbikitsanso maphunziro atsikana mdera mwawo boma lonse la mangochi anatero paramount chief kawinga 
 mfumuyi yapempha achibale achite bata pambuyo pake asankhe munthu wa makhalidwe abwino inalili mfumu yamwalirayi yomwe dzina lawo lenileni linali atinga sande 
 imfa ya mfumu bwananyambi ikudza patangotha mwezi umodzi mfumu amidu ya mboma la balaka yomwenso ya wa chiyao itamwalira
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
kafukufuku wa cashgate sadayankhe mabungwe omwe si aboma ati zotsatira za kafukufuku wa kubedwa kwa ndalama za boma cashgate kulikulu la lino zomwe boma latulutsa sabata ino zangokanda pamwamba nkhani zikuluzikulu zomwe amalawi amayembekezera 
  mabungwewa ati imodzi mwa nkhani zikuluzikulu zomwe zotsatira za kafukufukuyu sizidachite kubisa maina makampani omwe akukhudzidwa nkhaniyi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc john kapito wa bungwe loona za ogula kugwiritsa ntchito katundu wosiyanasiyana yemwenso amakonda kulankhulapo pankhani za mmene zinthu zikuyendera mdziko muno wati zotsatirazo zikadatchula maina makampani okhudzidwa adziwe 
  munthu yemwe akutsatira za nkhaniyi akuyembekezera kudziwa makampani omwe adasakaza chuma chawo zotsatirazi zangokhazikika kuchuluka kwa ndalama zosokonekerazo momwe zidasokonekerera basi zomwe adamva kale watero kapito 
  boma lidapereka mphamvu kukampani ya ku britain ya baker tilly business services ichite kafukufuku wakuya pankhaniyi idapeza ndalama zonse zomwe zidasokonekera k13.6 biliyoni 
  malingana zotsatira zomwe zatulutsidwazo kampaniyi idalephera kuulutsa maina makampani okhudzidwa poopa kusokoneza milandu ya nkhaniyi yomwe pakalipano ili kukhoti 
  pakadalipano milandu yokwana 70 ili mmabwalo milandu momwe osiyanasiyana ogwira ntchito mboma akuwafunsa alongosole za mmene adapezera chuma chankhaninkhani omwe adapezeka ndalama zambiri 
  nduna ya zachuma maxwell mkwezalamba wati kafukufukuyo sadalondole pandalama zomwe zidasokonekera ati ochita kafukufukuyo adafukula mbali zina zomwe samayenera kukhudzako 
  ndalama zenizeni zomwe zidasokonekera k6.1 biliyoni osati k13.6 biliyoni mmene zotsatira za kafukufukuyu zikusonyezera akatswiri omwe kafukufukuyu adapeza k13.6 biliyoni adalowerera mmadera omwe samafunika kukhudzamo watero mkwezalamba polongosola 
  kutengera nyuzipepala ya the nation ya lachiwiri lapitali akatswiri omwe adachita kafukufukuyu adzudzula banki ya reserve bank of malawi mabanki angonoangono polephera ntchito yawo kulekerera ndalama zambiri zikupita mmadzi 
  kafukufukuyu wati mwa maakaunti 554 kubanki aboma akatswiri ochita kafukufukuyu adaloledwa maakaunti 11 okha zomwe mabugwe ati nzogwetsa mphwayi kukhulupirira zotsatira za kafukufukuyo 
  mwa akuluakulu mabungwe omwe si aboma lucky mbewe wa bungwe loona achinyamata akupatsidwa mphamvu zokwanira zotenga nawo mbali pachitukuko wati boma silikuonetsa chidwi pankhani ya kusokonekera kwa ndalamaku 
  wati nzika za lino amalawi ufulu wodziwa chilichonse pankhaniyi wapempha boma lisinthe mmene likutengera nkhaniyi kupanga zakupsa amalawi akhale chikulupiriro mboma lawo

Text:

   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu awiriwa akuti adakumana kuofesi ya maphunziro ku nathenje 2014 atamaliza maphunziro zauphunzitsi komwe amakolongosola za komwe azikagwirira ntchito

  akuti panthawi yomwe amayembekezera kuthandizidwa mpamene adapeza mwayi wolankhulana msungwanayo adacheza mpaka kupatsana nambala za foni 
  kusiyana kwa pamenepo kudali madzulo atalandira thandizo kudali kusiyana pamaso chabe macheza adapitirira kudzera palamya

  akuti chikondi chake regina chidakula kwambiri kaamba ka khalidwe lake lokonda kupemphera zinthu mwa nzeru modzilemekeza mwasangala 
  regina adati poyamba adamutenga amos mchimwene pangonopangono chikondi chidayamba kumugwira moti samafunanso amos adzagwe mmanja mwa munthu wina 
  adati amakanakana poyamba mtima udali utalola kale amafuna kuona amos adalidi munthu wachilungamo wosangofuna kumuseweretsa

 nthalika alankhula mbindikiro wa tsiku limodzi wa bungwe la abambo la catholic men organization cmo mparishiyo 
 ati abambo udindo waukulu zochitikachitika za mpingo kotero ndikofunika adzikhala patsogolo pazochitika zilizonse mpingowu 
 azibambo gawo lalikulu mumpingo kaamba koti amene mutu wa mawanja ndiye akuyenera akhale patsogolo kulimbikitsa akazi kutenga nawo gawo zochitika chitika zamumpingo anatero nthalika 
 poyankhulapo wapampando wa bungwe la abambo la ku holy trinity matawale parish dayosizi ya zomba nicholas mwisama ati anakonza cholinga chofuna wina adziwe udindo mpingo 
 abambo akuyenera kudziwa mutu wa mpingo akuyenera patsogolo kuphunzitsa onse zabwino zachikhristu kutenga nawo gawo mmiyambo iyi anatero mwisama

Text:
tidziwane enock balakasi wa joy radio atolankhani mdziko muno amakumana zokhoma zambiri makamaka pofuna zoti auze wa amalawi mwa zifukwa zina kusoweka kwa lamulo lothandiza atolankhaniwa azitha kutola nkhani paliponse popanda chowapinga nkhani yomwe pakalipano ili mkamwamkamwa steven pembamoyo adacheza enock balakasi wa kanema wayilesi ya joy pankhaniyi 
  balakasi ufulu wolemba uli papepala basi dzina lako ndani mbale   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu dzina langa enock balakasi wachiwiri mbanja la ana 7 ndimachokera mmudzi mwa matandika kwa t nkula mboma la machinga ndimayanganira ofesi ya lilongwe ya kanema wayilesi ya joy ndidalembedwa ntchito mkonzi mtolankhani 
  udayamba liti za utolankhani utolankhani ndidauyamba 2007 nditamaliza maphunziro anga kusukulu yophunzitsa ntchito ya blantyre business college yemwe adandilimbikitsa nditsatire za utolankhani malume anga dr rodrick mulonya ndikupitirizabe maphunziro zautolankhani sindidafike pomwe ndimafuna 
  zimaonekatu atolankhani mdziko muno amavutika apeze nkhani kodi vuto nchiyani choyamba ndivomereze ufulu wolankhula kulemba ulipo kandodo kokwapulira kamakhala mkhundu ufuluwu umaoneka uli papepala basi ukwaniritsidwe pamavuta mwachitsanzo chabe atolankhani akhala akugubuduka kupempha pakhale lamulo lowapatsa mphamvu zogogoda khomo lililonse kukatola nkhani lija amati access to information ati zikuoneka akuluakulu maganizo pankhani imeneyi lamuloli litangotheka zonse zikhoza nkumayenda pantchito ya utolankhani 
  nkani ina ndiyakuti zambiri mdziko muno pamatenga chomwe chachitika chimveke momwe maiko anzathu amachitira pamenepanso nkhani ya lamulo lomweli mbali ina tikhoza kunena lamuloli limatengapo gawo lake kwakukulu kusowa kwa zipangizo nyumba zambiri zoulutsa kusindikiza nkhani muno malawi zilibe zipangizo zokwanira momwe makampani akunja mukunenawo mwachitsanzo kuno kwathu pakakhala zochitika zambiri timadalira omwe akonza zochitikazo anyamule atolankhani komwe kuli kulakwitsa pamenepo mumakhala mwayamba kale kugwa mbali ya okutenganiwo njira yabwino ikadakhala yoti makampani oulutsa kusindikiza nkhani akhale zipangizo zawozawo akafuna kukatola nkhani asamakhale mbali ina iliyonse
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
papa wapempha aleke manyazi nkhani za mulungu mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wapempha khristu asamachite manyazi kuwonetsa kukondwa kwawo nkhani za mulungu 
 papa wanena nsembe ya ukalistia yomwe anatsogolera lero ku tchalitchi la casa santa marta 
 kufalitsa uthenga wa mulungu kutha kosavuta khristu azifalitsa uthengawu mtima wokondwa 
 papa anapitiriza kunena kupatula mulungu akhristu ayenera kugawira wina nzake madalitso omwe nawo momwe davide anachitira 
 mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolikayu anapitiriza kunena khristu akuyenera mokondwa kukondwa kwake kosapitilira muyezo

Text:

  tidakwera galimoto la wina kulowera ku lilongwe si timapita kuja kulikulu la boma kumene masamu ogula mmera asokonekera

  nsataye nazo 
  chaka chino talowa talowa adani omwe akufuna moyo wanga aononge chauta thandizeni iyi nyimbo imene tinkamvera mugalimoto ya amene adatitenga tidafika kubwalo la mpira latsopano kumene zipolopolo nyerere zimamenyana munthu nkupha nyerere poyiwombera ndidangomva adathyola mipando kutenga makalilole zina zotero abambo ankalowa kuzimbudzi za akazi utatha mpira sindikudziwa udatha abiti patuma adandikoka timuthawe uja 
  tidakakwera basi imene sindikuyidziwa mudali anyamata chimwemwe kwambiri amangoti 5 kwa 1 5 kwa 1 onse atamuona abiti patuma adakuwira limodzi abiti patuma yo yo yo wina adamukumbatira wina kumupsopsona patsaya 
  osadanda mwayiphula basi ndikuthangatani nonse mbasi momwe muno adatero abiti patuma 
  abale kudalitu kulandirana basi imamveka ndithu mashoko siali komabe mmodzimmodzi adali kulandira chithandizo kwa abiti patuma

Text:
kulira chimwemwe   banki mkhonde adali chidwi choyamba bizinezi atukuke kusowa kwa mpamba kumapondereza khumbolo sanderson yuba wa mmudzi mwa namalima kwa t nazombe mboma la phalombe adakanika kutenga ngongole kubanki kaamba kosowa chikole kuopa chiongola chokwera 
  lero mkuluyu mwa makhumutcha mderalo ngongole yomwe adatenga kubanki mkhonde kuyamba bizinezi ya matabwa mpaka wamanga nyumba ya malata kugula njinga ya moto ziweto 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mabanki mkhonde afalikira mdziko muno kupanda banki mkhonde loto langa loyamba bizineziyi si likanakwaniritsidwa bwenzi ndili mpopangolo wa mmudzi bankiyi idandithandiza kupeza mpamba adatero yuba 
  yuba mwa amalawi omwe miyoyo yawo yasintha cha mabankiwa si onse otenga nawo mbali akusimba lokoma akumana zikhomo kusokoneza ngongole zawo za banki mkhonde muumphawi 
  mwa janet mawata wa mboma la phalombe lomwelo yemwe atakanika kubwenza ngongole ya k20 000 adalandidwa katundu 
  wina yemwe tisamutchule dzina ku zomba adalandidwa nyumba kaamba ka ngongole ya k250 000 padakalipano umoyo ukuvuta 
  pakutha chaka mmizinda mmatauni akumagawana ndalama zochuluka mpaka k7 miliyoni kuchoka kubanki mkhonde ndalamazi zimasungidwa mnyumba mwa membala wosankhidwa kutero osati kubanki 
  zidachititsa wakale wa banki mdziko muno ya reserve bank of malawi rbm charles chuka kunena mabanki mkhonde sakufunika akusokoneza kayendedwe ka chuma 
  mabungwe atsutsa 
  wa community savings and investing promotion comsip bungwe lomwe limayanganira mabanki mkhonde tenneson gondwe adati kutero kusokoneza cholinga cha ndondomekoyi yomwe imapereka mpata wa ngongole kwa osowa 
  anthuwa amasonkha ndalama zomwe amabwerekana kuyamba mabizinezi kugawana pakutha chaka kulowerera kwa rbm kungasokoneza miyoyo ya akufuna angopanga banki ya kumudzi yomwe izikwaniritsa zosowa za adatero gondwe 
  kafukufuku wa bungwe la finscope adapeza 50 100 onse mdziko muno kuthekera kofika ku mabanki pamwamba 21 100 wo amene mabuku ku mabankiwo 
  zotsatirazi zikupereka mpata kumabanki mkhonde ochuluka poonjezera chiongola chochepa chomwe amapereka ngongole iliyonse
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
akhristu udindo wosamalira chilengedwe chilolo vicar general wa dayosizi ya zomba vincent chilolo ati akhristu udindo waukulu wosamalira chilengedwe chomwe chofunika kwambiri moyo wa munthu 
  chilolo amayankhula loweruka ku st charles lwanga parish pomwe akhristu parishi yi amakhadzikitsa ntchito yodzala mitengo 
 ati parishi yo iwonetsetsa mitengo yomwe yadzalidwayi ikusamalidwa cholinga chodzalira mitengoyi chikwanilitsidwe 
 chaka chaka timadzala mitengo pena timatayilira kusayisamalira ndiye mitengo imeneyi isamalidwe ikule kukwaniritsa cholinga chathu anatero bamboo chilolo 
 mau ake moderator wa st charles lwanga parish immaculate chamangwana achita pofuna kukwanilitsa imodzi mwa za masomphenya dayosizi yawo ya zomba
