Text:
malawi mdima zasokonekera malawi pamoto wosaneneka kuzimazima kwa magetsi akumudzi akugona kuchigayo kudikira magetsi pamene alimi ngombe zamkaka akutaya mkaka 
  loweruka usiku cha mma 10 koloko pamene timafika pachigayo cha muhiriri mdera la mfumu kasisi mboma la chikwawa 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka si zidaonekenso amayi kugona mchigayo podikira kugayisa chimanga 16 atatu mwa abambo pachigayopa kudikira magetsi anayi okha ndiwo maso pamene onse agona 
  matumba chimanga mapira andandana magetsi akayaka agayise magetsiwatu akuti adazima lachisanu mmawa 
  nane pali wachikulire wothodwa sindikudziwa ayaka yanji ndabwera mmawa cha mma 7 adatero mayiyu ezelesi stanton wa zaka 60 
  atayaka stanton sangabwerere kumudzi wayenda mtunda wa makilomita 8 
  awa ndiye mavuto adzaoneni akudikira magetsi ayake chigayo cha ku chikwawa kulibe ufa ndasiya ana ndibwerere ndiye sitikadya ufa udatheratu adatero mayiyu 
  awa ndiwo mavuto amene akungana kumudzi pamene bungwe lopanga magetsi la electricity generation company of malawi egenco likungopanga pafupifupi theka la magetsi amene lino likufuna 
  zikupangitsa aku chikwawa azitha masiku awiri osaona magetsi 
  eleni kalavina wa mmudzi mwa chikalumpha akuti mwezi wa november wokha wagona kuchigayo kanayi kudikira magetsi agayise 
  pamene timafike chigayopa kalavina adali mtulo adadzidzimuka pemene mwana wa miyezi 7 amalira adadzuka kumuyamitsa 
  pachigayopatu pali ana oyamwa anayi amene agona kumimba kwa amayi 
  ambuye adzatitenge lino latopetsano kalavina adatero mwina nkukaona zina kumwambako 
  kodi ambuye abwera liti tatopa abale adati kuzimazima kwa magetsi kukuzuza moyo wawo mabanja 
  zina amunanga amandikaniza ndisadzagone kuno poganizira mwina ndikukayenda amuna pamene si choncho adatero 
  pamene imathamangira 12 koloko usiku wina adafika pamalopo mokuwa kodi kuli akazanga kumeneko bamboyu davie kachiza wa zaka 49 amachokera mmudzi mwa josamu mdera la mfumu katunga mtunda wa makilomita 7 kudzasaka mkazi 
  ndakhala ndikumudikira mpaka sakubwera ndanyamuka cha mma 9 koloko usiku ndisake chigayo chomwe adatero mkuluyu 
  wasiya mwana wa zaka 14 wina wa zaka 9 pachigayopo padalibe mkazi adatsetserekera ku chigayo china komwe adakamupeza 
  kachiza adapempha atsogoleri athetse mavuto amene akunga malawi tivomereze zinthu sizili mdziko muno malawi waipa adatero kachiza 
  nyakwawa zakaliya idati anthuwa alibe kothawira amayenera ayende mtunda wa makilomita 17 akapeze chigayo cha dizilo 
  adati mantha ake kugona kuchigayo kumayenda usiku kusaka magetsi zachisoni anthuwa atha kuchitidwa chipongwe kwawo akumasiya ana pamene makolo kuchigayo adatero zakaliya 
  pamene timachoka chigayopo mmama wa lamulungu nkuti magetsi asadayakebe akuti adayaka cha mma 5 madzulo lamulungu 
  mavutowa sadasiye malo ku ntcheu thyolo nkhata bay akuti ayamba kumasinja pamanja pamene akuyenda mitunda yotalika kusaka chigayo cha dizilo 
  tayamba kusinja pamanja kuno adatero mfumu kabunduli ya mboma la nkhata bay 
  boma lisagawe pakati escom zomwe zikubweretsa mavutowa aleke escom izipanga kugulitsa yokha magetsi idaonjeza choncho mfumuyo 
  samuel mugwa mlimi wa ngombe za mkaka wa kwa goliati mboma la thyolo akuti akusowa kogulitsa mkaka makampani ogula mkaka ayimika kaye cha kuzimazima kwa magetsi
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
aziputa dala amuna ambiri amakonda zongotenga asungwana osawadziwa nkukagona nawo ku maresitihausi 
  zikatha amaoneka wochenjera komatu amaiwala zina akhoza kugwa nazo mmavuto oopsa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc tsikulo katakwe adali paulendo wobwerera ku lilongwe ku blantyre pomwe adamuona msungwanayo pagulu la omwe adali pasiteji ya basiyo mwana wamkazi adawala duwa pakati zinyatsi 
  phazi la katakwe lidagwa buleki mosaliuza adaima chapatsogolo nakodola msungwanayo msungwanayo sadanyamuke yomweyo 
  adatulutsa kagalasi mchikwama chake cha mmanja ndikupaka kaye lipisitiki milomo yake kenaka adaponya magalasi akuda mmaso mwake 
  adayenda modzithyola catwalk wamtalipo msungwanayo adali mdiresi lothina lalitali lomwe lidaumba thupi lake 
  atalowa mgalimoto mpomwe katakwe adaona diresi la namwaliyo lidali siliti yofika mpaka muntchafu 
  katakwe adazunguzika mutu mmoyo mwake adali asadaonepo msungwana wokongola namwaliyo 
  mumtima adadzitsimikizira ayenera kutulutsa kukhosi asadafike ku lilongwe 
  galimoto lidadya mtunda uku awiriwo akucheza msungwanayo adati dzina lake lidali jo 
  katakwe adapeza msungwanayo amachitako kachakumwa koledzeretsa ankaima mmalo osiyanasiyana nkumakonkhako ka mowa mmene ankayandikira ku lilongwe nkuti atathodwa ndithu 
  katakwe sadatulutse kukhosi komabe nkucheza kwawo kudapezeka awiriwo adagwirizana zokagonera limodzi ku resitihausi 
  atafika lilongwe adapita kumalo angapo achisangalalo mmene imafika pakati usiku adapita kukagonera limodzi ku resitihausi 
  adayamba kudzuka adali katakwe adakasamba kubafa pobwera anadabwa kuona msungwana uja asadadzukebe adamugwedeza mwana wamkazi adangoti thapsa 
  adamugwedezanso msungwanayo ulendo uno mwa mphamvu msungwana adangoti lobodo apa mpomwe katakwe adazindikira kena kake kavuta mtima wozama adaona msungwana adali atamwalira
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
si zonyengerera 2016mkulu wa polisi kalikiriki kukonza mapulani chaka chatsopano cha 2016 mapulani ake akukhudza umbanda ziphuphu lake si lino waneneratu wa polisi mdziko muno lexten kachama 
  kachama adalankhula 31 december 2015 pomwe apolisi amakondwerera chaka chatsopano kulikulu la polisi ku area 30 mumzinda wa lilongwe 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka lexten kachama chaka cha 2016 chikhala chaka cha chitsanzo pankhani yolimbana wa uchifwamba umbanda ziphuphu tithana zigawenga zonse onse omwe akufuna kulemera kudzera mziphuphu adatero kachama 
  adati mchaka cha 2015 apolisi adayesetsa kulimbana wa uchigawenga umbanda ngozi za pamsewu zidakwera 18 pangozi 100 zilizonse kuyerekeza mchaka cha 2014 
  kachama adati chimodzi mwa zifukwa zomwe zidachititsa ziphuphu zomwe apolisi apamsewu amalandira kwa eni galimoto zosayenera kuyenda pamsewu 
  nkhani ya ziphuphu imodzi mwa nkhani zomwe apolisi amatchuka nazo makamaka pamsewu komabe ndinene si apolisi onse omwe apolisi ochepa chabe adyera adatero kachama 
  adati chaka chino akhwimitsa chilango chomwe apolisi opezeka mlandu wa ziphuphu amalandira adachenjezanso omwe amakopa dala apolisi ndalama zinthu zina awatsekere milandu yawo 
  malinga kafukufuku wathu wapolisi wongolembedwa kumene ntchito maka amene satifiketi ya fomu 4 amalandira ndalama zosaposera k50 000 asanaduleko msonkho 
  mmene mitengo ya zinthu ilili panopa nkosatheka munthu akwaniritse zofunika pamoyo wa tsiku tsiku malipiro achepa awa poganizira chakudya nyumba ya lendi fizi ya ana asukulu zovala zina zotero zofunika pamoyo wa munthu 
  mwina ichi nkukhala chimodzi mwa zifukwa zomwe wa katangale ziphuphu watenga malo pakati apolisi 
  kachama adalonjeza apolisi ayesetsa kugwira ntchito yokomera adati zitheke akuyenera kutengapo gawo makamaka potenga apolisi abwenzi powatsina khutu akawona zodabwitsa mmadera momwe akukhala 
  pothirapo ndemanga wa bungwe loona za maufulu la centre for human rights and rehabilitation chrr timothy mtambo adati uthenga wa wa polisiyu wafika panthawi yoyenera pomwe malingaliro zauchifwamba za 2015 akadali mmitima 
  adati mchaka changothachi uchifwamba udakula mpaka apolisi kumaphedwa zigawenga zomwe zimadetsa nkhawa pazachitetezo cha moyo katundu wawo 
  chitetezo ndiye gwero la chitukuko cha uliwonse mabizinesi zipembedzo ufulu wa ngakhaleso zomangamanga zimayenda pakakhala chitetezo chokwanira amapanga zinthu mtima uli mmalo adatero mtambo 
  adati pulani ya apolisiyi singatheke pokhapokha boma litaikapo mtima powapatsa zipangizo zokwanira zogwirira ntchito yawo kuwaganizira pankhani ya umoyo makhalidwe 
  mwa zina mtambo adati apolisi amasowa chilimbikitso kaamba kakuti malipiro omwe amalandira ogwetsa mphwayi zomwe zimawafoola nkhongono nyumba zomwe amakhalamo nzosaoneka amagwira ntchito popanda zodzitetezera 
  zina apolisi amalephera kupita kukagwira ntchito yawo kaamba kosowa mayendedwe cha nkhani za mafuta galimoto apolisi amapezeka akugwira ntchito mmalo zipolowe alibe zodzitetezera choncho sangagwire ntchito momwe akadagwirira nawo amafuna kudziteteza adatero mtambo
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
escom isayerekeze kukweza magetsibanda makina amagetsi escom zomwe wa zachuma kukampani ya magetsi mdziko muno ya escom delano ulanje adauza wailesi ya mbc bungweli likweza magetsi posakhalitsa wa bungwe loona za ufulu wa la malawi watch billy banda wati kampaniyi losayesere zokweza magetsi 
  lachinayi ulanje adakanira the nation sangabwerezenso amene adalankhula mbc kotero tilankhule mneneri wa bungweri 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mneneri wa bungweli george mituka adati sizoona pali chikonzero chokweza magetsi 
  pali kukanirana kotero komabe banda wati chipongwe bungweri likweze magetsi pamene akuvutika nkhani zachuma 
  chuma sichidapole bungweli lingakweze magetsi ndiye zonse zikwera mtengo boma likuyesetsa zinthu ziziyenda pamene akufuna kukweza magetsi ndiye kuyenda kwake atero ndiye akusemphana zomwe boma likuchita azisangalala momwe zinthu zikuyendera amabungwe tikuti ayi adatero banda 
  banda adati sanganeneretu chomwe bungwe lake lichite escom ikweze magetsi wati adzawona chomwe angachite 
  kuyambira may chaka chatha magetsi akwera katatu zomwe zachititsa zinthu zikwere mitengo 
  zikuchitika pamene magetsi akungozima mdziko muno 
  sabata zingapo zapitazo adadzudzula kampaniyo ikuononga ndalama pogula galimoto za k1.4 biliyoni akhala akudandaula kuzimazima kwa magetsi
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
boma lipereka mavidiyo jb lutepo ku acb boma lachinayi lidati lapereka kubungwe lothana ziphuphu la anti corruption bureau acb mavidiyo mtsogoleri wakale wadziko lino joyce banda akukambirana oswald lutepo yeme akumuganizira ndiye adasolola ndalama za kashigeti zochulukitsitsa 
  bungwe la acb lachinayi lomwelo lidati silidalandire mavidiyowo ofesi ya banda idati siyidaone chikalata cha bomacho ayankhepo kanthu 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc chikalatacho chimene chidali patsamba la boma la internet chidati mafilimuwo alipo 23 awiriwo ankakumana za boma za sanjika chikoko bay kamuzu palace mzuzu state lodge 
  chikalatacho chidati zina awiriwo amakumana okhaokha pena pamakhala angapo kuphatikizapo atsogoleri chipani cha pp 
  wachiwiri kwa wa acb reyneck matemba adati bungwelo silidalandire mafilimuwo sakudziwa kalikonse pankhaniyo 
  ndafunsa bwana wanga wa acb ngakhalenso ofufuza amene akutsata nkhaniyi onse akuti sakudziwapo kanthu adatero matemba 
  mthandizi wa banda andekuche chanthunya adati sadachione chikalatacho sangayankhepo kanthu 
  lutepo adali mwa chipani cha pp pomwe chinali mboma boma latulutsa chikalatacho patatha sabata ziwiri kuhokera pomwe lutepo adauza wailesi ya zodiak aulula banda za momwe awiriwo amagwirizanirana kupakula ndalama zaboma 
  wa oimira boma pamilandu mary kachale adati lutepo amayenera kukanenera kukhoti
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
chilimikani ulimikazembe malinga ngamba imene yasautsa mmadera ambiri mdziko lino wachiwiri kwa kazembe wa limodzi mwa maiko ku ulaya la flanders nikolas bosscher wati boma la malawi liyenera mtima potukula ulimi mdziko muno 
  bosscher adanena lolemba msonkhano wa dzidzidzi wa komiti ya national agricultural content development committee nacdc 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka adati lino lithane mavuto akudza cha kwanyengo nkofunika kubweretsa chitukuko chachikulu kumbali ya ulimi 
  la malawi silikuchita chitukuko chenicheni kumbali ya ulimi ndalama zambiri zikumapita kundondomeko yopereka zipangizo zaulimi motsika mtengo kugula chimanga zomwe sizingamange maziko olimba otukula ulimi adatero 
  adati ulimi ukumakhudzidwa china chilichonse chokudza ngamba tizilombo toononga mbewu matenda kusowa kwa misika kumene choncho boma liyenera patsogolo ndikubweretsa chitukuko kumbali ya ulimi 
  madera omwe chimanga chaumiratu mlimi ayenera kuuzidwa azule chimangacho ndikubzala mbewu zina chinangwa mbatata adalongosola bosscher 
  wa nthambi ya ulangizi ku unduna wa zaulimi jerome nkhoma yemwe adali nawo msonkhanowo adati boma laika kale mtima chitukuko mwazina lidaika mlozo womwe kampani zingatsate pobweretsa chitukuko kumbali ya ulimi 
  nkhoma adati nkofunika alimi apatsidwe uthenga oyenera mwachangu okhudzana ulimi pothana vutoli 
  farm radio trust bungwe lomwe limathandiza kufalitsa uthenga kwa alimi yomwe idaitanitsa msonkhanowo idati zinthu sizili mdziko muno alimi ambiri akhudzidwa ngamba mbozi zomwe zikuononga mmera 
  tidauzidwa ngamba mbozi zoononga mmera sitimayembekezera vutoli likhala lalikulu chonchi adatero george vilili wochokera ku bungwelo 
  pomwe wa nthambi yoona zanyengo jolamu nkhokwe adati nthambi yake idanena chaka chino ngamba madzi osefukira mwezi wa september chaka chatha 
  nkhokwe adati mvula ikadali kugwa madera omwe mudagwa ngamba alandira mvulayi komabe adalimbikitsa alimi uthenga omwe nthambi yake imapereka
Label: FARMING

Text:
jooma wati mangochi ikutsalira chitukuko by thokozani chapola ent uploads/2019/07 jooma.jpg alt= width="512 height="276 />jooma dera la katuli lotsalira kwambiri chitukuko jooma nduna yowona za mtengatenga zomangamanga ralph jooma wati mangochi limodzi mwa maboma amene akutsalira mmbuyo kwambiri nkhani za chitukuko 
 jooma amalankhula sukulu ya pulamimale ya katuli mdera la kumvuma kwa boma la mangochi komwe phungu wa ya malamulo watsopano wa derail francesca masamba theula amachititsa msonkhano wothokoza pomuvotera yemwe watenga udindowu kuchoka kwa abubakar mbaya wa chipani cha udf yemwe wakhala phungu wa derali kwa zaka 25 
 pamenepa jooma walonjeza boma limanga nsewu wa mangochi katuli cholinga chofewetsa vuto la mayendedwe lomwe mderali amakumana nalo 
 dera lino lili sukulu imodzi yokha ya sekondale kuli mavuto madzi nsewuwu suli boma nsewu umenewu tawuyika kale maplan athu tiyike phula anatero jooma 
 mmawu ake phungu wa derali francesca masamba theula anawona kofunikira kwambiri apitenso ku derali kukathokoza amene anamusankha udindowu 
 ineyo ndikhale udindowu cha voti yawo panali achikulire oti anavutikira kuyenda mpaka kuzandivotera choncho ndinawona kofunika ndizawathokoze mapadera tidye timwe kusangalala limodzi anatero masamba 
 zokambirana za nyumba ya malamulo zomwe zapitazi masamba analankhulapo yemwe phungu ku dera lake palibe chomwe anachitako ku mbali ya chitukluko zomwe zinakwiyitsa mbali yotsutsa boma maka chipani cha udf pomwe phungu wadera la mangochi malombe misolo mussa kapichira anayimilira kudzudzula zomwe zinayankhulidwazi 
 mwa mwe nawo mwambo wothokozawu phungu wad era la pakati mboma la mangochi victoria kingstone phungu wa dera la mangochi masongola ishmael grant yemwe anapambana woyima payekha tsopano walowa chipani cha dpp 
 tsiku lomwelo masamba anachititsanso misonkhano ya mtunduwu ku iba makanjira mderalo
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
lingalirani zobzala mitengo mvula masiku ano ikugwa mwanjomba kutentha kukuonjeza madzi sachedwa kuuma nthaka ikukokoloka modetsa nkhawa awa mwa mavuto omwe akatswiri akuti akudza chilengedwe chikuonongedwa kusasamala makamaka mmene akudulira mitengo chaka chaka mdzinja amalawi amalimbikitsidwa kubzala mitengo pofuna kubwezeretsa chilengedwe steven pembamoyo adacheza wa bungwe la mgwirizano wa alimi la farmers union of malawi fum prince kapondamgaga zokhudza ntchitoyi 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kodi kapondamgaga nchifukwa ninji masiku ano nyengoyi ikuoneka siikupanganika pamenepa akhoza kuzungulirapo kwambiri nkhani yeniyeni yakuti adaononga chilengedwe kwambiri ndiye momwe zinthu zimayendera kale si momwe zingamayenderenso panopa ayi 
  mukutanthauzanji pamenepa kapondamgaga kubzala mtengo chaka chatha apa ndikutanthauza momwe mvula inkagwera kale si momwe ingagwerenso mwachitsanzo tonse tikudziwa mvula imabwera cha mitengo yomwe imasefa malingana mmene zimakhalira mlengalenga panopa mitengo ija idatha ndiye mpweyawo usefedwa bwa nanga si usefedwa mvula ichokera   mukakamba za kutentha ndiye musachite omwe zinyama mafakitale zimatulutsa mitengo imayamwa nkumapangira chakudya imatulutsa womwe timapuma nkumanyadirawu tsopano mitengoyo kulibe nchifukwa chake kumatentha motere 
  ndiye mwati alimi azibzala mitengo yambiri ndiye nkhani ya mitengoyi imakhudza alimi okha ayi si ntchito ya alimi okha munthu kungoti ambiri mwa mavuto omwe tatchulawa akukwapula kwambiri ntchito za ulimi cha kutha kwa mitengo nthaka lero ili pamtetete zomwe zikuchititsa mvula ikangogwa pangono madzi azithamanga kwambiri nkumakokolola nthakayo moti chonde chambiri chidapita 
  ndiye mwati njira yake nkubzala mitengo basi basitu ndiye njira yake imeneyo sikuti kubzala mitengoko ndiye mukukonza kapansi muulimi okha ayi pali ntchito zambiri za mitengo kutchisira fodya kwa alimi fodya kumangira zigafa mapaso nyumba kupangira mosungira zokolola nkhokwe kumangira makola ziweto nkhuni ntchito zina zambirimbiri 
  kodi mitengoyo ikhoza kubzalidwanso mwa mthirira palibe vuto bola munthu madzi yothirira mitengoyo yabwino nyengo ya mvula nchifukwa chake chaka chaka nyengo ya mvula kumakhala nyengo yobzala mitengo nyengoyi yabwino kuthirira kwake nkosavuta madzi amakhala ambiri ntchito imakhala yongolambulira basi mvula ikamadzati ikutha mitengo yambiri imakhala itagwira moti siivuta munthu akhoza sabata zingapo osathirira mitengo osafa 
  kodi mitengoyo nkungobzalapo bola mitengo ayi ndithu mpofunika kuona posankha mitengo yobzala kusankha kumatengera malo ake pali mitengo ina yoteteza ku mphepo ya mkuntho yomwe imafunika yamizu yozama izipirira ku mphamvu ya mphepoyo palinso mitengo ina yoteteza nthaka yomwe imafunika ya mizu yoyanza madzi asamathamange kwambiri pankhani ya ulimi timalimbikitsanso kubzala mitengo yachonde yomwe alimi angakambirane alangizi mmadera mwawo 
  mlimi wamba angapeze mbande za mitengo eya pali njira zambiri zopezera mbande za mitengo njira yoyamba kugwirizana pamudzi nkuona vuto lomwe lilipo mukatero mukhoza kukauza alangizi akuthandizeni komwe mungapeze mbande njira yomweyo mukhoza kupanga pakalabu munthu payekha kutengera upangiri wa alangiziwo mukhoza kuona muchita pali mbande zina zomwe alimi amafesa nkumagulitsa zomeramera mukhoza kungogula mbewu kutola mnkhalango nkufesa nokha pofika nyengo ya mvula mudzakhale mbande 
  inuyo bungwe la mgwirizano wa alimi mumatengapo mbali yanji pantchitoyi ifeyo amodzi mwa magulu omwe patsogolo kulimbikitsa ntchitoyi moti chaka chilichonse timakhala tsiku lomwe timakabzala mitengo kumalo ake malingana pologalamu yathu kupatula apo timakhalanso tikubzala mitengo patokhapatokha mmadera momwe timakhala alimi mabungwe akatiyitana tikakhale nawo akakonza mwambo wobzala mitengo timakhala okonzeka 
  nanga monse tidayambira kubzala mitengo muja siidakwanebe ambuye musadzakhale maganizo amenewo mmene akudulira mitengomu mungamati yobwezeretsapo yakwana zoona ndiponso kunenna mosapsatira pakufunika kubzala mitengo yambiri zedi kuyerekeza yomwe imabzalidwa chaka chaka osayiwalanso mitengo yomwe imabzalidwa siyonse yomwe imakula ina imafa ndiye imafunika kubwezeretsa.n kapondamgaga kubzala mtengo chaka chathandiwo akulima
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
titsirika nkhalango zonsenganga gulu lina la asinganga ku dedza ladzithemba likhoza kuteteza nkhalango za lino chambu akuluakulu boma ati zonse zili mmanja mwa asingangawo awakhutitse njirayo idzayenda 
  woyanganira za nkhalango mdziko muno clement chilima adati nthambiyo yokonzeka kupereka mpata kwa asingangawo kugwira ntchito asingangawo poteteza nkhalangozo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kodi nsupa zitsamba zingathandize kuteteza nkhalango adati chomwe asingangawa angachite nkulembera kalata nthambiyo ifunse upangiri pena pena ganizo lawolo lolandiridwa silikuphwanya malamulo 
  mmagwiridwe ntchito yathu timalandira yemwe njira yothandiza asingangawa akunena zoona njira yawoyo siyikuphwanya malamulo abwere tiwapatsa mpata adatero chilima 
  wa nthambi yoteteza za kutchire brighton kumchedwa adati sanganeneretu mwa ndithendithe chambu ndiye yankho adati gulu la asingangalo ndilolandiridwa likudziwadi njira yomwe ingathandize kuteteza nkhalango 
  ntchito yathu yogwira ndiye papezeka omwe akuti njira yomwe ingathandize chowaletsera nchiyani atatipeza nkutifotokozera bwinobwino titamvetsa tikhoza kuona tingagwire nawo ntchito adatero kumchedwa 
  adati mdziko muno muli nkhalango 84 zomwe zimafunika chitetezo mitengo zopezeka mmenemo zikutha mosakhala cha mbala 
  gulu la asingangali lochokera mboma la dedza lanenetsa chambu chikhoza kugwira ntchito yoteteza nkhalango kuposa ntchito ya alonda asilikali 
  nthambi ya za nkhalango zopezeka mmenemo itaima mutu opha kudula mitengo mozemba idalemba alonda omwe amathandizana asilikali kuteteza nkhalango 
  woyanganira kulangiza asinganga pantchito yawo mboma la dedza gulupu ntambeni chinyamula adati kupatula chidima ophotchola mnkhalango akhoza kukakamiraa mpaka kugwidwa momwemo 
  chambu nchamphamvu zedi chikhoza kugwira munthu yemwe amafuna kukasokoneza mnkhalango mpaka kugwidwa momwemo nkulandira chilango choyenera adatero chinyamula 
  pulezidenti wa asinganga mdziko muno frank manyowa adati nzotheka kuteteza nkhalangozi potsirika nkhalangozo chambu mmalo modalira alonda asilikali 
  chambu tikhoza kuteteza nkhalango zonse zomwe zikusowa chitetezo owonongawo asamazione powakantha chidima akhoza kulephera kupanga upandu omwe adakonzawo adatero manyowa 
  adati asinganga njira zambiri zomwe akhonza kulangira oononga nkhalango zilangozo zikhoza kuwapatsa mantha moti sangalakelake kubwerera kunkhalango 
  manyowa adati asinganga zimawapweteka nkhalango zikamaonongeka kasupe wa ntchito yawo wagona mmenemo 
  timalimbikitsa kuteteza nkhalango ndiko timapeza mankhwala athu boma lakhala likuyesetsa kuteteza nkhalango zikuwoneka zikuvuta asinganga akhoza kukwanitsa chambu adatero
Label: WITCHCRAFT

Text:
cmo iyamikra abambo parish ya mwanza es="(max width 564px 100vw 564px />abambo mwanza parishi kujambulitsa limodzi abambo ku nthawira parishi bungwe la umodzi wa abambo la catholic men organisation cmo arkdayosizi ya blantyre layamikira abambo chikatolika mparishi ya mwanza ya mpingowu kamba kobwera mwaunyinji kuzamvera zolinga ndiponso masomphenya bungweli wa bungweli arkdayosizi ya blantyre martin chiwaya alankhula ku parishiyi lamulungu 1 december 2019 pokhazikitsa bungweli ku parishiyi 
 ati akhutira momwe abambo mparishiyi mmene anatulukira ku zamvera zothandizira kupititsa patsogolo ntchito za bungwe latsopanoli abambo aku mwanza bungweli alirandira kwambiri taona abambo ambiri ochokera mmatchalitchi omwe pansi parishiyi anatsalira amve zolinga za bungweli anatero chiwaya pamenepa ati zoterezi zithandiza abambo mpingowu kugwira nawo ntchito za mumpingo mmalo mosiyira amayi okha 
 dausi mafunso zolinga za bungwelo chidwi chomwe abambo akuchionetsa zikutilimbikitsa kwambiri tsopano abambo ayamba kutulikira poyera patsogolo pothandiza mpingo anapitiliza chiwaya 
 mau ake mwa abambo mparishiyi wolemekezeka nicholas dausi omwenso nduna ya boma phungu waderali kubwera kwa bungweli kuthandizira abambo mparishiyi pamodzi kukweza miyambo ya chipembedzo zochitika mpingo 
 pamenepa dausi alimbikitsa abambo onse achikatolika kulowa nawo mbungweli mmaparishi talimbikitsa abambo ambiri tilowe bungweli potero tizithandizana tizizuzulana tizizutsana wina mwa akagwa mapeto ake tonse tikalowe ufumu wa mulungu anatero dausi 
 bungwe la umodzi wa abambo arkdayosizi ya blantyre likupitilizabe kuyendera maparish osiyanasiyana cholinga choti lifikire mmaparish onse 43 amu arkdayosiziyi lamulungu la 8 december 2019 bungweli kudzera mmakomiti okhazikika mmaparishi ayendera ndikukhazikitsa bungweli mmaparishi za lunzu mkhwayi nyungwe thunga
Label: RELIGION

Text:

 chigalu wati awiriwa ubwenzi anapatsana pathupi mamunayo anakana mimbayo siyake 
 kwa yonseyi mayiwa akhala akuvutika okha mwanayi kufikia sabata latha pomwe bamboyu anayamba kuzachonderera abwerere banja malemuwa 
 malemuwa atakana zobwerera banja oganiziridwawa zinawakwiyitsa anaganiza zowadikirira panjira pomwe malemuwa amyenda nsewu wina ndikuwabaya anafera pamalo amwewo anatero chigalu

Text:
ochita bizinesi songani ayamikira boma powamangira msika wamakono ochita malonda nsika wa songani mboma la zomba ayamikira boma kamba kowamangira msika wamakono omwe ukuyembekezeka kutha pambuyo miyezi itatu ikubwerayi 
 mkhalapampando wa komiti ya ochita malonda msika wa songani wilard allan anena lachitatu pomwe akuluakulu ochokera ku unduna wa za maboma angono anakayendera zitukuko zosiyanasiyana zomwe khonsolo ya boma la zomba ikugwira 
 mmbuyomu akhala akukumana mavuto osiyanasiyana kusowa kwa zimbudzi zaukhondo msikawu 
 mavuto omwe timakumana nawo mmbuyomu atha tikuyamikira boma cha msika wamakono umenewu anatero allan 
 ati okhutira mmene ntchito yomanga msikawu ikuyendera ati okonzeka kugwira ntchito limodzi mafumu ntchitoyi iyende msanga
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
pac ifuna mayankho za kukwera kwa mitengo kukwera kwa zinthu mdziko muno kwaika amalawi pamoto wa mavuto zomwe zachititsa bungwe la public affairs committee pac likonze msonkhano wopeza mayankho mavutowa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza wa bungweli robert phiri watsimikizira tamvani za msonkhanowu wati tsiku malo amsonkhanowu adziwitsidwa posakhalitsapa 
  kukweza kwa mitengo ya madzi k45 k100 iliyonse mitengo ya magetsi k39 k100 shuga k10 k100 iliyonse zina zakudya kukwera kwa chiongola choperekedwa munthu akakongola ndalama kubanki zinthu zomwe zapangitsa moyo ukhale wopweteka 
  msonkhano wa pac 2012 kudali chitetezo chokhwima zedi zomwe si zidakhazike chete bungwe la pac pamene akonza nkhumano kusaka mayankho 
  bungwe la pac likudziwa nyengo zowawitsa zomwe amalawi akudutsamo chomwe nchakuti amalawi tikhale pamodzi tipeze mayankho mavutowa adatero phiri 
  titamufunsa msonkhanowo ungabale zipatso phiri adati akukhulupirira ukhala chophula kusiyana nkuti azizilankhula payekha 
  padakalipano tikulumikizana mabungwe mbali zina momwe tingakonzere msonkhanowu momwe tingapezere mayankho ku mavuto amene tikukumana nawowa adatero phiri 
  adaonjeza zomwe mabungwe onse adzagwirizane zomwe zidzachitidwe kwathu kupereka mwayi akambirane kupeza mayankho 
  bungweli lidachititsanso msonkhano wotere march 2012 pamene kudali chitetezo chokhwima pamene amati msonkhanowo udali cholinga chofuna kuthana boma 
  msonkhanowu womwe mbali ya boma sidafikeko udachitikira ku limbe cathedral mumzinda wa blantyre 
  phiri wati msonkhano ukudzawu umemeza mbali zonse kuphatikizapo boma bungwe lawo limapereka kumva kwa boma lililonse lomwe likulamula 
  wa bungwe loona ufulu wa ogula la consumer association of malawi cama john kapito wati boma lakhumudwitsa amalawi cholephera kukonza zinthu 
  panopa zinthu zaipa zasokonekera makuponi kulibe chiongola chakwera ku mabanki zomwe zichititse katundu akwere zomwe zizunze amalawi zomwenso boma likuchita sizikuoneka tilibenso chiyembekezo zinthu zibwerere mchimake adatero kapito 
  adati amalawi akuyenera kumadya mosinira amange malamba komwe tikupitaku zinthu zinyanya kuwawa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
milandu yogwililira yakwera mboma la zomba wa apolisi chigawo chaku mmawa kwa lino commissioner arlene baluwa wapempha mdziko muno athandizane polisi ntchito yothana wogwilira ana mdziko muno 
 wati milandu yogwililira yakwera kwambiri baluwa commissioner baluwa amayankhula kwa group village headman chingondo mdera la mfumu yayikulu mwambo mboma la zomba msonkhano womwe apolisi anakonza okambirana za momwe angathetsere nkhanza zogwilira kuzunza okalamba kuphatikizapo khungu la chi albino 
 commissioner baluwa wati nkhanza zogwilira zikuchulukira mboma la zomba kamba koti mchaka cha 2019 milandu yokwana 97 idalembetsedwa kusiyana milandu 68 yomwe idalembetsedwa chaka cha 2018 choncho apempha adzikanena ku polisi za nkhadza zogwililira zomwe zikuchitika pakati magulu okhudzidwawa 
 nkhani ya belo ya polisi commissioner baluwa wati akuyenera kudziwa beloyi yaulele kotero sakumayenera kupereka ndalama ina iliyonso kwa apolisi pomwe apempha belo
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
wachitetezo wa mutharika chisale wamangidwa apolisi amanga yemwe wamkulu wa achitetezo kwa mtsogoleri wakale wa lino peter mutharika norman paulos chisale 
 mmanja mwa apolisi chisale wavala jekete ya blue wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mdziko muno james kadadzera watsimikiza za nkhaniyi polankhula radio maria malawi 
 ndizoona mmanja mwathu kuno ku lilongwe maka maka ofesi yofufuza fufuza nkhani yokhuza chuma apolisi timayitana omwe tikuwaganizira nkhani inayake kumawafusa kudikira tipeze umboni weni weni anatero kadadzera 
 kadadzera tinenabe zifukwa zomwe tawamangira malipoti akusonyeza chisale amangidwa pokhudzidwa nkhani yolowetsa cement mdziko muno opanda msonkho 
 mneneri wa apolisiyu wakana kunena zifukwa zomwe awamangira chisale ponena akufufuzabe

Text:
2018 chaka cha ululu february 2018 dorothy kampaninyirenda amagwiritsira magetsi k2 500 mwezi   kufika october mpaka lero nyirenda akugwiritsira magetsi k5 000 mwezi    wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kukwera mtengo wa mafuta kudaliza amalawi   mayiyo amene amakhala ku bangwe mumzinda wa blantyre adati february 2018 amagwiritsira ntchito k700 kulipirira minibasi akafike ku trade fair komwe amapanga bizinesi lero zasintha pamene akugwiritsira k1 000 mtunda womwewo   uwu ndiye ululu akhala akuumva mchaka cha 2018 kukwera mtengo kwa mafuta agalimoto kukwera kwa magetsi komwe kudapangitsa zinthu zikwerenso   malinga malipoti centre for social concern cfsc banja la 6 mchaka cha 2017 limafunikira likhale k183 000 mwezi   zimachitika pamene ndalama yotsikitsitsa yomwe munthu amalandira idali k19 000   2018 banja la 6 limayenera likhale k190 549 mwezi pamene ndalama yotsikitsitsa yomwe munthu amalandira idali k25 000   kutanthauza banja la 6 okhala mtauni amalowa mmasautso osaneneka athe mwezi umodzi zomwe amapeza zimasiyana zomwe zimafunikira 
  magetsi akhale akukwera mchakachi pamene timamaliza 2017 nkuti mafuta petulo akugulitsidwa k888 00 lita imodzi dizilo adali k890 90 lita imodzi   mafutawo adakwera kanayi mchakachi petulo adafika k990 50 pamene dizilo adafika k990 40 lita   zidachititsa maulendo minibasi akwere 5 pelesenti mdziko muno   october bungwe logulitsa magetsi la escom lidakweza magetsi 31.8 pelesenti kwa amene amagwiritsira magetsi k7 714 mwezi adayamba kugwiritsira ntchito k10 105 mwezi   zinthu zambiri zofunikira pamoyo wa munthu zidakwera mtengo thumba la chimanga lolemera makilogalamu 50 lidafika k10 000 kuchoka k5 000 june mchakacho   kwa kampaninyirenda chakachi chidali chowawa mitengo ya zinthu zidakhazikike 
  vuto lalikulunso nkuti bizinesi simayenda ndiye upeze ndalama yogulira chakudya pakhomo yoyendera kwakhala kovuta adatero   wa bungwe loona za ogula la consumer association of malawi cama john kapito adati mchakachi ndalama ya kwacha idaoneka idali mphamvu komebe sizidathandize ogula   akuvutika agule katundu iliyonse mitengo ikungosintha boma likuyenera libweretse yankho chaka chino asavutike adatero   kapito adati chaka cha 2019 chingakhale chabwino kwa boma litaonetsetsa mitengo ya zinthu zofunikira kwambiri pamoyo wa munthu sizikukwera mwachisawawa
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
nseula banda smile at nampak golf charles nseula and carol banda on saturday contributed to the lineage of nampak golf tournament champions and became the first titleholders since the company rebranded from packaging industries limited pim last year 
  the two proved good enough to take home glory in the men and ladies categories respectively during the 17th edition of the contest at mulanje golf club which was patronised by 60 golfers 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi with 41 individual stable ford points nseula counted out the clubs golf captain ajay singh to the second slot as sophie kaira settled for the third place with 40 points 
  this is my special day i played very well and i was consistent with my swing i had string of pars on the front nine i was not surprised when i emerged victorious hard work has paid for me today said nseula who has added fourth trophy this year alone 
  on the flipside banda who collected 40 points three points ahead of her runner up beatrice mangwana attributed her success to some great shots on the fairway 
  i had shaky start but some fantastic shots on the back nine made up for that double strokes on some last holes gave me the much needed points for success she said 
  john gift mwakhwawa did it in the mens category burdon mbera took the nearest to the pin accolade while harry mukaka and chris kapanga claimed the best front nine and back nine awards with 22 points and 20 points in that order 
  nampak marketing manager nyakhoko nsona said the main purpose of the golf competition was to promote the game and thank customers including those working in the tea industry for the business they give us
Label: SPORTS

Text:
lutepo wakundende 
 bwalo lalikulu la milandu ku zomba high court lachisanu lapitali lalamula auswald lutepo yemwe mwa omwe akuyankha milandu yokhudza kusolola ndalama za boma wotchedwa cashgate akakhale mndende kwa zaka 11 popezeka wolakwa pamlanduwu popereka chilango jaji redson kapindu adati pamlandu woyamba wopanga upo pofuna kubera boma lutepo akaseweze zaka wachiwiri wosolola ndalama zokwana k4.2 biliyoni akaseweze zaka 8 zilango zonsezi ziyendera limodzi kuyambira 11 june pomwe adapezeka wolakwa pamilandu yonse iwiri jajiyu adati wamumverako chisoni pamplandu wachiwiri kaamba koti adabwezako ndalama zokwana k370 miliyoni
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mavuto kusowa zipatala anyanya gogo chidzukulu paulendo wa makilomita 26 kukapeza thandizo la chipatala boma likuyesetsa pofika 2016 likhale litamanga zipatala asamayende mtunda woposa makilomita 8 popita kuchitapala tamvani yapeza ganizoli livutirapo kutheka mpaka lero palibe chachitika mmadera 
  malinga mavuto amene akhodzokera mmidzi kaamba kakusoweka kwa zipatala akuyenda mitunda yaitali kupita kuchipatala 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc amene apezeka kachilombo koyambitsa matenda edzi ndiwo pamoto akuyenera azipitapita kuchipatala kukalandira mankhwala otalikitsa moyo 
  2011 la malawi lidakhazikitsa lingaliro pofika 2016 likhale litamanga zipatala pasadzapezeke munthu woyenda makilomita oposa 8 popita kuchipatala 
  mboma la neno mwa kumudzi amene akusowekera thandizo la chipatala midzi yoposa 34 mbomalo kwa gulupu soka t dambe akuyenda mtunda wautali apeze thandizo la chipatala 
  mmidzi ya ntaja leketa amene achita malire la mozambique akuyenda makilomita 26 akafike pachipatala cha neno boma kuderali kulibe chipatala chachingono chomwe angapite 
  gogo emelesiya piyo zidzukulu zingapo zomwe amasamalira chimodzi mwa makolo ake onse adamwalira matenda edzi 
  chidzukuluchi sitichitchula dzina chomwe chidasiyidwa chili miyezi iwiri chidabadwa kachilomboka 
  mwanayu akusamalidwa agogo akewo amayenera kuyenda makilomota 26 akafike kuchipatala cha neno akalandire mankhwala otalikitsa moyo arv 
  ndimadzuka 4 koloko ulendo kuboma la neno kukatenga mankhwala tikanyamuka 4 mbandakucha timakafika mma 4 koloko madzulo pamene ndikupita ndimatengeratu chofunda chakudya ndimakaphikira komweko 
  tikalandira mankhwala timapempha malo kuchipatala komweko tigone mmawa timadzukirira kumabwera kumudzi mwanayu ndimayenda naye ndikamusiya palibe angamusamale adatero gogoyu yemwe zaka 75 
  nkhawa yanga imakhala poti mankhwalawo kulibe kulibe ndimayenera ndidikire mpaka atapezeka ndikamadzafika kuno miyendo imakhala yatupa moti sindingapitenso 
  pemphero la gogoyu ndilakuti akhale moyo asamale chidzukulu chake mulungu akadandilola ndisafe mpaka mwanayu atasinkhuka bola atangofika poti akuyenda yekha kukatenga mankhwalawo kuchipatala 
  mneneri wachipatala cha neno ganizani mkwate akuti kaamba ka mavuto amene anthuwa akukumana nawo pamodzi thandizo la partners in health ayamba kuyendera midziyo aziwathandiza pafunika 
  timapita komabe thandizo lenileni silikuwafikira kwambiri timapita yomwe mvula kulibe kuli mvula galimoto singayende akukumana mavuto moti kuwayankha mavuto ndikungowamangira chipatala chachingono adatero mkwate yemwe akuti akanyamuka 6 koloko mmawa galimoto amakafika mma 1 koloko masana 
  ndizovutabe nanga atakhala munthu wadwala mwadzidzidzi angafike kuno adadabwa 
  achikhala ganizo la boma linali zochitika lero sibwenzi gogo piyo akukhumata akaona chidzukulu chawo mmalo moyenda masiku awiri kuchipatala bwezi akugwira ntchito zina 
  mwandipeza ndikuchokera ku mozambique komwe ndimakalimitsa chakudya sindilola mwanayu agone njala amayenera adye asanamwe mankhwala akutero gogoyu 
  kodi ganizo la bomali lili pati mneneri muunduna wa zaumoyo henry chimbali adati ntchito ili mkati komabe palibe chipatala chamangidwa 
  lingaliro lathu timati kuyambira 2013 2014 tikhale titamanga zipatala 15 nzachisoni palibe chipatala tingaloze chatha izitu zachitika cha kusowa kwa ndalama adatero chimbali 
  kodi ganizo loti pofika 2016 asamadzayenda makilomita 8 litheka chimbali akuyankha zikhala zovuta cha mavuto zachuma amene takumana nawo zipatala 15 sizinathe ndiye zivutirako komabe patakhala ndalama mwina ntchitoyi ingagwirike mwachangu 
  ndondomeko ya zachuma ya 2014/2015 mwina ndiyo idakapereka chiyembekezo kwa anthuwa kuyangana ndalama zomwe zaikidwa ku unduna wa zaumoyo ikuwonetseratu mavuto sangathe lero 
  mndondomekoyo undunawu udalandira k65.2 biliyoni mmalo mwa k130 biliyoni ikonzere mavutowa 
  wa bungwe loona zaumoyo la malawi equity network mhen martha kwataine chiyembekezo palibe ku neno apitilira kuvutika 
  mndondomeko yapita undunawu udalandira 12 100 ya ndalama zomwe zidayikidwa mndondomeko yazachumayo tabwerera mmbuyo pamene undunawu walandira 8 100 ya ndalama zomwe zayikidwa mndondomekoyi 
  mavutowa angathe boma litakwanitsa lingaliro lathu unduna wa zaumoyo ulandira 16 100 ya ndalama zomwe zili mndondomeko ya zachumayo momwe zililimu ndiye basi tidikire ina adatero kwataine mokhudzidwa mavuto ku neno 
  kufotokoza kwa kwataine ndiye anthunso ku chikwawa mmudzi mwa kaloga kwa t ngabu akuyenera kudikira ndondomeko ya zachuma ya 2015/16 apume ku mavuto adzaoneni amene akukumananawo 
  akuti amapita kuchipatala cha chipwaira health centre chomwe chili mtunda wa makilomita 28 
  malinga lucia dauleni wa mmudzi mwa kudzanji akuti chipatalapa sathandizidwa amapita kuchipatala cha ngabu chomwe makilomita 33
Label: HEALTH

Text:
ndalama zakale zitha 23 may banki yakumbutsa mabanki mdziko muno ndalama zakale za chilembwe lino zisiya kugwira ntchito 22 may 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mchikalata chimene wa bankiyo mary nkosi adalembera mabanki mdziko lino bankiyo idalengeza pomwe limakhazikitsa ndalama zatsopanozo 23 may chaka chatha pofika 22 may ndalama zakale zikhala zitasiya kugwira ntchito 
  ndalama zapepala zisiye kugwira ntchito patsikulo ndalama zachitsulo zidzakhala zikugwira ntchito mpaka mtsogolo muno adatero nkosi 
  mchikalatacho nkosi adapempha mabanki asamapereke ndalama zakalezi kwa makasitomala 
  mabanki ayenera kutenga ndalama zakalezo kukazisiya ku reserve bank akazilandira chenjezo kwa mabanki ndilakuti ayenera kusamala ndalama zachinyengo adatero nkosi 
  ambiri ati chilembwe idali khobili lokongola tsamba lake lidali lalikulu kotero simakwana matumba mzikwama zosungila ndalama poyenda waleti
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
mipingo ipewe tsankho papa wolemba thokozani chapola mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco lachinayi wapempha mipingo idzikhala patsogolo kuperekeza kwa mulungu posatengera kusiyana kwa mitundu kochokera 
 papa francisko papa walankhula imodzi mwa miyambo ikulu ikulu yomwe nayo ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican 
 wati mpingo usamakhale malire tsankho pakati akhristu ake pomwe ukufuna kupereka masacrament kapenanso kulandira mpingowo 
 mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolikayu wati khomo la kumwamba limakhala lotsekula zonse mipingo kudzera mwa atsogoleri akuyenera nawonso kumasula milandu ya akhristu omwe anamangidwa 
 pamenepa papa francisco anapereka chitsanzo cha akhristu oyamba omwe kuyendera limodzi sanali kusungirana mangawa
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
akufuna chakudya ku nsanje maboma ambiri zikuoneka apata chakudya mnyengo ya ulimi yangothayi mboma la nsanje ati akufuna thandizo la chakudya lomwe mabungwe boma amapereka lipitirire kwa miyezi ina itatu sanakolole chimanga chokwanira njala 
  phungu wa dera la kummwera kwa bomali thomson kamangira adanena pamsonkhano wa chitukuko omwe nduna yofalitsa nkhani nicholas dausi idachititsa podziwitsa pulojekiti ya boma yoonetsetsa netiweki ya lamya ikupezeka mmaboma onse mosavuta yotchedwa malawi national fibre backbone sabata yatha 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka dausi tiyesetsa asafe kamangira adati ngamba yomwe inagwa chimanga chitangomasula ngayaye inasokoneza mbewu mbomalo 
  tikusowa zambiri pakali vuto la njala kaamba ka ngamba osati madzi osefukira mabungwe asiya kupereka chakudya tikuwapempha kupitiririza kwa miyezi itatu tipulumuke ku njala yomwe itisause posachedwapa adatero kamangira 
  pothirira ndemanga khansala robert chabvi adati mderalo chaka chinonso zawavuta kumunda boma mabungwe awapase zida zochitira ulimi wamthirira 
  sikuti ndife opemphetsa chimanga chatilakanso chaka chino boma mabungwe tipatseni zida za ulimi wamthirira zoyendera mphamvu ya dzuwa tilimenso uku mukutipatsa thandizo la chakudya pokhala kumudzi alibe chuma chogulira chimanga kwa mavenda ku admarc adatero chabvi 
  poyankhapo dausi adati asadere nkhawa mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika achita zotheka asafe njala 
  zikusemphana lipoti la boma la february lomwe linati chimanga chikololedwa chochuluka matani 3.2 miliyoni kusiyana chaka chatha 2.3 miliyoni 
  malinga wa farmers union of malawi fum alfred kapichira banda nzosadabwitsa ku nsanje adandaule za njala 
  zolosera zokolola sizimasonyeza momwe zinthu zilili adatero
Label: HEALTH

Text:
kucheza ibu mphanje gaba wochemerera bullets otsata masewero mpira wa miyendo alipo ambiri amaonjeza kukonda kwake adachita kufika popereka maina achilendo kumatimu omwe amachemerera ati pofuna kuwopseza anzawo ibu mpanje mwa ochemerera timu ya big bullets yomwe eni ake amati timu ya fuko ma palestina ndidacheza naye motere mphanje masapota tionjezera mphamvu moni wawa ndikudziweni   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndine ibu mpanje kwathu nku nathenje ndikukhala mtauni ya lilongwe ndimakonda kwambiri masewero mpira wa miyendo moti timu yanga big bullets ambiri amandidziwa dzina lakuti gabadinho osati osewera mpira uja ayi wochemerera 
  tsono dzina la gabadinho lidabwera basi kumpira ambiri amandipatsa ulemu nkhani yochemerera ndiye ija kudadzatulukira gabadinho wa mpira ija amatengera momwe adagwedezera nkumandiitana dzina lomwelo 
  ambiritu amakonda kudzitcha okha maina otchuka sizili choncho iwe ayi nokhaso mudaona momwe zidalili kuja kokhala ochemerera momwe ndidagwedezera ochemerera matimu omwe samafunira bullets zabwino zimakhala mommuja zonse kukakhala mpira makamaka wa big bullets timu yanga kuyambira kalekale 
  umangokonda mpira basi uli mbiri iliyonse pamasewerowa mpira ndinkasewera kalekale kuyambira kupulayimale mpaka mmakalabu moti kusiya ndidasiyira timu ya kia ndasewerako malo osiyanasiyana mgalaundi malo omwe ndidasewera kwambiri kutsogolo kuvulala ndiko kudandichititsa ndisiye mpira ndidavulala kamodzi ndiye kuyambira pomwepo ndinkati ndikasewera mpira ndimadzutsa vutolo 
  malingaliro ako adali otani panthawiyo panthawiyo ndinkafunitsitsa kudzasewera mmatimu akuluakulu makamaka ya big bullets moti sindikaika chipanda kuvulalako nkadafika pomwe ndimafunapo omwe adandionererako imeneyo akhoza kufotokoza za luso lomwe ndidali nalo moti ndimadandaula kwambiri ndidasiya mpira ndisadasewereko mutimu ya flames 
  chifundo chosechi timu ya bullets supikisana nawo pamaudindo uzitumikira nawo ayi zinthu zimafunika kupatsana mpata pali omwe aonetsa kale mtima wofuna kutumikira mumafunika kuthandiza amenewo pakhale umodzi nonse mukamalimbirana mkangano suchedwa kuyamba ayi 
  sabata yathayi mwasewera masewero awiri omwe simudapambaneko zikutanthauzanji kwa iwe wochemerera poti adali masewero ongopimana mphamvu ndiye sindingazitengere kwenikweni tikudikira ligi ikayamba ndiye adzaone bullets yeniyeni mudaona nokha ligi yathayo momwe bullets idavutira chaka chino tiposa pamenepo ifenso ochemerera tionjezera mphamvu anyamata osewera nawo adzadzipereke kotheratu
Label: SPORTS

Text:
kusakaza kudaimitsa zinthu kalinde kusokonekerako kudadzetsa umphawi bungwe loyanganira zaufulu wa la malawi human rights commission mhrc lati kusokonekera kwa kayendetsedwe ka chuma cha boma kudapangitsa chitetezo chilowe pansi mdziko muno 
  wa bungweli sophie kalinde wati kusokonekeraku kudadzetsa umphawi kwa ambiri zomwe zidapangitsa wa umbava umbanda ukule apolisi ntchito iwachulukire 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc wati chotaya chikhulupiliro mwa apolisi adayamba kulanga okha akagwira munthu oganiziridwa mlandu kugenda kuphwanya maofesi polisi 
  amaukirira kumaphwanya maofesi apolisi mpakana awiri adaferapo ndiponso chiwerengero cha omwe adaphedwa poganiziridwa akuba kusonyeza samakhulupirira polisi adatero kalinde 
  adati zonsezi zidayamba amasowa pogwira ndalama zimasowa zitabedwa ogwira ntchito mboma 
  magulu osiyanasiyana ati kuperewera kwa chitetezoku kudapangitsa ntchito zina zina za chitukuko zibwerere mmbuyo 
  zina mwa ntchito zomwe akuti zidasokonekera zamalonda zomwe akuti eni malonda amamangika akafuna kutsegula makampani mafakitale opanga katundu osiyanasiyana poopa kuberedwa kuvulazidwa 
  oimira malonda ochokera ku china peng zhou bing wati 2013 mtunduwu udamenyedwa kulandidwa ndalama katundu wankhaninkhani zomwe adakonzekera kutsegulira kutukulira makampani adalephera kutero 
  pali anzathu ambiri omwe amafuna kubwela kudzakhazikitsa ntchito za malonda zosiyanasiyana amagwa ulesi akamamva momwe zinthu zilili kuno chitetezo adatero bing 
  bing wati imodzi mwa ntchito zamalonda zomwe zidasokonekera cha umbava umbandawu yomanga fakitale yopanga mapepala ku lilongwe yomwe mwini zhao 
  wati fakitaleyi imayenera makina atatu opangira mapepala achiwembu adaba mabokosi omwe mudali zitsulo za makina awiri makina amodzi okha ndiwo akugwira ntchito 
  saganiza makina enawo akadakhala akugwiranso ntchito bwenzi kampaniyi italemba ntchito ambiri omwe akungokhala mchaka chimenechi katundu ndalama zathu zankhaninkhani zabedwa anzathu adakhapidwa adatero bing 
  mwa ochita malonda zovala za kaunjika mumsika wa lilongwe john melekiyasi wati apolisi adayesetsa kukhwimitsa chitetezo nkhanza zidalipo makamaka akanyulana mavenda 
  wati zambiri apolisi amakhala chithunzithunzi cholakwika cha mavenda ndiye kulakwitsa kulikonse amakutenga mlandu wawukulu pomwe pali zoyipa zambiri zomwe akungowonerera 
  sikuti amalakwitsa kuchepetsa chipwirikiti mtauni khani imavuta nkhanza nkhani ingonongono umapeza ayamba kumenya kuphulitsa utsi okhetsa misozi komwe kuli kulakwira chabe adatero melekiyasi 
  apolisi ati chitetezo chidayenda mdziko muno mchaka cha 2013 amangokhala mantha cha mbiri yakale ya polisi ziwembu zina zina zomwe zimamveka 
  oyendetsa ntchito za kafukufuku ndikuonetsetsa ntchito za polisi zikuyenda george kayinga wati chitetezo chidakwera mmizinda ya mdziko muno cha mgwirizano omwe udalipo pakati apolisi 
  chitetezo chidayenda kwambiri mchaka chimenechi tikayerekeza mmene zidalili mmbuyomu tikuona kusitha kwakukulu adakali mantha mmaganizo akhulupilire chitetezo chili chipitilira kuyenda watelo kayinga 
  wati maso pakagwiridwe ntchito ka polisi ndiye pakakhala vuto lalingono amangowona polisi ikulephela pomwe ikuchita zinthu zambiri
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
makuponi si yankho ingosiyani boma lili kalikiliki ndondomeko ya zipangizo zotsika mtengo mphunzitsi wa zandale joseph chunga woona zaufulu wachibadwidwe billy banda ati boma lithetse ndondomekoyi kayendetsedwe kake kakusempha ovutika sikakutukula 
  boma lamenyetsa nkhwangwa pamwala ponena lilibe maganizo othetsa ndondomekoyi padakalipano ndondomeko yokhayo imene ingathetse njala umphawi mdziko muno 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mwachitsanzo mndondomeko ya chaka chino ovutika 44 000 achotsedwa pamndandanda wolandira nawo zipangizo zotsika mtengo chikhalirecho mbajeti ya chaka chino k60.1 biliyoni ndiyo yalowa kundondomekoyi 
  chaka chatha k40.6 biliyoni ndiyo idalowa kundondomekoyi yomwe idapindulira ovutika 1 544 000 zomwe malinga banda akuti nkutheka ndalamazi zikulowa penapake 
  ndondomeko ya zipangizo zotsika mtengo yofunika kulikonse nanenso ndimavomereza mmene zikukhalira bwinonso ndondomekoyi ithe watero chunga 
  chunga wati kafukufuku yemwe adapanga adapeza ndondomekoyi ikupereka mafunso ambiri ngatidi lino liyenera kupitiriza ndondomekoyi 
  funso loti kodi lino likuyenera kupitiriza ndondomekoyi mpaka liti kodi kufunika kwake nkotani akuti ovutika akuyenera akhale ndondomekoyi nanga ovutikawo akuthandizidwadi nanga ovutikawo akhale ati akumalemba abale akudziwana mfumu zomwe zikusemphana zomwe adatero chunga 
  lipoti lomwe boma mmwezi wa march chaka chino lidatulutsa pounguza mmene ndondomeko ya 2012/2013 idayendera likuti fetereza wa k120 miliyoni sadapindulire ovutika 
  lipotilo lomwe lidatsimikizidwa tione lidati ndalamazo zidali za matumba 9 100 fetereza feterezayo akuti wambiri adasempha ovutika kukapindulira anamadyabwino 
  mndondomeko yathayi alimi ambiri adalandira mchenga mmalo mwa fetereza zomwe sizidadziwike phata lake 
  chunga akuganiza mwina ndalama zomwe zalowa mndondomekoyi atazigulira chimanga chogawira ovutika zingapindule 
  tikukamba za k60.1 biliyoni ndalamayi yambiri pena tikuganiza atakagula chimanga kumaiko akunja kudzagawa kwa ovutikawo sizingathetse mavutowa adatero chunga 
  mneneri muunduna wa zaulimi sara tione wati kuphunzitsa munthu kuwedza nsomba mmalo momugawira tsiku lililonse azigogoda pakhomo pako umugawire 
  ndondomekoyi ikuphunzitsa kawedzedwe ka nsomba mawa akawedze okha osati kuwaphunzitsa kupempha inde ndondomekoyi ikukumana zokhoma komabe tikuyesetsa zilongosoke 
  ndiponso tiyitanitsa chimanga kunja pamene nthaka zina zotero tili nazo mdziko muno adatero tione 
  za kutsika kwa amene alandire zipangizozi tione wati zachitika 44 000 adangowonjezeredwa chaka chatha wati kukwera mtengo kwa fetereza ndiko kwachititsa zimenezi malinga nkhani ya zachuma mmene ikuyendera mdziko muno 
  tione wati posakhalitsapa zipangizozi ziyamba kufika mmadera mvula yoyamba isanagwe 
  banda akuganiza boma lachulutsa dala ndalama zopita kundondomekoyi pofuna kuyambitsa ndondomeko zina 
  dziwani ndalamayi yachuluka kwambiri chiwerengero cha opindula chachepa zimanditanthauzira mwina boma likufuna ligwiritse ntchito ndalama yochepa kundondomeko ya zipangizo zotsika mtengo pamene zina zikulowa mmapolojekiti amene sitingawadziwe 
  akuganiza k60.1 biliyoni ikungolemeretsa osati ithandiza ovutika banda akuti bwono boma lithetse ndondomekoyi kuyamba ina yomwe ingapindulire amalawi onse 
  mneneri wa chipani cha dpp nicholas dousi wati akadzalowanso mboma adzapitiriza ndondomeko yopereka zipangizo zotsika mtengo kwa alimi adzayesetsa ziphuphu zithe 
  tidalephera kumva maganizo zipani zina mcp udf pankhaniyi kaamba koti titawayimbira mafoni ankangoitana samayankha 
  mtsogoleri wakale wa chipani cha mcp john tembo yemwenso mtsogoleri wa zipani zotsutsa boma mnyumba ya malamulo adati akadakhala mboma bwenzi atayambitsa ndondomeko yoti fetereza wotsika mtengo afikire osati osaukitsitsa okha ayi
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
escom ganizirani amalawi utsi sufuka popanda moto mwambiwu umatanthauza kalikonse kamveka sikatero pachabe 
  zamveka bungwe la escom likufuna kukweza magetsi tikukhulupirira sizidangolankhulidwa kenakake bungweri likukonza 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc escom idziwe amalawi amafuna zinthu zotsika mtengo zoyenerera zonse pamene akukweza magetsi amanena akufuna kukonza zinthu magetsi asamazimezime yomwe imangokhala nyimbo 
  tikulankhulamu magetsi akungozimazima pena mpaka kumatha tsiku lonse magetsi osayaka pamene azimitsa magetsi kodi amaganiza akugwiritsira ntchito chiyani makalanso oletsedwa ndiye agwire mtengo uti bungwe la escom liganize lisadabwere chiganizo tikukamba may chaka chatha akweza magetsi katatu adakweza amalawi sadaone kulikonse kuzimba kwa magetsi ndiyo yakhala nyimbo yomwe akuyimba 
  chonsecho tikumva kampaniyi yagula galimoto zodula zedi masiku apitawa 
  amalawi akufuna magetsi tsiku lonse zonse magetsi akenso akhale otsika mtengo osati akwere akakwera asintha kanthu zinthu zidakwera inde mmalawi akulira si nokha escom amene mukumva kuwawaku 
  kondani amalawi osati kukweza zinthu

Text:
kota yatha jc yabwerera unduna wa za maphunziro wathetsa njira yosankhira ophunzira msukulu zaukachenjede yotchedwa kota yabwezeretsa mayeso jc msukulu za sekondale 
  kudzera njira ya kota yomwe yakhala ikudzetsa mpungwepungwe mdziko muno ophunzira amasankhidwa potengera boma lomwe amachokera osati momwe akhonzera 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc ophunzira azisankhidwa msukulu zaukachenjede potengera kukhoza kwawo akatswiri azamaphunziro ayamikira boma cha kusinthaku achenjeza boma lisachite pofuna kukopa kudzavotera chipani cholamula cha democratic progressive party dpp chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa lino chomwe chidzachitike may 19 chaka chino 
  polengeza nkhaniyi msonkhano wa atolankhani mzinda wa lilongwe lachinayi nduna ya maphunziro william susuwere banda idati boma lamvera maganizo malo msukulu zaukachenjede za boma achuluka poyerekeza momwe zidaliri mmbuyomu 
  mukudziwa boma lawonjezera malo msukulu zake kupatula apo sukulu zina zomwe zidali pansi university of malawi zaima pazokha zomwe zachititsa malo achuluke msukuluzo   boma lamvera amalawi kaamba koti akhala akudandaula njira ya kota kuchotsedwa kwa mayeso jc adatero banda 
  zipani zotsutsa boma zakhala zikugwiritsa ntchito kota kampeni ya chisankho cha may 19 2020 mwachitsanzo malawi congress party mcp utm akhala akuuza amalawi adzathetsa kota zikadzalowa mboma 
  sinodi ya livingstonia ya mpingo wa ccap yomwenso yakhala ikudzudzula boma cha kota yati siikambapo kanthu pokhapokha itaona zinthu zasinthadi 
  tamva sitinenapo zambiri ilo lonjezo chabe tiyambe kaye taona zikuchitika ndiye tidzalankhulapo adatero mlembi wamkulu wa sinodiyo mbusa levi nyondo 
  wapampando wa gulu lina lotchedwa quota must fall lomwe lakhala likutsutsana njirayi dr bina shaba adati sakufuna malonjezo kuchotseratu kota 
  tidzaomba mmanja tikadzaona zinthu zitasintha padakali sitisiya kulankhula zotsutsana kota adatero shaba 
  mwa akuluakulu bungwe loona zaufulu wa la human rights defenders coalition hrdc charles kajoloweka adati akhala akulondola boma likuchitadi zomwe lalonjezazo 
  lonjezo limakhala la phindu likakwaniritsidwa tamva tikhala tikulondolo ncholinga chofuna kudziwa boma likuchita zomwe lalonjezazo adatero kajoloweka 
  wa bungwe civic society education coalition csec benedicto kondowe adati nkhaniyi yabwino boma lisakhale likusewera maganizo amalawi pogwiritsa ntchito kota nyambo yokolera mavoti 
  kuthetsa kota ganizo labwino tisalankhule zambiri itha kampeni chabe   zina boma limalankhula zinthu mongofuna kukopa takhala tikulira za nkhanizi kwa yayitali ndiye lero lokha kwatani adafunsa kondowe   mtsogoleri wa bungwe la sukulu zomwe si zaboma la independent schools association of malawi isama peter patel wayamikira boma pobwezeretsa mayeso jc 
  patel adati kuchotsa kwa jc kumalowetsa pansi maphunziro 
  chomwe chimachitika nchoti ophunzira amangosewera kuyambira folomu 1 mpaka folomu 3 nkudzadzidzimuka folomu 4 chaka chawo cha mayeso ndiye amakhala kakasi ntchito imachuluka zotsatira zake ophunzira ambiri amalephera adatero patel 
  pakati 2015 pomwe boma limathetsa jce 2019 ana 58 100 aliwonse ndiwo amakhoza mayeso msce pomwe pakati 2011 2014 jce isadathe ana 53 100 aliwonse ndiwo amakhoza msce 
  kondowe adati zilibe ntchito kupanda kuthetsa jce bwenzi ana akukhoza kwambiri kuposa 58 100 aliwonse potengera momwe ndondomeko ya maphunziro idasinthira 
  makhozedwe zaka 8 adali motere 2011 51.8 2012 51.8 2013 52.48 2014 54.08 2016 58.32 2017 61.66 2018 63.00 2019 50.36 
  boma lidalengeza lathetsa mayeso jc september 2015 zidatanthauza ophunzira akapita ku sekondale azingokhulula mpaka folomu 4 komwe amalemba mayeso aboma msce 
  poteteza ganizolo boma lidati iyi njira imodzi yotetezera ndalama za boma zimatanthauza kuyambira sitandade 1 ku pulayimale mpaka folomu 4 ku sekondale ophunzira azilemba mayeso aboma awiri basi sitandade 8 pslc msce 
  njira ya kota idayamba mchaka cha 1987 akhala akuikana boma limakakamirabe kuigwiritsa ntchito
Label: POLITICS

Text:

Text:
zokhudza mikangano ya ufumu nkhani za ufumu zakhala zikuvuta kwa yaitali zina mwa nkhani zomwe zakhala zikupanga mitu mikangano ya ufumu pakati apo kudabuka ganizo loti mmatauni musamakhale mafumu steven pembamoyo adacheza gulupu santhe imodzi mwa mafumu akale 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndikudziweni mfumu 
  santhe makhoti asamalowererepo ndine aclas chisoni la ufumu ndine nyakwawa santhe wa mdera la t kalolo ku lilongwe 
  tiziti santhe ake ku kasunguwa chibale chilipo chakumizu ku kasungu mbere la nkhoma pomwe kulilongwe ndife mbere la mwale 
  ufumu mudaulowa liti ndidalowa ufumu mchaka cha 1985 achimwene anga wilson pwela omwe adali afumu atamwalira mchaka cha 1983 panopa ndikutha zaka 21 ndili mfumu chaka chino ndikuyembekeza kukwenzedwa kufika senior group santhe 
  zaka zonsezi mwakhala mfumu mavuto anji omwe mungatiuze amapezeka ufumu mavuto alipo ambiri osayiwala mikangano maufumu ambiri amatchuka mikangano makamaka yemwe adali nfumu akamwalira ndiye wina alowepo zina mpaka pamalowa za mankhwala kulimbirana ufumu vuto lina ndilakuti adani amachuluka ukangoweruza mlandu yemwe sizidamukomere basi chidani chimayamba pomwepo 
  ndiye pakatipo kudabuka zoti maufumu mtauni athe maganizo anu ngotani sizowona ayi mafumu ndiwofunikabe paliponse chitukuko chiyende mafumu pakagwa zovuta mafumu ndiwo amaongolera zonse palibe kanthu mtauni kumudzi pomwe pali pamayenera utsogoleri 
  makhansala sangagwire ntchito ya mafumu tiyeni tiziganiza mozama mfumu amasankha munthu okhwima maganizo odziwa kutsata mwambo chikhalidwe tsono makhansala ambiri amasankhidwa kaamba ka maphunziro kutha kulankhula basi utsogoleri wa ufumu sachita kampeni ayi okha amaona uyu atithandiza 
  nanga nkhani za ufumu kupititsa mukhoti ukunso nkusokoneza nkhani ya ufumu imayenera kukambidwa kumudzi apo ayi kwa dc zikavutitsitsa ku unduna wa zamaboma angonoangono kholo la maufumu
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:
nb idandaula kugula luso la ict lakunja wolemba thokozani chapola banki ya national yalangiza makampani owona za chuma mdziko muno aganizire kupereka mwayi kwa achinyamata mdziko muno omwe ukadaulo okhudza luso la makono cholinga chowathandiza kukweza luso lawo kutukula lino 
 wapempha kampani zizitenga luso la ict mdziko muno kawawa wabanki ya national macfussy kawawa yemwe wanena lachinai mboma la mangochi mkumano wa akadaulo luso la makono la ict omwe unachitikira ku sunbird nkopola kumenenso bankiyi inapereka mphotho kwa omwe achita zinthu za luso nkhani za ict 
 kawawa anena potsatira dandaulo la kampani zambiri zoona za chuma mdziko muno zikumakonda kupereka mwayi kwa kampani za ict zakunja kuposa za mdziko muno 
 pamenepa kawawa alangiza achinyamata luso la mtunduwu mdziko muno adzigwira ntchito limodzi cholinga choti luso lawo liwonekere patali kwa omwe angathe kulifuna 
 polankhulapo mtsogoleri wa bungwe la information communication technology association of malawi ictam bram fudzulani ati okondwa mmene ntchito za ict zikukulira mdziko muno wati akuyesetsa awonetse poyera ntchito zomwe amagwira makampani akonde kupereka mwayi kukampani za ict za mdziko muno kusiyana za kunja

Text:

 ndine mtsikana wa zaka 21 ndili mwana amuna anga adandisiya ataona ndili pathupi mwana atabadwa adauzidwa mpaka sadabwereko kudzaona mwana wawo ndikawauza za chithandizo samayankha amangozengereza chomvetsa chisoni nchakuti munthune ndimakhala agogo okalamba poti makolo anga onse adamwalira ndithandizeni ndipange

Text:
anayi anjatidwa kamba kochitira chiwembu mzika yaku pakistan apolisi ku lilongwe amanga anai omwe akuwaganizira abera mzika in ya mdziko la pakistan pachiwembu chomwe anayichitira 
 watsimikiza za nkhaniyi benjamin wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa apolisi mboma la lilongwe sergeant foster benjamin wati amunawo farouk rahim lenias wright george kasabola sautso mandala awamanga lachinayi powaganizira anaba ndalama zokwana 400 sauzande kwacha lamya zammanja za ndalama pafupifupi 470 sauzande kwacha usiku wa 27 april chka chino 
 sergeant benjamin wati pakadali anthuwa awuvomela mlanduwu apolisi akupitiriza kufufuza omwe limodzi akubawa omwe sanapezeke 
 farouk rahim wa zaka 33 wa mmudzi mwa mazengela mdera la mfumu malengachanzi mboma la nkhotakota lenias wright wa zaka 30 wa mmudzi mwa michenga mdera la mfumu mabuka ku mulanje george kasabola wa zaka 30 wa mmudzi mwa moyo mfumu phambala sautso mandala wa zaka 40 zakubadwa wa mmudzi mwa chikadya kwa mfumu ganya mboma la ntcheu

Text:
yodep yalonjeza kuthandiza achinyamata odzidalira bungwe la youth development yodep lati lipitilira kuthandiza achinyamata akhale upangiri oyenera nkhani za chuma cholinga choti azitha kumadzithandiza okha mavuto omwe amakumana nawo mdziko muno 
 wa bungwe li mac blessings buda wayankhula pambuyo mwambo wopereka mbuzi ku makalabu asanu imodzi achinyamata opezeka mmidzi ya mdera la mfumu yayikulu chowe mboma la mangochi 
 ati bungwe lawo lachita cholinga chofuna achinyamata azipeza thandizo la ndalama akagulitsa ziwetozi 
 polankhulapo mfumu nkata yochekera mderali inati ndiyokondwa kaamba ka thandizo lomwe bungweli lapereka kwa zomwe ati zithandiza achinyamatawa nkhani za maphunziro zosoweka moyo wawo wa tsiku tsiku 
 tiri othokoza kwambiri bungwe limeneli la yodep kaamba kobwera mmudzi muno kudzapereka thandizo la ziweto zomwe zithandize anawa kupezako mathandizo zomwe amasowa makope zolembera school uniform zina azizipeza akagulitsa mbuzizi anatero group nkata 
 bungweli lapereka mbuzi zokwana 60 kwa achinyamata ochokera mmakalabu 6 mmidzi yozungulira group village nkata mfumu yayikulu chowe mboma la mangochi
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
mai mutharika ati amayi akhale odzidalira wa bungwe la beautify malawi trust beam trust gertrude mutharika walimbikitsa amayi mdziko muno akhale odzidalira pachuma 
  mutharika adalankhula masiku apitawa pomwe amakhazikitsa tsiku lokumbukira ntchito za mabizinesi la world entrepreneurship day mdziko la amerika 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mutharika tayika ndondomeko zingapo mutharika adati beam trust ikufuna kulimbikitsa amayi kutengapo gawo lalikulu pantchito za mabizinesi njira imodzi yowalimbikitsira kudziyimira paokha 
  tayika ndondomeko zingapo zomwe cholinga chake nkupititsira amayi atsikana mmabizinesi beam trust ilimbikitsanso amayi atsikana kutengapo gawo lalikulu pantchito zolimbikitsa ukhondo mmatauni mizinda adatero 
  adatsindika kusowa mpamba woyambira bizinesi chikole ndiye mavuto amene amayi asungwana omwe akufuna kuyamba mabizinesi akukumana nawo africa 
  choncho adapempha mabungwe omwe mabanki aganizire kufewetsa zawo amayi atsikana adzitha kupeza ngongole mosavuta

Text:
cwo ipempha amayi atenge gawo mlozo bungwe la amayi achikatolika la catholic women organisation cwo arkdayosizi ya blantyre lapempha amayi onse mpingowu kutengapo mbali mlozo wa zochitikachitika womwe bungweli lakonza mchaka chino cha 2020 
 mwa amayi achikatolika blantyre archdiocese mlembi wa bungweli arkdayosiziyi hellen maseko ndiwo alankhula ku limbe cathedral arkdayosiziyi pambuyo pamkumano wa atsogoleri bungweli womwe cholinga chake ndikukonza mlozo wa zochitika action plan zomwe bungweli lichite mchaka chino chatsopano 
 maseko ati mlozo watsopanowu uli zochitika zosiyanasiyana mogwirizana ma pulojekiti omwe bungweli lili nawo zomwe amayiwa agwirana manja zithandiza kukweza miyoyo yawo uzimu chitukuko cha eni cha ku thupi 
 zoona takumanadi cholinga choti tikonze mlozo wa momwe tiyendere mchakachi mlozowu tayikamo zinthu zambiri potengera ma pulojekiti omwe tili nawo amayi mchaka cha 2019 zonse zimene zinali action plan yathu tinakwaniritsa palibe chomwe tinalephera kamba koti amayi onse anatenga mbali choncho chaka chino tilinso chikhulupiliro amayi onse opezeka mmaparish 43 arkdayosiziyi atithandizanso anatero maseko 
  atinso amayi akufunitsitsa achite zotheka azikhala odzidalira moyo wao wa tsiku tsiku kwinakunso akutumikira mpingo wao 
 yoti amayi kukumana kungochita mapemphero mkumapita inatha ino ndiyoti tilumikize moyo wa mapemphero ndiponso kuzidalira kwa amayi moyo watsiku tsiku ndiye tikagwirana manja ndiye dayosizi yathu ikhala yotsogola amayi athu akhala otukuka uzimu ku thupi komwe 
 mlozowu ati chochitika choyambilira cha amayiwa kukhazikitsa ntchito yobzala mitengo yomwe amayiwa amathandizidwa banki la national ku parishi ya kadikira 25 january 2020 komwenso kukumbekezereka arkepiskopi wa arkdayosiziyi ambuye thomas luke msusa akuluakulu ochokera ku banki ya national
Label: RELIGION

Text:
ndidamuona koyamba shoprite kwangotsala mwezi umodzi adzathyole dansi paphwando la ukwati wa evance mwale tiwonge nundwe 4 may 
  evance amagwira ntchito ku sinodi ya ccap ya livingstonia pomwe bwenzi lakelo muulutsi wailesi ya voice of livingstonia 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu awiriwa akhala ubwenzi kwa zaka 
  malinga mwale adamuona koyamba nundwe shoprite ku mzuzu adamusangalatsa 
  tidakumana koyamba mchaka cha 2015 shoprite adandipatsa chidwi mpaka ndidayamba kumufufuza ndithu ndimudziwe lomwe kwawo kudziwa zomwe adalongosola mwale 
  adati akufuna kwabwino adamuuza zonse za namwaliyu 
  komatu mwale adali mwayi mchaka chomwecho adapeza danga lokagwira ntchito kuofesi ya nundwe komwe sadachitenso za bo bo!bo kuyamba kucheza mtsikanayo 
  pofika chaka cha 2016 ubwenzi wa ponda apa nane ndipondepo udayambika pakati awiriwa 
  ndidamufunsira ndine adalibe nane chidwi olo pangono nkukhala nane paubwenzi wokathera mbanja zidanditengera miyezi isanu umodzi andipatse danga lokhala naye ubwenzi adalongosola mwale 
  komatu zikhalira ubwenzi uliwonse umakhala zokhoma zake nawo awiriwa akumana nazo zokhoma zofuna kuwalekanitsa chauta waikapo amange banja 
  pomwe mwale adamutsira diso nundwe koyamba shoprite namwaliyo adamuona koyamba mwale pomwe adakayamba kuphunzira ntchito kusinodiyi 
  kumayambiliro timacheza munthu mnzake sindidaganizeko zoti awirife nkukhala paubwenzi tidayamba kucheza kwambiri mpaka kumaona tili paubwenzi nthawiyo pomwe sizidali chomwechi adalongosola nundwe 
  adati chikondi cha awiriwa chidayambira pomwe ankapitira limodzi kokadya nkhomaliro mmalo odyera mumzinda wa mzuzu
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
amanga wometa mnzake kumanyazi zachilendo akuti zachitika ku mangochi komwe apolisi amanga wina pomuganizira adameta mnyamata wa fomu 4 malo aulemu 
  mneneri wa polisi ya mangochi rodrick maida watsimikiza za kumangidwa kwa kenneth chimombo wa mmudzi mwa mtalimanja kwa t mponda mbomalo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu maida wati apolisi amutulutsa mkuluyu pabelo pamene kufufuza zenizeni za nkhaniyi kukupitira akuti amutsekulira mlandu wogwira munthu malo osayenerera indecent assault 
  maida adati chimombo adakumana mnyamatayo lachitatu 23 march pomwe adagwirizana akachezerane 
  mnyamatayo adauza apolisi wakhala asakupita kwa chimombo patsikulo atakumana chimombo adamuuza abwere kwake akacheze adatero maida 
  cha mma 10 koloko mmawa wa tsikulo mnyamatayo amene zaka 18 akuti adapita kunyumbako adamupeza chimombo mwana wina kunyumbako 
  maida adati mnyamatayu wauza apolisi adauzidwa chimombo apite kuchipinda komwe ati kudachitika zoda mutuzi 
  akuti panthawi yomwe amauzidwa thupi lake lidafooka zomwe zidamuchititsa achite chilichonse chomwe amalamulidwa 
  kuchipindako akuti adayamba kumusisita pamimba adayamba kumumeta pamimba akuti panthawiyi adafooka wabaidwa jakisoni wa dzanzi akumumeta choncho akuti adadzidzimuka pamene chimombo adayamba kumugwira malo obisika amumete adatero maida 
  apa akuti pamene adazindikira adatuluka mnyumbamo ulendo kukanena kwa makolo ake panthawiyo akuti adayamba kusanza adafooka kwambiri 
  makolo mnyamatayu akuti ndiwo adapita mwana wawo kupolisi ya mangochi kukadandaula awametera mwana wawo 
  kupolisi adavula tione tidaonadi adali wometedwa ndiye tidamanga chimombo tsiku lomwelo pomuganizira wachita ndiyenso amatchulidwa adatero 
  chimombo wa zaka 29 akuti wauza apolisi adametadi iyeyo pamene adauzidwa mnyamatayu amumete 
  sadakane kupolisi wati adachita kutumidwa mnyamatayu amumete tidamutengeranso kubwalo la milandu komwe amakauzidwa za mlandu womwe akuzengedwa adaonjeza maida 
  chimombo akapezeke wolakwa pamlanduwu atha kukakhala kundende zaka malinga malamulo lino
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
chihana abweretse umboni za chuma cha bingu dausi pasathe masiku asanu chipani cha dpp chati yeremiah chihana amene adavumbulutsa zoti mtsogoleri wakale wa lino bingu wa mutharika adali chuma choposa k61 biliyoni abwere umboni wa nkhaniyi pofika lachitatu 
  polankhula kwa atolankhani mumzinda wa lilongwe mneneri wa chipanicho nicholas dausi adati zomwe adavumbulutsa chihana zilibe umboni zideafalitsidwa pofuna kudetsa mbiri ya dpp pomwe chisankho cha 2014 chili pamphuno 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc pasanathe masiku asanu chihana abwere zikalata zochokera ku mabanki amene akuti mutharika adali ndalama palibe banki yakunja imene ingangolankhula chihana pakamwa abwere zikalata za katundu malo amene akuti mutharika adali nazo adatero dausi 
  malinga dausi mtsogoleri wakale wa linoyu adalibe buku limodzi mngono peter yemwe adzaimire dpp pampando wa mtsogoleri wa lino chisankho cha chaka cha mawa 
  potha masiku asanu abwere umboni wochokera kubanki imene ili kulikonse padziko ngakhalenso ku malawi kuno kusonyeza bingu peter adali buku lina la kubanki limene adatsegulira limodzi adatero dausi pamsonkhano umenenso padali akuluakulu dpp 
  chihana yemwe mwini wa kampani yofufuza za katundu ya ymw property investment lachinayi adati akukambirana kaye womuimira pamilandu asanayankhe zimene adanena dpp 
  ndimve andiuza zotani mlanduwu ukadali kukhoti angouimika kaye dzulo lachitatu tidzaupitirize 7 august adatero 
  malinga zomwe chihana adapereka kubwalo la milandu pomwe amatenga mpando bingu adali k150 miliyoni pomwe amatisiya nkuti ndalama zoposa k61 biliyoni mmabanki mmaiko osiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo zimbabwe south africa united states of america kuno kwathu 
  vumbulutsolo litangophulika boma lidatseka mabuku mutharika pomwe ana mutharika duwa mutharika mubaira tapiwa mutharika amasamutsa ndalama zina kuchoka kumabuku malemu mwawo mutharika adasankha anawo adzayendetse chumacho atatsikira kuli chete 
  mmbuyomu peter mutharika adati boma likungofuna kulanga chipani cha dpp pomwe chisankho cha magawo atatu chili pamphuno 
  akutiopa akufuna kutilanda galimoto mafamu tisakhale ndalama za kampeni adatero
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
wlps ilimbikitsa amayi mmaudindo zamasewero bungwe lolimbikitsa amayi kutenga nawo mbali nkhani za masewero la women leadership program in sports lakonza mwambo wa masewero osiyanasiyana pakati masukulu primary chitawira mulambala njira imodzi yolimbikitsira amayi atsikana kutenga nawo mbali pamasewero osiyanasiyana mdziko muno 
 mlembi wa ku bungwe loyendetsa masewero tennis mdziko muno regina dembo wanena polankhula radio maria malawi 
 wati bungweli linakhazikitsidwa lipereke mwawi kwa amayi atsikana azikhala maudindo oyendetsa ntchito za mmasewerowa 
 bungweli likugwira ntchito zake matghandizidwa ma bungwe malawi national council of aports afican union of sports council
Label: SPORTS

Text:
tigwirane manja pothana chisaka cha nthochi woona za mbewu za mgulu la zipatso ku dipatimenti ya za kafukufukuku unduna wa zamalimidwe felix chipojola akuti nkhondo yolimbana matenda chisaka cha nthochi mdziko muno siingaphule kanthu pokhapoka atagwirana manja 
  adafotokoza njira yokhayo yothana chisaka ndikuchotsa nthochi zonse zakale ndikubzala zina 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kukakamira nthochi zakale kukuchititsa chisaka chizipitirira chipojola adati mzomvetsa chisoni alimi sakufuna kudzula nthochi zawo zakale zomwe zikuchititsa matendawa asathe msanga mdziko muno 
  tidakagwirana manja ndikuonetsetsa nthochi zonse zakale zachotsedwa matendawa akadatha mdziko muno bwenzi mukupezeka ntchochi zochuluka adatero 
  malingana mkuluyu alimi omwe adachotsa nthochi zakale ndikubzala zopanda matenda pachiopsezo cha matendawa amzawo sakufuna kudzula nthochi zawo zakale zomwe zikhoza kuchititsa za tsopanozo ziyambenso kugwidwa matendawa 
  chipojola adati matenda chisaka cha ntchochi amafala nsabwe zomwe zimatha kuulukira mminda ina 
  akumaputsitsika akaona nthochi zawo zikuoneka za thanzi akuyenera kudziwa matendawa amabisala tsiku lina amadzavumbuluka adatero 
  woona za ulimi wa mbewu za mtunduwu kwa bvumbwe harold katondo adati adayendera mmaboma momwe mumalimidwa kwambiri nthochi mdziko muno ndicholinga chofuna kupeza zomwe zikuchititsa alimi azikakamirabe mbewu zakale 
  pocheza nawo alimiwa amafotokoza mbewu zawo zakale nzokoma kwambiri amatha kuzigwiritsa ntchito kuphikira zinthu zosiyanasiyana 
  chodabwitsa nchoti amayankhula zoterezi sadayetserepo kulima kudya nthochi zatsopanozi adatero 
  katondo adati zachititsa ayambe kutolera mbewu zakalezi mmadera osiyanasiyana mdziko muno ndikuzikonza zikhale zopanda matenda 
  adati akazikonza ndikuzichulukitsa adzazibwezera kwa alimi azidzabzala 
  wa za ulimi mboma la thyolo jackson mkombezi adati alangizi mbomali adayesetsa kuwafotokozera alimi za njirayi ntchito ya kalavula gaga yomwe imakhalapo pochotsa ntchochi ndiyomwe ikuchititsa mbewu zakale zizipezekabe 
   ntchitoyi ikadakhala yosavuta ikadayenda mwachangu nthochi zambiri zikadachotsedwa ndikubzalidwa zina zopanda matenda adatero 
  mkuluyu adati alimi omwe adabzala mbewu zopanda matenda 2015 akutsimba lokoma ambiri akupeza zokolola zamnanu 
  mulanje limodzi mwa maboma omwe ulimiwu umachitika kwambiri moti wa za ulimi mbomalo evelyn chima akuti kuchepa kwa mbewu mwa mavuto omwe amachititsa azikakamirabe mbewu zakale 
  poyambirira tidalandira mbewu yochepa moti alimi omwe adavomereza kubzala mbewu zopanda matenda sadalandire onse 
  chaka chino talandira mbewu yochuluka alimi tawaphunzitsa azitha kuchulukitsa ndikumagaira anzawo 
   zithandizira ochuluka apeze mbewu adatero 
  chima adati alangizi mbomali akuyesetsa kugwira ntchitoyi atsogoleri mipingo mabungwe zipani cholinga chofuna kupititsa patsogolo ulimiwu
Label: FARMING

Text:
papa wati akhristu aphunzire kukonda anzawo mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wadzudzula khalidwe lodzikonda pakati 
 malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa walankhula lachiwiri pomwe amakumana ana omwe akuchita masewero osiyanasiyana mapemphero ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican 
 wauza anawa moyo umakoma munthu abwenzi kofunika akhazikitse ma ubwenzi abwino anzawo atatha kulankhula kwa anawa papayu anachezanso omwe akuyanganira anawa kuthandizira zina zina asanabwerere yake yomwe amakhala ya casa santa marta nyumba ya marita woyera 
 zochitikachitika za anawa zinayamba kumayambiriro mwezi uno pali masewero osiyana siyana kuphunzira zina nzina mapemphero 
 mwa masewero omwe akuchitika masewero mpira wa miyendo football tennis basketball kusambira swimming pongotchula ochepa 
 zonse zikuchitika motsata ndondomeko zoyikika pofuna kupewa nthenda ya covid 19 anawa omwe alipo 100 zaka zoyambira zisanu 5 mpaka zaka khumi zinayi 14 ana omwe amagwira ntchito zosiyana siyana ku vatican
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
mwambo wogwetsa simba sukulu zatsekera zikatere mmaboma ambiri makolo kalikiriki kukonzekera ana apite kusimba kukavinidwa kumenekotu kumakhala uphungu anawa adziwe khalidwe momwe zina za mbanja zimakhalira zambiri zakhala zikukambidwa zokhudza unamwaliwu sabata ino bobby kabango akutibweretsera mwambo womwe umachitika pamene anamwali akutulutsidwa kusimba pachinamwali cha jando kodi zimakhala tidziwane   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc ndine evason chalamanda wamkulu wa simba muno mmudzi mwa malika kwa t mpama mboma la chiradzulu mukufuna kudziwa chilichonse cha simba ndiye mwini 
  timamva kumakhala mwambo patsiku lomwe mukusasula simba kodi zoona zimenezo zoonadi chinamwali mwambo ndiye pamene mwamaliza kulanga anamwali mumayeneranso mutsate mwambo womwewo mukusasula simba ndigwirizane nanu kutidi pamakhala mwambo 
  umakhala mwambo wanji   mwambo wosangalala basi tamaliza chinamwali tikawasunga anamwaliwa kwa sabata ndiye tsiku lomwe tikuwatulutsa timayenera mwambo basi 
  mwambowo umachitikira malo alionse oyandikana simbalo usachitikire mumangotuluka kusimbako chapafupi simbalo mwambowu suchitikira kusimba kumakhalabe anamwali dziwani mwambowu ukamayambika anamwali amakhala asanatulutsidwe amadzakupezani mwambowo uli mkati dziwani amayi amene sadavinidwe sayenera kufika kusimbako nchifukwa mwambowo suchitikira kumeneko 
  osangopangira kusimba komweko pamene tikusasula simba timafuna tisangalale anzathu makolo achibale anzathu midzi yosiyanasiyana amabwera poti anthuwa saloledwa kufika kusimba nchifukwa chake timachoka kusimbako tikumane malo abwino anthuwa amakhala akufupa anamwaliwa pamene atuluka kusimbako 
  kodi kumakhala zochitika zotani patsikuli akufunira kunoko timakhala mwambo wosangalala magule timakhala azungu chinyama zomwe zimasangalatsa amene abwera kudzaonerera mwambowo 
  azungu   eya kunena amene khungu lawo loyera 
  amachokera amachokera kusimba komweko mdziko lomwe lino mumachita kupangatu amene amakhala kusimbako amakhala adavinidwa kale awa si anamwali anamwali amatuluka usiku basi pamenenso kumakhala mwambo wina 
  kodi azungudi mundipusitsatu amenewa si azungu enieni timachita kupanga kusimba komweko timatenga dothi nkuliviika mmadzi likafewa timawauza ayambe kudzola thupi lonse likauma munthuyo amafanana mzungudi 
  amaoneka khungu mzungu mavalidwe ndiye amavala zosiyasiyana amavala nsalu dilesi ndiye amaoneka atsikana onse anyamata 
  ndiye mwati kumabweranso chinyama eya chimakhala chofanana mbalame dzina lake timachitcha chimwanambera ntchito yake nkuopseza ana adziwe za kuopsa kwa samba paja ndanena kumabweranso ana sikuti chimawamenya 
  mumachitanso kupanga eya timachipanga mitengo kunjako timachikutira bulangete nsalu mkatimo mumakhala awiri azichiyendetsa
