Text:
kwaya ya masiphumelere ichita ubale abwenzi tchalitchi la kankhomba kwaya yopangidwa akhristu mpingo wakatolika kuno ku malawi akukhalira ku capetown mdziko la south africa ya fishhoek masiphumelere yayamikira ubale wabwino ulipo pakati kwayayi bungwe la abwenzi tchalichi la kankhomba parish ya thunga arch dayosizi ya blantyre akukhalira mdziko lomwelo la south africa 
 wapampando wa kwaya yi mosses lusale omwe anena pakutha mwambo wa paper sunday yomwe kwayayi inachita njira imodzi yofuna kupeza thandizo la ndalama zojambulira chimbale chawo 
 ayamikira mamembala bungwe la abwenzi tchalichi la kankhomba omwe akukhalira ku capetown mdziko mo kaamba kofika kudzawathandiza mwambo wu 
 pamenepa lusale ati zomwe zachitikazi zasonyeza umodzi ulipo pakati magulu awiri wa 
 polankhulanso mwa mamembala bungwe la abwenzi atchalichi la kankhomba parish ya thunga arch dayosizi ya blantyre okhalira mdziko la south africa wa velonica makawa ati wokondwa ubale wu
Label: RELIGION

Text:
akhristu apewe kuyika mtima za mdziko papa mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisko wati akhristu aleke kuyika mtima kwambiri zinthu za mdziko la pansi 
 papa francisko walankhula lachiwiri nsembe ya misa yomwe anatsogolera ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican wati mtima kwambiri zinthu za kumachititsa mdima wosasiyanitsa pakati chinthu chabwino choipa 
 papa francisko pamenepa papa francisko wapempha akhazikike zonse zinthu zomwe zokweza ufumu wa mulungu 
 polankhula mtchalichi cha lalingono la santa marta ku vatican papa francisko wati mavuto ambiri katangale ziphuphu akhazikika pakati choika mtima kwambiri zinthu za mmalo motsogoza mulungu 
 papa francisko wati akuyenera kumadzifunsa zonse chomwe akufuna chikuchokera kwa mulungu mzimu woipa 
 pamenepa wati munthu akuyenera kumasinkhasinkha zonse zomwe zikuchitika moyo adziwe akuchita zosangalatsa mulungu ayi 
 pomaliza wati nkofunika kumapemphera kwambiri pofuna kuima njiiii za mulungu
Label: RELIGION

Text:
atukuka kukwatitsa mitengo ya zipatso masiku ano nkhani ili mkamwamkamwa paulimi yogwiritsa ntchito mitundu ya mbewu zamakono zomwe akatswiri adayesa nkupeza zili kuthekera kotukula ulimi alimi zipatso nawo adayambapo kutsata nzeruzi akusimba lokoma alimi gulu la taweni farmers club ku mzimba akuchita nawo ulimiwu akudalira kwambiri kukwatitsa mitengo ya zipatso wapampando wa gululi jester kalua adafotokozera steven pembamoyo za ulimiwu motere   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mlimi pantchito yake kalua kukwatitsa mitengo ya zipatso dzina ndani dzina langa jester kalua wa mmudzi mwa kamanga kwa t mtwalo ku mzimba ndine wapampando wa gulu la alimi la taweni farmers club 
  kodi kalabu imeneyi mumapanga zotani timapanga ulimi wa zipatso zosiyanasiyana malalanje mapapaya mango mapichesi mapeyala tili malo aakulu kwambiri omwe timabzalapo mitengo yazipatsoyi timathandizana kusamalira gulu 
  mumabzala mitundu yotani ya zipatsozo pali ntchito ndithu sitimangofesa basi nkumayembekezera tidzaokere ayi pali zambiri zomwe timachita kwakukulu nkukwatitsa mitengo yathu yazipatso 
  mukutanthauzanji mukatero ndikutanthauza timatha kufesa mitengo ina yomwe sivuta kumera nkusamala panazale kenako timaikwatitsa mitengo ina yomwe imabereka imavuta kafesedwe kake 
  kukwatitsako mumtani tikafesa mitengo yathu timayanganira mpaka itafika pamsinkhu wokwatitsa pokwatitsapo timadula nthambi ya mtengo womwe ukwatidwewo nkuikapo nthambi ya mtengo womwe nkumanga tikatero timapitiriza kusamalira 
  ndiye mtengowo sungafe ayi zomwe timachita nzakuti sitidula nthambi zonse mwina imodzi nkusiya nthambi zina zoti zizipanga chakudya cha mtengowo uku ukugwirana unzakewo zikagwirana bwinobwino timatha kudzadula nthambi zinazo mtengo wokhawo womwe upitirire kukula 
  cholinga chake nchiyani timafuna kupeza phindu lochuluka paulimi wathu mbewu yomwe timaphayo imakhala yobereka pangono kusiyana mbewu yokwatitsayo ndiye timafuna kupindulapo mbewu inayo 
  mungatchuleko mitundu ya mbewu zomwe mukukwatitsa pakalipano tikukwatitsa mandimu malalanje mango achikuda achizungu mapichesi achikuda achizungu 
  ndiye mwati kusiyana kwake nkotani kusiyana kwake nkwakuti mbewu zachizunguzi zimabereka zipatso zikuluzikulu zimabereka kwambiri kuposa mbewu zachikuda 
  sindikumvetsa pakakwatitsidwe ka mandimu malalanje nchifukwa chiyani mumapha mandimu mudzakolole malalanje pali zifukwa zingapo choyamba mandimu savuta kafesedwe kake poyerekeza malalanje ndiye timafuna mandimuwo atiyambire moyo wosavutawo kenako nkuupatsira ku malalanje chachiwiri mandimu malalanje chili msika waukulu malalanje ndiye munthu akamabzala mbewu zodzagulitsa amaganizira za msika choncho timaona chanzeru kulimbikira malalanjewo 
  mwanenapo za kasamalidwe kodi mumasamala mitengi yanuyo zoonadi mitengo imafunika chisamaliro chokwanira kupanda kutero simungapeze phindu chiopsezo chachikulu moto wolusa womwe umayamba mosadziwika choncho mpofunika kulambula bwinobwino munkhalango ya zipatso kupatula apo mitengo sichedwa kugwidwa matenda osiyanasiyana choncho pamafunika kuyendera pafupipafupi mwaoneka chizindikiro cha matenda vutolo lithetsedweretu 
  yokolola mumatani choyamba sitingokolola chisawawa pamakhala yake yokololera timayamba taona zipatsozo zafika poti tikhoza kukolola timakana kungokolola chisawawa zipatso zokolola zanthete zimabweretsa maluzi maonekedwe ake zikapsa amakhala osapatsa chikoka 
  misika yanu ili tili misika yosiyanasiyana ya zipatso zipatso zina timapikulitsa kwa mavenda zina timapita nazo mmagolosale akuluakulu omwe amatigulitsira nkumatipatsa ndalama
Label: FARMING

Text:
nkhondo ilipo afcon atusaye kumanja kuthambitsana mnyamata wa ethiopia kuphedwa kwa ethiopia lachitatu kamuzu stadium malawi kuphedwa kwa mali tsiku lomwelo algeria zikusonyeza mgulu b momwe muli matimu anayiwa mukhala ntchito yosayamba 
  tikukambamu timu iliyonse yasewera mipira iwiri umodzi pakhomo umodzi koyenda algeria ndiyo yachita chamuna yapambana onse 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi mali malawi ndiwo akusetekera pakamwa sanadye mokwanira kutolera mapointi atatu pamasewero awiri 
  mali idapha malawi pakwawo 2 0 nkukagonja mmanja mwa algeria 1 0 koyenda malawi idakwapula ethiopia 3 2 nkugonja kwa mali pamene algeria yathambitsa ethiopia 2 1 mali 
  mgululi ikutsogola algeria kutsatirana mali ili mapointi atatu chimodzimodzi malawi iyo yachinyitsa chigoli chimodzi pamene malawi yachinyitsa zigoli 4 kumbuyo kuli ethiopia yomwe sidatole pointi imodzi 
  mumpikisano wa afcon matimu awiri mgulu lililonse amene achita ndiwo amapitirira kukapikisana nawo apa zikusonyeza masewero onse akatha woyamba wachiwiri adzapita ku morocco chaka chikubwerachi 
  mpikisanowu ukatha timu imodzi yomwe yathera nambala 3 yasewera kuposa matimu onse amene sadachite idzasankhidwa ipite nawo ku morocco 
  nkhondo mgulu b ikuoneka ikhala pakati mali malawi apitirire algeria yomwe yathobola kale ethiopianso ili mwayi wochita 
  malawi 11 october ikulandira algeria timu yomwe adayigonjetsa 3 1 2010 masewerowa kamuzu stadium lachitatu lake 15 malawi idzatsatira algeria mdziko lawo kukaphana timu ya algeria idakhalapo katswiri wa mpikisanowu 1990 itaphwasula nigeria 
  malawi ichite ikuyenera ithethetse algeria pamene ikubwera kamuzu stadium kudzapha mali imene idzafike kamuzu stadium 15 november iyesetse kutidzimula pakati ethiopia algeria kwawo pakavuta kukangolepherana nawo 
  padakalipano timu iliyonse mgululi ili mwayi wopita ku morocco ingasamale magemu akudzawa 
  masewero malawi ethiopia adachinya zigoli za malawi adali atusaye nyondo ziwiri frank banda pamene ethiopia adayichinyira adali getaneh kebede yusuf saleh
Label: SPORTS

Text:
mwana wa dos santos anathawa mlandu boma woyimira boma mlandu mdziko la angola wati akufuna mwana wa mtsogoleri wakale wa dzikolo isabel dos santos abwelerenso mdzikolo 
 malipoti awailesi ya bbc ati santos yemwe mwa amayi olemera kwambiri kuno ku africa anakhazikika ku london ake atangochoka udindo wa utsogoleri wa dzikolo 
 akuti akukhudzidwa katangale ku la kwawo santos mayiyu ati akukhudzidwa nkhani za katangale zomwe zimachitika mdzikolo yomwe bombo ake mtsogoleri wa polankhuklapo santos wati zomwe apolisiwa akunena zabodza ndale chabe 
 mwa apolisi azofufufzafufuza wa helder pitra wauza wailesi ya dzikolo thandizo lochokera ku maiko portugal dubai maiko achita chothekera kumubweretsa santos kumudzi azayimbidwe mlandu wokhudza za katangale zomwe anachita mdzikolo 
 mwazina nkhaniyi inafika kale ku bwalo lamilandu la mdzikolo pomwe zinaululika mayiyu amagwiritsa ntchito makalata achinyengo pochita malonda ake mdzikolo
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
moi walowa mmanda mwambo woyika mmanda thupi la mtsogoleri wakale wa la kenya daniel arap moi wachitika bwalo la sukulu ya ukachenjede ya kabarak mdera la nakuru mdzikolo 
 walamulira la kenya kwa zaka 27 moi malipoti wailesi ya bbc ati president wa dzikolo uhuru kenyatta wachiwiri william ruto nawo mwambowo omwe unatsogoleredwa mpingo wa african inland aic komwe mtsogoleriyu amkapemphera pamene adali moyo 
 moi anababwa 2 september mchaka cha 1924 wamwalira 4 february 2020 
 anakhalapo wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dzikolo kuyambira mchaka cha 1967 mpaka 1978 anadzakhala president imfa ya yemwe mtsogoleri wa dzikolo jomo kenyata mchaka cha 1978 
 moi yemwe wamwalira sabata yatha zaka 95 mtsogoleri wachiwiri wa la kenya mtsogoleri amene walamulira kwambiri la kenya kuyambira mchaka cha 1978 mpaka 2002 
 pamene akuti adzamkumbukira moyi tate weniweni wokonda lake akuti ulamuliro unali opondereza wa tsankho katangale
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
mwambo odzodza ansembe uchitika ku blantyre zomba by richard makombe 0449-1-1024x683.jpg 1024w sizes="(max width 662px 100vw 662px />mwambo wa malumbiro umenewu uchitika ku zomba blantyre mwambo odzodza madikoni anayi ansembe arkidayosizi ya blantyre uchitika loweruka ku limbe cathedral akidayosizi ya blantyre 
 malinga alfred chaima omwe wa muofesi yoona za utumiki arkidayosiziyi ati zonse zokonzekera kudzodza adikoni atatu achibadwiri wa chipani cha mzimu woyera tsopano zafika kumapeto 
 chaima ati ambuye thomas luke msusa omwe adzatsogolere mwambowu 
 padakalipano nawo akhristu eni ake ati zokonzekera zizafika kumapeto pomwe magulu omwe akutsogolera miyambo yosiyanasiyana alimbikitsa kukonzekera zochitikazi njira imodzi yokometsa mwambowu 
 mwa omwe komiti ya zochitika chitika tsikuli patrick kombe wati chiyembekezo choti akhristu alendo omwe ayitanidwa tsikuli azasangalala kuthandiza archdiocese yao pamene ikulandira atumiki atsopanowa 
 zonse zili mchimake pofika tsiku loweruka yemwe waitanidwa adzabwere mwaunyinji wa ana dayosiziyi adzadzodwa tsikuli anatero kombe 
 kombe kofunika akhristu wa adzaonetse umodzi wawo potenga nawo gawo zochitika tsikuli pomwe nso dayosizi tsopano yakula ili ma ma parish 43 
 dayosizi ya zomba mwambo odzodza ma deacon atatu ansembe uchitikanso loweruka pomwenso kukakhale chikondwelero choti ansembe atatu akwanitsa zaka 25 akutumikira mulungu diocese ya zomba 
 malinga innocent chiwanda yemwe pastoral secretary wa diocese ya zomba ambuye george desmond tambala omwe akatsogolere mwambowu 
 ma deacon atatu wa peter chiopsa petro chilumpha fortune gondwe ansembe atatu omwe akukondwelera atha zaka 25 akutumikira mulungu daniel beneti ignancio bokosi charles namalitha
Label: RELIGION

Text:
youth week ibwereredi achinyamata mafumu mtsogoleri wa achinyamata ndale wa bungwe la young politicians union clement mukuwa wati wosangalala ganizo la boma lofuna kukhazikitsanso sabata ya achinyamata youth week likugwirizana zomwe achinyata adaika pamndandanda wa zolinga zawo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka tili mndandanda wa zomwe achinyamata atamachita chimodzi mwa kugwira ntchito modzipereka ndiye tikakumbuka zomwe youth week inkachita zikugwirizana imeneyi adatero mukuwa 
  kudikira boma likonze munthu kuoloka movutikira paulalo woonongeka phungu wa kumpoto cha kummawa kwa boma la mchinji alex chitete ndiye adayambitsa nkhaniyi mnyumba ya malamulo pomwe aphungu amaunika momwe chuma cha chayendera pamiyezi isanu umodzo 6 
  phunguyu adapempha boma likhazikitsenso sabata ya achinyamata zidalili mnthawi ya ulamuliro wa malemu dr hastings kamuzu banda pomwe achinyamata mdziko muno adali sabata yogwira ntchito zachitukuko mmadera pofuna kuwaphunzitsa za ubwino wogwira ntchito modzipereka potukula lawo 
  adati panthawi ya ulamuliro wa chipani chimodzi achinyamata ankatenga gawo lalikulu pachitukuko kusiyana masiku ano pomwe kuli ntchito zogwira chiyembekezo cholandira dipo yomwe akugwira akukuluakulu 
  poyankhapo nduna ya zantchito henry mussa adati ganizoli si loipa silokakamiza mmapulani boma muli kale ndondomeko zomwe akuti achinyamata azipatsidwa mpata kutenga nawo mbali pantchito zina 
  adati mundondomekoyi ntchito zina zomwe zizigwiridwa zachitukuko momwe zinkakhalira mnyengo ya youth week kalelo 
  tidayankha kale pankhani imeneyo si zokakamiza ndondomeko ilipo kale moti pompanopompano ziyambika adatero mussa 
  mukuwa adati mtsogoleri wa achinyamata pandale akhoza wokondwa atadziwitsidwa ubwino wa youth week zolinga zake mtima wogwira ntchito wodzithandiza posayembekezera malipiro ubwerere mwa amalawi 
  katswiri mbiri ya lino desmond dudwa phiri dd phiri mafumu angapo akuluakulu ati ganizo lokhazikitsanso sabata ya achinyamatali lofunika kwambiri pachitukuko cha la malawi 
  dd phiri adati youth week nyengo yomwe achinyamata ankatengapo mbali pachitukuko chosiyanasiyana nzika za mwaulere zinkathandiza kutula midzi madera omwe ankakhala 
  imeneyi achinyamata ankakhala otangwanika kwambiri pantchito zachitukuko kukonza misewu milatho zipatala sukulu zina mmadera mwawo mwaulere zinthu zinkayenda adatero mkhalakaleyu 
  adati ntchito zomwezi zimalira bajeti agwire mapeto ake ndalama zikasowa zitukukozi zimayamba zaima kwa yaitali zinthu nkumapitirira kuonongeka 
  youth week inkakhalako chaka chilichonse nyengo ino ya pasaka tinkadziwiratu misewu yonse yoonongeka milatho zipatala sukulu nyumba za aphunzitsi zomwe zikuonongeka zikonzedwa 
  ntchito zimenezi zimalinda ndalama za mbajeti makontirakitala azigwire ndalamazo palibe ndiye zinthuzo zizingopitirira kuonongeka mpaka ndalama zidzapezeke adatero dd phiri 
  mkuluyu adati youth week idatha mdziko muno mutabwera ulamuliro wa zipani zambiri poganiza idali nkhanza kwa thangata mmalo mwake boma lidasenza lokha udindo wogwira ntchito zachitukuko 
  adati sankaona youth week thangata ankagwira ntchito modzipereka umodzi mpaka pomwe adauzidwa thangata 
  wodziwa za mbiri yakaleyu adati maiko ambiri omwe otukuka adayamba eni ake kudzithandiza boma linkangobwera pambuyo kudzawonjezera pomwe paperewera 
  mfumu t maseya wa ku chikwawa akugwirizananso ganizoli ponena achinyamata amaphunzira ntchito zosiyanasiyana panyengoyi amasakanikirana omwe adali luso amagawira anzawo pogwira ntchitozo 
  adati kudzera mnjira imeneyi achinyamata amakula mtima wokonda ntchito ndiposo zimawathandiza kukhwima mmaganizo paokha akhoza kupanga chinthu chooneka popanda kuyanganiridwa 
  zidali zokoma kwambiri moti zitati zayambiranso zikhoza kungoti nzofunika poyambitsapo aunike bwinobwino ntchitozo angazigawe motani potengera zaka zisakolane nkhani yogwiritsa ana ntchito yoposa msinkhu wawo adatero maseya 
  inkosi chindi ya ku mzimba idasangalalanso ganizoli ponena nyumba zambiri zophunziriramo zokhalamo aphunzitsi milatho misewu zomwe zili bwinja zikhoza kukonzedwa mosavuta 
  chitukuko cha kudera udindo wa okhala kudera limenelo ndiye atafotokozeredwa bwinobwino phindu lomwe angapeze kuchoka muntchito zachitukuko cha youth week sindikukhulupirira angawiringule adatero chindi 
  adati munyengoyi achinyamata amagwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana kulambula misewu kukonza milatho nyumba za aphunzitsi zitukuko zina uku akutayitsa macheza 
  naye t mkanda ya mboma la mchinji idati ana ambiri masiku ano amalephera kupita kusukulu nyengo ya mvula kaamba kolephera kuoloka mitsinje chodikirira boma likonze milatho
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
mtambo walowa ndale yemwe adali wapampando wa gulu la human rights defenders coalition hrdc timothy mtambo wati wasintha nthabwa wayamba ndale zenizeni 
  mtambo wati waganiza zoyamba ndale wati cholinga chake chachikulu nkuthandizira mgwirizano wa zipani za malawi congress party mcp utm party kuchotsa mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika wa democratic progressive party dpp pampando 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mtambo kulankhula pazionetsero zina mmbuyomu wayambitsa gulu la ndale lomwe silidafike chipani akulitcha citizens for transformation cft wati wokwiya kwambiri momwe chipani cha dpp chasokonezera la malawi 
  ndakhala ndikulingalira za lino kuyambira pomwe tidapeza ufulu wa demokalase 1994 ndaona lathu laonongeka kwambiri cha ulamuliro wopanda masomphenya adetero mtambo polengeza zakutembenuka kwake lachitatu ku lilongwe 
  kadaulo ndale george thindwa wati mtambo wasiya anzake padzuwa watembenuka yabwino akhonza kukwaniritsa zolinga zake mosavuta mosadikira yaitali 
  mwamumvetsa akuti akufuna kuthandizana mgwirizano wa mcp utm kuchotsa mutharika pampando masomphenya awa nthawiyi walondola amapanga za mseri tsopano amasuka watero thindwa 
  pogwirizana naye kadaulo wina mustafa hussein wati mtambo wachita wayamba ndale ataona kale momwe ndalezo zimakhalira ndiye sakavutika kukwaniritsa zolinga zake 
  mtambo wakhala akutsogolera zionetsero zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno wakumana zambiri pantchitoyi iyeyu wandale kale yemwe wakumana zokhoma ndiye waganiza watero hussein 
  naye kadaulo kayendetsedwe ka zinthu mdziko makhumbo munthali wati pakhonza mafunso ganizo la mtambo losiya kutsogolera hrdc zolinga zake sizikadakwaniritsidwa akadakakamira ku gululo 
  zolinga zomveka sakadazikwanitsa akadakhala ku hrdc iyeyu amayenera ndithu paufulu wandale ndithu mpomwe zimuyendere timuika mmapemphero akwaniritse zofuna zake watero munthali 
  akadaulo atatuwa agwirizananso yoti kuchoka kwa mtambo sikungasokoneze gulu lonse mapulogalamu onse bungwe amapangira limodzi anzake omwe wawasiya ndiye iwowo apitiriza pomwe wasiyira 
  nduna ya zachitetezo cha mdziko nicholas dausi nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani mark botoman ati sakudabwa mtambo wabwera poyera ndale adadziwa kale mkuluyu wandale 
  asatiphimbe mmaso lake gulu chabe ayi chipani cha ndale ganizo lake silalero labwera chithokozo kuchipani cha mcp muona amupatsa mpando waukulu kuchipani adatero dausi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
sabuside yayamba njengunje pulogalamu ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo ya sabuside ya chaka chino yayamba zokhoma zilipo zambiri kuyerekeza zaka zammbuyomu nduna ya zamalimidwe allan chiyembekeza yavomereza 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu polankhula uchikumbe chiyembekeza adati pulogalamuyi yayamba jenkha chonchi kaamba ka mavuto zachuma boma tsopano likudzidalira palokha pachuma chake 
  ndunayo idati ntchitoyi yayamba mavuto oterewa amalawi asataye mtima boma kudzera muundunawo likudzipereka alimi asavutike 
  kudikira kugula zipangizo zotsika mtengo chaka chatha tikuvomereza zinthu sizidayambe sizikutanthauza zinthu zaipiratu ayi padakalipano zipangizo zayamba kale kupita mmadera moti alimi asataye mtima zinthu ziyenda adatero chiyembekeza 
  ndunayo idati polingalira mavuto mayendedwe ya mvula ntchitoyi yayamba mmadera ovuta kufikira mdziko lose la malawi polingalira mvula ikayamba mmadera oterewa galimoto zonyamula zipangizozi zimatitimira kugwa mmatope 
  tayambapo makamaka mmadera ovuta kufikira mvula ikagwa panopa madera ambiri oterewa alandira kale zipangizo moti alimi akungodikira makuponi ogulira akagule adatero chiyembekeza 
  wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe zaulimi wa civil society agriculture network cisanet tamani nkhono mvula adati boma lachita kubwera poyera nkunena momwe pologalamuyi ikuyendera alimi azidziwiratu zochitika 
  nkhono adati kawirikawiri zinthu zimaonongeka chobisa momwe zinthu zilili zomwe zimachititsa alimi azidzidzimutsidwa yothaitha zinthu zitasokonekera kale 
  pamenepa tiyamikire boma lapanga zazikulu kubwera poyera zambiri chilungamo ichi chimabisidwa cha ndale mapeto ake zinthu zimasokonekera adatero nkhono 
  adati alimi panopa akhale kalikiliki mminda kuyembekeza mvula yobzalira osatengera boma lalankhula iwowo ndiwo amalima osati boma lomwe limangothandizapo 
  alimi ambiri mminda kukonza kapansi mvula ikangogwa abzale mbewu akuti nkhawa sakudziwa mbewu zipangizo zina feteleza azipeza liti poti sadalandilebe makuponi ogulira 
  amos dziyende mwa alimi omwe adakonza kale munda adati nkhawa yake ili pawiri mtengo wa zipangizo nyengo yogulira poti mpaka lero sadalandirebe makuponi ogulira 
  tidakonzeka tikumva mtengo wa zipangizo chaka chino wakwera ndiye kaya zitha mpaka makuponi sitidalandire adatero dziyende 
  panopa mvula yagunda kale mmadera iliyonse madzi akhala akugwa pansi dzinja
Label: FARMING

Text:
maphunziro alowa nthenya okhudzidwa ngozi akuphuphabe ili cha mma hafu pasiti leveni 11:30 am kunja kukutentha koopsa mwa ophunzira pasukulu ya pulaimale ya chikoja kwa mfumu osiyana mboma la nsanje akuphunzirira pansi pamtengo wopanda masamba mmatenti momwe mukutentha molapitsa ofesi ya aphunzitsi ili pansi pamtengonso masamba ake adayoyoka 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc posakhalitsa wophunzira wa sitandade 4 wakomoka chotentha ophunzira anzake akudzithira madzi kumutu pofuna kuziziritsa matupi 
  awa ndiwo mavuto amene amanga nthenje pasukulu ya chikojayi yomwe idakhudzidwa madzi osefukira 
  nazonso sukulu za chingoli mboma la mulanje mvunguti mboma la phalombe akukumana zokhoma zokhazokhazi 
  pamene patha miyezi 8 chichitikireni ngoziyi nyumba za aphunzitsi zimbudzi mabuloko maofesi aphunzitsi sizidakonzedwe zomwe zikupereka mantha mavutowa angakhodzokere mvula ikayamba mwezi ukubwerawu malinga azanyengo 
  wachiwiri kwa mphunzitsi wamkulu pasukulu ya chikoja clement seda akuti mvula itayambe ndiye zivutitsitsa panopa tikupirira dzuwa mvula ikayamba ndiye palibe chabwino sukulu idzatsekedwa kaye 
  mboma la nsanje madzi osefukira adagwetsa sukulu ya chinama namiyala zidachititsa boma limange matenti kuphiri la kwa osiyana kwa t mlolo ophunzira azikaphunzirirako pamene matenti adamangidwa kwa chambuluka 
  kumangidwa kwa matentiwa chidali chimwemwe kwa basi athana mavuto osefukira kwa madzi lero kwaipa pamene mavuto afika mkhosi 
  seda akuti boma lidalonjeza ayamba kuwamangira sukulu ya mvula isadayambe mpaka lero kuli chuu 
  adatimangira matenti asanu makalasi akuphunzirira panja poyamba tinkadandaula ana amene ankaphunzira panja tikudandaulanso matentiwa mukutentha kwambiri mwaona nokha mwana wina sali mavuto amenewa achulukira matenda amutu si nkhani adatero seda 
  seda adati aphunzitsi onse akukhala ku fatima makhanga womwe mtunda wa makilomita osachepera 14 
  tikafulumira kufika kuntchito ndiye 8:30 mmawa kusonyeza piriyodi imodzi imadutsa tisanafike chotentha ophunzira amaweruka mofulumira dzuwa lisadafike powawitsa 
  zikuchititsa ana asaphunzire mokwanira ambiri sakubwera cha mavuto amene tikukumana nawowa adatero seda 
  adati zachititsa zotsatira za mayeso sitandede 8 chaka chino zikhale zosokonekera mwa ana 40 amene adalemba mayeso pslc ana 4 okha ndiwo adakhoza pomwe chaka chatha ana ana onse 35 adakhoza 
  2013 adalemba ana 85 onse adakhoza 2012 ana 29 adalemba mayeso 27 ndiwo adakhodza sukuluyi yakhala ikuchita kuyambira mmbuyo monse adatero seda amene sukulu yake ili ophunzira 900 
  mneneri muunduna wa zamaphunziro manfred ndovi adati timupatse afotokozepo zomwe boma likuchita lipulumutse ophunzirawa 
  nayo sukulu ya chingoli pulaimale mboma la mulanje akuti mavuto ankhaninkhani malinga dc wa mbomalo fred movete 
  chimangireni matenti palibe chimene chachitikapo mabuloko sadayambe kumangidwa moti zivuta kwambiri mvula ikayamba ndangomva mapulani alipo mabuloko amangidwa adatero movete 
  dc wa boma la phalombe paul kalilombe akuti mbomalo mavutowa ochepa kuyerekeza maboma 
  sukulu ya mvunguti ndiyo idakhudzidwa makalasi awiri okha ndiwo akuphunzira mmatenti mmabuloko adatero kalilombe 
  maboma 15 ndiwo adakhudzidwa ngozi ya madzi january chaka chino boma la mulanje nsanje phalombe omwe sukulu zidakhudzidwa
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
womukaikira zopakula ku kapitolo adzipereka adakali ku south africa mphwiyo wabizinesi osward lutepo amene wakhala akusakidwa apolisi lino polisi ya maiko osiyanasiyana ya interpol lachitatu adatera mdziko muno kunja adakadzipereka kulikulu la polisi ku area 30 mumzinda wa lilongwe 
  lutepo yemwenso mwa akuluakulu chipani cholamula cha peoples party pp akumuganizira amagwirizana ogwira ntchito mboma azipakula ndalama zaboma kupyolera mmakampani ake amene amalandira mamiliyoni ochuluka osagwira ntchito iliyonse 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc padakalipano oposa 20 akhala akukaonekera kukhoti pokhudzidwa kusowa kwa mabiliyoni boma mwa amagwidwa mamiliyoni osaneneka kumabuti galimoto ngakhalenso mnyumba zawo ndalama zimene akuganiza zimasololedwa kunjira yolipirira pantchito katundu yemwe boma limagula ya integrated financial management system ifmis 
  chongofika mdziko muno lutepo adapita kupolisi motsagana womuimira pamlanduwo jai banda 
  wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa likulu lapolisi kelvin maigwa adati lutepo yemwe wa zaka 35 adakadzipereka yekha 
  tili naye tikumufunsa mafunso angapo padakalipano milandu imene timuzenge sinadziwike adatero maigwa 
  bungwe lothana ziphuphu la anti corruption bureau acb lidatseka mabuku akubanki makampani 20 amene akuwakaikira akukhudzidwa chipwirikiti chopakula mabiliyoni boma makampani 8 adali lutepo amene amayendetsa mogwirizana 
  zili choncho pika manondo wina amenenso akusakidwa apolisi pomuganizira akukhudzidwa mlandu wofuna kupha woonetsetsa ndondomeko ya chuma cha boma ikuyendetsedwa paul mphwiyo adauza nyuzipepa ya the nation abwera mdziko muno pofika mawa 
  adati wokonzeka kuthandiza apolisi pazofufuza zawo zokhudza kuomberedwakwa mphwiyo september 13 2013 pomwe amati azilowa pachipata cha nyumba yake ku area 23 nthawiyo nkuti mphwiyo atagwira ntchitoyo kwa miyezi iwiri 
  apolisi adanjata macdonald kumwembe yemwe adakhalapo msirikali robert kalua powaganizira ndiwo adaombera mphwiyo apolisiwo adagwiranso dauka manondo mngono wa pika 
  kupakula kwa ndalama kwakhudza kwambiri boma la mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda yemwe sabata zapitazo adachotsa nduna zake zina kuphatikizapo yemwe adali nduna ya zachuma ken lipenga yemwe adali nduna ya za malamulo ralph kasambara 
  apolisi sabata yatha adakachita chipikisheni kwa kasambara kuyangana galimoto imene akuti idagwiritsidwa ntchito pokaombera mphwiyo yemwe akadali ku south africa adatuluka kuchipatala kumene amalandira thandizo

Text:
kupherera ngamba akalozera mmunda alangizi zaulimi apempha alimi mdziko muno azipanga akalozera ateteze nthaka kusunga chinyontho kwa yaitali mminda yawo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu madalitso munthali mlangizi wa mbewu ku kaporo mboma la karonga wauza uchikumbe mavuto odza kwa nyengo atha kuchepa alimi ambiri atayamba kupanga akalozera mminda mwawo 
  mlangiziyu adati akalozera amathandiza alimi kukolola madzi mvula kuteteza nthaka isakokololoke mmunda mwawo 
  alimi kupanga akalozera pogwiritsa ntchito chingwe akalozera muuni wa kayendedwe ka madzi mmunda alimi amayenera kuunga mizere umu momwe mumalimidwa milambala yoongoledwa yomwe imachengeta nthaka podekhetsa madzi mmizere 
  kulima mwa chisawawa opanda akalozera zikuchititsa nthaka izikokoloka madzi mvula 
  zotsatira zake njala chajira chikukokoloka kusiya minda yoguga mbewu zikumauma posowa chinyezi popeza madzi amangothamangira ku mitsinje adatero munthali 
  katswiriyu adalangiza alimi kupeza thandizo la alangizi mmadera mwawo popanga akalozera 
  osangokhala kumadikira mvula igwe october november pakadalipano mlimi wotsogola akupanga akalozera manyowa galauza adatero 
  mlangizi wina wa ku chingale epa mboma la zomba limbani thangata akuti nthaka yofunika kwambiri ulimi choncho iyenera kutetezedwa 
  alimi asaiwale kwa nyengo kukusokoneza ntchito yathu choncho tiyenera kupanga akalozera mmunda mwawo 
  dongosololi limathandiza kusamalira chajira poimitsa madzi nkusunga chinyezi kwa yaitali chothandiza mbewu mvula idule adatero thangata 
  mkuluyu adati kupanga akalozera njira imodzi yothana ngamba kaamba koti madzi samathamanga akhala yolowa pansi mmunda makamaka alimi akapanga maswale ulimi wa mmaenje phimbira ngonyeka box ridges 
  popanga akalozera thangata adati pamafunika atatu chingwe chotalika mamita 5 mitengo ndodo iwiri yoongoka nkutalika mamita 1.6 mpaka 2.0 chikwanje zikhomo hamala levuloija amagwiritsa ntchito amisili pomanga nyumba 
  adafotokoza kachitidwe kake motere awiri amaima ndodo zomangidwa chigwecho amakhala pakati levulo ija kuyeza pomwe timadzi levuloyo tabwera pakatikati wa kumapeto amakhoma chikhomo kusunthira komwe kuli ndime 
  amatero mpaka kumaliza munda wonse malingana kutsika kwa malo akalozera amatalikirana mamita 5 10 umu momwe timaungamo milambala ija 
  mwa alimi mminda mwawo muli akalozera mmudzi mwa giliya kwa mfumu mwaulambo mboma la karonga jimmy mwakila mwa alimi womwe amapanga akalozera munda mwake mwakila wa mmudzi mwa giliya mdera la mfumu mwaulambo ku karonga adati dongosololi lamuthandiza azikolola dzinthu zambiri
Label: FARMING

Text:
amangidwa popha anamapopa ndende ya nsanje ikusunga awiri omwe akuyenera kuyankha mlandu wopha landani chipira wa zaka 48 atamuganizira namapopa mmudzi mwa gulupu mchacha james kwa t mlolo mbomalo 
  malingana mneneri wapolisi ya nsanje agnes zalakoma anthuwa omwe sadawatchule maina poopa kusokoneza kafukufuku wawo adaonekera mukhoti lachiwiri mlandu udzapitirira 20 october 2017 kafukufuku wa tamvani wapeza awiriwo gulupu mfumu ina kumeneko 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka an artists impression of the arrest zalakoma adati mmudziwo adakwiya machitidwe chipira yemwe mfumu chizinga namapopa adamugenda mpaka kupha 
  masana apa 28 september olusa adathyola nyumba ya mkuluyo kumugenda kufika lero tamanga awiri powaganizira akukhudzidwa imfayo sitiwatchula maina kuopa okhudzidwa angathawe adatero 
  nkhani yomweyi mneneriyu adati apolisi amanganso amayi awiri mmudziwo chrissy goba nota tomas powaganizira adafalitsa mauthenga abodza odzetsa mantha mwa zomwe zosemphana gawo 60 la malamulo zilango mdziko muno 
  mbusa danger giant wa mpingo wa open door mdera la gulupu mchacha james adati chibwana chalanda akudandaula chotaya moyo wa mfumu mpheketsera chabe 
  munthu wina mmudzi mwa malemuwa adati wapopedwa magazi ndiye ambiri adangoti mfumu ikudziwapo kanthu kukayigenda chibwana zinthu mchigulu zadzetsa chisoni mmudzimo adatero giant 
  kumangidwa kwa awiriwo kudadza pomwe mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika adadzudzula wopha oganiziridwa namapopa pamsonkhano wandale mutharika adakonza zokayendera maboma amene mchitidwewu wakula mchigawo chakummwera mulanje phalombe thyolo nsanje 
  mutharika adati ndakhudzidwa zopopana magazi amalawi mitima ikhale pansi tiyenera kupewa kufalitsa nkhanizi zilibe umboni nzopweteketsa osalakwa 
  7 aphedwa kale poganiziridwa anapopa zimene zachititsa la united states of america bungwe la united nations kuchotsa ogwira ntchito ake mmadera okhudzidwa
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
papa walimbikitsa akhritsu asamakhale mantha mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wati mantha sakuyenera kupeza gawo mmoyo wa akhristu 
 malinga malipoti vatican radio papa francisco walankhula lamulungu ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican 
 wati mulungu amakhala amasamalira ake kotero okhulupirira akhristu sakuyenera mantha ya mavuto osaneneka 
 papa francisco wapereka uthenga wa chilimbikitsowu pomwe maiko ambiri akudutsa nyengo yovuta cha mavuto mliri wa coronavirus nkhondo kusowa ntchito kwa tsankho pongotchula pangono mwa mavutowa 
 polankhula lamulungu kwa omwe anasonkhana bwalo la saint peters square kwa kudzera wayilesi ya kanema makina intaneti papayu wati sakuyenera mantha angakhale akumane zokhoma moyo wao ma udani kuzunzidwa 
 papa francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kukumbukira zonse mulungu wa chikondi saiwala ake amakhala nawo 
 wati yesu khristu kuuza ophunzira ake asachite mantha 
 papa francisco wati uwu uthenga yesu khristu akupitirira kulankhula kwa akhristu masiku ano pomwe la pansi akudutsa mmavuto osiyana siyana 
 kwa alaliki uthenga wa chipulumutso wati polalika uthengawu adzapezeka outembenuza uwakomere pamenepa wati sizikuyenera kuwadandaulitsa kuwafooketsa mmalo mwake zikuyenera kupereka mangolomera olalika uthengawu mwa mphamvu chimwemwe 
 mwambowo papa francisco anakumbutsa zakufunika kosamala chilengedwe 
 wati ya mliri wa coronavirus chilengedwe mmaiko ambiri chakhala chosamalika cha kuchepa kwa ma ulendo ndege galimoto omwe amaononga chilengedwe woipa wati pomwe ma ulendowa ayambika pangonopangono akhale chidwi posamalira chilengedwe
Label: RELIGION

Text:

 bungwe lake lakonzeka kuchititsa chisankho chapadera ansah chisankhochi chidalepheleka kawiri konse potsatira imfa ya mwa omwe ankayimila ku delali zisankho zapatatu za 21 may chaka chatha mai agnes penemlungu chipani cha utm zipolowe zokhudza chisankhochi zomwe zinachitika mdelaro 
 polankhula kwa atolankhani lolemba mzinda wa lilongwe wapampando wa bungwe li justice dr jane ansah bungwe la mec lichita potsatira makalata awiri omwe owatsimikizira delali kuli bata chisankhochi tsopano chitha kuchitika 
 pakadalipano bungwe la mec latinso lidzachitsa chisankho chachibweleza ku ward ya liwawadzi kumpoto kwa boma la balaka 5 march chaka chino
Label: POLITICS

Text:

Text:
chaka cha anamwino ku salima lero kuli chaka lero ku salima pamene anamwino mdziko lino akukondwerera tsiku lokumbukira ntchito yawo 
  anamwino padziko lonse amapatula tsiku la 12 may chaka chili chonse ati popereka ulemu kwa katswiri wina wakale yemwe anayambitsa unamwino wa makono florence nightingale yemwe anamwalira mchaka cha 1910 zaka 90 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc wa bungwe la anamwinowa la national organisation of nurses and midwives of malawi nonm dorothy ngoma anauza atolankhani chikondwerero cha chaka chinochi chilunjika mutu womwe ukulimbikitsa zotengapo mbali polimbana matenda imfa 
  ngoma anatambasula lino limadziwa zofooka zambiri pantchito za umoyo magawo ochepa okha amene amayesa kuchitapo kanthu 
  zikukweza chiwerengero cha odwala omwalira kaamba ka matenda mdziko muno 
  mwachitsanzo bungwe loona za umoyo lonse la world health organization limalimbikitsa namwino adziyanganira odwala osapyolera zana limodzi kuno kwathu namwino akumasamalira odwala oposa 3800 kaamba kuchepa kwa anamwinowa anatero ngoma 
  mwambo wa ku salimawu anamwino onse akuyembekezeka kukagawana ntchito zosamalira odwala chipatala cha mbomalo kusamalira mabwalo sukulu ya sekondale ya salima ati pochitira umboni ntchito za umoyo zingathe kupita patsogolo manja angachuluke 
  kukakhalanso kupereka mphoto kwa ogwira ntchito za umoyo omwe achita mchakachi ncholinga chowalimbikitsa kukuza chidwi mwa anzawo
Label: HEALTH

Text:

Text:
leo mpulula alibe 2 koloko akulu ligi ikuyamba kochi wa max bullets mwakonzeka tapimana matimu ambiri zikuonetsa anyamata agwira ntchito momwe ndikufunira 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mudasewera wanderers masewero adali adali anyamata akuonetsa kulimba mtima kusonyeza ntchito igwirika 
  masewero atatha mudawayankha atolankhani zamwano vuto lidali chiyani mpulula ndazitaya amwene si mwano atolankhani amadabwitsa adandifunsa anyamata anga sadamenyere pagolo chiyani ndiye ndidamufunsa wanderers idamenyera pagolo yekha adaona ndiye amafuna chiyani amafuna timu ithe nanga apapa mwandiyankha momwe masewero adathera kudalibe mtima wanga wakhala pansi ndapeza chomwe chidavuta mudakandifunsa komweko ndiye mudakaona mwano chili chilungamo 
  mukafunsidwa momwe masewero mwawaonera zonse mumabweza funso pali vuto kodi akandifunse momwe ndawaonera iyeyo adali iyeyo adaonera osakalemba zomwe waonazo ndimabweza si funso ayi nchimodzimodzi kumafunsa madziwa akupezeka kubafaku ndiye ndiziti chiyani akudziwa timu sili ndiye akufunsa ndaiona iyeyo adali akufuna chiyani yankho nalo akufunsanso ndiye akufuna chiyani amwene amwene ndamva mwazitaya ku max bullets zoona kwambiri kwake ndazisiya amwene mwini wa max bullets max kapanda samva za munthu ndiye ndangoti khala nayo timu yakoyo ndapita 
  nkhani yake ndinamuuza apereke ma contract abwino kwa ma players amati player asayinire k100 000 kwa zaka zoona zimenezo k100 000 chiyani kwa player wa super league si salale ya pamwezi imeneyo ndiye ma players amene ndimafuna anakana kusayinira k100 000 ndiye inenso kochi ndinangoti ma players apita ndiye nditsala nda nchifukwa chane nane ndachoka ku max bullets ubwino sindinasayine contract
Label: SPORTS

Text:
cashgate isokoneza khisimisi kwa mboma ogwira ntchito mboma kutchinga maofesi ku lilongwe ambiri ogwira ntchito mboma pachiwopsezo chakuti khisimisi ya chaka chino saiwona chosowa ndalama ogwira ntchito mboma ataba ndalama zankhaninkhani 
  mpaka nthambi zina za boma kuunduna wa zamaphunziro sadalandirebe ndalama za november pali chikayiko pofika tsiku la khisimisi mmasiku anayi akudzawa akhala atalandira ndalama zawo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc bungwe loyanganira ufulu wa ogwira ntchito mboma la civil service trade union cstu lati ogwira ntchito mboma omwe sadalandire ndalamawo akuzunzika adaba ndalama za boma nkhani yomwe ikudziwika cashgate 
  mtsogoleli wa bungweli eliah kamphinda banda wati nzomvetsa chisoni akuzunzika pomwe ndalama zawo zili mmatumba wati boma liganize mozama pankhaniyi kuthandiza anthuwa mwamsanga 
  sizimayenera choncho vuto lakuti amaganizo olakwika adaba ndalama za boma nchifukwa chake ogwira ntchito mboma akuvutika chonchi adatero kamphinda banda pouza tamvani 
  boniface mbowe mwa aphunzitsi pasukulu ya kabyala ku mchinji yemwe akuti mpakana sadalandirebe malipiro ake wati zamulowetsa mungongole zankhaninkhani 
  ndidachita kubwereka ndalama zolipira nyumba ndalama zoti ana ayendere kuchoka kusukulu pakalipano ndikusowa ndalama yogula mbewu moti mwina ndibzala mbewu yakabwereza mukanena za khisimisi ndiye iwalani olo ndalama zitabwera lero zonse zipita kungongole adatero mbowe 
  nduna yoona ulamuliro ukuyenda ofesi ya pulezidenti nduna chris daza wati malipirowa achedwa boma limakonza makina atsopano owerengera ndalama za boma 
  wati omwe sadalandirebe ndalama zawo asade nkhawa ntchito yokonza makinawo ili kumapeto sadanene tsiku lomwe angakhale atalandira malipiro 
  vuto la kuchedwa kuchepa kwa malipiro labweretsa mavuto osiyanasiyana mdziko muno kuphatikizapo kumwalira kwa mzipatala cha masitalaka omwe ogwira ntchito za umoyo akhala akupanga 
  mabungwe omwe si aboma maiko omwe amathandiza lino akhala akudzudzula boma kaamba kolephela kulimbikitsa ogwira ntchito mboma makamaka pankhani ya malipiro 
  mtsogoleri wa bungwe loona za ufulu wa ogula malonda la consumers association of malawi cama john kapito wati mmene katundu akukwerera mtengo masiku ano moyo wa munthu ngofunika ndalama zokwanira amasuke 
  panopa chithandizo cha kuchipatala chikukomera omwe ndalama tsono mukaikapo lendi zovala chakudya munthu akufunika ndalama zingati pavuta munthu amupatseko zofunikira kwambirizo osati kungomutayiratu adatero kapito 
  mneneri wa nthambi yowongolera chuma cha boma nations msowoya wati vuto la kuchedwa kwa malipiro lidaonekeratu kuyambira pomwe kufooka kwa ndondomeko yoyendetsera chuma cha boma ya integrated financial management information system ifmis kudaonekera poyera 
  mavuto awa adawonekeratu titangotulukira kufooka kwa ndondomeko yomwe boma limatsata poyendetsa chuma ya ifmis choncho sitikudabwa zonse zilongosoka adatero msowoya 
  akuti pofika lolemba lathali aphunzitsi ogwira ntchito kuunduna wofalitsa nkhani ochokera ku ntchisi mulanje mangochi phalombe adali asadalandire malipiro mwezi wa november 
  msowoya adati mlembi wamkulu wa boma hawa ndilowe adalemba kalata yoti ogwira ntchito mboma alandire malipiro pofika 16 december ambiri sadalandirebe adati boma liyesetsa alandire malipiro december pofika masiku chisangalalo cha khisimisi 
  mlembi wa wa bungwe la aphunzitsi la teachers union of malawi tum denis kalekeni wati nzokhumudwitsa aphunzitsi zonse amaikidwa kumapeto pankhani yolandira malipiro 
  wati aphunzitsi 1 065 ochokera ku south east education division 1 083 ochokera kunthambi ya maphunziro ya boma la ntchisi kuphatikizapo aphunzitsi ku kochirira cdss minga cdss ochokera kunthambi ya maphunziro ya boma la mulanje sadalandirebe malipiro mwezi wa november 
  kalekeni wati bungwe la aphunzitsi lidalemba chikalata kuunduna wa zamaphunziro aphunzitsi omwe azikhala asadalandire ndalama zawo pakadutsa 27 azinyanyala ntchito unduna sudayankhe chibaluwacho 
  kalatayo idapita sadatiyankhe moti chomwe chatsala tiyambe kuwadziwitsa aphunzitsi za nkhaniyi ambiri sakudziwapo kanthu adatero kalekeni
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
amayi abisa katundu wa k16 000 panti ukathyali wakasololedwe wachitika pamalo omwetsera mafuta puma wenela pomwe apolisi adanjata wina wa ku zambia pomuganizira amathandizira amayi awiri omwe akuwaganizira amatulutsa katundu mushopu pomubisa kumalo obisika 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa polisi ya blantyre yona thembachako watsimikizira msangulutso za kunjatidwa kwa john bwanga yemwe akuti padakalipano amutumiza kwawo adalibe zikalata zokwanira zomuyenereza mdziko muno 
  malinga thembachako ogwira ntchito mshopumo amadabwa kusowa kwa katundu wina osadziwa yemwe akuba wati zidachititsa ogwira ntchitowo ayangane ma vidiyo kamera mshopumo aone chomwe chimachitika 
  thembachako wati ogwira ntchito pamalopo atayangana pakamera adaona amuna awiri akumatchingira mlonda yemwe ankalondera mushopumo pomwe amayi awiri akulowetsa katundu kumanyazi 
  wogwira ntchito wina mushopumo yemwe sadafune kutchulidwa wati tsiku loyamba amayiwo adatenga zitini ziwiri za mkaka wa ana zolemera magalamu 400 nkuulowetsa mmadiresi 
  kenaka akuti adaonanso akutenga chigubu cha mafuta ophikira cholemera malita 5 nkuchipanira kumeneku 
  atatero adatuluka panja pomwe padali galimoto diraiva wawo kuuyatsa adatero 
  adati adadabwa momwe amayiwa amalowetsera katunduyo pakati miyendoyo 
  amangokweza diresi nkupanira katunduyo pomwe amalowetsa zitinizo mmphechepeche zimaoneka komwe kumalowa katunduyo ndiye sikumaoneka adatero kufotokoza zomwe zimachitika 27 april 
  akuti katunduyo adali wa ndalama zokwana k15 955 
  atazindikira akuti adakhala mochenjera 5 may adabweranso patsikulo akuti adatenganso mowa wa carlsberg green mpunga wolemera makilogalamu asanu sadadziwe la 40 lakwana ogwira ntchito mushopumo akuti adali tcheru malinga zomwe adaona vidiyopo akaona ofanana amenewo achenjere nawo 
  patsiku logwidwali ogwira mushopumo atamuwona bwanga adatseka pakhomo kumugwira adamutengera kupolisi ya blantyre komwe apolisi adamusunga amufufuze 
  thembachako wati bwanga adavomereza iyeyo amene akuoneka pavidiyopo adati amayi enawo adangokumana nawo momwemo 
  bwanga akuti adatinso mmodziyo nzika ya ku zambia 
  thembachako akuti bwanga adakana mlandu woti amathandizira kuba nawo katundu 
  titamufunsitsitsa mpomwe tidapeza alibe ziphaso zokhalira mdziko muno ndiye ku ofesi ya immigration adamutumiza kwawo 
  zoonadi akadatithandiza kafukufuku wa amayiwo timawona tikungomusunga woti adakana za nkhaniyo adatero thembachako yemwe adati apolisi akufufuza kusakasaka amayiwo mwamuna yemwe akuwoneka pavidiyopo
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
st marys cdss yatsekedwa maphunziro sukulu ya mpingo wa katolika ya st marys community day secondary mboma la machinga ayimitsidwa zionetsero zomwe achipembedzo cha chisilamu amafuna lero ati pofuna kukakamiza akuluakulu oyendetsa sukuluyi azivomereza atsikana kuvala ma hijab ya maphunziro 
 malinga mtolankhani wathu yemwe anafika ku sukuluyi masiku apitawa makolo aphunzitsi sukuluyi anagwirizana atsikana achisilamu asamavale ma hijab zomwe akuti sizinasangalatse atsogoleri chipembedzo cha chisilamu mderali 
 mmawa wa lero pomwe atsogoleriwa pamodzi ku sukuluyi akakumane mphunzitsi wamkulu sukuluyi kukamukakamiza avomere atsikana ovala ma hijab nawo maphunziro 
 anthuwa akuti anakonza dongosolo lakuti achite ziwonetsero sukulupa sizinatheka kamba koti apolisi anafika sukulupa mwansanga anthuwo asanasonkhane 
 polankhulapo wa nthambi zosiyanasiyana dayosizi ya mangochi ted chigamba ati mawa lachisanu akuyembekezeka kukachita zokambirana magulu okhudzidwa ku sukuluyi kuphatikizapo ku sukulu ya pulaimale ya mpiri mboma lomwelo la machinga yomwenso inatsekedwa masiku apitawa 
 mawa tikhala tili komweko kukachita nawo zokambirana tiwone mtsogolo muno titsata dongosolo lanji tikafikanso ku mpiri komwe maphunziro kumeneko anayamba ayimitsidwa kaamba ka nkhaninso za zomwezi anatero chigamba
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
miyoyo ya akayidi ku zomba ili chiwopsezo miyoyo ya akayidi ku ndende ya zomba ili chipsezo kuwonongeka kwa khoma denga za ndendeyi 
 mneneri wa ndende za mdziko muno malawi prison service supretendent chimwemwe shawa watsimikiza za nkhaniyi polankhula radio maria malawi wati pali chikonzero chomwe nthambiyi bungwe la european union likuchita chofuna kusamutsa akayidi omwe ku ndendeyi kukawasiya ku ndende ya chitedze mzinda wa lilongwe 
 ndende ya zomba ndendeyi inamangidwa kalekale choncho pofuna kupewa ngozi tinawona pakufunika timangendende ina yomwe idzakhale mlowammalo wa ndende ino ndende ya zomba tizangoyiyiwala basi tisadzasungekonso akayidi 
 tinayamba ndende ya chitedze cha mavuto yachedwa kutha bungwe la eu lalowelerapo ntchitoyi ithe msanga anatero supretendent shawa 
 miyoyo yawo ili chiopsezo wati ndende ya chitedze yomwe ilowe mmalo mwa ndende ya zomba 
 supretendent shawa wati kupatula kuwonongekaku ndendeyi mulinso akayidi ochuluka kaamba koti inamangidwa idzisunga akayidi 850 padakalipano muli akayidi oposa 3,000
Label: HEALTH

Text:
papa wati ufulu wolankhula zakukhosi ofunika mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisko wati ufulu woyankhula za kukhosi ofunika moyo wa munthu 
 papa francisko walankhula lachisanu kulikulu la mpingowu ku vatican pamene amatsegulira likulu la bungwe lomwe limaona za maphunziro mmaiko lotchedwa scholas occurrentes 
 polankhula mwambowo papa francisko wati bungweli lothandiza maka achinyamata kutulutsa maganizo zomwe zingawathandize akule muzochitika zao tsogolo lawo 
 patsikuli papa analandiridwa achinyamata ochokera mmaiko osiyanasiyana japan argentina united states of america mozambique haiti mexico spain italy 
 pamwambowo panali akazi atsogoleri maiko asanu 
 bungwe la scholar occurrentes limodzi mwa mabungwe utumiki wa papa likupezeka mmaiko 190 lonse
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
chakwera angadze kalumo kakuthwa chakwera wachiwiri ku manja limodzi mkazi monica akuluakulu kumsonkhanowo mlendo ndiye adza kalumo kakuthwa akadaulo pandale ati kusankhidwa kwa mbusa dr lazarus chakwera mtsogoleri wa chipani chachikulu chotsutsa boma cha mcp kungadzetse kuwala mchipanimo pamene chisankho cha 2014 chili pamphuno 
  chakwera adasankhidwa kumsonkhano waukulu wa chipanichi ku natural resources college mumzinda wa lilongwe sabata yatha ndiye adzaimire chipanichi chisankho cha 2014 maso maso mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda yemwe adzaimire chipani cha pp peter mutharika wa dpp atupele muluzi wa udf 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc malinga pulezidenti wa bungwe la akatswiri potambasula za ndale la political science association of malawi psam joseph chunga kusankhidwa kwa chakwera kungachititse chithunzithunzi chimene nacho mcp chisinthe adanena polingalira mbiri ya chipanichi idali ya nkhanza makamaka paulamuliro wa zaka 31 1964 pomwe chidathetsa ulamuliro wa atsamunda 
  ambiri akukumbukirabe nkhanza za ulamuliro wa mcp udachotsedwa 1994 pakatipa chipanichi chinagawanika cha mkangano wa atsogoleri chipanichi makamaka john tembo gwanda chakuamba atangochoka mchipanichi chakuamba otsatira chipanichi mchigawo chakumwera adazitulukanso adatero chunga 
  chakuamba adatenga mpando wa utsogoleri wa chipanichi 1997 mtsgoleri wakale wa lino dr hastings kamuzu banda atausiya adali atakula adaimira chipanichi 1999 tembo adagonjetsa chakuamba kukovenshoni yokonzekera chisankho cha 2004 adaimira chipanichi 2004 2009 chakuamba adatuluka mcp atangogonja kwa tembo atsogoleri adamutsatira pomwe adayambitsa zipani zawo 
  chunga adati kudza kwa chakwera kungachititse kukhale kovuta zipani zina zigonjetse chipanichi zipani zambiri zomwe zilipo sizikuonetsa utsogoleri weniweni makamaka amene akutsogolera zipanizo ayesedwa aunikidwa momwe akuyendetsera ndale 
  pajatu kafukufuku wa 2012 afrobarometer adasonyeza amalawi 40 mwa 100 alibe chipani makamaka chosowa chikhulupiriro mwa atsogoleri andale ndiye mcp ikhoza kutolera gawo la amenewa chakwera ntchito yoyanjanitsa kuluzanitsa atsogoleri amene adalephera kupeza mipando adatero chunga 
  katswiri wa ndale kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college blessings chinsinga wati chakwera mlendo pandale mphamvu zodzatengera chipanichi mboma 
  wati chakwera atapambana chisankhochi zochitika za mchipanichi zomwe zingamupangitse kuyendetsa kulephera cha chilendo chakecho 
  ndale zosiyana kayendetsedwe ka bungwe mpingo kapenanso kampani ndale zimafuna kwambiri luso lolimbikitsa maubale lomwe munthu woyamba kumene ndale angavutike kukwaniritsa 
  zikutengera zochitika mchipanichi chakwera atapambana adzalamule ayi kumbali imodzi chilendo chake chikhoza kumupangitsa azipanga zokhwima kuzikwaniritsa posawerengera ndale atamusokoneza atapanga nfundo zolimbazo zikhoza kuvuta kuzikwaniritsa kwake adatero chinsinga 
  chinsinga wati tsopano anayi akuluakulu odzapikisana nawo pampando wa mtsogoleli chisankho cha 2014 adziwika zikuonetsa misonkhano yokopa alendo chaka chino mpakana cha mawa ikhala yovuta kwambiri 
  wati kutengera anayiwa zipani zikuyenera kupanga nfundo zamphamvu zodzagulitsira munthu odzaimirirayo mpikisano udzakhala wa mphamvu 
  zikuoneka mpikisano wa chaka cha mawa udzakhala oopsa ndiye mpofunika kupanga zenizeni osati kutaya kukamba za munthu zipani zina chitukuko chimatengera nfundo zomwe zamangidwa osati kudziwa kulankhula basi watelo chinsinga 
  katswiriyu wati pamene nyengo ya misonkhano yokopa odzavota yayandikira ayiwale za mipingo mitundu malo ochokela kumvetsetsa zomwe zipani zakonzela lino 
  senior chief kaomba ku kasungu yati kusankhidwa kwa chakwera chitsimikizo ndale zayamba kukhwima mdziko muno adati chakwera sadatchukepo mumbiri ya ndale palibe chomuletsa kutsogolera chipani mwini akudzidalira wasankhidwa 
  timanena za mphanvu ku zimenezi ndiye mphanvu kuanthuzo munthu wamkulu akudziwa zomwe akuchita chofunika chakuti akuluakulu omwe mkhalakale pandale mchipanimo azimugwira zonse ziyenda adatero kaomba 
  chakwera wati tsiku lomwe adasankhidwa maso ake patsogolo kuwunika mofooka monse adzakonze mcp ingalowe mboma chaka cha mawa 
  wati chikhulupiliro mchipani cha mcp amuthandiza kuyala zokomera amalawi 
  chipani cha mcp chachikulu kwambiri chili ochitsatira ambiri omwe akufuna chitukuko kuchipani chathu tikhala pansi bwinobwino okhwima nzeru tione zimene lino likusowa ndikupeza podzayambira kukonza tikadzapambana adatero chakwera 
  zolola amuna akazi kukwatirana okhaokha adauza wailesi ya zodiak lachinayi atasankhidwa kutsogolera lino achite zimene amalawi sakufuna za mkangano wa nyanja ya malawi adati kukambirana ndiye kofunika pakati maiko malawi tanzania
Label: POLITICS

Text:

   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc msabatayi bwalo la milandu la majisitireti ku lilongwe lidagamula victor sithole akaseweze kundende zaka 9 atamupeza wolakwa pamlandu wopezeka ndalama zakunja popanda chilolezo kupezeka katundu wobedwa kuyeretsa kusungunula ndalama zobedwa zisadziwike 
  sithole adali wachiwiri kutumizidwa kujere yemwe mlembi wa unduna wa zokopa alendo tressa namathanga senzani yemwe bwalo lomnwelo lidamulamula akaseweze zaka popezeka k63 yomwe adasolola kuboma 
  sithole adapezeka wolakwa pamlandu woti adali k112 miliyoni yosadziwika us$31 850 zoposa k16.6 miliyoni marand122 000 k5.7 miliyoni zomwe zabwezedwa ku boma 
  oimira mlandu sithole adapempha bwalolo lisamutumize kundende kadali koyamba apalamule woweruza patrick chirwa adati akaseweze chaka chimodzi chopezeka ndalama zakunjazo popanda chilolezo chaka chimodzi popezeka ndalama zakuba zaka 7 pofuna kuzimbaitsa ndalama zakuba zisadziwike 
  bwalolo lapezanso wyson zinyemba soko wolakwa pamlandu wakuti adalandira k40.9 miliyoni ku unduna wa zokopa alendo palibe ntchito imene adagwirira undunawu kupyolera mukampani yake ya zomangamanga ya watipaso general dealers 
  soko wachipani cha mcp mwa 9 amene adaimira zipani zosiyanasiyana pachisankho cha 20 may amene akukhudzidwa nkhani yosolola chuma cha bomako 
  poweruza mlanduwo majisitileti patrick chirwa adakana kumva kudziteteza kwa soko yemwe ankanena munthu wina wotchedwa godfrey banda yemwe adagwiritsa ntchito kampani yake posolola ndalamazo 
  ndikudabwa nazo mukunenazo sizikumveka konse adatero chirwa 
  malinga ripoti la osanthula momwe chuma chagwiritsidwira ntchito baker tilly amene adapemphedwa nthambi ya chitukuko mdziko la britain lomwe lidapempha akadaulowo k24 biliyoni idasololedwa kuboma pamene amalipidwa ndalama pomwe sanagwire ntchito zaboma enanso amalandira ndalama asanagulitse kalikonse kuboma

Text:
mec yayamba kupereka zotsatira za chisankho zotsimikizika bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno la malawi electoral commission mec layamba kutulutsa zotsatira zotsimikizika za chisankho cha president chomwe chachitika lachiwiri lapitali 
 malingana wapampando wa bungweli justice dr chifundo kachale pofika 10 koloko ya mmawa wa tsiku la lero bungweli linali litalandira zotsatira za maboma 26 
 kachale tili mkati mowunika zotsatirazi mwa mabomawa atawunguza kutsimikizira zotsatira za maboma anayi okha omwe mulanje chiradzulu mwanza likoma 
 padakalipano zotsatira zomwe zatsala zitipeze kuno za boma la mzimba dowa padakalipano tili mkati mowunika zotsatira za maboma 22 omwe afika kalewa tibweranso ina tifotokozere wa malawi za nkhaniyi anatero dr kachale 
 mwazina dr kachale ati akazembe mabungwe akunja sanabwere kudzawonelera chisankhochi akulumikizana nawo kuwadziwitsa mmene chisankhochi chikuyendera kudzera mwa mdziko muno omwe amagwira ntchito mabungwewa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
katsoka mtsogoleri wa alakatuli ulakatuli limodzi mwa maluso omwe akuphukira kumene mdziko muno zaka zambiri zapitazo samatenga ndakatulo njira yofalitsira uthenga kuphunzitsa momwe zikukhalira pazaka zochepa zokha alakatuli mdziko muno atumphuka ambiri ayamba kukonda ndakatulo alakatuliwa adakhazikitsa bungwe lawo lomwe mtsogoleri felix njonjonjo katsoka steven pembamoyo adacheza naye motere   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu katsoka mlakatuli wodziwa kuluka tandiuza dzina lako komwe umachokera 
  ndine felix njonjonjo katsoka ndimachokera mmudzi mwa chingamba mboma la ntcheu ndikukhala ku nkhotakota ndidaphunzira za uphunzitsi ndimagwira ntchito ya zaumoyo kumbali ya zakudya zamagulu 
  utsogoleri wa alakatuli udaulowa liti ndidauyamba mchaka cha 2009 malingana malamulo athu timayenera zisankho zaka zisanu 5 zilizonse moti panopa tili kalikiriki kuthamangathamanga tipeze ndalama zopangitsira nkhumano ina komwe tidzakhalenso zisankho 
  kodi bungwe limeneli lidayamba liti bungweli lidayamba mchaka cha 1997 pomwe alakatuli adakumana kubwalo la masewero la kamuzu stadium mwa akatakwe omwe adali kumeneko laurent namarakha malemu aubrey nazombe edward chitseko malemu george chiingeni 4 september 1998 bungweli lidalembetsedwa kunthambi ya kalembera wa mabungwe 
  cholinga chake nchiya cholinga cha bungweli kufuna kutukula luso la ulakatuli mmalawi muno kufuna kufalitsa mauthenga kuphunzitsa kudzera mndakatulo momwe amachitira azisudzo oyimba 
  kodi munthu chiyani akhale mlakatuli choyambirira kudzipereka mtima ofunitsitsa mlakatuli sizilira kupita kusukulu ayi luso ndithu lachibadwa sindidaphunzireko ndakatulo alakatuli ambiri omwe ndimadziwa sadachite maphunziro ndakatulo ayi.katsoka nanga ndakatulo yabwino imafunika chiyani ndakatulo yabwino imayenera phunziro msangulutso izigwirizana zachikhalidwe nkhani yomwe ikunenedwa mundakatulo muli ufulu wosankha mmene ukufunira mavume azimvekera palibe malamulo akuti ndakatulo izimveka motere ayi kwathu kuno ndakatulo zambiri zimakhala zokhudza chikhalidwe cha chimalawi makamaka potengera chiphunzitso malangizo
Label: ARTS AND CRAFTS

Text:
mwapasa achokehrdc zipani za malawi congress party mcp utm party zati ziunika mwakuya ganizo la mgwirizano wa mabungwe omenyera ufulu wa la human rights defenders coalition hrdc lomema aphungu akakane duncan mwapasa wa apolisi 
  mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika adasankha mwapasa ogwirizira mpandowo potsatira kupuma kwa yemwe adali paudindowo rodney jose yemwe wakwanitsa zaka zake zokapuma 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka akufuna achoke mwapasa mwapasa akugwirizira mpandowo kudikira aphungu nyumba ya malamulo akaunike mbiri luntha lake pankhani za chitetezo nkuvomereza kukana mkuluyu akhale pampandowu 
  zili choncho potsatira zomwe ndime 154 2 ya malamulo lino imanena pakasankhidwe ka wa apolisi 
  pulezidenti akuyenera kusankha wa apolisi pogwiritsa ntchito mphamvu zake nyumba ya malamulo ili mphamvu zounika wosankhidwayo nkumuvomereza kukana akatero komiti younika za kasankhidwe ka maudindo ya public appointments committee pac ikhoza kagwiridwe ntchito ka wa apolisiyo iliyonse akutero malamulo 
  wachiwiri kwa wapampando wa hrdc gift trapence adati akuona mwapasa sangatsogolere apolisi amaoneka amagwirizana chipani cholamula cha democratic progressive dpp kotero sangatsogolere apolisiwo 
  adati pachifukwachi bungwelo lakonza zomema aphungu nyumba ya malamulo asakamuvomere mwapasa akamakumana podzakambirana za ndondomeko ya zachuma ya 2019/2020 mwezi wa mawa 
  mwapasa wa dpp kutanthauza chilichonse amapanga nchokomera chipani cha dpp wa apolisi ndiye polisi isanduka chida cha dpp mmalo mokhala chida cha amalawi watero trapence 
  mwapasa adakana kulankhulapo nkhaniyi pocheza nyuzipepala ya the nation lolemba hrdc itangolengeza ganizo lake msonkhano wa atolankhani 
  mneneri wa mcp maurice munthali wati chipanicho chili nchikhulupiliro mwa aphungu ake akaona zochita nthawiyo ikadzafika pomwe mneneri wa utm party joseph chidanti malunga adati chipani chiona zochita hrdc ikachipeza 
  poti iyi nkhani ya ku nyumba ya malamulo tiyisiya mmanja mwa aphungu athu omwe tili nawo chikhulupiliro chonse akaunike mwapasa mopanda mantha kunyengereredwa yopatsirana maudindo patebulo idatha adatero munthali 
  malunga adati padakalipano sitinena zambiri hrdc akatipeza nayo nkhaniyi tidzayilandira nkupanga chiganizo mozama amalawi asataye chikhulupiliro mwa 
  katswiri ndale george phiri wati ndondomeko yosankhira wapolisi yomveka ndiye hrdc yaonapo vuto mwapasa zili kutengera nkhawa zawo kwa aphungu 
  pulezidenti wasankha zonse zikutsalira aphungu ku nyumba ya malamulo hrdc ikawapatse nkhawa zake aphunguwo akaona akatani nkhawazo khulupilirani mwapasa wasankhidwira ndale akavutika kudutsa watero phiri 
  nyumba ya malamuloyi ikakakana mwapasa ndiye akhala munthu wachiwiri kukanidwa nyumbayo wa apolisi kukanidwa kwa mary nangwale 2006 yemwe adasankhidwa mtsogoleri wakale bingu wa mutharika 
  aphungu ataunika maiyo adaona samakwanira kutsogolera nthambi ya apolisi adamukana nkuunikira mutharika asankhe munthu wina woti atsogolere nthambi ya apolisi 
  mwapasa wakhalanso mdindo wachiwiri yemwe bungwe la hrdc silikufuna akhale pampando wapampando wa bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec jane ansah yemwe pakali hrdc ikutsogolera zionetsero zoti atule pansi udindo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
pepani ngonamo chirwa kudali ntchito ku fam pamene amafuna kochi wa timu ya fuko ya flames eddie ngonamo nsanzurwimo ramadhan ernest mtawali gilbert chirwa ndiwo adalembera fam atenga mtawali ramadhan kochi wachiwiri 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc aganyu alankhula zambiri kutengedwa kwa akamunawa kuikapo maganizo potaidwa kwa ngonamo chirwa 
  lero tikubweretsa zomwe aganyu akhala akulankhula za ganizo la fam pamene akuti ganizo la fam lilibwino akuti zalakwika 
  amwene pamenepaja pakufunika ngonamo mukudziwa dala aja preparatory certificate for licence akuphunzitsanso zamasewero ku karibu academy fam adakonza kale zimenezo 
  mukudziwanso dala aja adachita maphunziro limodzi jos mourinho akhala akuphunzitsa mmaiko akunja basi dala aja asalemberenso ntchito imeneyi zikuoneka samawafuna kuwasiya chirwa aja ndiye sadalakwe mukudziwanso adaithawa bullets wina adatero 
  winanso adaperekapo maganizo ake zili apapa ngonamo adalephera atapatsidwa mwayi ku flames 2013 flames idapambana gemu imodzi tikusewera namibia kwawo patsikulonso iyeyo panalibe namibia itabwera kuno tidalephera kuichinya amuchita 
  ndidamuona ngonamo akukhazikitsa malamulo okhwima ukafuna kujambula flames ku training amati tizimupempha bwana ndiyeyo inuyo mudazionapo kutiko zimenezi mukuti akuphunzitsa ku karibu ndiye amaphunzitsa ana ndiye mukufuna ayambe kuphunzitsa flames mpakana imeneyo ndiyo ntchito ya malawi
Label: SPORTS

Text:
mavuto madzi akula october ku lilongwe pomwe mumzinda wa lilongwe akubangula vuto la kuzimazima kwa magetsi kampani yopereka madzi ya lilongwe water board yachenjeza madzi nawo avuta mwezi ukudzawu 
  mneneri wa bungweli bright sonani watsimikiza za nkhaniyi wati asade nkhawa kwambiri madzi azitulukabe mwa apo apo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc sonani wati bungweli litulutsa ndondomeko ya mmene madzi azitulukira azitunga nkusunga madzi okwanira mmakomo mwawo panthawiyi 
  mwezi umenewu tikhala tikukonza mwa mathanki omwe timasungiramo madzi tikuchita malingana ogwiritsa ntchito madzi akuchuluka ndiye mosungira mokwanira adatero sonani 
  malingana chikalata chomwe bungweli lasindikiza madzi azidzasiya 6 koloko mmawa kuyambanso kutuluka 6 koloko madzulo tsiku loyamba kusiya lolemba 28 september 
  potsirapo ndemanga wapampando wa mabungwe ogwiritsa ntchito madzi mumzinda wa lilongwe bentry nkhata wati nkhaniyi yoopsa polingalira amadalira madzi pamoyo wawo wa tsiku tsiku 
  adati madzi akasowa matenda makamaka ammimba kolera kamwazi amabuka kaamba koti amamwa kugwiritsa ntchito madzi osatetezedwa 
  nkhani yowonjezera mosungira madziyo yabwino zikutanthauza mtsogolo muno madzi sazidzavutavuta nkhawa ili pakuti azigwiritsa ntchito chiyani zambiri madzi akasowa kumakhala mavuto aakulu adatero nkhata 
  unduna wa zaumoyo wati nkhaniyi isachititse kutayirira wati chofunika nkusunga madzi okwanira mmakomo mwawo kugwiritsa ntchito njira zotetezera madzi 
  pafupifupi mdera liilonse muli alangizi zaumoyo choncho tiyeni tonse tiziwafunsa momwe tingatetezere madzi tipewe matenda ammimba panyengoyi adatero mneneri wa unduna wa zaumoyo adrian chikumbe 
  zambiri madzi akasowa amadalira zitsime mitsinje yomwe madzi ake amakhala dothi tizilombo toyambitsa matenda ammimba
Label: HEALTH

Text:
udf yalonjeza za chiyambi chatsopano chipani cha united democratic front udf chanenetsa chidzapitiriza kutukula ntchito za ulimi maphunziro umoyo wa mdziko muno chikalowa mboma 21 may 
  zanenedwa lamulungu pamene atupele muluzi amakhazikitsa manifesito ya udf yomwe mutu chiyambi chatsopano 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mkamanga sakufotokoza mwinano kumbali ya ulimi manifesitoyo ikuti udf idzamanga nkhokwe za mmadera zomwe zizidzasamalidwa amene akukhala kuderalo   katswiri ndale mdziko muno emily mkamanga watsutsa zakuthekera kwa mfundoyo wati chipanicho sichidafotokoze mmene nkhokwezo zidzamangidwire 
  sakufotokoza madera amene adzapindule mbewu zomwe chipanicho chikufuna amalawi azidzasunga mnkhokwezo tonse tikudziwa mbewu zambiri zimaonongeka kale mnkhokwe kodi zomwe adzasungezi zidzasamalidwa adatero   udf yati idzasintha mbewu zina zomwe alimi amadalira chuma chakudya fodya chimanga kupita ku mbewu zina sichidafotokoze za misika ya mbewuyo   chipanicho chati amalawi adzapitiriza kugula zipangizo zotsika mtengo angachisankhe chilowe mboma   udf yatinso idzaonetsetsa pulogalamu ya zipangizo zotsika mtengozo ikupindulira akumudzi osaukitsitsa njira imodzi yothana njala 
  iyi mkamanga adati ndondomekoyo sionetsa phindu lenileni kwa alimi chinyengo chidalowererapo adati ndondomekoyo ithetsedwe pangokhala mtengo umodzi wa zipangizo za ulimi azipindula 
  nkhani ya maphunziro chipanicho chati chidzaonetsetsa aphunzitsi alipo ochuluka makamaka msukulu zomwe zili mmadera kumidzi atsikana azikhala sukulu mpaka atakwana zaka 15 cholinga chothana maukwati ana   udf yati idzapanga ubale mabungwe osiyanasiyana athandizepo maphunziro 
  kumbali ya umoyo chipanicho chati chidzamanga zipatala mmizinda ya blantyre lilongwe mzuzu poonjezera zipatala zazikulu zomwe zilipo kale 
  zipani zina udf yalonjezanso kudzapeza njira zina za mayendedwe zomwe zidzalumikize lino maiko africa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
la malawi lili kuthekera kochita zinthu palokha chisankho chatsopano cha mtsogoleri wa akuti chawonetsa la malawi lili kuthekera kochita zinthu zina za chitukuko palokha mosadalira thandizo lochoka ku maiko mabungwe 
 mwa amene amalankhulapo zinthu zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno coxley kamange wanena pamene amathilirapo ndemanga momwe chisankhochi chayendera 
 kuponya voti yawo chisankhocho chisankhochi chachitika ndalama zochokera ku boma popanda thandizo lililonse lochokera ku mabungwe omwe zambiri amathandizira chuma kuzawonelera momwe chikuyendera 
 kamange wati zimenezi zikutanthauza ndalama zomwe boma limatolera kudzera mmisonkho zokwanira kuchitira zinthu zina watinso mdziko la malawi kuthekera koyendetsa zinthu nzeru zawo 
 mmene ayendetsera zinthu dr kachale mmene boma lakwaniritsira boma kupereka ndalama zochititsira chisankhochi la malawi likhala chitsanzo cha mayiko mayiko asamaziyanganire pansi atha kukwanitsa kuyendetsa zinthu pawokha anatero kamange 
 mwazina alimbikitsa omwe apambane chisankhochi asangalale mosaphwanya ufulu wa omwe atagonje avomereze
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
police arrest three criminals recover stolen motor vehicle namwera police post in mangochi is keeping in custody 21 year old man shafi hassan and two others on allegations that they stole mazda demio vehicle registration number mj 2339 worthy k1.7 million 
 according to mangochi police deputy spokesperson amina daudi hassan and the other two rashid james 23 and julius saidi 28 were apprehended on the wee hours of april 1 2020 
 confirmed the incident daudi the three went to the house of yusuf nelson on the night of january 23 2020 dressed in camouflage attire and disguised themselves as police officers from mangochi police station 
 according to daudi the criminals lied that the said car was wanted because it was involved in hit and run road accident in monkey bay 
 eventually they demanded keys of the vehicle and drove away with the victim and his son who were later dumped at namwera 
 namwera police officers successfully apprehended the three during patrols and recovered the stolen motor vehicle 
 daudi says investigations are still underway to recover the camouflage attire and all suspects will appear before court to answer charges of theft of motor vehicle and personating police officer 
 the suspects come from katuli village in the area of traditional authority katuli in mangochi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
hrdc yati ipitilira ziwonetsero zokhudza kwa nsundwe wachiwiri kwa wa apolisi mdziko muno john nyondo anenetsa onse omwe angapezeke olakwa nkhani yokhudza kuchitira nkhanza amayi atsikana kwa nsundwe adzayimbidwa mlandu molingana malamulo 
 amalankhula lero msonkhano wa atolankhani ku likulu la apolisi ku area 30 mzinda wa lilongwe 
 ati cholinga cha apolisi sikufuna kuzizilitsa nkhaniyi akuyesetsa ndondomeko zonse zitsatidwe pasanafike poyimba milandu omwe angapezeke olakwa 
 john nyondo kuloza chala timothy mtambo zionetsero zammbuyomu polankhulapo wa bungwe la ngo gender coordination network babra banda ari akhala akudikira mwachete zotsatira za lipoti lomwe apolisiwa atulutse 
 pakadalipano bungwe la hrdc lati lipitilirabe ganizo lake lochititsa ziwonetsero za lonse nkhaniyi lachinayi lino 
 nkhani yokhudza kugwililira si nkhani ya chibwana sitikuona choti achitirenso kafukufuku wina pomwe mhrc anapereka kale zotsatira choncho tipitilira ziwonetsero zathu lachinayi likudzali anatero luke tembo yemwe mwa akuluakulu bungwe la human right defenders coalition hrdc
Label: POLITICS

Text:
bungwe la ccjp dayosizi ya dedza laphunzitsa mwapadera ake oyanganira chisankho dayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya dedza yati iwonetsetsakuti chisankho chomwe chichitike mawa lino chiyende mokomera za democracy 
 wapampando wa nthambi yoyanganira za chitukuko cha dayosiziyo paul kumkumbira omwe anena maphunziro omwe bungwe la ccjp dayosiziyo limaphunzitsa ake omwe aziyanganira nawo chisankhochi 
 ati awonetsetsa chisankhochi chikhale chokomera mzika zonse za lino pofuna kupewa mavuto omwe angadze chisankhochi sichiyenda 
 mukudziwa mmawa kuli chisankho dayosizi ya dedza tinakonza msonkhano tiphunzitse nthumwi zathu za bungwe limeneli la ccjp zimene zikutenga nawo mbali oyanganira awonetsetse chisankhochi chayenda mokomera ulamuliro wa democracy anatero kunkumbira 
 ati zina mwa zomwe amawaphunzitsa kuona mmene zoyendetsera chisankho zayendera kusegulidwa kwa malo oponyera voti komaso amaulumali athandizidwa mmene abungwe loyendetsera chisankho agwirira ntchito 
 mwa omwe anachita nawo maphunzirowa aida madinga ati aphunzira zambiri maka nkhani yowonetsetsa pasakakhale chinyengo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
ankadzapepesa maliro mkazi wanga   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu imfa ya mkazi mwamuna wako si mathero amoyo mulungu amakoza njira ina akupepese bwinobwino uyiwale zakale 
  iyi ndiyo nkhani ya momwe excello zidana mkonzi wa pologalamu ya ulimi walero adakumanirana keterina mtambo mphunzitsi kamalambo fp school kwa jenda ku mzimba 
  keterina poyamba adakwatiwa mbusa yemwe adamwalira zaka 7 zapitazo nayenso excello adataya mkazi zaka zapitazo 
  excello keterina lero banja awiriwatu adakumana november 2013 apa excello amapita ku karonga kukagwira ntchito mkazi wa mbusa keterina adali ataiwala za imfa ya mwamuna adayamba kutonthoza excello paimfa ya mkazi 
  kupatula kutonthoza keterina adalimbikitsa excello mulungu osadziwa mawa awiriwa atonthozana zenizeni pokhala zidana 
  kuchoka apo awiriwa akuti adagawana manambala azilimbikitsana kuchezerana kufikira january 2015 pamene nkhani idasintha chikondi chidayamba kumera pamtima kodi mulungu akufuna titani march 2015 ndidaganiza zomuyendera kukangozindikira chilichonse chomwe ndimafuna nditadzamuyenderanso may 2015 ohndiye mtima wanga kuferatu chifukwanso patsikulo adandikonzera nkhomaliro 
  basitu keterina adangoti zitero momwe mukufunira.zonse zidatheka basi tizikapepesana tokha pakuti tonse tidakumana mavuto adatero zidana 
  pamene amakumana nkuti ana atatu poti awiriwa thupi limodzi ndiye banjali lili ana 6 omwe ati akumvana motheratu 
  chinkhoswe chidachitika july ukwati wachitika 1 november 2015 ku likuni mumzinda wa lilongwe 
  keterina amachokera mmudzi mwa namasasa kwa t mwabulambya ku chitipa excello wa mmudzi mwa mtherereka t namkumba mboma la mangochi
