Text:
k5 biliyoni yothana matenda mkungudza bungwe la queen elizabeth diamond jubilee trust qedjt lapereka ndalama zokwana k5 biliyoni kuboma la malawi zogwirira ntchito yothetsa matenda khungu otchedwa mkungudza trachoma mdziko muno 
  potsimikiza nkhaniyi mneneri wa unduna wa zaumoyo adrian chikumbe wati boma ligwira ntchitoyi mabungwe angapo kuphatikizapo lodziwika mdziko muno la sightsavers lomwe lidalandira ndalamazi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc ntchitoyi yomwe adaikhazikitsa kale mdziko muno october chaka chathachi mboma la karonga akuti idya ndalama zokwana k5.110 biliyoni mzaka zinayi zomwe akhale akuigwira 
  chikumbe adauza tamvani lonse la pansi laika 2019 chaka chothetsera matendawa boma la malawi ligwira nchitoyi mwachangu molimbika pofika 2018 matendawa adzakhale atatheratu mdziko muno 
  yoti matendawa adzakhale atatheratu padziko lonse la pansi chaka cha 2019 kuno ku malawi taganiza tichite chamuna pothana nawo chisanafike chaka chimenecho adatero chikumbe 
  mkuluyu adatinso pakalipano matendawa avuta kwambiri mmaboma okwana 15 pachifukwachi bungwe la sightsavers akuti layamba kale kugwira ntchitoyi maka mmaboma omwe akhudzidwawo 
  adati ntchito yogawa mankhwala kwa odwala nthendayi ifalikira madera onse lino posachedewapa cholinga chothana matendawa msanga 
  panopa maboma omwe akhudzidwa kwambiri nthendayi kasungu nkhotakota salima karonga mchinji lilongwe zomba machinga mangochi ntcheu nsanje neno mwanza dowa ntchisi adatero chikumbe 
  nalo bungwe la sightsavers lomwe akadaulo odziwa za ntchitoyi lati la malawi lili mgulu la maiko oyambirira okwana 14 padziko omwe akuvutika kwambiri matenda mkungudzawa 
  pafupifupi okwana 230 miliyoni omwe akudwala matendawa padziko 9.5 million ku malawi latero bungwe la sightsavers 
  malinga sightsavers ntchitoyi akuti ikayambika agawa mankhwala kwa oposa 8 miliyoni mdziko muno 
  mchikalata chake bungweli lati matenda mkungudza ochizika osautsa kwambiri kotero munthu achedwa kulandira chithandizo msanga akhoza kupunduka wakhungu 
  bungweli lati zina mwa zizindikiro za nthendayi zakuti zikope zambiri zimagwera mkati mwa diso kenaka nsidze zimayamba kukanda galasi la disolo mpaka zilonda zinthu zikafika pamenepo munthuyo sangathenso kuona 
  bungweli lati nthendayi yomwe yopatsirana imafala mofulumira ambirimbiri akhala malo othinana opanda ukhondo wokwanira 
  malinga sightsavers bungwe la zaumoyo padziko lonse la pansi la world health organisation lomwe lidavomereza ntchito yotereyi ichitike maiko omwe ntchito yamtunduwu ichitikenso kenya uganda nigeria mozambique
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
zipani zikufuna mayankho zitupa za unzika zipani za malawi congress party mcp peoples party pp zati kusowa kwa zitupa zina za olembetsa mkaundula wa unzika zidzasokoneza chisankho cha patatu cha 2019 
  nthambi ya national registration bureau nrb yati mwa zitupa 1.7 miliyoni zomwe zidajambulidwa mgawo loyamba la zitupa za unzika 1.5 miliyoni ndizo zatuluka zili choncho bungwe loyendetsa chisankho la malawi electoral commission mec lati lidzagwiritsabe ntchito zitupazo polembera ovota 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mlembi wa pp ibrahim matola adati zitupazo sizimayenera kugwiritsidwa ntchito mkalembera wa ovota ntchitoyi siyinakhazikike 
  tangoyamba kumene ntchitoyi tisayidalire ayi bola mtsogolomu zikadzagwira msewu padakalipano tiyeni tigwiritse ntchito njira yomwe timagwiritsa nkale lonse adatero matola 
  mneneri wa chipani cha mcp eisenhower mkaka adati zitupa za unzika zokha sizikuyenera kugwiritsidwa ntchito mavoti zina zikusowa 
  kudzazigwiritsa ntchito limodzi zitupa zovotera osati pazokha ayi poopa libolonje adatero 
  phungu wa ku mmawa kwa boma la dowa richard chimwendo banda wa mcp adati kufaifa kwa zipangizozo kukhoza kuchititsa ambiri mchigawo cha pakati asadzakhale zitupa ndikulephera kudzaponya nawo voti 
  mkaka alongosole mneneri wa mec sangwani mwafulirwa watsindika zitupazo zidzagwiritsidwa ntchito popanga kaundula wa odzavota chisankho cha 2019 
  munthu amene adzakhale chitupa nzachidziwikire nzika ndiye sitidzalimbana naye zambiri komabe tidzaona momwe tidzathandizire omwe alibe zitupa adatero mwafulirwa 
  adati mec ikuyembekezeka kudzayamba kukonza kaundula wa odzavota akukhulupilira pofika yamavoti nzika iliyonse idzakhala italandira chitupa chake 
  mneneri wa nthambi ya nrb norman fulatira wati asakhale nkhawa pankhaniyo zivute zitani amalawi onse adzakhala zitupazo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
anatchezera ndimamukonda agogo ndinali pachibwenzi mkazi wina zaka ziwiri zatha pomwe tinasiyana mwana yemwe wabereka mwezi watha ndiye akumabwera kwa nkumati tibwererane kodi pamenepa ndithani agogo mkaziyo kunena zoona ndimamukonda ndinalimba mtima nditani amfumu zingwangwa amfumu nkhani yanu yovuta kuitsata bwinobwino simukumasula vuto lanu chiyani jwenikweni poyamba mwanena mkaziyo munasiyana naye zaka ziwiri zapitazo munasiyana chiyani mwati mkaziyo akuti mubwererane nomwe mukuti kunena zoona ndimamukonda nomwenso mukuti munalimba mtima mukutanthauzanji mwatinso mkaziyo mwana wa mwezi umodzi nchachidziwikire mwanayo si wanu poti mwanena nokha chibwenzi chanu chidatha zaka ziwiri zapitazo apatu kunena zoona amfumu mayankho muli nawo ndinu mkaziyo mukuti mumamukonda chovuta nchiyani mubwererane mukuti mwalimba mtima kulimba mtima kotani nchifukwa chake ndikuti zonse zili mubwererane ayi poti zifukwa zake zomwe mudalekanirana mukuzidziwa ndinu mwakula mwatha amfumu 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza akufunabe wakale agogo ndili mkazi yemwe ndabereka naye ana atatu zambiri wakhala akumafunabe chibwenzi chake chakale chomwe chidamusiya ndakhala ndikupeza ma sms olemba i love u mpaka kale pafoni ndikamufunsa amathamangira kupepesa kodi andithandiza ameneyu ndinganene ndidapezadi mkazi ndiyangane wina chonde ndithandizeni 
  che mwenye che mwenye chichewa pali oti madzi saiwala khwawa mawuwa akutikumbutsa pali amene akakhala pachibwenzi chibwenzicho chitatha akakumana amakumbutsa chikale amathanso kumachitirana nsanje chonsecho chibwenzi adathetsa pakati pawo khalidwe lotere silofunika mukakhala mbanja tanthauzo lake nloti wina akuzembera mnzake wabanja pokhala chibwenzi zibwenzi zamseri wina akangozindikira mnzangayu akundiyenda njomba ukwati zambiri sulimba 
  tsono apa kunena mwachindunji mkazi wanuyo alibe chilungamo sangamalembe kulandira ma sms achikondi kwa wina mulipo malamulo mbanja amakana zimenezi chifukwatu munthu wotere sunga mukhulupirire banja lagona pachikondi chikhulupiriro kwa wina mnzake 
  abambo muli vuto akazi anu akachokapo basi muli pafoni gwi kuyangana waimba ndani kumayangana ma sms si kumatero zimaonetseratu mbanja mwanu simukhulupirirana.chomwe mungachite apa pansi akazi anu kuwafotokozera lomwe za kuipa komagonekerana khosi bwenzi lawo lakale pomwe tsopano akupiririzabe wotere muli zifukwa zokwanira zothetsera banja mkazi sakhala mitala pajatu amati mapanga awiri avumbwitsa
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
anatchezera sakufuna kukaonekera gogo natchereza   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi mnyamata wina adandifunsira chibwenzi cholinga choti tidzakwatirane 
  padakali padutsa zaka zinayi tili paubwenzi palibe chomwe amandiuza chokhudza ukwati mnzangayu amangofuna tizigonana basi 
  gogo ndithandizeni kodi ndimutaye mnyamatayu ttk ttk mutaye mnyamatayu zomwe akufuna nzongogonana basi osati za banja 
  anyamata ambiri amabwatika atsikana powauza adzawakwatira akudziwa zaukwati nazo kutali 
  chakumtima kwawo chikaphwa atsikana aja samawawerengeranso 
  nawo atsikana vuto lawo lalikulu nkutengeka poganiza akakana kugona nawo awasiya nkukapeza 
  apatu ndikuona mnyamatayu kamberembere mutaye asakutaitse yako pachabe 
  gogo natchereza bwenzi langa chimasomaso gogo natchereza ndidakumana mtsikana wina mzinda wa mzuzu zaka zapitazo tidapatsana nambala za foni takhala tikuimbirana mpaka ubwenzi udayamba 
  mtsikanayu amagwira ntchito ku banki ina mzindawo moti mnyumba yakeyake yomwe amakhala 
  gogo mnzangayu ndamupezapo katatu konse chikondi amuna osiyanasiyana wakhala akundipempha ndimukhululukire ndimakhululukadi 
  gogo mtima wanga ndiwosweka mnzangayu ndimamukonda kwambiri moti maganizo moyo mphamvu zanga zonse zidali 
  nditani gogo chonde ndithandizeni hka hka mtsikanayu njinga simungapitirire naye paubwenzi 
  mutha kutero mwakufuna kwanu mudzanongoneza bondo mtsogolo muno khalidwe la chimasomaso sindikuona akusiya 
  akuchita ukathyali muli paubwenzi zidzatha mukadzamukwatira ndikudziwa nzopweteka kusiyana wokondedwa wanu limbani mtima
Label: RELATIONSHIPS

Text:
kusanthula ulamuliro mmasiku 100 banda boma la mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda likuyenera kukhwimitsa chitetezo mdziko muno kuchepetsa chisawawa kuchepetsa kuchotsa pantchito 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc atsogoleri azipani mabungwe mafumu otumikiridwa atero msabatayi pomwe amaikira ndemanga pazomwe mtsogoleriyu wachita mmasiku 100 akulamulira lino 
  mneneri waboma moses kunkuyu wati kwa maundindo ntchito zina sikolakwika mtsogoleri wa akamalowa pampando amasankha oti agwire nawo ntchito 
  nayo nduna yazamdziko uladi mussa yati boma likuyesetsa chitetezo chikhwime mdziko muno 
  adati nkutheka alipo omwe akufuna ayalutse boma la banda lilibe chitetezo 
  posangalala watha masiku 100 akulamula lino 7 epulo pomwe adamulumbiritsa mtsogoleri wakale wa lino bingu wa mutharika atamwalira mwadzidzidzi kudali mapemphero zochitika zosiyanasiyana 
  banda adayamba kulamula lino litakutidwa mmavuto mikwingwirima kusowa mafuta ndalama zakunja shuga zina zotere 
  ya ulamuliro wa mutharika chipani chake cha democratic progressive party dpp kudadzanso malamulo amene amaoneka ndiopondereza lamulo limene limapatsa mphamvu apolisi chipikisheni opanda chikalata chaboma lamulo lopereka mphamvu kwa nduna kutseka nyuzipepala wailesi yodzudzula boma kusokonekera kwa ubale wa lino maiko 
  banda chipani chake cha peoples party pp atangotenga boma mavuto enawo adazilala malinga bomali lili zolakwika zake 
  manthu mavuto mneneri wa dpp nicholas dausi wati pamasiku 100 chipani chawo chaona zokhoma manthu wamavuto kulira cha mpanipani womwe banda wauchita kwa achipanichi 
  dausi wati sakuona chomwe banda angaonongere chuma cha boma posangalala watha masiku 100 chikhalirecho zinthu mdziko muno sizili 
  chisangalalocho chikudabwitsa kodi akusangalalira bingu adamwalira sitikuona pali chosangalalira akuti mdziko muno muli mafuta ndalama zakunja moyo wa munthu wakumudzi sudasinthe zinthu ndiye zakwera mtengo adatero dausi 
  adati mdziko muno achotsedwa ntchito kumangidwa adapereka zitsanzo za omangidwa wa bungwe lothana ziphuphu la anti corruption bureau acb alexious nampota gavanala wa dpp kumpoto christopher ngwira wa achinyamata dpp lewis ngalande kalaliki wamkulu wa nyumba ya malamulo matilda katopola woyanganira nyumba zaboma edward sawerengera wachiwiri nector mhura wapolisi peter mukhito wa banki ya malawi savings bank boma lakana kulembanso ntchito yemwe wa nthambi yaboma yoona za olowa kutuluka mdziko muno elvis thodi 
  kuchotsana kumanganaku kukutidabwitsa adatero dausi 
  mneneri wa chipani cha udf mahmudu lali wati kupezeka kwa mafuta agalimoto ndalama zakunja kuchotsedwa kwa malamulo oipa kubwezeretsedwa kwa mbendera ya lino kwasonyeza utsogoleri wa banda zinthu zayamba 
  lali wati boma lisakomedwe zina zayamba kale kusokonekera chitetezo chasokonekera taonanso momwe bomali layendetsera gawo 65 la malamulo adziko lino angochita momwe boma la dpp lidachitira litawonanso zipangizo zophunzirira ndizokwana msukulu masitalaka akuyenera kutha 
  zikuyenda malinga kwa boma aphungu achipani cha dpp adakhamukira kumbali ya boma mnyumba ya malamulo malamulo amati aphungu otere achitsedwe pamipando yawo kukhale chisankho cha chibwereza banda akuluakulu dpp ati nzosayenera zingaononge ndalama boma lokhazikika ndilo likufunika 
  wa bungwe loona zaumoyo la malawi health equity network mehn martha kwataine wati masiku 100 ndiochepa kukonza zinthu boma la banda layesetsa 
  wati banda akuyenera kuchenjera omwe amuyandikira omwewo omwe adayandikira mutharika 
  tipemphe bungwe la acb lizifufuzanso omwe mboma osangoti lidzifufuza omwe siali mboma adatero kwataine 
  t chekucheku ya mboma la neno yati sabata yathayi kwawoko amalandira cheke cha ndalama zoti amangire nyumba za aphunzitsi kukonza sukulu yawo kumeneko zomwe wati ndichitsimikizo zinthu zikuyenda 
  wati umbava umbanda wakula kudera lake kotero boma likuyenera kanthu 
  mfumu malemia ya mboma la nsanje yati zinthu zili mmidzi boma lati liyambitsa ntchito zachitukuko mmidzi zomwe wati zitukula akumudzi 
  addition mawononga wa mmudzi mwa matiya kwa t nkumbira mboma la zomba wati boma likhwimitse chitetezo 
  chitetezo chacheperatu lamulungu 15 akuba adandibera k10 000 siine ndekha akulira mdziko muno tikumva wa apolisi mdziko muno lot dzonzi wauza apolisi asamawombere akuba sizonena kulankhula pagulu bwezi atangowauza apolisiwo momwe ateremu ndiye chitetezo chimasukiratu adatero mkuluyu

Text:
jb asankha kachali mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda lachitatu adasankha khumbo kachali wachiwiri 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kachali yemwe phungu wa ku mzimba wachiwiri kwa banda mchipani cha peoples party pp 
  kachali wachinayi paudindowu pomwe lino lidayamba ndale za zipani zambiri 1994 mmbuyomu justin malewezi cassim chilumpha banda adakhalapo paudindowu 
  kusankhidwa kwa kachali kudadza tsiku limene banda adasuntha mlembi wamkulu muofesi ya mtsogoleri wadziko lino nduna zake woona za madyedwe ndinso za hiv dr mary shawa kupita kuunduna woona za amayi 
  maudindo ambiri akhala akusinthidwa msabatayi imfa ya mtsogoleri wakale wadziko lino bingu wa mutharika yemwe adamwalira 5 epulo ya boma ku lilongwe atadwala nthenda ya mtima 
  thupilo adalitengera kuchipatala cha kamuzu centre mumzinda wa lilongwe malinga malipoti achipatala akuti mutharika adali atamwalira kale pomwe amafika kuchipatalako 
  madzulo lachinayilo boma lidati mutharika amutengera ku kch komwe adati akudwala mtima 
  lachisanu 6 mtsogoleri wakale wa lino bakili muluzi banda adachititsa msonkhano pomwe adati malamulo adziko lino akuyenera kutsatidwa yemwe alowe mmalo mwa mutharika wadwalika wamwalira 
  lachisanu lomwelo cha mma 11 koloko usiku akuluakulu aboma patricia kaliati nicholas dausi kondwani nankhumwa symon vuwa kaunda adachititsa msonkhano wa atolankhani ku area 4 mumzinda wa lilongwe 
  msonkhanowo kaliati adatsutsa zomwe muluzi banda adanena adati banda sakuyenera mtsogoleri adachoka mchipani chomwe chimalamulira cha dpp ndikukayambitsa chipani chake cha pp 
  kaliati adakananso sanena momwe mutharika akupezera adangoti ku chipatala cha milpark mdziko la south africa 
  apa nkuti nyumba zoulutsira zamaiko zitalengeza mutharika wamwalira 
  mmawa wa loweruka ofesi ya pulezidenti nduna idalengeza mutharika wamwalira idati amalawi akhuza malirowo kwa masiku khumi 
  lowerukalo yemwe adali wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleriyu joyce banda adalumbiritsidwa mtsogoleri wa lino 
  mutharika yemwe adali mwana wa mphunzitsi adabadwa febuluwale 1934 amachokera mmudzi mwa kamoto mboma la thyolo 
  mutharika dzina lake adali ryson webster thom adasintha dzinali mzaka za mma 1960 
  malemuwa omwe adali katswiri zachuma adasankhidwa mtsogoleri wa la malawi 2004 mtsogoleri wa lino ataimira chipani cha udf

Text:
makuponi otsiriza afika mzigawo mabanja ovutikitsitsa tsopano akhoza kumwetulira kaamba ka kubwera kwa makuponi otsiriza zipangizo zaulimi zotsika mtengo 
  boma lati lalandira makuponi omaliza zomwe zipangitse alimi ovutikitsitsa 812 100 apeze zipangizozi mzigawo za pakati kumpoto 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka makuponiwa abwera panthawi yomwe aphungu ku nyumba ya malamulo atsogoleri mabungwe omwe si aboma akhala akudzudzula boma cha kuchedwetsa pogawa makuponi ganizo loyamba kugawa makuponi mchigawo cha kummwera 
  wachiwiri kwa woyendetsa ndondomeko ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo muunduna wa zamalimidwe osborne tsoka adatsimikiza za kufika kwa makuponiwa adaonjezera boma lamaliza kusankha omwe alandire makuponiwa mmaboma 27 boma la dowa lokha ndiko ntchitoyi ikupitirira 
  tsoka adafotokoza tikudziwa tikuthamangitsana ichi chake tamwanza akhale akupereka makuponiwa kwa alimi mzigawo ziwiri zomwe zinali zisanalandire padakalipano makuponi anyamulidwa kupita mmaboma omwe adali asanalandire 
  tikakamba za maboma boma la dowa ndilo latsala timalize ntchito yosankha omwe alandire makuponiwa ndikukhulupirira pofika kumapeto sabatayi ntchitoyi ikhala itatha 
  poyankhula mwapadera nduna ya zaulimi chitukuko cha madzi dr allan chiyembekeza adati sadatekeseke chikayiko cha mabungwe omwe si aboma chakuti ndondomekoyi chaka chino ikumana zokhoma 
  sabata yatha boma lidalandira makuponi oyamba ofikira 687 900 mchigawo cha kumwera 
  potsirapo ndemanga ovitikitsitsa omwe alandire makuponiwa chaka chino mafumu maka mchigawo cha kumpoto adandaula kusankha maina sikunayende chaka chino omwe asankhidwa alandire nawo si ovutikitsitsa opeza mzintchito zolipidwa pamwezi 
  ku rumphi nyakwawa ina ya mdera la gulupu chikulamasinda kwa themba la mathemba paramount chief chikulamayembe idati yokhumudwa mwa 9 omwe alandire makuponiwa mmudzi mwake asanu oti sali pamudzipo mzintchito ku blantyre ku lilongwe ku mzuzu wina mphunzitsi ku kasungu 
  inde mmudzi mwanga si ovutikitsita mwini wakene ndimagwira ntchito ku blantyre dzina langa latuluka pamndandanda wa omwe apindule makuponiwa kusiya ovutikitsitsa mmudzi mwanga 
  sindidziwa amasankha mainawa akadatifunsa mafumufe woyenera ndani kulandira makuponi tikadawapatsa maina anthuwo osati kusankha okha okhala ndan iwowo mafumu idafunsa mfumuyo yomwe sidafune itchulidwe poopera mawa
Label: FARMING

Text:
moto wayaka ku nkosini pasanadutse nkomwe mwezi chilongere inkosi yamakosi gomani yachisanu ku ntcheu fumbi labuka pomwe mbali ina kubanjalo ikukakamiza wogwirizira rosemary malinki kutula pansi udindo kupepesa ati chipongwe chomwe adatulutsa mwambo wolonga ufumuwo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mbaliyi yati malinki adalankhula kulibe mawa ku mwambo wolonga mswati willard gomani inkosi gomani yachisanukapena ngwenyama 5 ogasiti ku nkosini likulu la ufumu wachingoniku lizulu mbomalo 
  mneneri wa okhumudwawo dingiswayo romeo samson philip gomani wauza tamvani lachiwiri msabatayi tsopano abanja akukumana kukalondolera momwe ufumuwo uziyendera 
  malinki wati angapepese pokhapokha nkhaniyo itafika ku nkosini kwa gomani 
  malinki wati ngwenyama yokha ili mphamvu yochotsa kusankha yemwe akuyenera kugwirizira ufumuwo 
  dingiswayo wati mwa zina malinki adaphotchola pomwe amaunikira mkazi naye akhoza kulowa ufumu wa gomani pofanizira namlangeni yemwe ati adalamulira adali 
  chatsitsa dzaye malinki adanyanyula mbaliyi ati popitiriza namlangeni amalamulira amuna enieni osati amasiku anowa 
  dingiswayo wati malinki adapitirizanso ufumuwo supita kwa ana omwe sadalowoledwe zomwe ati zidawanyanyulanso 
  pachingoni ufumu wathu umakhala mnyumba imodzi susinthana umakhala nyumba yomweyo mpaka yesu adzabwere adatsendera malinki 
  apa abanjawa motsogozedwa dingiswayo adatulutsa uthenga mnyuzipepala lachisanu 10 ogasiti kulengeza malinki apepese 
  dingiswayo pouza tamvani adati mkazi sangalamule ufumu wa gomani malinki sakuyenera wogwirizira pomwe mfumu yadzozedwa 
  adatinso malinki adalowoledwa kotero za ufumu wa gomani sizikuyeneranso zimukhudze 
  gomani iv adasiya ana atatu womaliza mswati onsewo akuchokera kwa amayi osiyana 
  ubwino ana onse timakhala nawo pamodzi mbumba 
  onena ufumuwo supita kwa ana obadwira kunja kwa banjalo adatikwiitsa ichi nchifukwa tikuti apepese adatero dingiswayo 
  titamufunsa achita zokambiranazo sizichitika adati imeneyo nkhondo komabe ayesetsa zokambiranazo zitheke 
  za mafumu achingoni achikazi t kachindamoto adati akudziwa za ufumu wa gomani 
  mfumu yatsopanoyi idati singalankhule kanthu 
  sindikudziwa yemwe angalankhule pankhaniyi padakakhala zoti lidziwe tikadakuuzani idatero ngwenyamayo 
  boma sililowerera   nduna ya maboma aangono chitukuko cha kumudzi grace zinenani maseko yati boma sililowerera chilichonse nkhaniyo 
  maseko adati zomwe agwirizane banja boma limvera zomwezo 
  kaya asankha wina wogwirizira pomwe mswati akupita kusukulu tivomereza adatero 
  mbiri ya ufumu wa gomani philip gomani yachiwiri idabereka willard samson lineti hastings simasi titus willard yemwe adali gomani wachitatu adabereka rosemary kanjedza yemwe adaali gomani yachinayi kanjedza adabereka frank zwelithini mswati yemwe mfumu anawa adabadwa kwa amayi osiyana

Text:
bungwe la chrr ladzudzula zipolowe ndale bungwe lomenyera ufulu wa la center for human rights and rehabilitation chrr lati lokhumudwa kukula kwa wa zipolowe ndale mdziko muno 
 kudzera chikalata chomwe bungwe li latulutsa wa bungweli micheal kaiyatsa ati zomvetsa chisoni otsatira zipani akuchitirana ziwembu njira zosiyanasiyana munthu ufulu wa chibadwidwe 
 bungweli lalankhula potsatira zachiwembu zomwe otsatira zipani za utm dpp mcp akumana nazo masiku apitawa 
 bungweli lokhuzidwa zamtopola zomwe zikuchitika mdziko muno lamulo likuyera kugwira ntchito anatero kaiyatsa 
 apempha atsogeleri bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno la mec awonjezere achitetezo mmalo olembetsera chizankho nkhanzazi zichepe apempha apolisi agwire ntchito yawo moyenera

Text:
fodya wobwerera kumsika amugulitsa wa bungwe la tobacco association of malawi tama graham kunimba wati fodya yemwe anabwerera pamsika chaka chino tsopano amugulitsa 
  adati zinthu zinavuta bungwelo lidayesetsa kukambirana boma bungwe la tobacco control commission tcc ogula kufikira tsopano fodya yense amugulitsa mwa magawo 100 alionse fodya wofika kumsika 70 akhala akubwezedwa chaka chino alimi ambiri manja mkhosi kusowa chochita naye 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu alimi fodya uyu ayenera zitupa kunimba wati malonda fodya mchakachi anavuta kwambiri fodya analimidwa wochuluka kwambiri kuposa mlingo omwe ogula amafuna kafukufuku akusonyeza la malawi limayenera kulima fodya okwana makilogalamu 158.1 miliyoni chaka chino tinakolola makilogalamu 205.53 miliyoni 
  fodyayu amugula mitengo yake inali yotsika kwambiri zapangitsa lino lipeze ndalama zochepa ku ulimiwu kusiyana chaka chatha kafukufuku akusonyeza chaka chatha la malawi lidapeza k216.8 biliyoni ku fodya chaka chino tapeza k162.6 biliyoni 
  pamenepa ndiye boma lapeza ndalama zochepa msonkho wochokera ku ulimiwu wachepa mwachidziwikire chuma cha boma chakhunzidwa adatero kunimba 
  wa bungwe la farmers union of malawi fum alfred kapichira banda wavomereza za kugulitsidwa kwa fodyayu adati fodyayu amugula mongolanda fodya wambiri amugula pamtengo wa k553 kilogalamu wina amugula kuchepera apo adatero kapichira banda 
  mwa alimi omwe anakhudzidwa vutoli isack banda wa mboma la dowa wati zomwe wakumana nazo mchakachi zayamba kumupatsa maganizo osiya ulimiwu sanapeze phindu lililonse 
  ulimi wa fodya umalowa zambiri umalira zipangizo zochuluka zokwera mtengo moti ndikawerengetsa zonsezi palibe chimene ndaphula koposa ndingoleka adatero banda 
  bungwe la tama likuchenjeza mlimi amene sanalandire chilolezo ku tcc asalime fodya sadzagulidwa kumsika 
  bungweli lati zithandiza fodya yemwe alimidwe chaka chino asapyole mlingo omwe la malawi likuyenera kulima kunimba adati alimi omwe alandira chilolezochi apatsidwa mlingo wa fodya yemwe akuyenera kulima 
  tikuwalangiza alimi onse asatire mlingo omwe tcc yawapatsa asapyole kuopa kuchulutsa zokolola zomwe zingapangitse malonda adzavutenso chaka chamawachi adatero kunimba
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
atudzula ziwalo za mwamuna pamene nkhanza zambiri zomwe zimachita zimakhakla zochokera kwa abambo kupita kwa amayi loveness nakayuni wa mmudzi mwa chapyoka t mwaulambia mboma la chitipa masiku apitawa adali mchitolokosi pomuganizira adafinya mwamuna kumalo obisika mpaka kutudzula ziwalo 
  mneneri wa polisi mchigawo cha kumpoto maurice chapola adatsimikiza za nkhaniyi pouza msangulutso mayiyo adali mmanja mwawo kaamba kovulaza mwamuna winis kita wa zaka 46 atamugwira kumoyo akuti adaphwanya lonjezo logona kwake 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi adati kita yemwe wamitala adanyamuka kupita kukamwa mowa komwe adabwerako madzulo 
  adafikira kwa mkazi woyamba nakayuni sadakhalitse adapita ya mkazi wamngono zidamuwawa nakayuni yemwe adamulondola mwamunayo kwa mkazi wamngonoyo 
  atafika adapeza mwamunayo atakhala pakhonde akusuta fodya nakayuni adangombwandira malo obisika mwamuna wakeyo nkufinya mpaka kutudzula adafotokoza chapola 
  adati kita adamutengera kuchipatala cha boma komwe adalandira thandizo lobwezeretsa ziwalozo zake mchimake akuti akupezako akuchita kuyendera kukalandira mankhwala kuchipatala 
  funso nkumati kodi banja lilipobe apa tidalephera kuyankhula kita wapolisi wa zofufuzafufuza teketivu yatamu kasambara adauza msangulutso mkuluyu adakatseketsa mlandu kupolisiko ponena zidali zambanja mkazi ati azikalera ana 
  ku chitipa komweko wina mawazo nzunga akumuganizira wapha mlamu atamumenya mpini wa khasu pamutu atalephera kumvetsetsana pankhani ya chakudya 
  chapola adauza msangulutso wophedwayo willard mwilenga adapita komwa mowa pochoka kumowako adaganiza zokapempha chakudya ya mbale komwe adauzidwa chakudya chake kulibe 
  yankho la mlamu wakeyo silidamusangalatse kaamba ka kuledzera adayamba kummenya nzunga pobwezera adatenga mpini wa khasu adamugogoda nawo pamutu nkumukomola nawo adafotokoza chapola 
  mwilenga adathamangira naye kuchitapatala cha kameme ataona zawakulira adamutumiza kuchipatala chachikulu ku chitipa komwe adakafera 
  chapola adati nzunga rimandi pandende ya chitipa kudikira kuyankha mlandu wa kupha munthu 
  pothirapo ndemanga pankhani za nkhanza wapampando wa bungwe la ngo gender coordination network emma kaliya wati nkhani itengedwe ya nkhaza kwa amayi abambo zimakhala kuyangana chatsitsa dzaye njovu ithyoke mnyanga 
  mboma la chitipa amuna azikazi kachisimo kokamwa mowa ku chilabu limodzi makamaka madera kwa kameme mwaulambia 
  tikuyesetsa kuthana womwa mowa ku chilabu tikukhulupirira umakolezera nkhaza pakati amayi abambo adatero kaliya
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
mutharika asosola nthenga atsogoleri .asankha nduna chimunthu banda aukana mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika sabata imene ikuthayi wotangwanika zedi ndiye wasosola nthenga akuluakulu mboma ngakhalenso mchipani chake cha democratic progressive party dpp 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc chimunthu banda kumanja wakana unduna wa zamigodi lachinayi mutharika adasankha nduna zatsopano 32 kuphatikizapo zochokera kuchipani cha united democratic front udf chomwe nacho mumgwirizano henry chimunthu banda yemwe adapikisanapo mutharika pofuna kuimira dpp 2014 dzulo chimunthu banda adakana undunawo 
  mutharika polengeza ndunazo sanatchule dzina la wachiwiri saulos chilima yemwe bwalo la constitutional court lidati abwerere pampando wa wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa gawo 79 la malamulo lino limaneneratu wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino amayenera mgulu la nduna za boma 
  mutharika adasankha atupele muluzi lilian patel clement chiwaya kuchipani cha udf pamndandanda wa ndunazo 
  zina mwa nduna zimene zabwerera everton chimulirenji chipiliro mpinganjira bright msaka ben phiri joseph mwanamvekha ralph jooma mary navicha jappie mhango nicholas dausi symon vuwa kaunda salim bagus mark botomani 
  mwa amene angosankhidwa kumene kamlepo kalua kenneth ndovie grace kwelepeta chimwemwe chipungu grezelder jeffrey mary makungwa 
  pambali mutharika adasonyezanso mphamvu zake msabatayi pomwe adakana mabilo ofuna malamulo zisankho adakana kumva pempho la komiti yoona zolemba ntchito akuluakulu mboma la public appointments committee pac achotse makomishona bungwe la zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec 
  adakananso kusayinira mabilo ofuna malamulo oyendetsera zisankho popeza adati akutsutsana malamulo aakulu lino 
  pambali pochotsa nduna zake zonse sabata yatha mutharika msabatayi adachotsa wa asilikali vincent nundwe wachiwiri clement namangale kusankha andrew namathanga wa asilikali davis mtachi wachiwiri adasinthanso mipando ya akuluakulu asilikaliwo 
  kusinthako kudafikanso kuchipani chake cha democratic progressive party dpp komwe mutharika adachotsa magavanala kumpoto ken sanga pakati bintony kuntsaira adasanha christopher mzomera ngwira gavanala wa kumpoto david kambalame gavanala wa pakati 
  nako kupolisi mipando ya akuluakulu idasintha pomwe akuluakulu mzigawo adasamutsidwa mosiyanasiyana 
  malinga kadaulo wa zandale ku chancellor college mustapha hussein adati kusasainako kuonetsa mutharika akufuna adziwe ndiye chiongolero 
  akufuna kuonetsa akulamula ndiye pali chikonzero choti chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa lino chichitikenso adatero hussein 
  lachiwiri mutharika kupyolera mwa mneneri mgeme kalilani adati sangachotse makomishona pac adapemphera padali zokhota zina 
  ndidalandira lipoti la pac ndaliwerenga lili zofooka zambiri mwa zina silikunena makomishona adauzidwa za zofooka zawo asadakaonekere adapatsidwa mpata wolumikizana maloya likuoneka adangotengera chigamulo cha khoti chomwe tidapanga apilo kukhoti lalikulu la supreme adatero mutharika 
  adapitiriza makomishona omwewo ndiwo adayendetsa chisankho cha aphungu makhansala zomwe zidavomerezedwa ndiye zidatheka asakhale akadaulo pachisankho cha mtsogoleri wa lino chokha 
  zifukwa apulezidenti akuti sadavomere lipoti la pac sachotsa komishona kuphatikizapo wapampando jane ansah mpaka chigamulo cha apilo adatero kalilani 
  bwalo lounikira malamulo aakulu kwambiri mdziko lino lidagamula 3 february 2020 komitiyo iunike makomishona onse mmodzimmodzi oyenera kuyendetsa bungwe la mec lipereke zomwe lipeze kwa mtsogoleri wa lino 
  chigamulocho chimatsatira samani ya mtsogoleri wa malawi congress party mcp lazaru chakwera wa utm party saulos chilima omwe adadandaula bungwe la mec chipani cha dpp adasokoneza chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa lino cha 21 may 2020
Label: POLITICS

Text:
zipolowe zalepheretsa chilima misonkhano ku machinga omwe akuwaganizira otsatira zipani za dpp udf asokoneza misonkhano yoyimayima yomwe wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino saulosi chilima amayembekezeka kuchititsa mmadera mboma la machinga 
 nsewu wa bakili muluzi highway unatsekedwa zigawenga chilima yemwe akuyima chisankho chomwe chikudzachi dr lazarus chakwera pansi mgwirizano wa zipani wa tonse walepheretsa misonkhano yonse yomwe amayenera kuchitayi 
 polankhula radio maria malawi phungu wakale wadera la pakati mboma la machinga yemwe mbuyomu wa chipani cha dpp tsopano analowa mchipani cha utm ellock maotcha banda wati mtsogoleriyu anayimitsa misonkhanoyi kaamba koti samafuna osalakwa avulale kaamba ka misonkhano yake 
 anyamata dpp udf anapatsidwa ndalama atsogoleri chipani chawochi asokonezeze msonkhano omwe umafuna uchitike madera nselema ntaja nsanama ulongwe mangochi turn off zinapangitsa president athu utm asapangitsenso msonkhanowu pofuna kutetza miyoyo ya osalakwa anatero amaotcha 
 ati kulephereka kwa msonkhanowu sikodandaulisa kweni kweni chabe chipani cha dpp chikuluza mavoti mmaderawa ponena chipani cha utm tsopano chili ambiri ochitsatira mchigawo chakumvuma
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
ambuye msusa adzudzula zipolowe ndale wa mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno archbishop thomas luke msusa wadzudzula wa zipolowe zokhudza ndale zomwe zikuchitika mmadera osiyanasiyana mdziko muno 
 msusa tili nkhawa ambuye msusa omwenso arkiepiskopi wa mpingo wa katolika arkidayosizi ya blantyre amayankhula kwa bvumbwe mboma la thyolo pambuyo mwambo wa malumbiro oyamba sister agnes magombo chipani cha divine providence 
 tili nkhawa zitha cha kampeni imene ikuchitika yomwe sikulemekeza ufulu wa munthu sikulemekeza munthu atha kupita kulikonse kukapereka uthenga kuli nkhanza ziwawa kuononga zinthu zaena kulemberana malire zomwe zoipa ndikudzudzula umenewu zinatha kalekale ya atsamunda tili ufulu wa democracy anatero ambuye msusa 
 ambuye msusa mwapadera anayamikira bata lomwe linalipo bwalo la milandu linapereka chigamulo chake nkhani ya chisankho cha president zomwe akuti zikusiyana momwe zinthu zilili padakalipano 
 pamenepa ambuye msusa adzudzulanso boma zipani za ndale polephera njira zabwino zopewera matenda covid-19
Label: SOCIAL

Text:

Text:
dayosizi ya dedza yati akhristu ake adzipemphelera panja mpingo wa katolika dayosizi ya dedza wapempha akhristu ake adzichita miyambo ya nsembe za misa panja tchalitchi njira imodzi yopewera mliri wa coronavirus 
 malingana kalata yomwe yatulutsidwa dzulo 6 july yasainidwa owona za utumiki dayosiziyi peter white zadza kaamba kofuna malo opemphelera otakasuka pofuna kuchepetsa kufala kwa nthendayi 
 akuti azipemphera panja tchalitchizi white ati pali mavuto omwe ngadze kaamba kopemphera panja akhristu akuyenera kupilira kusiyana atenge nthendayi 
 milungu ingapo yapitayi tinawona matchalitchi athu akutsatira zomwe chipatala akunena cha kuchepa kwa malo mtchalicthi sakumakhala motalikirana apa pomwe tinakhala pansi kuona akhritsu azisonkhana panja tchalitchi popeza pali malo aakulu anatero white 
 ati pamene amapanga chiganizo chimenechi anaganiziranso mavuto omwe akhristu azikumana nawo maonga mphepo kakhalidwe ka malo panjapo komabe ati akhristuwa akuyenera kupilira kusiyana atenge nthendayi kaamba kothithikana mtchalitchi
Label: RELIGION

Text:
kusamala antchito olera ana ana ambiri masiku ano akuleredwa antchito mmakomomu popeza makolo amakhala otangwanika kusaka makobidi kuntchito mabizinezi 
  alipo antchito odziwa kulera mwana mwachikondi oona nkumadabwa zoterezi zikutheka si onse antchito omwe amaika mtima posamala mwana wa bwana ngankhanza achibwana amgwazo kupanda kupenyetsetsa akhonza kubweretsa mavuto pamoyo wa ana banja 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zina cha kutangwanika makolo amalephera kuonetsetsa ana akuleredwa pakhomo makolo amangotayirira chilichonse nkusiya mmanja mwa omwe kwawo kumakhala kungothandizira kaleredwe ka ana 
  antchito enanso chidwi chawo sichikhala kwenikweni posamalira mwana ndalama zomwe amalandira mwezi ukatha 
  poterepa pamafunika kupenyetsetsa 
  tamvapo za antchito omwe mwana akawavuta kulira amatha kungomuyamwitsa mmalo momupatsa mkaka wambotolo 
  mmakomo momwe miswachi imangounjikidwa kubafa antchito wawo mswachi ukatalikira amangotolapo wa mwana nkutsukira mkamwa mwawo 
  kaya chibwana kaya umbuli masiku ano matenda opatsirana edzi nkwapafupi uwu ukhale chiopsezo kumoyo wa ana 
  antchito aulesi amangomusiya mwana muthewera loonongeka nkungomusintha kumusambitsa kumadzulo make akayandikira kubwera chonsecho tsiku lonseli mwana wakhalira kupsa muthewera losalongosoka 
  ana oliralira akukhalira kutsinidwa kumenyedwa kumene othandizirawa enanso omwe amakhalira kumudyera zakudya mwana makolo nkumangodabwa sikelo ya mwana sikulongosoka 
  zilipo zambiri zomwe anthuwa amatha ana omwe pokhala achichepere sangawiringule chilichonse 
  pakhomo pali wothandizira kumachitako chidwi zinthu akuyendetsa 
  nanga anawo akuwasamalira tsiku lina nkudzalirira kuutsi
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
amayi ozembetsa mankhwala ozunguza bongo apatsidwa chilango wolemba thokozani chapola wp content uploads/2019/10 adarkwa.jpg 607w sizes="(max width 282px 100vw 282px />amulamula akagwire ukayidi ku maula kwa zaka ziwiri adarkwa bwalo la milandu la mkukula ku lumbadzi mboma la dowa lachitatu lalamula amayi awiri akakhale ku ndende kukagwira ukayidi atapezeka olakwa mlandu wofuna kuzembetsa mankhwala ozunguza bongo otchedwa apomorphine 
 amayi awiriwa harriet namate wa mboma la zomba sally adarkwa yemwe mzika ya la ghana anagwidwa sabata ziwiri zapitazo bwalo la ndege la kamuzu mzinda wa lilongwe 
 wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi ku bwalo la ndege la kamuzu sub inspector sapulani chitonde wati namate yemwe anapezeka mankhwalawa olemera 7 kilograms amulamula akagwire ukayidi kwa zaka theka adarkwa yemwe anapezeka mankhwalawa olemera 5 kilograms amulamula akagwire ukayidi kwa zaka ziwiri 
 awiriwa kudzera mwa ma lawyer anapempha bwaloli liwamvere chisoni kaamba koti amayi kutumidwa abambo bwaloli linawona mkofunika awiriwa apatsidwe chilango cha mtunduwu kaamba koti ati mchitidwewu ukuchulukira mdziko muno 
 padakalipano chitonde wati bwalo la ndege la kamuzu si malo ophweka podusitsira mankhwala ozunguza bongo akuyenera kupewa
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
anatchezera za chikondi chibwenzi agogo   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kodi chibwenzi chikondi zosiyana mwina funso limeneli likhoza kuoneka lopanda nzeru kwa lofunika kwambiri funso lina loti kodi mwamuna amakonda kulonjeza chibwenzi wachikondi adzakwatirana chonsecho mkazi samamulonjeza mwamuna ndiye pamenepa mwamuna angathe kupitiriza chibwenzi angomusiya lf area 12 lilongwe wokondeka lf munthu utha abwenzi ambirimbiri wachikondi zambiri satha kusiyanitsa pakati chikondi chibwenzi chikondi chozama kuposa chibwenzi chikondi chimachoka pansi mtima zambiri awiri akakondana maka pakati mwamuna mkazi amagwirizana mzambiri moti nchifukwa chake mapeto ake amalolerana kulumbira adzakhala limodzi mpaka moyo wawo wonse mbanja pamene chibwenzi mumatha kugwirizana zina kusiyana mzambiri zochitika nchifukwa chake munthu utha abwenzi ambiri uli pabanja ndanena kale amene umatherana naye nkhazi zakukhosi zakumphasa yekha wachikondi wako funso lako lachiwiri yankho loti pachikhalidwe chathu mwamuna ndiye amafunsira mkazi iyeyo amene amauza mkazi za cholinga chake pachibwenzi chawocho akazi ambiri amakhala manyazi kunena alola chibwenzi chonsecho mkati mwa mtima wawo alola kale ndiye munthu wamwamuna uyenera kumvetsa kufatsa osapupuluma ukhoza kutsekereza mafulufute kuuna poganiza mkazi sakunena chilichonse pamene pali chikondi sipasowa zochitika zimasonyeza zokha apa pali chikondi wina asanene 
  amandikonda ayi ndili mwamuna amene akufuna akaonekere kwathu sindimamukonda kwambiri iyeyo amandikonda kwambiri ndiye akuti andikwatira zaka zinayi zikubwerazo ndakumana wina akuti andikwatira zaka ziwiri zikubwera kutsogolo ndiye nditani agogo lc area 49 lilongwe zikomo lc mwana wanga chimene ukufuna sindikuchidziwa iwe ukufuna kukwatiwa mwamuna wotani wokukonda amene akufuna ukwati pompanopompano sakukonda vuto chiyani mwamuna amene ukuti amakukonda akufuna kudzamanga nawe banja zaka zinayi zikubwerazi nchifukwa chiyani udamulola poyamba sumamukonda ndiye ukuti wapeza mwamuna wina amene akuti akukwatira zaka ziwiri zikubwerazi makamaka ukufuna ndikhuthandize chiyani pankhani imeneyi zonse zili iwe mwini chomwe ndingakulangize choti si amuna onse amene amakhala chikondi chenicheni wina atha kunena tikwatirane lero lero mumtima mwake mulibe chikondi pomwe wina anena tikhale pachibwenzi zaka zinayi kenako tidzakwatirane pazifukwa zina zina chichewa pali oti lero lero linadetsa mnthengu ukasauka sunga khosi mkanda woyera udzavala enanso amati kuona maso nkhono nkudekha onsewa akutiphunzitsa zinthu mofatsa tione ubwino patsogolo osati zinthu mwakhamanikhani tsono ndanena kale zili iwe mwini ukudziwa chomwe ukufuna ndikanakhala ndili ndikanamupatsa mpata mwamuna woti waonetsa chikondi chenicheni kwa anene atenga andikwatire chikondi chenicheni sichimaona nthawitu paja

Text:
dayosizi ya chikwawa ili komiti yatsopano ya abwenzi radio maria by richard makombe abwenzi radio maria malawi dayosizi ya chikwawa asankha komiti yatsopano yomwe cholinga chake ndikuthandiza kuyendetsa ntchito za radio maria 
 komitiyi yasankhidwa pambuyo chisankho chomwe abwenzi wayilesiyi anakonza chomwe chinachitikira loweruka ku st michaels cathedral mboma la chikwawa 
 poyankhula mbuyo masankhowa national coordinator radio maria louis phiri ayamikira abwenzi wayilesiyi dayosiziyi kamba kotuluka mwaunyinji kusankha atsogoleri ku mtima kwawo 
 phiri alimbikitsa abwenzi onse amene asankhidwa komiti yatsopano ya dayosizi ya chikwawa asabwelere mbuyo pogwira ntchito yawo 
 ndithokoze kwambiri nonse amene munatenga nawo mbali powonesetsa chisankhochi chiyende mwa bata mtendereanatero phiri 
 phiri anatengerapo mwayi ndikupempha atsogoleri atsopanowa akonzekere ndikuadzatenga nawo mbali chikondwelero chokumbukira radio maria malawi yakwanitsa zaka 20 ikufalitsa uthenga wabwino mdziko muno chomwe chidzachitike mwezi wa september chaka chino 
 pothilirapo ndemanga wapa mpando wa laity council dayosizi ya chikwawa george mkutu anayamikira abwenzi radio maria mdziko muno kamba kotenga gawo ntchito zothandiza radio maria mdziko muno 
 ndikofunika abwenzi radio maria akhale patsogolo kuthandiza wayilesiyi kaamba koti thandizo kwa akhristu onse mdziko muno choncho abwenzi wayilesiyi akuyenera kutsogolera ntchito yothandiza wayilesiyi anatero mkutu 
 mmawu ake wachiwiri kwa wapampando yemwe wasankhidwa kumene clement majawa ati ndiokondwa komiti yomwe amayiyembekezera tsopano yasankhidwa 
 omwe asankhidwa mmaudindo mathews chimota omwe wapampando clement mjawa asankhidwa wachiwiri kwa wapampando zachariah malunga awasankha mlembi wachiwiri wawo cecelia jeke enifa mwale awasankha msungichuma
Label: RELIGION

Text:
la tanzania layamikira amalawi posunga bata yosintha ulamuliro la tanzania layamikira lino posunga bata mtendere ya kwa ulamuliro wa lino 
 wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa la tanzania samia suluhu hassan wauza atolankhani lolemba ku lilongwe pambuyo zokambirana mtsogoleri wa lino dr lazarus chakwera zomwe mzika za lino zawonetsa nthawiyi chitsimikizo chakuti zotheka kulemekeza ufulu wa demokalase 
 wayamikira la malawi suluhu zokambiranazi zinachitika pambuyo mwambo opereka lupanga la utsogoleri ukulu wa gulu la asilikali nkhondo lino kwa mtsogoleri wa lino dr lazarus chakwera pomwenso hassan nthumwi zina zochokera mayiko kunja nawo 
 apa hassan atsimikizira lino lawo lipitiriza kuthandizana lino ntchito za malonda pofuna kukweza chuma cha maiko awiriwa 
 polankhula atalandira lupanga la nkhondo chakwera walonjeza awonetsetsa wathetsa katangale wacheptsa mphamvu za mtsogoleri wa kulimbikitsa umodzi pakati 
 chakwera wapempha mzika za lino zikhale zolimbika ntchito ponena yofupa osakhetsera thukuta yatha
Label: POLITICS

Text:
ndale zosadula chitukuko zikhumudwitsa amalawi ntchito za ulimi wamthirira za greenbelt zidaima kudula ntchito zimene adayambitsa atsogoleri akale lino kukuchititsa amalawi azingosaukirabe ndalama zambiri zimangolowa mmadzi ntchitozo osamalizidwa 
  wa bungwe loonetsetsa chilungamo chikutsatidwa la justice link justine dzonzi adanena lachinayi mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda yemwe adzaimire chipani cha mcp atanena nkofunika mtsogoleri wina amene watenga mpando asamadukize ntchito za chitukuko zimene adayambitsa mtsogoleri amene wachoka pampandowo zili zopindulira amalawi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mapulojekiti boma othandizidwa maiko mabungwe amadilizika zipani zolamula zikasintha mwachitsanzo loto la boma la udf loti umphawi udzakhale utatheratu pofika mchaka cha 2020 lidataidwa chipanicho chitachoka mboma ndiponso ntchito zoti mudzi uliwonse uzitulutsa katundu wakewake ya one village one product ovop zidalowanso pansi udf itachoka mboma 
  chipani cha dpp motsogozedwa bingu wa mutharika adakhazikitsa ntchito ya ulimi wa mthirira ya greenbelt initiative boma la joyce banda chipani chake cha pp sakukambapo kanthu nkhani yolimbikitsa ulimi wakathithi mmadera oyandikira mitsinje nyanja za lino 
  mmalo mwake banda wabwera ntchito zakezake yotukula madera kumidzi ya mudzi transformation yogawa ngombe kwa osauka ya one family one cow 
  zili choncho ntchito ya boma thandizo la ndalama zochokera ku world bank amphawi apeze malo ya kudzigulira malo yalowa pansi pamene bankiyo idamaliza kupereka thandizo mchaka cha 2011 mwa omwe adagula malo pulojekitiwo akubwerera kwawo nayo pulojekiti ya ulimi wamthririra ya smallholder irrigation project ship idafa banki yachitukuko ya african development bank adb itapereka masikimu mthirira atapereka sikimu za ulimiwu kwa eni ake 
  dzonzi wati vuto atsogoleri athu alibe masomphenya pofika zaka zikudzazi malawi adzaoneke mwa wina 
  wati zaka 20 zapitazi dzikoli likadakhala masomphenya likadakhala pena pake zonsezi zikukanika chosowa masomphenya 
  akubweretsa zomwe akufuna zomwenso sizikupitirira tidakabwera ganizo limodzi pofika chaka chakuti tikhale titakwanitsa kufikira pamene takonza pakutha zaka 20 bwezi lino litatukuka nchifukwa chake tikungosaukirabe tatha zaka 50 tili odzilamulira adatero dzonzi 
  dzonzi adati nzovuta kunena lino laononga ndalama zingati kudukiza kwa ntchito za chitukukozi 
  mwa akadaulo za chitukuko jephter mwanza yemwe wa kalondolondo programme adati kusowa umwini ndiko kumalowetsa pansi ntchitozi 
  amaona ntchitozi za boma osati za eni mwachitsanzo akhoza nyumba yopemphereramo okha ndikumaisamalira omwewo amakanika kusamala mijigo milatho yomangidwa boma mabungwe adatero mwanza 
  adati kuyambitsa mapulogalamu kuwaimika zifukwa za ndale kumaonongetsa ndalama za boma ndalama zambiri zimakhala zitalowapo kale 
  pulogalamu ikangoyamba ndiye ndalama zimakhala zikupita choncho kungoimitsa pulogalamuyo nkunyika adatero 
  wa ovop tamia kaluma sulumba adati pofuna kuonetsetsa ntchito za bungweli sizikufa kwa utsogoleri amene mtsogoleri wa lino amakhala wapampando wa bungweli 
  zoonadi ntchito zina zimafa mtsogoleri akasintha tayesetsa ntchito zathu zisafe kwa utsogoleri moti tikunena tili magulu 105 amene angakhale mtsogoleri wa lino amakhala wapampando wa bungweli nchifukwa chake taona atsogoleri atatu 2003 adatero kaluma sulumba 
  malinga banda si kudukiza mapulogalamu cha kwa chipani cholamula 
  nchifukwa chake ndayesetsa ndisataye ntchito zimene adayambitsa bingu wa mutharika zina mwa zili gawo lalikulu lotukulira lino banda adauza abusa amene adakamuyendera 
  polankhula pamsonkhano ku kasungu chakwera ntchito za chitukuko ziyenera kwa amalawi eni ake 
  nzachisoni lino losaukitsitsa mdera lino la africa zili choncho makamaka chodukiza ntchito za chitukuko tiyenera masomphenya podzafika 2020 lathu lidzakhala lili pati adatero chakwera
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mbs ichlimika poteteza miyoyo ya bungwe la malawi bureau of standards lati likudzipereka ntchito zoonetsetsa mdziko muno akudya kugwilitsa ntchito zinthu zoyenera cholinga choti miyoyo yawo idzikhala chitetedzo chabwino zonse 
 wa bungwe li mdziko muno symon mandala wanena ku mangochi pomwe bungweli limazindikilitsa atolankhani ntchito za bungweli 
 ati bungweli likuyesetsa ntchito zake pali kufikira zakudziwabe za momwe bungweli limagwilira ntchitozi 
 kumbari ya madandaulo omwe akhala akupereka ponena bungweli limachedwa kuvomeleza katundu wawo ayambe kupezeka msika mandala zimenezi zimachitika kamba koti anthuwo amalephera zomwe bungweli limafuna klivomeleze
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
apempha makolo achikatolika apitirize kuphunzitsa ana maphunzitso ampingo pamene tchalitchi zatsekedwa makolo mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno awapempha apitirize kuphuzitsa ana ziphuzitso za mpingo pamene mpingo wayimitsa zochitika zake kaamba nthenda ya covid-19 
 wa ofesi yowona za utumiki wa ana akidayosizi ya blantyre matias thawani apereka pempholi pothilirapo ndemanga udindo wa makolo nyengoyi 
 thawani ati makolo akuyenera kukumbukira malumbiro amene anachita tsiku la ubatizo ophunzitsa kuwongolera ana moyo wachikhristu 
 anawa tikudziwa amaphunzitsidwa ku tchalitchi tsopano udindo wa makolo agwire ntchito imeneyi pozindikira tchalitchi yoyambirira anatero thawani 
 ayamikiranso mawailesi mpingo wa katolika radio maria amene akumachita mapologalamu ana katikisimu wa ana mupingo omwe ukuthandiza ana asaiwale maphunzitso mpingo
Label: RELIGION

Text:
maneb ikhutila mayeso sitandade 8 bungwe loyendetsa mayeso la malawi national examinations board maneb lati lakhutira mmene mayeso sitandade 8 ayambira 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc wa bungweli roy hauya adanena lachinayi atayendera malo angapo komwe ophunzira amalembera mayeso kuyambira lachitatu 
  lachitatu hauya adayendera sukulu zina ku blantyre lachinayi adali ku lilongwe 
  takondwa mmene mayeso ayambira nditsimikizire lonse mayeso akuyenda anzathu achitetezo akugwira ntchito yawo ophunzira akulemba momasuka.tikufuna zipitirire chonchi mmene tikhale tikuyamba mayeso mwezi ukubwerawu adatero hauya 
  adavomereza alandira lipoti lochokera mboma la mchinji loti munthu wina amalembera wophunzira wina mayeso 
  pakadalipano tingati talandira mlandu umodzi wa mayesowa.wolembera mnzake mayeso amugwira ku mchinji adatero hauya 
  ophunzira adamaliza mayeso dzulo lachisanu
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
moto buu ku swaziland kochi wa timu ya lino ya malawi flames ernest mtawali wati timu yake yakonzeka kuonetsa zakuda timu ya swaziland yomwe aphane nayo mumpikisano wa africa cup of nations afcon mawa lino somhlolo stadium mumzinda wa lobamba 
  malawi ili mgulu l momwe muli swaziland guinea zimbabwe awa masewero achiwiri flames mumpikisanowu chigonjerreni 2 1 zimbabwe kamuzu stadium 13 june chaka chino panthawiyo kochi adali young chimodzi yemwe adachotsedwa ntchito kaamba ka kugonjaku 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mtawali akuti anyamata ake akuyembekezera kuphophola swaziland timu yomwe mmasewero ake oyamba idakatikita guinea kwawo komwe 
  ndili chikhulupiriro mwa anyamata amene ndawatenga kumwetsa zigoli njira yabwino yoteteza golo lanu kumenyera mpira kutsogolo tikapeze zigoli adatero mmene ankanyamuka mdziko muno lamulungu lapitali kupita ku south africa komwe idalepherana mbombela united 2 2 pamasewero apaubale pokonzekera swaziland 
  malawi yakumanapo swaziland maulendo 18 yapambana katatu kugonja ka 10 kulepherana mphamvu kasanu 
  mumpikisanowu chaka chatha malawi sidachite pamene idakumana matimu akuluakulu mgulu lawo algeria mali ethiopia pamasewero onsewo malawi idangokwanitsa kupeza mapointi 7 itapha mali pakhomo ethiopia kulepherana ethiopia kwawo 
  mtawali akuti timu yomwe nayo ina chiyembekezo chilipo mawa alandira zotsatira zabwino kwa anyamata ake 
  mtawali watenga limbikani mzava stanly sanudi yamikani fodya wonder jeremani john lanjesi pilirani zonda yamikani chester isaac kaliati chimango kaira chawanangwa kaonga chiukepo msowoya muhammad sulumba manase chiyesa robin ngalande robert ngambi john cj banda chikoti chirwa micium mhone gerald phiri jnr richard chipuwa bright munthali 
  amkhalakale joseph kamwendo fischer kondowe esau kanyenda frank banda lucky malata harry nyirenda zicco mkanda atusaye nyondo macdonald harawa charles swini atsala 
  masewero zimbabwe malawi idachinya kudzera mwa john banda amene mawali akhalenso ntchito pakati flames
Label: SPORTS

Text:
waganyu tisaloze chala mtawali sabata yatha zidatigwera junior flames kupunthidwa zambia 2 1 tisabise zambia idasewera mwayi goloboyi wathu apo biii tidakasamba zenizeni 
  ganizo la ernest mtawali lakuti akasinthe zinthu ku zambia tingopemphera mwina chozizwa chikachitike kuona kwathu zikavutirapo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kukonzekera kwathu nkodandaulitsa mpikisano umenewu tikungokhala ku chiwembe pamapeto nkumati takonzeka kukapha zambia 
  timaganiza tionetsa chidwi anyamatawa polingalira imeneyi timu yomwe tidyere mawali 
  timadandaula sitichita ku afcon timu eya tikuyenera kudandaula mpira wathu sitiyambira patali tili osewera amene akumenya flames sadapondemo under-17 20 
  lero tili anawa thandizo palibe mphunzitsi wa zambia hector chilombo adati lawo likupereka thandizo kwambiri kutimu yake akudziwa tsogolo lonse lili mwa achisodzera 
  ndizodziwikiratu pofika zaka zikudzazi zambia idzakhala ikuchita mukaona mmene akuchitira 
  vuto lathu sitithandiza achisodzerawa mwachitsanzo timu ya flames idalonjezedwa k100 000 akapha benin anawa posewera zambia osawalonjeza kanthu 
  flames yakonzeredwa masewero ambiri opimana mphamvu anawa ayi mmalo mwake kumakumana azam tigers mighty wanderers
Label: SPORTS

Text:
kusowa kwa magazi mankhwala ku qech odwala kuchipatala cha queens amakumana zokhoma mavuto akhodzokera pachipatala cha queen elizabeth central hospital qech mumzinda wa blantyre kusowa kwa magazi zipangizo kukuika miyoyo ya odwala pachiswe chosowa chithandizo 
  lolemba lachiwiri pamenetamvaniidaswera pachipatalapa msabatayi idadzionera zokhoma imfa za si nkhani yachilendo pamene odwala angogonekedwa kudikirira tsiku lodzapezeka mankhwala 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc dotolo wina amene tidamupeza mchipatalachi adati vuto lakula pachipatalapa kusowa kwa magazi mankhwala 
  mankhwalawa ndiye sadayambe kusowa magaziwa ndiye avutitsitsa mwina nchifukwa choti ana atsekera sukulu 
  mankhwala alipo ochepa kuyerekeza amene chipatalachi chimalandira adatero dotoloyu 
  mlembi muunduna wa zaumoyo chris kangombe akuti vutoli lilipo lipitirira sipakhala ndalama zomwe undunawu umalandira 
  mndondomeko yachuma ya 2013/2014 timafunikira k28 biliyoni tidalandira k6 biliyoni timafuna mankhwala amitundu yoposa 1 000 ndiye kugula mankhwalawa kumadya ndalama zambiri tangoganizani tikufunikira $ 115 miliyoni pafupifupi k553 biliyoni yogulira ma arv okha ndiye ndalama yomwe timalandira sikukwana adatero kangombe 
  adati mndondomeko ya zachuma ya 2014/15 akufuna k32 biliyoni yogulira mankhwala adakaika ndalamayi iperekedwe yonse 
  naye mneneri wabungwe lotolera magazi la malawi blood transfusion service mbts allen kaombe adati mavuto osowa magazi akhudza zipatala zonse mdziko muno 
  adati kusapereka magazi mokwanira ndiko kwachititsa mavutowa akhudze zipatala mdziko muno 
  tikulephera kutolera magazi amene timawafuna omwe mauniti 80 000 pachaka mmalo mwake tikutolera mayuniti 50 000 tikawerengetsa timayenera kutolera mayuniti 7 000 pamwezi 320 patsiku sizikuchitika tikungotolera 4 200 pamwezi 190 patsiku adatero kaombe 
  kaamba ka mavutowa sizikudabwitsa kumva akumwalira kusowekera pogwira mzipatala maka cha qech chomwe tidayenderako 
  samalani woyanganira odwala amene tidamupeza muwodi ya 4a amasamalira akazi ake amene amachokera mmudzi mwa elema kwa senior chief nthache mboma la mwanza 
  akuti adafika pachipatalapa lachiwiri 29 july mkaziyo atadwalika chifuwa chachikulu kusowa kwa magazi 
  timafika cha mma 2 koloko usiku ku mwanza timanyamuka cha mma 12 koloko matenda atakula chipatala cha mwanza ndicho chatitumiza kuno kumeneko mankhwala magazi palibe adatero mkuluyu 
  29 atafika samalani adauzidwa magazi palibe 
  adati tidasowa kopita adatigoneka tidikirire mpaka atapezeka 30 botolo limodzi lidapezeka litatha adati sapezekanso takhala tikudikira apezeka lero 5 august akuti akatha ndiye angotitulutsa kulibiretu 
  samalani akuti sipakudutsa tsiku maliro osachitika muwodi yawo zomwe zikumupatsa mantha 
  ku mwanza tabwerako awiri anzathuwo amwalira moti patsiku awiri atatu akumwalira adatero 
  sipakhala ndalama zopita ku undunawu ndiye samalani akhala pavuto losasimbika 
  nchifukwa chake tikumema apite akapereke magazi otere athandizidwe adatero kangombe amene akuti mavuto kusowa kwa mankhwala kwasintha poyerekeza mwezi wa december wapitawo 
  naye kaombe sakudziwa tsiku lomwe magazi ayambe kupezeka mzipatalazi kovuta tipeze magazi tikulephera kupeza mlingo omwe timafuna pamwezi mavutowa angathe tsiku lililonse titagwirana manja tipereke magazi mwaunyinji 
  kaombe adati mavutowa akula kwambiri ophunzira amene amapereka magazi kwambiri atsekera 
  malita 85 mwa 100 magazi amene timatolera amachokera kwa achichepere omwe azaka pakati 16 mpaka 25 pamene nambala yotsalayo imachokera kwa akuluakulu azaka 26 mpaka 65 pamene sukulu zatsekera tikuvutika titolere magazi adatero kaombe
Label: HEALTH

Text:
zikhulupiliro zikukolezera milandu yogwililira ku ntchisi zikhulupiliro akuti zimene zikukolezera kuchuluka kwa milandu yogwililira mboma la ntchisi 
 kaponda amawona akhwima wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo richard kaponda wauza radio maria malawi pali omwe amaganiza akagona mwana wachichepere achira ku matenda edzi amatenga zizimba zochitira bizinesi 
 komabe kaponda wati kudzera ntchito yawo yozindikirtsa za kuyipa kwa mchitidwewu milanduyi yatsikirapo mmiyezi itatu yapitayi poyerekeza miyezi yomweyi chaka chatha 
 malinga kaponda bomalo linalandira milandu yogwililira 15 mmiyezi ya january mpaka april 2019 mchaka cha 2020 bomalo lalandira milandu ya mtunduwu yokwana 13
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
nankhumwa walimbikitsa otsatira dpp akhale mtendere wachiwiri kwa president wa chipani cha democratic progressive dpp mchigawo cha kumwera kondwani nankhumwa wapempha otsatira chipanichi alimbikitse bata mtendere pamene ntchito yokopa ikupitilira 
 nankhumwa mutharika anawina kale chisankho nankhumwa anayankhula msonkhano omwe anachititsa ku ndirande mzinda wa blantyre ati chipani chawo chimakhulupilira kufotokozera za chitukuko njira zomwe zingatukule miyoyo ya 
 chisankho tinapanga chaka chatha owina anawina peter mutharika anawina mavoti ambiri khoti linagamula peter mutharika sangachotsedwe mpando kuponyedweso voti anatero nankhumwa 
 apempha atsogoleri zipani zina azikamba zokopera mwamtendere osaliti kulimbikitsa ziwawa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
lingalirani musanathane fodya akatswiri alimi ati la malawi likuyenera kulingalira mozama lisadagonjere khumbo la bungwe la zaumoyo padziko lonse la world health organization who nkhani ya malonda fodya 
  bungwe la who lili kampeni yolimbana osuta fodya zomwe zikutanthauza kampeniyi ikadzatheka mayiko omwe amadalira malonda fodya malawi adzapeze njira zina zopezera chuma 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka lonse likhala likukumbukira tsiku lolimbana osuta fodya 31 may mutu waukulu udzakhala kulingalira mavuto omwe kusuta kumabweretsa ku mtima wa munthu 
  unduna wa zaumoyo wati umagwirizana kwatunthu kampeni yolimbana osuta fodya moti uli kalikiliki kukambirana nthambi zina za boma zimvetsetse ubwino wa kampeniyi 
  unduna sitikuyenda tokha ayi tikuyendera limodzi maiko anzathu mabungwe la who nkhani imeneyi tikugwirizana nayo kwathunthu watero joshua malango mneneri wa undunawu 
  katswiri wa zachuma dalitso kubalasa yemwenso wamkulu wa bungwe lowona za momwe chuma chikuyendera la malawi economic justice network mejn wati pakufunika kulingalira mwakuya potsatira kampeniyi 
  wati kampeniyi idayamba kale fodya akadali nsanamira ya malawi chuma chake maziko amalawi ambiri makamaka mmidzi kotero tsogolo la amalawi lagona zomwe boma lingatsate 
  tikati tibwerere mmbuyo tiona fodya ndiye wakhala akutibweretsera chuma chambiri mbewu yomwe sitingangoti lero lero basi tiyisiye na pankhani ya chuma cha lathu kumeneko nkudzikhweza adatero kubalasa 
  waunikira fodya yekha amabweretsa k25 k100 iliyonse imene boma limapeza munjira zosiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo thandizo lochoka kunja ambiri amapeza chochita fodya 
  padakali tikudziwa 7 mwa 10 aliwonse amagwira ntchito yokhudzana fodya tsono kutaya fodya amenewa angadzagwire mtengo wanji adatero kubalasa 
  wa bungwe loyanganira za ulimi malonda fodya la tobacco control commission tcc kaisi sadala wati la malawi likuyenera kuyangana za malonda afodya kupyola nkhani ya zaumoyo 
  wati mokonda lathu amalawi sitikuyenera kuvomereza zoletsa malonda fodya tikuyenera kumalingalira za mbeu zochita zina zomwe zingamathandizane fodya pobweretsa chuma msika wafodya ukamatsika 
  maloto amenewo ngosagwira ku malawi kuno kunena chilungamo 
  tikuyenera kuyangana malonda fodya nkhani ya umoyo inde tiunikirane za chuma cha lathu zikhala motani adatero sadala 
  wati cholimbitsa mtima nchoti kampeniyi ili mkati zikuoneka malonda fodya akuyendako kuyerekeza momwe zidalili mzaka zingapo zapitazi kusonyeza malawi ikadali chiyembekezo fodya
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
akhritsu eni ake agwirizana ganizo la maepiskopi loyimitsa mapemphero bungwe la akhristu eni ake arkidayosizi ya blantyre lati likugwirizana pempho la maepiskopi mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno loletsa kusonkhana pagulu kumachita mapemphero 
 wapampando wa bungweli joseph kachala omwe anena polankhula radio maria malawi mzinda wa blantyre 
 ati zomwe achita maepiskopiwa zothandiza pochepetsa kufala kwa nthenda ya covid-19 kwa akhristuwa ansembe maka padakalipano pomwe chiwerengero cha opezeka kachilomboka chikuchulukira 
 tinganene nkhaniyi tailandira popanga nkhaniyi panali cholinga chofuna kuteteza moyo wathu ansembe athu anatero kachala 
 mmawu ake mlembi wa bungweli anderson gama alangiza akhristu mpingowu kupewa kunyoza maepiskopiwa kudzera mmasamba mchezo nkhaniyi 
 akhritsu eni ake tiwalimbikitse azipemphera pawokha pamene tili nyengo yosapita ku tchalitchi imeneyi anatero gama 
 apemphanso akhritsu apeze njira zosamalira ansembe nyengoyi poganizira kutseka kwa tchalitchi ndiye anthunso samakhala yopereka mphatso zapaguwa
Label: RELIGION

Text:
akagwira ukayidi kaamba kodyetsa mwana chimbudzi bwalo loyamba la milandu mboma la kasungu lalamula hickson banda zaka 26 zakubadwa akakhale ku ndende kukagwira ntchito ya kalavulagaga kwa zaka kamba kowapeza olakwa mlandu odyetsa chimbuzi mwana omupeza 
 wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo sergeant miracle mkozi waudza radio maria malawi banda adapalamula mulanduwu 22 april mwanayu atakatula nkhaniyi ku polisi pomwe anamangidwa tsiku lomwelo 
 popereka chigamulo chake first grade magistrate damiano banda adati zomwe adachita banda podyetsa mwana chimbudzi zosemphana gawo 240 la malamulo lino choncho akuyenera akagwira ukayidi kwa zaka atengerepo phunziro 
 panali pa22 april pomwe hickson banda zaka 26 anasiyiridwa mwana akazi omwe kuchigayo pobwera anapeza mwanayo wadyesedwa bibi akaziwo anabwera kuzanena ku polisi anater mkozi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
kalikiliki popewa ngozi za madzi pamene nkhani yolosera mvula ili mkamwamkamwa boma lati lili pakalikiliki madzi osefukira amene amasautsa mmadera chaka chino lisakhale vuto la mnanu 
  ambiri mwa omwe amakhudzidwa omwe amakhala mmphepete mwa madzi makamaka mmaboma kuchigwa cha shire chikwawa nsanje chaka chatha kusefukira kwa madzi kudankitsa kudakhudza maboma 18 mdziko muno mpaka mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika adati lino la ngozi zimene zidachititsa mabungwe maiko athandizepo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka malinga wa nthambi yoona ngozi za dzidzidzi bernard sande chomvetsa chisoni nchakuti ngozi zotere zikachitika boma limaononga ndalama za nkhaninkhani kusamala okhudzidwawo kubwezeretsa zinthu zoonongeka 
  chaka chino chokha boma lidati likufunika k215 biliyoni zoti likonzetsere zinthu zomwe zidaonongeka madzi osefukira dzinja lathali pomwe ziweto katundu wawo zidakokoloka 
  zambiri mwa zofunika kukonzedwazo milatho masukulu misewu zipatala zogwiritsa ntchito mmalowa zomwe zidaonongeka 
  sande adati chomvetsa chisoni nchakuti omwe amakhudzidwa kawirikawiri amakakamira kumadzi komwe sikuchedwa kusefukira adati chaka chino boma likufuna onse okhala mmalo oterewa achokeretu mvula isadayambe 
  tayamba kale kulangiza achoke mmadera momwe mumasefukira madzi tionetsetsa onse achoka sitikufuna chaka cha mawa tizidzakambanso nkhani yomweyi adatero sande 
  adati anthuwa amati sangachoke mmalomo makolo adamwalira kuikidwa momwemo malo olima kuweterapo ziweto zawo momwemo 
  malinga t maseya ya mboma la chikwawa amavuta pankhani yamalo amakhulupirira kusiya malo omwe padagona mizimu ya makolo kuli kuwagalukira nchifukwa chake safuna kusamuka 
  adati vuto lina lakuti malo omwe anthuwo amakhala aakulu kutanthauza atati asuntha ndiye komwe angapiteko malo sangakawakwanire potengera pokhala polima pomwe 
  kupatula kukhulupirira pamodzi mizimu ya makolo vuto lina malo okhalapo kulima kumtundako adatero maseya 
  paramount kyungu ya ku karonga adagwirizana sande pankhaniyo adati palibe phindu kutaya moyo chokakamira manda minda mmalo mosuntha kupita kumtunda kudzabwerera mchilimwe

Text:

 wati mfumuyi yamwalira lamulungu 28 july 2019 ku chipatala cha mwayiwathu mzinda wa blantyre atadwala kwa yaitali 
 mwambo woyika mmanda thjupi la malemu ngolongoliwauchitika lachitatu 31 july 2019 ku likulu la ufumuwu ku mtundawosema mboma la thyolo kuyambira ya 12 koloko masana 
 thupi la malemu paramount chief ngolongoliwa lili bokosi padakali mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika walamula mwambowu udzakhale mwambo wa boma udzalandire ulemu wa asilikali nkhondo lino malinga mughogho mtsogoleri wa linoyu akakhala nawo mwambowu

Text:
sukulu za katolika zikhale zizindikiro ofesi yowona za maphunziro dayosizi ya mangochi ya mpingo wa katolika yati koyenera sukulu zake zikhale zizindikiro maka nkhani ya utsogoleri 
 imodzi mwa sukulu za mpingo wa katolika wa ofesiyi felix masamba anena pamene ofesi yawo mogwirizana mafumu makomiti sukulu ansembe akupitiliza kupeza njira zothana kusamvana komwe kukumakhalapo kayendetsedwe ka sukuluzi pamene ophunzira zipembedzo zina akhala akufuna kumabweretsa malamulo zipembedzo zawo msukuluzi 
 masamba ati mwa malamulowa kuyika atsogoleri mpingowu mmakomiti sukuluzi zikwangwani zolembedwa dzina la sukuluzi padzikhala osonyeza sukuluzi zachikatolika 
 nkhani ya school identity tikunena sukulu zikuyenera zizikhala zizindikiro zizidziwika sukulu za chikatolika pazilembedwanso pompo mangochi diocese anatero masamba 
 atinso zikakhala sukulu za chikatolika azidziwira chikwangwani polemba oti catholic school mphunzitsi wamkulu otsatira azikhala achikatolika okha okha

Text:
yas yati boma lifufuze ndalama zomwe zawonongedwa ku escom mabungwe national anti corruption alliance kudzanso la youth and society yas apempha mtsogoleri wa lino professor arthur peter muntharika achotse thom mpinganjira udindo wa wapampando wa bungwe la escom 
 boma lifufuze za nkhaniyi kajoloweka mabungwewa anena msonkhano wa atolankhani mzinda wa mzuzu 
 polankhulapo mwa akulu akulu ku bungwe la yas charles kajoloweka mhango afotokozera atolankhaniwa zina mwa zikuluzikulu zomwe zikupezeka lipoti lomwe boma lidatulutsa mchaka cha 2019 lomwe mwazina linafotokoza momwe bungweli likugwilira ntchito zake 
 mhango ati ndizomvetsa chisoni kufikira lipotili likusonyeza ndalama pafupifupi 8 billion kwacha zidasakazidwa ku bungweli palibe yemwe wamangidwa zomwe ati zinthu zokolezera woononga chuma cha boma 
 tithokoze boma kaamba ka kafukufuku wawo ku bungwe la escom zomwe zatiululira mmene ndalama zakhala zikuonongedwera ku bungweli chomwe choti athom mpinganjira asakhalenso udondo wa wapampando wa bungweli kaamba koti mulandu afufuzidwenso anatero mhango 
 mwazina apempha president wa lino achotse mpinganjira udindowu pofuna bungweli liziyendetsedwa omwe okhulupirika maka ntchito za bungweli ziyambe kuyendanso
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
aphungu apane boma posakaza chuma pamene aphungu ku nyumba ya malamulo ayambe kukumana 8 wa bungwe loona zachilungamo pachuma la malawi economics justice network mejn wa bungwe loona ufulu wa ogula la cunsumers association of malawi cama andale ati aphungu akuyenera akapane boma potsotsomola misonkho ya amalawi mmiyezi isanu yokha 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc ati amalawi akufuna amvetsere mwachidwi momwe boma lakombezera misonkhoyo pomwe eni ake pamoto ndikukwera mitengo kwa zinthu komwe kudadza ndikugwa kwa ndalama ya kwacha zina za boma 
  mawuwa akudza pomwe kwadziwika mmaunduna ambiri agugudiza kale ndalama zomwe adapatsidwa mndondomeko ya zachuma ya 2012/2013 yomwe idzathe 30 juni chaka chino 
  boma lakhala likunena zinthu zina zasokonekera cha kugwa mphamvu kwa ndalama ya kwacha akhala akunena zikafotokozeredwa ku nyumba ya malamulo pomwe aphungu akumane 
  mbali zounikirazi wa mejn dalitso kubalasa yemwe adali nduna yazachuma mboma la udf friday jumbe mneneri wa komiti ya zachuma mchipani cha mcp ku nyumba ya malamulo joseph njobvuyalema ati boma lisatenge kugwa kwa kwacha chophererera bomali ndilo lidagwetsa kwacha kusonyeza bwezi atapeza moponda 
  kubalasa wati bungwe lake likuchitanso kafukufuku wa momwe bomali lagwiritsira misonkho ya mnthawi imeneyi 
  wati malipoti omwe akhala akumveka momwe bomali lagwiritsira misonkho ya zikusonyeza ndondomekoyi boma lasakaza kagwiritsiridwe ka ndalama 
  zomwe tikupeza nkuti bomali laonjeza kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka misonkho ya amalawi malipoti okhudza kulira kwa ndondomeko ya zipangizo zotsika mtengo mavuto kuchipatala momwe ndalama zikuyendera kubomako zikusonyeza mwambiri mwaipa 
  mnkhumano umenewu ukuyenera kupereka chiyembekezo kwa ikuchitika pomwe akulira ndikukwera mtengo kwa zinthu aphungu apane boma pakusagwiritsira ntchito ndalama mmaunduna adatero kubalasa 
  wa bungwe la cama john kapito wati kunyumbako kusakangokhala kupana bomali kukhazikitsa malamulo oti boma likasakaza misonkho padzikhala chilango 
  adati boma likuyenera loona mtima pofotokozera amalawi momwe lagwiritsira ndalama za mndondomeko yazachumayi 
  zinthu zayipa kuchipatala sikuli misawu yakumbika mosewerera bawo kusukulunso kwavuta pomwe ndalama zagwira ntchito 
  pakuyenera chilango chokhwima ku boma lachita motere zingakonzedwe aphunguwa adatero kapito yemwe adati bungwe lawo likuyembekeza momwe ku nyumbayo zikakhalire 
  jumbe yemwenso mtsogoleri wa chipani cha new labour wati lamulo la nyumba ya malamulo ndikuunikira momwe ndondomekoyi yayendera ndiye aphungu akayemebekezere boma lifotokoze 
  nduna zokhudzidwa zikuyenera kukafotokoza chomwe chachitika zifike pamenepa adatero jumbe 
  njobvuyalema adati chipani cha mcp chakonzeka kukapana boma adati afunsa lipoti ku unduna wa zachuma momwe zinthu zayendera 
  tikumva pafupifupi unduna uliwonse wagwiritsira ntchito ndalama mosakaza tikafunsa adatero njobvuyalema 
  mwachitsanzo ku nyumba ya chifumu kudalowa k1.8 biliyoni agwiritsire ntchito pofika disembala chaka chatha nkuti ndalama zoposa k2.6 biliyoni zitaphwasulidwa kale 
  mmaulendo mtsogoleri wa lino omuyandikira kudaperekedwa k1.24 biliyoni ndalamayo idatha pakutha miyezi isanu nkuti ndalama zoposa k2.3 biliyoni zitagwiritsidwa ntchito 
  padakali sukulu zina za ukachenjede zaboma zikutseka zipata zake zina zili pachiopsezo chotsatira choti boma likuuma manja kupereka thandizo lokwanira ndalama zomwe zidatumizidwa msukulumo zatha kuli ngongole ya k1.6 biliyoni 
  sukulu ya ukachenjede ya mzuzu university mzuni yatumiza kumudzi ophunzira onse nayo sukulu ya madotolo ya college of medicine idatseka zipata zake 
  ku chancellor college chanco kudatumizidwa k4.808 biliyoni mndondomeko yazachuma kufika lero ndalamayo idatha kuli ngongole ya k879 miliyoni 
  ku kamuzu collage of nursing kudapita k1.6 biliyoni kufika ndalamayo yatha kale kuli ngongole ya k191.3 miliyoni 
  kuchipatala nako kuli moto k4.5 biliyoni ndiyo idapita agulire mankhwala mzipatala mulibe mankhwala pamoto kufika lero k2.1 biliyoni yatha 
  ku ndondomeko yazipangizo zotsika mtengo nayo yakungana mavuto alimi ambiri akudandaula sadagule feteleza wotsika mtengo undunawo udalandira k40.6 biliyoni igulire matani 150 000 afetelezayo zidapereka chiyembekezo kwa alimi nambala ya opindula idakwera kuchoka 1.4 kufika 1.5 miliyoni kulira sikukutha 
  tidayesetsa kulankhula nduna ya zachuma ken lipenga yemwe samayankha foni yake 
  mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda pomwe amagwetsa mphamvu ya kwacha adauza amalawi timange malamba ponena mavuto afika pamwana wakana phala 
  msonkhano wa aphunguwu ndiwokaunguza momwe ndondomeko ya zachuma ya 2012/2013 yayendera
Label: POLITICS

Text:

  mdera lino muli mavuto misewu za umoyo achinyamata ambiri sakupita kusukulu zaulimi sizikuyenda chonsecho mtsinje wa shire mitsinje ina ili yoti achinyamata aziopa ndale idatha adatero 
  pomulandira nduna ya za mdziko uladi mussa adati ichi chitsanzo chabwino malamulo akumulola kutero 
  malamulo oyendetsera lino amaneneratu ofuna kuimira uphungu akhale wa zaka 21 kuposa apo iyeyu adakwanitsa zakazo tili chikhulupiriro chonse akwanitsa ntchito waiyambayo adatero mussa

Text:
sukulu ya mkombaphala ikufewetsa ntchito ya aphunzitsi wolemba sylvster kasitomu kutumiza ana ku sukulu za mkombapahala ati kukuchepetsa ntchito ya aphunzitsi pomwe apita ku sukulu za primary 
 mlangizi wa aphunzitsi amsukulu za primary zone ya chimwala mboma la mangochi nancy ndazamo omwe anena powuza mtolankhani wathu ati khumbo lawo sukulu iliyonse ya pulaimale ikhale sukulu ya mkombaphala komwe ana angaphunzireko mmene angulumikizirane aphunzitsi zomwe zikuchititsa anawa akapita ku primary azikachita 
 mwazina ndazamo apempha makolo azipititsa ana ku sukulu za mkomba phala azakhale ana anzeru pomwe apita ku primary 
 ana omwe akuchokera ku sukulu za mkombaphala akuthandiza kwambiri tchito yophunzitsa maka aphunzitsi ku primale kaamba koti amakhala pamene akukayamba sukulu akudziwa kupinda chilembo zomwe zimachititsa aphunzitsiwa asakhale ntchito yomudziwitsa kugwira kwa pensulo anatero ndazamo malinga wa zamaphunziroyu madera ambiri mdziko muno amkumana vuto la kusowa kwa sukulu za mkomba phala kaamba kosowa thandizo loti athe kusamalira anawa
