Text:
adzudzula jb zomanga mfumu nkhata nzodabwitsa mphunzitsi wa za malamulo kusukulu yaukachenjede ya chancellor college mwiza nkhata wati zodabwitsa mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda walamula apolisi anjate t chimombo ya ku nsanje 
  nkhata wati pulezidenti komanda wa asilikali apolisi sakuyenera kutero kunjata munthu kumafunika kufufuzidwa kaye kunjatako kusadachitike 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc banda lachiwiri adalamula apolisi anjate chimombo pomuganizira adasowetsa chigayo chomwe chidaperekedwa 2008 chithandize olumala 
  ndikulamula wachiwiri kwa pulezidenti khumbo kachali alowererepo pankhaniyi mpaka wokhudzidwayo atamangidwa adatero banda 
  nkhata akuti pali zambiri zomwe banda akadachita asadalankhule akewo 
  kuli mmanja mwa apolisi atha kuuza wa apolisi afufuze nkhaniyo chilichonse kufika polamula chonchi zachilendo 
  apolisi amayamba afufuza kaye asadanjate munthu tsono akalamula amangidwe kodi amumanga wina walamula apeza zifukwa zomumangirazo adatero nkhata 
  mneneri wapolisi ya nsanje samson balakasi lachinayi adati mfumuyo siidanjatidwe pofika lachisanu madzulo tikhala titafika pena pake nkhaniyi adalonjeza balakasi 
  mfumuyi yomwe dzina lenileni stanford ntukula idaimitsidwa ntchito yake chaka chatha ifufuzidwe za malipoti oti amachitira nkhanza ake 
  mderalo adakamangala kupolisi sabata yatha afufuze za chigayocho
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:
tsiku lokumbukira usodzi chaka chino zangokumanizana ndendende lero 21 november tsiku loganizira nsomba ntchito za usodzi padziko la pansi world fisheries day bungwe la united nations lidakhazikitsa tsikuli pokhudzidwa kuchepa kwa nsomba kusakazika kwa zachilengedwe zammadzi padziko lonse 
  patsikuli asodzi padziko lonse amakonza zochitika zosiyanasiyana zozindikiritsa kufunika kwa nsomba pamiyoyo chitukuko cha maiko kusamalira zachilengedwe zammphepete mwa nyanja 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kwathu kuno tsikuli lidakumbukiridwa koyamba chaka chathachi pamwambo udachitikira mboma la nkhata bay mwambowo udakonzedwa bungwe la ripple africa 
  miyoyo ya oposa 400 000 amene amadalira usodzi paumoyo wawo ili chiopsezo kaamba kochepa kwa nsomba mnyanja mmitsinje ya lino chimene chikuchitika pakalipano nchakuti pamene mitundu ya nsomba zofunika kwambiri chambo kampango utaka zikusowa mpamene bonya akuchulukirachulukirabe 
  mtsogolo muno tidzafotokozera chiyani zinthu zikubwerera chammbuyo chonchi pakalipano nkofunika kulimbikitsa njira zimene zikutsatidwa poteteza nsomba ambiri asadzasowe pogwira zisanatheretu 
  usakhale udindo wa boma lokha mafumu asodzi eni ake wamba mabungwe ripple africa usaid pact world fish centre sukulu zaukachenjede kugwirana manja kumaimba nyimbo imodzi poteteza nsomba nyanja zonse za mdziko muno zimayerekezedwa zimatulutsa nsomba zoposera 50 000 tonnes pachaka zomwe nzochepa kwambiri kukwanitsa kudyetsera wa amalawi motero sizodabwitsa nsomba zina zimalowa mdziko muno kumaiko 
  kaamba ka kuchepa kwa nsomba munthu akumuyerekeza akumadya makilogalamu anayi okha mmalo mwa makilogalamu 14 nsomba pachaka zikupereka chithunzithunzi nsomba zochepa zimene zikumaphedwa mnyanja mmitsinje ya lino motero nkofunika kulimbikitsa njira zobwezeretsanso chiwerengero cha nsomba kutseka kwa nyanja kuyambitsa ulimi woweta nsomba mmaiwe
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
njala ikhaulitsa malawi ma admarc kuli gwagwagwa zafika pena wina samwalira njala ungokhala mwayi chabe zinthu zaipa mdziko muno moti akugona kumimba kuli pululu 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika akunenetsa palibe amene amwalire njala sipachitika china chake mmisika ya admarc mdziko muno amwalira nayo 
  mzere wa ofuna kugula chimanga ku admarc ulendo wa tamvani mmaboma chigawo cha kummwera pakati kumpoto wapeza madera patha miyezi ingapo chimanga chikusowa mmisika ya admarc 
  ma admarc chikomwe ngwerero nasawa mayaka sunuzi jenala zaone buleya mboma la zomba kwa t mbiza akuti atha miyezi iwiri kulibe chimanga 
  gulupu belo wati malinga kusowa kwa chimangacho amagonera deya amene amagula pamtengo wa k240 kilogalamu 
  panopa amene wapeza gaga munthu chakudya chasowa moti ndatumiza 8 kuchipatala amene amaonetsa zizindikiro zachilendo chosadya adatero belo 
  ku mwanza malinga t kanduku miyezi iwiri yatha chimanga kulibe wati poyamba amagonera mango lero ndiye kolowera kwasowa 
  nkhani yosabisa njala yavuta kuno chimanga chatenga chisadafike ku admarc adatero kanduku 
  ku balaka patha miyezi iwiri chimanga chisadafike admarc ya phalula pamene kwa sosola ndiye patha mwezi 
  sabata yatha tidapeza ammudzimo akupita kukadandaula kwa dc wa bomalo akhala akuuzidwa chimanga chibwera kuli chuuu 
  admarc ya misuku ku chitipa ikumalandira chimanga mwezi ulionse kamodzi chimangacho chikuchokera kubungwe la world vision admarc ya chikwera mbomalo ilibiletu chimanga pamene admarc ya paboma yangolandira kumene matumba 300 mabanja 2 000 ndiwo amadalira admarc ya pabomayo ikugulitsa makilogalamu osaposa 15 kwa 
  admarc ya karonga boma ili chimanga pamene timafikapo lachiwiri msabatayi nkuti pali mnzere wotalika mamita 280 akumagona pomwepo agule chimanga 
  ma admarc boma la nkhata bay akuti akumalandira chimanga pafupipafupi chikumatha tsiku lomwelo chikumafika chochepa kuyerekeza amene akufuna chakudyacho 
  wa bungwe la admarc foster mulumbe wati chiyambireni september chaka chatha agulitsa matani 26 000 chimanga watinso kufika admarc yatsala matani ochepa 
  chimanga chidakalipo chochepera tikupitiriza kupereka mmisika yathu chimanga chatha mmisika yathu kutidziwitsa msanga titumize china adatero mulumbe 
  miyezi ingapo yapitayo boma lidagula matani 30 000 chimanga mdziko la zambia 
  woyendetsa ntchito wamkulu unduna wa malimidwe bright kumwembe wati chimanga chonsecho chidapita kumisika ya admarc 
  chimanga chonsecho chidafika mdziko muno chili mmisika ya admarc likulu losamala chakudya la national food reserve ageency nfra likugula chimanga china mdziko momwe muno adetro kumwembe 
  nkhani ya njala si yachilendonso mdziko muno bungwe la world food programme wfp lati lakwanitsa kufikira 1.6 miliyoni mmaboma 15 amene pamoto wa njala 
  wfp lolemba lidatulutsanso lipoti lina lomwe limati 14 miliyoni pachiopsezo chokukutika njala kummawa kwa africa 
  la malawi limodzi mwa maiko okhudzidwa cha mavuto kusowa kwa mvula
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
chifunga za boma la fedulo nkhungu yowirira yakuta tsogolo la boma la fedulo federalism lomwe magulu mdziko muno akufuna pamene sakugwirizana maganizo otero 
  maganizo boma la fedulo adabwera choti akuganiza pali tsankho kagawidwe ka maudindo chitukuko mdziko lino 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc jessie kabwila mbusa peter mulomole yemwe mneneri wa bungwe la chipembezo la public affairs committee pac lomwe lidasankhidwa boma limve maganizo wanthu za boma la fedulo wati akusiyanabe maganizo pankhaniyi chomwe chikusonyeza ambiri sakudziwabe tanthauzo la boma la fedulo adati ichi chipsinjo ku bungwe la pac 
  takhala tikugwira ntchito yofufuza maganizo nkhaniyi kuyambira mwezi wa november chaka chatha mpaka tsogolo lenileni silikuwoneka tikulandira maganizo osiyanasiyana adatero mulomole 
  adati akumanapo magulu osiyanasiyana mchigawo cha pakati komwe adamva maganizo osiyanasiyana padakali mchigawo cha kumpoto komwenso magulu osiyanasiyana akupereka maganizo 
  tikukumana mafumu mipingo mabungwe andale amabizinesi ogwira ntchito mboma mmakampani akatswiri mmagawo osiyanasiyana zandale zachuma zamalamulo amenewa akutiwuza maganizo mosaopa adatero mbusa mulomole 
  mneneriyu adati asayembekezere zotsatira msanga nkhaniyi ndiyokhudza lonse choncho nkofunika bungweli litolere maganizo mofatsa nkupeza chenicheni chomwe akufuna 
  mulomole wakana mphekesera zoti boma ndilo likupereka ndalama zopangitsira misonkhanoyi 
  adati mbali imodzi yokhudzidwa nkhaniyi boma likadapereka ndalama kubungwe la pac zoti ligwirire ntchitoyi zotsatira zake sizikadapereka tanthauzo 
  bungwe loyima palokha sitikutenga mbali ili yonse nkhaniyi ntchito yathu ndiyongofufuza zomwe akufuna choncho sitikuyenera kulandira ndalama zogwirira ntchitoyi kuchoka ku mbali ili yonse yokhudzidwa adatero mulomole 
  adapitiriza kunena bungwe lawo pamodzi bungwe la chi katolika lowona za chilungamo la catholic commission for justice and peace ccjp akugwira ntchitoyi thandizo lochokera ku bungwe la united nations development programme undp 
  nkhani ya fedulo idadzetsa mtsutso waukulu kuyambira miyezi ya august september chaka chatha pamene mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika adasankha nduna zake zomwe zambiri zidachokera mchigawo cha kummwera 
  zipani zotsutsa boma magulu makamaka mchigawo cha kumpoto pakati adati kuli dzikoli litagawidwa kutengera zigawo cholinga choti chigawo chiri chonse chidzidzipangira chokha ndondomeko za chitukuko 
  phungu wa dera la hora mboma la mzimba christopher ngwira wa dera la kuvuma mbomalo harry mkandawire omwe chipani cha peoples party pp mwa omwe adayambitsa kulimbikitsa maganizo boma la fedulo 
  chipani cha malawi congress party mcp nachonso chidagwirizana maganizo oyambitsa boma la fedulo mneneri wa chipanichi jessie kabwila adati boma la fedulo lidzapangitsa madera onse liko atukuke 
  kafukufuku yemwe tamvani adapanga adasonyeza aphungu ambiri aku nyumba ya malamulo sakugwirizana maganizo kamba koti atha kugawa 
  boma lidati apatsidwe mwayi wonena zakukhosi kwawo akufuna boma la fedulo ayi 
  boma silikufuna kupondereza maganizo wanthu nkhani ya boma la fedulo ufulu opereka maganizo ake zichitike poganizira udindo omwe munthu nawo adatero kondwani nankhumwa omwe mneneri wa boma 
  pogwirizana mulomole nankhumwa adati boma sililowelera ntchito yomwe bungwe la pac likuchita yophunzitsa kufufuza maganizo za boma la fedulo 
  nankhumwa adatinso boma silidaperekeo ntchitoyi mmanja mwa bungwe nthambi ili yonse lidangotsegula chitseko kwa mabungwe omwe angakwanitse kuphunzitsa adziwe ubwino kuyipa kwa boma la fedulo 
  bomatu silidakane kuvomereza boma la fedulo apereke maganizo aphunzitsidwe mokwanira ichi tidalekera mabungwe omwe angakwanitse agwire ntchitoyi ndalama zawo adatero nankhumwa 
  ngwira adati akukaika boma lili chidwi nkhani imeneyi 
  tawonapo nkhani zikuluzikulu zikufera mmazira komiti yoona nkhanizi itakhazikitsidwa kukadakhala boma liri chidwi likadapereka chithandizo choti omwe akugwira ntchitoyi agwiritse adatero ngwira 
  polankhula tamvani katswiri wa zandale ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college blessings chinsinga adachenjeza nkhani ya boma la fedulo siyofunika kupupuluma 
  chinsinga adati nkhaniyi ndiyofunika iyende mundondomeko zingapo isadafike pokhazikitsidwa choncho mpofunika zinthu zidzayenda motani bomalo likadzavomerezedwa 
  choyamba akufunika kuphunzitsidwa za tanthauzo la boma la fedulo cholinga choti apereke maganizo pachinthu chomwe akuchidziwa zikatero avomereza pakuyenera voti ya liferendamu 
  pofika popangitsa chisankho cha liferendamu palinso zofunika zingapo mmene chuma chizigawidwira mmene malamulo aziyendera malamulo amodzi lonse chigawo chiri chonse chikhale malamulo ake zomwe sizapafupi adatero chinsinga

Text:
atsopano alowa dpp ku mangochi chipani cha democratic progressive dpp chati chikukula mchigawo chakumvuma kaamba ka zitukuko zomwe chikuchita mchigawochi 
 gavanala wa chipanichi mchigawo chakumvuma kwa lino julius paipi wanena lolemba msonkhano womwe anachititsa sukulu ya pulaimale ya namalaka mdera la lutende mboma la mangochi komwe amalandira mamembala atsopano mderalo ochoka ku chipani cha peoples kulowa mchipani cha dpp 
  zimenezi zikutanthauza akukhutitsidwa ulamuliro wa chipani cha dpp cha zitukuko zomwe chikuchita mdziko muno onyadira kwambiri 
 kunatsala dera lomwe pp inali mphamvu ndiye dera lake limeneli zimenezi zikutanthauza tayimaliza mangochi yonse ya dpp basi anatero paipi 
 wati kulowa kwa mchipanichi kukusonyeza chikhulupiliro chomwe nacho mwa chipanichi malinga ntchito za chitukuko zomwe chikugwira 
 khwimbi la msonkhanowo polankhulapo yemwe wapampando wa chipani cha peoples mdera la mangochi lutende yatima william achita atawona deralo likutsalira nkhani za chitukuko kaamba kosankha aphungu mbali yotsutsa boma 
 amene anditsatira oposa 7000 tachita zimenezi dera lathu likutsalira kwambiri chitukuko ndiye tawona bola tithawire ku mbali ya boma dera lathu litukuke msanga kusiyana kumbuyo kwa otsutsa anatero william

Text:
kafukufuku wa chamba watha zotsatira za kafukufuku wa ulimi wa chamba zomwe amalawi akhala akudikira zatuluka mlembi wa unduna wa zamalimidwe mthilira chitukuko cha madzi gray nyandule phiri wati zotsatirazi akuzisunga mwachisinsi 
  phiri wati zotsatirazi zomwe kafukufuku watha zaka ziyamba zapita ku ofesi ya presidenti nduna zake opc akaziunike zisadaulutsidwe kwa amalawi 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kafukufukuyu adatenga zaka ku chitedze ku salima zotsatira zake zatuluka tsopano tikudikira akaziunike ku opc kenako tidzazitengere ku nyumba ya malamulo adatero nyandule phiri 
  phungu wa dera la kumpoto kwa ntchisi boniface kadzamira ndiye adabweretsa nkhani yololeza kulima chamba mnyumba ya malamulo zaka zapitazo aphungu adavomereza nkhaniyi atakambirana 
  akadaulo osiyanasiyana akhala akuthirira ndemanga za kufunika kothamangitsa kafukufukuyu la malawi liyambe kulima nkugulitsa chamba chomwe akuti chikhoza chuma cha lino 
  katswiri wina wa bizinesi yokhudza malonda chamba wa ku canada wa green quest pharmaceuticals adati chamba chili mtengo wabwino pamsika wa maiko chikhoza kubweretsa ndalama zambiri mdziko 
  chamba chomwe akadaulowa akulimbikitsa chomwe amagwiritsa ntchito mmafakitale popanga zinthu zosiyanasiyana mankhwala akatswiri amati mphamvu zake nzochepa poyerekeza chamba chosuta chija chimazunguza bongo 
  polankhula tamvani mlembi wa yoona za mbewu zogwiritsidwa ntchito mmafakitale industry crops association ica hellen chabunya adati boma likuyenera chidwi kafukufuku wa ulimi wa chamba lino litukuke 
  chongofunika apa nkuwonetsetsa tapanga malamulo ogwira okhudza kayendetsedwe ka ulimi malonda chambachi zina mwa nkuwonetsetsa taunikaso malamulo okhudza mbeu zimenezi adatero chabunya

Text:

   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu malinga mneneri wapolisi ya ntchisi gladson mbumpha wogamula young ngoma adapeza nakwawa nyalapu dzina lenileni fraser vesiyano yolakwa pamlandu woti idapusitsa ozingwa mmudzi mwa chiwere iwathandiza kugula feteleza ku admarc ya mmudzi mwake

  adamata phula anthuwo njira zomwe angachite athe kuwagulira fetelezayo pambuyo pake adayamba njomba 
  anthuwo adali makuponi zikuoneka mmudzi mwawo admarc yomwe amadalira kudalibe feteleza ndiye mfumuyo itamva idaona mwayi okhupukira nkuuza anthuwo iwathandiza adatero mbumpha 
  adati mfumuyi idauza anthuwo asonkhanitse makuponi asonkhe ndalama zomwe zidakwana k148 500 nkumupatsa adagwirizana adzabwere tsiku lotsatilalo kudzatenga fetereza wawo

Text:
udf ibalalika ku nyumba ya malamulo mpungwepungwe udabuka nyumba ya malamulo yomwe idatsegulidwa lolemba pomwe aphungu chipani cha united democratic front udf adaonetsa kusamvana pankhani yonkhudza mbali imene azikhala munyumbayi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc pomwe msonkhano wa aphunguwo umayamba aphungu udf adakhala mbali yotsutsa mawa lake adakhamukira mbali ya boma 
  lachitatu pomwe tinkalemba nkhaniyi nkuti mlembi wamkulu wa chipanichi kandi padambo atatsindika mbali yokhazikika yomwe aphungu azikhala siinadziwike akuluakulu achipanichi akadali mkati mokambirana 
  tikadakambirana za nkhaniyi ndiye sindinganene aphungu athu azikhala mbali iti mpaka zopingapinga zonse zitatha adatero padambo 
  mpungwepungwewu udayamba nyumbayi isanatsegulidwe pomwe komiti yakale ya chipanichi idalemba kalata kwa sipikala wa nyumbayi henry chimunthu banda kupempha aphungu apatsidwe malo mbali yotsutsa 
  ganizoli lidasinthidwa komiti yatsopano yachipanichi yomwe idalemba kalata ina kwa sipikalayu kupempha aphungu abwerere kumbali ya boma tsiku lotsegulira nyumbayi lolemba wokhazikitsa bata udf clement chiwaya adalemba kalata ina yopempha sipikala aphungu onse achipanicho apite mbali yotsutsa 
  lachiwiri aphungu udf anachedwa kulowa mnyumbayi pobwera chiwaya anabweretsa kalata ina kwa sipikala yomwe imapemphanso aphungu udf abwerere mbali ya boma 
  sipikala wa nyumbayi henry chimunthu banda adatsimikiza adalandiradi makalata osiyanasiyana ku chipanichi okhudza mbali yomwe aphungu ake azikhala mnyumbayi 
  lero lomwe ndalandira kalata ina ku chipanichi ganizo lawo loyamba lija lasintha akufuna kubwerera kumbali ya boma adatero banda atangolandira kalata yachitatu yokhudza nkhaniyi mnyumbayi 
  mpungwepungwewu uli mkati aphungu 12 omwe adachoka muchipani cha democratic progressive party dpp kulowa chipani cha peoples pp adalengeza abwerera mchipani chawo chakale 
  nayenso phungu wa dera la kumadzulo ku mchinji theresa mwale walengeza wachoka kumbali ya boma padakali phungu oima payekha aphunguwa akana kunena zifukwa zomwe akuchokela chipani cha pp 
  nyumbayo ikuyembekezera kukambirana nkhani yokhudza chisankho cha magawo atatu chomwe chikuyembekezeka 2014
Label: POLITICS

Text:
wa ya chisoni agwidwa ziwalo abambo awiri omwe amagwira ntchito yachisoni kuchipatala cha kamuzu central kch akuzengedwa mlandu wodula maliseche mtembo wa munthu wamwamuna omwe unali mnyumbayo poyembekezera abale ake adzautenge 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mneneri wa polisi ya lilongwe ramsy mushani watsimikiza za nkhaniyi ponena aganiziridwawa lufeyo mphimbi wa zaka 54 samalani jabu wa zaka 58 adadula ziwalozo atawauza pali msika wa k8 miliyoni wa ziwalo za munthu wamwamuna 
  mushani wati omwe akuwaganizira adapeza msikawo sebita mwale wa zaka 27 eric mwandira wa zaka 34 adalonjeza ogwira ntchito yachisoniwo malonda akatheka adzawapatsa theka la ndalamazo 
  mushani wati apolisi adagwira mwale mwandira pamalo omwetsera mafuta galimoto kaunda pamsewu wopita ku mchinji atatsinidwa khutu awiriwo adali maliseche munthu wamwamuna omwe amagulitsa 
  atafunsidwa za ziwalozo adaulula adachita kupatsidwa abambo awiri mphimbi jabu omwe amagwira ntchito yachisoni ku kch onse anayiwa adavomera adatenga nawo gawo pankhaniyi adatero mushani 
  adati mwandira adapita ya chisoniyo kukakumana mphimbi yemwe mnzake wakalekale kukakambirana za nkhaniyo anthuwo adakambiranadi muofesi ya jabu nkumvana 
  atagwirizana za malipiro mphimbi jabu adalowa mchipinda chosungiramo mitembo momwe adatulukamo malisechewo nkuwapereka kwa mwandira yemwe adatengana mwale akagulitse adatsina khutu apolisi msanga adatero mushani 
  mwale mwandira akuwazenga mlandu wopezeka ziwalo za munthu zomwe zitsutsana ndime 16 yokhudzana thupi la munthu mmalamulo lino pomwe mphimbi jabu akuyankha mlandu wodula ziwalo za munthu wakufa kutsutsana ndime 18 ndinso wopereka ziwalozo zitsatsidwe malonda kutsutsana ndime 16 gawo b la malamulo okhudza za thupi la munthu 
  bwalo la milandu ku lilongwe lachiwiri lapitali lidakana kutulutsa anayiwa pabelo ati likuopa akhoza kuthawa 
  pogamula pempho la owayimira anayiwo pamlanduwo alemekezeke mando chris tukula apatsidwe belo woweluza milandu kubwaloli magisitiriti patrick chirwa adati kupatsa belo anthuwo nkovuta mlandu wawowo woopsa 
  ndili mantha kwambiri paganizo lopatsa anthuwa belo pali chiopsezo chakuti chilungamo chikhoza kusokonezeka chikhulupiriro chomwe nacho mubwalo lino chikhoza kuonongeka adatero chirwa

Text:
ndale zachibwana zalowa ku mcp masapota mcp sakudziwabe odzawatsogolera kadaulo wa ndale kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college blessings chinsinga wati chipani cha malawi congress party mcp chalowa chibwana sichikudziwa momwe chingaongolere ndale mdziko muno

  chinsinga adati chipanichi chikupereka unthenga osiyanasiyana okhudza tsogolo lake kwa amalawi zomwe zikusonyeza atsogoleri ake alibe mphamvu zowongolera kayendetsedwe kachipani

  adatinso sabata yomweyo tembo adauza nyuzipepala adadzipereka kutsika mndandanda wa ofuna kudzapikisana nawo pampandowo komitiyi yakana palibe yemwe adadzipereka kutsika pamndandandawo

  mwa ofuna mpandowu mchipanichi felix jumbe yemwe adali wa bungwe la alimi la farmers union of malawi fum adati amkhalakale mchipanichi akupanga ndale zapansipansi pofuna kuipitsa anzawo

  okha adanena amene akufuna kudzapikisana nawo akuyenera kusonkha ndalama ndiye apa chokanira ndalama zina ndikumalandira zina chiyani chofunika apa chipanichi chikuyenera kumapanga fundo zolimbitsa chipani adatero chinsinga 
  tembo adauza atolankani adakana ndalamazo chakwera adapereka yomwe akuluakulu chipanichi amakumana akambirane za mmene angachepetsere chiwerengero cha okufuna kutsogolera mcp

  145 000 adakhudzidwa mmaboma 6 adasamutsidwa mmalo mwawo kukasungidwa mmisasa

  mutharika adalengeza lino malo angozi kotero mabungwe maiko akunja akuyenera kupulumutsa dzikoli kumavutowo mawuwa adachititsa mabungwe akunja mdziko la malawi momwemuno ayambe kupereka thandizo losiyanasiyana kwa amene adakhudzidwa 
  mtopola ku joni amalawi athothedwa   nkhani inanso yomwe idakula mchakachi zipolowe zomwe zidabuka mdziko la south africa kuchitira alendo amaiko amene akugwira ntchito mdzikomo 
  maiko adayamba kusamutsa nzika zake mdzikolo chimodzimodzinso la malawi april lidasamutsanso nzika zake 3 200 zomwe zidakhudzidwa mtopolawo 
  mtopolawo udali wachiwiri la south africa likuchitira alendo amene akudzafuna maganyu mdzikomo june 2008 la south africa lidachitiranso mtopola alendo mmaiko amene akukhala mdzikolo 60 adaphedwa pamene oposa 600 adavulazidwa

  ziwawazo zidayamba pamene mfumu ya mazulu gooodwill zwelethini idakolezera moto ponena nzika za mmaiko zibwerere kwawo ati zikuwaphangira ntchito 
  utsi sufuka popanda moto zwelethini adakana ponena atolankhani ndiwo sadamumvetse 
  maiko mabungwe africa adadzudzula zomwe zochitika mdzikolo 
  la nigeria nalo lidayamba kusala nzika za la south africa ku zimbabwe mawailesi mdzikolo adayamba asiya kuimba nyimbo za mdziko la south africa pamene ku mozambique nzika zina za mdziko la south africa zidachitidwa chipongwe 
  ku malawi kuno adachita zionetsero pamene adakapereka chikalata cha madandaulo kwa kazembe wa la south africa kuphatikiza apo amalawi adachitanso zionetsero zina zokakamiza asamagule katundu msitolo za mdziko la south africa zimene zili mdziko muno shoprite game pep 
  boma lichotsa mafumu amtauni nkhani ina yomwe idazunguza mchakachi mpaka lero ya ganizo la boma lofuna kuchotsa mafumu mmizinda mtauni mmamanisipalite 
  unduna wa maboma angono ndiwo udatulutsa chkalata chomwe chidadzetsa kusagwirizana pamene mafumuwo adaopseza boma achita zomwe angathe pofuna kuteteza ufumu wawo 
  chikalatacho mwa zina chidati mafumuwo sazilandiranso mswahara tsopano wamba gawo 3 5 la malamulo okhudza ufumu chiefs act lomwe lidaomba mkota paganizo la bomalo

Text:
kuphunzira chingerezi tsono chiziyambira msitandade 1 kanyumba nduna ya maphunziro angapo mwa makolo mdziko muno ati okondwa ndondomeko yatsopano yomwe unduna wa maphunziro mdziko muno wakhazikitsa ana msukulu za boma ayamba kuphunzira mchingerezi kuyambira sitandade 1 pamaphunziro onse kupatula chichewa 
  pocheza tamvani makolo angapo mmadera osiyanasiyana ati ana asukulu akhala akulephera kuyankhula chingerezi chothyakuka kaamba koti sasulidwa mokwanira kusukulu 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc chingerezi chiyankhulo chofunikira kwambiri kupatula chichewa chitumbuka ziyankhulo zina mdziko muno 
  rodrick savamkunkhu wa ku chinsapo ku lilongwe yemwe ana onse awiri kupulayimale winayo wa sitandade 1 chinsapo wati ili ganizo labwino kwambiri anawa akhala akuphunzira kuyankhula chiyankhulochi akadali achichepere pamaphunziro 
  savamkunkhu wati ophunzira okhawo omwe amaphunzira sukulu zapamwamba zomwe si zaboma ndiwo amakhala mwayi wophunzira chingerezi mozama poti amayambira kalasi yoyamba kuphunzira maphunziro onse mchingerezi kupatula chichewa 
  nayo ellen mwafulirwa wa ku dwangwa mboma la nkhotakota alandira nkhaniyi manja awiri ponena ichotsa kunyazitsa komwe ophunzira amasiku ano amabweretsa akamayankhula chingerezi chothyokathyoka 
  zili mwina nkuchepetsako chingerezi chomvetsa chisoni chomwe ana athu amayankhula watero mwafulirwa 
  charity kandikole wochokera ku balaka wati ndondomekoyi ili makolo agwirane manja boma poonetsetsa aphunzitsi akutsatadi ndondomeko imeneyi 
  nduna ya zamaphunziro lucius kanyumba yati ndondomekoyi iyamba kutsatiridwa mchigawo cha maphunziro chomwe chikubwerachi 
  khumbo la boma kuona ophunzira akuyankhula kulemba chingerezi chabwino watero kanyumba

Text:

 zipata za lino zidakali zotsekula kamange amalankhula mzinda wa blantyre pothilirapo ndemanga momwe boma likugwilira ntchito yolimbana kufala kwa kachilombo komwe kakuyambitsa nthendayi ka corona virus mdziko muno

Text:

 mwa akuluakulu ku bungweli charles nyekanyeka omwe anena lachinayi ku maula cathedral mzinda wa lilongwe maphunziro tsiku limodzi okhudza momwe amayi angapititsire patsogolo malonda 
 ati ochita business zingono zingono akuyenera njira zoyenera zovomerezeka akufuna kugulitsa katundu wawo ku maiko akunja njira imodzi yopititsira patsogolo malonda kwakukulu bungwe lathu likugwira ntchito amayi omwe ma bizinezi osiyanasiyana abwewre pamodzi ndikuphunzitsana ma upangiri amene angachitire mabizinezi antero nyekanyeka 
 polankhulapo mwa amayi ochita malondawa doreen mtawi ati kudzera bungwe la nasme amayi wa apeza maupangiri abwino omwe angachitire mabizinezi kudziwa misika yoyenera ya zokolora zawo kugulitsa zokolorazi mitengo yabwino zomwe zawapezetsa phindu lokwanira mmaguru kothandiza kwambiri kaamba koti umapeza zinthu zoti iwe wekha siungazipeze kupeza misika ya zokolora zina zambiri antero mtawi 
 bungwe la nasme linakhazikitsidwa cholinga chofuna liziyanganira mabungwe angonoangono pomwe mwazina limathandiza amayi ochita malonda kuwapezera misika ya malonda yovomerezeka

Text:

Text:
nsewu wa kachulu uyamba ndondomeko yachuma ikadutsa   botomani boma latsimikizira mdera la zomba chisi nsewu wopita ku kachulu ku nyanja ya chilwa uyikidwa phula ndondmeko yaza chuma yomwe ikubwerayi chaka chino 
 botomani nduna ya zachuma yanditsimikizira nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani mark botomani omwe anena polankhula radio maria malawi botomani omwenso phungu wa ya malamulo wa derali ati nduna ya zachuma yawatsimikizira nsewu umenewu uyambidwa chaka chino 
 feasibility study inachitika kale miyezi yapitayo mwinanso munamva boma litalengezetsa likufuna kampani yoti ipange zimenezo zinachitikadi ndakambirana kale nduna zachuma anditsimikizira nsewu umenewu awuyika ndondomeko ya zachuma yomwe ikubwerayi anatero botomani 
 ati nsewu wu omwe ochoka ku zomba airwing kudutsa kwa govala ofunika kwambiri kaamba koti ukupita komwe kuli nyanja yachiwiri kukula mdziko muno ati kumalimidwa mpunga wochuluka
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
cadecom ipindulira mboma la mwanza by glory kondowe mpingo wakatolika mdziko muno wati wokhutira mmene mboma la mwanza akupindulira ntchito zake zomwe zikugwiridwa bungwe lake la zachitukuko la catholic development commission in malawi cadecom 
 mlembi wamkulu ku bungwe la ma episikopi mpingo wakatolika mdziko muno la episcopal conference of malawi ecm henry saindi alankhula pambuyo poyendera ntchito zosiyanasiyana zomwe bungwe la cadecom likugwira mdera la mfumu kanduku mboma la mwanza archdayosizi ya blantyre saindi ati kudzera ntchitozi zawonetsa poyera mderali akuthandizika njira zosiyanasiyana kamba koti akutha kuzipezera okha zosowa za moyo wawo wa tsiku tsiku 
 ayamikira bungwe la cadecom saindi pamenepa ati mpingo wu upitiliza kugwira ntchito boma pothandizira ntchito zotukula lino 
 ntchito zomwe bungwe la cadecom ikuwathandiza amudzi mwa ulemu kuwathandiza kufetsa ndikuwokera mitengo okha komaso azimayi akuwaphunzitsa bizinesi yophika mowa wa wine womwe ukupangitsa njira yopenzera chuma isamasowe anatero saindi 
 ati okhutira bungwe la cadecom lomwe limathandizidwa abwenzi ochokera mdziko la australia lomwe cholinga chake ndikuona zomwe akuchita kale kuwathandiza pomwe sangathe kufikilapo ulimi osiyanasiyana
Label: SOCIAL

Text:

Text:
papa wati njala ya mtendere mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisko wati lili njala ya mtendere alibe mtendere wa mtima 
 papa francisko walankhula lachinayi misa kulikulu la mpingo ku vatican papa francisko wati lingakhale mtendere weniweni pokhapokha poyamba munthu paekhapaekha mtendere mtima 
 papa francisko wati nzosatheka kumakamba za mtendere la pansi eni akewo alibe mtendere mtima mwao pamenepa wati mtendere wa mtima umabwera azika mizu ya moyo wao mwa mulungu 
 wodzitchula mkhristu chonsecho kalikiliki kubweretsa chisokonezo banja lake mmudzi mwake ku ntchito kwake malo onse omwe apezeka ngwabodza sayeneranso kudzitchula mkhristu watero papa francisko 
 wati mtendere ungabwere agonjera mulungu azika mizu ya moyo wao mwa mulungu 
 papa francisko wati mulungu yekha amene angabweretse mtendere kudzera mwa mzimu woyera mzimu woyerayo akhazikike mtima mwa munthu 
 wati kuzika mizu mwa mulungu zitanthauza kukondana wina mzake ichi papa francisko wati ndiye chinsinsi chobweretsera mtendere 
 papa francisko wafotokoza kukondana wina mzake zitanthauza kukamba zabwino za osati kukhalira miseche pamenepa wati akuyenera kumadzifunsa kudzera mzokamba zake akuthandiza kubweretsa mtendere ayi 
 papa francisko wati satana amakondwa pamene akumenyana kukangana popeza cholinga chake chimakhala chakwaniritsidwa 
 pomaliza papa francisko wati mtendere mphatso ya mzimu woyera
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
kukokana za amayi ovina jameson mzimayi abise thupi zusamvana komwe kudabuka zakayendetsedwe ka bungwe la asilamu la muslim association of malawi mam kwayamba kufalikira mmaboma ambiri tsopano 
  magulu osiyanasiyana omwe akumadzitcha asilamu okhudzidwa ayamba kulankhulapo pankhani yofuna kuchotsa wapampando wa bungweli idrisa muhammad yemwe akuti akuphwanya ngodya za chiphunzitso cha chipembedzochi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc muhammad watsutsa za nkhaniyi wati sakugwedezeka palibe munthu bungwe lomwe lingamuchotse pampandowo 
  wati akuganiza magulu omwe akuchita akutumidwa akuluakulu mchipembedzochi omwe sakumufunira zabwino walonjeza sagonjera oterewa 
  ndikudziwa alipo ake omwe akuwatuma azichita zimenezi saphulapo kanthu atachita palibe yemwe mphamvu zondichotsa pampando sindingalole kutula pansi udindo wotsogolera chipembedzochi watero muhammad 
  magulu omwe akulimbikitsa muhammad atule pansi udindo akuti mkuluyu walephera kugwiritsa chiphunzitso cha chisilamu polola amayi achipembedzochi kuvina pamisonkhano ya ndale kugwiritsa ntchito nyimbo za chisilamu zimene angozisintha potamanda andale 
  limodzi mwa magulu omwe sakukondwa mtsogoleriyu bungwe loona zinthu mchisilamu zikuyenda mwachilungamo la muslim commission on social justice 
  mtsogoleri wa bungweli abdul aziz shouaib jameson wati amayi chisilamu saloledwa kulankhula kuvina pamalo omwe pali abambo 
  jameson wati amayiwa ololedwa kutenga nawo mbali pandale osati kudzera mchipembedzo 
  chiphunzitso chathu chimanena mzimayi abise thupi lake asalankhule pomwe pali abambo pokhapokha awiri mwamuna watero jameson 
  kuyambira pomwe nkhaniyi idaphulika sabata zapitazo mumzinda wa blantyre pomwe gulu lina limafuna kukatseka ofesi ya muhammad gulu lina lidachititsa msonkhano wa atolankhani mumzinda wa lilongwe pankhani yomweyi 
  lachisanu lapita gulu lina mboma la salima lidachita zionetsero zoti sakusagwirizana wapampando wa bungweli lidakapereka kalata kwa bwanamkubwa wa bomalo chosonyeza kusakondwa ndo mtsogoleriyo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
joyce banda akumana mafumu otsutsa azizwa joyce banda akumana mafumu otsutsa azizwa mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda lachinayi adakumana mafumu mdziko muno zomwe zidachititsa otsutsa boma kuzizwa 
  banda adakumana mafumuwo ya boma ya sanjika mumzinda wa blantyre 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mneneri wa chipani cha udf ken ndanga adati chipanicho chakhala chikudabwa momwe banda amachitira zokhudza mafumu 
  tikudziwa iyi njira yakuti mafumu akhale mbali yake pomwe chisankho chili pamphuno adatero ndanga 
  mneneri wa dpp nicholas dausi adati akudabwa banda akuchita zimene ankadzudzula nazo mtsogoleri wakale wa lino bingu wa mutharika 
  bingu akaitana mafumu banda amati si mmalo mowasiya mafumu kuunikira momwe kalembera wa chisankho akuyendera akuwaitanitsa ya boma adatero dausi 
  pomwe timasindikiza tamvani lachinayi nkuti zisanadziwike banda mafumuwo amakambirana chiyani 
  mneneri wa ya boma steven nhlane adanena msonkhanowo usadachitike samadziwa zomwe mtsogoleri wa lino mafumuwo amakambirana 
  naye mneneri wa unduna wa maboma aangono maganizo mazeze samadziwa zomwe amakambirana
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:
ana atetezedwe ku gozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi social welfare wolemba sylvester kasitomu ofesi yoona za chisamaliro cha wanthu ya social welfare mboma la zomba yapempha adzichilimika pothandiza kutetedza ana ya ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi 
 wa kuofesiyi stephano joseph anena loweruka 31 august sukulu ya primary ya sunuzi mbomalo pomwe bungwe la future vision international limachititsa mwambo wokumbukira mwana wa africa 
 joseph omwe anafika mlendo wolemekedzeka mwambowu adathokodza bungwe la future vision international chowonetsa chidwi ntchito zokumbukira tsikuli 
 lero mmene tabwera mwai wa nawonso apeze nawo mwai wa maphunziro amene angasamalire ana aangono aakulu omwe anakhudzidwa matenda ogwa mwadzidzidzi antero joseph 
 pothirirapo ndemanga wa bungwe la future vision international mdziko muno newton sande sindo apempha mdera la sunuzi mboma la zomba agwiritse uthenga womwe alandira wokhudza mwambo wa tsiku lokumbukira mwana wa africa 
 ngozi chinthu chomwe chimabwera modzidzimutsa mwazina zimakhudza anhtu olumala ana nde tinachiona cha nzeru tibere kuno tidzapereke uthengawu anatero sindo 
 mdera la sinuzi mboma la zomba limodzi mwa madera mbomali omwe amakhudzidwa ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
kusolola mboma kudayamba kale ingakhale sukulu iyi chitukuko kumidzi chikulephera kupita patsogolo akuba ndalama za boma zayamba kuululika kafukukufuku yemwe adapangidwa pakati 2009 2012 waulula boma lotsogozedwa chipani cha dpp chomwe mtsogoleri adali bingu wa mutharika lidasowetsa ndalama zoposa k90 biliyoni mnjira zopanda dongosolo 
  kafukufuku wowunika njira yoyendetsera chuma cha boma ya integrated financial management and information system ifmis yemwe ofesi yolondoloza chuma cha boma ya national audit office nao idachita mwezi wa november 2011 kufikira 2012 wasonyeza kusololaku kudayamba kale makamaka muulamuliro wa demokalase 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zotsatira za kafukufukuyu zikusonyeza boma la dpp lidasokoneza ndalama zankhanikhani mnjira zosiyanasiyana makamaka kugula katundu wa boma popanda dongosolo kulipira makampani omwe sadagwire ntchito iliyonse 
  kafukufukuyu wasonyezanso kusololaku sikudaonekere poyera msanga kaamba koti boma la dpp lidayimika kafukufuku yemwe unduna wa zachuma udakhazikitsa utakayikira chinyengo njira ya ifmis 
  boma la dpp lidaimika kafukufukuyu nthambi 14 za boma zisadaunikidwe zomwe zidachititsa chinyengo cha kunthambizi chisaonekere poyera 
  ofesi ya nao idakanika kufufuza ofesi ya mtsogoleri nduna zake ochita kafukufukuwo adabwezedwa pomwe unduna wa zachuma sudafufuzidwe adakonza udzakhale womalizira kufufuzidwa nthambi zina 12 sizidafufuzidwe cha mavuto ndalama zogwirira ntchitoyi 
  kumapeto kwa chaka cha 2011 kafukufukuyu mkati kalaliki wogwira ntchito ku ofesi ya wowerengera ndalama za boma adapezeka ndalama zokwana k400 miliyoni kubanki 
  panopa kukankhizirana kuli mkati pakati chipani cha dpp chipani cholamula cha pp pankhani yosakaza chuma cha boma yomwe aphungu akukambirana ku nyumba ya malamulo 
  katswiri wina wa zachuma mdziko muno ati za otsutsa boma mnyumba ya malamulo pankhani yokhudza ndalama zomwe zidabedwa kulikulu la boma ku lilongwe zingathandize kupeza omwe akukhudzidwa nkhaniyi 
  anthuwa ati nzomvetsa chisoni kafukufukuyu wakhwimitsidwa kwambiri kwa makalaliki amaudindo angonoangono mboma kulikululi pomwe pali malipoti osatsimikizidwa oti akuluakulu akukhudzidwa kusokonekera kwa chumachi 
  tikukamba bungwe lothana katangale ziphuphu la anti corruotion bureau acb lamangapo kale woyendetsa unduna wa zokopa alendo zankhalango tressa namathanga senzani 
  iyeyu akumuganizira adalamula unduna ulipire kampani yake yotchedwa visual impact ndalama zankhaninkhani chikhalirecho kampaniyo sidagwire ntchito yotumidwa boma 
  otsutsa boma aganiza kwambiri pamenepa polimbikitsa akuluakulu mboma afufuzidwenso pankhaniyi osati azibisala kumbuyo kwa mipando yawo ayi nthambi zomwe zikufufuza nkhaniyi zimve amenewa zichitepo kanthu joana nkhwazi mphunzitsi pasukulu ya pulaimale ya kaufulu mumzinda wa lilongwe wauza tamvani 
  naye martin mpiringidza yemwe amayendetsa lole yonyamula katundu mumzindawu adati kufufuzako kusangothera ogwira ntchito mboma kuchitikenso makampani omwe akuganiziridwa akukhudzidwa nkhaniyi 
  mpiringidza adanena potsatira zomwe adanena mtsogoleri wa chipani cha dpp mnyumba ya malamulo george chaponda makampani oterewa eni ake akuluakulu boma omwe amatumiza ndalama zambiri kumakampaniwa akulipira ndalama za katundu yemwe sadaperekedwe nkomwe 
  mabvuto bamusi yemwe amalondoloza nkhani za chuma zaumoyo wayamikira zipani zotsutsazi polimbikitsa kafukufukuyu afikenso kumabanki komwe ndalamazi zimalowera kutulukira 
  otsutsa anena zanzeru kwambiri mulimonse mmene kafukufukuyu angathere ndalama zosowazo zimalowera kutulukira kumabanki ndiye nkutheka mmabankimo muli omwe akukhudzidwa ofunika kufufuzidwa watero bamusi 
  zipani zotsutsa zidadandaula boma silidauze nyumba ya malamulo zogwira mtima lolemba pomwe wachiwiri kwa pulezidenti wa lino khumbo kachali amatsegulira msonkhano wadzidzidzi wa aphungu womwe cholinga chake kukambirana za ndalama zobedwazo nkhani zina zikuluzikulu 
  john tembo wa mcp clement chiwaya wa udf george chaponda wa dpp ati boma lidangobwereza zomwe aphungu amadziwa kale mmalo monena za momwe boma likuyendetsera nkhaniyi 
  tembo yemweso mtsogoleli wa zipani zotsutsa boma mnyumba ya malamulo adati zipani zotsutsa zimayembekeza boma lilongosola chenicheni chomwe mtsogoleri wa lino adachotsera nduna zake zonse october 10 ndiponso chomwe nduna zina zikuluzikulu sadazibwezere pamaudindo potsatira nkhaniyi 
  nkhani imeneyi itangochitika mtsogoleri wa adachotsa pamipando nduna zonse posankha nduna zatsopano nduna zina adazibwezera mmipando yawo nduna zina zikuluzikulu ken lipenga ralph kasambara adazichotseratu pamipando yawo zikutanthauzanji zinthu zomwe amalawi amayembekezera kumva kuboma osati kubwereza zinthu zomwe akudziwa kale adatero tembo 
  lipenga adali nduna ya zachuma unduna womwe ukukhudzidwa kwambiri chisokonezochi katswiri wa zachuma maxwell mkwezalamba ndiye watenga mpandowu 
  mpando wa nduna ya zachilungamo malamulo womwe udali wa kasambara waperekedwa kwa katswiri wa zamalamulo fahad assani
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
lidali tsiku la big sunday sangwani mwafulirwa tsopano si mnyamatanso akumudziwira dzulo 4 june 2016 wamulonjeza trufena chiwaya mwana wa mmudzi mwa muleso kwa senior chief somba mboma la blantyre sadzamusiya mpaka imfa 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu sangwani mneneri wa bungwe loyendetsa zisankho la malawi electoral commission pamene trufena akugwira ku western university of malawi 
  kukwaya ya mpingo wa living waters ku ndirande ndiko kudayambira kukumana kwa awiriwa sangwani yemwe kwawo ku ndirande mumzinda wa blantyre akuti panthawiyo adalibe khumbo lothira chichewa namwaliyu 
  amangondisangalatsa khalidwe lake zachibwana ayi zibwenzi ayi zonse chidwi mulungu zidandipatsa chidwi adatero mneneriyu 
  sangwani trufena thupi limodzi ndimadziwa makolo anga akwiya akamva zoti ndapanga chibwenzi ndimafuna ndikafike ku university adaonjeza sangwani 
  idakwana awiriwa asiye kucheza zamapemphero zokhazokha sangwani adalibe maganizo komabe mulungu adazikonza 
  zonse zidayambika pamene ake trufena adamwalira ku ndirande zomwe zidachititsa namwaliyu abwerere kwawo kwa che somba kuiwalana sangwani kudali komweko 
  patatha masiku ndidayamba kumukumbukira kodi moyo uli kodi akulimbikirabe kupemphera khumbo lomuyendera lidalipo padalibe amene amadziwa komwe ankakhala adatero sangwani 
  tsiku lidakwana akumanenso uku tsopano kudali ku big sunday yomwe idachitikira ku living waters church ku chimwankhunda mumzinda wa blantyre kumeneko ndiye kudali kufunsana zambiri sangwani adadziwa komwe namwaliyu akukhala 
  pakutha masiku angapo sangwani adakwawira kwa che somba mofunsira njira adakwanitsa kukakumana namwaliyu apo padali 8 july 2001 
  ndinenetse ndinalibe maganizo ofunsira kukangomuona tikucheza nkhani zidandithera kenaka ndidatulutsa achikondi adatero sangwani 
  naye trufena adati ndinadabwa akundiuza zachibwenzi ndinali ndisanapangepo chibwenzi padalibenso zoganiza kumuyankha pomwepo zimenezo sindimapanga adandikakamira ndinayamba kudabwa naye kenako maganizo adandifikira munthuyu wayenda mtunda wautali ndiye watsimikiza moyo wanga udavomera ndidamulola
Label: RELIGION

Text:
mdima wanyanya mmakhonsolo zomwe anena makhonsolo mizinda ya lilongwe blantyre mzuzu zikusonyeza vuto la mdima mmisewu ya mizindayi litenga lithe kaamba koti akuyesetsa akonze zinthu akubwezeretsa zinthu mmbuyo poononga dala zipangizo za magetsi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   escom in free for all fuel scam khonsolo ya mzinda wa lilongwe yati vuto lalikulu yomwe kampani ya magetsi ya escom imatenga ikalumikize magetsi ntchito yozika mapolo ikatha 
  mneneri wa khonsoloyi tamala chafunya wati khonsolo ikamaliza kuzika mapolo nkulumikiza nthambo za magetsi zimakhala mmanja mwa escom idzamalizitse ntchitoyo polumikiza magetsiwo 
  gawo lathu ntchito imeneyo idachitika kuchedwaku kampani ya escom khonsolo idalipira kale ndalama zolumikizira magetsi zaka zikungopita timayesetsa kutokosako adatero chafunya pouza tamvani nkhani ya vuto la mdima mmisewu yambiri mumzindawu 
  chafunya adati kuchedwaku kumapereka danga kwa amaganizo olakwika aziononga mapolowo chipsinjo chimagweranso pamsana khonsolo kukonzanso mapolowo 
  mneneri wa kampani ya escom kitty chingota adavomereza khonsoloyi idalipiradi ndalama zolumikizira magetsi akatswiri ake atakayendera malo ofunika kulumikiza magetsiwo adapeza zolakwika zambiri 
  adati pofuna kupewa ngozi za magetsi kampaniyi idalangiza khonsoloyi ikonze molakwikamo magetsewo asadabwere palibe chomwe achitapo 
  mmalo mapolo adadutsa mmunsi mwenimweni mwa nthambo zathu za magetsi malamulo escom salola kulumikiza magetsi mmalo oterewa mmalo mapolo adatalikirana kwambiri adagwetsedwa opotoka maganizo ndiye mpovuta kulumikiza magetsi mmalo oterewa adatero chingota 
  chafunya adati zambiri mapolowo akawonongedwa kumakhala kovuta kuwabwezeretsa ndalama zomwe zimalowa nzochuluka kwambiri 
  kukonza polo ya simenti imodzi yokha kuyambira kuwumba mpaka kukaizika imatenga ndalama zokwana k400 000 ndiye muwerengere msewu umodzi umadya ndalama zingati za mapolo nanga akawononga tikabwezeretse ndiye zitukuko zina ziimiratutu adatero chafunya 
  mumzinda wa blantyre nkhani yokhayokhayi mmisewu yambiri mdima wokhawokha kaamba koti mapolo ambiri adagwtsedwa akuba zomwe zikuchititsa azichitidwa chipongwe cha kusowa kwa kuwala usiku 
  mneneri wa khonsoloyi anthony kasunda adati nzoona mumzindawu muli vuto la magetsi mmbali mwa misewu ambanda adaba zipangizo pamapolo 
  ili vuto lalikulu amayenda mwamantha usiku pamene khonsolo ikuyesetsa mzinda tipite patsogolo chitukuko amaganizo olakwika akubwezeretsa chitukuko mmbuyo pomaba zipangizo zothandizira magetsi pansewu adatero kasunda 
  adati khonsolo akupempha makhoti pamene munthu wagwidwa katundu wa khonsolo ameneyo azilandira chilango chokhwima asadzabwerezenso atengerepo phunziro 
  tipeze njira imene tingachite zipangizo za magetsi zisamabedwe pogwiritsa ntchito magetsi oyendera mphamva ya dzuwa ija chingerezi amati solar powered system 
  pempho lathu khonsolo ndilakuti tiyeni tonse titengepo gawo poteteza katundu zipangizo zimene khonsolo imaika mmalo osiyanasiyana zitumikire okhala mumzinda wa blantyre isakhale ntchito ya khonsolo yokha tonse adatero kasunda 
  namonso mumzinda wa mzuzu nyimbo yokhayokhayoambanda kaliriki kuononga zida za magetsi mmbali mwa misewu moti malo ambiri mdima uli bii usiku ukagwa 
  zinthu zidayamba kusonya pamene magetsi oyamba mmisewu ya mmataunishipi zolozolo chimaliro katawa msongwe adayatsidwa 2012 2013 zinthu zabwerera mmbuyo adayamba kuba nthambo za magetsiwa 
  wogwirizira mpando wa wa khonsoloyi victor masina adati ili vuto lalikulu ndithu moti khonsoloyi akufuna ndalama zosachepera k3.5 miliyoni akonzenso zipangizo zoonongekazo ma transformer mapolo ogwetsedwa galimoto zikaphuluza msewu
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
muva kutsitsimutsa mukuimba lero lamulungu akuyembekezeka kukakhazikitsa chimbale chake cha messiah 1 ku mzuzu boma park kumeneko kukakhala oimba osiyanasiyana odziwika mmalawi muno dailes banda adacheza donnex muva amudziwitsitse mkuluyu yemwe akuti cholinga chake nkutsitsimutsa kudzera nyimbo adacheza naye motere akhazikitsa chimbale chake lero muva tikudziweni achimwene 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi ndine donnex muva ndimachokera mmudzi mwa kajani kwa inkosi kampingo sibande mboma la mzimba ndili zaka 32 zakubadwa ndili pabanja ndili ana atatu 
  mbiri ya maphunziro anu njotani ndayenda sukulu zambiri kaamba ka anga omwe abusa mayeso anga sitandade 8 ndidalembera ku chihami mboma la nkhata bay sekondale ndidaphunzira ku chintheche mboma lomwelo 
  nditamaliza sekondale ndidachita mwayi woyamba ntchito ku chipiku pakadalipano ndikugwira ntchito kubungwe la solar aid malawi 
  mudayamba kuimba kuimba ndidayamba ndili wachichepere kwambiri makamaka kaamba ka ubusa wa anga panthawiyo ndinkaimba mukwaya ya kumpingo kwathu kuimba kwenikweni ndidayamba mchaka cha 2009 pomwe ndidatulutsa chimbale choti ya manna inatha 
  chaka chino ndikuyembekezeka kukakhazikitsa chimbale changa cha messiah 1 ku mzuzu ku boma park 30 august kumeneko kukhalanso oimba osiyanasiyana odziwika mmalawi muno 
  zomwe mwakwaniritsa pamoyo wanu ziti chachikulu chomwe ndakwaniritsa kubweretsa kwa mulungu kudzera nyimbo zimbale ziwiri si chinthu chapafupi kupanga chimbale pamalowa ndalama zambiri 
  pali zopinga zotani zomwe mwakumanapo nazo zopinga ndiye zilipo choyamba woba nyimbo moti ndikunena ayamba kale kubena nyimbo zanga mchitidwewu umabwezeretsa kwambiri mmbuyo oimbafe chachiwiri kusowa kwa chithandizo popanga chimbale ndanena kale ndalama zimalowa zambiri pantchito yapanga chimbale zomwe oimba ambiri sitingakwanitse patokha timafuna chithandizo kwa makampani akuluakulu zimakhalira kumaiko 
  oimba anzanu muwauza zotani pakhale chikondi pakati pathu osati kuponderezana mtima wofuna pamwamba zonse womwe ukuononga oimba ambiri mdziko muno
Label: MUSIC

Text:
moto utentha misika njakata izinga malonda omwe katundu wawo adapsera mmisika ya mavenda ya tsoka ku lilongwe wa blantyre akulira chokweza uku akupempha boma liwakongoze kangachepe koyambiranso bizinesi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc moto udatentha misikayi lamulungu lapitali kufikitsa chiwerengero cha misika yakupsa 10 mzaka ziwiri 
  mneneri wa polisi kumwera wa khonsolo ya mzinda wa mzuzu ati kusasamala pakapalidwe ka magetsi kungakhale chimodzi mwa zomwe zachulutsa ngozi za moto mmisika 
  mneneriyu davie chingwalu wati kupatula msika wa blantyre womwe sakuuganizira wayaka kaamba ka magetsi zofufuza ngozi za misika ingapo zimatulukira zizindikiro za kusagwiritsa ntchito magesti moyenera 
  wati nkuthekanso omwe amaphika mmisika moyandikana misikayo sazimitsa lomwe moto kandulo poweruka 
  wa khonsolo ya mzinda wa mzuzu victor masina wati zofufuza moto omwe udatentha msika wa mataifa mzindawo zidaonetsa padali kusasamala kwa magetsi 
  adati pali omwe akamanga golosale amakokeramo okha moto wa magetsi zomwe tsiku lina zimadzabutsa moto 
  pomwe tamvani idayendera msika wa blantyre pomwe udangopsa mavenda adadandaula boma mabanki apereke ngongole kwa mavendawa zomwe ziwathandize kuyambiranso mabizinezi 
  rafael nameta mwini sitolo ya zamagetsi ya ranambe electronics rafael nameta akuti wataya katundu wa pafupifupi k7.6miliyoni 
  wati patapezeka ngongole mavendawa angakhale mmagulu nkuyambiranso bizinesi 
  steve maliyoti buzinesi yogulitsa lamya mumsikaku akuganiza boma liyenera kuthandiza mavendawa amalawi omwe akufuna thandizo laboma 
  wa khonsolo ya blantyre ted nandolo adakana kuikirapo ndemanga kupsa kwa msikawu ati sadalandire lipoti la zomwe zidadzetsa motowo kumsika wa blantyre 
  chingwalu adati zofufuza zikulunjika koti adayatsa moto adali ana ongoyendayenda 
  wati mwana wina wa zaka 12 yemwe apolisiwa akumusunga mchitolokosi akuulula anzake anayi amene adayatsa msikawo 
  wati akuganizira apeza zenizeni kuchoka kwa mwanayo 
  zatipatsa ntchito yogwira ana onse oyendayenda mmisika usiku tikawagwira tiwapereka kwa makolo omwe alibe makolo apita kumalo osungira ana amasiye
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
alendo alanda maudindo pp kusankhidwa kwa alendo ochoka mzipani zina mmaudindo onona kuchipani cholamula cha peoples pp kungakolezere mavuto kuchipaniko maka pandawala yolowera kuchisankho cha 2014 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc katswiri wa ndale kusukulu ya chancellor college blessings chinsinga mfumu atero msabatayi pounikira zotsatira za chisankho cha akuluakulu oyendetsa chipani cha pp 
  chipanichi chidali msonkhano waukulu kuyambira lolemba mpaka lachiwiri komwe amkhalakale angapo adagwa chagada maudindo kupita kwa omwe sadathe mvula zingapo kumeneko 
  wachiwiri kwa mneneri wachipanichi yemwenso adasankhindwa paudindowu popanda opikisana naye ken msonda wati amalawi asade nkhawa kusankhidwa kwa andalewo kulimbitsa chipanichi 
  ku chisankhocho mpando wa mtsogoleri udapita kwa yemwe pulezidenti wa lino yemwenso mwini chipanichi joyce banda popanda opikisana naye 
  wachiwiri wakenso yemwe wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa khumbo kachali adangodutsa popanda omugwedeza 
  kukhetserana thukuta kudakula posankha wachiwiri kwa wachiwiri kwa pulezidenti kuchigawo cha pakati kumwera 
  kuchigawo cha pakati cassim chilumpha yemwe adasomphoka ku udf epulo kutangodziwika amusankha nduna adasankhidwa mavoti 1,253 
  adagwetsa clement stambuli yemwe adapeza 478 uladi mussa 277 chaima banda 35 william nkhono yemwe adapeza voti imodzi 
  kuchigawo cha kumwera sidik mia yemwenso adasomphoka kuchipani cha dpp ndiye adasankhidwa mavoti 1,711 kugwetsa mkhalalakale brown mpinganjira yemwe adapata mavoti 276 
  apa chinsinga wati asangosangalala ndikupambanako adziwe zotere zingayambitse mabala mchipanimo 
  wati zingachitike omwe agwa pamasankhowo ndiwo akhala chipanichicho pomwe sichidali mboma 
  chinsinga wati kaamba ka zimenezo zingatheke olirawo kuyamba kaduka kwa anzawo omwe achita pamasankhowo 
  adatinso nkutheka mwina masankhowo pena sadayende zomwe zingakwiitse omwe adagonja 
  mwachitsanzo banda pamwambowo adayamikira mia ndiye adakonza dongosolo lonse msonkhanowo utheke zomwe chinsinga adakaikira zingathandizire kusankhidwa kwake 
  nkutheka nzimene zidamupambanitsa zotere sangakondwere nazo mpungupungwe mchipani umayambika mmalo otere ndiye chipanichi chisamale adaunikira chinsinga 
  msonda adati akuluakulu omwe asankhidwe pamutu mkhalakale akadaulonso pandale kotero sizingatheke kukwera kwawo kudzetse chisokonezo 
  adatinso anthuwo adasankhidwa kusonyeza kuwakhulupirira agwira ntchito yolimbitsa chipani kutukula lino 
  t nthache ya mboma la mwanza yati idadzidzimuka nkusankhidwa kwa andale omwe adabulika kuzipani zawo 
  iyo idati boma la dpp lidazunza ulamuliro kotero si kutenganso ochokera kumeneko 
  ndidaganiza atsopano komabe ndifunire zabwino zonse pulezidenti achiwiri ake adatero nthache 
  angell banda wa mmudzi mwa jali kwa t mwambo mboma la zomba wati akukhulupirira kutenga mipando kwa alendo kugwetsa chipani cha pp wati mpinganjira mkhalakale kuchipaniko kotero kugwa kwake sangakondwe wakhala mchipanimo pomwe chisali mboma 
  apa zavuta kutha kwachipani kumeneko alendowa sibwezi atawalola ayime nawo ntchito zawo tikuzidziwa pomwe adali kuzipani zawo 
  andale athu akungofuna ndalama osatinso kutitumikira mapeto ake mudzapeza udf dpp yonse ili ku pp awa omwe sitikuwafuna joyce banda achenjere adatero angell 
  pius amidu wa mmudzi mwa sosola kwa t msamala mboma la balaka wati akuganiza alendowa amanga chipani ntchito zawo kuchipani komwe adali zidali zabwino 
  amanga chipani amenewo asawaderere adatero amidu
Label: POLITICS

Text:
malungo atheretuunduna pamene limakumbukira ntchito yothana malungo lachiwiri boma la malawi lati likuyesetsa malungo mdziko muno atheretu 
  bungwe la zaumoyo lonse la world health organisation who lidapatula 25 april chaka chilichonse tsiku lokumbukira nthendayi imene imatengera kuli chete ambiri makamaka amayi oyembekezera ana africa.aria   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka pamene mutu wa chaka chino kuthetseratu malungo ukukhudza la malawi kwambiri who idalengeza lino limodzi kenya ghana akhala maiko oyamba padziko kulandira katemera wa malungo kuyambira chaka cha mawa 
  woimira who pankhani yolimbana malungo mdziko muno wilfred dodoli adati ndondomeko ya katemerayu yongoyesera chabe wati chikhulupiliro wothandiza makamaka kwa ana 
  uku nkubowoleza chinsinsi chothana malungo tikuyembekezera ana 120 000 pakati miyezi isanu 25 mmadera osankhidwa alandira katemerayu adatero 
  unduna wa zaumoyo wati katemerayu athandiza kuchepetsanso imfa zodza malungo pafupifupi 40 imfa 100 zomwe zimagwa pakati ana chiyembekezo choti mtsogolo muno vutoli lidzatheratu 
  undunawu watinso wakhazikitsa kafukufuku wofuna kupeza momwe vuto la malungo lilili mdziko muno pofuna kuonjezera mapologalamu oyenera la malawi likwanitse cholinga cha mutu wa chaka chinowo 
  woyanganira ntchito zaumoyo muunduna wa zaumoyo dr charles mwansambo wati kafukufukuyu achitika mmadera osankhidwa achitidwa madotolo omwe adaphunzitsidwa ntchito ya zaumoyo makamaka zokhudzana malungo 
  kafukufukuyu akhudza kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka masikito otetezedwa kaperekedwe ka thandizo la mankhwala malungo kuyeza malungo kuchuluka kwa magazi mmatupi mwa ana omwe atenge nawo gawo kafukufukuyu adatero mwansambo 
  uthenga wa tsiku lokumbukira matenda malungo unduna wa zaumoyo udati mzaka zisanu zapitazi imfa zodza malungo zachepa 60 imfa 100 zomwe zinkachitika undunawu wati ichi nchifukwa cha kuyenda kwa mapologalamuwa 
  cha mapologalamu kugawa masikito onyikidwa mmankhwala kupopera mankhwala mmakomo kulimbikitsa amayi oyembekezera kuyezetsa malungo kulandira thandizo yabwino imfa zodza malungo zatsika chidatero chikalatacho 
  wa bungwe la zaumoyo la malawi health equity network mhen george jobe wati ndondomeko zomwe unduna wa zaumoyo uli nazo zabwino 
  adati njuga yagona momwe ndondomekozi zikuyendetsedwera maphunziro zaumoyo omwe akulandira azitha ndondomekozi zipindule 
  ndondomekozi nzabwino mpofunika akuphunzitsidwa mokwanira ndikunena polingalira zomwe zikuchitika mmaderamu akugwiritsa ntchito masikito omwe amalandira powedzera nsomba kupangira madimba adatero jobe 
  senior chief mwadzama ya ku nkhotakota idavomereza pakadali vuto lalikulu pakati malangizo makamaka pakagwiritsidwe ntchito ka masikito udzudzu pangonopangono ayamba kumvetsetsa 
  poyamba kudali zikhulupiliro zoti mankhwala masikitowa amafowola ambiri akumvetsetsa kufunika kogona mmasikito tidakhazikitsanso malamulo opezeka akugwiritsa ntchito masikito powedzera nsomba kupangira dimba tizimulambalala pakabwera mapologalamu ndiye akuwopa adatero mwadzama 
  padakali nduna ya zaumoyo peter kumpalume yati lino lasayina pangano la china akatswiri ku china abwere kudzathandiza pakafukufuku wa mankhwala zitsamba ochiza malungo 
  mankhwalawo alipo timawagwiritsa ntchito kupeza mankhwala omwe angagonjetse malungo ati tingawakonze mmafakitale akhale osavuta kugwiritsa ntchito adatero kumpalume la china lidagonjetsa kale malungo wachiwiri kwa nduna ya zaumoyo kulera mdzikolo wang guogiang adati zidatheka pogwiritsa ntchito mankhwala zitsamba
Label: HEALTH

Text:

Text:
alandira k14 biliyoni yotukulira maphunziro maiko mabungwe omwe amathandiza boma ati apereka thandizo la k14 biliyoni ku unduna wa zamaphunziro zotukulira maphunziro msukulu za pulayimale 
  lonjezoli lili mumgwirizano wa pakati paboma la malawi maiko norway germany kudzanso banki yayikulu padziko lonse ya world bank bungwe la united nations childrens fund unicef 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka haugen tiyamba chaka chino mbali ziwirizi zidasayinirana mgwirizanowu lachitatu pasukulu ya pulayimale ya muzu mboma la lilongwe oyimirira mayiko mabungwewa kikkan haugen yemwe kazembe wa la norway adati ndalamazi ziyamba kufika chaka chino 
  gawo loyamba libwera chaka chino lichokera ku norway world bank unicef gawo lachiwiri lidzabwera 2018 lidzachokera kudziko la germany adatero haugen 
  adatsindika sizikutanthauza maiko mabungwewa ayambiranso kupereka thandizo lomwe ankapereka ku bajeti ya malawi adasiya zifukwa zosayendetsa ndalama za mbajeti 
  wa bungwe la mgwirizano wa mabungwe omwe amayanganira za maphunziro benedicto kondowe adati nkhaniyo mayeso aakulu ku unduna wa zamaphunziro boma la malawi 
  oyendetsa pulogalamu ya thandizo la mumgwirizanowu akuyenera kuzindikira tsogolo la thandizo lina mtsogolo likhala mmanja mwawo ntchito zawo ndizo zingakope mayiko mabungwe alowererepo adatero 
  nduna ya zamaphunziro sayansi emmanuel fabiano adati boma la malawi kudzera muunduna lionetsetsa thandizoli labweretsa mmaphunziro ku pulayimale mdziko muno 
  boma sukulu makolo atenga nawo mbali pachitukuko chilichonse chomwe chikhazikitsidwe mmapologalamu mumgwirizanowu ndiponso liziyesetsa kupereka upangili zofunika kuwonjerapo mmapologalamuwo adatero

Text:
papa wachenjeza ogulitsa nyuzipepala mmisewu nkhani ya mliri wa coronavirus mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wachenjedza omwe amagulitsa nyuzipepala mmisewu adzichita malondawa mosamala pofuna kupewa kutenga kachilombo ka coronavirus 
 papa francisko papa francisco walankhula kudzera uthenga watumizira anthuwa 
 wati akudziwa momwe mliri wa coronavirus wakhudzira ntchito za ogulitsa nyuzipepalawa mmalo osiyanasiyana lonse 
 mwazina uthengawo mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolikayu papa franciso wayamikira anthuwa chothandiza ntchito zofalitsa mauthenga osiyanasiyana omwe akuchitika dzikoli
Label: HEALTH

Text:
2019 msce results out by thokozani chapola ele.jpg alt= width="452 height="320 />has released the results susuwele banda the malawi national examinations board maneb has released the 2019 msce examination results 
 according to the annouced results total of 98,332 candidates had registered for the examination but 92,867 sat for the examination 
 the results have been announced by minister of education william susuwele banda through statement 
 out of the 92,867 candidates who sat for the examination 46,771 have passed this represents 50.36 pass rate out of the 41,708 female candidates who sat for this examination 17,887 have passed this represents 42.89 pass rate out of the 51,159 male candidates who sat for this examination 28,884 have passed this represents 56.46 pass rate out of 573 special needs candidates who sat for this examination 302 have passed this represents 52.71 pass rate the results of 6 candidates have been withheld pending investigations for contravening maneb regulations reads the staterment 
 the maneb has also released list of ten best performing schools in this years msce examinations are as follows loyola jesuit secondary school of kasungu marist secondary school of dedza mlare secondary school of lilongwe east lilongwe islamic pvt secondary school of lilongwe west pius x11 seminary of chiradzulu ludzi girls secondary school of mchinji zomba catholic secondary school of zomba urban st marys secondary school of zomba urban marymount catholic girls secondary school of mzuzu city johns pvt secondary school of lilongwe city according to the same maneb the ten best candidates in this years msce examinations are as follows ranking candidate name sex centre name aggregate points 1 arthur promise chibondo m zomba catholic secondary school 6 2 lusako mwaisango m chaminade secondary school 7 3 misheck a. masamba m blantyre secondary school 7 4 ruth paul bizeck f st marys secondary school 7 5 yamikani watson m zomba catholic secondary school 7 6 bland benson mtchona m maranatha pvt secondary school 7 7 harris ecrem majamanda m robert blake secondary school 7 8 gowokani mkandawire m chaminade secondary school 8 9 wilned kanyimbo m marist pvt secondary school 8 10 leonard kadzamira m marist pvt secondary school 8 the minister has however congratulated maneb for releasing free fair and credible examination results
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
joyce mhango nyale ya zisudzo azisudzo mmalawi muno akhala akulimbika kutukula lusoli cha zovuta zina zina mwayi woonekera nkulandira mphotho zochita zawo sumapezeka adayamba kutaya mtima malawi ingapange zisudzo zoti maiko nkutamanda zili choncho masiku apitawa mwa ochita zisudzo mmalawi muno joyce mhango adalandira chikho cha ulemu ochita zisudzo mmaiko osiyanasiyana africa steven pembamoyo adacheza naye nkhani yabwinoyi 
  poyamba tafotokoza ndiwe ndani   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kusonyeza chikho chake chavula mhango ndine joyce mhango chavula wochokera ku rumphi ndidasankha wa zisudzo mmoyo mwanga makamaka ndimapanga mafilimu zisudzo mkonzi wa zisudzo ndimayendetsa kampani ya zisudzo ya rising choreos 
  posachedwapa udalandira chikho kukuyamika ntchito yako makamaka cha filimu yako yotchedwa lilongwe amalawi ambiri ndiwonyadira cha nkhaniyo sadziwa filimuyi ndiyotani ungawafotokozere zoonadi ambiri mwina sakuidziwa filimuyi lilongwe filimu yomwe imakamba za mtsikana oyendayenda yemwe ana atatu omwe adapatsidwa amuna osiyanasiyana pantchito yabwino amapeza ndalama zambiri kuchoka kwa amuna okwatira omwe amagona nawo pambuyo zaka 7 kale lake la lilongwe lidayamba kumuweruza mufilimu yonse samaiwala oti musandiweruze simukudziwa komwe ndachokera 
  sitidamveko wakhazikitsa filimi imeneyi mdziko muno idakhazikitsidwa october chaka chatha ku lilongwe ku cinema ambiri adasemphana nayo mapulani okhazikitsanso alipo april chaka chino adzayionerere chimbale chake chifika pamsika posachedwapa 
  udalandira ulemu waukulutu ukuona chinsinsi chake chagona pati ndiyambe kunena ndine wodala mwa olandira ulemu umenewu ndidapereka filimuyi kwa woyendetsa mwambo ipikisane nawo mafilimu mwa mwayi idasankhidwa nawo mgulu la mafilimu omwe adasankhidwa ndimakhulupilira kulimba mtima kwanga ndiko kudandithandiza pamphepete madalitso mulungu 
  zidakutengera yaitali kupanga filimuyi udakumana zokhoma zanji zidatitengera masiku 12 ojambula mosadukiza zonse zitheke padatenga yaitali yovuta kwambiri idali yokonzekera kusankha oyenera kusonkhanitsa zofunika ndingoti padalibe kugona komabe zonsezo zidapita poti filimuyi yalandirako zikho ziwiri tsopano choyamba cha ochita zisudzo mwapamwamba ku shunaffoz ku zambia mchaka cha 2015 ichi chapompanochi
Label: MUSIC

Text:
mutharika afika mawa mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika afika mdziko muno mawa ku america komwe adakakhala nawo msonkhano wa bungwe la maiko onse la united nations 
  katswiri wa za ndale george phiri wati mutharika wachita kubwera adzakonze mavuto omwe agwa mdziko muno kunja 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka wadukiza ulendo mutharika phiri amanena za zipolowe zomwe zidachitika pakati ochita zionetsero anyamata omwe adavala makaka chipani cha democratic progressive party dpp 
  anyamatawo adatema akuluakulu bungwe la human rights defenders coalition hrdc omwe zionetsero zofuna kukakamiza wapampando wa bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec jane ansah atule pansi udindo kaamba koti sadayendetse zisankho za meyi 21 
  pofuna kukhazikitsa bata apolisi adaponyera utsi wokhetsa misonzi wina udakagwera ku chipatala cha gulupu komwe udadzetsa mpanipani pakati odwala madotolo mpaka wina woyembekezera adakomoka nawo 
  mwa omwe adakhapidwa mwa akuluakulu hrdc billy mayaya 
  adamson muula mwa madokotala aphunzitsi sukulu ya madotolo ya college of medicine com alembera kalata wa apolisi duncan mwapasa yosonyeza kukhumudwa woponyera utsi ku chipatala 
  wa bungwe la malawi health equity network george jobe naye adati wokhumudwa mpungwepungwe womwe apolisi adadzetsa ku gulupu 
  chokhumudwitsa nchoti apolisi sakusankha malo woponya utsi wokhetsa misonzi moti wina udagwera ku gulupu mpaka woyembekezera kukomoka nawo adatero jobe 
  ichi nchifukwa chake phiri akuyamikira mutharika kaamba kodukiza ulendo azathana mavutowa   kalata yolengeza kubwera kwa mutharika yachokera ku nyumba ya boma ikuti mtsogoleriyu atera bwalo la ndege la kamuzi internatioal airport kia mawa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
kulumana ofunika kulandira chakudya kusankha ovutikitsitsa alandire thandizo la chakudya ku boma kwavuta mmidzi ina pamene mafumu ayamba kulumana 
  izitu zadza pamene boma kudzera mnthambi yoona za ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi ya department of disaster management affairs dodma yayamba kugawa chakudya kwa amene sadakolole chakudya chokwanira cha ntchemberezandonda ngamba 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kugawa chimanga kuli mkati mmaboma nthambi ya dodma idapempha alangizi zamalimidwe ofesi ya dc mboma lililonse itolere maina amene athiphwa njala 
  ntchitoyo dodma idatolera mabanja oposa 400 000 malinga amene akuyendetsa ntchitoyi ku dodma paul kalilombe 
  awatu oposa 2 miliyoni amene tikuyenera tiwapatse thandizo iyi nambala yomwe tigwiritse ntchito lonse adatero kalilombe 
  nambalayi yakhumudwitsa mafumu amene akuti mmadera asiya ambiri amene akhudzidwa njala 
  gulupu cheghama wa mboma la karonga kwa paramount kyungu adati mdera lake mwa nyakwawa 5 amene akhudzidwa njala ayenera thandizo madzi asadafike mkhosi 
  cheghama adati pafupifupi 300 amene akuphupha njala mwa mfumu ngingekemo mwangwabila kazguli kazguli 2 mwaphoka 
  chomwe tadabwa nchakuti tidapereka mainawo boma liwathandize avomereza 75 okha ndiwo alandire chakudya adatero cheghama 
  gulupu mpochera ya kwa mfumu tsikulamowa mboma la ntcheu yati idapereka maina 250 amene adakhudzidwa njala mdera lake 
  poyamba akuti adadziwitsidwa nambala ija ayidula 115 amene alandire thandize 
  sabata yatha adaitananso mafumu onse titapita akatiuza nambala ija ayidulanso 45 okha amene alandire thandizo adatero mpochera 
  250 tonse takambirana chimanga chikabwera tonse tikhala pansi tigawana kaya adzatenga chimanga chodzadza mbale yokha bolani akaphike kaphala kumwa adaonjeza 
  mfumuyo idati dera lake kapuchi ngamba zimene zidasokoneza moti palibe amene adapeza thumba limodzi la chimanga 
  kunoko kuli moto ineyo ndimakolola matumba oposa 10 chaka chino ndidapeza ndowa imodzi basi adatero 
  kalilombe akuti nthambi yawo ikuyangana okhawo amene alibe pogwira nkhuku yeniyeniyi alibe 
  zoti chiwerengero chabwera chochepa zimenezo sitikudziwa tidadalira afufuze amene akufunika thandizo nambalayo tidapatsidwa 
  zoti chimangacho azigawana gulu sitikondwera ndiye akupha cholinga chathu asafe njala angovomereza basi si onse amene angalandire thandizo adatero kalilombe 
  adati banja la pafupifupi asanu likulandira thumba limodzi la chimanga lolemera makilogalamu 50 
  lipoti la malawi vulnerability assessment committee mvac lomwe lidatuluka mwezi watha lidati 3.3 miliyoni atuwa njala chaka chino choti sadakolole chakudya chokwanira 
  kodi enawo athawira kalilombe akuti akamaliza gawo ayambalo akhala pansi aunguze za 3.3 miliyoni amene mvac yafunthula 
  amene tikuwagaira sitidagwiritsire ntchito zomwe yatulutsa mvac tikamaliza gawoli ndiye tikhala pansi tigawirenso 3.3 miliyoni amene mvac yatulutsa adatero kalilombe lachitatu pamene amagawa chimanga mmaboma dowa mchinji 
  pofotokoza mmene ndondomekoyo ikuyendera kalilombe adati ntchitoyo yayamba sabata yatha mmaboma phalombe chikwawa 
  adati ndondomekoyi yachedwerako mndandanda wa oyenera kulandira umachedwa kuperekedwa ku nthambi yawo 
  malinga kalilombe sabata ino amayenera kugawa mboma la blantyre ofesi ya dc yachedwa kupereka mndandanda wa amene akuyenera kulandira 
  tikufunitsitsa pofika 14 mwezi uno tikhale titamaliza sitikupereka kwa mafumu kwa amene adalembedwayo adatero
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
papa wapereka zipangizo za mchipatala mdziko la ecuador mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wapereka thandizo la zipangizo za mchipatala ku la ecuador 
 malinga malipoti vatican radio papa wapereka thandizoli njira imodzi yofuna kuchepetsa mavuto omwe la ecuador likukumana nao maka cha mliri wa coronavirus 
 thandizoli la zipangizo zothandiza omwe akuvutika kupuma athe kupuma mosavutika 
 bungwe la ma episkopi mpingo wa katolika mdziko la ecuador atsimikiza za nkhaniyi kazembe wa la ecuador kulikulu la mpingo ku vatican jos luis lvarez palacio atalengeza thandizoli latumizidwa kale lifika mdzikolo masiku ochepa akubwerawa 
 47,000 agwidwa nthenda ya covid 19 4,000 amwalira nthendayi mdziko la ecuador lomwe liri chiwerengero cha chokwana 17 million malinga malipoti unduna wa za umoyo mdzikolo 
 thandizo la papa francisco ku la ecuador limodzi mwa zithandize zomwe wakhala akupereka ku maiko osiyana siyana omwe akhudzidwa mliri wa coronavirus 
 mmbuyomu wapereka thandizo la zipangizo za mchipatala ku maiko italy romania spain syria israel zambia pongotchula ochepa
Label: HEALTH

Text:
wopha wame akasewenza moyo wonse bwalo la milandu lalikulu mboma la salima lachitatu lidagamula limbani maliro mnyamata yemwe adapha mlaliki shadreck wame kukasewenza moyo wonse

  naye woweruza esmie chombo sadachedwe zambiri kungolunjika mpaka kupereka chigamulocho chomwe chidaliza ake maliro 
  khope yake ili chigwere maliro yemwe adalibe omuimira pamlandu adapempha chombo amumvere chisoni wachichepere banja amathandiza abale 
  popereka chigamulo chake chombo adati maliro akuyenera kusewenza moyo wonse mlandu womwe adapalamula ngwaukulu wosayenera munthu wachichepere 
  adatinso naye wame adali abale omwe amawathandiza moti ana ambiri omwe amawalipirira fizi apita msukulu zosakhala akulephera kukwanitsa kupeza fizi 
  malinga mneneri wa polisi mboma la salima gift chitowe maliro adauza bwalo la milandulo adapha wame poganizira amasunga ndalama zambiri mnyumba mwake 
  atadya mutu poona katundu yemwe wame amabweretsa pakhomopo maliro adaganiza zomupha amubere patsiku lomwe adamuphalo maliro adagwidwa matumba chimanga omwe adanyamula wilibala usiku

  adati maliro adapepesa zomwe adachita amaoneka wokhudzika mnthawi yonse ya mlanduwu

Text:
acb idayamba kale kufufuza chaponda nthambi yofufuza za ziphuphu ya anti corruption bureau acb yati idayamba kale kufufuza nkhani ya momwe bungwe la admarc lidagulira chimanga mdziko la zambia 
  wa acb lukas kondowe adanena lachitatu patangotha masiku angapo pomwe komiti imene lidasankhidwa mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika lifufuze nduna ya za malimidwe george chaponda ikukhudzidwa pankhani yoti bungwe la admarc lidasokoneza zina pogula chimangacho kupyolera kampani ya kaloswe courier and commuter services ya ku zambia 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka afufuzidwe chaponda mwa zina gululo limene limatsogoleledwa anastazia msosa lidapempha mutharika acb ifufuze momwe nkhaniyi idayendera kondowe adati adayamba kale 
  tidayamba kale mtsogoleri wa lino asadakhazikitsenso komiti yapadera choncho tingopitiriza basi adatero kondowe 
  polankhula mtolankhani wathu kondowe adati adangomva pawailesi za kupsa kwa ofesi ya chaponda lachiwiri adati akudikira lipoti la momwe maofesi chaponda akuluakulu adapsera 
  sitikudziwa zomwe tikadafuna mkafukufuku wathu kumeneko zaonongeka nawo motowo adatero kondowe 
  motowo udaononga ofesi ya nduna malinga wa apolisi lexten kachama amene adafika pamalo ngoziyo adati apolisi akufufuzabe chidayambitsa motowo cha mma 11 koloko mmawa 
  motowo udadzetsa mtsutso pakati amalawi pamene ankati udabuka pofuna kusokoneza umboni pomwe ankati ngozi chabe 
  polankhulapo wa mabungwe omwe si boma omwe adakatenga chiletso mwezi watha ndunayi ayiimitse kaye pantchito mpaka kafukufukuyu atachitika moses mkandawire adati kuyaka kwa ofesiku kukufunika kufufuzidwanso mwapadera 
  mkandawire yemwe wa bungwe loona za kakhalidwe ka ya church and society sinodi ya livingstonia adati pakadalipano zovuta kuloza zala munthu ndiye wayatsa motowo 
  sitingaloze zala munthu ndiye wayatsa moto chofunika kafukufuku wina ofesiyi idayaka panthawi ino pomwe ili mkamwamkamwa mwa siyidayake ofesi ya zofalitsa nkhani ofesi ina kodi tingati zangochitika adadabwa mkandawire 
  adati chopweteka kwambiri nchoti failo uthenga wambiri waboma waonongeka motowo zomwe zingasokoneze ntchito za boma zomwe zimayenera kupitilizidwa osiyanasiyana 
  izitu nzopweteketsa ana athu tawaonongera uthenga wofunika womwe akadadzaugwiritsa ntchito mtsogolo muno kaamba koti zinthu zathu zambiri sizili intaneti n gati maiko aanzathu adatero mkandawire 
  komabe mkandawire adayamikira mutharika pokhazikitsa komiti yapaderayo adayamikira zotsatira za kafukufukuyo ati popeza adangotsimikizira zomwe mabungwe omwe siaboma akhala akunena chaponda ngofunika kufufuzidwa 
  malinga lipotili chaponda akuyenera kufufuzidwa momwe adalowerererapo kampani ya transglobe ikhale nawo mgulu logulitsa boma chimanga 
  pali kukaikitsa njira yomwe kampani ya transglobe idapezera chiphaso chotumizira chimanga mdziko la zambia kubweretsa kuno choncho chaponda akuyenera kufufuzidwa mbali yomwe adatengapo idatero lipotilo 
  lipotili lidatinso bungwe la ku zambia la zambia cooperative federation lomwe adali pamgwirizano bungwe admarc loperekera chimanga chokwana matani 100 000 lidangoperekapo matani 4 000 okha 
  padakalipano komiti yapadera ku nyumba ya malamulo lachitatu limayembekezera kutulutsa zotsatira zake 
  poyankha mafunso komitiyo sabata yatha chaponda adati nkhaniyo siyimamukhudza kwambiri gawo lake lidali kukambirana nduna ya malimidwe ku zambia boma la malawi likufuna chimanga za ndondomeko yogulira chimangacho adatero idali mmanja mwa admarc 
  lathu lidali pamoto wa njala nyumba ikupsa mukhonza kuthyola zitseko mawindo mupulumutse mwana amene angafere momwemo ndondomeko zina sizinatsatidwe tidali pampishupishu chaponda adatero
