Text:
chilima adzapikitsana nawo chaka cha mawa wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino saulos chilima wati adzaima nawo zisankho za chaka cha mawa dongosolo lonse loyenera posankha mtsogoleri likadzatsatidwa 
  chilima adalankhula pologalamu ya padera wailesi ya zodiak broadcasting station zbs 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka zidali chonchi mutharika chilima asadasemphane june 6 chilima adalengeza atuluka democratic progressive party dpp kaamba ka za mtopola zomwe achinyamata achipanicho amachitira amufuna adzapikitsane mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika msonkhano wosankha atsogoleri chipanicho 
  chilima adakana kudzalimbana eni ake chipani cha dpp mmalo mwake adaganiza zotulukamo 
  kusagwirizana kudabuka mchipanicho pomwe mkazi wa mtsogoleri wakale wa lino callista mutharika adapempha mlamu peter mutharika apereke mpando kwa chilima kaamba koti wakula sangadzapambane zisankhozo 
  peter mutharika adakana kutula pansi udindowo ndpo adati yemwe sakufuna adzaimenso yudase isikariote wosafunira dpp zabwino 
  polankhula wailesi ya zbs chilima adatsimikizira amalawi wokonzeka kudzapikitsana nawo zisankho za chaka cha mawa dongosolo loyenera posankhira atsogoleri likatsatidwa kaamba koti sakufuna kukakamiza adzawaimire 
  adati ambiri akhala akulimbikitsa adzapikitsane nawo sadafotokoze adzaima payekha alowa chipani ayambitsa chake 
  tikukuma mabungwe zipani dongosolo lonse likatha tilengeza zotsatira zake 
  kuima wekha nkwabwino uyenera kukuganizira utha kumalimbikira mtunda wopanga madzi adatero mtsogoleri yemwe walongeza amalawi tsogolo la chilima movement lisongola pasanathe masiku 10 
  mtsogoleriyu waonetsa ubwino wa mgwirizano pakati zipani womwe udachitika 2004 
  watsutsa zoti mpingo wa katolika ndiwo ukumulimbikitsa adzaima mpingo wa katolika umalimbikitsa akhristu ake azitenga nawo mbali ndale sulodzera mtsogoleri woti adzamuvotere 
  chilima wakhala akupezeka kulankhula misonkhano yisiyanasiyana ya mpingo wa katolika komwe ansembe akhala akumulimbikitsa asakane maitanidwe wodzaima nawo zisankho za chaka cha mawa 
  mtsogoleriyu wakhala akudzudzula wa ziphuphu mboma zomwe zakhala zikudabwitsa kaamba koti iyeyo wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino 
  chilima wapempha akalembetse mwaunyinji wawo adzaponye nawo mavoti zisankhozo 
  kulumpha dzenje nkuliwonera patali ndipemphe akalembetse mulungu adzawapatsa atsogoleri womwe akufuna adatero mtsogoleriyu 
  chilima walimbikitsanso achinyamata omwe akufuna kudzapikitsana nawo zisankhozo asagwe mpwayi adapereka zitsanzo za andale odziwika aleke banda gwanda chakuamba omwe adalowa ndale achinyamata
Label: POLITICS

Text:
papa wapempha akhritsu okhazikika chikhulupiliro chawo mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wati akhristu akuyenera osagwedezeka chikhulupiriro chawo 
 papa francisko papa francisco walankhula loweruka misa yomwe anatsogolera ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican 
 wati apostoli adakumana mavuto osiyana siyana pofalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso sadalore mavutowo achepetse kuthetseratu chikhulupiriro chawo mwa mulungu mmalo mwake adali olimba mtima chikhulupiriro 
 pamenepa papa francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kutengera chitsanzo pokhala olimba mtima osagwedezeka chikhulupiliro pofalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso
Label: RELIGION

Text:
mbts ipempha apitilize kupereka magazi wolemba glory kondowe uploads/2019/09 blood donors.jpg alt= width="530 height="450 />ena mwa akupereka magazi ya mbuyomu bungwe lotolera magazi mdziko muno la malawi blood transfusion services mbts lapempha mdziko muno apitirize kupereka magazi cholinga chofuna kupulumutsa miyoyo ya ochuluka zipatala zosiyanasiyana 
 wofalitsa nkhani za bungweli mdziko muno allen kaombe anena polankhula radio maria malawi 
 ati udindo wopereka magazi wa wina aliyese anatsutsa zimene amaganiza kupereka magazi ntchito ya ophunzira okhawokha msukulu zosiyanasiyana 
 mwa zina kaombe ayamikira omwe amadzipereka popereka magazi ku ma ofesi zomwe ati zofunika kwambiri akumbutsa malawi omwe akuyenera kupereka magazi oyambira zaka 15 zakubadwa kulekeza 65 anthanzi 
 sizoti ana sukulu wokha ayi ndikupempha malawi onse udindo wawo kupereka magazi ku bungweri anatero kaombe 
 ati magazi omwe amafunikira mdziko muno 120 thousand litres chaka amene latolera 58 thousand yomwe 50 percent yokha basi
Label: HEALTH

Text:
blantyre yawala iwalirabe kuyenda usiku tsopano sikukhalanso koopsa ganizo la khonsolo ya mzinda wa blantyre lipherezeke 
  mneneri wa khonsoloyi anthony kasunda wati khonsolooyi ikuganiza zoika magetsi mmisewu aziwala usiku wonse mumzindawu 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mmbuyomu adaba zitsulo za magetsi kasunda wauza tamvani pasadathe miyezi 6 msewu wa masauko chipembere highway ukhala magetsiwa kuchoka ku blantyre mpaka ku limbe 
  aona kuwala ndithu talowa mumgwirizano bungwe la roads fund administration tigwire ntchito imeneyi yomwe idye ndalama zokwana k400 miliyoni adatero kasunda 
  adati mmisewu ina ingapo ntchitoyi yagwirika kale 
  tapanga kale kuchoka kandodo corner shop mpaka kameza roundabout kwacha roundabout mpaka kudya kudutsa mbc tv ci mpaka green corner ndinso sunnyside mpaka ku manyowe 
  ntchito imeneyi yatitengera ndalama pafupifupi k145 miliyoni zomwe gawo la k1.8 biliyoni zochokera kuboma za ntchito yachitukuko cha mumzinda wa blantyre adatero kasunda 
  mneneriyu adatinso khonsolo ikamapeza ndalama ionetsetsa misewu yonse ya mumzinda wa blantyre ikhale magetsi 
  magetsi amathandiza kukhwimitsa chitetezo ndikhumbo la khonsolo ya blantyre mzinda ukhale wowala usiku tikumema onse mumzindawu atithandize poteteza magetsi amenewa makamaka potsina khutu apolisi akulu khonsoloyi akaona wina akuononga dala zipangizo zamagetsi mapolo nthambo zamagetsi adaonjezera kasunda
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
papa wati utatu woyera muli chikondi chozama cha mulungu mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wati utatu woyera wa mulungu ukuyimira chikondi chozama chomwe mulungu amakhala nacho pakati 
 malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa walankhula la mulungu kulikulu la mpingo wu ku vatican tsiku lomwe mpingo umachita chaka cha utatu woyera wa mulungu 
 wati chikondi pakati mulungu atate mulungu mwana mulungu mzimu woyera chikondi chopulumutsa popeza mulungu adakonda la pansi kotero adatumiza mwana yesu khristu 
 papa francisco wati utatu woyera wa mulungu umawulula chikondi cha mulungu chosasimbika chikondi chomwe wati chili pakati eni atatuwo 
 wati chikondi cha mulungu atate mulungu mwana mulungu mzimu woyera chikondi cha mwamba chopulumutsa mulungu adakonda la pansi kotero adatumiza mwana yesu khristu kudzapulumutsa 
 papa francisco wati mulungu amakonda ake mulungu amakonda la pansi angakhale la pansi lodzadza uchimo.iye wati mulungu amakonda ake posayanganira mphulupulu zawo 
 papa francisco wati kudzera mchaka cha utatu woyera mulungu amaitana ake afike osinthika chikondi chodabwitsa chimenechi cha utatu woyera 
 wati akhristu amalandira za ulere za mulungu kudzera mma sakramenti powerenga kumvetsera mau mulungu papa francisco wati kudzera mma sakramenti akhristu amakhala ubwenzi utatu woyera ubwenzi womwe umabweretsa umodzi mtendere pakati 
 mwambowo wapempherera mwa njira ya padera maiko amene akhudzidwa kwambiri mliri wa coronavirus 
 pamenepa wati kusonkhana kwa bwalo la saint peters square patapita miyez itatu zisakuchitika nkhani yosangalatsa mliri wa coronavirus wotheka kuthetsa komabe wachenjeza akuyenera kupitiriza kusamala kutsata ndondomeko zoyikika pofuna kupewa nthendayi 
 pomaliza wakumbutsa katolika mwezi wa june mwezi wa mtima woyerayera wa ambuye yesu wapempha akonde kulemekeza ambuye yesu wokhala ukaristia
Label: RELIGION

Text:
makhansala ayamba mopendama   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   kuli makhansala akadatunga madzi kutali pamene pangodutsa miyezi 4 chisankhireni makhansala akudandaula makhansalawa ayamba kubisala sakuwayendera amve mavuto 
  mwachitsanzo kwa gulupu soka t dambe mboma la neno akuti khansala wawo adamuona ya kampeni yokha chimusankhire sakufikanso 
  kuderali kuli mavuto kusowa madzi aukhondo midzi 34 kumeneku ikumwa mjigo umodzi kuli mavuto kusowa zipatala pomwe akuyenda makilomita 26 akafike kuchipatala cha boma cha neno 
  khansala wa derali montfort bwanali adati nzoonadi sadafikeko kuderalo madera kaamba ka mavuto mayendedwe 
  kupatula k80 000 yomwe khansalayu akulandira pamwezi boma lidati makhansalawa apatsidwanso mwayi wotenga njinga yamoto mwa ngongole ziwathandize kuyendera madera mpaka lero lonjezoli silidakwaniritsidwe zomwe zikubweretsa mavuto amayendedwe bwanali adafotokozera 
  kunyamuka cha mma 4 mmawa ukafike midzi imeneyi yomwe yachita malire la mozambique mma 2:00 madzulo apatu ndiye wayenda pagalimoto ndiye nzovuta ndingawayendere wamba amenewa pokhapokha nditakhala mayendedwe adatero bwanali amene wati chisankhidwireni wangogwira ntchito kamodzi 
  adati ntchitoyo idali yolambula msewu sabata yatha 
  tsopano zikuchititsa asaone ubwino wa makhansala midzi ya kumphika kuziona ntaja soka benalita leketa kwa kunenekude ina ku mwanza neno pamene akusowabe kotulira nkhawa zawo 
  nyakwawa kuziona yati ake akuona mavuto ambiri amene amafunitsitsa atawatula kwa khansala wawo amene sakuoneka 
  mwaona nokha midzi yonse kuno tikumwa mjigo umodzi tilibe mijigo tilibe sukulu ya sekondale tikafuna kuchipatala ndiye tiyende makilomita 26 kukafika kuboma la neno mwaonanso timalima kwambiri sitingathe kupita nazo kumsika kaamba ka kusowa kwa misewu 
  yomwe adati tikhala makhansala ndidasangalala poganizira tizidzalankhulana khansala wathu kumuuza mavuto athuwa chisankhireni khansala mpaka lero sadafike kuno idatero mfumuyo 
  vutoli liliponso mmudzi mwa thambala kwa t kanduku mboma la mwanza midzi inaso mboma la ntcheu kwa t phambala ikudandaula khansala wawo adasowa atangomusankha 
  zikusiyanabe mmudzi mwa mtamba kwa t nkalo mboma la chiradzulu mmudzi mwa chimpini mboma la zomba kumeneko ntchito za khansala akuti zayamba kuoneka kukuvutabe alumikizane khansala wawo 
  mfumu mtamba ikuti kumeneko khansala wawo akumawayendera wawabweretsera khitchini lophikira phala la ana asukulu 
  nayo nyakwawa golosi ikuti chiyembekezo chikuoneka makhansalawa awathandiza kudera lawo akusowa yomamva mavuto amene akukumana 
  khansala wa derali emmanuel kamwendo akuti vuto phungu yemwe sakumuyendera wati kusowekera kwa njinga zamoto zomwe adawalonjeza vuto lina 
  ndayendera wodi yanga ndiye ndatengedwa abungwe apo ayi sizitheka npake ayambe kudandaula sindikuwayendera adatero kamwendo 
  nako ku karonga malinga senior chief kalonga yati ntchito yangoyamba kumene 
  dzulo 23 kudali nkhumano ya makhansala kukambirana momwe angamapezere ndalama zotukulira khonsolo ino ndaona ntchito imeneyi adatero kalonga 
  wa bungwe lomwe ntchito zake ndikutukula akumudzi la miglat lomwe likugwira ntchito zake mboma la chiradzulu thyolo victor mkolongo akuti mmaboma amene akugwira ntchitowa makhansala ayamba ntchito yawo patenga 
  msabata yomweyi makhala onse 10 mboma la chiradzulu adatiyendera aone ntchito zathu aka ndikoyamba kuyenderedwa ndikumva kuyenda kwawo koyamba chisankhidwireni ndikumeneku tingati ayamba zatenga miyezi ayambe kugwira ntchitoyi adatero mkolongo 
  naye jephter mwanza yemwe mapologalamu kalondolondo akuti nthawiyi yachepa chisankhidwireni komabe zikuonetsa pali mavuto ntchito zawo 
  ndinali ku nsanje akuoneka sakudziwa ntchito yawo pamee akuoneka akuzitsata nkhani yakula mkusiyanitsa ntchito za khansala phungu adatero mwanza
Label: POLITICS

Text:

  uthenga wawo wa pasaka wopita kwa atumiki onse akhritsu akufuna kwabwino ma episkopiwa ati mliriwu wasokoneza kwambiri chikondwelero cha pasaka cha chaka chino choncho pofuna kuonetsa umodzi wawo akhristu onse omwe pakadali akudwala nthendayi akuwayikiza mmapemphero anthuwa mulungu awachiritse 
 kalata yomwe yalembedwayi ati mwa akukhala mwa mantha kamba ka mliriwu achibale akusungidwa ku malo awokha zomwe zikukulitsa kutaya mtima pakati pawo choncho ati uthenga wa pasakawu uwalimbikitse za chikondi cha mulungu 
 onse omwe akudwala matendawa omwe akuthandiza odwalawa akuyenera kudalira mulungu polimbana matendawa akhristu akuyenera zomwe papa francisco anapempha kusonkhedwe limodzi limodzi tithadizire onse omwe akhuzidwa yatero kalatayo 
 apemphaso akhritsu akhale olimba mtima momwe akazi awiri aja analili pokawona manda ambuye yesu zomwe zikusonyeza zonse zatha nayo imfa yagonja

Text:

 khani wayankhula lachitatu ku domino lodge mzinda wa zomba pomwe anakonza phwando posangalala mgwirizano wa tonse wapambana chisankho 
 wati achinyamata ayembekezere miyoyo yawo isintha popeza adzichita ma business osiyanasiyana kaamba koti iwonso omwe anathandizira tonse alliance ipambane 
 mavenda amenewa amu zomba amene anagwira ntchito yotamandika chipani chathu chipambane amenewa amene apangitsa zinthu zisinthe zasinthadi fetereza wa 4 sauzande wabwera ngongole zija zafikanso cha amenewa anatero khani 
 poyankhulanso mwa ochita business mboma la zomba yemwenso wapampando wa chipani cha peoples pp msikawo ayatu chidothe ma vendor amu mzindawu chomwe akufuna chitukuko popeza ya misonkhano yokopa inatha

 wapampando wa bungweli prudence kadiwa ati akuluakulu bungweli akumana posachedwapa akambirane za mmene angayendetsere bungwe li nyengo ino ya mlili wa covid 19 
 arkidayosizi ya lilongwe tikhala msonkhano wathu loweruka likubwerali 23 may tikumane kukambirana zoyenera maka zomwe tinalephera kupanga yake anatero kadiwa

Text:

 nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani kuphunzitsa zinthu zosiyanasiyana mark botoman omwe anena pambuyo poyendera chipatala chomwe changomangidwa kumene cha makina mdera zomba chisi 
 botomani yemwenso phungu wa derali wati kumangidwa kwachipatalachi kuthandiza kuchepetsa mtunda mderali amayenda akafuna thandizo la chipatala 
 ambiri mdera lino amayenda mtunda wautali kufuna thandizo lachipatakla amapita kuphalombe amathandizidwa chipatala cha mission konkuno kubwera kwa chipatala ichi kuchepetsa mwa maqvuto pankhani zaumoyo omwe amakumana nawo mdera lino anatero botoman 
 polankhulapo wa zaumoyo mboma la zomba dr raphael piringu wati oposa 21 000 omwe akuyembekezeka kupindulira chipatalachi chikatsekuliridwa 
 chipatalachi achimanga ntchito yatsala pangono kutha panopa chatsala ndikumanga chipinda choti azimayi azichiriramo kupanga register mukaundula wazipatala za mboma lino la zomba anatero dr piringu

Text:

  nduna ya zamalimidwe ulimi wamthirira chitukuko cha madzi allan chiyembekeza ndiye adalengeza pamsonkhano wa atolankhani kulikulu la undunawu mzinda wa lilongwe lachiwiri lapitali 
  adati boma lachita poona omwe amapindula mupologalamuyi omweomwewo saonetsa kulikonse zomwe zidachititsa maiko nthambi zomwe zimathandizirapo mpologalamuyi kugwa mphwayi 
  mwayi womaliza ogula feteleza mbewu za sabuside chaka cha mawa adzadzigulira okha pologalamuyi idayambitsidwa cholinga chopatsa alimi poyambira zikawayendera azidzidalira malipoti akusonyeza omweomwewo ndiwo amalandira makuponi chaka nchaka popanda kuonetsa kulikonse adatero chiyembekeza 
  adati poona boma laganiza lipereke mwayi umodziumodzi kwa oyenera thandizoli yemwe zimukanike azidzionera yekha zochita mtsogolo mwayi upita kwa 
  pakalipano tili mndandanda wa alimi chimanga okwana 4.2 miliyoni mwa amenewa tasankhamo alimi 1.5 miliyoni omwe athandizike chaka chino asayembekezere chaka chamawa adzapezekanso pamndandanda wa alimi olandira makuponi adatero chiyembekeza 
  wapampando wa komiti ya zaulimi mnyumba ya malamulo felix jumbe sakugwirizana ganizoli ponena kumeneku kuweta umphawi wadzawoneni mdziko muno 
  potsirapo ndemanga zomwe chiyembekeza adanena jumbe adati nzosatheka ovutikitsitsa nkukhala odzidalira paokha cha matumba awiri feteleza paketi imodzi ya mbewu zosowa pamoyo zambiri 
  zimenezi nkungofuna kunyeketsa amalawi opsa kalewa zoona munthu angasinthe matumba awiri feteleza paketi imodzi ya mbewu basi akufuna apange ndondomeko yabwino adzapereke zipangizo zokwanira zoti mlimi akhozadi kuimirapo akasiya kupereka thandizo adatero jumbe 
  adati mmaiko zambia alimi adakwanitsa kuima paokha boma lidawapatsa zipangizo zokwanira matumba 8 mlimi moti adaleka kudalira boma 
  jumbe adati njira yomwe boma la malawi limatsata mupologalamu ya sabuside yongopeputsa alimi osati kutukula ulimi momwe maiko otukuka adachitira kwawo 
  naye mfumu kabudula ya ku lilongwe idadandaula ndondomekoyi yatsopanoyi ponena zikakhala choncho ndiye ambiri azivutika njala umphawi 
  alimi ambiri malo olima ochepa kwambiri moti akolole nkugulitsa zonse sangadzakwanitsebe kugula feteleza mmene udakwerera mtengomu thumba limodzi la feteleza k23 000 pomwe la chimanga k5 000 kutanthauza mlimi akuyenera kusunga matumba 5 chimanga adzagule thumba limodzi la feteleza 
  nanga poti alimi ambiri amafuna matumba feteleza 4 kuposa apo ndiye agulitse matumba angati chimanga aime paokha mwinanso pakhomopo pali ana angapo akufunika fizi zovala kudya adatero kabudula 
  mwezi wathawu akadaulo pankhani za kayendetsedwe ka chuma economics association of malawi ecama adalangiza boma pologalamu ya sabuside ikuyenera kutha kaamba koti imapsinja ndondomeko ya chuma bajeti 
  mmadera ambiri mvula yobzalira yagwa kale katundu wa sabuside yemwe wafika kale mmisika yomwe idakhazikitsidwa azikagulira zipangizozi sakukwana theka la katundu yense yemwe akufunika mupologalamuyi 
  pologalamu ya chaka chino boma lakonza feteleza wokwana matani 150 000 omwe yemwe agawidwe pakatimpakati wokulitsira wobereketsera matani okwana 3 000 mbewu za wa nyemba soya khobwe nandolo mtedza

  mitengoyi ndiyokwererapo kuyerekeza mitengo yammbuyomu ati pofuna kuchepetsa ndalama zomwe boma limaononga mupologalamuyi

Text:
kulandira mulungu kulandira yesu papa mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wati povomera kulandira mulungu akhristu amalandira yesu khristu yemwe 
 malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa walankhula lamulungu ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican wati fanizo la wofetsa mbewu lothandiza akhristu kuwunika za moyo wawo maka umo mmene alandilira mau mulungu 
 zolankhulalankhula zake tsiku lamulungu la 15 nyengo ya chaka papa francisco wafotokozera uthenga wabwino womwe unawerengedwa tsikuli omwe fanizo la wofetsa mbewu 
 wati sikungakhale kulakwitsa kunena fanizo la wofetsa mbewu manthu wa mafanizo opezeka baibulo popeza ili fanizo lomwe likunena mwa mvemvemve zakufunika komvetsera mau mulungu 
 papayu wapitiriza kunena mau mulungu ndiye yesu khristu kotero amene amvetsera ndikuvomera mau mulungu ndiye akuvomera kulandira yesu khristu amene wati mau mulungu omwe mbewu fanizoli yesu khristu amene mau mulungu odzipangidwa munthu 
 papa francisco wati akhristu akuyenera kulandira mau mulungu nthaka yabwino yomwe ichititsa mbewu kumera kukula mpaka kubereka zipatso wati mulungu mbewu imene mulungu amafetsa pakati ake 
 papa francisco wati munthu nthaka pomwe mbewu yomwe mau mulungu amagwerapo zili kwa munthu kusankha akhala nthaka yotani ichi chisankho chomwe munthu akuyenera moyo wa chikhristu
Label: RELIGION

Text:
sitalaka yatha yaika amalawi pamoto pomwe ogwira ntchito mboma sitalaka kufuna malipiro akwere k67 k100 iliyonse omwe amafuna thandizo la ogwira ntchito mbomawa tsopano ndiwo pamavuto adzaoneni 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc pomwe limafika lachitatu nkuti maofesi ambiri aboma otseka kuchipatala kokha ndiko kudali kosatseka 
  anamwino amene adakumana mtsogoleri wa lino lolemba adati madandaulo kuphatikiza kukwezedwa kwa malipiro sakwaniritsidwa pofika 26 february nawonso achita sitalaka 
  wophunzira wina pasukulu ya sekondale ya nyambadwe adati kumeneko aphunzitsi pulaimale sekondale adayamba kunyanyala lachiwiri sabata yatha 
  mnyamatayu yemwe fomu 3 zaka 24 amagwira ntchito ya mnyumba ku mbayani amalandira k5 000 pamwezi 
  pandalamapo amachotsapo k4 700 alipirire sukuluyo pateremu 
  ndidachoka kwathu ku mangochi anga adamwalira anga ndiwo ankandilipirira sukulu ankagulitsa tiyi zitawasokonekera kusukulu adandithamangitsa 
  nditapata ntchitoyi ndipomwe ndabwerera kusukulu ndimalimbikira ntchitoyo ilipo ndikhale ndamaliza sukulu kunyanyala kwa aphunzitsi kukundiwawa ntchitoyi mwina itha kutha zomwe zidzandivute ndibwererenso kusukulu posowa ndalama adadandaula mnyamatayu 
  wophunzira wina yemwe sitandade 8 sukulu ya pulaimale ya mbayani wati boma liwaganizire mayeso ayamba posachedwapa 
  sitidaphunzire mokwana kwangotsala miyezi itatu tilembe mayeso boma litiganizire zimenezi adatero msungwanayo 
  mnyamata wina pasukulu ya nkolokoti sitandade 7 wati mayeso aphunzitsi ayamba sabata ya mawayi kotero boma liwaganizire 
  omwe akuchititsa adaphunzira kale ana msukulu za pulaiveti ndiye iyi si nkhani kwa chonde boma liganizire adatero mnyamata wa zaka 11 
  mphunzitsi wina mbayani adati mwana sakuyenera asemphe kanthu mayeso 
  chitsanzo 8 miyezi itatu yokha pomwe silabasi sadamalize nanenso ndine kholo zikundimvetsa chisoni nanga nditani adatero mphunzitsiyo 
  lachitatu ana sukulu zina mumzinda wa blantyre adapita kusukulu ya joyce banda foundation yomwe ya mtsogoleri wa lino anawo adati akasokoneze maphunziro ati ana kusukuluyo amaphunzirabe 
  nawo maofesi road traffic lachitatu adali kotseka wina yemwe tidamupeza ku ofesiyi amafuna thandizo adati zamukhudza 
  cof ya galimotoyi yatha dzulo 19 ndingayendebe pamsewu ndiye andigwira akangondigwira ndiyenera kulipira k3 500 ndachita changu kudzakonzetsa apa pali potseka 
  boma lidziwe omwe tikuvutika ndife osati adatero mkuluyo 
  wa bungwe la ogwira ntchito mboma la civil service trade union eliah kamphinda wati omwe akuvutikawa akuyenera omwe achititsa mavutowa adze 
  pali achititsa afunse azamaphunziro omwe adzetsa zonsezi adatero kamphinda 
  adati ku lilongwe apereka kalata yachidandaulo kuyambira lachinayi amayembekezeka kumakumana malo amodzi mpaka boma litayankha 
  nduna ya zachuma dr ken lipenga lachiwiri lomwelo adati sizingatheke boma likweze malipiro ogqira ntchito mboma boma litero ndiye ndalama zimene boma limalipira ntchito ake zidzakwera kuchoka k92 biliyoni kufika k276 biliyoni chaka chilichonse 
  adanena pamsonkhano wa atolankhani omwe adaitanitsa bungwe la international monetary fund imf 
  zingatanthauze ndalama za boma zonse zithera kulipira ogwira ntchito mboma mankhwala mzipatala tidzagulira chiyani adazizwa lipenga 
  wa imf kuno ku malawi tsidi tsikata adati adapempha boma la malawi lichepetse ndalama zomwe limagwiritsa ntchito 
  boma likuyenera kuonetsetsa likugwiritsa ntchito ndalama zomwe zilipo mmalo motaya zazingono bwenzi boma likuikapo mtima pogwiritsa ntchito ndalamazo adatero tsikata

Text:
dayosizi ya mzuzu yauza akhristu atumiki adzivala zodzitetezera ku covid-19 dayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya mzuzu yauza akhristu ake adzivala zotchinga kukamwa mphuno pamene akuchita mapemphero osiyanasiyana mmatchalitchi 
 walemba kalatayo bishop ryan episkopi wa dayosiziyo ambuye john ryan omwe anena kudzera kalata yomwe alembera ansembe abulazala asistere yomwe yatsindika za kuopsa kwa nthenda ya covid-19 
 ati potengera kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha omwe apezeka kachilombo ka coronavirus dayosiziyo kofunika anthuwa azitsatira njira zoyenera zopewera mliriwu 
 malinga kalata yomwe episkopi wa dayosizi ya mzuzu ambuye john ryan walembera atumiki onse dayosiziyo kuvala kwa mask komwe kukuchitika kwambiri mmadera matawuni dayosiziyo kukuyenera kukhale chikhalidwe kuzichitika mmadera onse kuphatikizapo mmadera omwe kumudzi 
 ntchito yolandira ma sacrament kulapa ukaristia akuti zikuyenera zizichitikira panja motsata malamulo onse omwe zaumoyo akulimbikitsa nambala ya anyamata othandizira misa akuti yachepetsedwa 
 kalatayi yati ana omwe akupita ku tchalitchi adziperekezedwa akuluakulu anawa asamakhale mmagulu kumasewera kutchalitchiku zomwe zachititsanso ayimitse maphunziro onse katekisimu wa ana 
 espiskopiyu kudzera kalatayi wayimitsa zochitika zosiyansiyana dayosiziyo wati kupereka kwa masacrament ubatizo ukaristia ulimbitso ukwati kuyambe kwayima kaye 
 wayimitsanso maulendo oyenderana pakati matchalitchi maparishi magulu mabungwe onse dayosiziyo wati ogwira ntchito dayosiziyo azikatenga chilorezo ku ofesi ya epskopiyu akufuna kuyenda ulendo wopita kunja kwa dayosiziyo 
 mwazina ambuye ryan apempha akhristu dayosiziyi azikhala moyo wabwino kuphatikizapo kudya zakudya zabwino masewero olimbitsa thupi kuchepetsa kumwa mowa kukhwimitsa moyo wawo wa uzimu popemphera 
 pamapeto pake episkopiyu walangiza atumikiwa aziwonetsetsa akutsatira malangizo onse pansewu popewa kuyendetsa galimoto mosasamala ataledzera wati atumikiwa apewenso kuyenda maulendo aatali ya usiku
Label: HEALTH

Text:

  pali malipoti oti mdzikomo muli nkhondo yapachiweniweni pakati asirikali boma zigawenga za chipani chotsutsa cha renamo chomwe mtsogoleri afonso dhlakama boma la mozambique lakhala likutsutsa malipotiwo zikwizikwi athawa mdzikomo kudzapeza mpumulo mdziko lino 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mtopolawu udayamba lachitatu sabata yatha pomwe maguluwo adatentha galimoto ina yomwe idanyamula mafuta petulo wandalama zokwana pafupifupi k28 378 800 yemwe amabwera mdziko muno 
  mtopolawu usadaiwalike maguluwo adatenthanso galimoto zina lachisanu masana ziwiri mwa galimotozo zidanyamulanso mafuta msabata imodzi yokha galimoto zoyatsidwa zakwana zisanu 
  chiwembuchi chikuchitika kwambiri kwa galimoto zodutsa njira ya tete beira maguluwo sakusankha kochokera kopita galimotozo 
  malingana wa bungwe la makampani oitanitsa mafuta mdziko muno enwell kadango ndalama zokwana pafupifupi k70 miliyoni zapita mmadzi kaamba ka ziwembuzi adati iyi nkhani yoipa pamalonda 
  mwachidule galimoto iliyonse yonyamula mafuta imanyamula mafuta ndalama zapakati k22 miliyoni k23 miliyoni ndiye mukawerengera ndalama zomwe zamwazika nzambiri zedi adatero kadango polankhula tamvani 
  potsatira zokambirana pakati maiko malawi mozambique la mozambique lidatumiza asirikali ake azikaperekeza galimoto zotuluka kulowa mdziko muno podzera mdzikolo

Text:
amayi okhudzidwa akuyembekezeka ziwonetsero poteteza ansah by thokozani chapola amayi omwe akuti okudzidwa ziwonetsero zokakamiza wapampando wa bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec jane ansah atule pansi udindo alengeza achita ziwonetsero mzinda wa blantyre mawa lino 
 white kulira msonkhano wa atolankhani pomwe amalengeza za ziwonetserozi alengeza msonkhano wa atolankhani womwe anachititsa lolemba mzinda wa blantyre mwa amayiwa yemwenso wapampando wa bungwe lomwe akulitcha concerned women seodi white wati zokhumudwitsa jane ansah akutonzedwa kunyazitsidwa njira zosiyanasiyana kaamba koti wapampando wa bungwe lomwe limayendetsa chisankho chapatatu 
 wati akukhulupilira akuchita powona ansah munthu wamayi 
 kuyenda kumeneku kusonyeza tili pambuyo ansah chisankho cha 2014 munthu mpaka anafa sanapange ziwonetsero munthu wammuna ndiye palibe munthu amene wafapo chisankhochi akupanga ziwonetsero tikuwona akupanga zimenezi mzimayi anatero white 
 padakali nduna yowona za kusasiyana pakati amayi abambo mary navitcha ati akachita nawo ziwonetserozi polankhulapo mwa akatswiri nkhani za ndale mdziko muno enerst thindwa ati zodabwitsa omwe patsogolo chipani cha dpp maudindo nthambi za boma omwe patsogolo kunyoza ulamuliro wa mtsogoleri wakale wa lino joyce banda yemwenso munthu wa zomwe ati zikusonyezeratu anthuwa akupanga zofuna zawo osati za malawi 
 gulu limeneli ambiri achipani cha dpp ndiye zikudabwitsa dpp nkhani ya chisankho zikugwirizana enanso mwa amenewa amene amakhala patsogolo kunyoza amayi anzawo kumbukirani ya joyce banda mwa amayi amenewa amene patsogolo kunyoza banda ndiye lero zikudabwitsa abwera ganizoli anatero thindwa komabe thindwa ati koyenera amayiwa apatsidwe mpata wochita ziwonetserozo kaamba koti ufulu wawo kutero malinga malamulo lino
Label: POLITICS

Text:
chilonda chatukusira dpp bwerani poyera mulankhule kwa amalawi awa akadaulo ndale pamene alangiza mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika wachiwiri saulos chilima alankhulepo mpungwepungwe omwe wabadwa mchipanicho 
  akadaulowo emily kamanga henry chingaipe alangiza kusamvana yemwe atengere chipanicho kuchisankho cha 2019 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka chilima mutharika msabatayi akhala akubwera poyera zovala za dpp zokhala nkhope ya chilima ndiye atengere dpp kuchisankho cha 2019 
  lolemba mlembi wa chipanicho grelzedar jeffrey adatsindika zovalazo si za dpp zovala zawo zimakhala nkhope ya mutharika bingu yemwe adayambitsa chipanicho 
  tikudziwa akupanga adani athu kotero dziwani chipani chili mphamvu kulanda zovala zimenezo zovala za dpp zimakhala nkhope ya yemwe adayambitsa chipanichi bingu wa mutharika amene mtsogoleri adatero jeffrey 
  adaopseza titengera kukhoti amene akugawa kupanga zovalazo 
  mwa amene sakufuna mutharika bon kalindo wati pamodzi gulu lawo sabwerera sachita mantha pokhapokha chilima akhale pachiongolero 
  sabata yatha adadzidzimuka pamene adamvetsera uthenga womwe jeffrey amalankhulana nduna ya maboma angono kondwaninankhumwa 
  mzolankhula zawo jeffrey adaulula chilima sakubwerera mutharika amulonjeza zokhalanso wachiwiri 
  ineyo ndidalankhula naye chilima adanditsimikizira sakufuna wachiwiri kwa mutharika kumsonkhano waukulu sadzapitako ati angokhala 
  ndinadabwa basi angokhala ndiye ineyo wandale ndikudziwa chomwe akutanthauza adatero 
  bwana ndakhala ndikukuuzani wamisala adaona nkhondotu chilichonse chimene ndakhala ndikulankhula chomwe chikuchitika anthuwatu adayamba kale 
  ndidakuuzani chilima sabwereranso akupanga zake awa bomali alilowerera bwana mutharika atani maka chilima salola noel masangwi sabwereranso bwana aitanitse ngc kumsonkhano waukulu chilima sangawine akulimbana ndikugawa dpp cholinga mcp itole boma adatero mlembiyu 
  mkamanga akuti chofunika nchoti mutharika chilima abwere poyera kulankhula zonsezi zitheretu 
  nkhani yonseyitu ikukamba za awiriwo ndiye atalankhula zonse zingathe komabe ndilibe chikhulupiriro awiriwo amalankhulana apapa zavuta basi ndikukaika angamvane adatero mkamanga 
  naye chingaipe adati kusalankhula kwa awiriwo ndikomwe kukuze bala la chipanicho kotero ayenera abwere poyera
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mlenje wakhapa mlimi ku dedza mlenje wina wa mmudzi mwa mbwindi mdera la mfumu kachere ku dedza wavulaza mlimi wa mmudzi mwa kuchikowa pamene nkhwangwa yomwe adaponya ilase nkhwali itaphuluza nkumulasa mutu 
  mlenjeyo francisco kwenda mlimiyo nachimwani langisi adalawirira kukagwira ntchito yake 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc langisi atatsiriza kuthirira mbewu zawo ku dimba adatsikira kudambo akasambe mmiyendo popeza mudali mutachita matope 
  atangoyamba kusamba adamva chinthu chawamenya mutu adagwa pansi 
  mosakhalitsa adazindikira adakhapidwa nkhwangwa moti mmene amabwera kudzawathandiza nkuti magazi atachita chosamba 
  nkhaniyo idakatulidwa ku polisi popeza madotolo chipatala chachingono cha matumba mbomalo adakana kuwathandiza opanda chikalata chochokera ku polisi 
  kwenda womwe adavomera ndiwo adavulaza langisi adawatsekera 
  pofotokozera apolisi mlenjeyu adapempha mlimiyo amukhululukire adamulasa mwangozi 
  ndidaponya nkhwangwa ndiphe nkhwali mwangozi idaphuluza nkukakhapa langisi omwe sindimadziwa akusamba ku damboko chonde ndapota nanu ndikhululukireni adatero kwenda 
  langisi mafumu mderalo adalandira kupepesako adapempha polisi amasule kwenda 
  mafumuwo adalangiza alenje mderalo adzisalama kwambiri posaka kuwopa kuvulaza kupha 
  padakali langisi akupezako
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
blessings cheleuka wa joy fm amalawi ambiri kuyamba lolemba mpaka lachisanu ya 2 koloko kufika 4 koloko masana amatsegula wailesi ya joy fm amvere nyimbo zothyakuka zoimbidwa amalawi anzawo namandwa wophulitsa nyimbo zimenezi blessings cheleuka yemweso wachitapo mbali kutukula alakatuli mdziko muno steven pembamoyo adacheza naye motere cheleuka chilichonse nchotheka pamoyo wa munthu dzifotokoze wanga 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndine blessings cheleuka ndimachokera mmudzi mwa mothiwa kwa t likoswe mboma la chiradzulu ndine muulutsi wa pawayilesi ndimakonda ndakatulo kwambiri 
  ntchito yakoyi udayamba liti ndakhala ndikugwira ntchitoyi kwa zaka 12 ndagwira mnthambi zosiyanasiyana wolemba nkhani mkonzi muulutsi zina china choti mungadziwe nchakuti ndagwirako ntchitoyi kunyuzipepala kuwayilesi komwe ndiye ndili ukadaulo kwambiri 
  akadaulo ambiri amakhala komwe adaphunzirira ntchito iwe udaphunzirira choyamba ndidaphunzira zautolankhani kusukulu yaukachenjede ya polytechnic nthambi imodzi ya university of malawi kumeneku ndidaphunzira zomwe zimatenga munthu ukhale mtolankhani mbali zonse kuchoka apo mmalo momwe ndakhala kugwira ntchito power 101 fm komwe ndidayambira ntchito ndidaphunzirako za kuulutsa mapologalamu osanjenjemera chifukwatu kunena zoona luso lapadera limenelija ndimayamikaso mulungu ponditsogolera kundiunikira 
  nanga umaulutsa mapologalamu anji pawailesi ndimaulutsa mapologalamu ambiri dimba music yomwe imauluka kuyambira lolemba mpaka lachisanu ya 2 koloko masana mpaka 4 koloko madzulo zina ukamva yomwe imauluka 8 koloko madzulo loweluka pologalamu ya ndakatulo yotchedwa patsinde yomwe imayamba 8 koloko mmawa mpaka 10 koloko mfuwu wa chimwemwe kuyamba 6 koloko mpaka 9 koloko mmawa lamulungu gospel top 20 ya nyimbo za uzimu ndine ndimayanganira za uwulutsi kuwailesi kanema za joy 
  ukutinso uli chidwi zaulakatuli umatengapo gawo lanji ndapanga zambiri kudzera pologalamu yanga ya patsinde ndimafukula alakatuli omwe sadayambe kudziwika ndimakonzaso zochitika za alakatuli ambiri amazikonda 
  ukafatsa umakonda kutani ndimakonda kuonerera mapologalamu pakanema zauzimu basi 
  mwina okutsata amangoti ndiwe muulutsi ungawauzenji za iwe   ndine blessings cheleuka odziwika bule wanu pazausangalatsi cholinga changa nkusangalatsa amalawi basi
Label: MUSIC

Text: kukana kuba woimba joseph nkasa mnyimbo yake ina amaneneratu ayenera kugwira ntchito ina iliyonse kupatulapo kuba   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi sunganeneretu kuba ntchito kupewa tchimoli kuli njira zambiri apa tikuona mnyamata wina kumsika wa limbe kugulitsa zinkhupule poopa kuba ntchito nzosiyana tisaiwale ndalama imodzi
Label: MUSIC

Text:
chikalata cha sinodi chili boma lisanyozere zounikira za chikalata cha sinodi ya nkhoma mpingo wa ccap younikira mavuto omwe ayanga pakati mdziko muno atero wachiwiri wakale wa mtsogoleri wa lino mlembi wamkulu wa sinodi ya livingstonia mpingo wa ccap levi nyondo wa bungwe la zachilungamo mfumu ina kudzanso angapo msabatayi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kalatayi yomwe idati boma la bingu wa mutharika silikulabada zofuna za omwe adalisankha idawerengedwa mmatchalitchi sinodiyi lamulungu 
  mutu wa kalatayi yomwe uthenga udachokera mateyu 5 13 16 udali kukwaniritsa chikhulupiriro chathu kudzera mmapemphero yathu mdziko mwathu 
  mneneri wa boma patricia kaliati wati nkutheka uwu mtopola chabe cha kusakwaniritsa kuwapatsa k10 miliyoni yomwe mutharika adalonjeza ku sinodiyo 
  kumvetsa malemba   wati mulunguwa akuyenera zomwe yesu kumamvetsa malemba 
  mwa zina kalatayi idati kusowa kwa mafuta agalimoto ndalama zakunja kwavulaza akumudzi malinga kukwera kwa mitengo ya katundu zina zofunika umoyo wa 
  uthenga wa kalatayi udapitiriranso kukumbutsa mutharika za k10 miliyoni ya mamangidwe yomwe mtsogoleriyo adalonjeza mpingowu juni chaka chatha 
  wachiwiri wakale wa mtsogoleri wa lino cassim chilumpha wati boma la dpp lilibe chidwi pamadandaulo limatenga wopereka maganizo ake wofuna kuononga 
  wati likadakhala boma lofuna kuthandiza ake likadayankha zingapo zokhudza amalawi mosayangana zifukwa za ndale 
  chilumpha wati akukaika bomali lingayankhepo aka sikoyamba kutuluke chikalata chonga ichi zonse boma limangoyankha molalata 
  pamene patuluka mafunso pamayenera patuluke mayankho adatero chilumpha 
  akuvutika   mfumu ina mboma la mwanza yati sinodiyo sidalakwitse polemba chibaluwacho kumudzi akuvutika kwambiri 
  iyo yati ikadakonda boma litakonza zomwe amabungwe amipingo akhala akunena zikudandaulitsa 
  kuno ku mwanza patha sabata ziwiri kulibe mafuta agalimoto timve yankho la boma ikutero mfumuyi 
  nyondo wati mpingo ukugwirizana kwathunthu chikalata chomwe nkhoma alemba kotero boma likuyenera kukonza mberewere zake 
  wati mpingo wawo ulibe maganizo otulutsa chikalata china uyesetsa kuthandizira chikalata chomwe anzawo alemba 
  tikakamizabe boma likonze zimenezi zikanike boma silikuchita kanthu ndiye tiona chomwe tingachite sitinganeneretu za chomwe tichite 
  kaya ndikukakamiza mtsogoleri wa lino atule pansi udindo kaya ayi tichita kanthu zikakanika adatero nyondo 
  konzani molakwika tiyanjane kadzah yemwe mulimi wa mmudzi mwa nakhalu kwa t kayembe mboma la dowa wati boma likonze molakwika awa mulungu omwe akudziwa chomwe chikuchitika 
  mulungu sumalimbana nawo umangokonza chomwe anena kunena zoona zinthu sizili sizikuyenda sikumudzi kokha kuno komwe mavutowa azinga adatero kadzah 
  cathy lambulira wa mmudzi mwa chindiwo kwa t mlumbe mboma la zomba akuchita maphunziro ukachenjede mumzinda wa blantyre wati boma likuyenera kuonetsa chidwi pazomwe chibaluwachi chikunena zomwe zikunenedwa ndizo zikukhudza amalawi kumudzi 
  kumudzi kuno tikukhala pachiopsezo kaamba ka kukwera mtengo kwazinthu tingakhale pomwe chilichonse chikungokwera mtengo uku ndikupha kumene boma silikudziwa 
  atakonza zimenezi pachilichose tikuvutika wapempha lambulira 
  zinthu sizili wa bungwe loona zachilungamo la justice link justine dzonzi wati chikalatachi chikutsimikiza zinthu sizili 
  dzonzi wati alibe chikhulupiriro boma lingathe zinthu pakali 
  t mwakaboko ya mboma la karonga yati sikumvetsa mmene zinthu zilili mdziko muno kotero angodikirira 2014 
  adakana kuyankhapo pankhaniyi ponena angodikira 2014 pomwe adzaponye masankho osankha yemwe akumufuna 
  sikuti mavutowa mdziko mwathu muno mokha maiko anzathu akuvutikanso sitingati ulamuliro oipa ndiwo wabweretsa mavutowa 
  tidikire 2014 tidzaone zili ayi adatero mwakaboko 
  mlembi wa wa sinodi ya blantyre mpingo wa ccap alex maulana wati sadalandire chikalata chomwe nkhoma atulutsa kotero sangaike mlomo akugwirizana nacho ayi 
  adapempha tamvani imupatse awerenge chikalatacho 
  mchaka cha 2010 sinodiyi idatulutsanso chikalata chodzudzula mutharika boma lake la dpp 
  okotobala chaka chatha mpingo wa katolika udatulutsa chikalata chodzudzula boma la mutharika pandale chuma maufulu 
  bishop joseph mukasa zuza wa mpingo wa katolika adati sangaikepo mlomo sadaone kalatayo t mlumbe ya mboma la zomba adati nkhaniyo yamukulira kotero sangayankhire
Label: RELIGION

Text:
mabungwe adzudzula mutharika makomishonala atsopano mec mabungwe osiyanasiyana adzudzula mtsogoleri wa lino professor arthur peter mutharika momwe wasankhira makomishonala bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno la malawi electoral commission mec 
 wapampando watsopano wa bungwe la mec kachale mtsogoleri wa linoyu wasankha atsopano akhale akuluakulu bungweli pomwe wasankha justice dr chifundo kachale akhale wapampando wa bungweli kulowa mmalo mwa justice dr jane ansah omwe anatula pansi udindowu sabata zapitazo 
 makomishonala atsopano omwe asankhidwa arthur nathuru steve duwa dr anthony mukumbwa olivia liwewe 
 amubwezeretsa komishoniyo kunje mutharika wabwezeretsanso komishoniyi dr jean mathanga linda kunje awiriwa omwe kale gulu la makomishona bungweli omwe anayendetsa nawo chisankho cha chaka chatha chomwe bwalo la milandu linalamula chichitikenso kaamba koti sichinayende ponena chinali zolakwika zambiri 
 mabungwe public affairs comittee pac la human rights defenders coalition hrdc alankhula mosakondwa zomwe zachitikazi 
 polankhula mwapadera kwa atolankhani lamulungu mzinda wa lilongwe akuluakulu bungwe la hrdc ati achita zionetsero lachitatu likudzali pofuna kukakamoza aphungu nyumba ya malamulo akambirane momveka za tsiku lomwe chisankho chichitike mdziko muno kuvomereza ma bilu onse okhudza chisankho 
 sitingayembekeze kunenas tidikire akambirane zomwe analankhula president analankhula zosathandiza zobwezeresa mmbuyo anatero sembereka yemwe mwa akuluakulu bungweli
Label: POLITICS

Text:
ambuye stima apempha akhristu athandize maphunziro asemino wolemba sylvester kasitomu mpingo wakatolika dayosizi ya mangochi walimbikitsa akhristu ake adzipereke pothandiza maphunziro osula achinyamata omwe akuchita maphunziro unsembe 
 episikopi wa dayosiziyi ambuye montfort stima anena ku mangochi cathederal loweluka 24 august 2019 atangomaliza misa ya chaka chokondwelera nkhonse ya dayosizi yo augustuno woyera 
 ati asemino omwe mma seminale osiyanasiyana omwe akuchokera dayosizi yo akusowa zambiri maphunziro kotero dayosizi yo ikuyenera kufufuza ndalama zoposera 34 million kwacha zothandizira asemino wa pamaphunziro chaka 
 kotero ambuye stima alimbikitsa akhristu wo apitirize kudzipereka pothandiza kupititsa patsogolo ntchito za utumiki dayosizi yo momwe akuchitira padakalipano 
 asemino athu akufunika ndalama zambiri apitilize maphunziro ndiye akhristu tigwirane manja pofuna kuthandiza ansembe amawa wa anatero ambuye sitima 
 mwazina dayosizi ya mpingo wakatolika ya mangochi ili asemino omwe ku st peters ku st anthony kachebere major seminary okwana 32 nsemino amayenera kugwiritsa ntchito ndalama zosachepera 1 million chaka
Label: RELIGION

Text: anatchezera sagona mnyumba anatchereza   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndili zaka 20 amuna anga sagona mnyumba ndiye chonde ndithandizeni akuti ndikawauza ankhonswe banja langa litha ukwati tapanga chaka chatha   ndine blantyre zikomo mwamuna wakoyo ngwachibwana zedi mwangokwatirana kumene ukuti sagona mnyumba ndiye amakagona ukapanda kusamala naye ameneyo akugwetsa mmavuto aakulu ndikunenatu matenda oopsa kuphatikizapo hiv edzi wayamba kale kunena ukakanena kwa ankhoswe banja lithapo ndiye za banja alibe nazo ntchito kusangalatsa chilakolako cha thupi lake basi ndiye usazengerezepo apa pita kaitule nkhaniyi kwa ankhoswe umve zimene anene akufuna banjali lithe lithe basi mwamuna wachimasomaso woopsa kwambiri safunika kumusekerera
Label: RELATIONSHIPS

Text:
boma liganizire sabuside adzavutika nkhalamba ana amasiye mkonzi   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndalemba kalatayi zomwe nduna yoona zaulimi allan chiyembekeza adanena masiku apitawa 
  mukunena kwawo chiyembekeza adati boma likufuna omwe angalandire mbewu fetereza zotsika mtengo chaka chino asalandirenso chaka chinacho 
  akuti zithandiza kuthetsa wa chinyengo kuchepetsa woti amodzimodzi amene azipindula mundondomekoyi 
  adzavutika nkhalamba ana amasiye maganizo amenewa akuoneka abwino ndikuona mfundoyi ipweteketsa magulu 
  ndikunena boma silidatiuze ndondomeko zomwe liike pofuna kuonetsetsa okalamba ana amasiye omwe amalerana okhaokha omwe sangathe kudzigulira feteleza mbewu pamsika liziwathandiza 
  palinso anzathu omwe mavuto osiyanasiyana kulumala omwe akhala akudalira feteleza mbewu zotsika mtengo apeze kachakudya kokwanira timisiku tingapo kudzera ulimi 
  awa chabe mwa magulu omwe sangathe kudzigulira mchere wamnthaka mbewu pamsika pomwe thumba limodzi la feteleza panopo cha pakati k22 000 k23 000 
  choncho ndikufuna ndifunse boma kudzera kwa chiyembekeza litiuze ndondomeko yomwe lakonza poonetsetsa akuthandizika pamene boma likugwiritsa yoti munthu yemwe wapindula chaka chino asadzapindulenso chaka chinacho
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
chimanga kulibe amalawi adandaula admarc pamene njala ikupitirira kukantha mmadera zadziwikanso mmisika ya admarc yambiri mdziko muno mulibe chimanga ku ntcheu dedza mzimba chitipa blantyre alirira boma lichitepo kanthu 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc omwe alankhula tamvani msabatayi ati ndikale adagula kuona chimanga ku admarc zomwe zikuwakakamiza kugula kwa mavenda mtengo wa k5 500 kusiyana k3 000 yomwe amagulira thumba la makilogalamu 50 ku admarc 
  mneneri wa bungwe la admarc agnes chikoko adati timutumizire mafunso pomwe timalemba nkhaniyi nkuti asadayankhe 
  bungwe la admarc lidalengeza mmbuyomu pasapezeke ogula makilogalamu oposa 25 ku admarc wachiwiri kwa nduna ya zaulimi ulemu chilapondwa wati lino lili chimanga chochuluka vuto ndilakuti chikakasiidwa ku admarc mavenda ndiwo akumagula mwa machawi 
  adati boma pakadali likuyesayesa kupeza njira zothana mavendawa asadatumizenso china ku admarc ko 
  chimanga changotha ku admarc osati kulibe tili matani 31 miliyoni omwe akusungidwa pasakhalitsapa tidatumiza matani 10 000 vuto mavenda adatero chilapondwa 
  misika ya mmadera titamupatsa madera omwe tapeza mulibe chimanga adakana sizingatheke 
  florence nsangu wa mmudzi mwa chapita 2 kwa t masasa mboma la ntcheu ana 8 akuti chaka banja lake limafunika matumba pafupifupi 20 
  zaka za mma 2000 akuti matumbawa amawapeza akachita ganyu cha kwa nyengo akulephera kukolola chimanga chokwanira zikavuta akuti amapeza asanu chaka chatha adapeza atatu cha vuto la mvula pofika october chimangacho nkuti chitatha 
  zikavuta chonchi kothamangira ku admarc mtengo sukhala woboola mthumba ndakhala ndikupita ku admarc ya ku lizulu ku bembeke kukayangana chimanga kulibe 
  tatopa ndikuyendera ndiye tikungogula mwa mavenda adatero mayiyu yemwe akuti 2011 ndimo adagula chimanga ku admarc 
  wati akumachita ganyu yolimitsa apeze ndalama yogulira chimanga zikavuta akugonera mbatata 
  patsiku akumapanga k500 ndiye tikakhalapo angapo tikumapeza ndalama yochuluka maganyuwo akusowa adatero mayiyu yemwe adati boma liyike chimanga ku admarc 
  tamvani itayendera admarc ya ku lunzu matindi idapeza malowo otseka omwe tidakumana nawo adati chimanga tikagule mwa mavenda ku admarc sichinabwere adati tipite takondwa commodities pamsika wa lunzu komwe amati amagulitsa pamtengo wotsika 
  takondwa commodities tidapeza oposa 30 akufuna kugula chimanga pamenepo akuti amagulitsa k4 700 thumba la makilogalamu 50 
  dolasi kabotolo wa mmudzi mwa manjombe kwa t kapeni mboma la blantyre tidamupeza pamenepo adati mwina apeza chipulumutso apo 
  sindingakumbukenso tsiku lomwe ndidagula ku admarc kawiri sabata ndimakapondako kukafunsa yankho lake nkuti chimanga kulibe 
  takondwa chatha ndiye timalira kwambiri timakagula kumsika komwe akupanga k5 500 thumba apa chili chotsika komabe timavutika magulidwe mavenda ndiwo amachuluka kudzagula adatero kabotolo yemwe ana 6 pamzere 
  panthawi yomwe timacheza naye nkuti akudikirira wina yemwe adabwera galimoto ya matani awiri akugula matumba 15 
  nako ku dedza mavutowa akuti sadasiye malo rashida mathews wa mmudzi mwa mkajenda kwa t tambala wati kumeneko adasiye kupita ku admarc chimanga chidasiya kufika 2011 
  akuvutika gulupu lodzanyama wa kumeneko watinso akuvutika cha kusowa kwa chimanga mwa mavenda mtengo sangakwanitse 
  wati kumeneko kuli njala sapindula fetereza wa makuponi 
  sanudi tambula wa ku ulongwe mboma la balaka wati kumeneko chimanga samagula ku admarc mwa mavenda ku admarc sichibwera 
  ku mzimba nako akuti kulibe tomasi manjaaluso wa mmudzi mwa takumanapo kwa t mzukuzuku wati akugula kwa mavenda chikabwera ku admarc mavendawo ndiwo akumakagula 
  charles kabaghe wa mmudzi mwa mkombanyama kwa t mwaulambia mboma la chitipa wati ku admarc yakumeneko kulibe chimanga akumakagula ku tanzania kumeneko ndichotchipa 
  ku tanzania tikugula k1 500 thumba la makilogalamu 50 kupita ndikubwera k2 000 komabe nanga titani adatero kabaghe 
  mwa madera nsanje chikhwawa chiradzulu mwanza neno momwe akuti mavutowa achuluka 
  mwambiri akuti chimanga chikafika chimagulidwa mavenda wamba sakupeza mpata agule zikudza pomwe kholola wa 2011/2012 amasonyeza lino tapata matani 3.9 miliyoni pomwe lino limafuna matani 2.4 miliyoni kholola wa 2010/2011 lino lidapata matani 3.2 miliyoni
Label: HEALTH

Text:
papa watsiriza ulendo wocheza mmaiko africa wolemba thokozani chapola ria.mw/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/pp.jpg alt= width="525 height="297 />papa ulendo wa africa mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisko watsiriza ulendo wocheza mdziko la mauritius 
 mdzikolo papa wachita zokambirana atsogoleri ndale ma episkopi magulu mumpingo 
 wayamikira ubale wabwino omwe ulipo mdzikomo pakati zipembedzo mitundu ya 
 la mauritius lili chi chiwerengero cha okwana 1.3 million 52 percent achipembedzo cha hindu 30 percent akhristu mpingo wa katolika 18 percent achipembedzo cha chisilamu 
 papa wakhala ulendo kwa sabata yathunthu woyendera mayiko africa komwe wayendera mayiko mozambique madagascar asanafike mdziko la mauritius 
 mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolikayu lero akubwelera ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku vatican mdziko la italy komwe amakhala
Label: RELIGION

Text:

 pofuna kukonzekera kulimbana matendawa makhonsolo wa anayitanitsa msonkhano mosiyana komwe kunafika omwe akugwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana mboma li 
 mwazina msonkhano wu mboma la zomba akhazikitsa komiti yomwe muli achitetezo ocita malonda komabnso ogwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana cholinga choti akhale akuyendetsa ntchito zi 
 nalo boma la mangochi lati liwonetsetsa ake otetezeka ku kachilombo ka coronavirus komwe kakuyambitsa nthenda ya covid 19 
 bwanamkubwa wa bomalo mbusa moses chimphepo wati khonsoloyo yayika ndondomeko zabwino zofuna kuwonetsetsa ochokera mmayiko south africa la mozambique lomwe lachita malire bomali sakulowa mbomalo mwachisawawa

Text:
mafumu atekeseka bilu ya malo akufuna akhalebe mphamvu pankhani yogawa kugulitsa malo mafumu mafumu mdziko muno aopseza achita zionetsero lamulo lokhudza malo lingasinthe asakhalenso mphamvu pogawa malo 
  mafumuwa akudza pamene mabungwe landnet farmers union of malawi fum womens legal resource centre wolrec yakaliyakali kumva maganizo bilu yokhudza malo customary land bill 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc pali maganizo oti lamuloli lisinthe mafumu asamakhale mphamvu zonse pamalo mmalo mwake pakhale komiti yomwe iziona za malo pakhale othandizira nkhani za malo osati nduna za mafumu zilili panopa 
  mafumu akwiya ganizoli anenetsa zikasinthadi achita zionetsero kusonyeza mkwiyo wawo eni malo 
  tikati gogochalo timakamba malo ufumu malo popanda malo palibe ufumu popanda ufumu palibe malo wina akufuna kukhudza malo ndiye akukhudzanso mafumu akachotsa malo asakhalenso mmanja mwathu ndiye achotsa ufumu wathu t kabunduli wa mboma la nkhata bay adauza tamvani mosapsatira 
  apa sitikuopanso pulezidenti aphungu adziwe pavuta akufuna akhudze malo adapitiriza 
  malipoti akhala akumveka mafumu akugulitsa malo mwachinyengo mosafunsa eni malowo omwe mafumu angonoangono 
  kabunduli akuti pasakhale mantha amenewo mafumu amene akukhudzidwa ziphuphuwa si mafumu 
  si mafumu amenewo lamulo lisasinthe zotere zachitika sitikusintha ganizo lathu lamulo lisasinthe kuli kuchotsa ufumu wathu adanenetsa kabunduli 
  nkhani zokhudza malo sizikukata ku ntcheu mkangano wa malo uli mkati pamene makampani crown plantation limited mota engil atengera nkhani ya malo kubwalo la milandu 
  makampaniwa akuganizira t masasa adagulitsa malo amodzimodziwo kwa makampani awiriwo 
  lamuloli lisinthe ndiye komiti yomwe ikubwera ndiyo izidzakhudzidwa kagulitsidwe ka malo pakadzakhala kusamvana apadera ndiwo azidzayendetsa nkhaniyo osati mafumu nduna za mafumu zilili panopa 
  t kaphuka wa mboma la dedza limodzi senior chief kachindamoto t nyambi wa mboma la machinga akulankhula chichewa chofanana sangatchedwenso gogochalo mphamvu zawo malo zachotsedwa 
  gogochalo mwini nthaka ndiye akufuna awachotsenso panthakapo lamulo lisasinthe nanga amene adapempha malo kwa gogochalo awatani tipemphe amene akufunsa maganizo anthuwo aitanitse msonkhano wa mafumu tikamve bwinobwino chomwe akufuna adatero kaphuka yemwe adati sadakumanepo amabungwewa 
  atha mbali zina za lamuloli pokhapo poti mafumu asamakhale mphamvu pamalo ndiye sizotheka ayi tisachotsedwe mphamvu zathu pamalo adatero nyambi 
  emmanuel mlaka yemwe akuyendetsa ntchitoyi kubungwe la landnet wati ntchito ili mkati pafupifupi mafumu 8 10 alionse akukana lamuloli lisinthe 
  takhala pachigawo cha pakati kwa sabata kulankhula mafumu sabata ikubwerayi tikulowera ku karonga pazomwe tapeza mafumu akukana lamuloli lisinthe pamene wamba akuvomera kukhalepo 
  chomwe mafumu akukanitsitsa nkuti pakhale komiti yomwe iziyendetsa za malo pakhale amene aziwathandiza kuzenga nkhani za malo akunena nduna zawo zomwe zimawathandiza kotero palibenso kufunikira koti pakhale apadera adatero mlaka 
  gift mauluka wa bungwe la worlec akuti ntchitoyi ikupita kumapeto 
  sabata yathayi mauluka adali mboma la thyolo kwa mfumu khwethemule komwe mafumu adatemetsa nkhwangwa pamwala lamuloli lisasinthe 
  mafumu akukana akuvomereza kukhalepo tilemba zomwe akunenazo kutumiza adatero mauluka 
  2 june 2013 aphungu nyumba ya malamulo adadutsitsa gawo lina lokhudza biluyi yomwe pulezidenti joyce banda adakana kusayinira ponena iwunguzidwenso 
  bungwe la alliance for green revolution in africa agra ndilo likupereka thandizo mabungwewa agwire ntchito yofunsa za lamuloli
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:
boma lathetsa quota system kubwenzeretsa jce boma lalengeza labwenzeretsa mayeso jc lathetsa ndondomeko yosankhira ophunzira kupita ku sukulu za ukachenjede yotchedwa quota system 
 walengeza za kusinthaku susuwele banda nduna ya zamaphunziro dr william susuwele banda yemwe walengeza msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe unachitika lero masanawa mzinda wa lilongwe 
 ndunayi yati zikutanthauza mayeso jce ayamba kulembedwa chaka cha maphunziro cha 2020 2021 ophunzira adzayamba kulembanso mayesowa chaka chamawa cha 2021 
 boma lakhala likutsatira mwachidwi ndemanga za osiyanasiyana ophunzira ambiri akhala akulephera mayeso msce kaamba koti amatayilira akakhala zaka zinayi kulephera mayseo fomu 4 amakhala alibe chilichonse choti awonetse chosonyeza ku sekondale anatero banda 
 polankhulapo katswiri zamaphunziro dr steve shara wati ndondomekozi zili kuthekera kosintha momwe ntchito za maphunziro ziziyendera mdziko muno pakufunika boma magawo onse okhudzidwa agwirane manja pothana mavuto omwe akubweretsa mbuyo maphunziro mdziko muno kusowa kwa zipangizo zophunzitsira kuphunzilira

Text:
chiwerengero cha ana odwala chikuku chakwera kwambiri ku cameroon nduna yoona zaumoyo mdziko la cameroon yati chiwerengero cha ana omwe apezeka matenda achikuku chakwera 34 percent zaka zapitazi 
 dr phanuel habimana awuza wailesi ya bbc zachitika kamba koti unduna wawo siunakwanitse kupereka katemera wa matendawa pomwe anakwanitsa kupereka kwa ana 75 hundred aliwonse mdzikolo 
 ati pofuna kuthana matendawa akuyenera kupereka katemerayu kwa ana 95 handred aliwonse mdzikolo 
 sabata yatha la cameroon lapereka katemerayu chaka chino kwa ana omwe miyezi isanu inayi kufikira zaka zisanu omwe ochuluka kwambiri mdzikolo 
 chiwerengero cha omwe anafa nthenda ya chikuku chaka chatha choposa 140 sauzande padziko lonse omwe ambiri ana osapyola zaka zisanu 
 maiko asanu omwe anakhuzidwa kwambiri matendawa chaka chatha democraticm republic of congo drc liberia madagascar somalia ukrane
Label: HEALTH

Text:
otsutsa adzudzula mec bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec liyenera kutambasula za pangano lake bungwe limene likupereka zitupa za unzika la national registration bureau nrb zoti lidzagwiritsa ntchito zitupazo kalembera wa chisankho cha 2019 watero kadaulo ndale mustafa hussein 
  zipani za ndale makamaka zotsutsa boma zakhala zikunena chikonzero cha mec nkufuna kudzathandiza chipani cha dpp kubera mavoti 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kalembera wa nzika mkati mwati mudzagwiritsa ntchito zitupa za unzika amalawi alowe mkaundula wa zisankho apatu mpofunika pamveke akusokonekera adatero hussein 
  zipani zotsutsa boma zakhala zikudandaula ganizo la mec lodzagwiritsa ntchito zitupa za unzika munthu adzalowe mkaundula wa chisankho cha 2019 
  zipanizi zakhala zikubweretsa nkhaniyi mnyumba ya malamulo momwe aphungu akukambirana za bajeti ya 2017/18 moto weniweni udabuka lolemba lapitali nkhumano yomwe bungwe la mec lidapangitsa lifotokozerane zipani nkhani yokhudza chisankhochi 
  nthumwi za zipani zotsutsazi makamaka za malawi congress party peoples party zidabooleza zikukhulupilira ganizoli njira imodzi yofuna kudzabera chisankhochi zidanenetsa sizilola pulaniyi idutse 
  phungu wa kummawa kwa boma la dowa richard chimwendo banda wa malawi congress party mcp adati akuona mec ikukonza zodzathandiza chipani cholamula cha democratic progressive dpp kubera chisankho 
  adati ndiwodabwa kukakamira kwa bungwe la mec lidzagwiritse ntchito zitupa za unzika popanga kaundula wa odzaponya voti chonsecho silikutengapo gawo lililonse zakapangidwe ka zitupazi 
  bungwe la mec lidali pomwe nthambi yopanga kalembera wa zitupazi imayamba ntchito yake tili chikhulupiliro mapulani odzabera chisankho ulendo uno sitikulekelerani adatero chimwendo banda 
  adati bungwe la mec lisiye kulowerera ntchito za eni lipange pologalamu yake yakalembera wa mkaundula wa chisankho mmalo modalira kuwolokera pamsana anzawo 
  wampampando wa bungwe la mec jane ansah yemwe woweruza milandu ku khothi lalikulu la apilo sadakondwe zomwe adanena aphunguwo adawadzudzula nawo akulephera udindo wawo posafotokozera za kufunika kwa zitupazi 
  adatsutsa zoti bungweli lili maganizo odzabera chisankho mwanjira iliyonse likufuna ovomerezeka okha ndiwo adzaponye voti 2019 
  nduna ya za mdziko chitetezo grace chiumia adavomera kalembera wa zitupa za unzika ikukumana zokhoma kufaifa kwa zipangizo zogwiritsa ntchito
Label: POLITICS

Text:

  akamalowa apa aziyamba ayezedwa zadziwika kudzera chikalata chomwe akuluakulu chipatalachi atulutsa chomwe chikufotokoza ndondomeko zatsopano zomwe akhazikitsa zopewera mliri wu

 tichepetse kuchuluka kwa omwe amabwera kuzaona odwala kudzadikilira odwala tichepetsanso magulu amene amabwera kuzachita za tchalitichi mapemphero ward zomwenso zimachititsa achulukane kufalitsa matendawa anatero kambeni omwe mwa akuluakulu chipatalachi

Text:
achita phwando kuimitsidwa kwa kuluunda lero kuli madyerero mmudzi mwa senior chief bibi kuluunda mboma la salima kusangalalira mfumuyi yaimitsidwa kugwira ntchito yake mbomali 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mmudzimu kuphatikizaponso mafumu akhala akubindikira kuofesi ya dc wa bomali pofuna kukakamiza boma ichotse mfumuyi poiganizira yaziphuphu 
  anthuwa adayamba mbindikirowo 11 april wapiyatu 
  lachitatu lapitali mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika adasayina kalata yoimitsa kuluunda amene wakhala paufumuwu kwa zaka 20 kupereka chimwemwe kwa anthuwa 
  mtsogoleri wa anthuwa muhammad chingomanje adati chimwemwe chosayamba 
  wayamba waimitsidwa ufumu kuluunda lero lachinayi 5 may lidzakhala tsiku lachimwemwe pamoyo wanga lero lidzakhala tsiku lapaderadera mmbiri ya la malawi maka kwa ku salima 
  titagona panja ofesi ya dc kwa masiku 24 lero yankho labwera wokondwa wachimwemwe zomwe zachitika lero adatero chingomanje 
  kulankhula chingomanje pafoni kudali kovutirapo cha nyimbo zomwe amaimba phokoso lachimwemwe lomwe limamveka 
  nyakwawa chilaboto ya mwa gulupu kawanga mdera la kuluunda idati mafumu onse 31 amene nawo mbindikirowo okondwa ganizo la mutharika 
  mtendere wadza mmudzi mwanga limodzi anga 1 800 amene ndimawalamulira takhala tikulira mfumuyi kwa zaka maso athu adali kuboma atiyankhe lero chimwemwe paliponse idatero mfumuyi uko akuimba nyimbo yachimwemwe 
  mfumuyi idati lero phwando yankho labwera tikupha ngombe mbuzi tikhala tsiku lalikulu lamulunguli zomwe timapempha zayankhidwa 
  abweretsa zakudya kusangalala tsiku lomwe timaliyembekeza lakwana adatero chilaboto 
  adati mfumu nkhani ya kuimitsidwa kwa kuluunda ithandiza ntchito yake kwa ndakhala ndikulimbana amfumuwa pankhani zoti nanunso simungazimvetsetse yoti tipume yakwana tsopano 
  titaimbira foni kuluunda timve maganizo ake adangoti ndili mminibasi ndiye sitingamvane mundiimbirenso 
  titaimbanso mfumuyi sidayankhe foni 
  malinga nduna ya maboma aangono kondwani nankhumwa mutharika waganiza zoimitsa kuluunda malinga nkhani za katangale zomwe mfumuyi ikukhudzidwa nazo zoti idalandira k30 miliyoni ya green belt initiative zoti igawire okhudzidwa polojekitiyi sidalongosole komwe idapita k15 miliyoni

Text:
papa wati kukambirana njira yodzetsera mtendere wolemba glory kondowe mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisko lero wati kukambirana kumvetserana njira yokhayo yothetsera kusamvana

 wati msonkhano wa ku yerusalemu mbukhu la ntchito za atumwi chitsanzo chabwino pofuna kuthetsa mikangano kusamvana komwe kungakhalepo pakati masiku ano
