Text:
ogwira ntchito ku ndende ayamba kunyanyala ntchito asilikali ogwira ntchito mmaudindo angonoangono ndende za mdziko muno ayamba kunyanyala ntchito pofuna kukakamiza boma limve madandaulo 
 malinga mtolankhani wathu kummawaku kunali mpungwepungwe ku zomba central prison pakati asilikali maudindo angonoangono mabwana pomwe akuluakuluwo analawira kuyamba kugwira ntchito asilikali maudindo otsika asanafike 
 pamenepa asilikaliwa anathamangitsa mabwana awowa anatseka chipata cholowera ku ndendeyi moti padakalipano anenetsa adzayamba kugwira ntchito madandaulo akamveka kuyankhidwa 
 padakalipano apolisi omwe amatenga oganiziridwa ku bwalo la milandu alephera kukatenga akayidi omwe amakhala akuyembekezera kupita ku khothi chipata cha ndendeyi chinali chotseka 
 malinga malipoti anthuwa akufuna ogwira ntchito pansi kwambiri awakweze ntchito awapatse ndalama zowonjezera miyoyo yawo ili chiwopsezo kubwera kwa mliri wa coronavirus 
 akuti akufunanso akuluakulu ndende asiye tsankho ponena pali asilikali ku ndende ambiri omwe akupindula akuchokera mbali yomwe akuchokera akulu akulu nthambi yi 
 padakalipano wofalitsa nkhani za nthambi ya ndende mdziko muno chimwemwe shawa wati kunyanyala ntchito komwe akuchita asilikali otsika mmaudindowa kosavomerezeka sanatsate ndondomeko yake
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
phwitiko kutambasula za maphunziro unduna wa zamaphunziro udalonjeza zotukula maphunziro mdziko muno poyesetsa kukwaniritsa undunawu uli mapologalamu osiyanasiyana mmiyezi yapitayi undunawu udakonza zokweza fizi uzitolera ndalama zokwanira zotukulira maphunziro steven pembamoyo adacheza mneneri wa undunawu rebecca phwitiko phwitiko ndimalumikiza unduna atolankhani tafotokoza mbiri yako 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndine rebecca phwitiko ndidabadwira kukulira mumzinda wa blantyre ndimachokera mmudzi mwa danda t kalumbu mboma la lilongwe 
  nanga mbiri ya maphunziro ako ndiyotani ndidaphunzira kusekondale ya our lady of wisdom ku blantyre mzaka za 1999 mpaka 2002 kenako nkukapanga maphunziro ukachenjede ku chancellor college panopa ndikuonjezera maphunzirowa ndikhale masters degree 
  udindo wako weniweni ku unduna wa zamaphunziro wotani kwenikweni ntchito yanga yokhudzana zofalitsa nkhani za undunawu ntchito yokonza zokhudza uthenga wopita kwa kulumikiza unduna nyumba zofalitsa kusindikiza nkhani kukonza zochitika za unduna kusanthula zomwe olemba kufalitsa nkhani alemba kulandira madandaulo ochokera kunthambi zosiyanasiyana zina mwa ntchito zanga 
  usadalandire udindo umenewu unkagwira ntchito yanji ndinkagwira ntchito kuwayilesi ya boma ya malawi broadcasting corporation mbc mkonzi wa mapologalamu muulutsi mtolankhani 
  umagwiritsa ntchito yako yapadera ndikakhala mpata ndimakonda mabuku okamba za africa ndimakondanso kumvera nyimbo kuyenda kuona malo osiyanasiyana 
  unduna wa zamaphunziro umanena cholinga chake choyamba nkutukula maphunziro kodi mukuchitaponji pofuna kukwaniritsa zimenezi choyamba unduna wa zamaphunziro uli udindo waukulu kuphunzitsa wa amalawi udindo umenewu timagwirira ophunzira aphunzitsi makolo ofalitsa kusindikiza nkhani pofuna kukwaniritsa tili mapologalamu ambiri onsewa atheke mpofunika mgwirizano waukulu pakati magulu onse omwe ndatchulawa mzati nkulumikizana pafupipafupi moyenerera
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
kupewa kutsegula mmimba   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu nthenda ya kutsegula mmimba imodzi mwa matenda omwe amakonda kufala kwambiri mnyengo ino ya mvula 
  malinga dokotala wa pachipatala cha st lukes mboma la zomba siwale shaime kutsegula mmimba pamene munthu akuchita chimbudzi cha madzi mopitirira kanayi tsiku adati zambiri chomwe chimayambitsa matendawa tizilombo tingonotingono tosaoneka maso tomwe chingerezi amatitchula germs 
  zithaphwi zimasunga majelemusi otsegula mmimba nyengo ino ya mvula matendawa amachuluka tizilomboti timakonda kupezeka pamalo chinyontho timafala mosavuta madzi ntchetche adatero dotoloyo 
  shaime adati mvula ikagwa madzi othamanga amakokolola tizilomboti pamalo onyasa kukatisiya mmisinje mzitsime malo okhala madzi 
  munthu akamwa kugwiritsa ntchito madzi oterewa tizilomboti timalowa mthupi mwake kuyambitsa matendawa adatero shaime 
  adaonjezanso ntchentche zimachuluka kwambiri ya mvula zimakatenga tizilomboti pamalo pomwe pali nyansi kukaziika chakudya 
  ntchentche zikamva fungo la chinthu choola zimathamangira kukatera pomwepo pochoka zimanyamulapo tizilomboti kukatiika chakudya wodya chakudyachi akhonza kutsegula nacho mmimba adatero shaime 
  adati matendawa oopsa ndiopeweka ukhondo ndiye chida cha mphamvu 
  akuyenera kusamba mmanja sopo akangochoka kuchimbudzi asanakhudze chakudya akasintha mwana thewera pofuna kuyamwitsa kudyetsa mwana chimbudzi cha ukhondo pakhomo kupewa chimbudzi paliponse kusamala kutaya zinyalala moyenera kuvindikira chakudya kutsuka zipatso asanadye kuteteza madzi akumwa pophitsa kuthira mankhwala opha majeremusi adatero dotoloyo
Label: HEALTH

Text:
osolola ndalama za edzi mitima ili phaphapha unduna wa zaumoyo wati zotsatira zakafukufuku wokhudza kusokonekera kwa ndalama zothandizira kulimbana matenda edzi zatuluka undunawu ukudikira ndemanga za nthambi yoona zakapewedwe ka matenda ya centre for disease control cdc unene tchutchutchu 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mlembi wamkulu undunawu macphail magwira watsimikiza za nkhaniyi wati zotsatirazi azitulutsa mtsogolo muno nkuwona undunawu ungachitenji omwe akukhudzidwa kusokonekera kwa ndalamazi 
  zotsatira za kafukufuku zatulukadi zili mmanja mwa nthambi yoona zakapewedwe ka matenda osiyanasiyana nawo aikepo ndemanga zawo zikachoka kumeneko mpomwe tione tingatani potengera zotsatira ndemangazo adatero magwira 
  adati oganiziridwa onse omwe adzapezeke olakwa adzaimitsidwa ntchito chosokoneza ndalama za boma 
  kumapeto kwa chaka chatha unduna wa zaumoyo udaimitsa ntchito 63 zitadziwika ndalama zina zomwe zimayenera kugwira ntchito yolimbana matenda edzi zasokonekera undunawu umafuna mpata wofufuzira 
  tidaimitsa omwe amaganiziridwa nawo mwa anthuwa amagwira kunthambi yowerengera ndalama za undunawu makalaliki ogwira ntchito mmaofesi tifufufuze bwinobwino popanda zopinga adatero magwira 
  anthuwa adapatsidwa mpaka 31 march chaka chino tsiku lomwe angadzayambe ntchito mpaka anthuwa sadayambebe ntchito kudikira zotsatira za kafukufukuyo zituluke 
  maunduna nthambi zina za boma zakhala zikukhudzidwa kusokonekera kwa ndalama za boma zomwe amangoti kashigeti pofanizira kubedwa kwa ndalama zankhaninkhani kulikulu la boma
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
amangidwa kaamba kogwililira wamisala wolemba thokozani chapola rt-of-arrest.jpg 302w sizes="(max width 586px 100vw 586px > apolisi mboma la chiradzulu amanga wina kaamba komuganizira wagwililira msungwana wa zaka 17 yemwe wamisala 
 wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo sergeant yohane tasowana watsimikiza za kumangidwa kwa mkuluyu patrick kodo polankhula radio maria malawi 
 wati zotsatira za kuchipatala zatsimikiza msungwanayu anagwililidwadi kodo akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa 
 watsimikiza za nkhaniyi tasowana woganiziridwayu kwa mtsikanayu madzulo anamugwiragwira kumkokera patchire kugona naye ake mtsikanayu omwe anazanena za nkhaniyi ku polisi anatero sergeant tasowana 
 wati milandu yogwililira ikuchulukira kwambiri mbomalo ponena ikumakhala pafupifupi itatu mwezi uliwonse 
 kodo amachokera mmudzi mwa mpokera kwa mfumu likoswe mboma lomwelo la chiradzulu
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
amangidwa kaamba kobisa khanda   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi   pamene amayi akukangana amuna mmidzimu kufuna nsalu yalekaleka amayi pamene mwayi woterewu akumauseweretsa nkumataya ana oberekabereka nkuthiridwa maunyolo apolisi 
  zikutsatira kumangidwa kutsekeredwa mchitolokosi kwa wa zaka 22 pomuganizira adafuna kubisa khanda lomwe adabereka ku dowa 
  wofalitsa nkhani za polisi mboma la dowa richard kaponda wati mayiyu jenifer wilson wa mmudzi mwa kamphelo mdera la t mkukula mbomali 
  kaponda adati nkhaniyi idachitika 4 august chaka chino mmudzi mwa kamphelo 
  nkhani malingana kaponda ikuti mayiyu ankakhala ku lilongwe chemwali wamkulu komweko mwamuna wina adamuchimwitsa kumupatsa pathupi 
  adaganiza zopita kwa makolo ake ku dowa atalephera kuchotsa pakatipo atafika kumeneko sadadziwitse makolo ake za nkhaniyi amaphimba mimbayo isaonekere kunja 
  pomwe idakwana yoti abereke adapita pathengo lina loyandikira pomwe padali chulu adabereka mwana wamkazi adamutayira mdzenje pachulupo momwe munali chiswe chomwe chinayamba kuteketa mwanayo adafotokoza kaponda 
  adati khandalo lidayamba kulira amene ankadutsa chulucho amene adamva kulirako adakatsina khutu mfumu ya mmudzimo yomwe idakanena kwa apolisi 
  kaponda adafotokoza mwanayo adamutengera kuchipatala chachikulu cha dowa komwe adakamwalira chibayo kaamba kozizira 
  mayiyu woganiziridwayu adamumanga kaamba koti amatulutsa magazi atakamupima kuchipatala zomwe zidapangitsa amuganizire adabereka kutaya khanda lake mdzenjemo 
  mayiyu akuyembekezereka kukaonekera kubwalo la milandu posachedwapa komwe akayankhe mlandu wofuna kubisa khanda
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
bishop stima apempha akhristu akondwere pasaka mosamala episkopi wa dayosizi ya mangochi ambuye montfort stima wapempha akhristu dayosizi yi pamene akukondwerera chaka cha pasaka asayiwale njira zomwe unduna wa zaumoyo wapereka zopewera kachilombo ka coronavirus mdziko muno 
 wapereka mafuno abwino kwa akhristu ake bishop stima ambuye stima alankhula uthenga wawo wapadera wa chaka cha pasaka kwa akhristu ati mulungu woyera wa chaka chino siwunayende mwa zaka zonse akhristuwa asaleke kupitiriza kupemphera kulimbikitsa njira zopewera kachilombo ka coronavirus 
 mulungu woyera wa chaka chino siwunayende mwa zaka zonse tisaleke kupitiriza kupemphera kulimbikitsa njira zopewera kachilombo ka coronavirus anatero ambuye stima 
 ati kachilombo ka coronavirus komwe kadza pakati lonse kadzetsa mavuto aakulu kuwuka kwa ambuye yesu kuthandize kudzetsa kuwala pochotsa mantha chikayiko mmitima mwa akhristu
Label: RELIGION

Text:
alowerera paesiteti ya kawalazi t kabunduli wa mboma la nkhata bay wadandaula pafupifupi 500 omwe adalowerera kukhazikika paesiteti ya tiyi ya kawalazi mbomalo 
  kabunduli wati anthuwa omwe awutcha mudziwo joni(potengera mzinda wa johannesburg mdziko la south africa aupandu sadatsate dongosolo loyenera lopezera malo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc anthuwa adandipeza zaka zoposa zisanu zapitazo kupempha malo ndidawauza dongosolo loyenera zodabwitsa zoti adakalowerera malo esiteti adatero kabunduli 
  mwambi uja amati tikhale nawo adalanda malo ukupherezera pankhaniyi pomwe kabunduli akulongosola anthuwa si mbadwa za boma la nkhata bay obwera maboma mhigawo cha kumpotochi 
  kabunduli adati nkhawa mkanganowu esitetiyi mpamba wa ake 
  ndikuopa mkanganowu ungakhudzenso ntchito za mdera langa amene amagwira kuesitetiku kabunduli adatero 
  dc wa bomali fred movete adati anthuwa omwe ambiri mwa amaotcha makala derali lili mitengo yachilengedwe amati adalowerera malowa omwe adagula esitetiyi mzaka za mma 1970 sanawapatse makolo chipepeso 
  movete adati akutero ofesi yake idalandiranso malipoti oti anthuwa si mbadwa za mboma la nkhata bay ochokera kumaboma 
  adalongosola nkhaniyi yakhala ikulowa mbwalo la milandu kangapo konse makamaka pomwe olowererawa adaphwanya galimoto kulanda wapolisi mufti yomwe idapezeka kuvulaza ogwira ntchito pakampaniyi 
  padakalipano tikukambirana mbali ziwirizi tibweretse mgwirizano nkhanizi zikafika kukhoti zinthu zimaonongeka adatero movete 
  poyankhulapo akuluakulu esitetiyi adati mchitidwewu wobwezeretsa chitukuko mmbuyo 
  wachiwiri kwa wa kampaniyi kenneth kabaghe adati anthuwa aika kampaniyi pampani 
  adati ncholinga cha kampani yake mwabata oizungulira zikuvuta mudzi wa joni
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
maepiskopi akatolika awunikira akhritsu za mtsogoleri woyenera kumusankha maepiskopi mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno atulutsa kalata yomwe mwa zina yaunikira akhristu mpingowu zina mwa zomwe akuyenera kudziunika pofuna kukonza maziko abwino miyoyo yawo 
 kalatayi yayamba mau mbukhu loyera mateyo mutu wa 20 kuyambira ndime ya 25 mpaka ya 27 pomwe pali akuti yesu adawaitana ophunzira ake nawauza mukudziwa olamulira amadyera masuku mutu pakati zisamatero ayi 
 ofuna wamkulu akhale mtumiki wanu wofuna mtsogoleri pakati panu akhale kapolo wanu 
 alemba chikalatacho maepiskopi aku malawi malinga kalatayi yomwe mutu kusindika za kufunika kosintha zinthu kuyambanso moyo watsopano mmalawi yalimbikitsa atenge gawo posintha zinthu mdziko muno 
 chisankho chatsopano cha mtsogoleri wa chomwe chikudzachi njira imodzi yomwe amalawi angasinthire zinthu zomwe zakhala zisakuyenda ofunika kusankha atsogoleri okhawo omwe angathandize amalawi akhale amodzi ogwirizana ochita zinthu mwadongosolo owopa mulungu olemekza malamulo bwalo la milandu osakondera chigawo chipani chatero chikalatacho 
 adandaulanso khalidwe losankhana mitundu lomwe lakhala likuchitika zipolowe ndale kuchuluka kwa katangale kusalangidwa kwa akaphwanya malamulo alimbikitsa kampeni yamphamvu yothana nthenda ya covid-19 
 kalatayi ya namabala 26 kulembedwa maepiskopi mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno 1961 pomwe analemba kalata yoyambilira
Label: POLITICS

Text:
aika mwala wa maziko kawiri pachipatala kachikena banda kuyalanso mwala lolemba msabatayi mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda adatsogolera mboma la ntcheu pomwe amayala mwala wa maziko chipatala cha amayi apakati kuyala kwa mwalaku kumadza mkazi wa mtsogoleri wakale wa lino callista mutharika atayalanso mwala wamaziko pamalopo mmbuyomu 
  mutharika adalonjeza ndalama pafupifupi k18 miliyoni zomwe amati zimangire chipatalacho pomwe banda adalandira k35 miliyoni kukampani ya magetsi ya escom yomwe imangire chipatalacho 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc malinga mfumu ina ku ntcheuko yomwe siidafune kutchulidwa dzina mutharika atayala mwalawo ntchito yomanga chipatalacho idayambika 
  mwala wa maziko udadzayalidwa kale tangodabwa winanso wamaziko ukubwera timaganizatu kubwera chipatala osati mwala ntchito yomanga chipatalacho idayambika kale moti apapa komwe kunamangidwako kwagumulidwa ntchitoyo iyambirenso idatero mfumuyo 
  wa bungwe loona zaumoyo la malawi health equity network mhen martha kwataine wati payenera kafukufuku ndalama zomwe adalonjeza mutharika adalonjeza zidalowera ntchitoyo iyime 
  ntchitoyi ya amalawi eni osati munthu apapa timvetse komwe kudapita ndalamazo nanga zagwira ntchito yanji 
  ntchitoyo idayambidwa zakhala boma ligumule kudayambidwako mmalo moti angopitiriza zifufuzidwe adatero kwataine 
  patsikulo phungu wa kumadzulo mboma la ntcheu chikumbutso hiwa nduna ya za umoyo catherine gotani hara pamodzi banda adatengetsa mutharika polephera kumalizitsa chipatalacho 
  sindikufuna ndiyambe chomwe chidachitika chipatalachi chisamalizidwe kuonetsetsa zomwe amayembekezera zakwaniritsidwa adatero banda 
  kwataine adati si ntchito zomwe zipindulire kumazilowetsa ndale ponena zotere sizingapititse malawi patsogolo
Label: HEALTH

Text:
csc ipempha boma lipereke chipukuta misonzi kwa okhudzidwa nsewu bungwe la centre for social concern lapempha boma lichite changu kupereka chipukuta misonzi kwa omwe anakhudzidwa gawo loyamba lomanga nsewu wa machinga chingale lirangwe kamba koti zikupereka mavuto osiyanasiyana pamoyo wawo bernard mphepo omwe mlangizi ku bungweli ndondomeko ya economic governance ndiyemwe wanena atayendera ndikuwona ntchitoyi mmene ikuyendera masiku apitawa 
 imodzi mwa nyumba zokhudzidwa nsewu wa chingale ndife okhudzidwa kwambiri boma silikutengepo gawo pankhani yopereka chipukuta misonzi mpaka anthuwa ufulu wao ukuphwanyidwa munjira zosiyanasiyana tingopempha boma lichite changu liwathandize pozindikira nyengo ino ndiyamvula anatero mphepo 
 mai mphatso charles mwa omwe akhudzidwa ati zikupereka chiopsyezo pamoyo wao watsiku tsiku 
 msewuwu wadutsa mphepete mwa nyumba kwambiri zikupereka chiopsyezo kwa ana pakhomo panga anakumba ngalande dothilo anayika pakhomo panga lomwe likupangitsa madzi adzisefukira mpaka kulowa mnyumba anadandaula motero charles 
 masauko mgwaluko omwe mneneri ku bungwe loona nkhani yopereka chipukuta misonzi la roads fund administration wapepesa chochedwa kupereka ndalamazi zomwe wati zimachitika kamba kosowa ndalama zokwanira walonjeza ntchitoyi ichitika posachedwapa 
 kumbuyoku tinali ndimavuto okhudza ndalama tinali nazo zochepa zomwe sizikanakwanira tilipire onse okhudzidwa zinakakhala zokhumudwitsa kwa otsalawo ndilonjeze tsopanso ndalamazi zapezeka tili chiyembekezo tipereka kwa onse okhudzidwa omwe analembedwa mkaundula sabata yoyamba yamwezi wa january chaka chammawachi tipepese chakuchedwaku anatero mgwaluko msewuwu wa machinga chingale lirangwe uli mchigawo choyamba cha ntchitoyi yomwe ndiyamakilomita makumi awiri 20 yomwe ikuyambira ku lirangwe kulekeza ku chipini
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
papa wapempha athu azisamalira achikulire mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wati achikulire akuyenera kusamalidwa 
 malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa walankhula uthenga wa lamya wopita ku parishi ya paulo woyera wa mtanda diocese ya rome 
 wati achikulire akufunika chisamaliro chokwanira akufunika nao kumacheza nao 
 roberto cassano yemwe mfumu wa parish ya paulo woyera wa mtanda saint paul of the cross diocese ya rome wati wodabwa msabata yangotha kumeneyi pomwe analandira lamya atamvetsera mau munthu yemwe amalankhula naye anazindikira kulankhula papa francisco 
 papa francisco episkopi wa diocese ya rome adayendera parishyi 12 april mchaka cha 2018 
 umodzi mwa ma utumiki opezeka mparishiyi womwe papa francisco adachita nao chidwi ndiwo wosamalira achikulire 
 kudzera lamyayo papayu walimbikitsa cassano apitirize ntchito yotamandika yosamalira achikulire omwe kawiri kawiri amaiwalidwa 
 mmawu ake cassano wati zopatsa chidwi kulandira lamya ya chilimbikitso kwa papa francisco yemwe akukumbukirabe za ulendo wokacheza mparishiyi 
 cassano wati wachita chidwi kangapo konse lamyayo papa francisco anapempha parishyi izimupemphelera 
 watinso lamya ya papa francisco yawalimbikitsa kwambiri parish utumiki wao wosamalira ovutika njira zosiyana siyana makamaka achikulire 
 mmaiko ambiri la pansi kuphatikizapo la malawi achikulire akukumana mavuto osiyana siyana mwa zina zomvetsa chisoni nkuti achikulire ku malawi amagniziridwa afiti omanga mvula
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
maliro akapeza ukwati pamoyo wa munthu mavuto mtendere zimabwera mosayembekezera zina zovuta zimagwa pamene pali zilinganizo zina zachimwemwe ukwati gift chimulu adacheza gogochalo pemba mboma la salima amve zambiri maliro akapeza ukwati mudzi zimatani adacheza motere   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu gogo zimatani kudera kwanu kuno maliro akagwa pabanja lomwe lakonza chilinganizo cha ukwati choyamba ndinene zikafika potero mafumu mikoko yogona imaima mitu cha nkhani imeneyi ndinene zimatengera kwambiri kodi ubale wa amene wapitayo amene akupanga ukwati wotani pemba kufotokozera chimulu momwe zimakhalira tiunikireni tsopano zikatero gogochalo gawo lanu limakhala lotani mudziwa mafumu amakhala mbali panthawi ya ukwati angakhalenso maliro zotero zikagwa timayenerabe kukumana kubanja ganizo lawo nditsindike zambiri timatsekera kaye zovutazo cholinga choti mwambo waukwati udutsepo 
  zikatero sanganene mwapeputsa maliro maganizo otere atha kukhalapo choti nchoti kukonzekera ukwati sikwatsiku limodzi ayi pamene maliro amangodza mwadzidzidzi timakhulupirira pamene wina wamwalira zake zimakhala zatha choncho amoyo sangaimike zichitochito zawo kaamba ka zovuta 
  gogo yanu mfumu zinakugweraponi zoterezi yanga ayi sizidandionekerepo ndaziona zikuchika ndili wamngono maliro adayamba atsekeredwa kaye kudikira ukwati udutsepo zonse zidayenda bwinobwino popanda milandu potsatira chilinganizo chotero 
  miyambo imeneyi ana masiku ano sakuyidziwatu sadzatitukwana tsiku lina tikadzatsekera maliro kaamba ka ukwati nkhawa yanu yoona zikufunikiradi dongosolo ana ongobadwa kumenewa azidziwa miyambo ya makolo momwe angathanirane mavuto okhudza miyambo zikhalidwe zawo gawo lalikulu lili mmanja mwa makolo aziwaunikira ana 
  pomaliza gogo mzimu wa wotisiyayo mukuona amaganiza zotani pomwe tasiya mwambo woika mmanda thupi kaamba ka ukwati mukuganiza kwambiri ndafotokozera muja zoterezi zimachitika mosapanganika mzimu wakwiya mapemphero amachotsa zonsezo ndimalize kunena zili choncho zones maliro timawapatsa ulemu wofunikira timatha kuimika zina zonse kaamba ka zina zina paukwati pokhapo ziyenera kutero basi 
  mwatero gogo eya akavine kenako kulira mwambo wonse wa maliro pambuyo
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
kunjatidwa kwa kasambara kunganyanyule mavuto kusamvera mabwalo milandu komwe boma laonetsa kwasonyeza kulephera kwa chipani cha democratic progressive dpp kulemekeza ufulu wachibadwe zomwe ati zingakhale zotsatira zoipa 
  azipani zotsutsa boma amabungwe oona za ufulu wachibadwidwe mfumu ina kudzanso mmadera osiyanasiyana aunikira pomwe apolisi adakakamira kusunga mwa akatswiri woimira pamilandu chonsecho bwalo lamilandu litampatsa belo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc ralph kasambara yemwe wakhala akudzudzula boma mzambiri kuimira pamilandu odzudzula boma adamangidwa lolemba 13 febuluwale poganiziridwa kuvulaza omwe ati amafuna kumupha kuphulitsa nyumba yake bomba la petulo 
  womuimira pamilandu adatenga belo ya bwalo lamilandu kasambara atulutsidwe apolisi sadamulole kutuluka kufikira lachiwiri 21 febuluwale pomwe adatulutsidwa belo 
  apa omwe aikirapo ndemanga ati zingapereke chithunzithunzi choti boma silikulabadira za ufulu wachibadwidwe likutseka pakamwa amalawi otsutsana ulamuliro wa dpp mtsogoleri wa lino bingu wa mutharika 
  ndemangazi zati mwa zina maiko mabungwe akunja angapitirize kumana lino thandizo boma silikulemekeza ufulu wachibadwidwe 
  dziwani tuwanje wa mmudzi mwa chiwalo kwa t chiwalo ku phalombe wati zikungosonyeza ufulu wobadwa nawo uli pachiopsezo 
  timadalira omenyera ufulu amenewa akumangidwa pazifukwa zonsamveka ndiye ifenso tili pachiopsezo akutero tuwanje 
  samuel luangwa wa mmudzi mwa maulabo kwa t maulabo mboma la mzimba wati moyo wa uli pachiwopsezo maka zizifika pokanzidwa belo chonsecho bwalo lamilandu litaloleza 
  mfumu ina ku mwanza yomwe siidafune kutchulidwa dzina yati sikumvetsa chomwe kasambara amakaniziridwa belo 
  mfumu ndikuti ndikulakwa kukaniza kasambara kutuluka belo ufulu wathu uli pachiopsezo chachikulu 
  apa boma likuchita kuonetseratu nkhanza zonse zikutipatsa uthenga woipa kumudzi kuno atalankhula zosakhala ndiye azingomutumizira achipani ndikumukhapa mwina kumuotchera nyumba kumene ikutero mfumuyi 
  wa bungwe lomenyera ufulu wachibadwidwe la malawi watch billy banda wati mawanga aboma pankhani ya kasambara akuonetsa boma la dpp silikuimira mzika za malawi likapemphedwa likonze likuganiza akunenayo akufuna kulanda boma 
  maiko akunja akhoza kudula thandizo chilichonse chikuchitika mokomera munthu akutero banda 
  mtsogoleri wachipani cha petra kamuzu chibambo wati maso akuyenera kumakhala kwa kumudzi amazunzika awanenera zamavuto alibe mwayi odzudzula boma 
  adanenetsa akumudzi asadandaule kwambiri nkhani ya kasambara azipani ayesetsa chilungamo chioneke 
  kasambara yemwe kale adali mlangizi woyambirira wa boma pazamalamulo mboma la bingu wa mutharika wakhala akudzudzula boma zokhudza ulamuliro wabwino 
  damangidwa pamodzi arthur chikankheni mayamiko kadango brian magoya patrick gadama kaka adatulutsidwa belo ya bwalo lamilandu lachitatu 15 
  mwa onsewa kasambara yekha adamangidwanso patangotha maola awiri ati ndondomeko zotulutsira amunawa sizidatsatidwe 
  mneneri wa mtsogoleri wa lino hetherwick ntaba wati anthuwa akuyenera kumvetsa nkhanza zomwe adachita kasambara pootcha osalakwa kumaliseche moto wa magetsi uko atawamanga 
  wati sindale palibe chisonyezo chilichonse boma lachipani cha dpp lasiya kulemekeza ufulu wachibadwidwe 
  lachinayi 16 febuluwale kasambara adatengeredwa ku ndende ya zomba komwe adasungidwa pamodzi akaidi wodikira kuphedwa kuseweza moyo wawo wonse 
  lachisanu kasambara adamutengera kuchipatala cha mwaiwathu mumzinda wa blantyre akalandire chithandizo chachipatala ati malinga vuto lake la mtima 
  ntaba wati mwina sakumvetsetsa ati apolisi sangangomanga munthu popanda 
  nokha mwamva belo yomwe adapatsidwa idali yosasayinidwa apolisi ndiye kumumanganso sikuti pali zifukwa za ndale apa 
  kasambara wakhala akulankhula chipongwe mmbuyo monsemu samamangidwa zili zifukwa za ndale akutero ntaba 
  malinga woimira kasambara pamilandu wapona kita kasambara watulutsidwa belo sizikudziwika adzikaonekera masiku ati 
  pomwe timasindikiza nkhaniyi nkuti kasambara kuchipatala cha mwaiwathu mumzinda wa blantyre kuyembekezera kupita kunja ku chipatala lachinayi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
papa wavomereza mlozo wa maphunzitso mpingo mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wavomereza mlozo wa maphunzitso mpingo kafalitsidwe ka uthenga wa chipulumutso 
 malinga malipoti vatican radio bungwe la ku likulu la mpingo ku vatican lomwe limaona za chibalalitso cha mpingo mnyengo ino ya makono lomwe latulutsa mlozowu 
 mlozowu ukutsatira mlozo wina wa 1971 1997 
 mlozowu ukutsindika zinthu zingapo poyamba mgwirizano womwe ulipo pakati kuphunzitsa maphunzitso mpingo kafalitsidwe ka uthenga wa chipulumutso mlozowu ukutsindika mkhristu wobatizidwa mmishonale woyenera kulalika kufalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso 
 chigawo choyamba cha mlozowu chikukamba za aphunzitsi uthenga wa chipulumutso kufunika koti anthuwa azisulidwa kokwanira 
 pamene chigawo chachiwiri cha mlozowu chikukamba za kaphunzitsidwe ka uthenga wa chipulumutsowu 
 chigawo cha chitatu chikukamba za maphunzitso mpingo mma parish osiyana siyana
Label: RELIGION

Text:
alimi otsogola amasamalira nthaka chuma chili nthaka komatu sichipezeka nthaka yosakazidwa kusasamala za chilengedwe mitengo kukupangitsa nthaka iziguga izitu zikusautsa alimi chaka chilichonse potaya ndalama zawo mminda yokanika kupereka zipatso zoyenera zili chonchi alimi akusimba lokoma minda yawo ili mphamvu zogonera mwa alimiwa joseph khoswe wa mmudzi mwa matipa chingale epa mboma la zomba yemwe akubwekera dongosolo losamala nthaka akalozera temwa mhone adacheza khoswe motere   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu alimi chingale epa ku zomba kuunga mlambala pansi chingwe cha kalozera panopa tiziti kwacha moti alimi azipita ku munda eya ulimitu ulibe tchuthi kudacha kalekale titakolola april august mwezi wogalauza apo apo lingaliro lokonza minda mvula ikayamba masabata awiri isadagwe likuchititsa ulimi mdziko muno wovuta chizolowezichi chimayipitsa mbiri ya ulimi pomaganiza ulimi magobo timachita zinthu zambiri yochepa pothamangitsana mvula 
  mukuukokomezatu ulimi mpaka levulo ku munda akuseka pomwe pali chuma palibe ulimi bizinezi yodalira nthaka yomwe timayenera kuyisamala chaka chonse pambali mavuto odza kwa nyengo mugwirizana nane ambiri ulimi ukuwakanika minda idaguga mbewu sizikubereka moyenera levuloyi yogwiritsa ntchito amisili omanga nyumba poyala njerwa chimodzi mwa zida zokonzera akalozera oteteza nthaka zina zikhomo chikwanje chingwe cha mamita 5 mitengo ndodo iwiri yotalika mamita 1.6 mpaka 2.0 hamala 
  akalozera dongosolo lopezera kayendedwe ka madzi mmunda cholinga chokonza mizere yoteteza nthaka mwachitidwa akalozera timaungamo milambala yomwe imateteza nthaka pochepetsa kuthamanga kwa madzi mmunda mizere yonse yotsatira imalunjika mlambalawo potengera kutsika kwa malo akalozera milambala imene imatalikana 5 10 mitazi mmunda 
  mumakonza motani akalozera timafunika atatu awiri aima ndodo zomangidwa chigwe chija ndikhala pakati levuloyi kuyeza malo omwe timadzi levulo tabwera pakatikati wa kumapeto amaika chikhomo kusunthira komwe kuli ndime timatero mpaka munda wonse uthe 
  dongosololi lofunika mmunda kuteteza nthakako ndiye chonde sichikokoloka amathandiza chinyezi kukhalitsa mmunda polowetsa madzi okololedwawo pansi yankho ku vuto la ngamba kuguga kwa nthaka madongosolo ophimbira ngonyeka box ridges ulimi wa mmaenje maswale 
  mwapindula motani akalozera chajira kaya muti chonde mmunda mwanga chogonera kukagwa ngamba maonera kufoota kwa mbewu za alimi ochita chisawawa poti mwanga chinyezi chimakhalitsanso zokolola kholophethe mpaka ndidasankhidwa mlimi wachitsanzo kumbali ya akalozerayi

Text:
wafa atawombedwa galimoto ku kasungu wina wa zaka 30 zakubadwa wa mboma la kasungu wafa atawombedwa galimoto yomwe sikudziwika 
 wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mboma la kasungu sergeant miracle mkozi watsimikidza za ngoziyi poyankhula radio maria malawi 
 wati ngoziyi yachitika pamudzi wa chitete mbomalo zotsatira za kuchipatala zasonyeza malemuyu masawu ndawu wafa kaamba kovulala kwambiri mutu 
 kuno ku kasungu mzibambo wa zaka 30 wafa ataombedwa galimoto yomwe siikuziwika ngoziyi inachitika dzulo 25 may 2020 mmudzi wa chitete chikwangwani cha chitukuko cha mmatauni anatero mkozi 
 sergeant mkozi wati muthuyu wafa kamba kovulala kwambiri mmutu apempha oyendetsa galimoto aziyima akachita ngozi ponena galimoto yomwe yachita siyinayime malopo
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
msonkhano wa ycw uli mkati ku karonga msonkhano waukulu wa chaka wa bungwe la achinyama mpingo wachikatolika la young christian workers kuno kumalawi uli mkati dayosizi ya karonga 
 polankhula radio maria malawi lero pulezidenti wa bungweri light balton wati msoknanowu ukuchitikira ku sukulu ya atsikana ya st mary usokhanitsa ma membala onse bungeri ochokera mmadiosizi onse asanu atatu mpingo wakatolika mdziko lino 
 msonkhano umenewu chaka chinochi nkhani yayikulu yomwe tikukapanga ndikupereka malipoti momwe ycw yagwirira ntchito chaka chimenechi kuonjezera apo kukachita ntchito ya chifundo ku sukulu ya ana osamva osayankhula loweruka kudzakha kulumbira kwa membala amene alowa kumene bungeri anatero balton 
 mwazina wati mawa mwambo wa misa yotsegulira msonkhanowu omwe adzatsogolere ambuye peter musikuwa chikwawa diosizi mwambo wa misa omwe udzachike loweruka pamene mamembala atsopano adzalumbire adzatsogolere ambuye musikuwa komso ambuye mstumbuka msokhanowu awuchita motsogoleredwa mutu wakuti kubatizidwa kutumidwa cholinga chofuna kuyendera limodzi mpingo dongosolo lake

Text:
2019 ikudetsa nkhawa chikhulupiliro chapita amalawi 28 mwa 100 aliwonse akuti akuona chisankho chopanda mtendere chilungamo chaka cha mawa 
  zadziwika potsatira kafukufuku wa nthambi yofufuza za maganizo pankhani zosiyanasiyana ya institute of public opinion and research ipor 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kafukufukuyo yemwe adayendetsa akadaulo kayendetsedwe ka boma ndale wasonyeza amalawi nkhawa kaamba ka zina mwa zomwe zikuchitika mdziko muno pokonzekera chisankhochi 
  omwe ataya chikhulupilirowa akuti nkhani za zipolowe mphekesera zodzabera chisankho malingaliro okondera ku bungwe la mec kusayenda kwa zisankho za mmbuyomu ndizo zifukwa latero lipoti la kafukufukuyu 
  pomwe chipani cholamula cha democratic progressive dpp chadzudzula kutsogoza maganizo otere zipani zotsutsa zati maganizo anthuwo tanthauzo 
  zisankho za mmayiko africa zimasokonekera cha wotsogoza kutaya chikhulupiliro mmalo momasakasaka njira zokonzera zinthu adatelo mneneri wa dpp nicholas dausi 
  adati chofunika nchoti angokhulupilira chisankho chidzayenda basi pasadzakhale kukokanakokana zotsatira zachisankhocho 
  mneneri wa chipani cha malawi congress mcp maurice munthali adati nkhawa yachisankho chopanda chilungamo mtendere zidabwera nyumba ya malamulo itangokana malamulo oyendetsera chisankho 
  malamulo kuja lidali ganizo la nthambi zosiyanasiyana zomwe zidali zitaona kufooka kwa malamulo oyendetsera chisankho ndiye nkhaniyi itangokanidwa adataya chikhulupiliro pompaja adatelo munthali 
  adati zipani zandale nazo zikuonjeza kunyogodolana pamisonkhano kuchulutsa odzetsa mkwiyo kuyambitsa ziwawa 
  tikapanda khalidwe lonyoza kulankhula zodzetsa mkwiyo kuyambitsa phokoso misonkhano yathu tiyembekezere ulendo owawa wa ku chisankho adatelo munthali 
  mneneri wa united transformation movement utm joseph chidanti malunga adati akugwirizana kwa thunthu omwe akuwona mdimawa potengera zomwe zikuchitika mdziko muno 
  taona kangapo konse pakuchitika zofuna kulepheretsa kubwela ku misonkhano yathu apa akulimbana nafe tisalembetse chipani mukumbuka adatiwotchera galimoto ku msonkhano wa ku mangochi zonsezi amaona adatero malunga 
  kafukufukuyo yemwe adachitika mmiyezi ya august september 2018 akusonyeza dpp yomwe ili oyitsatira ambiri kumwera ili danga lalikulu lodzapambana chisankho 
  lipotilo lasonyezaso mcp ikubwela pachiwiri mphamvu zake zadzadzana chigawo cha pakati kutsatidwa utm yomwe mphamvu zawoneka ku mpoto 
  mcp kudzera mwa mneneli munthali yatsutsa zoti iyo ili mphamvu mchigawo chapakati chokha ponena chipanichi chidazika mizu mzigawo zina za lino 
  sitikudelera omwe adapanga kafukufukuyu patokha tikuwona talanda malo mzigawo zina chitsanzo zotsatira za chisankho chachibwereza cha 2017 adatero munthali 
  chipani cha mcp chatchulidwa ndicho ambiri nacho chikhulupiliro choti chitha kudzakonza zinthu zomwe zidaonongeka kayendetsedwe ka 
  adati dpp yolimbikitsidwa zotsatira za kafukufukuyo yati ilimbikira kukonza zofowoka zomwe kafukufukuyo wayipeza nazo 
  zipani ziwirizi zagwirizana maganizo utm yangogweramo mbwalo kaamba koti kafukufukuyo adachitika yomwe gululi limakhazikitsidwa kumene ndiye lidali nchikoka 
  malunga adati utm nchiwopsezo chachikulu ku zipani za dpp mcp adati zotsatira za kafukufukuyo zatsimikiza mphamvu kuwopsa kwa utm
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
nthula abambo ofooka kuchipinda achangamuke akuti abambo amafooka pamene akucheza akazi cha zina zomwe zimasowekera pamene machezawa mkati ichi nchifukwa chake makolo akale amakhulupirira pakhale nthula mthunduwere zomwe zimachangamutsa amuna oterewa ibra monjeza wa mmudzi mwa sauka kwa t malemia mboma la zomba ndiye akufotokoza kwa bobby kabango 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu monjeza kufotokozera za kufunikira kwa nthunduwere tidziwane bwinobwino 
  monjeza ndine mlimi amandidziwa ulangizi wanga ulangizi wokhudza mabanja ulimi 
  ulangizi wanji omwe mutipatse lero ndikupatsani ulangizo omwe ndimawafotokozera pafupifupi tsiku lililonse uwu ulangizi kwa amayi zomwe ayenera asamafooke pamene akucheza nawo 
  ndiye amayenera atani nkhani nthula basi kugwiritsa ntchito nthula molondola ndiye zako zayera abwekera zonse sangafooke 
  nthula nchiyani   zibalobalo za kamtengo kakangono kamene kamakhala minga amati nthunduwere mbuzi zimadyanso 
  mwati zimathandiza chiyani dziwani macheza pakati amakhalabwino akusangalala amakhala yaitali pamene akucheza mayiyo wapanga zomusangalatsa apa pamene tikuti nthula zimagwira ntchito machezawa akhale 
  nthula ndiye zimapanga chiyani   zimakometsera machezawo athe pakufunika nthula nonse awiri akhutitsidwe 
  mumazitani nthulazo zifike pamenepa umafunika uthyole nthulayo usankhe yoti ikupita koola imakhala yoti ili biii kuda dziwani amayi ndiwo amagwiritsira ntchito nthulayi osati amuna imangopangitsa mwamuna asangalale pamene akucheza 
  ndiye munthu wa mayiyo atani akatenga nthulayo amayingamba pakati kumagwiritsira ntchito pakutha sabata mayiyo amakhala wasinthiratu akati acheze mwamuna zimakhala zabwino mwamuna amasangalala ndithu 
  amazigwiritsa ntchito chimathekacho nchiyani akangoyicheka pakati nthulayo basi apite kwa amene wamkulu mdera lawo akamuuza momwe angaigwiritsire ntchitomo akaigwiritsa ntchito amakhala mkazi woti mwamuna amasangalala naye pamene akuchita macheza amuna ofooka amalimbikitsidwa 
  tafotokozani 
  sindinena dziwani kale ulionse umadziwika zochita zake angoni achewa timawadziwa momwe akuchitira kuchipinda masiku ano amatsata njira zomwe akufuna asangalatse amuna ake kale alhomwe timawadziwa mikanda lero upezanso omwe alhomwe alibe mikanda izitu zikusonyeza chikhalidwe chidasokonekera akupanga chomwe akufuna ndikunenazi zachikhalidwe ndiye sindinganene wamba 
  osati mukungotinamiza apa   kodi mudakwatira mudayambapo mwacheza mudasiyanitsapo mudachitapo bwezi mutandimvetsa sindikunama zoona 
  inuyo mudasiyanitsapo   akuseka ndikudziwa chomwe ndikunena
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
kudzula mpeni wofunikira kwa butchala popha mbuzi ngombe amagwiritsa ntchito zida zosiyanasiyana nkhwangwa zikwanje mipeni umodzi mwa mipeniyi umatchedwa kudzula eni ake akuti mpeniwu amagwiritsa ntchito posenda nyamayo steven pembamoyo adacheza innocent chimsewu yemwe amapha nkugulitsa ya mbuzi adziwe chinsinsi chosagwiritsa mpeniwu pantchito zina kuphera kusendera basi adacheza motere tandiuze dzina lako ntchito yomwe umapanga mnyamata 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu dzina langa ndine innocent chimsewu ndimapha mbuzi kumagulitsa yake mumsika wa ku area 22a ku lilongwe 
  kodi pali zinsinsi zilizonse zokhudzana bizinesi ya makamaka ya mbuzi ngombe chimsewu kusenda mbuzi mpeni wa kudzula ndikudziwa zomwe mukutanthauza mukukhala mukukuluwika pangono yankho lake ili bizinesi ya ya mbuzi ngombe nchimodzimodzi bizinesi ina iliyonse apa ndikutanthauza momwe amayendetsera bizinesi ina iliyonse ndimoso zimachitikira mbizinesi ya 
  ndidamvako mpeni wosendera ya malonda sugwiritsidwa ntchito zina zimenezi nzoona nzoona mpeni umenewu tikamaliza kusendera mbuzi ngombe timautsuka bwinobwino kuusunga pamalo abwino usamalike kunena zoona si pali kugwirizana kulikonse amangochita njira imodzi yosamalira mpeniwu usasowe 
  dzina la kudzula lidabwera dzina basi momwe maina onse amayambira kubwerera adangoganiza mpeniwo ukhale kudzula mwina potengera ntchito yomwe umagwira yosendera 
  umakhala mpeni wooneka mpeni momwe umakhalira mpeni wina uliwonse uwu umakhala wakuthwa kwambiri kawirikawiri umaninga mmphepete imodzi wosokera nsapato kaamba konolanola timanola pafupipafupi mpeni wobuntha umanyotsola posenda mnofu wambiri umatsalira kuchikopa 
  ndikubwezere mmbuyo pangono mpeni wa kudzula utasowa mpeni wina uliwonse sungagwire nthito yosendera mbuzi ngombe ukhoza kusendera bwinobwino popanda choletsa komansotu posenda mbuzi ngombe si pamakhala mpeni umodzi wokha ayi kungoti si mipeni yonse yomwe ili kudzula wokhawo womwe ndalongosola uja umenewu ndiwo suloledwa kugwiritsa ntchito ina iliyonse ntchito ina ya kudzula chiyani kudzula amagwira ntchito zambiri pakupha kusenda mbuzi ngombe ntchito yoyambirira yothyolera fupa la pakholingo wocheka pakhosi akacheka pamakhala fupa lomwe limatsalira lomwe limasunga moyo ndiye amatenga kudzula nkuthyolera fupa limeneli ntchito ina poti mpeniwu umakhala wakuthwa kwambiri kuchekera zammimba mtima chifu matumbo ndulu makamaka ndulupo ukagwiritsa ntchito mpeni wobuntha mwangozi ukhoza kuthudzula ndulu ndiyetu kungotero ndiwo yonse yaonongeka 
  nanga mubutchala mogulitsira nyamayo kudzula safunika si kwenikweni kwake nkophera kusenda zikavutitsitsa akhoza kugwira ntchito yochekera mubutchala si china chake chingachitike ayi ambiri amaumira kutero kuopa kusowetsa
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
wafa atatu atsopano apezeka coronavirus nduna yowona zaumoyo mdziko muno jappie mhango watsimikizira za imfa ya wina yemwe wamwalira nthenda ya covid -19 mdziko muno 
 mhango wanena msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe komiti yapadera yomwe ikuwona za matendawa inachititsa lero mzinda wa lilongwe ndunayi yati mayiyu yemwe wa zaka 51 amakhala mdziko muno inali mzika ya mdziko la india wafika mdziko muno posachedwapa ku united kingdom 
 ndunayi yalengezanso atatu atsopano apezeka nthendayi pomwe wati awiri mzinda wa blantyre pamene wa mboma la chikwawa 
 malinga mhango munthu wamu mzinda wa blantyre wa zaka 34 yemwe watenga matendawa kwa mbale yemwe anapezeka nthendayi 3 april chaka chino wina wa zaka 28 yemwe anafika mdziko muno 19 march ku united kingdom 
 ndunayi yati munthu wachitatu wina wa zaka 30 wa mboma la chikwawa yemwe anafika mdziko muno 16 march mdziko la south africa 
 zimenezi zikutanthauza amene apezeka nthendayi mdziko muno padakalipano akwana asanu atatu 8)
Label: HEALTH

Text:
alimbikitsa makatekist amvetse za baibulo makatikisti dayosizi ya mangochi awapempha zitsanzo zabwino powerenga kuphunzitsa baibulo 
 samuel malamulo omwe anena maphunzirowa omwe anachitikira ku st marys pastoral centre dinale ya mpiri mutu woti baibulo nyale ya moyo wanga 
 anatinso ma catechist azikhala chidwi chowaphunzitsa akhristu akabwerera ku maparish kwawo akathandize kumvetsa baibulo 
 iwowa atsogoleri akuyenera akachoka akathe kuphunzitsa akhristu ku madera kwawo zokhudza baibulo choncho akuyenera kumvetsa cholinga cha maphunziro amenewa anatero malamulo 
 mwa ma katekist omwe anachita nawo maphunziro wa matthews mchakulu ati maphunzirowa akawathandiza kuwaphunzitsa akhristu mma parish mwawo kumvetsa baibulo 
 maphunziro amenewa atithandiza kwambiri atithandiza kumvetsa za baibulo tikabwelera ku parish kwathu tikatha kuphunzitsa akhristu athu anatero mchakulu
Label: RELIGION

Text:
udindo wa amalawi kutetedza chilengedwe- svp bungwe la zachifundo mpingo wa katolika la st vincent de paul ssvp lati kwa nyengo kwakhala gwero lalikulu la mavuto ambiri amene mdziko muno akukumana nawo kuphatikiza kusowa kwa malo okhala abwino chakudya 
 bungwe la svp kupereka zofunda kwa ovutika bungweli lanena lamungu 22 february 2020 ku likulu lake mdziko muno mzinda wa blantyre pothilira ndemanga mapurojeketi omwe bungweli lili nawo mchaka chino 
 wa bungweli mdziko charles kimu ambiri omwe bungweli lawafikila mbuyomu amene anakhuzidwa kwa nyengo kusefukila kwa madzi chilala choncho vutoli lalikulu pakati mzika za lino 
 tapelera katundu osiyanasiyana kwa mawanja amene anakhuzidwa madzi otsefukila kwa okhuzidwa ngamba ochuluka ntchaka cha 2019 choncho vutoli likuvutitsa miyoyo ya ambiri muno anatero kimu 
 kimu kupatatula kuwapasa zinthu zokhazikika amene anakhuzidwa kwa nyengo osowa kofunika kwambiri lino liyike chidwi chake posamalira chilengedwe pozindikira chilengedwe gwero la zofunika zambiri umoyo wa munthu 
 kimu kupereka zovala kwa ovutika chaka cha 2020 bungweli lilindimalingaliro okonzera nyumba za omwe anakhuzidwa mvula yamphavu mchaka cha 2019 ndondomekoyi iyambila akidayosizi ya blantyre 
 amene anakhuzidwa mvula ya mphavu chaka chatha akukhalabe mnyumba zamavuto zamingalu choncho ndikofunika kuwafikila anthuwa anaonjezera motero kimu 
 mwazina bungweli mchaka cha 2020 liphunzitsanso ntchito zamanja mwaulele ochokera ku mabanja ovutikikitsitsa mbali imodzi yowalimbikitsa anthuwa kuimba paokha chuma 
 bungwe la svp kupereka chimanga kwa osowa wapampando wabungweliyu anapitiliza kupempha amene amalandira thandizo losiyanasiya kuchokela kwa akufuna kwabwino azisamala thandizolo kutelo zimaonetsa mtima othokoza 
 zimamvetsa chisoni kuona akugulitsa katundu yemwe alandira kwa akufuna kwa anadandaula choncho kimu 
 bungwe la st vincent de paul liyamba mdziko muno ku zomba dayosizi 17 okotobala mchaka 1970 berck mdziko la france
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
ku machinga akonzekera ulimi wa fodya alimi mmakalabu 7 ati chaka chino akonzeka kulima fodya wochuluka ncholinga chosintha mabanja pachuma popeza amakhulupirira fodya mbewu yomwe imabweretsa chuma chochuluka pakhomo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu nkhaniyi idadziwika pamene kampani ya japanese tobacco international jti sabata yatha idapereka feteleza pangongole kwa alimi ochokera mdera la mfumu ngokwe mboma la machinga pamwambo womwe udachitikira pamsika wa ngokwe alimiwo adatsindika kudzipereka paulimiwu chaka chino malawi asimbe lokoma ndalama zakunja zomwe zimathandizira kuyendetsa ntchito za chitukuko mdziko 
  jti idaganiza zochita machawi pofuna kuwagwira mkono alimiwo akwaniritse masomphenya 
  kampaniyo idakongoza alimiwo matumba feteleza okulitsa super d compound kwa onse omwe adapanga makalabu zaulimi alime fodya wochuluka kumusamala 
  mwa alimiwo sitola banda adati jti ikuthandiza alimi mbomalo kukwaniritsa malingaliro chaka chamawa boma lipeze fodya wochuluka 
  talandira ngongole ya matumba feteleza wokulitsa tikukhulupirira tigwiritsa ntchito thandizoli moyenera makalabu omwe aakuluakulu adakongozedwa feteleza matumba 200 pofuna achilimike ntchito za kuminda yawo si mlimi kusiya ntchito za kumunda nkumapita uku uku koyangana feteleza mnyengo yoti ulimi wafika kale pampondachimera banda adatero 
  adati dera la ngokwe makedzana lidali minda ya fodya yochuluka alimi ankatumiza fodya wambiri kumisika ya fodya mdziko muno choncho adapempha alimiwo adzipereke kotheratu kaamba koti nalonso boma limaika chidwi pafodya chuma chiyende 
  tiyeni titukule lathu potenga nawo mbali paulimiwu mlimi wochenjera adafesa kale fodya kunazare pakadalipano maso tcheru kuyembekeza kumwamba mvula igwa liti adaonjezera banda 
  mlimiyu yemwe amachokera mkalabu ya kondwerani mmudzi mwa muwawa t ngokwe adathokoza kampani ya jti kaamba kowapatsa poyambira zomwe zakhazikitsa pansi mitima ya alimi mderalo 
  tikuthokoza jti popereka ngongole yochuluka chotere apatu sitijejemajejema mvula ikayamba kugwa talandira matumba feteleza okulitsa motengera muyezo wa fodya yemwe tidasayinirana kudzagulitsa kukampaniyo tikuyembekezanso kulandira matumba feteleza wobereketsa posachedwapa adatero banda 
  tingopempha chauta kutipatsa mvula yokwanira chaka chino tikwaniritse khumbo lathu potukula mabanja lathu tikuyamikiranso kampaniyi popeza ikutilimbikitsa kubzala mitengo yambiri mmalo momwe tadulamo mitengo yogwiritsira ntchito paulimiwu tichepetse kuononga chilengedwe kuderali adaonjezera motero banda 
  palinso mabungwe mardef omwe akuthandiza alimi kuderalo powapatsa ngongole ya zipangizo za ulimi asasowe pogwira pamene ntchito ya kumunda yayambika makedzana lidali minda ya fodya yochuluka alimi ankatumiza fodya wambiri kumisika ya fodya mdziko muno choncho adapempha alimiwo adzipereke kotheratu kaamba koti nalonso boma limaika chidwi pafodya chuma chiyende .tiyeni titukule lathu potenga nawo mbali paulimiwu adaonjezera banda 
  mlimiyu yemwe amachokera mkalabu ya kondwerani mmudzi mwa muwawa t ngokwe adathokoza kampani ya jti kaamba kowapatsa poyambira zomwe zakhazikitsa pansi mitima ya alimi mderalo 
  tikuthokoza jti popereka ngongole yochuluka chotere apatu sitijejemajejema mvula ikayamba kugwa talandira matumba feteleza okulitsa motengera muyezo wa fodya yemwe tidasayinirana kudzagulitsa kukampaniyo tikuyembekezanso kulandira matumba feteleza wobereketsa posachedwapa adatero banda

Text:
sungani mbatata mmunda   mnkhuti isaonongeke alfred mumba wa mboma la dowa amalima mbatata malo okwana maekala 5 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu amapeza matumba osachepera 250 mbatata pachaka malowa chomvetsa chisoni nchoti amangokwanitsa kugulitsa theka lokha la zokolola zake 
  mbatata imasungika yaitali mukaisamala ndikanyamula matumba 10 kupita nawo ku msika 5 okha ndiomwe ndimagulitsa mtengo wabwinoko osalawo ndimagulitsa mongotaya kungozisiya ku msika komweko 
  zimakhala chomwechi ogulawo amatiphwathulitsa matumba ndikusankhamo zomwe akufuna zotsalazo amazisiya ndikupita kwa ogulitsa wina adatero 
  katswiri wa mbewu za mtunduwu kwa bvumbwe miswell chitete adati zokolola za mbewuyi za pakati 30 50 100 zilizonse zimaonongeka mdziko muno 
  adati mbatata sizichedwa kuonongeka zimakhala osaonongeka mosachepera miyezi itatu zikasiyidwa mmunda momwemo osazikumba miyezi 9 zikasungidwa mnkhuti 
  malinga chitete njirazi ndizothandiza mlimi azitha kugulitsa mbewuyi pangonopangono yomwe yayamba kusowa choncho akhoza kupindula nayo 
  mbatata ikakhwima sizikutanthauza mlimi akolole yonse ndikupita nayo ku msika akagulitsa yochepa chabe yambiri izangoonongeka agulitsa mongotaya adatero 
  adafotokoza mlimi akhoza kuilekerera mmunda momwemo ndikuzayamba kukumba pamene waona mbatata yachepa msika apindule nayo kwambiri 
  katswiriyu adati vuto lomwe mlimi akhoza kukumana nalo posunga mmunda la kufumbwa kwa mbatata kaamba ka anankafumbwe 
  chitete adati vutoli silalikulu kwenikweni akhoza kuthana nalo pokwirira mingalu anankafumbwewa azisowa polowera 
  mlimi akhoza kusankha kusunga mbatata yake nkhuti ndikuzaigwiritsa ntchito mtsogolo kumatengamo pangonopangono kufikira izathe adatero 
  katswiriyu adati nkhuti dzenje losungiramo mbatata mlimi amakumba molingana kuchuluka kwa zokolola zake za mbewuyi 
  akamaliza kukumba chitete adati mlimi amayenera kusanja mbatata yake mzigawo 
  adafotokoza pamwamba chigawo chilichonse amayenera kuwazapo phulutsa mchenga dzenje lija likadzadza alikwirire 
  akachoka apo katswiriyu adafotokoza mlimi amayenera aziyifukula mwezi uliwonse ncholinga choti akapeza ikumera azichotsa mphukirazo potero imasungika kwa yaitali 
  njira ina yotetezera mbatata isaonongeke ndikuipala makaka 
  makakawa akauma mlimi akhoza kupanga ufa ndikumaphikira phalala thobwa zina zambiri adatero 
  katswiri wa mbewu za masamba ku lilongwe university of agriculture and natural resources luanar eric chilembwe adati alimi akhoza kuchulukitsa phindu ku mbewuyi pogulitsa yophika kale yootcha 
  mulu umodzi wa mbatata umagulitsidwa motsika mtengo pamene kuyiphika kuyiotcha ndikumagulitsa ndalama yake imakhala yooneka adatero 
  jean pakuku mwa bizinesi omwe akupititsa patsogolo miyoyo ya alimi mdziko muno powagula mbatata yofiyira mkati ndikumapangira zinthu buledi masikono
Label: FARMING

Text:
chikho cha carlsberg chafika pachimake osewera okonda kamuzu barracks kusangalala mmbuyomu thambo lagwa chikho cha carlsberg chaka chino chabwera zake pamene anyamata ovala jombo atenga malo kugwedula matimu omwe amakula mtima 
  chikhochi tsopano chafika mndime ya semifayinolo pamene dzulo evirom imakumana red lions kamuzu mumzinda wa blantyre 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc lachitatu big bullets idatulutsidwa kamuzu barracks ku dedza 1 0 bullets itapha silver strikers ku kamuzu patsikuli ku chitowe mafco idapondedwa asilikali anzawo moyale 3 1 mpira udathera mmapenote 
  lachinayi masewero adaliponso ku silver strikers kumene blantyre united idaumbudza mponela united 1 0 
  pofika dzulo masana nkuti mndime ya semifayinolo mutalowa blantyre united moyale kamuzu barracks moyale imangodikira timu imene ipambane pakati red lions evirom pamene kamuzu barracks imene idatulutsa amene amateteza chikhochi blue eagles ikumana blantyre united 
  malinga mphunzitsi wa kamuzu barracks billy phambala timu ya chisilikali ndiyo itenge chikhochi iya adalankhula atakomola bullets 
  tidali kuposa bullets chokhumba chathu titenge chikhochi adatero phambala pamene mphunzitsi wa mafco stereo gondwe polankhula atatuluka adati timu ya chisilikali ndiyo itenge chikhochi

Text:
papa yohane paulo wachiwiri wokonda kupemphera wachilungamo mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wati papa yohane paulo wachiwiri woyera munthu wokonda kupemphera wokonda chilungamo 
 papa yohane paulo wachiwiri woyera malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa francisco walankhula lolemba ku likulu la mpingo ku vatican misa yokumbukira papita zaka 100 pamene papa yohane paulo wachiwiri anabadwa 
 wati papa yohane paulo wachiwiri mbusa wokonda wokonda kupemphera wokonda chilungamo 
 lolemba 18 may papa francisco watsogolera misa yomwe yachitikira manda papa yohane paulo wachiwiri woyera 
 iyi inali misa ya padera yothokoza mulungu cha mphatso ya mtengo wa patali ku la pansi ya papa yohane paulo wachiwiri 
 misayo papa francisco wati papa yohane paulo wachiwiri mbusa yemwe amakonda zonse wokonda kupemphera wokonda chilungamo 
 mulungu amakondadi ake mulungu anayendera ake zaka 100 zapitazo kudzera mwa mwana yemwe anabadwa ku poland anakula nakhala wansembe episkopi mpaka papa zoonadi mulungu amakonda ake amawayendera akewo watero papa francisco misayo 
 papa francisco wati papa yohane paulo wachiwiri wokonda kupemphera anadziwa ntchito yoyamba ya episkopi kupemphera papa yohane paulo wachiwiri wokonda nchifukwa chake anayenda maulendo ambiri mmaiko osiyana siyana kukalimbikitsa akhristu kukasaka nkhosa zotayika watinso papa yohane paulo wachiwiri wokonda chilungamo kuonetsetsa mmaiko muli mtendere wa chifundo popeza chilungamo chifundo zimayendera limodzi 
 pomaliza papa francisco wati lero akukamba za chifundo cha mulungu divine mercy cha papa yohane paulo wachiwiri 
 papa yohane paulo wachiwiri woyera anabadwa 18 may 1920 ku poland anakhala papa kwa zaka 27 kuyambira 1978 mpaka kumwalira kwake mchaka cha 2005 papa anayenda maulendo 104 mmaiko osiyana siyana kuphatikizapo la malawi mchaka cha 1989 kuyambira 4 mpaka 6 may

Text:
phindu lochuluka ngombe za ulimi wa ngombe za umafuna mpamba wochuluka phindu lake limabwera mochedwa akadaulo zaulimi wa ziweto akuti ulimi wolemeretsa kwambiri kusiyana wa ziweto zazingono mlimi akautenga 
  akadaulowa akuti mlimi amadya nazo ngombe za akamazikwatitsa zachizungu kuzinenepetsa asadazigulitse 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi malingana woyanganira ulimi wa ziweto mboma la kasungu jacob mwasinga ngombe ya malawi zebu kuikwatitsa ya chizungu ya chi brahman bosimala ana obadwawo akamafika chaka chimodzi amakhala akula afika poti mlimi akhoza kupha pamene osakwatitsa amatenga zaka ziwiri 
  ngombe za brahman zimakhala yochuluka mlimi akazitsekera mkhola ngombezi kwa miyezi itatu kumazidyetsera momwemo zakudya mapesi zotsalira za mtedza osaiwala madeya kuzipatsa mankhwala opha nyongolosi ndikuzitetezera ku nkhupakupa zimanenepa kwambiri choncho phindu lake limapambana 
  mlimi akakwatitsa ngombe zake zachizungu kuzinenepetsa asadagulitse amakhala wachepetsa yokolola amadzichulukitsira zokolola ku ulimiwu choncho amapindula koposa adatero 
  woona za ulimi wa ziweto ku shire valley agricultural development division shivadd dickson mangadzuwa adafotokoza kuzera mundondomeko yonenepetsa ngombe mlimi amatha kuchulukitsa kulemera kwa ngombe yake theka kupita mmwamba pakutha miyezi itatu 
  ndaonapo alimi akuonjezera makilogalamu 0.7 kilogalamu iliyonse ya ngombe yake kuzera ndondomekoyi choncho akagulitsa amapha nayo makwacha ochuluka ngombe imagulitsidwa malingana kulemera kwake adatero 
  adati kugula ngombe zazikulu kale kumangozinenepetsa kopindulitsa kwambiri mlimi amangozinenepetsa kwa miyezi itatu yokha kugulitsa choncho amapanga ndalama pafupipafupi akuweta zingonozingono 
  mangadzuwa adafotokoza iyi njira yokhayo yothandiza alimi ngombe za aziutenga ulimiwu bizinesi 
  medison semba wa mboma la blantyre mwa alimi amene ulimi wonenepetsa ngombe za ndikumagulitsa akuti ulimi wopindulitsa 
  kale ndimangoweta kumagulitsa phindu lake silimakhala logwirika kufikira pamene ndidayamba bizinesi yomagula kwa alimi anzanga kumazinenepetsa kumagulitsa 
  zambiri sindizinenepetsa kwa miyezi itatu miyezi iwiri yokha zimakhala zafikapo poti ndikhoza kugulitsa ndikapyola miyezi iwiri ogula amadadaula yachuluka mafuta ndimapha kumagulitsa ndekha adatero 
  malingana mlimiyu amadyetsera ngombe imodzi chakudya chokwana makilogalamu 8 patsiku 
  adafotokoza chakudyachi chimakhala chakasakaniza madeya chimanga mpunga udzu mamolase 
  udzu umakhala wochuluka kwambiri zakudya zonsezi chakudya chodalirika kwambiri cha ngombe adatero 
  zili chomwechi mphunzitsi wa zaulimi wa ziweto ku lilongwe university of agriculture and natural resources luanar jonathan tanganyika adati ulimi wa ngombe za mdziko muno ukukumana mavuto kusowa kwa malo zipangizo zodyetsera 
  kuonjezera apo adati matenda misika yosowa ndondomeko yoyenera mwa mavuto amene akulowetsa pansi ulimiwu mdziko muno
Label: FARMING

Text:
ku nsanje akukana zosamuka 
 zosamuka ayi yanenetsa gulupu karonga ya kwa mfumu mlolo mboma la nsanje 
 mfumuyo akudza pamene 56 pofika lachinayi sabata ino adatsimikizika amwalira mvula yosalekeza yomwe idazunguza lino sabata yatha 
 malinga nthambi yoona za ngozi zogwa mwa dzidzidzi ya department of disaster management affairs dodma nyumba 184 589 omwe 922 945 akhudzidwa 
 lachitatu dodma idachenjeza amene akukhala malo angozi asamukire kumtunda zanyengo alosera mvulayo itha kubweranso 
 komabe sizikusuntha gulupu karonga amene wati aiwale zosamukazo pali zambiri zomwe ataye atasamuka 
 lero ndine mfumu ndisamuke kupita dera lina ndiye ndikakhala munthu wamba mukupaona pamenepo adatero karonga kulankhula mmalo mwa mafumu ake angonongono 
 mfumuyo limodzi ake atsakamira pachilumba cha makhanga pakati madzi sangapite madera pokhapokha akwere bwato lomwe ulendo umodzi k5 000 
 mfumuyo yatinso anthuwo atha kusamuka atawapezera dera lomwe kulibe akakhale udindo malo okwanira 
 mlembi wamkulu wa dodma wilson moleni adati apita ku nsanje kukawapemphabe anthuwo asamuke 
 akuti mvulayi ibweranso kutanthauza zinthu zifike polakwika kuposa apa kusamukira malo okwera tipewe adatero moleni 
 ngozi ya mvulayi yakhudza maboma 14 mdziko muno boma lomwe lakhudzidwa kwambiri chikwawa 8 amene afa 
 2015 lino lidakhudzidwanso ngozi ya madzi yomwe idadza cha mvula yosaleka 79 adafa 153 adasowa 638000 adakhudzidwa
Label: FLOODING

Text:

 amalankhula masana lachitatu ya malamulo pomwe nyumbayi imayamba zokambirana zake 
 kwa ineyo ndikuona amenewa achipongwe polankhula ifeyo azibwana ndife ana amene oti sakuyenera kulankhulidwa munthu kwa nzake potengera analankhulira kuno ku paliyamenti ndikupemphanso asipikala asankhe komiti yoti mtambo akapepeseko chipongwe chomwe achitachi anatero botomani 
 botomani ati nkhaniyi yafika kale kwa sipikalayu anaena achitapo kanthu akakambirana bwinobwino apempha asipikala wa achite machawi powayitanitsa mtambo ku komiti yomwe asankheyi azapepese poti chipongwechi chalankhulilidwa kwa sipakala omwe anyumbayi 
 polankhula imodzi mwa wailesi zina mdziko muno wacbiwiri kwa wa bungwe la hrdc gift trapence ati sangapepese aphungu mbali ya bomawa omwe akuyenera kupepesa powatchula zigawenga
Label: POLITICS

Text:
nyumba ya malamulo yatsiriza zokambirana zake by richard makombe ads/2019/07 parl3 300x168.jpg alt= width="671 height="376 />nyumba ya malamulo ya malawi nyumba ya malamulo lero yatsiliza mkumano womwe aphungu akhala akukambirana zinthu zosiyanasiyana zokhudza lino 
 mtsogeri wa lino professor peter mutharia yemwe anatsegulira zokambiranazi 21 june chaka chino pomwe mwazina aphunguwa anakambirana za ndondomeko yoyendetsera lino kwa miyezi inayi kuyambira mwezi uno kufikira mwezi wa october 
 mmawu ake potsiliza zokambiranazi mtsogoleri wa mbali yotsutsa boma robin lowe anathokoza aphunguwa kamba kodzipereka zokambirana samakhalanawo zokambiranazi 
 komabe ndili okhumudwa kamba koti aphungu samaikapo chidwi zokambirana zina zomwe zimachitika mnyumbayi anatero lowe 
 mtsogoleri wa nyumbayi kumbali ya boma kondwani nankhumwa poyankhulapo ndiokhudzidwa momwe aphungu otsutsa amayankhulira mnyumbayi pomwe zambiri amanyoza mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika 
 kumayambiliro mkumanowu aphungu otsatira chipani cha malawi congress mcp anatuluka mnyumbayi pomwe mtsogoleri wa lino professor peter mutharika amayankhula potsegulira msonkhano wa aphunguwa ya malamulo mzinda wa lilongwe kamba koti sakuvomereza mtsgoleri wa lino kunyumbayi kukakambirana za ndondomeko ya chuma yoyendetsera lino 
 mwazina kwa yoyamba mbiri ya lino aphunguwa anasankha catherine gotani hara sipikala wanyumba ya malamulo
Label: POLITICS

Text:

Text:
papa wasankha episkopi watsopano mdziko la zambia mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wasankha episkopi watsopano wa dayosizi ya ndola mdziko la zambia 
 malinga malipoti vatican radio papa lachisanu wasankha ambuye benjamin phiri episkopi wa dayosiziyo 
 episkopi watsopanoyo ambuye phiri ambuye phiri akhala episkopi wothandizira wa dayosizi ya chipata mdzikolo kuyambira mchaka cha 2011 
 lachisanu 3 july 2020 ya 12 koloko masana ku rome likulu la mpingo wa katolika vatican pamene lalengeza papa francisco wasankha ambuye benjamin phiri episkopi wa dayosisi ya ndola 
 ambuye ongosankhidwawa omwe adabadwa 14 june 1959 ku chipata adadzodzedwa unsembe 14 september 1986 ku dayosisi ya chipata 
 wansembe atumikira ma parish osiyana siyana woyanganira za chiyitanidwe anakhalapo woyanganira sukulu yosula ma catechist anakhalapo mlembi wa ambuye medardo mazombwe 
 kuyambira mchaka cha 1997 mpaka 2002 adakachita maphunziro malamulo mpingo canon law ku sukulu ya ukachenjede yotchedwa pontifical urban university ku rome 
 pambali pokhala episkopi wothandiza auxiliary bishop wa diocese ya chipata kuyambira mchaka cha 2011 analinso woyanganira rector wa seminary ya saint dominic ku lusaka mdzikolo ntchito yomwe ayigwira kuyambira mchaka cha 2004 
 mpingo wa katolika ku malawi nawo ukudikira mwa chidwi modekha papa francisco asankhe episkopi wa dayosizi ya dedza
Label: POLITICS

Text:
kampani ya ahl yapempha alimi atsate ndondomeko zoyenera kampani yoyendetsa malonda fodya mdziko muno ya auction holdings limited yapempha alimi atsate ndondomeko zomwe zayikidwa kagulitsidwe ka mbewuyi chaka chino kaamba ka nthenda ya covid-19 
 wapempha alimi atsatire ndondomeko zoyenera ndanga mneneri wa kampaniyi tereza temweka ndanga wanena pamene msika wa malondawa ukuyembekezeka kutsekulidwa lolemba likudzali 
 wati pali ndondomeko zatsopano zomwe zayikidwa pofuna njira zopewera matenda covid-19 alimi onse okhudzidwa asakhale chiwopsezo chotenga kufalitsa nthendayi 
 tikugwirisa ntchito ma receiving centres alimi azitha malonda fodya kumeneko kudzera mma sellers shit anatero ndanga 
 atinso alimi azithanso malonda afodya kudzera mma lamya njira ya ahl 252 kwa alimi omwe analembesa
Label: FARMING

Text:
alimi samalani pososa mlimi weniweni ndiye amasamalitsa kalendala yake ya ulimi kuyambira mwezi watha mpaka uno alimi amalangizidwa akuyenera kuyamba kusosa 
  mlangizi wamkulu mboma la chiradzulu sheila kangombe wati alimiwa ayenera asamalitse pamene akusosa chiyambi chosakolola zochuluka yososa 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kangombe adati alimi akuyenera kudziwa mitengo ya thonje fodya siyiyenera kukwiriridwa zambiri imakhala matenda 
  pofotokozapo njira zabwino za kasosedwe kangombe adati kukwirira mapesi ndondomeko yabwino ya kasosedwe kumasunga manyowa 
  alimi angathe kukwirira mapesi awa mapesi chimanga mtedza mbewu zina ayenera akwiriridwe iyi njira yabwino ya kasosedwe zikaolerana zimapanga manyowa 
  amakonda kuotcha mapesi siziloledwa mitengo ya fodya thonje zomwe ziyenera kuotchedwa mapesi achimanga mbewu zina amabweretsa manyowa akwiriridwa adatero 
  madera ambiri alimi ayamba kale kukwirira sadayambe zilili ku dedza komwe alimi otangwanika kukumba kachewere mbatata ya kholowa 
  sylvester chitini wa mmudzi mwa salile kwa t kasumbu mboma la dedza akuti kumeneko alimi sadayambe kusosa komabe mwezi ukudzawu ayambapo 
  ndife otangwanika kukumba mbatata ya kholowa kachewere zonse timayamba mochedwa kusosa kuno kumapeto kwa september akhala wayambapo kusosa adatero 
  mboma la blantyre maboma alimi akumaliza kusosa pamene akuyamba kumene tomasi kandodo wa ku chilomoni akuti sabata ikubwerayi akhala atamaliza kusosa munda
Label: FARMING

Text:
papa walengeza zakusintha kwa tsiku la chaka cha achinyamata mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco walengeza chaka cha achinyamata world youth day chidzachitike kutsogoloku osati mmene adakonzera poyamba 
 malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa francisco wavomereza chaka cha achinyamata world youth day chaka cha mabanja world meeting of families zisachitike mmene adakonzera poyamba malinga nthenda ya covid-19 
 uthengawo wati malinga mmene zinthu ziliri padakali chaka cha mabanja chomwe chimayenera kudzachitika mwezi wa june 2021 ku rome chidzachitike mwezi wa june mchaka cha 2022 ku rome komweko chaka cha chinyamata chomwe chimayenera kudzakhalapo chaka cha 2022 ku lisbon mdziko la portugal chidzachitika august mchaka cha 2023 ku portugal komweko 
 malinga uthengawo mliri wa coronavirus mwa zina wasokoneza zokonzekera zomwe zimayenera zitayamba kuchitika mma diocese mpingo wa katolika lonse zokonzekera zomwe zimayenera zitayamba kuchitika padakali kulikulu la mpingo ku vatican 
 chaka cha mabanja chimasonkhanitsa pamodzi mabanja chikatolika mbali zonse za la pansi cholinga chofuna kukondwerera moyo wa banja pakati mamuna mkazi zinayamba mchaka cha 1994 pamene chaka cha chinyamata chimasonkhanitsa chinyamata mpingo wa katolika mbali zonse za la pansi pofuna kulimbikitsa chinyamatawa moyo wao wa chikhristu 
 papa yohane paulo wachiwiri woyera ndiye adayambitsa chaka cha chinyamata mchaka cha 1985
Label: SOCIAL

Text:

Text:

Text:
papa apempha akhristu apempherere msonkhano wa ma episcope ku amazon wolemba sylvester kasitomu mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisko lamulungu wapempha akhristu mpingo wu lonse apemphere ma episcope mpingo wu adindo ku amazon omwe ayamba msonkhano wawo wa sinodi

 wafuniranso zabwino atsogoleri adindo omwe akuchita nawo msonkhano wu wapempha ma episcopi wa pomwe akuchita msonkhano wu awonetsetse agunda kukambirana zabwino zomwe zingathandize ntchito zokweza mpingowu sinodi yo

Text:
amatsutsanabe zamakumanidwe ambiri akapezana nkukondana nkugwirizana za banja amakhala chikumbumtima cha komwe mmene adakumanirana nkhani yochititsa chidwi kumva za chiyembekezo focus maganga lydia kalonde 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu awiriwa akuti mpaka lero sagwirizanabe za malo tsiku lomwe adakumana koyamba chomwe amakumbukirako nchakuti mudali mchaka cha 2013 adapanga chinkhoswe 7 june 2013 
  chomwe ndimakumbuka nchakuti ndidakamupeza kuofesi yake nditapita mnzanga dickson kashoti pomwe amakakamira tidakumana koyamba mminibasi kwa uku kudali kukumana kwachiwiri adatero focus 
  focus linda pachinkhoswe chawo panthawiyo nkuti focus akugwira ntchito ya utolankhani pomwe lydia adali wothandizira wa zofalitsa kuunduna wa zofalitsa komwe mpaka 
  focus adati poti awiriwa alibe tsiku lokhazikika lomwe angati adakumana koyamba chomwe amakumbukira nchakuti atakumana kuofesi ya lydia adangopatsana moni polingalira idali ya ntchito 
  kwinaku akuti amakumbukira atakumana mminibasi lydia adali chidwi momwe adavalira suti yapamwamba tsitsi losapesa mmaganizo mwake amangoti mwina wadzuka mowa mmutu 
  adali maganizo oterewa macheza adayenda mpaka posiyana tidapatsana nambala za foni nkumaimbirana mwakathithi mpaka chibwenzi chidayamba adatero focus 
  adati chitachitika chinkhoswe adalowana asadapange ukwati pofuna kukonzekera mofatsa akuti ukwatiwo ukhalako kumapeto kwa chaka chino 
  focus akuti amakonda kwambiri lydia wooneka wanzeru wachikondi woopa mulungu amamuthandiza nzeru kumulimbikitsa akamafooka 
  naye lydia akuti amamukonda kwambiri focus kaamba ka zochitika zake masomphenya kulimbikira pochita zinthu 
  amapanga zondisangalatsa khama luntha pochita zinthu tidapezana okonda kupemphera tokhatokha ansangala adatero lydia
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
ampingo avula gule zigoba madzi achita katondo kwa kansonga mdera la mfumu chilowoko mboma la ntchisi komwe akhristu mpingo wa ccap wa biwi adavula zigoba za gule wamkulu yemwe adakasononeza msonkhano wawo wachitsitsimutso 
  sabata yapitayi akhristu mpingo wa kanjiwa adali msonkhano wachitsitsimutso pampingo wa biwi msonkhanowo udatenga masiku atatu kuyambira lachisanu kufikira lamulungu 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc amayerekeza gulewamkulu akafuna chiwembu malinga omwe atitsina khutu omwe malonda pamsikawo ulaliki umatsindika kwambiri za gule wamkulu zomwe sizidasangalatse akuluakulu kumzinda 
  pofika lamulungu gule wokwana 7 adatulukira pamalo chitsitsimutsowo akasokoneze akhristuwo adagwirapo zirombo ziwiri kuzivula zigoba zirombo zinazo zitaona zidathawira kudambwe 
  polankhulapo mfumu chilowoko ya mbomalo yati ikufufuzabe za nkhaniyi idziwe mizimuyo idawedzedwa mfumu ya mzinda 
  zina amangoyeserera gule wamkulu awa omwe amangotuluka paokha opanda mfumu ya mzinda titsimikize uyu adalidi gule pafunika chitsimikizo chochoka kwa mfumuyi adatero chilowoko 
  adatinso pali chikaiko choti guleyo adali wovomerezeka mfumu ya achewa kalonga gawa undi adaletsa kuwedza gule malinga mlili wa covid-19 
  zikapezeka nzoona guleyu adali wa mzinda akapezeka wolakwa timalipiritsa mbuzi kuposera apo achewa timafuna mabungwe onse azikhala mwamtendere opanda chiopsezo adatero chilowoko 
  malinga nkhani yomwe wamvetsedwa yoti nawo mpingo pachitsitsimutso chawo amangokamba za gule wamkulu zomwe sizidakomere agulewo 
  pakadalipano tingodikira apolisi atiuze pomwe nkhaniyi ili ndauzidwa idakafika mmanja mwawo mukudziwa salowa mabwalo awiri adalongosola chilowoko 
  adanenetsa apolisiwo akathana nazo za mzinda alekere eni chikhalidwe omwe mafumu omwe amakawedza gule kumanda 
  mneneri wa polisi mboma la ntchisi richard kaponda adati nkhaniyo siyidafike kupolisi mbali zonse zokhudzidwa zidangokambirana pazokha 
  nawo bungwe losungitsa chikhalidwe la chewa heritage foundation chefo adati atumiza ku maloko woyanganira nkhani za mafumu chikhalidwe akafufuze chidatsitsa dzaye njovu itchoke mnyanga 
  wapampando wa bungwelo george kanyama phiri adati mpungwepungwe pakati mpingo gulewamkulu wakhala ukusowetsa mtendere kwa kanthawi tsopano
Label: CULTURE

Text:

Text:

  gogo ndithandizeni kodi ndimutaye mnyamatayu ttk ttk mutaye mnyamatayu zomwe akufuna nzongogonana basi osati za banja 
  anyamata ambiri amabwatika atsikana powauza adzawakwatira akudziwa zaukwati nazo kutali

  apatu ndikuona mnyamatayu kamberembere mutaye asakutaitse yako pachabe 
  gogo natchereza bwenzi langa chimasomaso gogo natchereza ndidakumana mtsikana wina mzinda wa mzuzu zaka zapitazo tidapatsana nambala za foni takhala tikuimbirana mpaka ubwenzi udayamba 
  mtsikanayu amagwira ntchito ku banki ina mzindawo moti mnyumba yakeyake yomwe amakhala 
  gogo mnzangayu ndamupezapo katatu konse chikondi amuna osiyanasiyana wakhala akundipempha ndimukhululukire ndimakhululukadi 
  gogo mtima wanga ndiwosweka mnzangayu ndimamukonda kwambiri moti maganizo moyo mphamvu zanga zonse zidali 
  nditani gogo chonde ndithandizeni hka hka mtsikanayu njinga simungapitirire naye paubwenzi 
  mutha kutero mwakufuna kwanu mudzanongoneza bondo mtsogolo muno khalidwe la chimasomaso sindikuona akusiya

Text:

   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi tikakumana tinkangocheza mmene amachezera padafika poti tayamba kukumana mowirikiza chidwi chikondi chidayamba kuchuluka mpaka ubwenzi udayamba adatero banda

  nkhani zomwe tinkakambirana tikakumana zomwe zidandikopa kwambiri mtima adatero banda 
  awiriwa adakhala chibwenzi zaka asadalowe mbanja 
  gift banda mkazi tisunge paubwenzi wawo adakumana zokhoma zingapo kukaikiridwa makolo omwe amaganiza akungochita zachibwana eni akewo amadziwa chikondi chawo nchozama chili tsogolo lowala 
  akulangiza achinyamata omwe akufuna kupanga chiganizo chopeza wachikondi azidekha yabwino yomudziwa wachikondi wawo asathamangire zogonana asadapange dongosolo lonse lofunika 
  awiriwa akuti akakumana mavuto mbanja mwawo amagwada pansi nkupemphera mulungu awathandize
