Text:
dpp yati siyigonja pochita zionetsero chipani cha democratic progressive dpp lachitatu chinachita ziwonetsero chigawo chaku mmawa kwa lino ati posakondwa momwe bwalo la zamalamulo la constitutional court lidagamulira mulandu wa za chisankho cha president 
 ziwonetserozi zinachitikira mzinda wa zomba zinayambira ku chinamwali mpaka kukafika ku khonsolo ya bomalo komwe adakapereka chikalata chamadandaulo kwa wa mzinda wa zomba charles thombozi kwa bwanamkubwa wa bomalo dr raphael piringu 
 otsatira chipani cha dpp zimodzi mwa zionetsero zomwe anachita chipani cha dpp chati chikufuna bungwe la anti corruption bureau acb lifufuze ma judge omwe amamva mulandu wu popeza akuwaganizira adalandira ziphuphu agamule mokomera dr saulos chilima dr lazarus chakwera 
 chikalatachi chikutinso mwama judge omwe amamva mlanduwu dingiswayo madise mbale wa dr saulos chilima choncho samayenera kuzenga nawo mulanduwu 
 polankhulanso kwa atolankhani mlangizi wa president nkhani zandale francis mphepo wati oweluza mulandu wu zimene anachita zopanda chilungamo 
 khothi la zamalamulo linanena ifeyo dpp sitinabele kusonyeza siife olakwa anachita mec ndiyeno sitinabele chiyani alamula chisankhochi chichitikenso kumeneko ndiye kupanda chilungamoko anatero mphepo 
 zimenezi ziwonetsero zachiwiri kuchitika zoyamba zomwe zinachitika lolemba mzinda wa blantyre pali chikonzero chakuti ziwonetsero za mtunduwu zichitikanso ku lilongwe ku mzuzu msabatayi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
acj yati yokhudzidwa imfa ya mlelemba bungwe la atolankhani achikatolika la association of catholic journalists acj lati lokhudzidwa kamba ka imfa ya martin mlelemba yemwe mwa mamembala bungwe li mdziko muno 
 wapampando wa bungwe li mchigawo chapakati sam kalimba wanena pofotokozera radio maria malawi wati bungwe la acj lataya munthu wofunika kwambiri ntchito zokweza bungwe li 
 malo amene wagona mlelemba polankhulanso wapampando wa bungwe lomenyera maufulu atolankhani mdziko muno la media institute of southern africa misa malawi teleza ndanga wati atolankhani onse mdziko muno okhudzidwanso kamba ka imfa ya mtolankhaniyi kamba koti mwa atolankhani omwe amathandiza ntchito zokweza atolankhani wa mdziko muno 
 malemu martin mlelemba anabadwa 24 december mchaka cha 1983 pomwe amasiyana lino mkuti akutumikira wa wailesi ya kanema ya mpingo wakatolika ya luntha amagwira ntchito mtolankhani wapadera wa wailesi ya channell africa chichewa service
Label: RELIGION

Text:
za jessica bwira zina mvula idagwa tsikulo wenela si ndiyo kaya inkachokera kaya   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu abale anzanga musandifunse za jessica bwira mwano mkangama pierre chamkhwatha zoziyamba dala kodi mwati foni ingalande ufumu wa mose zidaliko wenela tsikulo 
  inetu za whatsapp zina zotero ndilibe nazo gawo komabe ndikudabwa asirikali awa wenela adayamba liti kulowetsa kozizira pofuna kuwachenjeza zachilendo ndithu adatero abiti patuma 
  ukungonena iwe kuchezatu kwaphweka kwatchipa kunena zoona male chauvinist pigs akudziwa lomwe ana farao adagwiritsa ntchito kwambiri foni kuthamangitsa farao ku ma pyramid ku gizeh umamudziwa cheops iwe nanga chidathyola mphuno ya the great sphinx nchiyani sindikukambatu za great sphinx of quartz adatero adali naye tsiku limenelo 
  kaya sukulu kaya chiyani sindikudziwa ankakamba chiyani ankalankhula mokuluwika moya pete 
  zonse zili apo apatu zangosonyezeratu ku male chauvinist pigs kuli amthirakuwiri nanga achina niko adziwa amakambirana kuchipinda cha foni adafunsa abiti patuma 
  zoona mpaka kuwamanga awachenjeze chadza yani adafunsa uja 
  nkhani imene idatifika wenela idali ya kutengedwa kwa jessica mwano pierre iyitu ndiyo nkhani idaphimba za mneneri bushi minor amene waletsedwa kugawa nandolo chipere moya pete wakhuta kwambiri sakumvanso njala sakufunanso kumva zakuti wina wagona njala 
  ndiye zinaliko khoba ngazingazi zawo zija lilongwe apa mumayesa masewera adailowa nkhani gervazzio 
  kodi moya pete simesa adatiuza zomangana za ziii wenela ayi nanga apa alonda ake akuti chiyani adafunsa adali abiti patuma 
  adakuuzani zomangana zokhazo musaiwaletu adabweretsa ana ake aja mukhulupirire iyeyo sadagwe mumtengo wa papaya lero anawo angabwerenso wenela adzafe njala gogo uja adafunsa abiti patuma 
  langatu lidali khutu chabe mlomo wanga udali womangidwa loko sefa ya ku reserve bank 
  ndiye ndikumva wathu amupatsa tsamba lapamwamba unganga wodziwa kusesa kukolopa zimbudzi adaisintha nkhani abiti patuma 
  simukudziwa pamene mukubwebweta za njala simukudziwa iyi njira yothetsera phokosolo zinyalala momwe zachulukira wenela wina nkumalandira nazo masamba abale misalatu yachuluka wenela adatero uja 
  abale anzanga musandifunse za zinyalala wenela nokha simukuona fungo lochoka mumtsinje wa mudi silitseka mfuno zanu mfemvundikunena mphemvusizinaberekane phwamwamwa wenela tsono akulandira tsambali amene amasesa mumsewu awapatsa chiyani adafunsa abiti patuma 
  pamene mukuti kuli njala simunamve tikutseguliranso msewu uja adatsegulira adona hilida simudamve tikutseguliranso msewu uja adausintha dzina mpando wamkulu zochita kuphiri ziliko zambiri zikuyenda wenela adatero uja uku akuvula malaya ake ationetse t shirt yake ya wa thambo pali zitsononkho
Label: POLITICS

Text:
bungwe la cfm ladandaula wogwiritsa ntchito achinyamata zipolowe za ndale bungwe la mabanja mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la christian family movement cfm lati lokhumudwa atsogoleri ndale omwe akumagwiritsa ntchito ana achinyamata poyambitsa zipolowe za ndale 
 wapampando wa bungweli mdziko muno banja la kelvin eunice chifunda auza radio maria malawi apeza ziwawa zomwe zakhala zikuchitika mmadera osiyanasiyana mdziko muno zakhala zikutsogoleredwa ana achinyamata omwe akhala akugenda atsogoleri asafike ku madera kuzachititsa misonkhano yokopa 
 pamenepa alangiza atsogoleri ndale apewe ponena kulimbikitsa ziwawa pakati ana achinyamata kumadzala makhalidwe oyipa mwa anawa zomwe anatinso chiwopsezo chachikulu ku tsogolo la lino 
 ifeyo mabungwe mabanja tinene zoona za ziwawazi zikutikhuza kwambiri choti banja ndiye maziko pamene mabanja kalikiliki kulera ana moyenera atsogoleri ndale akumakhala akutenga anawo akayambitse ziwawa anatero chifunda 
 apempha atsogoleri ndale atsatire zomwe atsogoleri mipingo angawalangize kamba nkhani yothandiza achinyamata kupewa ziwawa ponena anawa atsogoleri mawa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
hrdc yachita ziwonetsero zokwiya kusankhidwanso kwa makomishonala awiri bungwe la human rights defenders coalition hrdc lero lachita ziwonetsero zosagwirizana kusankhidwanso kwa ma commissioner awiri bungwe la mec mtsogoleri wa lino professor peter mutharika 
 mzinda wa zomba ziwonetserozi zinayambira ku chinamwali mpaka ku ofesi ya bwanamkubwa wa bomalo 
 ziwonetsero za mmbuyomu zokonzedwa hrdc polankhula kwa atolankhani atapereka chikalata cha madandaulochi wapampando wa bungwe la hrdc mchigawo chaku mmawa madalitso banda ati akufuna mtsogoleri wa lino avomereze chisankho chichitike 23 june momwe aphungu akunyumba ya malamulo agwirizanirana akufuna ma commissioner awiri bungwe la mec omwe dr jean mathanga linda kunje asagwire ntchito chisankho chimenechi choti mabwalo milandu anawapeza adalephera kugwira ntchito chisankho chomwe chidachitika 21 may chaka chatha 
 polalankhulapo atalandira chikalatacho mmalo mwa bwanamkubwa wa bomalo chris nawata ati chikalatachi achipereka kwa oyenelera chikafika mmanja mwa mtsogoleri wa lino 
 ziwonetsero za mtunduwu zachitikanso mmizinda ya blantyre lilongwe mzuzu
Label: POLITICS

Text:
ndidakamira kufunda nawo ambulera padali 5 february 2014 kunja kuli mvula yamphamvu ya mabingu pomwe devlin nazombe mmisiri wopanda zida yemwe amagwira ntchito muulutsi youlutsa ya angaliba amaongolera zochitika zikwati zina adakumana mkazi gloria muhiwa 
  nazombe yemwe tsiku lina adaona koyamba gloria atafunda ambulera kuphelera mvulayo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu devlin gloria tsiku la ukwati wawo apatu nazombe sakadachitira mwina kumuimitsa namwaliyo nkumupempha afunde nawo 
  ndidamuimitsa ndifunde nawo ndidali ndikunyowa kwabasi nditamuimitsa adanyogodola sindidaimve ndidakakamira kufikira pomwe adandiloleza kufunda nawo adalongosola nazombe 
  komatu nazombe sadapitire kufunda nawo ambulera kokha adayamba kumupempha gloria nambala yake ya lamya 
  gloria adakanitsitsa sangandipatse nambalayo ndidamukakamiza chabwino angotenga nambala yanga adailemba mmanja akakafika kwawo akaisunge nazombe adatero 
  adawonjezera atafika posiyana adamuchondelera namwaliyo ayankhulane naye madzulo atsikulo adali chikaiko chachikulu 
  nazombe adati padadutsa sabata ziwiri asadamuyankhule adaiwalanso zoti adapereka nambala 
  tsiku lina ndidaona uthenga woti ndiimbire munthu lamya nditamufunsa ndani adati gloria ndidabalalika kwambiri mpaka wakuti ndiye adandilongosolera ndidamupatsa nambala yanga nditakumbukira tidayamba kucheza adatero 
  patadutsa kanthawi awiriwo akucheza nazombe adamufunsira mkaziyo yemwe akuti adavuta kwambiri amulole komabe pamapeto zonse adavomera ndithu 
  imeneyo takhala tikukumana zokhoma zochuluka chibwenzi kutha nkudzayambiranso anzake amamuuza sindingamukwatire ndine wotchuka otchuka sakhala mkazi chosangalatsa nchoti gloria samazitengera zonsezo nazombe adalongosola 
  awiriwo omwe amanga ukwati wawo august 31 mpingo wa south lunzu ccap madyelero adali ku grace garden ku machinjiri mumzinda wa blantyre akulangiza onse omwe mchikondi asamamvere zokamba za chikondi chao chizikhala chotsogoza mulungu kut mzonse azikula 
  adati akakumana vuto lililonse amakhala pansi ndikukambilana modekha wolakwa avomereze ndikupepesa zikatha amagwada pansi ndikumupempha mulungu awayanjanitse   awiriwa amakhala ku machinjiri mumzinda wa blantyre gloria amagwira ntchito ku sitolo za pep salon komwe amamanga tsitsi
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
atolankhani radio maria alandira maphunziro apadera wolemba glory kondowe 2 pagina news ed eventi.jpg 2000w sizes="(max width 505px 100vw 505px />phiri maphunziro ayenda kwambiri maphunziro apadera otumikira ku radio maria malawi akuti ayenda 
 woyendetsa ntchito za radio maria malawi louis phiri ati maphunzirowa anakonzedwa cholinga chofuna kusula mwa ukadaulo awulutsi atolankhani wailesiyi ntchito zawo zipite patsogolo ayamikiranso omwe anaphunzirapo sukulu ya ukachenjede ya polytechnic omwe mpingo wa katolika podzipereka kudzachititsa ma phunzirowa 
 maphuziro amenewa awathandiza wotumikila radio maria malawi ntchito zawo zipite patsogolo makamaka pankhani yolemba nkhani 
 tikuthokodzaso akhristu achikatolika omwe anaphunzirpo sukulu yawukachenjede ya polytechnic omwe anachiwona chopambana azathandize wailesiyi luso lawo pankhani yakulemba nkhani kuwulutsa ndinso momwe woyanganila ma studio angalembere ma lipoti anatero phiri 
 mbali imodzi ya maphunzirowo mwa omwe anaphunzirapo sukulu ya ukachenjede ya polytechnic omwe mpingo wakatolika augustine mlomole anawona atha kuchitapo kanthu pothandiza radio maria malawi maphunziro njira imodzi yomwe amafuna kukumbutsa ndinso kudziwitsa momwe angalembere nkhani kuwelenga 
 akuwona achinyamata aku radi maria malawi chidwi malingana ndimamfunso omwe amafusa yamaphunzirowa awalimbikitsa apitilize mtima wozichepesa ndikufuna kudziwa zambiri apempha akufuna kwabwino achiteponso kanthu pothandiza wailesiyi ipitilize kufalitsa nthenga wabwino
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
papa walimbikitsa mtendere wa mbanja mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wati mtendere umodzi zofunika mbanja mpingo 
 papa umodzi mwa maulendo ake oyendera papa francisco walankhula lolemba misa yomwe anatsogolera ku likulu la mpingo ku vatican 
 wati akudziwa kufunika kwa umodzi mtendere mbanja maka pamene mabanja ambiri mnyumba zao pofuna kupewa nthenda ya covid 19 yomwe yakhudza lonse la pansi 
 papa francisco watinso umodzi mtendere zofunika mpingo pofuna popewa maphokoso kugawikana wati pemphero lake umodzi mtendere zipitirire mmabanja mpingo momwe
Label: SOCIAL

Text: kodi malubino tilowere kodi tilowere mndani amene adzatiteteze boma likulephera kubweretsa yankho   awa mafunso amene ian simbota alinawo simbota munthu wa chialubino mtolankhani ku wailesi ya mbc    wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ulendo wotsiriza wa phiri mafunso simbota akudza kuphedwa kwa yasin kwenda phiri 54 wa mboma la nkhata bay phiri adaphedwa lolemba msabatayi adamuchotsa manja   imfa ya phiri ndiye nkhani zokhudza malubino yafika 162 2014   23 adaphedwa 10 adasowetsedwa komatu kuyambira 2014 palibe munthu amene walandira chilango chokhudzidwa nkhani zokhudza malubino   kodi vuto nchiyani simbota akudabwa kukhotiko kwapita nkhani zokhudza united transformation movement utm mpaka milandu yawo yatha milandu yathu ikukakamirabe kukhotiko vuto nchiyani   kodi akufuna tikakhale tilowere poyamba amati vuto ndalama nanga ndalama za ntchito zina zikupeza kukhoti kudapita milandu 44 palibe udatha pena amati vuto akafukufuku palibe kodi titani   boma la dpp lidalowa 2014 icho chaka chimene nkhanizi zidayamba mpaka lero pamene tikupita kuchisankho yankho silidabwere   zaka zisanu zambiri bwezi boma litapeza yankho nkhani yokhudza kuphedwa kwa alubino adatero simbota   wa apolisi mdziko muno rodney jose adati polisi yakhazikitsa kafukufuku anjate amene adapha phiri   mabungwe kuphatikizanso chipani cha utm alankhulapo pakuphedwa kwa phiri adzudzula khalidwelo   utm idati kuphedwa kwa phiri chisonyezo cha kulephera kwa boma la dpp poteteza achialubino   kuphedwa kwa achialubino kwanyanya zikuoneka boma lalephera kuthana nkhanizi ifeyo utm tidzaonetsetsa tathana nazo idatero kalata yosayinidwa mneneri wachipanicho joseph chidanti malunga   mabungwe amene adzudzulapo pakuphedwa kwa phiri centre for human rights and rehabilitation chrr centre for the development of people cedep human rights defenders coalition hrdc association of persons with albinism in malawi apam   mtsogoleri wa apam overstone kondowe adati kuphedwa kwa phiri chitsimikizo boma la dpp lalephera   taonapo maiko amene tayandikana nawo adathana nazo kale ifeyo tikulepherabe adatero kondowe
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
aphungu ku uganda akufuna mkazi wa mtsogoleri wa dzikolo akonze maphunziro nyumba ya malamulo mdziko la uganda yati ikufuna mkazi wa mtsogoleri wa dzikolo janet museveni afotokoze nkhani ya kusayenda kwa maphunziro mdzikolo 
 malipoti wailesi ya bbc ati speaker wa nyumbayi rebecca kadaga analembera kalata museveni yemwe nduna yowona za maphunziro akawonekere mnyumba ya malamuloyi lachiwiri kukafotokoza chomwe chikuchititsa dongosolo latsopano la maphunziro lisayende 
 museveni akuti sanapite ku nyumbayi wati apitako lachinayi likudzali 
 aphungu nyumba ya malamulo mdziko la uganda akudzudzula unduna wa za maphunziro poyambitsa dongosolo latsopano la maphunziro mdzikomo nyumba ya malamulo inalamula dongosololi liyimitsidwe kaye ponena lolowetsa pansi maphunziro 
 aphunguwa akuti okudzidwanso kwambiri kaamba ka kusowa kwa mabukhu kusaphunzitsidwa kwa aphunzitsi dongosolo latsopanoli
Label: EDUCATION

Text:

   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mutharika kulandira lupanga la ulemu atapambana chisankho ngakhalemalamulo lino amaperekampatawochitazionetserozamtendere zionetserozaulendounozaonetsaamalawizambiripomwekatundu bizinesi galimotozaanthukomansozabomazawonongedwa

Text:
afa atamwa bibida wosadyera mneneri wa polisi ya nkhotakota williams kaponda watsimikiza wina kumeneko wakabzala chinangwa atapapira mowa osadyera 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kaponda adati malinga achibale damson wasiya 34 malemuwo omwe francis phiri adapita kukapopa mowawo lamulungu 8 november mbomalo 
  achibalewo auza apolisi malemuwa adapezeka usiku akuchokera kopopa mowawo lamba mumsewu zomwe zidakhudza ofuka kwabwino amene adamutengera 
  ataona mbaleyo akuoneka moti samapeza adathamangira naye kuchipatala cha boma komwe madotolo adakatsimikiza adali atafa adatero kaponda yemwe adati zotsatira za achipatala zidaonetsa malemuwo adafa chomwa wosadyera
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
vatican ilandira 33 othawa kwawo kulikulu la mpingo wa katolika ku vatican lachinayi akuyembekezeka kulandira othawa kwao okwana 33 omwe akuchokera ku chilumba cha lesbos mdziko la greece khumi akuyembekezeka kufikanso mwezi omwe uno 
 malipoti catholic news agency ati anthuwa ochokera mmaiko afghanistan togo cameroon 
 zadza potsatira pempho la mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika lonse papa francisco lakuti ku likulu la mpingowu akuyenera kupereka thandizo kwa achinyamata mabanja omwe amathawa mmaiko kaamba ka kusamvana mmaikowo zomwe zimadzetsa nkhondo 
 anthuwa akhala akuthandizidwa ofesi ya papa yoona zachifundo bungwe la saint egidio gulu la akatolika omwe amathandiza osauka
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
amalawi akulira chitetezo chachepa akuluakulu mabungwe omwe siaboma ati kuchepa kwa malipiro apolisi chimodzi mwa zomwe zalowetsa pansi chitetezo mdziko muno popeza apolisiwo amatangwanika kusokerera malipiro ochepawo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc undule mwakasungula wa bungwe loona ufulu wachibadwidwe la malawi human rights consultative committee mhrcc kudzasno billy banda wa malawi watch amaunikira kubooka kwa chitetezo komwe kwasiya akulira umbava umbanda 
  wa apolisi mdziko muno lot dzonzi wati sangakjane kuvomera malipiro vuto wati apolisi akukumana mavuto ambiri adziwitsa kale boma za 
  adati nkoyenera apolisi aike maso pantchito kukambirana za malipiro kutsatire 
  munthu akulemba ntchito umayenera kulimbikira zinazo kaya zamalipo mumakambirana adatero dzonzi 
  kwa kanthawi tsopano zipani zotsutsa mabungwe kudzanso mmadera osiyanasiyana akhala akudandaula za kamphepo ka umbanda umbava komwe kaomba mwamphamvu mdziko muno 
  mbalizi zakhala zikudzudzula boma kuchotsa yothira mpholopolo ndikupheratu shot to kill ndiko kwadzetsa mavutowa ponena bwezi zitangolankhulidwa pakati apolisiwo osati kulengeza 
  apolisi omwe sadafune kutchulidwa mayina avomereza kuchepa kwa malipiro nkhani yotentha yomwe imawagobola mafupa 
  mwa adati k20 000 yomwe amalandira mwezi nchitonzo chabe 
  zinthu zakwera nzoona wapolisi adzifera kandalama kameneka adatero wapolisi wina mumzinda wa blantyre 
  wapolisi wina wa nthambi ya kafukufuku mboma la ntcheu adati malipiro apolisi saphula kanthu 
  munthu angalimbikire ntchito apa tisamanamizane adakatiganizira pamalipiro pokhapo adatero wapolisiyo 
  mdziko muno chitetezo chasokonekera kumva wina waphedwa kuberedwa katundu sinkhani yachilendo 
  lolemba 30 julaye alonda awiri adaphedwa pamalo omwetsera mafuta galimoto ku machinga 
  malinga dzonzi anthuwo adasinjidwa mitu osadziwika omwe nkutheka amafuna kubooleza malo olimba osungira ndalama pamalopo 
  nako ku chirimba sabata zapitazi wina adapezeka atafa atakhapidwa zikwanje 
  sabata ziwiri zangothazi winanso yemwe amagulitsa nkhuku kwa kachere mumzindawu adapezeka atafa atapachikidwa mumtengo 
  lolemba mumzinda wa lilongwe mbava zidathyola nyumba ina ndikuba ndalama zoposera k2 miliyoni 
  nayo tamvani lachisanu 20 julaye idadziwonera atatu atakhapidwa mbava kuchipatala cha gulupu mumzinda wa blantyre 
  mwa anthuwo adali wapolisi wina yemwe adakhapidwa mmutu paphewa achiwembu omwe adakimana nawo kwa kamba mumzindawu 
  adauza achipatalawo adakhapidwa cha mma 7 koloko madzulo atangoweruka kuntchito 
  aapa amabungwewa ati boma silikonza malipiro apolisiwa umbanda umbava siutha osautsika akhala amalawi 
  mwakasungula adati kugwa kwa ndalama ya kwacha kudakweza mitengo ya katundu wambiri ogwira ntchito ambiri mmakampani mboma adakwezeredwa malipiro pomwe apolisi mpaka akulandirabe malipiro akalewo

Text:
zionetsero zokhudza achialubino zilipo achialubino anenetsa achitabe mbindikiro ya boma ya kamuzu palace mwezi wa mawa pofuna kukakamiza boma lichitepo kanthu za kuphedwa kwawo 
  wapampando wa bungwe la association for people with albinism in malawi apam overstone kondowe wati mbindikirowo ulipo kuyambira 6 mpaka 8 march nduna ya zachitetezo nicholas dausi yapempha anthuwo adekhe kaye nkhaniyi siyinafike pochita zionetsero 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka flashback massa is seen with placard during the search for mark masambuka who was later found murdered malinga kondowe adzayenda pabwalo la community mtauni ya lilongwe kudzera ku nyumba ya malamulo mpaka ya boma ya kamuzu palace kukapereka kalata kwa mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika 
  kondowe adati anthuwa akakhala konko kwa masiku atatu masikuwa akakadutsa asadayankhidwe zakupsa akapempha mtsogoleriyu kulengeza lino lino lili chiopsezo moti sangakhalemo 
  tikatero tidzapempha mabungwe maiko akunja kutenga achialubino omwe akusowa chitetezo mdziko muno kupita mmaiko momwe muli chitetezo chokwanira adalongosola motero 
  adati achialubinowa adzapempha kuchoka mdziko muno pokhapokha mtsogoleri wa lino akadzapanda kuwayankha madandaulo 
  mtsogoleriyu akadzapanda kutiyankha tikupempha yemwe wa chialubino kudzasonkhana ku maofesi akazembe oimira maiko akunja mdziko muno apite ku maiko adatero kondowe 
  malinga kondowe kalata yomwe akukapereka kwa mutharika ili madandulo akuluakulu asanu 
  mwa madandaulowa akupempha boma lipereke ndalama zokwana k3 biliyoni ku ndondomeko zomwe zidakhazikitsidwa chaka chatha momwe muli ntchito zothandizira anthuwa zomwe mwa zina zikukamba zowamangira nyumba zolimba zoti zigawenga zizikanika kuthyola kuwapatsa chitetezo chokwanira 
  adatinso anthuwa akufuna bwalo la milandu la paderadera loweruza milandu ya okhudzidwa kuphedwa kwa achialubino 
  tikufunanso kukhazikitsidwe bungwe lapadera lofufuza komwe akuti kuli misikako tikudabwa omwe akugwidwa angonoangono awa osati akuluakulu eni ndalamawo adatero kondowe 
  adati zafikapa boma mtsogoleri wa lino alephera kuwateteza 
  malinga kondowe lino liunikenso malamulo ufiti asinganga azikhala mkaundula kumagwira ntchito yawo motsatira malamulo okhazikitsidwa 
  dausi adauza msonkhano wa atolankhani lachiwiri ku lilongwe chialubino achepetse moto zinthu sizidafike povuta penipeni 
  zinthu sizidafike poti nkuabindikira ku nyumba ya chifumu kuyamba kupempha kusamuka mdziko muno kukakhala kumaiko kunja adatero dausi 
  zawonjezera mkwiyo wa anthuwa omwe pofika lachitatu bungwelo lidalengeza atuluka munthambi yomwe mtsogoleri wa dzino lino adakhazikitsa poyangana za ufulu wa anthuwa 
  kondowe adati zomwe adanena dausi zikusonyeza boma lilibe chidwi chitetezo cha achi alubino 
  mchaka cha 2014 okwana 25 ndiwo aphedwa mdziko muno zikhukhulupiliro zoti mafupa zina mwa ziwalo zawo nzolemeretsa 
  naye womenyera ufulu wa gift trapence adati mabungwe apitiriza kukakamiza boma liteteze anthuwa popereka ndalama ku ndondomeko yomwe muli ntchito zowatetezera pakadalipano palibe chomwe bomali likuchitapo 
  adatinso chisoni chachikulu cha kulankhula kopasula kwa dausi 
  boma alephera chake anthuwa akufuna kungosamuka mdziko muno ndife okhumudwa kwambiri adatero trapence 
  pomwe tamvani adalankhula mwa asinganga mdziko muno pofuna kumvetsetsa ziwalo za achialubino zingalemeretse singanga wina wa mboma l;a salima jamitole kadango adati bodza la mkunkhuniza munthu angalemere ziwalo za anthuwa 
  zikuchitika kwathu kuno chipongwe chabe palibe angalemere cha ziwalo za achialubino anthuwa akuphedwa chabe asinganga kwathu nkuchiza basi adatero kadango 
  pomwe mfumu kameme ya mboma la chitipa kumalire lino la tanzania komwe mchitidwewu udachokera idati zomwe zikuchitika mdziko muno ndizochititsa manyazi 
  boma kufufuza za momwe anzathu ku tanzania adathana nalo vutoli apa tisalozanenso zala tifufuze kwa anzathuwa za momwe adachitira adatero kameme

Text:
zikhulupiriro zina   zisokoneza mdulidwe zikhulupiriro zosiyanasiyana zikusokoneza ntchito ya mdulidwe wa abambo womwe unduna wa zaumoyo mabungwe akulimbikitsa msangulutso wapeza 
   escom in free for all fuel scam   wait gets longer   secrecy over party funders ku nsanje dowa ku nkhata bay maboma amene zikhulupirirozi zachititsa abambo asamapite kuchipatala kukalandira mdulidwewu 
  malinga senior chief dzoole ya mboma la dowa ati samvetsa komwe kumapita kachikopa kamene adulako zomwe zimawapatsa mantha 
  amaganiza kachikopa kamene akadulako amakakachitira mankhwala maganizo awa amene amachititsa kuno asapite kukalandira mdulidwe 
  okwatira amaganiza pamene akalandira mdulidwe ndiye akazi aziwayenda njomba akawadula sangakakhale malo amodzi mkazi wawo ati panthawi iyi amaganiza mkazi wawo akhoza kuawayenda njomba adatero dzoole 
  mdulidwe wa abambo wakuchipatala njira imodzi yothandiza kupewa kufala kwa hiv dzoole adati mdera lake mwa amuna 10 amuna anayi okha amene amalandira mdulidwe 
  kampeni ili mkati moti mafumufe atiphunzitsa timeme akachititse mdulidwe amuna ochepa amene akupita kukalandira mdulidwe adatero dzoole 
  senior chief kabunduli wa mboma la nkhata bay wati kampeniyi yakanika kumeneko amaganiza akakalandira mdulidwe ndiye alowa chipembedzo cha chisilamu 
  ambiri kunoko amaganiza amene alandira mdulidwe ndiye achipembedzo cha chisilamu maganizo amenewa amene akuchititsa asakhale nazo chidwi zokalandira mdulidwezo adatero kabunduli 
  titafunsa mfumuyi ikumemeza ake akachititse mdulidwe iyo idati ukawauza kachitsitseni mdulidwe akufunsa iweyo unapanga ndiye msinkhu wangawu sindingapite kumdulidwe 
  ndinetu munthu wamkulu ndiye ndikakalandira mdulidwe lero balalo lidzapola liti sindingapange zimenezo kampeni imeneyi sindikuchita nawo 
  ku nsanje malinga mcknowledge tembo hiv aids co ordinator pachipatala cha boma zikhulupiriro za kumeneko zimati munthu akalandira mdulidwe ndiye amaafooka kuchipinda 
  kunoko tinaphunzitsa mafumu amipingo azaumoyo za ubwino wa mdulidwe mukamayenda muja amafunsa zambiri zokhudza zikhulupiriro zawo mdulidwe 
  palibe amene adabwera poyera kudzatiuza akufooka kuchipinda walandira mdulidwe komabe upeza akulankhula zabodza palibe umboni zoona zake nzoti macheza amakhalanso mbanja mwamuna akakhala adalandira mdulidwe adatero tembo 
  nayenso simeon lijenje wa psi akuti bodza la mkunkhuniza amuna amene alandira mdulidwe amafooka wati amuna amene adulidwa ndiwo amachitanso kuchipinda kusiyana osadulidwa 
  palibe umboni wa zomwe anthuwo akunena dziwani mwamuna amene walandira mdulidwe ndiye amasangalala kuchipinda amakwaniritsa chilakolako cha mkazi adaphera mphongo lijenje 
  adati kampeni ya mdulidwewu idayamba 2012 october 2014 mpaka september 2015 pafupifupi abambo 93 642 ndiwo alandira mdulidwe mbomalo 
  achipatala amati abambo alandira mdulidwe ndiye pali mwayi woti chiwerengero cha otenga kachilombo ka hiv podzera mkugonana chingachepe 6 mwa 10 alionse 60 malinga mabungwe who unaids 
  kuyambira 2007 mabungwewa akhala akubwekera mdulidwe umathandize kwambiri kachilomboka kasafale kwambiri 
  malinga mabungwewa maiko 14 kummwera kwa afrika kummawa ndiwo kalikiriki kupangitsa kampeni amuna azikalandira mdulidwe 
  mdulidwe wa abambo pamene achipatala amadula kachikopa kakutsogolo kwa chida cha abambo kachikopaka kamasunga zoipa walandira mdulidwe amakhala waukhondo zoipazo zimakhala zasowa malo oti zisungidwenso lidatero lipoti la unaids nkuonjera mdulidwe umathandiza kuchepetsa matenda khansa ya khomo la chiberekero cha amayi

Text:

 matonga zikhudza chuma cha mlembi wamkulu wa bungwe la pac mbusa gilford matonga wati mtsogoleri wa lino wasankha chiwerengero chochuluka cha nduna zake zomwe akuti zitha kuwonongetsa chuma cha lino 
 kukhuzidwa kwathu cabinet yomwe atulusa president sikusatha kutha ntchito mmene cabinet yo ilili kupezeka kwa banja cabinet kukula kwa cabinet yi zomwe zitakhuze chuma cha lino anatero matonga 
 padakalipano nalo bungwe la centre for democracy economic and development initiative cdedi lati zomwe wachita mtsogoleri wa linoyu zikusiyana kwambiri zomwe amalonjeza misonkhano yokopa 
 wa bungweli sylvester namiwa ati mwazina kusankha ma udindo komwe chakwera achita zawonetsa cholinga chawo kufuna kuthokoza anthuwa osati kuwasankha anthuwa atumikire malawi 
 atinso okhumudwa kusankhidwa kwa amayi ambiri omwe ayikidwa achiwiri kwa nduna osati nduna zenizeni

Text:

  ndikudzidzimuka mnyamatayo yemwe timayenda mosemphana adapitirira ulendo akumwetulira sadachite chilichonse chodabwitsa

  kwa yaitali ndidakhala ndikudzifunsa za mmene ndikadakhaulitsira ndoda yachipongweyo

Text:
nyumba ya malamulo yakhutira mec komiti yolondoloza malonjezo boma ku nyumba ya malamulo yati ndiyokhutira lipoti la bungwe loyendetsa zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec 
  bungwe la mec lidawonekera pamaso komitiyo lachiwiri msabatayi kukapereka lipoti la momwe zokonzekera za chisankho chapatatu zikuyendera    chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka alfandika tili masiku 7 ofufuza atsogoleri polankhula tamvani wapampando wa komitiyo yaumi aufi mpaweni adati lipoti la mec likusonyeza ntchito yokonzekera chisankho ikuyenda komiti yonse idagwirizana zomwe idawona kumva kuchoka ku mec 
  tidayitana bungwe la mec lidzatipatse lipoti zomwe adatiuza zikusonyeza ntchito ikuyenda mamembala onse akomiti adakhutira lipotiro kungawoneke zovuta tiwona mtsogolomu adatero mpaweni 
  adati komitiyo ndiyokonzeka kuthandizira pomwe bungwe la mec lingakumane zovuta za uliwonse pofuna chisankho cha chaka chino chidzayende mokomera zipani onse 
  mulipoti lake woyanganira zisankho ku bungwe la mec sam alfandika adafotokoza momwe ntchito za kalembera maina kupeleka zikalata za ofuna kudzapikisana nawo pamipando ya mtsogoleri wa wachiwiri aphungu makhansala zidayendera 
  adalongosolanso zovuta zomwe akuyembekezera ndondomeko zomwe bungwelo lakonza zofuna kudzathana zovutazo zitadzawoneka 
  mukudziwa adalembetsa 6 859 570 pogwiritsa ntchito njira yamakono yomwe idatithandiza kuchepetsa chinyengo padali chiseso chochotsa maina opezeka kangapo mkaundula maina 13 244 adachotsedwa adatero alfandika 
  adati pozindikira kunja kuli akathyali malinga makono bungwelo lidapeza akadaulo nkhani za zida zamakono omwe azithandizira kuwonetsetsa palibe yemwe walowerera chinsinsi cha bungwelo 
  alfandika adauzaso komitiyo amene akufuna kupikisana nawo adapeleka kalata zowonetsa zolinga zodzapikisana nawo adati ntchitoyo idayenda 
  tidalandira zikalata zonse tikuziunikabe moti pakutha kwa masiku 7 tikhala tikutulutsa maina omalizira omwe tawavomereza kudzapikisana nawo mpando wa mtsogoleri wa lino pamene ntchito younguza aphungu nyumba ya malamulo idzatenga masiku 14 makhansala itenga masiku 21 adatero alfandika
Label: POLITICS

Text:
katswiri wayamikira nduna zatsopano nduna imodzi yakana udindo katswiri nkhani za ndale mdziko muno dr boniface dulani wati chikhulupiliro nduna zomwe zasankhidwa president wa lino dr lazarus chakwera zigwira ntchito zawo popeza zili zowayenereza kugwira ntchitoyi 
 dulani ndikukhulupilira agwira dr dulani yemwenso mphunzitsi wa zandale ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor wauza radio maria ayike chikhulupiliro mwa ndunadzi pofuna zigwire ntchito yawo ati mwachitsanzo wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino dr 
 saulosi chilima ulamuliro wa professor peter mutharika mchaka cha 2014 adagwiraponso unduna omwewu adagwira ntchito yawo mwaukadaulo 
 tidikirebe tiwone akagwira ntchito yotani komano vice president tikuziwa tonse anagwirapo ntchito undunawu anayigwira ntchito mukuwuona kwanga boma lasankha ndunazi chitetezo cha mkati mwadziko chikhale choyenerera anatero dulani 
 msiska ziwoneka akundipatsa mphatso padakalipano yemwe anasankhidwa nduna yowona za chilungamo malamulo modecai msiska awukana udindowu ponena aganiza chakwera akuwalipira ntchito yomwe anathandizira chipani cha mcp chipambane mlandu wa chisankho cha president 
 anapitirizanso kunena pali achinayamata ambiri omwe angati kugwira ntchito udindowu osati omwe achikulire
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mafumu sanunkha kanthu pandale kafukufuku amene achita akadaulo zandale mdziko muno wasonyeza mafumu amayesetsa kusanthula momwe amalawi akuganizira pandale amalawi salabadira zonena za mafumuzo 
  mwa akatswiriwo happy kayuni amene amaphunzitsa ukadaulo pandale ku chancellor college adati zotsatira zimene adapeza adzazikhazikitsa 17 march ku sunbird mount soche mumzinda wa blantyre 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mafumu sayenera mlomo pankhani za ndale zikudza patangotha sabata pamene adakuwiza paramount lundu pamaliro mfumu kabudula ku lilongwe pomwe mwa zina adati chipani cha mcp chidalamulira lino zaka 31 sichidzalamulilanso 1994 pomwe chidachoka mboma lundu adatinso chipani cha democratic progressive party dpp ndicho chidzalamulire 2019 
  polankhula tamvani kayuni adati kafukufukuyo adapeza mafumu amalemekezedwa kukhulupiliridwa pankhani za miyambo yawo osati popanga ganizo la ndale 
  tikatulutsa zotsatirazo adzadzionera okha amalemekeza kukhulupilira mafumu pankhani za chikhalidwe chawo alibe chikoka pakapangidwe ka ganizo la munthu amene asankhe ndale adatero kayuni 
  kayuni adakana kutambasula kafukufukuyu adamuchita yaitali angati njira yomwe adatsata pofunsa mafunso mafunso amene amafunsidwa adati zonse adzazitambasula akamukhazikitsa 
  wati chanzeru chomwe mafumu angachite nkuphathirira ku udindo wawo kumalimbikira ntchito yawo mmalo motaya zandale powopa kutsukuluza ulemu omwe nawo 
  zomwe mafumu akhala akunena amayenera mbali yaboma kayuni wati ichi nchilungamo chokhachokha waunikira mpofunika kutanthauzira bomalo molondola 
  mpofunika kutanthauzira bwinobwino liwu lakuti boma mwina mafumu amaona boma nchipani cholamula pomwe si choncho boma limagawidwa patatu mtsogoleri nduna zake aphungu nyumba ya malamulo mabwalo oyendetsa 
  akamati amakhala mbali ya boma sakulakwa aziganizira tanthauzoli ngopanda mbali ntchito yawo nkutsogolera pankhani zamakhalidwe chitukuko ndale nza adatero kayuni 
  polankhula ku maliro t kabudula senior chief lundu adaweruziratu chipani cha dpp ndicho chidzapambane pachisankho cha 2019 kaya wina afune kaya asafune mafumu mdziko muno sadzaleka kusapota mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika chipani cha dpp 
  tili pansi ulamuliro wa mutharika chipani cha dpp chotiletsa kumusapota nchiyani choti mudziwe nchakuti chipani cha dpp chikuyenera kulamula mpaka 2019 chidzapitiliza kuchoka apo adatero lundu kumaliroko 
  adapitiriza kunena chipani cha malawi congress party mcp chomwe mtsogoleri lazarus chakwera adali maliro pomwepo chisamalote zodzalamuliranso kwake kudatha momwe chidatuluka mboma chipani cholamula 
  chakwera atafunsidwa ndemanga yake tamvani nkhaniyi adati alibe mau aliwonse kenako nkuseka 
  oyendetsa nkhani za mafumu ku unduna wa maboma angonoangono lawrence makonokaya adati timutumizire mafunso omwe tikuyembekezera mayankho ake 
  zotsalira tikuchezanso kadaulo wina amene adacchita nawonso kafukufukuyo
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:
sibwino kulekeza panjira kumwa ma arv mwa amene adapezeka kachilombo koyambitsa matenda edzi akukangalika kuphunzitsa za matendawa hannah mandanda wati ntchito yolimbikitsa amene akulandira ma arv asasiye kumwa mankhwalawa ndiyaikulu 
  polankhula pamaphunziro amene bungwe lothandiza amene adawapeza kachilombo la dream ku balaka mandanda adati kusiya kumwa mankhwala kwadzetsa imfa zomwe sizikadakhalapo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc amalandira mankhwala osamamwa uku nkulakwa masiku apitawa tidali ku maliro wina amene ankalandira mankhwala mwezi mwezi amangowabisa kuchipinda tidawapeza atatisiya adatero mandanda 
  woyanganira ntchito za dream ku blantyre jane gondwe adati vuto la odwala kuleka kumwa mankhwala likukulira kulira 
  amasiya achipembedzo awauza mulungu wawachiritsa pomwe amanamizidwa asinganga enanso amasiya chitetezo cha mthupi mwawo chakwera ayi sichoncho mankhwalawa akumwa moyo wonse adatero gondwe 
  adati amasiya kumwa akaona matenda ayambanso kuvuta amayambiranso kumwa mankhwala 
  palibe chimene angaphule kachilombo kamakhala kakhwima kupeza njira zina mankhwalawo asagwire ntchito adatero gondwe 
  adati nchifukwa chake bungwe lawo limaphunzitsa 65 woti azikaphunzitsa momwe angadzisamalire atawapeza kachilombo ka hiv
Label: HEALTH

Text:

 wa kuofesi yoona za utumiki dayosiziyi medrick mlava alankhula pambuyo popereka sacrament la ulimbitso kwa akhristu mparishiyi ati akhristu omwe alandira sacramenti li akuyenera kumalimbikitsa ntchito zabwino kamba koti zimene zikakondweletsa mulungu 
 pamene alandila sacrament la ulimbitso amakhala alandira mangolomera mphatso za mzimu woyera ndiye akuyenera kugwiritsa ntchito mphatsozi mpingowu pokhala ansembe asisiteri akhristu eni ake olimbika anatero mlava 
 akhristu omwe alandira sacrament la ulimbitso patsikuli okwana 100

Text:
nyaude tidadabwa zochitika zake akamaimba nyimbo ya musalolere mulungu ephraim zonda amaimba mtima wonse polingalira akulowa mbanja mwezi ukubwerawu mulungu asalolere adani alepheretse zimenezi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi atupele ephraim kukonzekera kudzakhala thupi limodzi kumaloto ephraim akamakumbukira tsiku lomwe adaonana atupele chikaya akuti sadadziwe akhoza kudzakumananso 
  ndidamuona koyamba atupele ku tchalichi cha zambezi ku kawale komwe tinkakaimba panthawiyo sitidayankhulane mwachisomo cha mulungu tidakumananso ku chefa komwe tidakaimbanso adatero ephraim 
  mnyamatayu wachiwiri kubadwa mbanja la ana asanu awiri luso lopeka nyimbo anthetemya moti amaimba mukwaya ya great angels si zokhazo amachitanso bizinesi yogula kugulitsa katundu wochokera ku china kuphatikizapo galimoto 
  atupele wachiwiri kubadwa mbanja la ana anayi amagwira ntchito ku road traffic ku zomba 
  awiriwa adayamba kucheza muchaka cha 2009 pomwe adakumana patatha chaka akucheza chomwecho ephraim adamufunsira atupele ataona mkazi wabwino 
  atupele mkazi amene zomuyenereza zomwe mwamuna amafuna mkazi atu mkazi wakhalidwe woopa mulungu wanzeru womvetsetsa adatero ephraim akunyadira bwezi lakelo 
  patatha zaka zisanu chimodzi chikumaniraneni awiriwa adaganiza zomanga ukwati atsimikize za chikondi chawo 
  ukwati wawo uliko 12 september chaka chino akadalitsira ku mpingo wa ccap ku area 23 mumzinda wa lilongwe madyerero akakhala ku capital hotel 
  ephraim adanenetsa chomwe chidzawalekanitse imfa basi adati yawathandiza kudziwana zomwe akuti zidzawathandiza mbanja mwawo
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:

Text:
radio maria itsekera nyengo ya mariatona wolemba richard makombe director radio maria malawi joseph kimu ati wayilesiyi ikukwanitsa kufalitsa uthenga wabwino wa yesu khristu ili ngongole zoposa 50 million kwacha 
 joseph kimu amayankhula mwambo wa nsembe ya ukaristia otsekera nyengo ya mariatona omwe unachitikira ku mtendere parish dayosizi ya dedza 
 kimu ati ndiokondwa ambiri amamvera wayilesiyi kuphatikizapo omwe si mpingo wa katolika zomwe chisonyezo zikulimbikitsa kukonda kupemphera 
 mlendo wolemekezeka mwambowo- bonga akazi pali ambiri omwe amathandiza wayilesiyi omwe mipingo ina zapangitsa radio maria ikhale ikufalitsa uthenga wabwino wa yesu khristu kuyambira pomwe inatsegulidwa zaka 20 zapitazoanatero kimu 
 kimu anapitiliza kupemph onse akufuna kwabwino akhristu apitilize kuthandiza kuyikonda wayilesiyi izikwaniritsa cholinga chake chofalitsa uthenga wabwino kwa ambiri 
 ndikupempheni mupitilize kupemphelera radio maria muzikonda kugwiritsa ntchito wayilesiyi zochitika zanu uthenga wa mulungu upilire kufalikira ponseponseanapitiliza motero kimu 
 kimu ndikudziwa muli mavuto zachuma parish mmanyumba mwanu munaona nkofunika muthandize radio maria ndithokoze mwaonetsa chikondi chomwe muli nacho ku wayilesiyi mmawu monsignor john chithonje akuthokoza director wayilesiyi kamba kosankha kudzachitira mwambo otsekera mariatona ku dayosizi ya dedza zomwe ati zikusonyeza ubale wabwino omwe ulipo pakati dayosiyi yi radio maria malawi 
 dayosizi ino ndiyokonzeka kuthandiza radio maria ina iliyonse timayesetsa kuthandiza ntchito zake zipitilire kupita patsogolo anateromonsignor chithonje 
 monsignor chithonje anathokoza kwambiri akhristu parishi yi kamba kotenga gawo pothandiza wayilesiyi zomwe zaonetsa ubale omwe ulipo wayilesiyi amayikonda radio maria 
 ntchito yomwe radio maria ikugwira yathandiziranso ubale wathu akhristu mdziko la mozambique ukhale opambana wamphamvundipo zaonetseratu akhristuwa amakonda kumvera wayilesiyianatero monsignor chithonje nyengo ya mariatona inatsegulidwa ku sacred heart zomba cathedral ku zomba dayosizi 4 may yatsekedwa 27 july 2019 ku mtendere parish dayosizi ya dedza 
 mwambowu ndalama zokwana 1 million six hundred and fifty 9 hundred forty kwacha zomwe zinapezeka mlendo olemekezeka mwambowu mike bonga omwe anapereka cheke cha ndalama zokwana 5 hundred thousad kwacha
Label: RELIGION

Text:
chipani cha sacramentine chichita chaka cha asisteri atatu wolemba thokozani chapola chipani cha asisteri cha sacramentine chachita chaka pomwe asistweri awiri amalumbira malumbiro ku zonse pomwe sisteri amakondwelera wakwnitsa zaka 50 akuctumikira mulungu sisteri chipanichi 
 sister francesca cortinovice mdziko la italy akwanitsa zaka 50 utumiki sister veronica chilemba sister theresa misomali alumbira malumbiro ku zonse 
 mwambowu unachitikira ku parishi ya ntcheu dayosizi ya dedza anatsogolera mwambowu woyendetsa ntchto za dayosiziyi john chithonje 
 mmawu chithonje alangiza makolo atengerepo chitsanzo cha asisteriwa polimbikitsa ana nkhani ya maphunziro 
 zipani zikamatenga ana oti alowe chipani chimodzi mwa zinthu ziomwe amayangana sukulu yomwe anachita choncho makolo akuyenera kulimbikitsa ana maphunziro anatero chithonje 
 mwa akuluakulu chipani cha sacramentine kuno ku malawi sister hellen matchado ati okondwa mwambowu watheka wapempha asisteriwa akhale odzipereka utumiki wawo 
 adutsa mwambiri zazikulu zomwe mulungu watichitira powatsogolera mpaka lero pomwe atsimikiza okonzeka kutumikira mulungu anatero sister matchado 
 polankhulapo mwa asisteri omwe achita malumbiro ku zonse sister terteza misomali athokoza mulungu powathandiza kukwaniritsa maloto 
 si mphamvu nzeru zathu timadalira chithandizo cha mulungu tifike pamenepa anatero sister misomali 
 chipani cha sacramentine kuno ku malawi chikupezeka mmadayosizi awiri mwa ma dayosizi 8 omwe alipo mdziko muno omwe dedza mangochi
Label: RELIGION

Text:
chimanga cha k1bn chaola ku admarc komiti ya za malimidwe ku nyumba ya malamulo yatulukira chimanga cha ndalama zokwana k1 billion chaola nkhokwe za admarc 
  wa admarc margaret roka mauwa wakana kuthirirapo ndemanga lipotilo kaamba koti sadalilandire 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka admarc iyenera kupeza njira zosamalira chimanga chake popereka lipoti lake ku nyumbayo komitiyo yati zili choncho admarc ikugulitsabe kwa chimangacho 
  komiti yathu yapeza chimanga cha ndalama zosachepera k1 biliyoni ncholemera matani 7 000 nchoola nkhokwe za admarc 
  chokhumudwitsa nchoti admarc ikupitiiriza kugulitsa chimangacho kwa likutero lipotilo 
  lipotilo lidawerengedwa sameer suleman werani chilenga 
  komitiyo idatulukira pomwe imakumana akuluakulu ochokera mmabungwe omwe pansi unduna wa zamalimidwe pokonzekera kukambirana bajeti ya 2019/20 
  mauwa adati nkovuta kuthirirapo ndemanga nkhaniyo kaamba koti sadalandire lipotilo 
  pakhala povuta ndiyankhe kaamba koti lipotilo sindinalione kudalibe komwe amaliwerenga 
  pakatipa zambiri zakhala zikundidutsa kaamba koti ndinali mchipatala adatero mkuluyu 
  katswiri wa zaulimi tamani nkhono mvula adati nzokhumudwitsa admarc ikugulitsa chimanga choonongeka kwa 
  mkuluyu adati zaka zowerengeka zapitazo admarc idakumana vuto lomwelo amayembekezera adatolapo phunziro 
  kodi nzoona tizimva chimanga chaonongeka ku admarc kodi chiyani sititolapo phunzira chimanga chaboma chomwe chidaonongeka posachedwapa nkupeza njira zothandiza kuthana vutoli kodi zimatheka chimanga kumaolera nkhokwe za admarc akumabwerera mmisika yake kaamba kosowa chimanga ndimamva chisoni kwambiri lathu adatero nkhono 
  katswiriyu adati admarc siikuyenera kugulitsa chimanga choonongeka kaamba koti nchoopsa moyo wa munthu 
  kafukufuku akuonetsa mbewu zoola zimakhala chuku chomwe chimayambitsa matenda osiyanasiyana kuphatikizirapo khansa 
  2013 chimanga cholemera matani 60 000 chidaoleranso nkhokwe za admarc nthawiyo ambiri amagona mmisika yake kufuna kuchigula 
  aphungu komitiyo apempha boma lipereke ndalama ku admarc zoti igulire matani 96 000 chimanga asafe njala mdziko muno 
  malingana lipoti la mvac oposa 3.3 miliyoni akumana vuto la chakudya chaka chino mwa anthuwa 1.8 miliyoni ochokera mchigawa cha kummwera 
  alimi ambiri mchigawochi sadakolole mokwanira kaamba ka ngamba vuto la madzi osefukira womwe adasesa mbewu zawo 
  komitiyo yapezanso admarc ikulipira pafupifupi 900 omwe sagwira ntchito ku bungwelo moti yapempha boma kuphwasula bungwelo nkuipanganso pofuna kuthana vutolo 
  komitiyi yapemphanso boma liwonjezere omwe akuyenera kupindula zipangizo zotsika mtengo 900 000 nkufika 1 miliyoni 
  padakali ndondomeko ya zipangizo zotsika mtengo adaipatsa k35.5 biliyoni
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
akatolika mdziko muno awapempha akhazikike chikhristu akhristu mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno awapempha achilimike mmapemphero pawokha nyengo ino pomwe mpingowu wayamba wayimitsa zochitika zake mapemphero lamulungu pofuna kuwatetedza ku kachilombo ka coronavirus 
 mlembi wa zautumiki arkidayosizi ya blantyre alfred chaima amene anena ku limbe cathedral pothilirapo ndemanga nkhaniyi 
 ati zowawa tsopano palibenso kupemphera kudzera ku matchalichi kale akhristu akuyenera kumvetsetsa chitetezo cha mpingo ake matendawa 
 zinthu zowawa sitimakumana mpingo pamodzi kupemphera pamene tikuchita zimenezi tikuyenera kukula chikhulupiriro anatero chaima 
 atinso papa apempha akhritsu asate njira zomwe zaumoyo akupereka apemphanso asapereke mpata kwa kachilombo kameneka kudzera kukumana mpingo
Label: RELIGION

Text:
ccjp ikufuna dpp ipereke mwambo kwa ma cadet wolemba thokozani chapola content uploads/2019/09 chibwana.jpg alt= width="400 height="344 />wasayinira chikalatacho chibwana bungwe la chilungamo mtendere mpingo wa katolika la catholic commission for justice and peace ccjp lapempha chipani cholamula cha dpp chipereke mwambo kwa achinyamata ake ochitsatira apewe kuyambitsa zipolowe mdziko muno 
 malinga chikalata chomwwe bungweli latulutsa chomwe chasaindidwa wa bungweli boniface chibwana ziwonetsero ufulu wa munthu wina choncho mlangizi wa boma za malamulo chipani apolisi alibe udindo woletsa ziwonetsero 
 chikalatachi chadza patangodutsa tsiku limodzi pamene otsatira chipani cha dpp anasokonzeza ziwonetsero zomwe bungwe la hrdc amatsogolera mzinda wa blantyre 
 ccjp yapempha nthambi za chitetezo mdziko muno zipereke chitetezo chokwanira kwa amene akuchita ziwonetsero za bata apempha mtsogoleri wa lino komiti ya nyumba ya malamulo yokhudziwa nkhaniyi ichitepo kanthu kuthetsa mavuto amene alipo mdziko muno nkhani za ndale 
 president achitepo kanthu nkhaniyi zinthu ziyende apolisi asilikali ateteze ochita ziwonetsero kaamba koti ufulu wawo kutero palibe amene mphamvu yoletsa ziwonetsero anatero chibwana 
 komabe alangiza omwe akuchita ziwonetsero achite mwa bata mtendere posawononga chuma cha boma katundu wa osalakwa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
chimodzi jnr career stalls former silver strikers captain and flames midfielder young chimodzi jnrs career has stalled as he is yet to depart for india where he in march signed for kenkre sports club 
   two affiliates cry foul over covid-19 relief package   no hard feelings says nyamilandu   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso the holding midfielder yesterday explained that he was waiting for his foreign based agent to arrange with kenkre for his air ticket 
  chimodzi l i miss the game the delays have also cost chimodzi his flames career he signed year long contract with the india league division two side 
  the visa is out but my agent who also manages tawonga is very busy i miss the game but it is matter of being patient he said yesterday 
  he is now four months into his contract and he insisted that he would decide later in the event of further delays 
  kenkre chief executive officer joshua lewis assured to meet all expenses during his stay in india according to an earlier story published in march by the daily times 
  this is to inform you mr young lawrence chimodzi professional football player hailing from the republic of malawi is currently representing our club kenkre fc the club will also bear all expenses during his stay in india reads part of the letter
Label: SPORTS

Text:
akangalika ulimi wa mthirira mlimi wochenjera nellie nyoni wa mboma la balaka amayambiratu ulimi wa mchilimwe mvula ikamapita kumapeto asavutike kwambiri ndikuthirira tikunena adabzala kale chimanga nyemba posachedwapa ziyamba kubereka esmie komwa adacheza mlimiyu motere ulimi wa mchilimwe umaposa wa mdzinja kodi nchifukwa chiyani mumafulumira kuyambapo ulimi wa mthirira   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu choyambirira ndimafuna ndigwiritse ntchito chinyezi chochuluka chomwe chimapezeka mvula ikangosiya kugwa mbewu zikamadzafuna madzi owonjezera ndidzangothirira kanthawi kochepa basi zatheka china nchoti ndimafuna ndizipezeka mbewuzi pafupipafupi ndizipeza phindu lochuluka 
  nanga mudayamba liti ulimi wa mthirira ulimiwu ndidayamba 2004 
  kodi chidakukopani ulimiwu nchiyani ndidaona mbewu za mthirira zimagulitsidwa mtengo kusiyana zodalira mvula ichi nchifukwa chomwe ndimazilimbikira 
  nanga mumalima mbewu zanji ndimalima mbewu zosiyanasiyana tomato kabichi kwambiri ndimaonjeza chimanga 
  kodi mumalima mbewuzi pamalo okula malo womwe ndimachitirapo mthirirawu wokwana ma ekala 6 theka 
  nanga zikayenda mumapeza ndalama zochuluka pakamozi mbewu yomwe ndimaiwerengetsera ya chimanga ndimailima mochuluka ndanena kale chimangachi chikakhwima ndikugulitsa chachiwitsi ndimatha kupeza k600 000 zikavutirapo k500 000 
  kodi chinsinsi chanu chagona pati chinsinsi changa ndikusamalira mbewu zichite ndimaonetsetsa zizipeza madzi wokwanira ndimathira feteleza ndimapalira kuthana zilombo zoononga zichite ubwino wa mbewu za mthirira ndiwoti zikangotheka ndimadziwiratu zanga zayera 
  kodi mumagwiritsa ntchito mthirira wanji kwa zaka zonsezi ndakhala ndikugwiritsa ntchito ma water cane kuthiririra mbewu zanga padakali ndagula pampu yopopera madzi yogwiritsa ntchito petulo 
  nanga mavuto anji omwe mumakumana nawo pogwiritsa ntchito mthirira woterewu kunena zoona mthirira wa mtunduwu ndiwopweka kwambiri tangoganizani munthu ukwanitse kuthirira malo wokula motere sizamasewera khama langa ulimiwu ndilomwe limandichititsa ndizilimbikirabe 
  nanga mavuto anji omwe mumakumana nawo ulimiwu vuto lalikulu ndikusowa kwa zipangizo za mthirira za makono zogwiritsa ntchito madzi ochepa vuto lina ndikusowa kwa madzi othiririra mbewu makamaka tikamayandikira nyengo yotentha zitsime zomwe timadalira zina zimaphwa mvula siidagwe yokwanira zimachititsa tidukize panjira nkumadikirira mvula mmalo moti tizilumikiza kwa chaka chonse chinthu chokhumudwitsa kwambiri nchoti ulimiwu timangozichitira popanda alangizi mthirira ndimadabwa alipo mdziko muno 
  nanga masomphenya anu ulimiwu ndiwotani ndikufuna mtsogolomu nditaika mthirira wa makono uja amalumikiza mapaipi ndikumangotsegula madzi azifikira mbewu okha mthirira woterewu umafuna mlimi akhale matanki zitsime zakuya zopopera madzi zogwiritsa ntchito zipangizo zoyendera magetsi mphamvu ya dzuwa zidzandithandizira ndizitha madzi kwa chaka chonse kupopa mosavuta ndikumathiririra mbewu zanga 
  kodi mudzapitiriza kulima mbewu zomwe mukulima panopazi ayi ndikufuna ndidzayambe ulimi wa kachewere ndidamva ndiwaphindu kwambiri ndimakanika kuyamba panopa cha mavuto omwe ndanena aja kabitchi mbewu ina yomwe ndimaganiza ndidzaikirapo mtima 
  nanga muchita chiyani mukwaniritse masomphenyawa ndekha ndikuona ndizovutirapo zipangizo za mthirira wa mtunduwu ndizokwera ntengo kwambiri ndidakakonda padakapezeka mabungwe omwe akhoza kundithandiza kufikira masomphenyawa tidayetsera kuwafotokozera ku nthambi yoona za ulimi wa mthirira adangotiyankha tikuthandizani kutenga ngongole ku banki adatilonjeza motere tikuona sizingachitike choncho ndikupempha akufuna kwabwino andithandize
Label: FARMING

Text:
kuchitsedwa ntchito zina   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu   mourinhao mwa anzanga amene ndimacheza nawo wenela sindikudziwa nchifukwa chiyani mkuluyu amakonda arsenal momwe amaonekera nzeru zake ndimadabwa iyeyu arsene wenger adadyetsana mankhwala wanji 
  nchifukwa chake zambiri tikamukumbutsa patha zaka 10 timu yakeyo isanachite zakupsa potenga chikho amakwiya zedi iyo nkhani ya tsiku lina 
  tsono mourinhao adatopa kuitanira minibasi adapempha mwini minibasi ina amupezere ntchito mwini minibasiyo adali dotolo pambali pothandiza odwala ku gulupu dotoloyo amakaphunzitsanso kusukulu ina ya anamwino

  ndailephera ntchito andichotsa adayankha mwa chidula 
  apa mpomwe adafotokoza momwe ntchitoyo idathera 
  ndimagwiranso ntchito yokonza mnyumba mwa dotoloyo kukolopa kusesa kukonza mufiliji zina zotero tsiku lina ndidapeza liver ina idakhalitsa mfilijimo ndidaaitenga kukaotcha atabwera uja adandifunsa ndinasiya katundu umu watenga ndani ndidati sindikudziwa adafotokoza uja 
  adamezera malovu nkupitiriza ya nkhomaliro adandifun sanso ndidakananso ngakhalenso madzulo adandifunsa ndidaona katundu ndidakananso pobwera madzulo tsiku linalo adabwera mowa adandigaila 
  akuti mkuluyo ataona mourinhao wayamba kuledzera adamufunsanso ndinasiya katundu wanga watenga ndani mourinhao adayankha mukunena ija ndaotchera pepani 
  uja adangoti chinalitu chiwindi cha munthu ndimati ndikaphu nzitsire 
  abale anzanga tikakhala pantchito sib wino kusolola zimene tikuziona nzazingono tikadakhala tonse tilibe mtima osolola nkhani zotengera abale alongo kunja moononga ndalama kubwereka ndege yaufiti kabanza si bwenzi zikutisautsa

  zinakhalanso adafunsa gervazzio mmalo moika nyimbo ya nakulenga

Text:
papa apempha madotolo akhale okhulupirika wolemba sylvester kasitomu papa francisko lachisanu lapitali wapempha madotolo apewe wothandizira odwala amwalire mwamsanga powapatsa mankhwala olakwika ponena kutero ndikuonetsa khalidwe loipa 
 papayu wayankhula nkumano ma madotolo omwe anakamuchezera kulikulu la mpingowu ku vatican 
 wati wothandizira odwala amwalire mwamsanga maka kubaya kupereka mankhwala olakwika wonyazitsa ulemerero wa munthu womwe tempile ya mulungu 
 mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolikayu mwazina watsindika za kufunika kolemekeza moyo wa munthu wina maka pozindikira mulungu ndiye mwini moyo palibe munthu yemwe mphamvu yothandizira munthu amene akudwala amwalire mwa msanga chakukula kwa matenda palibe yemwe mphamvu yochotsa moyo wa munthu 
 wati mulungu yekha yemwe amapereka moyo yemweyo amatenganso moyo yake 
 papayu wapitiriza kunena kusamalira wodwala sikungopereka mankhwala kokha kumvetsera chidwi nkhawa za wodwala payekhapayekha 
 wakumbutsa madotolowo zonse ayenera kukumbukira malamulo ntchito yawoya udotolo

Text:
kudali ku mapemphero scom patha zaka zisanu tsopano dyson milanzie yemwe mkonzi wa mapologalamu kuwailesi ya kanema ku mbc tv pabanja njole yake jane 
  awiriwatu adamangitsa woyera 30 july 2011 ku word alive garden mumzinda wa blantyre 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza adakumana ku bss dyson jane dyson amakhulupirira mulungu ndiye adagwira ntchito yonse akumane woyera 
  adadziwana mchaka cha 2003 pomwe jane amaphunzira kusukulu ya sekondale ya blantyre bss dyson kusukulu ya pulaiveti ya kamacha onse nkuti fomu 2 
  mchakachi sukulu ya dyson idakonza mapemphero students christian organization malawi scom omwe amakachitikira ku sukulu ya bss kupatula mapemphero dyson adagwiritsira ntchito nzeru zachibadwidwe pamene adaponya maso jane 
  macheza okhudza mapemphero adayambira pomwepo mosakhalitsa zinthu zidasintha dyson adaganiza zolankhula nkhani ina kwa njoleyi 2004 dyson adafunsira njoleyi tsoka ilo adakana 
  akuti zidabalalitsa dyson maso ake amalasalasa njoleyi kotero kudali kovuta ayangane kwina 
  mnyamatayu sadalekere pomwepo adayeserabe kuponya chichewa chake chimakanidwa 2005 pamene njoleyi imaphunzira koleji ya polytechnic akuti mpomwe idalola chichewa cha dyson 
  jane akuti loto lake lidali lodzagwa mchikondi mwamuna wokhulupirira mulungu akuti ataonanso kupemphera kwa dyson sikudali kwachinyengo adaganiza zomulola 
  kukhulupirira mulungu akuti ndicho chakhala chinsinsi chawo lero angakwanitse zaka zisanu popamba kuponyerana mapoto kuitana ankhoswe adzaweluze milandu 
  awiriwa ati achinyamata azizisunga akufuna kudzagwa mmanja munthu woopa mulungu 
  dyson milanzie wa mmudzi mwa chemgundo kwa t kumtaja mboma la blantyre wa 9 mbanja la ana 11

Text:
zipolowe zikuphulika pamene tikuyandikira chaka cha 2014 pomwe amalawi akuyembekeza chisankho cha magawo atatu chosankha pulezidenti aphungu   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc ya malamulo makhansala bungwe loona momwe zinthu zikuyendera mdziko muno la pac lati wa zipolowe pakati zipani ukhoza kusokoneza zokonzekera chisankhochi 
  wofalitsa nkhani za bungweli mbusa maurice munthali wati chipani chikutchuka wamtopola ziwawa omwe amafuna kudzachisankha amatha kukhumudwa maganizo 
  watinso zipani zikachulutsa ziwawa zimachepetsa mwayi wawo wodzigulitsa kwa omwe akanazisankha 
  amafika pozolowera chipani chakuti chimakonda zipolowe ndiye chikakhala msonkhano amaopa kupitako cha mbiri yoipayo chipani nkumalephera kudzigulitsa adatero munthali pocheza tamvani sabata ino 
  munthali watinso zambiri atsogoleli zipani ndiwo amapangitsa owatsatira azikonda ziwawa makamaka cha kalankhulidwe komaso zochita zawo wati zikhoza kutha pokhapokha atsogoleri atamvetsetsa tanthauzo la ndale 
  vuto lakuti atsogoleli zipani samvetsetsa tanthauzo la ndale mmalo moti azitenga atsogoleri anzawo zipani zina opikisana nawo amawatenga adani zomwe zimawapangitsa azilankhula mtopola udani wotere umalowelera mwa otsatira zipani omwe amati akakumana amangokhala anayambana kale basi ndewu nkuyambira pomwepo watero munthali 
  wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa apolisi mdziko muno kelvin maigwa wati panthawi ino yomwe chisankho chikuyandikira apolisi akhwimitsa chitetezo salekerera munthu aliyese yemwe apezeke akuyambitsa ziwawa 
  sitiona ndale ayi ntchito yathu kuonetsetsa pali bata mtendere ndiye munthu aliyese yemwe apezeke akuchita kuyambitsa ziwawa adzamangidwa watero maigwa 
  zipani za ndale zati pakadalipano zili kalikiriki kuphunzitsa ozitsatira ake makamaka achinyamata kupewa zipolowe zati zipitiriza ntchitoyi mpaka chisankho chidzachitike chaka chamawa 
  lino jolly kalelo mneneri wa chipani cha malawi congress party mcp chomwe chikuyembekeza kupanga msonkhano waukulu wokasankha maudindo mawa lino wati chipanichi chili nthambi yoona za achinyamata yomwe imaphunzitsa achinyamatawo za makhalidwe abwino 
  timakhulupirira boma sungatenge chomenya anzako ayi kupanga zabwino zoti akhutire nazo pachifukwa ichi timaphunzitsa achinyamata athu za mtima wodzichepetsa kumvetsa watero kalelo 
  wolankhulira chipani cha democratic progressive party dpp nicholas dausi wati ziwawa zikhoza kuchepa pandale wonyozana kutukwanana pamisonkhano ungathe ndiwo umayambitsa maphokoso 
  vuto lalikulu limakhala zolankhula za atsogoleli pamisonkhano akuima pansanja kuyamba kutukwana anzawo anzawowo sangasangalale nazo mapeto ake nkhondo chofunika kwambiri kuona zomwe atsogolelife timalankhula pagulu tikatero achinyamata otitsatira athu sangapange ziwawa ayi watero dausi 
  wa zipolowe pakati zipani udayamba kalekale zaoneka mchitidwewu wawonjeza pomwe nyengo ya chisankho ikuyandikira 
  bungwe loona achinyamata akupatsidwa mphamvu zokwanira kuwaphunzitsa mmene angatengerepo mbali zitukuko zosiyanasiyana la youth empowerment and civic education yece lati kwa yaitali lakhala likuphunzitsa achinyamata kuipa kolowerera mikangano ya ndale 
  akuluakulu ndale amati akayambana amanyengerera achinyamata katundu ndalama akathane adani awowo mapeto ake achinyamatawo ndiamene amamangidwa kuvulala ndiye takhala tikuwaphunzitsa kuwopsa kwa mchitidwewu moti tili chikhulupiliro pakhala watelo oyendetsa bungwe la yece lucky mbewe 
  sabata yatha zipani za united democratic front udf peoples party pp zidasemphana zochita ku zomba pomwe odzaimira chipanichi cha udf pachisankho atupele muluzi ankakapangitsa msonkhano wa ndale pasukulu ya mponda 
  mneneri wa polisi ku zombako thomeck nyaude adauza nyuzipepala ya the nation mkanganowo udayamba omwe adavala zovala za chipani cha pp atazungulira kumalo msonkhanowo pagalimoto otsatira chipani cha udf sadakondwe zomwe adachita anzawozo 
  zidachitika patangotha sabata ziwiri wotsatira chipani cha pp jimmy phiri adakhapidwa otsatira chipani cha dpp ku nancholi mumzinda wa blantyre 
  pomwe chipani cha dpp chimakonzekera msonkhano waukulu amene akuwaganizira ndiwotsatira peter mutharika adakaotcha katundu wina wa frank julius yemwe amati amatsatira yemwe amapikisana mutharika henry chimunthu banda 
  zipani ziwirizi zidalimbanaso mwezi wa january ku balaka komwe adavulazidwa kwambiri otsatira chipani cha udf atadzudzula otsatira chipani cha pp adawazulira mbendera
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
kwa ngombe zamkaka zimalira chisamaliro chokwanira lasford mbwana mwa alimi ngombe zamkaka omwe akuchita kwambiri kwa bvumbwe mboma la thyolo moti mlimiyu akuyenda chokhala kaamba koti adagula galimoto ulimiwu bright kumwenda adacheza naye motere tafotokozani kodi ulimi wa ngombe zamkaka mudayamba liti   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ulimi wa ngombe zamkaka ndidayamba 2006 nditaona momwe anzanga amapindulira moti ngombe yanga yoyamba ndidagula k130 000 ndakhala ndikuonjezera mpaka zidafika 8 
  kodi mwapindula motani ulimiwu mbwana kudyetsa ngombe zake zizipereka nkaka wochuluka phindu losachita kunena ndikadakhala sindikupindula sindikadaonjezera chiwerengero cha ngombe zanga ngombe za mkaka zimandipatsa ndowe zothira kumunda ndalama zogulira chakudya zovala zinthu zina zosoweka pabanja panga panopa banja langa likuyenda chokhala choti tidagula galimoto ulimi womwewu 
  nanga mungamulangize zotani munthu amene akufuna kuyamba ulimi wa ngombe zamkaka choyamba akhale chidwi ziweto malo wobzala nsenjere amange khola labwino akhale madzi msika wa mkaka 
  kodi mukati khola labwino mukufuna kunena chiyani khola labwino limakhala malo wodyera wokamira mkaka womwetsera mankhwala wosewerera wokhalira mwana akabadwa woti ngombe izikhala panthunzi ikafuna kupuma kugona 
  kodi patsiku mumakama mkaka wochuluka motani ndili ngombe 8 ndikukama zinayi zokha choti zina zazingono udzu deya masese zikamapezeka mosavuta ndimakama malita osachepera 100 patsiku omwe amandipatsa ndalama zokwana pafupifupi k500 000 pamwezi 
  chinsinsi choti ngombe izitulutsa mkaka wambiri nchiyani kudyetsa mokwanira wa ngombezo ngombe sizisiyana munthu kodi simukudziwa akamadya mokwanira mwana amasangalala choti mkaka umatuluka wambiri ngombe zamakono zimatulutsa mkaka wambiri pofanizira zachikaladi 
  mukati ngombe zachikaladi mukufuna kutanthauzanji ukapereka umuna wa ngombe za chizungu kwa ngombe zachikuda za malawi zebu ana obadwa amakhala makaladisakhala azungu achikuda amakhala pakatikati moti mkaka omwe amatulutsa sukhala wambiri wa ngombe ya chizungu sukhala wochepa kwambiri wa yachikuda 
  kodi ngombe zanu za wanji ngombe zanga za wa holstein alimi ambiri ngombe za mkaka mdziko muno akuweta ma holstein jersey ma friesian 
  tafotokozani kodi mumagula ngombe zamkaka timagula kwa alimi anzathu amagula mmafamu boma ku mikolongwe ku chiradzulu likasi ku mchinji diamphwi dzalanyama ku lilongwe dwambadzi ku mzimba mabungwe alimi ngombe zamkaka shire highlands milk producers association shmpa central region milk producers association crempa mpoto dairy farmers association mdfa amathandizanso alimi kupeza ngombe zamkaka 
  nanga munthu asungire zingati akafuna kugula ngombe zamkaka zimatengera wogulitsa komwe ukukagula ngombezo alimi ambiri amagulitsa ngombe pamtengo wapakati k250 000 k300 000 ikakhala yabere imafika mpaka k400 000 
  mavuto otani omwe alimi ngombe zamkaka amakumana nawo kusowa kwa madzi zakudya makamaka miyezi ya pakati october april imeneyi deya amasowa udzu umavuta kuwupeza moti alimi amayenda mitunda italiitali apeze udzu wodyetsa ngombe zawo chaka chathachi thumba la deya tim0agula k6 000 adali wokwera mtengo amavuta kupeza kuthimathima kwa magetsi kumawononga mkaka alimi ngombe zamkaka amapanga magulu osiyanasiyana bulking groups omwe amasunga mkaka wawo mmalo ozizira kudikira makampani adzagule mkakawo magetsi akathima mkaka kuwonongeka asadadzautenge ndiye alimi mmadzi kuphatikizira apo mitengo yomwe makampani amatigulira mkaka yotsika kwambiri ulimi wa ngombe zamkaka susiyana wa fodya wogula amene amayika mtengo 
  matenda otani omwe amagwira ngombe chifuwa chachikulu chigodola zotupatupa mwa matenda omwe amazunza ngombe 
  nanga anu otsiriza wotani potsiriza ndikufuna ndipemphe anzanga akumbe zitsime kubzala nsenjere asamavutike kupeza madzi chakudya mudzinja
Label: FARMING

Text:
apolisi adalakwa pomanga aphungu katswiri wina wa za malamulo othirapo ndemanga agwirizana bungwe la malawi law society mls ponena phungu wa nyumba ya malamulo pomwe mkhumano wa nyumbayo uli mkati kulakwira malamulo lino 
  mphunzitsi wa zamalamulo kusukulu yaukachenjede ya chancellor college edge kanyongolo wanenanso pogwiritsa ntchito mauthenga pafoni nkuwaphwanyira ufulu wawo wokhala chinsinsi 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kanyongolo adanena msambatayi apolisi atagwira aphungu awiri nyumba ya malamulo chipani cha mcp peter chakhwantha jessie kabwila wina wa chipanichi ulemu msungama powaganizira amakambirana zogwetsa boma la peter mutharika pamauthenga palamya otchedwa whatsapp 
  zitangochitika bungwe la maloya la malawi law society mls lidati apolisi adaphwanya lamulo pomanga aphunguwo masiku zokambirana zawo asanathe 
  gawo 21 la malamulo oyendetsera lino limati ufulu wokhala chinsinsi lamuloli limaletsa kusechedwa opanda chikalata cha boma kulandidwa katundu ngakhalenso kuwerengeredwa kalata nkhani zonse zokhudza mafoni adatero kanyongolo 
  adati umboni wotengedwa popanda chilolezo wotere suloledwa kukhoti wina angapereke umboni wotere akhoza kusumiridwa 
  zikhoza kuvuta mwa amene amakambirana nawo ndiye adakapereka mauthengawo kupolisi adatero kanyongolo 
  mpungwepungwe udayamba lamulungu pomwe apolisi adamanga msungama pomuganizira akukhudzidwa nkhaniyo pomwe chakhwantha kabwila samadziwika komwe adali 
  lolemba pamene msonkhano wa aphunguwo udayamba apolisi adatchinga zipata zotulukira ku nyumbayo sadathe kugwira aphungu awiriwo kabwila adamugwira akuti azithawira kumaofesi kazembe wa la germany pomwe chakhwantha adakadzipereka yekha kupolisi lachiwiri 
  kanyongolo adati malamulo lino salola phungu pomwe mkhumano wa nyumba ya malamulo uli mkati 
  ndime 60(1 ya malamulo imanena phungu chitetezo choti sangamangidwe panthawi yomwe akupita pomwe ku nyumba ya malamulo adatero kanyongolo 
  naye mphunzitsi wotchuka wa za malamulo ku cape town mdziko la south africa danwood chirwa adapherapo mphongo ponena aphungu akangoyamba kukumana amakhala otetezedwa pankhani yomangidwa sali mnyumbamo 
  malamulo amati aphungu sayenera kumangidwa zokambirana zikatsegulidwa amakhala otetezedwa zokambirana zingatenge yaitali chitetezochi chimakhalapo akhoza kudzamangidwa zokambirana zikatsekedwa adatero chirwa 
  mpungwepungwe wa lachiwiriwo udachititsa sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo richard msowoya kuimitsa msonkhano wa aphungu atamasulira kumangidwa kwa aphunguwo kuchepetsa mphamvu za nyumbayi 
  zokambirana ziyamba zaima mpaka boma lititsimikizire za chitetezo chathu aphungu nyumba ya malamulo adatero msowoya 
  wa apolisi lexton kachama adati apolisi sadalakwe pomanga atatuwo adati akadafufuza nkhaniyi 
  sitidachite kutumidwa andale anthuwo sitidawazenge mlandu wofuna kuukira boma tidangofuna kumva mbali yawo ntchito yathu apolisi nkusungitsa bata timachita mwa ukadaulo wathu adatero kachama sadafune kunena momwe adapezera mauthenga foni za eni ake 
  mpungwepungwewu udayamba sabata yatha kumkhumano wa komiti yoona za mmene zinthu zikuyendera mdziko ya public affairs committee pac mumzinda wa blantyre komwe nthumwi za boma zotsutsa boma zidasemphana chichewa pankhani yoti mutharika ayenera kutula pansi udindo mtsogoleri wa lino ati kaamba kolephera kupeza mayankho mavuto zachuma kusowa kwa chimanga mmisika ya admarc 
  kusemphanako kudabuka nthumwi zotsutsa boma zitatemetsa nkhwangwa pamwala mutharika atule pansi udindo kaamba kolephera kuyendetsa zinthu 
  nkhani yomwe idavuta kwambiri ya kayendetsedwe ka chuma njala yomwe yasanduka mutu wa nkhani pafupifupi paliponse mdziko muno maka pakusowa kwa chimanga mmisika ya admarc 
  zipanizi zidapereka malire masiku 30 boma litumize chimanga mmisika ya admarc litule pansi udindo omwe angakhale njira zothetsera vutoli atenge phamvu zoyendetsa boma 
  pamkhumanowu aphungu akuyembekezeka kukambirana za momwe chuma chikuyendera nkhani ya njala nkhani yokhudza ufulu wolemba kufalitsa nkhani mitu ina yomwe idatsalira pazokambirana za ndondomeko ya chuma cha 2015/16 
  nkhani yokhudza ufulu wa atolankhani yakhala ikuvuta imodzi mwa nkhani zikuluzikulu zomwe zidabwerera pamkhumano wa ndondomeko ya chuma womwe wapitawo bungwe la atolankhani maiko kudzera mwa akazembe adadzudzula kuponderedzedwa kwa nkhaniyi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
chekucheku kuno ayi chekucheku sindichoka ufumu mpaka nditafa chigamulo pamwamba chigamulo patangotha sabata imodzi bwalo lalikulu lamilandu mumzinda wa blantyre litabwezeretsa t chekucheku wa mboma la neno pampando mbomali ati sakugwirizana chigamulo cha bwalolo kotero achitanso zionetsero zoonetsa mkwiyo wawo 
  chekucheku yemwe dzina lenileni francis magombo adaimitsidwa pulezidenti wopuma joyce banda 15 may 2014 mtsogoleriyo sadapereke zifukwa zomuimitsira kugwira ntchito yake t a. 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kalata yoimitsa mfumuyi idati malinga mphamvu zopatsidwa kwa pamutu 23:03 ndime ii gawo 11 2 la malamulo okhudza mafumu ndikuimitsa francis magombo musagwirenso ntchito za ufumuwu mboma la neno kuyambira tsopano mpaka zofufuza zokhudza magwiridwe anu ntchito zitatha 
  mfumuyi idathamangira kubwalo la milandu kuthemba kalatayo malinga zomwe chekucheku adauza bwalolo banda adamuimitsa amalola zipani zonse kuchititsa misonkhano ya ndale mdera lake 
  yemwe amaimira mfumuyi pamlanduwo golden mbeya adati chekucheku amayenera auzidwe mlandu womwe adapalamula mkalata ya banda mudalibe 
  malinga chigamulo cha bwalo ndiye mfumuyi yayambiranso kugwira ntchito yake ya ufumu mboma la neno zomwe zakwiyitsa kumeneko amene aopseza achita zionetsero 
  oposa 200 2 april mpaka 3 chaka chino adachita zionetsero zokakamiza dc wa bomalo memory kaleso monpeiro achotse mfumuyi 
  monpeiro adatsimikiza ofesi yake idalandira kalata ya madandaulowa adatumiza zodandaula za anthuwo ku ofesi ya pulezidenti 
  mukudziwa nkhani zochotsa mfumu zili mmanja mwa pulezidenti ndiye ndidazitumiza kwa oyenera adatero kaleso monpeiro 
  ofesi yake akuti sidagwire ntchito kwa masiku awiri anthuwo atatchinga mitengo adaopseza achokapo pokhapokha mfumuyi ichotsedwe pampando 
  wa anthuwo yemwenso akuyankhulira gululo steve donda wa mmudzi mwa donda adati mfumuyi yakhala ikulanda minda ya 
  ikumadyetsera ngombe zake mminda mwathu zomwe zikuononga mbewu zathu ikulonga mafumu posatsata ndondomeko ya ufumu wa chingoni amene akuwalowetsa ufumu si angoni adatero donda pouza tamvani msabatayi 
  akuti anthuwa ayambiranso zionetsero mpaka mfumuyi itachotsedwa donda wati chigamulocho sichidawakomere 
  sitikufuna mfumuyi itilamulirenso akufuna akhale mfumu ndiye kuno ayi apite kwina tikumana tikatsekanso ofesi ya dc mpaka mfumu imeneyi ichotsedwe adatero donda 
  chekucheku akutsutsa zomwe anthuwa akunena akuti akukhulupirira akumuchitira kaduka chabe 
  zabodza ndikumatsegulira ngombe kukazidyetsa mminda mwawo zoti ndikulonga mafumu mosatsata chikhalidwe cha chingoni ponena mafumuwo si angoni bodza 
  ndine mngoni ndinenso ndidalimbikitsa chikhalidwechi mbomali sindichoka pampando wa ufumu mpaka nditafa adamenyetsa nkhwangwa pamwala motero chekuchechu 
  polankhulapo za kufunika kwa mafumu katswiri wa zandale henry chingaipe akuti mafumu ofunika lino silidafike pomagwira ntchito yake popanda mafumu 
  akuti chofunika nkuti lino lifotokozenso ntchito ya mafumu mtsogoleri wa pasakhale mpungwepungwe wa momwe mafumu amagwirira ntchito 
  malamulo okhudza mafumu chiefs act adapangidwa ya chipani chimodzi malamulo omwewa akugwira ntchito pamene tili zipani zambiri chofunika nkuti malamulowa akonzedwenso tidziwe ntchito zawo momwe pulezidenti angagwirire ntchito mafumuwa adatero chingaipe 
  adati malo ambiri mmanja mwa mafumu zomwe nzovuta mafumu achotsedwe pamene nkhani za malamulowa sizidalongosoke
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:
akufuna t chekucheku achoke okwiya lolemba lachiwiri msabatayi adasonkhana paofesi ya dc wa boma la neno komwe amapempha bwanamkubwayo achotse t chekucheku avulidwe ufumu wandodowu ati wanyanya ziphuphu 
  mwa anthuwa steve donda wa mmudzi mwa donda kwa t chekucheku akuti mfumuyi ikulanda minda ya ikumadyetsera ngombe zake mminda mwa ikulonga mafumu posatsata ndondomeko ya ufumu wa chingoni 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mfumuyi yati zomwe akunena nzabodza satula pansi ufumu 
  kusiya ufumu ndiye ndamwalira apo ayi sizitheka idatero mfumuyi 
  iyo idaonjeza ndikukonza zowatengera anthuwa kukhoti pali milandu yambiri 
  donda adati sasiya kupempha boma lichotse mfumuyi panopa tayamba kusonkhana kwa dc sitikubwerera mmbuyo mpaka mfumuyi itachotsedwa adatero 
  dc wa bomalo memory kaleso monpeiro watsimikiza ofesi yake yalandira madandaulowa wati lolemba kudavuta moti sadagwire ntchito 
  adatchinga ofesi yathu moti sitidagwire ntchito.lero lachiwiri bolani angofika oposera 100 pomwe dzulo lachiwiri kudafika oposa 200 adatero monpeiro 
  adati watumiza madandaulo anthuwo ku ofesi ya pulezidenti poti ndiye mphamvu zonse
Label: POLITICS

Text:
wesm ikuthandiza alimi kupanga manyowa bungwe la wildlife and environmental society of malawi wesm lati ndilokhutira mmene alimi mdera la chingale akuchitira maphunziro omwe akuwapatsa 
 mwa akuluakulu bungweli san daniel nkunga omwe anena ku chipini mboma la zomba pomwe amayendera alimi kuona akutsatira njira za ulimi zomwe alimiwa adaphunzira 
 bungwe la wesm likuphunzitsa alimi mderali kapangidwe ka manyowa pogwiritsa ntchito zinthu zosavuta kupeza mmadera mwawo 
 akutsatira zomwe tikuwaphunzitsa chatsala choti akazichite kumunda kwawo alimi kuno amadandaula kukwera mtengo kwa feteleza chake tinawaphunzitsa kapangidwe ka manyowa pogwiritsa ntchito zinthu zopezekeratu anatero nkunga 
 mwa omwe anachita nawo maphunzirowa hanne lihonga ayamikira maphunzirowa ponena athandiza kuchulukitsa zokolora zawo cha chino
Label: FARMING

Text:

  kochi wa flames ernest mtawali lachinayi adawalola osewera akatumikire matimu osewerawo adangololedwa asewere masewero alero abwerere ku flames madzulo alero 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc bullets idachinya wanderers mndime yoyamba 2 1 wanderers idabweza chipongwe carlsberg cup pamene idapambana 2 1

  pamene mabvuto lungu wa bullets akuti nawonso akonzeka komabe timu yawo isowa ntchito za chiukepo msowoya owen chaima vincent gona chovulala pamene sankhani mkandawire wabwerera

Text:

  abale anzanga mzinda wonse wa blantyre mulibe malo omwe munthu angayimirire mwaulele chonsecho akuti munthu ukagwidwa pamtengo wakundende ndithu 
  nanga zinyalala wenela wachikwama athana nazo ndikudziwatu mukundinena tade zoona chikwama chimanyamulidwa chija mukakhale zomanga zimbudzi wenela simukudziwa chomwe mukunena
