Text:
2017 yatilandira zigumula pangotha sabata chilowereni chaka cha 2017 malipoti ngozi zakudza mvula mmaboma osiyanasiyana atopetsa kale 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu nyumba sukulu misewu katundu zakudya za zaonongeka amalawi pamavuto kaamba ka ngozizo 
  lachitatu lapitali nyumba 32 zidasasuka kudzanso zipupa zina kugwa kaamba ka mvula ya mphepo ya mkuntho yomwe idagwa kwa mfumu mkukula mboma la dowa komwe idaononga katundu chakudya 
  mlatho wa jalawe ku rumphi udaguvukira mvula itakokolola zoulimbitsa agulupu aakulu mengwe omwe dera lawo lidakhudzidwa kwambiri adati mvula mphepozo zidayamba mma 3 koloko masana tsikulo mmudzimo mudali kokakoka kusowa kolowera pogwira 
  chakudya chathu ufa pogona zofunda katundu wina ofunika zidaonongeka pangoziyo moti mwayi palibe yemwe adavulala adatero mengwe 
  wapolisi mbomalo felix phiri adakafotokozera ofesi ya dc momwe zinthu zilili apolisi atakayendera madera okhudzidwawo athandizane zochita 
  lachitatu lomwelo 7 adavulala pamalo okwerera basi mibawa mumzinda wa blantyre mvula yamphamvu itazula chimtengo chomwe chidali malowo nkuwugwetsera maminibasi 7 
  lachiwiri mvula ina ya mphamvu idakokolola mlatho wa jalawe omwe umalumikiza maboma rumphi karonga msewu wa m1 
  malingana dc wa mboma la rumphi lusizi nhlane mvula yamphamvu idagwa usiku wa lachiwiri zomwe zidapangitsa madzi aziyenda mwamphamvu mpakana kufowola mizati ya mlathowo omwe udakokoloka 
  ngozi zina zokhudzana mvula yamkuntho zidachitika tsiku loyembekeza kulandira chaka cha tsopano 31 december 2016 mdera la mfumu nanseta mboma la thyolo komwe nyumba 114 zidaonongeka 
  kauni yemwe khonsolo ya boma la thyolo adachita wasonyeza chiyambire mvula ya chaka chino nyumba 1 000 ndizo zakhudzidwa zapangitsa mavuto malo okhalapo akule mbomali 
  31 december 2016 pomwepo nyumba 96 zidaonongeka mvula yamkuntho yomwe idagwa mboma la karonga komiti ya zachitetezo ya district civil protection dcpc adati zidafikitsa chiwerengero cha nyumba zokhudzidwa 424 mbomali 
  komitiyo idati midzi ya mwamutawali mponera mwandovi ina mwa midzi yomwe yakhudzidwa mvula zolusazi mbomali zina mwa zomwe zaonongekeratu sukulu ya pulaimale ya chisumbu msika wa jetty 
  nthambi yoona zanyengo mdziko muno idalengeza kumayambiriro mvula chaka chino lino liyembekezere mvula yamkuntho cha mphepo ya la nina yomwe zambiri imabweretsa mvula yamtunduwu 
  pankhaniyi mneneri wa nthambi yoona ngozi za dzidzidzi jeremiah mphande adati ndilokonzeka kulimbana zotsatira za mvula ya mtunduwu itati yabwera ilo mothandizana maiko mabungwe adakhazikitsa kale ndondomeko zoyenera
Label: FLOODING

Text:
abwenzi radio maria apereka katundu kwa ana osaona osamva abwenzi radio maria akidayosizi ya blantyre alimbikitsa akhristu mdziko muno azitengapo mbali pothandiza 24w https://www.radiomaria.mw/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/ngomba-768x576.jpg 768w https://www.radiomaria.mw/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/ngomba.jpg 1040w sizes="(max width 492px 100vw 492px />ngomba kupereka wina mwa katunduyo wapampando wa gululi james ngomba omwe amayankhula pomwe anayendera kukacheza ana omwe vuto losaona kumva sukulu za montfort demonstrations school for the deaf mary view school for the blind ku nguludi mzinda wa blantyre lamulungu 1 december 2019 
 ngomba anachiona chanzeru athandize ana wa njira imodzi yogwira ntchito za chifundo 
 ndife okhutira tinabwera kudzacheza kuthandiza ana omwe amasowa thandizo taona akusowa zambiri choncho tikonzanso ulendo wina tibwerenso kudzawathandizaanatero ngomba 
 ngomba udindo wa munthu amene kuthekera kuthandiza omwe osowa makamaka ana akuno omwe vuto losaona kumva 
 poyankhulapo mmawu ake mphunzitsi wamkulu mary view schools for the blind james khuku anathokoza gululi kamba kowapatsa katundu yemwe ati wafika yoyenera pomwe akukumana mavuto akusowa kwa chakudya 
 katundu yemwe talandira lero atithandiza kwambiri kuchepetsa mavuto zakudya omwe alipo sukulu pano.anatero james khuku 
 apa khuku apempha akufuna kwabwino awathandize kamba koti sukulupa amakumana mavuto osiyanasiyana makamaka nkhani ya zakudya 
 wina mwa katundu yemwe gululi lapereka ufa mpunga nyemba mafuta ophikira za ndalama zokwana 200 thousand kwacha
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
papa wokhudzidwa kutenthedwa kwa nkhalango ya amazon wolemba sylvester kasitomu mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisko wati ndiwokhudzidwa moto womwe ukupitiliza kusakaza mitengo zinthu zina zachilengedwe nkhalango yayikulu ya amazon yomwe ili mdziko la brazil 
 papa francisko papa francisco walankhula lero mapemphero masana ku likulu la mpingo wu ku vatican walankhula potsatira kukhudzidwa kwake kubukanso kwa moto nkhalangoyi 
 wati nkhalango ya amazon nkhalango yofunika kwambiri imapereke mpheya wabwino umathandiza aziugwilitsa ntchito kupitilira kuhala moyo 
 posachedwapa akatswiri zofufuza fufuza anatulutsa lipoti lomwe kwambiri limasonyeza ngozi za moto zaonjeza kwambiri kuchitika nkhalango yofunika yi 
 kotero mtsogoleri wa la brazil naye adzipereke ntchito yotetedza nkhalangoyi 
 padakalipano mdziko akuti ayamba zionetsero zokwiya kulekekera kwa boma la dzikolo ntchito yotetedza mkhalango yi
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
zilango zophweka zivulaza maalubino miyezi 18 kwa ofuna kugulitsa alubino ku dz pali mantha maalubino angapitirire kuona zokhoma mdziko muno boma silichita machawi lamulo latsopano loteteza anthuwa liyambe kugwira ntchito wa bungwe lomenyera ufulu wa maalubino la association of people with albinism in malawi apam bonface massah watero 
  mantha mkuluyu akudza pamene amene apezeka olakwa pozunza kusowetsa maalubino akupitirira kulandira zilango zozizira 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc lachisanu sabata yatha bwalo la milandu mboma la dedza lidagamula siyireni nyata chrissie lajabu kukaseweza kundende zaka ziwiri miyezi 6 poopseza mwana wa zaka 14 amupezera kale msika 
  malinga mneneri wa polisi ku dedza edward kabango amayiwa akhala akulankhula kwa yaitali 
  amati kanyama kosendasenda akapezera kale msika woti akakagulitse adatero kabango 
  kaamba ka kuopsezedwako mwanayo akuti adasiya sukulu pochita mantha angakumane amene amati amugulawo makolo mwanayu akuti adakadziwitsa apolisi april 15 amayi awiriwo adanjatidwa 
  bwalo lidawapeza olakwa lidawaimba mlandu wobweretsa mantha kwa mwanayu adawalamula akaseweze zaka ziwiri miyezi 6 kundende 
  chilangocho chikudza pamene winaso ku machinga sinoyo wyson wagamulidwa akakhale kundende zaka ziwiri posowetsa mwana wa zaka 11 wachialubino 
  may chaka chinonso amuna awiri ku zomba adawalamula kukaseweza miyezi 12 popezeka mafupa alubino 
  massah akuti si zoona milandu yotere izikhala zilango zofewa wati bungwe lawo lichitapo kanthu maalubino asamakhale mwamantha 
  ndikumvanso kwa za nkhani ya ku dedzayo tifufuza pankhani ya ku machinga ndiye tidakagwadanso kubwalo lalikulu aunikenso chilangochi adatero massah 
  adati oweruza milandu si olakwa zigamulo zomwe akuperekazi malamulo lino amapereka zaka ziwiri kwa wopalamula mlandu wozembetsa munthu 
  adati mavuto onsewa angathe lamulo la anti human trafficking lingayambe kugwira ntchito lamuloli lidavomerezedwa kale aphungu nyumba ya malamulo mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika 
  lamulo latsopanoli likupereka zaka khumi kwa amene wapalamula mlandu wonga uwu chomwe chilango chokhwimirako tayesera anzathu boma yomwe lamuloli liyambe kugwira ntchito zomwe tikumva si zopereka chiyembekezo 
  maalubino sakutetezedwa kupatula kungolankhula chabe zomwe sizingateteze anthuwa adatero massah 
  mneneri muunduna woona za chilungamo malamulo apoche itimu akuti lamuloli lidavomerezedwa kale mutharika 
  chomwe ndikudziwa nchakuti lamuloli lidavomerezedwa sindingakumbuke lidasindikizidwa liti panopa kwangotsala liyambe kugwira ntchito mukufuna kudziwa zenizeni za lamuloli funsani unduna wa zamdziko adatero itimu pouza tamvani 
  mneneri ku unduna wa zamdziko rose banda lachiwiri msabatayi adati timuimbire tsikulo lisadathe atipatse zenizeni zokhudza lamuloli 
  pakutha tsikulo banda adati sadakumane oyenerera amene angamufotokozere nkhani yonse yokhudza lamuloli 
  lachitatu adatitumizira uthenga pafoni akhala zotsatira zonse pofika lachinayi 
  maiko tanzania mozambique south africa zambia lamuloli lomwe limakhaulitsa opezeka apalamula mlanduwu pamene mtsogoleri wa la zimbabwe robert mugabe adakhazikitsa ndondomeko yapadera yothanirana anthuwa 
  mutharika wakhala akumalankhula pawailesi ya mbc oopseza amene apezeke akusautsa maalubino athana nawo 
  mutharika angalankhule maka kukhoti akuyendera zomwe malamulo amanena posatengera ake zapangitsa mabungwe apam alimbikitse kupempha boma likhazikitse lamulo lokhwima pofuna kuteteza miyoyo maufulu maalubino 
  massah akuti yakwana mabungwe amene amamenyera ufulu wachibadwidwe agwirane manja pofuna kuthana wozunza maalubino 
  mdziko muno mukangochitika nkhani mumaona amabungwe akubwera pamodzi kudzudzulapo zomwe zikuchitika mmakhoti athu palibe amene akulankhulapo tikufunika tigwirane manja kulimbana nkhaniyi tipambane nkhondo yoteteza amene zilema maalubino adatero massah 
  nkhani zosowetsa maalubino kufukula manda zidafika pachimake february chaka chino anthuwa pamodzi amabungwe adachititsa msonkhano mumzinda wa blantyre kudandaulira boma lichitepo kanthu 
  pamsonkhanowo senior chief kawinga ya mboma la machinga idati zosamveka chilango cha wosowetsa munthu chizikhala chochepa 
  munthu wina adaba ngombe adamupatsa chilango choti akakhale kundende zaka zisanu pamene wosowetsa munthu akumupatsa zaka ziwiri pali chilungamo apa kodi ngombe ikhale yofunikira kwambiri kuposa munthu kodi alubino si munthu adadandaula kawinga
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
achinyamata akambirana za mmanifesto nthambi ya achinyamata ya chipani cha malawi congress party mcp yakambirana zokhudza achinyamata zomwe chipani chawo chiyike mmanifesto yake yokopera pachisankho chikudzachi 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu woyanganira za achinyamata richard chimwendo banda watsimikiza mneneri wachipanichi mbusa maurice munthali wati kupatula achinyamatawa chipanichi chikulandira maganizo ku magulu osiyanasiyana 
  mwa achinyamata amene adafika kumsonkhanowo tili mkati mopanga manifesto yathu poonjezera zomwe tidaiwala 2014 imodzi mwa nthambi zomwe taikapo mtima kwambiri achinyamata tsono tidaona nkwabwino akambirane okha zowakhudza nkutipatsa watero munthali 
  achinyamata mcp mchigawo chapakati nthumwi za mzigawo zina amakumana kulikulu la chipanichi 23 24 august mumzinda wa lilongwe kukambirana mfundozo chimwendo banda wati msonkhano omwewu ukachitikaso mzigawo zina 
  pamsonkhanowu tidali achinyamata 1 000 ochokera mmadera onse oyimiliridwa aphungu mchigawo chapakati mphepepete mwanyanja nthumwi za mmakomiti mzigawo misonkhano yomweyi ikachitikanso mzigawo zina adatero 
  adati kumsonkhanoko achinyamata adatulutsa nkhani zambiri zowakhudza nkuzikambirana adamanga za momwe akuonera nkhanizi zikhonza kukonzedwa atsogoleri 
  wati chipanichi chidachita njira imodzi yoperekera mphamvu kwa achinyamata kupanga ziganizo za momwe lingayendere wati nchikhulupiriro atsogoleri chipanichi akhutitsidwa mfundozo 
  pothirirapo ndemanga munthali adati komiti idasangalala koposa momwe msonkhano wa achinyamatawo udayendera zomwe adamanga nkupereka ku likulu 
  zomwe adatipatsa zikusonyeza mchipanimu tili achinyamata akupsa mmaganizo omwe angathandizedi pachitukuko cha zawo tazitenga tiziphatikiza mmanifesto yathu nzokomera achimata onse mdziko muno watero munthali 
  woyendetsa gulu la mphala ya achinyamata la youth consultative forum edward chileka banda wayamikira zomwe chipani cha mcp chapanga wati zingakhale zipani zonse zitatengera mchitidwewu 
  zimenezi nzomwe timafuna achinyamata kupatsidwa mphamvu osati kumangogwiritsidwa ntchito osapota chipani zida za zipolowe andale ayi uku ndiye kuphunzitsa achinyamata utsogoleri watero chileka banda 
  wati kupatula momwe chipani cha mcp chapangira mpofunikaso achinyamata azipatsidwa mpata wokwanira ogwira ntchito zogwirizana maluso osati kumangowaponderedza
Label: POLITICS

Text:
awiri afa atagwera mtsinje ku rumphi awiri omwe nathaniel gondwe zaka 35 zakubadwa hotters mhango zaka 15 zakubadwa afa atagwera mtsinje wa lunyina mboma la rumphi pomwe amaweza nsomba mtsinjemo 
 wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo sergeant tupeliwe kabwilo watsimikiza zangozi yi 
 wati anthuwo amaweza nsomba anafa cha kubanika 
 athuwo amaweza nsomba nsinje wa lunyina atamaliza kuwezako hotters anagwera mmadzimo nathaniel amakampulumutsa mwasoka nayenso anamira anatero sergeant kabwilo 
 padakalipano apolisi akulangiza mderalo apewe kuwoloka mitsinje yakuya kuopa ngozi zamtunduwu
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
apezereni obwera chochita asadzabwererenso ku joni pamene amalawi othawa kuinga maiko kumene kwagundika ku south africa ati zokhoma zimene aziona sabwereranso ku joniko mafumu apempha boma lipereke mwayi wa ntchito kwa amalawi zitheke 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc sabata zapitazi ku south africa akhala akuthotha maiko ati akuwalanda ntchito akazi mwayi wochita bizinesi ziwawazo zachititsa akunja kulandidwa katundu kuvulazidwa kuphedwa kumene 
  potsatira chipwirikiticho inkosi ya makhosi mmbelwa ya ku mzimba senior chief chimwala ya mboma la mangochi apempha boma lipereke mpamba kwa anthuwa woyambira bisinesi ntchito za manja mzimba mangochi mwa maboma amene amatumiza amalawi ambiri ku joni 
  mafumuwo ati kuchepa kwa malipiro ntchito kusowa kwa ntchito kukwera mtengo kwa chiongola akakongola ndalama ku banki zina mwa zifukwa zomwe adathawira mdziko muno kukwawira ku south africa komwe ndalama si nkhani 
  mfumu chimwala yomwe ana ake atatu ku joni yati boma lionetsetse lapereka mwayi wa ntchito achinyamatawa azigwira kusiyana kukhamukira ku south africa 
  achinyamata akhale mwayi wambiri wopeza ntchito maganyu boma likakonza mavutowa akhala mbiri yakale sindikutanthauza sadzapitanso chiwerengero chake chingachepe kusiyana momwe zilili idatero mfumuyo 
  naye mmbelwa yemwe mfumu ya angoni ku mzimba akuti anthuwa sanganeneretu sadzabwerera mdzikolo 
  koditu anthuwa amapita kukasaka buledi ndiye asadzapitenso pakhale malipiro okwera mmakampanimu pakhale mwayi wa ntchito adatero 
  wa bungwe la zachuma la economic association of malawi ecama henry kachaje akuti amalawi sadzaleka kupita mmaiko otukuka kukasaka ndalama malawi sakonza nkhani za chuma 
  achinyamata sadzasiya kupita mmaiko otukuka kukasaka mwayi pokhapokha malawi atatukuka pachuma nkovuta kusunga wachinyamata mdziko muno popanda ntchito adatero kachaje 
  adati malawi akuyenera kuchilimika athe kupereka mwayi wa ntchito kwa achinyamata tikuyenera kuthandiza kwambiri maunduna amene angapereke mwayi wa ntchito wambiri unduna wa zokopa alendo tsoka lakenso palibe chikuchitika chofuna kutukula undunawu adatero kachaje 
  lolemba nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani kondwani nankhumwa amalawi awiri adaphedwa ziwawazo 3 200 akhudzidwa pamndandanda wobwerera kuno kumudzi anthuwa adayamba kufika mdziko muno lolemba usiku akusungidwa ku blantyre lilongwe poyembekeza atumizidwe mmakwawo 
  onse amene tidacheza nawo adakana kwa mtuu wa galu sangabwererenso mwa obwererawa yusuf amidu wa mboma la mangochi akuti amagwira ntchito yowotcherera zinthu kwa munthu wina mdzikolo amidu akuti amalandira k16 000 sabata kusonyeza mwezi amapeza k64 000 
  ntchito iyi mdziko muno ili malipiro osaposera k25 000 mwezi malinga amidu adati ndalamayo siyingathandize munthu amene pabanja 
  zingathandize boma litaunikira zayanganidwa zitatero palibe pagululi angabwererenso ku south africa kuli mavuto timangopitira kuthawa zokhoma kuno adatero amidu amene watha zaka mdzikolo 
  zokhoma zimene amalawi akumana nazo si ndizo mwachitsanzo alick wyson wa mboma la mangochi adaomberedwa pachifukwa akuti adachitidwa chipongwecho mdzikolo 24 december chaka chatha 
  amalawi ambiri akumva za zipolowezo panopa zidayamba kumapeto chaka chatha pomwe nanenso ndidaona zokhoma adatero 
  zione khombeya amene pathupi miyezi 7 akuti adathamangitsidwa mnyumba mwake madzulo pamene amati aziphika chakudya 
  gulu la limene limasaka obwera akuti lidayamba kuthethetsa amene si mbadwa za dzikolo limodzi mwamuna adathawa kukabisala adavulazidwa mwendo pothawapo 
  evelyn thumba wa mboma la thyolo adamuvulazanso mwendo pamene amathawa pamene amatsika kamuzu stadium miyendo yake idali yotupa adafikira mmanja mwa achipatala 
  aka sikoyamba zipolowe zotere zibuke ku south africa june 2008 la south africa lidachitiranso mtopola alendo mmaiko amene akukhala mdzikolo 60 adaphedwa pamene oposa 600 adavulazidwa 
  la malawi lidakatengako mzika zake zoposa 1 000 kaamba ka ziwawazo zipolowezo zitazizira khamu la lidabwereranso mdzikomo 
  nankhumwa akuti padakali boma laponya maso ake populumutsa mzika zomwe zikuvutika ku south africa zina zonse zibwera pambuyo 
  nankhumwa akuti boma lili ndondomeko zambiri zomwe lakonza zofuna kuthandizira anthuwa 
  maso athu powapulumutsa kaye zina zonse zitsatira sikuti tangokhala adatero 
  chipwirikiticho la malawi lidayamba kututa nzika zake kuyambira lolemba pamene 390 adatengedwa mabasi 6 amene adafikira pabwalo la kamuzu stadium mumzinda wa blantyre
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
mdipiti wa galimoto za chilima wachita ngozi anayi afa anayi afa awiri avulala ngozi yomwe yachitika kwa phalula mboma la balaka 
 malinga mneneri wa apolisi mboma la balaka inspector felix misomali imodzi mwa galimoto za mdipiti wa wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino yagundana galimoto ina nsewu wa zalewa 
 imodzi mwa galimoto zapa mdipitiwo wati ngoziyi siyinakhudze wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa linoyu kaamba koti galimoto yake inali itadutsa kale yomwe inachita ngoziyi galimoto yomwe inali kumapeto kwa mdipitiwu 
 galimoto ya wa toyota vitz saloon nambala yake bw 8173 yomwe amayendetsa tamara kamanga imadutsana convoy ya vice president choti imathamanga kwambiri dalaivalayu analephera kuwongolera galimotoyo zomwe zinachititsa akawombane galimoto yomwe inali kumapeto kwenikweni kwa mdipiti wa vice president wu toyota rand cruiser nambala yake bw1732 momwe munali dalaivala wapolisi anatero inspector misomali 
 inspector misomali ati ngoziyi amayi awiri omwe anakwera galimoto ya vitz yi omwe sakudziwika mayina afera malo ngoziwo wina yemwe galimoto yomweyo wamwalira atangofika naye chipatala cha phalula pamapeto pake dalaivala wa galimotoyo wamwalira atafika ku chipatala cha boma la balaka 
 awiri omwe galimoto yapa mdipitiwo avulala padakalipano awatengera ku chipatala cha kamuzu central mzinda wa lilongwe
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
kudali kosungitsa ndalama ukamalowa mbanki amangoganiza chaphindu chochoka mmenemo kusunga kutapa ndalama komatu akusimba lokoma tikukamba banja lokoma 
  sadock ngambi wa ku chitipa yemwe amagwira ntchito yoonkhetsa chuma kubungwe la unesco akuti amakaika ndalama za bungweli kubanki mwamwayi adakumana tumenye mwenitete wa ku karonga yemwenso amakasungitsa ndalama 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza awiriwa akuti adakhala mzere umodzi mbankimo amacheza adadziwana kalekale apo kudali kukumana kwawo koyamba mwinatu chilankhulo chidagwilapo ntchito 
  mpaka imfa kudzawalekanitsa sadock tumenye adandisangalatsa momwe adamasukira nane mumtima ndidangomva tseketseke mmene amamwtulira timanyazi pangono sangala ndidaona ndekha mkazi uyu adatero sadock 
  adati panthawiyo mchaka cha 2010 sadathe adangopempha nambala ya lamya ya mmanja yomwe adalandira naye nkupereka yake kuyambira apo udali ubale ochezerana lamya 
  ataona bobobo amuzulitsira boonaona adalimba mtima nkupita kukaonekera kwawo kwa tumenye mwa mwambo wa kwawo adapereka malowolo yomweyo asowe khomo lolowera 
  nditapereka malobolo padapita chaka china mchaka cha 2012 pomwe tidamanga woyera ku kawale ccap madyerero ake adali kusukulu ya sekondale ya chipasula adtero sadock 
  adati akaona mkazi wakeyo amakhala waona makolo abale ake cha chikondi chisamaliro chomwe amalandira 
  naye tumenye sadafune kuotcha chofunda kuyamikira kuthokoza adapeza mwamuna wakukhosi kwake 
  ambiri alipo okwatira kukwatiwa ineyo pandekha ndimadzitenga wodala mwinanso amadzitenga odala mmaanja ndiye nawo adapeza wawo mmene ndidapezera wanga adatero tumenye 
  tikunena awiriwa mai aulemu wawo opemphera okondana mkazi mwamuna
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
chikalimba walonjeza kugwira ntchito tonse alliance phungu wa dera la zomba changalume john chikalimba wati agwira ntchito mgwirizano wa zipani za ndale wa tonse ponena omwe uli kuthekera kotukula dera lake 
 chikalimba mgwirizano wa tonse wa phindu chikalimba wauza radio maria malawi akufuna mdera lake mumangidwe chipatala nsewu zomwe wati boma la chipani cha dpp lakanika ulamuliro 
 wati chipatala cha namadidi chomwe chili mdera lake chili nyumba yobwereka yomwe amalipira 150 thousand kwacha mwezi zomwe sizoyenera zizichitika 
 zomvetsa chisoni padakali mudera lino tili chipatala chimodzi cha namadidi chomwe chili nyumba ya weni tikulipira ndalama zomwe zikutionongera ndalama choncho ndawona mgwirizano wa tonse uli phindu lake maka zokomera zomwe akulonjeza anatero chikalimba 
 mwazina watinso dera lake mukufunika kumangidwa misewu ya tala sukulu ya secondary yogonera komweko ophunzira omwe asankhidwira ku sukulu za sekondale asamayende mtunda wautali kupita ku sukulu
Label: POLITICS

Text:
akufuna fisi alangidwe koopsa magulu omwe amalimbikitsa maufulu amayi ati mpofunika woimira boma milandu director of public prosecutions dpp mary kachale atengere nkhani ya eric aniva kubwalo lalikulu 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka aniva yemwe adanjatidwa zaka ziwiri kukagwira ntchito ya kalavulagaga kundende atapezeka wolakwa pamlandu wotenga mbali miyambo yoopsa pokhala fisi wochotsa fumbi kulowa kufa mboma la nsanje 
  adampatsa zaka ziwiri aniva nkhani ya aniva idagwedeza atabwera poyera nkuulula wakhala akugwira ntchito ya ufisi kwa yaitali adagonana amayi atsikana oposa 100 
  magulu amayi motsogozedwa mabungwe malawi human rights resource centre mhrrc ngo gender co ordination network ngo gcn african womens development and communications network femnet ati chigamulo chomwe aniva adalandira lachiwiri lapitali nchochepa 
  maguluwa ati potengera mlandu wa aniva ufulu wa amayi sudalemekezedwe kotero amayenera kulandira chilango chokhwima osati zaka ziwiri basi 
  ndife okhudzidwa munthu yemwe kachilombo ka hiv komwe kamayambitsa matenda edzi amapitiriza kugona amayi ana achichepere mpaka zaka 12 angalandire chilango chochepa chonchi 
  uthenga wanji omwe tikupereka kwa abambo akhalidwe longa lomweli zaka ziwiri basi mlandu wonsewu uku nkunyoza amayi bwalo la milandu likuyenera kuunikapo nkusintha chigamulochi adatero wa bungwe la mhrrc emma kaliya 
  mabungwewa adati nkhani yoyamba ya mtunduwu yoweruzidwa pogwiritsa ntchito lamulo latsopano la za ufulu wa aniva amayenera kulandira chilango choletsa khalidweli 
  naye wa zophunzitsa kubungwe la femnet hellen apila adati apa la malawi waphonya mwayi waukulu wopera chenjezo kwa omwe salemekeza ufulu wa amayi potsatila miyambo 
  bwalo la magistrate ku blantyre lidagamula aniva lachiwiri lapitali akagwire ntchito yakalavulagaga kundende atavomera mwambo wa fisi akudziwa kachilombo ka hiv
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
anjata wopezeka mitengo ya tsanya apolisi ku lilongwe lachitatu adanjata nzika ya ku china chomuganizira adapezeka mitengo ya tsanya yomwe nzikayo imafuna kutumiza kwawo ikasake misika 
  nzikayi adaigwira pabwalo la ndege la kamuzu international airport dzuwa lili paliwombo pamalo ochitira chipikisheni pabwalo la ndegelo akuti katunduyo amafuna kumukwenza ndege yopita kwawo kudzera ku ethiopia 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc apolisi pabwalo la ndegelo adati mkuluyo lin jie adavomera mlanduwo adati mitengo yomwe amafuna kutumiza kwawoko idali yokafufuzira msika chabe msikawo ukapezeka ayambe bizinesi yotumiza mitengoyi kwawo 
  yemwe amatanthauzira pakati apolisi mkuluyo shi qi bine adanena mosapsatira amafuna kuyamba bizinesi yogulitsa mitengoyi kunja yomwe amatumizayo idali yokangoonetsa chabe adatero sapulani chitonde mneneri wa polisi pabwalo 
  adati lin jie adauza apolisiwo la malawi likufunika amasomphenya ofuna kupeza njira zina zopezera ndalama osati kudalira njira zamgonagona 
  mkuluyu adabwera mdziko muno mwezi wa may chaka chino amakhala mumzinda wa lilongwe 
  malingana malamulo lino mlandu kupezeka zamnkhalango popanda chilolezo chilichonse apolisi ati adzathana wopezeka katundu wamnkhalango mwachinyengo wofuna kutulutsa katundu woletsedwa kudzera pabwalo la ndegeli 
  kumapeto mwezi watha apolisi adagwira nzika inanso ya ku china aipeza ikufuna kuzembetsa minyanga ya njovu yoduladula mapisi nkuibisa mchikwama cholinga choti apite nayo kwawo
Label: WITCHCRAFT

Text:
cama ikuti zionetsero 17 pamene nkhani yochita zionetsero pokwiya utsogoleri wa pulezidenti joyce banda mmene akuyendetsera lino mwa amalawi otumikiridwa ati sakuona kuyenda pamsewu kungakhale yankho la mavuto kotero ati sachita nawo ziwonetserozo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc apempha omwe akukonza ziwonetserowa alole kukambirana boma asadabwere ganizo lochita zionetserozo 
  mneneri wa gulu lomwe likukonza zionetserozo kingsley mabalani wati boma linene akambirane pamfundo zisanu ziwiri 7 zomwe akuchitira zionetsero sazengereza 
  mabalani wati gulu lawo lalembera kale boma pamfundozo pofika lachitatu lapitali nkuti boma lisadayankhe 
  zomwe gululi likuchitira zionetsero kugwa kwa mphamvu ya kwacha kuyendayenda kwa banda kuchuluka kwa nduna mmaunduna unduna wa zamaphunziro womwe ati uli nduna zinayi kufotokoza za katundu kulankhula kwa pulezidenti komwe akuti kukugawanitsa boma lichepetse katangale 
  zinthu zikungokwera mtengo cha kugwa kwa ndalama ya kwacha ndiye boma lichitepo kanthu 
  talilembera kalata boma pamfundozi ndiye kaya ayankhe olo asayankhe zionetsero tichita amalawi amvetse zomwe tikufotokozazi adatero mabalani 
  anthuwa ati akukayika kumeneko sadzaphedwa ponena ziwonetsero zomwe zidachitika 20 julaye 2010 20 adaphedwa 
  malinga mabalani apolisiwo awatsimikizira zodzapereka chitetezo chokwanira patsikulo 
  alfred banda wa mmudzi mwa ngongonda kwa t njewa ku lilongwe wati ufulu wolankhula amabungwe asatenge zishango 
  si kale tidali zionetsero pomwe 20 adaphedwa ndiye panonso akuti tichite zionetsero adziwe sitidaiwale tiyeni tipemphe boma pakhale kukambirana osati zionetsero adatero banda 
  limbani kaombe wa mmudzi mwa kachepa kwa t likoswe mboma la chiradzulu wati omwe akukonza zionetserowo adziwe njovu zikamamenyana umavutika udzu ndiye zionetsero zisachitike 
  inde zinthu sizili katundu wakwera mtengo kutiuza tikayende pamsewu ndiye si zoona 
  afuna aphetse osalakwa akufuna ayende okha asavutike kuwamema achite zionetsero adatero kaombe 
  shemaiah chavula wa ku mzuzu wati pakhale kaye zokambirana zavuta ndiye atha zionetsero 
  charles kabaghe wa mmudzi mwa mkombanyama kwa t mwaulambia mboma la chitipa wati ayende pamsewu asaope kuphedwa 
  inde zionetsero zijazi za 20 july 2010 adaphedwa kumpoto kuno ndiko kudaphedwa ambiri apa tisawope 
  kuphedwako tazolowera tiyende pamsewu basi zinthu sizili adatero kabaghe 
  banda posakhalitsapa pomwe amalankhula amalawi kudzera pawailesi ya zodiak broadcasting station zbs adati sakuletsa munthu achite ziontserozo pali yochita zionetsero saali pampanipani 
  banda adatinso akukonzekera zochita ziwonetsero sagwetsanso mphamvu ya kwacha ponena amalawi akuyenera kupirira kwa kanthawi zonse zikhale mchimake 
  adati sakuletsa munthu ziwonetsero malamulo adziko lino amalola ziwonetsero
Label: POLITICS

Text:
msusa alimbikitsa akhristu kulemekeza masacrament wolemba richard makombe w wp content uploads/2019/09 msusa.jpg alt= width="310 height="263 />msusa mabanja sakuchedwa kutha akibishop thomas luke msusa wa akidayosizi ya blantyre wapempha akhristu akhale okonda kusunga ma sacrament 
 akibishop msusa amayankhula lamulungu mwambo wa chibalalaitso cha mpingo omwe unachitikira ku st pius parish akidayosizi ya blanytre 
 bishop msusa wati nkofunika akhristu akhale olemekeza kusunga ma sacrament makamaka sacrament la ukwati 
 ndizodandaulitsa kuona tikadalitsa ukwati pakangotha chaka chimodzi uona ukwati uja watha choncho sibwino anatero bishop msusa 
 bishop msusa anatengerapo anathokoza parish ya st pius kamba kokhala parish ya chitsanzo povomera kuchititsa mwambo wa chaka achino wa chaka cha chibalalitso 
 ndithokoze akhristu ansembe onse popemphelera mwambowu ukhale opambana anatero akibishop msusa 
 chaka chaka mpingo wa katolika umachititsa mwambo wa chibalalitso cha mpingo omwe cholinga chake ndikufunakupeza thandizo la ndalama zothandizira kukulitsa mpingowu lonse
Label: RELIGION

Text:
munthu woyamba wafa covid 19 ku botswana la botswana lalengeza za munthu woyamba kufa kaamba ka nthenda ya covid-19 mdzikolo 
 malipoti wailesi ya bbc ati imfayi yadza patangodutsa maola ochepa dzikolo litalengeza za kupezeka kwa atatu oyambilira kupezeka kachilombo ka coronavirus mdzikolo 
 wayimitsa zochitika zonse za mdziko la botswana president masisi wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dzikolo slumber tsogwane wati womwalirayu wina wachikulire wa zaka 79 yemwe mdziko la south africa atabwerako anayamba kumva kuzizira anamuika malo omupatula chipatala china komwe wafa patadutsa masiku anayi 
 tsogwane wati mayiyu anayikidwa mmanda munthu wokaikiridwa nthenda yachilendo kaamba zotsatira zake zinali zisanatuluke zotsatirazi zatuluka atayikidwa kale mmanda pomwe zadziwika wafa kaamba ka nthendayi 
 padakalipano mtsogoleri wa dzikolo mokgweetsi masisi walengeza mdzikomo wagwa ngozi walamula zochitika zonse za mdzikolo ziyambe zayima kwa masiku 28 
 zikutanthauza kuyambira lachinayi palibe amene akuyenera kuyenda kugwira ntchito amene adziloredwa kuchoka mnyumba zawo okhawo omwe akugwira ntchito zofunikira kwambiri mdzikolo
Label: HEALTH

Text:
msika wa zondeni ngosayamba katswiri wa zamadyedwe mdziko muno chrispine jedegwa akupanga kugulitsa ufa wa mbatata ya kholowa yamakolo yotchedwa zondeni yomwe akuti ili ufa wapamwamba wopatsa thanzi 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ambiri adazolowera ufa umapangidwa kuchimanga chinangwa basi katswiriyu wati phindu lochokera mmbatata limachuluka mbatatayo ikagayidwa nkugulitsa ufa 
  alimi ambiri sakonda kulima mbatata ya zondeni sibereka kwambiri chomwe sadziwa nchakuti mbatatayi ili mphamvu ya mankhwala muli ndalama zochuluka adatero jedegwa 
  jedegwa ufa wa zondeni tikaukonza umakhala uwu adati mbatatayi ikacha mukaimuka bwinobwino mukaigaya mukhoza kupanga ufa wophikira phala chakudya china chilichonse munthu akadya phalalo thupi lake limakulupala 
  mkuluyu adati alimi alime mbatata ya mtunduwu kwambiri powatsimikizira msika ulipo wosayamba 
  pakalipano mbatatayi ikulimidwa kwambiri alimi ku thyolo phalombe kasungu mchnji sakukwanitsa pomwe timafuna moti alimi omwe akufuna kupha makwacha alime mbatata yamtunduwu tikulonjeza tidzawagula adatero jedegwa 
  adatinso alimi atafuna mbewu ya mbatatayi yobereka kwambiri akhoza kukumana akuluakulu kampani ya c nf omwe akupanga ufawu mbewuyi alinayo yambiri 
  alimi ambiri amadandaula amalephera kulima mbewu zina polingalira nkhani ya msika jedegwa watsimikiza kampani yawo njokonzeka kugula mbatata yonse ya zondeni yomwe alimi angalime 
  jedegwa adati kupatula chakudya ufa wa mbatata ya zondeni mankhwala othandiza kumatenda osiyanasiyana mtima kuthamanga kwa magazi shuga zilonda zammimba kuphwanya kwa minofu
Label: FARMING

Text:
mutharika achenjeza akamberembere mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika wasonyeza amatsatira ukamberembere omwe umachitika mkatikati mwa malonda fodya wachenjeza ogulitsa ogula sakufuna nyansizi chaka chino 
  mutharika adapereka chenjezoli potsegulira msika wa fodya wa chaka chino ku ku kanengo mumzinda wa lilongwe lachitatu lapitali 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka sadasiye mbali podzudzula kuchenjeza onse okhudzidwa mmalondawa ponena ogula chisimo chosintha mawanga mkatikati mwa malonda pomwe ogulitsa adawadzudzula amachulutsa ukamberembere poika zitsotso mmabelo 
  makampani ogula fodya ndikuchenjezeni tsiku loyamba mumagula fodya pamitengo yomwe idakhazikitsidwa kenako nkusintha mawanga mkatikati mwa msika zimenezi sitikuzifuna chaka chino adatero mutharika 
  adati wotere umayambitsa mikangano pakati ogula fodya alimi mpaka msika kumasokonezeka cha kusamvana 
  mutharika adatembenukiranso kwa alimi nkuwadzudzula achepetse ukamberembere woika zitsotso mmabelo cholinga chopusitsa makampani ogula fodya mabelo azilemera pomwe muli fodya wochepa woipa 
  inuso alimi ndikuchenjezeni pakhalidwe loika zinthu zosayenera mmabelo fodya khalidwe limene lija ndilo limapangitsa makampani azibweza fodya wambiri pamapeto pake mumakhala ngatimudagwira ntchito yopanda malipiro adatero mutharika 
  adati chiyembekezo malonda fodya ayenda chaka chino poyerekeza zaka za mmbuyo pomwe kumakhala kusamvana kwakukulu pakati alimi andi makampani ogula fodya makamaka pankhani ya mitengo maonekedwe fodya 
  fodya wa chaka chino ayamba kumugula pamtengo wa $ 0.80 pafupifupi k552 kilogalamu pomwe kusiyana chaka chatha pomwe adayamba $ 2.32 pafupifupi k1 044 kilogalamu potengera mphamvu ya kwacha panthawiyo 
  zili chonchi bungwe la tobacco control commission tcc lati lokhudzidwa kuchuluka kwa fodya yemwe akubwezedwa potengera tsiku lotsegulira msikali pomwe mabelo 30 mabelo 100 alionse amabwezedwa 
  wa bungwe la alimi la farmers union of malawi fum alfred kapichira banda adati nzodabwitsa kwacha yayamba kukwera mphamvu pomwe alimi akugulitsa fodya pomwe adagula zipangizo mokwera kwacha itagwa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
adzikonzera mpumulo wa bata ukayenda umaona agalu michombo ndithu ku rumphi aliko oyenda masanasana pamene wina wa zaka 62 wakumbiratu manda owaka kuyembekezera tsiku lomwe namalenga adzati kwatha 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu sasintha mnozga yemwe mbusa wa mpingo wa african church adakonza mandawa ndalama zoposa k200 000 mmudzi mwa mnozga mfumu chikulamayembe mbomalo 
  mafumu mderali wodabwa mchitidwewu zomwe akuti zotsutsana chikhalidwe cha atumbuka pakuti munthu saloledwa kukumbiratu manda ake 
  mandawo amenewa pali tsiku lakubadwa palibe lakufa mnozga pocheza msangulutso lachitatu adati sakuonapo vuto lililonse mwakuti akusakasaka makobidi aguliretu bokosi lomwe adzamuyikemo akamwalira 
  ndikufuna kukonzeratu zonse abale anga asadzavutike kusakasaka makobidi okonzera manda anga ndikadzamwalira abale anga ambiri ovutika moti sangadzakwanitse kugula bokosi adatero mnozga yemwe ana 10 
  adati china chomwe chidamuchititsa akumbiretu manda momwe salemekezera maliro kumanda 
  amangoponya dothi pamwamba pabokosi litakhala la makobidi ochuluka sizimandisangalatsa konse 
  mandawa ndawakonza miyala matumba 11 simenti zikutanthauza bokosi langa silidzakhunzana dothi mmene zimakhalira mmanda adatero mnozga 
  mnozga amachitanso bizinesi boma la rumphi chigayo malo ogonapo alendo adali mfumu kumudzi kwawo adasiyira mwana wawo atayamba ubusa mchaka cha 2001 
  pamene adayamba kukumba mandawa mchaka cha 2013 abale adawakaniza adakakamirabe poyamba ankakana nditawalongosolera chomwe ndimachitira adavomera mosasangalala momwemo 
  kwa mafumu silidali vuto adali anzanga paja nane ndidali mfumu adatero mnozga 
  mfumu chikulamayembe yomwe idati idawaonapo mandawa idakana kulankhulapo pankhaniyo 
  mfumu kayiwale chirambo ya mderali idati zomwe adachita mnozga sizololedwa chikhalidwe chawo 
  pachikhalidwe chathu sitivomera munthu kukumbiratu manda ake vuto lakuti masiku ano ufulu ochita zomwe akufuna pachifukwa ichi mpovuta timuletse adatero chirambo 
  adati sakudziwa chomwe chidachititsa mnozga kubwera ganizo lotereli 
  sitikudziwa kaya misala kaya ukhristu chuma tonse ndife odabwa palibe chomwe tingachitepo chakuti ufulu kutero 
  kukanakhala kwakale tikadawaitanasa nkuwaletsa zimenezi atati akana tikadatha kuwalanga adatero chirambo 
  mnozga siwoyamba kudzikumbira manda mbomali mzokoto padalinso ss ngoma yemwenso adazikumbira manda atamwalira abale adakhaniza zokawayika kwina komwe adamanga mandawo 
  asanamwalire mtsogoleri wakale wa lino bingu wa mutharika adakonzeratu nyumba yomaliza yomwe adagonamo mkazi ethel mandawo amatchedwa mpumulo wa bata
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
ayi dausi wakana chaponda zomwe zachitika ku bwalo la mirandu ku lilongwe msabatayi zalephera kupherezera mwambi woti khoswe akakhala mkhate sapheka 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka khwimbi la lidapita kubwaloli lachiwiri kukamvera mlandu wa nduna yakale ya zamalimidwe mthirira chitukuko cha madzi george chaponda adachokako akupukusa mitu 
  dausi anangotenthedwa zomwe samayembekezera zidachitika nduna yazofalitsa nkhani nicholas dausi itanena mmaso muli gwaa siikudziwapo kanthu ndalama zomwe zidapezeka mnyumba mwa chaponda mlandu omwe akuyankha pakali 
  chaponda akuyankha mlandu wopezeka ndalama zankhaninkhani za mmalawi zakunja mnyumba popanda chilolezo cha reserve bank of malawi momwe zimayenera kukhalira 
  podziteteza ku mlanduwu chaponda adauza bwalo la milandu k95 miliyoni ndalamazo zidali za chipani cholamula cha democratic progressive dpp dausi ndiye amayenera kukatenga ndalamazo nkukapereka kuchipani 
  poperekera umboni dausi adauza bwalolo zoti ndalamazo zidali za dpp nzabodza dzina lake lidangotchulidwamo nkhaniyi sakudziwapo kanthu 
  zoti ndikudziwapo kanthu nzabodza mwina chaponda adangosokonekera ponditchula munthu akakhala pampanipani oterewu kaya phungu nduna mphamvu zimatheratu adatero dausi 
  chaponda adali mwa nduna zikuluzikulu za boma zake zidatembenuka chaka cha 2017 nduna ya zamalimidwe mthirira chitukuko cha madzi pomwe adayamba kufufuzidwa poganiziridwa amakhudzidwa kusokonekera kwa kagulidwe ka chimanga ku zambia 
  chaponda adamangidwa limodzi wa kampani ya transglobe produce export limited rashid tayub grace mijiga mhango wa bizinesi yemwenso wa pampando wa bungwe la makampani ogula kugulitsa mbewu 
  mmwezi wa february nthambi yolimbana katangale idakachita chipikisheni ku nyumba ku ofesi ya chaponda ku mawofesi admarc komwe kudapezekanso zododometsa zina 
  kuofesi ya admarc nthambiyi idalanda makina kompyuta pomwe kwa chaponda idapezako ndalama zankhaninkhani za lino maiko za ku amereka zomwe zidapangitsa nkhaniyi yomwe poyamba imakhala ingawakomere chaponda itembenuke
Label: POLITICS

Text:
bungwe la save the children lati lidzipereka poteteza ana ku coronavirus bungwe la save the children lati lidzipereka pothandiza boma ntchito yoteteza ana ku mliri wa coronavirus 
 wa bungweli mchigawo chakummwera thoko bemu omwe anena pamene bungweli limapereka zipangizo zosiyanasiyana zomwe zizithandizira ogwira ntchito chipatala cha ntcheu polimbana mliri wa covid-19 
 ati ana omwe amakhudzidwa kwambiri panthawi yomwe kwadza ngozi zadzidzidzi 
 pakachitika ngozi zadzidzidzi ana omwe amachitidwa nkhaza kusowa chakudya chithandizo nde tikugwira ntchito imeneyi ya child protection mothandizana boma anatero bemu 
 mwazina bungweli likuyembekezera kuthandiza maboma asanu imodzi kummwera kwa lino
Label: HEALTH

Text:
ghana igulira apolisi mifuti wolemba thokozani chapola /08 ghana police.jpg alt= width="550 height="366 />alandira mifuti ma bullet proof ghana police boma la la ghana lati lipereka mifuti kwa apolisi onse ogwira ntchito za pansewu traffic ziwembu zomwe apolisiwo akuchitidwa 
 malipoti wailesi ya bbc ati apolisi asanu anaphedwa mwezi watha awiri aphedwa lachitatu lapitali pamene zifwamba zina zinawombera apolisiwa pamene zimakana kuyimitsa galimoto yawo zitayimitsidwa achitetezowa 
 padakalipano boma la dzikolo lati laganiza zogulira apolisi malaya omwe amateteza ku chipolopolo cha mfuti bullet proof kupereka mifuti zida zina kwa apolisiwa 
 nduna yoona za mdziko ambrose dery yati zida zatsopanozi zithandiza apolisi kulimbana zauchifwamba zomwe zikuchitika mdzikolo kudziteteza okha
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
okwiya aimitsa njanje madzi achita katondo ku nkaya mboma la balaka komwe okwiya aletsa kampani ya mota engil yomwe ikumanga njanje kumeneko isiye kuthira dothi mminda mwawo galimoto zawo zisadutsenso mmindamo 
  anthuwa ati sasintha ganizo lawo pokhapokha akuluakulu kampani ya sitima zapamtunda mdziko muno omwe akumangitsa njanjeyi ya central east african railways cear awapepese 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kuyambira lolemba mpaka lachitatu msabatayi ogwira ntchito pakampu ya nkaya adangogwira mchiuno kudikira akuluakulu akambirane kugwirizana anthuwo asanayambe kupitiriza kugwira ntchitoyo 
  gulupu nkaya adatsimikizira tamvani lachiwiri ake akwiya zomwe anjanje akuchita pomatayira dothi mminda yawo popanda kukambirana kulikonse 
  panopa anthuwo akufuna amvetsetse kwa omanga njanjewa pazomwe zikuchitikazo adabwera kwanga kudzandifotokozera nanenso ndalephera kumvana nawo ndawauza anjanjewo aime kaye ntchito yawo mpaka titakambirana adatero nkaya 
  lachiwiri masana akuluakulu cear adakhamukira kumaloko akakambirane mfumuyo nkaya adatsimikizira anthuwo ntchito iyambiranso sizidachitike 
  malinga mneneri wa cear chisomo mwamadi mgwirizanowo udali woti pofika 2 koloko masana lachiwiri ntchitoyo ikhala itayambiranso 
  polowa kwa dzuwa lachiwiri ntchitoyo nkuti isadayambe malinga nkaya 
  ndayesera kukamba anga onse amidzi ya nsoma mbiya nkaya awalole agwire ntchito yawo ndalephera 
  akukana akuti pokhapokha cear awapepese kena kake osati pakamwa pokha mpamene awalole apitirize kugwira ntchito poyamba tidakambirana akuluakulu cear tidagwirizana tiwalole apitirize kugwira ntchito titagwirizana tsiku lina abwera ku cear adzakambirane anthuwo 
  mpaka lero palibe chogwirika tachiona nchifukwa chake anthuwa akukana ntchito isagwiridwenso pokhapokha amene adawatchulawo atabwera idatero mfumuyi 
  wa cear hendry chimwaza adati nayenso wodabwa mfumuyi ikulephera kulamula ake amvere zomwe adagwirizanazo 
  njanje si yathu njanje ya mfumuyi mboni kubwera kwa chitukuko cha njanje kwabweretsa ntchito zambiri zotukula ake kulembedwa ntchito malonda kungotchulapo zochepa za malo otaya dothi modutsa makina athu tidakambirana tikudabwa lero kumva nkhaniyi 
  mfumu kulephera kukambirana ake komabe tisathe tikambirana nawo ntchito ipitirira tikulankhula nkhaniyi taikamba kale kwatsala nkuona ntchitoyi ikugwiridwa adatero chimwaza lachitatu 
  atafunsidwa nkhaniyi akuidziwa akuluakulu boma chimwaza adati idakali kaye mmanja mwawo pena patavuta adziwitsa akuluakuluwa 
  kupatula kuthira dothi mminda china chomwe anthuwa akudandaula galimoto zikuluzikulu makina zomwe zimadutsa mmindamo 
  mwa anthuwo amene adakana kutchulidwa dzina adati mgwirizano wawo anjanje udali woti alandira ndalama galimotozo zizidutsa mminda mwawo azitayira dothi mdera lawo 
  poyamba amati angothira dothi mmalo amene minda yakokoloka dothilo athira akupitirizabe kuthira moti sitingalimenso nchifukwa chake tawaletsa adatero 
  ntchito yomanga nkaya siteshoni idayamba chaka chatha november gawo loyamba latha june chaka chino 
  chimwaza adati gawo loyamba lidali njanje zina ziwiri kuphatikizapo yakale yomwe idalipoyo kukwanitsa 
  kwa njanjezi kuthandiza sitima zizitha kupatukirana nkaya popanda vuto lililonse azitha kuchulutsa kuchepetsa mabogi zomwe sizimachitika poyamba
Label: TRANSPORT

Text:
olembetsa akuchepa boma la nsanje likupitilirabe kutsogola maboma omwe nantindi wa alembetsa ntchito ya kalembera wa mkaundula wachisankho cha chaka cha mawa 
  poyerekeza chisankho cha 2014 maboma onse kupatula nsanje chikwawa nkhotakota alembetsa ochepa kwambiri chaka chino 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka ntchito ya kalembera tsopano yalowera kumpoto malinga kalata yomwe lidatulutsa bungwe loyendetsa zisankho mdziko muno la malawi electoral commission(mec lachinayi lidati pakutha gawo 7 omwe alembetsa 6.26 milliyoni 
  chiwerengerochi chotsika 81peresenti poyerekeza 7.74 miliyoni omwe bungwe la mec limayembekezera alembetsa pakutha gawo 7 yatero kalatayo yomwe idasainidwa komishona wa mec jean mathanga 
  chiwerengerochinso chotsika 91 peresenti poyerekeza omwe adalembetsa panthawi yomweyi mchaka cha 2014 nthawiyi 6.85 miliyoni ndiwo adalembetsa 
  komatu ntchitoyu ili kumapeto pomwe gawo lomaliza layamba lero mmaboma mzimba likoma nkhata bay mzinda wa mzuzu zikuoneka amalawi ambiri sakutenga nawo gawo mkalemberayu poyerekeza zisankho za mchaka cha 2014 2009 
  izitu zikuonetseratu chiwerengerochi chikhonza kudzatsikanso yamavoti tikaunika mbiri ya kavotedwe mdziko muno 
  malinga mneneri wa bungwe la malawi electoral support network mesn michael kachaso vuto lalikulu lagona poti mabungwe ambiri sadatenge nawo gawo pokaphunzitsa zakufunika kwa kulembetsa 
  adati bungwe la mec lidavomereza mabungwe ambiri kukaphunzitsa zokalembetsa ambiri mwa mabungwewa sadagwire ntchitoyi chosowa ndalama 
  kachaso adaonjezeranso amalawi ambiri sadalembetsenso adanyanyala 
  olembetsa ndiochepa zifukwa zambiri kunyanyala atsogoleri sadakwaniritse zomwe adalonjeza adalongosola kachaso 
  adaonjezeranso sakuona phindu lolembetsa kale chiphaso cha u nzika 
  apa adati mmbuyomu amalembetsa apeze ziphatsozi sakuonanso phindu la kalemberayu 
  kachaso adatinso bungwe la mec lingaganize zobwerezanso kalemberayu mabungwe adzatengepo gawo lalikulu pophunzitsa makamaka omwe alembetsawo adzavote 
  polankhulapo wa bungwe la national initiative for civic education nice ollen mwalubunju adati bungwe lake layesetsa kumemeza akalembetse mkaundulayu 
  mwalubunju adati vuto lagona poti ambiri adanyanyala atsogoleri omwe adasankha mmbuyomu sadakwaniritse zomwe adalonjeza 
  tikuyesetsa kumbali yathu kuwamema akalembetse akufuna zinthu akangokhumudwa nkukhazikika njira imodzi yoti omwe sakuwafuna akhalebe mmipando adalongosola mwalubunju 
  adaonjezeranso malinga malipoti omwe bungwe lake likulandira kwa omwe akugwira nawo ntchito mmidzi amalawi ambiri akhumudwanso kaamba ka kukula kwa katangale mbali zonse za lino 
  talephera ndondomeko zotsimikizika zothana vutoli okhumudwa kwambiri mwa zina pachifukwa ichi adindo atsogoleri zipani aunikenso malonjezano mwalubunju adatero 
  adatinso bungwe la mec lipange kafukufuku wofufuza zomwe zachititsa ambiri asatuluke 
  mchaka cha 2014 7.5 miliyoni adalembetsa mkaundula okavota adali 5.2 miliyoni zikutanthauza pafupifupi 30 peresenti ya olembetsa sidakavote nawo 
  pamasankho 2009 pafupifupi 5.8 miliyoni ndiwo adalembetsa pomwe 4.6 miliyoni amene adavota apa pafupifupi 22 peresenti sadakavote nawo pamasankhowa 
  kalemberayu adayamba mwezi wa june akuyembekezereka kutha november 9 mmaboma mzimba nkhata bay likoma mzinda wa mzuzu ntchitoyi yayamba lero
Label: POLITICS

Text:
2019 polisi idaziona mchaka changothachi cha 2019 nthambi ya chitetezo ya polisi idalibe mpata opumira cha mpungwepungwe womwe udalipo ndikusukuluka kwa chikhulupiliro pakati apolisi 
  wogwirizira mpando wa wapolisi duncan mwapasa wavomereza muuthenga wotsanzikana chaka cha 2019 chomwe amalawi sadzayiwala mmbiri ya lino 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mwapasa kudali mkokemkoke mwapasa wati nthambiyo yayesetsa mbali zina kuchepetsa ngozi za pamsewu omwalira pangozizo nkhani yokhazikitsa bata mtendere udali mtunda ovuta kukwera 
  zonse zidayamba january nkumati zili atsogoleri awiri atangotsutsa zotsatira za chisankho cha may 2019 kudali mkokemkoke ophwanya malamulo nkutengera zonse mmanja mwa adatero mwapasa muuthenga womwe adaupereka 31 december 2019 
  wati apolisi ambiri adavulazidwa mpaka adaphedwa chakudzipeleka pantchito yawo malingaliro oyipa aanthu omawona apolisi zirombo zaboma zogwiritsa ntchito pofuna kuthana 
  katswiri pandale ernest thindwa wati apolisi adadzipalira okha moto cha momwe ankagwirira ntchito yawo mdzina loteteza chuma chawo 
  adati kulephera kwa apolisi kudaonekera pomwe adakanika kukhazikitsa bata pakati ochita zionetsero opanda zida zoopsa wokondera pogwira ntchito 
  zimachita kuonekeratu mbali yolamula akangokolana anzawo enawo ndiwo amalangidwa chonchi nkumati chiyani nchifukwa chake ubale udasokonekera ndiye akupadziwa pomwe padalakwika tingopemphera akonzepo mchaka chatsopanochi adatero thindwa 
  mwa akuluakulu zamaufulu timothy mtambo watsutsa amalawi adali mtopola mchaka cha 2019 wati amalawiwo amafuna kuteteza ufulu wawo womwe boma pogwiritsa ntchito apolisi amafuna kupondereza 
  zimenezo ndidakana ndidzakanabe amalawi alibe vuto boma pogwiritsa ntchito apolisi ndiwo adakolezera moto lidzadze utsi chonchija adatero mtambo 
  mwa zowawa zina mwapasa adati apolisi ambiri adamenyedwa nyumba zawo kutenthedwa mawofesi ambiri polisi adatenthedwa apolisi adasamuka mmalo momwe zinthu zidafika poyipitsitsa 
  mwapasa walonjeza panyengo yomwe amalawi akhale akudikirira chigamulo cha mlandu wa zisankho yolengeza chigamulo mmasiku otsatira apolisi apereka chitetezo chokwanira 
  nzachidziwikire mitima ili mmwamba chilichonse chikhoza kuchitika apolisi ndife okonzeka kuteteza katundu tikupempha atsogoleri ambali zonse zokhudzidwa pamlanduwo mlandu uliwonse opambana amakhala basi adatero mwapasa 
  muuthenga wotsanzikana 2019 mwapasa adati polisi idachita mbali zina kuchepetsa ngozi zapamsewu kuchoka 996 2018 kufika 975 2019 
  pangozizo wati chiwerengero cha omwalira chidatsikanso kuchoka 1163 2018 kufika 1141 2019 adati zambiri mwangozizo zidachitika chakusasamala kwa oyendetsa galimoto ogwiritsa ntchito msewu
Label: POLITICS

Text:
asemphana maganizo   ulimi wa chamba alimi ambiri mdziko muno ati okonzeka kuyamba kulima chamba chosazunguza ubongo mmalo mwa fodya bola boma liwaunikire zomwe ayenera akukaikirabe ulimiwu ungawatulutse muchithaphwi cha umphawi momwe akusambira 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu zikudza pamene nyumba ya malamulo yavomereza bilu yopereka mphamvu kuboma livomereze ulimi wa chamba chachilendochi njira imodzi yopititsira patsogolo chuma cha lino kulowa mmalo mwa fodya 
  phungu woima payekha wa dera la kumpoto mboma la ntchisi boniface kadzamira masiku apitawo adapempha nyumba ya malamulo ipereke mphamvu kuboma livomereze ulimi kugwiritsa ntchito wina wa chamba wotchedwa industrial hemp 
  kadzamira adatsindika wa chamba chomwe akufuna amalawi azilima wosiyana kwambiri wina wa chamba chozunguza ubongo chomwenso amapenga nacho akachisuta 
  chamba akunenacho si ichi chomwe chimazunguza ubongo adati chamba chomwe akunena chakhala chikulimidwa kugwiritsidwa mmaiko ambirimbiri kuyambira chaka cha 1770 maiko omwe akulima mbewuyi adatukuka kwambiri kudzera mphindu lomwe amapeza ku malonda mbewuyi 
  ndine munthu wosangalala wokhutira kwambiri momwe aphungu ku nyumba ya malamulo adaikambirana nkhaniyi chamba chili phindu lalikulu kwabasi 
  la malawi nalonso liyenera kuyamba kulima kugwiritsa ntchito mbewuyi tiyambe kupeza nawo phindu lomwe anzathu akupeza maiko enawo adatero kadzamira 
  pocheza msangulutso lachiwiri gunde njobvu wa mmudzi mwa moloka mdera la mfumu kayembe ku dowa adati wokonzeka mwa alimi oyambirira kulima mbewuyi 
  njobvu adati wakhala akulima fodya wa bale zaka zambiri palibe chomwe wapindula 
  choncho sindikuona vuto kuyesako ulimi wa chamba mwinanso chamba nkukhala mdalitso wanga sindikudziwa ndingachite ndikhale nawo mgulu la alimi oyambirira adatero mkuluyu 
  kambiza mwale mlimi wa zaka 60 wochokera mdera la mfumu kasalika mboma lomweli adati nkhaniyi adailandira mantha kaamba koti omwe akukolezera ulimiwu nkhaniyi sadatulukire nayo poyera kuuza alimi za kusiyana kwa mbewuyi chamba chosuta 
  adati nkhawa poopa kudzagwa nazo mmavuto kaamba kosatsatira malamulo 
  mwale adati satengapo kaye gawo paulimi umenewu kufikira boma litawaunikira kusiyana kwake kwa mbewu ya chamba choletsedwa mbewu ya chamba chomwe chimagwiritsidwa ntchito popanga zinthu 
  towera jere wa mmudzi wa mzukuzuku jere mboma la mzimba naye adati sadapangebe chiganizo nkofunika atengepo gawo ulimi wa chamba 
  jere adati mantha ake poti zikamayamba boma mabungwe amagwiritsa njira onyengelera pofuna kukopa pamene pansi mtima akufuna kuwagwiritsa ntchito osauka podzilemeretsa 
  alimi mdziko muno agwiritsidwa ntchito makasu anamadya kwa yaitali kwabasi pomwe ulimi wa fodya unkayamba timauzidwa masomphenya athu akwaniritsidwa tikalimbikira kulima angati omwe akusimba lokoma lero kaamba ka phindu lochokera muulimi wa fodya adafunsa mayiyu 
  mwa achinyamata omwe amakhala luchenza mboma la mulanje violet banda adati sakuona choletsa kulima chamba chosazunguza ubongo 
  k oma adapempha boma liunikire amalawi kagulitsidwe ka mbewuyi kadzasiyane momwe zilili fodya wa bale mitundu ina 
  ndikunena ichi kaamba koti ndikutha kuona alimi atapatsidwanso chiyembekezo chabodza miyoyo yawo idzasintha kudzera muulimi wa chamba ayenera kutiuza kodi adzagule chamba ndani akusiyana omwe akugula bale kuokushoni lero adatero mtsikanayu 
  wa bungwe la community initiative for people empowerment cipe trintas manda adati alibe chiyembekezo la malawi lidzatukuka kaamba kolima chamba 
  manda yemwe bungwe lake limagwira ntchito zake ku mzimba kasungu adatsindika pokhapokha boma la malawi litathetsa chiyengo chomwe chikuchitika pamsika wa fodya lino lidzapitirirabe kulirira kuutsi zokolola zili zake 
  woyendetsa ntchito za bungwe la national initiative for civic education nice mboma la nsanje kondwani malunga adati akugwirizana zoti pakhale ndondomeko yapadera yodziwitsira za kusiyana kwa chamba choletsedwa chomwe lino likufuna lichivomereze 
  ayenera kuphunzitsidwa mokwanira azitha kusiyanitsa pakati chamba choletsedwa chomwe boma likufuna kuchivomereza apo ayi tidzaona mavuto ambiri kuposa phindu lomwe lino likuyembekezera kupeza kudzera muulimi umenewu adatero malunga 
  aphungu angapo ati akugwirizana ganizo loyambitsa ulimi wa chamba mdziko muno 
  lucius banda yemwe phungu wa dera la kumpoto mboma la balaka wati munthu sangasiyanitse mowa wamasese thobwa padzakhala povuta asiyanitse wa chamba chosuta chogwiritsa ntchito kupanga zinthu 
  choncho pamene tivomereza biluyi nkofunikira tiikenso ndondomeko zapadera zomwe zingatsogolere mabwalo milandu pozenga mlandu omwe angafune kupezerapo mwayi lamuloli adatero banda 
  wa bungwe la drug fight malawi dfm nelson baziwelo zakeyo wati sakugwirizana zomwe achita aphungu nyumba ya malamulo povomereza biluyi ponena zidzabweretsa chisokonezo mdziko muno
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
ku mozambique akulembetsa   mavoti mwafulirwa mlandu waukulu nzika zina za mdziko la mozambique zikulembetsa nawo mkaundula wa mavoti ku dedza popofuna zidzavote nawo chisankho cha magawo atatu chomwe chilipo 20 may 2014 
  mneneri wa polisi ku dedza edward kabango wati panopa apolisi anjatapo kale nzika imodzi ya dzikokolo edward tenganibwino wa zaka 28 wochokera mmudzi mwa golongozo yemwe amafuna kulembetsa mkaundulayu mwachinyengo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kabango wati tenganibwino adanamiza akalaliki ochita kalemberayu mmalawi amachokera mmudzi mwa katsekaminga ku dedzako akalalikiwo adamuzindikira msanga kumuneneza kupolisi 
  bungwe logwira ntchito zophunzitsa la national initiative for civic education nice lati nzika zambiri za ku mozambique zalowa mdziko muno kufuna kudzalembetsa nawo zina zidabwezedwa akalaliki kalemberayu atazitulukira 
  woyendetsa za maphunziro kubungweli patrick siwinda wauza tamvani asanu agwidwapo kale akadali zungulizunguli mbomalo kuyesayesa alembetse mkaundulayu 
  wati ambiri mwa anthuwa akuti amafuna ziphaso zoponyera voti cholinga choti azidzatha kutenga ngongole zotukulira ulimi wa kachewere kumabanki mdziko muno 
  siwinda wati ambiri mwa achinyengowa akumagwiritsa ntchito ziphaso zolowera kutuluka mdziko za malawi ziphaso zoponyera voti za mndondomeko ya chisankho cha chaka cha 2009 umboni awalembe 
  2 november wina wa ku mozambique adabwera chiphaso cha ku malawi alembetse adabwezedwa adatero siwinda 
  adati nthumwi za bungweli zati mchitidwewu ukuoneka mmalo olembetserako 13 mdera la bembeke 
  siwinda wati madera omwe akukhudzidwa mchitidwewu katsekaminga cdss mazanjala sukulu zapulayimale za kapesi magaleta sukulu zasekondale za umbwi msambiro dedza muslim jamat sukulu ya asungwana achisilamu ya dedza dedza ccap dedza lea dedza community hall mudzi wa dauya 
  bungwe loyendetsa zisankho mdziko muno la malawi electoral commission mec lati wolembetsa kuthandizira munthu yemwe sali woyenera kulembetsa alembetse mlandu waukulu wolakwa akhoza kunjatidwa 
  wofalitsa nkhani mbungweli sangwani mwafulira wati pofuna kuchepetsa mchitidwewu zipani mabungwe azisankha oyanganira ndondomeko ya chisankho monitors mdera lomwe kukuchitikira ntchitoyi azitha kuzindikira ofuna zachinyengo 
  kusankha nthumwi za mdera lomwe kukugwiridwira ntchitoyi sizivuta kuzindikira akuyenera kuzindikira kuperekera umboni wabodza munthu mmalawi pomwe si mmalawi woyenera kulembetsa mkaundula mlandu waukulu woti munthu akhoza kulipira ndalama zokwana k500 000 kukakhala kundende zaka ziwiri watero mwafulirwa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
ma mp olowa pp akonzekere nkhondo mphunzitsi wa zandale kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college chanco ati chipani cholamula cha peoples pp chikuyenera kusamala malamulo potolera oti athandize chipanichi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kulankhulaku kwadza pomwe aphungu adauza nyuzipeplala ya the nation lachisanu sabata yatha mtsogoleri wadziko lino joyce banda adawafunsa kui ayambe atuluka zipani zawo asadalowe chake cha pp 
  aphunguwa adati banda adanena ya boma ya mtunthama mumzinda wa lilongwe pomwe adapita kumuyamikira pokhala mtsogoleri wa lino kumutsimikizira agwira naye ntchito limodzi 
  apa katswiri wa zandaleyu blessings chinsinga wati nkuswa malamulo kuchoka chipani chomwe udayimira ukhale phungu ndikukalowa chipani china popanda masankho 
  chinsinga wati nzoyenera omwe adasankha phunguwo akhale mwayi wosankhanso potsatira kwa phunguyo 
  wati nzoikika gawo 65 la malamulo oyendetsera gawoli limati sipikala alamule mpando ulibe munthu membala amene pachisankho wachipani chandale choti chili mpando mnyumbayo kupatula phungu yekhayo mwachifuniro chake wasiya membala wachipanicho ndikulowa mchipani china chomwe chili nthumwi mnyumba ya malamulo 
  gawoli limapitirizanso kutsindika sipikala akhoza kulamula mpandowo ulibe munthu ngatinso phungu wochokayo alowa chipani chandale bungwe ngakhalenso mgwirizano womwe ntchito zake nzonkera kundale 
  apa chinsinga wati phungu yemwe akufuna kulowa chipani cha pp akonzekere kukachita masankho achibwereza akufuna chipani chomwe adaimira 
  wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa chipani cha pp ken msonda wati ganizo limenelo silidatulukepo ku msonkhanowo 
  wati phungu wofuna kuthandiza boma womasuka kutero kuchipani chomwe chidamulowetsa ku nyumba ya malamulo 
  adati chofunika nkudziwitsa chipani chakalecho sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo za komwe akupita 
  msonda adati pali mphekesera mamulumuzana zipani zina akufuna kulowa pp pofuna kukasokoneza 
  phungu wa chipani cha dpp kuchigawo cha kummawa kwa boma la kasungu otria jere adati wakumanapo banda kangapo za nkhaniyi sadauzidwe 
  phunguyu yemwenso wachiwiri wa nduna ya zamaphunziro adati zitakhala zoona ndiye akuyenera akamve maganizo omwe adamusankha mafumu kudera lake 
  jere adati chomwe mbalizo zikamuuze adzamvera 
  waluza wati naye wokonzeka kumvera ganizo la omwe adamusankha 
  wati pali zinthu zambiri zomwe zimafunika phungu agwire ntchito boma 
  tikati kugwira ntchito boma zimatanthauza zambiri kudutsitsa mabilu mnyumba ya malamulo apa timatsutsa zoipira amalawi kuvomereza zomwe zingawathandize adatero waluza 
  msonda wati aphungu nduna zili phuma pomwe zikufuna kuchoka kuzipani zawo ndikulowa chipani cha pp 
  adati mwa aphungu nduna 10 alionse 9 agogoda kale ku pp kufuna kulowa 
  msonda wati pp siyidatenge pofuna kuyendetsa kaye mwambo wa maliro mtsogoleri wakale wa lino malemu bingu wa mutharika 
  sitingawatchule maina pofuna kuwapatsa ulemu adatero msonda 
  adatinso chipani cha pp chichenjera anthuwa dakwanitsa kuthawa mutharika asadaikidwe mmanda nkosavuta kudzathawanso chipanichi pamavuto 
  mlimi wa mmudzi mwa kachepa kwa t likoswe mboma la chiradzulu limbani kaombe wati banda asapupulume kutenga aphungu omwe ku zipani zina mbali yake 
  kale amabungwe adathandiza boma la mutharika kudutsitsa ndondomeko yachuma pomwe zipani zotsutsa amakana boma la mutharika panthawiyo limachita zomwe amafuna 
  zomwe anthufe timafuna banda wayamba kukonza ubale maiko ndiye ku nyumba ya malamulo zikavute tidzathandiza adatero kaombe 
  angapo mwa aphungu dpp adakana kulankhula pankhaniyi amadula lamya yawo 
  wachiwiri muofesi ya pulezidenti nduna yemwenso phungu wachipani cha dpp mboma la mwanza nicholas dausi adati alibe chokamba akukhuza maliro anadula lamya yake 
  nduna ya zamaphunziro george chaponda idati tilankhule mlembi wachipani cha dpp titaifunsa ndunayi za ganizo lake phungu iyo inadula lamya yake 
  nduna ya zamasewero chitukuko cha achinyamata symon vuwa kaunda adati pamaliro ndiye sangathe kulankhula za ganizo lake 
  chipani cha pp sichili mnyumba ya malamulo aphungu adalowa chipanichi atathamangitsidwa kuchoka kuchipani cha dpp 
  mnyumba ya malamulo chipani cha mcp chili aphungu 30 dpp ili aphungu 140 udf ili aphungu 18 mafunde ili phungu maravi phungu aford aphungu awiri pomwe oima paokha 
  kuchigawo chapakati ku mzimba sikudachitikbe masankho achibwereza kumwalira kwa phungu wa dpp dontoni mkandawire
Label: POLITICS

Text:
tsabola waphindu wophweka kulima ulimi wa tsabola umaoneka opanda pake ogwetsa mphwayi benison kuziona wa bungwe la zikometso innovation and productivity centre akuti ulimiwu waphindu wophweka 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kuziona adati ndalama yochepa mlimi amatulutsa ndalama zochuluka chaka chathachi mbewuyi idafika pamtengo wa k3 000 kilogalamu alimi omwe adalima adachita nayo mphumi kwambiri adatero mkuluyu 
  adaonjezanso ubwino wina wa tsabola woti ukabzala chaka choyamba chaka chachiwiri subzalanso mvula ikangogwa mitengo ija imaphukiranso zokolola zake zimakhala zochuluka kuposa poyamba 
  tsabola mbewu imene alimi akupindula nayo kwambiri bungwe la malawi fruits mogwirizana mzuzu agriculture development division mzadd adachita kafukufuku wa tsabola mzaka za mmbuyomu adapeza kulima tsabola kophweka sikulira ndalama zochuluka poyerekeza mbewu zina 
  zili chomwechi president wa bungwe la farmers union of malawi alfred kapichira banda wati alimi atsabola mmadera mdziko muno amagulitsa kwa mavenda pamtengo wotsika kwambiri adati alimi ambiri sakudziwa misika yeniyeni ya tsabola kotero amangoberedwa mavenda 
  tikupempha misika yovomerezeka yomwe imagula tsabolayu ibwere poyera alimiwa azitha kugulitsa mitengo yabwino adatero kapichira banda 
  adati chakuti alimiwa akhala akugulitsa mitengo yotsika ambiri akumangolima moyerekeza pomwe adalekeratu ulimiwu 
  bungwe la zikometso innovation and productivity centre limodzi mwa mabungwe omwe amalimbikitsa za ulimi wa tsabola zikometso nthambi ya bungwe la national smallholder farmers association of malawi nasfam 
  ntchito zake kugula tsabola kwa alimi kuwagulitsa njere zabwino kuwaphunzitsa momwe angalimire tsabolayu azikolola ochuluka wapamwamba bungweli lili fakitale yomwe imapanga tsabola wa mmabotolo yemwe amagulitsidwa mmalawi ngakhalenso maiko akunja 
  malinga kuziona ulimi wa tsabola umayambira ku nazale momwe amachitira ulimi wa mbewu za masamba tomato tsabola amayenera kufesedwa kumapeto kwa mwezi wa october akuyenera kuwokeredwa pamene mvula yayamba kugwa yochuluka adatero kuziona 
  adafotokoza mizere imayenera kutalikana masentimita 75 pobzala mapando amayenera kutalikirana masentimita 45 
  akayamba kuphukira amayenera kudulidwa tisonga take apange nthambi zochuluka zimathandiza pamtengo uliwonse mlimi adzakolole tsabola ochuluka adatero kuziona 
  adaonjezanso mbewuyi imayenera kuthiridwa feteleza wa d compound ikangobzalidwa kumene can pakadutsa masiku 21 
  kathiridwe kake kofanana momwe timathirira ku chimanga fetelezayu amathandiza tsabola akule abereke mochuluka adatero mkuluyu 
  adaonjezanso tsabolayu zina amatha kugwidwa matenda tizilombo 
  tizilombo tomwe timasakaza mbewuyi tofanana tomwe timagwira mbewu za wa masamba tomato mankhwala ake ofanana omwe amapoperedwa kumbewuzi mlimi akhonza kupopera mankhwala chachikulu kubzala mbewu zabwino kumapalira apewe matenda tizilomboti adatero kuziona
Label: FARMING

Text:
apolisi anjatidwa pokhudzidwa ophedwa zionetsero apolisi asanu anayi adatengedwa msabatayi powaganizira akudziwapo kanthu za amene adaphedwa pazionetsero za 20 julaye 2012 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc 20 adaphedwa pazionetserozo zomwe amalawi adachita mmizinda ya blantyre lilongwe mzuzu zomba pokwiya ulamuliro wa yemwe mtsogoleri wa lino bingu wa mutharika pofuna kuletsa zionetserozo apolisi adaombera mwa 
  wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa kulikulu la polisi kelvin maigwa adati apolisi lachitatu adamanga sub inspector kamwala wa kupolisi ya lumbadzi sergeant makokezi wa pmf ku lilongwe sergeant kanyama wa ku mchinji constable lobo wa kupolisi ya kawale omwe amasungidwa kupolisi ya lilongwe 
  malinga mneneri wa polisi mchigawo cha kumwera nicholas gondwa ku blantyre paul mussa kelvin nyirenda benedicto dzombe mahomed kulusinje lemekezo mikuti omwe apolisi ya ndirande adatsekeredwa powaganizira akukhudzidwa imfa ya awiri ku ndirande zionetserozo 
  apolisiwo amayembekezeka kukaonekera kukhoti dzulo 
  20 atafa pazionetserozo mutharika adakhazikitsa bungwe lofufuza chomwe chidachitika patsikulo zotsatira zake zidatuluka muulamuliro wa joyce banda pomwe zidaoneka apolisi adalakwa kuombera anthuwo 
  mabungwe oposa 80 adakonza zionetserozo zofuna za amalawi zidayalidwa mmasamba 15 chikalata chimene chidatulutsidwa 
  zina mwa zolira za amalawiwo pazionetserozo zidali kusowa kwa mafuta ndalama zakunja kubwera kwa bajeti yosadalira ndalama zakunja kusowa kwa ufulu wa aphunzitsi msukulu za ukachenjede kuthamangitsa kazembe wa ku mangalande kuno ku malawi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
uhule wanyanya lero 1 disembala tsiku limene maiko onse padziko amakumbukira za nkhondo yolimbana matenda edzi zimene zikuchitika ku mponela mboma la dowa zingapitirire nkhondo yothana matendawa ivutirapo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kumeneko asungwana achichepere zaka za pakati 10 14 akuti alusa kwambiri woyendayenda mmalo omwera mowa momwe akumachita zachisembwere abambo akuluakulu apeze ndalama 
  polankhula pamsonkhano wothana kukwatiritsa ana msanga adakonza bungwe la everychild sabata yatha t dzoole yambomalo yati asungwanawa amachokera mmidzi yozungulira mponela omwe amathawa umphawi kwawo mfumuyo yapempha apolisi achitepo kanthu mchitidwewu 
  wati asungwana osakwanitsa zaka 15 akumapezeka mmalo omwera mowa ogona alendo kufunafuna abambo oti azichita nawo zachiwerewere posinthanitsa ndalama zinthu zina 
  ndakumanapo kangapo ana achichepere makamaka asungwana azaka za pakati 10 14 omwe amagulitsa matupi kwa abambo akuluakulu mchitidwewu wafika ponyanya kwambiri moti pakufunika njira youthetsera msangamsanga idatero mfumuyo 
  adati apolisi akadayesetsa kuchitapo kanthu zikupangitsa matenda edzi asathe zikuchulukitsa chiwerengero cha ana osowa chithandizo cha makolo asungwana oterewa akatenga pathupi amangobereka mwana nkumuthawa adatero dzoole 
  chiwelewele chomwe chimakhudzana kwa mbiri wa uhule njira ayayikulu yomwe imafalitsa matenda edzi omwe lonse likukumbukira lelo chikalata chomwe adatulutsa bungwe la world health organisation 2011chimasonyeza oposa 34.2 million lonse kachilombo ka hiv 
  wachiwiri kwa wa polisi ya mponela george ntetemela adatsimikiza za kukula kwa wa uhule mderalo adati apolisi kale kalikiliki kusaka njira zochotsera asungwana achichepere mmalo omwera mowa 
  cholinga chathu sikumanga munthu tiwagwire asungwana oterewa kenako tiitane makolo tikambirane nawo adatero ntetemela 
  oimira bungwe la everychild tissie msonkho adati asungwana ambiri mdziko muno akumalowa mbanja zaka zoyenerera zisanakwane zomwe zimapangitsa azizunzika 
  msonkho maukwati ambiri aana achichepele amapangidwa cha umphawi miyambo nkhanza zomwe ana maka asungwana amakumana nazo mmanyumba momwe amakhala
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
tipulumutseni ku ukwati wa ana amati ana tsogolo la mawa zikuchitika ku neno zikukaikitsa adzakhaledi atsogoleri mawa 
  kumeneko ukwati wa ana akuti wafika lekaleka boma mabungwe sachitapo kanthu zinthu zifika poipitsitsa 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka lachinayi sabata yatha bungwe la save the children lidaitanitsa nyumba ya malamulo ya ana komwe anawa adatula nkhawa zawo kwa atsogoleri nyumbayo idakumana masiku awirilachinayi mpaka lachisanu 
  momwe zimachitikira sizimasiyana momwe imakhalira nyumba ya malamulo ya lino mudali sipikala aphungu 
  zonsezi zimachitika ana amboma la neno amene amachokera msukulu zosiyanasiyana za mbomalo 
  malinga mlangizi wa ana ku bungweli thandizolathu kadzamira anawa adachita kusankhana apeze owayimira sukulu yawo 
  amasankha phungu wawo amene akawalankhulire mnyumbayi ikamakumana adasankhanso sipikala wawo awatu masukulu ambiri mboma lino adatero kadzamira 
  mnyumbayi anawa adalankhula chingerezi chichewa osachita mantha holo ya neno idakhoma ofuna kudzaonera nkhumanoyo 
  nkhani zidamanga nthenje mnyumbayi zidali zodandaulira boma mabungwe awapulumutse ku maukwati ana omwe akolera mbomalo 
  anawa adapemphanso boma liwamangire sukulu zabwino kuikamo zipangizo zoyenera 
  sipikala wa nyumbayo trifonia kaduya wa zaka 14 akukalowa folomu 2 sekondale ya chiwale adati akuluakulu asiye kuimba nyimbo ayambe 
  timalankhula palibe chimachitika nkhumano ino akuluakulu athu ayambe adatero 
  mwana wa zaka 14 umupeza wakwatiwa kale kodi apa palinso lonjezo loti mawa tidzakhala atsogoleri adadabwa sipikalayu 
  wotsogolera komiti yokhudza ana ku nyumba ya malamulo richard chimwendo banda adalonjeza sipikala kaduya nkhawa zawo ziyankhidwa 
  alankhula mopanda mantha zomwe zithandizire chidwi chathu chofuna kuthandiza ana amve kwa tichitapo kanthu adatero banda 
  adati nyumba ya malamulo ya lino ikamakumana adzatenga mwa anawa akalankhule kunyumbayi cholinga aphungu akadzimvere mavuto amene anawa akukumana nawo
Label: CULTURE

Text:
dpp idzudzula boma chipani chakale cholamula cha democratic progressive dpp chati amalawi angapitirire kusauka boma la chipani cha peoples pp silibwera msanga ndondomeko zotukulira mdziko muno potsatira kugwa kwa ndalama ya kwacha 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mneneri wachipanichi nicholas dausi yemwe akufuna kudzaiimira pp pachisankho cha pulezidenti peter mutharika auza tamvani msabatayi boma latsopanoli lataya ndondomeko zina zomwe boma la dpp lidakhazikitsa zitukule lino 
  malinga dausi ulamuliro wa wa dpp udakhazikitsa ndondomeko zisanu zinayi zotukulira lino pansi chikonzero cha chitukuko cha malawi growth development strategy mgds 
  ati nzachikwanekwane kuthandiza boma la pp ati silikuzilabada mmalo mwake likungotsogoza kuthothola pantchito 
  naye mutharika yemwe mchimwene wa mtsogoleri wakale wa lino bingu wati malinga ndikuchepa kwa chitetezo mdziko muno bizinesi atekeseka achipongwe ambanda 
  wati nzosakomera chuma cha 
  mneneri wa boma moses kunkuyu wati boma laika chidwi chachikulu zosankhika zokhazo zomwe zingapindulire amalawi 
  kuyambira pomwe chipani cha pp chidalowa mboma potsatira imfa ya bingu wa mutharika yemwe ankatsogoleranso dpp chipani cha dpp chakhala chikudzudzula za boma la pp 
  lamulungu 22 julaye peter mutharika pochititsa msonkhano mumzinda wa lilongwe adadzudzulanso boma la pp ati zake nzosathandiza konse amalawi 
  kunkuyu wati amalawi ndiye mboni za boma la pp popeza amene akudziwa choonadi nkhaniyi 
  kodi tikhaliranji ndondomeko zina zomwe sizikuoneka mutu adafunsa kunkuyu 
  wati ndiwodabwa phokoso lomwe chipani cha dpp chikuchita pomangodandaula osapereka maganizo momwe boma lingathetsere mavuto mokomera amalawi 
  dausi adati miyezi inayi ndiyokwanira boma la pp lidayenera kuyamba kuonetsa zipatso zaulamuliro 
  chongotenga boma chipanicho chidayenera kuonetseratu chikutsatira zotukula miyoyo ya adatero 
  adati kuyesera kupereka maganizo kungakhale padiwa ati boma latsopanoli lomwe silikumva chidzudzulo silikuchedwetsa unyolo lingamukokere kundende 
  apa kunkuyu wati atsogoleri mtsogoleri wakale wa lino bakili muluzi mtsogoleri wachipani cha mcp john tembo akhala akupereka maganizo momwe boma latsopanoli lingakonzere zinthu dpp akungolalata chabe osaunikira zoyenera 
  amalawi amene angaweruze za ulamuliro wa pp adatero kunkuyu 
  wa bungwe lomenyera ufulu wachibadwidwe la malawi watch billy banda wati lero amalawi opemphapempha osauka kwambiri nchifukwa cha ulamuliro woipa wachipani cha dpp 
  wati boma la dpp silinkamva zonena kotero lisakhale zolankhula mmanja mwawo mwakuda 
  akufuna amvere zolankhula zawo abwere kaye poyera nkupepesa amalawi zomwe ulamuliro wa dpp udachita amalawi avutika bwezi tili poipitsitsatingothokoza mulungu amalikonda lino adatero billy banda 
  banda adalangizanso boma la pp lisaiwale komwe likuchokera kotero likuyenera pamtima zofuna za amalawi 
  mfumu makwangwala ya mboma la ntcheu yati kumeneko zinthu zili mafumu akumana sabata ikudzayi akambirane za ndondomeko ya chitukuko ya mthandizi 
  ndondomekoyi amalandira ndalama pomwe agwira ntchito kulambula misewu 
  edward chimkwita wa mmudzi mwa malika kwa t likoswe mboma la chiladzulu wati dpp imene idaononga zikusintha 
  mfumu ina mboma la mwanza yati zomwe achipani cha dpp akunena nzoona kotero boma likonze pomwe sipali 
  mmatumba mwa mulibe ndalama katundu wakwera mtengo chitetezo chastika akuba akumasula mbuzi za eni dzuwa likuswa mtengo 
  apa zikungokhala tabwereranso kale malonda nawo sakuyenda kilogalamu imodzi ya nandolo tikugulitsa mtengo wa k30 zomwe sitikupindula nazo 
  chikhalirecho fanta tikugula k90 mwinanso k120 idatero mfumuyo yomwe siidafune kutchulidwa dzuwa likuswa mtengo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
akati tonde azimveka fungo akutanthauzanji miyambi ilipo yosiyanasiyana ina ukaimva mutu umachita kuwira kulephera kulumikiza mwambiwo tanthauzo lake amangoti bola ndanenapo mwambi osalingalira kodi omvera akutengapo phunziro lanji pamwambiwo mwambi watitengera pabwaloli lero wakuti tonde azimveka fungo steven pembamoyo adakumana mfumu thipwi ya ku nkhotakota kwa t kanyenda pamsonkhano wokhudza za katetezedwe ka chilengedwe pomwe padatuluka mwambi wozunguawu adacheza motere ndikudziweni wawa 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka ndine village headman thipwi wa mdera la gogochalo kanyenda mboma lino la nkhotakota 
  pamsonkhano walero mumabwerezabwereza oti tonde azimveka fungo mumatanthauzanji mauwa choyamba mudziwe amene aja mwambi chabe ndiye mudziwa mwambi umanenedwa cholinga choti omvera atengepo phunziro chenjezo malingana zomwe zachitika zikuchitika 
  nanga poti pamsonkhano umeneuja padali okhaokha padalibe mbuzi nchifukwa chake mawuwo akutchedwa mwambi kutanthauza sakuimira munthu ayi pali phunziro lomwe atolepo mwachitsanzo msonkhano udali wokhudza za katetezedwe ka chilengedwe pogwiritsa ntchito njira zosiyanasiyana ndiye mwambi uja udali woyenerera kuugwiritsa ntchito 
  nanga mwambiwu umatanthauzanji chabwino mwambi umenewu umatanthauza ntchito zamanja za munthu ndizo zimamuchitira umboni munthu wolimbikira zotsatira za kulimbikira kwakeko zimafotokoza zambiri za popanda wina kuima pachulu nkumalalika mwachitsanzo mlimi wolimbikira amadziwika ngolimbikira potengera zokolola zake chimodzimodzi katswiri wa mpira wosewera kutsogolo amadziwika kaamba komwetsa zigoli 
  kutanthauza mbuzi nchitsamba chabe chongobisalirako momwemo ndithu sikuti timatanthauza munthu yemwe tikukambayo tonde poti akumveka fungo la mbuzi ayi iyi njira chabe yoperekera phunziro malangizo chilimbikitso moti apo omwe adali pamsonkhanowu adziwa pamenepanja azilingidwa zotsatira za ntchito zake osati kungokamba pakamwa ayi 
  ndiye tonde zikumukhudza pamenepa osasankha zina tondeyo mbali yake yomwe amagwiritsidwira ntchito nkhani yakuti mkhola la mbuzi mukamabadwa ana pafupipafupi ulemu umanka kwa tonde ndiye amagwira ntchito mmenemo tonde akakhala wolephera ofooka khola limakhala pomwepomwepo asasuntha ayi ndiye mlimi akaona zaka zikutha mbuzi zake sizikuswana amakabwerekera tonde wina uja nkumuchotsamo mwina kumugulitsa kwa mabutchala apa ndiye amene uja sadamveke fungo tonde mnzakeyo akangolowa mkhola nkuyamba kubereketsa amalandira matamando ndiye tonde zipatso zake zikuoneka 
  ndiye aja amati akamva fwemba la munthu nkumati tonde azimveka fungo amalakwitsa kwambiri potero paja sipayenera kugwiritsidwa ntchito mwambi umenewu atapeza mwambi wina bola mwambi wakuti wakumba kanyimbi apo zikugwirizana poti kanyimbi naye fungo vloboola mmphuno osati masewera ndiye munthu akumveka fungo losakhala mwaneneramo fwemba ndiye akuononga anzake akuzunzika momwe amazunzira kanyimbi
Label: CULTURE

Text:
anatchezera adandichotsa ntchito zikomo gogo   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndakhala ndikugwira ntchito kwa bwana wina mumzinda wa blantyre kwa zaka 4 masiku apitawa ndidaapempha holide ya masiku 10 bwanawo adavomera ndili kopuma bwanawo adandiimbira foni andichotsa ntchito palibe ndalama zimene angandipatse 
  ndichitenji ku ofesi yolemba ntchito ngakhalenso kukhoti ya makampani sindinathandizidwe mutu waima 
  bmw blantyre 
  bmw ili likhale phunziro kwa tonse pamene tikuyamba ntchito tiyenera kuunikirana lomwe zomwe ziyenera kuchitika pamene ntchito ikutha malamulo zolemba ntchito akuneneratu bwana akuchotsa wantchito ayenera kumuuza amuchotsa pakutha masiku 15 
  awa antchito amene amalandira malipiro otsika kwambiri 
  chimodzimodzi munthu siungangodzuka lero nkunena bwana ndasiya ntchito uko kuphwanya malamulo 
  tsono mwati adakuchotsani muli kutchuti tchuti gawo la ntchito yanu sikuti bwana akukuchitirani chifundo gawo limodzi la ntchito 
  munthu ukusiya ntchito uli masiku amene mumayenera kupita kuntchito masikuwo mumawerengera mukhonza kusiya ntchito pompompo 
  chofunika kwambiri kukambirana amene akukulembani ntchito musanayambe nkotheka musayinirane nkutheka apa ku labour office khoti ya makampani simungaphule kanthu palibe umboni wa zomwe mudagwirizana 
  apachibale akundifuna anatchereza pali anyamata awiri pachibale amene akuoneka amandifuna mwa anyamatawo ndidamudziwa kalekale wakhala akundifundira ndimamukana 
  ndidadziwana winayo cha mbale wakeyo nsye akunditumizira mauthenga chikondi ati akundifuna ndichitenji chifukwatu awiriwo akundisowetsa mtendere 
  m.e 
  mponela me anyamatawo simukuwafunadi kuwauziratu mmalo mowapatsa banga aziganiza mwayi ukadalipo 
  mwinatu inuyo simutsindika kukana kwanuko nkutheka anyamatawo nkhakamira mwinanso pampikisano aone angakutengeni ndani 
  muli monsemo mphamvu zili mmanja mwanu kulola kukana 
  ana owapeza avuta zikomo anatchereza ndakhala pachibwenzi mkazi wina yemwe ndidalowa naye mbanja chaka chatha adabwera ana ake awiri abale polingalira banja nanenso ndidakatenga mwana wanga
