  akungokhalira kulalatira mwana wangayo ati wamwano zina akumachita panja nyumba zoyandikira amve akuti nditachoka sangadandaule chonsecho pathupi miyezi 7 
  ndapirira mokwanira ndithandizeni 
  wl lilongwe 
  wl musanachite chilichonse pabanja mumayenera kukambirana kaye momwe zikuonekera apa mkazi wanuyo adakangotenga ana abale akewo musanakambirane nanunso mudangoyendera yanu nkukatenga mwana wanu 
  choncho kusamvana sikungalephere kubwerapo 
  komatu apa palibe chokwanira choti nkuthetsera banja
Label: RELATIONSHIPS

Text:
escom adziwe takwiyakapito si zachilendonso nyimbo yomwe akuimba kuzimazima kwa magetsi mmalo mopereka magetsi tsiku lililonse anenera ayamba kupereka mdima tsiku lonse 
  sizikukhumudwitsa okha nawo amabungwe akwiya nazo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kapito osasekerera zimenezi akunenera wa bungwe loona ufulu wa ogula la consumers association of malawi cama john kapito escom isimba tsoka posakhalitsa 
  escom imva nkhwangwa ili mmutu zafika pokwana tatopa kulira uwu mtopola zithera wina watero kapito 
  kapito wati vuto amalawi safuna kugwirizana zinthu zikafika povuta zilili 
  tigwirane manja tiyeni tionetse mkwiyo wathu awa escom adziwenso takwiya si kusekerera zotere talankhula tatopa panopa tiyeni tichitepo kanthu adatero kapito 
  naye woona mabungwe mabizinesi angonoangono lotchedwa small and medium enterprises association smea james chiutsi akuti chuma cha lino chikutsika makampani ambiri sakugwira ntchito 
  chiutsi wati escom ikuyenera kupeza njira zina zothandizira kusiyana nkumawanamiza zonse 
  anzathu amapanga magetsi kudzuwa kumphepo tikudalira magetsi opukusidwa mphamvu ya madzi kodi nanga madziwo akadzaphwera ndiye tidzakhalanso magetsi adadabwa chiutsi 
  panopa zinthu zaipa makampani alowa pansi pafupifupi theka atseka makampani sangakwanitse kugwiritsira ntchito injini za magetsi generator mabutchala ikuonongeka ometa asiya kodi lingatukuke muyembekezere munthu yemweyo akuyenera kupereka ndalama ya lendi kodi aipeza adatero chiutsi 
  mkuluyu kapito apempha boma lichitepo kanthu nkhaniyi amalawi aone nkhani ya kuthimathima kwa magetsi
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
pewani ngozi kuberedwa nyengo ya khirisimasi nyuwere kumachuluka ngozi za pamsewu wa umbava umbanda ngozi zina kumira mmadzi akusangalala 
  nthambi yoona za ngozi za pamsewu ya directorate of road traffic and safety services drtss yakhala ikupereka malangizo kudzera mnyuzipepala kuyambira december 14 2016 pofuna adziwe msanga za kapewedwe ka ngozi zisangalalo zisadafike pachimake 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ngozi iyi idachitika sabata yangothayi nthambiyi yati kupatula zopangitsa ngozi zina nkhani imakhala kuyendetsa galimoto chiledzerere galimoto zosayenera kuyenda pamsewu zomwe zimaononga miyoyo katundu 
  chikalatacho chidatinso oyendetsa galimoto akuyenera kupereka mpata odutsa kwa mmalo monse mowolokera asayankhule palamya akuyendetsa galimoto poopa chidwi chawo chingathawire ku lamyako mmalo moyendetsa galimoto 
  nthambiyo idatinso okwera udindo odziteteza popewa kukwera galimoto zomwe zadzadza kwambiri kupewa kukakamiza oyendetsa azithamanga achedwa paulendo wawo 
  nawo apolisi ati udindo woteteza miyoyo katundu wawo potsatira ndondomeko zomwe amapereka chaka chaka kuonetsetsa asiya munthu okhwima maganizo pakhomo akamachoka 
  mneneri wa polisi james kadadzera adati zambiri chokomedwa amasiya pakhomo palibe nkupita kokasangalala pobwera amapeza nyumba yathyoledwa 
  njira ina nkuonetsetsa pomwe ana akusewera kusangalala pali munthu wamkulu owayanganira kuopa angabedwe kuvulala okhaokha adatero kadadzera
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
amalawi ati boma la pp likusakaza chuma akuluakulu ati boma la chipani cha peoples party pp motsogozedwa mtsogoleri joyce banda kudzanso wachiwiri khumbo kachali lataya chipangano pomwe lasiya kulabada miyoyo ya ake kumangoononga chuma cha chiswe 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc wa malawi watch billy banda katswiri wa zandale henry chingaipe adauza tamvani msabatayi pomwe amawunguza momwe boma likuonongera misonkho ya pofuna kudzikundikira lokha pomwe amalawi pamoto 
  chitsanzo amalankhula momwe misonkho ya yaonongedwera ulendo wa ku united nations un womwe mtsogoleriyu watenga oposa 40 kuphatikiza mafumu 
  ounikirawa ati pomwe nkhani za chuma zisadakhazikike mdziko muno ndikosafunika boma litenge mafumu paulendowo ochuluka amvekere uku ndikuononga chuma posaganizira amalawi 
  kusakaza chiswe malinga malipoti omwe nyuzipepala ya the nation ya lachiwiri sabata yatha idapeza pafupifupi k308 miliyoni ndiyo ionongedwe paulendowo ndalamayi ingakwanire kugulira matumba 616 000 fetereza wotsika mtengo 
  ndalamazi mwazina zolipirira matikiti ndege ndalama zapadera za omwe wayenda nawo zomwe akuti k84 000 munthu patsiku 
  mneneri wa boma moses kunkuyu wati sizoona boma akudzikundikira aiwala amalawi chilichonse chomwe boma likuchita ndichokomera amalawi 
  pali maulendo omwe akufunika achitike ndithu ndiye sikuti taiwala ndizoonadi paulendowo pali mafumu malemia yaku nsanje pali kufunika kwake 
  mukudziwa bomali likugwira ntchito mafumu nkhani ya uchembere wabwino zina ndiye chomwe nkuti akathe kumva momwe mayiko zikhalira adatero kunkuyu 
  zikuchitika pomwe amabungwe omwe siaboma adzudzula mamulumuzana abomawa achepetse maulendo 
  bomali likumbuke komwe lachokera zikuonetsa atsogoleriwa pachinyezi ayiwala amalawi tinkadzudzula boma la dpp zoononga misonkho ichi sichachilendo kwa tikudabwa nawonso ayamba zomwezo apa asanduka agalatiya adatero banda 
  maulendo achuluka naye chingaipe wati bomali likulephera kuchepetsa ndalama zogwiritsidwa ntchito maka pamaulendo 
  adati ndibwino maulendo aboma zizipita nduna zokha ndalama zogwiritsidwa ntchito zichepe 
  ulendo wa ku un ulendo wa boma omwe akuyenera kupita omwe akukhudzidwa nkhani za boma zikudabwitsa ulendowo kwapita mafumu 
  kuulendowu kwapita ambiri akukakhala masiku ambiri zomwe ziononge ndalama adatero chingaipe 
  francis lunga wa mmudzi mwa malasa 1 kwa t malengachanzi mboma la nkhotakota wati kumeneko zinthu zaipa pomwe akusowa kopezera ndalama chikhalirecho zinthu zikukwera mtengo 
  tidayamba ntchito yolima msewu timalandira k300 patsiku ntchitoyo yayimanso sitikudziwa mutu kuno sitikudziwa vuto lenileni zinthu zidzivuta chonchi zili choncho tikungomva alowera uku uko maulendo aonjeza adatero lunga 
  abraham kamanga wa mmudzi mwa kandeya kwa t kadewere mboma la chiradzulu wati akuganiza boma lidangowanyenga akumudzi salira ndikugwa kwa ndalama ya kwacha ponena pakhala zowatonthoza adati nzodandaulitsa pamene mavuto akula maulendo akudya ndalama ankitsa

Text:
aopa chinyengo mayeso jce bungwe lokhudzidwa kayendetsedwe ka maphunziro mdziko muno lati akhumudwa zomwe lidachita bungwe la loyanganira mayeso la maneb polola ophunzira kulemba mayeso junior certificate of education jce chaka chino popanda zitupa za umboni i d 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe okhudzidwa nkhani za maphunziro la civil society education coalition csec benedicto kondowe wati zikhoza kuchititsa mayesowa alowe chinyengo 
  polankhula tamvani lachinayi lapitali kondowe adati ophunzira ambiri adalowa mpakana sabata yachiwiri ya mayesowo amene adayamba 26 may alibe ma i d zimadabwitsa oyanganira mayeso amazindikira ophunzirawo alidi olondola 
  zimenezi mphunzitsi munthu wina akhoza kulembera wina mayeso oyanganira osadziwa ntchito ya i d nkuthandiza oyanganira mayesowo kuzindikira wolemba mayesoyo alidi iyeyo adatero kondowe 
  mkuluyu adati zikusemphana kwambiri malamulo oyendetsera mayeso omwe amaletsa wophunzira yemwe alibe nambala i d kulemba nawo mayesowo 
  mneneri wa bungwe loyendetsa mayeso la maneb simeon maganga adatsimikiza mayeso jc adayambadi ophunzira alibe zitupa adati mmene limafika tsiku lachinayi akulemba mayesowo ma i d onse adali atapita msukulu zoyenera 
  maganga adati ophunzira pafupifupi 170 000 ndiwo adalemba nawo mayesowa adaonjeza nkovuta kunena kuchuluka kwa ophunzira amene adalibe ma i d. 
  mmene mayeso amayamba tidali titapereka zitupa msukulu za kumpoto kumwera tidakhalira sukulu zina mchigawo cha kumwera zipangizo zopangira zitupazo zidali zosakwanira 
  tidayesetsabe moti patatha masiku anayi chiyambireni mayeso tidali titatumiza zitupa zotsalirazo ophunzira onse zitupa zawo adatero maganga 
  kondowe yemwe alinso mkomiti yoona mayeso akuyenda palibe zachinyengo adatsutsa zomwe adanena magangazo adati mkati mwa sabata yomwe ino akuyendera mayeso adapeza ophunzira akulemba opanda zitupa zikunenedwazo 
  tidapeza ophunzira msukulu zina mchigawo cha pakati ku shire highlands akulemba popanda zitupa ndiye zitupazo akapereka liti adadabwa kondowe 
  potsutsapo za nkhawa ya chinyengo maganga adati bungwe la maneb mothandizana oyanganira mayeso akuluakulu pasukulu amathandizana kuzindikira ophunzira omwe amalowa mchipinda cha mayeso kondowe adati pagulu lonselo amadziwa anawo akuluakulu pasukulu moti atafuna chinyengo akhoza kupusitsa anzawowo 
  takhala tikumva akuluakulu pasukulu amangidwa kulipitsidwa chinyengo pamayeso ndiye angalephere kupusitsa anzawowo zawo ziyende poti mphunzitsi amafuna mbiri yake izikoma ana akamakhoza mayeso adatero kondowe 
  adati bungwe la maneb likadavomereza kulakwitsa nkusintha kachitidwe ka zinthu mavuto otere asamachitike kawirikawiri 
  kondowe adati pologalamu yokonzekera mayeso maneb imasonyezeratu yomwe ophunzira oyembekezera kulemba mayeso akuyenera kupereka ndalama ya zitupa akatero bungweri limayenera kupanga zitupazo mayeso asadafike 
  unduna wa zamaphunziro wasamba mmanja pankhaniyi ponena nkhani ya mayeso si ya unduna bungwe la maneb unduna ntchito yake nkuonetsetsa silabasi ikuyenda 
  nkhani ikadakhala yakuti ana sadamalize silabasi ikadakhala yathu ndiyo mbali timayanganira nkhani ya mayeso ziphaso mufunse bungwe la maneb adatero mneneri wa undunawu manfred ndovi 
  komabe adati sikolondola kulola munthu yemwe alibe i d kulemba mayeso unduna akambirana maneb zoterezi zisadzachitikenso 
  kondowe adati musukulu 12 zomwe komiti idayendera mchigawo cha pakati 6 mudapezeka ophunzira omwe amalemba mayeso popanda ziphaso pulezidenti wa eni sukulu zomwe si zaboma joseph patel adapereka lipoti lakuti msukulu 150 ophunzira adayamba kulemba mayeso opanda ziphaso 
  ophunzira amaliza kulemba mayesowo dzulo 5 june
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
brother dostie chipani cha marist amwalira aku likulu la chipani cha marist brothers kuno ku malawi alengeza za imfa ya brother fernand dostie 
 malingana wa chipanichi brother francis jumbe brother dostie amwalira lamulungu 21 june 2020 ku chipatala cha kamuzu central mzinda wa lilongwe atadwala kwa yayitali nthenda ya khansa 
 mwambo woyika mmanda thupi la malemu brother dostie uchitika lachitatu 24 june 2020 ku marist secondary school mtendere campus mboma la dedza 
 malinga brother jumbe amaene adzatsogolere mwambowu arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya lilongwe ambuye tarcizio ziyaye ati palinso chiyembekezo chakuti ambuye george desmond tambala dayosizi ya zomba episkpi opuma wa arkidayosizi ya lilongwe ambuye remi ste marie akakhala nawonso mwambowo 
 ati potsatira njira zopewera mliri wa coronavirus ochepa okha amene akapezeke ku mwambowu 
 brother fernand dostie amwalira zaka 87 zakubadwa akhala akugwira ntchito kuno ku malawi kuyambira chaka cha 1962 
 mzimu wa brother fernand dostie uwuse mtendere wosatha
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
chisankho chiliko bwalo lalikulu la milandu la supreme court dzulo lidagamula bwalo lapadera la constitutional court concourt silidalakwe pogamula chisankho cha 21 may 2019 sichidayende 
  choncho chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa lino chichitikabe 2 july 2020 bwalolo lati okhawo amene adalembetsa mavoti 2019 ndiwo adzavotenso osati amene amalowa mkaundula watsopano amene wakhala akuchitika 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc nyirenda chisankho si chibwana lazarus chakwera yemwe adaimira chipani cha malawi congress party mcp saulos chilima yemwe adaimira utm party adakamangala kukhoti bungwe la zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec silidayendetse chisankhocho polengeza mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika ndiye adapambana pachisankhocho 
  3 february chaka chino lidagamula chisankhocho sichidayende pakhale chisankho china pasanathe masiku 150 bwalolo lidagamulanso nyumba ya malamulo iunike momwe makomishona mec adayendetsera chisankhocho aphunguwo adapempha mutharika achotse makomishonawo limodzi wapampando akuimalimodzi muluzi yemwe akudziwa za chitukuko 
  polankhula opereka zikalatazo payekhapayekha wapampando wa mec jane ansah adati pochita kampeni atsogoleriwo ayenera kubwera njira zatsopano zochitira kampeni malinga matenda covid-19 boma lidati asakhale oposa 100 malo amodzi zimene zingakhudze kampeni yomwe idayamba 2 may 
  padakalipano akadaulo za ndale aikapo mlomo momwe chisankhochi chikuyendera 
  kadaulo wina humphreys mvula adachenjeza mwayi adakana kuchotsa makomishonawo.wawo jane ansah mchigamulo chawo oweruza 7 supreme court adadabwa chomwe mec mutharika adachitira apilo alibe zokwanira 
  wa oweruzawo andrew nyirenda adati mwa 137 zimene zidaperekedwa pochita apilo zidali zokolana zongobwereza zosatsata ukadaulo wa zamalamulo zochititsa manyazi 
  nyirenda adati chisankho nsanamira ya demokalase kumakhala kusankha atsogoleri si zinthu za masewera chisankho chiyenera kuyenda mwa chilungamo osati mongawaula pachitika chisankho 
  mchigamulocho oweruza adati mec idaphwanya malamulo pakayendetsedwe ka chisankhocho
Label: POLITICS

Text:
anatchezera sakuthandiza mwana agogo ndine mtsikana wa zaka 19 ndili mwana ndidali pabanja litatha bambowo samatumiza chithandizo olo sopo ndiye nditani poti mwanayu ndimavutika naye ndekha pepa mtsikana zimene ndakhala ndikulangiza atsikana zonse limbikirani sukulu mudakali anthete osati kuthamangira kukwatiwa tikamanena si kuthamangira banja timadziwa zambiri zotsatira zake zimakhala zimene wakumana nazo iwezi tsono nkovuta kukuthandiza zenizeni sukulongosola ukwati wanu udali wotani wongolowana wachinkhoswe mudadalitsa kutchalitchi nanga zifukwa zomwe banja lako lidathera nzotani ukwatiwo udathera kukhoti basi mwamuna adangoti zipita kwanu ukwati wanu udali ankhoswe akutipo chiyani kutha kwa ukwati wanu banja lenileni silimangotha lero lero popanda zifukwa zenizeni banja si masanje ndiye mmene zikuonekera mudangotenganapo popanda ndondomeko yeniyeni mwamuna adalola zokukwatira pothawa milandu atakupatsa pathupi si choncho ndiye poti amati madzi akatayika saoleka chomwe ungachite nchoti nkhaniyi upite nayo kwa ankhoswe kubwalo la milandu akakuthandize bamboo wa mwana udindo woti azithandiza mwana banja lanu latha mwana asavutike cha kusemphana chichewa kwa makolo kodi sukulu udalekeza mukalasi yanji chonde pali mwayi woti nkubwerera kusukulu chita zomwezo udakali mwana wamngono 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndikhulupirire anatchereza ndidali chibwenzi chomwe tinkakondana kwambiri tinkamvanadi titakhala zaka ziwiri osaonana kaamba ka zovuta zina popeza ankakhala makolo ake panopa adakwatiwa mwana titakumana miyezi yammbuyomu adandiuza amandikondabe kodi ndikhulupirire ndipange ndithandizeni anathereza 
  godfrey richard sindima thyolo okondeka sindima tisatayepo apa si mwati adakwatiwa ameneyo mwana ameneyo si wanunso ayi mwini akadakhala amakukondani akadakudikirani osati kukwatiwa munthu wina ayi kodi mukundiuza kumene adakwatiwako adachita kumukakamiza padali chikondi pakati mwamunayo mkazi yemwe mukuti adali chibwenzi chanuyo tsono musapusitsidwe akukukondanibe pamene pabanja mwamuna wina apa ndiye silidalembe adzakhala nthiti yanu funani wina achimwene ameneyo ngodanitsa mkazi wapabanja amene amadyeranso maso amuna timati wachimasomaso ameneyo si wofunika kutaya naye ndikhulupirira mwamvetsa 
  amamumenya zikomo anatchereza ineyo ndili chibwenzi timakondana kwambiri makolo ake amamumenya cha ndiyeno ndikamuuza chithe amakana ineyo ndimaopa adzamuvulaza nditani pamenepa ndimusiye pati bii pali munga makolo anzeru sangamamenye mwana wawo wamkazi popanda zimene ukunena amamumenya mchikondi iwe si zoona ayi chilipo chomwe amamumenyera mwina mwana wawoyo adakali pasukulu sakufuna asokoneze maphunziro chochita zibwenzi pasukulu mwina nkutheka sakuvomereza chibwenzi chanu kaamba ka zifukwa zina zina vuto loti sukufotokoza bwinobwino za cholinga cha chibwenzi chanucho msinkhu wako zina zotero chibwenzi chanucho cholinga chake nchoti mudzakhale pabanja iwe wachitapo chiyani kuonetsa si zachibwana ayi iwe udamaliza sukulu uli pantchito ayi pali chitomero ayi mwina utandiyankha mafunso amenewa ndingathe kuona ndikuthandize

Text:
kodi idrissa walesi akutani mozambique 2012 ku mighty wanderers kudatchuka wosewera wa kumbuyo idrissa baba walesi atangotchuka walesi adasowa zidamveka wakwawira ku mozambique chipitireni 2014 walesi adachita zii kodi akusewera wayamba geni bobby kabango adamupeza mumzinda wa nacala provincia mdziko la mozambique acheza motere   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu idrissa baba walesi ulipo ah achimwene ndilipo mwasowatu ukutani mdziko la mozambique walesi akudya ku mozambique pajatu chibwerereni kuno 2014 ntchito yanga yampira basi nthawiyo ndakhala ndikusewera timu ya desportivo mpaka lero pamene ndasintha timu 
  umasewera yonseyi ku training kokha haha mwandinyozatu achimwene ndakhala ndikusewera pafupifupi gemu iliyonse chaka changothachi adandisankha ku timu kwathu ndatchinga kumbuyo 
  chibwerereni ku mozambique timu yako yasewera chaka chathachi ndiye sizidayende tathera nambala 12 mapointi 29 
  chachitika nchiyani uchoke ku timuyi tidali mgwirizano wa zaka ziwiri mgwirizano watha adandipempha ndisewererebe timuyi ndakana timu yomwe ndapita panoyi idandilonjeza zochuluka 
  timu yanji uzilandira zingati ferroviario de nacala yomwe idathera nambala 8 achimwene mpaka ndinene malipiro aah ayi nokha mutha kudziwa musalembe ndayamba timu imeneyi chaka chatha tili mgwirizano wa chaka chimodzi 26 february 2016

Text:
dpp yaima njiii gawo 64 65 chipani cholamula cha dpp chagwirizana zipani zotsutsa boma za mcp pp nkoyenera kutsata gawo 65 la malamulo oyendetsera lino limene limapereka mphamvu kwa sipikala kuchotsa phungu amene achoka chipani chimene adaimira apambane pachisankho ndikulowa chipani china 
  mlembi wamkulu wa chipanicho dr jean kalirani adati chipanicho sichikuopa chilichonse lamuloli ligwiritsidwe ntchito poti chikufuna malamulo lino azitsatidwa mosayangana nkhope 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc dpp yakonzeka kuonetsa chitsanzo chabwino pokwaniritsa malamulo oyendetsera lino ku nyumba ya malamulo chipani chathu chikaonetsetsa lamuloli ligwire ntchito aphungu azikhala mzipani zimene zidawanyamula paphewa akalowe kunyumbayo sitikufuna khalidwe lomwe lakhalapo kwa yaitali lomwe aphungu amangosintha zipani momwe afunira adatero kalirani 
  adati akuyembekeza chipani chake chimene padakali chili aphungu 49 mwa 191 kunyumbayo amene adalumbira pamipando yawo sabata ikuthayi chisankho chichitikanso mboma la thyolo komwe peter mutharika yemwe adapambana upulezidenti ku blantyre kumene yemwe amapikisana nawo adamwalira chisankho chisanachitike 
  zikusonyeza sichingapeze aphungu chipanichi chikhoza kukazunzika ku nyumba ya malamulo zimene chikufuna zidutse pamafunika aphungu 129 avomereze zidutse 
  mmbuyomu aphungu zipani zotsutsa boma akhala akukhamukira kuchipani cholamula sipikala mphamvu zochotsa aphungu otere zakhala zikukanika malinga ziletso zimene aphunguwo amatenga kukhoti zipani zolamula nazo zakhala zikuchita njomba pagawoli 
  zipani za udf dpp pp zidalephera kulondoloza za lamuloli 
  kalilani watinso chipanichi chikufuna kubwezeretsa gawo 64 la malamulo oyendetsera lino lomwe aphungu adalichotsa mchaka cha 1995 gawoli limanena oposa theka la amene adavota nawo pachisankho cha phungu asainira chikalata chimene mwa ovotawo apempha bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec kuchotsa phunguyo sipikala wa nyumbayo apatsidwe mphamvu zochotsa phunguyo potsatira ndondomeko za ku nyumba ya malamulo 
  kalirani adati chipanichi chitulutsa chitulutsa chikalata cha ndondomeko zomwe chitsate mabilo asakavute kudutsa ku nyumba ya malamulo 
  tsatanetsatane wa momwe tikwaniritsire titulutsa posachedwapa padakalipano amalawi adziwe zomwe momwe tichitire ayembekezere ndondomeko yomwe chipani cha dpp chitulutse adatero kalirani 
  adatinso akuyembekezera aphungu adzaika zofuna za ovota patsogolo kotero kugwiritsa ntchito malamulo awiriwa zili zomwe ovotawo akufuna aphungu akuyenera kudzakhala patsogolo kukwaniritsa posayangana chipani chomwe akuchokera 
  katsiwiri pandale dr mustafa hussein wa kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college ku zomba adati chipani cha dpp chingachitedi zomwe chalonjezazi demokalase ya lino ipita patsogolo poti khalidwe la aphungu losintha zipani zovala litha 
  gawo 65 la malamulo linoli lingatsatidwe iyi ikhala nkhani yabwino kwambiri pankhani ya demokalase lamuloli lichititsa phungu azikhala mchipani chomwe chidamutengera mnyumba ya malamulo adatero hussein 
  katswiri pandaleyu adatinso lamuloli lichititsa ovota akhale okhutira nyumbayo phungu wawo azikhala kumbali yomwe adamutumiza 
  pankhani ya gawo 64 hussein adati lamuloli lidzafumbatitsa mphamvu ovota azidzatha kuchotsa phungu yemwe sakuchita zomwe anthuwo adamuikira pampando 
  lamuloli lithekedi kubwereranso nkuyamba kugwiritsidwa ntchito zidzathandiza ovota mphamvu zomwe padakalipano alibe kwa yayitali ovota akhala akugwiritsidwa fuwa lamoto pomwe phungu yemwe adamuvotera amawakhumudwitsa samatha kumuchotsa asankhe wina ovotawo amadikira mpaka pathe zaka zisanu adzakhalenso chisankho adatero hussein 
  hussein adati amalawi akuyenera kuchenjera osamala pomwe akubweretsanso gawo 64 poti likhoza kubweretsa mpungwepungwe ndale adati akhoza kumatengerapo mwayi lamuloli nkuyamba kuipitsa kagwiridwe ka ntchito ka phungu cholinga chakuti achotsedwe chonsecho mumtima mwawo akufunanso mpandowo 
  ku nyumba ya malamulo aphungu oima pawokha ndiwo ambiri alipo 52 pomwe chipani cha dpp chili aphungu 49 chipani cha malawi congress mcp chidapeza aphungu 48 pomwe chipani cha peoples pp chili aphungu 26 chipani cha united democratic front chidapeza aphungu 14 
  kawirikawiri aphungu oyima pawokha ndiwo amakhala patsogolo kulowa zipani zina makamaka chipani cholamula
Label: POLITICS

Text:
kusefukila kwa madzi amtauni aiwalidwa maso mabungwe boma onse kuchigwa cha mtsinje wa shire komwe ambiri adakhudzidwa madzi osefukira 
  amene wapeza thandizo akumatsetserekera kumabomawa poiwala madera enanso pamoto ndikugwetsedwa kwa nyumba zawo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mwachitsanzo mumzinda wa blantyre ambiri adakhudzidwa ngoziyi thandizo lakhala likungopita ku chilobwe chimwankhunda maboma mulanje thyolo akuchigwa cha mtsinje shire 
  sabata yathayi bungwe la self help assistance program asap mogwirizana i m swedish development partner lidazungulira mzinda wa blantyre ukotu kwa t makata komwe adagwidwa tsemwe kuona momwe akuvutikira cha ngozi ya madzi 
  anthutu akusowa pokhala ana angonoangono pachithunziwa agwidwa njakata cha mvula yosaleka yomwe idagwa january 11 
  bungweli lidaperekako matani 25 000 ufa wachimanga matani 2 500 nyemba kwa mabanja 540 amene adakhudzidwa ngoziyi 
  banja lililonse lidalandira thumba lolemera makilogalamu 50 ufa makilogalamu 5 nyemba katunduyu adali wokwana k6.7 miliyoni 
  wa bungweli twisiwile mwaighogha adati nawonso adali wodzidzimuka ambiri akuvutika motere silikudziwa
Label: FLOODING

Text:
kulira kwanyanya mzipatala kubangula kulira mokweza kukumveka mzipatala za mdziko muno pomwe boma lachepetsa ndalama zopita kuntchito za chipatala potsatira mavuto zachuma amene lino likukumana nawo 
  mneneri wa unduna wa zaumoyo adrian chikumbe wavomereza za vutoli adati undunawo udalandira ndalama zochepa ku nthambi ya za chuma 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa odwala akuona masautso mzipatala tikuyesetsa tipeze ndalama zoonjezera pakadalipano tikuyankhula mabungwe omwe angatithandize adatero chikumbe 
  adati akuyembekezera ayankhidwa mwezi uno miyezi iwiri ikubwerayi 
  zipatala zachepetsa ntchito zambiri makamaka mayendedwe maambulansi chakudya chikumaperekedwa kamodzi kawiri patsiku mmalo mwa katatu 
  dokotala chipatala cha karonga charles sungani adauza tamvani achepetsa chakudya cha odwala kudya katatu kufikira kawiri patsiku 
  ambulansi nazo mafuta zilibe pakadali maambulansi akumangogwiritsidwa ntchito kunyamula amayi oyembekezera omwe mavuto adatero sungani 
  adati pofika sabata ya mawa mafuta amene nawo akhala atatha 
  mmaboma mzimba nkhata bay odwala akumadya chakudya kamodzi patsiku ambulasi zambiri zikungokhala kaamba ka kusowa kwa mafuta galimotozo ziziyenda 
  dokotala wamkulu mboma la nkhata bay albert mkandawire adadandaula ndalama yomwe adalandira yochepa kwambiri ithandizire zipatala zonse mbomalo 
  talandira k4.8 miliyoni yomwe ikuyenera kupita ku zipatala zoposa 20 ndalama imeneyi yochepa kwambiri itithandize pantchito za pachipatala adatero mkandawire 
  zinthu zili choncho mmaboma la dedza sadalimve kuwawa kwambiri vutoli aphungu nyumba ya malamulo adagwirana manja kuthandizapo 
  mneneri wa chipatala cha dedza arnold mndalira adati achipatala adawauza aphunguwo za kuchepa kwa ndalama zomwe zidabwera kuchoka kuboma 
  mndalira adati apa aphunguwo adasonkherana limodzilimodzi kuonjezera ndalama pachipatalapo 
  adapereka k2.4 miliyoni yomwe theka lidapita ku chakudya theka lina lidapita ku mafuta galimoto adatero
Label: HEALTH

Text:
apempha asamalire zitukuko zotsala mthandizi wa parish ya domasi dayosizi ya zomba peter mlomole apempha akhristu aku zomba cathedral madera boma la zomba asamalire zitukuko zomwe malemu peter zakiresiki akhala akulimbikitsa mdelaro 
 anatsogolera misayo mlomole pakati mlomole amayankhula idzi lachisanu mmudzi mwa group village headman ntogolo mdera la senior chief malemia mwambo wa nsembe ya ukalistia unakonzedwa bungwe la partners in action for sustainable development pasd njira imodzi yokumbukira mzimu moyo wa peter zakiresiki yemwe adamwalira 5 february mdziko la kwao ku canada ayikidwa mmanda lachisanu 14 february kwawo komweko ku canada 
 ati mpingo wa katolika ku zomba cathedral udzakumbukiranso yi kamba ka zitukuko zomwe analimbikitsa pomangira mpingowu matchalichi awiri nyumba zopangitsa rent kugula mipando ku school ya primary ya namikhate kugulira ma uniform choir zina zambiri 
 mlomole atinso kupatula kuthandidza mpingo wa katolika zakiresiki amathandidzanso bungwe la partners in action for sustainable development pasd mmadera mafumu akulu malemia mlumbe mboma la zomba 
 poyankhulanso pakutha pamwambo wansembe ya ukalistia yo wa bungwe la partners in action for sustainable development amos chiyenda nawo adzawakumbikira malemuwa kamba ka chikondi chomwe chali nacho kwa munthu wina
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
hrdc yati ichititsa ziwonetsero zatsopano zokakamiza ansah kutula pansi udindo bungwe lomenyera ufulu wa la human rights defenders coalition hrdc lati lichititsanso ziwonetsero zokakamiza wapampando wa bungwe loyendetsa chisankho la malawi electoral commission mec justice dr jane ansah makomishonala onse atule pansi maudindo 
 trapence tembo kumanja zanenedwa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe bungweli linachititsa lolemba mzinda wa lilongwe ati zionetserozi azikonza zidzachitike 28 mwezi uno 
 akulu akulu bungweli ati odabwa mpaka lero dr ansah sakutulabe udindo wawo adanenetsa bwalo la milandu la apilo litapezadi sadayendetse chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa cha chaka chatha 
 masiku apitawa akhala akunena amadikira khoti ligamule khoti lagamula sanayendetse zisankho tikudabwa mpaka sakusiya udindowu ndiye tingowachotsapo tokha ndikuika munthu oti ayendetse chisankho anatero tembo 
 ati kuli nthenda ya covid-19 ziwonetserozi zichitikabe akhala akutsata ndondomeko zomwe unduna wa zaumoyo akhazikitsa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
anatchezera akumandiipitsa zikomo agogo   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndili chibwenzi makolo akudziwa mwamphekesera chabe ina ake osati omubereka amafuna kumugwiririra ndiye akumandiipitsa dzina kwa ake sakutekeseka ndili mantha nditani pamenepa agogo fk mchinji fk wati uli mantha mantha ake otani sindikuonapo choti uzikhala mantha pamene sudalakwire munthu ndiye iwe ukuchita mantha ndani ngatidi ukunena zoona omupeza mtsikanayo adafunadi kumugwiririra bwenzi lakolo adachitapo chiyani zitachitika zimenezo kodi mtsikanayo nkhaniyi akuidziwa akuidziwa adachitapo chiyani ndikufunsa mafunso onsewa mlandu waukulu kugwiririra kufuna kugwiririra munthu wopalamula mlandu wotere amayenera kulangidwa kundende malinga malamulo lino munthu wotere ngosafuna kumusekerera ndibwerere kunkhani yako yoti uli mantha umamukonda zoona mtsikanayo pitiriza kutero tsiku lina udzakhala mpulumutsi kwa womupezayo mukadzakhala thupi limodzi mwina ake sakutekeseka zokuipitsira dzina lako akudziwa choona chenicheni maka pankhani yoti amuna amafuna kugwiririra mwana wawo akukhala chete akuopa angawasiye banja tazionapo zikuchitika 
  akuti tibwererane zikomo gogo ndinali pachibwenzi mtsikana wina kwa miyezi isanu umodzi pamene timati tipange ukwati mwezi wotsatira iyeyo adathetsa chibwenzi kutengana wina patatha miyezi iwiri adabwera kudzandipepesa ati tibwererane akwathu akukana kodi nditani pamenepa ng mzuzu ng utani pamenepa mvera malangizo makolo ako akwanu amene akuti usayerekeze kubwererana naye zimene akukulangizazo zoona akulu amakoma akagonera ukanyalanyaza udzalirira kuutsi tsiku lina adathetsa chibwenzi pakati iwe adakwatiwa wina kenaka patha miyezi iwiri uyo akubwera poyera undikhululukire tibwererane alibe manyazi chavuta komwe adakakwatiwako chiyani chilipochilipo ndiye iwe ukavomereza zoti mubwererane udzaoneka wombwambwana wodya masanzi 
  ndimukhulupirire agogo ndili pachibwenzi mnyamata wina ndakhala naye zaka zinayi chaka chino adakaonekera kwathu ineyo akundikaniza ndikaonekere kwawo ndikamufunsa akundikaniza chiyani sayankha zogwira mtima ndikamufunsa za ukwati amavomera mtima wonse ndimukhulupirire fannie blantyre
Label: RELATIONSHIPS

Text:
mwambo wa maliro wasintha ku com sukulu ya zaudotolo ya college of medicine com yasintha momwe mwambo wa maliro panyumba ya chisoni ya pasukuluyo mumzinda wa blantyre uzichitikira kuyambira november 1 2015 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu tsopano galimoto imodzi yokha ndiyo iziloledwa kufika kumalowa yomwe izikhala osaposera 10 panja pampanda wa sukuluyu pamene galimoto zimaima tsopano sipakuloledwanso paime galimoto 
  woyendetsa sukuluyu margaret longwe adatsimikizira msangulutso lachinayi msabatayi adati asaope kusinthaku 
  kotenga maliro kuzikhala osaposa 10 nayo mitengo yosamalira mtembo yasintha kuumitsa thupi embalming tsopano k50 000 kuchoka k10 000 kusunga usiku umodzi k10 000 kuchoka k1 000 pamene kusambitsa kuveka k15 000 kuchoka k10 000 
  china chomwe chasintha nkuti kumaloku sikuzikhalanso mwambo oona nkhope mwambo wa mapemphero mmalo mwake zizikachitika kumpingo 
  longwe akuti zonsezi zachitika kufuna kusamala malowa palibe chodandaulitsa apa dziwani iyi sukulu kukachitika maliro kumabwera ambiri mpaka kumachitira mapemphero zomwe si zabwino polingalira apa pasukulu 
  panjapanso pamakhala galimoto zambiri moti mwayi bwezi tikukamba pachitika ngozi sizidachitikepo ndiye zonsezi tachita tithandizane omwe amagwiritsira malo ano adatero longwe 
  adati akapita thupi kumaloko azifunsidwa kaye akwanitse malamulo atsopanaowo akakana thupilo lizibwezedwa 
  atafunsidwa alankhulepo za kukwera mtengo longwe adati iyi si nkhani yoti tikambirane 
  sitikulengeza mitengo mnyuzi simudamvepo tikulengeza amadzamva komwe kuno akabwera za mitengo palibe nkhani pamenepa kungowadziwitsa iiyamba ndondomeko zatsopanozi 1 november adatero 
  wophwanya lamuliro akuti adzalipa k50 000
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
mavuto osakata wenela tidakhala malo aja timakonda wenela zidaonekeratu zochita zikusowa kodi nkumachitanji pomwe zinthu zikukwera mtengo tsiku tsiku palibe womanga mabuleki   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi musandiuze za moya pete momwe ndidakuuzirani muja palibe icho achita lili auto pilot basi 
  nanga kusakaza nkhalango kwagundikaku mungati zinthu zikuyenda kodi nkhalango ndidaisiya kwathu kwa kanduku lero ndingakaipeze pamene ootcha makala sakugona kusaka njira zothera mitengo kumeneko pamene nkhalango zikutha moya pete akungoti asiya kugwirizana ampalamatabwa kuwaletsa kudula kesha msetanyani nanga abale ake andale amene amatulutsa nkhuni matabwa mbande za mitengo akuwasiya akudziwa mowe pati mgulumo mulinso uyu mulibe wa galimoto zake nanga uja mbale wathu wosowa ya lendi mtauni shati choyamba wa ku lower shire onse akuwadziwa 
  nanganso osauza abale ake eisssshcom inde anyamata oonetsetsa kuzima kwa magetsi kukufalikira inde kampani yogulitsa mdima nawonso amakhapa mitengo ati akonze mapolo kodi mdima amagulitsa mukadzapeza munthu akugulitsa mdima dziwani satana inde dyabulosi akaona munthu wotere amavula chipewa nkugwada kunena dutsani amfumu munthu wamkulu zedi thambo la kumwamba zonse zilambira ufumu wanu kuguwa kwanu palibe angayerekeze kufikako 
  abale anzanga nanga tsiku tsiku munthu wopuma wa umunthu angamasangalale kunena lero ndizimitsa kuwala akuba atambalale munthu wokhala umoyo wauzimu nkumanyadira timakanda tifera kumagetsi cholephera ntchito zamanyazi 
  chilichonse sichikuyenda 
  nanga adona hilida ndiye kuthawa wenela mopanda mantha uyu mafunso akuti ayankhe 
  nanga mwaiwala iyeyo ndiye adanena amene adaombera yomphwi ndikuwadziwa adasolola makobidi nkundigawira zawo wakudya nawo alibe mlandu 
  zoti ameneyu ndiye ankatsogolera tonse ojiya osolola osenza wenela kodi iyeyo abiti patuma bola ndani pomwe ndikukuuzani nkhaniyi mbale oswin pitapo akuyembekezera kulandira udotolo ndangomva kale atatsindika palibe katakwe posolola sukulu yaukachenjede kuja kwa chikanda ku zomba lachisanu imayembekezera kumupatsa udotolo wovuta ati doctor of philosophy in colossal tax payer pilferage of extraordinary proportions dotolo wamkulu chifwamba tsinzinantole wamkulu wamtali zala wamkulu kuposa onse nyapala wandende kaidi nanga ndatukwana ndirande iyi machinjiri iyo lilongwe kwerani ka starlet aka mukafika ndidakuwa
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
mpingo omwe amasonkhana kupemphera limodzi papa papa fransinco yemwe mtsogoleri wa katolika lonse wakumbutsa panopa akutsatira mapemphero osiyana siyana kudzera njira za makono makina intaneti cha nthenda ya covid 19 cholinga cha mpingo azisonkhana kupemphera limodzi mmatchalichi 
 papa francisco wapereka chenjezo walankhula lachisanu misa yomwe anatsogolera ku likulu la mpingo ku vatican pamene mliri wa coronavirus wavutitsa kwambiri zomwe zachititsa asiye kupita ku matchalitchi mmalo mwake akumatsatira mapemphero osiyanasiyana kudzera njira za makono zofalitsira mauthenga makina intaneti wati akhristu akuyenera kukumbukira mpingo gulu la omwe amabwera pamodzi kupemphera powonana maso maso 
 nkutheka iyi ya mliri wa coronavirus apusisika kumaganiza ukatha mliriwu palibenso chomasonkhanirana malo amodzi kumapemphera anatero papa 
 wati zomwe zikuchitika za kanthawi kochepa kotero pambuyo mliri wa coronavirus adzayenera kupitiriza kusonkhana malo amodzi ndikuchita mapemphero zinalili mliriwu usanabwere wati akuyenera kukumbukira kufunika kolandira ambuye yesu wokhala ukaristia kufunika kwa masakramenti sakramenti la kulapa wati akuzindikira zovutirapo iyi ya mliri wa coronavirus
Label: RELIGION

Text:
bungwe la umodzi community lathandiza zipatala za mboma la dedza bungwe la umodzi community mboma la dedza lapereka katundu osiyanasiyana othandizira ntchito yolimbana matenda covid-19 mzipatala zosiyanasiyana mbomalo 
 wa bungweli philimon kavala ati bungwe lawo linagula katunduyu ndalama zosachepera 3 milion kwacha cholinga chothandizira boma polimbana muliri wu 
 ati bungwe lawo limagwira ntchito omwe anapezeka kachirombo ka hiv omwe akuona chiopsezo chachikulu kamba kakufika kwa ku matenda wa 
 bungwe la umodzi community development tikupanga project yomwe ikubweretsa onse omwe anapezeka kachilombo ka hiv titaona omwe amalandira mankhwala ma arv chitetezo chimakhala chotsika taganiza zothandiza zipangizo zoyezera matenda covid-19 anatero kavala 
 ati athandiza katundu okwanira 3 million pomwe anagula ma thermometer ma rechargerble batteries ndowa
Label: HEALTH

Text:
akayidi atsopano adziyezedwa coronavirus mps nthambi ya ndende mdziko muno ya malawi prison service mps yati idziyamba yayeza akayidi omwe angomangidwa kumene kachirombo ka coronavirus 
 malinga wofalitsa nkhani za nthambiyi superintendent chimwemwe shawa njirayi ithandiza omwe akukayamba kumene ukayidi wawo asafikitse nthendayi mndendezi 
 adziyamba ayezedwa kaye tikugwira ntchito limodzi azachipatala powonetsetsa akayidi omwe akubwera azikayamaba ayezedwa kaye asanalowe ndende anatero supretendent shawa 
 nkhani yomwe mtsogoleri wa lino ananena yoti akayidi omwe anapalamula milandu ingonoingono atulutsidwe shawa wati padakalipano maina akayidi omwe ayerekedzedwa atulutsidwe aperekedwa ku komiti yomwe ikuwona za nkhaniyi 
 ndende za mdziko muno zodzadza akayidi sangakwanitse kumakhala motalikirana 1 mita tikuyesetsa akayidiwa apungulidwe zonse zaperekedwa ku komiti yowona zimenezi
Label: HEALTH

Text:
akufuna mayankho njala ya mzipatala mabungwe omwe si aboma ku rumphi ati akudikirabe yankho kwa mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika zakusowa kwa chakudya mzipatala zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mwezi wathawu mabungwe omwe pansi civil society network ku rumphi adachita zionetsero njira imodzi youza boma lichitepo kanthu zakusowa kwa chakudya pachipatala cha rumphi 
  banda chikalata chomwe adalembera boma mabungwewa adauza mutharika kudzera mchikalata chomwe adapereka kwa akuluakulu boma awayankhe pasanadutse sabata ziwiri 
  wotsogolera mabungwewa eunice banda wauza tamvani boma silinayankhebe chikalata chawocho 
  wati mabungwewa akufuna kukhalanso pansi apeze njira ina yopezera mayankho ku boma 
  titachita zionetsero boma lidapereka matumba 100 chimanga chakudya chimenechi chitha kumapeto mwezi uno zikutanthauza kukhalanso njala kuyambira mwezi wamawa adatero banda 
  nduna ya za masewero chikhalidwe grace chiumia masiku apitawa adauza mabungwe achepetse zionetsero chakuti boma limamva kamodzi 
  chiumia polankhula ku nkhata bay pamene amakhazikitsa ntchito zolimbana nkhanza mbanja adati ndalama zomwe mabungwe akugwiritsa ntchito pazionetsero azipititse kuntchito zachitukuko

Text:

Text:
chipembedzo cha chisilamu chayamikira kalata ya maepiskopi bungwe lowona za ufulu wa ku chipembezo cha chisilamu la muslim forum for democracy and peace layamikira chikalata maepiskopi mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno alemba momwe alankhulapo momwe zinthu zikuyendela mdziko muno 
 kawinga akuluakulu bungwe la mfdp wa bungweli sheikh jafah kawinga wauza radio maria malawi udindo wa mpingo kulankhulapo momwe zinthu zikuyenera kuyendera momwe mzika zikuyenera kuchitira pofuna kukweza lino 
 sheikh kawinga ati munthu thupi mzimu pamodzi choncho koyenera pamene mpingo ukupereka chiwuniko cha uzimu pomweponso mpingo upereke zofunika ku thupi 
 mpingo ukuyenera kulankhulapo pamene zikuchita pamene zisakuchita ukakhala chete ndiye ukugwirizana zomwe zikuchitikazo anatero sheikh kawinga 
 adzudzulanso omwe amanena mpingo wa katolika ukulowelera ndale ponena anthuwo sadziwa mbiri ya zipembedzo kaamba koti ati zimenezi zimachokera baibulo komans quaran

Text:
khansala adandaula otumiza ana ku jubeki wolemba sylvester kasitomu mboma la mangochi awapempha apewe ololera ana azitengedwa ndikupita nawo kunja kwa lino cholinga chofuna kukawapezera ntchito kamba koti wu ukuyika pachiopsezo miyoyo ya ana ambiri mdziko muno 
 khansala wa dera la nthundu mdera la pakati mboma la mangochi khansala coster bwanali amene wanena polankhula mtolankhani wathu 
 wati zomvetsa chisoni ana ambiri akapita mmayiko kukagwira ntchito akumakagwilitsidwa ntchito zoposa usinkhu wawo zina zosayenera kotero makolo akuyenera kumaonetsetsa akutetedza ana ku wu 
 akumangochi kuno timakonda kutumiza ana athu ku jubeki tisakudziwa komwe akukafikira munthu amene akumutenga tidziwe zolakwika tikuyenera kusiya khalidwe limeneli anatero bwanali 
 mwazina apempha makolo omwe atumiza ana mmaiko akunja akagwire ntchito zosiyanasiyana achenjere maka popewa kupasira anawa oti sakuwadziwa kaamba koti mwa amakhala zolinga zolakwika 
 boma la mangochi limodzi mwa maboma amene ambiri omwe akugwira ntchito ku maiko akunja zomwe zikuchititsa milandu yozembetsa ikule mbomali
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
kwaya ya sts symon and jude ithandiza radio maria malawi kwaya ya saints symon and jude ku chileka parishi ya lunzu arkidayosizi ya blantyre ya mpingo wa katolika yati udindo wa kuthandiza radio maria zinthu zosiyanasiyana 
 mkhalapampando wa kwayayi florence chirwa alankhula pambuyo popereka thandizo lawo ku wailesiyi mboma la mangochi 
 chirwa ati kwayayi si ya ochita komabe anachiona cha nzeru agawane wailesiyi zochepa zomwe nazo pofuna kuthandizira ntchito yofalitsa uthenga wabwino padziko lonse 
 titakhala pansi kwaya tinaona kofunika kuthandiza wayilesiyi popeza imathandiza mpingo wathu njira zosiyanasiyana tathandiza ndalama yokwanira 40 thousand kwacha anatero chirwa 
 polankhulapo wowona ntchito zokweza wailesiyi martha mwandira ayamikira kwayayi kaamba kofika thandizo lawo yoyenera pomwenso wayilesiyi ikukumana mavuto ambiri zachuma 
 othokoza kamba koti kwayayi yagwira ntchito yothandiza wayilesiyi thandizoli ligwira ntchito yoyenera anatero mwandira 
 apephanso akufuna kwabwino adzithandiza wayilesiyi molowa manja ntchito zake zipite patsogolo maka ino ya coronavirus pomwe zinthu zambiri zayima

Text:
apolisi ku ntcheu ayamikira mpingo wa katolika wolemba thokozani chapola apolisi mboma la ntcheu ayamikira mpingo wa katolika dayosizi ya ntcheu potengapo gawo pothandiza kukweza ntchito za apolisi mbomalo 
 mneneri wa apolisi mbomalo sub inspector hestings chigalu wanena pomwe bungwe la amayi parish ya ntcheu diocese ya dedza linayitanitsa apolisi achipatala njira yophunzilira zina mwa zomwe akuyenera posamalira mabanja 
 chigalu tiyamikire mpingo wa katolika ku ntcheu parish sub inspector chigalu ati mkumanowu wathandiza apolisiwa kufalitsa kwa ntchito zomwe amagwira zithandizira kuchepetsa umbava nkhanza maukwati ana achichepere mbomalo 
 tiyamikire mpingo wa katolika ku parishi imeneyi ya ntcheu tsiku limeneli tawaphunzitsa za mayendedwe abwino apansewu kukakamiza ana kulowa mbanja nkhanza kwa ana mbanja zina zambiri powauza za udindo wawo zinthu zosiyanasiyana mpingo anatero chigalu 
 mwa apolisi kulankhula amayi ku parishi ya ntcheu apempha mipingo ina itengerepo chitsanza zomwe mpingowu parishiyi wachita ponena khumbo lawo kugwira ntchito mipingo yonse mdziko muno 
 wapampando wa bungwe la amayi ku parishi ya ntcheu dayosizi ya dedza milliam chikafa ati mkumanowu unali wopambana 
 tinawaitana azatithandize nkhani za nkhanza za mbanja maufulu ana anatero chikafa 
 ati patsikulinso anayitana azachipatala azathandize amayiwa za matenda khansa ya khomo la chiberekero fistula edzi
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
agwiritse zokomera mulungu papa papa francisko wati akuyenera kugwiritsa zinthu zokhazo zokomera mulungu 
 papa francisko walankhula lachinayi misa yomwe anatsogolera ku likulu la mpingo ku vatican.iye wati cha zinthu zambiri zomwe zilipo zomwe zikuchitika masiku ano akhristu akuyenera kusamalitsa choncho asataye chikhulupiriro chao mwa mulungu 
 pamenepa wati kofunika akhristu azipempha chaulere cha mulungu pamene azindikira akusochera 
 wati ambiri amayamba chikhristu chao mapeto ake mfumu solomon amataya mulungu cha zinthu zosiyanasiyana 
 papa francisko wati mfumu solomon anayamba mfumu popempha luntha mapeto ake akazi ambirimbiri omwe adakwatira adamutayitsa mulungu woona nkuyamba kupembedza milungu ina wati mfumu solomon adayamba kutaya mulungu pangonopangono 
 papa francisko wati masiku ano akutaya mulungu pangonopangono poika mtima kwambiri chuma kunyada pongotchula zochepa chabe 
 wati nkoyenera akhristu azipempha chaulere cha mulungu pamene azindikira akusochera
Label: RELIGION

Text:
kalembera wa nzika wayamba boma kupyolera mnthambi ya national registration bureau nrb lachitatu lidayamba gawo loyamba lolemba amalawi akhale zitupa za unzika 
  gawo loyamba la kalemberayu idayamba mmaboma nkhotakota ntchisi m chinji kasungu salima dowa ntchitoyi imene ikhale mmagawo atatu idya k36.5 biliyoni amalawi 9 miliyoni alowa mkaundula 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka ntchito ya kalemberayo ku mchinji lachitatu malinga mneneri wa nthambi ya boma imene ikuyendetsa ntchitoyi ya nrb norman fulatira kalemberayu wayamba ndiwothandiza kwambiri 
  chitupa cha unzika kuthandiza mnjira zambiri apolisi akaona munthu amene akumukaikira wakunja azidzamufunsa aonetse chitupa chake polembetsa opindula ntchito za mthandizi sabuside ya chisankho kuchipatala amalawi azidzangoonetsa chitupa cha unzika adatero fulatira 
  fulatira adatsutsa malipoti oti pali mavuto malipiro omwe akugwira ntchitoyi adati boma silidalandire lipoti lina lililonse lokhudza mavuto 
  zomwe tikudziwa nzoti malipiro adachedwa masiku awiri oyambirira okha pomwe anthuwa maphunziro choti tidali tikuwakonzera ziphaso adatero fulatira 
  pamene ntchito yopereka zitupa za unzikayo yayamba bungwe lophunzitsa zosiyanasiyana la national initiative for civic education nice likuthana mphekesera zina zimene zingafoole amalawi kukalembetsa 
  malinga wa nice mchigawo chapakati akhala akufalitsa kalemberayu njira yothandiza kudzabera pachisankho cha 2019 
  azipembedzo amauzanso kalemberayu akusonyeza likutha akuti boma likungofuna kugwiritsa ntchito kalemberayu pokapemphera thandizo kumaiko kunja zonsezi nkhambakamwa chabe adatero naphiyo 
  adati bungwelo lifikira amalawi ambiri pofuna kuthana mphekeserazo zimene zingasokoneze ntchito ya kalemberayo 
  wa nice ollen mwalubunju adati ntchito yophunzitsa za kalemberayu imavuta madera adali ovuta kufika 
  kudali malo mmaboma ntchisi dowa komwe sitidafikeko nkovuta mayendedwe choncho tidapempha mafumu aphunzitsi kuphunzitsa anthuwa za kalemberayu adatero mwalubunju 
  mkuluyu adatinso agwiritsa ntchito wailesi za mmadera pofalitsa uthenga 
  adati bungwe lake lidakumananso vuto la kusowa kwa galimoto ntchitoyi imafuna kufikira mmadera ambiri 
  kupatula apo mwalubunju adatinso ophunzitsa anthuwa adakumana zikhulupiro zina zomwe sizilola kulembetsa 
  tidawalimbikitsa kalemberayu ngwa kupanda kutero kusemphana malamulo lino adatero mwalubunju 
  dc wa boma la mchinji rosemary nawasha adati mbomali mudalibe mavuto aliwonse pokonzekera kalemberayu
Label: POLITICS

Text:
kwelepeta adandaula kuchuka kwa atsikana osiya sukulu wolemba sylvester kasitomu wachiwiri kwa nduna yowoona zoti pasakhale kusiyana pakati amayi abambo ana olumala grace kwelepeta lolemba adandaula kaamba ka wosiyira sukulu panjira kwa atsikana ambiri mdziko muno 
 mai kwelepeta ayankhula mwambo wopereka njinga kwa ophunzira sukulu ya secondary yoyendera ya katsonga mboma la zomba zomwe bungwe la world bicycles relief lapereka kwa ophunzirawa 
 kwelepeta zimabwezera mbuyo chitukuko cha mwazina kwelepeta ayamika bungwe la world bicycles relief kaamba kopereka njingazi kwa ophunzirawa zomwe zithandize ophunzirawa asamasiyire school panjira kaamba koyenda mtunda wautali kupita ku sukulu 
 ndithokoze bungwe la world bicycles relief kaamba kopereka njingazi kwa ophunzirawa ndipezerepo mwayi olimbikitsa atsikana apewe olekera sukulu panjira poti zimasokoneza chitukuko cha anatero kwelepeta 
 polankhulapo pambuyo polandira njingazi mwa ophunzira pasukuluwa olive meja wayamikira bungweli kaamba ka thandizo la njindazi kaamba koti zichititsa ophunzira omwe amachokera madera akutali sukulu azifika nsanga 
 kawiwrikawiri ndimakonda kuchedwa kusukulu kaamba koti ndimayenda ntunda wautali zomwe zimandipangitsa kugona yophunzira kupatsidwa njingayi ndiyesa kufulumira kusukulu ndizakhoze mayeso anga anatero olive
Label: EDUCATION

Text:

 malipoti wailesi ya bbc ati maiko aku ulaya sakufuna kulanda ziphaso za umzika kwa anthuwa maiko germany denmark united kingdom alanda kale ziphaso kwa anthuwa omwe analowa gulu la zauchifwamba la jihadists 
 padakali la turkey likusungira asilikali mazanamazana ochokera mmaiko ndende zake cholinga chakuti afufuzidwe bwinobwino sakukhudzidwa gulu la zigawengali
