Text:
stanislaus chinguwo amwalira mwambo woyika mmanda thupi la malemu stanislaus chinguwo uchitika loweruka likudzali 30 may 2020 ku limbe cathedral arkidayosizi ya blantyre 
 malemu chinguwo chinguwo amwalira mbandakucha wa lero lachinayi 28 may 2020 ku chipatala cha mwaiwathu mzinda wa blantyre mwambo wa maliro ukuyembekezeka kudzayamba 10 koloko mmawa motsogozedwa arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosiziyo ambuye thomas luke msusa omwenso wapampando wa bungwe la maepiskopi mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la episcopal conference of malawi ecm 
 chikalata chomwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika latulutsa chati mawa sikukhala kusonkhana mapemphero mmalo mwake ansembe akhristu akupemphedwa adzipemphelera malemu chinguwo mmakomo mwawo mzimu wawo uwuse mtendere 
 malemu stanislaus chinguwo anabadwa 19 january mchaka cha 1969 amachokera ku namlenga parish arkidayosiziyo
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
maepiskopi apitirizabe kudzudzula boma mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno wati upitiriza kudzudzula mosakondera pamene zinthu zisakuyenda mdziko muno 
 mwa maepiskopi mpingo wa katolika ku malawi wapampando wa bungwe la maepiskopi mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno la episcopal conference of malawi ecm ambuye thomas luke msusa alankhula pothilirapo ndemanga za kulumbilitsidwa kwa atsogoleri atsopano lino omwe dr lazarus chakwera wachiwiri wawo dr saulosi chilima 
 ati ntchito yawo ma episkopi si yokhala mbali ya boma kuthandizana boma ntchito za chitukuko cha lino kulankhulapo pena sizikuyenda 
 tipitiriza ntchito yathu ya upostoli yomwe kulalikira kulankhulira pamene zinthu sizikuyenda kuliwuza boma likonze zimenezo sitisiya sitidzasiya kudzudzula boma tipitirizabe kulemba ma pastoral letter kudzudzula anatero ambuye msusa 
 mwazina ambuye msusa apempha atsogoleriwa alimbikitse mgwirizano pakati amalawi kupititsa patsogolo chitukuko cha lino pokwaniritsa malonjezo omwe amapereka nyengo yokopa
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
lundu kaomba apita ku mwambo wa kulamba mafumu kukapereka zowonga kwa kalonga gawa undi chaka chatha mafumu aakulu achewa muno mmalawi paramount chief lundu senior chief kaomba akana kunena apite kumwambo wa kulamba omwe ufike pachimake lero kulikulu la mfumu ya achewa mmaiko malawi mozambique zambia 
  mafumu awiriwa adasiya kupita kumwambowo mafumu achewa mmaiko atatuwa amapereka ulemu kwa mfumu yawo kalonga gawa undi kufotokoza momwe zinthu zikuyendera mmadera adasiya kupita kumwambowo pamene lundu yemwe mfumu ya amanganja achewa amanena gawa undi alibe ulamuliro paiye 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc lundu adati akulowererapo nkhaniyi 
  sindikuyankhani kalikonse ndikudziwa pali omwe amakutumani muzifunsa za nkhani imeneyi adatero gawa undi nkudula foni 
  kaomba adati sanganenepo kanthu lundu ndiye mphamvu zonena chochita pansi pake muchikhalidwe cha achewa 
  yankhulani paramount chief lundu amene angakuuzeni ndimatsatira zomwe anena wamkulu kwa zomwe anganene ndipanga zomwezo adatero kaomba 
  wapampando wa chewa heritage foundation chefo professor george kanyama phiri wati chiyembekezo choti mafumuwo apita kumwambowo 
  adati akuluakulu gululi limodzi mafumu akhala akukambirana kaomba lundu nkhani yokhudza kusemphana kwawoko zokambiranazo zimayenda 
  phiri wati kaomba lundu adali nawo ku zochitikachitika zofuna kupeza ndalama zomwe adakonza chefo 14 august 2013 zomwe akuti zidapereka chikhulupiliro chakuti mafumu awiriwa adzapita nawo kumwambo wa kulamba mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda adali mlendo wolemekezeka ku mwambowo 
  tidali nawo ku zochitika zomwe tidapanga tipeze ndalama pokonzekera mwambowu ndiye ndikhulupilira amenewa tidzakhala nawonso kumwambowu takhala tikukumana nawo kukambirana za nkhaniyi pamaoneka zinthu zimayenda phiri adauza tamvani lachiwiri 
  wati kusamvanako kudangoona kuchitika gawa undi lundu mpachibale choncho samayenera kulimbana 
  gawa undi weniweni wa paramount chief lundu kotero padalibe vuto lililonse kumuveka udindo wa kalonga adatero phiri 
  mwambo wa kulamba umachitika loweruka lomaliza la mwezi wa august chaka chilichonse pambali zolankhulalankhula mafumu kulamba pomwe amakapereka zokolola kwa kalonga gawa undi kumakhala zakudya zovala magule osiyanasiyana achewa njedza gulewamkulu chisamba otero 
  phiri wati chaka chino achewa akonza magule osiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo nyau ya ndege ya wa helicopter yomwe idzanyamule nyau zina za mitundumitundu kupita nazo kubwalo la mwambowo 
  yemwe adali wapampando wa chefo justin malewezi chaka chatha adauza tamvani kumwambowo la malawi lili mafumu 136 chichewa pomwe ku mozambique kuli mafumu 42 pomwe ku zambia aliko 36 
  malewezi panthawiyo adati kumwambowo kudafika achewa 1.5 miliyoni
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:
ntchentchefly zivuta ku lilongwe tsiku limenelo tidakhala wenela abiti patuma adati tipite ku lilongwe kumenetu ndalama zabooka malinga ungano wa aphungu malonda fodya 
  adati nditsagane nawo kumeneko 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu tidaimatu roundabout kameza kuimitsa galimoto iyi iyo nthawiyo nkuti abiti patuma atapita kukagula madzi atangobwera galimoto zidatiimira 
  anti mukupita kwa chingeni tiyeni adatero 
  ayi ndithu adayankha abiti patuma 
  inetu wa ku mwanza mukupita kumeneko kwerani ulere atatu mzimayiyo akhale kutsogolo adateronso wina wa galimoto yake yopuma 
  abiti patuma adapukusa mutu ndidagwira mchiuno kuthodwa 
  posakhalitsa padatulukira galimoto ina yofiira sindinaonepo galimoto yopuma imeneyo 
  tikukakhazikitsa galimotoyi ku lilongwe ya madzi iyi mtidzi osanena tiyeni adatero amene amayendetsayo 
  ndani akadakana mayesero okwera galimotoyo abiti patuma adakwera kutsogolo 
  nkhani imodziimodzi zidali kuphulika 
  ndikuchokera ku nansadi ku thyolo ndaona kukumangidwa nyumba zina mudzi uja basi ukhala tauni blantyre kulenga adatero mkuluyo tikudutsa zalewa 
  apolisi adali mbweee palibe adaimika galimotoyo 
  mwati ku thyolo kukumangidwa nyumba zina adafunsa abiti patuma 
  sindinatero malo angopezeka pamangidwenso manor ina mulimba adafunsa mkuluyo 
  abale anzanga musandifunse amatanthauzanji sindikuyankhani nanga kwathu kwa kanduku ziliko za ma manor mpumulo wa noma nawo ulipo kale kodi simukudziwa iyi penshoni ndani safuna zabwino kuukalamba adafunsa uja 
  adandipindanso 
  tsono titafika ku lilongwe uja adati tizungulire 
  ndisaname tidazungulira monse adayenda anyamata aja asadaomberane kalelo mukuwadziwa aja adazungulira lilongwe yonse akusakana mikangano ya ziboliboli kufuna kusinthitsa ndalama kuzungulira malo onse omwera mpaka kukaomberana pachipata kulimbirana ndalama zobooka za adona hilida 
  adona hilida kodi nsalu ija ankapachikira paphewa akupachikabe nanga richie wa kwawo akupita nawo konse ayenda muja ankachitira kalelo tidafika ku nyumba ya malamulo tidapeza akupha tulo inde adali atalumidwa kashembe ntchentchefly ija yotchedwa tsetse imene imayambitsa trypanosomiasis nthenda yogonetsa 
  tsono akupha tulo apayu uyu joliji mwati akudzatenga fupa la moya pete nanga tulo take timeneti adzatithandiza adanongona abiti patuma 
  mwamuiwala kodi pajatu ankati aletsa zotsitsa pagulu ndidatero 
  tsono momwe mukumuonera iyeyo akuchita emit ma gas ochuluka to bring environmental degradation or is it climate change adafunsa abiti patuma 
  adandipinda 
  sindimagona ndimaphethira wanuwanu amene ndidzatenge mpando wa moya pete sindimagona ndimaphethira mwana wanga msangalatsi mwamuiwala izeki mwana wanga ankafuna izeki ineyo ndikufuna kudzakhala moya pete musandiipitsire mbiri za tulo adalira munthu wamkulu 
  abiti patuma adamupatsa sand paper ati chibwano kaya chatani kaya
Label: FARMING

Text:
chikondi chidayambira kuubwana akuti chikondi chidayambira kuumwana kalelo pomwe ankasewerera limodzi nkumakula kalera ku salima lero akhala thupi limodzi 
  francis tayanjah phiri mtolankhani wodziwika yemwe akugwira ntchito kukampani ya times group sabata yathayi adamanga chinkhoswe nthiti yake stella kamndaya yemwe mphunzitsi ku lumbadzi mboma la dowa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi tayanjah dona stella kugonekerana khosi patsiku la chinkhoswe tayanjah adati mzaka za mma 1980 ake ankaphunzitsa pasukulu ya pulayimale ya kalera limodzi ake stella mabanja awiriwa adali pachinzake cha ponda apa nane mpondepo zomwe zidabzala mbewu ya chikondi mwa ana 
  anzanga onse yemwe ndinkagwirizana naye kwambiri adali iyeyu kufikira pomwe ndidapita kukapanga maphunziro utolankhani naye adakapanga kozi ya uphunzitsi kuyambira pamenepo tinkangomva wina uku wina uku adatero tayanjah 
  adati kutalikiranako sikudafufute chikondi chomwe adali nacho pakati wina mnzake ankaganiziranabe zonse mpakana mwamwayi adakumana akuyendera zake mumzinda wa lilongwe nkukumbukira kale lawo 
  cha chikumbumtima cha kale lathu titakumana padalibe chilendo chilichonse tidayambiranso kucheza ndidaona ubale womwe adatiphunzitsa makolo athu kalelo tiuonetsere kudziko adatero tayanjah 
  adati nyengo ikupita machezawo adapereka maganizo banja mtima udadzadza chimwemwe choopsa stella atavomera 
  naye stella adati kwa adali maloto okoma oti ukadzuka zomwe umalotazo zikuchitikadi uli maso 
  ndidalibe chotengera ndikaganize ndimuone kaye ndakula naye nzeru zake khalidwe lake chikondi chake zonse ndidali ndikudziwa kale tili ana adatero stella 
  adati chiyembekezo cha banja lapamwamba tayanjah pemphero lake lakuti mulungu awapatse luntha lomwe adapatsa makolo pakasungidwe ka banja kaleredwe ka ana 
  tayanjah amachokera mmudzi mwa rubeni t kambwiri ku salima stella kwawo kwa daniel t maganga ku salima komweko
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
mls yalasa bungwe la akadaulo za malamulo mdziko muno la malawi law society mls ladzudzula zipani za ndale wa bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec apolisi okonza zionetsero mkokemkoke wabuka zolengeza za chisankho cha 21 may 
  bungwe la mec motsogozedwa jane ansah lidatulutsa zotsatira za chisankho pomwe lidati mtsogoleri wa chipani cha dpp peter mutharika ndiye adapambana chisankhocho motsatizana lazarus chakwera wa mcp pomwe saulos chilima wa utm adali wa chitatu chakwera chilima adatengera kukhoti mec dpp ponena chisankhocho sichidayende 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka ansah ndiwayankha mls pambuyo mgwirizano wa mabungwe omenyera ufulu wa wa human rights defenders coalition hrdc wakhala ukukonza zionetsero zofuna ansah atule pansi udindo pazionetserozo pakhala pakuchitika zipolowe katundu wina wa boma wa wakhala akuonongedwa 
  lachitatu mls idalembera kalata mutharika chakwera chilima ansah wa hrdc timothy mtambo sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo catherine gotani hara wa apolisi rodney jose kutambasula zolakwika zimene akuona 
  chikalatacho adasayinira mlembi wa mls martha kaukonde chidati chikudabwa pali ziwawa zoti ansah achoke sakuchoka katundu akuonongeka wochuluka osangotula pansi udindowo idatero kalatayo 
  mls idadzudzula atsogoleri ndalewo ati sakuuza owatsatira mlandu uli kukhoti ukhonza kukomera 
  tikudabwa andalewo akuchititsa misonkhano ya kampeni mmalo mowakonzekeretsa owatsatira khoti likhoza kugamula mosawakomera malingana zonenedwa mukhoti tikumbutsane mec bwalo la milandu lokha limene linganene chisankho chidayenda ayi 
  zopereka maumboni mchezo wa internet sizitithandiza idatero kalatayo 
  kalatayo idadzudzulanso mutharika kaamba kolola otsatira chipani chake zionetsero za mpikisano motsutsana amene akuti sadapambane sabata yatha otsatira chipani cha dpp adayenda mumzinda wa blantyre adakathera ya sanjika kumene mutharika adawatsimikizira chipani chake chipitiriza kulamula mpaka 2084 
  iyo idati hrdc iyenera kulingalira mozama za zionetsero zimene yakhala ikukonza zingapindulire wa amalawi 
  mls idadzudzula apolisi polephera ntchito yawo yoteteza amalawi katundu wawo ya zionetserozo pamene ofuna ansah achoke adachita zionetsero otsatira adamenya anthuwo apolisi amangoyangana asirikali malawi defence force mdf ndiwo adaletsetsa anthuwo 
  chofunika tsopano nchoti pakhale kukambirana pakati onse okhudzidwa bata mtendere zibwerere mdziko muno idatero kalatayo 
  pempho loti pakhale kukambirana likudza pomwenso bungwe la mipingo loona momwe zinthu zikuyendera mdziko muno la public affairs committee pac lakumana kale chakwera chilima amene avomereza kukambiranako 
  wapampando wa bungwelo ambuye thomas msusa ndiye akuyenera kuluzanitsa atatuwo akuyenera kukumana kaye mutharika akonze tsiku la zokambiranazo 
  polankhula mtolankhani wathu chakwera adati adalandira kalatayo amayembekezera kumva kwa alangizi ake za malamulo asanayankhepo kanthu chilima naye adati adalandira kalatayo adati mneneri wa chipani chake joseph chidanti malunga ndiye angayankhe malunga adati sanakambirane zoti anene 
  ansah adati ayankha mls zomwe adalembazo 
  mlandu wa chisankho ulowanso mbwalo lachisanu likubwerali mumzinda wa lilongwe mls ikutenga nawo mbali pamlanduwo pounikira bwalolo zina zina zokhudza malamulo
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
mpingo ukana mbusa womangidwa za zitupa mpingo wa lords chosen charismatic revival ministries lccrm wakana zomwe munthu wina wa ku cameroon adauza nthambi yoona za olowa kutuluka mdziko muno mbusa mtsogolera wa mpingowu mdziko muno 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc abusa akhrisitu mpingowu ati israel ejelli adachoka mumpingowo atapempha kulikulu lawo ku nigeria amuchotse patchalitchipo chosasangalala zomwe 
  mwa abusa akuluakulu mumpingowu desmond ugochukwu wa ku nigeria wati ejelli wa mpingowu kuno ku malawi ankachita zosemphana malamulo mpingowu sankalemekeza mtsogoleri wa mpingowu 
  vuto lenileni lomwe nalo lakuti amaderera mtsogoleri wa mpingo wathu lonse mbusa lazarus muoka yemwe ku nigeria amaphwanya malamulo mpingo wathu adatero ugochukwu 
  wati mpingowu udaganiza zoyamba kumusala likulu la mpingowu lidatumiza mbusa wina peter ndukwe wochokeranso ku nigeria adzatenge udindo wotsogolera mpingowu 
  ugochukwu akuti mbusa wokanidwayo ataona sakugwirizana akhristu mumpingowo adapempha kulikulu akufuna kuchoka mumpingowo adamulembera kalata yomuvomereza kuchokako yomwe adadzaipereka kutchalitchiko 
  mmabuku mwathu tikudziwa zoti adatuluka mumpingo si mbusanso tikudabwa akumagwiritsa ntchito mpingowu chizindikiro chake posachedwapa atamangidwa adauza apolisi mtsogoleri wa mpingo uno chonsecho adapuma mtsogoleri panopa mbusa peter ndukwe 
  zimenezi zakwiyitsa akhristu athu tikhala pansi tione chomwe tingachite asanapitirize kuononga mbiri ya mpingo adatero ugochukwu 
  mneneri wa nthambi yoona za olowa kutuluka mdziko muno kuofesi ya ku lilongwe ealack banda adati ejelli adamangidwa pamlandu wopanga ziphaso zachinyengo 
  adati nkhaniyi idaphulika akuofesi ya kazembe wa la china atauza nthambiyi munthu wina adapita kuofesiko ziphaso zinayi zachinyengo zomwe ankafuna kutengera zilolezo za ku ghana 
  titamva tidamanga munthuyo daniel bart plange wa zaka 32 titafufuza nkhaniyi idakhudzanso mbusayo ejelli tidawamanga adatero banda 
  akuluakulu mpingowu ati kalata zomwe mpingowo udamupangitsira ejelli adzagwire ntchito mbusa kuno ku malawi zidatha ntchito 
  mpingowu akuti udabwera kuno ku malawi 2003 uli nthambi ku lilongwe ku area 2 ku mzuzu 
  banda wati ejelli anamutulutsa pabelo akuti azikaonekera ku ofesi yowona za olowa kutuluka mdziko muno lolemba lililonse pomwe mnzakeyo bart plange kundende ya maula onse akudikira tsiku la mlandu 
  tidalephera kulankhula ejelli samadziwika kumene akukhala 
  awiriwa akadzapezeka olakwa adzamangidwa kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kwa zaka chophwanya gawo 356 la malamulo lino
Label: RELIGION

Text:
papa wapempha akhristu akhale odzichepetsa mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wapempha akhristu akhale odzichepetsa yesu khristu 
 papa francisko malinga malipoti wailesi ya vatican papa francisco anapempha akhristu omwe anasonkhana bwalo la st peters square akonde kupemphera pemphero la mthenga wa njelo kwa mai maria ayesetse kuyenda mmapazi yesu khristu 
 wati zomvetsa chisoni akhristu ambiri amalephera kutengera khalidwe la ambuye yesu khristu chokomedwa zinthu za mdziko
Label: RELIGION

Text:
amayi amachawi akufuna chilungamo chiwoneke kuphedwa kwa mzimayi ku mangochi gulu la amayi machawi mboma la mangochi lati lifunitsitsa pakhale chilungamo mlandu wa kuphedwa kwa mzimai wina wachikulire wa mbomali yemwe amaganiziridwa nkhani ya ufiti 
 wapampando wa gululi mai triza masauli omwe alankhula lachisanu mbomali msonkhano wa atolankhani 
 ati ufulu wa munthu moyo choncho pakuyenera pakhale dongosolo labwino loyendetsera mlanduwu cholinga chakuti chilungamo chisaponderezedwe 
 ndife okhudzidwa kwambiri cha imfa ya mzathu yemwe anangophedwa nkhuku timati tipemphe zimenezi zisadzachitikenso kuno ku mangochi anatero masauli 
 pamenepa apempha achitetezo magulu owona za maufulu atenge gawo lalikulu kafukufuku wa nkhani yi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
apempha akhristu afikire osowa nyengo ya khilisimasi george kaliati otumikira mpingo wa katolika arkidayosizi ya blantyre apempha akhristu mpingowu mdziko muno afikire osowa nyengo ya khilisimasi yomwe ikudzayi 
 anena loweruka ku limbe cathedral arkidayosizi ya blantyre pambuyo m`bindikiro wa tsiku limodzi wokozekeretsa akhristu mparishiyi nyengo ya khilisimasi yomwe ikudzayi 
 kaliati kujambulitsa mwa akhristu omwe nawo mbindikirowo kaliati omwe mfumu parish ya st pius arkdayosiziyi omwe anatsogolera m`bindikilowu ati akhristu achikatolika akuyenera khrisimasi yawo mwachikhiristu mosiyana momwe mdziko amachitira 
 khirisimasi ya akhristu yosiyana achikunja akhrisitu tikuyenera kukulitsa moyo wauzimu kupemphera kulapa anatero kaliati 
 khirisimasi nyengo osati tsiku anaonjezera motero kaliati 
 kaliati anapitiriza kupempha akhristu achikatolika afikire omwe osowa nyengo imeneyi ponena nyengoyi yowonetsa chikondi cha mulungu kwa ake 
 akuyenera kuziwa chifundo cha mulungu nyengo imeneyi kudzera zitsanzo zathu zabwino anapitiriza motero kaliati 
 mau ake wapampando wa tchalitchi la limbe cathedral andrew kabvala akhristu m`bindikirowu wawapindulira kwambiri makamaka pakumvetsetsa khrisimasi yomwe ikuphatana kwatunthu kubadwa kwa yesu khrisitu 
 tazindikira kufunika kwa kulapa makamaka pamene tikukonzekera kubadwa kwa yesu khristu anatero kabvala 
 omwe anatenga nawo gawo m`bindikirowu akhristu onse ozungulira tchalitchi la limbe ochokera mmatchalitchi omwe azungulira tchalitchichi cholinga cha mbindikirowu chinali kuwakozekeretsa akhristu kubadwa kwa yesu khristu zoyenera nyengo ino ya advent
Label: RELIGION

Text:
papa apemhelera mliri wa covid-19 loweruka mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco akuyembekezeka mapemphero pofuna mliri wa coronavirus uthe 
 papa anapempheleraponso okhudzidwa coronavirus mmbuyomu malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa achita mapemphero kolona loweruka likudzali mogwirizana malo oyera onse lonse la pansi mutu wa mapemphero kolonawa okhulupirika mmapemphero limodzi amayi mari papa francisco adzachita mapemphero kolonawa grotto la ku lourdes lopezeka kulikulu la mpingo ku vatican 
 mapempherowa omwe adzayambe ya 5:30 pm ya ku rome yomwe nthawinso ya ku malawi adzauluka pompopompo live wayilesi ya kanema ku lonse la pansi 
 ya mapempherowa ma grotto akuluakulu la pansi adzalumikizananso papa francisco kudzera makina intaneti ma grottowa lourdes fatima lujan milagro guadalupe san giovanni rotondo pompeii
Label: RELIGION

Text:
ku zomba abwekera feteleza wa mbeya   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc odwala kuchipatala cha zomba central bungwe la millennium villages projects mvp lati yakwana pamene alimi akuyenera kukolola pogwiritsa ntchito feteleza watsopano wotchedwa mbeya amene akumakonzedwa ku zinthu zopezeka mmadera osiyanasiyana mdziko muno 
  wa bungwe la mvp dr andrew daudi adalankhula kuchionetsero cha zaulimi chimene chidachitikira pabwalo la mfumu john masamba kwa t mlumbe mboma la zomba 
  chionetsero cha ulimichi chidakonzedwa pofuna kupereka mwayi kwa alimi mabungwe osiyanasiyana amene amakhudzidwa nkhani za ulimi akaphunzire kwa alimi zimene kuminda kumadimba osiyanasiya mmadera mwawo 
  feteleza wa mbeya akupangidwa posakaniza ndowa imodzi ya deya ndowa imodzi ya zitosi za nkhuku nkhumba theka la ndowa la phulusa makilogalamu 10 feteleza wa msitolo 
  akatha kusakaniza alimiwa akumazikulunga mthumba la pulasitiki kuzisunga pozizira kwa masiku 21 tsiku la 21 likafika amazitulutsa kuziyanika pamnthuzi kwa masiku awiri akatero feteleza watheka 
  ubwino wa fetelezayu wakuti safuna ndalama zochuluka amakonzedwa kuzinthu zopezeka mosavuta deya phulusa madzi manyowa mlimi angoyenera kugula makilogalamu 10 feteleza wachitowe wobereketsa 
  feteleza wa mbeya saononga nthaka mmene amachitira winayu kotero tikuwalimbikitsa alimi agwiritsitse felereza ameneyu adatero daudi phungu wa ku nyumba ya malamulo wa derali grace maseko amene adali mlendo wolemekezeka pamwambowu adayamikira bungwe la mvp pochita kafukufuku wakuya za mmene angatukulire ulimi pakati alimi kumudzi cholinga chakuti nkhani ya njala ikhale mbiri yakale mdziko muno 
  phunguyu adatinso akamema anzake ku nyumba ya malamulo alimbikitse boma mabungwe osiyanasoiyana limutenge feteleza wa mbeyayu chida chimodzi chothandizira kuthesa njala mdziko muno 
  alimi ambiri amene agwiritsa ntchito fetelezayu kumadimba kwawo akusimba lokoma akolola zinthu zochuluka chaka chino anena motsimikiza nyengo yobzala mbewu ikubwerayi agwiritsa ntchito feteleza wa mbeyayu basi 
  fetelezayu akutchedwa mbeya adachokera mumzinda wa mbeya ku tanzania kumene akatswiri zasayansi kumeneko atachita kafukufuku adaona akhoza kupindulira alimi ochuluka zedi
Label: FARMING

Text:
zaka 30 zolimbana umphawi zapita mmadzi bungwe loona za maphunziro sayansi chikhalidwe mumgwirizano wa maiko la unesco lati la malawi lalephera kutukula miyoyo ya ovutika mzaka 30 zomwe lakhala likuyesetsa kutero 
  zotsatira za kafukufuku yemwe bungweli lidapanga pogwiritsa ntchito nthambi ya zakafukufuku ya centre for social research zaonetsa mmalo mosintha miyoyo ya zomwe boma lakhala likutsatira mmagawo atatu zangowonjezera mavuto amalawi 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndondomeko zothetsera umphawi zalephera kukwaniritsa zolinga zake pamene amalawi ambiri akusaukirasaukirabe zotsatira za kafukufuku yemwe adachitika zaonetsa mavuto omwe amayi achinyamata ana angonoangono olumala amakumana nawo adaonjezereka cha zomwe zimayenera kuchepetsa mavutowo lipoti la zotsatira za kafukufukuyo latero 
  malingana lipotili ndondomekozi zidayamba mzaka za mma 1980 pomwe mabungwe world bank international monetary fund imf adayambitsa pologalamu yosintha zinthu ya structural adjustment programme 
  itatha pologalamuyi mzaka za mma 1990 boma lidakhazikitsanso pologalamu yothetsa umphawi ya poverty alleviation programme kenaka poverty eradication programme itatha iyi kudabweranso pologalamu ya malawi growth and development strategy mgds 
  lipoti la bungwe la unesco lati chodandaulitsa nchakuti mapologalamu onsewa adalephera kukwaniritsa zolinga zake mmalo mwake zidangoonjezera mavuto omwe zimafuna kuthetsawo 
  potsirapo ndemanga zomwe bungweli lanena nduna ya zachuma goodall gondwe wati kutsutsa zotsatira za kafukufukuyu nkulakwitsa chofunika momwe muli zigweru zofunika kukonza mavuto umphawi kusiyana pachuma pakati opeza osauka kuchepe 
  gondwe adati boma lipanga zotheka mavutowa azitha pangonopangono mpaka idzafike yoti onse pamtendere mavuto achepa 
  katswiri zachuma henry kachaje wati nkhani yotukula chuma kuchepetsa mavuto omwe amakumana nawo njofunika kugwirana manja pakati boma makampani omwe si aboma mabungwe 
  mkuluyu wati chuma chikwere apepukidwe mpofunika kuyamba kutukula ntchito za malonda kukonza kayendetsedwe ka chuma cha boma pokonza ndondomeko ya chuma yabwino kuitsatira 
  nkhani yothetsa mavuto si yapafupi njotheka bola patakhala ndondomeko yabwino ya chuma cha boma njira zoyendetsera ndondomekoyo mwaluntha china kulimbikitsa mgwirizano pakati boma makampani mabungwe adatero kachaje 
  aphungu ku nyumba ya malamulo akuyembekezeka kuyamba mwei uno akakambirane za ndondomeko ya chuma cha 2016/2017 kachaje adati apa poyenera kuyambira popanga ndondomeko yoganizira za umphawi wa 
  malinga zotsatira za kafukufuku yemwe adachitikayu mavuto kusiyana kwakukulu chuma pakati magulu osiyanasiyana nyumba za boma zomwe sizidamangidwe moganizira olumala kusiyana mphamvu pakati amayi abambo mwa mavuto akuluakulu 
  lipoti la bungwe la oxfam lomwe nyuzipepala ya the nation ya 22 january 2016 lidadzudzulanso wolowetsa ndale chuma cha womwe lidati kukupangitsa vuto la umphawi lizinkera mtsogolo 
  lipotilo lidati atsogoleri ndale amabizinesi akuluakulu amadzikundikira chuma pomwe osauka akungosaukirabe 
  wa bungwe la aid and development charity john makina adati zomwe zili mulipotili zimaonekera poyera potengera nyumba sitolo amakono zomwe zikumangidwa mmizinda ikuluikulu ya lilongwe blantyre mzuzu 
  adati pomwe mmizindayi mukutukuka chonchi mmadera akumidzi akunka nalowa pansi kusonyeza ndalama zili mmanja mwa ochepa pomwe ambiri akuvutika 
  mavuto kuchepa kwa chisamaliro kwa okalamba ana amasiye mabanja omwe amayanganiridwa amayi ana zomwe zimapangitsa opempha azichuluka makamaka mmisewu mmizinda ya lino 
  manambala akusonyeza magawo atatu ndondomeko zomwe takhala tikutsatira sadaphule kanthu polimbana kusiyana pakati amuna amayi asungwana ana achichepere likutero lipotilo 
  wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe olumala la federation of disability organisations in malawi fedoma amos action adati olumala amodzi mwa omwe amakumana mavuto aakulu kusalidwa 
  adati zina zomwe zidakhazikitsidwa nzabwinobwino vuto limakhala potsatira mfundozo zotsatira zofunikazo zikwaniritsidwe
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
mse ipereka maphunziro apa intaneti kwa atolankhani kampani yogulitsa ma share ya malawi stock exchange yati kudzera mwa atolankhani kwapafupi amvetse momwe msika wa ma share umakhalira 
 kanyangala atolankhani ofunika kwambiri mwa akuluakulu kampaniyi kelini kanyangala awuza radio maria malawi lolemba pakuyamba kwa maphunziro sabata imodzi internet omwe kampaniyi yakonzera atolankhani ochokera mnyumba zofalitsa nkhani zosiyansiyana za mdziko muno 
 kanyangala ati maphunzirowa athandiza kwambiri kuzindikiritsa ambiri za momwe angachitire akufuna kugula ma share kamba koti atolankhaniwa adzatha kufotokozera pambuyo maphunzirowa zomwe ati zothandiza kwambiri chitukuko cha lino 
 malawi stock exchange mse timazindikira gawo lofunikira lomwe atolankhani amatengapo maka potenga gawo pofalitsa nkhani zapa msika wama share talimbikitsa ubale umenewu pochita maphunziro apa intaneti anatero kanyangala 
 ati maphunzirowa athandiza atolankhaniwa kumvetsa nkhani za malonda akakhala mafunso azidziwa kokafusa
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
zaka zinayi kwa ofuna kuba alubino njonda ziwiri zochokera mboma la mzimba lachitatu zidagamulidwa kukasewenza jere kwa zaka zinayi kugwira ntchito yakalavula gaga chofuna kuba cholinga chopha mwana wa chialubino wa zaka zinayi wa mwamuna 
  lusungu sele wa zaka 30 amachokera mmudzi mwa mkoko t chindi jailosi luwanda wa zaka 24 wochokera mmudzi mwa vakalani kwa senior chief mtwalo adanyengerera womupeza wa mwanayo amube pamtengo wa k20 miliyoni 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu bwalo la milandu la mzuzu 21 decemberlidamasula bamboyo christopher kumwenda wa zaka 38 yemwe amachokera mmudzi mwa kumwenda t mzikubola mboma la mzimba ati popeza padalibe umboni wokwanira woti adali cholinga chogulitsa mwana womupezayu 
  apa nkhaniyi idatsalira sele luwanda 
  wapolisi woimira boma pamilandu lloyd magweje adauza bwalolo sele adalumikizana luwanda yemwe amakhala ku mzuzu ndiye adzagule mwanayo diluyo ikatheka 
  bwaloli lidamva mphepo za chiwembuchi zitamupeza mayiyo adathawitsa mwana wakeyu kupita naye mmudzi mwa chisewe mboma lomwelo 
  25 august chaka chatha sele adatsatira mwanayu mmudzimu pomwe adali pagulu la anzake 
  apa diluyo idapheduka popeza sele adayamba wafunsa wachibale wa mwanayo za momwe angamupezere wachibaleyu adakatsina khutu wa mwanayo yemwe adakanena kupolisi akusakidwa 
  magweje adapempha bwaloli liwapatse awiriwa chilango chokhwima milandu yotere ikuchulukira mwanayo adasiya anzake amatsekeredwa mnyumba 
  podandaula sele adauza bwalolo limupatse chilango chozizira poti amasamala banja lake pamene luwanda adati wamasiye amasamala mkazi ana ake awiri 
  poweruza majisitileti tedious masoamphambe adati chilango chomwe abwalo amayenera kupereka chimafunika chikhale choti akhutitsidwe nacho chithandiza kuteteza ma alubino omwe akuphedwa kuchitidwa nkhanza 
  masoamphambe adati komabe chilangochi chimafunika chikhale chogwirizana mlandu asaganize awiriwa alangidwa mwankhanza 
  ndili chikhulupiliro chilangochi chiwasintha nzika zabwino masoamphambe adatero asadapereke chigamulocho 
  chigamulochi sichidasangalatse bungwe loona za ufulu wa alubino la association of people with albinism in malawi 
  mtsogoleri wa bungweli bonface massa adati akadakonda akadapatsidwa zaka zosachepera 14
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
zipani zigonjera chiletso cha escom chipani cha mcp chati chichotsa mbendera pamapolo zipani za ndale mdziko muno zagwirizana chiletso cha bungwe loyendetsa ntchito za magetsi mdziko muno la escom choti zipani zandale zisamapachike mbendera zawo pazipangizo zake mapolo magetsi 
  mneneri wa chipani cha mcp jessie kabwila wati bungwe la escom lolandiridwa paganizo lakeli wapempha bungweli litsate njira zabwino pochotsa mbenderazo kuopa kuononga 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc escom sakulakwitsa akuganizira za chitetezo cha tingopempha pakhale kulumikizana kwabwino katundu wathuyu asaonongeke poti wodula adatero kabwila 
  mlembi wamkulu wa chipani cha pp wakuda kamanga naye wati palibe cholakwika bungwe la escom ngozi za magetsi zimaopsa makamaka akuseweretsa zida za magetsi 
  iyi njira imodzi yomwe bungwe la escom laona ikhoza kuthandiza kuchepetsa ngozi kuteteza katundu wawo choncho tikambirana achinyamata athu akachotse mbendera zomwe zili pamapolo magetsi adatero kamanga 
  mneneri wa chipani cha dpp nicholas dausi adati chipani chawo sichipachika mbendera zawo mmapolo magetsi 
  zimenezo mukafunse pp sitiika mbendera pamapolo magetsi adatero dausi tamvani itamufunsa za maganizo chipani chake chiletso cha bungwe la escom 
  wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa bungwe la escom george mituka wati bungweli lidayamba kuganiza za nkhaniyi kalekale lakhala likukambirana makampani makhonsolo chimene angachite 
  mituka adati aganiza zochita poona mmene mchitidwewu wakulira momwe ngozi zokhudza magetsi zikuchitikira 
  nkhaniyi tidaiyamba kalekale taona zanyanya ndiye palibe kuchitira mwina moti tayamba kale kuthothola adatero weachiwiri kwa mneneri wa bungweli 
  mneneri wa bungwe loyendetsa zisankho mdziko muno la malawi electoral commission mec sangwani mwafulirwa wati mlandu kupachika mbendera za chipani mmalo osaloledwa malamulo mec sanena chilango chomwe wopezeka akutero angalandire 
  bungwe la escom lidaletsa zipani kupachika mbendera zawo pazipangizo zake maka mapolo magetsi lidati lidzathothola mbendera zipangizo zina za kampeni zomwe zidapachikidwa kale 
  bungweli lati kupatula mchitidwewu woopsa zipangizo zawo zimawonongeka zimasokoneza ntchito zawo 
  escom sidzakhudzidwa ngozi iliyonse yomwe ingaoneke pomwe akupachika mbendera pamapolo magetsi idzaimba mlandu yemwe adzapezeke akupachika mbenderazi pamapolo ake pomaliza escom ithothola mbendera zonse zomwe zidapachikidwa kale chatero chikalata cha escom 
  bungwe la escom lanena layamba kale kuchotsa mbendera zipangizo zina za kampeni mmapolo magetsi mbenderazi zidajali petupetu mmizinda mmatauni mmaboma pamene kwatsala mwezi umodzi ndendende chisankho chapatatu chichitike 20 may
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mphwiyo kasambara akadali mchitokosi   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu pamene bwalo la milandu ku lilongwe likupitiriza kumva nkhani za amene akuwaganizira adatengapo gawo posolola ndalama za boma yemwe adali woyendetsa chuma cha boma paul mphwiyo nduna yakale ya zachilungamo ralph kasambara akadali mchitokosi 
  akadali mkati mphwiyo kasambara akuyankha mlandu womuganizira adakonza chiwembu chofuna kupha mphwiyo pamene mphwiyo akuyankha mlandu womuganizira adatengapo gawo poba k2.4 biliyoni ya boma adamangidwa loweruka lapitalo pomwe oganiziridwa pamlanduwo auzius kazombo mwale clemence mmadzi roosevelt ndovi adatulutsidwa pabelo lachitatu 
  lachinayi wachiwiri kwa wa bungwe lothana ziphuphu la anti corruption bureau acb reyneck matemba yemwe amaimira boma pamlanduwo mmalo mwa wa oimira boma pamilandu mary kachale adapempha wogamula esmie chombo mphwiyo asungidwebe mchitokosi kwa sabata ziwiri 
  apolisi ofufuza za ndalama apeza maumboni okhudzana mphwiyo potha sabata ziwiri akhala atamaliza zofufuza zawo adzakhale asanamalize tidzalola atuluke sikuti tikungofuna kumuzunza adatero matemba 
  mphwiyo milandu 17 yokhudza zosololazo 
  woweluza kubwalo lalikulu la lilongwe rezine mzikamanda dzana adati pofika lachisanu sabata ya mawa kasambara adzakhala atadziwa angatuluke ayi adanena woimira kasambara modecai msiska adapempha bwalolo litulutse kasambara woweluza michael mtambo adabweretsa nkhani yoti kasambara asakhalenso pabelo kukhoti yekha nkulamula kasambarayo alowenso mchitokosi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
future vision yapereka zipangizo zopewera coronavirus mdera la sinuzi bungwe la future vision international lazindikiritsa mdera la sunuzi mmudzi mwa mfumu taulo kwa mfumu ngwelero mboma la zomba njira zabwino zolimbikitsira ukhondo pofuna kupewa kutenga kufalitsa kachirombo ka coronavirus 
 wa bungweli mdziko muno newton sindo yemwenso wapampando wa mabungwe omwe si boma ku zomba walankhula mdelaro pomwe bungweli limapereka zipangizo zosambira mmanja ndowa sopo kwa kwa mdela la mfumuyi mbomalo 
 ati kachilombo ka coronavirus kopeweka choncho kofunika kumatsatira zomwe akuluakulu zaumoyo akulimbikitsa pofuna kupewa kutenga kachilomboka 
 coronavirus yotheka kuyipewa pokhapokha nmgati titsatira ndondomeko zones zaukhondo tikukhulupilira zipangizo zimenezi zilimbikitsa ukhondo mdera lino anatero sindo 
 polankhulanso group village headman taulo mdelaro ati adzipereka polimbikitsa mafumu anzawo za kapewedwe kamatendawa
Label: HEALTH

Text:
mudali basi ya national shamuda drake mtolankhani wa wailesi ya galaxy yemwe tsopano pabanja mkazi madalitso moyo momwe drake amayamba ulendo wochokera ku lilongwe komwe amakaona mchimwene kupolisi ya kawale sadadziwe nkupeza nthiti yakeyo 
  naye madalitso pamene amachoka ku dwangwa komwe amagwira ntchito kukampani yopanga shuga ya illovo ulendo wa ku mzuzu kukaona abale patsiku lokumbukira amene adafera ufulu wa lino 3 march samadziwa nkupeza wachikondi

  drake adamuimbira foni usiku omwewo amve wayenda sadakambe zambiri 
  drake adati patadutsa masiku angapo adamuyimbiranso kumpatsa moni apa adali njoleyo idali itabwerera ku dwangwa adayankhulitsana ongodziwana chabe 
  nditakhala masiku angapo mtima wanga udayamba kukankha mwazi ndidamuyimbira ndikadakonda titakumana kukambirana nkhani ina adati adalibe mpata ntchito yawo amagwira sabata yonse nditalimbikira adangoti ndidzapite ya nkhomaliro tidzakambirana kwa mphindi 30 zokha adatero drake 
  tsikuli litakwana drake adakampezadi mada akadali kuntchito atakumana adamtengera kwake komwe kudalinso anzake awiri apa adamkonzera chakudya adakambirana uku akudya

  patatha masiku atatu drake adakokanso chingwe cimwemwe chidadzala tsaya mada atanena walola

Text:

 mphunzitsi wamkulu sukuluyi sr agness kapatu alankhula lachitatu pomwe radio maria malawi imafuna kudziwa zomwe sukuluyi ikuchita pofuna kubwenzeretsa chilengedwe 
 ati padakali mogwirizana makolo akudzala kapinga kuzungulira sukuluyi potsatira mavuto omwe sukuluyi yakhala ikukumana nawo nyengo yamvula pomwe nthaka imakokoloka zomwenso wati zimapereka chiopsezo kuzipinda zophunzilira sukuluyi 
 pasukulu nthaka inankoloka mvula zomwe zimachititsa zambiri mvula ikamagwa ma block ambiri azigumuka anatero sister kapatu 
 mwazina ayamika mgwirizano womwe ulipo pakati aphunzitsi makolo sukuluyi ponena zatheka kaamba koti pali mgwirizano wabwino pakati pawo 
 pamenepa sister kapatu anapezerapo mwayi opempha mabungwe akomanso akufuna kwabwino atahandizepo ntchito yokonzanso sukuluyi kaamba koti ntchitoyi ikufuna zipangizo zambiri zomwe ndizofuna ndalama zokwanira

Text:

 ndalama yomwe mwapereka simunataye ndikudziwa mwapereka chikhulupiliro chokonda wayilesi ya radio maria anatero kimu

Text: anatchezera akundikaikira anatchereza   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi ndine mtsikana wa zaka 17 ndili fomu 4 ndili chibwenzi chomwe ndakhala nacho miyezi 6 timakondana kwambiri amayesetsa tidane poimba foni kutumiza mauthenga pafoni zammanja sms pamene sindili naye limodzi mnzangayu adayamba wanenapo zogonana kamodzi ndinakana ndiye kuyambira pamenepo amati ndiye ndili chibwenzi china chomwe ndimagonana nacho zili choncho timakondanabe sanasinthe chikondi chake amalimbikira kunena ndili wina mpaka timafika poyambana agogo nditani asiye kundiganizira zimenezi mwana wanga ndasangalala kwambiri chondilembera kupempha nzeru ndikuthandize bwenzi lakolo lisiye kukukaikira za chibwenzi china choyamba ndikuthokoz kwambiri bwenzi lakolo litakuuza zogonana iwe udakana kugonjera chilakolako cha thupi apo wadya 10 10 umenewo ndiye umunthu mwana wanga atsikana ambiri amsinkhu wako agwa mmavuto aakulu chovomereza kugonana pachibwenzi zimachitika zambiri mukamagonana yoteero isanakwanekutenga mimba kutenga matenda opatsirana kuphatikizapo edzi kulephera kupitirza sukulu zina zotero zitakere ndiye wadzionongera tsogolo lako ndiye iwe limbikira sukuluyo mpaka upite nayo patali usalolere zogonanazo mpaka mutalowa mbanja cholinga cha chibwenzi chanu nchoti mudzalowe mbanja mwamuna wako adzakhala wosangalala kwambiri iwe unali wodzisunga kufikira pomwe walowa mbanja ukadzangomuvulira ameneyo muli pachibwenzi sadzakhalanso nawe chidwi ndikuuze adzakhala wathana nawe basi mathero ake adzakusiya ndithudi mtima umenewo usausiye mwanawe kutsogolo udzasimba lokoma akuti ndimusiye anatchereza ndithandizeni ndili chibwenzi chomwe chimafunitsitsa banja ndinavomera zochitenga poyamba mnzanga ndiye adandifunsirira ndiye mnzanga yemweyo akuti mkaziyo ngwachisawawa pomwe poyamba nditamufunsa adati mkazi wabwino akuti ndimusiye ndikatenge tanga tonse kwa mkaziyo nditani pamenepa abwam chiradzulu abwam chibwenzi sachita kufunsirirana vuto lanu chiyani mnzanu ndiye azichita kukupezerani mkazi wachibwenzi chimene chachitika apa chinyengo basi mnzanuyo wakuyendani njomba sindikukaika wayamba kudyerera maso mkaziyo naye akumufunanso nchifukwa chake akuti umusiye ukatenge katundu wako mwina nditafunsako kodi mkaziyo mudaonanapo nkuchezerana mwakhala pachibwenzi yaitali maganizo anu mpaziyo otani mnzanuyo akamati mkaziyo ngwachisawawa akutanthauza chiyani zili kufufuza mudziwe zoona zake za mkazi muli naye pachibwenziyu musanathamange zothetsa chibwenzi chanu mwina payenda dumbo kaduka pamenepa zambiri vuto lotuma mnzako akufunire mkazi mwamuna limakhala limeneli mudziwa pofunsirana kuseriko akukhuthulanso zakukhosi kwawo dziwani fumbi ndiwe mwini

Text:
zomba district health office launches its strategic plan 
 by judith sonkho formulation and implementation of strategic plan sp is said to be one of the key ways and interventions for addressing number of health issues gripping the country 
 acting director of health and social services in zomba district dr raphael piringu was speaking at media briefing organized by zomba district health office with an aim of updating journalists on the progress of their strategic plan implementation in the district 
 dr piringu said for the first time in the history of the ministry of health in the country zomba district health office launched its first ever strategic plan to address number of challenges affecting delivery of quality health care services in the district 
 we are intensifying the fight against maternal mortality rate infant mortality rate and fertility rate among other thematic areas of this strategic plan said dr piringu 
 acting director of health and social services in zomba district dr raphael piringu the acting director of health and social services said maternal mortality rate is on the increase in the district thereby fueling maternal deaths and their target is to reduce the vice by 20 percent by the year 2022 
 according to dr piringu the sp will also be looking into global problem of hiv aids and tuberculosis but at district level 
 he also said his office will strengthen partner collaboration and community ownership of the strategic plan to ensure effective implementation of the same to achieve desired goals 
 as one way of strengthening this we have formed the sp together with the community and the stakeholders and we are planning to implement and review it together continued dr piringu 
 the strategic plan has lifespan of five years from 2017 to 2022 and will be drawing its inspiration from the ministry of healths strategic plan which is currently being implemented at national level
Label: HEALTH

Text:
boma lilimbikitsa phunziro la sayansi wolemba thokozani chapola boma lati lipititsa patsogolo phunziro la sayansi mdziko muno 
 wachiwiri kwa woona za maphunziro apamwamba mdziko muno dr valentine zimpita anena ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor mwambo wopereka ma certificate kwa ophunzira okwana 43 omwe atsiriza maphunziro za sayansi omwe limachititsa bungwe la skills development initiative 
 ati msukulu zambiri za mdziko muno mulibe luso okhala mma laboratory choncho omwe alandira ma certificate wa akagwira ntchito yotamandika mma laboratory msukulu za mdziko muno 
 ku unduna wathu tikulimbikitsa phunziroli pali ndondomeko yomwe ilipo kale yayamba yomwe tizipititsa ku training achinyamata akhale luso la sayansi 
 anthuwa tikuyembekezera akagwira ntchito yawo msukulu zosiyanasiyana kaamba koti aphunzitsidwa anatero dr zimpita 
 lihoma tipitiriza kupereka maphunzirowa mmawu ake wa bungwe skills development initiative mdziko muno grant kumtumanji ati okondwa bungwe lawo layamba kutulutsa achinyamata omwe adzikagwira ntchito mma laboratory msukulu zosiyanasiyana za mdziko muno 
 tinayamba mongoyesera tawona zikutheka tipitiriza kupereka maphunzirowa msukulu zathu za sekondale mukhale akadaulo sayansi osati kungolemba ntchito omwe sakuzitsata zinthu anatero kumtumanji 
 bungwe la skills development initiative lati lili malingaliro oyambitsa maphunziro omwe azipereka ma diploma
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
palibe mlendo ku mcpmunthali pomwe chipani cha malawi congress party mcp chidachititsa msonkhano waukulu kumathero sabata yapitayi mwa mpanimpani pothawa ziletso ku mabwalo milandu zidadziwika chipanichi chasintha kayendetsedwe pochoka pokhazikika mchigawo chapakati nkusefukira mzigawo zonse za lino 
  pamsonkhanowo amnkhala kale mchipanichi omwe amachokera mchigawo chapakati juliana lunguzi max thyolera lewis chakwantha kusamba dzonzi daniel mlomo lyton dzombe jean sendeza rhino chiphiko sadapateko mpando olo umodzi 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka atsogoleri mcp mkandawire mia chakwera yambiri mwa mipandoyi idapita kwa alendo ochokera ku chipani cha peoples party(pp sidik mia harry mkandawire cornelius mwalwanda salim bagus ken zikhale ngoma catherine gotani mwa 
  zikuonetsa maudindo achoka kuchipinda cha mcp komwe nkuchigawo chapakati afalikira mzigawo za kummwera kumpoto 
  tikayangana mmbuyo msonkhano omwe chipanichi chidapangitsa mchaka cha 2013 lazarus chakwera yemwe adali mlendo wochokera kuchigawo chapakati adasankhidwa mtsogoleri pomwe wachiwiri adali richard msowoya wochokera ku chigawo cha kumpoto mlembi wamkulu adali gustave kaliwo wa kummwera 
  pamasankho omwe adalipo sabata yathayi chakwera adasankhidwa mtsogoleri wopanda wopikisana naye pomwe naye sidik mia wochokera ku mmwera adalowa wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri eisenhower mkaka yemwenso amachokera ku lilongwe adalowa mlembi wamkulu wachipanicho 
  pomwe mpando wa mneneri udapita kwa mlendo winanso maurice munthali yemwe amachokera ku chigawo cha ku mpoto mpandowutu udali wa mkaka msonkhanowu usadachitike 
  komatu sizidawakomere anenetsa chipanichi chidaperekedwa kwa alendo okhaokha maka ochokera ku pp oposa theka mmipando ikuluikulu nkusiya amnkhala kalewa pofuna kuwasangalatsa 
  polankhulapo mneneri wa chipanicho munthali adati palibe mlendo mchipani cha mcp adali wa chipanichi ulamuliro wa zipani zambiri usadabwere 
  malinga munthali anthuwa angobwerera kuchipani chawo chakale 
  adati mnkhalakalewa akungoyenera kudziwa kayendetsedwe ka ndale kamasintha malinga momwe nyengo ilili 
  tisaiwale paja mtsogoleri wathu chakwera adatsegula khomo alowe palibe zoti uyu adali wa pp aford kaya dpp ayi adalongosola munthali 
  adaonjeranso nchifukwa cha kutsekulidwa kwa khomoko ambiri akubwera chipani akufuna ambiri 
  amnkhalakalewa asadandaule kuchoka mchipani kubwera kwa anthuku kukungosonyeza chipanichi chili fungo labwino lomwe likuitana adatero 
  mwa akadaulo ndale mustafa hussein adavomerezana munthali adali wa mcp anthuwa angobwerera ku chipani chawo chakale 
  hussein adati posankha ochokera mzigawo zosiyanasiyana chipanichi chatenga njira yabwino yoonetsa cha fuko la malawi osati cha chigawo chapakati chokha 
  mizu ya mcp nchipani cha kale apapa chipani cha mcp chapeza njira yabwino amati ncha chigawo chapakati pomwe ankati ncha achewa uku kudali kulakwitsa chipanichi sadayambitse achewa ayi achina orton chirwa yemwe adali wa ku nkhata bay adatero hussein 
  adaonjeranso chipani chiyende ntchito imakhala pomanga maziko osati maudindo kumtundaku
Label: POLITICS

Text:
parishi ya magomero ayiyamikira polimbikitsa mpingo odzidalira wolemba sylvester kasitomu akhristu mparish ya magomero dayosizi ya zomba awayamikira kamba konetsa chidwi ntchito zotukula mpingowu modzidalira 
 mwa amsembe otumikira parishi yi alfred chilenga omwe anena polankhula mtolankhani wathu ati momwe akhristu akudziperekera pogwira ntchito zotukula parishi yo zikuonetseratu poyera tsopano ayamba kudziwa za udindo wawo pothandiza mpingo modzidalira 
 kuno ku st pius toikuyetsera kachita kuthekersa pantchito zozamitsa moyo wa uzimu kupereka masacrament kupereka nsembe za ukalistia mibindikiro zomwe tikuchita parishi anatero chilenga 
 mwazina ayamika akhristu amparishiyi kaamba kodzipereka ntchito yotukula mpingo posadalira thandizo lochokera kwina ma tchalitchi kugula njinga zamoto zothandizira mayendedwe kwa aketichisti zina zambiri
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
bingu adafa pakhale kafukufuku mabungwe omwe si boma mfumu ina angapo otumikiridwa ati nkoyenera amalawi adziwe lomwe za imfa ya mtsogoleri wakale wa lino bingu wa mutharika choncho boma lisagonjere malingaliro ojejemetsa kafukufuku pankhaniyo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kuunikiraku kwadza pomwe boma banja la mutharika akhala akuponyerana chichewa ganizo la kafukufuku imfayo 
  pomwe boma mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda akhala akutsindika kufunika kwa zofufuzazo akubanja malemuyo akhala akuti nkosayenera kutero ati chomwe chidapha wawo chidadziwika kale 
  msabatayi ndemanga zati mutharika wotumikira osati banja lokha kotero ayenera amve mvemvemve dziwe zambiri imfa ya mtsogoleriyo 
  mutharika adamwalira matenda mtima adzidzidzi ku mayambiliro epulo adalowa mmanda 23 epulo 
  mwa zina chinsinsi chachikulu chidakuta nkhani ya matenda imfayo 
  malipoti maudindo angapo amatsutsana kumati mutharika adamwalirira ku chipatala cha kamuzu central amati ya boma ku lilongwe enanso amati ku chipatala mdziko la south africa 
  pamtanda wa bingu nazo zolembedwa mtanda wosonyeza tsiku lobadwa la kumwalira kwa mutharika zimasinthasintha mtanda wina umati anamwalira 5 epulo wina 6 epulo wina nkumati 7 epulo 
  masiku awiri thupi la mutharika lisadalowe mmanda ofesi ya pulezidenti nduna zake idati malemuyo adamwalira 5 epulo mtanda womaliza udasonyeza adatisiya 6 epulo 
  apa akhala akuti tsopano nkoyenera kudziwa tsiku lenileni lomwe mutharika adamwalira tsatanetsatane wa malo zochitika zomwe zidazinga maola ake omaliza 
  4 juni 2012 mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda adalumbiritsa gulu loti lifufuze chenicheni imfa ya mutharika banja la malemuyo motsogozedwa mchimwene peter adati kafukufukuyo nkungotaya 
  mtsogoleri wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe omwe siaboma la council for non governmental organisations congoma voice mhone wati amabungwe achitapo kanthu banja la mutharika akane kafukufukuyo 
  tikudabwa kodi banja akukaniranji kufufuzako nkoyenera tikuwapempha alole zomwe boma likufuna 
  amalawi sakudziwabe mmene mutharika adamwalirira adatero mhone 
  wa bungwe loona ufulu wa chibadwidwe la malawi watch billy banda wati mutharika adasankhidwa kotero anthuwo adziwe za imfa yake 
  ndikukhulupirira abanjawo chilipo akubisa boma likafufuza timva zambiri tsiku lenileni lomwe adafera komwe adamwalirira momwe zidachitikira amwalire 
  timvanso za chuma chake ndiye banja asakane adatero banda 
  akumudzi sadziwa mfumu malemia ya mboma la nsanje yati akumudzi sadziwabe tsiku lomwe mutharika adamwalirira matenda omwe adapha mtsogoleriyo kotero boma lisagonjere 
  wati zimamveka ya boma komwe mutharika adagwera kunalibe galimoto za boma zothandiza zadzidzidzi matendawa 
  malemia watinso nyumba zoulutsira zakunja zidalengeza bingu wamwalira pomwe kuno akuluakulu amakana kotero zenizeni sizinadziwikebe 
  banja akudziwa abwere poyera apo ayi kafukufuku achitike adatero malemia 
  charles kabaghe wa mmudzi mwa mkombanyama kwa t mwaulambia mboma la chitipa wati kafukufukuyo akhale wolira ndalama achitike 
  zikumveka bingu adamwalirira adangopita thupi ku south africa pomwe aboma panthawiyo adakana zikutisokoneza 
  nalo tsiku lomwalira silikudziwika boma lifufuze tidziwe mutu weniweni adatero kabaghe 
  aubrey jeke wa mmudzi mwa sambani kwa t mlolo mboma la nsanje wati kumeneko akufuna kudziwa zambiri 
  wati kumeneko zokamba nzambiri mpofumika boma likumbe nkhaniyi mwatsatanetsatane 
  boma limvere banja t mwakaboko wa mboma la karonga wati boma limvere zomwe abanja akunena sakufuna kafukufukuyo achitike sibwino kukakamira 
  mutharika adaikidwa kumalo ake ku thyolo malo amenewo si aboma ndiye banja ulamuliro onena zomwe afuna adatero mwakaboko 
  pulezidenti banda adasankha gulu la asanu atatu lifufuze za imfa ya mutharika

  lachisanu 15 akuchokera ku mangalande banda adauza atolankhani kafukufuku akhalapo imfa ya mutharika 
  banda adati mutharika adali mtumiki wa lino kotero akuyenera kudziwa chomwe chidamukokera ku masano

Text:
malawi ipunthanandi zimbabwe lero mpikisano wa matimu africa wa africa cup of nations afcon wayamba lero pamene matimu osiyanasiyana akuthethetsana 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc matimu mgulu l momwe muli malawi zimbabwe swaziland guinea ayambanso kutuwitsana lero pamene malawi ikulandira zimbabwe kamuzu stadium masanawa 
  zimbabwe yomwe ili panambala 119 mdziko pamomwe matimu akuchitira pamndandanda wa fifa yakumana zokhoma zosowa ndalama zidachititsa timuyi itulutse mochedwa maina osewera amene akubwera ku malawi kuno 
  lachiwiri usiku kochi wa timuyi kalisto pasuwa adatulutsa mndandanda wa osewera 19 abwere kudzazimitsa flames 
  malinga nyuzipepala ya theherald ya ku zimbabweko timuyi idayamba zokonzekera zake lachitatu ndalama zoti igwiritsire ntchito kubwera ku malawi zidali zisadapezeke 
  kumbali ya malawi zonse zili mchimake malinga kochi young chimodzi 
  tidakasewera egypt tidagonja 2 1 komabe zatithandiza tione anyamata amene tingawagwiritsire ntchito pamene tikumane zimbabwe tingathe kunena chilichonse chatheka adatero chimodzi amene timu yake yakhala mkampu kwa mwezi tsopano 
  timuyi ili osewera onse amene adakasewera nawo ku south africa mumpikisano wa cosafa akatswiri amene amasewera mmaiko 
  ku egypt john banda ndiye adagoletsa chigoli cha malawi lero maso akhale katswiriyu atusaye nyondo esau kanyenda kutsogolo kwa malawi 
  zimbabwe yaitana nyasha mushekwi amene amasewera ku sweden mnyamatayu watchuka kumwetsa zigoli kumeneko masanawa flames iyenera kuchenjera naye ameneyu 
  masewero omaliza pakati matimuwa amene adachitikiranso pabwalo lomweli 5 march chaka chatha malawi idagonja 1 4 atusaye ndiye adachinya chigoli cha malawi
Label: SPORTS

Text:

 mgulupa mologeni amalankhula lamulungu lapitali ku tchalitchi la machira parishi yi pomwe akhristu akutchalitchili amajambulitsa maprograme osiyana siyana ku wailesi yi 
 ati wailesi yi imasowa zambiri akhristu udindo wawo kuithandiza ndalama kujambulitsa maprogramme osiyanasiyana ku wailesi yi njira imodzi yotenga nawo gawo patchito yofalitsa uthenga wabwino yomwenso ntchito ya wailesi yi 
 udindo wathu kuyithandiza radio maria njira njira ina yomwe tingaithandizire mapologalamu uthenga wathu umveka lonse anatero mologeni 
 ati ayamikira akhritsu akwa machira kamba kotenga nawo gawo popanga nawo mapologalamu omwe amamveka radio maria polankhulapo mkhala pampando wa tchalitchi cha machira luka fabiano okondwa achita mwayi ojambulitsa mapologalamu omwe wayilesiyi imaulutsa

Text:

 malingana montfort mwale yemwe mtolankhani wa dayosizi yi amsembe omwe awatumiza adzitumikira parishi ya st magadalena wa kanosa ku koche dayosizi yi paul rappozo medrick mlava 
 polankhula mwambo wolandira msembe wa wapampando wa parishi yi bruno chakhaza ati mpingo parishi yo wokondwa ndikufika kwa amsembe atsopano wo 
 chakhadza ati chikhulupiliro chakuti amsembe atsopano wa athandiza ntchito zokweza mpingou njira zosiyanasiyana 
 mmawu mfumu parishi yi clemence pindulani athokoza akhristu mparishi yo kamba kolandira amsembe wa

Text:
amuna awiri anjatidwa kamba kogwililira msungwana amuna awiri mchitolokosi cha apolisi mboma la nkhotakota powaganizira agwililira msungwana wa zaka 15 
 wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo sergeant paul malimwe wati amunawa david francis wa zaka 26 uzeni banda wa zaka 18 onse mmudzi wa muyanja mfumu nkhanga mbomalo 
 wati 27 june chaka chino msungwanayu anatumidwa kukagula mchere kamtini ina mderalo pobwelera pomwe anakumana awiriwa omwe anamukokera tchire kumugwililira mosinthana sinthana 
 msungwanayu akuti anayesetsa kukuwa palibe anamumva kaamba koti panali patali nyumba za wanthu pambuyo pomugwililira amunawa anamusiya msungwanayu akumva ululu kwambiri 
 atakafika kwawo anakafotokozera makolo ake za nkhaniyi omwe anakatula nkhaniyi ku polisi yaingono ya mkaika zotsatira za ku chipatala cha malowa zinatsimikiza msungwanayu wagwiliridwa 
 awiriwa anjatidwa apolisi lachitatu akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu kukayankha mlandu wogwililira zomwe zotsutsana gawo 138 ya buku loweruzira milandu mdziko muno

 malinga chikalata chomwe chasayinidwa wa nthambiyi jolam nkhokwe mvulayi yomwe ikhale yosakanikirana mphepo yamphamvu ziphaliwali ikuyembekezeka kugwa mmadera kumwera pakati madera mbali mwa nyanja

Text:
apempha mafumu miyambo boma nthambi ya mgwirizano wamaiko wa european union eu atsindika kufunika koti mafumu aunikenso miyambo ina yomwe ikadatsatidwa mzigawo zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno 
  iyi ndiyo idatenga gawo lalikulu la msonkhano wa masiku awiri msabata yangothayi wa mafumu akuluakulu ku golden peacock mumzinda wa lilongwe 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka lukwa miyambo ina isinthe cholinga cha msonkhanowo chidali chofuna kupereka mpata kwa mafumuwa kukambirana za malamulo omwe mafumu amatsata poyendetsa zinthu mmadera mwawo kudaoneka milandu yambiri yomwe imafuna malamulowa imakhudzana miyambo 
  nduna yoona pasamakhale kusiyana pakati abambo amayi anyamata asungwana jean kalirani adanena motsindika amai ana ambiri amachitiridwa nkhanza zikuluzikulu kaamba kofuna kukwaniritsa miyambo ina 
  nzoona mpaka tizikhala tikukamba za miyambo kulowakufa kuchotsa fumbi phwando la nkhandwe fisi zonsezi zikuchitika mmadera momwe mafumu amakhala mphamvu zosintha zinthu adatero kalirani 
  adati malawi limodzi lomwe lidalowa nawo mumgwirizano wa maiko udindo oonetsetsa zomwe maikowo adagwirizana zikutsatidwa chimodzi mwa mapanganowo nkuonetsetsa nkhanza kwa amai ana zatha 
  woimira bungwe la united nations un ama sande adati nthumwi zina za kunthambi ya amayi mgwirizano maiko la pansiwu adagwidwa chisoni atayendera madera nkupeza asungwana achichepere omwe adawafotokozera za momwe amakakamiziridwa kugonana akuluakulu 
  adati adakhudzidwa kwambiri akuluakulu omwe adacheza nawo atawayankha poyerayera mwana wa zaka 8 akafika zaka 12 ndiye wakula 
  chomvetsa chisoni kwambiri nchakuti zambiri mwa nkhanza zomwe asungwana adafotokoza zimachitika kaamba ka miyambo yomwe imatsatidwa mmadera adatero sande 
  senior chief lukwa ya ku kasungu idati zomwe adanena akuluakuluwa nzoona adalonjeza pamsonkhanowo mafumu akambirana za zokhwima zotetezera amayi ana chamiyambo 
  adati zitheke nkofunika kuganizira mafumu pankhani yamayendedwe ndalama zogwirira ntchito yawo mosavuta zambiri amalephera kufikira omwe akuzunzika kaamba kosowa pogwira 
  woyanganira zakayendetsedwe ka ntchito kuunduna wa maboma angonoangono norman mwambakulu adalimbikitsa mafumuwo mphamvu zopanga malamulo omwe nyumba ya malamulo ikhoza kungovomereza

Text:
chatsalira wa silver strikers kwa onse otsatira mpira wa miyendo dzina la ndaziona chatsalira si lachilendo mnyamatayu zitchito zake zimaonekera pakati timu mbwalo la masewero mnyamatayu padakalipano akusewera silver strikers mwa osewera omwe amakayimirira lino pamasewero pakati maiko kumwera kwa africa sabata yapitayo steven pembamoyo adacheza naye amve za mbiri yake machezawo adali motere chatsalira ankafuna wotseka pakati kodi ndaziona chatsalira ndani   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi ndaziona chatsalira mnyamata wosewera mpira yemwe adabadwa mbanja la ana 5 amuna okhaokha wachiwiri kubadwa kumudzi kwathu ku dowa kwa t chiwere 
  tafotokoza mpira udayamba liti mpira ndidayamba ndili sitandade 4 komwe ku dowa pomwe ndimafika sitandade 8 ndimasewera mmakalabu angonoangono kwathu komweko mpakana ndimasewera mmipikisano yodziwika kumeneko 
  nanga upezeke ukusewera super league zidayenda nditalemba mayeso sitandade 8 adandisankhira kusukulu ya sekondale ya madisi komwe ndidakapitiriza mpira nditayamba fomu 1 choyamba ndidapeza malo mutimu ya pasukulu ndili kalasi yomweyo kudabwera wina yemwe adachokera ku lilongwe adandiona ndikusewera ndidacheza naye pangono adatenga nambala yanga kenako adadzandiimbira foni timu ya pakeeza ku lilongwe imandifuna 
  kenako zitatero ndidapita kukakumana akuluakulu timuyo ku lilongwe tidamvana mpaka ndidayamba mutimu ya pakeeza mchaka cha 2005 kenako ndidapita kutimu ya escom united mchaka cha 2007 
  mwayi umenewu udakupeza mchaka cha 2007 timu ya escom united idabwera ku lilongwe kudzasewera mpira timu ya silver strikers ndiye poti adali atandiona kale ndikusewera mtimu ya pakeeza adandiitana ndikayese mwayi wanga kumeneko mchaka cha 2008 ndidakayesa mwayiwo nkukhoza umu ndimo ndidapezekera ku escom united nkuyamba mwakathithi super league 
  dzina lako limamveka ku timu ya silver strikers udankako nditasewera ku escom united kwa kanthawi timu ya silver strikers imafuna osewera angapo oti azikatseka pakati kumbuyo kumwetsa zigoli mchaka cha 2011 ndidali mwa osewera omwe timuyo idatenga malo anga adali pakati kuthandizira otseka kumbuyo omwetsa zigoli omwe 
  umaseweransotu mtimu ya flames tafotokoza udahonga ndani amwene munthu ukakhala wakutha ndiwe wakutha kudalira kuhonga munthu suchedwa kutha
Label: SPORTS

Text:
kusamala anapiye mikolongwe amati nkhuku dzira kusonyeza susamala dzira ndiye udzalandira nkhuku za matenda zomwe sizichedwa kufa kupanda kusamalira anapiye akhonzanso kufa chisamaliro ichi nchotani bobby kabango adakacheza rose mphepo mphunzitsi wa kusukulu ya ziweto ya mikolongwe mboma la chiradzulu adacheza motere tidziwane   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndine rose mphepo ndine assistant hatchery managerwachiwiri kwa woyanganira malo oswera nkhuku tikuopeni mphepo kuyanganira anapiye timve momwe tingasamalire anapiye mikolongwe   kuno tilibe nkhuku mikolongwe amangoti nkhuku za mikolongwe palibe wa mikolongwe nkhuku zimenezi ma black austrolorp zimachokera kuno amangoti mikolongwe ndikufotokozerani momwe timasamalira anapiye tipite kuofesi kwathuko tsono tidaika madzi amene mukaponde musadalowe kuofesiko madzi amenewo mankhwala musabweretse matenda kukholako 
  chisamaliro cha anapiye amtundu umenewu chimakhala chotani ukufuna kuweta nkhuku zimenezi choyamba samala mazira ndiye tili khola ilo lomwe tikusungako nkhuku 300 tambala misoti 10 zimaikira komweko mmawa cha mma 10 koloko timakatolera mazira madzulo cha mma 3 koloko 
  mazira amenewa amapita   tikatolera timapita nawo ku hatchery iyi nyumba yofungatilitsa mazira anapiye atuluke tisadawaike mnyumbayi timawaika egg chamber awa malo amene timasankhira mazira timaikapo zongendawa amene amapha timajeremusi tomwe dzira latenga kukhola kuja timawasungamo kwa sabata imodzi tikawatulutsa mmenemu ndiye timawaika moti akafungatilitsidwe dzira chinthu cha moyo taliyika incubator lili majelemusi ndiye anapiye adzabadwanso matenda panthawiyo timasankha mazira amene mavuto amene angonoangono osweka

  incubator yathu imalowa mazira 30 000 cha mavuto sitikwanitsa kuikamo mazira 30 000 mapeto ake timangoika momwe tapezera sabata iliyonse lachiwiri timatulutsa anapiye 4 000 mavuto enanso nkuti tilibe zakudya zokwanira zosamalira anapiye achuluka tikawaika mmenemu timadikira padutse masiku 18 apa timasankha mazira amene satulutsa anapiye dziwani tambala akaphonya pamene akukwera thadzi dzira limenelo limakhala lakufa loti simutuluka napiye 
  zimakhala lachinayi lililonse muzitulutsa anapiye nchifukwa choti sitiika mazira 30 000 ilili incubator yi ndiye sabata ino timaikamo mazira timaika sabata yotsatira zomwe zimachititsa anapiye azitulukanso mosiyana amatha masiku 21 sabata ino pamene sabata ya mawa 
  kodi anapiye sangapse mmenemu atati atuluka cha kutentha kutentha kwa incubator kofanana nkhuku timaonetsetsa incubator ikutentha madigiri 37.5

Text:
chenjerani pokolola mbewu ya chimanga nayo imafuna kuyichengetera yokolola zokolola zikhale zochuluka zopatsa kaso

   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu namkafumbwe amachecheta mosavuta chimanga chokololedwa mofulumira mwachitsanzo adati kukolola mbewuyi isadaume mlimi akaiyanika imafota zotsatira zake nankafumbwe amaboola mosavuta

  pothirirapo ndemanga zomwe adayankhula kaulembe paul fatch mphunzitsi wa kunthambi ya za ulangizi ya ku lilongwe university of agriculture and natural resources luanar adati chimanga chimayenera kukololedwa chikakhwima kuuma chizindikiro chake nchoti chimaloza pansi

  kaulembe adafotoza mlimi sakuyenera kulowa mmunda kuyamba kukolola chimanga tsiku lomwe kwachita mitambo kukuonetsa ina iliyonse kukhoza kugwa mvula 
  adati chimanga chikanyowa mvula chimachita chukwu 
  kaulembe adati yokolola yafika kunja kukugwabe mvula mlimi ayenera kuthandizira chimanga chomwe sichidaloze pansi chitero cholinga choti madzi asalowe mchimanga muja azingotsetsereka kufikira ataona mvula yaleka 
  ichi nchifukwa chake kale makolo ankasanja chimanga chawo mnkhokwe molozetsa pansi kotero mugwere mvula sichimaonongeka adatero 
  kuonjezera nankafumbwe yamwe amatha kuyamba kuononga chimanga chikakhalitsa mmunda kaulembe adati alimi asamakolole mochedwa kwambiri kuopetsa chiswe moto olusa 
  pokolola mlimi aziona pomwe akuika chimanga chake chikakhala chulu chimagwidwa chiswe akaika pachidikha chinyontho chimaononga adatero 
  mlimi wa chimanga mboma la salima matiyasi banda adati saphuphulumira kukolola chimanga chake amafuna chiumiretu akangofikira kutonola kuthira mankhwala kuchisunga 
  ndidaona kuyanika ntchito ina yolemetsa yapadera kotero ndimangochisiya mmunda momwemo chiumiretu   ndimakolola pokhapokha makoko ake akamaoneka ouma kwambiri adatero

Text:
chipatala cha bangwe chatsekedwa chipatala cha bangwe mzinda wa blantyre chatsekedwa kutapezeka ogwira ntchito awiri omwe apezeka kachilombo ka coronavirus 
 chikhala chotseka kwa masiku awiri wa kuofesi yowona za umoyo mzindawo dr gift kawalazira watsimikiza za nkhaniyi polankhula radio maria malawi 
 wati onse ozungulira derali tsopano akuyenera kumakapeza thandizo la mankhwala ku chipatala cha limbe mmasiku awiriwa pomwe zaumoyo akhale akupopera mankhwala mchipatalachi 
 kawalazira ogwira ntchito awiri apezeka kachilomboka kawuniwuni yemwe tikuchita poyeza tapeza awiri ogwira ntchito ku chipatala cha bangwe apezeka kachilombo ka coronavirus choncho ndondomeko yake tikuyenera chipatalachi tichitseke tithiremo mankhwala chiyambirenso kugwira ntchito pakatha masiku awiri anatero dr kawalazira 
 ati akugwira ntchito yofufuza onse omwe anakhudzana azachipatalawa nawonso ayezedwe atenga kachilomboka 
 ogwira ntchito athu zachipatala ophunzira zones amavala moziteteza asapatsire matenda ndiye pali omwe akhudzana nawo amenewo tiwafufuza nawonso ayezedwe anatero dr kawalazira
Label: HEALTH

Text:
minibasi zikwera mwachinunu zonse minibasi zikamakweza mtengo makamaka mafuta akakwera bungwe la eni minibasi limalengeza mitengo ya minibasi adziwe loweruka lapitalo mitengo ya minibasi mmadera idakwera mwachinunu 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu zidachitika patangotha tsiku limodzi pomwe oyendetsa minibasi adanyanyala ntchito zawo ati pokwiya zilango zina zimene amalandira akaphwanya malamulo pamsewu 
  amalawi amene tacheza nawo ku blantyre lilongwe mzuzu adati ndiokhudzidwa kukwezaku komwe cholinga chake sichikumveka 
  mandiya okwera akuyenera kupereka yochuluka basi mwa omwe akhudzidwa mitengoyi sydney chingamba wa ku chilomoni yemwe amagwira ntchito ku ginnery corner mumzinda wa blantyre wati ichi chitonzo okwera akuyenera kuchitapo kanthu mitengo ibwerere 
  kafukufuku wa msangulutso wapeza mitengoyi yakwera k50 k100 mmadera osiyanasiyana mmizindayo 
  malingana mwa madalaivalawa limbe fatchi madani iyi njira yoti galimoto itulutse ndalama zomwe eni minibasi amafuna patsiku pali malamulo okhwimawa 
  okwera akuyenera kupereka ndalama yochuluka basi patsiku bwana amafuna k10 000 kutenga atatu pampando k500 kukawasiya kwa goliati phada ameneyo tisatenge anayi anayi pampando ndalama izipezeka yokwanira cha mitengoyi adatero madani 
  naye phillip bwanali woyendetsa galimoto pakati limbe blantyre adati akweza mitengo sakuloledwa kunyamula katundu chimanga mtedza zina yemwe okwera amamulipira mwa padera 
  tatero tisavutike kupewa kuyamba kuba umbanda mmene chilili chuma cha lino ambiri sangakwanitse kutenga katundu matola omwe okwera mtengo kusiyana maminibasi adatero 
  poyankhapo wa bungwe la eni minibasi la minibus owners association of malawi moam coaxley kamange adati odabwa zimenezi wangomva mphekesera madalaivala achita moteremu 
  sizikutikhudza akhoza chili chonse mitengo lamulo likulola kutero takhala tikudzudzulidwa bungwe la competition and fair trading commission cftc pamene timakonza mitengo mmbuyomu tidasiya adatero kamange 
  adati zosokoneza akudziwa zakusinthaku mminibasi padepoti 
  timayenera kutenga gawo chiganizochi kuphatikizapo okwera mitengo ikhale yokomera onse bungweli cftc lidati tisamakonze mitengo ya minibasi padakalipano ndondomeko yabwino palibe adatero kamange 
  wa bungwe loona ufulu wa okwera la passengers welfare association of malawi pawa don napuwa adati zokhumudwitsa madalaivala sakuyenera kukweza mitengo ya galimoto boma langokhwimitsa kuyamba kutsatsa malamulo omwe adalipo kale 
  madalaivala akusokoneza kunyanyala ntchito komwe adachita sabata yatha eni galimoto sadadziwitsidwe mitengoyi imakwera potengera mtengo wa mafuta mafuta sanakwere oyendetsawa alibe danga lokweza mitengo adatero napuwa
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
adzudzula kampani ya enviro consult kamba kochedwetsa malipiro mmudzi mwa dauti mfumu mpando mboma la ntcheu adzudzula kampani ya enviro consult kaamba kosawapatsa ndalama zomwe anagwilira ntchito kuyambira mwezi wa march chaka chino 
 nsewu wa tsangano omwe ukukonzedwa malinga mwa anthuwa omwe anayankhula radio maria malawi kampaniyi ili contract nthambi ya malawi defence force yomwe ikumanga nsewu wa tsangano mwanza neno inauza okwana 24 adzale kapinga mmbali mwa nsewuwu kufikira anthuwa akuti sanalandire ndalama iliyonse 
 tinakhala tikugwira ntchito yodzala kapinga cholinga choti tipeze ndalama kupewa kuba mpaka sitinalandire ndalama anatero mwa odandaulawo 
 poyankhapo nkhaniyi mwa akuluakulu kampaniyi benjamin mughogho avomereza za nkhaniyi ati vutoli ladza kaamba koti boma silinaperekebe ndalama ku kampaniyi 
 nkhaniyi yowona ifenso sitinalandire malipiro athu ku boma cha zandale zikuchitikazi ma funding sanatuluke anatero mughogho
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
ngambi atusaye uncertain flames midfield star robert ngambi and striker atusaye nyondo on tuesday said they are most likely to miss saturdays swim or sink 2015 africa cup of nations preliminary round return leg against benin 
  the two players told the nation in separate interviews from south africa that unless something develops up they have already given up hope due to logistical hitches beyond their control 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi has returned to action ngambi the development comes as setback for the flames who need full strength squad for saturdays showdown to overturn the tables having lost the first leg 1 0 away in cotonou which both ngambi and nyondo also missed 
  i had meeting with the clubs platinum stars management over the issue but what came out very clearly was that they do not want to release me and the reasons they are giving are my level of fitness having just recovered from injury and that the benin match clashes with the clubs mtn8 match against mamelodi sundowns which will also be played on the same day said ngambi from rustenburg in south africa 
  ironically ngambis last appearance for the flames was against nigerias super eagles in 2014 world cup qualifier in september last year since then he has missed number of competitive and friendly matches due to injuries 
  nyondo also cast doubt on his availability saying i do not think my work permit will be ready anytime soon i had assumed that it would be ready by this week but from the look of things i might even miss the early part of the season here 
  it is very frustrating but there is nothing i can do about the situation nevertheless i am confident that the guys will do the job 
  nyondo can not travel outside south africa as his passport is with the department of home affairs for work permit renewal 
  and with the increasing doubts on the availability of the duo fam has called up battle scarred forward esau kanyenda who according to chief executive officer suzgo nyirenda is expected to fly in today 
  however kanyenda said his release would be determined after meeting his club polokwane citys director johnny mogaladi yesterday 
  commenting on ngambi nyirenda said they were waiting for platinums final decision that was expected to be communicated later yesterday 
  the problem is that apart from assessing his fitness they platinum also have game on the very same day so it is indeed tricky situation but we have nt given up yet 
  as for atusaye it seems there is change in the process of acquiring work permit in south africa and it takes bit longer he is not the only player who has been affected however his club pretoria university chairperson is scheduled to meet the psl later today because they too fear they may miss the services of their key foreign players when the season starts he said 
  apart from kanyenda defender harry nyirenda midfielder chimango kayira and another striker chiukepo msowoya are also expected to arrive today 
  robin ngalande arrived on monday dr congo based midfielder joseph kamwendo is expected on thursday while bloemfontein celtic duo of limbikani mzava and frank gabadinho mhango will be the last to join the team just over an hour before the match on saturday
Label: SPORTS

Text:
osinthasintha zipani ngosadalilikaakadaulo andale osinthasintha zipani osadalilika cha dyera atero akadaulo zandale mwa andalewo atsutsa 
  akadaulowo mustapha hussein happy kayuni ernest thindwa adanena polankhula tamvani paderapadera potsatira wa andale wosamuka mzipani zawo kulowa zina umachulukira makamaka ya chisankho ikayandikira mwachitsanzo lamulungu brown mpinganjira ken lipenga henry phoya omwe adakhalapo nduna za boma mmaulamuliro zipani zina mmbuyomu adalengeza alowa chipani cha dpp limodzi mbusa daniel gunya 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mutharika pakati kulandira anayiwo lamulungu zili choncho miyezi ingapo yapitayo sidik mia yemwe adakhalaponso nduna mmaboma mmbuyomu naye adalengeza walowa mcp akufuna mpando wa wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wachipanicho 
  hussein adati andale osinthasintha zipani wosadalirika phindu lawo losaoneka adangotsala maina okha adati akudziwa kale wosakhazikika kotero kuwatsatira nkudzipachika wekha 
  ndimaina aphindu sangasinthe zinthu mchipani cha mbiri zawo zoyendayenda adayamba ndale kalekale amawadziwa amadziwa mbiri zawo adatero hussein 
  polankhulapo za akuluakulu akhamukira ku dpp kayuni adati anayiwo akungofuna kudzawolokera pamsana pachipanicho apeze mipando ya uphungu pachisankho cha chaka chamawa 
  anthuwa akuchokera mmadera momwe dpp ili mphamvu akudziwa kuimira chipani china pampando wa uphungu akhoza kugwa akungoponya khoka kozama komabe sitikuwadabwa ndimo alili watero thindwa 
  malinga kayuni pambali posintha zipani malaya cha dyera vuto lina la kusowa kwa zipani adati zipani za mmaiko zimakhala zokhazikika choncho munthu amadziwiratu zomwe chipanicho chimafuna kukwaniritsa osati kuphinduka zimachitira zipani za ku malawi 
  chipani chimakhala zokhazikikazimene amatsata kuno kwathu chipani chimayamba iyi kenako nkutembenuka amene amatsatira imene yasiyidwa amatuluka chipanicho kukalowa china adatero kayuni 
  adati kubwera kwa alendowo kumangobweretsa chilimbikitso yochepa ngosadalilika kubwera kwawo kukhonza kubweretsa nthenya mzipani akulowazo mkhalakale amaona akufuna kulandidwa mipando 
  zaoneka kale kuchipani cha mcp kumene kubwera kwa mia kwadzetsa mpungwepungwe pomwe wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa chipanicho richard msowoya akuluakulu adzudzula mtsogoleriyo lazarus chakwera pogodokera khosi kwa mia asanalowe chipani cha mcp mia adakhalapo mzipani za udf dpp pp polankhula tamvani adatsutsa zoti dyera ndilo lamukokera ku mcp 
  adati chiyambireni ndale sadakhaleko mtima odzinthangatira yekha kutumikira nchifukwa chake adalowa mchipani cha mcp chomwe zake nzokomera amalawi 
  mpinganjira adali udf adachoka kukayambitsa chipani cha nda chipani cha pp chitalowa mboma adalowera komweko zinthu zitavuta pachisankho cha 2014 adachitaya 
  adati mbiri yake isakhale chomuyezera pandale adati walowa dpp pofunanso kutumikira amalawi 
  boma ili limaika mtima pamiyoyo ya nchifukwa chake ndikufuna kugwira nalo ntchito ndidzakhala nacho pamtendere pamavuto pomwe adatero mpinganjira 
  lipenga wakhalako mmipando ya unduna kuyambira mboma la chipani cha udf chomwe adachisiya kukalowa dpp momwenso adali nduna adachitsika mtsogoleri wa chipanicho bingu wa mutharika atangomwalira 2012 nkulowa pp yomwe idalowa mbwalo.samayankha foni yake 
  phoya adayamba chipani cha udf momwe adali nduna adasintha thabwa kulowa dpp kenako adalowa mcp kumene sadakhalitseko adafunsa timutumizire mafunso amene sanayankhe
Label: POLITICS

Text:
singanga akagwira ukayidi zaka 11 kamba kogwililira bwalo la milandu mboma la chikwawa lachitatu lalamula singanga wina akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka 11 atapezeka olakwa mlandu ogwililira msungwana wa zaka 13 
 singanga zomwe amadziwa ntchito yake bwaloli linamva kwa woyimira boma mlandu sergeant emmanuel namarwa lawrence chandendema anapempha singangayu yemwe dzina lake goodson bandecha apereke chithandizo kwa ana ake aakazi atatu omwe amavutika kupweteka kwa mmimba bandecha akuti anavomera kugwira ntchitoyi azichitira mkachipinda kena komwe anawa amalowa 
 mchipindamu mutalowa msungwana wa zaka 13 singangayu anamulamula avule zovala zonse kugona mphasa yomwe inali mkachipindako pambuyo pake anamugwililira atakawonekera ku bwaloli bandecha anaukana mlanduwu zomwe zinachititsa mbali ya boma abweretse mboni zisanu zomwe zichititsa mkuluyu apezeke olakwa 
 popereka chigamulo chake first grade magistrate gladstone chilundu wapereka chilango cha mtunduwu atengerepo phunziro kaamba koti milandu ya mtunduwu ikuchulukira mbomalo ponena singangayu anachita kukonzekera achite 
 goodson bandecha yemwe wa zaka 44 amachokera mmudzi mwa wizalamu kwa mfumu mphuka mboma la thyolo

Text:
