  makolo mwa ana omwe adalephera mayesowo adauza tamvani zikadathandiza ana olephera akadalemba mayeso awoawo ogwirizana silabasi yakale yomwe adaphunzira 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka chide sizikusiyana kwambiri mneneri wa undunawu lindiwe chide wati ophunzira onse adzalemba mayeso silabasi yatsopano kwa omwe sadaphunzire nawo silabasiyi adziwiretu chochita zidzawayendere 
  palibe kwakukulu pakati silabasi yakale yatsopano ndiye palibe cholembetsera mayeso osiyana yemwe akuona pali zina zomwe mmbuyo akuyenera kupeza njira yoti azidziwe watero chide 
  wati aphunzitsi wokonzeka kusula ana onse obwereza omwe adzalembe mayeso koyamba adzakhonze wa mabungwe omwe siaboma za maphunziro benedicto kondowe watsutsa mfundoyi 
  choyamba aphunzitsi ambiri sadaphunzitsidwe za kaphunzitsidwe ka silabasi yatsopano alibe mabukhu owatsogolera pophunzitsa silabasi yatsopano ndiyodzadza za sayansi zomwe ambiri obwereza sadaphunzirepo watero kondowe 
  wati ophunzira ambiri obwereza omwe akudzalemba mayeso koyamba adzakukuta mano mmayeso adzakhala asadakonzekere mokwanira potengera momwe silabasi yatsopano idakhazikitsidwira 
  mukakumbuka mabukhu ambiri adachedwa kubwera nkhani ya sayansiyi kumafunika zipangizo malabotale omwe msukulu zambiri makamaka ma cdss mulibe ndiye akudetsa nkhawa mwana yemwe adaphunzirako zithuzo pangono kuli yemwe sadaphunzirepo kalikonse watelo kondowe 
  makolo ana omwe alankhula tamvani ati akadakonda pakadakhala mayeso apadera ochokera silabasi yakale oti ana omwe akubwereza adzalembe kenako nkumapanga ndondomeko yophatikiza ophunzira silabasi yatsopano 
  jennifer ngwira wa ku area 25 yemwe mwana adalakwa mayeso msce adati kukakamiza anawo kulemba mayeso silabasi yatsopano nkuwapha palibe chomwe angadzaphulepo 
  mwana adalakwa zinthu zomwe adaphunzira angadzakhonze zomwe sadaphunzirepo nkomwe uku ndiye kufuna kupha tsogolo la ana adatero ngwira 
  mwa ana omwe akuyembekezera kubwereza mayeso msce sadafune kutchulidwa dzina adati sakuona tsogolo lililose mundondomeko yomwe undunawu wakonza 
  poyamba tinkamva zoti tidzabwerera fomu 1 zomwe tidakonzekera kale kutsutsa akadzalengeza tsono apa akuti tilemba silabasi yatsopano si chimodzimodzi nkubwereza adatero 
  mwa ana 197 286 omwe adalemba mayeso msce 2018 ana 124 745 ndiwo adakhonza kutanthauza 72 542 adalakwa akuyenera kubwereza chidwi chopita patsogolo maphunziro
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
mantha wenela titakhala pamalo aja timakonda wenela adafika gogo wina adavala nkhope yachisoni 
  ana mwataya chikhalidwe mwalowerera kuba kupha kuononga satana oyenda mapazi adatero gogo uja 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi tonse tidadabwa nkhaniyo imayambiranso pati 
  bwanjinso gogo chavutanso nchiyani adafunsa abiti patuma 
  ndinu alendo kodi wenela simunamve za kuphedwa kwachitika masiku apitawa wophedwayotu adakaponyedwa nyumba ija munkakhala mfumu mose adafotokoza gogoyo 
  abale anzanga wenela paterera kukacha nkhani za kuba mbweee kuphana ndiye kudya kwa awa 
  palibetu chimene chikuyenda mwinatu tingolimbikira ufiti njala nayo iyi ili pakhomopo adatero gogo uja 
  chaka chinonso galu wakuda adutsa abale tidyenso mapira mchewere nyika adafunsa abiti patuma 
  ayamba kale kudya zimenezo simunalowere ku nsanje pakatipa ndidafunsa 
  apa gervazzio adaika nyimbo ina yake lili lili mnzanga lija lomwe ana ankangothawa kuthawa njoka osati munthu 
  masiku amakedzana makwangwala akuikira pansi kudalibe kuphana umu mukuchitira leromu kodi mwalowa chiwanda chotani mmitima mwanumo inde mudzithemba u mafia dziwani imakwana adatero gogo uja 
  chokoledwa nkhani zachisoni zidayala nthenje wenela abiti patuma adati tilowere ku sitediyamu kudali mpira ndidavomera monyinyirika chifukwatu kubwalo la masewera limeneli tsopano kwalowa mphepo ina mukukumbukira wina adafako miyezi yapitayo mwakumbukanso adavulala tsiku lokumbukira wenela timadzilamulira tokha ojiya osenza osolola sitilabada za british overseas main administration imene idamanga goli tate ana 
  mukumbukatu tsiku lija moya pete adathawa anzake awiri ati kukafuna kuchezetsa abale mtauni 
  zidali kholo loitana mnzake kuchisangalalo chakuti mwana wakwanitsa zaka 51 mnzakeyo atabwera pakhomopo tate wa mwanayo nkumamutsanzika akupita mtauni mlendo akhoza kumaonera kanema adatiuza abiti patuma 
  musamutero moya pete ndikumvatu adachoka mpira uli mkati atatopa zedi komansotu paja akuti amakonda kugona osati masewero adatero gervazzio 
  nchifukwa chaketu ndimaona akadati munthu wotenga mpando wa mfumu mose asamadutse zaka 60 lero taonani wa zaka 90 akuyanganira anyamata othamanga magazi zaka zosaposa 60 amene akhoza kumupusitsa achoke pakhomo patafika alendo adatero gogo uja 
  zoona adamuuza sakhala woyamba gogo uja adapeza tadeyo asanavale zovala kwawo kwa kanduku naye sankamaliza kuonera mpira wadolola adatero abiti patuma 
  titafika kubwalo la masewero tidalandiridwa utsi wokhetsa misozi 
  masewero tadana nawo chiyani onani apolisi akuombera uyo uyo uyo tikabisala ndidalira 
  abale anzanga tivomereze wenela zinthu zatilaka mwina tilimbikire ufiti uthakati basi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
apolisi akupitirirabe kuphwanya malamulo polisi atatu agwidwa kutsekeredwa mchitolokosi chawo chomwe mumzinda wa zomba powaganizira adathandizira wina yemwe akuti adaba ndalama mdziko la south africa kutuluka mchitolokosi 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka apolisiwa sub inspector khudze sergeant mbalame mankhwala omwe akuganiziridwa adathandiza mayiyo yemwe akuti adaba ndalama zokwana pafupifupi k17 miliyoni kwa bwana mdzikolo 
  zidachititsa apolisi dzikolo kulumikizana lino omwe mwaukadaulo wawo adamugwira mayiyo mwa apolisi omwewo akuti adapezerapo mwayi wotakata anamutulutsa mwamseri 
  ku zomba konko wapolisi wina yemwe akungodziwika kalipinde adamangidwanso poganiziridwa adachita zakatangale 
  izitu zachitika patangodutsa sabata imodzi wapolisi winanso constable kamoto atatsekeredwa mchitolokosi cha polisi ya soche mumzinda wa blantyre pomuganizira adasowetsa mfuti ataledzebwa pamalo omwera mowa 
  pakadalipano apolisi akuti mfuti idasowayo idapezeka 
  zikuchitika mdziko muno amadalira apolisi pankhani yosungitsa lamulo chitetezo 
  kwa zaka zingapo tsopano apolisi akhala akupezeka milandu yosiyanasiyana kulowetsa omwe alibe ziphaso mdziko muno podzera njira zosavomerezeka umbava umbanda kuzunza mwa omwe amagwidwa akuyenda usiku 
  yonseyi boma akuluakulu akhala akutsimikizira wa malawi zikhala mbiri yakale kaamba koti kagwilidwe ntchito ka apolisiwa kanaunikidwanso 
  polankhulapo mneneri wa polisi mdziko muno james kadadzera adavomereza mwa apolisi akupitirizabe kuswa malamulo kusasunga mwambo 
  kadadzera adati akuluakulu apolisiwa sakusekerera akulanga opezeka akuswa malamulowo pogwiritsa ntchito njira ziwiri 
  adati akumalangidwa pogwiritsa ntchito njira zawo za polisi pomwe akumalangidwa pogwiritsa ntchito malamulo lino 
  mwachitsanzo apolisi anayi omwe sindiwatchula maina adatsekeredwa mumzinda wa zomba titalandira dandaulo lakuti adakhudzidwa zakatangale alangidwa potengera malamulo lino pomwe kamoto akulangidwa pogwiritsa ntchito malamulo athu adatero kadadzera 
  adakana kuyankhulapo mwatsatanetsatane za milandu ya anayiwa 
  kadadzera zili chomwechi chiwerengero cha apolisi opezeka akupalamula chikuchepera 
  musaiwale alipo apolisi omwe akugwira ntchito yawo molimbika modzipereka aliponso omwe akuswa malamulo choncho tili nthambi yoyangana kagwiridwe ka ntchito mwaukadaulo ya profession standard unit psu yomwe ikulimbikitsa kusunga mwambo mupolisi adatero kadadzera 
  nduna ya za mdziko grace chiumia adati atsirirapo ndemanga pankhanizi akamva tsatanetsatane wa nkhani zomwe zidachitika ku zombazi akhale umboni wonse 
  sindidalandire lipoti lililonse lokhudza nkhani za ku zombazi ndifufuze kaye zidayenda adatero chiumia 
  wa bungwe lopereka upangiri thandizo maufulu la centre for human rights education advice and assistance(chreaa victor mhango adati mchira wanyani udakhota pachiyambi pomwe mwa apolisiwa ankalembedwa ntchito 
  mhango adati ambiri adalowa ntchitoyi chodziwana mwa andale alibe chidwi chenicheni chogwira ntchito yachitetezo kudzilemeretsa 
  adati enanso mwa apolisiwa amaona lamulo silingawakhudze akhoza kupalamula kuzunza umo angathere popanda kulandira zilango zamtundu uliwonse 
  akavala yunifolomu ija kutenga unyolo mmanja amaona basi palibe angawakhudze adatero mhango 
  adati nzamanyazi mwa apolisiwa akumafika pamlingo wochita nawo za umbava umbanda mmalo moteteza
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
chiyembekezo ntchito zakunja ofuna ntchito ku lilongwe awa akufuna boma likonze zolakwika pamene boma lalengeza likulingalira zoyambanso kutumiza achinyamata kukagwira ntchito kumaiko osowa ntchito ati ndondomekoyi yabwino akukayika momwe amasankhira okagwira ntchito kunjako 
  mneneri wa unduna wa za ntchito joyce maganga adati ntchito yotumiza achinyamata kunja imene idayamba muulamuliro wa joyce banda ipitirira adatsutsa chipani cha dpp chidaimika ntchitoyi imene achinyamata 100 000 amayenera kupeza mwayi wa ntchito ku south korea quatar dubai 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc choti ntchitoyi idayamba mtsogoleri wakale wa lino sizikutanthauza ikuyenera kuimitsidwa kutayidwa mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika ndondomeko zatsopano zopitirizira pologalamuyi adatero maganga 
  malinga nduna yakale ya achinyamata enoch chihana boma limafuna achinyamata 2 000 atumizidwe kunja lidangokwanitsa kutumiza 800 okha makamaka ku dubai 
  achinyamata 15 000 adayesa mwayi wawo pachilinganizo choyamba adapeza mwayi sadapose 1 000 
  achinyamata ati akukayika osauka apindule pachilinganizochi 
  alfred limbani wa zaka 29 amakhala ku area 36 mumzinda wa lilongwe adati adakondwera pomwe adamva boma la joyce banda liyambitsa ndondomekoyi mvula ya masautso ake ulova sidakate momwe amayembekezera 
  ndidakondwa nditamva kukudza mwayi wa ntchito sindidamve bwinobwino opitawo amawasankha adatenga achinyamata 
  zoti chilinganizochi chipitirira nkhani yabwino tipemphe boma latsopanoli libweretse poyera ndondomeko zotengera achinyamata ulendo uno enafe tipindule nawo adatero limbani 
  sibongile manda wa zaka 26 adati boma likuyeneranso kubwera poyera malinga malipoti oti achinyamata amene adapeza mwayiwo amazunzika 
  boma liyenera kukayendera kaye malo antchitowo lionetsetse achinyamata sakukumana mavuto kumeneko litenge ambiri nafenso tipeze chochita adatero manda 
  zidapherezera lipoti la amnesty international limene mmbuyomu lidasonyeza maiko south korea qatar amazunza ogwira ntchito makamaka amene akugwira ntchito zammunsi ochokera kumaiko akunja 
  komatu chiyembekezochi sichili achinyamata okha nawo akuluakulu cydric brazilo wa zaka 35 maso kunjira adati zachinyengo zimene zimachitika pandondomeko ya mmbuyomu zisakhaleko 
  pologalamuyi tidaimva timafooka nayo choti kasankhidwe ka achinyamata okagwira ntchitoyi kamaoneka kachinsinsi tikuona adapita abale akuluakulu boma okha basi mnzanthu wina adapereka k15 000 nkulembedwa dzina apita adamuyenda pansi akadali lova kwawo ku kasiya adatero 
  kulipira ndalama kotere malinga patrick bvumbwe wa zaka 44 nkusupula amphawi amene akufuna ntchito 
  mmbuyomu zimamveka wofuna ntchito apereke ndalama tsono amphawife tizipeza ndalamazo adatero 
  malinga maganga ntchitoyi idakumana mikwingwirima ku south korea kokha boma linkati lidagwirizana boma la south korea litumizako achinyamata mwa akuluakulu oona za kunja kwa dzikolo moon sung hwan adati padalibe mgwirizano ulionse pakati maboma awiriwo 
  vuto tinali nalo lokhudza la south korea kumeneku kokha ndiye ntchitoyi tidaimitsa kaye kumaiko dubai kuwait ikupitirira adatero mneneriyo 
  mlembi wamkulu wa ungano wa mabungwe oyanganira apantchito wa malawi congress of trade union mctu elijah kalichero adati bungwelo lakhala likutsutsana ndondomekoyi achinyamata ambiri amakumana zokhoma kumaiko achilendoko 
  takhala tikulandira malipoti oti achinyamata ambiri amazunzidwa kugwira ntchito zakalavulagaga kumaiko kumene amapitako ambiri akugwira ntchito zosiyana zimene adalonjezedwa akufunitsitsa atabwerera kuno kumudzi adatero kalichero 
  tidalephera kulankhula nduna ya zantchito henry mussa timve ndondomeko zimene boma lakonza mavuto amene adalipo mmbuyomu athe samayankha foni yake
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
tanzania itulutsa maina amuna pabanja internet wolemba glory kondowe unduna woona zamaboma angono mzinda wa dar es salaam mdziko la tanzania akuti utulutsa mayina amuna onse omwe pabanja tsamba lake la makina internet 
 mwa akulu akulu unduna wu paul makonda auza atolankhani mdzikomo unduna wu wachita pofuna kuteteza amayi omwe akhala akuchitiridwa nkhanza zosiyanasiyana kusiyidwa mabanja kamba kokwatiwa amuna omwe kale pabanja 
 pamenepa paul makonda alangiza amayi omwe saali pabanja pomwe apezana mwamuna amene akufuna amange naye banja adziyamba amufufuza tsambali pofuna kupewa kukwatiwa amuna achinyengo wa
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
olephera asatuluke dppmutharika emmanuel muwambayemwe mtsogoleri wogwirizira mpando wa pulezidenti wa chipani cha dpp peter mutharika lachinayi adalangiza omwe amapikisana nawo pofuna mipando yosiyanasiyana akalephera si kuchoka mchipanicho 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc patsikulo chipanicho chidali msonkhano waukulu ku comesa hall mumzinda wa blantyre oposa 80 amalimbirana mipando yosiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo wa pulezidenti mutharika amapikisana sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo henry chimunthu banda 
  malinga mutharika pampikisano ulionse pamakhala wopambana wolephera choncho adapempha olephera asachoke mchipanicho kuchithandiza chidzapambane pachisankho cha chaka chamawa

  mutharika adakhala akugwirizira mpandowu pomwe bingu yemwenso mtsogoleri wa lino adatisiya 5 april chaka chatha 
  mutharika adati msonkhano waukuluwo udali mwayi kuchipanicho chipite patsogolo 
  anzanga ku dpp takonzeka tilowenso mboma chachikulu umodzi adatero mutharika 
  uwu unali msonkhano woyamba wa chipanichi chimene adachikhazikitsa 2005 bingu atatuluka mchipani chomwe adaimira pachisankho cha 2004 cha udf

Text:
kupha nyani sayangana nkhope kuyambira pomwe lino lidayamba ulamuliro wa demokalase matipate zinthu pangonopangno zidayamba kusokonekera makamaka pakayendetsedwe ka chuma 
  muulamuliro wa bakili muluzi chuma cha lino chidalowa pansi kotheratu moti njala idalowa amaswera kumisika ya admarc chimanga kudalibe atatenga ulamuliro bingu wa mutharika zaka 5 zoyambirira zinthu zidayamba kusonya chuma chidayamba kubwerera mchimake atasankhidwanso mtsogoleriyu adatayirira lidayambanso kulunjika kuphompho mmene ankatisiya nkuti mafuta akusowa mdziko muno ndalama zakunja nazo zidasowa mitengo ya zithu idakwera molapitsa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc amalawi adaona chauta wayankha kulira kwawo pamene joyce banda adakhala mtsogoleri wa lino kaamba ka imfa ya bingu haa lero suyu tikumva ogwira ntchito mboma akungosolola ndalama mmene angafunire makalaliki akumapezeka mamiliyoni mnyumba mgalimoto mdziko muno chikuchitika nchiyani abale zagwa zatha amalawi tikuti tatopa wotibera ndalama zikubedwazi zikuchokera kwa osauka amene akukhoma misonkho apeze mankhwala mzipatala misewu yabwino ndinso ana azipita kusukulu zabwino

Text:
mutharika walamula unduna ulembe ntchito azachipatala 2000 mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika walamula unduna wa zaumoyo ulembe ogwira ntchito owonjezera mzipatala okwana 2000 pofuna kuwonetsetsa akulandira thandizo la chipatala mosavuta 
 walengeza ndondomeko zatsopano mutharika mutharika wanena lachisanu pomwe amalengeza ndondomeko zatsopano zopewera matenda covid-19 pomwe tsopano zadziwika anayi kachilombo ka coronavirus mdziko muno 
 mwazina mutharika walamulanso bungwe la mera litsitse mtengo wa mafuta galimoto pofuna mtengo womwe akulipira poyenda maulendo utsike 
 zikutsatira dongosolo lomwe boma linakhazikitsa lochepetsa okwera galimoto pofuna kupewa kukhudzana kwa komwe kungatichitse apatsirane kachilombo ka coronavirus mosavuta zomwe zinachititsa eni minibus akweze mitengo yawo 
 padakalipano zadziwikanso mwa anayi omwe apezeka coronavirus mdziko la kenya awiri mwa anafika mdziko muno asanafike mdzikolo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
wa zaka 22 akaseweza zaka 23 wakhala akuthyola nyumba masana kasanu konse kubamo katundu ku balaka akhala akumusaka adali woterera mlamba la 40 lamukwanira john bunaya wa zaka 22 amene bwalo la milandu lamuthowa zaka 23 akaseweze kundende cha kutolatola 
  wapolisi woimira boma pamilandu inspector isaac mponela wati bwalo la balaka lidapeza mkuluyu wolakwa pamilandu yonse isanu yomwe adapalamula 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mponela adauza bwalolo 3 march chaka chino masanasana dzuwa likuswa mtengo bunaya adaswa nyumba ya gloria mphwiyo kubamo njinga ya matumba awiri chimanga zonse zidali za mtengo wa k43 000 
  28 march chaka chonchino bunaya akutinso masanasana adaswa nyumba ya ruth marley ku majiga mbomalo kubamo wailesi komaso zovala katundu wina 
  bunaya 13 april akuti adaphwanyanso nyumba ya rachel jika kubamo laputopu matilesi mafuta ophikira shuga za k320 000 
  10 may bunaya akuti adaswa nyumba ya william munthali kubamo kamera foni zakugolosale za k72 000 
  sadalekere pomwepo 13 may akuti njondayi idakaswanso nyumba ya daniel pondani komwe adakasokolotsa dvd masipika awiri lg mafuta ophikira mafoni za k100 000 
  mponela atamaliza kumunenera bunaya kubwaloko adadzidzimuka zidadabwitsanso woweruza milandu victor sibu yemwe sadachedwe kusatakula chilango chokhwima 
  adalamula bunaya yemwe adavomera kulakwa pamilandu yonseyi akaseweze zaka 23 adaliralira wachichepere ndiye amasamala banja lake makolo omwe adati okalamba 
  bunaya amachokera mmudzi mwa kandengwe kwa t nsamala mbomalo
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
chisamaliro choyenera   cha ngombe za mkaka alimi ambiri ngombe za mkaka amabwekera akupeza phindu ku ulimiwu jacob mwasinga mlangizi wa ziweto ku mzuzu agricultural development division mzadd akuti alimi akhonza kusimba lokoma atasamalira moyenera ziweto zawo 
  malinga mlangiziyu ngombe ya mkaka ya wa friesian yosasakaniza pure breed yomwe alimi ambiri akuweta ili kuthekera kotulutsa mkaka okwana malita 50 patsiku ikudyetsedwa zakudya zoyenera zokwanira ikupatsidwa madzi zonse ikukamidwa moyenera siikubisiridwa mwana pamene mlimi akukama 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu alimi akukama mkaka wochepa pamene zili chomwecho alimi taulo chisoso chrissy wyson mgulu la alimi lotchedwa namahoya kwa t chimaliro mboma la thyolo akuti akati apeza mkaka ochuluka okwana malitazi 15 okha ngombe imodzi ya mtunduwu 
  madzi amathandizira kwambiri ngombe ya mkaka itulutse mkaka wochuluka pafupifupi 90 peresenti ya mkaka madzi ichi nchifukwa chake ngombe ya mkaka imatha kumwa madzi pafupifupi malita 200 patsiku 
  ichi nchifukwa chake mkhola la ngombezi mmayenera madzi zonse chachiwiri zakudya zoonjezera ku udzu womwe ngombezi zimadya gaga zakasakaniza zija zimadziwika dzina loti dairy marsh pachizungu zimathandizira ngombezi zitulutse mkaka wochuluka adatero mwasinga 
  adati ngombe ya mkaka imayenera ikamidwe kawiri masana madzulo pokama mlimi awonetsetse wachotsa mkaka wonse zimathandiza ngombe ipangenso mkaka wina 
  kuonjezera apo adati ngombe zina zimakhala chizolowezi chobisa mkaka mwana sanayamweko mwana siyikumuona yomwe ikukamidwa choncho mwana amayenera akhale patsogolo izitha kumuona amayenera ayamweko pangono kenako kumuchotsa kuyamba kukama 
  pothirirapo ndemanga nkhani ya kadyetsedwe jonathan tanganyika mphunzitsi wa ziweto ku lilongwe university of agriculture and natural resources luanar adati mlimi akhonzanso kumaonjezera chakudya gaga chakasakaniza kufikira ataona ngombe yafika pamalekezero opanga mkaka ochuluka singathenso kupitiriza ataonjezera chakudya china 
  adafotokoza mlimi amayenera kudyetsera ngombe za mkaka chakudya chopangidwa ku mbewu kawiri patsiku sayileji kamodzi kawiri patsiku makamaka mlimi akamaliza kukama pomwe heyi akuyenera kumapezeka zonse zizidya umo zafunira poopetsa udzu wina ukhonza kumangoonongeka mlimi aziyika pangonopangono

Text:
akugulitsa magazi ku mangochi kaamba ka kusowa magazi pachipatala cha mangochi ozungulira chipatalacho akugulitsa magazi kwa odwala osoweka mwazi pamtengo wa k7 000 lita 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zidadziwika pamene wina hawa ntila adabereka mapasa ku makanjira adatumizidwa kuchipatalacho lamulungu adapereka k7 000 lolemba adaperekanso ndalama yomweyo apeze magazi 
  mneneri wa unduna wa zaumoyo henry chimbali adatsimikza nkhaniyi 
  ntila amagwira ntchito kubungwe lothandiza amayi za malamulo la women and law in southern africa wilsa 
  wabungweli seodi white adati adakwiya nazo 
  mpaka k14 000 ndidafunsa chikuchitika nchiyani adatero 
  mwa ogulitsa magaziwo anyamata kabaza pachipatalapo 
  bungwe loona za magazi la malawi blood transfusion lati vutoli lagwa sakupereka magazi mokwanira

Text:
flames ikaluza tom abwerera kuli nkhondo ku calabar lero flames ikhala ikuphana nigeria masewero amenenso aunikire ntchito ya mphunzitsi wa flames tom saintfiet 
  kupambana kwa lero kuthandiza uncle tom mwina apate ntchito yophunzitsa flames 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc aganyu lero tili pambuyo flames tichitira kupambana kwalero kufunika mulungu akhale mbali yathu 
  pemphero lathu tigwirana manja mneneri wa ku chirimba mumzinda wa blantyre yemwe wabwera poyera waona flames ikupita pagolo la nigeria kawiri 
  ulosiwu mwina ukutanthauza kuwina mtumikiyu akuti kupita pagolo ndiye sitikudziwa kupita pagolo kuli kuchinya kungopitapo 
  tafuna timvetsetsane apa mneneri winanso ku zomba adalosera akuona amalawi titanyamula mbendera yathu uko tikusangalala amalankhula pamene flames imakumana namibia pamapeto pake tidalepherana mphamvu ndiye pena tikuyenera kumvetsa zomwe oloserawa akunena 
  nkhani ilipo ya uncle tom kodi tikagonja lero abwereranso kumudzi kuno kudzatani tikufunsa choncho adati loto lawo kugwetsa nigeria basi nigeria siigwa ndiye abweranso atengeratu katundu wawo okonzeka uncle tom bola zomwe anabwerera zitheke tonse tili pambuyo flames iwine lero 
  pamene maso akhale ku calabar aganyu tikhale tili ku mzuzu kumene moyale ikhale ikuphana red lions mchikho cha carlsberg mawa tikumana kamuzu pamene jombo ya kamuzu barracks ipondane mphembedzu za blantyre united
Label: SPORTS

Text:
abwatika bwalo   polisi ku mangochi fisi adakana msatsi yemwe adauza abale mwamuna amafuna kugulitsa mwana wawo wa chialubino wasintha chichewa   vanessa manyowa wauza bwalo la milandu ku mangochi zomwe adanenazo zidali zopeka panthawiyo nkuti atayambana mwamuna nkhani za kumunda 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kadadzera nzokhumudwitsa mayiyo adabereka mwanayo wa chialubino asadakwatiwe mwamuna watsopanoyu padakali mwanayo zaka 14

  lachinayi sabata yatha nkhaniyo adaitengera ku khoti la mbomalo komwe manyowa adasintha chichewa   manyowa adauza bwalolo adapeka nkhaniyo atayambana mwamuna wakeyo adamukaniza kutengapo gawo lake la chimanga mtedza womwe akolola

  adati zimatengera kukula kwa mlanduwo umboni womwe ulipo

Text:
adandaula zochitika kumgodi wa kanyika jere kuonetsa chizindikiro cha msamuko okhala mdera lozungulira kanyika kwa t mabulabo mboma la mzimba ati ndiokhumudwa momwe dongosolo la kukumba miyala ya mtengo wapamwamba ya niobium likuyendera mderalo 
  anthuwa adati pamene anauzindwa za dongosolo lokumba miyalayi zaka zisanu ziwiri zapitazo palibe chizindikiro chooneka ntchito yokumba miyalayi ichitika mowapinduliranso 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc adati kuyambira pamene boma linawauza achoke pamalopa anthuwa akhala akudikirira za nkhaniyi palibe dongosolo likuoneka pamaso pawo 
  polankhula lachisanu lapitalo pamsonkhano wa pakati akululuakulu oyanganira nkhani za chitukuko mderali omwe udapangitsindwa bungwe la church and society ya livingstonia synod mfumu nkosana yobe idnati kuyambira yomwe boma linawauza asamuka pamalopa malinga ntchito yokumba miyalayi pakhala povuta anthuwa apange chitukuko poganizira adzachotsedwa 
  adati chodabwitsa nchakuti yaitali yapita anthuwa asakuuzidwa chogwira mtima chilichonse zamsamuko wawo 
  tili odandaula ndimene nkhani yokumba miyala kuno ku kanyika ikuyendera tinauzidwa tisapange chitukuko chilichose pamalopa kutero sitidzapatsidwa chipukuta misozi chitikuko tachitacho mpaka palibe chimene chikuoneka zikuchititsa tikhale omangika idadandaula mfumuyo 
  padakalipano ozungulira kanyikawa ndiodabwa zaka 7 zapita kampani ya kanyika niobium mining ikukumba miyala imene imati ndiyachiwonetsero imene anthuwa akudabwa imapita wa za chitukuku mderali folger nyirongo adati zokhumudwitsa boma likumapanga ndondomeko yokumba miyala ya mtengo wapatali mdera lawoli popanda eni malo ozungulira mgodiwu kutenga nawo mbali 
  adati zikutsutsana zofuna za demokalase zotukula mphamvu yaulamuliro kwa 
  tikudabwa nazo boma likamapanga ngwirizano makampani odzakumba miyalayi sakumatitenga nawo ku zokambilanazo zikudabwitsa zikutsutsana dongosolo loyendetsa boma la mphamvu ku adatero nyirongo 
  poyankha nkhaniyi mneneri wa ku unduna wa za migodi lazy undi adati ndiwokhutira dongosolo limene lilipo pakati kukanyikako unduna wawo 
  unduna wathu unali konko kukambirana nawo zatsogolo la mgodiwo ndiwokhutira mmene ubale ukuyendera deralo adatero undi 
  mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika potsegulira zokambira za nyumba ya malamulo posachendwapa adati boma lake lionetsetsa pakhale ndondomeko zabwino zoonetsetsa lino akupindula migodi imene ikhazikitsindwe
Label: POLITICS

Text:
anatchezera ndazunguzika agogo   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndine mtsikana wa zaka 18 ndinazunguzika mutu chaka chatha pomwe ndinapezeka kachilombo ka hivkoma sindinagonepo munthu ndinali nacho chibwenzi amayi anga hiv abambo anga alibe banja la makolo anga lidatha ndili chaka miyezi isanu iwiri ndine woyamba kubadwa ana onse obadwa kwa amayi anga amabadwa kachilombo amayi anga akuti adatenganso pathupi ndili miyezi 9 abambo anga amakana mwanayo adali wawo ndiye zinandizunguza mutu kodi zidayenda abambo anga amayi anga ondipeza amandinena ndinatenga kachilomboka kwa chibwenzi chomwe ndinali nacho mankhwala ndinayamba kumwa sabata yomwe anandipeza kachilomboka popeza chitetezo chinali chotsika kwambiri sindinadwale ndidangopita ndekhala kukayezetsa ndinalibe nkhawa iliyonse ndikusowa mtendere ndithandizeni chonde nditani rm mzuzu zikomo rm nkhani yako ndaimva lomwe ndakunyadira ndiwe mtsikana wolimba mtima si ambiri amene amalimba mtima kukayezetsa magazi sakudwala adziwe momwe chitetezi chilili mthupi mwawo ambiri amaopera kutalitali safuna kudziwa nkomwe ngali kachilombo ayi wanena udapezeka nndi kachilombo ka hiv chaka chatha wanenetsa sudagonanepo munthu wina ndiye zidatheka kupezeka kachilomboka iyidi nkhani yozunguza pali njira zambiri zotengera kachilomboka njira yodziwika kwambiri yogonana munthu amene nako mosadziteteza zimatheka ndithu kutenga kachilomboka mwatsoka ndithu imodzi mwa njira zotere kutengera kachilomboka pobadwa kwa amene nako ndikhulupirira iweyo udatenga kachilomboka panthawi yobadwa wanena ana onse obadwa mwa ako akumapezeka kachilombo ka hiv chomwe ndingakulangize nchoti pitiriza kumwa mankhwala otalikitsa moyo udzisunge wadzisungira yonseyi udzakhala moyo wautali wosadwaladwala uziyesetsa usamakhale nkhawa zikhoza kubweretsa mavuto pamoyo wako uzilandira uphungu woyenera kwa akatswiri odziwa za kachilombo ka hiv ukhalebe moyo wathanzi wansangala osati kudzimvera chisoni kupezeka kachilombo sikutanthauza ufa iliyonse ayi utha zakazaka mpaka kukalamba bola kudzisamalira 
  amadikira ndimuimbire anatchereza ndine mtsikana wa zaka 15 ndili chibwenzi ku nkhotakota poyamba timaimbirana foni panopa adaleka amadikira ndiimbe kodi pamenepa ndimudikire agogo ndithandizeni 
  tg mtakataka zikomo tg kunena zoona mwana iwe wafulumiza chibwenzi za sukulu uli nazo iwe ndakaika iwe mwana wa zaka 15 chibwenzi nchachiyani mwanawe ayi ndithu ukayamba zibwenzi pamsinkhu wakowo sizidzakuthera kutsogolo udzanongoneza bondo mwana wamngono iwe sayenera zibwenzi mtima pamaphunziro sukulu yofunika kwambiri sunandiuze bwenzi lakolo lili zaka zingati munthu wamkulu ndikhulupirira wazindikira si pachibwenzi mwana wamngono iwe nchifukwa chake sakulabadira zokuimbira ndiye umamva chonde musiye uike mtima pasukulu ukapanda kumva langizo langa kaya zako usadzati sindinakuuze

Text:
malawi ili kuthekera kochita ulimi fao wolemba sylvester kasitomu nthambi ya bungwe la united nations yoona zaulimi chakudya ya food and agriculture organisation fao yati la malawi lili kuthekera kochita nkhani za ulimi litayikanso chidwi ulimi wa ziweto 
 wa bungweli mdziko muno zijun chen ati lino likuyesetsa ntchito yolimbana umphawi polimbikitsa ntchito za ulimi kuchilimika ulimi wa ziweto kuthanso kuthandiza azipeza ndalama pomwe agulitsa ziweto zawo amalankhula pamwambo okhazikitsa ndondomeko yolimbikitsa kuzindikilitsa alimi mwansanga zamatenda omwe amagwira ziweto 
 mmawuake oyanganira ntchito za ulimi ku unduna wa zaulimi dr tanira mtupanyama mkumanowu wafika yabwino akuyembekezera zomwe zimangidwe zithandiza alimi njira zamakono zochitira ulimi wa ziweto azipeza phindu lochuluka ulimi wawo 
 boma taika kale njira zosysanasiysana pofuna kuteteza zathu pomwe zagwidwa matenda zisapatsilane kuwaphuzitsa akapha yoto imadwala matendawa asagawe kwa omwe ziweto anatero mtupanyama 
 mwazina ati akugwira ntchitoyi mboma la mchinji kaamba koti limodzi mwa boma omwe mmalire adziko lino zomwe zingachititse kugawana kwa matenda kukhale kochuluka kwa za mdziko muno
Label: FARMING

Text:

  malinga idah msiska yemwe wapampando wa komiti ya chitukuko ya mmudzi mwa muyereka ku ngala matendawa adafala kwambiri cha kusowa zimbudzi utchisi wa deralo

  adati chodziwikiratu matendawa afala chimbudzi mnyanja momwe enanso amatunga madzi ogwiritsa ntchito pakhomo 
  malinga mwa 258 amene apezeka matendawa ku karonga baxter nyondo matendawa wovuta akungoyamika mulungu akadali moyo lachiwiri tidamupeza akulandira thandizo pachipatala chachingono cha ngala 
  sindinkadziwa chinkandichitikira ndinkangothulula osalekeza bola ndikuyamika achifundo adanditengera kuchipatala msanga adatero

  oyanganira ntchito za umoyo mmaboma lilongwe karonga kumene kolera yafala kwambiri adati sakugona tulo kaamba ka matendawa 
  woyanganira ntchito za umoyo mboma la lilongwe alinafe mbewe adati vutoli lakula kwambiri kwa mitengo ku area 36 kauma komwe ambiri omwe apezeka matendawa amachokera

Text:
lamulo lochotsa mimba ladengula   akufuna ogwiriridwa opatsana pathupi pachibale ana achichepere aziloledwa kuchotsa pathupi   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka lamulo lokhudza kuvomereza amayi akhoza kumachotsa mimba movomerezeka latsala pangono kupita ku nyumba ya malamulo aphungu akalikambirane msangulutso watsinidwa khutu 
  mlangizi wa mmene ntchitoyi ikuyenera kuyendera kubungwe lomwe likulimbikitsa boma livomereze kuchotsa mimba popanda mlandu la coalition on prevention of unsafe abortions copua luke tembo wati kukonza lamuloli kudatha kale kwatsala aphungu akalikambirane 
  tidasiya nkhaniyi mmanja mwa nthambi ya zamalamulo law commission aunike lamulo lomwe lidalipo kale tikunena lamulo lina lidatha kale kukonzedwa likungodikira kupita ku nyumba ya malamulo adatero tembo 
  wothandizira ntchito zounika malamulo kuthambi ya zamalamulo mtamandeni liabunya lachisanu adatsimikiza nthambiyi idamalizadi kukonza lamulo latsopanoli kwatsala liyende mundondomeko zina lisadasindikizidwe 
  zonse zoyenerera zidachitika kale tidamaliza tikungoyembekezera tikatule kuunduna woona pasamakhale kusiyana pakati amuna akazi chisamaliro cha ana ndondomeko izipitirira mpaka ku nyumba ya malamulo adatero liabunya 
  nduna yoona pasamakhalae kusiyana pakati amuna amayi chisamaliro cha ana patricia kaliati adati unduna sukudziwapo kanthu za lamulo latsopanoli 
  kaliati sitingalole zimenezo adati njala yoona lamulolo aone zomwe zilimo zikugwirizana zolinga za boma za tsogolo moyo wa amayi asungwana 
  nkhaniyitu okhudzidwa kwambiri amayi asungwana ndiye unduna wa boma sitingalole chilichonse chomwe chikusemphana za boma zotukulira amayi atsikana atipatse tilione lamulolo tiliunike adatero kaliati 
  bungwe la copua likulimbikitsa zobweretsa lamulo latsopanoli pofuna kuchepetsa imfa za amayi asungwana ana cha njira zochotsera mimba zamseri poopa kuchipatala sakaloledwa angaimbidwe mlandu wofuna kupha 
  tembo adati lamulo lakale limangolola munthu kuchotsa pathupi pokhapokha pali umboni wakuti moyo wa mayiyo mwana uli pachiopsezo lamulo latsopanoli laonjezerapo zifukwa zina zochotsera mimba 
  lamulo latsopanoli lawonjezera zifukwa zina zomwe munthu angathe kuchotsera mimba mimba yobwera kaamba kogwiriridwa mimba yopatsana pachibale mimba zopatsana ana osakhwima pamchombo amisala aziloledwa kuchotsa mimba adatero tembo 
  kaliati adati unduna sugwirizana ganizo lovomereza kuchotsa mimba kaamba kakuti uku nkuphwanya ufulu wa mwana wosabadwayo 
  adati akudziwa zoti magulu akulimbikitsa zokhazikitsa lamulo lovomereza kuchotsa pakati boma lidanena kale poyera kuteroko nkusokeretsa wa amalawi makamaka asungwana 
  kodi kuuza uti akhoza kumachotsa mimba mmene afunira ndiye tikumanga lanji zimenezi zikhoza kuchititsa makamaka asungwana atayirire podziwa akatenga mimba akachotsa adatero kaliati 
  adati boma limangovomereza lamulo lomwe lilipo pakalipano lomwe lidayamba kuonetsa mphamvu mchaka cha 2010 lamuloli limalola munthu yemwe moyo uli pachiwopsezo kuchotsa pathupi 
  wapampando wa komiti ya aphungu achizimayi mnyumba ya malamulo jessie kabwila adati komitiyi iyambe yaona lamulo lomwe lapangidwalo zake 
  tione kaye zomwe zili mulamulolo nkukambirana mukomiti mumakhala amaganizo osiyanasiyana amakhulupirira kuchotsa mimba nkupha pomwe amazitengera paufulu wa ndiye mpofunika titagwirizana chimodzi komiti adatero kabwira 
  adati kupatula kusemphana maganizoku nkhani yochotsa mimba njofunika kuyiona amayi ambiri akutaya miyoyo yawo tsiku tsiku kaamba kochotsa mimba 
  mneneri wa polisi mdziko muno rhoda manjolo adati imfa zokhudzana nkuchotsa mimba zikuchuluka akatengera mmabuku kupolisi 
  adati malingana kafukufuku wa polisi ambiri mwa amayi asungwana omwe amachotsa mimba kaamba ka mantha kukhumudwitsidwa omwe adawapatsa mimbazo

Text:
