  bainbridge adanena lachitatu pomwe nduna ya zokopa alendo malonda joseph mwanamvekha adayendera kampaniyo akamvetsetse za gwero la kusowa kwa shugayo kusowa kwa shuga kudachititsa ogulitsa akweze kuchoka k750 kufika pakati k950 k1 200 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka ogwira ntchito ku illovo pakalikiliki kupanga shuga malinga bainbridge chaka chino kampaniyo inagulitsa shuga olemera matani 244 000 pomwe lino limalira matani 160 000 anadabwa shugayo akusowa 
  tinali shuga wokwanira chaka chino mvula siyinagwe yomwe timabzala nzimbe ogulitsa amagula shuga wochuluka nkumusunga zomwe zimadzetsa mavuto awa adatero 
  adati padakalipano kampaniyo ikuyesetsa iwonjezere shuga amene imapanga azikwanira chaka chonse 
  mwanamvekha adati wokondwa kampaniyo yalonjeza izipanga matani 650 shuga patsiku pomwe lino limalira matani 411 patsiku 
  tazindikira pali shuga wochepa pamsika zimene zachititsa mtengo ukwere kwa amene akukweza shuga mopweteka amalawi malamulo agwirapo ntchito tili chiyembekezo illovo ikwaniritsa lonjezo lake shuga ayambe kupezeka adatero mwanamvekha 
  pomwe amalawi akudikira shugayo ayambe kupezeka amalawi amene tidacheza nawo anadandaula kusowa kwa shugako ponena zikuchititsa moyo kuthina 
  mwa amalawiwo joana chimphamba wa kwa senti ku lilongwe adati abizinesi kumeneko akumaphwatula paketi ya kilogalamu imodzi kuigawa pawiri gawo lililonse akuligulitsa k600 k650 
  zikutanthauza yomwe timagula k780 paketi tikugula k1 200 k1 250 nanga akapitirira kusowa shugayu zitithera adadabwa 
  chimvano moyo wa ku area 25 wati poyamba sadakhulupilire atatuma mwana kukagula shuga lamulungu lapitali pobwera adamuuza adagula mtengo wa k970 chikhalirecho amagula pamtengo wa k780 
  wati atapita kukatsimikiza kumsika adapeza magolosale ambiri alibe shuga pomwe adamupezapo adamutsimikizira shuga akusowa akapezeka akukhala okwera mtengo 
  mwa anyamata ogwira ntchito mushopu ya spar mumzinda wa lilongwe adati patenga shopuyi isanalandire shuga ku illovo 
  adati ambiri akhala akubwerera mushopuyi akafuna shugayo eni ake adapereka kale oda ya katunduyu sadanene shugayo samabwera chiyani 
  mumzinda wa blantyre ochuluka amakhamukira kusitolo zosiyanasiyana shoprite kumene kumakhala miyandamiyanda ya pamzere kufuna kugula shuga akapezeka 
  davie chilikumwendo wa ku namiyango mzinda wa blantyre adati wasiya kumwa tiyi ndalama ya shuga siyikukwanira 
  shuga yemwe akupezeka akugulitsidwa pamtengo wokwera padakalipano tizigwiritsa mchere mphala tiyi adzamwedwa shuga akayamba kugulitsidwa mtengo woyenera adatero chilikumwendo 
  nawo ochita malonda mumzindawu ati kusowa kwa shuga kukusokoneza bizinezi amadalira yemweyi popanga phindu lochuluka mwa clement chafoteza wa ku chilobwe adati shuga wochepa yemwe akupezeka akugulidwa modula wamba akukanika kuagula
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
sakundikwatira agogo 
 ndithandizeni ndili paubwenzi mwamuna yemwe adakwatirapo banja lake lidatha mkaziyo kuli mwana inenso ndili mwana titatha chaka tili pachibwenzi adandiuza andikwatira mpaka lero padutsa zaka 4 palibe chimene chkuchitika foninso adasiya kundiimbira pan chikondi chachepa nditani 
 bh zikomo bh 
 mwamunayo si wachilungamo akungokunamiza za banja alibe nazo ntchito ukuti zaka 4 zatha chikuuzireni akufuna akukwatire olo foni sakukuimbiranso ufuniranji umboni wina woti alibe nawe chikondi usataye naye ameneyo udzangodikirapo madzi mphutsi apa palibe chako akadakhala chidwi nawe atakaonekera kwa makolo ako bwenzi tikukamba muli pabanja 
 ndidalirebe 
 agogo ndifunse nawo kwathu ku rumphi ndakhala ndili pachibwenzi mnyamata wa ku mzimba kwa zaka ziwiri tsopano sitinagonanepo tinagwirizana zotengana mpaka chaka chikuthanso ndikamufunsa akuti akonzeke kaye kodi ndipange ndidalirebe 
 zikomo pondilembera kuchoka ku rumphiko funso lovuta kuyankha mwana wangakodi udalirebe inde ndikuti eee usataye mtima poti kuona maso nkhono nkudekha mnyamatayo akuti akonzeke kaye mwina akunena chilungamo anyamata ochepa amene amatha pachibwenzi mtsikana kwa zaka ziwiri osagonana naye sindidziwa paja amati mtima wa mnzako tsidya lina mmene ndikuonera fatsa zoona zake zioneka zokha iwe ukuthamangira banja chiyani mwamunayo ngwanzeru nchifukwa chake akuti akonzekere kaye za ukwati osangoti lero lero basi tikwatirane uku alibe chilichonse ndikudziwa lomwe ku mzimba ku rumphi miyambo yokhudza ukwati imafanana mwamuna akafuna kukwatira amayenera kupereka malobolo si choncho ndiye mwina akusakasaka kaye akamatuma thenga kwa asewere akhale kenakake mmanja osati kungopita chimanjamanja chachikulu nchoti simudagonanepo ukuona akukunamiza ukhoza kumusiya nkupeza wina amene watsimikiza za ukwati zambiri atsikana zikawavuta tiyese mwatsoka achimwitsidwa wina pamene pachibwenzi winanso amakakamira wachikondiyo akwatirane msangamsanga ncholinga choti azikati pathupi mpamwamunayo ndikhulupirira sizili chonchi iwe 
 ofuna mabanja ndine wa mwana ndikufuna mwamuna wodziwa mavuto wachikondi woopa mulungu wopanda banja 0884 437 604 
 ndili zaka 23 ndifuna mwamuna woti ndimange naye banja akhale woti akufunadi banja osati zoyesana ayi wofuna aimbe 0992 673 004 
 ndine wa ana awiri ndifuna mwamuna womanga naye banja akhale wachilungamo woopa mulungu.0992 728 276
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
ayembekezere ntchito zofalitsa nkhani kazako boma lati nyumba zofalitsa nkhani mdziko muno ziyembekezere kwakukulu kagwiridwe ka ntchito zake miyoyo ya atolankhani 
 kazako anavota zinthu zisinthe nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani gospel kazako omwe anena polankhula radio maria malawi 
 ati kusinthaku kufikiranso magulu wanthu omwe gawo la zofalitsa nkhani kutumiza mauthenga zomwe pamapeto pake zisintha miyoyo ya mzika za lino 
 mdziko muno anavota zinthu zisinthe ndiye kumeneku kuchitika pakati malawi kuphatikizapo atolankhani mmene nyumba zowulutsamawu zizigwilira ntchito 
 zimenezi zikhudzanso anzathu lamya za mmanja othandiza potumiza mauthenga kumeneku pamapeto pake kokomera onse mdziko muno anatero kazako 
 pamene amalankhulapo za udindo wawo nduna yatsopanoyi yati idalira chithandizo cha mulungu igwire ncthito zake udindowu
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
ogwira ntchito ku chipatala cha zomba akupitilirabe kunyanyala ntchito ogwira ntchito ku chipatala chachikulu cha boma la zomba ati apitilirabe kunyanyala ntchito boma lawatsimikizira lawawonjezera ndalama zomwe amapempha 
 mwa anamwinowa yemwe sadafune kudzitchula dzina wauza radio maria malawi achita kamba koti ndalama yomwe imakhala ya chipepeso choyika miyoyo yawo chiwopsezo yomwe amalandira poyamba ya 1 800 kwacha idakhalitsa inali yochepa atinso anamwinowa sakugwirizana nazo zomwe unduna wa zaumoyo wanena ndalama zimenezi alandira ya mliri wa coronavirus yokha 
 mwazina ayamikira boma kaamba kowatsimikizira alemba owonjezera ogwira ntchito mchipatala pomwe ku chipatala cha zomba kutumizidwe anthuwa okwana 70 
 ndizoona boma anena pakhala kuwonjezera kwa ndalama zachiwopsezo zomwe timapempha kukambirana kwathu akuluakulu ati zipangizo zafika padakali zilipo ndondomeko zomwe zilipo pakadali za ndalama zachiwopsezo chathu yomwe tisakugwirizana nayo anatero namwinoyo
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
ambuye msusa apempha akalembetse mkaundula wa voti mwaunyinji arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya blantyre ambuye thomas luke msusa alimbikitsa akhristu amu arkidayosiziyi atenge nawo gawo chisankho cha pulezidenti chatsopano chomwe chikuyembekezeka kuchitika 2 july chaka chino 
 ambuye msusa anena polankhula radio maria malawi 
 amene wafika msinkhu wovota akalembetse msusa ati kofunika akalembetse kaundula wa voti cholinga choti adzavote kudzasankha mtsogoleri wakumtima kwawo yemwe adzatsogolere lino zaka zisanu zomwe zikudzazi 
 amene wakwanitsa zaka 18 akuyenera akalembetse kudzavota tsiku la chisankho amene tinalembetsa kale tipitenso tikawone dzina lathu lilipobe mkaundulayu anatero ambuye msusa 
 arkiepiskopiyu wapemphanso achinyamata omwe amatenga gawo ntchito yokopa achite molemekeza ufulu wa 
 yokopa amakhala mantha amavutika achinyamata chipongwe posalemekeza maganizo anzawo kusalemekeza katundu wa mpaka kuwabera ngakhalenso kupha anzathu
Label: POLITICS

Text:
amati aukitsa wakufa athera mzingwe mudali fumbi mmudzi mwa mpheziwa kwa t kasumbu mboma la dedza posachedwapa pamene khwimbi la lidakhamukira mmudzimo kukaonerera ntchito ya asinganga atatu omwe amati atha kuukitsa wina kwa akufa 
  mapeto ake awiri mwa atatuwa adathera mmanja mwa apolisi akuyankha mlandu wopanga upo wofuna chinyengo pamene wachitatuyo adati phazi thandize mpaka apolisi akumusakasakabe 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi gulupu chinyamula mkazi wa malemuyo mneneri wa polisi ya dedza edward kabango atsimikiza za nkhaniyi 
  malinga kabango oganiziridwawo gift phiri jemitala alfred wina amene akungodziwika dzina loti masambaasiyana 
  atatuwa akuti amadzithemba nayo mphamvu youkitsa munthu kwa akufa adati chikaiko aonera evance bunya yemwe adamwalira 15 may chaka chino atadwala mutu kwa sabata imodzi 
  mkazi wa malemuyo rose bunya adauza msangulutso lachinayi lapitali asingangawo adabwera mnzake wa mayiyu yemwe amati amathandiza kuukitsa munthu kwa akufa 
  gunya adati atabwera adandiuza malemu amunanga adachita kusowetsedwa mmatsenga kotero ndingafune atha kupanga mankhwala angathe kubwera nkukhalanso moyo 
  asingangawa amati malemuyo adachita kusowetsedwa mmatsenga gunya adati mwambo wonse wa maliro udayenda bwinobwino mwamuna adakaikidwa kumanda achitira maliro onse 
  gulupu chinyamula yemwe amayanganiranso mudzi wa mpheziwa adati asingangawo adatchaja ndalama pafupifupi k400 000 akufuna malemuyo abwere komwe amati adamupititsako mmatsenga 
  mmudzimo adali kalikiriki kusonkherana apa nkuti kulibe adapeza ndalama zoposera k200 000 zomwe akuti adachita kukongola kwa pamene zina zidaperekedwa achibale malemuwo adatero gulupu chinyamula 
  akuti asingangawo adakana kulandira ndalamayo ponena yachepa bunya adaperekanso wailesi apa mpomwe akuti asingangawo adawatsimikizira malemuyo atulukira 
  malinga kabango 31 july wapitayu ndilo tsiku lomwe oganiziridwawa amati achite matsengawo wakufayo atulukire pamaso abale ake dzuwa likuswa mtengo 
  adasonkhana kudali zoimba kudakonzedwa zakudya adye uku akudikira malemuyo atulukire mosakhalitsa kudatulukira asinganga awiri adafunditsa nsalu munthu amene amati wouka kwa akufayo 
  adamulowetsa mnyumba ya malemuyo adati munthu akufuna kukamuona bamboyo alipire k1 000 adatero kabango 
  mwambowu akuti udasokonekera pamene gulupu chinyamula adamva za nkhaniyi 
  amanamiza angathe kuukitsa munthu kwa akufa sindidakhulupirire ndiponso amalephera kufotokoza akhulupirire ndiye ndidangowathira zingwe kuitana apolisi adzawatenge adatero chinyamula 
  kabango watsimikizira zakunjatidwa kwa phiri alfred wati apolisi akusakasakabe masambaasiyana yemwe akumuganizira ndiye amatsogolera zochitikazo 
  masambaasiyana akuganiziridwanso ndiye adalandira ndalamazo ndiye kafukufuku mkati adatero kabango 
  kabango adati omangidwawa atsekuliridwa mlandu wopanga upo wofuna chinyengo 
  akuti adaonekera kubwalo la milandu lachitatu 12 august akhoti awapatsa belo
Label: WITCHCRAFT

Text:
chikondi chidayambira kutchalichi mipingo ina ponyadira chipembedzo chawo imati kupemphera kwabwino kwatidziwitsa awa kukumana kwa womwewu kudasintha moyo tsogolo la elisha mtambo menala msiska womwe lero banja 
  elisha yemwe amachokera mdera kwa mfumu mwenelupembe mboma la chitipa akuti adakumana menala wochokera mdera la mfumu kachulu mboma la rumphi mchaka cha 2015 kutchalitchi ya ccap ya sinodi ya livingstonia ku area 24 mzinda lilongwe 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu elisha menela paukwati wawo adati kupatula kukumana koyamba kutchalitchi amakhulupilira mulungu ndiye adawalumikizitsa atangowonana mitima yawo idadumpha mwachilendo pambuyo pake adalonjerana nkupatsana nambala za lamya pompo 
  ambiri amadziwa sichophweka kukumana msungwana mnyamata koyamba nkulankhulana naye pomwepo mpaka kupatsana nambala za lamya ndimo zidakhalira ndiye sindichotsera la atate lidayendapo adatero elisha 
  naye menala wati tsiku lomwe adakumana elisha kutchalitchi adamva kugunda kwachilendo mumtima mwake pokhala msungwana adayesetsa kugwira thupi lake asawonekere adali kumva mwachilendo mthupi 
  munthu amazidziwa momwe amakhalira kumvera zonse mthupi mwake patsikuli ndithu ndidamva mwachilendo makamaka momwe mtima wanga umagundira watero menala 
  elisha wati kuchoka tsiku lokumanalo awiriwa adakhala miyezi itatu akungocheza palamya kudikira tsiku lomwe onse adakhutira wina mnzake 
  tsiku lomwe ndidamufunsira adaseka nkundifunsa ndidaganiza potenga yonseyo chilungamo chidali chakuti ndinkafufuza kaye za khalidwe lake adatero elisha 
  wati atapereka yankho lakelo adadzidzimuka menala naye atamuuza adagwa mchikondi kalekale tsiku la kukumana kwawo sadafune kuonetsera pamiyezi itatu yomwe amangochezayo nayenso amafufuza mbiri ya elisha 
  onse adali atamasukirana menala sadavomere kutomera kwa elisha adamuuza adzamuyankhabe akamaliza kulingalira za mawuwo 
  ndidavomera maganizo akewo eeeeh adandiyika mundende ya malingaliro usiku usana 
  adandilora pakutha mwezi wachiwiri pemene ndinkati zanga zada elisha adafotokoza 
  chibwenzi chitayamba 2015 akuti awiriwa adagwirizana zoti adzamanga ukwati mchaka cha 2018 chibwenzicho chidayenda kwa zaka zomwe amakonzekera ukwati wawo omwe adamanga 7 july 2018 patchalitchi yomwe adakumanirayo
Label: RELIGION

Text:
chipatala chiutsa mapiri pachigwa akuluakulu khonsolo ya lilongwe kontilakitala yemwe akumamanga chipatala cha biwi mumzinda wa lilongwe ayankha mafunso zitadziwika pantchitoyi pakukhala padayenda zachinyengo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu nduna ya maboma angonoangono kondwani nankhumwa wanenetsa anjatidwa pankhaniyi kafukufuku akatha 
  chomwe chautsa mapiri pachigwa nchakuti chipatalacho chayamba kale kugwa mbali imodzi chisadathe makoma mingalu yokhayokha 
  nankhumwa kumanzere sadakhulupirire kuona mmene ntchito ya chipatala cha biwi ikuyendera nankhumwa adanenetsa pantchitoyi yomwe ndalama zokwana k198 miliyoni padayenda chinyengo chachikulu chomwe akuti kashigeti wati ofufuza akamaliza onse okhudzidwa adzayankha mlandu wosakaza ndalama za boma 
  polojekiti imeneyi idayamba popanda pulani iliyonse chimenechi ndiye chinyengo choyambirira chachiwiri zidatheka kumusiya kontilakitala kuyamba mpaka kufika pokhoma malata osazindikira akupanga chinyengo adatero nankhumwa akuthambitsa akuluakulu khonsolo ya lilongwe mafunso lolemba lapitali 
  panthawiyi ndunayi idakayendera chipatalachi itamva chagwa mbali imodzi mkati monse mingalu yokhayokha zitseko zimbudzi zidaphotchokaphotchoka chipatalacho sichidathe 
  adati unduna sulekera pomwepa ufufuza momwe kontilakitalayo adapatsidwira ntchitoyo zonse zomwe zakhala zikuchitika pachipatalapo pakapezeka zachinyengo chilichonse onse okhudzidwa adzazengedwa mlandu 
  tikukamba apazi ndalama zambiri zedi nzodabwitsa yonseyi kontilakitala amagwira ntchito yosaoneka iyi akhonsolo adali ichi nchinyengo chachikulu tifufuza mpaka azengedwapo mlandu apa adatero nankhumwa 
  ndalama zomangira chipatalachi zidachokera kudziko la japan nankhumwa adati momwe zakhaliramu boma silikudziwa koti lingatenge ndalama zokonzeranso chipatalachi chilongosoke 
  wa khonsolo ya lilongwe moza zeleza adavomereza ntchito yomanga chipatalayo sidayendedi kontilakitala sadagwire yomwe amayenera kumaliza ntchitoyo 
  adavomereza ntchitoyo idagwiridwa mwa mgwazo kontilakitala adagwiritsa ntchito zipangizo zosayenera adaphonya khonsolo idalephera pantchito yoyanganira kumangidwa kwa chipatalacho 
  ntchitoyi sidayendedi ayi moti tidakamangala kale kubungwe la zomangamanga la malawi institute of engineers mie omwe adatipatsa chilolezo cholemba katswiri woti aunike bwinobwino chipatalachi kutiuza choyenera adatero zeleza 
  adati khonsoloyi singachitire mwina kudikira zomwe adzanene katswiriyo kugwetsa chipatala chonsecho nkuyambiranso momwe chilili nchiwopsezo chachikulu kumiyoyo ya 
  zeleza adati chipatalachi chikadayenda nkutha chikadachepetsa chiwerengero cha amayi mmadera asanu awiri 7 omwe amayenda mtunda akafuna thandizo la chipatala 
  mwa madera omwe akadapindula nawo chipatalachi chikadatha biwiyo area 36 area 24 area 22 chipasula kaliyeka madera omwenso kumachokera ambiri mumzindawu 
  kupatula chipatala cha kawale chipatala china chomwe mmadera asanu awiriwa amadalira cha bwaila nchokhacho chomwe amayi oyembekezera mmaderawa amakachilirako chiptala chomwe tikukamba panochi biwi chidakakhalanso malo ochilirako amayi kutanthauza mavuto othithikana ku bwaila akadachepa adatero zeleza 
  mneneri wa unduna wa maboma angonoangono muhlabase mughogho adati undunawu utakayendera chipatalachi koyamba chaka chatha udapeza pansi makoma mudali mingalu yochititsa mantha 
  adati atatsina khutu akhonsolo adapitako adakapeza ogwira ntchitoyo akutchinga mingaluyo matayilosi komabe sizidathandize matayilosi amapotoka pomata
Label: HEALTH

Text:
madzi achita thope ku dpp   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu madzi sakudikha kuchipani cha dpp pamene mpungwepungwe wolimbirana amene adzatsogolere chipanichi ku chisankho cha 2019 wafika kamuthemuthe 
  atsogoleri chipanichi anenetsa kaya wina afune kaya asafune amene atsogolere chipanichi mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika basi osati wachiwiri saulos chilima akufunira ofuna chilima akuti mutharika yemwe zaka 79 wakalamba sangadzapambanitse chipanicho pachisankho cha chaka chamawa 
  akufuna mutharika kumanja pomwe chilima mkokemkokewu ukudabwitsa kadaulo wandale ku chancellor college ernest thindwa amene akuti zimayenera zikachitike kumsonkhano waukulu 
  adati akuluakuluwa akuyenera manyazi zimatuluka kumsonkhano waukulu osati zomwe zikuchitikazi 
  chipanicho chili cha demokalase ndiye sakuyenera kubwera kale mtsogoleri wawo pokhapokha msonkhano waukulu utachitika amene akusankha apm akuyenera manyazi zikusemphana ndale za demokalase adatero thindwa 
  lachiwiri msabatayi wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wachipanicho mchigawo cha kummwera george chaponda adati mutharika akadutsa kumsonkhano waukulu popanda wopikisana naye 
  naye mneneri wachipanicho nicholas dausi adati wina afune kaya asafune mutharika ndiye atsogolere chipanichi mchisankho cha 2019 
  tichititsa msonkhano waukulu womwe ukasankhe mtsogoleri wathu mutharika basi adatero dausi akupitiranji kumsonkhano waukulu pamene asankha kale mtsogoleri zikudabwitsa thindwa 
  mlembi wa chipanichinso greselder jeffrey adati kaya satana afune kaya asafune mutharika mpaka 2024 
  wathu apm amene timutengere kuchisankho cha 2019 kaya afuna kaya ayi zichitika motero adatero jeffrey 
  mbali inayi phungu wa chipanicho kummawa kwa boma la mulanje bon kalindo adati kaya wina afune kaya asafune chipanichi chitsogozedwa chilima 
  adati zomwe akupanga akuluakulu dpp kuli kuwaonjezera mafuta ganizo lawo lobweretsa chilima litheke 
  apm ayi wakula kodi atitsogolere nchifukwa chiyani okalamba azititsogolera atitsogolere tilipo gulu tikukumana posakhalitsa tidziwitsa amalawi zomwe takonza adatero kalindo 
  adati vuto lalikulu amene azinga mutharika zikupherezera zomwe adanena mkazi wa mtsogoleri wakale wa lino callista mutharika ayemwe adashosha mavu mkhomola pobwera poyera kunena mlamu peter akukakamizidwa kudzaimanso zilombo zimene zamuzungulira 
  apm munthu wabwino wazunguliridwa ngona sasamala zimudya.komwe kuli bingu wa mutharika adziwe amene adasangalala imfa yawo azungulira mbale tsiku lililonse amukhzadzulirana adatero 
  woyanganira achinyamata mchipanicho louis ngalande adati nkhaniyi itheretu pafunika dpp ichtitse msonkhano waukulu komwe akasankhe mtsogoleri 
  ngalande amene achinyamata mchipanicho amupempha atule pansi udindo posankha chilima wati sakubwerera mmbuyo mpaka ganizo lake litatheka 
  zikuchitika moto womwe adayatsa callista mutharika mkazi wa bingu wofuna chilima adzaime osati mlamu amene akuti wakalamba
Label: POLITICS

Text:
nkhawa akafuna kudzathandiza satenga madzi amavutika akafuna chimbudzi kumalo antchito kulibe madzi 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ichi chibalo chomwe ogwira ntchito kunthambi yosunga katundu wa boma ku blantyre central government stores akuchita bungwe la blantyre water board bwb lidadula madzi march chaka chino apa nkuti madziwo atangotuluka january february pamene adadulidwa zaka zapitazo 
  mwa ogwira ntchito paofesiyo yemwe adakana kutchulidwa dzina adati atopa kutenga madzi mmakomo mwawo kukagwiritsa ntchito kuchimbudzi 
  mabikiri madzi akumachoka sakubwera kuntchito cha vutoli tipita kutchuti nkudzabwera akayamba munthu satenga madzi amadzipana kukalipira ku wenela palibe kuchitira mwina zimbudzi zamadzi si zokumba adatero 
  wogwira ntchito wina adati ukhondo ukulephereka miyoyo ili pachiopsezo kaamba koti madzi omwe amabweretsa sakwanira 
  patsikulo zidadziwikiratu pamalowa nkhani yodzithandiza ku chimbudzi yovuta pomwe mtolankhaniyu amatengeredwa kuchipinda chosungira mbendera amayi amachenjezana zosamala madzi adabweretsa ponena wochepa udali uli 10 koloko mmawa 
  mtolankhaniyu atapempha malo okazithandizira adalowetsedwa chimbudzi cha amayi chomwe adati cha ukhondo kaamba koti amabweretsa madzi tsiku lililonse 
  kasitomala asakaone nyasi ku chimbudzi cha abambo sasamalako abambo kufooka kutenga madzi kuzisokoneza chisamaliro cha amuna ogula katundu adatero wina 
  mchimbudzimu mudali bigiri ya madzi mwaukhondo ntchentche zikuwetedwa gawo la abambo komwe nyansi zikudzadza mtondo wa chimbudzi 
  zaka ziwirizo anthuwa amagwiritsa ntchito zimbudzi za bungwe loyendetsa zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec komwe adawaletsa amachulukitsa ndalama yolipirira madzi ku bwb mwezi 
  adatiletsa mmimba mukawira timakangocheza ku mec komweko vutoli likusokoneza madongosolo achuma chathu kupatula kudya tikufunika ndalama ya chimbudzi adatero wina 
  pothirira ndemanga pankhaniyi mneneri wa bwb priscilla mateyu adati vuto ofesiyi siyimalipira ndalama yogwiritsira ntchito madzi 
  adati sanganene ndalama zomwe cgs ikuyenera kupereka njira yolemekeza ufulu wa kasitomalayu 
  naye mneneri ku nthambi ya chuma cha boma alfred kutengule adati zangovuta kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka ndalama ku cgs amalandira ndalama zolipirira madzi
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
amuna awiri afa pokumba golide ku makanjira awiri afa nthaka itawakwilira kumalo oletsedwa omwe akuchitako migodi ati pofuna kupeza miyala ya mtengo wapatali ya golide ina mphiri la namizimu mdera la mfumu yayikulu makanjira mboma la mangochi 
 watsimikiza za ngoziyi maida malingana ofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo inspector rodrick maida anthuwo akuti akhudzidwa imfayi dzenje lomwe amakumba pofukula miyala ya mtengo wapataliyo litagumukira kuwakwilira 
 amuna wa issa saladi matola bakali onse zaka 22 zakubadwa ngozi yi inachitika 9 january 2019 mdera la mtiule mbomalo 
 matupi anthuwo atawatengera chipatala cha makanjira komwe anatsimikizira achibale amunawo anafa kamba kobanika 
 malemu issa saladi matola bakali ochokera mmudzi mwa chiwoko mfumu yayikulu makanjira mboma la mangochi
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
boma lipempha atolankhani athetse nkhani za bodza 9 botomani.jpg alt= width="325 height="368 />botomani timakhala okhumudwa zolembedwa zina boma lapempha atolankhani ayike chidwi nkhani za zofufuzafufuza pofuna kuthana kufala kwa nkhani zabodza 
 nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani njira zamakono mark botomani apereka pempholi potsekera msonkhano waukulu wapachaka wa bungwe la atolankhani chigawo cha kumwera kwa lino la blantyre press club omwe unachitikira mboma la mangochi 
 msonkhanowu unachitika mutu woti kuthana kufala kwa nkhani zabodza atolankhani wa anachitanso chisankho pofuna kusankha atsogoleri atsopano omwe ayendetse bungweli kwa zaka zikubwerazi 
 ati atolankhaniwa akuyenera kugwiritsa ntchito ukadaulo wawo omwe anaphunzira polemba nkhani zomwe zoona zokhazokha 
 ku bomaku timakhala okhumudwa zina zomwe zimalembedwa ndikukhulupilira msonkhano umenewu uthandiza zimenezi anatero botomani 
 botomani ati nyumba zofalitsa nkhani zikuyenera kutengera phunziro nyumba zina zomwe zimapititsidwa ku bwalo la milandu kaamba kolemba nkhani za bodza
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
akana kulemba utm akatswiri nkhani za ndale ati mlembi wa zipani sadalakwitse pokana kulemba utm chipani mdziko muno 
  wachiwiri kwa mlembi wa zipani chikumbutso namelo adakana kulowetsa mkaundula wa zipani gulu la united transformation movement(utm lomwe likutsogoleredwa wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino saulos chilima 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mtsogoleri wa utm chilima mchikalata chopita ku utm ku ofesi ya mlembiyi namelo adakana kutero gululo lidapempha kugwiritsa ntchito dzina la utm mmalo mwa dzina lonse la united transformation movement 
  mkalatayo namelo adati kugwiritsa ntchito dzina la utm nkungofuna kubalalitsa ofesi ya mlembiyi palinso kale chipani china chotchedwa united transformation party utp 
  posakhutira chiganizochi gulu la utm latengera nkhaniyi ku bwalo la milandu awunike malinga mneneri wa chipanich joseph chidanti malunga 
  poperekapo maganizo ake katswiri nkhani za ndale wochokera pasukulu ya ukachenjede ya university of livingstonia unilia george phiri adagwirizana kwatunthu ofesi ya mlembi wa zipani kulowetsa mkaundula wa zipani dzina la utm kukadabweretsa chipwirikiti 
  phiri adati vuto lagona poti zambiri mkaundula mumafunika kulowa dzina lonse osati lachidule ayi popangira zokudza mawa kumangidwa 
  nchifukwa chokwanira kusawalowetsa mkaundula kwa mlembi wa zipani kukhonza utm kunjako nkumagwiritsa ntchito united transformation movement zomwe zikhonza kubweretsa chisokonezo adalongosola motero phiri 
  adati vutoli lalingono likhonza kukonzedwa mosavuta posagwiritsanso ntchito mabwalo milandu 
  sindine loya ndikhonzabe kunena amangoyenera pansi kuunikanso dzinalo kukonza pali vutopo ndikukaperekanso zikalata zina kubwalo la milandu kukhonza kungochedwetsa zinthu adatero phiri 
  pogwirizana phiri naye chimwemwe tsitsi yemwe mphunzitsi kusukulu yaukachenjede ya polytechnic adati zifukwa zomwe adapereka mlembi wa zipani zidali zomveka potengera malamulo lino zovuta kulembetsa chipani chomwe chili dzina lofananilako chomwe chidalembetsedwa kale 
  sitikudziwa utm adaganizapo pachiyambi adauza amalawi aphatikizana chipani cha utp chomwe mtsogoleri newton kambala angochotsa p ndikuikapo m. tikuona akukalembetsa utm adadabwa tsitsi 
  adati gulu la utm likuyenera pansi nkuunikapo kupeza upangiri kwa akatswiri amalamulo nkhani ya dzinali 
  akuyenera kupanga mwamsanga yawathera kale adalongosola tsitsi 
  adaonjezera gulu la utm likhonza kuona kuvuta dzina cha katundu galimoto zovala zomwe zalembedwa mdzinali kusinthaku kungakhale kodula
Label: POLITICS

Text:
ndende zisanduka makhoti zanathina mmabwalo milandu sitalaka ya ogwira ntchito mmabwalowa idasandutsa zitokosi za polisi mabwalo ozengera milandu 
  zimachitika akuluakulu mabwalowa atalephera kunyengerera ogwira ntchito asiye sitalakayi kubwerera kuntchito 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka wa makhoti andrew nyirenda adapempha oweruza milandu onse ayambe kuweruzira milandu kupolisi kundende 
  nyirenda adapempha mamajisitiliti agawane ntchito azimasulira chigamulo azilemba azinyamula mafailo ntchito zomwe zimagwiridwa owathandizira 
  ofesi ya wa makhoti ikudziwitsa malinga sitalaka yomwe ikuchitikayi mukupemphedwa muyambe kumva milandu nkotheka muzipereka belo udatero uthenga wa nyirenda 
  uthengawu mamajisitileti adayamba kuzenga milandu kupereka belo kwa oganiziridwa adapalamula milandu omwe amasungidwa mzitolokosi 
  kupolisi ya ku limbe mzinda wa blantyre mamajesitilitiwa adatulutsa angapo belo kumva milandu yosinasiyana zimachitikira mchitolokosi 
  nako ku dedza mamajesitilitiwa adapatsidwa ofesi yapadera momwe amagwiritsiramo ntchito khoti 
  majesitiliti wina akamaweruza mlandu mnzake amatanthauzira mchilankhula chomwe woganiziridwa angamve mosavuta wina ndiye amanyamula mafailo mkango ukazingwa umadya udzu 
  ku nkhata bay khoti lidagamula paulos lungu kukaseweza kundende zaka atavulaza julius mwaluswa kwa chinguluwe mboma lomwelo 
  bwalolo lidathethetsanso rute makuluni yemwe zaka 32 kukaseweza miyezi 6 kundende popezeka chamba 
  wapolisi wofufuza milandu wa polisi ya nkhata bay keston chiona adati ganizo la nyirenda lathandizira musakhale kuthinana kwambiri mzitolokosi zawo 
  chomwe chikuchitika nkuti tikumawatenga oweruza milanduwa akamve milandu amene wavomera kulakwa akumupatsiratu chilango amene wakana akumupatsa belo kumutumiza kulimande adatero chiona 
  naye mneneri wapolisi mchigawo chakumpoto peter kalaya adati polisi zonse zamchigawocho zimatsata ndondomekoyo 
  timamanga tsiku lililonse kutanthauza zitolokosi zathu nzodzadza njira iyi ikuthandiza adatero chiona 
  malinga mneneri wa makhoti mlenga mvula ganizoli linadza njira imodzi yochepetsera kuchulukana kwa mzitolokosi za apolisi 
  ndondomekoyi ikuchitika mmaboma onse adatero mlenga 
  mneneri wa ndende smart maliro adati chiwerengero cha otumizidwa kundende kupolisi chidatsika amangosungidwa mzitolokosi 
  boma kudzera mwa mlembi wa zachuma ben botolo adadzudzula ogwira ntchito mmabwalowa sitalaka yawo yosavomerezedwa sizitheka boma lipereke ndalama zanyumba zoyambira mchaka cha 2012 
  akutero botolo boma launguza madandaulo anu ya boma sikusinthasiipereka ndalama zapadera za nyumba
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
anatchezera ukuchita njomba gogo natcheteza   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndine mtsikana wa zaka 25 ndakhala chibwenzi mnyamata wina kwa zaka zinayi 
  mnyamatayu nyumba yake akugwira ntchito yabwino kampani ina yopanga mafuta wophikira mzinda wa lilongwe 
  tidagwirizana tidzakwatirana mnzanga ndikamufunsa za banja amangozengereza 
  kumuuza abwere kwathu azaonekere amangoti ndidzabwerabe mpaka zaka nkumatha 
  gogo kodi pamenepa nditani popeza mnyamatayu ndimamukonda mtima wanga wonse jpj lilongwe jpj nkhaniyi siyachilendo atsikana ambiri amadandaula anyamata adawauza adzawakwatira akuchulutsa njomba 
  mnyamata wofuna banja sasowa sazengereza mwayi wokaonekera kwa makolo mtsikana ukapezeka 
  anyamata ambiri safuna banja amangofuna kugona atsikana chakumtima kwawo chikapwa amawasiya nkukapeza uku nkulakwa 
  muunikeni bwenzi lanuyo kuopa kudzanongoneza bondo mtsogolo paja amati mtsinje wa tinkanena udakathera msiizi 
  gogo natchereza mutu wazungulira ndine mtsikana wa zaka 23 ndili mwana 
  mnyamata wina adandiuza akundifuna chibwenzi cholinga choti adzandikwatire mtsogolo ndidalola 
  makolo abale ake amamukaniza asakwatiwe mtsikana wa mwana moti panopa zochita za bwenzi langa sindikuziona 
  ndikamuimbira foni zina sayankha ndikamutumizira uthenga whatsapp umaonetsa waona sayankha 
  gogo mutu wanga wazungulira nditani apa apa usadandaule ungozivomereza makolo amaletsa ana kukwatira atsikana oti adaberekapo kumene kuli kulakwa 
  akakondana saona zoti wina mwana ayi 
  apa zikuonetsa mnyamatayo wamvera zonena za makolo ake 
  choncho kutha kovuta chibwenzi chanu chipitirire 
  limba mtima mudzapeza mnyamata wokukondani posatengere mudaberekapo 
  usada nkhawa chachikulu kudekha sunga khosi mkanda woyera udzavale
Label: RELATIONSHIPS

Text:
mkazi wansanje achekacheka mnzake bwalo la milandu la majisitireti ku mchinji masiku apitawa lidalamula wansanje amene adachekacheka mnzake mpeni pakhosi kunkhope akagwire jere la miyezi 12 lidamumasula ponena asadzapezekenso mlandu wina kwa chaka chimodzi theka 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu woimira boma pamilandu thom waya adauza bwalolo mkazi wansanjeyo chimwemwe fanizo wa zaka 21 adafuna kuvulaza mwana wa mkazi mnzake wa miyezi 7 mpeni ati popeza mwamuna ankapereka thandizo kwa mwanayo 
  wasiya kuonetsa mabala ake mchipatala waya adati mpeniwo udasempha mwanayo yemwe adali kumsana kulunjika pakhosi la ake mbereko yomwe adaberekera mwanayo idamasuka moti adagwa pansi achisoni adamutola kuthawa naye 
  sizidakondweretse fanizo yemwe adalikumba liwiro kuthamangitsa munthu amene adathawitsa mwanayo mpeni uli mmanja komatu apa nkuti mkaziyo atamuchekacheka mnzakeyo malo anayi adamugwira adapita naye kupolisi pamodzi wovulazidwayo 
  zidachitika mmawa wa 6 january mkanda trading centre 
  apolisi adamutsekulira mlandu wovulaza munthu womwe womangidwayo adauvomera pamaso woweruza majisitireti rodwell meja 
  malinga waya bwalolo silidachedwe kugamula mlanduwo woimbidwa mlandu sadatayitse khotilo povomera kulakwa 
  podandaulira bwalolo limuganizire popereka chilango fanizo adati adapalamula mlanduwo adachita kuputidwa wodandaulayo tsala wasiya pokhala pachibwenzi mwamuna 
  pogamula mlanduwo meja adati bwalo lake lidamupeza mlandu wovulaza ayenera kulangidwa molingana malamulo lino adapereka chilango chosakhwimacho poganizira adachita kuputidwa poti sadatayitse bwalolo povomereza kulakwa kwake 
  meja adapereka chilango choti fanizo akaseweze chaka chimodzi kundende adati kundendeko sapitako bola asapezekenso mlandu kwa miyezi 18 adamulola azipita kwawo mlandu watha adatinso sakukhutira chi chigamulocho ufulu apilo 
  msangulutso udacheza wasiya yemwe zaka 20 umve mbali yake mmene zidakhalira zifike mpakana kuvulazidwa chonchi 
  adati adalidi paubwenzi daniel nkhomo ubwenziwu utafumbira adapezeka pakati 
  adati awiriwa sadalowane nkhomo adali kupereka chisamaliro chonse chomwe munthu oyembekezera amafuna mpaka mwana adabadwa 
  ndidadabwa pomwe mwana wanga adakwanitsa sabata abambowa adakatenga mkazi wina kwa msundwe adasiya kupereka chithandizo adatero 
  wasiya adati patadutsa miyezi iwiri bamboyu adayambiranso kuthandiza mwana wakeyu awiriwa amatchayirana lamya mwanayu akadwala zomwe sizimamkomera mkazi mnzakeyo 
  tsiku lina ndidatumiza uthenga palamya andiimbire kaamba koti mwana adali atadwala matenda otsekula mmimba mkazi wakeyu ndiye adandiimbira kunditukwana wasiya adatero 
  adati mphuno salota sadadziwe fanizo adali mangawa adakagula mpeni kukanoletsa kumatchini cholinga chofuna kuthana naye 
  wasiya adati patsikuli adali akuchokera kumsika fanizo adamutchingira kutsogolo 
  adandifunsa ndimaimba lamya ya mwamuna adandisiya nkutenga iyeyo ndili naye mwana nkudzati ndipanga za iwe pompo mpeni sololu abaye mwana kumsana mpeniwu udafikira pakhosi panga adalongosola wasiya adati adali wodabwa adavulazidwa chomwechi fanizo mfulu adampititsa kwawo 
  msangulutso udachezanso wasiya titus wa wovulazidwayu 
  adati sakudziwa mlanduwu uli pati kaamba koti atafufuza kupolisi ya mchinji adauzidwa fanizo adamasulidwa abwalo la milandu 
  abwalo la milandu sadamve mbali ya mwana wanga yemwe sakupezabe kodi adamtulutsa okhudzidwa kulibe komabe ndipita konko ndikamve umo zidayendera adatero titus 
  pakalipano wasiya wanenetsa zivute motani akufuna mwamunayu amukwatire basi 
  ndikufuna mwamunayu andikwatire wandipatsitsa mabala moti amuna sadzandisiriranso ayi mkazi wakeyu achita nsanje popeza ndiye ndidali woyamba ndimafunika nsanjezo ndineyo osati iyeyo wachiwiri ayi adalankhula motsindika wasiya 
  pomwe msangulutso udacheza mwamunayo lachinayi lapitali palamya adati wasiya adali mkazi wachibwenzi pomwe fanizo adali wapanyumba
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
khonsolo ankhanzaamalonda mwa ochita malonda mavenda mmisewu ya mumzinda wa blantyre alira khalidwe la akhonsolo ya mzindawu akuwachitira nkhanza malawi si lawo 
  pocheza msangulutso mavendawa akuti akupempha khonsoloyi iwaganizire maka amene akuchita mabizinesi angonoangono 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi mneneri wa khonsoloyi anthony kasunda akuti sadalandirepo dandaulo lililonse kwa anthuwa wati zomwe akudziwa nzoti akhonsolowa akumamenyedwa mavenda akamagwira ntchito yawo yoletsa malonda mmalo amene si oyenera kuchitiramo bizinesi 
  tikudziwa zambiri ma rangers othamangitsa mmalo oletsedwa athu akhala akugendedwa mavenda umboni ulipo timapita nawo kuchipatala 
  galimoto zathunso zagendedwapo kambirimbiri mukumbukira ranger wathu wachikazi adamenyedwa limbe ochita malonda anaona wamenyedwa venda adatero kasunda 
  komabe amalondawa akuti akhala akudandaulira khonsoloyi sichitapo kanthu 
  francis james amene amagulitsa mkaka wamadzi wa mmapaketi adati adamenyedwapo akhonsolowa kumulipitsa k5 000 kaamba kochita malonda mumzindawu 
  adandigwira madzulo ndikupita mmanja mwanga ndidali machubu awiri mkaka adandigwira kundimenya zitsulo mmiyendomu adandilipiritsa k5 000 adatero james 
  akuti akukumbukiranso za mnzake wina amene ankagulitsa nsapato adamulanda nsapato zonse patadutsa sabata tidakumana mwa amene adamulandawo atavala imodzi mwa nsapatozo 
  mnzanga wina wogulitsa maheu adamumenyanso zitsulo adamumwera maheuwo adatero james 
  naye wina yemwe adati alinafe akuti adamugwira adakamutsitsa ku chileka akayende wapansi kumeneko atamugwira malonda nthochi 
  kasunda akuti katundu akuyenera kugulitsidwa mmalo ovomerezedwa khonsolo msika 
  malo oyenera malonda okhawo omwe khonsolo idakhazikitsa msika malo amene avomerezedwa khonsolo potsatira pempho lochokera kwa ofuna malonda 
  dziwani wochita malonda malo amene khonsolo lavomereza amakhala chiphaso adatero kasunda
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
dayosizi ya chikwawa yayamba kuphunzitsa akhristu kapewedwe ka covid-19 mpingo wa katolika dayosizi ya chikwawa wakhazikitsa ntchito yophunzitsa akhristu ake njira zabwino zopewera nthenda ya covid-19 yomwe ikufala kamba kachilombo kotchedwa coronavirus   malinga malipoti ntchitoyi inayamba kale mwa azachipatala omwe anayitanidwa adzafalitse uthengawu wa anamwino chipatala cha boma la chikwawa lusayo malango 
 mukulankhula kwawo malango alimbikitsa akhristu wa azitsatira njira za ukhondo kusamba mmanja sopo apewe wobisa amene akulowa mdziko muno ku mayiko kumene nthendayi yafala kale 
 malango apereka malangizo wa tsiku lamulungu ku limana la st monica ku parish ya st michaels dayosizi ya chikwawa 
 akhristu limana la st monica titenge maphunziro omwe aperekedwa tikalimbikitse mmakomo mwathu pokhala ukhondo kusamba mmanja sopo kupewa kugwira maso mphuno ngakhalenso pakamwa tisanasambe mmanja tisatenge kachilomboka anatero malango 
 padakalipano nthambi ya zaumoyo mbomalo yapereka mankhwala chlorine ku ma tchalitchi malimana athandizire njira zolimbikitsa ukhondo pofuna kupewa coronavirus
Label: HEALTH

Text:
chitetezo chibwerera mchimake wapolisi mdziko muno lot dzonzi wati uchifwamba omwe ambiri akudandaula wafika povuta tsopano utha cha njira zina zomwe apolisiwa akonza 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc dzonzi adanena pomwe amatsegulira msonkhano wolimbikitsa mgwirizano wa apolisi popititsa patsogolo chitetezo omwe unachitikira kulikulu la polisi ku lilongwe lolemba 
  adati polisi omwe agwira ntchito aziwapatsa mphoto zikuluzikulu kukwenzedwa ntchito nyengo ya khirisimasi zina za ndalama 
  dzonzi adati likulu la polisi lakonzanso ndondomeko yotumiza apolisi ambiri mmatauni mmadera omwe azikakhalira komweko azigwira ntchito yawoyo aziwayendera kuona mmene ntchitoyi ikuyendera 
  titumiza polisi ambiri mmadera onse tiziwayendera pafupipafupi tiziona mmene ntchito ikuyendera 
  pambali potumiza polisi ambiri kumapeto kwa chaka chilichonse tizikhala mwambo wopereka mphoto zikuluzikulu kukweza apolisi omwe agwira ntchito kuwapatsa ndalama kutengera mmene agwirira ntchito yawo adatero dzonzi 
  adaonjeza akudziwa za mavuto amene apolisi amakumana nawo mmadera momwe akukhala adatsimikizira apolisiwa zinthu zisintha posachedwa awakhazikitsira maofesi pafupipafupi 
  pamsoknhanowo apolisi maofesi mmaboma adalandira mphoto chogwira ntchito dzonzi adapempha apolisi onse makamaka pansewu azikhala ulemu ndiomvetsetsa 
  timvetsetsane apa sikuti kugwira ntchito ndikumanga kokhakokha kuwaunikira pomwe akuoneka akusochera komabe pochita tikuyenera kuonetsetsa tikuteteza olakwiridwa adatero dzonzi 
  yunus lambat yemwe wapampando wa bungwe loyendetsa za mgwirizano wa apolisi adati pazaka ziwiri zokha bungweli lakhazikitsa maofesi okwana 27 000 mdziko muno omwe amayanganira ntchito za chitetezo adapempha komiti yatsopano ipitirize ntchitoyi 
  wa bungwe loona za ufulu wa la centre for human rights and rehabilitation undule mwakasungula adati apolisi achita kuganiza zokhazikitsa njirazi akuzunzika uchifwamba 
  mwakasungula adati nkofunika polisi aganize zokhazikitsa njira zambiri zoti azidziwitsira apolisi pamene akumana zovuta aona okayikitsa
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
ambuye ziyaye apempha ansembe akhale odzipereka arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosizi ya lilongwe ambuye tarcizio ziyaye wapempha ansembe mdziko muno akhale odzipereka ntchito yotumikira mulungu momwe ambuye yesu khristu kuchitira utumiki 
 ziyaye unsembe mphatso ambuye ziyaye anena ku tchalitchi la padre pio woyera yomwe nthambi ya st andrea kaggwa parishi arkidayosiziyi mwambo wodzodza dikoni benard mwayi ligomeka wamsembe 
 ati unsembe mphatso ansembewa akuyenera kutumikira amachitira yesu khritsu 
 unsembe mphatso ndiponso mitseri yodabwitsa kwambiri opatulika mulungu anatigawirako mphatso ina wansembe akadzodzedwa amasanduka wansembe wina anatero ambuye ziyaye 
 polankhulapo ligomeka okondwa maloto ofuna kutumikira mulungu njira ya usembe akwaniritsidwa 
 chimwemwe changa chopambana choti mulungu wandigawira sacramenti la ukulu anatero ligomeka 
 wansembe wa tsopanoyu akatumikira mdziko la tanzania ku sukulu ya achinyamata ya capuchin boys komwe akakhale mlangizi za uzimu sukuluyi
Label: RELIGION

Text:
masauko chipembere phase iii starts end november blantyre city council bcc has said phase iii of the masauko chipembere highway project is set to resume at the end of this month as the contractor has already been identified and the signing of the contract took place on october 30 
  the third phase from yiannakis rouandabout to standard bank limbe branch will be upgraded to dual carriage way in limbe central business district the project will include upgrading of the one way livingstone avenue up to the roundabout near illovo sugar malawi limited head office 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   csos in pay back our money campaign phase 1 of masauko chipembere highway presenting report from the chief executives office to be considered and adopted by councillors during the first ordinary council meeting held at the council chamber on thursday bcc chief executive officer ted nandolo said the amount made available for the phase is about $ 6 million about k3 billion 
  the final phase will start from yiannakis roundabout going through limbe up to illovo roundabout the contractor world kaihatsu kogyo company limited wkk will be available by the end of the month he said 
  nandolo also reported to the meeting that vehicles for the mayor and deputy mayor have been procured he said the mayors official vehicle kia sorento has been delivered whereas that for the deputy mayor is yet to be supplied due to some delays in registration 
  he said the mayors vehicle is worth k29 million while the deputy mayors vehicle toyota corolla is valued at k19 million 
  blantyre city deputy mayor wild making statement on behalf of mayor noel chalamanda who was not present at the meeting commended the council members for their dedication and zeal shown in attending various committee meetings and asked them not to become complacent but rather strive to become agents of meaningful change in their communities 
  said while the keep blantyre city clean and green campaign was launched last saturday it is pleasing to note that the residents and the corporate world are all eager and willing to work with the council in transforming blantyre into beautiful clean and green city it once was
Label: TRANSPORT

Text:
okhudzidwa ngozi ya madzi alandira mbewu nduna ya zaulimi dr allan chiyembekeza yapempha alimi amene adakhudzidwa kusefukira kwa madzi abzale mbatata chinangwa chinyezi chisadatheretu mnthaka adzapeze chomwera madzi 
  ndunayo idanena masiku apitawa pomwe undunawo umakhazikitsa ndondomeko yopereka mbewuzi kwa alimi amene adakhudzidwa ngoziyo january chaka chino mwambowo udachitikira mboma la mulanje 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi maboma onse 15 amene adakhudzidwa ngoziyi ndiwo alandire mbewuyi abzale pamene mvula ikugwabe mmaboma 
  nkhani yabwino komabe alimi akuti zosakwanira boma lisalekere pomwepa 
  olive chamveka wa mmudzi mwa mtiza kwa senor chief mabuka mboma la mulanje adali munda wa maekala awiri mundawu udakokoloka adati mizere 7 yokha ndiyo idapulumuka 
  ndimalima chimanga mmunda umenewu ndimapha matumba 45 chaka chino thumba la makilogalamu 50 silingakwane mavuto awa achimwene adatero 
  chamveka adalandira mbewu ya chinangwa yokwanira kubzala theka la ekala angasangalale mbewuyi chamveka sadakondwe 
  mvulatu idasiya kuno kusonyeza ndidalira chinyontho chomwe chidakalipo zomwe zokaikitsa tingaphule kanthu musadabwe sindikusangalala kwambiri 
  boma litipatse chimanga tifatu njala kupatula zomwe atipatsa lerozi komabe boma lisalekere pomwepa adatero chamveka movomerezana edina mutakha wa mmudzi mwa misomali mbomalo amenenso adalandira mbewu ya chinangwa 
  chiyembekeza polankhula atangokhazikitsa ndondomekoyi adati pali zambiri zomwe boma likuchita likwanitse kuthana mavuto amene anthuwa akukumana nawo 
  adati boma lakonza mapologalamu osiyanasiyana afikire alimiwa 
  iyi ndondomeko yoyamba posakhalitsapa pabwera ndondomeko ya mthirira yomwenso ithandize anthuwa zichitika pamene alimiwa akudikirira mvula abzale mbewu zina adatero chiyembekeza
Label: FLOODING

Text:
kuvulaza namfedwa ndinali maliro masiku apitawa komwe amfumu adaganiza zokhutula nkhawa zawo za anamfedwa tili kumanda amfumuwo adati sadakondwe momwe wa malemu ankathamangira thamangira pamaliro mmalo mosiira amuthandize 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu polankhula amfumuwa adadzudzula bamboyo akuti chizolowezi chochita zinthu mwayekha posafuna kuthandizidwa aka sikanali koyamba kumva anamfedwa akudzudzulidwa mokhadzula mokhudzana khalidwe lawo pamudzi 
  amadzudzulidwa kaamba kosapezeka maliro akagwera amadzudzulidwa chophonya ndondomeko miyambo ina yokhudza maliro ndaonaponso anamfedwa ataphikiridwa nsima pamaliro nkuwasiira adye okha ati akapita kumaliro sadya chakudya 
  pamene tikukhala mmagulu sipangalephere wina kulakwitsa kulakwira zina zifukwa zomwe sitidziwa sachita nawo zoyembekezeka pagulu kudya nsima pamaliro osakhala akudana nsimayo anthufe timayenda matenda osiyanasiyana omwe zina salola kumangodyapo chisawawa 
  kungodya za mchere kaya mafuta ndiye aputa zosaputa mthupi sangakwanitse kulengeza za matenda kwa awamvetsetse zina kachetechete amangopewa zakudya zomwe sizinaphikidwe mwa dongosolo lomwe adapatsidwa kuchipatala 
  yakhota pangono nkhaniyi apa pagona nkhani lero funso ili nchi chiyani amfumu ngakhalenso atsogoleri mmadera midzi yomwe tikukhala amafuna kumudzudzula namfedwa panthawi imene akumva kale kupweteka kotaya mbale amene mwaferedwapo mukudziwa kuwawa kwa imfa

Text:
kumawachenjeza anawa ndimakumbuka masiku adzanawo nkhani zogwiririra anazi zisanafale kwenikweni wanga ankatikhazika pansi achemwali anga kutiuza kunjaku kuli aupandu omwe amakhoza kuseweretsa matupi ana nkuwachita chipongwe 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu apatu nkuti tili achichepere zaka zathu zili pakati zisanu khumi 
  adachenjeza pali ziwalo zina pathupi zomwe munthu wina tisamamulole kuzigwira adanenetsa wina atakugwira modabwitsa kaya malume mlongo wako mphuzitsi ukuwe uthawe nkuwadziwitsa munthu wina wachikulire 
  adachenjezaso aphuzitsi amphongo osazolowerana nawo kusukulu adanenetsa aphuzitsi aamuna usakakhale nawo wekha muofesi kaya mkalasi adati akakutuma ukasiye makope ukawasesere kunyumbako uwakanire akakati wachita mwano adzathana mayiwo 
  adakambaponso za aphuzitsi opereka malikisi ochuluka pomwe mwana walakwa adati oterewa tikachenjere nawo sachita zaulere amafuna malipiro tsiku lina 
  zomangolandira timphatso switi bisiketi kaya ndalama kwa osawadziwa adakaniza pakhomo pali mnyamata wogwira ntchito padalinso malire pakachezedwe naye popewa angatikole msampha 
  padali zambiri zomwe ankatilankhula mwina ankaonjeza kumene adatitsegula maso za kuopsa kwa mdziko limene timakulamo 
  malangizowa adakhazika mmitu mwathu kotero sikudali kwapafupi wina atitchere ndale adali ataunikira za nzeru zosiyanasiyana zomwe amagwiritsa nthito pofuna nkhanza kwa ana 
  choncho zonse ndikamva za mwana amene wagwiriridwa sindilephera kulingalira makolo mwanayo adayesapo kumuchenjeza za mchitidwewu womwe ukukhala wafalikira mdziko lathu 
  malangizowa sangagwire ntchito zonse zina anawa amangokakamizidwa mwadzidzidzi munthu wamphamvu zoti sangalimbane naye 
  komatu kawirikawiri tikumva omwe akugwiririra anawa amawanyengerera switi ndalama zina zoterozo kusonyeza amabwera momuwenderera mwanayu pokambirana naye momupusitsa

Text:
zampira zenizeni cj banda john cj banda kaputeni wa blue eagles katundu wofunika ku flames wapeza mwayi wokasewera ku jomo cosmos mdziko la south africa kodi apita liti nanga mbiri yake yotani bobby kabango akucheza naye 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu dzina lonse ndani banda amanditcha cj dzina langa john banda ondikonda amati john cj banda 
  okukonda ake ati nanga cj akutanthauzanji   kwathu ku nkhata bay ndiwo adandipatsa dzina la cj chidule cha christopher john banda amene ankasewera big bullets ati timasewera mpira wofanana amaganiza adali anga ayi padalibenso chibale 
  tamva ukupita ku south africa unyamuka liti ulendo mwina ulipo kapenanso ayi zili chonchi eni akewo adamaliza nambala ya osewera akunja amene amayenera alembe nkhani yeniyeni yomwe ndikudziwa yakuti sadamalize kupereka ndalama kutimu yanga yomwe adagulira micium mhone zonse zikatheka ndiye may muno tipitako dziwani pali matimu amene akundifuna matimuwo sindingawatchule maina 
  mayeso mudakhozadi kwambiri mutafunsa eni timu akuuzani zidatheka ntchito tidagwira 
  tandiuzako za chiyambi chako chikopa 
  ndidayamba mpira ku eagle strikers 2008 tidali osewera amene tidailowetsa muligi idatha chaka osatuluka 2010 ndidachokako ulendo ku police training school kuchoka uko pomwe ndimadzayamba blue eagles tidawina standard bank cup 2011 carlsberg cup 2012 fama cup 2012 
  nanga mbiri yako ku flames ndidatengedwa kukasewerera flames 2011 pamene timamenya kenya ndasewera magemu 46 ndachinya zigoli 10 chaka chathachi ndidachinya zigoli zinayi kuposa osewera flames ndimasewera pakati 
  uli pabanja mkazi uyo akumvayo dzina lake jane mwana alipo dzina lake sean 
  kodi udindo wako wotani ku polisiko ndine inspector kulikulu la polisi ku area 30
Label: SPORTS

Text:
andale agundika misonkhano osapewa covid-19 msabatayi 5 adapezeka kachirombo ka coronavirus mdziko muno kuchititsa chiwerengero cha anthuwo chifike 63 chiopsezo cha nthendayi chikukulirakulira 
  zikuoneka andale sakusamala za pomwe akuchititsa misonkhano mosalabadira nkhani ya gulu chinyezi chofalitsa matendawa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc atangopereka zikalata zawo kwa wapampando wa bungwe la zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec jane ansah lazarus chakwera yemwe akutsatizana saulos chilima mumgwirizano wa zipani za malawi congress party mcp utm party adazungulira mumzinda wa blantyre komwe chikhamu chimasonkhana osapereka mpata wokhala mita imodzi 
  atapereka zikalata zawo mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika yemwe akuimira zipani za democratic progressive party dpp womutsatira atupele muluzi wa united democratic front udf nawo adazungulira mumzindawo mosalabadira za khamu lofikako 
  lamulungu chakwera chilima adachititsa msonkhano kubwalo la mzuzu upper stadium pomwe muluzi adali pamisonkhano yoimaima kuchoka ku chigawo cha kumwera mpaka pakati monsemo kudalibe kutsata ndondomeko yotalikana 
  akadaulo zaumoyo ndale ati zipanizi zikuika miyoyo ya pachiswe matenda covid-19 oopsa 
  kadaulo zaumoyo maziko matemba wati ndale zili apo atsogoleri zipani akuyenera kutsatidwa 
  kampeni imayenera kutha 30 june choti tsiku la chisankho silinaikidwe onse okhudzidwa ayenera kudziwa kapmeni iyenera kutha masiku tsiku la chisankho adatero 
  kadaulo wa malamulo sunduzwayo madise adati mec ili udindo wosankha tsiku la chisankho lichitira posankha tsiku la chisankho chapadera 
  nyumba ya malamulo idakhazikitsa tsiku pofuna kutsata malamulo chisankho psakhale chisokonezo nkhani ya chisankho cha patatu chiyenera kutsatidwa mec ili mphamvu yokhazikitsa masiku atsopano imachitira pakakhala chisankho chapadera cha aphungu makhansala adatero madise 
  wapampando wa komiti ya zamalamulo ku nyumba ya malamulo kezzie msukwa adati adzidzimuka nkhaniyi 
  nzodabwitsa mec ikufuna chisankho chidzakhaleko 23 june adatero msukwa 
  msabatayi akachenjede zamalamulo apempha mutharika alemekeze chisankhocho pochotsa makomishona mec omwe bwalo lamilandu lidawapeza sadayendetse chisankho cha 21 may 2019 
  mwa akachenjedewa garton kamchedzera wa ku chancellor college adati tcheru kuyembekeza tsiku lomwe mutharika adzachotse makomishonala nkusankha 
  nchifukwa chiyani sakufuna kutula pansi maudindo ndikuona zikanakhala akanatula maudindo okha kupanda kutero okhanza kupanga chiganizo pazosatira za chisankho chomwe chikubwerachi kupitirira kukhalabe maofesi sikovomerezeka mmalamulo mutharika akuyenera kuchitapo kanthu pogwiritsa ntchito section 75 ya malamulo 
  gawo 75 ndime 4 imaperka mphamvu kwa mtsogoleri wa dzko kudzera kubungwe la public appointment committee pac ya ku nyumba ya malamulo ikapeza komishoniyo ilibe kuthekera koyendetsa masankho 
  mipando ya makomishonayo itha 5 june pomwe akwaniritse ndime yawo
Label: POLITICS
