Text:
chotsani chiletso chogulitsa chimanga kunjamccci bungwe loona za malonda mafakitale la malawi confederation of chambers of commerce and industry mccci lapempha boma lichotse chiletso chogulitsa chimanga kunja 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu pulezidenti wa bungwelo karl chokotho adapereka pempholi lachinayi potsegulira chionetsero cha malonda ku gateway mall mumzinda wa lilongwe 
  adati chiletsochi chikupsinja kwambiri alimi angonoangono omwe akukakamizidwa kugulitsa chimanga chawo mdziko mommuno mitengo yotsika poyerekeza mitengo yomwe maiko akugulira 
  chokotho alimi akadapha makwacha tanzania pomwepa chimanga chikugulidwa pamtengo okwera mwina kuposa katatu mtengo wa boma la malawi ndiye alimi akadaloledwa azigulitsa chimanga chawo mmisika imeneyi akadapha makwacha adatero chokotho 
  adati akudziwa la malawi likuyenera kugula kusunga chimanga kupangira zogwa chaka cha mawa zomwe sizikudziwika adati vuto lomwe lilipo loti bungwe la admarc lomwe limagulako silikugulanso chimangachi 
  boma litakhazikitsa mitengo alimi adali chiyembekezo mwina apindula pogulitsa ku admarc nzosabisa admarc siyikugula chimanga moti alimi akungobwerera nacho mapeto ake mavenda akupezerapo danga adatero chokotho 
  nduna ya za ntchito achinyamata masewero kuphunzitsa ntchito francis kasaila yemwe adali mlendo wolemekezeka mwambowo adati mpofunika kuzama kukambirana bwinobwino chiletsochi chisadachotsedwe 
  ndunayo idati alimi ambiri angonoangono amadalira pologalamu ya boma ya sabuside paulimi pomwe omwe amagulitsa chimanga kunja mavenda zomwe zikutanthauza kuchotsa chiletsochi ndiye mavenda ndiwo apindule sabuside ya boma 
  vuto lalikulu loti omwe amagulitsa chimanga kunja mavenda omwe amagula kwa alimi pamitengo yolira ndiye zikutanthauza olo titachotsa chiletsochi alimiwo sathandizika ayi agulidwabe mtengo olirawo mavenda ndiwo apindule adatero kasaila
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
amayi oyembekezera akulipira k10 000 kusamvana kwabuka pachipatala cha chachingono cha chikangawa mboma la mzimba pamene amayi oyembekezera akulipiritsidwa k10 000 pokabereka   amayiwo omwe auza msangulutso ati odabwa mwana akangobadwa achipatala akumalamula kholo lake lilipire k10 000    wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu amayi oyembekezera akulipira k10 000 ku chikangawa   kulibe komwe tingathawire chipatala chathu chimwechi sitikudziwa boma lakhazikitsa malamulo woti tiyambe kulipira mzipatala tikakabereka kudabwitsa kwake sakumatipatsa malisiti tikabereka adatero wina amene adakana kutchulidwa   woona za umoyo mboma la mzimba lumbani munthali adavomera amayi akumalipira zikuchitika malamulo amene ozungulira chipatalacho adagwirizana   adati anthuwo adagwirizana amene sapita kuchidikiriro kukadikirira pamene masiku ake obereka ayandikira azipereka k10 000   cholinga chathu ndichoti amayi azipita msanga kuchipatala osati kudikira matenda ayambe amapezeka aberekera panjira ndalamayo imagwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana pachipatalapo adatero   munthali adatsimikizanso anthuwo sapatsidwa malisiti potsimikiza apereka ndalamayo zomwe zingabweretse mavuto polondoloza ndalamazo zikugwiradi ntchito yoyenera 
  ndalama iliyonse imafunika umboni lisiti yalipilidwadi apa tivomereze zimalakwika ndawauza athane vutolo adalongosola munthali 
  adati amayi amene amalipira ndalamayo amene apita mochedwa kuchidikiriro amene aberekera mnjira amene aberekera   amene amakadikirira kuchipatala salipira kanthu akabereka adatero munthali   komabe mfumu kampingo sibande ikuti malamulowo akuwadziwa iyo idati sikudziwa kalikonse anthuwo akuyenera kulipira   chindapusa chomwe tidavomereza chokhudza kukwatiwitsa mwana osati izizi adatero sibande   adati malamulowo pamene amakhazikitsidwa amafuna alimbikitse amayi azipita kuchipatala pamene masiku ayandikira   zikukhumudwitsa amayi oyembekezera malinga wina amene wangobereka kumene mwana wa mwamuna pachipatalapo k10 000 ndalama yambiri yomwe sangayipeze   adali malamulo ndiye mwina bwezi atatidziwitsa tiyambe kutsala ndondomeko yake apapa akutiranga osadziwa tchimo lathu masiku anowa munthu utiyo wa kumudzi angatulutse k10 000 adafunsa mayiyo   mfumu james lupeska ya mderalo idati salipira ndiye pena amabwenzedwa ndikulemberedwa kalata yopita ku chipatala cha boma mzimba chipatala chachikulu cha mzuzu central
Label: HEALTH

Text:
agwira onyoza mtsogoleri wa lino amayi awiri ati apolisi adawamanga sabata ikuthayi powaganizira adanyoza mtsogoleri wadziko lino joyce banda chipani chake cha peoples party pp ati atakana kulandira chovala chamakaka achipanichi avinire mtsogoleriyu 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc amayiwa ati adakananso kulowa mgulu la amayi anzawo omwe amavinira mtsogoleriyu pomwe adakayendera dera lawo 
  oganiziridwawa eliza kusheni wazaka 26 dorothy ngonga wazaka 24 adatulutsidwa pabelo la bwalo lamilandu la mwanza magistrate lolemba atakhala masiku asanu mchitokolosi cha apolisi 
  wapolisi wamkulu ku mwanza ellobiam banda adatsimikizira zakunjatidwa kwa awiriwo adati amayiwo sadamangidwe pochitira mtudzu mtsogoleri wadziko lino akunenera 
  adati kumangidwa kwa awiriwo kudadza malinga kusagwirizana pakati amayi amderalo 
  amayi awiriwa agamulidwa pogwiritsa ntchito onyoza 
  zikuganiziridwa amayi awiriwa adanyoza wina martha mazinzi potsatira nsanje yomwe idakula adatero wapolisiyu 
  adati atangonjata amayiwo lachinayi oganiziradwawo adatulutsidwa pabelo lolemba apolisiwo adali otangwanidwa mtsogoleri wa lino pomwe amakayendera kumeneko 
  zotolera za apolisi zikutsutsana zimene oganiziridwawo mkhalakale wachipani cha dpp bright kachingwe kumeneko akunena 
  ngonga wati mnzakeyo adazizwa ndikumangidwa kwawo patsikulo sadachitire mtudzu 
  patsikulo timachokera kundende ya mwanza pomwe tidakumana amayi 6 mwa adavala chovala cha makaka achipani cha pp ndidathirira ndemanga chovalacho chidali chabwino adatero mayiyo 
  ngonga adati atazindikira zinthu zidayamba kutentha mnzake adachoka pamalopo pomwe adabisala mgolosale yomwe awiriwo amagwira ntchito 
  adati apolisi adabwera pamalopo kudzawanjata popanda zifukwa zokwanira 
  awiriwo adatulutsidwa pabelo posapereka chikole chilichonse bwalo lidalamula awiriwo adzikawonekera kupolisi lolemba lililonse 
  kachingwe adati chipani ndichokhudzidwa kunjatindwa kwa awiriwo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
wa zaumoyo ku dedza wavulala ngozi wa zaumoyo mboma la dedza dr regina chimenya wavulala atawombedwa njinga yamoto mmbali mwa nsewu wochoka ku lilongwe kupita ku dedza mbomalo 
 malingana wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo sergeant cassim manda ngoziyi yachitika dzulo pomwe mayiwa anayimika galimoto yawo mmbali mwa nsewu wu msika wa bembeke agule ndiwo za masamba 
 njingayi yomwe imathamanga kwambiri akuti inawawomba pomwe amaika masambawo kumbuyo kwa galimoto yawo 
 dalaivala wa njingayi alufeyo chalusa akawonekera kwa bwalo la milandu akayankhe mlandu wovulaza munthu kaamba koyendetsa njinga mosasamala
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
mbusa amuganizira kugwirira wozelezeka apolisi mboma la neno akusunga mchitokosi mbusa wina wa zaka 52 yemwe amatchuka kutyi pastor joshua wa mpingo wa united of god pomuganizira adagwirira mtsikana wodwala nthenda yakugwa wa zaka 16 
  mbusayo yemwe dzina lake lenileni juwayo antoniyo amachokera mmudzi mwa siyali traditional authority(t chapananga mboma la chikwawa 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka malinga mneneri wa apolisi mboma la neno raphael kaliati antoniyo adakumana mtsikanayo lachisanu may 5 akuchokera ku chigayo 
  mtsikanayo adaima panyumba ya mbusayo kupemphako madzi akumwa mbusayo adamuuza angolowa nkukamwera madziwo mnyumbamo apa adamutsatira mtsikanayu kumugwiririra adatero kaliati 
  adati mtsikanayo adakamuneneza mbusayo kwa ake omwe adakadandaula kupolisi 
  kalata yaku chipatala yatsimikiza mtsikanayu adagwiriridwadi adatero kaliati 
  malinga apolisiwa mbusayo aonekera kubwalo la milandu masiku akubwerawa 
  zakhumudwitsa mamembala mpingowu 
  mkucheza kwathu traditional authority mlauli yemwenso mwa omwe amapemphera mumpingowo adati chokhumudwitsa nchoti mtsikanayu amagwa 
  mlauli adati mbusayo adayamba mpingowu mchaka cha 2014 anthuwa amamukhulupirira 
  mbusayotu amaonetsa weniweni mzochitika zake zina amakafika mpaka ku tete mdziko la mozambique kukalalikira choncho titamva wagwidwa pokhudzidwa nkhaniyo tazunguzika adatero mlauli 
  adati antoniyo wabwerera kuchoka ku mozambique chaka chathachi 
  mlauli adaonjezera mbusayu wasiya opemphera mpingowo umasiye 
  pakutivutanso poti iyeyu adayambitsa mipingo ku mulanje komwe iliko iwiri ku ndirande mumzinda wa blantyre ku zomba ku chikwawa kodi nkhosa zake mmadera onsewa zitani adadandaula motero mlauli 
  mbusayu banja
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
adatuma nthenga kudzandifunsira kudali ku dedza mwezi wa october mchaka cha 2017 pomwe lucy mvula adalandira uthenga kwa mzake wa geoffrey kishombe 
  uthengowo umati kishombe akulephera kugona kotero akumufuna chibwenzi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi lucy sadaugwiritse ntchito uthengawo choti wobweretsa nthengayo adali ankakonda kuledzera pomwe ankapereka uthengawo patsikulo nkuti atalawa pangono 
  nthengayo adabweranso tsiku lina maso gwaa kudzatsindika za khumbo la kishombe adandipatsa nambala ya phone ya nzawoyo ndidapereka yanga adatero lucy 
  lero thupi limodzi banja la kishombe apatu awiriwo adakhala masiku ndithu osayankhulana mpaka pomwe tsiku lina kishombe adamuimbira lucy ichi chidasanduka chizolowezi kufikira tsiku lomwe adagwirizana zoti akumane 
  tsiku lokumana litafika kishombe pamodzi anzake awiri adapita kwa lucy kukacheza zomwe zidachititsa macheza agwire moto 
  mosakhalitsa kishombe adafunsira naye lucy sadazengereze kulola 
  ndidatengeka kwambiri cha momwe ankandizondera ankakonda kuimba foni kungofuna kudziwa za moyo wanga adatero lucy 
  awiriwo adakhala ubwenzi kwa zaka ziwiri kufikira november 19 2019 pomwe adalowa mbanja madyerero adachitikira greek orthodox garden mzinda wa blantyre 
  awiriwo ati mavuto amathana nawo poyangana kwa mulungu lucy amagwira ntchito yaunamwino uzamba pomwe kishombe amagwira ntchito ku bungwe la malawi bureau of standards mbs 
  pakadali awiriwo akukhalira ku chigumula mzinda womwewu wa blantyre lucy amachokera ku euthini mfumu chindi mboma la mzimba kishombe amachokera mmudzi mwa mwafilaso mfumu kyungu mboma la karonga
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
papa ndiwokhudzidwa ngozi yomwe yachitika mdziko la india wolemba glory kondowe mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika lonse papa francisco wati wokhudzidwa ngozi ya kusefukira kwa madzi imene yakhudzz madera mdziko la india 
 wapereka uthenga wa chipepeso papa papa francisco walankhula potsatira malipoti akuti oposera 180 omwe afa ngozi yo yomwe yadza kamba ka mvula ya mphamvu yomwe yakhala ikugwa mdzikomo 
 malingana malipoti papa frascico wati wokhudzidwa ngoziyi wati ayikiza kukumbukira mapemphero omwe ataya miyoyo yawo pangoziyi madera omwe akhudzidwa clarah kelatakah muharashitra ambiri ati madera omwe akhudzidwa kwambiri madera lucky lala komwe kwafa oposera 60 omwe akhudzidwa chiwerengero chawo chaposa 288 thousand oposera 582 thousand ndiomwe apulumutsidwa pangoziyi ati zomwe zachitikazi zokhudza kwambiri la india
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
ulalo adali venda wa masiketi makolo polangiza amati ukadekha umawona maso nkhono mwambi womwewu ansembe amati ukafuna kuvala kolona ukuyenera kusunga khosi 
  miyambiyi siyapafupi kwa ambiri kuyitsata umboni ulipo wa nkhaninkhani pakuti kwa omwe adadekha nkusunga makosi   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu amadziwa momwe maso nkhono alili kolona mkhosi 
  edward maggie tsiku la ukwati wawo apa pali umboni wa edward bannet gangile wa kwa t chiwere ku dowa maggie failo wa kwa t malengachanzi ku nkhotakota omwe adakondana atangoonana koyamba adadekherana asadapalane ubwenzi 
  nthawiyo mchaka cha 2013 gangile adali wowerengera za chuma ku chipatala cha mishoni cha nkhoma akuti chipatalachi chimakonda kugula katundu mapepala zolembera kushopu ya maggie yomwe idali ku area 3 mumzinda wa lilongwe 
  nthawiyo ndimayesetsa kumuthandiza mwachangu mwansangala 
  timapatsana moni kucheza nkhani zingapo ndimalephera kumuuza za kukhosi adandisangalatsa kwambiri nsangala zomwe amandirandira nazo adatero gangile 
  adati mpata udapezeka tsiku mushopumo mudabwera venda ogulitsa masiketi omwe adasangalatsa maggie mwa namwaliyo adamufunsa angamugulireko mkazi 
  ndimathokoza mulungu ndidaganiza msanga ndidangoyankha ndidzamugulira ndikadzamupeza yankholi lidamupangitsa kundifunsa mafunso ambiri zamoyo wanga kuphatikizapo kukayika mwina ndimamunamiza adatero gangile 
  adati ichi chidali chiyambi cha awiriwa kufufuzana ndikudziwana bwinobwino mpaka adavomerezana onse amadikirana kutanthauza mwa adadekha kusunga khosi 
  adati awiriwa adakhala miyezi ubwenzi usadayambe kwenikweni kuchoka panthawiyo zonse zitalongosoka adapanga chinkhoswe 15 april 2015 ku area 47 kwa azakhali maggie ukwati udachitikira ku lilongwe golf club 12 july 2015
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
milandu ya maalubino   izipita kukhothi lalikulu milandu yokhudza kuphedwa kusowetsedwa kwa maalubino tsopano akuti izikakambidwira mukhothi lalikulu lomwe lili mphamvu yopereka chilango chokhwimirapo kuposa khothi la majisitireti lomwe chilango chomwe lingapereke nchochepa msangulutso utha kuvumbula 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu milanduyi sizitengera kuchepa kukula kwake pofuna kuteteza maalubino omwe miyoyo yawo ili pachiswe kaamba ka zikhulupiriro za zoti mafupa ziwalo za anthuwa zizimba za mankhwala olemeretsa 
  mneneri wa nthambi ya makhothi mlenga mvula wati sadalandire kalata yotsimikiza makhothi angonoangono majisitireti ovomerezedwa kusamba mmanja pankhani zotere nkhothi lalikulu ligwire ntchito 
  sindidalandire kalata iliyonse pankhani imeneyi kutengera momwe zinthu zilili pankhani yokhudza maalubino mamajisireti omasuka kusamba mmanja pamilandu yokhudza maalubino khothi lalikulu ndilo limve kupereka chigamulo chilango adatero mvula polankhula msangulutso lachitatu lapitali 
  bwaloli tsopano lizizenga milandu yokhudza maalubino adati mndondomeko za makhothi khothi lililonse lili mlingo womwe silingabzole popereka chilango ndiye potsatira madandaulo kuzunza maalubino kukunka mtsogolo kaamba ka zilango zochepa nkofunika khothi lalikulu ndilo lizizenga milanduyi 
  majisitireti sangapitirire mlingo wina popereka chilango ndiye kutengera zilango zomwe akufuna ozunza maalubino azilandira majisitireti akuyenera kutumiza mlanduwo kukhothilalikulu adatero mvula 
  chitsanzo cha nkhaniyi chapezeka ku mchinji komwe majisireti rodwell mejja phiri wasamba mmanja pamlandu wa zione gabina kamngola wa zaka 25 yemwe akuzengedwa mlandu womuganizira kuopseza msuweni gertrude ulaya wa zaka 22 yemwe wachialubino 
  mneneri wa polisi ku mchinji moses nyirenda wati kamngola akumuganizira adanena msuweni wakeyo ndalama akadakhala mwana akadamupha nkhaniyi akuti idaopsa msuweni wakeyo ake mary ulaya omwe adakadandaula kupolisi 
  adati apolisi atafufuza za nkhaniyi adatsegulira kamngola mlandu woopseza munthu womwe ungayambitse chisokonezo 
  malinga nyirenda majisitireti mejja phiri adanena nkhaniyo idamukulira malingana mlingo wa chilango chomwe angapereke mmalo mwake adapereka kalata ya limandi mayiyo ku maula kuyembekezera kukaonekera kukhothi lalikulu ku lilongwe 
  titamufunsa sikumulakwira wozengedwa mlandu waungono uwu kumutumiza kubwalo lalikulu mlandu usanazengedwe kubwalo la majisitireti mvula adati pakhothi lililonse munthu amalandira chilungamo mofanana mbali zonse ziwiri zokhudzidwa zimakhala mpata wonena mbali zawo chigamulo chimachokera zokamba zawozo 
  zilibe khothi la majisitireti khothi lalikulu la supreme ayi kulikonse mbali zokhudzidwa zimapatsidwa mpata wonena mbali zawo chigamulo chimachokera pamenepo adatero mlenga 
  adatsindika nkhani yagona pokhwimitsa chitetezo cha maalubino akaona zilango zikuluzikulu zomwe zikuperekedwa ayambe mantha wozunza maalubino uthe 
  potsirapo ndemanga katswiri wa zamalamulo kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college edge kanyongolo adavomereza mlandu wotere mlandu waungono woyenera khothi la majisireti zikutengera zomwe wagwiritsa ntchito posamba mmanja 
  umenewu umodzi mwa milandu ingonoingono potengera malamulo ogamulira milandu umayenera kugamulidwa majisireti chilango chake nchochepa zili chonchi zimatengera wawonaponji pankhaniyo pazifukwa zina akhoza kuutumiza kukhothi lalikulu adatero kanyongolo 
  naye mlembi wa bungwe la maloya khumbo soko adagwirizana kanyongolo ponena majisitireti mpata wofunsa chiunikiro cha khothi lalikulu akuona nkhaniyo ikuposa mphamvu zake 
  posamba mmanja mlanduwo 3 june 2016 mejja phiri adati adauzidwa milandu yonse yamtunduwu aziitumiza kukhothi lalikulu opezeka olakwa azilandira chilango chokwanira 
  gawo 88 1 la milandu zilango zake yokhudza mlandu woopseza munthu ili magawo awiri omwe kaperekedwe ka chilango chake nkosiyana 
  mlandu woopseza womwewu munthu akhoza kumangidwa mpakana moyo wonse adatchulapo za kupha pomwe adangoti ndikumenya poopsezapo chilango chachikulu chomwe angalandire zaka kundende adatero nyirenda 
  adati chokhacho chotchula kupha kutengera woganiziridwayo adaopseza munthu wa womwe lonse likudandaula uli pachiwopsezo chachikulu mlandu waukulu
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
papa wati akhristu akhale opilira mavuto mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wati odekha popilira zovuta za moyo uno ndiye moyo weniweni wa chikhristu 
 malinga malipoti vatican radio papa francisco walankhula lamulungu ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican 
 wati akhristu akuyenera odekha mmene mulungu achitira popereka mpata kwa ake alape kutembenuka mtima 
 papa francisco wati yesu khristu amawululira akhristu mulungu wodekha chinthu chomwe wati chosangalatsa chobweretsa chiyembekezo 
 papayu walankhula pothilira ndemanga uthenga wabwino womwe unawerengedwa lamulungu la 16 nyengo ya chaka womwe fanizo la mbewu zabwino nansongole 
 wati fanizoli antchito anafunsa mbuye wao awalole azule nansongole yemwe kukula limodzi mbewu mmunda mwini munda ayi azisiye zonse zikulire limodzi poopa angazule mbewu zabwino zomwe yokolola yomwe idzasiyanitse nansongoleyu mbewu zabwino 
 papa francisco wati mulungu yemwe mwini munda amabzyala mbewu zabwino zokhazokha satana amapeza mpata maka ya mavuto osiyana siyana moyo uno posokoneza omwe fanizoli mbewu 
 wati pali phuma ofuna kuthana tchimo onse ochimwa 
 pamenepa wati akhristu akuyenera odekha mmene mulungu achitira popereka mpata kwa ake alape kutembenuka mtima 
 papa francisco wati odekha popirira zovuta za moyo uno ndiye moyo weniweni wa chikhristu
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
voti yotengera zigawo ilipobe amalawi akadali mtima wovota potengera chigawo chomwe amachokera munthu chipani chomwe akulumikizana nacho mnjira inayake makamaka 
  mwachitsanzo zisankho ziwiri zapitazi za 2014 2019 chipani cha dpp chakhala chikupeza ma voti ambiri ku mmwera mcp mchigawo chapakati pomwe kumpoto kudavotera kwambiri zipani za utm and pp 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka duwa kale mbale zotsatira za chisankho cha chaka chino zawonetsa kavotedwe ka sikadasinthe kwenikweni zangokhala mkopera wa zotsatira za chisankho cha 2014 makamaka kwa zipani za mcp dpp zomwe zimapikisana kwambiri 
  wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe okhudzidwa zisankho la malawi electoral support network mesn steve duwa wati zili choncho saphunzitsidwa mokwanira za momwe angasankhire atsogoleri zipani za ndale zimalephera kutambasula zake asinthe maganizo pambali yovotera 
  kale mbali potengera zigawo zochokera amafuna kukokera kwake malingaliro oterewa akhonza potengera momwe aphunzitsidwira kasankhidwe ka atsogoleri momwe zipani zatambasulira zake adatero duwa 
  katswiri ndale ernest thindwa adati kuvota kwa malingaliro otere kawirikawiri kumachititsa mtsogoleri azisankhidwa ochepa zomwe zimaloledwa mdziko muno potengera malamulo achisankho nzosayenera demokalase 
  demokalase imatanthauza azisankha mtsogoleri yemwe akufuna azisankhidwa ambiri mwachidule opitirira theka la onse omwe adaponya voti ndiye demokalase ikuyenda adatero thindwa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
papa wati atsogolera misa ya chaka cha ukaristia lamulungu likudzali mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco lamulungu likubwerali adzatsogolera misa ya chaka cha ukaristia mtchalichi lalikulu la saint peters basilica 
 malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa adzatsogoleranso mwambo wopembedza ambuye yesu wokhala ukaristia pambuyo misayo 
 malinga mliri wa coronavirus ochepa chabe omwe adzawalole nawo miyamboyi 
 akuyembekezeka kutsgolera misayo papa francisko lamulungu la 14 june tsiku lalikulu mpingo wa katolika lons kaamba koti tsiku lomwe mpingo udzakhale ukuchita chaka cha ukaristia tsiku lolemekeza thupi ma magazi ambuye yesu chaka chimenechi chimadziwika corpus christi mchiyankhulo cha chi latin 
 pali chiyembekezo makumi asanu 50 omwe adzakhala nao mwambowo potsata ndondomeko zoyikika pofuna kupewa kufala kwa nthenda ya covid 19 
 akhristu katolika lonse mwayi wodzatsata mwambo wa misa mwambo wopembedza ambuye yesu wokhala ukaristia kudzera kanema makina intaneti 
 misa tsikuli idzayamba quarter to ten mmawa ya ku rome malawi 
 papa urban wa 4 ndiyemwe adalengeza mchaka cha 1264 mpingo wa katolika lonse uzichita chaka chimenechi 
 chaka cha ukaristia chimenechi chimafuna kutsindika mosapeneka konse ukaristia muli ambuye yesu kotero nkofunika kudzikonzekeretsa polandira ukaristia popeza si chakudya wamba zitumbuwa zikondamoyo 
 msonkhano wa ku trent mchaka cha 1551 udatsindika zoti ukaristia mulidi ambuye yesu
Label: RELIGION

Text:
dpp ikhumudwitsa ku kk mafumu ku nkhotakota okwiya chipani cha dpp chimene akuchidzudzula pogwiritsa ntchito galimoto ya chipatala ntchito zachipani 
  lachisanu 15 chipanicho chidatenga galimoto ya chipatala cha nkhotakota kukasiya otsatira chipani ku lilongwe komwe amakatsanzikana mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika ulendo wopita ku msonkhano wa united nations general assembly unga mdziko la united states of america 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka galimoto limene lidanyamula chipani kupita ku lilongwelo izitu zimachitika pamene pachipatalapo amasowekera thandizo la mayendedwe malinga phungu wa nyumba ya malamulo ku nkhotakoka peter mazizi 
  t wina amene adapempha tisamutchule adati mafumu akhala akupempha mchitidwewu uthe komabe sizikuphula kanthu 
  si koyamba dpp agwiritsire ntchito galimoto ya pachipatalapa timalankhula palibe yankho idatero mfumuyi amene akufuna thandizo la galimotoyo amadikira kaye ithandize achipani 
  mlembi wa chipanicho greselder jeffery wati ndale chabe si zoona adagwiritsira ntchito galimoto ya chipatala 
  mmmh abale komatu ndalezi ndiye zafika penapake adatero potsutsa nkhaniyi si zoona tidagwiritsira ntchito galimoto ya chipatala kodi asamavale makaka chipani chathu akakwera galimoto ya boma mwina anthuwo amapita ku maliro masiku ano akumavala makaka achipani chathu ukwati adatero jeffery yemwenso phungu kumpoto kwa boma la nkhotakota 
  titafunsa mneneri wa chipatala cha nkhotakota ngatidi zidali zoona galimoto yawo idanyamula chipani mneneriyu samson mfuyeni adavomera adati galimotoyo si ya boma 
  ogwira ntchito pachipatalachi ndiwo adagula galimotoyo adaonjeza galimoto ya chipatala osati boma timaigwiritsira ntchito zinthu zambiri zoona achipani cha dpp adabwereka poperekeza apulezidenti adatero 
  malinga mfuyeni palibe cholakwika kubwereketsa galimotoyo si ya boma 
  kafukufuku wathu wapeza galimotoyo mg 697aj ya unduna wa zaumoyo ikugwira ntchito pachipatala cha nkhotakota 
  malinga wina ku plant and vehicle hire organisationnthambi yomwe ili pansi unduna wa zamayendedwe galimotoyi yomwe lole ili mmanja mwa boma ku unduna wa zaumoyo 
  khalidwe la dpp lakwiyitsa phungu mazizi wa deralo amene wati aka si koyamba chipanichi chitenge galimotoyo 
  wati wakwiya kwambiri patsiku lomwe galimotoyo imatumikira chipani pachipatalapo padali maliro anayi amene anyamulidwe 
  anamfedwa adandidandaulira ndidasiya zomwe ndimachita kukawathandiza pamene galimoto yathu imatumikira chipani adatero 
  nkhaniyi ikudza pamene mabungwe omwe si aboma akukakamiza chipanichi chibweze k13 miliyoni yomwe chidalandira ku nthambi zaboma mwambo womwe chipanichi chidachititsa 29 july njira imodzi yopezera ndalama 
  kadaulo pandale mustafa hussein wati zomwe chapanga chipani cha dpp pogwiritsira ntchito galimoto ya chipatala ponyamula masapota ake pokaperekeza pulezidenti peter mutharika kulakwira amalawi zotere zitheretu 
  amalawi sangavomere ndalama zawo zizigwiritsidwa ntchito chonchi kulakwa posatengere chipani chomwe chikupanga adatero hussein
Label: POLITICS

Text:
chilala chavuta maboma ambiri nduna ya zamalimidwe chitukuko cha madzi dr allan chiyembekeza wati pakhala msonkhano wounikira momwe ngamba yakhudzira makamaka mchigawo cha kummwera 
  chiyembekeza adanena msabatayi atayendera madera omwe ngamba yavuta mmaboma lino 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ulendo wa chiyembekeza udali wachisoni maboma alimi sadabzale chimanga chafota pamene madera sichidamere 
  gojo chimanga chikamasula popanda mvula sichingabereke malinga malipoti mmaboma amene aperekedwa ku unduna wa zamalimidwe mmaboma phalombe chiradzulu nsanje chikwawa neno mwanza komwe kwavuta kwambiri cha kusowa kwa mvula 
  mwachitsanzo boma la phalombe lalandira mvula masiku 8 okha malinga lipotilo pofika lolemba 25 january nkuti mvula yozama mamilimita 130.6 okha itagwa yomweyo chaka chatha nkuti bomalo litalandira mvula kwa masiku 27 idali itazama mamilimita 663 
  wa zamalimidwe mbomalo osmund chapotoka wati cha kuchepa kwa mvula alimi amene adabzala koyambirira chimanga chawo chafota pamene amene adabzala kumapeto chimanga chawo sichidamere 
  mvula itagwa lero chimanga chimenechi sichingapulumuke apa ndiye alimi ayambiranso kubzala adatero chapotoka tili madera amene kumavuta mvula chaka chilichonse ku kasongo madera omwe kumagwa mvulawo kuli gwaaa alimi onse akulira 
  nako ku thyolo ndiye angolandira mvula kwa masiku 14 yochuluka mamilimita 199.9 basi yomweyi chaka chatha nkuti bomali litalandira kale mvula kwa masiku 22 yomwe idali yozama mamilimita 558.2 
  kumenekonso malinga wa zamalimidwe raphael mkisi zinthu zasokonekera 
  chiyembekeza tikumana mvula idasiya chimanga chitangoyamba kupota yadula kwa sabata ziwiri ndiye yayambiranso sichingabereke alimi akuyenera abzalenso adatero mkisi 
  ku mulanje mvula yangogwa masiku 15 yozama mamilimita 284.8 yonga yomweyi chaka chatha nkuti atalandira mvula kwa masiku 32 yozama mamilimita 934.9 
  ku neno ndiye angolandira mvula ya mamilimita 150.5 yomwe yagwa kwa masiku 8 yomweyi chaka chatha bomali lidali litalandira mvula ya mamilimita 806.5 kwa masiku 24 
  chiyembekeza akuti maboma balaka nsanje chikwawa ntcheu machinga chiradzulu mmavuto onga omwewa zikuchititsa mantha 
  ili si vuto la munthu namalenga ndiye akudziwa zonse sitikudziwa watikonzera zotani palibe boma lomwe lili nkhani yabwino adatero chiyembekeza 
  kuchigawo cha kumpoto lipoti lofotokoza momwe zinthu zilili silidaperekedwe kuboma ndunayi yati posakhalitsapa lipotilo lituluka pamene iyo ipitenso kukayendera mmaboma 
  tilibe komwe tikulandira mvula mokhazikika chaka chino tikuyenera kusamala kwambiri tilibe chiyembekezo tipeza chakudya chokwanira malinga momwe mvulayi ikugwera adatero chiyembekeza 
  komabe ndunayi yati kupatula boma likhala pansi kukambirana za chomwe achite alimi akuyenera ayambe kubzala mbewu zina zosalira mvula yambiri 
  mvula itabwera tisalimbanenso kuthira feteleza chimanga chomwe sitikololapo timusunge fetelezayo tikagwiritsire ntchito paulimi wamthirira 
  alimi akonzeke kubzala mbewu zina chinangwa mapira mchewere mbatata mbewu zina zosafuna madzi ambiri mvula yagwa kudera kwawo adatero chiyembekeza 
  adati si lokha la malawi lomwe lakumana chilalachi maiko south africa lesotho kudzanso zambia nawo pamoto zilili kuno chiyembekeza adati boma liyesa kupeza njira zoti lithandizire 
  si vuto la mvula lokha maboma phalombe mulanje ntchemberezandonda nazo zikuteketa mmera womwe wangomera 
  undunawu ukuyembekezera kutulutsa lipoti lomwe lifotokoze momwe zinthu zilili mdziko muno ukamaliza kuyendera maboma onse 
  pamenepo padziwikenso momwe chaka chino akololere chiyembekeza wataya chiyembekezo chokolola dzambiri 
  oposa 3 miliyoni mdziko muno ndiwo akutuwa njala boma layamba kale kugawa chakudya mmaboma 
  akulirira nyakwawa gojo ya mboma la mulanje chaka chino kulira kulipo alibe chakudya pamenenso chiyembekezo chokolola chachoka 
  onani mmunda mwanga muno chimanga chonse chamasula pamene mvula kulibe itabwera lero palibe chomwe chingachitike mulungu amve kulira kwathu adalira gojo
Label: ECONOMY

Text:

 pamenepa wapemphanso phungu wa mdzinda wu alimbikitse mgwilizano wabwino makhansala onse omwe akutumikira madera mdzindawu cholinga choti athandize ntchito zokweza mdzinda wu 
 tili ntchito yayikul yoti tiigwire teremu imeneyi misewu ina yamangidwa nsewu ochokera adho kukafika mpotola school anatero bamusi 
 mwazina wathokoza boma la dpp kaamba koyambitsa ndondomeko yokonza misewu mmizinda monse kuonetsetsa madzi abwino akupezeka mmizinda yonse 
 khansalayu wasakhadwa kwa chiwiri tsopano chisankho chomwe chinachitika mchaka cha 2014 athi agwira limodzi phungu wakunyumba yamalamulo yemwe wangosankhidwa posachedwapa bester awali

Text:
tinkapita kumpira wa silver akangomva za masewero ampira amalingalira zogenda kuvala ziyangoyango kuimba nyimbo basi komatu zochitika zina zilizonse iyi yokumana osiyanasiyana okonda zinthu zochita zosiyanasiyananso 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu onse amakonda timu ya silver daniel kudzera mumtendere woterewu mwayi waukulu pamoyo wawo mwina mpaka kupeza nthiti yawo momwe zidakhalira daniel nthala wa mmudzi mwa yesaya kwa mfumu kalumbu ku kamphata mboma la lilongwe mary kaliati 
  awiriwa akuti adakumana pasukulu ya nkhoma pomwe onse ankaphunzira apa adali paulendo wopita kukaonerera masewero timu ya silver strikers mwamwayi zidachitika onse ankasapota timu yomweyo 
  ndinkapita kukaonerera mpira ndiye patsogolo panga ndidaona munthu akulowera njira yomweyo pokhala munthu woti ndinkamuona pasukulu ndidamuthamangira nditamufunsa komwe ankapita adandiyankha adali paulendo wa kumpira adatero daniel 
  adati apo awiriwo adayendera limodzi mnjira atazindikira onse amakonda timu imodzi ubale udayambika pomwepo moti ankatengana zonse kukakhala mpira kukaonerera limodzi 
  nditaona chidwi chake pampira nditakhutira zokonda zake zanga zofanana ndidaona chanzeru tidzasungane nditamuuza adagwirizana maganizo anga adatero daniel 
  mary adati ataona zomwe daniel amakonda sadachotsere adakumana munthu yemwe angadzasungane naye popanda mavuto mwamaganizo akewo zidayendadi choncho mpaka akukhala limodzi banja mokondwa 
  zidangokhala ndife mapasa zambiri zomwe ndimakonda nayenso amakonda zomwezo kuleza ntima khama zinthu kukonda masewero ampira timu yathu imodzi chinthu chondisangalatsa kwambiri adatero mary 
  awiriwa adamaliza zilinganizo zonse zoti nkutengana banja la ana atatu akuti anawonso akuyenda mmapazi mwa makolo kukonda timu ya silver strikers 
  chikondi chomwe awiriwa nacho timu yomwe amasapotayi nchodabwitsa akuti timuyi ikapanda chakudya onse awiri sachifuna mpaka kumatheka kugona nayo chakudya akuchiona

Text:
kuweta ngombe zamkaka nkokoma 
  alimi akadaulo zaulimi abwekera ubwino phindu la ulimi wa ngombe ati pali zina zoyenera ulimiwu ufikepo mwa zina alimi ambiri amene adacheza uchikumbe mzigawo zonse za lino adati akusimba lokoma paulimiwu pali zina zoyenera kukonza phindulo libwere pambalambanda kadaulo nkhani ya ziweto kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya lilongwe university of agriculture and natural resources luanar pulofesa timothy gondwe wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe okhudzidwa ulimi la civil society agriculture network cisanet tamani nkhono mvula adaphera mphongo zonena za alimiwo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu gondwe adati pakadalipano alimi ngombe zamkaka akuchuluka chiwerengero cha ngombe nchochepa 
  pali zina zoyenera alimi mkaka apindule kwambiri adati zili choncho ambiri mwa angonoangono amakhala ngombe imodzi ziwiri 
  alimi akuluakulu sakuonetsa chidwi ulimiwu alimi aangono ambiri alibe zipangizo akusowa ulangizi kadyetsedwe kasamalidwe ka ngombe momwe angasamalire mkaka wawo ukapeze msika wabwino adatero gondwe 
  adapereka chitsanzo cha ngombe ya mkaka ya wa fresian imene itadyetsedwa ikhoza kutulutsa malita 40 tsiku alimi ambiri amakama malita 10 12 okha patsiku 
  adatinso vuto lina ndondomeko zoyendetsera msika wa mkaka 
  pophera mphongo nkhono mvula adati imodzi mwa ndondomeko zimene zimathimba alimiwa pakhosi gawo 36 ya malamulo bizinesi ya mkaka 
  malingana lamuloli alimi angonoangono sangagulitse mkaka wawo momasuka pokhapokha atakhala njira zowiritsira yomwe ntchito ina yapadera afuna kudutsa mndondomeko zambiri avomerezedwe kutero 
  pachifukwa ichi alimiwa amakakamizidwa kukagulitsa mkaka wawo kumakampani omwe zipangizo pamtengo wozizira adatero 
  malinga mkuluyo alimi mkaka pachipsinjo cha misonkho kusiyana alimi poti amadulidwa msonkho ndalama zilizonse zomwe angapate malonda pomwe pamalamulo msonkho munthu amayenera kudulidwa msonkho wapeza ndalama zoposa k50 000 mwezi 
  akadaulowa akungopherezera zimene alimi mzigawo zonse adauza uchikumbe 
  wapampando wa gulu la lusangazi dairy farmers cooperative ku mzimba hesco banda adati vuto la kusowa kwa zakudya likuchititsa miyoyo ya alimiwa yowawa adati alimi kuthekera kogula chakudya cha ngombezo pamtengo wa k10 000 thumba la makilogalamu 50 chikusowa 
  zakudya zikusowa moti tikungogwiritsa ntchito deya vuto lake deyayu tikulimbirananso anzathu ku tanzania amene akulolera kugula deyayo pamtengo wa k500 kilo mmalo mwa mtengo wa k200 adandaula banda 
  vuto lina adati kusowa kwa msika kumpoto kulibe kampani zogula mkaka momwe zilili mzigawo zina kampani za lilongwe dairy suncrest creameries dairibord zimagula mkaka kumwera pakati adaonjeza zachititsa mavenda alowererepo pomagula mkaka pamtengo wolira 
  msika ulipo alimi thomson jumbe wa mmudzi mwa waruna t chimaliro ku thyolo mitengo ndiyotsika malingana unduna wa malimidwe mtengo wotsikitsitsa mkaka uyenera kugulitsidwira k155 lita 
  timagulitsa mkaka mtengo wa k150 lita pomwe titulutse lita imodzi zimalowa zambiri makamaka tikawerengera zakudya deya mankhwala adatero jumbe 
  poyankhapo pamadandaulowa nduna ya zamalimidwe ulimi wothirira chitukuko cha madzi dr george chaponda adati unduna uunika madandaulowa nkuwona ungathandizane alimiwa ulimiwu upite patsogolo

Text:
papa okhudzidwa imfa ya ku malawi mozambique zimbabwe mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika lonse papa francisco wati okhudzidwa imfa ya ochuluka mmaiko malawi zimbabwe mozambique amene afa kaamba ka mphepo ya mphanvu yomwe inawomba mmaikowa 
 papa amalankhula zonkhula lankhula zomwe amakhala nazo lachitatu lililonse kulikulu la mpingowu ku vatican 
 wati okhuzidwa omwe afa mmaikowa omwe akuvutika njala kusowa kwa malo okhala kaamba kavutoli 
 pamenepa papa francisko wapempha akhristu mpingowu akhale patsogolo kuthandiza anthuwa kudzera mmapemphero zinthu za kuthupi chakudya zina 
 mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolikayu wapempherera mwapadera omwe akhuzidwa vutoli wapempherera mizimu ya omwe afa ngoziyi iwuse mtendere wosatha
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
apolisi ku lingadzi ati agwira ntchito limodzi achitetezo chakumadera ya lockdown apolisi ku lingadzi mzinda wa lilongwe lachitatu atsimikizira akuluakulu owona za chitetezo chakumadera community policing mmadera area 10 area 12 mzindawo apereka chitetezo chokwanira yomwe mtsogoleri wa lino walamula asayendeyende kwa masiku 21 
 zgambo chitetezo chikhalapo chokwanira wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi ku lingadzi sergeant salome zgambo watisimikizira zankhaniyi 
 wati cholinga cha apolisi poyendera apolisi akumidziwo chinali chofuna kukawalimbikitsa kukawatsimikizira za chitetezo ku maderawo 
 lero lingadzi police tinayendera makomiti aku area 10 komaso area 12 kuwalimbikisa chitetezo chikhalapo chokwanira tigwira ntchito usana usiku anatero zgambo 
 atsimikiziranso mmaderawo asakhale mantha cha kutulutsidwa kwa akaidi ku ndende pofuna akayidiwa asamakhale mothinana pofuna kupewa mliri wa nthenda ya coronavirus ponena akhalabe akuyanganira deralo
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
kusowa kwa madzi kusokoneza zambiri ku lilongwe chidziwitso cha lilongwe water board lwb bungwe lopopa kugawa madzi mumzinda wa lilongwe choti madzi akhala akuvuta kufikira dzinja chatsimikiza ntchito zambiri makamaka za umoyo zisokonekera mumzindawu womwe likulu la la malawi 
  lwb idalengeza sabata ziwiri zapitazo iyamba kugawa madzi mosinira potengera mlingo wa madzi womwe kampaniyi ili nawo mmadamu ake awiri kamuzu 1 2 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka bungweli lidati pomwe madera azilandira madzi mumzindawu kwina kuzikhala kopanda madzi zipitirira mpakana mvula ya chaka chamawa idzabwere 
  kuvuta kwa mvula kwachititsa madzi achepe modetsa nkhawa mmadamu awiri kamuzu 1 2 omwe timasungiramo madzi madzi omwe alipo panopa sangapose theka la madzi omwe timafuna tikwaniritse ntchito yathu chidatero chikalata cha bungweli 
  madamuwa alibe madzi okwanira kaamba koti mvula sidagwe mitengo yomwe imathandiza kusunga madzi idatha mmphepete mwa mtsinje wa lilongwe 
  timadalira madzi ochokera mumtsinje wa lilongwe womwe umatsira mmadamu athu mtsinjewu umachokera mnkhalango ya dzalanyama poti mitengo idatha mnkhalangomu mtsinjewu uli pambalambanda ndiye madzi sachedwa kuuma chidatero chikalatachi 
  mneneri wa chipatala chachikulu mumzindawu cha kamuzu central hospital kch mable chinkhata adati madziwo sadayambe kuvuta pachipatalachi nkhawa zidzatha madzi akadzayamba kuvuta ntchito zambiri pachipatalachi zidzasokonekera ntchito zaumoyo makamaka pachipatala zimafuna madzi kwambiri mwachitsanzo makina omwe timachapira zipangizo zochitira opaleshoni ngakhaleso zochapira zogonera zofunda makatani zimasiya kugwira ntchito madzi akangosiya zimayendera kompyuta adatero chinkhata 
  adati makinawa salola madzi ochita kuthiramo opopa okha kudzera mmakina kompyuta ndiye madzi akangosiya makinawa nawo amasiya kugwira ntchito 
  chinkhata adati nkhani ina yomwe ingavute yaukhondo potengera pachipatalachi palibe zimbudzi zokwanira zokumba moti odwala owadikirira omwe amadalira zimbudzi zamadzi 
  timasunga odwala pafupifupi 1 000 patsiku ndiye pomwepo amakhala owadikirira awiri atatu mukawerengera angati amenewo tsono onse azigwiritsa ntchito zimbudzi zamadzi chonsecho madziwo palibe sikubala mavuto kumeneku adatero chinkhata 
  vutoli lomweso okhala mumzindawu omwe amagwiritsa ntchito zimbudzi za madzi aona nalo mantha likhoza kubutsa matenda osiyanasiyana nkusokoneza ntchito zambiri 
  tangoganizani pamalo poti pali zimbudzi zamadzi zokhazokha popanda chokumba akamva mmimba azipita madzi atasowa kwa masiku awiri mapeto ake akhoza kumapita mtchire kungodzithandiza mtoileti nkusiyamo choncho poterepa munthu kungodwala matenda ammimba ndiye komboni yonse adatero innocent mzungu wa ku falls mumzindawu 
  derali limodzi mwa madera omwe nyumba zambiri zili zimbudzi zamadzi zidamangidwa moyandikana 
  nkhani ina yomwe vutoli likhudze la ulimi poti bungwe la bwb laletsa okhala kumtunda kwa mtsinje wa lilongwe omwe umatsira madzi mmadamu ulimi wamthirira 
  apa zikukolana ganizo la boma loti achilimike paulimi wamthirira polingalira kakololedwe ka chaka chino sikadayende mlembi wamkulu muunduna wa zamalimidwe erica maganga adati ayambe wakambirana kampaniyi kaye 
  choyamba sitikudziwa angati amagwiritsa ntchito madamuwa mtsinje wa lilongwe paulimi wamthirira ndikuyenera ndikambirane akuluakulu kampaniyi tione pomwe pali vuto momwe tingapangire adatero maganga 
  phungu wa ya malamulo yemwe nkhalango ya dzalanyama ili mdera lake peter dimba adati vutoli ndilochita kuweta mzaka 10 mpaka 15 zapitazo atsogoleri adalibe chidwi choteteza nkhalangoyi 
  adati mzakazi mitengo yambiri idadulidwa makamaka owotcha makala ogulitsa nkhuni pomwe akuluakulu amadzidzimuka madzi adali atafika kale mkhosi 
  mpanopotu pomwe zikukhala akuluakulu akukhuzumuka muone chitumizireni asirikali ankhondo mnkhalangoyi zinthu zikusintha tsono ankalekeranji kuganiza zimenezi kalelo adatero dimba 
  adati chikhulupiriro chitetezo chomwe chilipochi chiyembekezo chili mphukira za mitengo kuwonjezera mitengo yomwe ikubzalidwa chaka chaka 
  zili chonchi mumzindawu makampani opopa kugawa madzi mmizinda ya blantyre mzuzu ati alibe nkhawa ina iliyonse mitsinje madamu omwe amapopamo muli madzi okwanira 
  pakalipano wa bungwe la ogula kugwiritsa ntchito malonda la consumers association of malawi cama john kapito adati ichi chikhale chitsegula mmaso kwa 
  adati mnyengo ino yakusintha kwa nyengo chilichonse chikhoza kuchitika ndiye mpofunika mabungwe opopa kugawa madzi akhale malo ambiri odalirika osungirako madzi kupewa mavuto omwe agwa mumzinda wa lilongwe 
  tizidziwa madzi moyo chilichonse chomwe munthu amapanga pamoyo chimalira madzi ndiye mpofunika kusamala kwambiri pankhani yokhudza madzi osamachita zinthu modzidzimukira adatero kapito

Text:
akufuna boma likweze malipiro bungwe loona za ufulu wa ogwira ntchito la malawi congress of trade union mctu lapempha boma likweze mlingo wa ndalama zotsikitsitsa zomwe munthu angalandire amene amalandira ndalama zochepera k50 000 pamwezi asamakhome msonkho 
  polankhula pamwambo wokumbukira tsiku la ogwira ntchito lolemba ku lilongwe wa bungwelo luther mambala adapempha boma lionjezere ndalama za ogwira ntchito zotsikitsitsa zichoke k25 000 kufika k45 000 adati okhoma msonkho azikhala olandira k50 000 kupita mtsogolo osati k25 000 zilili 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mambala zinthu zakwera mambala adati akufunitsitsa boma litengere nkhaniyi ku nyumba ya malamulo aphungu akaikaimbirane nyumba ya malamulo imayembekezeka kutsegulidwa dzulo aphungu akambirana ndondomeko ya chuma 
  chiyembekezo chathu nchoti nkhaniyi ifike kwa aphungu amene angatithandize adatero mambala 
  bungweli lidapemphanso boma lipeze njira zothetsera kuzimazima kwa magetsi zomwe ati zakhudza makampani azipeza phindu lokwanira zomwe zikupangitsa awachotse ntchito 
  mneneri wa boma nicholas dausi adalangiza bungwelo lipereke madandaulo ku unduna wa zachuma omwe ungatengere nkhaniyi ku nyumba ya malamulo 
  sindinganene zomwe boma lichite kungowalangiza nkhaniyi aitengere ku unduna wa zachuma womwe ungatsatize nkhaniyi adatero dausi

Text:
amalawi alemekeza bingu amalawi mzigawo zonse mdziko muno apereka ulemu wawo wotsiriza kwa yemwe adali mtsogoleri wa lino bingu wa mutharika 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mutharika adamwalira 5 epulo atadwala mtima 
  thupi lake lomwe lidatengeredwa mdziko la south africa lidafika mdziko muno loweruka 14 kudzera pabwalo la ndege la kamuzu mumzinda wa lilongwe 
  kuyambira loweruka mpaka lasabata akuluakulu aboma abanja motsogozedwa mtsogoleri wadziko lino joyce banda adapereka ulemu wotsiriza kwa malemuwa 
  lolemba 16 thupili lidatengedwa ku nyumba ya malamulo mumzindawo komwe amalawi akuchigawo chapakati adapereka ulemu wawo mpaka 17 
  thoko loga wa ku kawale yemwe amapenta galimoto adati adzakumbukira mutharika kumbali ya chimanga kumangidwa kwa misewu nyumba akuluakulu mumzindawo 
  nditangoona nkhope ya malemu ndidagwidwa ndichisoni ndidalephera kudzigwira kukhetsa msonzi 
  lachitatu 18 thupili adalitengera ku mzuzu komwenso adapereka ulemu wotsiriza mpaka lachinayi 
  bob pota yemwe mumzinda wa mzuzu akuchita maphunziro aukachenjede community development akuti sadzaiwala mutharika pothetsa njala mdziko muno 
  lachinayi cha mma 12 koloko masana thupiro limayembekezereka kunyamulidwa kupita ku blantyre komwe akuchigawo cha kummwera akapereke ulemu wotsiriza 
  thupilo likuyembekezeka kunyamuka lero kupita ku munda wa mutharika wa ndata mboma la thyolo ndikukalowa mmanda lolemba 23
Label: POLITICS

Text:
auka atatha zaka 11 mmanda ku ntchisi 16 april 2005 lidali tsiku lachisoni mmudzi mwa ngwanje t malenga mboma la ntchisi pomwe nkomanyama charles adamwalira akubereka mwana wa nambala 6 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu zaka 11 chichitikireni zodabwitsa zaoneka mmudzimo pomwe munthu amene akumuganizira malemuyo adapezeka zungulizunguli mmphepete mwa phiri la katsumbi mawa wa 13 february moyo 
  mneneri wa apolisi mbomalo gladson mbumpha watsimikiza za nkhaniyi wati mayiyo kwa amene akuti makolo ake 
  akukhamukira ku ntchisi kukaona nkomanyama malinga mbumpha apolisi adali amkhalapakati wa zokambirana pakati mafumu makolo mayiyo amulandire 
  poyamba ake omwe mmudzi mwa chithonje ankachita naye mantha moti ankasungidwa mfumu katipwiri kufikira titamaliza zokambirana 15 february adatero mbumpha 
  mayiyo atangopezeka yemwe akuti mwamuna yobu gwaza wa mmudzi mwa ngwanje ndiye adayamba kumuzindikira adafotokoza mkazi wakeyo adamwalira mchaka cha 2005 akubereka dorica mwana wawo womaliza yemwe moyobe mpaka 
  adati adalera yekha mwanayo chithunzithunzi cha mkazi wakeyo chidali chikadali mmutu nchifukwa chake sadachedwe kumuzindikira atamuona 
  gwaza adati alibe vuto lililonse mkazi wakeyo wokonzeka kumulandira akapeza thandizo nkubwerera munzeru zake bwinobwino 
  angachire nkukhala bwinobwino chomuletsera kubwerera pakhomo pake nchiyani mmesa ana ake komweko adatero gwaza 
  akukhamukira kukaona zozizwitsazo ye we akuti malume mayiyo masaiti kalulu atabweretsa chomwe nkomanyama adajambulitsa asadafe omwe adachiona kuphatikizapo apolisi akuti pali kufanana pakati nkhope ya pachithunziyo mayiyo 
  mbumpha adati anthuwo ataona chithunzicho adakwiya kukana kwa woukayo pamalopo padayamba phokoso lomwe adakaletsa apolisi 
  padali chisokonezo moti chipanda apolisi kufika msanga pakadachitika chachikulu mwinanso mpaka mayiyo akadamenyedwa adatero padakalipano akumuganizira adaukayo kwa ake akuti sakutha kuyankhula zina amadya mwachidodo 
  tikukhala naye bwinobwino pena zinthu mwachidodo kudya akhoza kuyamba amalize pakumatenga 
  vuto lina lomwe lilipo losatha kuyankhula ndiye nzovuta kudziwa chomwe akufuna tiona akhala tikayenda naye adatero charles 
  mfumu chithonje ya mmudzi momwe mumachokeratu makolo mayiyo idatsimikiza za maliro mayiyo ponena ngoziyo itachita mchaka cha 2005 idalandira uthenga idachita nawo mwambo wa malirowo 
  mfumuyo idati kawirikawiri nkhani zokhudza munthu womwalira nkupezeka moyo zimazunguza mutu ndiponso zimayambitsa phokoso akazitengera pamgongo 
  pakalipano apolisi alangiza mafumu ozungulira derali aphe tsiku kupita kukanda akatsimikize ngatidi mmanda momwe adaika mtembo wa nkomanyama charles mulibedi thpi lake 
  wina wa mpingo wa church of christ mboma la nkhotakota maxwel nangunde adati amakhulupirira munthu akamwalira basi kwake kwatha mpaka patsiku la chiweruzo 
  zina ukamva abale mpovuta kunena chenicheni nchiti anthufe timakhulupirira munthu akapita wapita basi mpaka tsiku la chiweruzo adatero nangunde 
  mmbiri ya chilengedwe tikumva za kuuka kwa akufa kwa yesu khristu amenenso adaukitsapo angapo lazalo mwana wa jairus kudzanso mnyamata wina wa wamasiye ku nain 
  tikumvanso pamene yesu adapachikidwa pamtanda adaukanso patapita masiku anayi adalowa mlimbo naukitsa matupi abwino omwe adafa 
  mbuku la chipangano chakale tikuwerenga za mmene mneneri eliya adaukitsira mwana wa namfedwa wa zarephath elisha naye adaukitsa mwana wa mkazi wina mshunammite kwa akufa 
  naye paulo akuti adaukitsikwa kwa akufa atagedendwa miyala ku antioch iconium nkumusiya thapsa paulo yemwenso akuti adaukitsa eutychus yemwe adafa atagwa pansi panyumba yosanjikizana mmene ankatsinza

Label: WITCHCRAFT

Text:
admarc isagulitse chimanga kunja bungwe la admarc lisatengeke zakuti lino likhoza kukolola chimanga chochuluka chaka chino nkugulitsa chimanga kunja padakalipano wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe zaulimi la cisanet tamani nkhono mvula watero 
  nkhono mvula adauza tamvani pomwe admarc ikulingalira zogulitsa chimanga chimene lidagula ku zambia kumaiko kenya tanzania zadza pomwenso mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika atalamula asilikali akhamukire kumalire lino kugwira ofuna kugulitsa kunja chimanga mozemba lamulolo lidadza apolisi atagwira galimoto 17 zimene zimafuna kutulutsa chimanga mozemba 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka zina mwa galimoto zimene zidagwidwa wati mmera omwe uli mminda usapereke chiyembekezo chabodza admarc igulitse kunja chimanga 
  njala ikadalipo zonse zidzadziwika kafukufuku womaliza wa zokolola akadzatulutsidwa posakhalitsapa timasaka chimanga amalawi atasauka njala choncho kuchigulitsa panopa kunja chibwana cha mchombo lende adatero nkhono mvula 
  adati chimanga sichingasowe msika mdziko momwe muno phuma silingathandize konse 
  pamene boma lakhwimitsa chitetezo chimanga chisatuluke pakuyeneranso chitetezo momwe chimanga chikugulitsidwira mdziko momwe muno pali vuto lalikulu pamene chimanga chochokera kumwera chikukagwidwa ku karonga adatero mkuluyo 
  adatinso mpofunika boma kudzera ku unduna wa za malonda malimidwe azipereka ziphaso zapadera kwa ofuna malonda achimanga 
  polankhula pomwe amakhazikitsa ntchito ya magetsi mmidzi mutharika adati maiko kenya tanzania ati akufuna kugula chimanga kuchoka ku admarc salola zichitike 
  zidachitikapo mmbuyomu pamene tili chimanga chochuluka tidachigulitsa ku kenya chaka chotsatira kudali njala yadzaoneni mpaka kumakagulanso ku kenya komweko adatero mutharika nkupemphanso amalawi asagulitse chimanga chawo kwa mavenda kudikira misika ya admarc itsegulidwe 
  wapampando wa nthambi yoyanganira ntchito za admarc james masumbu adati mapulani ogulitsa chimanga ku tanzania kenya alipo akudikira alimi akolole kaye 
  panopa pologalamu yonse yaima tiyambe takolola tiwone chakudya chomwe alimi akolole tidziwe pomwe chitetezo cha chilili kumbali ya chakudya kenako tidzapanga ganizo lenileni adatero masumbu 
  adati kugulitsa chimangachi sikuzungulira mutu bungweli lili ngongole yofunika kubweza ndalama zobwezera ngongoleyi zikhoza kupezeka msanga pogulitsa chimangachi 
  polankhulapo ganizoli wapampando wa komiti yoyanganira za malimidwe mnyumba ya malamulo joseph chintantimalunga adati ganizo la admarc lofuna kugulitsa chimangacho labwino polingalira akufunika kubweza ngongole zomwe adatenga zogulira chimangacho 
  wachiwiri kwa mlembi wamkulu wa chipani cha malawi congress elsenhower mkaka adati mpata ogulitsa chimangacho ungapezeke admarc igulitse ndondomeko yake iyende moyera 
  ganizo lofunikira ziyende mwachilungamo zisakwirire nkhani ya kagulidwe ka chimanga ku zambia yomwe ikadali ikuyenera kuoneka mapeto ake adatero mkaka 
  pali malipoti akuti chaka chino pafupifupi 1 miliyoni akhala njala mdziko la tanzania pomwe la kenya lawona ngamba yomwe silidawonepo kutanthauza njala ivuta mdzikolo 
  malingana mgwirizano wa maiko common market for east and central africa comesa maiko amayenera kugwirana manja wina kapezeka vuto la njala 
  masiku apitawo apolisi adagwira galimoto zomwe zimafuna kutulutsa chimanga kupititsa ku tanzania kudzera mmaboma karonga chitipa 
  mneneri wapolisi james kadadzera adati galimotozo chimanga chomwe akuzisunga kudikira upangili wa boma chimangacho atani nacho eni galimotozo adzazengedwa mlandu ofuna kuzembetsa chimanga
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:

Text:

 wasayina chikalatacho ndanga bungwe li lanena kudzera chikalata chomwe latulutsa pomwe limathilirapo ndemanga kumangidwa kwa atolankhaniwa omwe anamangidwa pomwe nthumwi za bungwe la europian union eu zimafika mdziko muno zidzapereke lipoti lokhudza momwe chisankho cha 21 may 2019 chinayendera 
 malingana wapampando wa bungwe li mdziko muno teleza ndanga zomwe apolisi wa anachita zosayenera kotero wati bungweli liyesetsa likumane apolisi cholinga choti pakhale ubale wabwino pakati apolisi atolankhani mdziko muno 
 atolankhani wa steve zimba francis chamasowa omwe wailesi ya zodiak golden matonga wa nation publications limited anawatsekulira mulandu wochita zachisokonezo bwalo la ndege

Text:
chisiki mchezo wa amayi chikondano amapatsana zinthu mwachinsinsi pamoyo wathu pali njira zambiri zomwe timalumikizirana pophunzitsana kugawana nzeru kuunikirana umu ndimo moyo ulili zili choncho ambiri amaona okhala nawo ndiwo angakhale abwenzi maganizo oterewa akutsutsidwa mchezo wa amayi womwe amautcha chisiki ndidacheza miriam chikondano yemwe akulongosola za chisiki motere moni ndikudziweni 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zikomo ndili dzina langa ndine miriam chikondano wammudzi mwa chimoka ku lilongwe ndili pabanja ndili ana 4anyamata atatu msungwana mzime 
  mudapalanako ubwenzi mnzanu kwabasi moti padakalipano ndili abwenzi achizimayi ambiri zedi omwe ndimagawana nawo nzeru kucheza nawo 
  ubwenzi woterewu mumawuona choyamba ndimasulire tanthauzo la akuti ubwenzi masiku ano amaganiza mothamanga ndiye amadzayamba kutanthauzira mawuwa mwawomwawo akuti ubwenzi amatanthauza chinzake pakati awiri kuposerapo mukafunsa za mmene ndimauonera ubwenzi woterewu yankho langa lakuti njira imodzi yabwino kwambiri yomwe amagawanirana nzeru kulangizana kulumikizana pankhani zosiyanasiyana 
  kodi mgwirizano wa amayi umatchedwa chiyani mgwirizano wa amayi umatchedwa chisikileti mwachidule amangoti chisiki mzimayi amatha zisiki zingapo panthawi imodzi popanda vuto madandaulo alionse 
  dzinali limachokera pati dzinali lisakuzunguzeni ayi limachokera achingerezi oti secret longofuna kusiyanitsa maubwenzi ubwenzi tikukambirana panowu dzinali limabwera potengera zomwe zimachitika paubwenziwo apa ndikutanthauza zomwe bwenzi abwenzi ake amapangirana paubwenzi wawo 
  mungatambasule zomwe zimachitikazo panthawi ya ubwenziwo amayi amagulirana mphatso zosiyanasiyana mwamseri nkumapatsana mokhala mobisa zija mchingerezi amati secret ndanena kale ndiye pofuna kusazungulira amangoti chisiki basi 
  chisiki chimayamba pali njira zambiri zomwe chisiki chimayambira yagona pakuti anthuwa amakhala paubwenzi chisiki china chimayamba amachokera kumodzi china chimayamba chakuti amayendera limodzi adakumana kumalo kuzochitika zina zake kutchalitchi kumpalano wa magule kumsonkhano malo 
  ndiye zimayamba agwirizana magazi amatha kukambirana ayambe chisiki zina wina amangoyamba kutumizira mnzake mphatso kenako winayo amabweza basi chisiki chayamba chikatero 
  phindu lake lotani pali phindu lalikulu kwambiri makamaka pamoyo wa munthu wamayi amayi amakhala nkhawa milandu yambiri mumtima kuposa abambo ndiye mzimayi alibe mnzake womukhuthulira nkhawa milandu yotere moyo umakhala wokwinyirira ndiponso zinthu siziyenda akakhala mnzake siki amatha kukhuthulira khawa mavuto otere kwa mnzakeyo mtima nkumapepuka 
  basi phindu lake nkukhuthula nkhawa mavuto ayi chomwe ndikutanthauza nchakuti pamakhala nkhawa madandaulo ofunika kutanthauziridwa kulimbitsidwa mtima ndiye amayi awiriwo pausiki wawo amakhala pansi nkukambirana za nkhani zimenezi nkuthandizana nzeru zinthu ziziyenda mndondomeko yake 
  nanga chisiki chimatha nchamuyaya chikhoza kutha malingana zifukwa zake osangoti kwacha mmawa basi nkumati ndikuthetsa chisiki popanda mlandu uliwonse chachikulu chagona pakusungirana chinsinsi ndanena kale amayi omwe pachisiki amatha kuuzana za mavuto osiyanasiyana okhudza moyo wawo ngakhalenso mbanja ndiye wina akunka nalengeza za mavuto mnzake chisiki sichingapitirire palibenso ulemu chinsinsi 
  mungawauze chiyani amayi za chisiki ndiwochepa mpofunika kusamala posankha bwenzi la chisiki basi ukaona mnzako chidwi choti mukhale pachisiki kumufufuza lomwe kupewa mudzayambane nkudana patsogolo

Text:
njovu ziwiri zitengetsana 19 may zadziwika tsopano njovu ziwiri zomwe mgwirizano wa democratic progressive party dpp united democratic front udf malawi congress party mcp utm party ndizo zidzalimbane pachisankho cha 19 may 
  zidatsimikizika lachitatu zipani za mcp utm zitabwera poyera nkunena mgwirizano wawo womwe wakhala mphekesera chabe kwa yaitali tsopano watheka 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zikutanthauza tsopano zipani zinayi zomwe zidali zikuluzikulu pachisankho cha 21 may chaka chatha tsopano zapanga mbali ziwiri zomwe zidzapikisane pachisankho chomwe chikubwerachi 
  zipani za dpp udf zidalengeza mgwirizano wawo 25 february pomwe mcp utm ati mgwirizano wawo wangopsa kumene adzasainira 19 march ku bingu international convention centre bicc ku lilongwe 
  polengeza mgwirizano wawo dpp udf onse adati adaona zawo zachitukuko zolinga zawo nzofanana mcp utm nawo akunena zomwezo 
  migwirizanoyi yapangidwa pokonzekera chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa lino chobwereza potsatira chigamulo cha constitutional court choti chisankho cha 21 may sichidayende chibwerezedwe 
  khothilo lidagamula chisankhocho chichitike mmasiku 150 3 february 2020 pomwe lidapereka chigamulo chake chomwe chidakomera lazarus chakwera wa mcp saulos chilima wa utm party 
  awiriwa adakamangala kukhoti bungwe loyendetsa chisankho la malawi electoral commission mec lidapotoza zotsatira zachisankhocho chomwe lidapambanitsa peter mutharika wa dpp 
  zokonzekera chisankhocho ziyembekeza mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika asainire mabilo zachisankho amene aphungu nyumba ya malamulo adapereka kwa 
  mwa zina mabilowo akuti chisankho cha aphungu makhansala chotsatira chidzachitike 2025 chidzalingane cha mtsogoleri wa lino 
  aphunguwo adapemphanso mutharika achotse makomishona mec amene bwalo lidawapeza sadayendetse chisankho cha 21 may chaka chatha 
  oimira ufulu wa timothy mtambo gift trapence macdonald sembereka adamangidwa pokonza zionetsero zokakamiza mutharika kuchotsa makomishonawo 
  wotambasula za ndale humphreys mvula wati polingalira za yomwe yatsala chisankho chichitike nkoyenera pulezidenti asadikire masiku 21 asayinire mabiluwo 
  nzoona malamulowo akutero apapa tikuyangana yomwe ilipo chisankho chichitike adatero
Label: POLITICS

Text:
aoloka yorodani pamtsinje wa ruo sukulu adalekera sitandade 4 nkomuvuta kuwerengera ndalama kwa si nkhani sukulu sadapite nayo patali ntchito zake zikuthandiza oposa 15 000 kwa t mlolo mboma la nsanje 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza manja ake mnyamatayu wamanga mlatho wa mamita 100 pamtsinje wa ruo womwe ambiri tsopano akuolokerapo tsiku tsiku 
  mavuto atha ana asukulu abizinesi opita kuchipatala tsopano akutha kuoloka ruo nzoonadi aja adati wopusa adaimba ngoma ochenjera navina sadaname tikatengera nkhani ya laitoni anoki wa zaka 28 yemwe amachokera mmudzi mwa khasu 
  poyamba ankamutenga wopanda phindu kaamba koti sukulu adatulukira pawindo lero wasanduka momboli wawo mafumu mderali akuvomereza anoki ngwazi ya kumeneko 
  njinga zamoto zakapalasa matumba chimanga zigubu za mafuta zikuoloka pamenepa popanda vuto 
  zonse zidayamba madzi osefukira amene adavuta chaka chino chosefukira mtsinje wa ruo udaiwala khwawa nkuphotchola midzi yambiri idakokoloka makumimakuni adafa pangoziyo osanena za ziweto kukokoloka kwa minda 
  mtsinjewu udachititsa azilephera kupita kuchipatala ku makhanga health centre kusukulu yasekondale ya makhanga kumsika wa admarc mderali mtsinjewo wachitanso malire la mozambique komwe anthuwa amapitako kukasuma chimanga njala yomwe yagwa mbomali ndiko kukuchokera mafuta ophikira 
  poyamba anthuwa ankangoyenda osaoloka mtsinje padalibe mtsinje ankaoloka ruo pokhapo akupita ku mozambique 
  derali kudzera mwa mafumu akhala akupempha mabungwe boma kudzera mwa phungu wawo esther mcheka chilenje awamangire mlatho ruo kuli chuu 
  ngoziyi itangochitika phungu wathu adabwera kudzationa adatitsimikizira atimangira mlatho poona sitingathenso kupita kuchipatala madera mpaka lero sitikudziwa lonjezoli litheka liti adatero gulupu manyowa 
  adadza nzeru zomanga mlatho anoki manyowa akuti pafupifupi 15 000 ndiwo akhudzidwa mwa magulupu 13 onse mwa t mlolo 
  ataona kufunika kwa mlatho pamtsinjewu anoki wamisala adayamba kudula mitengo nayamba kukhoma mlathowo 
  pocheza msangulutso mnyamatayu akuti adayamba ntchito yomanga mlathowu mvula ili kusiya apo nkuti madzi akulekeza mkhosi 
  poona ntchito indikulira ndidakopa anyamata tithandizane tidalipo 8 tidadula mitengo ina ndimachita kugula ndidakagula misomali ina adangotipatsa ina ndidachita kukongola pamtengo wa k40 000 
  zida zitakwana tidayamba kukhoma mitengo pamadzipa timasongola kaye mitengoyo kukhoma hamala ntchito idalipo madzi nkuti ambiri moti mwina amandilekeza mkhosi adatero anoki 
  pakutha miyezi itatu mlatho wotalika mamita 100 nkuti utatha adayamba kuolokerapo 
  tidamaliza komabe tsiku lililonse timaugwiragwira pena umapeza msomali wazuka mtego wachoka pamadutsa ambiri adatero 
  lero anoki wayamba kudyerera thukuta lake pamlathowu 
  munthu amalipira k100 kupita kubwera njinga yamoto timalipitsa k200 thumba lolemera makilogalamu 50 timalipitsa k100 opita kuchipatala sitimawalipiritsa 
  patsiku anoki akuti amapanga ndalama yosachepera k20 000 sungadabwe kumuona mnyamatayu lero akutuluka mnyumba yanjerwa zootcha yamalata wagula mbuzi zingapo kumunda waikako aganyu 
  kupatula apo anoki walemba ntchito anyamata asanu azithandizira pamlathowo 
  amaoloka usiku womwe pakufunika olondera ndiye pali anyamata asanu amene akuthandiza amathandizira kuolotsa njinga patsiku ndikumawalipira k1 500 adatero anoki 
  anyamata amene adamanga nawo mlathowu akulandiranso zawo chomwe tapanga nkuti tizigawana sabata yolandira ndalamazi sabata ino ndilandira ndineyo ndiye wina alandira sabata yamawa 
  mmene tikuteremu ndiye ndalama yokonzetsera mlathowu imakhalanso tasunga mukuona akubweretsa mitengo amenewa tiwagule zida zikhale zokwanira adatero anoki uku akusintha ndalama zopatsa kasitomala 
  mphindi 20 zomwe tidakhala pamlathowo onyamula zigubu za mafuta matumba chimanga mdziko la mozambique opita kuchipatala ophunzira alimi ndiwo amaoloka mowirikiza 
  lero dzina la anoki silisowanso mmudzimo gulupu manyowa akuti alibe naye mnyamatayu 
  mtsinje umenewu waukulu 9 mmudzi mwanga adapita akuoloka mtsinjewu lero tikutha kumaoloka mwaufulu zomwe sitidaziganize maso adali kuboma zidatipatsa chimwemwe 
  tikumapita kumsika kusekondale ku mozambique ku admarc mopanda vuto simungapite ku bangula kuno osadutsa pamlathowu adatero manyowa amene akuti masiku samalipitsidwa 
  wina amene ankapita kuchipatala ake adati mlathowu wawathandiza kopambana 
  mkuluyu gift filipo wa mmudzi mwa james kwa gulupu mchacha akuti pachipanda mlathowu sakadapita ake kuchipatalako
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
trump wayamba kuthothola akazitape mtsogoleri wa la america donald trump wachota mmaudindo akuluakulu mboma kaamba koti amachitira umboni oti achotsedwe u president 
 wathamangitsa mwa ogwira ntchito mboma trump malipoti wailesi ya bbc ati kazembe wa dzikolo ku bungwe la european union gordon sondland wauzidwa achoke ku bungwelo 
 leftenant colonel alexander vindman mwa alangizi ake za ubale wa dzikolo ukraine wayimitsidwanso ntchito 
 malipoti akusonyeza president trump akuyembekezeka kuchotsa ntchito pamene akuluakulu adzikolo lachitatu lapitali alengeza president trump sakuyenera kuchotsedwa udindowu 
 mdzikolo kuphatikizapo aphungu akunyumba ya malamulo anavomereza president trump achotsedwe udindo nkhani zokhudza ubale la ukraine
Label: POLITICS

Text:

 wapampando wa bungweli ku mphakatiwu idah nkhoma omwe anena lolemba pambuyo mkumano omwe mphakatiwu unali nawo pomwenso anapezerako mwayi othandiza wailesiyi ino pomwe wailesiyi ikuchita mariatona 
 kuthandiza radio maria kumathandiza ntchito za wailesiyi zipite patsogolo 
 tinawona tikamakumana azimayi kakangono kamene tilin ako tikuyenera kuthandiza wailesi yathu yomwe imatidalitsa ikathandizenso anatero nkhoma 
 mwa amayi omwe anachita nawo mkumanowu patricia mwapasa okondwa popeza athandiza wailesiyi nyengo ino ya coronavirus pomwe ntchito zambiri zikuoneka zakhudzidwa kwambiri sizikuyenda
