Text:
papa wadandaula kusowa kwa chilungamo mmayiko mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisko wati kusowa kwa chilungamo ndikomwe kukuchititsa ambiri adzikudzidwa imfa pochokera ku mayiko kupita ku maiko 
 papa umodzi mwa maulendo ake oyendera mayiko papa francisko walankhula lachinayi kulikulu la mpingo wu ku vatican pamene amalandira gulu la othawa kwao lochokera chilumba cha lesbos mdziko la greece malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican 
 wati ndikusowa kwa chilungamo kumene kukukamiza ambiri kuthawa mmaiko kupita maiko pofuna kukapeza bata mtendere 
 pamenepa papa francisko watsimikizira wo mpingo wa katolika upitiriza kupereka chisamaliro kwa onse otha wa kwawo
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
apempha amayi dayosizi ya dedza akonde baibulo amayi chikatolika dayosizi ya dedza awapempha adzikonda mulungu 
 mlangizi wa bungwe la amayi dayosiziyi peter kasonkanji omwe anena ku parishi ya ntcheu msonkhano wa nthumwi za bungweli mmaparishi onse amu dayosiziyi 
 ati munthu akamakonda mulungu amakhala wa mtendere mtima ndiponso amakulitsa chikhulupiriro chake mwa mulungu 
 dayosizi iliyonse mmalawi muno gulu la amayi tinakhazikitsa amayi onse asulidwe aphunzitsidwe baibulo tinayitana anthony kadya mpakeni omwe mphunzitsi wa za baibulo ku zomba ku st peters aphunzitsa atsogoleri amenewa amene akaphunzitsire anzawo anatero kasonkanji 
 polankhulapo prisca nasiyaya maphunzirowa ofunikira kwambiri kaamba koti amayiwa adzindikira kufunika kowerenga baibulo 
 ansembe atatu omwe bamboo peter kasonkanji gift selemani bamboo anthony kadyampakeni amene asula amayiwa
Label: RELIGION

Text:
alimbikitsa achinyamata asamalire chilengedwe achinyamata parish ya bembeke dayosizi ya dedza awapempha athandize mpingo poteteza chilengedwe 
 wa achinyamata mparishiyi ignasicius chalanda omwe amalankhula potsekera mbindikiro wa masiku atatu omwe nawo pofuna kuwawunikira achinyamatawa zakuipa kowononga zachilengedwe 
 chalanda awunikiranso achinyamata azigwiritsa ntchito makina computer moyenera pofuna kupewa zinthu zoipa zomwe zikufalitsidwa kudzera makinawa 
 tikuwasula akhale achinyamata odalilika mpingo tikuwalimbikitsanso atenge mbali posamalira chilengedwe anatero chalanda 
 polankhulapo mwa achinyamata omwe anatenga nawo gawo mbindikirowu olifeyo christiano wapindula kwambiri mbindikirowu 
 tazindikira ntchito zomwe tikuyenera mbali yathu mpingo anatero christiano 
 wati mbindikirowu achinyamatawa alimbikitsidwanso kwambiri baibulo chaka chomwe papa anakhazikitsa chikhale cha baibulo
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
kuli zionetsero 13 december lachitatu 13 december mwana agwiritse mzigawo zonse za lino pamene bungwe la mipingo la public affairs committee pac litsogolere zionetsero 
  izitu zionetsero zokakamiza boma libweretse mabilo okhudza za chisankho nyumba ya malamulo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka chilima r adawerenga kalata mabilowo mwa zina akukamba mtsogoleri wa azisankhidwa mavoti oposa 50 peresenti 
  sinodi ya mpingo wa ccap ku livingstonia sukulu ya ukachenjede ya mzuzu apsepserezera zionetserozi posindika patsikuli akayenda ku msewu 
  mbusa levi nyondo wati pac ikulankhula zenizeni kotero nkofunika kuthandizana nayo nkhondo yokakamiza boma 
  mamembala onse ampingo akupemphedwa apite kumsewu kukachita zionetserozo adatero nyondo 
  lamulungu lathali wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino saulos chilima adawerenga kalata ya mpingo ku parish ya st patrick mzinda wa lilongwe yomwe imapempha amalawi kutengapo gawo ziwonetserozo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
katelele back in the studio sensational musician katelele chingoma is back in the studios where he is recording new album that is expected to hit the market in may 
  the musician fondly known for composing reggae and sena jive songs has recorded nine of 10 songs to be roped into the album zanga zatheka 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   her touch on murals katelele the songs have been recorded at number of studios as usual the artist has used his brother petros versatile producer on the consoles 
  i have used my brother again this time because he understands the type of music my fans like the songs have been recorded at number of studios in lilongwe and south africa and this will bring about mixed blend i deliberately did this to make sure that i come up with the best quality music that will soothe my fans said the blantyre based musician 
  the musician famed for the track asowe mlamu said his trip to south africa late last year has helped him to tap more skills from sa musicians 
  i went there and conducted live shows with thomas chibade and moses makawa i utilised my trip to tap more talent from artists such as dj cleo with whom i shared the stage i hope the fusion of talent will help my album sell well locally and internationally said the musician 
  katelele released his album ndili nawo mwayi in 2011 and says he has taken time preparing for the new album 
  i feel bad if fans do nt welcome my music that is why i do nt rush in releasing albums i want to stand to quality hence my four year silence i hope the album will sell well considering that i have taken lot of time to prepare said the musician 
  katelele says he will work with reggae outfit black missionaries to promote the album once it gets on the market
Label: ARTS AND CRAFTS

Text:
kampani ya terras yati itenga gawo pothana coronavirus kampani yopanga mankhwala za chilengedwe ya terras yati ikufuna kutenga nawo gawo pothandiza omwe apezekeka kachirombo koyambitsa nthenda ya covid-19 njira imodzi yolimbana nthendayi mdziko muno 
 akuti kuthekera kothandiza covid-19 zayankhulidwa msonkhano wa olemba nkhani omwe kampaniyi inachititsa loweruka 9 may mzinda wa blantyre pamene yati ikufuna kugwira ntchito boma maka ifikire omwe apezeka nthenda yi yomwe ilibe mankhwala ovomerezeka kufikira
Label: HEALTH

Text:
mpira uthera panjira wosewera atamwalira akugwedeza mitu yopanda nyanga ku choma mboma la mzimba kaamba ka imfa ya mnyamata wa fomu 3 pasukulu ya sekondale ya choma yemwe adaombana goloboyi poti agwire mpira paliwiro lamtondo wadooka lokagoletsa lachisanu lapitalo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu patsikulo timu yomwe isaac phiri wa zaka 20 amasewera imapimana mphamvu timu yachisodzera ya sukulupo 
  isaac amasewera wogoletsa 
  malinga mphunzitsi wamkulu pasukulupa mathews phiri yemwenso amaonerera masewerowa zidachitika patangodutsa mphindi 30 mpira utayamba udathera pomwepo 
  phiri adati isaac yemwe adali wogoletsa wodalilika adanyamuka mpira mwa liwiro zedi cholinga chokagoletsa atayandikira golo aponyere muukonde naye goli adachoka pagolo kuombana mnyamatayo 
  adati apa onse adagwa pansi isaac adayamba kudzigwiragwira moonetsa muululu woopsa 
  malinga lipoti la chipatala kuombana pachifuwa kwa awiriwo kudachititsa avulazane mkati womwalirayo apweteke kapamba 
  tidathamangira konko pamodzi achipatala omwe adalinso pompo tidayesa kumutsira madzi sizidathandize apa mpamene tidathamangira naye kuchipatala chomwe chilli bwalo lamaseweroli komwe atamupima adatiuza watisiya phiri adatero 
  adati masewerawo omwe amakonzekera masewero akulu timu ya sukulu ya pulaiveti ya chiume adathera pomwepo sakumvetsa zomwe zidachitikazo 
  levi mwale yemwe dokotala wa timu ya lino adati ngozi zotere sizichitikachitika 
  mwale adati zambiri zikachitika zimakhala wosewera mpira wameza lilime lomwe limatseka modutsa 
  adati vuto loti masewera ambiri mdziko muno amaseweredwa opanda akatswiri za udotolo 
  sadziwa munthu akavulala akusewera mpira amasamalidwa mwale adatero 
  adati zachisoni imfa zoterozi zimagwa chosowa chidziwitso 
  tikufunika tiphunzitsidwe kasamalidwe ka ovulala mpira kuyambira matimu supa ligi maligi aangono mmadera msukulu mwale adatero 
  polankhulapo mneneri wa apolisi mchigawo cha kumpoto maurice chapola adati issac yemwe amachokera mmudzi mwa msafiri t mtwalo mbomalo adamwalira kaamba kovulalira mkati adati adavumbulutsa chipatala cha mzuzu 
  chapola adatsimikiza isaac adakomoka ataombana goli achipatala cha choma ndiwo adalengeza za imfa yake kutumiza thupi lake ku chipatala cha mzuzu kukafufuza chidadzetsa imfayi
Label: SPORTS

Text:
aphungu apite mmidzi pomwe sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo henry chimunthu banda walengeza lachitatu msabatayi aphungu ayamba kukumana 18 meyi t mwakaboko ya mboma la karonga yati aphunguwa akuyenera apite kumudzi kukamva zomwe akufuna akakambirane 
  mfumuyi yati aphunguwa amangonama zomwe akukambiranazo zikuchoka kwa omwe adawasankha chikhalirecho samapitako 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mwakaboko wati aphungu akumakhala mtauni zomwe zikulepheretsa mbalizi zizikambirana zosowekera za dera lawo 
  mfumuyi yati ikhala yokondwa pakhale yankho la mavuto kusowa kwa mafuta agalimoto 
  mwakaboko watinso njira yosankhira ophunzira opita kusukulu ya ukachenjede ikuyeneranso kukambidwa 
  mukumbuka kuno takhala tikudandaula ndondomokoyi ndiye ndibwino aphunguwo akakambirane zimenezi adatero mwakaboko 
  william joseph wa mmudzi mwa goveya kwa t makwangwala ku ntcheu wati 18 pasadafike aphunguwa apite kumudzi kukafunsa osati kumangowaimbira lamya pazomwe akakambirane 
  mlimi wa chimangayu wati ndibwinonso aphunguwa akakambirane zochotsa ndondomeko yosadalira chithandizo chakunja ya zero deficit 
  wati avutika kwambiri maka pokwera misonkho kwa zinthu cha ndondomekoyo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
alangiza mafumu athetse zikhalidwe zoipa wolemba glory kondowe group villageman kingstone likoya ya kwa mfumu mlumbe mboma la zomba lachinayi yapempha mafumu makolo adzikhala patsogolo pothetsa zikhalidwe zoipa zomwe zimasokoneza kaganizidwe ka ana maphunziro 
 group likoya yati zimakhala zomvetsa chisoni kupeza mafumu makolo asakulabadira za makhalidwe achikunja omwe ana achichepere akuonetsa masiku ano 
 pamenepa mfumuyi yadzudzula ina mwa miyambo yomwe akuti yomwe ikuchititsa ana osokonekera 
 zimangochitika zimakhala bizinesi komabe timalangiza chonde tayetsetsani anawo muziwawuza zokhazokha zomwe zili zofunika kwambiri kwinako tisamawonjeze kufikako kumamuwuza mwana ameneyo zomwe zimakhara zowopsya anatero group likoya 
 mwazina apempha mafumu anzawo ati aziyenda momwe likuyendera kaamba koti maphunziro omwenso angakweze chitukuko cha lino
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
evance masina mapanga awiri samuvumbwitsa pali mwambi woti ndigwire uku uku pusi anagwa chagada penanso amati mapanga awiri avumbwitsa kutanthauza ndibwino chinthu chimodzi panthawi imodzi zikuyendere evance masina akutha sukulu mpira mkalabu nkumachita mzonse dailes banda adacheza naye motere akufunitsitsa atadzasewerapo kunja ndikudziwe mnyamata 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi ndine evance masina wa zaka 18 ndimachokera mmudzi mwa ntamba t nkalo mboma la chiradzulu ndine wachinayi mbanja la ana asanu pakadalipano ndikuphunzira pasekondale ya moyale ku mzuzu komwe ndili fomu 3 
  umatchuka kwambiri chosewera mpira kodi udayamba mpira ndidayamba kalekale ndili mwana zenizeni ndidayamba wa under-12 ndinkasewera timu ya young buffalo ya ku mzuzu konkuno nditadutsa zaka 12 ndidapitiriza ku young buffalo mtimu ya under-14 padachitika zovuta zinazake zomwe zidandichititsa ndikayambe ku chiputula united mtimu ya under-20 mchaka cha 2014 pomwe ndidayamba mutimu ya fish eagles komwe ndili mpaka timuyi ikutsogola muligi ya chikho cha fmb ku mzuzu kuno mapointi 38 
  wachinyako zigoli zingati kutimiyu ndachinya zigoli 26 mumasewero okwana 14 mchikho chimenechi 
  chisangalalo chako chotani pokhala amene wachinya zigoli zambiri mligiyi ndine wosangalala kwambiri si chinthu chapafupi zoterezi pokhala mwana wasukulu zochita zimandichulukira ichi chinthu chomwe ndakhala ndikufuna nditakwaniritsa mmoyo mwanga ndine wokondwa ndachikwaniritsa 
  umakwaniritsa kupanga za sukulu za mpira ndimayesetsa kupanga pulani momwe ndichitire tsiku tsiku cholinga choti ndizitsatira bwinobwino zomwe ndikufunika kupewa kusokoneza zochita zina 
  masomphenya ako chachikulu chomwe ndimafuna nditakwaniritsa mutimu mmalawi muno silver strikers mutimu ya ndimafunitsitsanso nditadzasewerako mutimu yakunja 
  osewera amene amakusangalatsa ati ndimasangalatsidwa maseweredwe chawanangwa kaonga wa timu ya silver strikers james rodriguez amene amasewera mutimu ya real madrid 
  umakonda chiyani ukakhala sukusewera mpira ndimakonda kuonerera mafilimu kumvetsera nyimbo 
  achinyamata anzako uwalangiza zotani alimbikire pachilichonse adzakhale opambana
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
papa wapempha mabungwe achilimike polimbana wogwiritsa ntchito ana mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wapempha maiko mabungwe achilimike ntchito yolimbana wogwiritsa ntchito ana 
 malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa walankhula lachitatu ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican 
 wati udindo wa kuchitapo kanthu pofuna kuthetsa woipa wogwiritsa ntchito ana womwe ukukulirakulirabe cha umphawi 
 mzolankhulalankhula zake lachitatu papa francisco wati wokhudzidwa wonyasa wogwiritsa ntchito ana ntchito zomwe sizigwirizana msinkhu wawo kotero ana amasanduka akuluakulutu yao isanakwane 
 pamenepa wapempha maiko mabungwe achilimike polimbana mchitidwewu waonjezeranso kunena ntchito ya munthu kuyetsetsa kuchitapo kanthu polimbana mchitidwewu 
 papa francisco wati nthenda ya covid-19 yomwe yakhudza lonse la pansi yabweretsa mavuto osiyana siyana yakakamiza ana ambiri mmaiko osiyana siyana anke nagwira ntchito zoposa msinkhu wao pofuna kuthandiza mabanja omwe umphawi wadzaoneni 
 wati ntchito zolemetsa zomwe ana akugwira zochititsa matupi aonongeke makamaka nzoononga kusokoneza maganizo 
 papayu wati ana chiyembekezo cha mabanja maiko kotero akuyenera kuyanganiridwa 
 uthenga wa papa francisco wabwera yoyenera pomwe lachisanu 12 june 2020 lonse la pansi likhale likuganizira za wogwiritsa ntchito ana world day against child labour
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
siteshoni ya nkaya ifewetsa maulendo gawo lachiwiri lomanga siteshoni ya sitima ya nkaya mboma la balaka layamba ntchitoyi ikuyembekezeka kutha november chaka chino 
  mneneri wa bungwe loona sitima zapamtunda la central east african railways cear chisomo mwamadi wati gawoli likatha amene amagwiritsira ntchito sitima zapamtunda athandizika sitima zizinyamula katundu wambiri ziziyenda mwachangu 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mwamadi samalani njanji june chaka chino bungweli lidamaliza gawo loyamba lomwe kudali njanji zinayi sitima zapamtunda zizidutsana pamalopa 
  gawo lachiwiri lidayamba litangotha gawo loyamba lomwe kukhale njanji ina yotalika makilomita awiri njanji zinayi zomwe zizithandiza kusungirako sitima kumasula mabogi 
  njanji zimenezi ndizomwe tizimasulira sitima ili vuto kusungirako sitima pamene tikupanga sitima zina zizitha kumayenda mopanda kusokonezedwa sizimachitika poyamba tidalibe malo tsopano ziyamba kuchitika popanda vuto lililonse adatero mwamadi 
  padakali malo amene amangepo njanjizi asalazidwa kale katundu wafika ntchitoyi iyambe tsiku lililonse 
  njanji yopita ku nkaya imeneyi mwamadi akuti gawoli likatha amene amagwiritsira ntchito sitima asangalala kwambiri bizinesi izichitika mwachangu 
  zonse zikatha ndiye nkaya akhala malo akulu pomwe sitima zizisemphana kumamangirira mabogi sitima yochokera ku mwanza blantyre liwonde kanengo zizidutsana nkaya titha kumamanga mabogi
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
ayamba kugawa makuponi nduna ya malimidwe joseph mwanamvekha yapempha alimi asagulitse makuponi amene boma lidayamba kupereka lachinayi 
  ndunayo idakhazikitsa ntchito yopereka makuponi 4 miliyoni kwa alimi 1 miliyoni ogulira mbewu feteleza pasukulu ya mtaya mboma la balaka 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka nduna ya malimidwe joseph mwanamvekha adalangizanso mafumu okhudzidwa kugawa makuponi apewe kuba chinyengo pantchitoyi zakhala zikukhalira mmbuyomu 
  ndikunena 58 amene adagwidwa pamilandu ya makuponi chaka chatha amene ayerekeze kuba makuponi lamulo lidzagwira ntchito adatero mwanamvekha 
  adapempha alimi ayambe kukonza mminda yawo azabzale mvula yoyamba feteleza afika kumadera mnthawi yake 
  chaka chino makampani amene akugulitsa mbewu feteleza mmaboma onse atitsimikizira afika mnthawi yake mmadera onse akangolandira makuponi yomweyo agule zipangizo adatero mwanamvekha 
  mmbuyomu alimi akhala akudandaula makuponi amawaolera mmanja kaamba kosowa kokagula zipangizo zotsika mtengo 
  phungu wa dera la kummawa cha pakati mbomalo yaumi mpaweni adapempha alimi agwiritse ntchito makuponi amene alandire 
  si kugulitsa makuponi anu uko kudzipha mukolole zokwanira kuwagwiritsa ntchito adatero mpaweni 
  mwa zina chaka chino kuponi iliyonse izikhala nkhope ya woyenera kulandira cholinga choti munthu wina asagwiritse ntchito 
  makuponi 4 miliyoni ogulira zipangizo zotsika mtengo adafika mdziko muno mwezi watha aperekedwa kwa alimi 1 miliyoni mchilinganizochi chaka chino 
  mndondomeko ya zachuma ya chaka chino mpaka chaka chamawa boma lidapereka k151 biliyoni ku unduna wa malimidwe k42 biliyoni ipita ku ntchito ya makuponi
Label: FARMING

Text:
ziyaye alimbitsa akhristu 345 ku parishi ya likuni wolemba sylvester kasitomu episcope wa arch diocese ya lilongwe ambuye tarsizio ziyaye lamulungu walangiza ankhristu archi dayosiziyi agwiritse ntchito mphatso za mzimu woyera kudzamitsa moyo wa uzimu pakati pawo 
 ambuye ziyaye amalakhula lamulungu ku parish ya holy rosary likuni mwambo wopereka sacrament la ulimbitso 
 akhristu amalandila mphatso zimene mulungu mzimu woyera amapereka kutumidwa yesukhristu akalalike nthenga wambwino kudzera sacramentili 
 sacrament la ulimbitso lili guru la masacrament oyambilira amene ofunika kwambiri kudzera sacrament ili mulungu mzimu woyera amatituma ndikutipatsa mpatso zake tikhale mboni za yesu khristu anatero ambuye ziyaye
Label: RELIGION

Text:
mutharika walengeza zoyimitsa ntchito zonse mdziko muno kwa masiku 21 mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika walengeza ntchito zonse za mdziko muno ziyima kwa masiku 21 kuyambira loweruka likudzali ati pofuna kulimbana kachilombo ka coronavirus 
 mutharika wanena dzulo usiku kudzera uthenga wapadera omwe amalankhula ku wa amalawi nkhani yokhudza nthendayi mdziko muno wati zimenezi zichitika kuyambira 12 koloko ya usiku wa loweruka 18 april mpaka 9 may 2020 
  mutharika wati kuyimitsa ntchito zonseku kutha kuzawonjezeredwa boma lizawone zinthu sizikusintha zikuyipirabe wati maiko ambiri ataya miyoyo ya ochuluka kaamba ka nthendayi mayiko onse amene azungulira lino nawonso akhudzidwa nthendayi choncho kofunika dongosolo labwino liyikidwe kaamba koti kupanda kutero oposa 50,000 atha kufa mdziko muno kaamba ka nthendayi 
 pamenepa wati kofunika atsatire dongosololi kaamba koti lothandiza kwambiri lino wati pamene zikhale zikuchitika boma likhalabe likupitiliza ntchito zake zopulumutsa miyoyo ya kuyeza omwe akukayikiridwa kulemba ntchito zachipatala owonjezera kukhwimitsa chitetezo mzipata malo onse kupereka zipangizo zogwilira ntchito kwa zachipatala ntchito yopereka mauthenga othandiza kudziwa za kapewedwe ka nthendayi 
 mutharika wati pakufunika ndalama zokwana 150 billion kwacha polimbana nthendayi wapempha atsogoleri ndale agwirane manja boma ntchito yolimbana mlirriwu 
 kulengezaku kwadza patangopita maola ochepa osadziwika ataphwanya zipangizo za kalembera wa chisankho msukulu zina mzinda wa blantyre ponena bungwe la mec silimayenera kupitilira ntchitoyi pamene nmdziko muno muli mliriwu zomwe zachititsanso bungweli liyimitse kalembera wachisankho mboma la blantyre 
 zachitikanso patangopita maola ochepa pomwe gulu la ndale lomwe langokhazikitsidwa kumene la citizens for transformation cft linachenjeza boma lisabwere ganizo loyimitsa ntchito zonse mdziko muno kamba ka nthenda ya covid-19 ponena ziyika miyoyo ya ambiri chiwopsezo 
 mtsogoleri wa gululi timothy mtambo analankhula lachiwiri ku lilongwe msonkhano wa atolankhani pomwe amalankhulapo momwe zinthu zilili mdziko muno pakadali 
 ati zomvetsa chisoni pakumveka za maganizowa wati mzika zambiri za lino zitha kuvutika kwambiri kupeza zofunika moyo wawo ntchito za zitaime pofuna kuteteza kufala kwa kachirombo ka corona virus
Label: HEALTH

Text:
akupopa zimbudzi pochepetsa matenda zimbudzi zawo zikadzadza amagwetsa kukumba china uku kutha malo lero zinasintha khonsolo ya blantyre mogwirizana waste advisers agwirizana zopopa zimbudzi zomwe zadzadza 
  iyitu njira yomwe mbalizi zamvana pofuna kulimbikitsa ukhondo mumzinda wa blantyre pamene matenda kolera akugwetsa moti kufika lero 26 amwalira 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kupatula khonsoloyi ikuyenda khomo lililonse mumzinda wa blantyre kuphunzitsa zaukhondo nyumba 10 000 azifikira 
  amene akuwongolera ntchitoyi ku bungwe la waste advisers marcel chisi adati kupatula ntchitoyi amanga zimbudzi 30 mwa zimbudzi 100 mumzindawu ukhondo upite patsogolo 
  tisamangonena asakodze paliponse tikuyenera zimbudzi azilowa mmenemo polipira kangachepe adatero chisi 
  tagwirizana makampani amene akugwira ntchito yopopa zimbudzi zamakono akatipeza tiwalumikizitsa kwa amene angawathandize 
  chimpopa chimodzi chimapopa zinthu zochuluka malita 3 600 munthu alipira k30 000 
  mtengo umasintha malinga kutalika kwa malo amene akapopawo 
  wachiwiri woona nkhani za umoyo ku khonsolo ya blantyre samden seunda adati zonyansazo zikapopedwa azizipititsa ku chirimba soche blantyre ku limbe komwe azikazithira mankhwala 
  tili chikonzero zonyasazo tizizithira mankhwala kutsogolo kuno tizipangira nkhuni zomwe mutha kuphikira adatero seunda
Label: HEALTH

Text:
kwa nyengo kukuphwanya maufulu cadecom bungwe la zachitukuko mpingo wakatolika la cadecom lati liwonetsetsa litengepo gawo maufulu omwe akuphwanyiridwa kaamba ka kwa nyengo 
 mwa akuluakulu ku bungweli aaron kandiwo mtaya omwe alankhula pambuyo ulendo wa masiku atatu oyendera madera group village chaweza magoli kathebwe kwa mfumu mwambo mboma la zomba 
 mavuto omwe akukumana nawo kaamba ka kwa nyengo akubwezeretsa chitukuko mmbuyo choncho kofunika mabungwe akhale patsogolo kuthandiza omwe akhudzidwa vutoli 
 udindo wa boma mabungwe awonetsetse ma ufulu wanthu asawonongeke 
 pakufunikanso kukhazikitsa malo othawirako okhazikika pamene akhudzidwa kusefukira kwa madzi osati azithawira msukulu kaamba koti zimenezi zikumasokoneza maphunziro mdziko muno
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
mtembo usagone panoachipatala pasathe tsiku mtengo wanu musadadzatenge uthenga omwe zipatala za rumphi machinga akuuza cha kuonongeka kwa malo wosungira mitembo pachipatalapo 
  pachipatala cha boma ku rumphi zaka ziwiri zatha malo osungira mitembowa atasiya kugwira ntchito pamene ku machinga miyezi itatu yatha malowa atasiya kugwira ntchito 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka jobe boma lichitepo kanthu sizidakomere amene amagwiritsa ntchito zipatalazi amene anena boma mabungwe alowererepo zotere zisinthe 
  t nyambi ya mboma la machinga akuti pakhala povuta azikatenga thupi la malemu tsiku lomwelo palibe amene amakonzekera maliro 
  ambiri tikukhala kutali chipatalachi zovuta zikagwa timadalira pathe tsiku tipeze mayendedwe tikuvutika kuchipatalako kulibe galimoto zokwanira azikatisiyira zovuta pakhomo pathu adatero nyambi 
  mneneri wa chipatala cha machinga clifton ngozo akuti sangachitire mwina angasunge thupi kwa ndiye lingathe kuonongeka 
  kudachitika ngozi tidasunga matupi amene amakha magazi padatha masiku awiri matupiwo apite kukaikidwa kudali fungo loipa ndiye sizithekanso tisunge mtembo pokhapokha malowa atakonzedwa adatero ngozo 
  adati atapitirira kumagoneka mitembo ndiye zingabweretse zotsatira zoipa matenda kwa amene akugwira ntchito kumalowa 
  poyamba timasunga mitembo kwa masiku oposa awiri atatu akamadzatenga mtembowo umakhala uli bwinobwino panopa sizingathekenso malowa aonongeka 
  panopa uthenga omwe tikuuza amene amagwiritsa ntchito malowa ndikuti sitikwanitsanso matupi azigona kumeneku zovuta zikachitika atha kusunga asagone aonongeka adatero ngozo 
  kuchipatala cha rumphi adasiya kugoneka mitembo cha kuonongeka kwa malo osungira mitembo 
  mneneri wa chipatalachi bwanalori mwamlima akuti malo osungira mitembo adaonongeka zaka khumi zapitazo akhala akukonzetsa mpaka 2015 
  panopa sitingakonzenso pena tikakonza sichimachedwanso kuonongeka apapa zavuta tasiya kugoneka mitembo ikumaonongeka adatero mwamlima 
  akuti vuto nkuti zipangizozi zakhalitsa ndikakumbuka zipangizozi zidaikidwa mma 1976 zakhala zikugwira ntchito mpaka lero adatero mwamlima 
  zakhumudwitsanso wa bungwe loona za umoyo la malawi health equity network mhen george jobe amene wati aphungu nyumba ya malamulo akuyenera aikambirane pamene akhale akukumana 
  amene adamanga nyumba yachisoni adali cholinga adaona kufunikira kwake si zoona mpaka malowa asiye kugwira ntchito talephera kuwakonza 
  palibe amene amayembekezera maliro pamene wapita kuchipatala ndiye simunganene maliro akangochitika basi munyamule adatero jobe 
  ku salima nakonso akhala akukumana mavuto omwewa zidayenda pamene malo osungira mitembowo adakonzedwa 
  t mwanza wa mbomali akufotokoza tidakumana mavutowa panopa zinthu zilibwino pachipatalachi adakonza adatero mwanza
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
papa wati utumiki chuma mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisko wati mphatso ya utumiki mpingo chuma chachikulu 
 papa umodzi mwa maulendo ake utumiki papa francisko walankhula la mulungu bwalo la saint peters square ku vatican tsiku limene mpingowu umachita chaka cha utumiki pakati ansembe asisiteri abulazala mpingo wu 
 wati maria yosefe anna simeon zitsanzo zenizeni za utumiki wa mphamvu wopezeka zonse 
 papa francisko wati likusowa atumiki eni eni amene okonzeka kutumikira kulalika za ufumu wa mulungu kudzera mmawu mulungu zitsanzo zao zabwino 
 chaka chilichonse mpingo wa katolika umachita chaka cha atumiki ake mpingo
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
kwelepeta wayamikira mabungwe pothandiza asilamu chakudya mnyengo ya ramadhan phungu wa dera la zomba malosa grace kwelepeta wayamikira mabungwe malawi relief fund uk issa foundation kaamba kothandidza mdera lake omwe chipembezo cha chisilamu katundu wosiyanasiyana wa chakudya pomwe akukonzekera nyengo ya ramadhan 
 kwelepeta yemwenso wachiwiri kwa nduna yowona za kusasiyana pakati amayi abambo wayankhula lachinayi ku zomba pomwe mlendo wolemekezeka mwambo wopereka chakudya chochokera ku mabungwe awiriwa 
 wati cha kubwera kwa muliri wa coronavirus aganiza chaka chino asagawe chakudya kudzera mmizikiti awapatse zinthu zoti azikaphika kudya kwawo kuwopa kupatsirana kachilomboka 
 nyengo ya ramadhan ya chaka chino yosiyana ya zaka zinazi anthuwa samadyeraso limodzi kale mmalo mwake tangowagawira azikadyera kwawo anatero kwelepeta 
 poyankhulapo mwa akuluakulu ku bungwe la malawi relief fund uk doreen kawanda ati chakudyachi chiwathandidza anthuwa nyengo ya ramadhan nyengo ino ya mliri wa coronavirus kawanda akufotokoza 
 momwe tikudziwira maiko ambiri kuphatikiza kuno ku malawi kwakhudzidwa matendawa tinayesetsa kupeza njira yoti anthuwa alandire chakudya chimenechi posatira zomwe who akulimbikisa anatero kawanda
Label: RELIGION

Text:
singanga wanjatidwa kamba kogwirira mwana apolisi mboma la chikwawa amanga singanga wina wa mankhwala azitsamba pomuganizira wagwirira mwana wa zaka khumi zakubadwa 
  wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa apolisi mbomalo sergeant dickson matemba watsimikiza zankhaniyi 
 wati mkuluyu goodson bandecha wa zaka 44 zakubadwa anachita 12 mwezi uno ponamiza msungwanayu achira matenda mmimba omwe amadwala akagona naye anamuwopseza akakana naye msungwanayu achita misala atachita naye zadamazo msungwanayu anakaulura kwa makolo ake omwe anatengera nkhaniyi ku polisi omwe anamanga mkuluyo 
 makolo mtsikanayo anayitanitsa msingangayo azawathandize kamba ka vuto la mmimba lomwe nalo apa ngangayo anapezerapo mwayi kugwirira mwanayo anatero matemba 
 padakali apolisi mbomalo amanganso wina yemwe anaba mwana kumakakhala naye banja kotero alangiza mbomalo asamalire ana asamakhulupirire asinganga
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
apha mwana atasemphena za ndalama apolisi mboma la mangochi amanga kutsekera mchitokosi wa zaka 28 chomuganizira wapha mwana wa zaka ziwiri atasemphana mwamuna nkhani za ndalama 
  wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa apolisi mboma la mangochi amina tepani daudi wati boma likuganizira mayiyo tamara chirambo adapha mwana thomas harawa junior onse ochokera mmudzi mwa mwakhwawa mdera la mfumu wasambo mboma la karonga 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka daudi adakangana za ndalama malingana daudi nkhaniyo idachitika usiku wa 12 june chaka chino mmudzi mwa ngombe mdera la mfumu yaikuru namabvi ku mangochi 
  mayiyo mkazi wachiwiri kwa msodzi wa nsomba thomas harawa wa zaka 46 akhala akukhala limodzi la ngombe 
  patsikulo banjalo lidakangana pankhani za ndalama zotsatira zake ndewu idabuka pakati awiriwa zomwe zidapangitsa mwamunayu athawire kwa mchimwene kukafuna malo obisala msika wa makawa mbomalo adatero daudi 
  adati mbandakucha wa tsikulo mwamunayo adalandira lamya kumudziwitsa mwana wamwamuna wamwalira apolisi adathamangira kumaloko atadziwa 
  zotsatira za kuchipatala chachikulu cha mangochi zidaonetsa mwanayu adamwalira chopotokoledwa khosi 
  mayiyo akaonekera kubwalo la milandu posachedwapa komwe akayankhe mlandu wokupha 
  pakadali apolisi mbomalo apempha apewe kutengera malamulo mmanja mwawo akasemphana pankhani za mbanja azikauza ankhoswe mabanja kupita kuma ofesi apolisi yoona za chinsinsi victim support unit kukakambilana modekha
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
atsikana osiyira sukulu panjira akuchulukira ku ntcheu ofesi yoona za maphunziro mboma la ntcheu yalimbikitsa atsikana azipitiriza maphunziro pofuna atsikana akhale ozidalira nkhani za maphunziro mdziko muno 
 mlangizi wazamaphunziro mbomali zone ya bunyenga sidney makwecha anena pambuyo ulendo wao wokayendera maofesi boma la ntcheu atsikana ochokera school ya saiwa komwe dera lomwe lili atsikana ochuluka osiyira sukulu panjira mbomalo 
 makwecha ati atsikana ambiri sakupitiriza maphunziro kaamba kopatsidwa pathupi zomwe zinachititsa ofesiyi pamodzi amayi ogwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana atsikanawa akazionere okha mmaofesiwa mmene amayi akugwirira ntchito zawo atengerepo chitsanzo amayiwa 
 taona atsikana ambiri mderali akumasiyira sukulu panjira nde tinawatengera ku boma la ntcheu akakumane amayi anachita maphunziro akuwoneka pamapeto ulendowu anawa aphunzirapo kanthu anatero makwecha 
 sukulu ya saiwa ili ku dera la kumudzi ana ambiri amasiyira sukulu panjira kaamba ka moyo otengera makhalidwe achitawoni zomwe zikumachititsa anawa azitenga pathupi adakali aangono
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
mmalawi mulibe ebola unduna kafukufuku yemwe akatswiri za chipatala mdziko la south africa achita watsikimiza munthu wa mboma la karonga amene wamwalira atadwala matenda ofanana ebola samadwala matendawa 
 chikalata chomwe unduna wa zaumoyo watulutsa lachiwiri chatsikimizira malawi asakhale nkhawa padakali mdziko muno mulibe nthenda yi 
 masiku apitawa nkhawa inakula mdziko muno pamene wina wa mboma la karonga anamugoneka chipatala chachikulu cha bomalo yemwe zizindikiro zina za nthendayi 
 mkuluyu wamwalira lachiwiri lapitali wayikidwa mmanda usiku wa tsiku lomweli zachipatala okhaokha omwe anavala zozitetezera zomwe anayamba kuganiza mkuluyu wafa ebola 
 padakalipano unduna wa zaumoyo wapempha malawi akhale mtima pansi kaamba koti kafukufuku yemwe bungwe la national institute of communicable diseases lachita wasonyeza nthenda yomwe amadwala mkuluyu si ebola 
 chikalatachi chomwe wasayina mlembi wamkulu unduna wa zaumoyo dr dan namalika chati nkhani za zaumoyo zimayendetsa mwachinsinsi kaamba koti zimakhudza ufulu wa 
 ati apitilira kukhwimitsa chitetezo kuteteza ku nthendayi
Label: HEALTH

Text:
aphungu akumana komaliza yatha aphungu nyumba ya malamulo amene adasankhidwa 2014 akumana komaliza kuyambira lachiwiri likudzali amalawi asanavote pachisankho cha patatu 21 may chaka chino 
  mwa zina aphunguwo akakambirana za momwe ndondomeko ya zachuma ikuyendera pomwe adaikhazikitsa chaka chatha kumanso kukambirana mabilo zikutanthauza nyumbayi akamaitseka aphungu sadzabwereranso mnyumbayo atalephera pachisankhocho 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka aphungu mnyumba ya malamulo mmbuyomu zili apo akadaulo zachitetezo ndale maufulu ati msonkhano womaliza wa aphunguwo sukhala wa phindu aphungu sakambirana za kubedwa kuphedwa kwa achialubino komwe kwayala nthenje mdziko muno 
  akadaulowa ati zikhoza kutheka aphunguwa atagwiritsa ntchito msonkhanowu popeza njira zokhwimitsira chitetezo cha omwe khungu la chialubino omwe chitetezo chawo chagwedezeka 
  mwa akadaulo zachitetezo brigadier general marcel chirwa yemwe adakhalapo msilikali kazembe wa lino adatanthauzira chitetezo cha munthu mosaopa kusaphwanyiridwa ufulu uliwonse 
  chitetezo cha munthu pomwe munthuyo akukhala mwaufulu wosaopsezedwa mwanjira iliyonse kuphedwa njala matenda mwachidule chitetezo pomwe munthu akukhala mosatokosedwa kuntchito mmudzi adatero chirwa 
  wati aphungu akamakumana akuyenera momwe akukhalira mdziko muno makamaka omwe khungu la chialubino nkupeza njira zothetsera mavuto omwe anthuwa akukumana nawo makamaka nkhanza zobedwa kuphedwa 
  nzachidziwikire achialubino alibe chitetezo akukhala mwa mantha nkhanza zomwe akukumana nazo aphungu atakonza apa pamsonkhano wawowu akhoza kuonetsa kukhwima nzeru kwawo watero chirwa 
  katswiri ndale george phiri wa ku university of livingstonia unilia wati lonse lili maso malawi njira yothetsera nkhanza zomwe akukumananazo achialubino ichokera pati moti yemwe angabweretse njirayo adzalandira ulemu waukulu 
  phiri wati aphungu ku nyumba ya malamulo asenza chiyembekezo cha lonse mwina muzokambirana zawo zomalizazi mukhoza kutuluka njira yosowayi 
  aphungu nkuthekera kowongola zinthu pankhani ya maalubinoyi msonkhano uwu womaliza pampando ndiokwanira kukambirana njira yotetezera maalubino moti akamakumana akuyenera kugwiritsa ntchito mpata umenewu watero phiri 
  wapampando wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe olimbikitsa zaufulu timothy mtambo wati mabungwe ayesetsa kukankhirira aphungu asalephele kukambirana zachitetezo cha maalubino mpaka njira ipezeke 
  mumatitsatira muyikira umboni takhala tikulimbana boma zachitetezo cha maalubino tsopano taona mpata wina mumsonkhano wa aphungu womwe ukudzawu tiyesetsa msonkhano umenewu usathe asadakambirane nkhaniyi watero mtambo 
  nyumba ya malamulo idasintha lamulo lokhudza kupezeka ziwalo za munthu mchaka cha 2016 pofuna kukhwimitsa chitetezo cha achialubino omwe nkhani ya kuzunzika kwawo idayamba kutchuka mchaka cha 2014 
  lamuloli limati mlandu kupezeka ziwalo za munthu chilango chake moyo wonse kundende ukugwira ntchito yakalavula gaga popanda mwayi wolipira chindapusa 
  wapampando wa komiti yoona za malamulo mnyumba ya malamulo maxwell thyolera wati cholinga china cha lamuloli nkuunikira milandu yotere izikambidwa mkhothi lalikulu osati mmakhothi angonoangono majisitileti 
  nkhawa yathu yoti apolisi makhothi sakugwiritsa ntchito lamuloli mokwanira tinkayembekezera nkhani zotere zichepa kutheratu lamuloli watero thyolera 
  makomiti atatu ya zamalamulo chitetezo makhalidwe mmadera akhazikitsa komiti imodzi yoti ifufuze chomwe chikuchitika nkhani zozembetsa ndikupha maalubino ati zotsatira zakafukufukuyu zidzaperekedwa mnyumba ya malamulo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mgwedegwede mzipani wakula mgwedegwede womwe wayanga chipani cholamula cha dpp zina zotsutsa boma udf mcp ungabale zisankho zabwino 2014 waunikira katswiri pandale yemwenso mphunzitsi wa zandale kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mkuluyu blessings chinsinga wati umu mmene zimayenera kukhalira maka zisankho pulezidenti phungu zikayandikira 
  apa chinsinga wati ichi ndichiyambi chabe pena zidzifika alindi mwana agwiritse adekhe mpaka madzi atadikha kuopa kumwa matope 
  wati misamuko ikuchitika mzipani imene itamangenso zipani mwatsopano kuzisanduliza zolimba 
  sabata yatha aphungu anayi chipani cholamula cha dpp adauza nyuzipepala ya weekend nation akhazikitsa gulu lomwe lidziunikira pomwe pakhota nyani mchira mchipanichi 
  gululi lomwe woliyankhulira phungu wa dera la kumwera kwa kwa mzinda kwa blantyre moses kunkuyu lati pali aphungu 30 lidziuza mtsogoleri wa lino bingu wa mutharika chindunji osati phula lomwe omuzungulira akhala akukumata 
  ku udf matatalazi sakutha pomwe chipanichi chagawika pawiri 
  akatakwe humphrey mvula sam mpasu mwa pambuyo friday jumbe yemwe akugwiriziza udindo wa pulezidenti wa chipanichi pomwe mtsogoleri wakale bakili muluzi adalengeza wasiya ndale 
  gulu lina kuli zikanthawe mlembi wachipanichi kennedy makwangwala geroge nga ntafu ibrahim matola kudzanso aphungu 15 chipanichi ku nyumba ya malamulo pambuyo mwana wa atcheya atupele muluzi 
  pomwe akadziotche yemwe adali wachiwiri kwa mneneri wachipanichi ken msonda wasamuka udf walowa chipani cha wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda cha peoples party pp 
  henry phoya yemwe adachotsedwa mchipani cha dpp mmbuyomu nayenso waumanga walowa mcp phoya adakhalapo nduna mmaboma udf dpp 
  chinsinga wati zonsezi ndizosadabwitsa zisankho zikayandikira andale amasinkhasinkha kolowera adzachite 
  apa amayangana mazira omwe angamubalire kanthu akawafungatira pofika juni zikhala zambiri zikuchitika pandale 
  zikuyenera kuchitika zitati zizichitika 2013 woponya voti angasokonekere koopsa 
  pounikira andale angapo omwe akwawira kuzipani zina wati kuyenda kwa anthuwa kungakhale tanthauzo mwinanso ayi 
  msonda adatsanzika akukalera zidzukulu akuti alowa kuchipani cha pp sizingapatse chikhulupiriro mwa mkuluyu 
  zomwe achita phoya zadabwitsa ambiri inenso mwina zingasinthe zingapo pandale malinga momwe amachionera chipani ca mcp 
  nkutheka phoya abweretsa zingapo ku mcp cha kulimba mtima kwawo komwe adaonetsa potsutsa mabilo oipa mnyumba ya malamulo akutero chinsinga 
  baziliyo kajani wa mmudzi mwa chaponya kwa t mzukuzuku mboma la mzimba wati sakuganiza mpungwepungwewu ungakonze masankho 2014 kaamba koti ino ndiyoyenera zipani zotsutsa zizichita ntchito yachitukuko 
  pandale pamafunika mgwirizano ncholinga chotukula osati zikuchitikazi zomwe sizingatipindulire 
  zipani zotsutsa zikuyenera kupereka thandizo kuchipani cholamula maka pankhani ya chitukuko zomwe sizikuchitika zingadzabale ziwawa 2014 adatero kajani 
  frank mpuno wa mmudzi mwa yoyola kwa t masasa mboma la ntcheu wati masankho abwino 2014 angadze akuluakulu zipani akudziwitsa za zomwe zikuchitikazo 
  amatifuna panthawi ya kampeni basi mukadzamva sitikavota osamadabwa akutero mpuyo 
  mgwedegwede udf udayamba mmwezi wa okutobala 2011 pomwe atupele muluzi adabwera poyera ndikulengeza adzaima nawo mpando wa pulezidenti mchaka cha 2014 
  sizidakomere komiti mchipanichi akuluakulu mmenemo adati nzosemphana malamulo achipani 
  apa chipanichi chidaitanitsa atupele akaonekere ku komiti yosungitsa mwambo yachipanichi adakana chidamuchotsa 
  kugwedezekaku kudabukanso 21 disembala 2011 pomwe mlembi wachipanichi kennedy makwangwala adalemba kalata yothetsa maudindo onse 
  kulumana ku mcp kuli pakati mlembi wa chipanichi chris daza mtsogoleri wachipani john tembo 
  daza wakhala akulankhula poyera tembo akuyenera kusiira utsogoleri wachipanichi mmanja mwa achinyamata zomwe zakhala zikutsutsula tembo 
  mmwezi wa sepitembala chaka chatha komiti ya chipanichi idachotsa daza sindiyenso mlembi wachipanichi bwalo lamilandu lalikulu ku lilongwe mmwezi wa okutobala lidabwezeretsa daza mpandowo 
  chipanichi chalandira phoya 
  ku dpp kwachoka aphungu angapo jennifer chilunga wa ku zomba nsondole yemwe adalowa chipani cha pp grace maseko wa ku zomba changalume
Label: POLITICS

Text:
papa wayamikira asodzi ogwira ntchito madzi mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wayamikira ogwira ntchito madzi asodzi cha ntchito yawo yothandiza kudyetsa 
 malinga malipoti vatican radio papa walankhula lachitatu kudzera uthenga wa kanema wopita ku utumiki wa mpingo wa katolika womwe umaona ntchito za madzi 
 kudzera uthengawo papa francisco wayamikira anthuwa chodzipereka kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus akukumana zovuta zambiri 
 wati ntchitoyi ili zovuta zake komabe anthuwa amayetsetsa kubweretsa chakudya kwa ambiri omwe amakonda ndiwo nsomba zina zambiri zopezeka mmadzi 
 papa francisco wati mliri wa coronavirus wachititsa anthuwa azikhala madzi yaitali asadakumane mabanja abwenzi poopa kupatsirana nthendayi 
 malinga nthambi ya bungwe la united nations yomwe imaona za ogwira ntchito international labour organisation yati oposa 150,000 akakamizidwa madzi osakumana mabanja abwenzi kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus 
 papa francisco watsimikizira onse ogwira ntchito za madzi za mapemphero ake wakumbutsanso anthuwa azinyadira ntchito yao popeza ophunzira oyambirira yesu khristu adali asodzi 
 pomaliza sadaiwale kulimbikitsa onse omwe amaona za moyo wa uzimu wa ogwira ntchito za madziwa 
 utumiki wa mpingo wa katolika womwe umaona ntchito za madzi apostleship of the sea nkhoswe yake amayi maria our lady star of the sea
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
ulimi wa fodya usafe maiko asanu awiri kummawa kummwera kwa africa agwirizana zogwirira ntchito limodzi pofuna kutukula ulimi wa fodya womwe pakali ukukumana zokhoma 
  nthumwi zochokera mmaikowa zidakumana lolemba lachiwiri mkati mwa sabatayi ku lilongwe komwe zidakambirana njira zotukulira ulimi wa fodya mbewu zina zomwe zingalowe mmalo mwa fodya kutabwera chiletso cholima mbewuyi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc potsegulira msonkhanowo lolemba nduna ya zamalimidwe mthirira chitukuko cha madzi allan chiyembekeza adati nkhondo yolimbana kusuta fodya imodzi mwa nkhondo zomwe zingalowetse pansi ulimi wa fodya 
  adati mpofunika pokambirana za momwe maiko makamaka omwe amadalira fodya pachuma angatetezere ulimiwu nthumwizo zilingalirenso za mbewu zomwe zingalowe mmalo mwa fodya ataletsedwa 
  pakalipano tikulimbikitsa alimi fodya azilima kwambiri palibe chiletso chilichonse polingalira tsiku lina akhoza kudzangoti fodya asalimidwenso tidzakhale tili kale pena podalira adatero chiyembekeza 
  adati mavuto omwe fodya amabweretsa pamoyo wa munthu nchimodzimodzi mavuto omwe amayamba kaamba ka zipatso zina za ulimi shuga mafuta zakudya zosiyanasiyana chodandaulitsa nchakuti fodya yekha ndiye amalozedwa chala 
  chiyembekeza adati kupha ulimi wa fodya nkufinya maiko omwe akutukuka kumene amadalira ulimi wa fodya pachuma 
  maiko ambiri omwe akutukuka kumene chiyembekezo chawo chili pafodya mwachitsanzo 60 peresenti ya chuma cha malawi gwero lake ulimi wa fodya si maiko omwe akutukuka kumene okha ngakhalenso maiko ambiri omwe adatukuka kale america canada maiko ku ulaya brazil fodya adatengapo gawo lalikulu adatero chiyembekeza 
  adauza nthumwizo kuleka kumenyerera ufulu wa ulimi wa fodya kukhoza kudzapangitsa mtsogolo muno mbewu zinanso zomwe timadalira zidzayambe kusalidwa momwe akusalidwira fodya 
  wa bungwe la kayendetsedwe ka nkhani za fodya la tobacco control commission tcc yemwenso adali nawo mukomiti yokonza za nkhumanoyi bruce munthali adati cholinga cha nkhumanoyo chidali kupanga zomwe maiko omwe amadalira fodya angagwiritse ntchito pofuna kuteteza mbewuyi 
  munthali adati magulu omwe amalimbikitsa zothetsa osuta fodya la world health organization who akunka nalimbikitsa zolinga zawo ndiye maiko omwe amadalira fodya sangachitepo kanthu ndiye tsogolo lawo lada
Label: FARMING

Text:
zidayambira mmalingaliro mwina tinganene kulimbikira ntchito ndiko kudapangitsa malingaliro omwe steve chimenya wa ku zomba adali nawo asanduke zenizeni kubweretsa chimwemwe mmoyo mwake 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mnyamatayu akuti amati akakhala payekha mmutu mwake munkabwera chithunzithunzi cha msungwana yemwe adali asadamuoneko nkale lonse kufikira mchaka cha 2014 pomwe tsiku lina kuofesi yake kudatulukira msungwana wofanana wa mmalingaliro akewo 
  chimenya nthiti yake patsiku laukwati wawo rachel jeremiah sato wa ku ntcheu yemwe akuti amagwira ntchito ya boma adatumidwa kukagwira ntchito komwe steve ankagwira ntchito uku nkomwe zonse zidayambira 
  nditamuona ndidadzimenya mmutumu kuganiza malingaliro aja andipezanso ya ntchito kenako ndidamuona akulowa muofesi yanga ndidakhulupirira sadali malingaliro chabe ndidamupatsa moni nkuyankha adatero steve 
  akuti tsikulo adaweruka mosiyana masiku onse moti olo okumana naye tsikulo ankadabwa nkhope yowala yomwe adali nayo 
  akuti chiyambi cha chikondi chawo chidali chomwecho mpaka 26 september 2015 adachita chinkhoswe kumudzi kwawo kwa rachel ku ntcheu 14 november 2015 lidali tsiku la ukwati woyera womwe madyerero ake adachitikira ku capital hotel ku lilongwe 
  rachel akuti atangomuona steve chinthu chidamugunda mumtima patapita masiku angapo pomwe steve ankamuuza za chikondi mumtima mwake adali atamukonda kale panthawi yomwe ankangocheza sankaonetsera
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
papa wapempha aku japan amupempherere wolemba sylvester kasitomu mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika lonse papa francisco wapempha mdziko la japan ateteze moyo apemphelere ulendo wopita mdzikolo 
  papa walankhula lero kudzera uthenga wa kanema wati chitetezo chomwe akupempha chochokera mtima 
 pamenepa papa wati akukhulupilira mdziko la japan amazindikira ubwino wokambirana pali kusamvana cholinga chofuna kuteteza umoyo wa 
 la japan lodalitsidwa chikhalidwe chabwino chomwe chimasonyeza umoyo wabwino 
 pomaliza mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolikayu anayamikira onse omwe akuchita dongosolo lokonzekera ulendo apitiliza kupemphelera
Label: RELIGION

Text:
gule alipo 17 october zipani za udf pp zaimika manja sizidzapikisana nawo pamipando ya phungu pachisankho cha chibwereza chimene chikhalepo 17 october maso pachisankho chapatatu 2019 
  bungwe loyendetsa chisankho la malawi electoral commission mec lidalengeza zochititsa chisankho cha chibwereza mmalo asanu amodzi 6 malo atatu akupikisana aphungu nyumba ya malamulo pamene enawo makhansala 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka chisankho cha chibwereza chidalikonso mmbuyomu chipani cha pp chikupikisana nawo pampando wa khansala wokha pamene udf malo awiri khansala onse sakupikisana nawo pampando wa phungu 
  mneneri wa udf ken ndanga akuti ndondomeko ya chipani chawo kupikisana malo amene akudziwa achita 
  komabe sikuti tangokhala tili zochitika mmaderawo adatero ndanga amene wati kusapikisana kwawo si tanthauzo lothandiza chipani cha dpp 
  mneneri wa chipani cha pp nowa chimpeni adati maso lili pomanga chipani chomwe chidzalowenso mboma 2019 
  iyi ndiye ndondomeko yathu musandifunse ndondomeko zanji adatero chimpeni amene adatsindika pp siyikutha 
  katsiwri wa ndale mustapha hussein wati zipanizo zikadaganiza mozama chisankho chilichonse mwayi wopima mphamvu za chipani 
  ndanga chipani sichikutha zipanizo zati maso pachisankho cha patatu chomwe chichitike 2019 mmalo mwake chipani cholamula cha dpp mcp ndiwo sakumwetsana madzi 
  hussein wati pp udf akuyenera aganize kawiri chisankho chilichonse nchofunika popima mphamvu za chipani 
  kukonzekera 2019 kumayenera kyamba njira yabwino nawo chisankho chachibwereza chomwe chimaonetsa mphamvu zachipani adatero hussein 
  poyankhapo maganizo hussein ndanga akuti chisankhochi sichisonyezo zomwe zidzachitike pachisankho cha 2019 
  chimpeni tikukonzekera 2019 taonapo chipani chikupambana chisankho chachibwereza kubwera chisankho chenicheni kugonja adatero 
  bungwe loyendetsa chisankho la malawi electoral commission mec lidalengeza zochititsa chisankho chachibwereza mmalo asanu amodzi 6 malo atatu akupikisana aphungu nyumba ya malamulo pamene makhansala 
  chipani cha pp chikupikisana nawo pampando wa khansala wokha pamene udf malo awiri khansala onse sakupikisana nawo pampando wa phungu 
  mec idakhazikitsa ya kampeni 13 september kampeniyi idzatsekedwa 15 october 17 chisankho chidzachitike 
  bungweli lavomereza 19 apikisane nawo amuna 15 amayi anayi chisankho cha aphungu chichitika kumpoto chakummawa kwa boma la lilongwe kumeneko apikisane ellen shaban kadango woyima payekha christopher joseph manja woyima payekha ulemu msungama wa mcp ruben ngwenya wa dpp 
  aphungu apikisananso kumpoto kwa lilongwe msozi komwe apikisane bruno daka wa dpp sosten gwengwe wa mcp yemwe adali wotsatira joyce banda wa pp pachisankho cha patatu 2014 
  ku nsanje lalanje apikisane gladys ganda wa dpp laurence mark sitolo wa mcp winnie wakudyanaye woima payekha 
  chisankho cha makhansala chichitika ku mtsiliza wodi komwe brighton golombe edward wa udf julio benedicto jumbe wa dpp kinwel frank zikaola wa mcp apikisane kummawa kwa mayani wodi komwe nicholas fackson josiya wa dpp everister ndaziona kusina wa udf benson william lameck wa mcp sakumwetsana madzi 
  nako ku ndirande makata wodi chilipo cha makhansala komwe ishmael chilambo wa udf thom lita wa dpp thom harry litchowa wa mcp mathews joseph shaba wa pp akupikisana 
  mneneri wa mec sangwani mwafulirwa wamema zipani zisunge bata nthawiyi wodzetsa chisokoneza adzalangidwa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
makhoti ayambanso kugwira ntchito sitalaka yomwe ogwira ntchito mmakhoti yatha lachinayi 
  mtsogoleri wa ogwira ntchitowa charles lizigeni adatsimikizira tamvani makhoti onse mdziko muno ayambanso kugwira ntchito 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka tagwirizana zobwerera kuntchito kaamba koti amalawi amavutika apeze chilungamo cha sitalakayi adatero lizigeni 
  ogwira ntchito mmakhoti atenga masabata anayi akunyanyaka ntchito pofuna kukakamiza boma liziwapatsa ndalama zolipirira nyumba momwe likuchitira majaji mamajisitiliti 
  nduna ya zachuma goodall gondwe idali yodabwa majaji mamajisitiliti akulandirira padera ndalama zolipirira nyumba 
  boma lidasintha ndondomeko zolipirira ogwira ntchito ake 2014 moti munthu sakuyenera kulandirira padera ndalama za nyumba 
  malipiro omwe ogwira ntchito ntchito mboma amalandira clean wage adaphatikizamo kale malipiro apamwezi munthu ndalama zolipirira nyumba 
  majaji mamajisitiliti akulandirira padera ndalama za nyumba ndiye boma lidangolakwitsa idatero ndunayo 
  boma kudzera mwa mlembi wa zachuma ben botolo lidadzudzula ogwira ntchitowa lidawauza sitalaka yawo siyovomerezeka malamulo lino boma lidauza anthuwo abwerere ku ntchito 
  botolo adati nzosatheka boma liziwapatsa ndalama za nyumba zoyambira mchaka cha 2012 
  lizigeni adatsutsa zomwe mlembiyu adalankhula sitalaka yathu yovomerezeka tikubwerera kuntchito sizikutanthauza sitalaka yathu idali yosavomerezeka 
  anthuwa adayenera kuyamba ntchito lachitatu adakana kutero adapempha apolisi omwe adadzadza mmakhoti achokeko kaye 
  sitalakayi idayamba july 31 mmakhoti onse mdziko lino
Label: POLITICS

Text:
papa alimbikitsa sukulu za ukachenjede za katolika mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika lonse papa francisco walimbikitsa sukulu za ukachenjede za mpingo wu zidzithandiza ophunzira akamaliza azikathandiza ntchito zotukula madera 
 papa francisko papa amalankhula kwa mamembala bungwe la sukulu za ukachenjede za mpingowu lonse la international federation of catholic universities komwe mwazina wakumbutsanso ntchito za mamembala bungwe li adzidzipereka ntchito zokweza maphunziro msukulu zi 
 bungwe li likhala likuchita mkumano mzinda wa rome mdziko la italy
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
miyoyo ya   amalawi ili pachiopsezo wa bungwe loona za umoyo la malawi health equity network mhen martha kwataine wati nzomvetsa chisoni la malawi lasemphanitsa zoyenera patsogolo wati zaika miyoyo ya amalawi ambiri pachiospezo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi kwataine adanena kaamba ka ganizo la boma losiya kulemba ntchito madokotala 51 omwe amaliza maphunziro kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya college of medicine ati popeza bomalo silikulembanso ntchito 
  unduna wa zaumoyo wati wasintha maganizo ake tsopano ulemba ntchito madokotalawa kumene kuchokere ndalama zowalipira sikukudziwika 
  polankhulana tamvani mkati mwa sabatayi kwataine adati nzachisoni boma lafika pokanika kulemba ntchito adotolo panthawi yomwe lino likulira chakuchepa kwa madotolo mzipatala 
  adati nzodabwitsa boma lomwe lakhala likudandaula madokotala akuthawa mdziko muno ntchino zonona kunja likukana kuwalemba ntchito 
  nanga akatithawa akasiya kupita kusukulu ya udotolo titani adadabwa kwataine 
  adati nzachisoni ganizo la boma posalemba ntchito madotokotalawa miyoyo ya amalawi ambiri pachiospezo madokotala alipo kale ochepa 
  ndikulankhula zinthu sizili mzipatala zambiri momwe akumwalira matenda ochizika kaamba kakuchepa kwa madotolo kwataine adatero 
  msabatayi madokotala onse mdziko muno adaopseza anyanyala ntchito boma sililemba ntchito anzawowo pakutha sabata ziwiri 
  pozindikira zinthu sizikhala madokotalawo akanyanyala ntchito unduna wa zaumoyo kuunduna wa zachuma adakhala pansi nkugwirizana madokotalawo alembedwe ntchito zisanafike poipa 
  mneneri wa unduna wa zaumoyo adrian chikumbe adatsimikiza za nkhaniyi lachinayi polankhula mtolankhani wa the nation adati undunawo sukudziwa ndalama zolipira madokotala atsopanowo zichokera 
  naye mneneri wa unduna wa zachuma nations msowoya adati adagwirizana zoti madokotalawo anamwino alembedwe ntchito sakudziwa malipiro azitenga 
  malinga kalata yomwe adatulutsa bungwe la medical doctors union of malawi mogwirizana bungwe la society of medical doctors kulemba ntchito adotolowa kuthandiza kuchepetsa kuperewera kwawo mzipatala 
  kalatayo idati boma la malawi liganizire za umoyo wa mdziko muno womwe ukufunika kuikidwa patsogolo zina zonse zibwere pambuyo.n wa bungwe loona za umoyo la malawi health equity network mhen martha kwataine wati nzomvetsa chisoni la malawi lasemphanitsa zoyenera patsogolo wati zaika miyoyo ya amalawi ambiri pachiospezo 
  kwataine adanena kaamba ka ganizo la boma losiya kulemba ntchito madokotala 51 omwe amaliza maphunziro kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya college of medicine ati popeza bomalo silikulembanso ntchito 
  unduna wa zaumoyo wati wasintha maganizo ake tsopano ulemba ntchito madokotalawa kumene kuchokere ndalama zowalipira sikukudziwika 
  polankhulana tamvani mkati mwa sabatayi kwataine adati nzachisoni boma lafika pokanika kulemba ntchito adotolo panthawi yomwe lino likulira chakuchepa kwa madotolo mzipatala 
  adati nzodabwitsa boma lomwe lakhala likudandaula madokotala akuthawa mdziko muno ntchino zonona kunja likukana kuwalemba ntchito 
  nanga akatithawa akasiya kupita kusukulu ya udotolo titani adadabwa kwataine 
  adati nzachisoni ganizo la boma posalemba ntchito madotokotalawa miyoyo ya amalawi ambiri pachiospezo madokotala alipo kale ochepa 
  ndikulankhula zinthu sizili mzipatala zambiri momwe akumwalira matenda ochizika kaamba kakuchepa kwa madotolo kwataine adatero 
  msabatayi madokotala onse mdziko muno adaopseza anyanyala ntchito boma sililemba ntchito anzawowo pakutha sabata ziwiri 
  pozindikira zinthu sizikhala madokotalawo akanyanyala ntchito unduna wa zaumoyo kuunduna wa zachuma adakhala pansi nkugwirizana madokotalawo alembedwe ntchito zisanafike poipa 
  mneneri wa unduna wa zaumoyo adrian chikumbe adatsimikiza za nkhaniyi lachinayi polankhula mtolankhani wa the nation adati undunawo sukudziwa ndalama zolipira madokotala atsopanowo zichokera 
  naye mneneri wa unduna wa zachuma nations msowoya adati adagwirizana zoti madokotalawo anamwino alembedwe ntchito sakudziwa malipiro azitenga 
  malinga kalata yomwe adatulutsa bungwe la medical doctors union of malawi mogwirizana bungwe la society of medical doctors kulemba ntchito adotolowa kuthandiza kuchepetsa kuperewera kwawo mzipatala

Text:
adzinjata kaamba ka mkazi wamwini chisoni chidaphetsa nkhwali ku masasa mumzinda wa mzuzu mnyamata yemwe adalembedwa ntchito ya zomangamanga pakhomo wina mderali mongomuthandiza atamumvera chisoni kaamba ka kuvutika akumuganizira adapezeka akuzemberana mkazi wa njondayo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu zachisoni nkhaniyi akuti yatengera joseph nyirongo yemwe adali wa zaka 23 kumanda atapezeka lende mumtengo wa paini pambuyo pomupezerera akuchita zadama mnyumba mwake mkazi wa njondayo 
  nyamhone nachi chitsa cha mtengo wotembereredwa pomwe adadzimangirira mwana wanga wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa polisi mchigawo cha kumpoto cecilia mfune watsimikiza za nkhaniyi 
  mkati mwa sabatayi msangulutso udacheza mwini mkaziyo lovemore luhanga yemwe adanenetsa wamukhululukira atchalitchi atamukhazika pansi wati samusiya mkazi 
  luhanga yemwe amaoneka mosatekeseka mbiri yomwe yatchuka mderali adati zili kwa mkazi wakeyu ayi ati kaamba koti zomwe adachita zapangitsa munthu wina kuluza moyo 
  pachikhalidwe ndiwatumiza kaye kumudzi akapitidwe mphepo yabwino adzachita kubweranso luhanga adatero 
  bamboyu adati panthawi yodzikhwezayo nyirongo adali atavala scumba ya akazi ake ya pepo purple 
  mwana wanga wa zaka ndiye adaizindikira scumbayo adapita mnzake wa zaka 8 kukaona thupilo lili mumtengo adayamba kulozera mnzakeyo amvekere amama bafwa bali muchikhuni ataona scumbayo luhanga adatero 
  polongosola chomwe chidatsitsa dzaye adati adayamba kumva mphekesera mkazi akuzemberana mnyamatayu mwezi wa november chaka chatha 
  luhanga yemwe bizinesi diraiva wa lole adati mkazi wakhala akukana za chibwenzichi 
  amati sangachite naye chibwenzi nyirongo sankasamba nanenso ndimakaikira chifukwadi adalibe ukhondo adatero 
  luhanga adati chibwenzichi chitafumbira mkazi wakeyu adamupezera nyumba mnyamatayo adayamba kumamupatsa ndalama zomwe amakatolera kubizinesi yawo yoperekera sopo wochapira mafuta odzola 
  bamboyu adati lachiwiri sabata yapitayo adalimba mtima kumufunsa nyirongo za mphekeserazo zomwe ati mnyamatayo adakanitsitsa kwa mtu wa galu sakudziwapo kanthu 
  apa akazi anga adatulukira nawonso adakanitsitsa za nkhaniyi ndidangowauza akuchitadi tsiku la fote lidzawakwanira chomwe chitadzachitike sindidzalankhula zambiri tili mkati mokamba anga adatulukira kudzatichezera nkhaniyi idathera pomwepo adafotokoza motero luhanga 
  adati patadutsa adatengana mkazi mwana wawo wa zaka kuwaperekeza ake mwadzidzidzi adazindikira mkazi sali nawo paulendowu sikudziwika komwe alowera 
  luhanga adati adachoka koperekeza ake ili cha mma 9 koloko usiku adatsekera ana mnyumba kuyamba kufufuza komwe mkazi wakeyo adalowera adali k43 000 yomwe adatolera tsiku limenelo 
  adati ili cha mma 1 koloko mmawa adamutsina khutu mkazi wakeyo akamuyangane kwa nyirongo 
  nditafika ndidaima pawindo ndidamva awiriwo akulankhula apa ndidadzutsa eni nyumbazo andikhalire umboni titagogoda nyirongo adatitsekulira adakanitsitsa zoti mkazi wanga adali mnyumbamo luhanga adalongosola motero 
  bamboyo adati adamulonjeza nyirongo ampatsa k10 000 mkazi wakeyo sadali mnyumbamo 
  adanditsekulira nditangoti lowu adandiponyera chikwanje pamutu chomwe chidandiphonya kumenya feremu ya chitseko kenaka adandimenya chitsulo padiso pamutu ndidagwa pansi apa nkuti mkazi wanga atathawira pawindo bamboyo adatero 
  adati atadzuka adakuwa wakuba wakuba ozungulira adamugwira mkaziyo nkuyamba kummenya 
  adati adaleretsa mkazi wakeyo mmanja mwa okwiyawo buno bwamuswe adamupititsa kupolisi achisoni atamuponyera kachitenje luhanga adati adatengera mkazi kupolisiko pomuganizira waba ndalama kaamba koti ndalama yomwe adali atatolerayo adali atamupatsa nyirongo poti awiriwo amakonzekera zothawira ku lilongwe 
  ndidatengana apolisi tidzamutenge nyirongo sitidamupeze ndidadzidzimuka kumva wapezeka atadzimangirira adatero luhanga 
  pakadalipano mkaziyu akubindikira mnyumba kaamba ka manyazi zomwe zidachitikazi akatuluka amangomulozaloza adakana kutuluka kuchipinda pomwe msangulutso udafuna kumva mbali yake 
  mkucheza kwathu wodzikhwezayo nyamhone adati adazindikira mwana wawoyo adadzimangilira ili mma 4 kololo mmawa wa lachitatu sadasiye uthenga uliwonse 
  nyamhone omwe amagulitsa masuku adati anzake amene adawauza mtengo womwe uli nyumba yawo mukulendewera munthu 
  mayiwo adati mwana wawoyo yemwe wasiya ana awiri banja lake lidatha mchaka cha 2010 adadzamugogodera cha pakati usiku ati kukangowaona 
  nyamhone adati nyirongo adadzimangirira mumtengo wautali kwambiri yomwe adamuonayo adali asanamalizike sadakwanitse kukwera amuombole 
  mwana wanga sadayambane munthu sadandilongosolere kalikonse zokhudza mzimayi nyamhone adatero 
  adati adali okhumudwa apolisi omwe adauzidwa za ngoziyo mmawa adafika pamalopo 12 koloko masana thupilo sadalitengerenso kuchipatala ati kaamba koti lidali litayamba kale kufufuma
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
mafumu asalidwa pogawa chimanga ntchito yogawa chakudya kwa osoweratu pogwira ili mkati kafukufuku wathu wasonyeza mafumu sakukhutira momwe ntchitoyi ikuyendera makamaka kasankhidwe ka olandira chakudyachi 
  kafukufukuyu wapeza mabungwe ambiri omwe akuthandizana boma ntchitoyi akusankha okha oti alandire chakudya nthambi yolimbana mavuto ogwa mwadzidzidzi ya department of disaster management affairs dodma yati njirayi ichepetsa katangale 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka akuti midzi yambiri yasiyidwa lukwa mmbuyomu mbiri ya ntchito yogawa chakudya zipangizo zina mmidzi pogwiritsa ntchito mafumu makomiti mmidzi idada nkhani ya katangale kasankhidwe ka olandira 
  mafumu auza tamvani njira yomwe ikutsatidwa tsopanoyi ndiyo ingapititse patsogolo katangale osayenera kulandira akhoza kupeza danga kaamba koti olembawo sakudziwa za mmadera 
  tikungomva akulembedwa maina akalandire chakudya ndalama mafumu osatengapo mbali ndiye mapeto ake osayenera kupindula nawo akupezeka pamndandanda adatero senior chief chapananga wa ku chikwawa 
  mfumu chadza ya ku lilongwe idati choti omwe akuchita kalemberayu sadziwa bwinobwino madera omwe akugwiramo ntchitowo midzi yambiri ikudumphidwa kusiya ambiri padzuwa 
  omwe akuchita kalembera sadziwa malire adayenda kuli ochuluka pachifukwachi midzi yambiri ikudumphidwa mwachitsanzo mdera langa lino muli senior group mwenda yemwe mafumu 80 6 000 omwe adumphidwa adatero chadza 
  senior chief lukwa wa ku kasungu adati mwa mafumu opitirira 200 mdera lake mafumu 6 okha ndiwo alowa mukalembera wa olandira chakudya kutanthauza midzi yambiri yasiyidwa avutika 
  mfumu chindi ku mzimba adati adangomva alembedwa maina ayamba kulandira chakudya osadziwa komwe zikuchokera momwe zikuyendera 
  adalembana okha komweko sizidatikhudze ayi zoti akulandira chakudya tikungomva mwachitsanzo ndidangomva mphekesera cha ku edingeni adalandirako chimanga ndilibe umboni adatero chindi 
  mneneri wa nthambi ya dodma jeremiah mphande adati njira yomwe ikugwiritsidwa ntchito posankha ndiyamakono yothandiza kuchepetsa chinyengo katangale yemwe adalipo kale 
  njirayi yomwe akuitcha unified beneficiary registry ubr imatenga kaundula wa ovutika nkuwayika mmagulu potengera mavutikidwe kuchoka apo amazindikira thandizo loyenera kupereka ku maguluwo 
  kuchoka mndandandawu amthandizi pakhomo amatengapo ntchito za chitukuko amatengaponso ofunika thandizo la chakudya nawo amachoka momwemo njirayi imachepetsa kulakwitsa kowonjezera kuchotsera kaundula adatero mphande 
  malingana dc wa mboma la lilongwe charles makanga bomali lidatsatadi njira yatsopano pofuna kuthetsamavuto omwe adalipo mnjira yakale kulowetsa ndale za pamudzi mupologalamu 
  chomwe chimachitika mundondomeko yakale nchakuti mafumu amayenera kugwirira ntchito limodzi makomiti village development committee vdc area development committee adc pamakhala kuyendana mmbali 
  tili zitsanzo zambiri zomwe kumapezeka mfumu payekha walemba maina anyamata mukomiti alemba maina kwa okha ndiye zimasokoneza pologalamu adatero makanga
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:
ngozi zapansewu mboma la ntcheu zachepa 53 apolisi mboma la ntcheu ati akwanitsa kuchepetsa ngozi zapansewu 53.8 mmiyezi itatu yoyambirira ya chakachi kuyambira january kufika march poyerekeza yomweyi chaka chatha 
 chigalu takwanitsa kuchepetsa ngozi zapansewu malinga mneneri wa apolisi mbomalo sub inspector hastings chigalu chaka chino nthawiyi kwachitika ngozi zokwana 23 ngozi zi 12 omwe afa kusiyana chaka chatha pomwe 26 anafa pangozi 15 zomwe zinachitika yomweyi 
 ati mwezi wa april chaka chino kunachitika ngozi zisanu imodzi mwangozi zi asanu omwe anataya miyoyo yawo pamene atatu anavulala 
 ndizoona apolisi tikayamba chaka chilichonse timachigawa mmagawo atatu omwe miyezi iliyonse timaona mmene tagwirira ntchito chaka chino takwanisa kuchepesa miyoyo yawanthu omwe afera panseu 
 adandaula milandu yakupha yomwe ati mchakachi yakwera 9 pamene chaka chatha inali iwiri apempha agwire ntchito limodzi ntchito yolimbana mavuto osiyanasiyana mbomalo
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
othawa nkhondo akutuwa njala kwathina kukampu ya othawa nkhondo mdziko la mozambique amene akukhala ku mwanza neno komwe anthuwa akutuwa njala 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu atha sabata ziwiri tsopano popanda chakudya amene amene adabwera ndalama mdziko lawo 
  gulupu ngwenyama wa mboma la mwanza wati anthuwa akusowa mtengo wogwira kupatula amene adayenda ndalama mdziko lawo 
  ndiwo vuto lalikulu kwa othawa nkhondo amene adabwera ndalama ndiwo sakulira kwambiri akumagula zakudya amene adangobwera opanda kanthu amene akuvutika akungodikira thandizo la mabungwe adatero 
  gulu la lidayamba kukhamukira mdziko muno ku mozambique komwe akugwebana pachiweniweni pakati otsutsa boma aboma 
  kumenyanako komwe kudayamba chaka cha tha kudafika poipitsitsa january pamene nzika zina za dzikolo zidayamba kuthawira mdziko la malawi 
  kampu ya luwani ku neno yomwe ikusunga pafupifupi 1 400 njomwenso yakhudzidwa kwambiri njalayi kampu ina ya kapise mboma la mwanza komwe kuli pafupifupi 900 
  malinga ngwenyama pali chiyembekezo lolemba likudzali bungwe la world food programme wpf ligawa chakudya kwa anthuwa 
  naye senior chief saimoni wa mboma la neno wati mavuto njala osakambika zonse kukumakhala mavuto
Label: POLITICS

Text:
boma likonzekera el ninochilima boma lati alimi mdziko muno asanjenjemere lipoti la nthambi ya zanyengo loti chaka chino kukhoza mphepo ya el nino ponena zikachitika ilo lokonzeka kuthana mavuto amene angadze 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino saulos chilima adalengeza posachedwapa pamsonkhano wa atolankhani pofuna kupereka chilimbikitso kwa alimi onse 
  chilima boma litumiza alangizi achitetezo mmadera osiyanasiyana takhazikitsa thumba la ndalama zokwana k1 biliyoni zoti zitithandize kukonzekera mphepo imeneyi isadzaononge adatero chilima 
  chilima adati ndalama zomwe boma lakhazikitsazi ntchito yake nkudzalimbana mavuto kusefukira kwa madzi ngamba zitati zachitika potsatira mphepo ya el nino yomwe ikumvekayi 
  adati pokonzekera el ninoyu boma litumiza alangizi achitetezo mmadera osiyanasiyana mphepoyi itati yafika adzakhale athandizi populumutsa katundu miyoyo ya 
  el nino mphepo yomwe imasokoneza ntchito za ulimi chosapanganika zina mphepoyi imachititsa mvula igwe yoononga pomwe zina imachititsa ngamba 
  mneneri wa unduna wa zamalimidwe erica maganga adati mvula ikagwa mopitirira muyeso mbewu zimakokoloka pomwe kukachita ngamba mbewu zambiri zimalephera kucha 
  adati njira ziwirizi zimabweretsa vuto la njala umphawi mdziko amakhala opanda chakudya choti angagulitse athandizike 
  chaka chatha mbewu zambiri zidakokoloka madzi mvula itabwera moonjeza panthawi yochepa akatswiri adati sizidali zotsatira za mphepo ya el nino kwa nyengo 
  mneneri wa nthambi yoona za nyengo sute mwakasungula wati azitsatira zomwe nthambiyi ikunena mmene nyengo ikuyendera malangizo omwe nthambiyi ikupereka 
  adati mphekesera zina zomwe zimamveka pankhani yokhudza za nyengo zikhoza kusokoneza makamaka alimi omwe amakhala nkhawa mpamvu zipangizo zawo zikhoza kupita pachabe 
  nthambi yathu ili akatswiri omwe amadziwa momwe nyengo ikhalire amapereka malangizo zomwe angachite asakhudzidwe kwambiri azitsatira zimenezi adatero mwakasungula
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:

Text:
ntchito za wedewede zanyanya kusowa ndalama zoyendera zitukuko kulekera kumudzi kugwira ntchito zomangamanga zachitukuko kukuchititsa ntchitozi zizikhala zawedewede atero akadaulo 
  zikudza patangotha sabata imodzi chipinda cha sukulu ya pulaimale ya natchengwa ku zomba chitagwa kupha ophunzira 4 kuvulaza mwezi watha mlatho wina udadilizika galimoto ina ikudutsa akhala akugawana zithunzi za msewu wosalongosoka mumzinda wa lilongwe 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka zipinda za ku nantchengwa zzidamangidwa dothi komiti ya zomangamanga ku nyumba ya malamulo ili mphamvu zoyanganira kuunikira momwe nyumba misewu milatho zikumangidwira zizikhala zapamwamba zolimba 
  wapampando wa komitiyo victor white mbewe adati zambiri komitiyi imalephera kukwaniritsa ntchitoyi imalandira thumba losakwanira kuzungulira lonse kuyendera zitukuko 
  tikadakhala timalandira thumba lokwanira si bwenzi iyi ili nkhani bwenzi tikumayenda paliponse kukaona momwe zitukuko zikuyendera zitukuko zambiri zikumangidwa akudera osayenderedwa adatero mbewe 
  wa bungwe la akatswiri zomangamanga la malawi institute of architects mariam mdooko wavomeleza vuto lalikulu loti nyumba zambiri zimamangidwa osafunsa ukadaulo wa ozidziwa 
  pali sukulu zipatala malo bizinesi nyumba zina zimene zikumangidwa osatsata ndondomeko akadaulo timadziwa zofunika mamangidwe ake zambiri zimangomangidwa osatifunsa adatero mdooko 
  adati njira yokhayo yothanirana vutoli nkuonetsetsa ntchito yomanga isadayambike akadaulo kaya pakhonsolo mabungwe akuluakuluwa azifunsidwa 
  mneneri wa bungwe loyanganira ntchito zomangamanga mdziko muno la national construction industry council laison gideon adati nthambiyo ili malamulo omwe amayenera kutsatidwa pachiyambi mpaka kumapeto 
  malamulo athu amati kontilakitala akuyenera kulembetsa mkaundula wathu ntchito iliyonse isadayambe tiuzidwe tizitha kuyilondoloza timatero adatero gideon 
  adati ndondomeko sizitsatidwa zambiri amafuna kupanga zozemba sadziwa zotsatira zake zimakhala zovuta zomwe zimawonekazi 
  gulupu matabwa kwa t chitekwere ku lilongwe adati aphungu makhansala amaika dyera ndale patsogolo zomwe zimadzetsa zitukuko zawedewede zomwe zimathera mngozi ya ku zomba adati zina adindowa amadza kontilakita wawowawo mosemphana amene komiti yachitukuko idasankha 
  komiti imatha kugwirizana wodzagwira ntchito ya chitukuko ikakwana timangoona akubweretsapo munthu wawo timangozindikira katundu wafika ayamba kugwira ntchito idatero mfumuyo 
  bungwe loona maphunziro apamwamba la civil society coalition for education csce benedicto kondowe wati kafukufuku wawo adapeza madera ambiri omwe amadandaula aphungu amawabweretsera kontilakitala kuwagulira zipangizo osawafunsa maganizo 
  mlembi wamkulu muunduna wa za maboma angonoangono chitukuko cha mmidzi kiswell dakamau adati mundondomeko ya mphamvu ku boma lidakhazikitsa ndondomeko ya momwe akadaulo aboma aziyanganira momwe zitukuko zikuyendera zikutheka 
  adati akati mphamvu ku amangofuna eni dera azitengapo mbali posankha chitukuko kupeza malo kalondolondo wa momwe ndalama zachitukuko cha mdera lawo zikugwirira ntchito 
  zinthu zikuyenda mmadera ambiri kunena boma limalekerera kumudzi sizoona chitukuko chilichonse chomwe chalowa mmabuku athu chimakhala wochiyanganira pokhapokha sitikuchidziwa adatero dakamau 
  wa bungwe loyanganira za misewu emmanuel matabwa adati potsitira mgwirizano wa maiko sadc nthambiyi idasintha kasankhidwe ka makontirakitala ntchito 
  panopa kulibe zawedewede tidamanga mabauti kuyambira pakasankhidwe ka makontilakitala kuwapatsa mlingo omwe akutsatiradi zomwe tawauzazo adatero matabwa 
  adati chitsanzo cha misewu yotere wa mzuzu nkhatabay omwe uli milatho yolimba wotakasuka wopsinjidwa usadzaonongeke msanga

Text:
anatchezera wamboni msilamu zikomo anatchereza   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi ndinagwa mchikondi mtsikana wa mboni za yehova mpaka ndinamuchimwitsa moti ndikunena kuli mwana wamphongo makolo ake atamufunsa ananditchula ineyo atandiitana akwathu ndidavomera mlanduwo makolo mtsikanayu adati ndikufuna zithe ndilowe mpingo wawo asakandisumire kukhoti ndizisamalira mwana wangayo sindikufuna kulowa mpingowo mtsikanayu akuti akhoza kulola kulowa chisilamu makolo ake angalole kodi apapa ndiye nditani mwanayu ndizimusamalira popanda kulowa mumpingo wawowo kodi nditani mkaziyu ndimukwatire bj   lilongwe   bj mwazingwadi achimwene bj vuto lili apa loti inuyo simufuna kulolera zofuna za makolo mkazi munamuchimwitsayo mukufuna zanu ziyende basi sizikhala choncho mukafuna kulowa moyo wa banja kulolerana ndiye gwero la banja mkazi munamuchimwitsayo waonetsa kale chikondi chake kwa akulolera atha kukutsatirani ku chisilamu bola makolo ake amulole chikondi chanu nchoperewerako pangono mukumenyetsa nkhwanga pamwala simungayerekeze kulowa mpingo wa mkazi wanuyo mulungu baba mipingo ndiye njambirimbiri langizo langa apa loti zonse zimatha nkukambirana akuchikazi nawonso sakulolera zoti mwana wawoyo alowe chisilamu inuyo mmene mwakanira simungalowe mpingo wa mboni za yehova kwatsala njira imodzimuthabe kulowa mbanja akhale ufulu wokapemphera akufuna zikakaniza apo ndiy kaya ndakhala ndikunena zambiri banja si masewera pamakhala zambiri zofuna kutsatidwa musanalowane mukadya mfulumiza mavuto ake amakhala amenewa baba nzoona mungalephere kuthandiza mwana wanu kaamba ka kusiyana mipingo mwana adalakwa chiyani nzoona makolo mkazi akukuletsani kuthandiza mwana wanu kaamba koti simunalowe mpingo wawo chonde mwana yekhayo asavutike cha nkhani yanu muzimuthandiza mjira iliyonse makolo mkazi ndikhulupirira sadzaona cholakwika mwana wanu akamalandira thandizo kwa ake omubereka
