Text:
kusanthula chaka cha ulamuliro wa jb pamene lino mawa 7 april likhale likusangalala mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda watha chaka akulamulira ayamikira ulamuliro pomwe akuti palibe chimene wachita cholozeka akuti nkungoononga chuma polonza zisangalalo patsikuli 
  ndemangazi zikuchokera kwa osiyanasiyana wa bungwe loona ufulu wa atolankhani la media institute of southern africa misa malawi anthony kasunda wa bungwe loona za ufulu wa ogula la consumers association of malawi cama john kapito kadaulo zachuma nelson mkandawire mafumu 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mwa zina anthuwa akuti zina zina zayenda muulamuliro wa banda mwina mwina mwakhota kotero boma likuyenera kukonzamo 
  zina zomwe akuzidandaula kukwera mitengo kwa zinthu umphawi kusowa kwa chimanga mmisika ya admarc 
  kapito wati sakuona choti boma la banda lingamakumbukira kusangalalira patha chaka akulamula moyo wa amalawi uli pamoto 
  kusangalalira kusangalala atha chaka akulamula bola pasakhale zisangalalo sindikuona kanthu koti munthu ungasangalalire mwina atamasangalala tsiku limeneli adakwanitsa mtsogoleri wa watero kapito 
  wati umphawi wakula maka kumidzi kutenga boma kwa banda kudali kungosonkhezera mavuto 
  sitinganene boma lapita lija ndilo limakonza zinthu mavuto adaliponso ndalama zimapezeka ndiye mavuto osasimbika akutero kapito poonjezera 
  kasunda wati kudya mfulumira kunena zinthu zili mdziko muno mwina mukuyenera kukonzedwa 
  zinthu zidaipiratu muulamuliro wapita wa bingu wa mutharika idali ya mdima maka paufulu wa atolankhani momwe andale achitira zikuonetsa zomwe pulezidenti banda adalonjeza atangotenga lino zidali njerengo chabe 
  adanena mbc idzakhala yotumikira zomwe zikuchitika kutumikira boma chipani chake cha peoples party pp adatero kasunda 
  adatinso msonkhano wa atolankhani kukumakhala otsatira chipani omwe akumadzuma atolankhani akamafunsa mafunso 
  ndizo tidadandaula muulamuliro wa mutharika banda adatifunsa momwe akufunira msonkhanowu uzichitikira tidapereka maganizo athu pamsonkhanowu pasamakhale otsatira chipani zikuoneka zidalowa mmakutu osamva adatero 
  kasunda adathokoza bomali pochotsa msonkho panyuzipepala kuonetsa chidwi chochotsa gawo 46 la malamulo lino 
  gawoli limapereka mphamvu kwa nduna kutseka nyuzipepala wailesi awona zalakwitsa lamuloli kukweza msonkhowo zidadza muulamuliro wa mutharika amaona zikufinya ufulu wa atolankhani 
  mkandawire wati zinthu zasintha mwaubwino likuyenera kuyamika utsogoleri wa banda 
  adati muulamuliro wa mutharika mafuta ndalama zakunja zinkasowa iyi mbiri yakale 
  vuto lakuti amalawi sitiyamika akutero mkandawire zinthu zibwerere mchimake zimatenga njira yomwe boma latenga ithandiza tifike pomwe inde pali mwina moti mukonzedwe kasamalidwe ka chuma 
  t mwakaboko wa mboma la karonga wati zinthu zingapo zasintha zenizenizo sizidaoneke banda akungopitiriza zomwe mutharika adayamba 
  ziwawa zakula mdziko muno zomwe zikuchititsa aziphwanya ufulu wawo wochita zionetsero kumaononga katundu wa zikuyenera zichepe boma lichitepo kanthu akutero mwakaboko 
  charles kabaghe wochokera mmudzi mwa mukombanyama kwa t mwaulambia mboma la chitipa wati zinthu zankitsa muulamuliro wa banda 
  wati zinthu zikupezeka zokwera mtengo kwambiri munthu wakumudzi mtauni momwe sangakwanitse kugula 
  thumba la fetereza tikugula mokwera zedi akuti zinthu zomwe zimasowa zayamba kupezeka tikulephera kugula boma lichitepo kanthu mitengo ya zinthu itsike apo ayi tili pamoto tifa kumene adatero kabaghe 
  banda adati zinthu mdziko muno zasintha mokomera amalawi kupezeka kwa mafuta agalimoto ndalama zakunja ufulu wa atolankhani 
  msabatayi kudali manongonongo akumveka boma likufuna kukonza zisangalalo latha chaka zomwe kadaulo pazandale joseph chunga adati zosayenera 
  zisangalalozi zibwera pomwe amalawi akulira kukwera mitengo ya zinthu komwe kwadza kugwa kwa ndalama ya kwacha 
  mutharika adamwalira 5 april 2012 banda yemwe adali wachiwiri kwa mutharika pomwe amatisiya adalowa mmalo mwake 7 april adasankha khumbo kachali wachiwiri
Label: POLITICS

Text:
chimulirenji apempha nduna zipewe katangale by thokozani chapola ent uploads/2019/07 chimu.jpg alt= width="481 height="318 />wachenjeza nduna za boma chimulirenji wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino everton chimulirenji walangiza nduna achiwiri kwa nduna za boma apewe katangale ziphuphu 
 chimulirenji walankhula pamene amatsegulira maphunziro nduna za boma ku sunbird nkopola lodge mboma la mangochi walangizanso ndunazi zikhale chidwi maphunzirowa kaamba koti omwe awathandize kugwira ntchito yawo moyenera 
 nduna mugwire ntchito yanu modzipereka mupewe katangale ntchito yanu katangale mdani wa chitukuko anatero chimulirenji 
 polankhulapo nduna yowona za maboma aangono chitukuko cha kumudzi ben phiri wati amene apezeke akukhudzidwa katangale lamulo ligwira ntchito 
 nkhani yothetsa katangale si president yekha ayi ifeyo amene watikhulupilira tiyendetse naye limodzi lino amene apezeke akukhudzidwa katangale lamulo ligwire ntchito panopa pakufunika munthu akakhudzidwa katangale azichotsedwa ntchito osati kungomusintha malo ogwira ntchito anatero phiri 
 kumbali yake nduna yoona za ntchito martha lunji mhone chanjo wati maphunzirowa awathandiza kudzindikira ntchito yawo 
 nduna timakhala patsogolo kupanga ziganizo mmalo mwa choncho maphunzirowa atithandiza kuzama mmaganizidwe kudziwa ntchito yathu titumikire moyenera anatero chanjo 
 maphunzirowa omwe masiku awiri anayamba lolemba 15 july anatha lachiwiri 16 july 2019
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
csec yapempa university za malawi ziyambe kugwira ntchito pazokha bungwe lomenyera ufulu wa maphunziro mdziko muno la civil society for education coalition network lati kuchedwa kwa sukulu za ukachenjede zomwe anazichotsa university ya malawi ziyambe kugwira ntchito kukusokoneza maphunziro mdziko muno 
 wa bungweli benedicto kondowe omwe anena polankhula radio maria malawi 
 ati zokhumudwitsa boma silinasankhebe akuluakulu oyendetsa sukuluzi vice chancellor zomwe ati zikukhudza kaperekedwe ka maphunziro msukuluzi 
 tikudikira gawo lotsiriza ndondomekoyi gama polankhulapo wapampando wa university ya malawi mbusa dr billy gama wati pakadali akudikira gawo lotsilizira ma university amenewa akhale oyima pawokha kuyamba kugwira ntchito zawo 
 tikudikirabe gawo lotsiriza la zokonzekerazi lomwe limatchedwa commitment notice kaamba koti yomwe inapatsidwa mphanvu kupereka ku ministry of education tsopano ma college aja akonzeka bwinobwino akhonza kuyima pawokha anatero dr gama 
 mwazina ati akufuna akazagawa ma university wa adzakhale akonzeka kuziyimira pawokha kunja kwa lino choncho akuyenera zinthu dongosolo lake zikhale zapamwamba
Label: EDUCATION

Text:

 wa project ya climate challenge malawi programme kudzera ku bungwe la cadecom mercy chirambo anena pambuyo mkumano womwe nawo atolankhani cholinga chowazindikilitsa zaudindo wawo pothandiza kuzindikiritsa zakusintha kwanyengo chilungamo nkhani yakusintha kwa nyengo 
 chirambo ati ntchitoyi ikuyangana ngodya zomwe zithandize kwambiri kufuna kuchepetsa kwa nyengo kuonongeka kwa zachilengedwe mdziko muno 
 nyengo yasitha tinachiwona chanzeru tikhale mkumano atolankhani kaamba koti amene kuthekera kouza zakufunika kosamala zachilengedwe anatero chirambo mwazina ati lino likukumana mavuto ambiri omwe akudza kaamba kakusintha kwa nyengo kusowa kwa madzi zomwe zikubwezeretsa mbuyo ntchito za ulimi ambiri madalira mdziko muno 
 project ya climate challenge malawi programme kudzera ku mbungwe la cadecom ikugwira ntchito mmaboma zomba balaka machinga chikwawa

Text:
dpp madzi afika mkhosimuntali zipani zotsutsa zati nzodabwa boma lagundika kukweza ogwira ntchito mboma kulipira mafumu ino ya kampeni pamene mmbuyo monsemu akhala akudandaula samathandizidwa 
  mwezi umodzi wokha boma lakweza apunzitsi 20 000 apolisi 7 000 moti padakali lili mkati molipira mafumu 42 000 ndalama za miyezi 6 zomwe zidatsalira chaka chatha 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu otsutsa akuti chipani cha dpp chikunyengerera mafumu adzachivotere boma ligwiritsa ntchito k832 miliyoni polipira mafumuwo 
  zipani zotsutsa zati zikuona chipani cholamula cha democratic progressive dpp chikungofuna kugwiritsa ntchito ndondomeko zaboma pochita kampeni 
  mneneri wa boma henry musa adati sakuonapo vuto lililonse palibe lamulo lomwe limafotokoza yokwezera pantchito kulipira mafumu 
  ogwira ntchito mboma akhala akukwezedwa mafumu akhala akulipidwa mmaulamuliro onse omwe akhalapo 
  choseketsa nchoti palibe lamulo lomwe lifotokoza yokwezera ogwira ntchito kulipilira mafumu adatero mussa 
  mfumu chindi ya ku mzimba chadza ya ku lilongwe dambe ya ku neno yatsimikizira tamvani mafumu alandira mswahara wa june mpaka december 2018 
  mneneri wa unduna wa maboma angonoangono chitukuko cha mmidzi muhlabase mughogho adati ndalamazi nzomwe boma limayenera kuonjezera mswahara wa mafumuwo pomwe nyumba ya malamulo idakweza mswaharawo 
  nyumba ya malamulo idavomereza mswahara wa mafumu ukwere k100 k1 000 iliyonse kuyambira mwezi wa june mpaka december 2018 mafumu samalandira ndalama yoonjezerayo ndiye akupatsidwa adatero mughogho 
  mlembi wamkulu wa chipani cha utm patricia kaliati adati ndiwodabwa kuonjezera mswahara wa mafumu kutavomerezedwa aphungu adaika mbajeti ndiye nchifukwa chiyani samapatsidwa ndalama zonse apatu ndikuona boma limazunza dala mafumu pambuyo pake adzawatseke mmaso ya kampeni 
  uku nkulakwa panthawiyo akadatha kupanga ndondomeko zina adatero kaliati 
  adati ndiwokondwa mafumuwo alandira ndalama zawo zomwe adagwirira ntchito azilandira yolakwika 
  kaliati adati ndalamazo nzofunika kuonjezeranso nzochepa poyerekeza ntchito yomwe mafumu amagwira 
  mawuwa akugwirizana omwe adalankhula mtsogoleri wa chipani cha malawi congress mcp lazarus chakwera msonkhano wa ku kasiya mswahara wa mafumu ndiwofunika kuganiziridwa azipatsidwa yake 
  mneneri wa mcp maurice munthali adati zomwe zikuchitikazi zikusonyeza chipani cha dpp chapanikizika cholephera zinthu yake 
  kodi aphunzitsi amayenera kukwezedwa liti nanga mafumu amayenera kulandira liti ndalamazo panopa madzi mkhosi ndiye akufuna awanamize ayi sititero adatero munthali 
  adati aphunzitsi apolisi omwe akwezedwawo awonetsetse zofunikira zonse zatheka wina asadzawakanire mawa mafumu alandire ndalama zawo zisawasokoneze pokavota adatero munthali 
  mlembi wamkulu wa chipani cha united democratic front udf kandi padambo adati boma lifotokozere mafumu komwe kwachokera ndalamazo akhoza kumaona dpp ndiyo yapereka 
  katswiri ndale george phiri adati mussa akunena zoona palibe lamulo lofotokoza yokwezera munthu kumulipira malipiro ake pali ndondomeko zina zomwe zimayenera kutsatidwa zomwe akuona sizidatsatidwe 
  choyamba munthu amakwenzedwa akagwira ntchito 
  nzowona aphunzitsi apolisi onsewa akugwira ntchito yawo chachiwiri adziwa liti akuyenera kukwenzedwa ntchito adatero phiri 
  adati nkhaniyi ikapanda kuunikidwa idzabweretsa mavuto aakulu patsogolo makamaka sipakhala makalata umboni oti akukwezedwadi ntchito

Text:
ulemu ulibe mkazi kaya mwamuna ulemu khalidwe lofunika pamoyo wa munthu wina aliyensewamwamuna wamkazichoncho mtsogoleri wadziko lino sadaphonye kwenikweni masiku apitawa pomwe adakumbutsa amayi za kufunikira kwa ulemu pabanja 
  kungoti langizo labwinoli lidakhala lapotokera mbali imodzi ya amayi pomwe abambonso amayenera kuchitako mbali yawo popereka ulemu kwa akazi banja liyende 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kulankhula kotereku kungathe kupititsanso patsogolo maganizidwe aja oika udindo onse oonetsetsa banja lilimbe uli mdzanja la pomwe bambonso mbali yoti achite poonetsetsa banja liyende 
  kuphatikiza apo langizo lakukhala wa ulemu limodzi mwa malangizo omwe amayi akhala akuuzidwa kwa yaitali kuphatikizapo aja akukhala opirira omvera 
  kotero kufunikira kwa ulemu amayi ambiri akhonza akukudziwa kuposa abambo pachilangizo cha anamwali omwe atha msinkhu omwe akulowa mmbanja nkhani ya ulemuyi imanenedwa kwambiri 
  amayi enanso ulemuwu saumvetsetsa kotero akamenyedwa salandula konse mmalo mwake amapepesa owamenyayo ati ulemu zomwe zikuchititsa nkhanza za mbanja zisathe 
  choncho mmalo mowirikiza za kufunika kwa ulemu ndibwino titathandizana kumvetsetsa ulemu uli malire ati makamaka mokhudzana zinthu zomwe siziyenera kuchitika mbanja nkhanza 
  kuphatikiza apo atsogoleri angathandize poika mtima kwambiri pankhani zomwe zikubwenzera mmbuyo moyo wa amayi mabanja nkhani kulephera kwa amayi ambiri kudziimira paokha chuma 
  chiwerengero cha amayi omwe akungokhala kudikira athandizidwe abambo chikadali chokwera palinso amayi ambiri omwe akukakamira mabanja achizunzo podziwa akalituluka banjalo alibe mtengo ogwira kumbali ya kapezedwe ka chuma apa pakufunika kukonza 
  sindikuti amayi azichita mwano mmabanjamu mwano ngosathandiza pabanja ulemu ndiwofunika zedi ulemuwu tiumvetse uchokere mbali zonse ziwirimayi bambochifukwa wa ulemu sikufunika ukhale wa mkazi wamwamuna amafuna kupatsidwa ulemu

Text:
tb imakhudza ziwalo zonse kusiyana nthenda zina nthenda ya chifuwa chachikulu ya tb imakhudza chiwalo china chilichonse kupatula zikhadabo tsitsi watero woona za nthendayi ku unduna wa zaumoyo james mpunga 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu adati zili chomwecho tizilombo toyambitsa nthendayi totchedwa microbacterium timatha kulowa mchiwalo china chilichonse cha thupi 
  mpunga chofunika nkusadukiza mankhwala ichi nchifukwa chake zizindikiro zakenso zimakhala zochuluka mwachitsanzo kukhosomola kupweteka kwa pachifuwa zina kutulutsa makhololo magazi kutuluka thukuta makamaka usiku kutentha kwa thupi kupweteka kwa msana cha ichi kawirikawiri sikelo ya wodwala imatha kutsika mosavuta adatero 
  mpunga adati nthenda ya tb imaika pachiopsezo nthenda yosavuta kuchiza chachikulu kuyezetsa mwamsanga munthu ayambe kulandira mankhwala kumamwa mankhwala mosadumphitsa mosalekera panjira kufikira munthu atachira 
  adati cha ichi ochepa okha omwe amamwalira nthendayi nkhani imakhala kunyalanyaza chabe 
   munthu odumphizadumphiza kumwa mankhwala amakhala pachiopsezo chosadzachira mankhwalawa adatero 
  mpunga adaonjezanso munthu wodwala nthendayi amayenera kulandira chisamaliro choyenera odwala wina kuonjezera apa amayenera kupatsidwa upangiri wa momwe angamamwere mankhwala zomwe akuyenera asapatsire anzake omwe alibe nthendayi 
  adafotokoza wodwala nthendayi amayenera kumaphimba kukamwa pokhosomola sakuyenera kumakhala pamodzi mmalo othinana ndiopanda mazenera potero akhonza kupatsira enawo mosavuta 
  nthendayi yopeweka njira yodalirika kusapuma wa munthu yemwe nthendayi tizilombo toyambitsa nthendayi timafala mwachangu kudzera mumpweya omwe timapuma adatero
Label: HEALTH

   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kumsonkhano wa aford adachita kugona komweko pamene mchipani cha dpp akhala akunena peter mutharika apereke mpata kwa wachiwiri saulos chilima adzaimire chipanicho mtsogoleri wadziko linoyo wati zivute zitani adzaimirabe dpp ku chipani chachikulu chotsutsa boma cha mcp ndiye kokera kwako wayala nthenje pomwe mpaka lero sizikudziwika msonkhano waukulu uchitika liti akasankhe wochiimirira 
  chipani cha udf nacho kuli mkokemkoke pomwe mlembi wamkulu wachipanicho kandi padambo wati chipanicho chikhale msonkhano waukulu 1 august chipanicho chagwirizana atupele muluzi ndiye adzachitsogolere chonsecho lucius banda wakhala akunena akufuna kudzaimira chipanicho 
  njerengo zili ku aford komwe pofika lachinayi kudali ochitsogolera awiri enoch chihana frank mwenifumbo zidaliko lachiwiri kumsonkhano waukulu wa chipanicho pomwe adalephera kugwirizana woyenera kuvota ndani mbandakucha wa lachitatu otsatira mwenifumbo adamusankha mtsogoleri masana tsikulo otsatira chihana adamusankha ndiye mtsogoleri 
  chihana adati mwenefumbo amabweretsa mamembala dpp kumsonkhanowo akavotenayenso mwenefumbo adati chihana adafika amene maina mulibe kaundula wa chipanicho 
  uwu si msonkhano wa dpp iyi aford ndine wokonzeka kuwauza avote bolani akhale athu adatero chihana 
  mwenifumbo sadaimve aford si chipani cha banja chilichonse chizichokera kwa chihana basi 
  mutharika wanenetsa adzaimira dpp omwe akufuna chilima akuti maloto chabe mwa bon kalindo wati achita zotheka mutharika asaime chilima 
  tikukumana posakhalitsapa tilankhula zomwe takonza dziwani chilima ndiye atitengere kuchisankho kodi nchifukwa chiyani tizikakamirabe mutharika yemwe wakula akudabwa kalindo 
  mneneri wa dpp francis kasaila adati chipani chawo chikudziwa mutharika ndiye atengere chipanichi kuchisankho 
  mgwirizano wa zipani pamene mkokemkokewu ukupitirira zikuoneka zipani zikudzigulira malo polowa mumgwirizano 
  pofika mdziko lino kunja kumene wakhala zaka zinayi chichokere pampando adalandiridwa otsatira pp mcp amene adakumana nawo kwa mphindi 30 
  polankhula kwa banda adakwanitsa kupereka moni kwa mcp tilandirenso anzathu mcp amene tili nawo 
  mlembi wa mcp eseinhower mkaka adakana kuyankhapo za mgwirizano wa zipanizi ndisayankhe zimenezo nditsimikize athu adapita kukalandira mtsogoleri wakale wa lino joyce banda uwu ulemu wathu adali mtsogoleri wa lino adatero mkaka 
  malinga kadaulo zandale henry chingaipe nzosadabwitsa zipani za mcp pp zikhoza kulowa mumgwirizano 
  chisankho cha 2014 chisadachitike padali zingapo zoonetsa ubale wa chipani cha pp mcp sindikudabwa kumva zomwe zidachitika pamene banda amafika mdziko muno zingatheke adatero chingaipe 
  pachisankho chapadera cha makhansala chimene chidachitika mmadera miyezi ingapo yapitayo zipani za udf dpp zidayendera limodzi popatsana mpata mmadera amene mphamvu atapambana otsatira zipanizo amaimba nyimbo imodzi 
  chingaipe adati zikuoneka dpp udf angayendere limodzi mchisankhocho komabe wachenjeza udf uwu ungakhale ulendo wokutha makatani 
  dpp ikulamula kale angachite ubale ndiye udf itha kumezedwa zomwe zingazimitse banja la muluzi pankhani ya ndale atha mgwirizano asamale adaonjeza motero
Label: POLITICS

Text:

Text:
kutambasula nthenda ya kadzamkodzo kunjaku kuli nthenda zosiyanasiyana nthenda zina ukamva kudulitsa mutu wazizwa sabata yapitayi nduna ya zaumoyo dr peter kumpalume adatsogolera amalawi kutsegulira nyengo yokumbukira matenda kadzamkodzo fistula mboma la kasungu steven pembamoyo adachita chidwi nthendayi adacheza ndunayi yomweso idagwiraponso ntchito ya udokotala itambasule za nthendayi motere kumpalume kutsindika za vuto la kadzamkodzo anduna akudziweni 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka ndine dr peter kumpalume nduna ya zaumoyo phungu wa chipani cha democratic progressive party dpp kudera la kumadzulo kwa boma la blantyre ndagwirapo ntchito zachipatala mmadipatimenti osiyabnasiyana mdziko muno maiko akunja 
  kodi apa mukuti pakuchitika zokhudza kadzamkodzo chimenechi nchiyani iyi nthenda yoopsa kwambiri ambiri sazindikira nthenda imeneyi imagwira amayi mzimayi akagwidwa nthenda imeneyi moyo umasinthiratu amadutsa mchipsinjo chachikulu makamaka chosalidwa amayi anzake abambo apakhomo moti banja mpaka limatha 
  amasalidwa mnjira yanji matendawa opatsirana ayi matendawa si opatsirana amayamba malingana zichitochito zina pamoyo wa munthu makamaka pazokhudzana uchembere amagwidwa matendawa malingana momwe wayendetsera moyo wa uchembere palibe mwayi woti wina akagwidwa akhoza kupatsira anzake ayi 
  ndiye chomusalira nchiyani poyamba mukuyenera kumvetsetsa nthendayi nthenda yanji imachita zotani imeneyi nthenda yokhudza njira ya amayi pazifukwa zina njirayi imapezeka yabooka ndiye mkodzo ukamabwera umangodutsa nkumachucha mwinanso nkusakanikirana chimbudzi pachifukwachi mzimayi amamveka fungo kwambiri moti pagulu la anzake amasowa mtendere anzake amamuthawa chomwechomwechonso abambo amatha kupirira kwa kanthawi pena amatopa nkuchoka pakhomopo si nkhani yamasewera ayi makamaka kwa yemwe wagwidwa matendawo 
  mwangoti pazifukwa zina kodi simungatambasuleko zina mwa zifukwazo ndikufotokozerani zifukwa zomwe zikuluzikulu muno mmalawi pali uchembere olawirira munthu akatenga pakati wamngono ziwalo zake zimakhala sizidakhwime ndiye chokakamiza pobereka vuto lotere likhoza kubwera njira ina nkubereka pafupipafupi ziwalo zimatopa mpaka imadzakwana yoti vuto laonekera njira ina kukonda kuchirira kwa azamba pakabwera vuto panthawi yochira azamba amalephera machitidwe ake 
  ndiye mwati vutoli lalikulu mdziko muno palibe njira yothandizira amayi oterewa njira ilipo yomwe nkuthamangira kuchipatala basi mdziko muno muli zipatala zingapo komwe kuli madipatimenti othandiza pavutoli ambiri amatsogoza matendawa amabwera kaamba kolodzana moti amataya nkumayendayenda mwa asinganga mmalo moti athamangire kuchipatala akalandire thandizo zinthu zisadafike poipitsitsa 
  nanga kungoti zipatala osatiuzako kuli zipatalazo zina mwa zipatala zomwe zikupereka nawo thandizo kwa amayi omwe nthendayi queen elizabeth central hospital quech mumzinda wa blantyre zomba central hospital ku zomba bwaila ku lilongwe mzuzu central hospital monkey bay

Text:

  malingana wachiwiri wa mneneri wa nthambi yoona za olowa kutuluka mdziko muno wellington chiponde chiwerengero cha oterewa chimasinthasintha kaamba koti yemwe wakonzeka amatuluka nkumanka kwawo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mwa olowa mdziko muno popanda chilolezo atawagwira ku nkhata bay mwa anthuwa amadzionera yekha chochita abwerere kwawo boma siliperekapo chilichonse kupatula kuwadyetsa kuwasunga pamalo okhazikika omwe nkundendeko adatero chiponde 
  adati anthuwa sakhala kundendeko akayidi njira yowathandizira malo okhala chakudya poyembekezera azipita kwawo akakonzeka polingalira lino lilibe malo osungirako nzika za maiko zolowa mdziko muno popanda chilolezo 
  chiponde adati malamulo amalola oterewa kusungidwa mndende kwa sabata ziwiri zokha ikakwana nthawiyi amafunsidwa apeza njira yopitira kwawo njirayo sidapezeke amawapatsanso masiku kufikira pomwe adzakonzeke kubwerera kwawo 
  si nkhanza ayi malamulo amatero nzika ya lina si yoyenera mdziko muno popanda chilolezo pazifukwa zingapo mudziwa boma limayenera kupanga ndondomeko ya zinthu zambiri chitetezo mankhwala chakudya zina 
  ndondomeko imeneyi iyende boma limayenera kudziwa chiwerengero cha omwe mdziko nchifukwa chake othawa nkhondo odzausa mwandondomeko amakhala zowayenereza amakhala malo awoawo adatero chiponde 
  adati malamulo oterewa mdziko lililonse maiko malo akeake osungirako oterewa poti lino likadalibe malowa limasunga anthuwa mndende 
  potsirapo ndemanga pankhaniyi mneneri wa zandende mdziko muno smart maliro adati ichi nchipsinjo chachikulu kwa akuluakulu oyanganira za ndende polingalira amayenera azidyetsa kuyanganira anthuwa kufikira pomwe adzatuluke 
  naye adati chiwerengero cha anthuwa chimasinthasintha kutengera momwe akulowera kutuluka zonse zimatengera nthambi yoona za olowa nkutuluka anenanji 
  timangolandira nkusunga anthuwa zonse amayendetsa anthambi yoona za olowa nkutuluka mdziko sikuti anthuwa omangidwa ayi nkhawa yathu imangokhala pachisamaliro zonse zimagwera 
  mwachitsanzo timayenera kupeza malo oti akhalepo chakudya poti chiwerengero cha mndende chimakwera zinthu madzi zina zimagwira ntchito kwambiri ndiye mabilu nawo amakwera adatero maliro 
  nawo oyanganira za maufulu ati zomwe amaona olowa mdziko mwachinyengowa nzopweteka zowaphwanyira ufulu kaamba koti amasungidwa mmalo oyenera omangidwa 
  wa bungwe la centre for human right and rehabilitation chrr timothy mtambo adati ndende za mdziko muno zili mbiri zosakhala makamaka pankhani yothithikana zaumoyo kuvuta kwa chakudya 
  mkuluyu adaona kusunga anthuwa mmalo amenewa nkuwalakwira kwambiri potengera malamulo zaufulu wa padziko lonse 
  kumeneko nkulakwa anthuwa sadamangidwe ayi akungoyenera kutumizidwa kwawo basi osati mpaka kumasungidwa mndende azengedwa mlandu nkumangidwa adatero mtambo 
  adati njira yabwino nkumanga malo osungirako oterewa poyembekeza azinka kwawo momwe zilili mmaiko 
  nduna ya zamdziko jappie mhango adati ganizo lomanga malo osungilako anthuwa labwino makamaka pankhani yachitetezo adati pakalipano palibe mapulani otere polingalira mavuto zachuma omwe mdziko muno 
  maganizo abwino kwambiri anthuwa amachokera kosiyanasiyana ndiye sitinganeneretu moyo wawo wotani mwina adali zigawenga zikuluzikulu kwawo akhoza kuphunzitsa omwe mndende adatero mhango 
  adati mtsogolo muno zinthu zikadzayamba kuyenda boma lidzaganizirapo mwina lidzamange malo osungirako anthuwa azikakhala kwaokha

  akuti ndidzamukwatire iyeyo basi zikomo agogo anga adasiyana ukwati adakwatirana mkazi wina yemwe analinso ana mwa anawo wamkazi ndamulera mpaka kusukulu ya ukachenjede kumene akuphunzira panopa 
  vuto langa nali iyeyo akuti sakufuna adzamve zoti ndakwatira mkazi wina amandikonda kwambiri adati adzamuikira chiphe mkazi amene ndingadzakwatire 
  iyeyo akuti bunthu akuti sadzalola mwamuna kudzamuyamba ndekha iyeyotu amati palibe chibale pakati iyeyo ndichitenji td lilongwe 
  td ndanena banja sakakamiza chikondi chili fupa ukakakamiza mphika umasweka apatu mlongo wanuyo ayenera palibe angakakamize wina kukonda mnzake mapeto ake ngozi

Text:
tidadziwana tili ana mtolankhani wa za masewero ku wailesi ya voice of livingstonia vol sylvester siloh kapondera adakumana wokondedwa annie chivunga kalasa ana mboma la kasungu 
  apatu nkuti kapondera zaka 11 mchaka cha 2001 ankacheza achimwene namwali wakeyu panthawiyo nkuti kalasa naye wachichepere kwambiri 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ubwenzi wa anawatu udali kwambiri nawo makolo adali anansi pomwe onse ankaphunzitsa sukulu ya mwimba mboma la kasungu 
  siloh annisha zidayamba chibwana patadutsa zaka zingapo anthuwa adatayana pomwe adalowera malo osiyana 
  mudali mchaka cha 2013 pomwe ndinkagwira ntchito kuwailesi ya tigabane pomwe ndidayamba kumufuna namwaliyu panthawiyo nkuti akuchita maphunziro ake auphunzitsi ku nkhamenya mboma la kasungu adalongosola kapondera 
  adalongosola atamuona kalasa mtima udatumphatumpha mpaka kupempha nambala yake ya lamya yomwe adapatsidwa mosavuta adali kale anansi 
  nditabwerera ku mzuzu ndidayamba kuchezetsa ndidamuuza chikondi komabe ndidakanidwa ndidayesetsa zidavuta kenako ndekha kudandivuta ndidapeza mkazi wina komabe mtima wanga umakumbukirabe annie adatero kapondera 
  mwatsoka adasiyana mkazi winayo kapondera sadaupeze kubwerera kwa kalasa komwe mtima udali 
  nditasiyana mkazi winayo kumayambirilo kwa 2017 sindidachedwe kupitaso kwa kalasa komwe malingaliro anga adali apaso nayeso sadachedwe kundisekerera nkundilora ataona zoti sindimafuna kupanga naye chibwenzi wamba ubwezi woti timange banja adalongosola kapondera 
  komatu ubwenzi wa awiriwa wakumana zokhoma zosiyanasiyana kupekeredwa nkhani mwa zina 
  chomwe chidandikopa kwambiri kwaiye ndichoti kupatula kuwala kwa namwaliyo khalidwe lwabwino ofatsa komaso okonda kuseka moti sindimavutika kupeze nkhani yoseketsa kwambiri mwina ndioneko mano ake adatero kapondera 
  adati chikondi chawo chimalimba chokhulupilirana komaso kulemekezana kumvetsetsana polankhulapo kalasa adati adamukonda kapondera ankamuonetsera chikondi 
  kalasa adati kapondera amakondedwa abale ake 
  ukwati wa awiriwa uliko april 28 kuholo ya sukulu ya sekondale ya katoto 
  kapondera mwana wachiwiri kubadwa mbanja la ana asanu pomwe kalasa mzime mbanja la ana 6

 wati ankhristu atengere chitsanzo cha batumeyo wankhungu yemwe anachiritsidwa ku vuto losaona atakhulupilira yesu khristu choncho wapempha ankhristu azikhala chidwi choitana yesu khristu awachiritse ku nthenda mavuto omwe akukumana nawo potengera chisanzo cha batumeyo yu

Text:

Text:

Text:

Text:
mtima pansiapm amalawi adali chiyembekezo choti aona kwakukulu pachuma zina zina zokhudza moyo wawo pambuyo kulumbiritsidwa kwa boma latsopano lotsogozedwa pulezidenti peter arthur mutharika chipani chake cha dpp asathamange magazi sizitheka lero lero 
  zili choncho mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika lachiwiri adati aphungu nyumba ya malamulo sakambirana ndondomeko ya chuma cha lino bajeti yomwe imayenera kuyamba 1 july 2014 mpakana 31 june 2015 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc polankhula koyamba mtsogoleri wa lino mnyumbayo mutharika adati mmalo mwake ndondomekoyi adzaikambirana mwezi wa august pofuna kupereka mpata woti boma liunike bwinobwino kunthambi zosiyanasiyana zinthu zofunika mundondomekoyi 
  adati mmalo mwake aphungu angokambirana za ndondomeko ya chuma chapadera chomwe boma ligwiritse ntchito kuyambira mwezi wa july mpakana september 2014 
  gawo 178 la malamulo oyendetsera lino limalola ndondomeko yongoyembekezerayi tinali yochepa yokonza ndondomeko ya chaka chonse tiyenera kuunikira ndalama zomwe zatsala kuthunba la boma tisanakonze ndondomekoyi adatero mutharika 
  nduna ya zachuma goodall gondwe akuyembekezeka kukapereka ndondomeko yoyembekezerayi sabata ya mawa 
  tikapereka ndondomekoyi tikhala tikufunsa zimene akufuna tiganizire mundondomeko ya chuma ya chaka chonse adatero gondwe 
  mwa zina amalawi ambiri chidwo chawo chagona poti boma la mutharika litsitsa liti mitengo ya malata simenti osauka amene akugona nyumba zofoleredwa udzu zozira donthi nawo athe zofolera malata zasimenti pansi 
  pokopa adzachivotere chipanichi panthawi ya kampeni zisankho zisadachitike may 20 2014 akuluakulu adalonjedza amalawi chipani cha dpp chikadzakhalanso mboma chimodzi mwa zinthu zoyambirira pofuna kutukula miyoyo ya amalawi ku kutsitsa mitengo ya malata simenti azigona mnyumba yoyenerera 
  akatswiri mnthambi zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno ati boma lingachite pachitukuko cha litatsata zomwe mutharika adanena potsegulira nyumbayo 
  akatswiriwa ati mutharika adanena zabwino zokhudza chitukuko sadatambasule momwe mfundozo bioma lidzakwaniritsire 
  zina mwa zomwe akatswiriwa ayamikira zotukula ntchito za umoyo ulimi maphunziro ati sizikutambasula mmene zidzayendere 
  dalitso kubalasa mwa akatsiwiriwa yemwe wa bungwe la malawi economic justice network lomwe ntchito yake kuona mmene boma likuyendetsera chuma chipindulire wati boma lakhazikitsa zabwino kwambiri lalephera kufotokozera amalawi mmene zidzayendetsedwere 
  mfundozi ndizabwino kwambiri pachitukuko cha lino nzosangalatsa mtsogoleri akudziwa za mavuto omwe alipo pachuma zili choncho pali zina zofunika kuwongoledwa zigwire ntchito yake adatero kubalasa pocheza tamvani lachiwiri lapitali 
  pankhani za umoyo mutharika adati mwa zina boma lidzakhazikitsa chisamaliro chapadera cha ogwira ntchito mboma lidzatukula miyoyo ya ogwira ntchito mboma pakakwenzedwe pantchto malipiro 
  wa bungwe loona ntchito za umoyo zikufikira onse mofanana la malawi health equity network mhen martha kwataine akuti boma laganiza pokhazikitsa chisamaliro chapadera cha ogwira ntchito mboma wadzudzula silidatambasule makamaka yomwe ntchitoyi idzayambe 
  zomwe takhala tikumenyerera kwa yaitali apa boma laganiza kwambiri makamaka pakulonjeza kutukula miyoyo ya ogwira ntchito za chipatala 
  chomwe ndingapemphe boma kutambasula bwinobwino yomwe zidzayambe kusiyana azingokhala mumdima adatero kwataine 
  mutharika adatinso boma lidzalimbikitsa ntchito zotukula achinyamata pokhazikitsa malo ophunzitsa achinyamata ntchito zosiyanasiyana azikhala odzidalira paokha 
  nduna yakale ya zachuma mathews chikaonda adati boma likuyeneranso kubwera poyera mmene ntchito yotukula achinyamatayi idzakhalire 
  adati achinyamata ofunika kwambiri pachitukuko cha mdziko choncho nkofunika patsogolo ntchito zowatukula

Text:

Text:

Text:

   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu inde pamtendere pamavuto moyo wabwino matenda sadzasiyana awa ndiwo adali malonjezo pakati gray iness omwe amachokera ku bembeke mboma la dedza onse bizinesi mumzinda wa lilongwe amayimbira limodzi kwaya ku mtima woyera parish ya mpingo wa katolika mumzinda wa lilongwe 
  gray akuti ulendo udayamba mchaka cha 2009 awiriwa atakumana kutchalitchi gray sadafune kuchedwa kufunsira pomwepo akuti sizidayende 
  adandiyankha ndisadzayerekeze kumulankhulanso za nkhaniyo sindikadakwanitsa kutero mtima wanga udali ndidapitiriza kutchetcherera mpaka april 2012 mpomwe adandilola adatero gray 
  gray iness kupsopsonana patsikulo adati atangomva oti ndavomera adamva wanyamula lonse mmanja mwake mtima ukudumphadumpha uku mmasaya muli chimwemwe chokhachokha 
  akuti adakhala pachibwenzi mpaka mchaka cha 2014 mwezi wa november pomwe awiriwa adapanga malonjezano oyamba pachinkhonswe adagwirizana zaka zina ziwiri asadapange ukwati akonzekere mokwanira 
  kuchoka apo tinkakonzekera ukwati wathu tonse tidaikapo mtima mpakana zonse zidatheka 4 june 2016 tidakadalitsira ku mtima woyera madyerero adali kubwalo la st peters anglican ku lilongwe adatero gray

Text:

  mavuto tsopano aziyenda kuchoka ku chirimba ndirande chilomoni kupita kuja koonekera ku chichiri yalakwa adatero abiti patuma 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu apatu khoswe pamkhate ndani angaope kuswa mkhate lero ndani lero angaloze uwo mkhate kuuswa basi tisachedwe anyamata olangika zotsatira za mkalabongo nkhani idazunguza wenela ya zochitika ku polisi palibe gulu la masiye 
  ndikumva nkhani ikuvuta ya kulimbana pankhani ya kamuleni kaduwa udadili issa omwe anenetsa libolonje lalowa ku polisi palibe ku dizilo petulo palibe adatero gervazzio wapamalopo 
  abodza amenewo kodi onsewo ndimayesa adali zipani zawo lero akudzetsa mpungwepungwe kwa adona hilida kodi kaduwa suja adazunguza mpando wamkulu pdm yake nanga uyu issa sankati tonse amaravi adayankha abiti patuma

  .amatigoneka kukada amatidzutsa kukacha amatidyetsa tikamva njala ili pemphero limene lalowerera paliponse pamene kulira njala kwafika pena kugona kumsika ugule chimanga kuotha dzuwa komweko mpaka ya nkhomaliro opanda chakudya

Text:
ndithu chili mwini kusankha balaba kumukana yesu   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu usapange mistake chonde chonde nyimbo ya evans meleka idali kuphulika wenela tsiku limenelo 
  ya ndirande iyi machinjiri inayo za lilongwe mpaka ku area 18 mwinamo abale anzanga pali dera limene latchuka zedi zaka zimenezi ndiye area 18 pajatu nanenso mizu yanga ili ku upper area 18 inde kuja kwa senti chomwe ndimadabwa nchoti akaphika nsima imakoma muli kale soya pieces 
  abale soya akanakhalako khalidwe akanangosankha chimodzi soya yemweyo akukonza mkaka soya yemweyo akukonza masoseji akanakhala khalidwe soyayu 
  kumukana yesu kufuna balaba nyimboyi idavuta kwambiri wenela tsiku limenelo potengera zija zidaachitika kwa chinsapo atitu kumeneko chigandanga china chotchedwa balaba chidaphedwa nkuvulidwa chinochino 
  ya ndirande iyi ya machinjiri iyo ya ku area 18 inayo oopsa uyu apolisi amamuopa moti akakanena kupolisi balaba akuwasautsa apolisiwo amaneneratu mukamugwira balaba mumubweretse kuno mpake anthuwo anamupititsa balaba wakufa kupolisiko adatero abiti patuma 
  kusankha balaba kumukana yesu usapange mistake chonde chonde ndangomva wina wa kampani ya alonda wapeza tender yolondera polisi ya wenela zisatikhudze adatero wa pamalopo gervazzio 
  gervazzio adayatsa kanema padali mbc tv adabwera jeffrey kapusa adali kuulutsa nkhani ya mwana wina amene adagwiriridwa apolisi amene amayenera kumuthandiza sanatero msungwana kumangolira 
  ogwirira anawa tikadatha kuwatchula zitsiru sititero mawuwo siwoyenera kuwatchula pagulu choncho tingoti wopusa si zitsiru ayi kapusa adali kutero mr splash ake mkamwa adatulukira moya pete 
  ndakwiya khwambiri zitsiru ndinu zitsiru kwambiri zitsiru zakumwa madzi wochapira ndevu adali kutero moya pete 
  kenako adatenga cholembera nkulemba pamalaya gervazzio chitsiru
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
kudali ku sitolo ya peoples   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu khalidwe la gift simkonda lokonda kukagula katundu kusitolo ya peoples kwa magalasi ku ndirande mumzinda wa blantyre mchaka cha 2010 lidathera kwa mnyamatayu kuzulamo nthiti yake eunice chingoni 
  panthawiyo nkuti eunice akugwira ntchito ya till msitolomo pamene gift adali akugwira ntchito ku sitolo za dapp wophunzitsa za mmene angamachitile malonda ku ndirandeko 
  malinga eunice zonse akaona gift akulowa musitoloyo mtima umakankha mwazi mwaliwiro kulakalaka mnyamatayu atadzakhala wakumkeka poti mkazi sakadalankhula kotero amayesetsa kumuchitira mkomya musitolo momwemo pomudindira kumulongezera mnyamatayu katundu mujumbo akagula katundu 
  banja la simkonda tsiku la ukwati zinkandiwawa gift akapita podinditsira mitengo pamunthu wina ndinkadziwa sindimva ake sandiona adatero eunice 
  adati chimene chinkamuzula moyo kwambiri mwa gift lilime lake la chitumbuka maonekedwe ake ofatsa kuumbidwa kwa mnyamatayu 
  naye gift adati mtima udayamba kuthawathawa mmalo netiweki ya lamya za mmanja atasiyanitsa umunthu nthandayi idali nayo makasitomala kufikira pamene naye adayamba kudyerera maso padonalo 
  gift adati kupatula kudzichepetsa nsangala zimene zidakuta wakumkeka wakeyu mnyamatayotu akutinso ankakopeka dzino logamphuka limene lili mkamwa mwadonalo limene limaonekera akamamwetulira 
  nditayizindikira nyenyeziyi sindidachedwe kupatsana nayo nambala ya foni patadutsa masiku tidagwirizana tikumane ndikatule nkhawa zanga adatero gift 
  gift akuti adakhumudwa ataponya khoka lake la chikondi mudziwe la chikondi la njoleyi pamene duwali lidatemetsa nkhwangwa pamwala silikufuna kugwa mchikondi 
  ndidakana dala pansi pamtima ndinkadziwa ndikumufuna ndinkafuna kuonetsetsa kuya kwa chikondi chake paine pakutha miyezi iwiri pamene ndidampatsa makiyi mtima wanga adatero eunice 
  nkhani ya awiriwa itafika mmakwawo akufuna akwatirane idautsa mapiri pachigwa akwawo kwa eunice mngoni sankafuna akwatirane mtumbuka akwawo kwa gift sankafuna mwana wao akwatirane mngoni 
  awiriwa adati zidali zopweteka kwambiri dzino lobooka kuzimvetsetsa asakwatirane cha kusiyana chilankhulo 
  pafupifupi chaka chinadutsa akwathu atatisiyanitsa sitidakhale chete tidayetsetsa kuwaunikira chikondi adalenga mulungu mulunguyo mphamvu yolumikizanitsa amitundu yosiyanasiyana ndikukhala thupi limodzi tidali okondwa ambali zonse ziwiri atatimvetsetsa ndikutilola titengane adatero gift 
  awiriwa adamangitsa woyera august 4 2013 mwana wongani amene akwanitse chaka chimodzi chaka chino banjali likukhala ku zomba kumene eunice akugwira ntchito ku sitolo ya peoples ya matawale pamene gift akugwira ku dapp ya mumzinda wa zomba
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
amanga ogulitsa chamba wolemba joseph mkango apolisi ku zalewa mboma la neno amanga abambo awiri atawapeza chamba cholemera makilogalamu 10 
  minda ya chamba iyi njoletsedwa malinga wapolisi wofufuza nkhani zosiyanasiyana james kancheka awiriwo john tamani wa zaka 27 james chibani wa zaka 34 omwe ndiwochokera kwa mmudzi mwa zalewa kwa t symon mbomalo 
  ndiwo adatsina khutu apolisi ponena awiriwa amagulitsa chamba wogulitsa chamba ukusokoneza mpaka kusiya sukulu panjira akupenga nacho kumene adatero kancheka

Text:
papa wasankha archbishop giordana awunike ofesi ya tchalitchi cha st peters basilica mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wasankha woti awunike momwe ofesi yomwe imayanganira tchalichi lalikulu la saint peters basilica izigwirira ntchito zake 
 malinga malipoti vatican radio papa wasankha archbishop mario giordana agwire ntchitoyi 
 malipoti akuti mwazina archbishop giordana awunika malamulo omwe ofesi yomwe imayanganira tchalichi lalikulu la saint peters basilica izigwiritsa ntchito 
 archbishop giordana agwira ntchitoyi commissioner wapadera extraordinary commissioner mothandizana bungwe lomwe alikhazikitse ofesi yomwe imayanganira tchalichi lalikulu la saint peters basilica amayitchula the fabric of saint peter fabbrica di san pietro zina mwa ntchito zake kuonetsetsa tchalitchi la saint peters basilica likusamalidwa kukonza zomwe sizili mtchalichili maintainance 
 lolemba 1 june 2020 likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku vatican linatulutsa kalata yonena za lamulo la tsopano lomwe papa francisco adakhazikitsa lothandiza kuteteza chuma ku likulu la mpingowu momwe ma kampani ogwira ntchito likulu la mpingowu azisankhidwira 
 malinga kalatayo ma kampani ofuna kugwira ntchito likulu la mpingowu azipikisana azisankhidwa potsata ndondomeko zokhazikika zizichitika poyera popewa chinyengo china chilichonse 
 likulu la mpingo wa katolika vatican lomwe loima lokha linakhazikitsa lamuloli lomwe lili mitu 86 mogwirizana za bungwe la united nations zolimbina wa ziphuphu katangale
Label: RELIGION

Text:
500 000 sadalembetse zotsatira za kalembera wachisankho mgawo loyamba lachiwiri zasonyeza 468 860 omwe amayenera kulembetsa sadalembetse nawo mkaundulayo 
  malingana zotsatira zochokera ku bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec mgawo loyamba 1 094 269 amayenera kulembetsa 798 351 ndiwo adalembetsa kuimirira 73 100 aliwonse 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mgawo lachiwiri 1 048 080 ndiwo amayenera kulembetsa 875 138 okha ndiwo adalembetsa kuimirira 83 100 aliwonse ofunika kulembetsa 
  apa zikutanthauza mmagawo onse awiri 2142 349 ndiwo amayenera kulembetsa mmalo mwake 1 673 489 ndiwo adalembetsa kutanthauza otsala osalembetsa mmagawowa 468 860 
  mwa omwe adalembetsawa 901 060 amayi pomwe 771 922 abambo chiwerengerochi sichidasangalatse chipani chachikulu chotsutsa cha malawi congress mcp bungwe lowona za ufulu wa la centre for human rights and rehabilitation chrr 
  mcp chrr adapempha bungwe la mec liganizire kudzabwereza kalembera mmaboma omwe mudachitika kalemberayu mmagawo awiriwa omwe adatsalirawa adzapeze mpata wolembetsa 
  mneneri wa mcp rev maurice munthali adati kalemberayo ngoyenera kuchitikanso mmaboma omwe adakhudzidwa omwe sadalembetse wochuluka kwambiri 
  sitingasiye onsewa osalembetsa ayi ndiye sitikudziwa chomwe tikupanga mec ikuyenera kudzabwerera mmaboma omwe akukhudzidwa mmagawo amenewa adatero munthali 
  wa bungwe la chrr timothy mtambo adati potengera kulemekeza ufulu wa mpoyenera kalembera adzabwerezedwe mmaboma okhudzidwawa 
  maufulu osiyanasiyana umodzi mwa maufuluwo otenga nawo mbali posankha atsogoleri momwe tikuyembekezera chaka cha mawachi apapa zikuonetseratu ambiri sadalembetse kotero ufulu wawo odzasankha atsogoleri waphwanyidwa adatero mtambo 
  wa mec jane ansah adati kalembera mmagawo oyambirirawa adavuta adali asadamve mauthenga bwinobwino padali mavuto okhudzana zipangizo zomwe zimafaifa adati mavutowa adatha 
  adapempha mabungwe zipani zandale zichilimike kumema kukalembetsa mkaundula akavote nawo chaka cha mawa pachisankho cha patatu 
  wa bungwe loona zisankho zikuyenda la malawi electoral support network mesn steve duwa adagwirizana ansah mabungwe zipani zandale athandizirepo kwambiri kumema kukalembetsa chisankho cha chaka chamawa chidzakhale chatanthauzo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
papa wati moyo mphatso ya mtengo wapatali mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wati moyo mphatso ya mtengo wa patali 
 papa francisko malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa walankhula uthenga kwa ma episkopi ku united kingdom ireland tsiku lomwe akhristu mpingowu amakondwerera mphatso ya mtengo wa patali ya moyo 
 uthengawo wati pozindikira moyo mphatso ya mtengo wapatali akuyenera kulemekeza ulemelero wa munthu 
 kusankha moyo ndiye mutu wa chikondwerero cha chaka chino

Text:
tambala wameza chimanga kusadabuzika kwa chipani cha dpp chisankho chapadera kukutanthauza amalawi atopa ulamuliro wa chipanicho akadaulo ndale atero 
  malinga zotsatira za bungwe loyendetsa chisankho la malawi electoral commission mec pachisankho chapadera chimene chidachitika lachiwiri mmadera phungu atatu makhansalanso atatu chipani cha mcp chidasesa mipando yonse ya phungu iwiri ya khansala pomwe chipani cholamula cha dpp chidapeza mpanda wa khansala umodzi 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka otsatira mcp kusangalala mumzinda wa blantyre akadaulo pankhani za ndale henry chingaipe mustapha hussein paokhapaokha adati kusakwaniritsa malonjezo amene dpp idapanga pachisankho cha 2014 ndizo zapangitsa ade nacho kukhosi 
  hussein adati zikutanthauza sakukhutira chipani cholamula cha dpp chimene wati sichikukwaniritsa malonjezo ake pachisankho cha 2014 
  amalawi sakukhutira momwe dpp ikuyendetsera zinthu chipanicho sichisintha adzaona zakuda 2019 adatero hussein 
  zotsatira za chisankhochi zikudza pamene gulu lofufuza momwe ndale zina zikuyendera africa la afro barometer litatulutsa kafukufuku wawo amene amasonyeza chisankho chitachitika lero amalawi angavotere mcp pamene amati ataya chikhulupiriro mwa dpp 
  kafukufukuyu atatuluka chipani cha dpp chidatsutsa chidati sangayiwale ntchito zabwino zomwe akuchitira amalawi 
  hussein wati zotsatira za chisankhochi zikuphera mphongo kafukufukuyo vuto chipani cha dpp chimakonda kutsutsa akuyenera kusinkhasinkha zomwe zachitikazi adaonjeza 
  naye chingaipe akuti chisankhochi uthenga atopa ntchito za dpp adati chisankhochi chili mpeni wa nsengwa wothwa konsekonse 
  2014 dpp idalonjeza zambiri kuthana mavuto kuzimazima kwa magetsi kusowa kwa madzi ziphuphu nkhani za umoyo mpaka lero palibe chachitika 
  lero amalawi apereka uthenga womveka ku boma sasamala aika chikhulupiriro chawo chipani cha mcp adatero chingaipe 
  mneneri wa boma nicholas dausi adati avomereza agonja ayi tivomere tagonja ndewu nkhondo sitidagonje adatero dausi 
  adati abwerera kwa amalawi amve pakhota nyani mchira mpaka ziwavute choncho 
  wachiwiri kwa mlembi wa mcp eisenhower mkaka wati ichi chizindikiro chipanichi chidaberedwa mavoti chisankho cha 2014 
  mwaona nokha zotsatira tanthauzo 2014 adatibera mavoti tili chiyembekezo 2019 chipani chathu chidzapambana adatero mkaka 
  polengeza wa bungwe loyendetsa chisankho la mec jane ansah lachitatu adalengetsa zotsatira za chisankho chapadera chomwe chidachitika mmadera atatu 
  chipani cha mcp chidapeza mipando ya kumpoto kwa lilongwe msozi komwe adapambana sosten gwengwe kumwera cha kummawa kwa mzinda wa lilongwe kumene adatola chikwama ulemu msungama pomwe lawrence sitolo adatenga mpando wa ku nsanje lalanje 
  chipanicho chidazomolanso mipando ya khansala wa kuwodi ya mtsiriza ku lilongwe komwe adapambana kingwell zikaola kuwodi ya ndirande makata kumene adapambana thom litchowa 
  wopambana yekhayo wa dpp adali nicholas josiya yemwe adatenga wodi ya kumpoto kwa mayani ku dedza
Label: POLITICS

Text:
t kaphuka alonjeza kuthana miyambo yokolezera edzi chipatala cha mpingo wa katolika cha kasina dayosizi ya dedza chinachita nawo mwambo wokumbukira matenda edzi lonse wa chaka chino 
 mwambo wu wachitika lolemba bwalo la zamasewero la nampala lomwe lili mdera la mfumu kaphuka mmau ake woyanganira zoyeza magazi chipatala cha mission cha kasina mai dorothy chikafa ati nkoyenera munthu adzidziwa momwe mthupi mwake mulili poyezetsa magazi 
 tikupempha kwambiri abambo ambiri azibwera kudzayezetsa magazi kaamba koti banja amatha kuthala zotsatira zosiyana anatero chikafa 
 polankhulanso mfumu kaphuka ya mbomalo yomwe inali nawo ku mwambowu yati iyesetsa kulimbana miyambo ina yomwe ikupitilira kukolezera kufala kwa kachilombo koyambitsa matenda edzi ka hiv yemwe apezeka akulimbikitsa miyambo yoyipayi mmudzi mwawo azilandila chilango chokhwima wena atengerepo phunziro
Label: HEALTH

Text:
pimani onyamula mafuta kati deru kadaopsa mlenje okhala kwa sonda komwe kuli nkhokwe za mafuta mzinda wa mzuzu sakumwa madzi madalaivala amene amadzatula mafuta mdziko la tanzania 
  pomwe tinkasindikiza nkhanyiyi nkuti mdziko la tanzania 285 akudwala matenda covid-19 11 atachira 10 atamwalira matendawa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi zikupereka mantha kwa kwa sonda madalaivala omwe akubweretsa mafuta mderali atha kuwatengera imfa 
  madalaivalawa akamalowa mdziko muno sakuwabindikiza zikuyenera kukhalira pamene ukutuluka kulowa mdziko muno 
  galimoto zonyamula mafuta kungofika kumene ku tanzania mneneri wa unduna wa zaumoyo joshua malango adati asachite mantha boma liyamba kubindikiza madalaivalawo kwa sabata ziwiri pachipata cha lino kuyambira sabata ino 
  adati kusunga madalaivalawo kuthandiza kuthana matendawo 
  anthuwo sadziyezedwa covid-19 ayi mokakamizidwa chizichitika nchakuti wolowa mdziko muno adzikhala kaye kwa sabata ziwiri malo olowerawa tione akuonetsa zizindikiro za nthendayo aziyesedwa akaonetsa zizindikirozo adatero malango 
  malinga wapampando wa nthambi ya chitetezo mderalo isaac soko madalaivalawo akafika kumeneko amakonda kuyendayenda zomwe zikupereka chiwopsezo atha kubweretsa mliri wa covid-19 kuderalo 
  soko adati zina madalaivalawo amakhala oposa 40 satsatira ndondomeko zoyenera asafalitse kutenga matendawo 
  tili pachiwopsezo chachikulu cha nthenda ya covid-19 anthuwa akuchokera mdziko la tanzania komwe nthendayi yafala kwambiri adatero soko 
  adati mantha akuchuluka madalaivalawo akafika mdziko muno akumayendayenda mderalo 
  adati madalaivala ambiri chi swahili ndiye akafika kuno chichewa chimawavuto zomwe zimawachititsa atengane amalawi amene amalankhula chichewa 
  mfumu ya deralo belewa yomwe idadandaula za vutolo pamaliro mkati mwa sabatayi idapempha boma lidzionetsetsa madalaivalawo akuyezedwa asadalowe mdziko muno adzikhala ku mbindikiro wa sabata ziwiri 
  malo oyezera nthendayo mchigawo cha kumpoto adatsekulidwa loweruka april 11 pofika pomwe timalemba nkhaniyi osapitilira khumi ndiwo adayezedwa 
  anthuwo palibe adapezeka nthendayo mchigawocho 
  mneneri wa bungwe la national oil company of malawi nocma lomwe limabweretsa mafutawo telephorous chigwenembe adakana kulankhulapo zomwe akuchita madalaivalawo akafika mdziko muno 
  la malawi nalo lili nkhondo yolimbana matendawo pofika dzulo 33 omwe adatsimikizika akudwala matendawo atatu adamwalira atatu adachira kutanthauza 27 omwe akudwala matendawa 
  maiko uganda kenya mwa maiko omwe akudadandaula madalaivala galimoto zonyamula katundu mwachitsanzo mdziko la uganda madalaivala awiri ochokera ku tanzania apezeka nthendayo lachitatu msabatayi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
nyanja ya chilwa ikuyika pachiopsezo boma la zomba ku coronavirus boma la zomba lili chiopsezo chokhudzidwa kwambiri nthenda ya covid-19 kaamba ka kusayezedwa kwa omwe akulowa mdziko muno kudzera nyanja ya chilwa mbomalo 
 akumadzera nyanjayi osayezedwa zadziwika pamene nduna ya zamalamulo bright msaka amayendera malo omwe boma la zomba lakonza lidzisungirako omwe angapezeke kachirombo ka coronavirus komwe kamayambitsa nthendayi 
 poyankhapo pankhaniyi ndunayi yati boma likuyesetsa kuyeza omwe akumalowa kudzera mzipata zonse za lino ati boma lichitapo kanthu omwe akumadutsira njanjayi adziyezedwanso kachilomboka 
 pozindikira kuno ku eastern region kuli ma border omwe tikumayeza onse olowa mdziko muno kuno ku chilwa kulibe malo oyezerawa anthuwa akulowa popanda chovuta anatero msaka
Label: HEALTH

Text:
boma lapempha makolo ateteze ana ku covid-19 boma lapempha makolo mdziko muno ayanganire mwatcheru ana pofuna kuwonetsetsa sakukhala chiwopsezo chotenga nthenda ya covid-19 kamba koti mwa asanu atatu omwe apezeka coronavirus mdziko muno mwana wa zaka khumi ziwili 12 
 navicha tetezani ana anu polankhula msonkhano womwe komiti yowona za matendawa inachititsa mzinda wa lilongwe nduna unduna woona zoti sipakukhala kusiyana pakati amayi abambo ana olumala mary navicha ati makolo akhale tcheru kupereka chisamaliro chitetezo chokwanira kwa ana powonetsetsa sakukhala mmalo chiwopsezo chotenga kachilombo ka coronavirus 
 komititiyi patsikuli yalengezanso atatu atsopano apezekanso kachilomboka wamwalira 
 navicha ati yomwe ana pakhomo amakhalanso chiopsezo nkhani zochitiridwa nkhanza zosiyanasiyana kugwiliridwa zina zomwe wati makolo akuyeyra kutengapo gawo lowateteza ku 
 msonkhanowu wauza atolankhani zomwe boma likuchita padakali pofuna kuthana coronavirus ku mbali zosiyanasiyana za chitetezo makamaka ku zinthu zolowa mdziko muno kupezeka kwa zipangizo za chipatala 
 padakali asanu atatu omwe atsimikizika apezeka nthenda ya covid-19 mdziko muno
Label: HEALTH

Text:
mesn ikufuna kuwerengera kwapadera mgwirizano wa mabungwe zachisankho la malawi electoral support network mesn lati likumenyerera mabungwe lidzakhale malo apadera owerengera mavoti pachisankho cha 2014 
  bungweli likufuna malo apaderawa adzafanizire zotsatira za chisankho zimene bungwe loona za chisankho la malawi electoral commission mec lidzapeze zothandiza pasakhale chinyengo chobera mavoti poonkhetsa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc msabata ikuthayi mesn idali msonkhano wofuna kumva maganizo mabungwe amene adapatsidwa chilolezo mec poyendetsa nawo chisankho 
  wapampando wa bungweli steven duwa adati njirayi yabwino ingathandize akadaulo amene alibe mbali kuunikira momwe aponyera voti kuwerengera mavotiwo 
  adati bungwelo likukonza zodzatumiza akadaulo 84 oona momwe chisankho chikuyendera akadaulo 800 okaonkhetsa mwapadera mavoti 1 500 owona chisankho pasakhale chinyengo 
  kugwira ntchitoyi limodzi mabungwe pakhale chilinganizo chapadera chisankho chilongosoke adatero duwa 
  mec idavomereza mesn ikhoza kukhazikitsa chilinganizochi bungwelo lidati sichidzakhala chanzeru mesn idzangoonkhetsa mavoti mmadera ochepa bungwelo lidati ntchitoyi iyenera kugwiridwa mmadera onse lino 
  zikuoneka chisankho cha 2014 mpikisano ukhala waukulu choncho chilinganizochi chikhoza kuthandiza kuthana ziwawa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
akhristu awapempha akonde kuthandiza radio maria malawi wolemba glory kondowe akhristu mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno awapempha azithandiza radio maria malawi 
 maxwell chikafa omwe mbusa wa dera la mzimu woyera 1 ku st marys nzama parish diocese ya dedza ndiwo alakhula lamulugu lapitali pambuyo mwambo wa thandizani radio maria omwe unachitikira ku tchalitchi cha mzimu woyera 1 tsangano turn off komwe akhristu anathandiza wayilesiyi ndalama yokwana mk133 860 
 abusa chikafa ati akonda kuthandiza radio maria wayilesiyi singamakumane mabvuto azachuma mmene ziliri zithu padakalipano polingaliranso wailesiyi yatha zaka 20 ikutumikira pofalitsa nthenga wabwino 
 wayilesiyi imatithandiza munjira zosiyanasiyana moti kufalitsa mnthenga wabwino wa yesu khristu zomwe zimatipatsa chiyembekeza 
 wailesiyi imasowa zinthu zosiyanasiyana ndiye tiyenera kuyithandiza nkhani ya zachuma 
 chikafa anatinso akhristu ayenera chotheka poyikapo chidwi kugwira ntchito wailesiyi aliyese amene atenga nawo mbari pothandiza radio maria zingati kutenga nawo mbali kufalitsa uthenga wabwino zaka 20 zomwe wailesiyi yakhala ikufalitsa nthenga wabwino chitsulo chimodzi sichiwunda chulu 
 anathokodzaso onse amene amagwira ntchito yozipereka awulutsi atolankhani awailesiyi kuwapempha apitilize ntchito yopambanayi
Label: RELIGION

Text:
apempha akatolika amvere maepiskopi kapewedwe ka coronavirus akhristu mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno awapempha atsatire ndondomeko zomwe maepiskopi ananena kudzera muchikalata chomwe analemba sabata zapitazo njira imodzi yopewera mliri wa covid-19 
				 analemba chikalata choyimitsa mapemphero mmatchalitchi onse wofalitsa nkhani dayosizi ya dedza josephy billiati ati chikalatachi chinapempha akhristuwa asamakumane ku tchalitchi mmalo mwake azipemphera mnyumba zawo cholinga chofuna kupewa kutenga kufalitsa kachilomboka kudzera kukumana mmatchalitchi 
 atinso akhristuwa akuyenera omvera atsogoleri kuphatikiza ndondomeko zomwe dayosizi yawo yakonza 
 zoonadi ma episkopi athu anatilembera kalata tisamakumane tipewe kufalitsa matenda covid-19 akhristu sakutsatira zimenezi koyenera tiphunzire zomwe akuluakulu athu akutilamula anatero biliati 
 pempha akhritsu atsatire zomwe ma episkopiwa anapempha asadikire mbindikiro uchite kuyamba
Label: HEALTH

Text:
ayamikira chakwera ponena adzikayankha mafunso ku nyumba ya malamulo mwa akatswiri nkhani za ndale mdziko muno george phiri wayamikira ganizo la mtsogoleri wa lino lazarus chakwera loti adzipita ya malamulo kukayankha mafunso kwa aphungu ya malamulo 
 phiri omwe mphunzitsi wa phunziro la za ndale ku university ya livingstonia wauza radio maria malawi ganizoli labwino kwambiri lingathandize mtsogoleriyu kudziwa za mavuto omwe ake akukumanan nawo phiri wati president adalembedwa ntchito amalawi choncho kofunika adzikayankha mafunso yamalamulo mbali imodzi mwa ntchito yomwe adalembedwera 
 mtsogoleri wantchito wathu osati olamulira phiri katswiriyu wati akuyenera achotse maganizo akuti mtsogoleri olamulira akuyenera kudziwa mtsogoleri munthu amene amalembedwa ntchito akuyenera kuwatumikira moyenera wati pali zinthu zambiri zomwe akuyenera kudziwa kuchoka kwa mtsogoleri wawo 
 pankhani yakuti president adzikhalanso yokumana mtsogoleri wotsutsa boma ya malamulo phiri wati zinthu zabwino kwambiri ponena kutsutsa boma sikutanthauza kufuna kugwetsa boma kukonza zinthu zomwe zikuwonongeka 
 katswiriyu wayamikiranso zomwe anayankhula mtsogoleri wa linoyu munthu ayenera kugwira ntchito molimbika adzilipidwa ndalama osati kulipidwa kaamba kowomba mmanja kuyimba nyimbo misonkhano ya chipani ati koyenera akhale olimbika ntchito business zomwe akuchita ponena zimenezi zothandiza pokweza chitukuko cha lino 
 ambiri mdziko muno ayamikira zomwe anayankhula dr chakwera pomwe amalandira lupanga la nkhondo losonyeza ukulu wa asilikali nkhondo mdziko muno pomwenso lino limakondwelera zaka 56 za ufulu odzilamulira
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mtima pansi mayeso   jce alipo chaka chino panali kupeneka kulikonse chaka cha 2015/16 sikukhala mayeso junior certificate of education jce zomwe boma lidalengeza posachepadwa lathetsa mayesowo msukulu za sekondale kukaikako kutheretu boma latsimikiza mayesowo alembedwa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   escom in free for all fuel scam eni sukulu zomwe si zaboma akhala akudandaula boma lawaika pachingwe cha kangaude polephera kubwera poyera kufotokoza mayesowo aliko ayi zitangomveka boma lathetsa satifiketi ya jce osamasula zimenezi ziyamba liti 
  ophunzira kulemba mayeso jce mmbuyomu mneneri wa unduna wa zamaphunziro manfred ndovi wati pasakhale mpungwepungwe uliwonse pankhaniyi poti mayesowa aliko kuyambira chaka cha mawa cha 2017 mayesowa sadzalembedwanso 
  mayeso aliko chaka chino chikhala chomaliza kulembetsa mayeso jce kuyambira chaka cha 2017 sikudzakhalanso mayeso oterewa adatero ndovi pouza tamvani palamya 
  adati sukulu ana onse omwe fomu 2 akuyembekezera kulemba mayeso jce atsatire ndondomeko zonse zoyenerera pokonzekera mayesowa osati kutekeseka 
  wa bungwe la eni sukulu zomwe si zaboma joseph patel adauza tamvani kumayambiriro sabatayi eni sukuluzi akusowa kolowera pankhaniyi kaamba kakuti sakudziwa mayesowa alembedwe chaka chino ayi 
  boma lidaganiza zoyambitsa njira yosefera ophunzira potengera momwe akuchitira mkalasi pamayeso teremu iliyonse mmakalasi onse kulekeza fomu 3 fomu 4 ndiyo azilemba mayeso boma 
  pofotokoza mmene zizidzayendera nduna ya zamaphunziro dr emmanuel fabiano idauza tamvani ndondomeko yatsopanoyi ikadzayamba bungwe la maneb lidzasamba mmanja pachilichonse chokhudza jce malo olemberamo mayeso cluster centres ndiwo adzasenze udindo 
  ndondomeko idzakhala yakuti malo olemberamo mayeso ana omwe akuyenera kulemba mayeso azidzalipira ndalama za mayeso ku cluster yomwe izidzakonza mayeso kulembetsa adatero fabiano 
  ndunayi idati sipadzakhala zobwereza kalasi kuchotsedwaokhoza olakwa omwe azidzapitirira mpaka fomu 3 
  fabiano adati boma lagani pofuna kupereka mpata kwa ophunzira onse omaliza nawo maphunziro kusekondale komwe akalemba mayeso fomu 4 okhoza azidzapatsidwa satifiketi ya msce pomwe olakwa azidzalandira kalata yaumboni yoti adamaliza maphunziro kusekondale 
  adati zizichititsa ambiri azilandira nawo maphunziro okwanira mundondomeko yakale olakwa jce amachoka pasukulu ambiri sankakhalanso chidwi chokapitiriza kwina 
  ya boma pochotsa mayeso jce yakuti satifiketiyi idatha mphamvu olemba ntchito ambiri masiku ano safuna satifiketiyi yokwererapo
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
anatchezera wamkulu ndine zikomo agogo   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndili chibwenzi timasiyana chaka chimodzi wamkulu ndineyo kodi tingathe kukwatirana iyeyu akufunitsitsa atandikwatira amandikonda kwambiri inenso ndimamukoinda zedi 
  cm lilongwe wokondeka cm zikomo pondilembera kusiyana zaka chisakhale chopinga mukwatirane bola chikondi kulemekezana si mkazi wamkulu pakubadwa bola chikondi chimene chimavuta zina kudererana mbanja kusapatsana ulemu pali akazi amene salemekeza amuna ati poti iwowo ndiwo aakulu pobadwa pachikhalidwe chathu mkazi ayenera kulemekeza mwamuna akhale wochepa msinthu zaka zobadwa chimodzimodzi mwamuna akakhala wamkulu pobadwa naye ayenera kulemekeza banja lake osatenga mkazi mwana choti wa zaka zocheperako kuposa mbanja laulemu mudza mwamuka akuti awa akazi anga mkazi naye amati awa amuna anga osati uyu mkazi wanga uyu mwamuna wanga pagulu tsono wamkulu ndiwe pobadwa umulole mwamunayo mukhale thupi limodzi ngatidi pali chikondi chenicheni pakati panu 
  akukana woyera agogo ndine mtsikana wa zaka 23 ndapeza mwamuna akuti akufuna ndimuberekere mwana akuti tisamange ukwati woyera ndamva anakaonetsa kale mkazi kwawo kunena zoona mwamunayu ndamukonda nditani pamenepa ll   area 1 lilongwe wokondeka ll apa ndiye ukufuna ndikuuze chiyani mwana wanga ukufunsa chinyezi mbafa nanga ndinene chiyani apa zikuonekeratu mwamunayu alibe chidwi choti mukwatirane akuti akufuna mwana mwana wachiyani ungomuberekera mwana basi mwanayo azikachita naye chiyani simukhala limodzi iwe mwana ulibe naye ntchito zachibwana basi ndiye ukuti umamukonda mwamunayu chikondi chako chili pati poti wachita kunena yekha sakufuna ukwati iwe zogonana basi wanena wekha adakaonetsa kale mkazi wina kwawo ndiwe iwe ukufunsa utani pamenepa umusiye basi upeza wina wofuna banja osati zamasanje zomwe akunena mwamunayo ayi kulera mwana si ntchito yapafupi imafunika banja lachikondi logwirizana ndiye iyeyo za banja nazo kutali iwe chotayira ntchawi yako iyeyo nchiyani gama abwerere ndine mrs jean makolosi amuna anga adachoka chaka chatha kupita ku mzuzu komwe ndamva akwatira mkazi wina ndikufuna mwamuna wanga abwereko mwamnsanga popeza sitinayambane mwamuna wanga ndimamukonda abwere mwezi uno usanathe chonde dzina lawo paul makolosi gama
Label: RELATIONSHIPS

Text:
anatchezera mkazi wanga asabwere anatchereza   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi ndili zaka 25 ndili pantchito yokhalira pomwepo ndine wokwatira ndili mwana abwana anga aakazi achikulire kwambiri ndithu ndikati ndiwapemphe ndiitanitse mkazi wanga tizidzakhala limodzi amakana ndichite pamenepa chonde thandizeni maganizo 
  i.j 
  mzuzu   zikomo ij ndathokoza cha kundilembera ndikuthandizeni maganizo pankhani ya banja lanu kodi mudayamba mwawafunsa abwana anuwo nchifukwa chiyani safuna mkazi wanu abwere muzikhala naye pantchitopo ndithu payenera kodi abwana anuwo amuna okha ndafunsa dala mafunsowa mwina akhoza kukuthandizani nokha kudziwa chomwe safunira mkazi wanu abwere pakhomopo mukandiyankha mafunsowa mwina ndidzatha kukuthandizani chomwe mungachite ndinama poti gwero lake lenileni lomwe amakanira mkazi wanu abwere sindikulidziwa nkomwe ndisapupulume kupereka chigamulo pomwe nkhani yonse sindikuidziwa lomwe 
  natchereza sakundifunanso gogo wanga ndidakwatiwa chaka chathachi pambuyo popanga chinkhoswe tidakhala mbanja mwezi wathuthunthu osandiuza amamwa ma arv tsiku lina ndidatulira nditapeza mankhwalawo mmabotolo nditamufunsa mwamuna wangayu adayankha pepa mkazi wanga ndimaopa ndikakuuza ukana tikwatirane usadandaule ndisamala ana ako pamodzi iweyo moyo wanga wonse 
  timakhalabe banja nditadwala ndidapita kuchipatala komwe adandiuza magazi amati zotsatira zake samaziona nditapitanso adandiuza ndilibe kachilombo ka hiv nditamuuza mwamuna wanga adati sakundifunanso banja ati ndilibe kachilombo nditani chonde ndithandizeni 
  zina zikamachitika kumangothokoza mulungu mwati mwamuna wanu akuti basi sakukufunaninso banja mulibe kachilombo zoona cholinga chake pachiyambi chidali chiyani kunena zoona iyeyu adali kampeni kakuthwa kumphasaamadziwa lomwe kachilombo ka hiv ndikhoza kunena popanda mantha cholinga chake chidali kufalitsa dala kachilomboko moyo woipa zedi umenewo   kufalitsa dala kachilombo ka hiv matenda alionse mlandu waukulu sindikulakwa munthu wotero ayenera kulangidwa ndiye mwati mwakayezetsa kawiri konse sadakupzeni kachilombo thokozani chauta tsono akuti sakukufunaninso ukwati vuto lanu nchiyani alibe chikondi ameneyo musiyeni mudakali moyo osangomusiyasiya ameneyo mukamusumire kumabungwe kukhoti chilungamo chioneke mwina angatengerepo phunziro
Label: RELATIONSHIPS

Text:
sheikh chabulika ayamikira radio maria wolemba thokozani chapola /uploads/2019/09 chabulika.jpg alt= width="293 height="165 > chabulika ndimakonda kumvera radio maria mwa atsogoleri chipembedzo cha chisilamu mdziko muno sheikh dinala chabulika wayamikira radio maria malawi kamba koulutsa nkhani zothandiza kulimbikitsa bata mtendere 
 shelk chabulika yemwenso mneneli wa bungwe la muslim association of malawi mam walankhula popereka uthenga wa mafuno abwino ku wailesi yi imene loweluka likudzali 28 september 2019 ikhale ikuchita mwambo wokondwelera yakwanitsa zaka 20 chifikireni mdziko muno 
 sheikh chabulika wati radio maria wailesi imene ili ukadaulo wabwino wa kaulutsidwe ka mdziko muno 
 ndimakonda kumvera radio maria wailesi imene imalimbikitsa bata mtendere simatenga nawo mbali polimbikitsa ziwawa momwe ma wailesi amachitira anatero sheikh chabulika 
 apempha atolankhani wailesi zina mdziko muno atengere chitsanzo cha radio maria malawi pomalemba nkhani zolimbikitsa mtendere mdziko muno
Label: RELIGION

Text:
moam yati ogwiritsa ntchito mitengo ya minibus yosavomerezeka anjatidwe bungwe la eni minibus mdziko muno la minibus owners association of malawi lati madalaivala omwe akugwiritsabe ntchito mitengo yokwera yomwe yosavomerezeka bungweli akuyenera anjatidwe kamba koti kumeneku ndikuba 
 okwera minibus akulipirabe modula wapampando wa bungweli felix mbonekera yemwe wanena poyankhapo nkhawa zomwe malawi ochuluka nazo kukwera kwa mitengo yokwelera ma minibus kutsika kwa mafuta galimoto kwachitika kawiri konse motsatana mdziko muno 
 ati bungwe lawo linakambirana zotsitsa mitengo yokwelera minibus 8 may oyendetsa minibus wa sanatsitsebe ndiye akuphwanya malamulo 
 kungoti pansewu pachuluka nyasi zambiri pali madalaivala makondakitala osamva tinawauza kalekale mitengo ikuyenera kutsika akuyenera kumata mitengoyo galasi asanakwere azidziwa mtengo woyenera pali omwe sakutero apolisi agwire ntchito yawo anatero mbonekera 
 mmwezi wa march chaka chino boma linakhazikitsa ndondomeko yochepetsa okwera minibus pofuna kuchepetsa kufala kwa kachilombo ka coronavirus mtengo wokwelera minibus unakweranso pambuyo pake mtengo wa mafuta unatsika kawiri konse zomwe zimapereka chiyembekezo eni minibus atsitsanso mitengo yawo zinthu zomwe sizinachiyike mpaka padakalipano
Label: TRANSPORT

Text:
15 anjatidwa kamba kotentha zipangizo zophera nsomba wolemba thokozani chapola mw wp content uploads/2019/05 handcuff-300x168.jpg alt= width="300 height="168 > apolisi mboma la mangochi amanga khumi asanu 15 powaganizira anatentha zipangizo zophera nsomba za ndalama zoposa 9 million kwacha za labani mhone 
 wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo roderick maida watsimikiza za nkhaniyi 
 wati apa 14 mwezi uno amunawa anachita kaamba ka mkwiyo poganizira mhone omwe anachititsa msodzi wina amire mmadzi zizimba zoti adzipha nsomba zambiri 
 anthuwa ati amawaganizira mhone amene anachititsa msodzi wina amire mmadzi mwamatsenga azipha nsomba zambiri 
 apa pomwe anakawotcha ma boti anayi ukonde ophera nsomba uwiri engine ya yamaha imodzi mabwato anayi anatero maida 
 maida wati msodzi yemwe anamira mmadziyu akupitilirabe kusowa
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
hrdc yauza malawi akhale tcheru chisankho bungwe lomenyera ufulu wa mdziko muno la human rights defenders coalition hrdc lapempha mdziko muno akhale tcheru uliwonse omwe ungakhale okayikitsa chisankho chomwe chikudzachi 
 wa bungweli gift trapence wanena msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe bungweli linachititsa lero mzinda wa lilongwe 
 mwa mamembala bungwe la hrdc trapence wati pali mphekesera zakuti pali omwe akufuna kubera chisankho choncho kofunika tcheru nyengoyi kuwonetsetsa chilichonse chomwe chikuchitika mdziko muno 
 apempha athu akhale tcheru mmalire mwa lino mmabwalo ndege pamene pakumveka mphekesera afuna alowetse mapepala oponyera voti mwachinyengo 
 pamenepa atsimikizira malawi obera chisankhochi azayankha mlandu payekha payekha ati popeza apeza kale owaimira mlandu pakazachitika chisokonezo chilichonse 
 trapence anatinso kukanidwa kwa bungwe lawo liyanganire nawo chisankhochi agwira ntchito mabungwe omwe achita nawo ubale omwe anapatsidwa kale chaka chatha chilolezo chochita azipeza mauthenga okhudza chisankhochi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
gulewamkulu agumula sitolo gulewamkulu wina lachwiri lapitalo akumukayikira adagumula sitolo ina pamsika wa nkhalambayasamba mboma la mchinji akumukaikira adasakaza katundu wa k3.5 miliyoni 
  mneneri wapolisiyo kaitano lubrino lachisanu adati apolisi amanga 16 amene akuwaganizira akukhudzidwa nkhaniyo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka apolisi kuyendera sitolo idathyoledwayo onsewa tikuwaganizira akukhudzidwa zophwanya sitoloyo kuba katundu adatero lubrino 
  malinga lubrino kuderalo kudamwalira wina wa bizinesi rabson wisalamu imfayo idadabwitsa 
  malinga mfumu nani yomwenso mbale wa malemuyo imfayo amaganiza imfayo idali yamatsenga 
  adali mushopu yake akugulitsa katundu kenaka tidangomva mthupi mukumuwawa kupita naye kuchipatala cha st gabriel adangoti ndagona kwathu sadayambane tikupenekera kushopuko alipo adayambana naye mpaka amuchitire chipongwe adatero nano polankhula naye pafoni 
  patsiku logumula sitoloyo maliro wisalamu adaikidwa mwambo utatha akuti kudavumbuluka gulewamkulu pamsikawo 
  guleyo akuti adalipo 20 atafika pagolosale ya julaye adagumula shopuyo kuyamba kutenga katundu wina akumusakaza 
  kafukufuku wathu wapeza pamene guleyo amafika nkuti julaye banja lake atathawa kale komwe sikukudziwika tikufufuzabe adatero lubrino zitachitika guleyo adabwerera atatuta katundu wa mshopumo 
  mphekesera zikumveka guleyo amachokera ku dambwe la nani kumeneko komwe kumachokera malemuwo 
  mfumu nani yauza msangulutso ilo bodza anga titachoka kumanda tidabwerera kukapitiriza mwambo wa maliro dziwani tidavomereza imfa ya munthu wathu palibe amene tikumuganizira adatero amfumuwo 
  lubrino wati apolisi anjata gulupu kabuthu amene dzina lonse tenthani nsaima zaka 46 woyanganira msika wa nkhalambayasamba daniel joseph wa zaka 40 onse kwa mfumu mavwere mbomalo akayankhe mafunso angapo za umbandawo 
  posakhalitsapa gulewamkulu adagwidwa ku chikwawa ataba mbuzi mumzinda wa lilongwe guleyo wakhala akugenda galimoto zomwe sizimupatsa ndalama 
  mfumu ya wa achewa kaomba akuti uyu si gulewamkulu zigandanga dzomwe zikufuna kuononga chikhalidwe chawo 
  awa akungotionongera mbiri gulewamkulu amasunga mwambo ichitu chikhalidwe adatero 
  apolisi ati akufufuzabe anjate amene adachita chipongwecho
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
wafa ngozi mboma la ntcheu munthu wafa asanu atatu 8) avulala modetsa nkhawa galimoto yomwe anakwera itagubuduka mmudzi mwa bula ku nsipe mboma la ntcheu 
 malingana mneneri wa apolice mbomali sub inspector hastings chigalu wati galimotoyi yomwe imayendetsedwa enerst chitamba zaka 22 zakubadwa mboma la mzimba inanyamula mpingo wa ccap 13 omwe yi akuchokera ku maliro mboma la chiradzulu 
 wati galimoto yi itafika pamalowa inagubuduzika mwa anthuwa charles bonongwe wa mmudzi mwa mzonda mdera la mfumu yayikulu chitukula mboma la lilongwe amene wamwalira ngoziyi pomwe asanu atatu avulala ayamba kulandira thandizo chipatala cha ntcheu
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
pafunika k450 miliyoni ya makhansala pafupifupi k450 miliyoni zikufunika boma likwanitse lonjezo lake lopezera makhansala njira ya mayendedwe akamayendetsa ntchito za chitukuko mmadera tamvani wapeza 
  pulezidenti wa makhansala mdziko muno samson chaziya adatsimikiza boma lidavomereza lipereka k1 miliyoni kwa khansala adzipezere mayendedwe 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc tidali mkhumano nduna ya maboma angonoangono komiti ya ku undunawu 13 february 2015 pomwe timakambirana nkhaniyi adalonjeza khansala alandira k1 miliyoni yoti aonere mayendedwe adatero chaziya 
  adati pakadalipano makhansala alipo okwana 450 
  nkhani ya mayendedwe makhansala idavuta pomwe boma limafuna kupereka njinga za moto za ngongole kwa makhansalawo ndondomekoyi siyidakomere makhansala 
  woyendetsa ntchito za maboma angonoangono ku undunawu kiswell dakamau adatsimikiza za mkhumanowo adakana kuwulula zomwe zidakambidwa 
  mneneri wa unduna wa maboma angonoangono chitukuko cha mmidzi muhlabase mughogho adati pamsonkhanowo padatuluka nkhani ziwiri zikuluzikulu zomwe magulu awiriwo adakambirana 
  adati nkhani yoyamba idali ya ngongole za mayendedwe adatsimikiza unduna udavomereza zopereka ma k1 miliyoni kwa makhansala osati njinga momwe chikonzero chidalili poyamba 
  ndalamazo sizichokera kuunduna unduna ukambirana mabanki apereke ngongole kwa makhansalawo za mmene ndalamazo zidzabwezedwere tidzachita kukambirana adatero mughogho
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
utsi ku nam pamene ma queens anyamuka utsi ukufukabe ku bungwe loyendetsa masewero ntchemberembaye la netball association of malawi nam kaamba kosemphana zochita pakati mphunzitsi wa timuyi peace chawinga kalua bungweli 
  timu ya ntchemberembaye yomwe imangodziwika malawi queens idanyamuka mdziko muno lachitatu msabatayi ulendo ku sydney mdziko la australia komwe ikukapikisananawo mchikho chapadziko lonse 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kugwebana kudayambika pamene zidadziwika nam idatumiza kale maina atsikana amene apita ku australia mosadziwitsa kalua 
  malinga kalua nam idatumiza maina osewerawo pamene asadawaitane kukampu akachite zokonzekera 
  ineyo amene ndimayenera ndisankhe osewera amene achita kukampuko zomwe zachitika nkuti nam yasankha kale osewera ndisakudziwa nditatulutsa mndandanda wa osewera anga amene ndikuwafuna akana osewera amene ndawapatsa aika amene akuwafuna adatero kalua 
  queens captured on departure at chileka airport in blantyre 
  pamene amanyamuka bwalo la ndege la chileka lachitatu nkhope za akuluakulu nam mphunzitsiyu zimaoneka sizikumvana zochita 
  chitsanzo titamufunsa mphunzitsiyu zomwe akonzekera kukabweretsa ku mpikisanowo adati funsani amene akonzekera kukabweretsa zotsatira zomwe mukufunsazo sindingayankhe zimenezo adatero mphunzitsiyu uko akusonya nam atifotokozere 
  titamufunsa pulezidenti wa nam rose chinunda adati sakuonapo vuto ganizolo lidachitika atakambirana wachiwiri kwa kalua yemwe mary waya griffin saenda yemwe wothandizira aphunzitsiwa kagwiridwe ka ntchito yawo

 zizolowezi zomwe akhristu ambiri amakhala nazo zimakhala zosemphana chifuniro cha mulungu apempha mzimu woyera awatsogolore muzochita zawo angawathandize koposa pokhala zizolowezi zabwino zomwenso zingakondweletse mulungu

Text:
fodya wakunja wayamba kulowa pomwe la malawi lalima fodya wochepa makilogalamu 27 miliyoni pamlingo omwe ogula fodyayu adaitanitsa mavenda amachawi ayamba kulowetsa fodya kuchoka mmaiko oyandikana lino 
  fodyayu akumalowetsedwa pogwiritsa ntchito njira zozemba mchitidwewu ngosemphana malamulo lino 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka wogwirizira udindo wa wa bungwe loyendetsa ulimi wa fodya mdziko muno la tobacco control commission tcc david luka adati bungwe lake likudziwa za mchitidwewu lidatumiza maofesala ake kumalo onse omwe zikuchitika 
  maofesala athu ku nkhamenya mboma la kasungu komwe kumalowera fodya mdziko la zambia ku mchinji ku namwera mboma la mangochi komwe fodya amakhala ochokera ku mozambique adatero luka 
  adati bungwe lake lokhumudwa mchitidwewu omwe uli vuto lalikulu ulimi wa fodya mdziko muno 
  ntchito yoyesetsa fodya asalowe kutuluka mdziko muno siyapafupi sikwapafupi kuchitapo kanthu adatero luka 
  adaonjezeranso nkhanizi kwambiri zokhudza linzake 
  alimi fodya mboma la mchinji adatsimikiza za kulowa kwa fodya mdziko muno 
  mwa alimiwa lazarus chitedze yemwe wakhala akulima fodya kwa zaka pafupifupi 20 adati fodyayu akulowa pangono chabe mdziko la zambia kusiyana momwe zimakhalira zaka zonse 
  akulowetsa fodya mavenda angonoangono omwe amagwiritsa ntchito njinga mwina chakuti mmaliremu muli asilikali omwe akulondera chimanga chisatuluke adatero chitedze 
  adati chaka chaka fodya amalowa ku zambiako kutuluka kuchoka mdziko muno 
  zimatengera komwe msika uli chaka chimenecho.ngati ku zambia zili mavenda amazembetsa fodya kupita naye komweko adatero chitedze 
  adati zikatere zimawakomera alimiwa mavendawa amawagula mokwera mtengo kusiyana ku msika wa fodya 
  malinga chitedze chiopsezo chimakhalapo fodya akamalowa mdzikolo zikhonza kuchulutsa fodya pamsika kuposera mlingo omwe ogula akufuna 
  polankhulapo mlimi wina yemwe sadafune kutchulidwa dzina lake adati fodyayu akulowa pangono ku zambiako ayamba kumene kusankha fodya 
  akangoti wafika pachimake kumeneko timuona akulowa wochuluka zedi adatero mlimiyo 
  mwezi wathawu woyanganira dera la kummawa mboma la zambia chanda kasolo adauza mwa atolankhani dzikolo asilikali omwe mmalire lino dzikolo akutetezanso kuzembetsa fodya 
  la zambia lidalengeza chaka chathachi likweza mlingo wa fodya yemwe amalima kuchoka ma kilogalamu 23 miliyoni kufika 30 miliyoni chaka chino 
  chaka chathachi mtsogoleri wa bungwe la alimi la eastern fodya association of zambia efaz franklyn mwale adadandaulira bungwe loyendetsa ulimi wa fodya mdzikolo msika wawo amautsekula mochedwa poyerekeza wa lino 
  limodzi mwa mabungwe alimi la tobacco association of malawi tama lidati silidalandire lipoti lililonse lokhudza kulowa kwa fodya mdziko la zambia
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
