Text:
cmst iyambanso kugawa mankhwala nkhokwe ya mankhwala ya central medical stores trust cmst yatsiriza kukambirana mabungwe omwe amathandiza lino nkhani ya zaumoyo udindo wosunga kugawa mankhwala ubwerere mmanja mwake 
  woyendetsa ntchito zaumoyo mdziko muno dr charles mwansambo wa cmst feston kaupa atsimikiza za nkhaniyi 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka ngoma ana amayi amavutika akuluakulu awiriwa ati zikutanthauza mabungwe maiko othandiza lino zaumoyo akhutira kwa ndondomeko zoyendetsera ntchito za ku nkhokweko makamaka chitetezo cha mankhwalawo 
  apa ndiye mabungwe chikhulupiliro nkhokwe yathu ya mankhwala adayamba kupereka okha mankhwala mzipatala kusolola mankhwala kutavuta mzaka za 2002 watero mwansambo 
  kaupa wati mwa zina mabungwe adatuluka ndondomeko yakale yodzera ku nkhokwe pogawa mankhwala pofuna zinthu zina zisinthidwe ku nkhokweko zonse zatheka tsopano 
  tidasintha zambiri chitetezo cha mankhwala nkhokwe pakagawidwe kake nkhokwe zathu nzamakono nzovomerezeka kusungamo mankhwala tili galimoto zapamwamba zokhala zipangizo zoilondola mankhwala asabedwe watero kaupa 
  kadaulo wina zaumoyo dorothy ngoma wati nkhaniyi ikumveka yokoma akuluakulu aku nkhokweyo akuyenera kuganizira mozama amayi ana ntchito yawo 
  apa zikutanthauza mphamvu zikubwera mmanja mwawo ndiye sitikufuna posachedwapa tiyambenso kumva nkhani zogonthetsa mkhutu mankhwala sakupezeka ndiwoonongeka ayi zimenezi zimazunzitsa amayi ana watero ngoma 
  kadauloyu wati pomwe mabungwe ankaganiza zotuluka mndondomekoyi adaona amayi ana ndiwo amavutika choncho akhoza akuyesa utsogoleri wa ku nkhokweyo wasinthadi 
  chomwe chimavuta nchoti amakhalapo ofunadi zinthu mkati momwemo mukhalanso atambwali ndiye tiyeni tiona aziyendetsa motani langizo langa ndiloti tichepetse mtima wodzikonda watero ngoma 
  mwansambo wati mabungwe atakhumudwa kubedwa kwa mankhwala adanyanyala nkuyamba kupereka okha mankhwala mzipatala moti kuchoka 2002 kudali magulu oposa 12 osunga kugawa mankhwala okha 
  chomwe chimachitika nchoti padali osunga ndikugawa mankhwala okhudzana matenda edzi amapanga za mankhwala achifuwa chachikulu zauchembere zina zosiyanasiyana tsopano zonsezi zibwera pamodzi pansi nkhokwe yathu watero mwansambo 
  wati zithandiza kuchepetsa ndalama zonyamulira mankhwala kupita mzipatala za boma ofesi ya zaumoyo ikayitanitsa mankhwala onse azinyamulidwa pakamodzi mmalo moti apititse wokha enanso wokha
Label: HEALTH

Text:

Text:
zig zero mnyamata wa nyimbo za dansi kuyambira kuubwana chimene amaganiza kulota kuimba nyimbo basi inde mulungu adamudalitsa liwu lanthetemya mnyamata ameneyu akugwiritsa ntchito luntha lomwelo apeze chakudya cha tsiku tsiku zosowa pamoyo uyu joseph alufandika mnyamata wosangalatsa mingoli yokoma chimwemwe sefasi adapezana naye poduka mphepo adacheza naye motere kudyera pakamwa alufandika ndikudziwe   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi dzina langa ndine joseph alufandika ndine wosakwatira ndimachokera kuchigawo chakumwera konkuno mboma la nsanje okonda nyimbo za dansi amandidziwa dzina loti zig zero 
  kodi kuimba nyimbo za dansi udayamba liti kuimba ndidayamba pakale ndithu ndili kusekondale pamene ndidazindikira ndili luso losangalatsa kudzera mumaimbidwe munyimbo za dansi 
  kodi kupatula kuimba umachitanso chiyani inetu ndimapanga bizinesi ndikupitiriza maphunziro kusukulu ya malawi college of accountancy komwe ndikuphunzira zoonkhetsa chuma 
  kodi chimbale chako chatsopano chituluka liti mutu chiyani chimbale changa chikuyembezereka kutuka kumapeto mwezi wa august chomwe chikhale nyimbo 14 zomwe zaimbidwa mchichewa mchingerezi kuyambira 3 august mpomwe nditawadziwitse amalawi zambiri 
  kodi mavuto ati omwe oimba nyimbo za dansinu mumakumana nawo mavuto omwe timakumana nawo kupita kuzoimbaimba osapatsidwa ndalama yomwe tinagwiriza kumeneku timaona tikuponderezedwa atukule luso lathu amafuna tiwapatse ndalama 
  kodi nyimbo za dansi zomwe umaimba iweyo ukuona zikupita patsogolo kunena mosanama chimwemwe uli apa nyimbo zaimbidwa achinyamata zikupita patsogolo kwambiri akati pamalo achisangalalo kuukwati zinkhoswe malo osiyanasiyana chisangalalo chawo chimakhala chopambana cha uthenga womwe tikumapereka kudzera mnyimbo zomwe tikumawapatsira 
  kodi ati omwe unaimbapo nawo nyimbo limodzi chiyambireni kuimba malawi inetu chiyambireni kuyimba malawi ndaimbapo nyimbo ambiri marcus pasanje wa dare devils blasto bfb ambiri 
  pomaliza tandiuze zomwe umakonda 
  ndimakonda kuimba kumvera nyimbo zina ndimakonda kuyenda kumaona malo osiyanasiyana kukumana osiyanasiyananso

Text:
kulandira mwana nkanulo zikhulupiriro zina ukamva mutu weniweni sowe pali zambiri zomwe makolo amakhulupilira paumoyo wa munthu kuyambira kubadwa mpaka kumwalira akuti amakhulupirira mwana akabadwa pamafunika mwambo wa nkanulo ati kusonyeza mwanayo walandiridwadi pakati abale steven pembamoyo adacheza miriam chongwe kwa mfumu t maganga mboma la salima yemwe akufotokoza zambiri za mwambowu 
  chongwe kumanja kulongosola za mwambo wa nkanulo ndati ndicheze nanu mwambo wa nkanulo mwambowu wotani   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu uwu mwambo womwe umatsatidwa mwana akabadwa kusonyeza abale pamudzipo amulandira wa zimatanthauza mfulu malo muja zikhalira malo banja munthu wongobwera amavutika kupeza malo palibe mizu yake yomwe angalondoloze 
  mwambowu umayenda sikuti kusonkhana momwe miyambo ina imakhalira ayi chomwe chimachitika nchakuti mwana akabadwa chinthu choyambirira nkudziwitsa abale makamaka amalume ake azakhali omwe amakanena kwa amfumu kenako amamasuka kupita kukaona mwanayo kumupititsira mphatso nazo 
  mukati chinthu choyambirira mukutanthauzanji poti azaumoyo amati mwana akangobadwa pompo ayamwe zimenezo nzoona apa tikukamba za mwambo umu ndimo makolo kalelo ankakhulupirira zinthu zisadayambe masiku ano miyambo yambiri ikutha pangonopangono cha maphunziro adayamba kuzindikira miyambo ina imaononga mmalo mokonza zinthu 
  tsopano mukati nkanulo timadziwa tanthauzo lokanula apapa pali mgwirizano wanji mwambo eya ndimayembekezera funso limenelo kumbukani ndati chimakhala chinthu choyambirira mwana akangobadwa ndiye kukanulako nkutsegula mwanayo kukamwa akhoza kuyamwa walandiridwa pakati mudzi banja lomwe wabadwiralo 
  mudachitapo mwambo umenewu mzaka za mmbuyomo nditangokwatiwa kumene kenako ndidazindikira nkulakwa chimakhala chilango kwa mwana mwachitsanzo kumatheka panthawi yomwe mwana wabadwa palibe mayendedwe achangu malingana nkuti nthawiyo mauthenga kukaperekedwa pakamwa pakalata foni kudalibe imeneyo ndiye mudikire munthu ayende kukapereka uthenga kuno mwana njala 
  madotolo anamwino amadziwa zikuchitika sindikudziwa zimachitika kwambiri chochirira kwa azamba mmidzi mwina ndinene kukhwefula ntchito za azamba ammidzi kudathandiza nawo kuchepetsa mwambo umenewu sindikukhulupirira dotolo namwino angalekerere zikuchitika 
  zinthu zili motani panopa zinthu zili maphunziro zauchembere wabwino tidatsekuka mmaso mwina pena pena zikhoza kumachitikabe poti uthenga umafika mosiyanasiyana nkhani yoti ambiri adatsekuka mmaso olo zokachirira kwa azamba ammidzi zidachepa

Text:
aphangirana ufa mwambo wa mapemphero achisilamu otchedwa dawa udasokonekera kwa chitulu kwa t mwambo mboma la zomba loweruka 2 april pomwe khwimbi la lidakhamukira kumeneko kukalimbirana ufa womwe amati agawe mwambowo ukatha 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kuderalo kudafika bungwe la eid charitable la mdziko la qatar lomwe limachititsa mapemphero achisilamu pakutha mapemphero amayenera kugawa ufa kwa asilamu ovutika 
  asanayambe kugawa chakudyacho amayamba mapemphero dawa kupereka mwayi kwa ofuna kulowa chisilamu atha kutero povomereza muhammad ndiye mneneri wa mulungu womaliza 
  mapemphero akupita kumapeto asilamuwa adapempha amene ankafuna kulowa chisilamu anene pemphero loti ashihadu anla ilaha llah wa shadu anna muhammad u rrasulu llah ndikuikira umboni pali mulungu yekha ndikuikiranso umboni muhammad mtumiki womaliza 
  khwimbi la kudikira alandire kangachepe apa mpomwe gulu la ambiri mwa akhrisitu adanena nawo pempheroli kuvomereza alowa chisilamu adatero shehe mustapha saidi yemwe amayanganira mzikiti wa chitulu 
  mwambo wa dawa uli mkati galimoto yomwe idanyamula ufawo idatulukira zomwe zidayambitsa khwimbi la likhamukireko padali nmwana agwiritse pomwe amati ayambe kugawa ufawo 
  mwina poona suwakwana onse zidavuta akhale pamzere adayamba kukwera okha pamwamba loleyo kukadzithandiza okha potenga matumba ufa amatenga awiri atatu amene olemera makilogalamu 25 limodzi 
  martin umi wa mmudzi mwa chitulo akuti mkhristu adalumbira nawo ponena pemphero la chisilamulo alandire nawo ufa 
  kunena zoona ndidavomereza ndalowa chisilamu ndimangofuna ndilandire nawo ufawo cha njala pakhomo panga komabe mwina mtsogolomu ndilowadi chisilamu nanga si amene akutithandiza adatero umi 
  adati adakwanitsa kutenga matumba awiri adavulala atapondedwa pamene amathawitsa ufawo 
  mfumu chitulu idati kudera lake madera kuli njala yadzaoneni mvula idasiya kugwa january kupangitsa chimanga chipserere 
  momwe njala yavutira kuno nkovuta wina angatsale pakhomo atamva kwina kukubwera chakudya si zodabwitsa kuona adaphangirana ufawo idatero mfumuyi yomwe mmudzi mwake muli 1 470 omwe mabanja 240 
  shehe saidi adati chipwirikiticho chidakhumudwitsa mamembala amene sadalandireko ufawo 
  zachisoni mamembala athu ambiri sadalandire nawo ufawo zomwe zachititsa asiye kutumiza ana kumadrasa sukulu ya ana ophunzira chisilamu adatero saidi yemwe adati akuyembezabe kuona omwe amati alowa chisilamu patsiku logawa ufalo abwere kumzikiti kudzapemphera 
  si kunamizira kulowa mpingo kaamba koti ukufuna chithandizo cha kuthupi uzilowa mpingo kaamba kofuna kukapulumuka kumwamba adaonjezera shehe saidi pouza msangulutso lachisanu lapitali 
  lero lachisanu olo mwa omwe adati alowa chisilamu patsikulo palibe amene wabwera kumapemphero amatero bungwe la eid charitable lidabweretsa ufa mdziko muno womwe udagawidwa mboma la zomba machinga mangochi 
  wa gululi muhammad al saaq adati adauzidwa bungwe la zamzam foundation la ku malawi za mavuto amene amalawi akukumana nawo kaamba ka njala 
  titamva za mavutowa tidabwera ufa ovutika athandizike tipemphenso athandize lino ifeyo tikabwerera tikasakanso thandizo lina tipitiriza kuthandiza lino adatero al saaq
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
pac iunguza za boma la chifedulo nthumwi zomwe zimakumana mumzinda wa blantyre kukambirana za nkhani yakuti zigawo za lino zizikhala mtsogoleri wakewake pansi mtsogoleri wa zati nkhaniyi iyende mpofunika malamulo 
  mfundoyi ikugwirizana zomwe adanena mphunzitsi wa za ndale kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college blessings chinsinga popanda malamulo nkhaniyi ikhoza kudzetsa chisokonezo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc senior chief chikumbu ya ku mulanje kufuna kutsitsa pamsonkhanowo choyamba tiunike malamulo athu akutinji mukhoza zigawo zodziyimira pazokha zomwe zingamakolanenso cha malamulo omwe mukutsata adatero chinsinga 
  msonkhanowo udakonzedwa bungwe la mipingo la public affairs committee pac cholinga chake chidali chomwe chidayambitsa nkhaniyi kukambirana momwe ingayendere 
  malinga wapampando wa bungwe la pac mbusa felix chingota nthumwi za kumsonkhanowo zidapeza nkhaniyo idachokera pakusamvetsetsana momwe zinthu zina zikuyendera 
  nthumwi zidapeza nkhani kusankhana kochokera kukondera pakasankhidwe ka maudindo kusiyanitsa pakagawidwe ka zinthu kupondereza zitukuko zomwe atsogoleri adayamba zina mwa zinthu zomwe akuona aziyendetsa okha zinthu adatero chingota 
  mlangizi wa mtsogoleri wa lino pankhani za mgwirizano wa mdziko muno vuwa kaunda adati cholinga cha mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika azipereka maganizo zinthu ziziyenda 
  kaunda adati mutharika adalumbira adzalemekeza malamulo lino omwe amapereka mwayi kwa amalawi wolankhula zakukhosi kwawo 
  mafumu nawo ayamikira zomwe lidachita bungwe la pac pokonza msonkhanowo zomwe nthumwi zidagwirizanazo 
  paramount chief chikulamayembe wa ku rumphi adati nzopatsa chidwi boma mabungwe akugwirizana pankhani yofuna kudzetsa umodzi mtendere pomanga zoyendetsera nkhani zikuluzikulu imeneyi 
  apa ndiye zinthu ziyenda kusiyana nkuti azingopanga phokoso lopanda tsogolo lake tionera kwa akuluakuluwo akonza zotani adatero chikulamayembe 
  malinga chinsinga nkhaniyi ingaphweke amalawi atalangizidwa momwe ulamuliro wotere ungayendere adati nzomvetsa chisoni kuchititsa mantha amalawi akungotsatira maganizo anzawo chosamvetsetsa 
  iyitu si nkhani yaingono pakuoneka ambiri sakumvetsetsa mutuwu mmalo mwake angotsatirapo poti walankhulayo amamukhulupirira mpofunikanso kumasulira bwinobwino tanthauzo la nkhaniyi nkuphunzitsa amalawi azipereka maganizo enieni adatero chinsinga 
  adati ulamuliro wotere njira yoyendetsera boma yomwe limagawidwa mmagawo omwe amayendetsa okha ntchito za chitukuko pansi ulamuliro wa mtsogoleri 
  adati kutengera pamgongo nkhani yotereyi kukhoza kubweretsa kusamvana chisokonezo pazinthu zingonongono 
  muganizire apa dzikoli lalingono kwambiri njira zobweretsa ndalama nzochepa pofuna kugawa mpofunika bwinobwino mmene malire akhalire chigawo chanji chitenga chiyani adatero chinsinga 
  wa bungwe la pac robert phiri adati msonkhano womwe bungweli lidakonza udakambirana zina mwa nkhani zoterezi 
  msonkhanowo udachitika lolemba lachiwiri mumzinda wa blantyre udabweretsa pamodzi akuluakulu mnthambi za boma mabungwe oyima paokha otsata mbiri ya lino 
  phiri adati zomwe adakambirana akuluakuluwo azitulutsa kuzipereka kuboma mabungwe zipereke chithunzithunzi cha mmene angagwirire ntchito pankhaniyi 
  mmbuyomu kafukufuku yemwe nyuzipepala ya the nation idachita adasonyeza aphungu 61 mwa 100 alionse adati nkhaniyi itapita ku nyumba ya malamulo akhoza kuikana nyuzipepalayi itafunsa aphungu 122 mwa 193 75 adati angakane mfundoyi aphungu 17 adali asanaganize angaivomereze ayi pomwe aphungu 30 adati angavomereze za mfundoyi 
  mchaka cha 2006 mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika adanena boma la mtunduwu likhoza kuthandiza pachitukuko cha lino uku kudali msonkhano wounikira malamulo lino masiku ano mutharika amatsutsana maganizowa ati kugawa 
  pamsonkhanowo padali zipani zosiyanasiyana mafumu azipembedzo mabungwe omwe si aboma amayendetsa zokambiranazo sipikala wakale wa nyumba ya malamulo henry chimunthu banda wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wakale wa lino justin malewezi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
chipani cha dpp chayimitsa membala wamkulu chipani cholamula cha democratic progressive dpp chayimitsa mwa mamembala ake mike chitenje ati kaamba kosowa mwambo 
 wayimitsidwa mchipani chitenje wavala chipewa malaya mizere malinga chikalata chomwe radio maria malawi yawona chomwe chasayinidwa mlembi wamkulu wa chipanichi grezelder jeffrey lachisanu 24 april chitenje yemwenso amadziwika dzina loti bangwe 1 waonetsa khalidwe loyipa lomwe litha kuwononga mbiri ya chipanichi pomwe amadzudzula monyoza wa chitetezo cha pulezidenti wa lino norman chisale 
 chikalatachi chachenjeza mkuluyu asayankhe chikalatachi njira iliyonse komiti yosungitsa mwambo mchipanichi imuyitanitsa posachedwapa akanyalanyaza achotsedwa mchipani akalowe chipani chilichonse chomwe akufuna 
 posachedwapa bangwe 1 amene mwa achinyamata chipani cha dpp mchigawo cha kummwera wakhala akudzudzula wa chitetezo cha pulezidenti mutharika norman chisale kudzera mmasamba mchezo intaneti ponena akutsekereza mamembala dpp kupeza thandizo kwa pulezidenti zomwe sizinasangalatse chipanichi

Text:
chisankho chachibwereza chilipo 6 june bungwe loyendetsa zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec lakhazikitsa 6 june 2017 amalawi adzaponye voti yachibwereza kummwera cha kummawa kwa lilongwe patangotha mwezi bwalo lamilandu la apilo litagamula chisankho cha kuderali sichidayende 
  chigamulochi chidaperekedwa potsatira dandaulo la yemwe ankaimira chipani cha malawi congress party mcp ulemu msungama chinyengo chidachitika pachisankhocho 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka voters will still use voter i d cards in 2019 chigamulochi chitaperekedwa zipani zandale zidapempha mec ichititse chisankho chachibwereza kuderalo msanga akhale phungu wowaimirira ku nyumba ya malamulo chigamulocho chidatanthauza deralo lilibe phungu 
  pachisankho cha 20 may 204 mec idalengeza bentley namasasu wa democratic progressive party dpp ndiye adapambana msungama adakamangala ku bwalo la mirandu za chigamulochi 
  wachiwiri kwa mlembi wa chipani cha mcp eisenhower mkaka mneneri wachipani cha peoples party pp noah chimpeni mneneri wa united democratic front udf ken ndanga adati mec isapange chidodo zopangitsa chisankho chachibwereza 
  mobweretsa chilimbikitso nkhawa ya za vuto la ndalama zopangitsira chisankhochi lomwe bungwe la mec lidanena poyamba bungweri lati chisankhochi chilipo 6 june 2017 
  potsatila chigamulo cha bwalo la mirandu la apilo bungwe la mec lidapangitsa msonkhano 4 april omwe lidafotokozera zipani okhudzidwa lipangitsa chisankho ku dera la ku mmwera cha ku mmawa kwa lilongwe 6 june 2017 chidatero chikalata chomwe bungweli lidatulutsa 
  chikalatachi chidatinso pofuna bungweli lisawononge ndalama zambiri chisankhochi chichitika limodzi zisankho zina kumpoto kwa lilongwe msozi chisankho cha khansala wa kumpoto kwa mayani ku dedza khansala wa kwa mtsiliza ku lilongwe 
  bungwe la mec lati makandideti akale atsopano olandilidwa kupikisana nawo motsatana malamulo zisankho 
  zisankhozi bungwe la mec lati omwe adzaloledwe kuponya voti okhawo omwe adalembetsa mkaundula wa 2014 sipadzakhala zosintha malo okaponyera voti 
  zipani za mcp pp udf zati nkhaniyi yabwino zati mpofunika kuwonetsetsa pasadzachitikenso zachinyengo zomwe zingadzapangitse zotsatira za chisankhochi zidzakanidweso
Label: POLITICS

Text:
samalani chitopa ku phindu la ulimi wothirira catherine bamusi wa mboma la blantyre adaganiza zogulako nkhuku zachikuda zizimupatsa manyowa ndiwo ngakhalenso ndalama akazingwa 
  adayamba nkhuku 6 chaka chathachi pamene amalowa mchaka chino zidali zitachulukana kufika 50

Text:
apempha achinyamata asinkhesinkhe mozama za chiyitanidwe chawo achinyamata mdziko muno awapempha adzipemphera kusinkhasinkha mozama za chomwe amafuna kudzakhala mmoyo 
 mwakhwawa achinyamata apemphere zolimba wamu ofesi yowona ntchito za mabungwe papa la pontifical mission societies pms vincent mwakhwawa anena lero pomwe mpingo wakatolika umachita chaka cha kuyitanidwa 
 ati kupemphera kusinkhasinkha mozama kungathandize achinyamatawa avomere mayitanidwe mwanzeru 
 ansembe asisteri kukondwelera tsikuli zaka zammbuyomu tsiku limeneli mpingo unatipatsa achinyamata apempherere asinkhe sinkhe zomwe akufuna azachite mtsogolomu choti mulungu amene amatitsogolera zonse anatero mwakhwawa 
 chaka chino zinthu zizinachitike zonse malinga mmene dongosolo la tsikuli limayenera kukhalira kaamb ka mliri wa covid-19

Text:
akukambirana zolola ana chi rasta msukulu unduna wa za maphunziro wati ukukambirana ma rasta unduna wa za malamulo za ana 26 amene ma rasta adapempha aziloledwa kuphunzira msukulu za boma tsitsi la mizeremadiredi 
  anawa amene padakali sakupita kusukulu akuimira ana onse ma rasta amene amaletsedwa kusunga tsitsi lopotana msukulu za boma za mdziko muno 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mwanamanga tinkakambirana bingu kalata yomwe unduna wa za malamulo udalembera unduna wa za maphunziro 27 january 2017 idaunikira undunawo ukuyenera kulandira mwana kuphatikizapo ana amene akusunga tsitsi lopotana malinga chipembedzo chawo 
  potengera kulemekeza mphamvu ya malamulo lino magawo 20 25 33 ufulu wa mmalawi kusasalidwa munthu ufulu wolandira maphunziro otsatira chipembedzo chomwe akufuna 
  kotero potengera lamulo lokhudza maonekedwe za kavalidwe pakati ophunzira lomwe limaletsa kusunga tsitsi pasukulu mukuyenera kulola ana omwe tsitsi lopotana potengera chipembedzo cha chi rasta msukulu za boma idatero kalatayo 
  mneneri wa unduna wa za maphunziro lindiwe chide adati undunawu ukudziwa za kalata yochokera ku unduna wa za malamuloyo adati undunawo ukukambirana mbali zonse zokhudzidwa momwe zingatsatidwire 
  tikukambirana mbali zosiyanasiyana zokhudzidwa za momwe tingayendetsere pulogalamuyi zikatheka mumva sizidzasowa adatero chide 
  sukulu za boma za pulaimale sekondale mdziko muno zimathamangitsa ana omwe tsitsi lopotana potsatira chipembedzo cha u rasta nkhaniyi siyikondweretsa mpangono pomwe eni chipembedzochi 
  kwa zaka zoposa 20 tsopano otsatira chipembedzochi akhala akumenyerera unduna wa zamaphunziro usinthe maganizo nkuyamba kulola anawa msukuluzi nawonso azidyerera ufulu wawo wamaphunziro 
  mtsogoleri wachipembedzochi mdziko muno mgawo la nyabinghi ras mikah chiserah wati zomwe zikuchitikazi zikutanthauza la malawi silivomereza chipembedzo cha chi rasta momwe malamulo amanenera 
  apatu zikutanthauza ma rasta tikufera chipembedzo chonsecho malamulo amati munthu ufulu otsata chipembedzo chomwe akufuna pambali ufulu wa maphunziro adatero ras chiserah 
  adati pomwe ufulu wa zipembedzo unkabwera kumayambiliro ulamuliro wa zipani zambiri ankaona kuponderezedwa kwa owutsatira kwatha akudabwa boma likulephera malamulo opanga lokha 
  kadaulo zamalamulo yemwenso mphunzitsi ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college ku thambi ya zamalamulo edge kanyongolo adati ufulu uli mlingo akaunika nkhani ya ma rastayi saonapo vuto 
  mmalamulo lino muli maufulu osiyanasiyana umodzi mwa maufuluwa nkukondedwa mofanana chokhacho chomwe ufulu ungapatsidwe mlingo mpomwe ukuphwanya ufulu wa sindikuona tsitsi lopotana kukuphwanya ufulu wa munthu wina adatero kanyongolo 
  malingana mneneri wa nyabinghi ras fred mwanamanga kusunga tsitsi lopotana umodzi mwa mizati ya chipembedzo cha chi rasta amalawi otsatira chipembedzochi amayenera kuloledwa kupanga chilichonse chomwe otsatira zipembedzo zina amaloledwa kupanga 
  pomenyerera ufulu wa maphunziro omwe mwanamanga adati otsatira chipembedzochi amamanidwa ma rasta adakumana mtsogoleri wakale bingu wa mutharika yemwe adawalonjeza zonse zikhala 
  mwanamanga adati mwatsoka zisadakhale momwe amayembekezeramo mutharika adamwalira zidachititsa ma rastawa ayambirenso nkhondo yomenyerera ufulu wawo 
  titangomva za imfa ya mutharika tidasweka mitima tidadziwa ntchito ikadalipo 2013 tidayenda ndawala yokapereka kalata ya madandaulo kulikulu la lino ku lilongwe komwe tidayankhidwa madandaulo athu apita kwa pulezidenti watero mwanamanga 
  wati pakhala pakuchitika zokambirana pankhaniyi pakati ma rasta unduna wa zamaphunziro unduna wa za malamulo magulu zamaufulu potsatira zokambiranazi unduna wa za malamulo udalangiza unduna wa za maphunziro uyambe kupereka mpata kwa ophunzira chipembedzo cha chi rasta
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
imfa ya chikulamayembe yautsa mapiri pachigwa mkangano wabuka mbanja la gondwe za munthu yemwe akuyenera kulowa ufumu wa chikulamayembe 
  mpungwepungwewu wayamba potsatira imfa ya walter gondwe yemwe adali mfumu chikulamayembe    chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka malemu mfumu chikulamayembe mfumu chikulamayembe idamwalira november 29 2018 
  isadamwalire idasankhiratu mwana mtima gondwe ndiye adzalowe ufumu mafumu adavomera nkusainira panganoli chikulamayembe asadatsikire kulichete 
  atamwalira zinthu zidasokonekera kaamba koti mafumu akuti mtima sangalowe ufumu mmalo mwa atate kaamba koti ufumuwu si wa banja limodzi umazungulira mmabanja 12 
  mafumu achitumbuka akuti 1795 pamene ufumu wa chikulamayembe adaukhazikitsa wazungulira mmabanja 9 
  mabanjawa gonapamuhanya kampungu pitamkusa bwati woyamba wachiwiri bamantha mkuwayira mujuma 
  mabanja atatu omwe atsala nawonso alongedwe ufumu wa chikulamayembe mkupa mzakwacha bongololo 
  pachifukwa ichi mabanja akuti ufumuwu sukuyenera kubwerera mbanja la walter moti akadandaula ku bwalo lalikulu la milandu mzinda wa mzuzu 
  akuti ufumu wa chitumbuka umasiyana wa chingoni kaamba koti sukhala wa banja limodzi 
  pofuna kumvetsetsa nkhaniyi msangulutso udacheza mafumu 6 mbanja la gondwe omwe chikalamba bongololo mkupa kalizga tawona webster omwe atsimikiza adakasumadi ku khoti 
  mneneri wa mafumuwa stowel kalizga gondwe adalongosola ufumu wa chikulamayembe wakhala ukuzungulira mbanja limodzi ya john hardy gondwe 1977 
  atamwalira john hardy ufumu sumayenera kupita kwa mwana walter gondwe kwa bwati gondwe 
  choti walter amakhala adali wophunzira mafumu adaganiza zomulongabe ufumu adatero gogo chikalamba 
  apa mpomwe padapindika nkhani 
  padakali aku banja la gondwe ufumu wathu uyambenso kuzungulira momwe zidaliri mmbuyomu angoni asadatithire nkhondo 
  lidziwe mwambo wa ufumu wathu anzathu gulu la mtima gondwe sakugwirizana nazo adatero kalizga gondwe 
  adati banja la gondwe likuyenera kusankha mfumu mmabanja atatu otsala aja 
  titakatula madandaulo athu kwa bwanamkubwa wa boma lino adatibwenza potiuza sagwira ntchito mafumu wamba 
  pachifukwa ichi tidalemba kalata ku boma yofotokoza madandaulo athu mpaka lero sadatiyankhebe 
  titaona masiku akudutsa osayankhidwa mmwezi wa march tidakasuma ku bwalo la milandu pakadali tikungodikira masiku adatero kalizga gondwe 
  adati asadapite ku khoti mabanja onse okhudzidwa adakhala pansi mafumu mwamlowe katumbi woimira milandu victor gondwe abizinesi alfred longwe malopa gondwe akambirane mwamtendere 
  kalizga adati adagwirizana zoti mtima apitirize kulamulira akadzangochoka ufumu udzayambenso kuyenda mmabanja 
  zomwe zidachititsa maganizo mpaka poti tikafike ku khoti zoti titachoka kuzokambiranazo komwe mtima sadabwereko adangotumiza nthumwi adatero   mwa mafumuwo tawona gondwe adati zinthu zidalakwika pachiyambi pamene malemu walter adasankhiratu mwana ndiye adzalowe mmalo mwake akadzamwalira 
  polankhulapo imodzi mwa mafumu omwe adawakhazika anthuwa pansi mwamlowe idati nzokhumudwitsa nkhani za ufumu zizipita ku bwalo la milandu 
  adati kuzokambiranaku mafumuwa adadandaula za khalidwe la mtima tidagwirizana popeza adasainira kale walter asadamwalire mwana wakeyu ndiye mlowammalo angopitiriza adzayambe mwambo wawo mtima akadzachoka 
  sindikudziwa chidachitika nchiyani ayambenso kuwatukwana anzake mafumu tikhalanso pansi tikambirane mfumu imayenera izilemekeza ake izikhala ya bata yodzichepetsa adalongosola mwamlowe 
  polankhulapo msangulutso mtima gondwe adati sakudziwa zomwe mafumuwo akukamba 
  inetu adachita kundiitanita mchaka cha 2012 ndidzakhale mfumu kuno ndinkagwira ntchito community development officer unduna woona zoti pasamakhale kusiyana pakati amayi abambo adalongosola motero mtima 
  adati ufumu wa chikulamayembe

Text:
zipani za moyo zionekecmd kodi zipani zinazi zili moyo yofukula yakwana mzipani pamene bungwe loona mgwirizano wa zipani zosiyanasiyana la centre for multiparty democracy cmd lalengeza zokumana akuluakulu zipani 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu bungweli laitana zipani 41 zomwe zidalembetsedwa zilibe aphungu mnyumba ya malamulo 
  cmd ikuchita kudutsa kwa bilo yokamba za kayendetsedwe ka zipani imene mwa zina ikuti zipani zimene sizikuoneka zichotsedwe mkaundula pakatha miyezi 12 
  tenthani tiwaimbira kalata yomwe cmd yatulutsa ikuti eni zipanizo atumize ku bungwelo maina mtsogoleri wawo mlembiatumizenso nambala madera amene akukhala 
  wa bungwelo kizito tenthani adati zipanizo zikatumiza maina manambalawo adzawaimbira akumane nawo awafotokozere zomwe zili mbiloyo 
  adati satiyankha mwina zisonyeza kulibe munthu pakatha miyezi 12 ndiye zisonyeza chipanicho chazimirirakusonyeza osindikiza zipani atha kuchifufuta 
  mwa zipani zomwe zaitanidwa cha the malawi democratic mdp chomwe mwa amene adachiyambitsa kamlepo kalua yemwe lero ku pp 
  chipani china cha malavi peoples party mpp chomwe adayambitsa uladi mussa amene akungoyendayenda adali ku udf asadasinthe golo kupita ku dpp madzi atachitako katondo adalumphamo kugwera pp lero wasinthanso golo kubwerera ku dpp 
  titamuimbira foni alembere bungweli mtsogoleri mussa adayankha modabwa malavi ndiye chiyani adafunsa aaa nanga mesa ndidachokako ndidali ku pp ndili ku dpp inuyo mungopitako mukaone atsogoleri amene apitawo osati muzindifunsa adatero 
  tenthani chikhulupiriro zipanizi ziwalembera wa cmd nditachoka lero sizikutanthauza cmd yatha atsogoleri otsalawo ndiwo angayankhepo atafunidwa titsimikiza mzipanizo mudatsala amene atilembere adatero 
  mndandanda wa zipanizi womwe udalembetsedwa mdziko muno zipani zokhazikika zina mwa zipani zoitanidwazo zidamveka pachisankho cha 1994 osamvekanso cha congress for the second republic cha kanyama chiume malawi democratic union cha amunandife mkumba united front for multiparty democracy malawi national democratic party zina zotero 
  lino lili zipani zoposera 50
Label: POLITICS

Text:
chisankho chopanda mudyo kodi azitaya chisankho cha 2019 sakuchionetsa dovu pamene zipani 12 zimene zidatulutsa atsogoleri 2014 zinayi zokha pakadalipano zimene zaonetsa chidwi chotulutsa atsogoleri 
  zikuchitika pamene kwangotsala miyezi 7 yokha lino lichititse chisankho chapatatu chomwe chichitike may chaka chikudzachi 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka chibambo cheteyu ndiye sitiyimira zipani zinayizo democratic progressive party dpp peoples party pp malawi congress party mcp cha united democratic front udf kuli gulu la united transformation movement utm lomwe langobwera kumene limenenso likuonetsa chidwi chodzapikisana nawo 
  mdziko muno muli zipani zoposa 50 zomwe zidalembetsedwa zina mwa zipanizo sizipikisana nawo pampando wa mtsogoleri wa 
  pocheza tamvani zipani zisanu zatsimikiza sizidzapikisananawo 2019 malinga kusadabuzika komwe adakuona pachisankho cha 2014 
  mwa zipanizi cha malawi forum for unity and development mafunde peoples progressive movement ppm national salvation front nasaf united independence party uip new labour party nlp 
  chipani cha pfuko ccp chomwe mtsogoleri davies katsonga sichipikisana nawo chipanicho chidagawana zida pamene mtsogoleri davis katsonga adasamuka kukalowa ku dpp 
  mtsogoleri wa mafunde george mnensa adati alibe chilakolako chopikisananawo mtsogoleri wa lino chaka chatha kudali atsogoleri 12 zomwe adaziona ndizokwanira ku fuko la malawi 
  ndibwino tingothandizira mwina pakhale oimira ochepa zomwe zimapangitsa asankhe molondola adatero mnensa 
  adati pali chiyembekezo chipani chake chipanga ubale zipani zina akhale mtsogoleri 
  pamene mtsogoleri wa peoples transformation party petra kamuzu chibambo adati chete amene waoneka kuchipani kwawo umboni alibe khumbo loimira 
  achikhala ndikuimira bwezi mutamva zochitika zambirimbiri tiwadziwitse zii amene umboni sitikuyimira kugwira ntchito limodzi zipani chabwino ku wa malawi adatero chibambo 
  kupatula kugwa mochititsa manyazi komwe adakuona 2014 zipanizi zidati zinthu zinanso kusagwira ntchito kwa lamulo lokhudza zipani political parties act lomwe lidavomerezedwa chaka chatha kwathandiziranso 
  akuti sakufuna kudzangodzidzimutsidwa yothaitha atachititsa kale kampeni 
  kadaulo ndale ernest thindwa adati sizodabwitsa zipani zikulakatika pamene tikupita kuchisankho cha 2019 cha ndondomeko ya chisankho imene lino limatsatira 
  adati mdziko muno muli ndondomeko yoti amene wapeza mavoti ambiriyo amene wapambana posayangana amene sadamuvotere 
  zimapangitsa ambiri agwe mphwayi akapikisane nawo ndiye sizachilendo kumva azitaya adatero thindwa 
  adati achikhala lino limagwiritsira ntchito ndondomeko ya 50 + 1 ambiri bwezi ataonetsa chidwi chopikisana nawo
Label: POLITICS

  zinthu zikupitirira kuvuta miyoyo ya ili pamoto kuno ku mwanza njala ikukhudza palibe yemwe adakolola

Text:
aletsa zionetsero za madzi wa bungwe loona za ufulu wa ogula la cama john kapito lachinayi adalepheretsa zionetsero mpaka lero ozungulira blantyre akusaukirabe madzi 
  chionetserochi chidakonzedwa wa pamene amati ayende kukadandaulira kampani yogulitsa madzi ya blantyre water board bwb 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zionetserozi zimadza pamene kwatha mpaka miyezi iwiri madzi mmadera amumzindawu asakutuluka mumzindawu kapito adati tidakumana akuluakulu bungweli atitsimikizira ayamba kupereka madzi taona palibenso chochitira zionetsero pamene atilonjeza ayamba kupereka madzi kapito adauza atolankhani 
  pofika lachinayi madera ambiri mumzinda wa blantyre madzi adali akuvutabe zomwe zidachititsa kukwiya nazo 
  mwa anthuwo rawjazz siula akuti tsiku lina kudzachita zionetsero zosagwirizana bungwe la cama popusitsa amalawi 
  basi bwana kapito akatinamize pamene tikunena patha sabata zambiri madzi asakutuluka sadayitane omwe amawauza ayende pamsewu zionetsero zalephereka sakumvetsa siula 
  mwayi mbwelera akuti nkhani ya madzi yavuta kotero zionetsero si bwenzi zitalephereka kuno ku mbayani tikusaukira madzi yonseyi samatibweretsera madziwo zalakwika adatero

Text:
ayamba kuponya voti mdziko la botswana wolemba thokozani chapola /2019/10 botswana voting-300x168.jpg alt= width="521 height="292 />anthu mdziko la botswana kuyipa pamzere kukaponya voti yawo mdziko la botswana ayamba lero kuponya voti yosankha mtsogoleri wa phungu akunyumba ya malamulo 
 malinga malipoti bbc aka ndikoyamba mdzikomo achite chisankhochi chilandilireni ufulu odzilamulira mchaka cha 1966 
 pafupifupi 900 000 omwe akuyembekezeka aponye nawo voti yi 
 zipani ziwiri za botswana democratic party bdp chomwe cholamula chipani chotsutsa cha umbrella for democratic change udc zomwe zikupikitsana chisankhochi 
 mwa zina chipani chotsutsa cha udc chati chili chikhulupiliro chonse chipambana chisankhochi kaamba koti manifesto ake akukamba zodzapereka mwayi wa ntchito kwa 100 000 chikapambana chisankhochi 
 malipoti amasonyeza mwa 2.2 million omwe mdziko mo 20 omwe sali ntchito 
 la botswana limodzi mwa maiko ochita mmayiko muno africa kaamba ka malonda mnyanga ya njovu kudzaso miyala ya mtengo wapatali ya wa diamond
Label: POLITICS

Text:
wonyozedwa moyo alemekezedwa atamwalira gogo wina ku ntcheu yemwe amagona pachisakasa chonga pogulitsira tomato abale ake akukana agone mnyumba yabwino adalemekezedwa atamwalira siwa idali nyumba ya makono ya mwa abale amamukana moyowo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu batameyu james wa zaka 67 wakhala akugona panjapo samapatsidwa chakudya amangodzionongera mvula idakhala ikumuthera pathupi abale ake atatemetsa nkhwangwa pamwala sangayerekeze kumuthandiza 
  james mchisakasa chomwe ankagona gogoyu asadamwalire adauza msangulutso 25 december 2015 ankagwira ntchito yaulonda ku lirangwe mboma la blantyre pamene adabwerera kumudzi kwawo sadamulandire 
  ndinkagwira ntchito yolondera ndidapita kale sindingakumbuke liti mkazi wanga adamwalira komweko ndidaganiza zobwerera kumudzi kuno yomwe ndimabwera nkuti ndikudwala adatero gogoyu nthawiyo 
  ganizo lobwerera kumudzi kwawo kwa howa t phambala silidakomere mchemwali wa gogoyu felisita james 
  gogoyo adafikira pamtengo amagona pomwepo sabata isadathe akuti matenda adakula samayenda 
  chimbudzi ndikupangira pomwepa sindingakwanitse kupita kuthengo miyendo yafa ndikuzizidwa kwambiri zofundazinso zikumanyowa kukabwera mvula adatero akali moyo 
  titamufunsa felesita chomwe sadamulandirire mbale adati sakufuna kulankhula zambiri titamupempha amulole gogoyu azigona mnyumba mwake adati alowe mnyumbamu ndiye ndituluka 
  kodi pali chiyani chomwe akulangira mbale wawo muwafunse adachoka liti pakhomo ndiye andifune lero nanensotu ndine wokalamba iwowo wamkulu adatero 
  matenda atakula gogoyu akuti adakomoka ndiye patsikuli adatengedwa oyandikana nyumba agone mnyumba mwawo 
  chisakasa cha jemusi kumbuyoko nyumba ya siwa28 apa pamene mudziwo udagwirizana umumangire nyumba gogoyu malinga nyakwawa howa sizidatheke 
  timafuna tipeze kaye udzu mpaka amwalira tisadakumanebe timumangire nyumba gogoyu mbale wawo wotchedwa mkwaso ndiye adadzazika timitengoti idatero mfumuyo 
  13 february akuti kudayamba mvula yosalekeza mpaka 15 mvulayinso akuti idamuthera pathupi gogoyu 
  gogoyo akuti adazizidwa kwambiri mmawa wa 15 adapeza wamwalira abale adasonkhana kuyamba mwambo wa maliro 
  chodabwitsa thupilo akuti adalirowetsa mnyumba ya felesita ayambe kukhuza nsima yomwe wakhala akuisowa akuti idaphikidwa achibale adalira mosaleka 
  gulupu mpochela idati adakwiya kuona banjali lidaganiza zolemekeza maliro kusiyana munthu wamoyo 
  gogogyu wakhala akuvutika kwa yaitali adabwera kuno october mpaka wamwalira akugona panja opanda chakudya lero wamwalira ndiye amulowetsa mnyumba ya malata paphikidwa chakudya adatero 
  mpochela wati zakumukhumudwitsa aitanitsa banjali likamalira kulira malirowo uku kulakwa kuzuza munthu wamoyo choncho wokalamba uyo sibwino ndawaitanitsa ku bwalo langa adatsimikiza mpochela 
  gogoyu moyo adauza msangulutso ana ku lirangwe pazolengeza za pamalirowo abanja adati malemuwo sadasiye mwana mkazi wawo adamwalira 
  malinga wachibale wina amene adakana kumutchula akukhala mumzinda wa blantyre malemuwa sadabereke mwana ana awiri amene amakhala nawo adali owapeza sadziwanso komwe anawo 
  nkhani zozuza okalamba si zachilendo mdziko muno posakhalitsapa ku neno adapha anayi okalamba powaganizira ufiti
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
dodma yakhazikitsa ndondomeko zatsopano ku dedza ofesi yowona za ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi mboma la dedza yati ichilimika ntchito yokhazikitsa ndondomeko zofuna kuchepetsa ngozi za mtunduwu mbomalo 
 kwa nyengo kukubweretsa mavuto awa mwa akuluakulu ku ofesiyi blessings kamtema anena maphunziro atolankhani mboma la dedza pomwenso amafotokozera za ndondomeko ya momwe ofesi yawo imagwilira ntchito ya ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi 
 mwazina ati pakufunika mgwirizano wabwino pakati ofesi yawo atolonkhani pofuna kupewa kulemba nkhani zosokoneza pamene kwachitika ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi 
 tichite zitukuko zimene zingachepetse mavuto omwe amabwera kamba ka mavuto ogwa mwa dzidzidzi tiyike njira zina zomwe zingateteze ngozi zimenezi zisachitike anatero kamtema 
 polankhulapo mwa atolankhani omwe anatenga nawo gawo maphunzirowa george mponda wati maphunzirowa amuthandiza kudziwa momwe angalembere nkhani zokhudza ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi

Text:

Text:
miyambo ya ukwati ukwati sangotengana nkhuku pali miyambo yake ukalakwitsa miyamboyi mavuto akakugwera umasowa mtengo wogwira pakati achewa miyambo ya ukwati nayo ilipo kondwani kamiyala adacheza chikumbutso funani wa mmudzi mwa phulusa kwa t kasumbu ku dedza atambasule zoyenera kutsata adacheza motere akulu zikuyenda   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka zikuyenda pangonopangono mavuto zachuma omwewa basi 
  funani kukagwa maliro ungasowe mtengo wogwira ndaona mukuchita za kabanza chiyambire ntchito ndiyomweyi ayi ndithu ndidakagwirako ntchito ku famu ina ku ntchisi ndidagwira kwa chaka chimodzi nditalandira malipiro anga pachaka k47 000 ndidabwerera kumudzi kuno ndidagula njinga ndakhala ndikuchita kwa zaka ziwiri 
  maphunziro mudapita nawo patali ndidalekeza sitandade 7 pasukulu ya chipaluka mudziwa zovuta za kuno kumudzi 
  zovuta zanji makolo ambiri amakakamiza ana aleke sukulu azikawathandiza kumunda kupita kuphiri kukasaka nkhuni pofuna tisaone kuzunzika kotero ambiri timasiya sukulu nkukakwatira kukwatiwa tizidzipangira tokha zapakhomo ana akukwatira zaka 15 tsono miyambo ya ukwati imayenda kuno kunotu kumakhala kupereka chapamudzi ya chitengwa kuli chiwongo chamsana chimene madera amati malowolo pamakhala nkhuku 
  tafotokozani poyamba za chapamudzi chamsana 
  chapamudzi ndalama zimene zimaperekedwa mwamuna akufuna mkamwini mmudzi ndalamayi imapita kwa mfumu chitengwa ndiye umapereka kwa mfumu pamene ukutenga mkazi mmudzi ukakhale naye kwanu 
  kodi mitengo yake imasiyana eya imasiyana mwachitsanzo padakali chapamudzi k7 000 pomwe ya chitengwa k5 000 
  cholinga choperekera kwa amfumu nchiyani chikuwakhudza nchiyani pamene awiri akondana musatero kodi utangobwera nkukwatira mmudzi amfumu osadziwa powapatsa chapamudzi utamwalira mwambo wa maliro ungayende nanga utatenga mkazi kupita naye kwanu amfumu osadziwa sunawapatse ya chitengwa mkaziyo nkumwalira mwambo wa maliro ukhala wotani mfumu imakana sitikudziwa tili mkamwini mkazi wakuti nthengwa mmudzi wina 
  kodi mudachita kupita kwa mfumu kukapereka ndalamayo ayi mwa mwambo tidapita kwa eni banja pamtundu wa chifumu amasankha munthu amene amatchedwa mwini banja tikapereka kwa ndiwo amakapereka kwa mfumu 
  tsono munakamba za chiwongo chamsana nkhuku tatambasulani 
  chiwongo chimaperekedwa kuthokoza mkazi adaleledwa mpaka kukula dziwani liwu loti chiwongo limatanthauzanso mfunda amayi amakhala nawo mwachitsanzo mwana wamkazi wa obanda chiwongo chake nabanda tikakamba za chamsana malowolo ndiye amaperekedwa kwa mkazi nkhuku ndiye ija amagawana ankhoswe 
  kodi akuzitsatabe alipo ambiri amene akutsata zina satsatira mitundu ya sakanikirana

Text:

amalimba mtima kukayezetsa magazi sakudwala adziwe momwe chitetezo chilili mthupi mwawo ambiri amaopera kutalitalisafuna kudziwa nkomwe kachilombo ayi wanena udapezeka kachilombo ka hiv chaka chatha kachilomboko zimatheka ndithu kutenga kachilomboka mwatsoka ndithu imodzi mwa njira zotere kutengera kachilomboka pobadwa kwa amene nako ndikhulupirira iweyo udatenga kachilomboka panthawi yobadwa wanena ana onse obadwa mwa ako akumapezeka kachilombo ka hiv chomwe ndingakulangize nchoti pitiriza kumwa mankhwala otalikitsa moyo udzisunge wadzisungira yonseyi udzakhala moyo wautali wosadwaladwala Text:
matenda osapatsirana akuchuluka boma wolemba sylvester kasitomu boma kudzera muunduna wa zaumoyo lati pofika mchaka cha 2025 ambiri mdziko muno azakhala atakhudzidwa matenda kuthamanga kwa magazi shuga kuposa matenda opatsirana edzi 
 othandizira kuyendetsa zipatala ku matenda asapatsirana mdziko muno ku undunawu hestings chigalu chiumia ndiwo ayankhula mboma la zomba pomwe amafotokozera akuluakulu aboma la zomba za matenda amgonagona osapatsirana wa mwazina chiumia alangiza apewe kusuta fodya kuledzara alimbikitse kudya zakudya zamagulu masewera olimbitsa thupi zomwe ndizothandiza asadwale matendawa 
 mwazina ambiri sasata njira zoyenera pakayendetsedwe kwa moyo wawo azadwala matendawa kuposa amene azapezeke matenda opatsilana edzi malungo zina 
 tikamafika chaka cha 2025 ambili azakhala atadwala matendawa kaamba koti masiku ano akukonda kudya zakudya za chipisi cha pachiwaya zina zomwe zingapangitse chiwerengero cha mafuta amthupi chikwere ndikuamba kudwala matendawa anatero chiumia 
 mwazina wapepha apewe kudya zakudya zomwe zingakoledzere kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha mafuta mthupi kukonda masewera kafukufuku anasonyeza muchaka cha 2009 odwala matendawa 33 hundred aliwonse odwala matenda bp 6 hundred aliwonse odwala matensda shuga chaka cha 2016 chinafika kufika 19 hundred aliwonse odwala bp atatu hundred aliwonse odwala shuga

Text:
mwambo woika maliro khanda lozizira amalawi miyambo yosiyanasiyana malinga mitundu yawo achewa angoni atumbuka alhomwe amanganga asena kaya ayao pamwambo woika khanda lopitirira zochitika zimakhala zofanana dailes banda adacheza catherine ligowe afotokoze mmene mwambo woika khanda lozizira umayendera adacheza motere ndikudziweni wanga 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc ndine catherine ligowe ndidabadwa zaka zambiri zapitazo ndimachokera ku ntcheu mmudzi mwa chikadya t ganya ndili ana asanu awiri ndinenso namkungwi kumudzi kwathu ndidali mzamba 
  kuno ku mzuzu mukupezekako mavuto mwanawe kuyeseyesa tipezeko koponyako mkamwamu 
  ku mzuzu kunonso ndinu namkungwi ayi ku mzuzu kuno unamkungwi wanga umakhala wa mmakwalalamu kumudzi komwe ndimagwira ntchitoyi kuchinamwali tere chaka chomwechi ndidali komweko 
  mutiuzeko pangono za maliro akhanda lopitirira mufuna mudziwe tiyambe mwambo wa maliro mmene umakhalira 
  khanda lopitirira limatchedwa khanda lozizira khanda lija amakhala sadakhale kaye pamodzi mwamuna 
  mukutanthauza khanda litamwalira pamiyezi iwiri makolo ake asadakhalire malo amodzi mwambo umakhala wa khanda lopitilira eya timakhulupirira mwanayo sadatenthetsedwe ake 
  zimayenda mwana uja akamwalira amakaikidwa azimayi okhaokha azimayi aja saloledwa kulira malirowo kulira kuja kumachititsa uja asadzaberekenso manda malirowa sakhala akuya maliro munthu wamkulu 
  chiyani sakhala akuya kalekalelo makolo athu ankakhulupirira manda khanda lozizira akakhala akuya kwambiri wa khandalo sadzaberekanso 
  ndiye maliro mapasa mumachita akamwalira mwa ana amapasa azimayi akalira malirowa timakhulupirira mwana wotsala uja amamwaliranso tikamaika malirowa timaika khanda lomwaliralo mvunguti pambali pake mzimu uziona akadali mnzake uja 
  nanga wotsalayo mumatani naye ameneyo timamusambitsa mumankhwala mzimu wa mnzake uja usamamubwerere 
  tsopano mumati mudali mzamba mudabadwitsako mwana wopitirira ayi palibe mwana wopitirira amene ndidabadwitsako 
  mudasiyiranji ntchitoyi boma lidaletsa amene amabereketsa azimayi amafa maso nchifukwa chake anamwino ambiri ochiritsa azimayi kuchipatala amakhala ovala magalasi kalekalelo mzamba asadayambe kugwira ntchito amayamba kaye wasamba mankhwala adziteteze ku ukhungu 
  chimachititsa kufa masoko chiyani chimachitika chakuti azimayi akamabereka zinthu zodabwitsa zambiri ndiye ukaona zinthu zimenezo kwanthawi yaitali maso aja amafa umangoona zinthu mwa mbuu 
  zikomo kwambiri cha yanu 
  zikomo

Text:
zipani zisaope achinyamata bungwe lolimbikitsa achinyamata ndale africa la centre for young leaders in africa cyla lapempha zipani zandale mdziko muno zisaope kugwira ntchito achinyamata 
  malingana mtsogoleri wa pulogalamu yotchedwa programme for young politicians in africa pypa ku bungwe la cyla wochokera mdziko la zambia anna mate achinyamata asakhale chiopsezo chitetezo ndale za mchipani 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mate achinyamata ambiri mate wati zipani zambiri zimene bungwe la cyla lagwira nazo ntchito zimaonetsa zikupereka zokhwima cholinga choti achinyamata azichita mantha nkubwerera mmbuyo ndale 
  olimbikitsa achinyamata ndale tidakumana akuluakulu zipani zandale zokhazikika mdziko muno tawalimbikitsa agwire limodzi ntchito achinyamata ndale adatero mate 
  adati chikhulupiliro uthengawu wadza mnthawi yake potengera nzika za lino zikukonzekera kukaponya voti ya patatu chaka cha maya 
  adatinso zipani zomwe zatsogoza achinyamata mmaudindo zimakhala mwayi waukulu wopititsa patsogolo kuchuluka kwa owatsatira potengera achinyamata omwe akutenga gawo lalikulu la chiwerengero cha lino 
  apemphanso achinyamata kuthandizana kulimbikitsana pamene akufuna kutengapo gawo ndale 
  pakadali cyla ikupitirira kufikira achinyamata cholinga chowadzindikiritsa za udindo wawo ndale za lino kuphatikizapo kuwalimbikitsa kukaponya voti zisankho za patatu za chaka cha mawa 
  pothirirapo ndemanga yemwe akufuna kudzaimira chipani cha malawi congress party mcp ku salima gerald phiri adati zipani zayamba kuthandiza oyimira posatengera zaka za munthu 
  atsogoleri asamangotigwiritsa ntchito achinyamata poyambitsa zipolowe basi yakwana yoti tigwire ntchito limodzi akuluakulu popanda kuopsezedwa adatero phiri
Label: POLITICS

Text:
chipatala cha khansa chitheka september odwala khansa ayembekezere kupuma umoyo wina chipatala chachikulu chothana matendawa chitsegulidwa september chaka chino mumzinda wa lilongwe 
  nduna ya zaumoyo atupele muluzi yatsimikiza za nkhaniyi yati cha ichi boma lichepetsa kusiyiratu kutumiza odwala kunja kukalandira thandizoli 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka peter mutharika kukhazikitsa ntchito yomanga chipatala cha khansa odwala khansa timawatumiza kunja kukalandira thandizo kumangidwa kwa chipatalachi kwatonthoza ambiri mmalo mopita kunja azithandizidwa mdziko momwemuno adatero muluzi 
  malinga nthambi yowona zaumoyo padziko lonse ya world health organisation who matenda khansa amapulula pafupifupi 9 miliyoni chaka 
  who ikutinso pafupifupi 8 mwa 10 alionse amene akupululuka khansa ochokera mmaiko osauka makamaka africa momwe muli la malawi 
  mdziko muno khansa yomwe yafala yokhudza chiberekero pakhosi mmagazi yomwe akulephera kuphupha 
  chachikulu nkuchedwa kupita kuchipatala maiko 30 mwa maiko 100 alionse osauka zipatala zoyenera zothandiza khansa adatero leslie mgalula woimilira who mdziko muno 
  lachitatu msabatayi tamvani itayendera chipatalachi idapeza ntchito yokhoma malata ili mkati kupereka chiyembekezo kwa amalawi amene akhala akulira kwa zakazaka 
  mwa amene adapulumuka ku khansa janet bonwel wa mmudzi mwa ndindi mboma la salima kumangidwa kwa chipatalako chokoma kwa odwala matendawa 
  ndidapezeka khansa ya pamwendo 2001 mzipatala amangondipatsa panado basi ululu sumatha adatero pamene adati adavutika matendawa kwa zaka 6 
  wati boma lionetsetse chipatalachi chithandize osati kusala osauka 
  wa bungwe loyanganira za ovutika khansa la cancer association of malawi regina njirima wati khansa imafunika chipatala chakechake momwe zakhaliramu 
  zimachitika vuto la khansa kuonedwa pafupipafupi adatero 
  njirima adati boma likuyenera kuchilimika kufalitsa uthenga momwe angapezere thandizo kuchipatalachi ponena akuyenera adziwe za thandizo lomwe chipatalachi chidzipereka
Label: HEALTH

Text:
okakamira milongoti zawo lachitatu likubwelali lidzakhala tsiku lowawa kwa amaonera kanema ya mlongoti aerial 
  makanema ambiri adzazima kudzakhala mdima wadzaoneni patsikulo adzayesa kuzimitsa makanema nkuyatsanso sadzayaka adzawatengera kwa okonzetsa osaoneka awa si mathero 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi okhawo omwe zowayenereza kuonera kanema wawo munjira yatsopano ya dijito adzaona kuwala awa mathero zithunzi zamchengamchenga ndinso zooneka mvula ikuwaza pakanema 
  mchaka cha 2006 bungwe la united nations un lidagwirizana maiko onse asiye kugwiritsa ntchito zithunzi zamchengamchenga nkupita kudijito 
  bungweli lidati dijito zithunzi za kanema zizioneka zopanda mchengamchega azimveka opanda manzenene 
  kodi angati akudziwa za kusinthaku mwa khumi omwe tidawapeza mmzinda wa mzuzu atatu amene akudziwa za kusinthaku 
  bungwe loona za ogula la consumers association of malawi cama ati boma lilibe nazo ntchito kwenikweni za kusinthaku 
  zoonetseratu boma silikukhudzidwa kusinthaku silikudziwa chomwe likuchita omwe silidawadziwitse mokwanira za kusinthaku adatero john kapito wa bungweli 
  nayo nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani kondwani nankhumwa mmbuyomu idavomereza boma lalephera kudziwitsa mokwanira za kusinthaku 
  wa bungwe loyanganira za kusinthaku la malawi digital broadcasting network limited mdbnl dennis chirwa adati bungwe lake layesetsa zomwe lingathe 
  adati bungwe lake lagula ma decoder omwe akugulitsidwa mmapositi ofesi onse mdziko muno pamtengo wa k20 000
Label: ARTS AND CRAFTS

Text:
khansala wa dpp mchitolokosi mlandu wa kuba khansala wa dera la bangwe mthandizi mzinda wa blantyre isaac jomo osman mchitolokosi cha apolisi pomuganizira akhuzidwa owononga katundu kuba 
 akuyankha mlandu wakuba osman malinga ofalitsa nkhani za polisi ya limbe inspector patrick mussa khansalayu yemwe wa chipani cha dpp amadziwikanso dzina loti mtopwa 1 wamangidwa lolemba tawuni ya limbe 
 inspector mussa wati 25 may 2019 phungu wa ya malamulo mdera la bangwe orphan shawa kwake ku mpingwe kukondwelera kupambana kwake chisankhocho phungu woyima payekha 
 chikondwelerochi chili mkati osman anzake akuti anafika ku nyumbayi atanyamula zikwanje kuyamba kuswa magalasi galimoto kuba lamya zammanja zisanu zomwe za ndalama zokwana 1 million and 35 thousand kwacha 
 isaac jomo osman amachokera mmudzi mwa mtalimanja mdera la mfumu mponda mboma la mangochi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
mlonda anjatidwa kaamba kosolola pamene kampani ya inovantis mboma la machinga imanyadira izigona tulo tozuna yalemba ntchito ibrahim justin wa zaka 23 mlonda woteteza katundu wawo ku ndipsi kampaniyi sinadziwe yatuma galu kumalondera ya mbuzi yowotcha kale 
  wapolisi wotengera milandu kukhothi liwonde police post ezekiel kalunga adauza bwalo la milandu la liwonde april 19 chaka chino akuluakulu kampani ya inovantis adakagwada kupolisi kukadandaula chipangizo chopanga mphamvu ya magetsi kudzuwa solar panel chidasowa pakampanipo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kafukufuku woyangana chipangizochi mkati wa alonda pakampanipo adakumana munthu wina atanyamula chipangizocho chimene adachizindikira cha kampani yawo 
  alonda onse adatengeredwa kupolisi atapanikizidwa mafunso adazembetsa chipangizocho ndani justin adavomera ndiyeyo adasolola 
  kalunga adapempha khothi limuthyape justin chilango chachikulu popeza khalidwe lakelo lothawitsa makamaka maiko akunja inovantis kudzakhazikitsa bizinesi zawo mdziko muno 
  popereka dandaulo justin adapempha bwalo limupatse chilango chochepa popeza nsanamira ya banja lake 
  woweruza milandu esther phiri adagwirizana kalunga ponena khaliwe lakuba limabwezeretsa chitukuko mmbuyo kotero adamugamula mlondayo akaseweze ndende kwa zaka ziwiri akugwira ntchito yakalavulagaga 
  justin amachokera mmudzi wa kaudzu mdera la mfumu sitola mbomalo
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
jb loto akuluakulu mabungwe ati mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda potsegulira msonkhano wa aphungu lachisanu lapitalo loto la chumba adapereka chiyembekezo kwa amalawi zinthu zikupitirira kuthina 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zadza patangotha maola ochepa banda atangopereka uthenga wa chikhulupiriro chiyembekezo zonse ziyenda mtengo wamafuta udakwera pomwe bungwe loona za mafuta la malawi energy regulatory authority mera lidalengeza petulo wakwera kuchoka k606.30 kufika k704.30 pomwe dizilo adafika k683.60 kuchoka k597.40 
  malinga wa bungwe la ogula la consumers association of malawi cama john kapito kukwerako kukutanthauza zinthu zikweranso mitengo amalawi afinyika kuphwetseratu chiyembekezo chimene banda adapereka 
  adati amalawi akuyenera kudikira zaka 15 20 zikubwerazo zomwe banda adalankhula zidzayambe kupindulira 
  adangochekenira ndizo akhala akuzinena zangosonyezeratu manthu wamavuto akungonena loto chabe osati amalawi angayembekezerepo kanthu zambiri akukamba za kayerekera sizingapindulire munthu wakumudzi panopa 
  chiyembekezo chingabwere pali njira zopindulira amalawi za ntchito zomwe amagwira kumudzi zotukulira anthuwo zomwe zilipo ndikungosangalatsa omvera adatero kapito yemwe adati uthengawo udali wa ndale chabe 
  t mphuka wa mboma la thyolo adati padakali mdera lake madera ambiri mdziko muno akupanidwa malinga mavuto ambiri kuphatikizapo kukwera mtengo kwa mafuta kwa posachedwapa 
  padakali zinthu zina zayamba kale kukwera mtengo banda sindinganenepo kanthu ndikudziwa mtsogoleri wa lino amaona zapatali choncho mavuto amene alipo panopa akhoza kutha akunenera adatero mphuka 
  wa bungwe loona nkhani zachuma zikuyenda mokomera onse la malawi economic justice network mejn dalitso kubalasa wati zomwe banda adalankhula zakhala zikukambidwa bomali wati ndibwino kulankhulaku kuthe ayambe kukwaniritsa 
  uthengawu ukungofuna kuthunzitsa mtima adanenapo nduna ziziunikidwa momwe zikugwirira ntchito sitikudziwa ngatinso zili ndondomeko yofuna kubwezeretsa chuma cha lino 
  zalankhulidwa zambiri amalawi akufuna zooneka akhale mpumulo osati kungolankhula adatero kubalasa 
  kadaulo wa ndale blessings chinsinga adati zikukaikitsa amalawi angatonthole banda adanenera muuthenga ponena pakufunika ntchito ichitike adadzudzulanso banda palibe chomwe akuchita pofuna kukwaniritsa zokonzanso chuma cha lino zomwe zili economic recovery plan erp 
  akuyenera kuyanganira zambiri sitikudziwabe yemwe akuyanganira ndondomeko ya erp nanga tikuchitanji tifikire mlingo omwe tikumvanso mabilu foni akuchita kufika mamiliyoni osaneneka zititengera kufi tifikire pachomwe 
  ndikaona uthengawu wangochuluka kulankhula zina zomwe akhala kale akulankhula chiyembekezo mulibe amadikira ntchito osati adatero chinsinga 
  masiku apitawa kudamveka nyumba ya boma kudali mabilu foni okwana k98 miliyoni mmiyezi 9 kampani ya mafoni ya mtl imafuna kukadula mafoni ya bomayo 
  nkhani ya mavuto za chuma ili mkamwa ogwira ntchito mboma lachiwiri adayamba sitalaka yosonyeza kukwiya kwawo malipiro ochepa pamene mitengo ya zinthu ikupitirira kukwera 
  adatchinga zipata za kumaofesi likulu la nthambi za boma ku lilongwe atanyamula nthambi za mitengo adali kuimba akulemera tikuona akunenepa tikuona 
  malinga wa bungwe la ogwira ntchito mboma la civil service trade union cstu eliah kamphinda banda akufuna malipiro akwere molingana ogwira ntchito mmakampani 
  ogwira ntchito mboma tatopa kudya bonya sitibwerera kuntchito malire ake boma litiganizire boma likuchedwa dala lionjezere malipiro athu tikumva akweza malipiro julaye 5 peresenti sitingalole adatero banda 
  dzulo lidali tsiku lomaliza limene bungwe la cama lidapereka ku boma likonze zina zimene amati zikulakwika mchikalata chomwe adachipereka pakutha zionetsero za 17 january pomwe timasindikiza mneneri wa boma moses kunkuyu adati aitanitsa akuluakulu cama akambirane
Label: POLITICS

Text:
ana achoke mmindanduna mvula yagwa madera ambiri moti kalikiriki mminda kuthira manyowa kubzala kuwokera nkhawa yagona pamchitidwe wogwiritsa ana achichepere ntchito za kumunda pofuna kuzemba mtengo wa aganyu chaka chino boma laneneratu silidzasekerera munthu wopezeka akugwiritsa ana achichepere ntchito mmunda steven pembamoyo adacheza nduna ya zamalimidwe dr allan chiyembekeza pankhaniyi 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu nduna tamva mukuchenjeza za wogwiritsa ana achichepere ntchito mmunda kodi mungatambasulepo pamenepa eya pamenepa tikutanthauza pali omwe amaganiza molakwika mmalo moti azilimbikitsa ana kupita kusukulu amalemba ana ochepa msinkhu kwambiri ntchito mminda makamaka pomwe fodya wagundika 
  mwana wachichepere ganyu mmunda wa fodya ana sayenera kugwira ntchito zoposa msinkhu wawo kodi kumeneku nkulakwa kulakwa kwambiri moti malamulo lino zimenezi salola mwana amayenera azipatsidwa yokwanira yolimbikira maphunziro mwana yemwe amakhalira kugwira ntchito zoposa msinkhu zakumundazo amakhala wotopa paliponse ndiye sangalimbikire maphunziro 
  ndimayesa kumeneku nkuphunzitsa mwana ntchito ayi kumeneku nkuzunza mwana osati kumuphunzitsa ntchito ayi munthu amakhala msinkhu womwe angagwire ntchito zamtundu wina osangoti basi tiyeni watopa azikapumira komweko ayi nkulakwa kwakukulu kumeneku 
  chiyembekeza ana azipita kusukulu osati kumunda kodi vuto limeneli lalikulu vutoli lalikulu ndithu komabe poti tidayamba kale kudziwitsa za nkhanza zopita kwa ana makamaka pankhani yowagwiritsa ntchito yoposa msinkhu wawo adamvetsetsa adasintha alipo omwe amakhulupirira mwana safuna malipiro ambiri akagwira ntchito ndiye amaona chidule kugwiritsa mwana ntchito kusiyana munthu wamkulu 
  zimakhala anawo sachita kukafunsira ntchitoyo okha tikudziwa za nkhani ya umphawi mmene ilili ana ambiri akhozadi kukafunsira ntchito okha apezeko mwina chakudya ndalama zodzithandizira kumavuto osiyanasiyana ambiri amakhala oti mwina alibe makolo kapenanso ndiwo akuyanganira ana anzawo ndiye palibe chomwe angachite pogwira alibe ambiri mwa ana omwe amakumana nkhanza zamtundu umenewu mgulu limeneli 
  nanga munthu utakhala ndalama zolipira aganyu mwana uja nkukupeza akufuna ganyu athandizike ungatani apa mpamene pamabwerera mtima wa umunthu munthu wamkulu uli udindo wongothandiza mwanayo uli thandizo kumuunikira aike maganizo pasukulu osati maganyu ambiri mwa anawa amachokera mmadera momwe ifeyo timakhala mbiri yawo timayitsata tsono chotiletsa nchiyani kungowathandiza nanga poti amagwiritsa ntchito ana omwe oterewa sangadziteteze ufulu wawo poti mwanayo wawo malamulo lino amaneneratu poyera mwana apite kusukulu osati azikagwira ntchito mmunda ayi palibe munthu yemwe mphamvu zilizonse zosintha malamulo amenewa lamulo likuti ichi ayi ayi basi 
  ndiye mukungodziwitsa palibe zilango zake lamulo lililonse labwino limakhala zilango zomwe olakwa angalandire ataliphwanya tikadzapeza munthu wolemba kugwiritsa ana ntchito tidzamutengera kubwalo la milandu komwe akagamulidwe potsatira zomwe malamulo akunena sitidzalola oterewa apatside ufulu wosalandira chilango

Text:
abzala mitengo ku neno kukuphopholedwa mitengo ku neno makala ambiri akuti akuchokera mbomalo malinga woyanganira nkhalango kumeneko 
  cha ichi mkuluyo emmanuel ngwangwa dc wa bomalo memory kaleso monteiro lachitatu adatsogolera kubzala mitengo mmudzi mwa hiwa kwa t chekucheku 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc patsikulo mitengo 1 200 ndiyo idabzalidwa chiyembekezo nchakuti pakutha chaka chino abzale mitengo 750 000 kusiyana chaka chatha pamene adabzala mitengo pafupifupi 500 000 
  ngwangwa adati chaka chaka akubzala mitengo imene ikupulumuka yochepa cha amene amatentha nkhalango amene amadyetsera ziweto paliponse 
  tauza mafumu aonetsetse zotere zachepa tauza abzale mtengo umodzi chaka atha kuposera apa atengepo mbali pobzala mitengo adatero ngwangwa 
  bungwe la shire river basin management project ndilo lidapereka thandizo la mitengoyi thandizo loti pakhale kukumana pakati akuluakuluwa

Text:
limbani simenti kukangalika zoimba ku malawi kuno kuli oimba zauzimu ochuluka mwa limbani simenti yemwe akudziwika iyetu amadziwika kwambiri nyimbo ya ndikuoneni chimwemwe sefasi adamupeza mnyamata wa ku ndirandeyu adacheza naye motere ndikudziwe 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi dzina langa ndine limbani simenti ndimachokera chigawo cha kumwera mboma la thyolo t nsabwe mmudzi wa matekenya 
  adaimba ndikuoneni baba simenti kodi zoimbaimbazi mudayamba liti inetu zoimbaimba ndidayamba kanthawi pamene ndidali sitandade 4 chidwi chidayamba kundipeza pomwe ndidayamba kuimba kwaya ya mount sinai 1999 2010 pomwe ndidayamba kuimba praise team ya mpingo wa all for jesus 2011 mpomwe ndidatulutsa chimbale changa cha lungisani mpiro kutanthauza konzani moyo wanga 
  kodi nkhani zamaimbidwe umaziona malawi nkhani za maimbidwe zili malawi kungoti ubwino weniweni umaoneka munthu ukakhala chidwi ukaikapo mtima wako wonse kudziwa chomwe ukufuna pamoyo wako zomwe umabzala zomwe umakolola 
  kodi nyimbo yako ya ndikuoneni imatiphunzitsanji ndikuoneni baba nyimbo yomwe mumapezeka mphamvu iyi nyimbo yomwe imatifupikiritsa chifupi mulungu mwachitsanzo ndikamati baba ndifuna ndikuoneni imakhala ikusonyeza tili paubale weniweni mulungu nyimbo yomwe uthenga ndimati ndikaumva ndimaona mlengi amene adandipatsa uthengawo ndilakhule kudzera mnyimbo posonyeza nkhawa zathu timatula kwa yehova kuonetsa ubale weniweni mulungu nyimbo imeneyi imapezeka mchimbale chotchedwa lungisani mpiro chomwe mudali nyimbo 12 uligwindi njoka yokalamba yesu salemphera zina pamene dvd idatuluka dzina loti ndikuoneni 
  kodi chaka chino amalawi ayembekezere zotani kuchoka kwa iwe ndikuwalonjeza amalawi tisanafike kumapeto chaka chino cha 2015 ndiwapatsira chimbale chomwe chili nyimbo 12 zomwe panopa ndamaliza kujambula

Text:
ccjp yadzudzula wa ziwawa ndale mdziko muno bungwe la chilungamo mtendere la catholic commision for justice and peace ccjp lati lokhudzidwa wa ziwawa ndale ukuchitika mdziko muno pomwe mkati mokonzekera chisankho chatsopano cha mtsogoleri wa lino chomwe chidzachitike 2 july chaka chino 
 wasayinira chikalatacho chibwana bungweli lanena kudzera chikalata chake chomwe latulusa podzudzula wu chikatatachi chati zomvetsa chisoni andale sakutenga nawo gawo pophunzitsa owatsatira za kuipa kwa wa ziwawa zomwe zikuononga lino 
 bungweli lati mzika za lino zikuyenera ziwunike andalewa pomwe akuyembekezeka kukaponya voti chisankho cha president wa 2 july chaka chino 
 mwazina chkalati chatsindika zina mwa ziwawa zamtopola zomwe zachitika mmadera mdziko muno kuphwanyidwa kwa zipangizo za bungwe la mec ku malo ochitira kalembera kuwotchedwa kwa nyumba kuphedwa kwa zomwe akuganizira akuchita chipani cha democratic progressive dpp
Label: POLITICS

Text:
bajeti sidaganizire akumudzi mwana agwiritse akutero amabungwe ati poti ndondomeko ya boma ya chuma ya chaka cha 2012 mpaka 2013 inayenera kulingalira zochepetsera munthu wakumudzi ululu wa kugwa kwa ndalama ya kwacha 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc aunikira wa bungwe loona ufulu wa ogula la consumers association of malawi cama john kapito mphunzitsi wa zachuma ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college ben kaluwa mafumu msabatayi 
  apa nkuti aphungu ku nyumba ya malamulo atandaulanso ndondomekoyi pomwe inaperekedwa nduna ya zachuma dr ken lipenga mnyumbayo lachisanu sabata yatha aphungu ayambe kukambirana 
  ndemangazi zalunjika poti ndondomekoyi ikomere akumudzi omwe achulukira malinga kalembera wa wa 2008 
  kalemberayo adaloleza chiwerengero cha mdziko muno chili pafupifupi 13 miliyoni 
  mwa chiwerengerochi pafupifupi 84 mwa 100 alionse amakhala kumudzi 16 otsalawo amene mmatauni mmizinda 
  mavuto akulu kapito wati malinga ndikugwa kwa ndalama ya kwacha moyo wa akumudzi uli pamoto 
  boma lachotsa msonkho nyuzipepala buledi kaunjika mutha kuwona za mtawuni mokha osati kumudzi 
  njira yopulumutsira munthu wakumudzi kumupatsa maganyu opezerapo kangachepe watero kapito 
  watinso boma likuyenera kukhazikitsa njira zoti katundu kumudzi asamakwere moboola mthumba 
  kaluwa wati boma langoika chidwi mmizinda mmatauni nkoyenera lichitepo kanthu madandaulowo akumudzi 
  mbali ya zamaphunziro ya zipangizo zotsika mtengo ndikomwe ndikuona ndondomekoyi yaserapo kuthandiza wakumudzi 
  lolemba lathali aphungu ku nyumba ya malamulo adapemphanso boma likhazikitse njira zothandizira kumudzi 
  mneneri wa zachuma kuchipani cha mcp joseph njobvuyalema boma laika patsogolo munthu wa mtauni osati wakumudzi 
  zipangizo zaulele njobvuyalema wati boma lidakaonetsetsa ndondomekoyo ikupatsa munthu wakumudzi ntchito ganyu atha kupeza ndalama 
  kugwa kwa ndalama ya kwacha pafupifupi theka la mphamvu zake vuto lalikulu kwa munthu wakumudzi zinthu zidakwera pomwe alibe pogwira adatero njobvuyalema 
  t phambala ya mboma la ntcheu yati ndondomekoyi ya chaka chino yaikabe ndondomeko ya zipangizo zotsika mtengo komabe wati boma lichite kanthu pofewetsa moyo wa munthu wakumudzi 
  wati boma likuyenera lipitirize ndondomeko ya nthandizi yomwe akuti ndiyo ingapindulire akumudzi 
  otenga nawo mbali pantchito za pansi ndondomeko ya nthandizi amalipidwa pomwe agwira ntchito patsiku amalandira amalandira k200 
  boma liganizire zobweretsanso ndondomekoyi kukweza malipiro kufika k400 watero phambala 
  mfumu themba chikulamayembe ya mboma la rumphi yati kumudziko zinthu zakwera mtengo kotero boma liike njira zoti akumudzi athandizike 
  bajeti isinthe miyoyo mary jimu wa mboma la chikhwawa kwa t mulolo wati akumudziko avutika ndondomekoyi sidasinthe moyo wawo 
  tili mabungwe kumudzi kuno bwenzi boma litaika ndalama mmabungwemo azithandizira akumudzi kuno 
  titha kumapeza ngongole ntchito zakumudzi momwe zilili moyo ukhala wovutirako adatero jimu 
  thoko loga yemwe amathira utoto galimoto ku chilinde mumzinda wa blantyre wati mndondomeko ya zachumayo mulibe chawo 
  ntchito zikusowa maso boma akhale omwe saali pantchito zinthu zakwera mtengo yemwe sakugwira ntchito akugulabe zinthuzo mtengo wokwerawo adatero loga 
  mneneri wa boma moses kunkuyu wati ndondomekoyi yayesetsa kufungatira akumudzi watinso asaiwale ndondomekoyi ya chaka chinoyi yofuna kukonza chuma chomwe pakatipa sichimayenda 
  wati mndondomekoyi muli zina zomwe zingapindulire munthu wakumudzi ndalama zomwe zalowa mgawo la chitukuko cha kumudzi ya social cash transfer 
  tikati kukonzanso sikutanthauza mukukonza mtauni mokha ndikusiya kumudzi zilipo zambiri zopindulira munthu wakumudzi 
  mwachitsanzo kuchotsa misonkho buledi zina zipindulira munthu wakumudzi adatero kunkuyu 
  enanso anayamikira kale ndondomeko ya chaka chino yomwe ya k406 biliyoni kusiyana ya chaka chatha ya k394 biliyoni 
  unduna wa zamaphunziro walandira k74 biliyoni yomwe yochuluka kuponsa maunduna onse 
  chaka chatha undunawo unali k54 biliyoni 
  unduna wa zaulimi walandira k68 biliyoni yomwe k40 biliyoni ya zipangizo zotsika mtengo
Label: POLITICS

Text:

   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu patsikulo mwa pabanjalo steven moses wa zaka 47 adamwalira atamwa mkalabongo wochuluka osadyera

  amos idali imfa yowawa adati mmbuyomo sadalandireko lipoti lilironse loti mbale wakeyo samamva atamva uthengawo adathamangira ya malemuyo komwe adakapeza atauma kale 
  tidamupeza atauma pamphepete pake pali mabotolo mkalabongo mulibe kanthu osayamba idali imfa yowawa adatero amos

  titalandira uthenga wa imfayo tidathamangirako titatengera mtembowo kuchipatala cha kamuzu central madotolo adatsimikiza imfayo idachitika kaamba ka mowa oposa mlingo adatero chimthere 
  aaron tsokwe yemwe amagulitsa kanyenya mumsika wa nsungwi komwe malemuyo amakonda kumwera mowa adati mkuluyu amakonda mowa wa kachasu wa mmasacheti amakonda mowa choncho adalibe mbiri ya ndewu

  wa bungwe lolimbana ogwiritsa ntchito mankhwala ozunguza bongo la drug fight malawi yemwenso amayendetsa mgwirizano wolimbikitsa pakhale ndondomeko zoyendetsera kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka mankhwala wa malawi alcohol policy alliance nelson zakeyu adati imfa zotere zikunka patsogolo kaamba kosowa ndondomeko zoyenera 
  adati zikadatha boma likadakhala ndondomeko zoyenera njira zamphamvu zoonetsetsa ndondomekozo zikugwiradi ntchito 
  timatsogoza kunena azidyera akafuna kumwa mowa mmalo mongoletsa anthuwo asamamwe adatero zakeyu 
  mneneri wa polisi mdziko muno james kadadzera adauza msangulutso lachinayi mkati mosonkhanitsa ngozi zomwe zachitika mkatikati mwa nyengo ya zisangalalo ntchito yomwe ikukhudza kusonkhanitsa chiwerengero cha imfa zokhala ya steven 
  adati apolisi amagwira ntchito usana usiku kuwonetsetsa akutsatira malamulo cholinga chopewa zinthu zosakhala imfa zopeweka za uchidakwa 
  malamulotu alipo pamlingo wa zaka zovomerezeka kumwa mowa yomwera mowa mamwedwe oyenera ichi nchifukwa chake zina apolisi amayendera malo omwera kufuna kuona ndondomeko zikutsatidwa adatero kadadzera

Text:
boma lati lithandiza pokhazikitsa malo oyezera coronavirus ku chancellor college boma lati ndilokonzeka kuthandiza sukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor mzinda wa zomba ikhazikitse malo oyezera kachilombo ka coronavirus 
 msaka tichitapo kanthu nduna ya zamalamulo yemwenso membala wa komiti yowona za nthenda ya covid-19 mdziko muno bright msaka anena lachiwiri pambuyo poyendera ndikuona ntchito zomwe boma la zomba likugwira polimbana nthendayi 
 ati okhutira malo oyezera omwe alipo padakali ku nthambi ya biology ku sukuluyi omwe ati zonse zowayenereza kupatulapo kusowa kwa zipangizo zoyezera nthendayi 
 taona chancellor college ili zipangizo zoyenera kuyeza matenda covid-19 ikugwira ntchito zomwe achipatala angathe kugwira yomwe mbali imodzi yomwe timakhazikitsira sukulu za ukachenjede zizithandiza pamene pasowekera anatero msaka 
 ati boma ndilokonzeka kuthandiza yemwe waonetsa chidwi chothandiza nawo ntchito yolimbana mliriwu
Label: HEALTH

Text:
akuganizira mwana kupha ake kudalembedwa mbaibulo masiku otsiriza mitundu idzaukirana ana nawo adzaukira makolo osati momwe zafikira mponda t nyoka mboma la mchinji 
  mwana wina kumeneko akumusunga mchitokosi pomuganizira adapha ake pankhani ya malo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mneneri wapolisi mbomalo moses nyirenda watsimikiza apolisi akusunga christopher chirwa wa zaka 56 pomuganizira adapha ake pataleo chirwa wa zaka 90 powanyonga pakhosi malingana nzotsatira za kuchipatala 
  mmene nkhani yonse ilili tikukaikira mwana wa malemuyu zifukwa zingapo choyamba adali limodzi tsiku lomwe malemuyo adakapezeka atafa chachiwiri malemuyo adapezeka chingwe mkhosi pamalo oti munthu sangadzimangilire chomaliza achipatala adatsimikiza malemuyo adafa kaamba kokhinyika adatero nyirenda 
  zambiri omwalira kaamba kodzimangilira amapezeka akulendewera kutanthauza sikelo ya thupi lonse imathera pakhosi pomwe padina chingwe chodzimangiliriracho 
  chomwe chidazizwitsa imfa ya bamboyu nchakuti adapezeka atakoledwa chingwe mkhosi adadzimangirira thupi lonse lili pansi wakhala tsonga nthambi yomwe idagwira chingweyo ili yowetezeka 
  patsikulo lomwe 16 july 2016 mmawa nyirenda adati mwanayo adauza ake apite kudimbako akaunikirane za malire bamboyo sadabwerere mpaka pomwe adapezeka atafa mmunda wina wa mphepete mwa njira 
  nyirenda adati apolisi atafika pamalopo adatenga mtembo wa bamboyo nkupita nawo kuchipatala akaupime pomwe mwanayo adapita naye kupolisi afufuze nkhani yonse mwaufulu
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
akagwira jere zaka zinayi kaamba kovulaza ake bwalo loyamba la milandu mboma la mangochi lalamula wina za zaka 40 akakhale kundende kwa zaka zinayi kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kaamba komupeza olakwa mlandu wovulaza 
 bwalolo linamva yu idi abdul anavulaza akewo powakhapa khwangwa paphewa ati kamba kopsa mtima zimene zinachitika posamusungira chakudya atafika ya usiku pakhomopo 
 popeleka chigamulocho first grade magistrate roy kakutu zomwe yi anachita zinali zosayenera kotero akuyenera akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka zinayi atengerepo phunziro 
 idi adbul amachokera mmudzi mwa bwanali mdera la mfumuyayikulu chowe mboma lomwelo la mangochi
