Text:
la drc latulutsa akayidi 1200 kaamba ka coronavirus unduna wa zachilungamo mdziko la democratic republic of congo watulutsa akayidi okwana 1,200 pofuna kuchepetsa kuchulukana kwa akayidi mndendezi mbali imodzi yolimbana kufala kwa kachilombo ka coronavirus 
 malingana nduna undunawu celestine tunda mwa omwe amasulidwa omwe milandu ingoingono 
 ndende ya makala yomwe ili mzinda wa kinshasa imodzi mwa ndendezi yamasula akayidi okwana 700 
 ndunayi yati akayidi enanso akhala akumasulidwa posachedwapa yapempha oweruza milandu azimanga okhawo omwe apalamula milandu ikuluikulu ya kupha yogwirira 
 mdziko la democratic republic of congo mwapezeka okwana 180 omwe matendawa 18 amwalira 
 padakalipano boma la dzikolo layimitsa zochitika zonse za mdera la gombe mzinda wa kinshasa kwa sabata ziwiri kaamba ka vutoli
Label: HEALTH

Text:
ntchito yasowa wayamba ulimi wa kabichi adabwera mtauni ya blantyre kudzasaka ntchito atamaliza fomu 4 adaponda paliponse kukasaka ntchito makalata chilembelenicho satifiketi yake ya malawi school certificate of education msce palibe amene adamutenga yankho lidali lobwerera kumudzi akangoyamba ulimi lero ulimi wa kabichi wayamba kumupatsa ndalama wagula ngombe ziwiri njinga nkhuku wamangitsa nyumba iyi ndiyo nkhani ya patrick khuliwa yemwe akucheza bobby kabango 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi kodi tingachezeko wawa kwambiri palibe choletsa kaya mufuna ticheze nkhani zanji potitu tangokumana kumunda kuno 
  mbiri yanu ulimi wa kabichi vuto palibe uwu munda wanga ndalima ndekha ndiye palibe pamene pangandivute kufotokoza 
  khuliwa akuti watola chikwama muulimi wa kabichi mbiri yanu yotani ndimachokera mmudzi mwa mulunguzi kwa t juma mboma la mulanje ndili satifiketi ya fomu 4 yomwe ndidapeza 2007 nditakhoza ndidapita ku blantyre ambiri amachitira komwe ndimakasaka maganyu achimwene ndidavutika osati masewera ntchito zikusowa zoti ndakhoza mayeso fomu 4 bodza ake amati mwina ndiyese ntchito za mnyumba malipiro ake adali ochepa mapeto ake ndidabwerera nkudzayamba ulimi wa kabichi 
  ulimiwu mudayamba liti 2007 momwemo nditabwerako kutauni 
  chaka chino mwalima munda wokula nanga mukupeza zotani ndalima theka la ekala munda umenewu chaka chino ndakolola matumba 20 kabichi olemera makilogalamu 100 lililonse 
  mwapha ndalama zingati thumba limodzi ndimagulitsa k9 000 pamatumba 20 ndidapeza k180 000 kabichi wina ndimagulitsira kumunda konkuno 
  msika mumaupeza panopa palibenso yokayangana msika mavenda akumadzagula kumunda konkuno chomwe tikuonetsetsa nchakuti mtengo uzikhala wabwino poyamba timagulitsa k7 000 thumba limodzi lachita kukwera 
  chaka mukumalima kangati ya mvula ndimalima kamodzi mvula ikangotha ndimalima kabichi wamthirira yemwe ndikumalima kawiri kusonyeza ndikumalima katatu 
  uyu mmundayu wachingati wachiwiri ndayambanso kukolola moti sabata ino ndikumaliza kukolola ndayamba kale kulima wina kutereku mbali inayo ndabzala kale pofika december ndikhala ndikukolola kusonyeza ndidzakhala ndikukonzekera ulimi wa mvula 
  ulimi woyamba wachiwiriwu mwapeza ndalama zingati kupatula zochotsachotsa ndalama yogwirika yomwe ndidaisunga idalipo k250 000 ndalama zinazo ndimagwiritsira ntchito pakhomo 
  chiyambireni ulimiwu mwapangapo chiyani ndamangitsa nyumba ya njerwa zootcha yomwenso yamalata ndagula ngombe ziwiri ndikulankhula zili mkhola mwake ndili nkhuku njinga ntchito zapakhomo zikuyenda mkabichi yemweyu
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
njengunje pothana matenda khansa muli ntchito mdziko muno odwala matenda khansa apeze mpumulo wanena yemwe adapulumuka ku matendawa blandina khondowe 
  khondowe adaononga k5 miliyoni apulumuke adachita kupita mdziko la india zitakanika athandizidwe mdziko muno 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mpaka zafikatu pamenepa amayi kufola mzere ayezetse khansa malinga woyanganira ntchito za umoyo unduna wa zaumoyo charles mwansambo zipatala za kamuzu central queen elizabeth zokhazo zomwe zili ukadaulo wa matendawa 
  kutanthauza kupatula malowa kulibenso kwina komwe wodwala angapite mdziko muno 
  boma lidakhazikitsa ntchito yomanga malo wothandizita odwala khansa 2007 mpaka malowa sadayambe kugwira ntchito 
  kwa khondowe ili vuto lalikulu lomwe likuika pachiopsezo odwala matendawa 
  kupatula tili zipatala zochepa vuto lina la zipangizo adafotokoza ineyo ndidazindikira bere langa limalimba mchaka cha 2011 kwa zaka ziwiri ndimayenda mzipatala amangondiuza chotupa mpaka pamene ndidaganiza zopita ku india 
  khondowe adaonjeza nditapita ku india ndidaononga k5 miliyoni angati angakwanitse ndalama zoterezi pokhapokha titapereka mphamvu zambiri ku zipatala zathu apitirirabe kufa khansa 
  mwa akadaulo matendawa leo masamba adati pakali chaka chaka pafupifupi 18 000 amapezeka khansa 
  adati mwa anthuwa amene pamoto akumudzi omwe chuma chowavuta 
  kuperewera kwa zipatala kukuzuza kwambiri akumudzi alibe ndalama akapeze thandizo adatero masamba 
  adati chofunika kumema amalawi athandize boma kukwaniritsa pologalamu yokhazikitsa malo othandizirako vuto la khansa mzigawo zonse za lino 
  malinga mankhwala oyenera zipangizo zogwirira ntchito ogwira ntchito odziwa galimoto zokwanira zonyamula osowa mayendedwe zinthu zomwe zikufunikira 
  akatswiri za umoyo ati pokhapokha patachitika chozizwa amalawi apitilira kupululuka matendawa cha kusowekera kwa zipangizo zipatala 
  woyanganira nthambi yothandiza ku matenda khansa chipatala cha kamuzu central richard nyasosela wati chipatalachi chimalandira osachepera 30 sabata iliyonse 
  steady chasimpha wa ku nthambi yowona za matenda khansa wati ku queen elizabeth central hospital ofuna thandizo sachepera 22 sabata imodzi 
  wati nambala zochuluka chotere nzowopsa poyerekeza kuchepa kwa ogwira ntchito ku nthambi za khansa zipangizo zothandizira ovutikawo 
  nambala imeneyi ikusonyeza zinthu sizili tikatengera vuto la ogwira ntchito zipangizo thandizo loperekedwa silingakhale loyenera adatero chasimpha 
  kusowekera kwa zipatala kwachititsa mmidzi azipita kwa asinganga kukalandira thandizo 
  mtsogoleri wa asinganga mdziko muno frank manyowa akuti patsiku amalandira pafupifupi asanu atatu odwala khansa 
  ambiri mwa anthuwa sapulumuka asingana amangofuna adyepo sangakwanitse adatero 
  pafupifupi 52 ndiwo amapezeka matenda khansa sabata mdziko muno pakutha mwezi pafupifupi 204 ndiwo amapezeka matendawa 
  khondowe akuti kutengera zomwe madotolo adamuuza ku india khansa ndiyochizika ikapezeka mmasiku oyambilira thandizo loyenera likakhala apo ayi ndiye amakangodula chiwalo mukachedwa kulandira thandizo 
  lero khondowe adayambitsa bungwe la think pink lomwe limapita mmadera osiyanasiyana kuphunzitsa za khansa kuwalimbikitsa azikayezetsa
Label: HEALTH

Text:
kuli ziii za mthandizi kwangoti zii nkhawa yagunda ntchito za mthandizi zomwe amalandira kangachepe akalima msewu ichitike popeza yake yadutsa osamvapo kanthu 
  iyi ndondomeko yomwe amalima misewu kulandira ndalama yomwe imathandiza ya njala chaka chilichonse ntchitoyi imachitika january february 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka miyezi itatu yatha mwachinunu osamva kanthu kuboma zadabwitsa mafumu amene amakhudzidwa ntchitoyi pomemeza mmidzi yawo akalambule misewu 
  mfumu kabunduli ya mboma la nkhata bay yati njala ikukuta mdera lake amene amapindula ntchitozo 
  february mwezi wa njala chaka chino akutuwa njala cha ngamba timadalira tipezako mpumulo tikayamba kulima misewu mpaka lero idatero mfumuyo 
  woona momwe ntchito zachitukuko zikuyendera kunthambi ya local development fund ldf booker matemvu wati ntchitoyi yasintha kusiyana zaka zonse 
  ntchitoyi iyamba september idzatha november chaka chino iyi yomwe takonza adzayambe kulima misewu adatero matemvu 
  ganizoli likudabwitsa kabunduli asinthiranji zalowa ndale mwezi wa njala february mpaka march apapa ndiye asokonezeratu cholinga cha ndondomekoyi adatero 
  tili kumudzi amene alibe chilichonse ganyu wovuta kumupeza amadalira kulima misewu apeze thandizo popezera ndalama ntchito yomweyi ndiye akusinthanso matemvu wati kusinthaku kwachitika zimatenga yaitali alandire ndalama zawo akalima misewu february 
  pena zimafika april asadalandire nchifukwa chake tasintha dziwani mmidzimo tayambitsa ntchito zina zomwe akugwira polandirapo ndalama kubwezeretsa zachilengedwe adatero matemvu 
  adati akukambirana boma ndondomekoyi ichitike imachitikira zaka zonse cha amene akutuwa njala 
  talandira madandaulo kwa maka mmadera amene akhudzidwa njala zonse zingathe ndiye ntchitoyi itha kuyamba iliyonse september asadafike adatero matemvu 
  ntchitoyi idzayambe september momwe matemvu akunenera madera ambiri misewu yoonongeka cha mvula pamene ina yosalambulidwa 
  ndalama zolimitsira misewuyi zachoka ku world bank 
  nthambi ya ldf yomwe imayendetsa ndondomekoyi idalandira kale k97 biliyoni 132 miliyoni dollars zigwire ntchito mpaka chaka chamawa 
  njala yakhudza maboma neno nsanje chikwawa balaka mwanza phalombwe ntcheu blantyre karonga
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
za kulephereka kwa zisankho muzina edi mwana   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu edi sebe santu muzina zizata mfana ya muzina sindikudziwa papa wemba nyimboyo adaimverapo ndimo ndinkayimvera pamene inkaphulika malo aja timakonda wenela gervazzio ndiye adaika nyimboyo pokumbukira papa wemba amene watsikira kwachete 
  ili zoona likutenga ofunika otchuka achina prince kusiya ojiya osolola osenza wenela imfa ikusiya zilengwalengwa 
  tsiku lina ndidzaipha imfa yotenga kusiya mwana akulira 
  tsikulo wina adati ndipite ndikaitanire ku mibawa nkadadziwa amandikankhira kunkhondo padafika asirikali atavala nkhwani nkhwani komatu eni minibasi samaimva ati khobwe akatolera nawo adabwera mapanza inde magigo 
  sitiimva minibasizi zanu muzitolera ndalama adatero phanza wina atanyamula miyala 
  kupanda nzeru malowa anu kodi ogulitsa nkhwani mumsika angamemane azitolera ziphaso ndiwo nkhwaniwo wawo kupusa mnyumba ya mwini saotchera mbewa adatero wapolisi wina akukanyanga mwa magigowo nkumuponya mchimbaula adachilawa chihana 
  apo ndeu idabuka paja lamulo liposa mphamvu akhonsolo adawina adayamba kutolera ndalama kwa madalaivala 
  nditabwerera ku wenela ndidapeza abiti patuma onse akumvetsera wailesi 
  chisankho chimati chikhalepo ku mchinji chalephereka boma silidapereke ndalama ati lilibe adatero muulutsi 
  boma lilibe ndalama chisankho cha ku zomba ndiye adapeza ndalama pafa khoswe apa adatero abiti patuma 
  paja nawe kumangomva fungo la khoswe paliponse kulitu njala uku adatero amene adali naye tsikulo 
  zanu komabe inetu ndikuona dizilo petulo palibe ikuona kuchititsa chisankho ku mchinji kukhoza kuchititsa male chauvinist pigs kuoneka mashasha adayankha abiti patuma 
  abale anzanga musandifunse amatanthauzanji nane sindikudziwa pajatu za matchera ayi 
  padakalipano boma likuphwanya malamulo omwe amaneneratu chisankho chiyenera kuchitika pasanathe masiku mwakuti adatero abiti patuma 
  mukutayatu paja zomatiuza chakuti chichitike pofika tsiku lakuti si mbali yathu adatero adali naye uja 
  mukutanthauza yokhala pampando ikadzatha mustafa sadzafuna kubweza mpando kwa ajibu adangoti duuu uja adalandira foni 
  mwati shati choyamba watisiya zabodza nkadamva ndikudziwa ku tajkstan komwe amuchotsa dzino dzana kukonda kupekera imfa akukupanitu makofi akabwera adatero mkuluyo adatero 
  imeneyinso idandipita malingaliro adali kwa papa wemba prince
Label: POLITICS

Text:
sitalaka wenela lidali lachinayi usiku tidali malo aja timakonda wenela kukambirana adachuluka adali madilaivala makondakitala minibasi 
  ojiya osenza osolola tidalipo ochepa 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu apapa afune asafune mawa kulibe woyendetsa minibasi kuchoka wenela adayamba nkhani mwa madalaivala 
  komatu tikanaganiza kale mawalo msuzi tikaupeza adafunsa kondakitala wina 
  akanadziwa anzakewo adamuukira kumuthira maphuzo achitira anthuwa pamsewu nkhani yavuta ya msuziyo mabwana aja akamangala papolisipa akatigwira tizilipira ndife osati mabwanawo msuzi uzikwaniranso apapa adafunsa wina bata litabwerera 
  inuyo chikuvuta nchiyani makamaka zifike apa adafunsa abiti patuma 
  kodi ndiwe mlendo apolisi ayamba kugwiritsa ntchito malamulo amene akutipweteka kwambiri sitikufuna zimenezo adatero wina 
  kodi malamulowo mmabuku adafunsanso abiti patuma 
  kodi ukufuna kuvuta zibwenzi zako malamulowo wokhazikika kungoti samawagwiritsa ntchito ndiye akufuna kutifinya adayankha wina mmaso muli gwaaa komatu tinzeru tikucheperako apapa ndikuona mutichedwetsa nazo tsono mukayamba zionetsero zokwiya malamulo okhazikika simukuona masiku akubwerawa nawo ogwiririra adzachita zionetsero chilango cha zaka 14 kwa opezeka olakwa chakula kwambiri adaponya funso lina abiti patuma 
  onse adangoti duuu malamulo mukuona akhwima kwambiri mukadakambirana aphungu anu akasinthitse ku nyumba ya malamulo wina akhoza kubwerapo minibus regulations bill osati zanu za umbuli mukuchita apazi adapitiriza 
  palibe kaya wina afune kaya asafune tikukachita zionetsero basi adatero wina akutulutsa chikwanje 
  adachinola pamsewu 
  mawa lake ndiye kudali moto ndidaona akuyenda wapansi kuchoka ku ndirande mpaka mtauni ochokera ku machinjiri adali kukwera malole ku manja chimwankhunda ndiye tidamva za kuphwanyidwa kwa galimoto zina eyi eyi eyiiiiii posafuna kutsalira zigandanga za ku machinjiri zidaotcha khoti chaka chatha zidathira moto maofesi apolisi atatu ati kusafuna kumangidwa 
  pomwe moto umazilala loweruka madalaivala aja adagwirizana zokweza mtengo wa minibasi 
  abiti patuma adati ndimuperekeze ku queens mibawa adati mtengo wakwera k200 kufika k250 
  adafunsa 
  kaya adayankha kondakitala 
  abiti patuma adalipira k500 ya awiri kenaka adatangwanika whatsapp sindikudziwa ankalemba chiyani uthenga womaliza udali woti tikumana pachipatala pasiteji 
  titafika pasitejipo tidapeza amalankhula anzake awiri 
  kwerani ndalipira kale kuchoka blantyre ya awiri asakulipiritseninso ameneyu akachita makani manambala aapolisi aja si nkhani ogenda kupolisi chamba chili mthumba awa adatero abiti patuma
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
konvenshoni ya mcp yalephereka chipani cha malawi congress party mcp chati msonkhano waukulu wa konvenshoni umayenera kukhalapo pakati lero lolemba wamwa madzi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc wapampando wa msonkhanowo joseph njobvuyalema lachinayi adati msonkhanowo walephereka chipanicho chalephera kupeza k35 miliyoni yochitira msonkhanowo ana asukulu ku natural resources college komwe nthumwi 700 zimayenera kukagona sanatsekere 
  mmalo mwa k35 miliyoni tangopeza k20 miliyoni tikadati tichititse msonkhanowu sukadakhala wapamwamba momwe timafunira ana asukulu ku nrc sanatsekere nthumwi 500 zikadasowa kogona kusukuluko kuli malo 200 okha basi adatero 
  zidadza pomwe mtsogoleri wa chipanicho john tembo adapereka zikalata zosonyeza akufuna kupikisana nawo pampando wa mtsogoleri wa chipanichi malamulo chipanicho sakumulola kutero 
  kadaulo wa ndale henry chingaipe adati kuimanso kwa tembo kudadzetsa mafunso omwe tembo ndiye angayankhe 
  chingaipe adadabwa tembo adapereka zikalata zake chipanichi chitaonjezera tsiku limodzi loti apereke zikalatazo 
  amene akuoneka alidi khumbo lodzaimira chipanichi kuchitsogolera adapereka mnthawi yoyenera tembo adakapereka chipanichi chitaonjezera tsiku limodzi sadali woyambirira kukapereka zikalatazo adatero chingaipe 
  msabatayi jodder kanjere chris daza felix jumbe betson majoni lazarous chakwera lovemore munlo eston kakhome nawo adapereka zikalata zawo 
  malinga mwa akuluakulu amene akhala akulandira zikalatazo potipher chidaya adati tembo adaonjezera tsiku limodzi lolandirira zikalatazo 
  chipanichi chidatulutsa ndondomeko ya zoyenereza munthu wopambana mwa zina pali yakuti mtsogoleri wa chipanichi ayenera yemwe wakhala membala kwa zaka zisanu akhale ophunzira ndiponso akhale wakuti sadalowepo chipani china 
  kakhome yemwe adali mtsogoleri wa chipani cha social democratic party sdp yomwe ndale za lino zimasintha adati ndiwokonzeka kutsogolera mcp 
  ndidagwirapo ntchito mcp ndikudziwa ichi manthu wa zipani mmalawi ndine wokonzeka kuchitsogolera tipambane pachisankho ndikubwezeretsa lino mchimake adatero kakhome 
  jumbe yemwe adali wa bungwe la alimi la farmers union of malawi fum adati sikuti nkhani kugonjetsa tembo kutsogolera fuko 
  lino limadalira ulimi chitsanzo momwe tingatukukire ulimi adatero jumbe 
  chakwera yemwe wa mpingo wa assemblies of god adati sakuonapo cholakwika tembo akufuna kuima nawo 
  ufulu sichoncho adatero chakwera yemwe akutinso akufuna kubweretsa msintho muutsogoleri wa chipanicho 
  munlo yemwe adatula udindo wa wa malamulo adati wakhala membala wa mcp kuyambira kale 
  ndidangochoka 2000 pomwe ndimakagwira ntchito kubungwe la united nations komwe samafuna andale pomwe ndidali wa za malamulo sindimayenera chipani adatero munlo 
  malinga kanjere yemwe adakhalapo nduna ulamuliro wa mtsogoleri woyamba wadziko lino dr hastings kamuzu banda adzaonetsetsa ulamuliro siukukhala paphewa la munthu 
  yakwana mcp ilamulire osati kumangokhala mbali yotsutsa boma adatero kanjere 
  daza yemwe mlembi wamkulu wa mcp ndiye wakhala yaitali akuneneratu wakonzeka kutsogolera chipanichi ya tembo pampandowu ikatha
Label: POLITICS

Text:
chipatala chidzapulumutsa k730 m pachaka chipatala cha khansa chomwe boma likumanga ku lilongwe chikatsegulidwa mwezi wa september chaka chino boma kudzera ku unduna wa zaumoyo lizipulumutsa k730 miliyoni chaka 
  ndalamazi zomwe boma limagwiritsa ntchito potumiza odwala khansa kunja kukalandira thandizo lomwe tsopano lizipezeka mdziko   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka momwemuno kudzera kuchipatalachi 
  wa bungwe loona zaumoyo la malawi health equity network mhen george jobe wati iyi ndinkhani yabwino unduna wa zaumoyo uzigwiritsa ntchito ndalamazi zinthu zina zofunikira kugula mankhwala mafuta othira mmaambulasi 
  k730 miliyoni ndalama zambiri zedi zoti kuzigwiritsa ntchito zikhoza kupindulira ambiri ku ntchito ya zaumoyo tikudziwa mafuta ambulansi ngakhalenso mankhwala zimasowa adatero jobe 
  unduna wa zaumoyo wati chiwerengero cha omwe khansa chodziwika mdziko muno 15 000 boma limatumiza 40 mwa anthuwa kunja kukalandira thandizo la mankhwala munthu k22 miliyoni apite kunja akalandire thandizo nkubwerako 
  bungwe loona za odwala khansa la cancer association of malawi lati thandizo lomwe odwala khansa amalandira kuchipatala cha gulupu ku blantyre loperewera kuli mpumulo pangono 
  wa bungwelo regina njirima adati khansa imafunika chipatala chakechake odwala khansa kuonedwa pafupipafupi kuwasakaniza odwala matenda kumawapangitsa kudzimvera chisoni kwambiri 
  wodwala khansa amakhala nkhawa zambiri kotero pamalo oti nkhawazo zizichepa njira yabwino nkukhala chipatala chawochawo chomwe chili zipangizo akadaulo othandiza odwalawo adatero njirima 
  mwa omwe adadwalapo khansa adachira atapita kuchipatala janet bonwel kwa t ndindi ku salima adati kupeza thandizo la khansa mmalawi nkovuta moti ambiri akuvutika matendawa 
  wati adapezeka khansa ya mmwendo 2001 kuzipatala zosiyanasiyana komwe amapita amangopatsidwa panado yemwe samachotsa nkomwe ululu omwe adali nawo 
  wati adakapeza thandizo kuchipatala cha ndimoyo ku salima komweko 
  ululu wa khansa siwamasewera ndidachita kusiya kugwira ntchito iliyonse sindimatha kugona chaululu kumangobuula usiku usana ndidalowera uku uko osapeza thandizo mpaka ndidafika potaya mtima ndizingodikira imfa adatero bonwel 
  wati chipatala cha khansa chibweretsa mpumulo waukulu kwa omwe khansa
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
chipwirikiti malawi zomwe zikuchitika mdziko la malawi zaimitsa mitu ya kuphatikizapo akadaulo nkhani zosiyanasiyana 
  msabata yomwe ikuthayi zionetsero zomwe zidaima kwa masiku 14 zidayambiranso lachitatu tsiku lomwelo mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika yemwe akuyenera kumva nkhawa za amalawi ochita zionetserozo adanyamuka ulendo wa ku msonkhano waukulu wa mgwirizano wa maiko ku america 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mwa ochita zionetsero kusonyeza mkwiyo wawo pomwe zionetserozo zidayamba zotsatira za chisankho cha 21 may chitangochitika mutharika wakhala akutuma wachiwiri everton chimulirenji kukamuyimilira mmisonkhano yosiyanasiyana kunja kwa lino mutharika adangotuluka sabata yatha kukakhala nawo kumaliro mtsogoleri wakale wa la zimbabwe robert mugabe 
  malinga kadaulo pandale makhumbo munthali ulendowu ukungotsimikiza mutharika sakukhudzidwa mtsogoleri zomwe zikuchitika mdziko lake 
  mwa ochita zionetsero kusonyeza mkwiyo wawo anyamuka momwe zinthu zililimu amayenera kukhalapo nkuona chichitike nchiyani nkuonetsa utsogoleri apapa zikungoonekeratu za ake sizikumukhudza adatero munthali 
  kadaulo ndale george phiri wati zonse zomwe zikuchitika mdziko muno nthabwala zokhazokha amalawi apatsidwa mafunso omwe sakupeza mayankho ake konse 
  kunena zoona mutharika samayenera kunyamuka ulendo akadatuma nthumwi momwe wakhala akupangira mmbuyomo apa wapita sikuti ndiye mavutowa atha ayi akamabwera adzawapezanso adatero 
  zili apo bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec kupyolera mwa woyendetsa zisankho sam alufandika lidalengeza lichititsa chisankho chapadera kumwera mboma la lilongwe november 5 2019 kuli zionetsero zoti wa bungwelo achoke chisankho sichidachitike mderalo 21 may mwa opikisana nawo agnes penemulungu adamwalira chisankhocho chili kuchitika 
  bungwe la mec lidzakumana onse okhudzidwa chisankhochi 3 october 3 lidzafotokoze ndondomeko yachisankhochi adatero alufandika mkalata yake 
  akuluakulu malawi congress party mcp utm party ati sizingalole bungwe la mec liyendetsenso chisankho china mlandu omwe akukana zotsatira ukadali kukhoti 
  zipanizo zidatengera kukhoti mec mutharika powaganizira adazondotsa zotsatira za chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa lino pomwe mec idalengeza mutharika ndiye adapambana 
  mlembi wamkulu wa mcp eissenhower mkaka adati chipanicho chilibe chikhulupiliro mwa bungwelo ungwiro ukuyesedwa mbwalo la milandu 
  mec siyikuyenera kuyendetsa chosankho chilichonse pokhapokha bwalo la milandu litapeza langwiro lidayendetsa chisankho chapitacho adatero mkaka 
  mneneri wa utm party joseph chidanti malunga adati chisankho chapaderacho chayikidwa yolakwika 
  ayi yakeyi sizidakhale mec amayenera kudikira asadapangitse chisankho china zochitika sizikugwirizana adatero malunga 
  munthali adadzudzula ganizo la mec lochititsa chisankho chapadera pomwe amalawi zionetsero zotsutsana nalo 
  apa zawonetseratu kwa palibe kuthekera koti nkukambirana amalawi asonyeza kuderera konse atenga amalawi opanda ntchito watero munthali 
  poyankhapo mneneri wa chipani cha dpp nicholas dausi adati mec ikulondola zomwe ikupanga ikutsatira malamulo 
  mec ikuyenera kugwira ntchito yake potsatira gawo 76 ya malamulo imayipatsira mphamvu osasokoneza ntchito za mec cha mangawa adatero dausi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mwambo woliza mfuti pamaliro achingoni mfumu yachingoni ikagona pamaliropo amaomba mfuti thupi la mfumuyo lilowe mmanda mwezi wathawu kudachitika maliro t bvumbwe mboma la thyolo ku malirokonso kudalizidwa mfuti chomwe amene adali kumwambowo adadabwa nacho bobby kabango adacheza amene amaomba mfutiyo amve zambiri za mwambowu motere wawa   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc fikani ndithu musaope 
  ndikudziweni choyamba dzina langa ndine moses chikoko mungandidziwe mbali ya mbumba kwa t bvumbwe mudamvapo za gomani chikuse amene adadulidwa khosi ameneyo ndiye adabereka anga mkazi wachinayi wa gomani chikuse amene adabereka angawo 
  ndiye mudapezeka mukukhala ku thyolo kuno pajatu angoni adali ankhondo ndiye gulu la anga lomwe lidabwera kuno pamene angoni ankafikira madera anga adali wa wa maseko anga adali kwa mulauzi 
  t bvumbwe wagonayu adali ndani wanu wagonayu mwana wanga sindikutanthauza amene ndidabereka iyeyu ake adayenda limodzi kusukulu amenewo adali steven bvumbwe 
  mfuti mwatengayi mufuna mugwiritsire ntchito yanji mukumva kulira mfuti pamalo ndikuliza ndineyo ntchito yake nkuti ilire pamene tikugoneka mfumu yathu dziwani pamaliro mfumu yachingoni pamalira mfuti mpaka mfumuyo itatsikira mmanda 
  mumaliza kangati   mfuti imalira kanayi koyamba imalira kusonyeza mfumu yamwalira apa amakhala amene alowe mmalo mwake wabwera kudzaona nkhope kutsimikizadi mfumuyo yamwalira imalira pamene tikutulutsa thupi la mfumuyo mnyumba timalizanso kachitatu pamene tanyamula thupi ulendo kumanda pamenepa timaomba kusonyeza akutsanzika timadzaombanso komaliza pamene bokosi latsitsiridwa mmanda kusonyeza wafika 
  chiyani mumaomba mfuti kusonyeza mngoni wankhondo ndiye mngoni yemwe timamudziwa wankhondo wamwalira zotere zimayenera zichitike 
  bvumbwe adamenya nkhondo yake bvumbwe adali mngoni angoni amadziwika ankhondo sadamenye nkhondoyo sindingakuyankheni adamenya dziwani bvumbwe adali mngoni yemwe wankhondo 
  nkhondo yake iti kodi mukudziwa angoni adachita kumenya nkhondo mpaka kudutsa ku domwe akafika pamalo amayamba amenya nkhondo kukhazikika nkhondo yake imeneyo 
  kodi ndimayesa nkhondoyo idatha kalekale nanga mukuchitabe eya nkhondo yathu ya mmagazi kusonyeza simatha mwambo umenewu udayamba kalekale makolo athuwo 
  mfuti zisadayambe kupangidwa mumaliza chiyani   aaah mwaiwala kudali mfuti zagogodera zomwe tinkagwiritsa ntchito ino 
  mwapeza chilolezo choliza mfuti choyamba dziwani ndine msirikali mfuti ndimaidziwa cha ntchito ndilinso mfuti ndidali wapayoniya ndiye mnyumba mwanga mfuti si yachilendo 
  enatu amadzidzimuka mumakhala chilolezo muombe mfuti nchifukwa chake mwandiona ndakhala kutchire ndekhandekha podziwa pali odwala mtima amene angathe kukomoka mfuti ikalira 
  ndiyetu tailozetsani kumbali kuopa chipolopolo chingafwanthuke ndikudziwa chomwe ndikuchita apapa olo zitachita kuvuta kotani singalire

Text:
lamulo la chuma cha pulezidenti liunikidwenso   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   mwa akatswiri za malamulo edge kanyongolo wati lamulo lomwe likukamba za katundu chuma cha atsogoleri liunikidwenso cholinga chopatsa mphamvu zochuluka kwa amalawi akafuna kufufuza atsogoleri omwe akugwiritsa ntchito maudindo podzikundikira chuma 
  zadza pamene la malawi ladzidzimuka kuchuluka kwa chuma cha mtsogoleri wakale wa lino malemu bingu wa mutharika adakhala pampandowu kwa kanthawi kochepa 
  kwa zaka 8 zokha zimene mutharika adakhala pulezidenti wa lino chuma chake chidawonjezekera modabwitsa kuchoka k150 miliyoni panthawi imene asankidwa kukhaka pulezidenti kufika k61 biliyoni mmene ankamwalira zomwe amalawi ambiri akuti zachulukitsa poyerekeza malipiro amene mtsogoleri wa amalandira pamwezi 
  malamulo lino amafotokoza pulezidenti wachiwiri sakuyenera kudulidwa msonkho pamalipiro apamwezi kuphatikiza apo misonkho ya osauka atsogoleriwa amakhala bajeti yogulira chakudya ziwiya za mnyumba zawo 
  pakatha zaka zisanu zilizonse atsogoleriwa alinso ufulu woitanitsa kunja galimoto imodzi ya kumtima kwawo popanda kupereka msonkho wotchedwa duty ku bungwe lotolera msonkho la malawi revenue authotiry mra 
  kwa yaitali atsogoleri akhala akugwiritsa ntchito mphamvu ufulu lamulo limawapatsa poitanitsa katundu wochitira bizinesi zosiyanasiyana osapereka msonkho ku mra zomwe zikutsutsana malamulo lino 
  pofuna kuthana mchitidwewu boma lidakhazikitsa bungwe lapadera la special law commission slc mchaka cha 2006 cholinga choti liunikenso gawo 88 la malamulo lino 
  ntchito yake inali kukonza lamulo lokakamiza pulezidenti nduna akuluakulu ogwira ntchito mboma kunena poyera mmene chuma chawo chilili asanalumbiritsidwe pamaudindo osiyanasiyana 
  kafukufuku wa bungweli adasonyeza kupatula lamulo lokakamiza atsogoleri kubwera poyera pakatundu yemwe nawo maiko uganda kenya tanzania adaikanso ndondomeko zowonjezera zothandiza munthu akafuna kudziwa momwe chuma cha atsogoleri chikuchulukira kudzera mumaudindo pulezidenti nduna phungu wa nyumba ya malamulo 
  mwa zina bungweli lidavomereza munthu wogwira ntchito mboma sakuyenera kugwiritsa ntchito udindo podzikundikira yekha chuma anzake asagwirenso ntchito zina kupatula yomwe adalembedwa boma apewe kugwira ntchito zomwe sizikugwirizana udindo asagwiritse ntchito udindo katundu wa boma molakwika 
  zili choncho zikuwoneka amalawi alibe mphamvu lamulo lomwe lingawaikire kumbuyo akafuna kulondoloza chuma cha atsogoleri zikupereka mwayi kwa atsogoleriwa kugwiritsa ntchito maudindo momwe angafunire popanda wina kuwafunsa 
  kanyongolo adati zikusonyeza kufooka kwa malamulo lino nchifukwa chake atsogoleri akutengerapo mwayi 
  adati lamulo lokhudza katundu chuma cha pulezidenti wachiwiri nduna za boma lokwanira likusowekera nsanamira zake zimene wamba angagwiritse ntchito polondoloza chumacho 
  mkuluyu adafotokoza poonjezera lamulo limene lilipo kale nyumba ya malamulo iganizirenso zokhazikitsa lamulo lina lokakamiza atsogoleri kubweranso poyera chuma chimene apeza pamene akuchoka mmaudindo 
  kanyongolo akuti akadakonda mabungwe financial intelligence unit fiu malawi revenue authority mra atapatsidwa mphamvu zounika mmene chuma cha atsogoleri chilili pamiyezi inayi iliyonse pakutha chaka amalawi azidziwa atsogoleriwa sakugwiritsa ntchito maudindo molakwika 
  ndikunena chipanda nkhani ya msonkho womwe mtsogoleri wakaleyu sanapereke ku mra lino silikadadziwa mutharika wolemera chonchi kanyongolo adatero 
  katswiri wina zamalamulo justin dzonzi wati gawo 88 la malamulo lopanda ntchito silikupatsa mphamvu chitetezo kwa nzika imene ikufuna kulondoloza momwe chuma cha atsogoleri chilili 
  dzonzi adati ku uganda nzika zili mphamvu zofufuza atsogoleri mmene akugwiritsira ntchito udindo wawo chuma cha boma 
  wa bungwe la owerengera ndalama la society of accountants in malawi socam evelyn mwapasa akuti amalawi atha kulondoloza katundu wa atsogoleri kudzera mmakalata mapepala okhudzana misonkho ku mra 
  mwapasa adatsindika vuto lalikulu mdziko muno kasungidwe ka mafayilo okhudzana misonkho 
  mmaiko munthu sungapikisane nawo pampando wa pulezidenti phungu wa ku nyumba ya malamulo pokhapokha utatulutsa umboni wosonyeza umalipira msonkho mwapasa adatero 
  adati pofuna kuthetsa katangale bungwe lotolera msonkho liyenera kulimbikitsa ntchito yosunga mafayilo misonkho 
  akaona atsogoleri athu akulemera modabwitsa mra ikuyenera kufufuza cholinga choti wina asamadyere masuku pamutu amalawi osauka mwapasa adatsindika 
  wa consumers association of malawi cama john kapito wapempha amalawi asataye kulimbana chuma chimene mutharika adazikundikira 
  mmalo mwake kapito adati akuyenera tcheru boma la peoples party pp womwe akuti uli kuthekera kowononga chuma chambiri sipangapezeke njira zolitchingira 
  si zodabwitsa malemu mutharika adapeza chuma chochuluka motere ifeyo amene takhala tikumenya nkhondo yokakamiza atsogoleri aulule chuma chawo mmalo motithandiza pankhondoyi tikutanganidwa zinthu zina zopanda pake adatero
Label: POLITICS

Text:
akulipitsa kulembetsa khadi amene sadalembetse nambala zawo akulirira kuutsi pamene ma agenti akuwauza alipire akufuna nambala yawo ilembetsedwe 
  zikudza pamene makampani foni za mmanja airtel tnm adachotsa nambala zimene sizidalembetse pofika 30 september chaka chino 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kulembetsa makadi kwa ulere kampanizi zidachotsa nambala zina eni nambalawo mwayi wokalembetsa iliyonse mwaulere 
  zikusiyana zimene akukumananazo pamene akupemphedwa kulipira nambala yawo ilembetsedwe 
  mboma la mulanje thyolo akulipira alembetse nambala zawo 
  mtolankhaniyu atayendera malo ku chirimba mafupi sitolo ya macsteel adauzidwa alipire k300 nambala yake ya airtel ilembetsedwe 
  tikuyenera tigule mayunitsi k300 omwe timalowera system ya airtel nambala yanu ilembetsedwe nambala yanuyo idadulidwa mwezi wapitawo zomwe zimapangitsa ntchito yathu ikhale yovuta adatero agentiyo 
  titamuuza tili k100 adakananso ndalamayo yachepa chifuwa polingalira kukula kwa ntchito yolumikizira nambalayo 
  mneneri wa kampani ya airtel norah chavula chirwa adati wodzidzimuka apezerapo mwayi kumabera makasitomala pamene akulembetsa nambala zawo 
  adati kampani yawo iyesetsa kuyenda mmidzi kulangiza sakuyenera kulipira polembetsa nambala 
  tikulangiza makasitomala athu aimbe 121 wina wawauza alipire polembetsa nambala yawo ngatinso mderalo kuli ofesi yathu athamangireko kuwamuneneza agent amene akulipiritsayo 
  apo ayi athamangire kupolisi kukanena pamene akuimba 121 ayenera adziwe code ya agent yo tichotse nambala yake adatero chirwa 
  naye mneneri wa kampani ya tnm daniel makata adati alandira nkhani zotere mboma la mulanje komwe agent akufuna ndalama alembe nambala 
  makata adati kampani yawo idalemba ntchito ma agent oposa 2500 mmadera onse lino alembe onse amene panetiweki ya tnm 
  ifeyo tidawalemba ntchito kulakwa nawonso ayambe kulipiritsa makasitomala athu 
  adziwe kulembetsa nambala kwaulerere sakuyenera kulipira kanthu ntchito imeneyi wina wakupemphani ndalama chonde tidziwitseni apo ayi pitani kupolisi adatero makata 
  makata adati pofika 30 september kampani yawo nkuti italemba makasitomala 75 100 alionse

Text:

  manthu wa ziphadzuwa lwara pakati omutsatira ake mbiri yako ya maphunziro yotani ndidalemba mayeso anga fomu 4 pasukulu ya sekondale ya ekwendeni padakalipano ndikuphunzira zokopa alendo mzuzu university ndili chaka chachiwiri 
   udayamba liti za uchiphadzuwa kunena chilungamo aka nkoyamba mnzanga wina adangobwera kudzandiuza ndikayese ndikhoza kupambana kuyesera kupambana kudali komweko 
  udazilandira za kupambana kwako sindikuchitenga chinthu chapafupi sindidakonzekera kwambiri anzanga adachitira ndine wosanglala kwambiri makamaka cha mphatso yomwe ndidalandira ya ndalama zokwana k50 000

Text:
mavuto udf angaphe demokalase chipasupasu cha mchipani chakale cholamula cha united democratic front udf chingaopseze ulamuliro wa demokalase mdziko muno womwe umalira pakhale zipani zotsutsa zamphamvu zothandiza kuongolera pomwe chipani cholamula chikulakwitsa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc katswiri wa phunziro la ndale kudzanso otumikiridwa pandale aikira ndemangayi potsatira mgwedegwede womwe wakula chipani cha udf 
  ati kufooka kwa udfchimodzimodzi mikangano ya mchipani china chotsutsa chachikulu cha mcpkupereka mwayi kwa chipani cholamula cha dpp kuyenda moyera mosatsutsidwa maganizo kayendetsedwe ka boma 
  katswiri maphunziro ndale yemwenso mphunzitsi sukulu ya ukachenjede ya mzuzu noel mbowela wati chipani cha udf chidali cha mphamvu polingalira chidalamulapo awa malecheleche sichikonza zolakwikazi 
  adati zipani zotsutsa zili za mphamvu zimakakamiza chipani cholamula chidzilabadira zofuna za zimapindulira 
  kuunikiraku kwadza pomwe tsopano mamulumuzana udf omwe mwa komiti yachipanichi agawikana kuli mbali ziwiri zomwe sizionana diso labwino 
  mbali imodzi kuli gorge nga ntafu mlembi wamkulu kennedy makwangala lilian patel atupele muluzi aphungu onse 15 chipanichi ku nyumba ya malamulo 
  mbali ina kuli friday jumbe yemwe adapatsidwa ulamuliro wachipani wapampando wakale bakili muluzi hophmally makande sam mpasu humphrey mvula ken nsonda 
  mbali ya jumbe yalengeza yachotsa makwangwala atupele pomwe ati awiriwa adalephera kukaonekera ku komiti yosungitsa mwambo yachipanichi 
  msonda wati asadandaule zomwe zikuchitikazi pochotsa njira imodzi yokonzera chipanichi 
  wati mavuto onse omwe kuchipanichi adadza bakili chodzitengera mwa yekha zochitika mchipanimo 
  mgwedegwede mchipanichi udakula mwezi wa okutobala 2011 pomwe atupele muluzi adabwera poyera ndikulengeza khumbo lake lodzaima nawo mpando wa pulezidenti mchaka cha 2014 
  sizidakomere komiti mchipanichi yomwe idati ndizosemphana malamulo achipanichi 
  apa chipanichi chidaitanitsa atupele akaonekere ku komiti yosungitsa mwambo yachipanichi adakana komitiyi idalengeza yamuchotsa mchipani 
  msonda wati aphungu onse akunyumba ya malamulo mbali ya atupele yemwenso phungu wa dera la kumpoto cha kummawa kwa machinga 
  kugwedezekaku kudakulanso 21 disembala 2011 pomwe makwangwala adatulutsa kalata yomwe msonda wati nkutheka idalembedwa atanamizidwa bakili muluzi 
  kalatayo idati   maudindo onse mchipanichi abwerera momwe adaliri 16 julaye 2009 pomwe wapampando wachipanichi bakili muluzi adanyamuka kupita kuchipatala ku uk ndikusiya zonse mmanja mwa mlembi wa wachipanichi 
   ngodya zomwe zakonzedwa kuchoka 16 julaye 2009 zonse zamasulidwa mamembala onse achipanichi omwe adakakamizidwa kuchoka mchipanichi abwezeretsedwa pamaudindo 
   msonkhano wa komiti yachipani udzachitika ku likulu la chipanichi ku limbe 28 disembala 2011 ya 9 koloko mmawa 
  apa mamulumuzana achipanichi msonda adati kalatayo yalembedwa mosafunsa akuluakulu achipanichi 
  adati makwangwala alibe mphamvu zoterezi komiti yomwe ikugwira ntchito ndiyo idayenera kubweretsa poyera mfundozi ku komiti ya chipani zisanatuluke 
  msonda wati zomwe zidalembedwa mkalatayo zikutanthauza bakili muluzi ndiye adabweretsa mfundozi makwangwala alembe 
  16 pomwe akunenapo muluzi adatula maudindo kwa komiti yomwe ikugwira ntchito maudindowa adawatenganso atabwera kuchoka kuchipatala 
  disembala 2009 muluzi adatulira udindo jumbe pomwe adalengezanso akusiya ndale 
  lero wina akamati maudindo onse abwerera mwakale akutanthauza muluzi wayambiranso ndale apa tikutsimikizirika zonsezi akuchita muluzi adatero msonda 
  kalatayi itangotuluka akuluakulu achipanichi pamodzi msonda adakatenga chiletso choletsa msonkhano wa 28 disembala 
  chipanichi chidaitanitsa makwangwala atupele ku komiti yosungitsa mwambo awiriwa sadatuyukire 
  apa awiriwa adachotsedwa mchipanimo nkusankha hophmally makande akhale wogwirizira mpando wa mlembi wachipanichi 
  chipanichi 27 disembala chidaitanitsa bakili muluzi akaonekere ku komiti yosungitsa mwambo 11 januwale 2012 muluzi pobwera ku zambia adati nzamkutu 
  kalata yomwe idalembedwa makande idati muluzi akuyenera kukayankha milandu itatu 
  iyi ndiyo kusowetsa k125 miliyoni yachipanichi kutenga katundu wachipani ndikukamulembetsa mdzina lake kuitanitsa mamembala achipanichi pamodzi makwangwala 21 disembala ku zokambirana chikhalilecho alibe mphamvu zotere malinga gawo 12 b)(vi 12(b)(vii 12(b)(ix malamulo achipanichi 
  mbowela wati zonsezi zikuonetsa chipanichi ulamuliro wa zipani zambiri ukulowera kuchiwonongeko 
  sam banda wa mmudzi mwa chipoka kwa t mponda mboma la mangochi wati chipasupasuchi chikusokoneza nditsate ziti sitikudziwa tidzavotera ndani akuyenera kugwirizana zochita adatero banda 
  sanudi tambula wa mmudzi mwa kalembo kwa t kalembo mboma la balaka wati chidwi chipanichi chikuchoka 
  msonda waloza chala bakili muluzi wakumbutsira zomwe adachita muluzi ati potenga munthu wakunja kwa chipanibingu wa mutharikandikumupatsa ulamuliro wa udf chisankho cha 2004 adati muluzi wayamba kugwiritsa ntchito makwangwala azibweretsa zachilendo mchipanichi zomwe komiti ikukana 
  mchaka cha 1994 pomwe chipanichi chidalowa mboma chipanichi chidali aphungu 92 mnyumba ya malamulo pofika 1999 nkuti chili aphungu oposa 100 aphungu chipani cha alliance for democracy aford adagwirizana chipanichi 
  mchaka cha 1999 mpaka 2004 chipanichi chidali aphungu 55 panthawiyi chipani cha mcp ndicho chidatenga aphungu ambiri 
  chipanichi chili aphungu 15 okha ya malamulo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
malawi akufuna 2018 wa ngwiro pomwe chaka cha 2018 changoyamba kumene mtsogoleri wa zipani zotsutsa boma lazarus chakwera akadaulo ati boma lisinthe kayendetsedwe ka zinthu chakachi chikhale chokomera amalawi 
  chakwera yemwe mtsogoleri wa chipani cha malawi congress party mcp kadaulo zamaphunziro benedicto kondowe kadaulo zachuma dalitso kubalasa kadaulo zaumoyo george jobe mtsogoleri wa bungwe la alimi la farmers union of malawi fum alfred kapichira banda aunikira momwe zinthu zikuyenera kuyendera 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka chakwera amalawi amayembekeza zambiri akuluakuluwa akhala akudzudzula za momwe boma limayendetsera zinthu zina mchaka chomwe changothachi poomba mkota wa madandaulo chakwera adati boma lidalephera kukwaniritsa malonjezo ake 
  padali zinthu zambiri zomwe amalawi amayembekezera potsatira malonjezo omwe boma lidalonjeza momwe chaka cha 2017 chimapita kumapeto padalibe chomwe chidaonekapo adatero chakwera 
  adati mwa zina boma lidalonjeza nkhani ya kuthimathima kwa magetsi zomwe sizidatheke mpaka kutukula alimi mmalo mwake ndiwo adamva kuwawa kwambiri mchakachi kuthana katangale zomwe sizidatheke kulemekeza malamulo 
  akuluakuluwa amalankhula tamvani potsatira pulezidenti peter mutharika polandira chaka chatsopano pomwe adati amalawi ayembekezere chaka chopambana cha zitukuko 
  2018 titsegulira ntchito ya mthirira yomwe idzapindulire mabanja pafupifupi 40 000 tipitiriza kutsegula mwayi wa ntchito kwa achinyamata ntchito za mtukula pakhomo ngongole za achinyamata amayi adatero mutharika 
  kudali kugona kuchigayo kudikira magetsi ayake adatinso boma lipitiliza kutukula ntchito za chuma powonetsetsa chiwongola chomwe amapeleka akakongola ndalama ku mabanki chatsika ambiri azitha kutenga ngongole 
  ndikufuna mchaka chimenechi mlimi mphunzitsi namwino msilikali apolisi azitha kulowa mbanki nkutulakamo atatenga ngongole adzipezere malo ndikumanga nyumba zawo mutharika adatero 
  adati boma lake lili ndondomeko zomwezidzathandize vuto la magetsi lisadzawonekenso mdziko muno likangotha 
  powonjezerapo malonjezowa nduna ya zamalimidwe mthilira chitukuko cha madzi joseph mwanamvekha adati mchaka cha 2018 boma lipezera alimi misika yabwino ya zokolola apukute misozi yawo 
  chaka chatha sitikadachitira mwina kutseka zipata mbeu zisatuluke mpaka tigule chakudya chokwanira poti chaka chino chakudya chiliko kale chokwanira alimi ayembekezere misika yabwino adatero mwanamvekha chakwera adati bola zisakhale zongofuna kupeleka chiyembekezo kwa amalawi aziti boma litithandiza yopanga ndale zonamiza idatha yolankhula ntchito 
  pounikira za momwe chuma chikuyenera kuyendera dalitso kubalasa yemwe kadaulo za chuma adati boma likuyenera mabawuti nthambi zonse za boma zizitsatira malamulo oyendetsera chuma cha boma 
  adati 2017 nthambi zina za boma zidapezeka mirandu yosapeleka malipoti kayendetsedwe ka chuma cha boma zomwe ziapangitsa papezeke mavuto ambiri kauniuni wa chuma ha bomachi 
  tidaona mmene malipoti adalili mchakachi okhudza kauniuni wa chuma cha boma pomwe ndalama za nkhaninkhani sizidaoneke momwe zidagwirira ntchito pamenepa pakuyenera kusinthidwa mchakachi adatero kubalasa 
  adati sizitheka ndiye amalawi ayembekezere chaka china chowawa ku mbali ya za chuma mabala ake adzavuta kupola kaamba koti chaka chotsatiracho chachisankho 
  benedicto kondowe yemwe wa mgwirizano wa bungwe oyanganira za maphunziro adati boma lisakakamire kutsegula sukulu zokha maphunziro liyike mtima kwambiri maphunzirowo apamwamba 
  adati maphunziro otukula aphunzitsi apite patsogolo sukulu zikhale aphunzitsi okwanira zipangizo zophunzilira kuphunzitsizira zizipezeka mokwanira oyendera sukulu akhale odzipeleka 
  ndibwino sukulu zikutsegulidwa tikuyenera kuwonetsetsa zipangizo zilimo aphunzitsi ndiwokwanira ophunzitsidwa pakhale timu ya akadaulo oyendera kuwona maphunzirowo akuyenda bwinodi adatero kondowe 
  kadaulo wa zaumoyo george jobe wati potukula ntchito za umoyo boma liyambe kukwaniritsa mlingo wa mgwirizano wa mayiko oyika k15 k100 bajeti yake yopita ku unduna wa zaumoyo 
  wati mpofunikanso kukhwimitsa malamulo olangira opezeka akuzembetsa mankhwala zipangizo za chipatala zipangizo zoterezi zizikhalamo mzipatala zonse 
  nkhani yayikulu apa kukhulupilika ndondomeko zokhwima zotetezera zipangizo za chipatala pamenepa pakukhudzidwanso ogwira ntchito za chipatala okwaira adatero jobe 
  pulezidenti wa alimi alfred kapichira banda adati alimi sakufuna zambiri kudzipeleka ku mbali ya boma nkhani yotukula alimi makamaka nkhani yolimbana nsi mbozi zomwezikuvuta komansomisika
Label: POLITICS

Text:
othawa madzi ati bola azibwerera kwao oti kwanu nkwanu mthengo mudalaka njoka lero akupherezeka pomwe amene adathawa madzi osefukira kumunsi kwa chigwa cha shire maka ku nsanje akuti akufuna boma liwalole azibwerera kwawo ponena akavutike kusowa pogona azikalima 
  nyakwawa katandika ya kwa t nyachikadza yomwe ikusungidwa pamsasa wa bitilinyu mbomalo yati iyo ake akuopa sabwerera msanga ndiye sakhala mwayi wolima zomwe zingawabweretsere njala yoopsa chaka chino mpaka chamawa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc anzathu chimanga chikupota pamene sitidayambe kulima komwe mvula sichedwa kusiya kuno tingokhala mmisasamu ndiye tikuputa dala njala katandika adauzatamvanilachiwiri 
  woona zomangamanga kuofesi ya dc wa nsanje kennedy adamson wanenetsa anthuwo akufuna kupita akukakamirabe mmalo angoziwa ndiye sapeza nawo mwayi wa nyumba zotsika mtengo 
  boma limanga nyumba zotsika mtengo mmadera amene simukhudzidwa ngozizi ndiye akukana kusamukira kumtunda akubwerera mmalo momwe chaka chaka mukhala vuto la kusefukira kwa madzi sapindula nawo ndondomekoyi adatero adamson 
  humphrey magalasi amene akuyanganira msasa wa bitilinyu akuti anthuwa akukakamira kubwerera pali mantha angakavutike madzi sadaphwerebe 
  kodi akuti apita kuli madzi okhaokhatu komwe amakhalako panopa tidakasakabe tipeze amene tikuwaganizira adapita sadapezekebe ndiye zinthu zili kumeneko adatero magalasi 
  nawo azanyengo achenjeza kugwa mvula yoopsa kuyambira lachinayi lathali pali chiyembekezo ku chikwawa ku nsanje madzi asefukiranso 
  mneneri wa nthambi yoona zanyengo elina kululanga wati maboma blantyre zomba mulanje ndiwo pachiopsezo cholandira mvula yochuluka 
  ikhala yaziphaliwali yamphepo ya mkuntho mvula yambiri chiyembekezo chilipo kuchigwa cha shire madzi asefukiranso adatero kululanga ouza tamvani lachiwiri 
  kodi nyakwawa katandika akuti chiyani zomwe odziwa zanyengo akunenazi iyo ikufotokoza chadutsa chija chinyama sizingatheke madzi otere adutsenso ineyo chibadwireni sikunadutseko madzi amenewa tisaope madzi amene aja apita malo olima alipo tikalima kumtunda chifukwatu madziwa aphwerako kusiyana momwe timachokako 
  kwa maola awiri amene tamvani idakhala pamsasa wa bitilinyu womwe ukusunga oposa 3 000 nkhani yomwe ambiri amakamba yoti abwerere kwawo basi 
  zakudya zikubwera pamsasawu anthuwa akuti sakukondwa momwe akuwagawira chakudyacho 
  tikuyenera tizidya katatu patsiku tikumadya kawiri basi chakudya chake chochepa kodi sitilima ndiye tizivutikabe chonchi boma litipatse mapepala apulasitiki tikamangire nyumba litivomereze kubwerera kwathu idatero mfumuyi yomwe idatinso mudzi wonse udathawa madzi oopsawo 
  izinso zili chonchi kumsasa wa makhanga ku osiyana mbomalo komwe malinga wa zaulimi isaac ayamba kale kutuluka mmisasa yawo 
  ndauzidwa akwezedwa mabwato abwerera akuti akukhala cha ku khonjeni mbali ya thyolo komwe kulibe chakudya kupitako nkovuta cha mayendedwe adatero 
  mvula ya mphamvu idagwa kumayambiriro mwezi uno maboma chikwawa nsanje phalombe zomba rumphi karonga thyolo machinga mangochi ntcheu chiradzulu mulanje balaka salima blantyre ndiwo adakhudzidwa 
  malinga zomwe mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika walankhula lachiwiri lapitali 174 000 atsamutsidwa mmalo mwawo kaamba koti nyumba zawo zakokoloka madzi 
  adati sukulu 234 zagwetsedwa sukulu 181 ndizo zikugwiritsidwa ntchito malo othawirako 
  mutharika adati chiyambireni mavutowa boma lake lakhala kalikiriki kuthandiza amene akhudzidwawa ndalama zoposa k38 biliyoni ndizo zikufunika zithangate anthuwa
Label: FLOODING

Text:
papa wayamikira ansembe madotolo potumikira modzipereka mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wayamikira ansembe madotolo chotumikira modzipereka 
 malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa walankhula lamulungu ku likulu la mpingo ku vatican tsiku lomwe mpingo umachita chaka cha yesu khristu mbusa wabwino 
 papa francisko wayamikira ansembewa madotolo chokhala abusa abwino potumikira modziyiwala eni 
 mmawu ake kumayambiriro misa yomwe anatsogolera mtchalichi lalingono la casa santa marta kulikulu la mpingo ku vatican papa francisco wathokoza ansembe madotolo chotumikira modziyiwala mpaka miyoyo yao yomwe chiswe nyengo iyi yomwe lili mliri wa coronavirus 
 wati potumikira mwa toto moyo ansembe madotolowa aonetsa naonso abusa abwino polola miyoyo yao chiswe chofuna kuthandiza 
 papa francisco wati ansembe oposa 100 madotolo 154 mdziko la italy lokha amwalira akutumikira ya mliri wa coronavirus kusonyeza poyera abusa abwino 
 wati yesu khristu ndiye mbusa wabwino amene adalola kusenza machimo onse mpaka kutaya moyo mtanda pofuna kupulumutsa wati abusa onse akuyenera kutengera chitsanzo cha yesu khristu 
 papa francisco sadabise mau ponena achulukirenji abusa chinyengo masiku ano amene cholinga chao mwa zina ndalama kufuna ma udindo wati chosangalatsa nchakuti akhristu amadziwa kusiyanitsa pakati abusa enieni abusa chinyengowa 
 wati mbusa akuyenera kumamvetsera kudziwa nkhosa zake 
 uthenga wa chaka chino za chiitanidwe papa francisco wati mpingo ukuyenera kupitiriza kulimbikitsa avomere chiitanidwe ku magawo osiyana siyana moyo wa chikhristu 
 uthengawo watinso moyo uliwonse wa chiitanidwe usowa kulimba mtima kupirira kulimbika mmapemphero popeza zovuta nzambiri poyankha kuitana kwa mulungu
Label: RELIGION

Text:
tidasala masiku 52 mulungu atiunikire zambiri timatenga banja sitepe pamoyo wathu basi tikalingalira momwe banja la mbusa mlembi wa wa mpingo wa ccap reverend vasco kachipapa banda mkazi madalitso nyoli mibadwo yobwerayi idzazindikira momwe banja la umulungu limakhalira 
  awiriwa akuti adakumana 1992 onse atasankhidwa kupita kusukulu ya sekondale ya mitundu chikondi chawo chidayamba 1994 uku sikudali kuyamba kwa banja poti zambiri zidadutsapo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu rev kachipapa adati mizati itatu ndiyo idagwira ntchito awiriwa atseguke mmaso kutidi adalengedwa kudzakhala limodzi kutumikira chauta odyetsa ndikusamala nkhosa zake 
  kachipapa madalitso lero banja mzati woyamba ineyo ndidadwala tikadali kusukulu mpaka ndidapita nditapeza nkubwerako madalitso adabwera kudzandizonda aka sikadali komaliza pamenepa ndidazindikira umunthu weniweni adatero kachipapa 
  adati chikondichi sichidasanduke mapeto azonse ayi chiyambi cha kudzifunsa kupempha utsogoleri wa mulungu 
  mchaka cha 1997 tonse awiri tidayamba mapemphero kusala kwa masiku 52 loweruka lokhalokha kupempha mulungu atiunikire ngatidi tidali oyenera kukwatirana mzati wachiwiri mzati wachitatu udali yomwe ndimapanga maphunziro zaubusa ku zomba mkazi wanga adali atayamba kale ntchito adandithandiza kupereka malowolo ake omwe adatero kachipapa 
  adati chauta atavomereza zonse ndondomeko zoyenera zidatsatidwa kufikira ya chinkhoswe mchaka cha 1998 kenako ukwati woyera ku ntchisi ccap 
  ndimakonda mkazi wanga kwambiri cha mtima wabwino amakonda kupemphera kwambiri simkazi wanga chabe mzanga muuzimu adatero kachipapa 
  nawo akuti madalitso akuti abusawa wabwino wokonda banja lawo wodziwa kusamala 
  abwino kwambiri odziwa udindo wawo ndiokonda banja lawo kusamala ana timapemphera limodzi kuyenda limodzi kudya limodzi mwachidule timapangira zinthu limodzi adatero mayiwo

Text:
alamulidwa zaka zinayi kaamba ka kuba bwalo lachiwiri lamilandu mboma la balaka lalamula mamuna wina wa zaka 33 zakubadwa akakhale ku ndende kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kwa zaka zinayi kaamba kopezeka olakwa mlandu wakuba 
  malinga wachiwiri kwa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo sergeant precious makuta mamunayu jofrey sidreck anapalamula mulanduwu 20 november chaka chatha pomwe anabera eliot ndalowa ndalama zokwana 2 hundred thousand shop uptown mbomalo 
 bwaloli linamva sidreck anatenga ndalamayi kwa mzawoyi cholinga choti amusungire pomwe nzawoyi atamwa mowa kutacha mmawa mwini ndalamayu analawira kwa sidreck kukafunsa za ndalama yake sidreck anakana sanatenge ndalamayi zomwe zinamuchititsa kukadandaula ku polisiyi 
 ku bwaloli sidreck anapezeka olakwa second grade magistrate victor sibu wapereka chilangochi omwe khalidwe ili atengerepo phunziro 
 jofrey sidreck amachokera mmudzi wa chingombe mdera la mfumu yayikulu makwangwala mboma la ntcheu

Text:
