Text:
apempha akhristu alimbike popemphera kolona wolemba sylvester kasitomu edwin lambulira omwe amatumikira dayosizi ya mangochi loweruka lapitali alimbikitsa akhristu mpingo wakatolika azikonda kulimbika moyo wa mapemphero maka mumwezi uno wachibalalitso cha mpingo 
 bamboo lambulira amalankhula pambuyo mapemphero kolona nsembe ya ukalistiya yomwe inachitikira goroto ya amayi maria amayi kolona ku kulikulu la wailesiyi ku mangochi 
 ati mapemphero goroto ya amayi maria mwezi uno olemekeza amayi maria wa kolona chinthu cha mtengo wapatali 
 lero tachita misa goroto ya amai maria ku wailesi ya amai maria mwezi wakolona zonsezi kulumikizana zikungofuna kutithandiza tidzindikire zonse tikuyenera kupempha uneneri wa amai maria atinenere kwa mulungu anatero lambulira 
 mwazina alimbikitsa akhristu kukonda mapemphero mwezi uno wachibalalitso cha mpingo mpingo ufalikire ponseponse
Label: RELIGION

Text:
luanar ikhazikitsa magulu alimi akafukufuku nthambi ya zaulangizi pasukulu yaukachenjede ya lilongwe university of agriculture and natural resources luanar sabata zapitazo idakhazikitsa magulu alimi kafukufuku 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu magulu alimiwa akhazikitsidwa cholinga chopereka mwayi kwa alimi atengepo mbali kafukufuku apeze mayankho mavuto omwe akukumana nawo paulimi 
  kwa yaitali alimi akhala akungolandira zotsatira za kafukufuku kwa akatswiri kafukufuku alangizi zapangitsa alimi azingolandira chilichonse kaya chogwirizana kudera kwawo ayi kotero kukhazikitsidwa kwa maguluwa kuthandiza alimiwo kupeza mayankho mavuto ulimi mmadera 
  ntchitoyi ya zaka zinayi ikuchitika kudzera mupulojeketi ya best bets iii chithandizo chochokera ku mcknight foundation magulu alimi akafukufukuwa akhazikitsidwa mmadera zaulimi zombwe mboma la mzimba mkanakhoti ku kasungu kandeu ku ntcheu 
  mwa alimi otenga nawo gawo chilinganizochi malingana yemwe akutsogolera ntchtitoyi daimon kambewa kwa yaitali alimi akhala akutengedwa osadziwa chilichinse kotero akatswri akhala akupanga kafukufuku paokha kumawauza alimi atsatire zomwe apeza zachititsa alimi kumangotsatira zilizonse njira zina sizinathandize kutukula ulimi 
  kutengapo mbali kafukufuku kuthandiza alimi luntha chidwi choganiza kupeza njira zomwe zingawathandize kuthetsa mavuto paulimi mogwirizana madera 
  kwanthawi yaitali akatswiri zaulimi akhala akupanga kafukufuku wawo paokha kumawauza alimi zoti achite zapangitsa alimi kumangodikira alangizi abweretse njira zatsopano za ulimi ntchito yopanga kafukufuku limodzi alimi ithandiza kulimbikitsa kudzidalira luntha luso chidwi chithetsa mavuto ulimi paokha adatero kambewa 
  gulu lililonse lili 22 anthuwo asankhidwa mmadera potengera chidwi chawo poyesera luso lamakono paulimi membala wa gulu akhala munda wa chionetsero azikumana kumakambirana nagawana nzeru 
  alimiwa aziyenderana mminda ya wina mnzake aziphunzitsana kumalimbikitsana 
  ntchitoyi ikuyembekezeka kuthandiza alimi oganiza mozama pofuna kuthetsa mavuto omwe akukumana nawo paulimi zichepetsa wodalira kudikira alangizi awauze njira zothetsera mavuto popeza alangizi alipo ochepa kuyerekeza alimi
Label: FARMING

Text:
boma lichenjeza oba zinthu za mbiri ya makedzana wolemba thokozani chapola aria.mw/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/archive.jpg alt= width="463 height="367 />zina mwa zinthu zopezeka ku national archives boma lapempha aleke wakuba zinthu zomwe zimapezeka ku malo osungirako zinthu za mbiri ya makedzana national archives 
 nduna yoona za masewero chikhalidwe francis phiso anena ku zomba pamene anakayendera ma ofesi omwe amasunga mbiri ya makedzana mdziko muno national archives 
 ati malowa ofunika kuwasamalira alonjeza boma limanga malo atsopano cholinga choti mbiriyi isamalike kaamba koti ma ofesi nthambiyi padakalipano aangono 
 phiso(pakati kulankhula ndid lihoma kumanja amaba kapenanso kuwononga katundu wopezeka kuno mwina kulibe chitetezo chokwanira ndiye timanga nyumba yabwino yotetezeka zinthu zimenezi zisamalike anatero aphiso 
 pamenepa phiso ati boma likulingalira zowonjezera mtengo wa ndalama yomwe okawona zinthuzi amalipira kuchoka 2000 kwacha chaka kupita patsogolo 
 polankhulapo wa national archives mdziko muno dr paul lihoma ati ofesi yawo ikusungira mbiri ya lino yolembedwa kuyambira mzaka za mma 1861 
 tikusungirazinthu zochuluka kwambiri vuto la kasungidwe zambiri timazisunga mmapepala mmene amakhalira ma nyuzipepala zomwe sizimachedwa kuwonongeka anatero lihoma 
 apempha boma lilingalire zomanga nyumba yabwino yosungirako zinthu za mbiri ya makedzana cholinga choti zisamalilike
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
ycw ichilimike polimbikitsa akhristu za baibulo sichinga mamembala bungwe la achinyamata mpingo wakatolika la young christian workers ycw dayosizi ya mangochi awapempha akuti akhale patsogolo pokonda baibulo akhale mboni zenizeni zauthenga wabwino chaka chino cha baibulo 
 mlangizi wa achinyamata dayosizi yi christopher sichinga omwe anena lamulungu ku parish ya mpingowu ya kausi komwe kumachitikira msonkhano wa atsogoleri bungwe li mma section onse opezeka dayosizi yi 
 ati mpingo kuyembekezera membala bungweli omwenso akhale patsogolo polimbikitsa zaubwino wokonda mau mulungu 
 mpingo ukuyembekezera iwowa akhala patsogolo kumemeza akonde baibulo kuhala nalo kumanso chomwe baibulo likunena anatero bamboo sichinga 
 polankhulanso wachiwiri kwa president wa bungwe la ycw dayosizi ya mangochi peter mukhori bungwe la ycw dayosizi ya mangochi liyesetsa ntchito zokweza mpingo wu mchakachi 
 ambiri amati sitimakonda zauzimu tikutsutsa zimenezo chaka chino tiwaonetse zauzimo ziliko ku ycw posachedwapa tikhala retreat yomwe ikachitikire ku phiri la unangu komwe malo oyera dayosizi mwathu muno anatero mukhori 
 ati chakchimenechi awonetsetsanso athandiza parishi imene ikusowa thandizo lapadera
Label: RELIGION

Text:
bajeti iganizire mavuto ndondomeko ya chuma ndiyo chiyembekezo chachikulu tsopano chomwe chingachepetse mavuto omwe akukumana nawo kaamba ka kukwera mitengo ya zinthu mdziko muno 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda dzulo watsegulira msonkhano wa aphungu nyumba ya malamulo omwe akuyembekezeka kukakambirana za ndondomeko ya chuma choyendetsera lino bajeti kuyambira chaka chino mpaka 2014 
  maganizo amabungwe mafumu amene takamba nawo asonyeza pokhapokhapo boma liganizire ake popanga ndondomekoyi ndiye mavuto omwe adza kaamba ka kugwa kwa mphamvu ya kwacha akhoza kunyanyira 
  pofotokozera tamvani wa bungwe loona za ufulu wa ogula la consumers association of malawi cama john kapito mafumu ati mavuto makamaka okhudza nkhani ya mitengo ya zinthu poyerekeza mmene amapezera akula kwambiri 
  ndemangazi zadzudzula kwambiri zina mwa zomwe ndondomeko ya chuma ya 2012 mpaka 2013 idatsata ponena mmalo mochepetsa mavuto zidaonjezera zowawa makamaka kwa akumudzi omwe kapezedwe ka ndalama nkovuta 
  malinga kapito zina zomwe zidavuta bajeti ya 2012/2013 zoti pambali poti ndondomeko yomwe ikungothayi ikadayesetsa kuyangana mbali zina iyo sidaganizire akumudzi mbali zambiri zomwe ndondomekoyi idakonza sizidawakhudze 
  akuti boma lidachotsa misonkho panyuzipepala kaunjika buledi mwa zina zomwe amagula kwambiri okhala mmadera mmizinda mmatauni momwe njira zopezera ndalama zimapezekako kusiyana kumudzi 
  bola popanga ndondomeko ya 2013/2014 aganizirepo kwambiri mmene akumidzi angawathandizire azitha kupeza ndalama zogulira katundu wofunika kwambiri pamoyo wa tsiku tsiku 
  mndondomeko yomwe ikupita kumapetoyi mbali imeneyi sadayiganizire mokwanira nchifukwa chake akhala akuvutika kwambiri mitengo ya zinthu itayamba kukwera mpakana anasiya kukwera mabasi choopa mtengo adaimika galimoto zawo cholephera kugula mafuta 
  ndikanakhala wosangalala kwambiri potulutsa ndondomeko ya chaka tikuchiyambachi aganizirepo zinthu zimenezi adatero kapito 
  itangotuluka bajeti ya 2012/2013 mneneri wa za chuma mchipani cha malawi congress party mcp joseph njobvuyalema adati ndondomekoyo idangoganizira okhala kutauni osati kumudzi mmene aphungu ambiri ankayembekezera 
  kutukula njobvuyalema adati boma limafunika kuonetsetsa bajeti ikupatsa akumudzi mwayi wogwira ntchito zingonozingono azitha kupeza kangachepe koti azithandizikira poyerekeza ndalama ya kwacha inachepa mphamvu kwambiri 
  zambiri akumudzi omwe amapezako ndalama amaipeza pakamodzi makamaka akagulitsa mbewu zawo ndiye ndalama ikagwa atagulitsa kale ndalama yawoyo simalimba choncho amakhala mmavuto pafupipafupi adatero njobvuyalema 
  t njewa ya ku lilongwe yati popanga ndondomekoyi boma liganizireponso ndalama zopita kuthumba logulira zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo poganizira chiwerengero cha ofuna kupindula nawo chikunka chikwererakwerera 
  njewa adati poganizira mbaliyi boma lionetsetsenso ndondomekoyo ili njira zabwino zoyendetsera kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka ndalamazo poopa alimi angaone zomwe zidaoneka chaka chatha pogula fetereza mbewu zotsika mtengo 
  pakufunika kutinso akamakonza ndondomekoyo aganizirepo zokhazikitsa za kayendetsedwe ka ndalama zogulira zipangizo zotsika mtengo pasamakhale chinyengo cha uliwonse chaka chatha alimi ambiri makamaka kuno kwathu anapezeka agula mbewu yomwe idakanika kumera mpaka anakakamizidwa kugulanso mbewu ina ndiye mavuto omwe mmidzimu pankhani ya zachuma pamenepa mpofunika patakonzedwa adatero njewa 
  akutipo chiyani foster ngondo yemwe amakonza galimoto mumzinda wa lilongwe akuti pomwe aphungu akukakambirana ndondomekoyi mwayi athe kukonza zomwe zidavuta kwambiri mchaka chomwe chikuthachi 
  akuti masitalaka osiyanasiyana omwe akhala akuchitika okhudza malipiro mchakachi umboni wokwanira adakumana mavuto ambiri omwe akufunika kukonzedwa 
  tiyembekezera zakupsa kuchoka kumeneku ku nyumba ya malamulo osati tizidzatinso pakadakhala chonchi ayi momwe munali mavuto akuluakulu tamuwona akuluakuluwonso aonamo choncho akuyenera mmalo amenewo akonzemo adatero ngondo 
  naye loveness botomani yemwe amagulitsa msitolo yogulitsa ziwiya wati boma lisalimbe mtima kwambiri ndalama zomwe likuyembekezera kufodya ndondomeko ya chaka chino ifunika kuonjeramo ndalama zambiri 
  tisataye kuwona tili ndalama zambiri zomwe zachokera kufodya tikuyenera kuganiza bajeti ya chaka chino muli zosowa zambiri osaiwala pakatipa malipiro akwezedwakwezedwa zina zina zasintha choncho pafunika ndalama zambiri zowonjezera mundondomekoyi adatero botomani 
  boma likutinji mneneri wa boma moses kunkuyu wati ndondomeko ya chuma ya 2012/2013 yayesetsa kutukula miyoyo ya akumidzi sizidawonekere zambiri amathamangira kuloza pomwe pakuperewera 
  si zoona ndondomekoyi inasiyiratu kunja akumidzi pali zambiri zomwe zinali mndondomekoyi zomwe cholinga chake chinali kutukula miyoyo ya akumidzi zambiri mwa zinakwaniritsidwa 
  mndondomekoyi ndalama zina zinagwiritsidwa ntchito ya chitukuko cha kumidzi ya social cash transfer yomwe yapindulirapo ambiri mmadera kumidzi munali pologalamu ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo yomwe alimi ambiri akumidzi adapindula nayo kungotchulapo zochepa chabe adatero kunkuyu 
  adati pokonzekera ndondomeko ya chuma cha 2013/2014 boma linapanga kale kafukufuku wa mnthambi zosiyanasiyana zofunika kulandira ndalama kuphatikizapo madera kumidzi lakonzekera bwinobwino 
  bajeti ya 2012/2013 idali ya ndalama zokwana k406 biliyoni mwa ndalamazi zambiri zinapita ku unduna wa maphunziro womwe udalandira k74 biliyoni unduna wa zaulimi womwe udalandira k68 biliyoni yomwe k40 biliyoni idali ya pologalamu ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
pms yakhutira ntchito yophunzitsa ana tilitonse radio maria ofesi yowona za mabungwe utumiki wa papa mdziko muno ya pontifical mission societies pms yati yokhutira momwe maphunziro mpingo pakati ana akuyendera kudzera radio maria malawi 
 wa ku ofesiyi vincent mwakhwawa anena polankhula mtolankhani wathu pomwe amathilira ndemanga za momwe maphunziro ana tilitonse akuyendera chiwakhadzikitsileni wailesiyi 
 apempha aphunzitsi anawa pamodzi makolo adzipereke ntchito yolimbikitsa anawa adzimvera kutenga nawo mbai maphunzirowa kudzera radio maria 
 maphunziro amene tikuchita radio maria akupindula kwambiri kaamba koti ino yomwe kuli mliri wa coronavirus ana sangathe kusonkhana pamodzi choncho tikupempha makolo ana onse alimbikitse anawa kutenga nawo gawo maphunzirowa kudzera wailesi ya amayi maria anatero mwakhwawa 
 mwazina mwakhwawa ati pambuyo maphuzirowa anawa azafunsidwa mayeso omwe ana amene azachite azalandila mphoto zosiyanasiyana
Label: RELIGION

Text:
akhoti anyanyala ntchito mavenda 40 omwe adamangidwa mzinda wa lilongwe sabata yathayi mgulu la zikwizikwi za amene akhudzidwa kunyanyala ntchito kwa ogwira ntchito mmabwalo amilandu mdziko muno komwe kunayambika lolemba lapitali 
  chakusayenda kwa zinthu mmabwalo amilanduwa iwowa alephera kupeza belo chithandizo china chilichonse afinyikabe mpaka kunyanyala ntchitoku kutatha 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc onyanyala ntchitowa ati akuchita pofuna kukakamiza boma liyambe kupereka malipiro omwe adagwirizana mchaka cha 2006 
  apa akatswiri ndale amabungwe otumikiridwa mabwalowa ati boma likuyenera kulongosola madzi asadafike mkhosi 
  kuyambira lolemba mabwalo amilandu adali otseka pofika lachitatu pomwe timasindikiza tamvani mabwalowo adali asadawatsegule 
  malinga wa bungwe loona zaufulu wa la malawi watch billy banda wati kunyanyala ntchitoko kwasonyeza boma silikulabadira miyoyo ya 
  banda wati kunyanyalaku kungapitirire amalawi ambiri avutika pali omwe sakuyenera kundende kumeneko cha kunyanyala ntchitoku 
  mavenda 40 omwe adamangidwa ku lilongwe pazipolowe amayenera kukaonekera kubwalo lamilandu lolemba sizidatheke cha sitalakayo 
  mneneri wa polisi mchigawo chapakati john namalenga lachiwiri adavomereza anthuwa adalephera kukaonekera kubwalo lamilandu choti kumabwaloko kudali kotseka 
  adati kunyanyalaku kukapitirira ndiye zitokosi zamdziko muno zikhala zodzadza 
  achuluka mchitolokosi timakawasunga ku polisi za kawale lingadzi kunyanyalaku kungapitirire tisowa pogwira 
  kudzadzaku kungachitike titamanga ambiri pakamodzi zimatheka oposa 100 patsiku adatero namalenga 
  mphunzitsi wa zandale kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college joseph chunga wati uku ndikupha ufulu wachibadwidwe makamaka kwa omwe mmanja mwa apolisi amayenera kukaonekera kubwalo lamilandu akapatsidwe belo akadziwike wolakwa mlandu omwe amangidwira 
  mwa malamulo pamayenera pasadutse maola 48 omangidwa asadakaonekere kubwalo lamilandu sizidatsatidwe ndiye ufulu wako waphwanyidwa 
  adati kunyanyalako kukapitirira pali chiopsezo boma lingatengerepo mwayi lidziwa munthu akamangidwa sakaonekera kubwalo la milandu 
  zikutanthauza ulamuliro wotsatira malamulo watha adatero chunga 
  osman chimenya wa ku kanjedza mumzinda wa blantyre adavomerezana chunga adati boma likuyenera kukwaniritsa mgwirizano ogwira ntchitowa 
  erick gomani wa ku malewule kwa t kapeni mboma la blantyre adaikira mangombe anthuwa adalonjezedwa apatsidwa malipiro atsopano kotero boma likuyenera kukwaniritsa 
  mneneri wa gulu lomwe likunyanyalali yemwenso kalaliki wamkulu ku high court mumzinda wa blantyre austin kamanga wati sasintha ganizo lonyanyala ntchito pokhapokha boma litayamba kupereka ndalama zomwe zidavomerezedwa nyumba ya malamulo mchaka cha 2006 
  adati malipiro omwe amagwira ntchito zina kumabwalo amilandu amavomerezedwa nduna ya zachuma zomwe akuti zidachitika 2006 boma silidafune kukwaniritsa 
  kuyambira 1997 malamulo akagwiridwe ka ntchito ogwira ntchito kumabwalo amilandu amaunikidwa pakatha zaka akaonedwa amatumizidwa ya malamulo aphungu akaunikire ndikuvomereza adatero kamanga 
  2006 nyumba ya malamulo itavomereza nduna ya zachuma itavomereza anthuwa akuti sadalandire malipiro atsopanowo kukokanakokana kudayambika 
  kamanga adaonjeza mchaka cha 2009 boma lidangolengeza litionjezera malipiro k15 k100 iliyonse sitikumvetsa ndalama imeneyi imachokera pati tiyambe kulandira ndalama zathu apo ayi sitibwerera kuntchito adalumbira kamanga 
  nduna ya zachuma ken lipenga samayankha lamya yake ya mmanja pomwe tamvani imafuna kulankhula naye 
  adauza atolankhani lachiwiri msabatayi unduna ukukambirana okhudzidwa ayankhe mavuto anthuwa 
  adati alankhulapo nkhaniyo akangomaliza kukambirana mbali zokhudzidwa nkhaniyo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
sitilemba akunjaansah pamene kalembera wachisankho walowa gawo lachisanu wa bungwe la zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec jane ansah wati amalawi asade nkhawa kunja salembetsa nawo mkaundula 
  ansah adanena potsatira ndemanga za pali chiopsezo choti nzika zina za la mozambique zikhonza kulembetsa mkaundula mboma la mulanje malinga pali chiopsezo ku mozambique akhonza kufuna kulembetsa nawo makamaka ku limbuli muloza komwe dera la mmalire mozambique 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka ansah adanenetsa taika ndondomeko zonse pasakhale wakunja woti walembetsa tikuchita poonetsetsa pali mamonitala kuderalo amenenso adzaonetsetse ofuna kulembetsa chitupa cha unzika 
  wa nthambi yoona za kalembera wa unzika mboma la mulanje wellingtone kalambo wati akumanapo nzika za ku mozambique zofuna kulembetsa nawo mavoti 
  taonapo mafumu ku muloza akupereka umboni munthu mmalawi kuwafunsitsa tidapeza ku mozambique adatero kalambo 
  kalembera wa chisankho adalowa mgawo lachisanu lolemba likuyembekezeka kudzatha malinga mec 3 271 744 adalembetsa mmagawo apitawa pomwe mec imayembekezera kulembetsa 4 619 174 zikusonyeza 81 mwa 100 alionse amene amayenera kulembetsa ndiwo adatero 
  kutsika kwa amene akulembetsa kwakhudza akadaulo mabungwe zipani zandale zina 
  katswiri wa zandale wa ku chancellor college ernest thindwa wati wamphwayi kukalembetsa ukhonza kukhumudwa kwa amalawi wa andale omwe amasintha mawanga akasankhidwa mmaudindo 
  mwina adagwa mphwayi nkhani za zisankho amakhumudwa wa atsogoleri omwe amalonjeza zinthu zina ya kampeni osazikwaniritsa akasankhidwa adatero thindwa 
  zipani zandale zaalunjika ponena bungwe la mec silinafalitse uthenga wa kalembera likulimbikira pofalitsa mauthenga wailesi nyuzipepala basi mmalo mopitanso kumaderawo 
  mneneri wa chipani cha united democratic front udf ken ndanga wati kafukufuku wawo adaonetsa bungwe la mec silidafalitse uthenga mokwanira mmadera 
  tikawafunsa sanalembetse mmadera amati samadziwa zoti kalembera wafika mdera lawo chipani tikumapita mmaderamu kumema adatero ndanga 
  mlembi wamkulu wag ulu la united transformation movement utm patricia kaliati mlembi wamkulu wa malawi congress party mcp eissenhower mkaka adagwirizana ndanga podzudzula mec 
  ndikunena ndili ku mulanje kumene kalembera mkati sindinaone galimoto ya mec chimkuzamawu kumema kukalembetsa 
  mkaka adati chipani chawo chomwe chakhala chikupempha mec ibwereze kalembera mmadera chimayembekezera pofika gawo lachinayi la kalembera zinthu zikhala zitasintha mmalo mwake zikunkira kuonongeka 
  mgawo loyamba lachiwiri zidali zomveka uthenga udali usadamwazidwe mokwanira mgawo lachinayi tizikamba nkhani imeneyi ayi sizoona mec ikadawonapo adatero mkaka 
  wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe okhudzidwa zisankho la malawi electoral support network mesn steve duwa adagwirizana zipanizi mec yalephera kumwaza mauthenga kalembera 
  ndidali ku thyolo luchenza komwe samaonetsa chidwi ntafunsa makhansala ngakhaleso amati sadalandire uthenga uliwonse woti kukuchitika kalembera mdera lawo kutanthauza ntchito ikadalipo adatero duwa 
  malinga ansah palibe kuwiringula kulikonse koti mauthenga sadamwazidwe mec mabungwe national initiative for civic education nice trust ayesetsa kumwaza mauthenga 
  kupatula njira yomwaza mauthenga wailesi timagwiritsanso ntchito galimoto zokhala zimkuzamawu mgawo loyamba tidagwiritsa ntchito galimoto 15 gawo lachiwiri galimoto 14 gawo lachitatu galimoto 18 gawo lachinayi galimoto 17 adatero ansah 
  adati bungweli lidzaunika pamapeto zonse nkoyenera kubwereza ntchito ya kalembera mmaboma omwe sizidayende
Label: POLITICS

Text:
sensasi ili mkati pamene kalembera wa nyumba mkati mafumu ati akuyembekezera mavuto amene amakumana nawo achepa boma limagwiritsa ntchito zotsatira za kalemberayo popereka zofunika kwa amalawi 
  kalemberayo amene amachitika pakatha zaka 10 zilizonse adayamba 3 mwezi uno akuyembekezeka kudzatha 23 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka wogwira ntchito ya kalembera kulembera banja lina ku lilongwe polankhula tamvani t mlauli ya ku mwanza t chindi ku mzimba t mkanda ku mchinji adanena payekhapayekha chiyembekezo mavuto amene adza kaamba ka kukula kwa chiwerengero achepa 
  vuto lalikulu limene tili nalo la madzi akumanga nyumba zofolera malate madzi tikumwabe mzitsime zosasaamalika zimadzetsa matenda amene timakavutikanso nawo kuchipatala adatero mkanda 
  t chindi adati kuli mavuto kusowa vuto la zaumoyo nkhani yamadzi siyimugoneka tulo 
  amayi amadzuka mbandakucha kukatunga madzi dzuwa litakwera kungochedwa pangono ndiye pakhomo pawo mukhonza kuona madzi akukanganiranawo pampope ayi pachitsime adatero chindi 
  t mlauli wa ku neno idati vuto la madzi likusautsa makamaka mchilimwe pomwe dzuwa likuomba kwambiri adati zikukhudzaa kwambiri dera lake limene lotentha kwambiri 
  akukonza zina zina nkhani ya madzi tisanamizanepo zinthu zikuyipirayipira mijigo ili apo apo chiwerengero cha ofuna madzi abwino chikungokwererabe adatero mlauli 
  kalemberayu akuyamba kumene padali mavuto osiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo la kuchedwa kwa malipiro ogwira ntchitoyi 25 000 pomwe adangolandira k20 000 mmalo mwa k120 000 imene amayenera kulandira ataphunzira ntchitoyi ogwira ntchito enanso adandaula sanapeze nawo lamya zogwirira ntchitoyo vuto lina lidali la kubedwa kwa zipangizo za ogwira ntchitoyi ku ntcheu 
  mneneri wa nthambi yoona za kalemberayu ya national statistical office nso kingsley manda adatsimikiza za mavutowa adati zonse zili tayale tsopano 
  chilichose chilibwino onse adalandira ndalama zawo tawatsimikizira mayunitsi afika sabata ino amafuna lamyawo tawafotokozera lamya nzawokhawo omwe akuyenda mmidzi kutenga mafigala adatero manda 
  adati vuto lalikulu lomwe lidalipo lidali lokhudza netiweki yotumizira ma figala makamaka mmadera momwe mulibe netiweki vutolonso adalikonza 
  padali vuto la netiweki mmadera ndiye poti makina omwe tikugwiritsa ntchito ngolira netiweki tilumikizane tidapereka galimoto zomwe akumagwiritsa ntchito kuyenda kukafika pomwe pali netiweki nkutumiza adatero manda 
  mwa owelengera anthuwa ku mpsupsu mboma la zomba amene sanadzitchule dzina adati tsiku akumawerenga makomo osachepera 40 
  adati nyumba za derali zili patalipatali akumakwanitsa ochuluka chotere mafunso pogwiritsa ntchito tablet sizikumatenga atsirize 
  wa amene awerengedwa kwa jali mboma la zomba lones kamwana adati mphindi zosaposera 45 zimene adafunsidwa mafunso akuti mphindizi zidali zopindulitsa kwa mwini ngakhalenso ku 
  mafunso ake akumufukula munthu phata zinthu zimene malawi tikayankha mwachilungamo zithandizira lathu lino likhale lotukuka adatero kamwana 
  kalembera wa mchaka cha 2008 chiwerengero cha chidapezeka 13 077 160 lipoti la kalemberayu limasonyeza 48 mwa 100 aliwonse amamwa madzi pamjigo 18 100 aliwonse amamwa mzitsime zosatetezedwa 
  lipotili likusonyezaso 43 100 amakhala mnyumba zawedewede 34 100 amakhala mnyumba zowonekako 23 100 aliwose amakhala mnyumba zolongosoka 
  malinga nso chiwerengero cha amalawi chikhonza kufika 17 931 637 chaka chino
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mcp utm asainira mgwirizano kudali khwimbi la ku kamuzu institute for sports ku lilongwe lachinayi pomwe zipani zotsutsa zimasayinira mgwirizano wawo motsogozedwa lazarus chakwera wa malawi congress party mcp saulos chilima wa utm party 
  mumgwirizanowu muli zipani za mcp utm party peoples party aford mafunde umodzi party petra freedom party ppm 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc chakwera chilima kupatsana moni kadaulo ndale george phiri wati mgwirizano wangati umenewu sudachitikeponso mdziko la malawi adati zipanizi zikapitirira kuyenda limodzi chonchi palibe chokaikitsa adzapambana pachisankho chobwereza chomwe chikubwera mtsogolomu 
  mukakumbuka ndidanenapo mmbuyomo chisadachitike chisankho cha 21 may 2019 mgwirizano wa zipani za mcp utm ndiwoopsa ndiye tikunena za zipani zingapo amenewo simasewera adatero phiri 
  padakalipano minofu ya mgwirizanowo ikadali yobisika yemwe adayendetsa mwambowo richard chimwendo banda adati pakhala tsiku lapadera lomwe zipanizo zidzalengeze momwe maudindo akhalire mumgwirizanowo 
  mgwirizanowo adasayinira chakwera chilima alembi zipanizo eisenhower mkaka patricia kaliati mtsogoleri wakale wadziko lino joyce banda adasayina mboni ya mcp pomwe enoch chihana wa aford adasayina mboni ya utm party 
  chakwera chilima onse polankhula kwa khwimbiro adati tsiku losayinirana mgwirizanowo lidali potembenukira la malawi kuchoka mmavuto adzawoneni nkuyamba kulunjika ku la mkaka uchi 
  chilima yemwe adayamba kulankhula adati ulendo omwe mgwirizanowo udayamba wopita ku nyumba ya boma akayendetse mwangwiro 
  ulendo wathuwu tikulowera ya boma mwa akakhala kumeneko ulendo uno palibe zoti wina abera chisankho tamva kale akuyesayesa njira zoti akoke mphamvu za mafoni azikazisokonezera ku nyumba imene ija pachisankho adatero chilima akuloza nyumba ya boma ya ku lilongwe 
  chakwera adatsimikizira yotenga boma yakwana adawalimbikitsa asadandaule chilichonse 
  adadzudzula zomwe adapanga mtsogoleri wadziko lino peter mutharika pokana kusayina mabilu oyendetsera chisankho kunyazitsa komiti yoona zosankha mmaudindo mboma pac pokana kuchotsa makomishona mec 
  chavuta apa nkufunitsitsa kudzikundikira mphamvu mphamvuzo zikuwakana chomwe timadziwa nchoti mphamvu za wanthu atsogoleri wongotumikira adatero chakwera 
  adatenga kanthawi kuphunzitsa anthuwo za matenda coronavirus
Label: POLITICS

Text:
dekhani zogawa dzikoakadaulo odziwa zandale malamulo ati maganizo ogawa lino chigawo cha kumpoto kukhale loima palokha akufunika kudekha kulingalira mozama 
  akuluakuluwo adatambasula tamvani utafuna kumva maganizo zomwe adanena gavanala wa chipani cha peoples party mchigawo cha kumpoto christopher mzomera ngwira yemwe mmbuyomu adanena chigawo cha kumpoto chikhale loima palokha 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc roadblock ya jenda malire zigawo zina kumpoto atafunsidwa mosiyana katswiri wa zamalamulo edge kanyonyongolo wa bungwe lolimbikitsa kukambirana za zoyendetsera lino la institute for policy interaction ipi rafiq hajat otambasula za ndale boniface dulani blessings chinsinga adagwirizana pamodzi nkhaniyi siyikufunika phuma 
  malinga kanyongolo dera gawo likathothoka kudziko nkukhala palokha limakumana mavuto maiko alivomereze 
  vuto lakuti maiko amachiona chovuta kuvomereza latsopanolo mmalo mwake silikhala mpata wotenga nawo mbali zinthu zomwe maiko amachitira limodzi adatero kanyongolo 
  dulani adati kulimbikitsa zogawa kuli kuukira zomwe siziloledwa mmalamulo lino 
  adati mbali gawo lina likuona zovuta mmene boma likuyendera njira yabwino nkupempha apatsidwe mphamvu zomayendetsera gawo lawo osati paokha imeneyi federation mchingerezi ikulimbikitsidwa chipani cha malawi congress party maiko south africa nigeria united states of america amatsata njirayi 
  njira yopempha mphamvuyi imakhala maiko omwe akuluakulu powerengera madera amakhala kutali kwambiri likulu ndiye mpovutadi kulandira thandizo moyenera adatero 
  hajat adati nkhaniyi ndiyosafunika phuma bwinobwino 
  omwe akulimbikira akhoza zokonza kusamvana komwe gwero la nkhaniyi zina oterewa kuwapatsa mpata oti ayese zomwe akutanthauzazo adatero hajat 
  chinsinga adati kugawa si za masewera chitukuko chikhoza kusokonekera 
  adati pali mtunda waukulu lagawidwe akuluakulu okhudzidwa amayenera kukhalirana pansi kugwirizana mmene kagawidweko kayendere 
  nkhani yoyamba kukonza chisankho cha liferendamu chomwe sichinthu cha akuluakuluwo amayenera kugwirizana bwinobwino mmene zinthu zikhalire dzikolo likagawidwa adatero chinsinga 
  adati zikakhala chonchi munthu amakhala mpata wosankha mbali yomwe akufuna akhale posatengera komwe amachokera 
  katswiriyu adati ntchitoyi ikhoza kuvuta cha nkhani ya maukwati ntchito zitukuko zomwe ochokera mchigawo china adakhazikitsa mchigawo chomwe si chakwawo 
  adagwirizana dulani maiko ambiri omwe mumakhala mpungwepungwe uwu amagwirizana chigawo chomwe sichikukhutitsidwa ndikayendetsedwe kazinthucho chikhale mphamvu zoyendetsera chigawocho chilli pansi paulamuliro wa lomwelo 
  mafumu mchigawo cha kumpotochi atsutsana maganizo ngwira ponena zomwe akunenazo si maganizo kumpoto 
  mwa mafumuwa kyungu yak u karonga adati omwe akulimbikitsa zokhazikitsa chigawochi lokha sadafunse apereke maganizo 
  sadafunse munthu pankhaniyi ndiye akhala maganizo kumpoto zimenezo sitikuzidziwa ayi adatero kyungu 
  mfumun chikulamayembe ya ku rumphi nayo idakana kutenga nawo mbali maganizo opanga chigawochi lokha nayo idati mpofunika atafunsidwa kaye nkumva maganizo 
  mwa akuluakulu mabungwe omwe si aboma pankhani ya maphunziro benedicto kondowe adati nzomvetsa chisoni amalawi safuna kuphunzirira zinthu zomwe zidachitikapo kale nkulephereka kugwira ntchito 
  kondowe yemwe wa bungwe loyendetsa mgwirizano wa mabungwe omwe amakhudzidwa nkhani za chitukuko cha maphunziro la civil society coalition for education quality adati nkhani yolowetsa mitundu pandale idabwezeretsako chitukuko cha maphunziro mmbuyo kubwereza zoterezi kungakhale zotsatira zowawa kwambiri 
  nkhani yolowetsa mitundu ndale idavuta mzaka za mma 1988/89 pomwe boma la malawi congress party lidalamula aphunzitsi onse kumpoto abwerere kwawo cha ichi kudapezeka sukulu zina zidagwa mmavuto aphunzitsi adatero kondowe 
  adati chofunika nkuunika chomwe chayambitsa nkhani yogawanayi nkukonza mowonongeka monse lipitirire kuyenda 
  malinga mzomera ngwira yemwe akuti chigawo cha kumpoto chimasalidwa mzinthu zambiri ntchito za chitukuko malinga malipoti mtsogoleri wakale wadziko lino joyce banda adati nzosatheka zipani zina zotsutsa cha udf sidatinso ganizoli silingathandize 
  ngwira adati chikhulupiriro kumpoto atapatsidwa mwayi woponya chisankho cha liferendamu akhoza kusankha chigawochi chichoke mmanja mwa la malawi lina palokha 
  ndikudziwa zomwe ndikunena si ndikulankhula zopanda pake ayi mwina 100 aliwonse awiri atatu okha ndiwo sangagwirizane maganizo osandutsa mpoto palokha adatero
Label: POLITICS

Text:
anatchereza mkazi wanga mkonono agogo   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu langa dandaulo mkazi wanga wokondeka iyetu mwano alibe ndiponso ntchito amagwira molimbika abale anga amawalemekeza ana athu akuloledwa chimodzi mkazi wanga mkonono ndichite chiyani yh zomba 
  yh zoonadi mkonono zina umasokoneza komatu ichi si choti nkudana nawo 
  muziwalimbikitsa akazi anuwo azigona chambali champeni osati chagada mudziwe zina mkonono umadza munthu wonenepa kwambiri choncho alimbikitseni akazi anuwo azichita masewera olimbitsa thupi mwina thupi nkuchepako kusamala zimene amadya zisakhale zonenepetsa kwambiri 
  zinanso kumwa mowa kwambiri ngakhalenso kusuta kumakuza mkonono kusiya kukhonza kuthandiza 
  zikupitirira mukhonza kumatchinga makutu anu zinthu zina thonje nyumba yanu ya zipinda zingapo mukhonza kumakagona chipinda china machitidwe mbanja muziona nokha 
  mwamuna wanga ulesi zikomo anatchereza ndidakwatirana mwamuna wanga chaka chatha ndiwaulesi osati masewera ndimagwira ntchito masiku ochuluka ndine ndikabwera amayembekezera ndiphike ndine kukonza mnyumba zonse ndimakhala otopa moti sabata iliyonse ndimapita kwa makolo anga ndikapumeko ndichite naye chiyani ab lilongwe 
  ab nzomvetsa chisoni amuna akadali moyo woti ntchito zonse azigwira amayi kukakhala kumudzi mupeza amayi abambo apita limodzi kumunda kukalima pobwera uko amayi asenza nkhuni kumbuyo atabereka mwana 
  kufika pakhomo amayiwo amapita kumadzi kenako kuphika nsima ndiwo chonsecho abambo akusewera bawo 
  khalidwe ili lachikale zoti ntchito zonse zapakhomo azigwira zidapita mukuyenera kulankhula naye mwamuna wanuyo sizikuthandizani 
  mopempha zothawira kwa makolo anu sizikuthandizani kumeneko sikuthana vuto kungolikankhira kaye pambali 
  adakwatiwa ndale anatchereza ndimanyadira malangizo anu kale ndinkaona sindingakhale vuto mpaka kukuuzani zandikulira 
  mkazi wanga ndale chingasinthe chipani cholamula amapezeka nsalu ya chipanicho nacho kukangoti kuli msonkhano timayembekezera tidya mochedwa 
  ndikamufunsa amayankha akukonza kapansi tilemera anzake apita patsogolo poimbira kuvinira andale ndimusiye dennis m zomba 
  dennis kuimbira andale kumayenera kutha kalekale nzomvetsa chisoni amayi asungwana abambo achinyamata akusiya ntchito zawo kukaimbira andale ili si vuto la amayi okha mwaonapo achinyamata akudzipenta makaka chipani 
  sindikudziwa amapindula chiyani chomwe ndikudziwa uku nkutaya
Label: RELATIONSHIPS

Text:
abwenzi alonjeza kuthandiza radio maria ya mariatona wolemba richard makombe abwenzi radio maria akidayosizi ya blantyre ati ndiokonzeka kuthandiza wayilesiyi ino ya mariatona ikwanitse kupeza ndalama zomangira studio yayingono mzinda wa mzuzu 
 wapa mpando wa abwenzi radio maria akidayosizi ya blantyre james ngomba awuza radio maria gulu lawo ndilokonzeka kuonesetsa nthawin ya mariatona wa october radio maria ipeze ndalama zokwanira cholinga cha wayilesiyi chikwaniritsidwe 
 radio maria imadalira thandizo kwa akhristu eni ake choncho abwenzi tikuyenera patsogolo kuthamanga amayi maria pofuna kupeza thandizo loyenera lithandize wayilesiyianatero ngomba 
 ngomba ati ayesetsa kufikira ambiri atahandize wayilesiyi kuonesetsa katundu ma booklet radio maria afika kwa ochuluka akwanitse kuthandiza nyengo ya mariatona 
 mariatona inayamba 13 october ikuyembekezeka kufika kumapeto 8 december 2019,ndipo wayilesiyi ikuyembekezeka kupeza ndalama zokwana 15 million kwacha
Label: RELIGION

Text:
mandela alowa mmanda mawa galimoto yonyamula thupi la mandela kutuluka kuchipatala cha asirikali thupi la mtsogoleri woyamba wachikuda wa la south africa nelson mandela likuyembekezeka kulowa mmanda mawa kumudzi kwawo ku qunu mdzikolo 
  mandela yemwe adali zaka 95 adatisiya lachinayi sabata yatha atadwala kwa maliro ake adakhudza ambiri padziko 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc pamwambo wokumbukira ntchito imene mandela adaigwira polimbana tsankho udachitika lachiwiri mumzinda wa johannesburg mdzikolo padafika atsogoleri oposa 90 maiko osiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda kuchikumbukirocho chimene chidachitikira kubwalo la za masewero la fnb kudafika oposa 90 000 
  atsogoleri osiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo barack obama wa la united states mlembi wamkulu wa mgwirizano wa maiko la united nations ban ki moon ambiri adatamanda mandela cha kulimba mtima kwake kutsata chilungamo kukhululuka kulemekeza 
  mandela adatiphunzitsa mphamvu ya maganizo inde ubwino wolingalira mwakuya mtsutso ubwino wounikira momwe amene timagwirizana nawo ngakhalenso amene sitigwirizana nawo akuchitira zinthu zawo adationetsa palibe ndende yozinga malingaliro chipolopolo cha maliwongo sichingafafanize maganizo adatero obama 
  lero asirikali akuyembekezeka kunyamula thupi la mandela kupita ku qunu kuchoka ku pretoria kumene maiko osiyanasiyana akhala akuona nkhope komaliza kuyambira lachitatu 
  mandela adabadwa mchaka cha 1918 ku banja lachifumu wa wa thembu amadziwika maina aulemu madiba rolihlahla kutanthauza munthu wovuta omukonda enanso amamutchula tata kutanthauza tate mchichewa 
  adali mchipani cha african national congress anc chimene chidalimbana kwambiri tsankho mdzikolo adamangidwa adatulutsidwa mchaka cha 1990 
  adazunzidwa zaka 27 kundende ya robben island imene ili mkatikati mwa nyanja ya mchere ya indian ocean sadabwezere choipa sadafune kuimanso pampando wa pulezidenti 1999 pamene thabo mbeki adalowa mmalo mwake 
  mandela adakwatirapo katatu mkazi woyamba adali evelyn mase 1944 kenako adatengana winnie madikizera mandela 1958 ukwati wawo udatha 1996 mchaka cha 1998 mandela adakwatira graa machel yemwe adali mkazi wa mtsogoleri wakale wa la mozambique malemu samora machel 
  atachoka ku mwambo wokumbukira ntchito za mandela mtsogoleri wa lino adalowera ku kenya kukakhala nawo pamwambo wokumbukira ufulu wa dzikolo akuyembekezeka kukakhala nawo kumwambo woika mmanda mandela mawa 
  malinga mneneri wa ku nyumba ya boma steve nhlane maulendowa akulipiridwa akufuna kwabwino
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
anatchezera sitinakumanepo anatchereza   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndili mkazi amene ndidamufunsira pafoni sitinaonanepo timangoimbirana foni basi amandiuza amandikonda kwambiri ndimukhululupirire zikomo nzovuta kukuthandizani simunanene zidayamba mumufunsire mkaziyo pafoni kodi nambala yake mudaitenga adakupatsani mbale wanu mbale wamkaziyo mnzanu mnzake mwa njira iliyonse nanunso mukuonetsa mukhoza kamtima ka chisembwere mwalifunitsitsa banja ndiye mukufuna kupeza mkazi basi dekhani 
  pokhala wa mvula zakale zambiri zikumandidutsa komabe adzukulu amandiuza kunjaku kwadza njira zamakono zochezera pafoni whatsapp facebook zina zotere 
  sindikudziwa nkotheka mudapatsana manambala kupyolera mnjira zimenezi 
  choti mudziwe nchakuti njira zopezera mwamuna zimakhala zosiyanasiyana chachikulu chimakhala chakuti munthu amene ukumanga naye banja ayenera yekhayo ukumudziwa 
  pali banja apa zikomo gogo tidamangitsa ukwati mkazi 2010 tili mwana mimba ankakana kukhalira malo amodzi ati poopa mimba ichoka   nkhaniyo ndidaitengera kwa ankhoswe omwe adatithandiza ziyambenso kuyenda banja mwanayo atabadwa adayambanso kukana zokhalira malo amodzi ati azikhala wotopa 
  nditayitengera nkhaniyo kwa ankhoswe adayikanika 
  kuntchito adandisamutsira ku mzuzu adakana kupita nawo ndidapitiriza kumulipirira lendi patatha miyezi ingapo adachoka adapita kwa ake ku blantyre 
  ndidapita komweko ukunso adakana zoti tikhalire malo amodzi ndichitenji nj zomba 
  nj ndikudziwa kukhalira pamodzi si ngodya yokhayo yomangira banja iyi njira yosonyezera chikondi mwamuna makzi choncho wina apezeka akulanga mnzake mnjira yotere zimasonyeza penapake zinthu si zili 
  zifukwa zimene mkazi wanuyo akupereka zopanda pake kusonyeza pali china chimene akubisa msinkhu wangawu sindidamvepo mimba yachoka mwamuna mkazi amagonana mkaziyo woyembekezera ndiye akuzitenga mudziwe mkazi wanuyo akudziwa apa banja lathapo basi poyamba kukukanizaniko nchifukwa chiyani adakana kukutsatirani kuntchito pomaliza nchifukwa chiyani wabwerera pakhomo la amake zonsezo zizindikiro apa paipa 
  chofunika nchakuti mupite kwa ankhoswe mukatule nkhaniyi 
  adasintha gogo ndili mkazi yemwe ndili naye mwana wa zaka malinga mavuto zachuma ndidachoka ku blantyre kudzagwira ntchito ku lilongwe patatha miyezi ingapo adanditsatira 
  chongobwera kuno adasintha amakonda kucheza amayi oyendayenda 
  ndichitenji m lilongwe 
  m poyamba simunandiuze ukwati wanu uli wa kwa ankhoswe mudangotengana wa ankhoswe kawakambireni 
  ayi poyamba muyenera kumufunsa mkazi wanu chimene akuyendera amayi oyendayendawo mumuuze ayenera sasintha chochita mukuchidziwa kale kunjaku kwaopsa adzakubweretserani matenda

Text:
bzalani mbewu zocha msangalipita woyendetsa ntchito za ulangizi njira zamakono za ulimi muunduna wa zamalimidwe wilfred lipita wati alimi akuyenera kutengerapo phunziro zomwe zidaoneka muulimi wa chaka chatha kusankha mwanzeru mbewu zolima chaka chino 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu polankhula uchikumbe paulangizi lipita adati masiku ano nkovuta kutchera mvula iyamba lero idzatha mawa mmalo mwake njira yabwino nkusankha mbewu zocha msanga 
  upangiri wa zanyengo umenewo payekha mlimi ayenera wozindikira kumwamba kukhoza iliyonse malingana nkusintha kwa nyengoku adatero lipita 
  lipita alimi apulumukira chinangwa adati kunjaku kuli mbewu zocha msanga zomwe mvula itati yadulira panjira mlimi akhoza kupeza popumira kusiyana nkukakamira mbewu zokhalitsa mmunda ndizo zingalowetse njala 
  mkuluyu adatinso pomwe alimi akubzala mbewu zachizolowezi chimanga nyemba fodya zina ayeneranso kulingalira za mbewu zina zopirira kuchilala chinangwa mbatata 
  ulangizi lipita adati alimi chaka chino apulumukira chinangwa mbatata kupatula ulimi wa mthirira malingana nkuti ulimi chaka chatha sudayende cha mvula yokokolola ngamba 
  mbewu chinangwa zili mgulu la mbewu zomwe timati zachitetezo mvula idule zimaberekabe palibe kanthu mitsitsi yake yochepa nkhani yakuti mbewu zina zitakanika mlimi amakhala pogwira adatero lipita 
  mmadera ambiri chimanga chidatuluka mlangizi wamkuluyu adati imeneyi si nkhani yokhazikika pansi kulimbikira ntchito za mmunda kupalira mbewu zisamalimbirane chakudya udzu 
  adati mbewu zokulira mtchire zimanyozoloka sizibereka mlimi ataononga ndalama zambiri kugulira feteleza 
  omwe chimanga chawo chatuluka ino ndiye yoyamba kulingalira kupalira chikafika mmawondo yothira feteleza wina kubandira chinyamuke mphamvu adatero lipita 
  adati chimanga chikanyamuka mphamvu maberekedwe ake amakhala osiririka mbewu yake ikakhala yabwinonso phesi limodzi limabereka chiwiri chitatu podzakolola nkudzakhala minda iwiri pomwe udali umodzi

Text:

Text:
mutharika wauza nyumba ya malamulo iwunike nkoyenera chisankho mkatikati mwa covid-19 mtsogoleri wa lino professor peter mutharika lero watsekulira nyumba ya malamulo kudzera uthenga omwe unali ojambulidwa 
  sanapiteko ku nyumba ya malamulo mutharika komatu sizidasangalatse aphungu maka mbali yotsutsa omwe anafunsa boma lifotokoze momveka chomwe mutharika analankhula momwe zinthu zilili mdziko muno state of the nation address pachingerzi kudzera uthenga ojambula osati kufika ku nyumbayi 
 malipoti akuti mutharika anachita kamba ka chiopsezo cha mliri wa covid-19 mwina ku nyumbayi kukadafika ochuluka zomwe zosemphana ndondomeko zomwe zilipo 
 mwazina president wa linoyu anakambako momwe chuma chikuyendera pakadali ndondomeko zopewera mliri wa covid-19 kudzudzula zipolowe za ndale ndondomeko zomwe boma likutsata pofuna kuthandiza ya mliriwu 
 lowe zikumvetsa chisoni akunyozabe ma judge kumbali ya zisankho mutharika wati nyumba ya malamulo ikambirane mozama kuli koyenera lino lichite chisankho posachedwa kudikira kaye mliriwu uchepe 
 pamenepa wadzudzulanso oweruza milandu kamba ka chigamulo chomwe adapeleka choti lino lichitenso chisankhochi awa maganizo ake osati kusalemekeza mabwalo amilanduwa 
 poyankhapo mtsogoleri wa mbali yotsutsa boma robin lowe ati osakondwa momwe mtsogoleri wa linoyu akulankhulira nkhani zokhudza ma bwalo milandu 
 zikungokhala zomvetsa chisoni mmene tayendera naye president sakulora khothi lili padera parliament ili padera executive ili padera ndiye atenga mphamvu za tonse afuna ayendetse anatero lowe 
 apempha olangiza mtsogoleri wa linoyu amuthandize mtsogoleriyu kumvetsa chigamulo chomwe khothi linapereka
Label: POLITICS

Text:

Text:
world vision donates buckets to mangochi police mangochi police station has reason to smile after receiving 35 buckets from world vision international mangochi branch to help in the fight against the coronavirus pandemic 
 the donation was received at station premises on march 25 2020 
 daudi they will also be distributed to our branches speaking during the handover ceremony world vision project officer miss ireen majankono said the organization thought it wise to assist in order to protect the officers and clients from the deadly covid-19 
 prevention is better than cure and we do nt want to experience what other nations are facing due to the spread of the deadly virus said majankono 
 in his remarks the station community policing coordinator assistant superintendent clement madeira who represented the officer ln charge applauded world vision for the nice gesture 
 madeira said the donation has come at right time when the whole world has been hit hard with coronavirus 
 he encouraged other stakeholders to borrow leaf from world vision international stressing that police officers also need to be safe at all times 
 world vision lnternational has been working together with the police especially in gender based violence interventions and child marriages 
 according to mangochi police deputy publicist amina daudi the 35 buckets will be distributed at the parent station and its three posts and 21 police units
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
kuthimathima kwa magetsi kwakhudzanso akumidzi lolemba mmbandakucha wa 12 september yangokwana kumene 4 koloko magetsi azima kale mboma la mulanje chiyembekezo nchoti posakhalitsa ayaka 
  gulu la alimi lopanga tsabola wa zikometso hot chilli sauce maso akudikira mwina magetsi ayaka iliyonse poyembekezera asakaniza kale tsabola magetsi akangoyaka ayambe kuphika mmakina 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka akadadziwa akadaphika there re magetsi sadayake tsiku lonse pofika 7 koloko mmawa wa lachiwiri magetsi kuli chuu zomwe zapangitsa akataye zosakanizazo 
  umu momwe zikukhalia kwa akumudzi amene sangakwanitse kupeza injini ya magetsi generator 
  makampani alimi akulephera kuyendetsa malonda zinthu zasokonekera cha kuthimathima kwa magetsi komwe kukulowa mwezi wachiwiri tsopano mdziko muno 
  nalo bungwe lopanga kugulitsa magetsi la escom laneneratu mavutowa anyanyira miyezi ikubwerayi cha kuchepa kwa madzi omwe amapukusa makina opangira magetsi ku nkula ku tedzani mumtsinje wa shire 
  akufotokozera wachiwiri kwa wa zikometso amos ambali pasabata amapanga mabotolo tsabola 2 100 akupanga osaposera 500 
  timagwira ntchito lolemba mpaka lachisanu masiku onsewa kukukhala kopanda magetsi mapeto ake tayamba kugwira usiku wokhawokha loweruka masana pamene magetsi akumayaka 
  sizikupanganika pena kukukhala kopanda magetsi tsiku lathunthu zomwe zasokoneza bizinesi yathu kangapo konse tataya tsabola patatha masiku awiri popanda magetsi kupangitsa tsabola wathu aonongeke adatero ambali 
  nawo talimbika agro processing and marketing cooperative society amene amapanga mafuta ophikira sunpower mboma la salima akuti magetsi akazima amagulula makina kuchotsa mpendadzuwa yense 
  fanny jodani mwa akuluakulu talimbika akuti patha miyezi iwiri magetsi akuzimazima tsiku lililonse akumazima isadakwane 4 koloko nkumayaka 6 madzulo 
  apapa tayamba kugwira ntchito usiku komabe zikuvuta pena kukumakhala kopanda magetsi magetsi akazima sitigwira ntchito timagulula makina athu kuchotsa mpendadzuwawo adatero 
  talimbika imapanga malita 500 patsiku magetsi akuyaka tsiku likutha osapanga mafuta 
  antchito oposa 11 amene akufunika malipiro kodi akumawalipira wa talimbika pharison chiwoko akuti ili vuto lalikulu 
  magetsi akamayaka timapanga ndalama yoposa k3 miliyoni pamwezi mwezi unowo k1 miliyoni sikwana timaononga k700 000 tilipire antchito mutha kuona mwezi uno alandire mwayi akutero chiwoko 
  nako ku dowa zinthu sizili watson kamchiliko wa madisi agro processors cooperatives omwenso amapanga mafuta ophikira wati pali mantha angachotse antchito sizisintha 
  timapanga malita 2 000 patsiku lero zasintha tikumapanga malita 2 000 pasabata bizinesi yasokonekera tili ogwira ntchito amene akulandira k150 000 kodi awa tingawalipirenso adatero kamchiliko 
  nako kuchigayo kwasokonekera kamchiliko akuti akugona kuchigayo kudikira magetsi ayake boma la dowa 
  pena amayaka cha mma 10 koloko usiku amagona kuchigayo akayaka agaitse adatero 
  kwa t phambala mboma la ntcheu eni zigayo za dizilo apezerapo mwayi kuzimazima kwa magetsi pamene akweza mtengo kuchoka k300 thini kufika k350 
  uthenga kubungwe la escom sukupereka chiyembekezo kwa anthuwa 
  wa bungweli john kandulu akuti zikhala zikuchitika kuyambira mwezi uno mpaka december pamene mvula idzakhale itayamba 
  kandulu akuti zili chonchi mlingo wa madzi mumtsinje wa shire wotsika kutsikaku kupitirira pokhapokha mvula itayamba 
  cha tingokwanitsa kutapa 135 megawatts mmalo mwa 361 megawatts zomwe zichititse magetsi akhale akuzimazima adatero kandulu
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
muyambitsi wa radio maria lonse wamwalira yemwe anayambitsa wailesi za radio maria lonse emmanuel ferrario amwalira zaka 90 zakubadwa 
 ferrario amwalira masana wa 08 july 2020 mdziko la italy ya imfa yawo president opuma wa world family of radio maria 
 muyambitsi wa radio maria lonse ferrario dongosolo lokhudza maliro nsembe ya misa yotsanzikana malemu president emmanuele ferrario lilengezedwabe 
 radio maria malawi idzawakumbukira malemu president emmanuele ferrario tate amene amakonda kufunitsitsa radio maria malawi ikule kufikira madera ambiri kuno malawi 
 president ferrario pamodzi anayambitsa radio maria ka wayilesi kakangono ka parish ya erba mdziko la italy mchaka cha 1982 
 president ferrario adali munthu yemwe amakonda amayi maria koposa chidwi chake chofuna kutsekula wailesiyi chinayamba pomwe anachita malonjezo kwa amai maria matenda mkazi adzachiritsidwa ku nthenda ya cancer adzagwira ntchito mosalekeza yofalitsa mthenga wabwino wa amayi maria 
 mkazi atachiritsidwa adagulitsa imodzi mwa kampani zake ndalama zake nayendetsera wayilesi imene imafalitsa za amai maria ku medjugorje imene inakhazikitsidwa mchaka cha 1983 pambuyo imfa ya mkazi mchaka cha 1984 president ferrario anapitiriza kuthandiza kutumikira ku wayilesiyi yomwe idali ya parish 
 pambuyo pake adagulitsa kampani yake ina yopanga zakudya zochokera ku mkaka kuyika chuma chake chonse ntchito zokulitsa ka wayilesi kameneka 
 mchaka cha 1986 pamene adakhazikika ntchito zoyendetsa wayilesi mchaka chotsatira adasankhidwa president wa wayilesi imeneyi mchaka cha 1987 adakumana livio fanzaga wansembe wina yemwenso adali wokonda wayilesi yi limodzi adagwirizana zikulu zikulu ziwiri zoyendetsera wayilesi yi imene idali itayamba kukula 
 yoyamba inali kukana malonda amtundu wina uliwonse wayilesiyi yachiwiri inali kukonza dongosolo la mapologalamu omwe tsinde lake lagona mapemphero katekisimu misa ichi ndiye chidali chiyambi cha mulakuli wa mphamvu wotchedwa radio maria unakula kuchoka wayilesi ya parish kufika wayilesi ya yomveka mdziko lonse la italy 
 kudzera uneneri wa amai maria wailesiyi yakwanitsa kufikira mmaiko 80 lonse ikuyembezeka kupita patsogolo maka kufikira maiko ku middle east ambiri 
 mzimu wa president emmanuel ferrario uwuse mtendere wosatha
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
sabata zingapo zapitazi takhala tikulengeza patsamba lino tizikupatsirani anatchereza malangizo pamavuto amene mumakumana nawo mavutowa akhoza mbanja maphunziro chipembedzo momwe mumakhalira anzanu ayamba kale kutitumizira madandaulo awa mmunsimu 
  chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza ndili zaka 20 amuna anga sagona mnumba ndiye chonde ndithandizeni akuti ndikawauza ankhonswe banja langa litha ukwati tapanga august wapiyu 
  ndine zikomo mwamuna wakoyo ngwachibwana cha mchombolende mwangokwatirana kumene ukuti sagona mnyumba ndiye amakagona ukapanda kusamala naye ameneyo akubweretsera mmavuto aakulundikunenatu matenda oopsa kuphatikizapo hiv edzi wayamba kale kunena ukakanena kwa ankhoswe banja lithapo ndiye za banja alibe nazi ntchito kusangalatsa chilakolako cha thupi lake basi ndiye usazengerezepo apa pita kaitule nkhaniyi kwa ankhoswe akufuna banjali lithe lithe basi mwamuna wachimasomaso woopsa kwambiri safunika kumusekerera 
  anatchereza mwamuna wanga anandisiya ndili mimba palendi ndikaimba foni amayankha mkazi amene akufuna kukwatirana naye ndipange pamenepa choyamba mwamunayo azichoka pakhomo nkukusiyani palendi chidachitika nchiyani eetu amati umanena chatsitsa dzaye njovu ithyoke mnyanga mukamafuna tikuthandizeni nkhani yanu muziiyala bwinobwino tidziwe gwero la mavuto anu kungokalakala pamwamba munena agogo sanandithandize poti ndikusowa poyambira ndikuthandizeni ndingonena pitani kwa ankhoswe anu mukawafotokozere zomwe amuna anu achita mwina atha kukuthandizani njira ina yopita kukadandaula kubwalo la milandu mwamuna wanu akufuna kukwatira mkazi wina akusudzuleni mwadongosolo nanga ukwati umatha choncho akapezeka mwamunayo ngolakwa akhoti amatha kumulamula mwana akadzabadwa azidzamupatsa chithandizo chakutichakuti kufikira atakula tayesani njira ziwirizi mwina mutha kuthandizika vuto lanu 
  anatchereza zikomo muli dzina langa ndine anthony p nyirongo ndavutika transport ndiye ndinasiya foni pababa shopu kuonjezera moto ndiye ndinawerenga nyuzi ya 27 september ndiye ndinawerenga pena pake amene vuto angathe kulemba text nambala yanu thanks
Label: RELATIONSHIPS

Text:
mphekesera zizunza ku mangochi zina ukamva kamba anga mwala ndithu mboma la mangochi sabata yapitayi adadzuka pakati pausiku mbandakucha nkuyamba kukupa phala pokhulupirira mphekesera zoti khanda longobadwa kumene laopseza yemwe sachita zimenezo awona zakuda 
  mfumu makanjira bwana mkubwa wa bomalo moses mphepo atsimikiza za nkhaniyo ati sakukhulupira zoti mphepo yamkuntho yomwe yaononga nyumba mizikiti katundu mbomalo ikugwirizana mphekeserazo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka makanjira amwa phala mfumu makanjira ikuti munthu wina adaitchaila lamya usiku yofotokoza khanda longobadwa kumene la mdziko la mozambique lalosera mboma la mangochi mugwa mavuto aakulu sakupa kudya phala 
  nditatsiriza kulankhula lamyayo ndinatuluka panja ndinadabwa kuona pikitipikiti kukupa phala akumwa anafika kwanga kukafunsa nzeru 
  tsiku lotsatira chimphepo chachikulu chidaononga nyumba mizikiti katundu wambiri moti akuti zikugwirizana akhanda lija adatero makanjira 
  mphekeserazo zikuti khandalo lomwe lidabadwira mdera kumwembe mdziko la mozambique lidamwalira litangotsiriza kupereka uthengawo 
  mussa malekano mwa omwe adakupa kumwa phalalo ndinalandira foni yondichenjeza ndiona zakuda ndikapanda kukupa kudya phala banja langa lonse 
  mneneri wapolisi wa mbomalo rodrick maida adati ofesi yawo siigwiritsa ntchito zikhulupiriro pogwira ntchito malamulo 
  chimphepo adati mphepo yomwe yawononga katundu mizikiti mbomalo siikugwirizana mphekesera za khandalo 
  ndalandira malipoti woti mphepo yaononga katundu sindikukhulupirira zikukhudzana mphekesera za khandalo adatero bwanamkubwalo
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
chonona chifumira kudzira tikamakamba za kufunika pasamakhale kusiyana mwayi womwe amayi abambo akupatsidwa titamakumbuka za mwambi uwu wakuti chonona chifumira kudzira 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu izitu zikutanthauza kwenikweni pakhalidwe la kwagona momwe akuleredwera mmakomo mwawo mmadera momwe tikukhala mmipingo kusukulu chimodzimodzinso nkhani ya kuthetsa nkhanza mmabanja nkhanza zina zomwe amakumana nazo kaamba koti aakazi aamuna tikumbuke ndithu youmba khalidwe la munthu yomwe akukula 
  mwachitsanzo ambiri abambo ngakhalenso amayi amene amakhala mtima woderera amayi amakhala adakula pakati chikhalidwe chomwe chimaonera amayi pansi oterewa amavuta akhale pansi pautsogoleri wa mzimayi amangoona munthu amene akuwalamula sakuyenera kutero 
  chikhalidwe cholakwikachi chimakhala chokhazikika mmitu mwawo kukonza kwake akakula kumakhala kovuta tsono udindo wambiri wokonza makhalidwe olakwikawa uli mmanja mwa makolo poonetsetsa nzika zomwe mukulera zikhale zikhulupiriro makhalidwe oyenerera osapondereza kuzunza kuderera kaamba ka momwe adabadwira 
  amayi amene azunzika mmabanja ana aamuna akhoza kuonetsetsa mwana amene akulera uja asadzakhale ake adzazunzenso mkazi akakula ana aamuna aphuzitsidwe kulemekeza munthu wamayi adziwe kusiyana kwawo munthu wamkazi kwagona kaumbidwe ka ziwalo zawo pakabadwidwe 
  zikakhala nzeru machitachita palibe kusiyana auzidwe ana aamuna mzimayi muthu si chida chongoti wina akafuna agone nacho kumamunyozetsa kumamuimbira miluzi akamayenda mmisewumu 
  chimodzimodzinso ana akazi tiwaphunzitse kuthekera kofikira chilichonse chomwe angafune pamoyo wawo tiwaphunzitse atsikana asadalire thumba la munthu wammuna chomwe akuchita apeze ndalama pakhomo iwonso akhoza kupanga 
  mtsikana asalunjike nzeru zake thupi lake pali luso nzeru zinthu zina zomwe anadalitsidwa nazo zipindulire 
  aphunzitsidwenso mwana wamkazi asalole munthu kumukokera pansi kumuchitira nkhanza angakhale mbale kaya mwamuna mwanayo auzidwe akali wamngono kukana kusapirira uliwonse wa nkhanza
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
chigamulo chiperekedwa 3 february bwalo la zamalamulo lalengeza lipereka chigamulo chake nkhani yokhudza chisankho cha president lolemba likudzali 3 february 2020 
 malinga chikalata chomwe chasainidwa wachiwiri kwa registrar wa mabwalo milandu mdziko muno chigamulochi chidzaperekedwa ku bwalo lalikulu la milandu la mzinda wa lilongwe ya 9 koloko mmawa 
 malipoti akusonyeza bwaloli lidzapereka mpata woti mbali yomwe siyidzakhutitsidwa chigamulochi idzakadandaule ku bwalo la supreme 
 mtsogoleri wa chipani cha utm saulosi chilima mzake wa mcp lazarus chakwera anakamangala ku bwalo la milandu ati potsutsana zotsatira za chisankho cha president zomwe bungwe la mec linalengeza peter mutharika wa chipani cha dpp amene anapambana
Label: POLITICS

Text:
ma cbo mboma la zomba adandaula kutsekedwa kwa sukulu mgwirizano wa mabungwe angono angono community based organizations network mdera la mfumu mwambo mboma la zomba wati kuyimitsidwa kwa sukulu cha mliri wa coronavirus mdziko kwachititsa maphunziro asokonekere 
 mlembi wa mwambo cbo network mboma la zomba josamu stephano omwe ayankhula mkumano wa mabungwewa komwe amakambirana zolimbikitsa ntchito yoteteza ana mdelaro 
 stephano ati cha kubwera kwa coronavirus ana ambiri atayilira kaamba koti akuganiza sadzabweleranso ku sukulu ati padakalipano ana ambiri atenga mimba akwatiwa kale 
 maphunziro ku dela lathu kuno asokonekera kamba koti ana ambiri tili nawo mmakomo ndiponso ana ambiri atayilira anatero stephano 
 adandaula sukulu zikazatsegulidwa ana ambiri sazabwerera kamba koti akwatiwa mwaiwo atenga mimba 
 poyankhulapo mwa membala wa mwambo community based organization network ethel banda ati maphunziro ana ambiri mderalo ayamba kupezeka ku malo omwera mowa komwe akuchita uhule 
 la malawi lakhuzidwa kamba koti ana ambiri maphunziro abwerera mmbuyo atenga mimba pomwe sukulu imatilerera ana anatero banda
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
ambuye stima apempha akhristu ansembe azivala zozitetezera ku covid-19 episkopi wa dayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya mangochi ambuye montfort stima wapempha akhristu dayosizi yi adzivala chotchinga kukamwa mphuno pomwe akukasonkhana anzawo ya mapemphero adzitetedze kutetedza ku kachilombo ka coronavirus 
 stima nambala ya omwalira ikukwera ambuye stima alankhula uthenga wawo wapadera wolimbikitsa njira zopewera kachilomboka 
 atinso pamene muthu akunva zizindikiro kupezeka kumene kachilomboka akuyenera pakhomo ndikuleka kukasonkhana anzake cholinga choti atetedze ku kachilomboka 
 nambala ya omwalira ikukwera nambala ya omwe matendawa awapeza ikukweranso ndiye zoyezeranso akuti zikutha ndiye tiyeni tipitirize kumvera malangizo akulu athu zaumoyo zonse 
 tikakhala mtchalitchi muja tivale mask kwa amene akudwala asabwere ku tchalitchi kuno alandira ambuye yesu uzimu palibe cha nzeru upite ku tchalitchi ukapereke matenda kwa anatero ambuye stima 
 ati tsopano yakwana azindikire matendawa alikodi si nkhani ya nkhambakamwa
Label: HEALTH

Text:
ngozi idazamitsa chikondi chathu adavulala adataya miyoyo yawo kwa joseph chirwa towera udali mwayi awiriwa akumane woyera 
  lero thupi limodzi nkhani yano imaseketsabe akakumbuka za ngozi yomwe idachitika 2010 mboma la zomba iyo idali ngozi ya basi 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu towera adali mbasimo adavulala kutengeredwa kuchipatala panthawiyo nkuti awiriwa atakumana kale kupatsana manambala zolota akapizana chikondi panalibe 
  joseph towera lero banja joseph yemwe akugwira ntchito kunthambi yoona za olowa kutuluka mdziko muno atamva towera wapanga ngozi adakhudzidwa samati waimbanso liti foni kukamuona 
  choimbaimba tidakhala pachinzake kwambiri kenaka tidayamba kufunana adatero joseph pamene adamudikira towera achire kaye nkhani yachikondi ilowe mbwalo 
  joseph akuti pamene zimachitika nkuti awiriwa atakumana kale ku masintha ccap komwe onsewa amapemphera 
  apo joseph nkuti mtsogoleri wa achinyamata towera adali membala wagulu la maimbidwe 
  komabe panthawiyo zoti angadzakhale thupi limodzi sizimadziwika zidatengera ngozi ya ku zomba zenizeni zioneke 
  2012 towera adali atachita joseph adaponya chichewa pounguza chikondi chomwe mtsogoleriyu adachionetsa ya matenda towera sadazengereze kuvomera 
  joseph oopa mulungu wachikondi komaso wosamala amalingalira mwakuya ndidapeza tsogolo langwiro mwa adatero towera 
  naye joseph adabwekera kuopa mulungu kwa njoleyo towera oopa mulungu maonekedwe abwino ndisanamepo mkazi wanga nthwani 
  ukwati udali 31 october 2015 ku masintha ccap madyerero adali ku ku lilongwe golf club
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
mashado pp ndiwo agawe chimanga cha boma banda pakati kulandira chimanga kwa nthumwi ya ku united arab emirates amene satsatira chipani cha pp pachiopsezo chosumbudzuka njala pamene boma lauza mashado pp ayambe kugawa chimangachi kwa ovutika mmadera 
  mneneri wa pulezidenti joyce banda steven nhlane wati nkovuta mashado zipani zina zimene zakhala zikulalatira kuipitsa mbiri ya pulezidenti atumidwenso kugawa nawo chimangachi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc aphungu omwe akufuna kudzaimira pp imodzi mwa njira zomwe zikugwiritsidwa ntchito pogawa chimangachi pali mafumu amene akugawa chimangachi mosayanganira ndale adatero nhlane 
  lachinayi sabata yatha pamsonkhano wa atolankhani ku sanjika mumzinda wa blantyre lamulungu pamwambo wokumbukira patha chaka chimodzi chimwalirireni inkosi ya makhosi mmbelwa iv ku edingeni mboma la mzimba banda adauza mashado pp apite ku farmers world ku lilongwe kukatenga chimangachi azikagawira amene alibe chakudya mmadera mwawo 
  chimanga chomwe chikugawidwachi chomwe lino lidalandira ku united arab emirates uae kudzera mbungwe la khalifa bin zayed al nahyan foundation chithandize mabanja pafupifupi 7 500 amene akusowa chakudya 
  dzikoli lidapereka matani 13 500 kudziko la malawi banda atadandaulira dzikoli amalawi pamoto 
  abdulrahim jali yemwe amaimira la united arab emirates polankhula pamene ankapereka chimangachi 17 february adati cholinga chathu kuthandiza ovutika pamene pulezidenti banda adapempha thandizo tidaganiza zobwera chimangachi kwa ovutika 
  nhlane akuti chimangachi chidaperekedwa kwa banda kotero ufulu wosankha momwe chingagawidwire 
  kupatula aponso pp ili mashado mzigawo zonse 193 amene angafikire onse amene akufunika thandizoli 
  mashado mp zipani zina si odalirika kwa mtsogoleri wa lino kotero si oyenera kugawa nawo chimangachi pulezidenti sangagwiritse ntchito amene tsiku lililonse amakhalira kuwanyoza agwire nawo ntchitoyi adatero mneneriyu 
  zadabwitsa katswiri zandale prof chijere chirwa amene akuphunzitsa kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college ku zomba yemwe akuti zaboma siziyenera kukhudzana chipani 
  chimangacho chimaperekedwa chithandize ovutika ku malawi ndiye njira yabwino kudali kukachisiya ku admarc mwa ma dc osati mwanja mwa chipani sichinabwere mnjira ya chipani ndiye chaperekedwa kuchipani akudabwa chirwa potsindika chipani si boma 
  chirwa akuti magawidwe chimanga otere kukuonetseratu palowa ndale makamaka pamene zisankho za pulezidenti aphungu makhansala zayandikira osati kuthandiza ovutika 
  posakhalitsapa bungwe la malawi vulnerability assessment committee lidatulutsa lipoti oposa 1.5 miliyoni ndiwo akuthatha njala mdziko muno 
  amene akuyanganira kagawidwe ka chimangachi macward themba yemwenso wa mudzi transformation trust mtt wati akugwirita ntchito aphungu pp mashado chipani kagawidwe kasavute 
  aneneri chipani cha udf dpp ati zodandaulitsa anenetsa zipani zawo zichitapo kanthu 
  ndale zoipa ndale sitipangira pamoyo wa munthu akuvutika njala ndiye mukumupatsa wachipani ndiye azigawa chimanga kwa ovutika chiyani tiwauza asanyengeke chimangacho komabe tilembera bungwe loyanganira za zisankho la malawi electoral commission lione ndale zomwe boma layamba adatero mneneri wa dpp nicholas dausi 
  naye ken ndanga wa udf akuti ndale zoipa mashado chipani chawo sadapatsidwe ntchitoyi 
  mashado athu palibe amene wapatsidwa chimanga azigawa komabe adziwe atopa akufuna adatero ndanga 
  azigawa mosankha zipani zathu sangapatsidwe chimangachi kuononga zinthu zothandizira kumeneku ndale zotere sitikuzifuna 
  mneneri wachipani cha mcp jessie kabwira samayankha foni yake ya mmanja pamene timati tilankhule naye lachitatu msabatayi 
  mashado maboma thyolo ntchisi lilongwe atsimikiza atenga kale matumba chimanga amene ayamba kugawa pamene akuti akhala akukatenga chimangachi msabatayi 
  raja khan yemwe shado wa pp kummwera kwa boma la thyolo akuti akhala akutatenga chimangachi msabatayi 
  kampeni ikuyenda chimanga ndikatenga msabatayi ndigawire anga adatero khan pouza tamvani 
  naye banda kalikiriki kugawa chimanga mdziko lonse zomwe anena kale ndale chabe 
  mneneri wa pulezidentiyu watsutsa ponena kugawa chakudya kwa ovutika si ndale 
  pomapereka chimanga kwa mabanja amene akuvutika njala pulezidenti akupulumutsa miyoyo ya atsogoleri zipani zina atha kutero akupemphedwa kuthandiza pulezidenti wa lino patchitoyi adatero nhlane
Label: POLITICS

Text:
makhwala ozunguza ubongo akukoledzera uphawi kwa achinyamata rac wolemba sylvester kasitomu kukula kwa wogwilitsa ntchito makhwala ozunguza bongo kumwa mowa mwauchidakwa drug and alcahol abuse akuti ukukolezera mavuto umphawi makhalidwe oyipa pakati achinyamata ambiri mdziko muno 
 wa bungwe lopereka uphungu wa za maufulu wanthu la rights advice center rac madalitso masache amene wanena pakutha maphunziro tsiku limodzi atsogoleri zipembedzo adindo mboma la mangochi 
 malingana masache maphunziro wo othandiza atsogoleri wa za momwe angathandizire ntchito zolimbana wu mbomalo anachitika thandizo lochokera ku bungwe la norwegian church aid nca 
 tinabwera kudzawaphunzitsa amawatumikira ku madera kwawo akawafikire amene akupezeka mmadera ogwiritsa ntchito mankhwala ozunguaza bongo kaamba koti ndimene zikubwezeretsa chitukuko cha dzikolino mbuyo anatero masache 
 polankhulanso mwa omwe achita nawo maphunziro wo sheikh abdula kaposa anayamikira bungwe li kamba ka maphunziro wo kaamba koti dera lawoli likukhudzidwa kwambiri mavuto omwe akudza pakati pawo kaamba komwa mowa mwauchidakwa 
 chomwe chimachitika nchoti munthu akagwiritsa ntchito makhwala ozunguza bongo kumwa mowa mwauchidakwa zinthu zosayenera ogonana zomwe zikuchulukitsa chiwerengero cha omwe akudwala matenda oapatsirana pogonana edzi anatero sheikh kaposa 
 maphunzirowa anasonkhanitsa adindo ozungulira boma lamangochi omwe anagakhale kuthekera kophunzitsa anzawo za kuyipa kogwiritsa ntchito mkhwala ozunguza ubongo
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
tom sakufunanso ndalama kati deru kadazizwitsa mlenje aganyu tadzidzimuka ganizo la mphunzitsi wa flames tom saintfiet yemwe tsopano wanena sakufunanso k3.3 miliyoni akakapuntha nigeria 7 september 
  tidayamba kutolera za mmageti pofika 7 zikhale zitakwana lero kudzidzimuka akuti ndalama ayi ah ah ah zataninso wawa   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc pamene uncle tom amabwera adagwirizana fam abwera mfalisi ntchito yawo ndiyokagwetsa nigeria komabe uncle tom adalamula fam idzawapatse k3.3 miliyoni lotolo akalichenutsa 
  lero uncle tom asintha maganizo akuti ndalama si nkhani akatsotsomole nigeria fam isadzawapatsenso ndalamazo 
  kodi pamene uncle tom amalamula ndalamazo samadziwa andalama kale mwadziwa fam imaphangirana matimu potolera za pageti zomwe zingatenge ndalamayo ikwane mwazindikira chitunda chimenechi sitingakakwerepo mwa anu aganyu sitikukayika nigeria tikadutsapo mphunzitsi wa nigeria wadzipereka kusiya ntchito yake akakagonja flames 
  mwina osewera athu atengerepo phunziro si kumasewera mtima wofuna kulandira kanthu mmalo mwake kufuna kupanga mbiri kukagwetsa nigeria kwawo nkhani yomwe ingatekese zikutitsimikizira popanda malonjezano mukangogwira ntchitoyo
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
asilikali 89 afa mdziko la niger chiwerengero cha asilikali omwe afa chiwembu chomwe gulu lina laza uchifwamba la chisilamu linachita mdziko la niger lachinayi sabata yatha ati chafika 89 tsopano 
  malingana wailesi ya bbc boma la dzikolo laika masiku atatu okhudza maliro asirikali wa nduna yofalitsa nkhani mdzikolo zakaria abdourahame yati pambuyo ntchito yofufuza omwe afa pachiwembuchi apeza mugulu lazauchifwambali okwana 77 afanso chiwembuchi 
 chiwembuchi chachitika patangotha mwezi umodzi gulu lachisilamu litachita zamtopola malo mdzikolo chomwe chinaphetsa asirikali aboma akwana 71 dzikolo 
 maiko chad mali niger burkinafaso mauritania akhala akugwirana manja pofuna kuthetsa za mtopola zomwe zakhala zikuchitika mmaikowo kwa zaka zochuluka zomwe akuganiza magulu achisilamu omwe akhala akuchita
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
zinthu nkhuku imodzi ya mikolongwe katswiri wa ulimi wa ziweto wa ku lilongwe university of agriculture and natural resources luanar timothy gondwe wati nkhuku ya mikolongwe imodzi chimodzimodzi nkhuku zitatuyanyama yachikuda yamazira 
  nkhuku ya mikolongwe imafika makilogalamu 4.5 adati nkhuku ya mikolongwe imakula kwambiri imaikira mazira ambiri kukoma kwa mazira yake chimodzimodzi mazira nkhuku yachikuda 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu nkhuku ya mikolongwe imakula kwambiri moti tambala mpaka amafika makilogalamu 4.5 pamene thazi amatha kulemera makilogalamu 4 miyezi 4 6 yokha 
  pachaka nkhuku ya mikolongwe imaikira mazira apakati 200 250 adatero gondwe

Text:
chaka chino kuli zokolola mpweche unduna wa zamalimidwe mthirira chitukuko cha madzi walengeza chaka chino alimi akolola matani 3.3 miliyoni chimanga kuyerekeza ndimatani 2.6 miliyoni omwe adakololedwa chaka chatha 
  zadziwika undunawu utachita kauniuni woyamba wa chiyembekezo cha kakololedwe kaulimi wa 2018/19 zotsatirazi zikutanthauza chaka chino alimi chimanga aonjezera makilogalamu 25 makilogalamu 100 aliwonse womwe tidapata chaka chatha

  zimatithandizanso popanga mitengo ya mbewu kuunikira alimi nkhani yogulitsa mbeu zawo idatero nduna ya zamalimidwe joseph mwanamvekha 
  wa bungwe la civil society agriculture network cisanet pamela kuwali wati nkhaniyi yabwino bola zinthu zisatembenuke mukauniuni awiri otsatira 
  waunikira boma mabungwe achilimike potsogolera alimi momwe angasungire mbewu zawo kuzipezera msika wabwino adzapange nazo phindu 
  chomwe chimachitika nchoti poti zachuluka mavenda amatsitsa mitengo yogulira mbewu ndiye poti alimi amakhala njala ya ndalama amangolola mtengo uliwonse osadziwa akubetsa watero kuwali 
  mbiri ya zaka za mmbuyo imasonyeza zotsatira za akauniuni atatuwa zimanka zitsika cha zochitika mdzinja kwa kagwedwe ka mvula tizirombo toononga mbewu matenda adzidzidzi 
  senior chief lukwa wa ku kasungu watsimikiza mmera mminda ukuoneka ukupereka chiyembekezo chokolola zochuluka wati mafumu alandira mabungwe onse omwe aziwapeza ncholinga chophunzitsa alimi kasamalidwe ka zokolola 
  ambiri akubwekera mvula ikugwa chaka chino mwanamveka wati kuchuluka kwa zokolola nchifukwa chapologalamu ya sabuside wafetereza mbeu ya makono 
  adati boma lidapanga dala kuwonjezera chiwerengero cha olandira makuponi afetereza mbeu kuchoka 900 000 2018 kufika 1 miliyoni chaka chino alimi ambiri apindule

Text:

Text:
chipwirikiti ku malawi kuphwanya kusalemekeza malamulo kwayala nthenje mdziko muno akungopha akupha nkhuku kugwiririra kuononga ngakhalenso kuyatsa katundu   sabata yatha awiri adakhapidwa kuphedwa ku neno powaganizira mfiti sipanathe pomwe enanso adaphedwa kwa chitukula ku lilongwe pamkangano wa malo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka naye adagendewa mayaya zili apo akhristu asilamu adalikitana ku balaka pomwe sukulu ya mpingo wa anglican ya mmanga idaletsa atsikana kuvala mipango yotchinga kumutu potsatira chipembedzo cha chisilamu 
  zili mkamwamkamwa msilikali wina adapha asilikali anzake awiri ku ntcheu naye adaomberedwanso apolisi kuusilikali si kale pomwe nyumba 21 zidaotchedwa ku nkhata bay 4 adaphedwa zipolowe 
  si kale pomwe otsatira chipani cha democratic progressive party dpp adagenda kuvulaza mwa omenyera ufulu wa billy mayaya zionetsero zimene bungwe la human rights defenders coalition hrdc limachita pofuna kukakamiza wa bungwe la malawi e;ectoral commission mec jane ansah atule pansi udindo wapolisi wina adaphedwa ku nsundwe mboma la lilongwe pomwenso apolisi akuwaganizira adagwirira kulanga amayi asungwana 
  nako ku karonga pofuna kusatsalira mpungwepungwe wabukawu kudali kuvula amayi atsikana avala mathalauza siketi zazifupi mbomalo 
  zikuchitika lamulo loyendetsera lino limati kuli ufulu wa kavalidwe amabungwe oteteza ufulu wa foundation for community support services focus adzudzula mchitidwewu apempha apolisi atsekere mchitokosi wachinyamata amene akuvula amayi

  malinga mfumu malema 2 ya mboma la karonga adakhazikitsa malamulo woti ana sukulu anyamata atsikana asamapezeke kunyanja zinthu zidafika poipa anawa zolaula kunyanjako 
  adati atakhala pansi adakhazikitsa gulu lomakayendera kunyanjako kumagwira tiana tomwe amatipeza adapeza galimoto yomwe idalengezetsa lachisanu lapitalo anawa asapezeke kunyanja akangopezeka agwidwa 
  tidachita anawa adaonjeza kuthawa kusukulu nkumabwera kunyanja kukamwa mowa kugona amuna 
  chidatikhudza kwambiri choti mwana wina wa zaka 13 adamwetsedwa mowa patsiku la anakubala kugonedwa anyamata ambiri anawa amakhala oti athawa msukulu adatero malema 
  adakanitsitsa adakhazikitsa malamulo oti amayi asamavale mathalauza siketi zazifupi mbomalo 
  akupanga akabaza kumsika sizikutikhudza adatero   pomwe wina yemwe adaona mnzake akuvulidwa christobel shaba adati zikuchitika mbomalo zoopsa amayi akukhala mantha akulu   polankhulapo chipwirikiti chomwe chikuchitikachi mphunzitsi wa ufulu wa pasukulu ya ukachenjede ya university of livingstonia george phiri adati zonsezi zikungosonyeza utsogoleri wa lino walephera 
  phiri adatinso nzokhumudwitsa mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika sakuonetsa chidwi chofuna kuthetsa mavuto mdziko muno wangoti duuu tangoganizani wamkulu wa apolisi adabwera poyera nkunena apolisi alibe kuthekera kopereka chitetezo mdziko muno kodi mtsogoleri wa lino adachitapo chiyani zitanenedwa kodi mtsogoleriyu akuona zikuchitikazi nanga wangoti duuu palibe chomwe akuchitapo adatero phiri 
  nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani mark botomani idatsutsa kwa mtu wa galu utsogoleri wa lino walephera botomani adati akugwirizana zoti zikuchitika mdziko muno ndipotsa mantha zoziziritsa thupi akungotengera malamulo mmanja mwawo mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika akuyesetsa kukonza zinthu zibwelere mchimake

Text:
chisankho cha mulhako chilephereka adanyanyala katunga kudali kuthafulirana chilomwe kusukulu ya pulaimale ya nyambadwe pulaimale lolemba masiku apitawa pamene gulu la mulhako wa alhomwe ku ndirande limachititsa chisankho 
  chisankhocho chimachitika patadutsa zaka chisadachitike amasankha maudindo wa gululi ku ndirandeko wachiwiri mlembi msungichuma 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   escom in free for all fuel scam amene adatsina khututamvaniati chidasokoneza zonse wina amene amafuna apikisane nawo adabwera achipani amene amafuna amuvotere

  vuto ndiloti mwa amene amapikisana nawo mpandowu wachipani cha dpp moti anabwera omutsatira achipaniwo izitu si zachipani zachikhalidwe cha alhomwe adatero wotitsina khutuyu 
  amene adawatenga kuchipaniwo si wathu zomwe zidakwiyitsa 
  awiri mwa amene amafuna kupikisana nawo pampando wa wamkulu wa gululi adafumukapo sapikisa nanawonso

 amwalira zaka 95 sister adora likwethu malingana mlembi wa chipanichi sister georgina kapangwa wati sister adora anamwalira loweruka 15th june 2019 ku nyumba yosungira asisitere achikulire odwala ya mary view ku nguludi mbomalo 
 malemu sister adora anabadwa 5 june mchaka cha 1924 mmudzi mwa nachamba mdera la mfumu yayikulu machinjiri mboma la blantyre amwalira zaka 95 zakubadwa 75 zotumikira chipani cha asistere cha sbvm 
 mwambo woyika malemuwa ambuye thomas luke msusa arkidayoyosizi ya blantyre omwe anatsogolera mwambowu apempha akhristu abale atumiki mpingo azikhala chidwi chothandiza atumikiwa adakali moyo kusamalira manda akamwalira

Text:

 miyendo ya ana amene anavulazidwawo malinga woyimira boma milandu sergeant abigail chirwa 3 march chaka chino mayiyu adapezeka akukakamiza ana awiri omwe owapeza akwawe pansi pokhakhala dzuwa likuswa mtengo ati kamba kowononga shuga mpunga 
 atawonekera ku bwalo la milandu mukunoheri anawukana mlanduwu zomwe zinachititsa woyimira boma mulandu abweretse mboni zinayi zomwe zinachititsa mayiyu apezeka olakwa 
 popereka chigamulo chake magistrate sarah beza zomwe anachita mayiyu zosemphana gawo 254 la malamulo lino anamulamula akakhale ku ndende kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kwa zaka

Text:
alimi samalani thonje kwagwa kachilombo koononga   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi   kwatulukira kachilombo kotchedwa kodikodi mealybug kamene kakuononga thonje watero mlembi wamkulu wa unduna wa malimidwe erica maganga 
  maganga wati kachilomboka kakuumitsa mitengo ya thonje nkhunje za thonje zikumaphulika zisanakhwime zomwe zikuchepetsa zokolola 
  madera ambiri kunsi kwa mtsinje wa shire ku magoti epa mboma la nsanje ku lisungwi epa mboma la neno komwe tizilomboni tagwa thonje lambiri lauma 
  malinga maganga thonje la wa chureza lomwe lili maluwa lopanda maluwa lomwe lagwidwa kwambiri tizilomboti 
  maganga wati tizilomboti tikumabisala mmingalu mmauna mopindika mwa mbewu zomwe zikuchititsa alimi alephere kutiona 
  mlimi kusamalira thonje lake mlembiyu akuti kupha kwa tizilomboti kovuta cha momwe tidabadwira 
  timakhala mafuta khungu lake taufaufa zomwe zimateteza tizilomboti ku mankhwala ku nyengo ina iliyonse yobweretsa chiopsezo ku tizilomboti adatero maganga 
  malinga mlembiyu sizikudziwika kachiromboka kachecheta ndime undunawu ukadafufuza chionongekocho 
  komabe maganga wati alimi apopere minda yawo mankhwala acephate 75 sp 1gm l malathion 50 ec 2ml l mlingo wa mamilimita 250 hekitala maekala awiri theka pogwiritsa ntchito mlingo wa 17.5l wa mankwhalawa mumalita 14 madzi 
  wati tizilomboti timafala kudzera mumbewu ya thonje mphepo madzi omwe amagwiritsira ntchito madzi mvula mbalame ziweto 
  mkalata yomwe undunawu watulutsa tizilomboti timapezeka mmitengo ya maluwa zipatso mbewu zakudimba kumunda mtchire
