Text:
kawangi cdss iyendera kuthandiza radio maria malawi by richard makombe akhristu mdziko muno awalimbikitsa azitenga nawo mbali pothandiza radio maria malawi kamba koti imasowa thandizo ntchito yake yofalitsa uthenga wa mulungu 
 patron wa achinyamata gulu la young catholic students ycs sukulu ya kawangi cdss mboma la dowa emmanuel maseko ayankhula pomwe anadzayendera ku radio maria malawi 
 maseko ati ndiokhutira momwe radio maria imagwilira ntchito zake choncho nkoyenera akhristu aziyithandiza ipitilize kugwira ntchito zake 
 ndife okhutira kagwiridwe ntchito ka wayilesiyi tikuona wayilesiyi imadzipereka pogwira ntchito zake choncho ndikoyenera kuyithandiza ipitirize ntchito yabwino yomwe ikugwira anatero maseko 
 mmawu ake mwa achinyamatawa ezara lazaro wati waphunzira zambiri paulendo ku radio maria wati wadziwa zambiri za momwe wayilesiyi imagwilira ntchito zake 
 ndikufuna ndipemphe achinyamata anzanga nawonso tsiku lina adzabwere kuno kudzaona momwe wayilesiyi imagwilira ntchito zake kudzaithandiza ikusowekra thandizo la wina anatero lazaro 
 achinyamatawa apereka ndalama zokwana 10 thousand kwacha zithandize kupititsa patsogolo ntchito za wayilesiyi
Label: RELIGION

Text:
amalawi apindulanji kutsogolera sadc la nsanje kodi liona kuwala tsopano akuluakulu zachuma mafumu mdziko muno ati mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda afunika masomphenya lino lipindule pamene wapampando wa mgwirizano wa maiko kumwera kwa africa wa southern africa development community sadc 
  banda wangosankhidwa sabata yathayi pamsonkhano wa sadc omwe umachitikira ku lilongwe komwe atsogoleri maiko 14 adasonkhana 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc aka sikoyamba mtsogoleri wa la malawi kusenza udindo wotsogolera mabungwe maiko angapo mtsogoleri wakale bakili muluzi adalinso mtsogoleri wa sadc mnthawi yaulamuliro bingu wa mutharika adali wapampando wa african union au 
  akunenera nduna yakale ya zachuma friday jumbe kamuna zachuma ku bungwe la malawi equity justice network mejn dalitso kubalasa banda akuyenera akhale masomphenya akufuna lino lipindule panthawiyi 
  utsogoleri wa banda ukudza pamene boma lake lili kalikiliki kukozanso chuma cha lino amalawi ayambe kusimba lokoma 
  panthawiyi mphamvu yokwaniritsa zomwe amalakalaka zitachitika mdziko muno chitsanzo mtsogoleriyu wakhala akukamba za malonda lino maiko zomwe zingatheke nthawiyi 
  chikufunika masophenya mphamvu zonse ndiye zili mmanja mwake economic recovery plan itheke yake imeneyi adatero kubalasa 
  mfumu yayikulu kwataine ya ku ntcheu yati uwu mwayi nkhani za uchembere wabwino zipite patsogolo mdziko muno maiko 
  nkhani za uchembere wabwino ulimi zikufunikira ukadaulo kukaphunzira momwe anzathu amachitira mmaiko akunjawo pamene apulezidentiwa mtsogoleri wa sadc tikukhulupirira zinthu zimenezi tipita chitsogolo nduna zawo zizikhudzidwa nkhanizi adatero kwataine yemwe adayamikira mapulani mtsogoleriyu 
  naye malemia wa ku nsanje wati kumeneko adayandikana la mozambique zomwe wati zithandiza maka kumbali ya ubale 
  asodzi ku mozambique amabwera ku malawi timapita mzipatala za lawo zidzichitika zimafunika ubale wabwino pakati mayiko awiriwa.tikukhulupirira zilimbikitsa ubale wathu adatero malemia 
  jumbe wati banda mwayi wakhala mtsogoleri pamene lino likukumana mavuto achuma mikangano ya nyanja la tanzania zomwe wati zingatheke atagwiritsa nthawiyi 
  mkangano wa nyanja ungakambidwe pamene akutsogolera sadc amakamba za zokopa alendo zomwe zingathandize nkhani zachuma pakufunika panthawiyi misonkhano ikuluikulu izichitika ku malawi kuno nkhani zokopa alendo zipite patsogolo pakufunika akhazikitse mgwirizano wabwino wa lino maiko omwe sadc zamalonda zipite patsogolo mkhalapampando adatero jumbe 
  poyangana mmbuyo pamene muluzi adali wapampando wa sadc jumbe wati panthawiyo lino lidapindula pankhani ya ubale wa lino maiko 
  ubale wa maiko uli malonda amayenda amalowa kutuluka mdzikomo momasuka popanda chiopsezo adatero jumbe 
  banda yemwe wachiwiri mtsogoleri wa la zimbabwe robert mugabe watenga udindowu kwa mtsogoleri wa la mozambique armando emilio guebuza 
  kusankhidwa kwa atsogoleriwa akuti kumachitika malinga zomwe ofesi ya sadc imagwirizana 
  amawafunsa pambali angakhale mtsogoleri wa sadc akavomera pamene amadzasankhidwa akhale mtsogoleri maiko osauka ambiri ndiwo amatengeka utsogoleriwu maiko ochita south africa satengeka nazo 
  mungaone muluzi adakhalapo joyce banda wangolowa kumene lero tikukamba mtsogoleri wa sadc adatero jumbe 
  mdziko muno muli mapulojekiti omwe atatha angathandize amalawi la nsanje ntchito dokoli zidayima chosagwirizana zingapo la mozambique 
  angoni alirira mafumu george singini angoni ku mzimba ati kumwalira kwa mfumu yawo kwambiri inkosi ya makosi mmbelwa mfumu jalavikuwa chaka chino kudzetsa mavuto pankhani ya ulamiro pakati angoni 
  inkosi mmbelwa adamwalira february pamene jalavikuwa adamwalira sabata yathayi mafumuwa omwe adali aakulu zaka kumwalira kwawo kwapangitsa ulamuliro wa chingoni ukhale mwa achinyamata 
  inkosi mabulabo yemwe mfumu yachinyamata wati wachingoni wasokonekera mmaganizo imfa za mafumu awiriwa omwe amwalira motsogozana 
  mabulabo adati mafumu awiriwa adali ofunika paulamuliro wa chingoni adali okhwima nzeru maganizo 
  mfumuyo idati poti kwangotsala achinyamata zikhala zovuta paulamuliro wa chingoni 
  sitikudziwa atisogolere ndani tataya atsogoleri ofunikira kwambiri atsogoleri otha kuyanjanisa opemphera komaso odzichepesa adatero mabulabo 
  mfumu ina ya chingoni inkosi mpherembe adati atha nzeru imfa za mafumu awiriwa adati jalavikuwa adali mgodi wa chikhalidwe cha chingoni akanathandiza kwambiri kuyanjanitsa angoni mmene anamwalira mbelwa 
  timalira kufa kwa inkosi ya makosi mmbelwa yomwe inali mfumu yathu kumwalira kwawo timadalira inkosi jalvikuwa omwe azitithandiza ulamuliro 
  ofunikira kwambiri popereka uphungu kuyanjaniza adatero mpherembe 
  adati zinthu zisasokenekere kwambiri akhala okakamizidwa kusaka achikulire chingoni aziwathandiza mmaganizo anthuwa sangawafaninze mmene akanachitira mafumu 
  mlembi wa wa ccap synod of livingstonia mbusa levi nyondo wati angoni pamavuto aakulu mpingo awaika mmapemphero zinthu zikhale mchimake 
  bwanamkubwa wa mzimba mbusa moses chimphepo wati kupita kwa mafumuwa kusokonezaso ntchito zaboma kamba koti olimbikira pachitukuko 
  wachiwiri kwa nduna ya maboma angno chitukuko cha mmidzi godfrey kamanya agwirizana nazo angoni mavuto aakulu ataya odziwa chikhalidwe
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
madalaivala truck awonjezeredwa malipiro madalaivala truck omwe amanyanyala ntchito alengeza ayambiranso ntchito boma lalonjeza lithandiza madandaulo 
 zinali chonchi ya sitirakayo ma truck tayimitsidwa mbali mwa nsewu ku blantyre nsewu wa blantyre lunzu wa akulu akulu truck drivers association masautso chagomerana wauza mtolankhani wathu pambuyo nsonkhanowu omwe unachitikira kulikulu la boma ku capital hill mdzinda wa lilongwe siokhutira kwenikweni panganolo akonza ayambirenso kugwira ntchito pofuna kubweretsa mtendere mdziko muno wapempha madalaivala onse abwerere ku ntchito mwa mtendere 
 wachiwiri kwa nduna ya za mtengatenga charles mchacha akulu akulu makampani ma truck ochokera ku nthambi ya apolisi nawo nsonkhano wu 
 zatheka asuntha minimum wage kuchoka 25 000 kufika 60 000 pali nkhani zambiri zoti tikambirana sabata ziwiri zikudzazi tachita tingobweretsa mtendere mdziko muno anatero chagomerana 
 ati akukhulupilira kutsogoloku zinthu ziyenda mokomera onse 
 mwazina madalaivalawa agwirizana boma ndalama zochulukitsitsa zomwe azilandira 140 000 kwacha wolandira ndalama zochepetsetsa izikhala 60 000 kwacha
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
ambwandira msilikali ku salima apolisi chigawo chapakati abatha msilikali wa nkhondo awiri powaganizira adapezeka chamba popanda chilolezo 
  msilikaliyu alex kanjanga wa zaka 23 wagwidwa majumbo 16 chamba pachipikisheni cha polisi thavite mboma la salima 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mneneri wa polisi mchigawo chapakati noriet chihanachimala watsimikiza za nkhaniyi wati tsiku lomwe msilikaliyu adagwidwa 3 april 2018 apolisiwo adagwiranso lawrent medson tambala wa zaka 30 atamupeza majumbo 11 achamba mary mwambane wa zaka 28 atamupeza katundu yemwe akuganiziridwa adabedwa 
  chimala wati apolisi adakhazikitsa malo achipikisheni adzidzidzi thavite katundu yenseyo adapezeka pachipikishenicho onsewa akawonekera ku khoti kafukufuku akatha 
  kanjanga yemwe akugwira ntchito ku engineers battalion yomwe ili mboma la kasungu amachokera mmudzi mwa msongola kwa mfumu kwataine mboma la ntcheu 
  tidamupezanso njere za chamba adatero chimala 
  adati pamalopo adagwiranso tambala akuchokera ku nkhotakota adabisa majumbo achambawo mchikwama chomwe amayenda nacho paulendowo 
  malingana chimala tambala amachokera mmudzi mwa kapangalika kwa mfumu khongoni mboma la lilongwe naye akuyembekezera kafukufuku wapolisi akawonekere ku khoti 
  awiriwa awatsegulira mlandu wopezeka chamba popanda chilolezo chilichonse 
  pachipikisheni china patsikulo apolisi adapeza zipangizo zowotchererera mchikwama cha mwambane adalephera kufotokoza komwe adatenga zipangizozo apolisiwo adamutengera ku polisi ya salima 
  ntchito yapolisi kulondoloza komwe katundu wachokera munthu akulephera kuonetsa malisiti ogulira kufotokoza komwe watenga katundu yemwe alinaye amayenera kutengedwa akalongosole za katunduyo watero chimala 
  mwambane amachokera mmudzi mwa mbuna kwa mfumu kanyenda mboma la nkhotakota akuyembekezeka kudzayankha mlandu wopezeka katundu oganiziridwa adabedwa kafukufuku wapolisi akatha
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
anatchezera sakuthandiza agogo   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndine mtsikana wa zaka 21 ndili mwana amuna anga adandisiya ataona ndili pathupi mwana atabadwa adauzidwa mpaka sadabwereko kudzaona mwana wawo ndikawauza za chithandizo samayankha amangozengereza chomvetsa chisoni nchakuti munthune ndimakhala agogo okalamba poti makolo anga onse admwalira ndithandizeni ndipange js mulanje pepa js apa zikuonekeratu ukuti amuna anga anthunu simunali pabanja mumagonana mpakana kuberekerana mwana chimene chimachitika zambiri nchakuti atsikana akangogwa mchikondi mwamuna akangowauza awakwatira basi amaganiza mwamuna yemweyo basi amayamba zogonana naye ati pofuna kulimbikitsa chikondi asamakaike za chikondi chawo kumene kuli kulakwa kwakukulu atsikana ambiri aononga tsogolo lawo cha wotere anyamata amuna ambiri akamberembere ongofuna kudzisangalatsa osalabadira za tsogolo la mnzawo akangomva mtsikhana watenga pathupi basi chibwenzi chimathera pomwepo zikatero mtsikana zako zada lino lili malamulo okhudza maukwati wina wakuchimwitsa udindo woti akusamale mwana ndiye apa usazengereze pita ukadule chisamani kukhoti basi chilungamo chioneke mwina amuna amene amakonda kuchimwitsa ana eni akhoza kutengerapo phunziro akundikakamira agogo ndine mtsikana wa zaka 19 zakubadwa vuto langa lakuti pali mnyamata wina amene amandifuna ineyo sindimamufuna olo pangono samafuna angondisiya moti miyezi itatu yakwana akundifunabe zina ndimayesetsa ndimuonetse nkhope yosangalala mtima wanga umakana ndiye nditani poti ndili naye kale amene ndimamukonda mtima wanga wonse chonde ndithandizeni 
  mt zomba zikomo mt ndithudi akadakhalapo atsikana ambiri amaganizo akowa bwenzi zinthu zikoma atsikana ambiri masiku ano amakonda zibwenzi zambirimbiri ati pamapeto adzasankhepo chimenecho si chikondi mapeto ake ambiri amasokonezeka mwinanso kutenga pathupi mnyamata amene samamukonda apa iwe waonetsa kale ndiwe wokhwima mmaganizo ndikufuna ndikulimbikitse chikondi sakakamiza uli kale mnyamata amene umamukonda mtima wako wonse palinso chanji choti uzitaya wina amene ulibe naye chidwi komabe zina chimachitika nchoti amene umamukonda kwambiri alibe chikondi angofuna kukuseweretsa kukometsa pakamwa amene sukumukonda amene chikondi chozama iwe ndiye apa chimene ungachite uyambe waona bwenzi lakolo munthu wotani wamakhalaidwe otani waulemu ayi yo wodzilemekeza cholinga chanu chiyani ubwenzi wanu chimodzimodzi amene ukuti akukukakamira chibwenziyo kodi munthu wotani cholinga chake chiyani wakhalidwe mvundulamadzi chabe ukalingalira zonsezo bwinobwino mpamene ungasankhe chochita chifukwatu zina umatha kukakamira mtunda wopanda madzi nkusiya munthu wachikondi weniweni

Text:
papa wapempha abambo akhale olimba chikhristu wolemba thokozani chapola mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika lonse papa francisco wati abambo omwe amadzipereka pogwira ntchito zotumikira mulungu akuyenera olimba chikhristu chawo 
 papa francisko papa francisco walankhula pomwe amapereka uthenga kwa mamembala bungwe lina mpingowu la servants of mary lomwe likuchita mkumano ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican 
 wati abambo omwe akutumikira mbungwe li akuyenera kumadzipereka kamba koti ntchito zomwe amagwira zopambana

Text:
apolisi sakununkha kanthu chitetezo ngombe zayangana kudazibomu ubale wa apolisi wafika wa mphaka galu moti apolisi sakununkhanso kanthu ntchito yawo yoteteza katundu wawo    chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka asirikali malawi defense force kusungitsa mtendere zionetsero sabata zapitazo agogo 6 adaphedwa mboma la karonga powaganizira athakati 
  apolisi atapita akagwire omwe adachita adawathamangitsa miyala mipini mipaliro zibonga moti adalephera kukwaniritsa zolinga zawo 
  aka sikadali koyamba zichitike mbomalo chaka chathachi apolisi kwa nyungwe adamenyedwa atatsekera omwe adakatenga namulondola adzawathandize kugwira mfiti mderalo 
  nako ku ntchisi okwiya adapha agogo awiri powaganizira adalodza mnyamata wina wa zaka 15 mmatsenga   zidachitika mwezi wa october chaka chatha mneneri wa polisi mbomalo richard kaponda wauza msangulutso mpaka lero palibe yemwe wamangira mokhudzana nkhaniyo 
  nako ku neno komwe adapha nkhalamba zomwe amaziganizira mfiti apolisi adachita chidodo akagwire kuzenga mlandu omwe adachita 
  adali mkwiyo waukulu moti apolisi mantha awagwire   nazo zionetsero zosonyeza kukwiya momwe bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec lidayendetsera chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa lino zaikanso pambalambala kufooka kwa apolisi moti boma lidapempha asirikali nkhondo malawi defense force mdf awathandize kuteteza katundu wawo 
  wa apolisi duncan mwapasa adavomera msonkhano wa atolankhani apolisi mphamvu zochepa sangakwanitse kuteteza omwe akuchita zioneserozo 
  apolisi akhala akuona mbwadza zionetserozo mmalo moti apolisi azisaka amtopola anthuwo ndiwo akumasaka apolisi nkumawavula kuwamenya kuwalanda mfuti kuwatsatira mmakomo nkukachita chipongwe mabanja moti wapolisi wina imedi usumani adaphedwa 
  kuphwando la kumapeto chaka chino wa apolisi wa mchigawo chakummwera sladge yousuf adati ntchito yoteteza ikuvuta kaamba kakusakhulupirirana pakati pawo akumudzi 
  yousuf adati chodandaulitsa kwambiri kuphwanyidwa kuotchedwa kwa mapolisi mdziko muno 
  amalawi okwiya akumatsatira munthu yemwe mchitokosi mpaka kukaphwanya kuotcha polisi nkumutulutsamo 
  nkhamenya ku kasungu chilobwe ku blantyre mwa mapolisi omwe adaphwanyidwa kaamba kosemphana chichewa pakati apolisi akumudzi 
  mwa aphunzitsi sukulu ya ukachenjede ya university of livingstonia george phiri adati apolisi asuluka cha katangale utsogoleri wa lino omwe wakoledzera moto ntchito 
  phiri adati kwakhala kukutuluka malipoti ambiri katangale yemwe apolisi zomwe zamachititsa amalawi asowe chikhulupiriro mwa apolisi 
  tsopano nkhani za katangale zonsezi zikatuluka tikuona palibe chomwe atsogoleri akuchitapo pofuna kuthana naye 
  pachifukwa ichi angoganiza zotengera malamulo mmanja mwawo adatero 
  phiri adati pakadali nzovuta munthu kuthawira ku polisi ukapezeko chitetezo akakwiya akumathamangitsa omangidwayo apolisi omwe akumuteteza 
  atsogoleri lino akufunika apeze njira zobwenzeretsa chikhulupiriro cha mwa apolisi adatero 
  mwapasa atakumana aphungu chizimayi ku nyumba ya malamulo nkhani yoti apolisi adagwiririra amayi ku mpingu msundwe mbwatalika ku lilongwe adavomera pali kusakhulupirirana pakati apolisi ayetsetsa kubwezeretsa chikhulupiriro mwa pogwira ntchito mwachilungamo
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
mra imema mafumu alimbikitse kudula msonkho wolemba thokozani chapola uploads/2019/09 kapoloma.jpg 312w sizes="(max width 300px 100vw 300px />kapoloma mafumu ofunikira nkhani yotolera misonkho mafumu mboma la mangochi awapempha akuti adzidzipereka ntchito zothandiza kuzindillitsa za ubwino wopereka ndalama za misonkho molingana phindu lomwe amapeza busness zawo 
 wa bungwe lotolera ndalama za misonkho la malawi revenue authority mra steve kapoloma yemwe wanena lero ku mpondas mbomalo pomwe bungwe li limazindikilitsa mafumu za udindo nawo pogwira ntchito limodzi bungwe li 
 ati ndalama zamisonkho ndalama zomwe zimathandizira ntchito zotukula lino kotero mafumu udindo waukulu woonetsetsa opezeka mmadera mwawo sakuchita zachinyengo akutha kupereke misonkho za malonda 
 boma la mangochi linachita malire la mozambique ndiye amathawa kudula msonkho podutsa njira zamadulira tawona amenewa njira zachiudule amadutsazo madera mafumu choncho kofunika kuwalimbikitsa mafumu azitenga gawo pothandiza kupereka msonkho mosathawathawa anatewro kapoloma 
 mwa mafumu mdera la mfumu yayikulu mponda mbomalo omwe anafika msonkhano woati agwirana manja bungweli polimbikitsa kupereka msonkho moyenera

Text:
mudali sitandede 1 dzina la julius mithi si lachilendo kadaulo zowerengetsa wagwirapo ntchito kubungwe la zamasewero la fam ambiri angamudziwe mkuluyu zambiri za banja lake sizidziwika momwe adatumbira namwali 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mithi akuti naye wosongoka pakamwa adatumba kale womusangalatsa uyu ella msopa kumwenda amene lero mithi 
  mithi mkazi ella banja lachitsanzo lonyadirana mulungu sadalimane mphatso za ana awiri kuwonjezera chimwemwe chawo kodi nanga mithi adamasuka pakamwa athere ella chithokozo chipite kwa makolo awiriwa potumiza ana ku vongo fp school mboma mzimba awiriwatu adaponyerana maso sitandede 1

  nanga chichewa adasula pati ndinachoka ku vongo kubwera ku mzuzu 1981 kudzakhala anga panadutsa zaka 7 pomwe sitinathe kuonana kufikira nditayamba ntchito mboma 1992 apo ella ku ekwendeni nursing school mwamwawi tinadzakumana ku mzuzu pomwe chibwenzi chathu chidayambiranso atatha zaka 4 kusukulu ya unamwinoko tidakwatirana 
  mithi akuti zinthu zidamukoka asadumphitse wokondedwa wakeyu ndinamufunsira adali mtsikana wofatsa amachoka kwathu kwawo kwa agogo anga

Text:
chilima wati mafuta galimoto akuyenera atsikebe wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino dr saulos chilima wati kutsika kwa mitengo ya mafuta galimoto komwe kwachitika kawiri konse mdziko muno kosakwanira poyerekeza mmene zinthu zilili pakadali 
 chilima musagulitse mafuta mtengo wokwera dr chilima omwe akuyima wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa chipani cha mcp dr lazarus chakwera pansi tonse alliance chisankho chomwe chikudzachi amalankhula loweruka msonkhano okopa omwe unachitikira bwalo la zamasewero la kasungu community 
 wati akudziwa boma likupeleka ma contract kwa osavomerezeka azibweretsa mafutawa mdziko muno phindu lina lizipita ku chipani cha dpp wati zikuyenera kutha mitengo ya mafutayi itsikebe 
 musagulitse mafuta mtengo odula mutsitsebe azisangalala mukupatsana macontract amuchipata akupatseni 4 million dollars mupangire campaign anatero chilima 
 pamenepa dr chilima alimbikitsa akavotere mgwirizanowu pachisankhochi miyoyo yawo isinthe kumbali ya ulimi ntchito za umoyo za maphunziro mwayi wa ma business ntchito
Label: ECONOMY

Text:

  mneneri wa polisi mumzinda wa mzuzu patrick saulosi adati nkhata adavomera kulakwa kwake pamlanduwo 
  adati woimira boma pamlanduwu sub inspector lyson kachikondo adapempha bwalo lamilandu chigamulo chikhale chokhwima kaamba kakuti mlanduwu ndiwaukulu zomwe wamudutsitsa mwanayo chinthu chomwe sangadzaiwale moyo onse

Text:
akagawira ukayidi zaka 10 kamba kogwililira bwalo loyamba la milandu mboma la mangochi lalamula maxwell jiya zaka 53 zakubadwa akakhale ku ndende kukagwira ntchito ya kalavula gaga kwa zaka khumi 10 kamba komupeza olakwa mlandu wogwilira msungwana wa zaka 10 zakubadwa yemwe mwana wa ku banja la akazi ake 
 bwalolo linamva kwa oyimira boma mlandu sub inspector skeva munyapa bamboyu mkazi akhala akulephera kupeza mphatso ya mwana anakatenga msungwayo ku banja la akazi azikhala naye khomopo 
 2 april 2020 mmawa akazi wa kotunga madzi kusiya msungwanayo pakhomo bamboyu anapezerapo mwayi wokokera msungwayu ku chipinda komwe anakamugwilira akazi atafika khomopo anadabwa ululu mwanayo kuumva atamufunsa anaulula za nkhaniyi 
 woyimira boma mulanduyu sub inspector munyapa zomwe anachita mkuluyi zinali zosayenera kotero akuyenera kulandira chilango chokhwima 
 popereka chigamulo first grade magistrate roy kakutu anagwilizana zomwe analankhula oyimira boma mulandu wu kupereka chigamulo cha mtunduwu atengero phunziro 
 maxwell jiya amachokera mmudzi mwa ngumela mdera la mfumu yayikulu juma mboma la mulanje

Text:
kasanthuleni za chisankho pamene aphungu nyumba ya malamulo akukonzekera kukumana kuyambira lolemba likudzali akadaulo awapempha akalunjike za chisankho cha 2019 
  aphunguwo akhale akukambirana za momwe ndondomeko ya zachuma yayendera katswiri ndale george phiri yemwe amaphunzitsa ku university of livingstonia unilia wati nkhani zina zonse zikhoza kuyamba zaima nkhani ya chisankho njofunika kuikambirana ikukhudza tsogolo la 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka aphungu mnyumba ya malamulo mmbuyomu zipani za ndale zakhala zikuthirira ndemanga za kalembetsedwe konyentchera mkaundula wachisankho nkhani zokhudza zipolowe ndale kusowa kwa makina akalembera mphekesera zofuna kudzabera chisankho phiri wati uwu mpata woti aphungu akakambirane nkhanizi mwachindunji 
  nkhani ya bajeti ili apo aphungu asakataye za ziii momwe amachitira muja yatha uwu mwayi wawo wokonza malawi kukonza malawi chisankho chomwe chikubwerachi adatero phiri 
  adati nkofunikanso aphungu asanthule za momwe akhala akuyendetsera thumba la ndalama za chitukuko la constituency development fund cdf ndemangayo ikudza pomwe lipoti ya nduna ya zachuma goodall gondwe kumayambiriro chaka chino lidaonetsa aphungu 20 adasokoneza ndalama za cdf mpaka lero palibe phungu amene adatchulidwa kusololako 
  phungu amalandira k18 miliyoni bajeti iliyonse apanga nayo chiyani cholozeka akuvutikabe kale watero phiri 
  katswiri za kayendetsedwe ka makhumbo munthali wati aphungu ayenera kukambirana za momwe chisankho chingayendere mwa bata chilungamo adati pali nkhani zingapo zimene zipani akhala akudandaula kalembera wa zisankho wophotchoka kusowa kwa makina ku bungwe la zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec zomwe zidadzetsa chikaiko zimene aphungu akuyenera kukaunikira 
  pambali pokambirana zoti chisankho chidzakhale cha mtendere chilungamo akumbukirenso nkhani zina mabilu okhudza zachuma za migodi ndalama zankhaninkhani zikutuluka mdziko muno chopanda zokhwima watero munthali 
  chipani cha peoples p(pp chati chikugwirizana maganizo akadaulo nkhani zofunika ku nkhumano ya aphungu 
  mneneri wachipanichi ackson kalaile wati nkhani ya chisankho njosathawika pafikapa ikukhudza miyoyo ya amalawi 
  tafika amalawi adataya chikhulupiliro ndiye ntchito yonse yobwezeretsa chikhulupilirocho ili mmanja mwa aphungu yake ndiyomweyi adatero kalaile 
  mneneri wa malawi congress party mcp maurice munthali adati akuluakulu achipanichi aphungu ake akumana mawa lamulungu kuomba mkota wa zopita nazo kunyumbayi 
  mneneri wachipani cha democratic progressive dpp nicholas daus adati chipanicho sichingakambe zake atolankhani zopita yamalamulo zili njira yake yodzera 
  adati zonse zikakonzeka komiti yoyenera idzalengeza sitingamakambirane atolankhani zomwe takambirana choncho ndilibe yankho adatero dausi posanthula nkhani ya momwe aphungu agwirira ntchito mmbuyomu adayamika momwe aphunguwo adatsatira nkhani yomwe nduna yakale ya malimidwe george chaponda amamuganizira adachita chinyengo pogula chimanga kuchoka ku zambia 
  adati zili choncho aphungu amene adasankhidwa 2014 wa akanika mzambiri mmalo mothandiza kutukula adathandizira kulilowetsa pansi 
  aphungu adayesetsa kukoka nkhaniyo ya chimanga tidayamika tikawayika pasikelo ya udindo wawo palibe chomwe adachitapo mzaka zonsezi adatero munthali amalawi amene tidacheza nawo aonetsa khumbo lawo lagona poti aphungu akambirane zakupsa zokhudza chisankho 
  jane mapira wa ku lilongwe wati akadakonda aphungu akadakambirana nkhani yokhudza akuluakulu mec omwe wati akhumudwitsa kale nzochitika zawo 
  wilson thomas wa ku zomba wati sakuona choti aphungu azikatayira nkukambirana zinthu zomwe sizingasinthe kalikonse wati kuli aphungu akangokambirana za bajeti nkumabwerako 
  atakambirana nkhani za chisankho palibe chingasinthe yatha kale apa akangokambirana za bajeti nkumabwerako kukadikira chipande may chaka cha mawachi basi watero thomas 
  ukatha msonkhano wa aphungu wa chaka chino aphunguwo adzaakumana komaliza mwezi wa march chaka cha mawa kutangotsala miyezi iwiri chisankho cha 2019 chichitike
Label: POLITICS

Text:
phungu wakale akagwira ukayidi cha katangale bwalo la milandu ku zomba lalamula phungu wakale wa nyumba ya malamulo mdera la zomba malosa anderson undani akakhale ku ndende kwa chaka chimodzi theka mlandu wa katangale 
 wasayinira kalatayo ndala malinga kalata yomwe bungwe lothana katangale ziphuphu mdziko muno la anti corruption bureau acb latulutsa yomwe yasayinidwa wofalitsa nkhani egritta ndala phungu wakaleyu omuthandizira pangani nazombe anasokoneza ndalama za thumba la contsituency development fund cdf zomwe zimayenera kugwiritsidwa ntchito pomanga nyumba ya mphunzitsi sukulu pulaimale ya mapalo 
 ndalama zina akuti zinali zoti amangire zimbudzi sukulu ya domasi ccap kukonzanso nsewu wa domasi kasonga mlatho mtsinje wa malonga 
 bungwe la acb linamanga awiriwa 1 october mchaka cha 2018 awiriwa anatengeredwa ku bwalo la milandu komwe undani amayankha mlandu wogwiritsa ntchito ofesi yawo molakwika kuba kupeza ndalama kudzera njira yachinyengo pomwe nazombe amayankha mlandu wothandizira munthu kupalamula mlandu kupeza ndalama kudzera njira yachinyengo 
 3 july bwaloli linawapeza olakwa nkhaniyi 13 pomwe bwaloli lapereka chigamulo chake nkhaniyi pomwe undani alamulidwa kukakhala ku ndende kwa miyezi 18 mlandu uliwonse omwe anapalamula pamene nazombe alamulidwa kukakhala ku ndende kwa miyezi 12 mlandu uliwonse omwe anapalamula akuti chilango chonsechi chidziyendera limodzi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
nigeria malawi agwilana manja pamene la malawi lili mkati mwazokambirana la tanzania nkhani ya umwini wa nyanja ya malawi yomwe akuti muli mafuta la nigeria lati ndilokonzeka kuthandiza lino kuwenga mafutawa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mtsogoleri wa la nigeria goodluck jonathan adanena lolemba pamene amafika mdziko muno kudzacheza kwa masiku awiri motsagana akuluakulu 143 ochokera ku nigeria komweko 
  la nigeria ndilimodzi mwa mayiko omwe amawenga mafuta ambiri jonathan adati lawo ndilokonzeka kutumiza akatswiri antchito zowenga mafuta kudziko lawo adzathandize ntchito zowenga mafuta nyanja ya malawi 
  la nigeria lakhala likuwenga mafuta kwa zaka zambiri padakali tili akatswiri odziwa za ntchito yowenga mafuta omwe tikhoza kuwatumiza adzathandize ntchito yotere kuno adatero jonathan
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
kalembera wafika kummwera kalembera wa mkaundula wachisankho cha chaka cha mawa wafika mchigawo cha kummwera tsopano ntchitoyi itakumana zokhoma zosiyanasiyana mmaboma mchigawo chapakati pomwe idayambirira 
  boma la ntcheu boma lomaliza la mchigawo chapakati komwe kwafika kalemberayu mgawo lachinayi mgawo lomweli muli maboma mchigawo cha kummwera blantyre mwanza chikwawa 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka ntchito ya kalembera kalemberayo adayamba lachinayi adzatha 29 august 
  malingana woyanganira zisankho ku malawi electoral commission mec sam alfandika pali chiyembekezo choti pamene ntchitoyi ikupitirira mavuto omwe amaoneka mmagawo atatu oyambirira achepa kwambiri aphunzira mokwanira za kalemberayu 
  kumayambiriro kuja tidali vuto loti ambiri adali asadadziwitsitse za kalemberayu mauthenga omwe akhala akuperekedwa ambiri akudziwa chiyembekezo nchachikulu ziyenda adatero alfandika 
  adapempha zipani zitengepo mbali yomema akalembetse omwewo ndiwo mavoti 
  wa bungwe lophunzitsa la national initiative for civic education nice trust ollen mwalubunju wati bungwelo lipitiriza kuphunzitsa mmadera momwe mukulowera kalemberayu cholinga chenicheni cha demokalase chidzawoneke pachisankho cha chaka chamawa 
  zimakhala zofoola nkhongono kuona ochepa ndiwo avota kusankha atsogoleri zimakhala aja angokakamizidwa kutsogoleredwa omwe sadawafune ndiye ulendo uno yemwe woyenera kuvota akavote chiyambi cha zonse kulembetsa adatero mwalubunju 
  adati wokondwa momwe kalembera adayendera mgawo lachitatu lomwe limachitika ku lilongwe adati zidatheka bungwelo mabungwe mipingo zipani adagwirana manja kumema 
  poyamba kalemberayu mmaboma kasungu salima dedza padali mavuto aakulu okhudza kufaifa kwa zipangizo mpakana ambiri sadalembetse mavutowa adapitirira mgawo lachiwiri ku mchinji dowa ntchisi nkhotakota moti chipani cha malawi congress mcp mabungwe la centre for human rights and rehabilitation chrr adapempha mec idzabwereze kalembera mmabomawa 
  mavutowa adadzachepa mgawo lachitatu lidatha sabata yatha padapezeka mavuto kulandidwa ziphaso miyambo yamakolo yomwe imabwezera kalembera mmbuyo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
konvenshoni ya mcp 28 april pamene chipani cha malawi congress party mcp chatsimikiza msonkhano waukulu wokasankha atsogoleri udzachitika 28 29 epulo katswiri wa zandale dr mustapha hussein wadzudzula wosintha malamulo oyendetsera chipani ncholinga chopatsa mpata omwe sakuloledwa kupikisana nawo pamaudindo atero 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc msonkhanowo ukuyembekezeka kudzachitikira ku bingu international conference centre ku lilongwe chipanichi chidakali kuunguza ndalama za msonkhanowo akuluakulu ati ulipo 
  malipoti msabatayi adati chipanichi chikukonza zokasintha malamulo kuphatikizapo loti munthu asamaimire chipanichi pazisankho za mtsogoleri wa koposa kawiri chipanichi chidati chikakambirana zosintha lamuloli munthu akhoza kuimira chipanichi popanda malire zomwe akuti nzongufuna mtsogoleri wa chipanichi john tembo adzaimirenso chipanicho chaka chikubwerachi 
  yemwe akuyendetsa zokonzekera msonkhano waukulu wa chipanichi joseph njobvuyalema watsimikiza mcp ikuunikanso malamulo ake tsopano yakhazikitsa masiku omwe chipanichi chidzapange msonkhanowo 
  nzoona tikuunikanso malamulo chipani chathu chake choti malamulowa ngakale kwambiri moti pali zina zina zofunika zizifanana padakalipano ntchitoyi ili mkati chilichonse chiunikidwa kuphatikizapo ndime yomwe imakamba za utsogoleri wa chipani 
  omwe akufuna kudzapikisana nawo pamaudindo osiyanasiyana auzidwa kale azikatenga zikalata kulikulu lathu kusonyeza chilichonse chili mmalo adatero njobvuyalema 
  hussein wati malamulo chipani panthawi yoti msonkhano waukulu wayandikira kungabweretse chikaiko pakati otsatira chipani komaso omwe satsatira chipanicho 
  lamulo lamulo palibe chosinthira zimenezi zimapangitsa chipani chizilephera za demokalase zikayamba choncho ndiye kutsogoloko omwe zolinga zawozawo azidzangosintha malamulo ziwayendere mapeto ake sakhulupiriranso chipanicho adatero hussein 
  za msonkhano waukuluwo njobvuyalema adati pali chitsimikizo choti msonkhanowo udzakhalako 28 29 mwezi uno chipanichi sichinamalize kutolera ndalama zodzayendetsela msonkhanowo chiyembekezo pofika masikuwa ndalamazo zidzakhala zitakwana 
  njobvuyalema adatinso odzapikisana nawo pamipando yosiyanasiyana sanadziwikebe akuyembekezera adziwika likulu lawo likatulutsa mndandanda wa omwe akatenga zikalata zosonyeza khumbo lopikisana nawo 
  msabatayi wa mpingo wa assemblies of god mbusa lazarus chakwera adati akufuna kudzapikisana nawo pampando wa mtsogoleri wa chipanicho mmbuyomu mlembi wamkulu wa chipanicho chris daza naye adati akufuna kudapikisana nawo 
  palinso phungu wa pakati mboma la nkhotakota edwin banda yemwe naye wati mpandowu akuufuna 
  wa bungwe la alimi la farmers union of malawi fum felix jumbe lachitatu adalengeza watula pansi udindowo akulowa ndale adatinso akufuna kupikisana nawo pampando wa pulezidenti 
  tawalandira jumbe apikisane nawo sanatenge zikalata zimene ofuna kupikisana nawo akutenga ayenera kutero adatero njobvuyalema 
  zipani zina peoples party pp united democratic front udf zidasankha kale maudindo mzipani zawo komaso odzaziyimira pampando wa mtsogoleri ya zisankho 
  hussein wati kusankha atsogoleri yabwino kumathandiza chipani kukonzekera mokwanira zisankho zisanafike
Label: POLITICS

Text:
la malawi lapezeka mmaiko 10 amtendere africa la malawi lapezeka gulu la mayiko 10 mtendere mmayiko africa 
 nyanja ya malawi chimodzi mwa zinthu zokopa alendo malinga kafulufuku amene bungwe lina lokhudzidwa nkhani zochita kafukufuku mmaikowa linachita mwa mayiko amene mguluri equatorial guinea tanzania namibia ghana sierra leone zambia madagascar botswana mauritius 
 malingana kafukufukuyu ambiri mwa maikowa akusonyezanso nkhani zokopa alendo mchigawochi kamba ka mbiri yabwino yomwe nayo

Text:
anatchezera akukana kunditsata agogo ndine mnyamata wa zaka 20 ndili pachibwenzi mtsikana wa zaka 22 timakondana kwambiri vuto loti akukana kunditsata kuchipembedzo changa ndiye ndithetse chibwenzichi ndipitirize   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu rm zikomo rm choyamba ndikanakonda nditadziwa cholinga cha chibwenzi chanu chiyani komabe poti ukufuna maganizo anga ndikuuza ndikhulupirira cholinga cha chibwenzi chanu kudzamanga banja mtsogolo sindikulakwa muli cholinga chodzakhala thupi limodzi kwambiri muzigwirizana muzonse inde pali mabanja oti mwamuma amapemphera mpingo wina mkazi nayenso amapita kwina nkumakhala bwinobwino mwansangala kunena zoona mukasiyana zipembedzo pamakhalabe kenakake kosonyeza pali kusagwirizana mbanjamo ndiye kugwirizana chimodzi musanalowe mbanja munayamba mwakhala pansi nkukambirana chake nchiyani akukanira kukutsatira kuchipembedzo chako nanga iweyo sungamugonjere wachikondi wakoyo umutsate kumpingo kwake nchifukwa chake zambiri kumakhala achinyamata mukamafuna mnzanu wachikondi muzidyerera maso kwa anyamata atsikana omwe mumapemphera nawo mumpingo umodzi nanga chokafunira wachikondi kwina nchiyani ndiye wafunsa kodi uthetse chibwenzichi ayi ndikuti zili iwe mwini mmene ukumvera mumtima mwako 
  ndipange agogo ndine mnyamata wa zaka 20 ndinakwatira mwangozi nditapereka mimba kwa mtsikana wina ndimafuna nditapitiriza sukulu zikukanika mkaziyu akukana nditero ndipange jk zikomo jk ndakhala ndikulangiza anyamata atsikana ambiri mfulumiza adadya gaga lero si waziona mwana wanga ndakondwa waona wekha kufunika kwa sukulu kuipa koyamba kugonana atsikana mosadziteteza udakali pasukulu udakali msinkhu wopita kusukulu kwambiri utatero mkazi wakoyo umamukonda iyenso amakukonda chimodzimodzi ayenera kumvetsa cholinga chako choti upitirize maphunziro ako kutsogolo mudzakhale moyo wabwino wodzidalira nokha osati mmene zilili panopa mmene ndikuonera banja lanu lidalira makolo chakudya zovala sopo amene zina zotere umutsimikizire mkaziyo kupitiriza sukulu sikutanthauza banja lanu latha ukuganiza za tsogolo lanu banja umuuze sukulu simatha akuluakulu amene mukuwaona mmaofesiwa ambiri afika pamene chopitiriza sukulu mbanjabe tsono chovuta iwe upitirize sukulu nchiyani safuna sukulu zake iwe chita zomwe ukufuna ndikhulupirira makolo ako adzasangalala kwambiri kumva ukufuna kupitiriza sukulu 
  ndinalapa anatchereza ndinali mchikondi kwambiri mwamuna wa kwa jali atandipatsa pathupi samandiuza nzeru iliyonse yothandiza umoyo wa mwana wodzabadwayo mapeto ake anandipatsa ndalama zokachotsera pathupipo kuchipatala zotsatira zake ndinadwala kwambiri nditapeza anayamba kundipepesa ndinamenyetsa nkhwanga pamwala sindidzayambiranso kodi mwamuna wotsogolera zolakwa wabwino ineyo ndinalapa amama ndinasiyana naye 
  ml zikomo ml ambiri ndilibe ndingoti khokhokho kumeneko ndiye timati kukula akulu akale adati mmphechepeche mwa njovu sadutsamo kawiri munthu ukachimwa kulapa wachitira iweyomu ndithudi mwamunayo sadakufunire zabwino chikondi chake chidali cha chiphamaso basi amangofuna zogonana osalabadira za zotsatira zake wachita kumusiya ameneyo yamba moyo wina watsopano mwamuna wina akakufunsira mulole osamulola muyambe mwagonana musanalowe mbanja amuna ambiri akangowavulira musanalowe mbanja sakhalanso chidwi amati wandilola nkutheka adalolanso amuna

 mbewe akavotere mutharika kuno ku chilaweni ward vuto lalikulu madzi midzi yambiri ilibe mijigo ambiri akumwa madzi mzitsime chachiwiri misewu yambiri kuno ndiyowonongeka ndiponso magetsi sanakwanire mmadera ward ino anatero mdala 
 poyankhapo pankhaniyi wachiwiri kwa mstogoleri wa chipani cha udf lancy mbewe wamema mderali azavotere peter mutharika chisankho chatsopano cha president chomwe chikudzachi cholinga choti mavutowa achepe mderali

Text:

 amayankhula mwambo okhadzikitsa bungwe la abambo ku parishi yo 
 nthumwi za bungwe la umodzi wa abambo zochokera arch diocese ya blantyre motsogozedwa wapampando ogwirizira bungwe li martin chiwaya mogwirizana abambo ku parish ya nthawira january omwe anakakhazikitsa bungwe li 
 poyankhulapo wapampando wa parish ya mendulo freeson tuwaga ati akukhulupilira kubadwa kwa bungwe li kupititsa patsogolo chitukuko cha parish yawo

Text:
2019 chaka cha mbiri zisankho chaka cha 2019 chidzalowa mmbiri ya la malawi chaka chomwe atsogoleri azipani adakwekwetsana koopsa koyamba mukhoti pankhani yokhudza zotsatira za chisankho cha pulezidenti 
  21 may 2019 amalawi adalawirira kukandanda mzere akasankhe atsogoleri ma khansala aphungu pulezidenti nyanga zidakola zotsatira za mpando wa pulezidenti 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka sadatule pansi udindo ansah 27 may 2019 bungwe la mec lidalengeza peter mutharika wa democratic progressive party dpp adapambana pachisankho cha pulezidenticho 
  malingana bungwe la mec mutharika adapeza mavoti 38.67 mwa 100 alionse lazarus chakwera wa malawi congress party mcp adapeza 35.41 saulos chilima wa utm party adapeza 20.24 
  zotsatirazo zidabweretsa mpungwepungwe waukulu moti chilima chakwera adakasuma ku khothi odandaula woyamba wachiwiri mndandanda omwewo 
  atsogoleri awiriwa akuti mutharika mec woyankha mlandu woyamba wachiwiri mndandanda omwewo adasokoneza chisankho cha pulezidenti akufuna khoti ligamule chisankhocho chichitikenso 
  chidadzutsa zonse zikalata zolembapo momwe avotera pomwe kudapezeka zikalata zambiri zidafufutidwa utoto wotchedwa tippex mamonitala sadasayine zikalata zina 
  mlandu utayambika padali kukolanakolana za mboni mlandu udayamba kuwoneka mutu mboni imodzi ya chakwera daud suleman ataonetsa khoti momwe omwe samayenera kulowa mmakina internet mec ankagulugushira mmakinawo 
  umboni wina omwe udavuta udali wa wa bungwe la mec sam alfandika yemwe adafunsidwa alongosole momwe tippex adakapezekera mmalo owerengera mavoti momwe adayankhira madando onse 147 momwe ansah adanenera polengeza zotsaira ndani adavomereza kugwiritsa ntchito zotsatira zokonzedwa tippex 
  alfandika yemwe patsiku loyamba adatuluka thukuta lochita kusamba mpaka khoti kuimitsidwa adalephera kupereka maminitsi zokambirana za makomishonala mec poyankha madando adavomera tippex adapezeka mmalo owerengera mavoti 
  mboni ya mutharika ben phiri yemwe nduna ya maboma aangono chitukuko cha mmidzi adavomereza chisankho chidakumana zokhoma zambiri adati vuto lidali bungwe la mec pogwiritsa ntchito omwe sadaphunzitsidwe mokwanira 
  mlanduwo ukuyendetsedwa kukhoti lapadera lomwe likumvedwa oweruza 5 omwe healey potani mike tembo dingiswayo madise ivy kamanga redson kapindu 
  mmwezi wa june 2019 khothili lidakana pempho la woimirira mutharika mec loti mlanduwo angowusiya wodandaula sadatsate ndondomeko zoyenera zosumira khothi lidati mlanduwo upitilire 
  mlanduwu ukunka kumapeto tsopano wakumana nzokhoma zambiri ziletso kuimaima makamaka pomwe mbali yoyankha mlandu adapempha sabata ziwiri zoti akatolere umboni kwa omwe amayanganira mmalo oponyera voti 
  panyengoyi padamveka mphekesera yoti okatolera umboniwo amaopseza kukakamiza kunyengerera oyanganira mmalowo oponyera votiwo azisayinira zikalata zomwe zidagwira ntchito zosasayina kupereka umboni wabodza 
  pachifukwachi otsatira zipani za mcp utm adayamba kuthotha anthuwo akafika mdera lawo zomwe zidapangitsa ntchitoyo ayionjezere sabata ina 
  sabata yathayi mbali zonse zokhudzidwa mlanduwo kuphatikizapo abwenzi khoti malawi law society mls women lawyers association wla adamaliza kupereka zindunji za zawo nkhani yatsala mmanja mwa majaji agamule
Label: POLITICS

Text:
afa atawombedwa mphenzi ku nkhotakota mamuna wina wa zaka 32 zakubadwa wafa mboma la nkhotakota mphezi itamuwomba akuwedza nsomba dziwe la chia lagoon 
 nkhalamo anagwera damu limeneli wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo sub inspector williams kaponda wati mamuna womwalirayu yemwe amadziwika dzina loti sweet nkhalamo adali anzake awiri kowedza nsomba ku chia lagoon 30 december 2019 
 mwadzidzidzi mvula idayamba kugwa mphezi idawawomba atatuwa adagwera mmadzi cholephera kusambira mkuluyu adafera pomwepo anzake awiriwo anasambira mpaka kumtunda 
 zotsatira za kuchipatala cha boma la nkhotakota zasonyeza mkuluyu wafa kaamba kobanika 
 nkhalamo amachokera amachokera mmudzi mwa ngaluka mdera la sub t nkhanga mboma la nkotakota

Text:
kenya ikudikira south africa ipulumutse omira indian ocean wolemba sylvester kasitomu la kenya lati likudikira akatswiri osambira pamadzi mdziko la south africa omwe afike mdzikolo lolemba kuzathandiza ntchito yosaka matupi awiri omwe afa atamira nyanja ya indian ocean 
 anthuwa mwana wankazi anamira muyanjayi masiku apitawa galimoto yomwe anakwera itaphonya nseu kulowa nyanjayi 
 kanema oonetsa mmene ngoziyi yachitikira wakhala akuonetsedwa masamba internet nthambi yoona za ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi mdziko la kenya yati inalephera kupulumutsa kupeza matupi anthuwa kaamba kosowa zipangizo zokwanira zoti agwirire ntchitoyi 
 nduna yofalitsa nkhani mdziko la kenya cyrus oguna yati akatswiriwa alipo magulu awiri anafika mdzikolo lamulungu otsiriza akuyenera kufika mdzikolo lolemba ayambe ntchito yosaka matupi anthuwa 
 tikuyesesa kuchitapo kanthu anthuwa apezeke akatswiriwa afika mdziko muno lero ayambe ntchito yawo anatero oguna 
 malipoti awilesi ya bbc ati nduna yoona za mayendedwe james micharia yatsimikiza za nkhaniyi akatswiriwa afika kale mdzikolo akhala akufika posachedwapa mdzikolo
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
atatu achira covid-19 atatu omwe gulu la omwe anapezeka kachilombo ka coronavirus akuti atawayeza awapezeka tsopano alibe kachilomboka mthupi mwawo 
 watsimikiza za anthuwa mhango nduna ya zaumoyo jappie mhango amalankhula pomwe amapereka lipoti lokhudza momwe zinthu zikuyendera ntchito yolimbana kachilomboka mdziko muno 
 masiku asanu apitawa sitinalandire uthenga wina uliwonse okhuza matendawa titayeza palibe anapezeka nawo dzulo kwapezeka munthu wa zaka 70 mzinda wa blantyre yemwe wapezeka matendawa anatero mhango 
 pamenepa ndunayi yati atatuwa akuyembekezereka kukayezedwanso astimikizidwe achiladi 
 ati tsopano onse omwe apezeka matendawa mdziko muno alipo 17 awiri mwa anamwalira

Text:
kutetedza okalamba udindo wa   manepo wolemba thokozani chiwaya bungwe lolimbikisa ufulu wa okalamba muno la malawi network of elderly persons organisation manepo lero lapempha mabungwe muno agwirane manja pothana nkhaza zomwe okalamba amakumana nazo 
 polankhulapo mzinda wa blantyre pambuyo maphuziro omwe bungwe la manepo linakonzera ma komiti madera olandira madandaulo kwa okalamba omwe akuwatcha complaints response mechanism pachingelezi mwa akuluakulu ku bungweli louisa kanyongolo ati maphuzirowa athandiza bungweli kufikira okalamba omwe akhuzidwa nkhanza zosiyanasiyana ku madera kwawo komweko kuzela ku makomiti pansi bungweli 
 mamembala komiti za manepo kulandira maphunziro amene mmakomiti abungweli omwe madera akufunika maphunziro amenewa pofuna kusula kagwiridwe kawo ka ntchito pothandiza okalamba anatero kanyongolo 
 mai louisa anatipitiliza kunena makomitiwa amenenso kuthukera kofikira zosowa za okalamba kamba koti omwe amakhala nawo okolambawa kumidzi komweko 
 mai kanyongolo apempha mzika za lino zigwirane manja poteteza kumenyera ufulu wa okolamba pozindikila tonse tizakalamba ndithu 
 tonsefe tizakalamba ndithu choncho tizizindikira udindo wa wotetedza okalamba posayanganira ntsikhu anaonjezera motero mai louisa 
 mau ake mwa amene anatenga nawo gawo maphuzirowa peter mambala maphuzirowa awathandiza kudziwa pamene amasalira pakagwiridwe kawo ka ntchito makamaka pofikila okalamba 
 taziwa malire udindo wathu poteteza achikulire mdziko muno makamaka madera athu owenso ndikumene kukupezeka okalamba anatero mambala 
 mwadzina mambala anathokoza bungwe la manepo kamba kamaphunzirowa ponena ntchito za mabungwe zimayenda amenenso bungwelo likuwafikila nawo limodzi momwe bungwe la manepo lachitila 
 ntchito za mabungwe zimakanika kufikira cholinga chake cheni cheni akumudzi eni ake sakuyikidwamo kudzera ku makomiti athuwa anaonjedzera motero mambala 
 maphuzirowa anakwanitsa kubweretsa pamodzi ma komiti bungweli omwe amapezeka mboma la blantyre
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
pemphererani lino ipempha ecm mpingo wa katolika wapempha amalawi apempherere la malawi utsogoleri wadziko lino panyengo ya lenti 
  muuthenga wanyengoyi wa mabishopu mgulu la episcopal conference of malawi ecm joseph zuza wati padakali amalawi akudutsa mumazunzo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zuza adati atsogoleri athu udindo waukulu woti moyo uzikhala ofewa wa tonse okhulupirira tiyenera kudziwa mulungu sangatitaye 
  zuza adati zina mwa zomwe amalawi ayenera kupempherera zichepe katangale ziphuphu kukondera ochokera kudera kwanu kusankhana mitundu zilakolako zakuthupi ufiti nkhanza kwa ana uchidakwa kupembedza satana 
  zuza adapempha akatolika aziyesetsa akhristu achitsanzo ndikutsatira malamulo mulungu 
  ayenera kuonetsetsa akukhala okhulupirika pamaso mulungu adatero zuza 
  muuthenga mnyengoyi papa benedict wachikhumi chisanu nchimodzi adati masiku 40 amene akatolika akhale akupunguza ayenera kulingalira za opezeka ahebri 10 ndime 24 
  tiyenera kukhudzidwa mavuto okondana kumanso kugwira ntchito zabwino adatero papayo 
  kwa masiku 40 akatolika amakhala akupunguza zimayamba tsiku la phulusa lomwe lidali lachitatu 
  panthawiyo amakhala akupemphera kugawana kulingalira molimba kusala zachifundo mpaka ya pasaka epulo
Label: RELIGION

Text:
toto takana mkozemkoze adanyula maliro aeni sinodi ya livingstonia yatemetsa nkhwangwa pamwala sipepesa momwe mafumu mboma la rumphi alamulira 
  pempho la mafumuwo likudza potsatira chipwirikiti chomwe chidachitika lachiwiri msabatayi poyika mmanda thupi la malemu chikulamayembe mbomalo    chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka nyondo akulankhula uku mafumu akukambirana zochita sinodiyo idakolana mafumu maliro chikulamayembe pamene idalamula atsogoleri wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino saulos chilima mtsogoleri wa zipani zotsutsa lazarus chakwera alankhulepo malirowo   ukali wa mafumuwo udaoneka pamene adakalanda mkuzamawu mlembi wa sinodiyo levi nyondo asalankhulenso   nyondo sadanjenjemere kuwauza mafumuwo ayendetse mwambo wa mapemphero zomwe zidakakamiza mafumuwo kupepesa mwambowo uchitike 
  ndizomwe zakwiyitsa mafumuwo motsogozedwa mwana wa chikulamayembe mtima gondwe yemwe wati sinodiyo idanyazitsa maliro ake   nchifukwa chake tikupempha sinodi ipepese zomwe zidachitikazo dziwani adamwalirawo adali anga ndiye akubanja tidakhumudwa nazo adatero gondwe   naye gulupu kawazamawe yemwe amalankhuliranso banja loferedwa adati mafumuwo   kusalemekeza maliro mfumu kuyambitsa chipwirikiti pamaso mtsogoleri wa lino kunena chilima chakwera alankhule zomwe zikadayambitsa ndewu adatero kawazamawe   sizikutekesa sinodiyo pamene yati ilibe yopepesa munthu zomwe zidachitikazo   mwa akuluakulu mpingowo mbusa douglas chipofya adati boma mafumu ndiwo akuyenera kupepesa mpingo 
  paja mafumu adapepesa kale kusiwa kuja choncho nkhanizi zidatha basi adatero chipofya 
  chipofya adagwirizana nyondo amene adatsindika mafumuwo amene akuyenera kupepesa kumpingo   kodi chichitike nchiyani pamene mpingowo wakana kupepesa gondwe adati aona chomwe achite sadanene chomwe angachite   t mwamlowe amene pansi chikulamayembe adati mwambo wa atumbuka mfumu ikalankhula palibenso amene amalankhula pamwamba pake 
  naye t mwamlowe adati kukadakhala kwabwino mbali zonse zikadadya khonde momwe ndondomeko ya mwambowo ikhalire   bungwe lachikhalidwe la mzimba heritage association mziha lidati zikuoneka sadapitire kukalira chikulamayembe   mwa atsogoleri mziha ndabazake thole adati mwambo wakumudzi ulemu umaperekedwa kwa mafumu ampingo amabwera nkumatonthoza anamfedwa   naye dc wa boma la rumphi fred movete adati zonse mfumu ya ndodo ikamwalira ofesi yake imapanga ndondomeko yakayendetsedwe ka mwambo mogwirizana banja unduna wa zamaboma angono
Label: CULTURE

Text:
apolisi asilikali ati akhwimitsa chitetezo yosayendayenda apolisi mdziko muno mogwirizana asilikali nkhondo anenetsa apereka chitetezo cholimba motsatira malamulo lino amene amawalora awonetsetse mdziko muli bata mtendere akutsatira malamulo 
 anayitanitsa msonkhano wa atolankhaniwo mwapasa wogwilizira udindo wa wa apolisi mdziko muno danken mwapasa limodzi wa asilikali nkhondo mdziko muno peter lapken mathanga anachititsa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe wachitika lachinayi mzinda wa lilongwe pokonzekera masiku 21 osayendayenda omwe pulezidenti peter mutharika walengeza ayambira pakati usiku wa loweruka sabata ino mpaka pakati usiku wa 9 may chaka chino 
 nthambi ziwirizi zapempha mdziko muno atsatire bwinobwino malamulo omwe aikidwa ponena opezeka akuyenda mopanda chilolezo adzalangidwa moyenera waphwanyira malamulowa 
 pamenepa atolankhani anafunitsitsa kudziwa adzalandira chilango chotani potengera ndendenso za lino potengera nkhani ya corona virus yomweyi sikukuyenera kudzaze anayankhapo anthuwa adzatengeredwa kupolisi mwachangu adzakawonekera ku bwalo la milandu komwe adzikalandira chilango mwachangu 
 nkhani ina yomwe inamanga nthenje kumeneku ndiyokhudza ntchito zakumunda pamene akukololabe mbeu zawo pamenepa akuluakuluwa ati mpofunika afunse komwe akuyenera akatenge chilolezo choti agwirire ntchitozo momasuka 
 anenetsanso sikufuna kwawo adzagwire ntchito yawo mwa nkhanza mokhala kumbali ya wanthu anenetsa akuyenera malamulowa kaamba koti omwewo amene apindule mfundozi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
eid al adha chikondwerero chopereka nsembe chaka chaka chipembedzo cha chisilamu amakhala akuzinga ziweto ina mwambowu asilamu amakhala akutsatira zomwe mulungu adalamula abraham zaka zammbuyo steven pembamoyo adacheza sheikh malekano rajab adakambirana motere poyamba ndikudziweni 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa ndine sheikh malekano rajab ndimatumikila pamzikiti wa pamsika wa area 22 ku lilongwe 
  kodi chaka chaka asilamu amakhala mwambo wopha ziweto talongosolani zimakhala mwambo uja timakhala tikukumbukira zomwe mulungu adauza abrahamu kalelo yomwe adavomera kupereka mwana ishmael nsembe akuti azipereka mwanayo nsembe mulungu adatumiza nkhosa mwanayo adapulumuka mulungu adalamula abrahamu chaka chilichonse asilamu azikhala mwambo umenewu chikumbutso kulemekeza mulungu 
  mwambowu umachitika liti umachitika tsiku la khumi 10 la mwezi wa chisanu chinayi mkalendala ya chisilamu pakafika 1 mwezi umenewo msilamu amayenera kuyamba kusala kwa masiku 10 kusalako kumatha tsiku la nambala 10 lomwe kumakhala kuzinga ziweto chikwenderero cha eid al adha chimachitika nchiyani tsikuli msilamu amayenera kugula chiweto ngombe mbuzi nkupha yake nkugawa naye mwini amayenera kutengapo gawo osangogawa yonse ayi kupha nyamako kumatchedwanso qrubani 
  chiweto chake chimayenera chotani chiweto chikhoza chilichonse chikhale chopanda chilema choti chidakokako ngolo chidalimako chikhale chiweto chalunga chopanda chilonda pathupi lake chathanzi 
  china chimachitika nchiyani lisadafike tsikulo asilamu ndalama zawo amapita ku mecca ulendo wopita ku mecca umatchedwanso haji imodzi mwa nsanamira za chisilamu omwe alibe ndalama amakhala kumudzi nawonso amakhala akutsatira zoyenera tsikulo lisadetsedwe 
  nanga wina akaphonyetsa kupha chiweto chodwala zimakhala pamenepo nsembe imeneyotu siyilandiridwa ndiyodetsedwa ndiyosayenera kuperekedwa kwa mulungu zonse munthu amayenera kukumbuka iyi nyengo yoyera yoyenera kuyeretsedwa 
  nanga aja amakhala akuimbawa amatinji amene aja sakhala akuimba nyimbo amakhala akupemphera pemphero lomwe mngelo gabriel ankanena akudzapereka nkhosa yomwe abrahamu adasinthitsa mwana yemwe adakonzeka kukamupereka nsembe pemphero lake limati mulungu wamkulu palibe ofanana naye ndiye tate basi 
  nanga ochepekedwa ndalama sizingatheke kugula yophaipha nkugawa ayi sizingatheke pamafunika kupha ndithu kugula kugawa yophaipha ndiye sikhalanso idi sadaka umayenera kupha tsiku lenilenilo masiku atatu otsatira kupanda apo imeneyonso sadaka odati idi ayi 
  ndiye mwati zidayamba liti zidayamba kalekale ya abrahamu pomwe mulungu adamuuza mwezi wa nambala 9 kuyambira 1 tsiku la nambala 10 kuzichitika mwambo oterewu kuchoka abrahamu aneneri onse omwe ankabwera kufikila muhammad amatsatira zimenezi ndiye asilamu onse amayenera
Label: RELIGION

Text:
ana avala umasiye   makolo akali moyo ya nkhomaliro yakwana pamsika wa manje mumzinda wa blantyre ambiri akudya nsima pamene akusaka chakudya 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kuponya maso patali pali ana atatu fakili wa zaka 8 pemphero 7 yamikani 4 pemphero lawo nkuti apeze chakudya anawa aima mpanda wa mfumu misesa 
  tipemphe mango tilibe chakudya adatero fakili uku akutonthoza yamikani amene akulira chomukaniza kutoleza makoko mango 
  uwu ndiye umasiye omwe anawa auvala makolo moyo zonsezo zikuchitika makolowo sakumwetsana madzi kumenyana kwa njobvu wovutika udzu 
  fakili akulephera kufotokoza bwinobwino chomwe chidachitika ayambe moyo wovutika choncho 
  fakili kumanja abale ake yamikani pemphero amayi sakutifuna ababa adachoka pena amatisaka adatero 
  mfumu misesa ikuti anawa si achilendo mdera lake 
  gulupuyu akuti patha mwezi anawo akungoyendayenda mdera lake kwanga agona masiku awiri adatero 
  uko atawathyolera mango azikukuta misesa adati banja la makolo anawo lidatha nthawiyo anawo akhala akuzunzika 
  ndidawaitana onse tikambirane zidakanika mkazi akuti adapeza banja lina sangasunge anawa pamene bamboyo chidwi chowasunga akuti sangathe alibe pokhala ntchito idatha adatero misesa 
  lolemba msangulutso udakumana wa anawa bamboyo dave singano adati mtima wosunga anawo nawo sangathe alibe thandizo 
  zikundiwawa anawa akuzunzika komabe palibe chomwe ndingachite ndilibe thandizo ndilibenso pogona ndiye ndiwatenge akagona potani adatero singano 
  bamboyu adati patha zaka chisiyirane mkazi adati adathetsa banja lake pomuganizira mkaziyo akumuyenda njomba 
  panthawiyo ndinkagwira ntchito ya ulonda ndiye adanditsina khutu ndikachoka kukumabwera mwamuna mnyumbamo nditakambirana mkazi wanga sitidamvane banja lidatha adatero 
  singano akuti adagwirizana mkazi amfumu anawo akakhala mkaziyo azipereka thandizo 
  panthawiyo zidachitika momwemo kungotha miyezi yochepa adasintha pamene adati sangakwanitse anawo poti wapeza mwamuna wina 
  ndidakhala anawo komabe nanenso zidandisokonekera ntchito idatha adandichotsa palendi ndikadatani adatero singano 
  adati patha chaka chimodzi tsopano anawa akukhala wokha komabe ndikapeza thandizo ndimawasaka dzana lamulungu ndidawatenga ndidakagona nawo ku chilobwe kwa mnzanga adatero 
  naye mkazi wa bamboyu akuti adauza bwalo la mfumu misesa sangatenge anawo adakwatiwanso 
  adauza bwalo anawa sakuwatenga patsikulo adabwera mwamuna watsopanoyo nditamuitananso tidzakambirane sadabwere mpaka lero adatero misesa 
  gawo 60 loteteza ana limati kholo lolephera kusamala ana ake liyenera kunjatidwa 
  misesa akuti nkhaniyi idapita kupolisi apolisi adanjata bamboyo adamutulutsa tsiku lomwelo 
  womenyera ufulu wa ana kubungwe la centre for childrens affairs malawi moses busher adadzidzimuka nkhaniyo adati makolowa akuyenera kunjatidwa 
  adati bungwe lawo litengera nkhaniyo kukhoti la ana bungwe lomenyera ufulu wa ana nkhaniyo sitiyisiya mpaka anawa athandizidwe akuyenera kusunga anawo mosayangana wakwatiwa ayi bamboyo akuyenera kumawathandiza tifufuza ana amenewa athandizidwa adatero busher 
  atafunsidwa ndikololedwa anawa atengedwe banja lina kukawasunga ana busher adati ndizotheka pokhapokha ndondomeko itatsatidwa 
  poona makolo onse alipo zangochitika cholekerera zifukwa zotenga anawa ako sizikumveka adaonjeza 
  pamene mutu wa nkhaniyi ukufufuzidwa moyo wa anawo udakali pamavuto adzaoneni 
  kusukulu sapita pogona kubowo kwa uvuni ya njerwa mkalasi apo ayi apemphe pakhomo eni chakudya chawo mango misonga ya mzimbe akadya ndiye banja lina lawagawira
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
ayamikira boma kamba komanga opalamula ulamuliro wa dpp mabungwe osiyanasiyana ati sakuona vuto lililonse pamene omwe mboma lapitali akumangidwa apolisi kamba kowaganizira anapalamula milandu yosiyanasiyana mthawi ya ulamuliro wa chipani cha democratic progressive dpp chomwe padakalipano chinatuluka mboma 
 mwa omwe amangidwa chisale mwa omwe anapikisana nawo mpando wa uphungu wa nyumba ya malamulo mdera la kumpoto chakumadzulo kwa boma la phalombe kelvin jumbe wanena polankhula radio maria malawi mzinda wa blantyre 
 wati pakufunika omwe mmaudindo osiyanasiyana mboma azilemekeza malamulo kuchepetsa owononga chuma cha maka yomwe mmaudindo osiyanasiyana othandiza ntchito zotukula lino zikuza pamenenso magulu akudzudzula boma ati kamba komanga omwe mboma la chipani cha dpp zomwe akuganiza zikuchitika zifukwa za ndale
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
opezeka kumanda ayankha mlandu mmudzi mwa yesaya nkosi mfumu kwa inkosi chindi mboma la mzimba adadzidzimuka ataona galimoto yachilendo itaimitsidwa pamanda mmudzimo pomwe anayi adali chizimba kumandako 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi mneneri wa polisi mboma la mzimba gabriel chiona adatsimikiza za nkhaniyi ponena adanjata anayi omwe akuganiziridwa mlandu wokhala pamalo popanda chilolezo adakaonekera kubwalo la milandu la majisitireti lachinayi 20 august 
  chiona adati anthuwo koloboyi mwazembe wa zaka 35 wochokera mboma la chitipa esau simwimba wazaka 36 wochokeranso ku chitipa tenson mhone wa zaka 65 chrissy phiri wa zaka 73 onse mboma la mzimba 
  malinga chiona mwazembe simwimba alamulidwa kukakhala kundende kwa chaka chimodzi apereke chindapusa cha k90 000 atawapeza olakwa pamlandu wopezeka kumanda popanda chilolezo 
  phiri mhone adzalowanso mbwaloli sabata ino adzayankhe milandu yopezeka pamalo popanda chilolezo kuba mwachinyengo milandu yomwe aikana 
  chiona adati anthuwo adanjatidwa 13 august pomwe mfumu msipani nyirenda adauza apolisi za omwe adali kumanda mmudzimo 
  malinga chiona wina adaona galimo ya oganiziridwawo itaima kwa yaitali manda mmudzimo zomwe zidamuchititsa akanene za nkhaniyi kwa nyakwawa yemwe adatsina khutu apolisi 
  mmudzimo adawagwira oganiziridwawo panthawi yomwe amatuluka kumanda mwa oganiziridwawo adanyamula chithumwa adapezeka ndalama zokwana k700 000 adatero chiona 
  msangulutso utafunsa mwa oganiziridwawa phiri afokotokoze zomwe ankachitika kumandako adati amafuna chizimba cha bizinesi chithumwa chomwe adali nacho nchokawira ndalama 
  chithumwachi chimakawa ndalama muli njoka yomwe imakhala ikukawa anthuwa ndalamazo adatero phiri 
  phiri adati wina adagula njoka kwa singanga mhone yomwe imakawa ndalama njokayo idathawa adati njokayo itathawa adaganiza zokagula ina yomwe singangayo adati idali kumanda komwe adapezekako 
  khansala wa derali dan nkosi adathirira ndemanga za nkhaniyi ponena apolisi adabwera kwakwe kudzamutenga akaone zomwe zidachitikazo 
  ndidapeza atawagwira oganiziridwawo kupita nawo kwa mfumu msipani nyirenda komwe adafunsidwa zomwe adafotokoza amagulitsana chizimba pamtengo wa k700 000 chomwe tidawapeza nacho adatero nkosi kuuza msangulutso 
  mfumu msipani nyirenda sadathe kupezeka ayankhulepo pankhaniyi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
ana ofunika pobwezeretsa chilengedwe bt archdiocese arkdayosizi ya blantyre yati ana mpingowu ofunika kwambiri ntchito yobwezeretsa za chilengedwe 
 wachiwiri kwa mlembi wa za utumiki arkidayosiziyo peter kamtembe omwe alankhula lachisanu ku parish ya mtenje atatsogolera ana ntchito yobzala mitengo yomwe inatsogoleredwa ofesi ya mabungwe utumiki wa apapa ya pontifical mission societies pms arkdayosiziyi 
 maepiskopi katolika kuwonetsa kudzipereka kwawo posamalira chilengedwe kamtembe ati arkdayosiziyi yazindikira kufunika kogwiritsa ntchito ana achichepere pobwezeretsa za chilengedwe zomwe ati zithandiza anawa chikhalidwe chobwezeretsa kusamala za chilengedwe ku madera chaka chaka 
 mmau ake mwa aphunzitsi utumwi wa ana mparishi ya mtenje zita makunje ati achita chotheka kuonetsetsa anawa akusamalira mitengo yomwe abzala
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
kanema ya papa yabodza bishop tambala episkopi wa diocese ya zomba ambuye george desmond tambala wachenjeza akhristu mpingo wa katolika asakhulupilire omwe kanema yomwe ikuyenda makina internet yotanthauzira molakwika zomwe papa francisco adayankhula chaka cha 2014 
 tambala akungofuna kunyozetsa mpingo wathu ambuye tambala awuza radio maria malawi uthenga womwe adayankhula papa francisko udali wa chiyankhulo chachi taliana udali ofunira mafuno abwino mpingo wa katolika ku america 
 ati omwe atanthauzira kanemayu cholinga chofuna kunyozetsa mpingo wakatolika utsogoleri cholinganso choti akhristu mpingo wu apandukire mbusa wawoyu 
 ambuye tambala ati anthuwa osafunira zabwino mpingo wa katolika cholinga choti akhristu mpingo wa katolika adane mtsogoleri wawo
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
ulimi wa tomato kabichi nyemba wakolera alimi abebetsa ulimi wa tomato kabitchi nyemba mboma la ntcheu pamene ulimi wa mmadimba wachiwiri wayambika 
  boma la ntcheu lomwe lachita malire dedza balaka lili pafupifupi 700 000 tsopano malinga chiwerengero cha cha 2010 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc ambiri mwa anthuwa alimi ulimi wa nyemba tomato mbatata ya kachewere kholowa chimanga kabitchi mbewu zina ndizo amadalira kwambiri 
  madera tsangano mphepozinayi mozambique border kampepuza nsipe mulangeni lizulu kasinje ndiwo amene amatchuka kwambiri polima kugulitsa mbewuzi 
  akunenera mlangizi wamkulu mbomali annily msukwa chaka chinonso ulimiwu wabonga pafupifupi khomo lililonse latangwanika 
  panopa alimi akugulitsa kukonza minda yawo abzalemo mbewu zina adatero msukwa polankhula uchikumbe lachiwiri msabatayi 
  akuti ulimi wa kabitchi tomato nyemba panopa wafika pachimake tili otangwanika kulangiza alimi panopa ayambiretu kugwiragwira kudimba pamene ntchito yogulitsa zokolola ili mkati 
  alimi ambiri ayamba kukumba zitsime posakhalitsapa mitsinje imakhala yayamba kuphwa ndiye madzi amasowa ndiye madzi aphwa ulimi wamthirira umavuta nchifukwa chake ayambiratu kukumba zitsime adatero msukwa 
  kupatula kukumba zitsime msukwa akuti alimiwa akuwalangizanso ayambiretu kupanga manyowa zigwirane mbewu zomwe akufuna alime 
  malinga mlangiziyu chaka chino ulimi wa tomato kabitchi nyemba wachita kusiyanako chaka chatha 
  panopa alimi akukolola mbewu zomwe adabzala kumapeto mvula ndikulankhulamu alimiwa ayamba kale kulima zina za mthiriranso podzakolola zimenezi mvula idzakhalanso yayandikira kunotu kulibe yopuma adatsindika
Label: FARMING

Text:
akatswiri adzudzula opereka chitseka pakamwa kwa majaji akatswiri ndale ati zomwe zamveka okhudzidwa mlandu wa chisankho amafuna kupereka chiphuphu kwa ma jaji omwe akumva mlanduwu zomvetsa chisoni 
 akatswiriwa george phiri humphreys mvula ati kupereka chitseka pakamwa kwa oweruza adzagamule mokomera mbali imodzi posatengera umboni omwe bwalo la milandu lalandira chidzindikiro cha akudziwa sanapereke umboni wokwanira mlandu wawayipira 
 mvula zomvetsa chisoni zochititsa manyazi zikusonyeza kuwola kwa atsogoleri omwe tili nawo mdziko muno akuchita ndiye akudziwa olakwa mlanduwu anatero george phiri yemwe mphunzitsi wa zamalamulo sukulu ya ukachenjede ya livingstonia 
 naye mkhalakale ndale humphreys mvula zomvetsa chisoni zochititsa manyazi kwambiri amenewa maganizo oyipa upandu mtima wa usatana 
 ndemangazi zikudza pomwe zadziwika majaji akubwalo lalikulu la milandu omwe akumva mlandu wa chisankho akadandaula ku bungwe lothana katangale ziphuphu mdziko muno la anti corruption bureau acb pali omwe amafuna kuwapatsa ziphuphu adzagamule mlandu mowakondera
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mera yakhazikitsa ndondomeko zatsopano unduna woona za chilengedwe mphamvu za magetsi migodi wayamikira bungwe loona za mulingo wa mphamvu magetsi mdziko muno la malawi energy regulatory authority mera kamba ka ndondomeko zomwe limatsata pogwira ntchito zake zomwe ati zikuthandiza kupititsa patsogolo chuma cha lino 
 kumtsaira wayamikira bungwe la mera nduna undunawu binton kuntsaila anena lachinayi mzinda wa lilongwe pomwe bungwe la mera limakhazikitsa ndondomeko zomwe litsate pogwira ntchito zake kuyambira chaka chino mpaka chaka cha 2024 
 ndondomekozi zili mmagawo awiri ina yothandiza makasitomala omwe afuna thandizo ku bungweli customer service charter ina yomwe bungweli layikamo ma plan ake zaka zomwe zikubwerazi strategic plan pachingerezi 
 kumtsaila ati malamulo omwe bungweli linakhazikitsa posachedwapa okhudza zamagetsi athandiza omwe amagwiritsa ntchito magetsi azikhala otetezeka 
 chitukuko cha sichingapite patsogolo opanda mphamvu za magetsi ndondomeko yomwe yakhazikitsidwayi ithandiza kukonza mavuto omwe analipo sitikufuna zisakasa zama filling station zomwe amamanga pakatipa anatero kumtsaila 
 polankhulanso wapampando wa board ya bungweli bishop dr joseph bvumbwe ati ndondomeko yatsopanoyi yakonza zina zomwe sizidayende ndondomeko ya mmbuyomu 
 pali zina zina zomwe timadzudzulidwa sitikuchita panalibe ndondomeko zake zoyendetsera zimenezo tsopano takhazikitsa ndondomeko zomwe zizitsogolera bungwe lathu anatero bishop bvumbwe 
 ati kudzera ndondomekoyi ofuna kuyamba kugulitsa mafuta azipatsidwa chilolezo pakatha mwezi umodzi akawunikira kaye malo amene akufuna malo ake ochitira malndawo
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
dayosizi ya dedza iyamikira akhristu ake dayosizi ya mpingo wa katolika ya dedza yayamikira akhristu ake kamba kothandiza mwambo wa dinner and dance omwe dayosiziyi inakonza unachitikira ku sukulu ya new era mboma la ntcheu 
 yemwe akuyendetsa dayosizi ya dedza padakalipano monsignor chithonje malinga wa kuofesi yofalitsa nkhani dayosiziyo joseph billiat cholinga cha mwambowo chinali chofuna kupeza 5 million kwacha yomangira malo ogona atsikana ku parishi ya mtendere dayosiziyo 
 padakalipano ndalama zomwe zapezeka patsikuli sizinadziwike akuganiza ndalamyo yakwana anayerekezera 
 patsikuli panachitikanso mayere omwe pamapeto pake horris kasudze ogwira ntchito ku bungwe la chilungamo mtendere anapeza mphotho ya plasma screen apezanso mphotho zosiyanasiyana
Label: RELIGION

Text:
mtima pansi makuponi akubwera boma lati omwe chiyembekezo chawo chili pazipangizo zaulimi zotsika mtengo za sabuside asataye mtima achilimike kukonza mminda mwawo kaamba kakuti makuponi ogulira zipangizozi afika sabata ikudzayi lolemba 
  chilimbikitsochi chadza pomwe adali nkhawa mvula yayandikira madera yagwa kale mwa ndii tsogolo la makuponi ogulira zipangizo silimaoneka bwinobwino 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka fisp fertiliser and seed will be handled by private traders this year mvulayi yagwa mmadera mzigawo zonse kuyambira sabata zapitazo pomwe jijirijijiri mminda mwawo amadandaula mwina mwayi wogula zipangizozi ukhoza kudzafika mmera utakwinimbira 
  si zongoganiza ayi taziwonapo mmbuyomu pomwe zipangizo zikufunika kumisika kulibe makuponi sadafike ndiye umayamba ntchito nkudzakhumudwa pambuyo adatero ammon yesani bakulo mwa alimi omwe akuyembekezera kulandira nawo makuponi kwa chiseka mboma la lilongwe chaka chino 
  nduna ya zaulimi mthirira chitukuko cha madzi george chaponda wati nkhawayi njopanda mtsitsi kaamba koti mkati mwa sabata ikudzayi makuponi ayamba kufika azigawidwiratu 
  ndikunena makuponi adindidwa kale moti sabata yamawayi akhala akufika yomweyo azigawidwa ayambe kugula zipangizo sitikufuna munthu adzadandaule patsogolo ayi adatero chaponda 
  mndondomeko ya chaka chino muli kungapo komwe chaponda wati kuthandiza kupititsa patsogolo cholinga cha pologalamu ya sabuside 
  kwina mwa kusinthaku kukhazikitsa mitengo yatsopano ya makuponi kutsitsa chiwerengero cha omwe apindule mupologalamuyi kupereka kontirakiti kwa makampani abizinesi agulitse nawo zipangizozi 
  kubwera kwa makampani abizinesi kumodzi mwa komwe kuthandize kwambiri kupangitsa zipangizo zotsika mtengo zizipezeka cha mpikisano mitengo isanyanye poti azifuna kugulitsa adatero chaponda 
  mupologalamu ya chaka chino mtengo wa kuponi ya feteleza wokulitsa wobereketsa uli k15 000 pomwe mbewu za chimanga papaketi ya 5 kg kuponi yake ili k5 000 mbewu zamtundu wa nyemba zolemera 2 kg mpakana 3 kg kuponi yake ili k2 500 
  chaponda adati mitengoyi yomwe boma likuwonjezera mlimi osati mitengo yogulira kumsika 
  mwachitsanzo thumba la feteleza lili k18 000 ndiye boma laperekako k15 000 k3 000 yotsalayo apereke mlimi adatero chaponda 
  malingana malipoti zanyengo chaka chino mvula ikhoza kugwa moti unduna wa zamalimidwe mthirira chitukuko cha madzi ukulimbikitsa alimi alimbikire ntchito za mminda
Label: FARMING

Text:
moyo pachiswe ambiri akuzemba mankhwala otalikitsa moyo amati phukusi la moyo umadzisungira wekha kumene zikuloweraku zikuonetsa amalawi ambiri omwe pamndandanda wolandira mankhwala otalikitsa moyo ma arv akukwirira phukusi lawo pachulu cha aganga pozemba kulandira kumwa mankhwalawa 
  malingana zomwe tamvani yapeza kumgwirizano wa mabungwe olimbana kufala kwa kachilombo ka hiv komwe kamayambitsa matenda edzi 20 mwa 100 alionse oyenera kulandira mankhwalawa akuchita ukamberembere 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mankhwala otalikitsa moyo awa safuna kudukiza munthu akayamba kumwa wapampando wa mgwirizanowu maziko matemba wati ukamberemberewu chiphe kaamba koti otere sachedwa kugwidwa chipwirikiti cha matenda chitetezo cha mthupi mwawo chimatsika msanga 
  matemba adati kupatula kutsika kwa chitetezo cha mthupi omwe amati kuyamba kumwa mankhwalawa nkudukiza thupi lawo limapima kotero silimvanso mankhwala alionse omwe angalandire akamva 
  tili nkhawa kwambiri otere ndiwo amabwezeretsa chitukuko cha mmbuyo boma likuyesetsa kugula mankhwala ake azikhala yaitali thanzi nkumathawanso komwe kuli kusayamika adatero matemba 
  adati abambo ambiri omwe amakhala mmatauni ndiwo akuchulukira kuzemba mankhwalawa kaamba ka manyazi kuiwala udindo pamabanja lomwe 
  mafigala bungwe la malawi network of aids organisations manaso amasonyeza mdziko muno muli pafupifupi 850 000 omwe akuyenera kumalandira mankhwala otalikitsa moyo mwa anthuwa mmadera akumidzi ndimo ambiri amatsatira ndondomeko 
  wa manaso abigail dzimadzi adati gulu lina lomwe likuchulutsa ukamberembere achinyamata omwe safuna kuonekera kachilombo poopa angadzasowe mabanja mtsogolo 
  chiopsezo chachikulu chili poti munthu yemwe sakulandira mankhwala ndiye nkuthekera kwakukulu kofalitsa kachilombo ndiye achinyamata akuzemba zikutanthauza tikulimbana nkhondo yomwe tikumenyananso tokhatokha adatero dzimadzi 
  nduna ya zaumoyo dr peter kumpalume akuti nkhaniyi yomvetsa chisoni kaamba kakuti boma limafunitsitsa vutoli litatheratu mdziko muno poti mwa omwe limataya cha vutoli ofunika mipando yautsogoleri 
  auza tamvani zina amazemba kukalandira mankhwala kaamba ka momwe amalandiridwira kuchipatala unduna wa zaumoyo bungwe la manaso ati ichi nchozizira polingalira za moyo wa munthu 
  mpofunika nkhani ya chinsinsi cha odwala safuna kuonekera mtima wofuna kumalandira thandizo china malankhulidwe ogwira ntchito kuchipatala omwe amagwetsa ulesi adatero lucy banda wapampando wa gulu lophunzitsa kuyendera omwe kachilombo ka hiv ku senga bay komwe akuti abambo ambiri amazemba kulandira mankhwalawa nkumatangwanika usodzi 
  woyanganira nkhani za umoyo muunduna wa zaumoyo dr charles mwansambo wati ichi nchimodzi mwa zifukwa zomwe boma kudzera muundunawu lidakhazikitsa pologalamu yoti kuchipatala kuzikhala malo apadera oti azikalandirirako uphungu pankhani za edzi mankhwala otalikitsa moyo 
  panopa mzipatala zambiri muli malo apadera omwe amakalandirirako uphungu kuyezetsa magazi kulandira mankhwala otalikitsa moyo ndiye nkhani ya chisinsiyo idakonzedwa adatero mwansambo 
  adatinso boma lidakhazikitsa pologalamu ya ma 90 atatu 90 90 90 kufuna athe kuzindikira kufunika kwa ndondomeko ya mankhwala arv 
  ndondomekoyi imatanthauza 90 alionse 100 akudziwa momwe alili mthupi mwawo mwa 90 90 akulandira mankhwala otalikitsa moyo moyenerera 90 atetezedwa kukutenga kachilomboka 
  potsindika kufunika kolimbana matendawa naye sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo richard msowoya adapempha aphungu nyumbayi kupatula kudalira bajeti ya boma azikhala mapologalamu opezera zipangizo zomenyera nkhondoyi 
  pempholi adaliperekanso kwa akuluakulu mabungwe pamisonkhano yomwe nyumbayi idachititsa mwezi wa august wa aphungu amabungwe pankhani yolimbana matendawa mchigawo cha maiko kummwera kwa africa yomwe imadziwika sadc pf
Label: HEALTH

Text:

Text:

 poyankhula pambuyo msonkhano okhazikitsa komitiyi woyendetsa ntchito za dayosiziyi john chithonje ati cholinga chokhazikitsa komiti kugawana nzeru za momwe diayosiziyi ingalimbanirane muliri wu 
 nawo komitiyo chithonje komitiyi muli ochokera mmagawo osiyanasiyana zaumoyo zamaphunziro za utumiki mpingo atolankhani chithonje akufotokoza 
 tayika task force imeneyi igwire ntchito limodzi boma ipindurira akhristu ngakhalenso atsogoleri mpingo anatero chithonje 
 mmawu ake wapampando wa komitiyi robin ngalande omwenso oyanganira ntchito za umoyo dayosizi ya dedza ati athu onse amu dayosiziyo akuyenera kusatira njira zonse zomwe zikuperekedwa zopewera matendawa 
 tiwona dayosizi yathu mpingo ikutengapo mbali polimbana matenda amenewa sitisiyira boma lokha kulimbana matenda amenewa mmalo mwake tigwira nawo ntchito limodzi anatero ngalande

Text:
magufuli wati chiwerengero cha atsikana otenga mimba chakwera kwambiri ku tanzania wolemba sylvester kasitomu 9768 src="http://www.radiomaria.mw wp content uploads/2019/10 magufuli.jpg alt= width="537 height="358 />wauza apolisi amange opeereka mimba kwa atsikana apasukulu magufuli president wa la tanzania john pombe magufuli wati wokhudzidwa kaamba kakukula kwa chiwerengero cha atsikana omwe akutenga pathupi sukulu chomwe akuti chafika 2 hundred 29 chigawo chimodzi chokha cha dzikolo 
 president magufuli wati zomvetsa chisoni kwambiri azibambo sakuona kufunika kolimbikitsa maphunziro tsikana mdzikolo mmalo mwake akukhala patsogolo powononga tsogolo lawo 
 malinga bbc magufuli wadzudzula azibambo omwe akupezeka ku chigawo cha kuzambwe kwa dzikolo omwe akukhala patsogolo kwambiri kumagonana ansungwana omwe msukulu zosiyanasiayana mdzikolo 
 pamenepa president magufuli walamula asilikali adzikolo amange azibambo onse omwe apezeke olakwa popereka mimba kwa atsikana apasakulu 
 la tanzania limapereka maphunziro aulere kwa atsikana opezeka msukulu zosiyanasiayana mdzikolo

Text:

Text:
tcc imema alimi fodya kulembetsa bungwe loyanganira za malonda fodya mdziko muno la tobacco control commission tcc lati alimi fodya omwe sadalembetse nkulipira zitupa zawo alembetseretu akhale nawo mkaundula wa alimi fodya 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu chikalata chomwe bungweli latulutsa chati pofika mwezi wa june chaka chatha alimi 29 861 ndiwo adali atalembetsa nkulipira zitupa zawo 
  alimi ayenera kulembetsa mkaundula isanathe kutsika kwa chiwerengerochi kwapangitsa bungwe la tcc liwonjezere yomwe alimi angakalembetsere kulipira zitupa zawo zogulitsira fodya chaka chino mpaka 29 january 2016 
  malingana chiwerengero cha alimi omwe alembetsa kulipira ziphaso zawo taganiza zoonjezera yolembetsera kulipira alimi omwe sadatero akhale mpata alimi onse omwe sadalembetse kulipira ziphaso zawo apangiretu nyengo yoonjezerayi chatero chikalatacho 
  woyanganira za ubale wa wa bungweli makampani nthambi zina mark ndipita adati vutoli ladza kaamba ka zovuta zingapo zokhudza malonda fodya 
  tikuganiza mwina alimi akadali otangwanidwa nkhani zokhudza malonda chaka chatha zochitika zina zosiyanasiyana mudziwa mmene nkhani ya fodya imakhalira adatero ndipita 
  adati zinthu zili choncho si malonda fodya chaka chino asokonekera poti alimi fodya amayendera mlingo wa fodya omwe amapereka tcc umaonetsedwa chitupa 
  wa tcc albert changaya adauza nyuzipepala ya the nation ogula fodya akunja atsitsa mlingo wa fodya yemwe agule chaka chino kuchoka makilogalamu 192.6 miliyoni chaka chatha kufika 177 miliyoni 
  changaya sadafotokoze chomwe chapangitsa mlingowu utsike zikutanthauza atsitsa mlingo fodya zitupa za alimi pokakhomera 
  fodya mbewu yomwe la malawi limadalira kwambiri pachuma chake pakatipa malonda fodya akhala akukumana zokhoma makamaka ku bungwe la zaumoyo padziko lonse la world health organization who lomwe limachenjeza za wosuta fodya 
  malonda 2015 la malawi lidapeza ndalama zokwana k189 biliyoni kuchoka k205 biliyoni mmalonda mchaka cha 2014
Label: FARMING

Text:

Text:
akufuna wogwirizira ufumu achoke apepese mafumu mdziko muno agwirizana ganizo la mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda magulupu nyakwawa asiye kulandirira ndalama kubanki 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc banda adalankhula sabata yatha pasukulu ya nsumwa mboma la salima poyankha pempho la mfumu ndindi mafumu akuvutika pokalandirira ndalama kubanki 
  polandira banda ndindi adati ndondomeko yomwe idayambitsidwa mboma la chipani cha dpp adzikalandilira mswahala kubanki yazunza mafumuwa ponena ndalamayo imathera ulendo 
  apa banda adati nyakwawa magulupu asamakalandirirenso ndalama kubanki ponena ndondomeko yapoyamba ibwezeretsedwa 
  apa mafumuwa ati nkhaniyi iwathandiza ndalamayo samaiwona ubwino malinga nkuti komwe kuli mabanki komwe amakhala mtunda wautali 
  nyakwawa kapoti ya kwa t zilakoma mboma la nkhata bay yati mmudzimo kukafika kuboma komwe kuli mabanki mtunda omwe amalipira k2 000 kupita kubwera 
  mfumuyi yauza tamvani penanso akapita ndalamazo amakapeza zisadalowe 
  ndimalandira k2 500 ndimaononga k2 000 kusonyeza malipiro anga k500 apa tiyamike tizilandira kumudzi kuno idatero mfumuyo 
  gulupu chisinkha ya mboma la mulanje kwa t mabuka yati ya boma ili bolani ndalamazo adziwapatsadi 
  ndondomeko yapoyambayonso idali mavuto ake pomwe pena malipiro sitimalandira ganizoli nlabwino bola tizilandira adatero chisinkha 
  mtsogoleri wakale wa lino bingu wa mutharika ndiye adalamula wogwira ntchito mboma kuphatikiza mafumu adzikalandira malipiro kubanki
