Text:
kupitakufa mbiri yakale imeneyo matenda hiv edzi asokoneza miyambo ina mwambo wa kupitakufa womwe umapereka mphamvu kwa fisi akakonze maliro pocheza namfedwa kwa sabata ziwiri machezawo amachitika katatu patsiku cha matendawa kwabwera njira ya nanawa yomwe yazilalitsa mwambo wa kupitakufawu bobby kabango adali mboma la nsanje komwe adacheza mlembi wa nyakwawa masanzo kwa t mlolo 
  mkaka mwambo wa nanawa timangomwa mankhwala othamangitsa imfa tidziwane achimwene    chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka ndine joseph mkaka 
  kodi amfumu tawapeza   ayi iwowa adzukirira kudimba akuyembekezereka kubwerako madzulo ntchito yakula kumeneko 
  tidalire mutithandiza vuto lathu   musakaikenso ndine mlembi wa amfumuwo ndiye palibe chomwe sindikuchidziwa chokhudza mudzi uno miyambo yomwe timatsata 
  kodi mwambo wa kupitakufa ukuchitikabe kuno zikuchitika mobisa momwe matenda edzi aopseramu sungayerekeze kumachitabe mwambowu amabungwe akhala akufika kumemeza miyambo yoipa umenewu itheretu zipatso zake zikuonekadi 
  ndiye mukutani imfa ithawe pakhomo timagwiritsa mankhwala nanawa amene amathamangitsa imfa pakhomo kuno ambiri tikutsata zimenezi 
  nanawa nchiyani   mankhwala amene singanga pakhomo pamene pagwa maliro maka achibale amamwa mankhwalawo molandirana pakhomopo pamakhala 
  zimachitika yanji   maliro akachitika lero mawa timakaika ndiye timasweretsa tsiku limodzi pamene timasonkhana kudzasesa yosesa mpamene mwambo wa nanawa umachitika mungathe mwambowu iliyonse kaya masana madzulo 
  kodi mankhwalawa mumatemera mumadya   mankhwalawa pawiri amakhala madzi amawaika mkapu ndiye wachibale amalandirana mankhwalawo kumamwa pangono mpaka nonse achibale akukwaneni pamene mankhwala amawaika kudenga kwa nyumba yomwe mumagona malemuwo mumawasomeka kudenga mbali yomwe kuli khomo akamalowa mnyumbamo azigwira mankhwalawo 
  mukutanthauza wachibale amayenera amwe mankhwalawo   zimatero kumene nonse mumalandirana kumwa pangono basi kamodzi momapatsirana 
  nanga achibale amene sadafike pamwambowo mumawatani   achibale amene ya malirowo tsiku la kusesalo palibepo timawasungira mankhwalawo mankhwala ake amene tawasomeka kudenga aja tsiku lomwe akonza zodzafika pakhomopo timawalandira kuwatengera yomwe kudachitika malirowo ndiye pamene tikulowa mnyumbayo timawapatsa mankhwala aja agwire akangotero basi amabwezeretsa mankhwalawo kudengako 
  amachitanso china chiti palibe agwira mankhwalawo ndiye nawonso akonzedwa ku imfa yomwe idakangogwa pakhomopo 
  yomwe munkatsata mwambo wa kupitakufa zinkakhala maliro akachitika chonchi timapeza fisi apite yomwe kwachitika malirowo akacheze namfedwayo katatu patsiku zikavuta atha kumacheza nawo kawiri patsiku kwa sabata ziwiri fisiyu ntchito yake idali yoti achotse mzimu wa imfa womwe wakuta pakhomopo 
  mpaka katatu ndiye zidalikolikotu hahaha eeh amasangalala kwambiri zimenezi zidatha

Text:
pac ansah sakuwulura zomwe akambirana wolemba thokozani chapola oads/2019/10 pac ansah pic.jpg alt= width="770 height="462 />bungwe la pac jane ansah kutoletsa pambuyo mkumano wawo bungwe la public affairs committee pac lati lakhutira mkumano wapampando oyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno dr jane ansah omwe nawo lolemba mzinda wa blantyre 
 arch bishop thomas luke msusa yemwe akutsogolera bungweri zokambirana zobweretsa mtendere mdziko muno yemwe wanena kwa atolankhani atatha zokambirana zao dr jane ansa zomwe zinachitika ku ma ofesi bungwe la mec mdzinda wa blantyre 
 ambuye msusa ati padakali gawo loyamba la zokambilanazi layenda alowa gawo lachiwiri lomwe akhalenso akukambirana mtsogoleri wa lino professor peter muthalika lazarus chakwera mtsogoleri wa chipani cha mcp ndinso wa chipani cha utm saulos chilima kuphatikizapo bungwe la hdrc magulu okhuzidwa mpungwempungwe wa ndale omwe uli mdziko muno 
 poyankhapo okonzeka kutula udindo pansi potsatira zokambiranazi dr ansah kumbari yawo sangayankhepo kathu okhutira momwe zokambirana zawo bungwe pac zayendera
Label: POLITICS

Text:
kanthu nkhama alimi akuchita kuthirira fodya kudula kwa mvula kutionetsa zachilendo mpaka alimi kuthirira mminda ya fodya mwina angaphulepo kena kake alimi ochenjera akuyesetsa kupulumutsa mbewu zawo pothirira ntchitoyi ili yowawa yotenga steven pembamoyo adacheza lingilirani chikhwaya mwa alimi omwe akuchita kuthirira fodya kumunda aphulepo kanthu mvula ikapanda chilungamo 
  ndikudziweni 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu chikhwaya zikavute kumsika ndine lingilirani chikhwaya mlimi wochokera mdera la nkhoma mboma la lilongwe 
  mumalima chiyani ndimalima mbewu zosiyanasiyana malingana nkuti masiku ano ntchito ya ulimi njosapanganika ukhoza kudalira mbewu imodzi nkugwa nayo osakolola kanthu ndiye potengera upangiri wa alangizi ndimangobzala mbewu zosiyanasiyana 
  ulimi wanu chaka chino ukuyenda kunena zoona zinthu zatembenuka tayamba mantha tsopano kodi chikutilonda nchiyani chaka chatha mvula sidalongosoke sitidakolole ndiye pomwe timaona mwina chaka chino tipeza polirira zikuonekanso mavuto ankira mtsogolo 
  ndiye mwangokhala basi nkumadikira chakudza ayi tikuyesetsa njira iyi iyo mwina mbewu zina zipulumuke mminda ina tili kale bwinoko tidatchingira mminda ina ya fodya tikuchita kuthirira ndithu ndiwo zamasamba kudimba kuchitira nanga tachoka kale kutali taononga ndalama mphamvu ndiye tikagwere mphwayi kuli kungodzipereka basi 
  ndiye momwe umakhalira munda wa fodya muja ntchito yake imakhala tidazolowera nkale tidayamba ulimi wa fodya ululu tikuudziwa kale tidauzolowera umatheka kugwira ntchito yakalavulagaga chaka chonse nkukakhumudwira kokagulitsa ndiye kuli ulimbe nazo zikamadzavuta kumsika nkhani ina 
  ndiye zimakhala munda wanga uli mtsinje omwe alimi kuno timagwiritsa ntchito ya mthirira tili sikimu yomwe akatswiri adatiphunzitsa kakololedwe ka madzi mvula itangoyamba muja tidakololapo madzi madzi amenewo omwe tikugwiritsa ntchito kumunsi kwa mtsinje womwe timadalirawo tidayamba tautseka madzi asamapite ambiri kupangira mwina mvula ikhoza kutenga isadayambirenso 
  ndikufuna ndimve za mathiriridwewo potitu munda wa fodya simasewera 
  sitidzipanikiza kwambiri ayi timatengako gawo lina lero nkuthirira kenako mawa mbali ina choncho zina tikakhala timakathirira mbali ina mmawa madzulonso nkukathirira mbali ina kungofuna kuonetsetsa pomwe mvula izidzabwereranso fodya adzakhale 
  muli chiyembekezo chanji fodya wanu nkhawa ilipo komabe ndikayerekeza momwe zikuonekera mminda ya mwina fodya wanga akhoza kudzakhala nawo mgulu la fodya wochititsa kaso kuli dzuwa chonchi ayi masamba ake akuoneka mphamvu moti mvula itangoti lero yagwa yambiri pakhoza kudzuka fodya 
  chaka chatha mvula idachita chimodzimodzi kugwa nyengo yochepa nkudula kenako nkudzagobwera moononga pemphero lanu nlotani ayi ndithu pemphero langa nloti zinthu zisakhale choncho chaka chino mulungu akadatichitira chifundo chaka chatha tidaona zowawa kwambiri mbewu zambiri zidakokoloka madzi mvula osefukira moti chaka chino kuli mavuto makamaka pachakudya ndiye timati mwina chaka chino tingaoneko chozizwitsa
Label: FARMING

Text:
womuganizira kutaya khanda lake anjatidwa okhala mdera la hilltop mmzinda wa mzuzu adadzidzimuka lamulungu lapitali wina wapabanja wochokera mderali atadziwika adataya mwana mchimbudzi chokumba 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc malinga ozungulira nyumba ya taona chonga wochokera mmudzi mwa mzukuchonga mboma la mzimba anthuwo adadabwa chimodzi mwa zimbudzi za pamalowa chikutulutsa fungo lodabwitsa 
  malo ake awa mwa okhala ku hilltop kusonyeza dzenje la chimbudzi chomwe mudatayidwa khandalo fungoli linatidabwitsa pokumbukira chonga adali pathupi pomwe panasowa tinadziwitsa mfumu afufuze adatero mwa anthuwo 
  adati mphekesera zili ponseponse mayiyo adakangana mwamuna yemwe bizinesi ya kabaza 
  akuti mwamuna amati pathupipo si pake mkaziyo azipita kwa mwini pathupipo adatero 
  mkazi wa mfumu chikundura ya deralo adati amayi anayamba kumudabwa mnzawoyo ataona pathupi pomwe adali napo pasowa alibe khanda 
  titamuona alibe pathupi tili kumadzi tidadabwa kumufunsa komwe wasiya khanda lake adakanitsitsa adalibe pathupi kunali kunenepa chabe adatero chikundura 
  adati apo pomwe adadziwitsa akuluakulu mnzawoyo wataya khanda 
  nawo apolisi mumzindawu atsimikiza akusunga mchitolokosi chonga wa zaka 28 pomuganizira adataya mwana mchimbudzi 
  malinga mneneri wa polisi ya mzuzu martin bwanali chonga yemwe ana asanu wina wakubere wa chaka miyezi 7 adauza apolisi adagwetsera chinthu mchimbudzimo atapita kokadzithandiza 
  bwanali adati chonga aonekera kubwalo la milandu masiku akubwerawa kukayankha mlandu wobisa pathupi 
  adati mayiyo adamutengera kuchipatala cha mzuzu central akamuyeze ngatidi adali pathupi zotsatira zidali zisadadziwike pomwe tinkasindikiza nkhaniyi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
george nyirenda za flames waiwalako zambiri zakhala zikulankhulidwa za george nyirenda amene akusewera caps united mdziko la zimbabwe atengedwe ku flames mwini wakhalanso akufunitsitsa ataitanidwa makochi flames amangomupatsa nkhongo bobby kabango adacheza naye za mphekesera yomwe yamveka akubwera kudzasewerera bullets nyirenda ndingasewere bullets basi moyo uli ku caps   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi zonse tayale madala nditangofika kumene ndiye zidatenga ndizolowere momwe mpira wawo amasewerera 
  kodi udapita liti kumeneko mudali may chaka chatha caps idandipeza pamene ndidali kukampu ya flames ndidabwera kuno padali kusamvana bullets timu yomwe ndimasewerera kumudziko malinga utsogoleri womwe udalipo panthawiyo 
  tikumva akuchotsa usamasewerenso kumbuyo wabwera pakati chachitika nchiyani   zoona panopa tili kochi wina wochokera ku england ndiye wabwera nzeru zake ndikusewera moti ndachinya kale zigoli ziwiri 
  osati umadzibayanso kumbuyoko hahaha ayi si choncho adangondikhulupirira ndingachite zakupsa kusiyana amene amasewera pakatiwo 
  pali mphekesera ku malawi kuno ukubwera kudzasewera mtimu yako yakale kodi zoona mphekesera chabe ndili kuno kaye zinthu zikuyendanso nditakhala ndabwera ku malawiko ndiyedi palibe timu yomwe ndingasewere bullets basi ndidzafa ndikusewerera timuyi yamagazi 
  wakhala ukulankhulapo za kusiyidwa kwako ku flames amati ukuyenera kutengedwa sizili choncho kodi vuto lili pati sindikudziwa vuto nchiyani ndilibe vuto kusewerera timuyi dziwani za flames panopa si mbali yanganso kwabwino ndizingopanga za kalabu basi za flames panopa ayi 
  kodi wakhumudwa ayi ndangosankha ndizichita za kalabu basi 
  pomaliza tikumudziwa george rasta wodya zamasamba kumeneko mwasintha kulikonse rasta rasta anandipatsa dzina jah love cholimba mtima za chirasta
Label: SPORTS

Text:
kupewa nsabwe za mfodya nsabwe za mufodya gwero limodzi lomwe limachititsa fodya avute malonda kumsika vutoli likagwera mlimi chaka chimenecho amalirira kuutsi kaamba koti ogula sadagule fodyayo pamitengo yolira ndiye wabwezedwa 
  malingana katswiri wa zafodya vutoli lopeweka kapewedwe kake nkosabowola mthumba poyerekeza zomwe zimalowa pofuna kupulumutsa fodya nsabwezo zikalowa 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka wa bungwe la alimi fodya la tobacco association of malawi tama reuben maigwa wauza uchikumbe vuto lalikulu la nsabwe za mufodya lakuti zimateketa fodya nkukhala wagayidwa kale ndiye ukapita kumsika ogula sachita naye chidwi 
  ogula fodya amayangana makulidwe kukhuthala kwa masamba fodya osati ufa wa fodya ayi ndiye amati akatsegula belo nkuonamo ufa amaona fodya wachinyengo amamubweza zikatero ndiye chaka chimenecho zadapo adatero maigwa 
  adati yopewa vuto la nsabwe za mufodya ino poti ikayambika ntchito yothyola fodya mpata umasowa zimathandiza nsabwezo zisakhale mpata wokwanira oswana 
  mkuluyu adati zambiri gwero la nsabwezi limakhala zipangizo zomwe zidagwiritsidwa ntchito chaka chinzakecho zomwe zidakhudzidwa nsabwe malo osungiramo fodya panthawi yoyembekezera kupita kumsika 
  tikunena alimi adayamba kale kusonkhanitsa zipangizo ziguduli zodindira mabelo ulusi wosokera zipangizo zina zimenezi ndizo zimatha kuyambitsa nsabwe komwe zidagwira ntchito mmbuyomo kudali vuto la nsabwe 
  kupewa kwake nkosavuta choyenera nkuchapa zipangizo zoterezi bwinobwino nkupopera mankhwala usadasunge pamalo abwino kudikira ntchito yake adatero maigwa 
  adati kuchapa kupopera kokha sikukwanira malo osungiramowo sali osamalika nsabwezo zina zimatsakamira mmakoma ndiye zipangizo zitasamalidwa nkusungidwa mmalo omwe muli nsabwe palibe chomwe chachitika 
  chaka chilichonse malonda fodya akatha timayenera kutsuka makoma onse momwe timasungiramo fodya wathu pansi pomwe nkupoperamo makhwala tizilombo nsabwe tife adatero maigwa 
  adati alimi ambiri amagwa mmavuto nsabwe za fodya kaamba kolekerera nkumaganiza idakalipo kenako akaona zawakoka manja amayamba zachidule ntchito nkumaonongeka 
  fodyatu sachedwa posachedwapa ayamba kuthyola ndiye ikangofika imeneyi mpata umasoweratu umati mmawa uli kothyola masana ukusoka uku ukupachika mmikangala ndiye zoti ungapeze mpata wokachapa ziguduli kukakonza mosungira mpovuta adatero katswiriyu 
  maigwa adatiso yomwe ino ndiye yofunika kuyambapo kukonza zigafa zidaonongeka palibiretu pomwe fodya azidzachoka kumunda kubwera kumudzi adzakhale pofikira osati zomwe zopachika fodya mkhitchini mophikira chosowa malo osungiramo fodya

Text:
nkhanza zapolisi zanyanya ophunzira 24 kusukulu za ukachenjede apereka maina ku bungwe la maloya la malawi law society mls za nkhanza zimene achitiridwa panthawi yomwe zionetsero zokwiya kukwera mtengo kwa fizi 
  adachita mls itawapempha apereke mainawo potsatira nkhanza zimene apolisi adachitira ophunzirawo amene akwiya fizi zakwera k275 000 kufika k400 000 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka apolisi kuponda mwana akufuna kutolera mabotolo ku kamuzu stadium nkhanzazo zidafika pambalambanda kwambiri atajambula vidiyo wapolisi wina ataomba khofi wophunzira wa chaka cha chinayi mayankho kapito yemwe mwana wa wa bungwe loona zaufulu wa ogula la consumers association of malawi cama john kapito kapito wati asumira apolisiwo 
  mtsogoleri wa ophunzira ku chancellor college ayuba james adatsimikiza pofika lachitatu chiwerengero cha ophunzira omwe adapereka maina adali atafika 24 
  talandiradi mainawo tikudziwa chiwerengero chayenera chokwera kwambiri ambiri apitapita mmakwawo nkovuta uthengawu uwafikire adatero james

  nditawafunsa chiyani amamenyera anthuwo adandikuta nditawauza ndine wakuti sadalabadire adandionongeranso galimoto langa adatero taulo

  amene tidacheza nawo ku lilongwe nawo adasimba za nkhanza za apolisi gift potani wa kumsika wa ku area 24 andrew mwenye wa mumsika wa tsoka alinafe matthias wa ku area 22 adanena apolisi akumanga kuwakwapula kumene opanda chenicheni 
  zina amapeza malo omwera masanasana nkuwaphaphalitsa kutengedwa osapatsidwa mpata wofotokoza zomwe akuchita adatero potani 
  si ana sukulu amalawi wamba amene akudandaula za nkhanzazi nawo amayi oyendayenda ati amakumana nkhanza za apolisi akagwidwa pantchito yawoyi 
  mneneri wa bungwe loyimilira amaiwa zinenani majawa adati pakati apolisi pali chichewa choti dzipulumutse kutanthauza wogwidwayo apereke kena kake akakhala mzimai asinthitse thupi lake ufulu 
  apolisi akatigwira vakabu amati dzipulumutse wekha kutanthauza akufuna ndalama palibe amamumenya kumugona mzimai popanda chitetezo chilichonse ndiye poti wapolisi kokanena kumasowa adatero majawa 
  wa bungwe la zaufulu la centre for human rights and rehabilitation chrr timothy mtambo adati apolisi akadaunika mofatsa magwiridwe antchito pomwe akuteteza miyoyo katundu asamaphwanye ufulu wa

Text:
mabungwe athotha galu wakuda ku mj mboma la mulanje omwe adakhudzidwa njala kaamba ka ngozi za kusefukira kwa madzi chilala kumayambiriro chaka chino akuombera kuphazi mabungwe angapo atamva pempho lawo la kufunika kwa chakudya apulumutse miyoyo yawo ku njala 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mabungwe oxfam save the children goal malawi concern universal irish aid ndiwo adachita chamuna posonkha ndalama zoposa k7 biliyoni zomwe zathandiza galu wakuda yemwe adadutsa mbomali ayambe kuona msana wa njira

  kazembe wa la norway ku malawi kikkan haugen adati pofuna kuonetsetsa palibe chinyengo ndondomeko yothandiza anthuwa mgwirizano wawo wasankha kampani ya foni zammanja ya airtel azilandira chithandizo cha ndalama zogulira chimanga mafuta ophikira nyemba nandolo kudzera ku kampaniyi 
  wogwirizira udindo wa wa kampani ya airtel charles kamoto adati kampani yawo ithandizira ndondomekoyi kudzera airtel money

  ndiye chomwe tapanga nchoti tamutsekulira akaunti ya airtel money yomwe azilandirirako ndalamayo zikalowa atha kupita kwa maejenti amene mboma lomwelino kukatenga ndalamazo zokagulira chakudya adatero kamoto

Text:
nrb ionjezera masiku otengera zitupa ntchito yopereka zitupa za unzika kwa mmaboma 15 mdziko muno imene imayenera kutha dzulo ayionjezera mboma la blantyre mneneri wa bungwe limene likuyendetsa ntchitoyi watero 
  maboma onse chigawo chapakati blantyre mwanza neno nsanje chiradzulu ndiwo akulandira zitupazo mgawo lachiwiri malinga mneneri wa bungwe la national registration bureau nrb norman fulatira adati bungwelo laonjezera sabata imodzi anthuwo atenge zitupa zawo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka fulatira lachinayi adati tionjezera sabata imodzi alandire ziphaso zawo akhalebe asadatenge zitupa zawo akatengera ziphaso zawo ku ofesi ya dc 
  fulatira wati amene satenga zitupazo pakutha kwa kuonjezerako azikatengera zitupazo kuofesi ya dc wa boma lawo 
  kafukufuku wa tamvani mumzinda wa blantyre lachinayi adavumbulutsa unyinji wa akulimbirana kutenga zitupa amene tidacheza nawo adati ntchitoyi ayionjezere 
  patrick sandramu yemwe adalembetsa kusukulu ya pulaimale ya makata ku ndirande mumzindawo adati gulu likumakhala kotenga zitupako nchiletso 
  kufika lero lachinayi ambiri sanatenge zitupa zawo gulu lake losanena ndidachita mwayi ndimadziwana mwa amene akugawa ziphaso ndidamuuza akachipeza changa andisungire adatero mkuluyo 
  maxwell majawa lachinayi adati adati adayendera masiku angapo kusukulu ya zingwangwa atenge chitupa chake 
  mbali imene amayendetsa aphunzitsi sizimavuta kumene kumakhala wamba ndiye mavuto analipo zoti tizipita kukatenga zitupa motsatira maina athu nazo zidatipomboneza ndidayendera masiku atatu ndipeze chitupa adatero majawa 
  roselyne manjawira amene adalembetsa kusukulu ya pulaimale ya katete ku chirimba adati pofika lachinayi adali asanatenge chitupa chake cha khamu ameyenera kupita kuntchito 
  akadaonjezera masiku akanena tizikatengera kwa dc kukakhala chipwilikiti choopsa kuposa momwe zilili mmaderamu adatero 
  zili choncho madera makamaka amene kulibe ambiri amatenga mosavuta 
  gawoli likatha lisamukira mboma la thyolo chiradzulu mulanje 
  ndondomeko yopereka ziphasozi idayamba october chaka chatha ikuyembekezereka kutha march chaka chino

Text:
jb achotsa kachali ku ec mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda wabweza moto wachotsa wachiwiri khumbo kachali pampando woyanganira bungwe la chisankho la electoral commission ec 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zadza atahauka ponena kusankhidwa kwa kachali paudindowo kukadachititsa ec idzayendetse chisankho cha 2014 mokondera chipani cha pp banda adaika kachali paudindowo sabata ziwiri zapitazo pomwe amasankha nduna zatsopano 
  polengeza za maganizoko nduna yofalitsa nkhani moses kunkuyu adati banda sakuona zidalakwika kachali pampandowo amangomupatsa mphamvu zomwe mtsogoleri wadziko nazo malinga ndime 6 ya malamulo oyendetsera chisankho wamvera zofuna za wachotsa kachali 
  ndimeyo imanena bungwe la ec liyenera kufotokoza momwe zinthu zikuyendera kwa mtsogoleri wa lino woimira milandu wapona kita adati mtsogoleri wa linonso amapatsidwa mphamvu zouza agwire ntchito zina zomwe akadagwira 
  mphunzitsi wa za malamulo kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college dr mwiza nkhata adati mtsogoleri wa lino sakadasiira ntchitoyo kwa wachiwiri 
  bungwe loyendetsa chisankho liyenera kuima palokha ndiye zitheka wina amene akukhudzidwa chisankho aziliyanganira adatero nkhata 
  mawuwa akuphera mphongo zomwe akadaulo zamalamulo adanena mmbuyomu wa bungwe la oimira pamlandu john gift mwakhwawa wa ec maxon mbendera azipani zina
Label: POLITICS

Text:
parishi ya kausi ichita chaka cha nkhoswe yake wolemba sylvester kasitomu akhristu muparish ya kausi dayosizi ya mangochi awapempha akhale achikondi nkhoswe zawo anna joakimu woyera amaonetsa pansi 
 vicar general wa dayosiziyi frank chingale omwe anena pambuyo mwambo wamisa yokumbukura nkhoswe za parishiyi zomwe ana joakimu woyera 
 ati anna joackim woyera banja la chikondi loopa mulungu kotero akhristu parishiyi nawonso akuyenera kuonetsa chikondi pakati pawo 
 nkhoswe za parishi yanu zinali zachikondi inunso muonetse chikondi pakati panu pokonda kuthandizana kupephererana 
 mwapadera ndithokoze akhristu nonse amene mwatenga nawo gawo pamwambowu uchitike mwaika ndalama mapemphero amene ndipempha mulungu odziwa kupereka awonjezere pomwe mwachotsa anatero chingale 
 mwazina bambowa pamene akkhristu asonkhana miyambo iyi zimasonyeza umodzi ubale omwe ulipo pakati pawo mpingo wakatolika umakondwererea anna joakimu woyera 26 july chaka chilichonse lomwe chaka linali lachisanu lapitali parishiyi yachita chakachi la mulungu 28 july 2019
Label: RELIGION

Text:
apm akuzemba pac akatswiri ndale othirira ndemanga ndale mdziko muno ati zimene mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika wachita posakumana bungwe la public affairs committee pac amve zomwe msonkhano wawo udagwirizana za mmene zinthu zilili mdziko muno zikuonetsa mtsogoleriyu akuzengereza dala nkhaniyi izizire kuiwalika 
  aphunzitsi awiri kusukulu ya ukachenjende ya chancellor college omwenso anamatetule nkhani za ndale boniface dulani joseph chunga anena msabatayi pothirapo ndemanga kulephereka kwa mkhumano wa akuluakulu bungweli mtsogoleriyu 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka akuti mpata sakuupeza mutharika kawiri konse mutharika wasintha yokumanirana akuluakulu pac ponena wotanganidwa ntchito zina 
  poyankha pac imayembekezera kukumana mutharika 25 february zidakanika boma lidati mkhumanowu uchitika 29 march zomwenso zalephereka 
  wa bungweli la pac robert phiri wati adafika mumzinda wa blantyre akumane mutharika mwadzidzidzi adangomva nkhumanoyo yalephereka 
  zachititsa pac ilephere kufotokozera mutharika zomwe msonkhano wawo womwe udachitika 17 february chaka chino udagwirizana 
  akadaulowa akuganiza mutharika akungozemba chabe osati watanganidwa ati sizingachitire ubwino amene akuyembekezera mayankho zomwe zikukhudza amalawi 
  dulani adati zomwe akuchita mutharika kuzemba chabe ncholinga choti nkhani zomwe zidatuluka ku pac zizizire kuiwalika 
  akungozemba chabe inde pulezidenti amakhala wotangwanika sindikukhulupirira angalephere kupeza yokumana pac 
  chomwe tingadziwe lino lili pamavuto aakulu kotero tikuyenera kupeza mayankho mwachangu zomwe bungwe la pac lidachita kumva maganizo kwa osiyanasiyana adatero dulani 
  mneneri wa boma jappie mhango wati si zoona mutharika akuzemba mtsogoleriyu amakhala wotanganidwa ntchito zambiri 
  pulezidenti amayeneradi kukumana pac sizidatheke cha nkhumano zinazo zomwe akuyenera akakhalepo si akuthawa ayi adatero mhango 
  mhango wati tsiku lomwe akumane akuluakulu pac awadziwitsa akuluakuluwa zichitika mutharika akakhala mpata wotero 
  kadaulo wina pandale ku chancellor college joseph chunga wati mutharika yambiri yomwe angakwanitse kukumana pac zikungoonetsa sakufuna 
  ndikuganiza mtsogoleriyu akungofuna kugula akonze zomwe pac idakambirana ncholinga choti pamene azikumana nawo akhale atakonza zinthu zina adatero chunga 
  chunga watinso mutharika adauzidwa kale akuluakulu boma amene adali nawo pamsonkhanowo za zomwe adakambirana 
  si sakudziwa zomwe zidakambidwa zidali mmanyuzipepala nduna zake zikuyenera zidamufotokozera komabe zili chonchi akuyenera kukumana pac oima paokha adaonjeza 
  msonkhano wa pac mwa zina udagwirizana mutharika akonze zinthu kusowa kwa chimanga zinanso zomwe adagwirizana nkuti boma lichotse zinthu zina zomwe likuchita pofuna kupeza mavoti kukweza mafumu pologalamu yomangira nyumba ya cement and malata subsidy

Text:
kusanthula ntchito ya fisi miyambo ya makolo yambiri ina akuti siyofunika kupitirira ikuthandizira kufalitsa kachilombo koyambitsa matenda edzi sabata yathayi mafumu adali msonkhano mumzinda wa lilongwe wokambirana za miyambo umodzi mwa miyambo yomwe ikukanidwa mwambo wa fisi omwe ambiri amausokoneza mwambo wa kusasafumbi steven pembamoyo adacheza senior chief lukwa wa ku kasungu zamwambowu adacheza motere lukwa mafumu tikuthana miyamboyi gogo tandimasuleni eti mwambo wa fisi mwambo wanji   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka pamwambowu munthu amalembedwa ganyu yobereka ana mnyumba ya munthu yemwe zikumukanika imakhala ganyu munthu wagula galimoto satha kuyendetsa ndiye amalemba munthu yemwe amatha kuyendetsa azimuyendetsera nkumulipira 
  basi nanga fisi uja amalowa mnyumba yoti mwini wamwalira asungwana akuchoka kutsimba uti choyamba ndikonze amene uja si fisi uja mwambo wa kuchotsafumbi fisi pokhapokha wina akulephera kubereka ana mnyumba ndiye pofuna asachite manyazi mmudzi amalemba fisi amuberekere mwana ana zimakhala zachinsinsi zongodziwa fisiyo basi 
  nanga kusasafumbi nkutani ndikufunatu ndimvetsetse kusasafumbi kuli pangapo zina mwamuna akamwalira mnyumbamo mumabwera mwamuna wina kudzagona mai osiyidwayo akuti kugoneka mzimu wa malemuyo zina mkazi akachotsa pakati anamwali akamachoka kutsimba amatenga mwamuna woti agonane nawo pokhulupirira kutero ndiye ayendetsa mwambo momwe uyenera kukhalira 
  malipiro ake amakhala chiyani zimatengera pangano la awiriwo amatha kulipirana mbuzi nkhuku mwinanso ndalama apa palibe dipo lenileni lokhazikika nzachinsinsi moti ozidziwa amakhala okhawo okhudzidwa 
  nanga pambuyo pake fisi atatembenuka akufuna ana ake zingathe bwa ichi nchibwana chachikulu potengera momwe mwambowu umayendera akagwira ntchito pathupi nkuoneka akangolandira zake basi kwatha zammbuyo muno nza eni nyumbayo masewera akuluakulu akhoza kugwirapo ntchito woteroyo waphwanya mwambo wachinsinsi omwe adavomereza yekha 
  boma mabungwe amati miyambo yotereyi yoipa makamaka nkubwera kwa kachilombo koyambitsa matenda edzi muti zimenezo nzoona zokhazokha moti mafumu kuyambira ku chitipa mpaka ku nsanje nkhotakota mpaka mchinji tidagwirizana chimodzi mmadera mwathu miyamboyi isamachitike tidachita dala omwe amazunzika kwambiri amai asungwana kumatheka kusasafumbi asungwana amai angapo choncho matenda edzi sangathe ayi 
  nanga poti mwambo mwambo mungathe kuwaletseratu mfumu siyilephera makamaka pomwe ikutsogolera ake pachinthu chabwino ndanena kale mafumu tidamanga fundo imodzi moti kumupeza wina akuchita khalidweli timamulanga potengera malamulo omwe tidamanga timaonetsetsa onse okhudzidwawo akayesedwe kuchipatala sadavulazane matenda
Label: CULTURE

Text:
epifania imathandiza ana kuzama chiphunzitso cha mpingo thawani arkdayosizi ya blantyre yati chaka cha ana cha epifaniya chofunika kwambiri chimawapasa mwawi anawa kutsogolera zochita msembe ya ukaristiya choncho anawa amakula akuzindikila nawo wofunika mpingo 
 matias thawani omwenso woona utumiki wa ana pansi mabungwe utumiki wa apapa portifical mission society pms arkidayosiziyi omwe anena lamulungu 5 january 2020 ku limbe cathedral mbuyo msembe ya ukaristiya zochitikachitika zomwe ana aku chalitchili anakonza tsiku la epifaniya 
 thawani kujambulitsa mwa ana patsikulo thawani tsiku ili limapereka mangolomera kwa anawa azikangalika za mpingo pozindikira nawonso mbali imodzi ya mpingowu 
 mwazina bambowa tsiku ili limathandiza kuzindikira mphatso zosiyanasiyana zomwe anawa nazo 
 pamene ana apasidwa mpata kutenga gawo pazochitika za mpingo mphatso zawo zauzimu zimatumphuka amazindikira mwachangu maitanidwe anatero thawani 
 anapitiliza kuthokoza ansembe onse arkidayosiziyi powapatsa mpata anawa patsiku lawoli 
  ndikuthokoza ansembe anzanga onse parishi zonse za arkidayosiziyi popereka mpata kwa anawa anathokoza motero thawani 
 mau ake katikisiti paul muheko wa mparish ya limbe anayamikira dongosolo la mpingo wakatolika pokhazikitsa tsiku la chaka cha ana ponena limathandiza anawa kutumikirana okhaokha ku uzimu ku thupi 
 dongosolo la mpingo wakatolika ndilapamwamba linakonza kale tsiku lero nawo ana azitenga gawo pachipembezo anatero muheko 
 naye mwa ana omwe anatenga nawo gawo patsikuli patricia likomwa tsikuli lamupindulira makamaka momwe angatumikire ana azake 
 ndasangalala kwambiri moti sindinasangalalepo chonchi moyo wanga wonse ndazindikira nane ndikhoza kutimikira ku mpingo makamaka kwa ana amzanga anatero patricia 
 chaka cha epifaniya chimachitika lamulungu loyambilira mchaka chilichonse pamene yesu khristu anadzera mitundu yonse pomwenso mpingo wakatolika lonse umachita chaka cha utumiki wa ana mutu wa chaka chino ana amabatizidwa ndikutumidwa alalikire mau mulungu
Label: RELIGION

Text:
kunalibe kubera 2015maneb wapampando wa bungwe loona za mayeso la malawi national examinations board maneb john saka wati bungweli lokondwa mchaka cha 2015 mayeso onse amene bungweli limayendetsa adayenda padalibe zobera 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu polankhula kwa atolankhani ku sunbird mount soche mumzinda wa blantyre lachiwiri saka adati chikhulupiriro chonse bungweli lathetsa kubera mayeso 
  akuti zobera mayeso zikuchepa adati pamayeso onse atatu primary school leaving certificate of education pslce junior certificate of education jce malawi school certificate of education msce lidakumana vuto limodzi lokha lokhudza kubera mayeso jce 
  saka adati iyi nkhani yosangalatsa kwambiri poyanganira momwe zakhala zilili pankhani yobera mayeso mdziko muno zaka zingapo zapitazo 
  ndife okondwa kuuza lonse mayeso mchaka cha 2015 ayenda kwambiri sanabedwe zotsatira zimene zidatuluka zoona zenizeni za mmene ophunzira adalembera mayeso ake tipitiriza kuonetsetsa mayeso asadzabedwenso 
  wapampandoyo adati zidatheka cha mgiwrizano ulipo pakati magulu osiyanasiyana amene amatengapo mbali poyendetsa ntchito za mayeso mdziko muno apolisi asilikali nkhondo aphunzitsi boma onse adaonjezera chitetezo cha mapepala amayeso chakwera kwambiri cha njira yatsopano imene idakhazikitsidwa wobera mayeso utafika poipa

Text:
mlandu wa savala ukupendekeka mlandu wa wa zaka 33 caroline savala yemwe khothi lidamupeza wolakwa pamlandu wakuba ndalama za boma zokwana k84 miliyoni ukuyenda mwapendapenda 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi savala yemwe bizinesi ya zomangamanga adamupeza wolakwa akuyembekeza chigamulo cha khothi zachilango chake lachisanu lapitali kudali sewero ku bwalo la milandu pomwe womuimira pamlanduwo ralph kasambara adalephera kubwera kubwalolo 
  sadayankhe funso limodzi savala kumanzere kusabwera kwa kasambara mmawa wa lachisanulo kudakwiyitsa wogamula mlanduwo fiona mwale yemwe adaimitsa mlanduwo upitirire 2 koloko masana 
  nkhaniyi ipitirira 2 koloko masana ano woimirira savala abwere sabwera tikamba nkhani popanda wowaimira adatero mwale 
  malingana ndondomeko za ku bwalo la milandu tsiku likakhazikitsidwa woimirira munthu pamlanduwo walephera kubwera pachifukwa chilichonse amayenera kudziwitsa bwalo la milandulo yabwino kutumiza okamuyimirira 
  mmawa wa lachisanu kalaliki wa kukhotilo adali kalikiliki kuyesetsa kulumikizana kasambara sizimatheke zomwe zidachititsa mwale asinthe ya mlandu 
  ya mlandu itafika 2 koloko masana kasambara sadaoneke kubwalo la milandulo mmalo mwake adatumiza womuimirira tisilira kaphamtengo yemwe adapempha wogamulayo mlanduwo awusuntheso poti samautsatira bwinobwino 
  ndiwongoimirira kasambala omwe sakumva mthupi poti nkhaniyi sindikuyitsata bwinobwino ndimati ndipemphe isinthudwe idzakambidwe tsiku lina adapempha kaphamtengo 
  mwale adakana kumva pempholi ponena zomwe adauza khothi kaphamtengo zokhudza kusamva mthupi kwa kasambala amayenera kuuza bwalolo yabwino adati mlanduwo upitirirebe 
  mwale atanena kaphamtengo adapemphanso alole savala asayankhe funso lililonse limene afunsidwe poopa kupotoza nkhani pempholi lidaloledwa 
  savala adafunsidwa mafunso 10 sadayankhepo limodzi mpaka mlanduwo udayimitsidwa 
  savala adapezeka wolakwa 18 july 2015 wogamula yemwe adalinso mwale atapeza umboni wakuti mayiyu amalandira ndalama zosagwirira ntchito kuchoka ku unduna wa zokopa alendo 
  savala yemwe samagwira ntchito mboma yomwe amaganiziridwa amalandira ndalamazo adauza bwalo la milandu muumboni adachita kukokeredwa kangaude wachinyengowu wina yemwe amagwira ntchito ku unduna wazokopa alendo leonard kalonga mnzake wa ku ubwana florence chatuwa omwenso amayimbidwa mlandu omwewo

Text:

  adapeza ochuluka akuchita bizinesi yootcha kugula makala mitengo yambiri yatsala kuderali amene amapanga makala mmaboma mwanza neno asamukira kumeneko 
  mtunda woposa makilomita 90 udali mitengo yambiri yachilengedwe lero mpala mitengo yatha mitengoyi ikugwetsedwa mmalire malawi mozambique 
  mtolankhaniyu atafika adauzidwa akakumane nyakwawa kabwayibwayi ya mboma la ntcheu yomwe imupatse malo woti agwetse mitengo mfumuyo idatsimikiza mitengo ilipo mtolankhaniyu aotche makala akuti amayenera kulipira cha nkhalango

  poona zitenga masiku ambiri mtolankhaniyu adaganiza zogula makala kwa ogulitsa kumeneko thumba lililonse limagulidwa k2 000

  masiku ambiri timakumana apolisi amene amatilipiritsa ndiye timakonzeratu kunoko tisavutike mayendedwe amene amathandiza mtolankhaniyo kupanga makalawa happy adatero 
  mtolankhaniyo atafunsa happy roadblock ya polisi ya zalewa akalipira chiyani adayankha malowo ngosavuta harry adaoda matumba 70

  onse amene adali makala adapereka ndalama zawo kwa woyanganira kampuyo pamene adanyamuka ulendo ku blantyre

  sipadatenge loweruka mma 3 koloko mmawa mtolankhaniyu adalandira foni galimotoyo yomwe idanyamula matumba 250 yafika msika wa khama ku machinjiri onse amene adakweza makalawo adali pamalopo kugulitsa makalawo 
  patsikulo bizinesi simayenda thumba lomwe poyamba limagulidwa k9 000 limapita k5 000 mpakanso kumafika k3 500 
  malinga unduna woona zachilengedwe pafupifupi mahekitala 3.4 miliyoni aonongeka pootcha makala june chaka chino komiti yoona zachilengedwe ku nyumba ya malamulo idapempha undunawu uletse kuotcha kugulitsa makala mdziko muno 
  wachiwiri kwa wa za nkhalango ted kamoto akuti dera la neno ntcheu mwanza lomwe likutulutsa makala ambiri pakadalipano kumeneko mitengo ikugwetsedwa kwambiri pamene akupanga makala adatero 
  malinga kamoto vuto la kuotcha makala lakulanso kwambiri cha kuzimazima kwa magetsi kuchepa kwa chiwerengero cha amalawi amene amagwiritsa ntchito magetsi pophika

Text:
ulimi wamthirira usangokhala nyimbo mkonzi ndimamva chisoni njala ikamagwa mdziko muno choti mwagwa chilala pamene tili nyanja mitsinje yambiri yomwe simaphwera yachilimwe zomwe zingatithandize paulimi wamthirira 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mthirira ungatipulumutse kodi amalawi anzanga zoona tizifa ludzu mwendo uli mmadzi ndithudi maiko anzathu amene sadadalitsidwe nyanja mitsinje ku malawi kuno amaseka chikhakhali akationa tikupempha chakudya kumaiko chonsecho tili kuthekera kopeza chakudya chokwanira chaka chaka choti chikhoza kudyetsa fuko la malawi chaka chathunthu popanda vuto lililonse 
  vuto boma lathu lomwe limatsogoza ndale kuposa chitukuko cha miyoyo ya ake liti lija adayamba za kulimbikitsa ulimi wamthirira pofuna kuthetsa vuto la njala mdziko muno tonse tikudziwa za nkhambakamwa ya green belt initiative ndani lero angandilozere green belt ili apa tidamva zoti boma lagula mathirakitala ku india athe kuthandiza alimi mmidzimu pachitukuko cha ulimi akuchita nawo chiyani kugula chakudya kumaiko akunja pofuna kudyetsa fuko la malawi kuli apo koposa boma likhazikitse zolimbikitsa ulimi wamthirira mmbali mwa nyanja ya malawi kuchigwa cha shire mmbali mwa mitsinje ina north south rukuru runyina limphasa kuchigawo cha kumpoto mitsinje ya linthipe lilongwe bua mchigawo cha pakati mitsinje ya thutchira ruo kummwera mongotchurapo malo ochepa
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
joyce banda wauza aku zomba avotere chakwera mtsogoleri wakale wa lino yemwenso mtsogoleri wa chipani cha pp dr joyce banda wapempha mdziko muno akavotere dr lazarus chakwera chisankho cha mpresident chomwe chikudzachi lino lisinthe chuma 
 banda lino likufunika atsgoleri owopa mulungu dr banda amayankhula lero ku chinamwali mzinda wa zomba msonkhano wotsiriza okopa omwe anachititsa mogwirizana mlangizi wa chipani cha utm noel masangwi ati oyenera kulamulira mdziko lino akuyenera akhale owopa mulungu chakwera chilima 
 ndimafuna kuwona wachichepere kuposa osadakwa owopa mulungu ndiye nnawapeza omwe ndakuonetsani apa chakwera chilima tidzaone feteleza otchipa nyumba mmidzimu anatero banda 
 mmawu ake mlangizi wa chipani cha utm noel masangwi chipani cha dpp chakonza upandu woti chipatse dc wa boma lililonse ndalama zokwana 2.5 million kwacha abele chisankho chomwe chikudzachi 
 lachiwiri minister of local government ben phiri ku mra akapange budget atenge 2.5 million ampatse dc abere chisankhochi anatero masangwi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mtunda ulipo zokambirana mtsogoleri wakale wa lino bakili muluzi sali kutali kwenikweni khumbo lake lofuna kukumana atsogoleri human right defenders coalition hrdc nkhani ya zionetsero atsogoleriwo ampatsa mtunda woti akwere zisadatheke 
  mwa zina muluzi akuyenera kukambirana mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika wapampando wa bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec jane ansah bungwe la public affairs committee pac atsogoleri zipani zina za ndale adzakhale nawo zokambiranazo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka akufuna mkumano muluzi muluzi adalembera kalata atsogoleri hrdc 19 august 2019 kuwapempha akumane nkukambirana chikonzero cha hrdc chofuna kupanga chionetsero mzipata za mabwalo ndenge kuyambira 26 mpaka 30 august 
  msabata ikuthayi adapempha mkumanowo utakhalapo dzulo lero lino zingathandize zionetserozo zomwe zikuyembekezeka kuyamba lolemba zikhala zisadachitike 
  pofunira zabwino lathu ndikupempheni tikumanenso nkukambirana nkhani ya zionetseroyi ndikuona njira yabwino yothanirana mavuto omwe mdziko lathuli nkukhala pansi adatero muluzi mkalatayo 
  poyankha kudzeranso mkalata bungwe la hrdc lati muluzi adalephera kukwaniritsa pangano lake bungwelo utatha mkumano woyamba omwe udachitika 23 july 2019 
  choyamba mudatilonjeza mukumana mutharika ansah mutiuza zomwe mukambirane naye pasadathe sabata imodzi mpaka sitidamve kanthu ndiye kukukhulupirirani kuvuta yatero kalata ya hrdc 
  kalatayo yapitiliza mkumanowo utheke ansah atule pansi udindo yekha mutharika yemwe adamusankha amuchotsepo zifalitsidwe kudzera mnyumba zofalitsa nkhani mdziko lonse adziwe 
  malingana momwe yalembedwera kalata ya hrdc zikutanthauza muluzi akapanda kukwaniritsa zinthuzi mkumano hrdc walephereka 
  katswiri ndale george phiri wati iyi si ntchito yamasewera kwa muluzi wati nzokaikitsa akwanitsa kubweretsa mbali zonsezi pamodzi 
  hrdc yanena za nzeru zokambirana zimayenera olimbanawo pomwepo mkhalapakati pomwepo okhudzidwa wothandizira mkhalapakatiyo pomwepo sindikuona zikutheka adatero phiri 
  kadaulo winanso yemwe amaphunzitsa za ndale ku chancellor college mustafa hussein wagwirizana milingo yomwe hrdc yapereka kwa muluzi polingalira adalephera kale poyamba 
  poyamba hrdc idali chiyembekezo choti muluzi auza amalawi zomwe adakambirana mutharika adasankha kusunga chinsinsi 
  muluzi abweretse pamodzi mutharika ansah hrdc adatero hussein n nkhani yokwenza mtengo wa chimanga nd iyabwino yadza yolakwika alimi ambiri atagulitsa kale chimanga chawo kwa mavenda 
  awa maganizo alimi osiyanasiyana omwe adacheza tamvani patatha sabata imodzi unduna wa malimidwe utalengeza mtengo omwe bungwe la admarc lizigulira chimanga wasintha 
  nduna ya zamalimidwe kondwani nankhumwa adalengeza lachisanu kuyambira sabata yatha mtengo wa chimanga wakwera kuchoka k150 kilogalamu kufika k180 kilogalamu admarc ikakagulira chimanga kumudzi k200 kilogalamu mlimi akapititsa yekha chimanga ku msika wa admarc 
  pocheza tamvani alimi ati nkhaniyo ili yabwino palibe chomwe alimi angonoangono apindulepo adagulitsa kale chimanga kwa mavenda mitengo yotsikirapo yomwe panthawiyo inkaoneka yabwino 
  mwa alimiwo william guza wa ku waliranji mboma la mchinji awa madandaulo amene amakhalapo chaka chilichonse 
  chaka chaka timadandaula nkhani yomweyi admarc imachedwa kuyamba kugula chimanga ikamabwera mbwalo mavenda amakhala atagula kale chimanga mmidzimu motola mapeto ake mavendawo ndiwo amakapindula pokagulitsa chimanga chomwecho ku admarc adatero 
  moses kawodzera mlimi wa ku chisi mboma la zomba naye wati admarc ikadayamba kugula chimanga mtengo watsopanowu yabwino akadapeza phindu lokwana kawiri lomwe adapeza chogulitsa kwa mavenda 
  panthawiyo mavenda adayamba kugula chimanga mitengo ya pakati k70 k100 kilogalamu pomwe boma lidali lisadayambe kugula chimanga adatero kawodzera 
  zikutanthauza alimi omwe adagulitsa chimanga chawo moyambirira adaluza ndalama zokwana k100 k120 kilogalamu iliyonse yomwe adagulitsa kwa venda 
  apa ndiye mlimi yemwe adagulitsa matumba 20 makilogalamu 50 lililonse mtengo wa k80 kilogalamu adagulitsa makilogalamu okwana 1 000 nkupeza k80000 akadagulitsa chimangacho ku admarc panopo k200 kilogalamu akadapeza k200 000 
  katswiri za malimidwe tamani nkhono mvula adati iyi nkhani yomvetsa chisoni venda ndiye amapeza phindu lomwe mlimiyo akadapeza mlimiyo amangokhala pamodzimodzi osasuntha 
  ichi nchifukwa chomwe ndimanenera admarc imayenera ndalama ukamafika mwezi wa march alimi akangoyamba kukolola izitsegula misika yake zikhoza kuthandiza mavenda atsatire mitengo ya boma pofuna kulimbirana chimanga admarc adatero mvula 
  maganizo mvula akugwirizana lipoti ya bungwe la civil society agriculture network cisanet lomwe lidati ndale za msika wachimanga zimapweteka alimi angonoangono nkumatukula mavenda 
  mavenda amabwera nkudzagula chimanga admarc ikuchedwa alimi akufuna ndalama msanga admarc ikamayamba kugula chimanga mtengo ikwera chimanga chimakhala mavenda omwe amapindula 
  nkhanza siyithera pomwepa njala ikayamba alimi omwe aja amadzagula chimanga ku admarc mokwera admarc idagula kwa mavenda mokwera ndiye nayo ikufuna ipezepo phindu pangono pokha likutero lipoti la cisanet 
  zikugwirizana kwatunthu momwe zakhalira chaka chino alimi adagulitsa chimanga mtengo wa k80 kilogalamu kwa venda yemwe akukagulitsa mtengo wa k200 kilogalamu ku admarc mlimi yemweyo adzayenera kugula chimangacho ku admarc mtengo osachepera k200 kilogalamu 
  mtengo wachimanga wayamba kale kukwera mosalingalira za mavuto zachuma moti mmadera ambiri thumba la makilogalamu 50 lili k12 000 mmadera ku chikwawa lafika k14 400 pomwe ku machinga akugulitsa k18 000

Text:

Text:

   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kodi apa tidzudzule boma tiloze zala fam vuto la mpira mdziko muno si lachilendo sitikudzidzimuka kumva boma lili chabechabe

Text:

Text:
masitalaka apm sakulankhulapo zafika mwana wakana phala akuluakulu mabungwe zipani apempha mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika alankhulepo kunyanyala ntchito kwa ogwira mboma komwe kwafika lekaleka mdziko muno 
  zikudza patatha mwezi mabwalo milandu otseka nazo sukulu za college of medicine chancellor college chanco zidatsekedwa kaamba ka sitalaka pothira mchere pabala ndiye abungwe lothana katangale la acb lomwe maofesi ake atsekedwa lachiwiri lapitali ogwira ntchito kuchipatala cha kamuzu central hospital amenenso ayamba kunyanyala pofunitsitsa boma liwakwezere malipiro 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc pali chipwirikitichi mutharika sakulankhulapo tsogolo likhala lotani mmalo mwake yemwe akulankhulapo nduna ya zachuma godall gondwe amene akukanitsitsa palibe kuonjezera malipiro ponena lino lili pamoto malinga momwe chuma chikuyendera 
  wa bungwe la institute for policy interaction ipi rafik hajat akuti boma lisatenge nkhani yonyanyala ntchitoyi mwachibwana 
  boma lionetse chidwi silisamala zingabweretse mavuto adzaoneni adatero hajat polankhula tamvani lachiwiri 
  mneneri wa chipani cha pp ken msonda akuti chipani chawo chakhumudwa mpaka lero mutharika sadalankhulepo kanthu zomwe wati nzodabwitsa 
  mwina poti adanena ya kampeni adzapitiriza pamene akulu adalekera ndiye mwina kupitiriza kwake nkumeneku pamene tayamba kuona masitalaka osalekeza zidalili nthawiwo adatero msonda 
  mneneriyu adati mutharika akuyenera auze amalawi zomwe zichitike pamene kunyanyala ntchito kuli mkati 
  nay billy banda wa bungwe la malawi watch akuti mutharika akuyenera kuyankhulapo pamene kakasi kusowa chochita 
  mtsogoleri sayenera kulankhula wamba nchifukwa chake pali mneneri nduna yokhudzidwa azilankhula pomene zafikapa mtsogoleriyu ayenera kulankhulapo ndithu amalawi ayembekezere zotani mmene zinthu zilili adatero banda 
  mkuluyu adati sakukhutira momwe boma likuchitira pankhaniyi kotero akupenekera kulankhula kwa mutharika kungabweretse chiyembekezo kwa amalawi 
  sizikudziwika sitalaka ya ogwira ntchito kumakhoti ingathe msanga pamene tikudikira kumabwaloko kulongosoke tikumvanso ogwira ntchito mboma ayambanso kunyanyala sitikumva boma lakambirana anthuwa kunyanyalaku kuthe 
  apatu sitikukhutira timayembekeza mwina boma lilankhulana anthuwa kukambirana bungwe limene limamenyera ufulu wawo mwina kulowerera kwawo mavutowa akhoza kutha adaonjeza banda 
  malinga wa zamalamulo kuboma kalekeni kaphale bungwe la maloya la malawi law society mls lidakumana mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika pomwe zidaoneka sitalakayo ikhoza kutha posachedwa 
  boma la dpp lakhala likunena mavutowa akudza kaamba ka kubedwa kwa ndalama mboma komwe kudaonekera muulamuliro wa pp msonda akuti iyi si nkhani 
  ndalama palibe nanga ndalama zomwe amadzikwezera okha zija adazitenga nanga amati azitenga popeza ndalama mbomamo akuti mulibe adatero msonda 
  sabata ziwiri zapitazo zidadziwika mtsogoleri wa lino pamodzi wachiwiri adzikwezera malipiro k8 k10 iliyonse nduna zake sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo kudzanso mtsogoleri wotsutsa mutharika wachiwiri saulos chilima adakana ayambe kulandira malipirowo padakalipano kaamba ka mavuti zachuma 
  naye mneneri wa chipani cha udf ken ndanga akuti sangayankhule zambiri sadatsatire momwe boma lakhala likuchitira pankhani yokhudza kunyanyalaku 
  komabe ndanga wati kukambirana kukufunika sitalakazi zitheretu mdziko muno 
  mneneri wa mutharika fredrick ndala mneneri wa boma kondwani nankhumwa sadayankhe mafoni pamene tamvani imati imve mbali yawo 
  nayenso wa bungwe loona za ufulu wa ogwira ntchitowa la civil servants trade union cstu servace sakala adakana kutsirapo ndemanga ponena tilankhule aboma pankhaniyi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
lamulo latsopano la zipani alikambirana lino lili zipani zoposa 40 komatu mwa zipanizi zisanu zokha zomwe zimakangalika pomwe zina zili ziii madzi mfiliji kudikira ya zisankho komatu mchitidwewu ukhala mbiri yakale malinga lamulo latsopano la zipani lomwe aphungu nyumba ya malamulo akuyembekezera kukambirana akakumananso mwezi wa may 
  malinga mtsogoleri wa nyumba ya malamulo kondwani nankhumwa aphungu adzakambirana za lamuloli mwezi wa may pamene aphungu akukumana panopa yochepa 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kupereka ndalama zinthu zina kwa ovota kudzaletsedwa tikadakonda tikadakambirana za lamuloli yangochita njiru imeneyi ilowanso pamndandanda wa zokambirana za mwezi wa may adatero nankhumwa 
  lamuloli zipani zizikakamizika kuonetsa zikugwira ntchito yake kupanga nawo zisankho kupanga misonkhano ya mamembala mchipani cholinga choonetsa zikugwiradi ntchito zotumikira 
  zikapanda kukwaniritsa mpamene woyanganira zipani azizichotsa mkaundula 
  lamulo latsopanolo lidzachotsa lamulo lakale la zipani lomwe limaona kulembetsa kwa chipani ndondomeko zotsatira 
  mwa zina lamulo latsopanolo lomwe lili magawo 8 likuunikira zingapo kukhazikitsa ofesi ya wolembetsa kuthetsa zipani zipani kulongosola momwe zimapezera ndalama mamembala azidziwa momwe ndalama za chipani zikuyendera 
  lamulolo likutambasulanso za kayendetsedwe ka zisankho kuthana wopereka ndalama zinthu zina kwa ovota ya chisankho membala wa zipani zingapo 
  polankhulapo za kufunika kwa lamuloli wa bungwe limene muli zipani zosiyanasiyana la centre for multiparty democracy cmd kizito tenthani adati adati padakalipano mamembala zipani alibe mphamvu zenizeni mzipani mwawo zimene lamulolo likufuna 
  bungwelo lomwe lakhala likukambirana mbali zonse zokhudzidwa momwe lamulolo lidzathandizire zipani kukwaniritsa ntchito yoimirira kupereka umwini wa chipani kwa mamembala 
  zimaoneka atsogoleri amene amakhala mphamvu zambiri mchipani lamololi lithandiza zimenezi kuonjezera apo ndale zathu mmalawi muno zakhala kwambiri zodalira ndalama panthawi ya chisankho zipani amene akufuna kuimira zipani pamipando yosiyanasiyana amakhala akupereka ndalama zinthu zina ncholinga chokopa awavotere adatero tenthani 
  adati mchitidwewu umapangitsa ndale zodula omwe ndalama mwayi wolowa mmaudindo zina amakhala opanda masomphenya mmene angathandizire kudera kwawo 
  lamuloli lithandiza kuthetsa umenewu likufunanso zipani zandale zizinena komwe zimapeza ndalama ncholinga chothetsa wa katangale adaonjezera tenthani 
  mwa akadaulo ndale mdziko muno rafiq hajat adati palibe chaphindu chomwe lamulo latsopanolo liphule lamulo lomwe lilipo lakanika kugwiritsidwa ntchito 
  hajat adati mwachitsanzo lamulo lakaleli limati chipani chilichonse chizipereka kwa wakalembera wa zipani momwe achitira chuma chaka chikamatha satero chipanicho chizithetsedwa 
  komatu sizili choncho tikukanika kukwaniritsa zinthu ndiye lamulo latsopanoli tidzaligwiritsa ntchito adadabwa hajat 
  adati aphungu ayenera kutenga yaitali kukambirana zinthu za kuba ndalama mboma cashgate njala zina osati za lamulo la zipanili 
  tiyeni tiyangane njira zogwiritsa ntchito lamulo lakale lomweli adatero hajat 
  komatu tenthani adatsutsa polongosola lamuloli losiyana kwambiri lakaleli layesera kukonza zimenezi akukhulupilira lidzagwiritsidwa ntchito 
  choti adziwe nchakuti lamulo lilipo lidapangidwa mwachangu kwambiri ncholinga choti mchaka cha 1993 athe kulembetsa zipani zikapange nawo chisankho cha 1994 mmalo ambiri lamulo lili panoli silinaunike maka pankhani ya kayendetsedwe ka zipani kuumiriza zipanizo zitsatire malamulowo adalongosola tenthani
Label: POLITICS

Text:
amayi cwo asamala chipatala cha mzuzu lilongwe wolemba sylvester kasitomu amayi achikatolika ochokera arch dayosizi ya lilongwe mzuzu loweruka awayamika kamba kotengapo gawo ntchito zolimbikitsa za ukhondo mmadera omwe akukhala 
 wapampando wa bungwe la amayi achikatolika mdziko muno catholic women organisation cwo lucy vokhiwa anena pothilirapo ndemanga pambuyo tchito yomwe amayi mma dayosizi wa achita maka pokasamalira mzinda wa lilongwe chipatala cha mzuzu komwe kunali koipa kaamba ka zinyalala 
 ati zomwe amayiwa achita zikusonyezadi chidwi kudzipereka ntchito zokonza kusamalira zachilengedwe zomwe mpingo ngakhalenso zimaphunzitsa kwa 
 amayi ku mzuzu anakayamba ndikupereka zinthu kuchipatala cha mzuzu pamene akulilongwe mumsika wa mumzindawu zimene zikuonetsa chilengedwe tikuchipanga control anatero vokhiwa
Label: SOCIAL

Text:

 munthu atakutenga ku blantyre usiku kukumanga kumaso nkukakusiya pamlatho uwu ukhoza uli ku mwanza utawerenga chikwangwani ichi nkhawa tsopano ikhoza kubwerera ku blantyre uyenera kulowera komatu mtsinje uwu si uli ku mlatho uwu siuli ku mwanza ku nsanje mtsinjewu umakathira mumtsinje wa shire kumayenda

Text:
kalembera wa mafoni aima boma laimitsa kalembera wa lamya za mmanja yemwe nthambi yoyendetsa ntchito za mauthenga ya malawi communications regulatory authority macra idakhazikitsa mwezi watha 
  macra idalamula yemwe lamya ya mmanja alembetse nambala ya lamya yakeyo pasadafike 31 march 2018 apo biii nambalayo idzasiya kugwira ntchito 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka unduna wa zofalitsa nkhani wati boma laganiza zoimika kalemberayu potsatira maganizo omwe akhala akukhuthula nkhawa zosiyanasiyana zokhudza kalemberayu 
  tikudziwa kalemberayu wofunika potsatira malamulo poti ili boma lomva maganizo tayamba taimitsa kaye kalemberayu mpaka tikonze zinthu zina chidatero chikalata chochokera ku undunawu 
  kuimika kwa ntchitoyi kwakwiyitsa wa bungwe loyimira ogula la consumers association of malawi cama davis kapito yemwe mmbuyomo adayamikira macra kaamba kokhazikitsa ntchitoyi 
  wati ganizoli lolakwika kalemberayu amatsatira lamulo lomwe lidakhazikitsidwa mnyumba ya malamulo kotero kumuimika kumayenera kudzera ku nyumba yomweyo 
  padali nkhawa kaya mavuto amayenera kupititsa nkhawazo mavutowo ku nyumba ya malamulo osati nduna unduna kungodzuka mmawa nkuyimika kalembera ofunika ameneyu adatero kapito 
  nkhawa zambiri za kalemberayu zidali mayendedwe kuchoka kumudzi kukafika komwe kuli malo olembetserakowo polingalira posachedwapa amaima pamizere italiitali kudikira kulembetsa zitupa za unzika 
  kapito adati la malawi limakhalira mmbuyo pankhaniyi maiko adayamba kale kalembera wamtunduwu 
  mmaiko sungangogula khadi ya lamya pamsewu nkuyamba kugwiritsa ntchito osalowa mkaundula nchifukwa chake amangogula khadi nkupangira zolakwika nkulitaya adatero kapito
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
covid-19 ilipodi action hope bungwe la action hope malawi ladzudzula omwe akulimbikitsa popereka mauthenga bodza ku wa malawi kulibe kachirombo ka coronavirus 
 aaron tikanena kulibe tikulakwitsa wa bungweli mdziko muno sammy aaron anena pomwe radio maria malawi imafuna kumva za kuopsa kwa mchitidwewu 
 ati mchitidwewu utha kupangitsa ambiri akhudzidwe mliriwu 
 tikanena matenda amenewa kulibe tikulakwitsa kwambiri kamba koti matendawa akuwonoga miyoyo yambiri mdziko anatero aaron 
 apempha malawi apitirize kupewa matendawa pochita zomwe unduna wa zaumoyo ukupempha 
 pofika tsiku la lero oposa 500 omwe apezeka kachirombo ka corona virus asanu omwe amwalira
Label: HEALTH

Text:
kalonga waluso lothetsa makhalu kunja kuno oimba ndiye mbwee luso lawo limakhala losiyanasiyana anthetemya amaimba zipangiso zingwenyengwenye saxophone ngoma pomwe enanso luso lawo kuthyola sitepe innocent kalonga amathetsa mankhalu luso lake amatha kuimba chida chilichonse mbandi popanda vuto katswiri pojambula nyimbo chimwemwe sefasi adafatsa naye motere amatha kuyimba chida chilichonse karonga ndikudziwe   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu dzina langa ndine innocent kalonga ndimakhala ku chileka mumzinda wa blantyre 
  kodi innocent kalonga amatani malawi inetu ndine katswiri wojambula nyimbo zamtundu wina uliwonse kumbali yojambula zithuzi za kanema ndimapezeka ku chileka kuno ku green arts studio komwe ndimakhala ndikujambula nyimbo 
  zoti uli luso lojambula udazindikira liti ndili zaka 14 yatchuthi ndinkakhala chidwi chofuna kudziwa nyimbo amajambula ndinso kwambiri ndinkakonda kumayesera pakompyuta apa mpamene ndidaona zayamba kutheka padakalipano ndimatha kuimba chida chilichonse chogwiritsidwa ntchito bandi 
  kodi luso la zamaimbidwe malawi likupita patsogolo kunena zoona mayimbidwe akupita patsogolo kwambiri moti panopa munthu sungakambe za luso osatchula magulu oimba nyimbo moti masiku ano tikuyenera kuvomereza ku malawi zoimbaimba zapita ndithu 
  magulu ati omwe wajambulirako nyimbo ndajambulako nyimbo za toza matafale wailing brothers limbani banda ambiri nyimbo zonse zomwe ndidajambula palibe anadandaulako 
  kupatula kuimba kupeka nyimbo umapangaso chiyani ndimakonda kumvera nyimbo ndimasangalala takhalapo kalambula bwalo wa oimba amene ndimawakonda
Label: ARTS AND CRAFTS

Text:
amayi adandaulira boma za hiv edzi amayi omwe kachilombo ka hiv koyambitsa matenda edzi apempha boma likonze zina mwa zake zoyendetsera nawonso azitengapo mbali pakayendetsedwe ka ntchito zosiyanasiyana 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc amayiwa apereka miyezi isanu umodzi boma liyankhepo 
  amayiwa analemba chikalata chofotokoza mavuto amene amakumana nawo cha malamulo apereka chikalato kwa wa nyumba ya malamulo henry chimunthu banda nyumbayi iunikenso mwa malamulo omwe amawaphwanyira ufulu 
  ndikukutsimikizirani zanu zamveka kuyambira 24 mwezi uno komiti yoyanganira za edzi chakudya chamagulu izikumana iwunike mfundozi ncholinga choti tikamatsegulira zokambirana mfundozi zidzakhale mgulumo anatero chimunthu banda 
  oyanganira za ufulu wa amayi omwe kachilombo ka hiv mbungwe la pan african positive womens coalition la mmaiko africa tendayi westerhof wati boma likuyenera kuchitapo kanthu mmiyezi isanu umodzi ikubwerayi 
  wati zikuyenera choncho mavuto amene akukumana nawo amayiwa aakulu kwambiri 
  pokapeleka chikalatacho amaiwa anapelekezedwa amai anzawo ochokera mmaiko angapo omwe anabwerera msonkhano waukulu oganizira za matenda edzi 
  mwanfundo zina zomwe ziri chikalatacho amaiwo akuti amamanidwa mwayi wa ngongole zoti angayambire bizinesi azidziyimira paokha ati zimawachititsa azisowa zoyenerera chakudya makamaka alibe owasamalira 
  chikalatacho chatinso mpaka mmadera mwina atsikana amakakamizidwabe kukwatiwa mwamunayo asakumudziwa bwinobwino zomwe akuti zikukweza chiwerengelo cha amayi omwe kachilomboka 
  yomaliza mmadandaulo amaiwa apempha boma lisinthe wa mankhwala otalikitsa moyo arv omwe alipo tsopanowa amaononga matupi okumwawo 
  chimunthu banda anakkhala nawo msonkhano waukulu wa maiko osiyanasiyana oganizira za matenda edzi omwe umachitikira kuno ku malawi ku lilongwe
Label: HEALTH

Text:
kaundula wa mavoti akuyenda kulembetsa msabatayi malawi mmadera adakhamukira kumalo olembetsa maina mkaundula wa chisankho cha 20 may 2014 
  malinga mphunzitsi wa za ndale kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college chisonyezo chakuti njala yofuna kusankha atsogoleri zimene zingachititse boma la pp kugwa kulamuliranso zaka zina zisanu 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc chinsinga amalankhula malinga momwe ntchito ya gawo loyamba la kalembera wa chisankho mmaboma chikhwawa nsanje neno mwanza madera mboma la blantyre yayambira 
  kalemberayu adayamba lolemba 22 july mmaderawa atseka 4 august 2013 
  malinga elton kananji yemwe akuyanganira kalemberayu pamalo wolembetsera sukulu ya pulaiveti ya che mussa assemblies of god mumzinda wa blantyre adati akulembetsa mwa unyinji 
  adati lolemba 342 ndiwo adalembetsa mwa anthuwa 172 amuna pomwe 170 adali amayi 
  apa ndiye zili pokhala tsiku loyamba kulembetsa lero lachiwiri akubwerabe mwa unyinji zomwe zikusonyeza ayirandira ntchitoyi mokhulupirika adatero kananji 
  nako ku mwanza akuti adapita kukalembetsa mwa unyinji akufotokozera t nthache ya mbomalo akufuna kudzavota adzasinthe boma kulibwezeretsa 
  ndinakalembetsa atangotsekula kuno tikulembetsera pasukulu ya pulaimale ya lipongwe akukhamuka mwa unyinji zomwe zikusonyeza chidwi chofuna kudzavota adatero nthache 
  nako ku neno akuti kalikiliki kukalembetsa kalemberayu malinga francis pulula wa kwa senior chief saimoni mbomalo akufunitsitsa atadzavota 2014 
  adati chisankho chobweretsa boma lina boma lilipoli lipitirize chili mmanja mwake zomwe waona akalembetse 
  tikulembetsera pasukulu ya pulaimale ya lisungwi akulembetsa mwa unyinji moti nane vuto nkuti ndinatangwanika ntchito iliyonse ndikukalembetsa adatero 
  ku nsanje zonse akuti zinali tayale kuyambira lolemba mpaka lachiwiri pomwe timacheza senior chief malemia ya mbomalo 
  akuti amalembetsa mwa unyinji panali vuto limodzi kumeneko 
  pamzere tikukhala yaitali tithandizidwe zomwe si zabwino akumachedwa atithandize ndiye zikumawagwetsa mphwayi akaime pamzere yaitali adatero malemia 
  chinsinga adati chisankhochi chofunika kwambiri simungadabwe kuona akukhala padzuwa alembetse adziwe zonse zotheka atakalembetsa adzakhale mwayi wodzavota adatero chinsinga 
  mneneri wa bungwe loyendetsa chisankho la malawi electoral commission mec sangwani mwafulirwa wati kalemberayu wayamba mwa mkokomo pofika lachiwiri padalibe mavuto omwe adawoneka 
  mwafulirwa adati padali vuto lomwe amaliganiza lingasokoneze la ngozi yomwe idachitika ku chikhwawa komwe galimoto yomwe idatenga ogwira ntchito bungwe la mec omwe amafuna akaphunzitse za ubwino ubwino wokalembetsa idachita ngozi lolemba 
  galimotoyo idazima ndiye pomwe amati ayilizenso mabuleki sadagwire ndiye idayamba kubwerera mmbuyo dalaivala adayesetsa asabwerere mmbuyo zidalephereka mpaka kukatsamira nyumba ina ogwira ntchito ku mec adavulala adawatengera kuchipatala komwe adawathandiza adatero mneneriyu 
  za momwe ayambira kulembetsa mwafulirwa adati akukhulupirira ntchitoyi itha zawapatsa chikhulupiriro maphunziro omwe adachititsa akalembetse agwira ntchito 
  kumbali ya mavuto omwe senior chief malemia yadandaula ku nsanje mwafulirwa adati afufuza pali vuto loti alowererepo vuto kuchepa kwa olembetsa kalemberawo 
  lino may 20 2014 lidzachititsa chisankho chapatatu adzasankha khansala wa wodi yawo phungu wa nyumba ya malamulo mtsogoleri wa 
  omwe alembetse ndiwo adzakhale mwayi wodzasankha mtsogoleri wawo malo olembetserawo akumatsekulidwa 8 koloko mmawa kutsekedwa 4 koloko madzulo 
  malowa akumatsekulidwa tsiku lililonse 
  macarthur matukuta yemwe wa gulu la zisudzo la solomonic peacocks wati ntchito yophunzitsa ubwino wokalembetsa kudzavota ikuyenda 
  takhala tikugwira ntchito yotere zisankho za 1999 2004 kunena zoona chaka chino zikuyenda tikufalitsa uthenga wachisankho kupyolera mzisudzo akuulandira adatero matukuta gulu lake likuchita zisudzozo mumzinda wa blantyre
Label: POLITICS

Text:
akayidi 60 omwe anatulutsidwa abweleranso mmanja mwa apolisi akayidi oposa 60 mwa omwe anatulutsidwa ku ndende za mdziko muno masabata apitawa alinso mmanja mwa apolisi atapezeka akuchita za umbava umbanda atangotulutsidwa 
 mwapasa tinakhwimitsa chitetezo kwambiri sabata zapitazo boma linatulutsa akayidi oposa 1000 ndende za lino ati pofuna kuchepetsa chiwerengero cha akayidiwa ndende zi pofuna kuwatetedza ku mliri wa covid-19 
 wa apolisi mdziko muno duncan mwapasa ati potsatira kutulutsidwa kwa akayidiwa apolisi anakhwimitsa chitetezo poyika njira zina za ukadaulo zotetezera katundu wawo iliyonse ku prison kukatuluka pardon amakhalapo 143 omwe atulutsidwa pardon nde umbanda umakwera kwambiri apolisi tilipo ochepa tinaika ndondomeko zabwino zoti tikwaniritse kutumikira madera onse padakali oposa 60 omwe agwidwa tsopano anatero mwapasa
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
akhutira mitsutso ya atsogoleri   andale akatswiri andale akhutira mitsutso ya atsogoleri omwe akudzaima nawo zisankho zapatatu zomwe zichitike mdziko muno may 21 chaka chino 
  akatswiriwa ati mitsutsoyi yofunika kwambiri ndale za demokalase kaamba koti imapereka mwayi kwa atsogoleri wotambasula zawo za chitukuko 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mary chilima phungu wa kummwera kwa boma la mzimba agness nyalonje kucheza ku mtsutso wa atsogoleri ku lilongwe adati chokondweretsa nchoti akupatsidwa mwayi wofunsa pamene sakumvetsetsa 
  mwa akatswiriwa rafiq hajat adati mmbuyomu atsogoleri samakhala mwayi wotambasula zawo kwa omwe akufuna adzawavotere 
  ndikadakondwa zomwe atsogoleriwa akutulutsa zikadalembedwa kusayinira mtsogolo asadzakane akadzafunsidwa adatero hajat 
  adapempha omwe akuyendetsa mitsutsoyo azipereka yokwanira yoti azifunsa atsogoleriwo 
  ambiri amasankha atsogoleri potengera zipani zigawo zomwe amachokera kadaulo wa ndale wa ku chancellor college mustafa hussein adasindika kufunika kwa mitsutso 
  amasankha atsogoleri potengera zomwe akutulutsa pachifukwa ichi tiyeni tipititse patsogolo mitsutso ya atsogoleri adatero hussein 
  kadauloyu adapempha omwe akuchititsa mitsutsoyo samakondere mtsogoleri wina 
  akatswiriwa akuti mitsutsi ikupindula mfumu mkumpha ya mboma la likoma ikuti palibe chaphindu chomwe ikuonapo 
  atsogoleriwa akungotinamiza akadzalowa mboma sadzapanga zomwe akuuza lero 
  ndikadakhala nambala zawo ndikadawaimbira nkuwauza asatimate phula mmaso adatero mkumpha 
  godfrey masawo akugwirizana maganizo mfumuyi 
  pothirirapo ndemanga patsamba la mchezo la facebook la kampani yosindikiza nyuzipepala ya nation publications limited npl masawo adati zinazi mkambakamwa chabe atsogoleriwa sadzakwanitsa 
  alembi zipani za ndale akuti wokhutira momwe mitsutsoyi ikuyendera 
  mlembi wa utm patricia kaliati wa malawi congress party mcp eisenhower mkaka adati zipani zawo zikudzigulitsa mokwanira kudzera mmitsutsoyo 
  tithokoze mabungwe omwe akonza mitsutsoyi yatithandiza tizigulitse kwa ambiri 
  ndikudziwa mitsutsoyi iwonjezera mavoti omwe tipeze adatero kaliati 
  kafukufuku akuonetsa ambiri akutsatira mitsutsoyo masamba michezo facebook twitter whatsapp 
  mwachitsanzo 6 700 ndiwo amatsatira mtsutso wa atsogoleri zipani za ndale womwe udachitika march 29 ku bingu international conference centre bicc mzinda wa lilongwe 
  pamene okwana 2 200 adaonera mtsutso wa otsatira kwa atsogoleri zipani womwe udachitika march 26 mzinda wa mzuzu
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mswati adakali mfumuboma boma kudzera mwa mneneri wa unduna wa maboma aangono ke muhlabase mughogho lati pali kukokanakokana ufumu wa gomani v boma likuvomerezabe mswati gomani wachisanu ndiye mfumu 
  mughogho adanena pamene mbali ina ya banja la gomani motsogozedwa dingiswayo yalengeza dingiswayo ndiye mfumu kulanda ufumuwu kwa mswati 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc gomani v lachiwiri akuluakulu abanja adatsutsa zomwe dingiswayo adalengeza mswati adakalibe mfumu patangodutsa tsiku abanjawa atalankhula dingiswayo adachititsanso msonkhano wa atolankhani zomwe adanena abanjawa ndizabodza ndiye mfumu yatsopano 
  panopa ofesi ya gomani yasamuka kuchoka ku lizulu tikulankhulamu ili kwa nkolimbo adatero dingiswayo 
  malinga mughogho mswati ndiye mfumu boma likudziwa mswati ndiye mfumu zili choncho mfumu ikasankhidwa abanja boma limavomereza mwambo udachitika wodzoza mswati gomani wachisanu sizidasinthe mpaka lero 
  gawo 11 1 la malamulo okhudza mafumu chiefs act la mchaka cha 2000 limati pulezidenti wa ndiye mphamvu yochotsa paramount chief senior chief chief sub chief 
  mswati adadzozedwa august 10 2012 gomani wachisanu imfa ya ake
Label: POLITICS

Text:
papa wasankha wa zaumoyo ku vatican mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wasankha wa bungwe lowona za umoyo ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican 
 malinga malipoti wailesi ya vatican loweruka 18 july 2020 papa wasankha doctor giovanni battista doglietto director wa bungwe lomwe limawona za umoyo ku likulu la mpingo ku vatican lomwe limadziwika vatican healthcare services fondo assistenza sanitaria fas mchiyankhulo chachitaliyana 
 doctor doglietto walowa mmalo mwa doctor stefano loreti yemwe wa bungweli 
 bungwe lowona za umoyoli la vatican healthcare services limaona onse amene amagwira ntchito kulikulu la mpingo ku vatican akulandira chisamaliro chabwino cha kuchipatala kukakhala kosoweka kutero pozindikira ntchito zomwe agwira zofunika kwambiri kotero akuyeneranso kusamalidwa polandira chithandizo cha chipatala yake watero monsignor luigi misto yemwe president wa bungweli pofotokozera vatican radio 
 monsignor misto wati likulu la mpingo wa katolika likuyenera chitsanzo chabwino maphunzitso mpingo wa katolika otchedwa social teaching of the church maka za ubale umodzi solidarity omwe akudwala akusowa chisamaliro wati zikuyenera kuyambira kulikuluko ku vatican 
 pali omwe sadwala nkomwe sasiyabe kupereka ndalama kuthumbali umenewu ndiye ubale umodzi solidarity omwe amasowa chisamaliro cha kuchipatala watero monsignor misto 
 mwezi mwezi wogwira ntchito ku likulu la mpingo ku vatican amapereka ndalama ku thumba la bungwe lowona za umoyoli la vatican healthcare services fondo assistenza sanitaria zomuthandizira atakhala wadwala
Label: HEALTH

Text:
anatchezera sakundilipira zikomo gogo ndakhala ndikugwira ntchito kukampani ya alonda ina kwa miyezi 11 popanda masiku opuma mwezi ulionse amatidula k500 ati ya yunifolomu ndidasiya ntchito mwezi wa december amachedwa kulipira pakatha miyezi iwiri amatipatsa za mwezi umodzi ndalama za mwezi wa december mpaka lero sanandipatse

   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu zonse ndine gogo wanga ndimagwira ntchito ya mnyumba chilichonse pakhomo ndimachita ndine kuyambira kusamala mnyumba kuphika kusesa panja kusamala mwana kutsegula pageti kuchapa zonse ndimagwira mwana kumsana olo akhalepo makolo mwana sakundilandira mwana wawoyo ndithandizeni anatchereza nditani pamenepa tm mulanje zikomo tm inuyo pamene munkafunsira ntchito kwa bwana wanu mudafunsira ntchito yanji ndafunsa choncho zonse munthu ukamafunsira ntchito bwana amakufunsa ukufuna ntchito yanji tsono pali ntchito yoonjezera mumachita kugwirizana malipiro ake mmene mwayalira nkhani yanu zikuoneka abwana anu ngovuta alibe chikondi kagwiridwe ka ntchito motere ukapolo makamaka zandimvetsa chisoni kumva chilichonse mumagwira nokha mwana kumsana makolo ake alipo uku ndiye nkusowa chikondi kwa mwana wawo yemwe tsono chili chizungu chilichonse azisiyira watchito tsiku lina adona mnyumbamo adzasimba tsoka ndaonapo abambo akukwatira mtsikana wantchito kusiya mkazi wawo ati wantchito akukwaniritsa chilichonse mnyumbamo amayi otere omwe amasiyira wantchito chilichonse pakhomo tambalale kumapenta milomo zikhadaba pamkeka pasofa asadandaule zikawachitikira zotere amuna ambiri amalakalaka atadyako zophika akazi haa zonse amvekere wantchito aphika basopo samalani nazo zimenezo tsono tm musadandaule kwenikweni ntchito ikukuchulukirani pitirizani kugwira modzipereka simudziwa chomwe mulungu wakukonzerani tsiku lina mudzalandira mphotho yanu cha kulimbikira ntchito pakhomo   ndemanga anatchereza ndati ndiikirepo ndemanga pankhani yomwe munalemba chaka chatha ya mzimayi yemwe akuti mwamuna amamubisira amamwa ma arv mayiwa athokoze mulungu kwambiri pakuti apulumuka ku likukumwe la matenda asachedwenso apite kukhoti kukamangala mwamunayo ndo woopsa kwambiri akufunika chilango chachulu mzungumbuli lilongwe
Label: RELATIONSHIPS

  ku exile anyamata ambiri amakhala ku exile asanalande ulamuliro adona hilida adathawira kunja ulamuliro utawasempha ntchito za manja poboola mipopi ya chuma zitawachitira umboni adatero abiti patuma 
  muli umboni wanji zikuwakhudza mudaliko adafunsa amene adali naye tsiku limenelo 
  mufunanso umboni wotani kuposa zomwe zikuonekeratuzi adathawiranji nanga onse akuwatchula adona hilidawa angakhale akulota adayankha abiti patuma 
  abale anzanga inetu zimandisempha 
  akadangobwera ya khrisimasiyi chifukwatu ndiye chochita sangachisowe akhoza kumagulitsa nawo mabaluni ngakhalenso makombola awandawa chochita sichingasowe adatero gervazzio 
  onsewa akuti ndalamazo zidali zakuti polisi palibe idzaluzire mpando wonona onsewa ngamisala akuopa chiyani adona hilida akadangobwera mlandu wa munda tidzaukambire pamunda pawo pomwepo adatero abiti patuma 
  kwa ndingothokoza sindili mtchona adona hilida ndimapuma mopanda kucheuka kusankha nkwanga ndisangalale khrisimasi ayi pajatu kwathu kwa kanduku timakhulupirira chisangalalo cha khrisimasi chidalipo kuyambira kale yesu asadabadwe 
  izotu sindizitengera kwenikweni pozindikira uzimu ndiwo ufunika 
  sindikulalikira kuthokoza taonanso khrisimasi ina kumayamika mulungu mwamwayi nkutsetserekera 2016 zaka ndiye zikukhamukira ku 2019 tidzaone adona hilida polisi palibe akuthotha moya pete dizilo petulo palibe

Text:
boma lisavomereze kuchotsa pathupi potsatira zomwe ndinalemba sabata yatha wa awerengi watumiza maganizo ake motere   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza rabecca ndine mwa amene ndimatsatira zimene umalemba patsamba ili sindinagwirizane maganizo omwe udalemba sabata yatha malamulo lino alole amayi omwe akufuna azitha kuchotsa pakati mzipatala 
  ndikudziwa pali mavuto omwe akudza kaamba koti akuchotsa pakati pogwiritsa ntchito njira zoopsa zomwe zikumavulaza kupha amayi atsikana komabe yankho la mavutowa si kuvomereza azingotaya pakati mwachisawawa 
  ndimakhulupirira moyo mphatso ya mtengo wapatali yomwe namalenga amapereka kwa munthu malembo amanenetsa tisanabadwe munthu asanapangidwe nkomwe mmimba mwa mulungu amakhala atamudziwa kale 
  kwa zikusonyeza pathupi paliponse pamapangidwa mulungu amene amapereka moyo posaona wotenga pathupiyo akadali pasukulu wagwiririridwa kaya sadalowe mbanja 
  ndiye mulungu walola woterewa akhale woyembekezera ndiye amakhala cholinga moyo wa mwana akuyembekezeredwayo choncho ncholakwika mayiyo aloledwe azichotsa moyowo 
  chamukomera mulungu pakhale moyo mulunguyo amadziwa mwana wobadwayo asamalidwa timaona amisala akubereka ana nkumakula mmatauni mmizindamu munthu wamisala akutha kulera mwana kuli alungalunga mwina simunaonepo ndikudziwa za ana omwe adabadwa makolo pasukulu sadalowe mbanja ndikamba anawa ofunikira omwe amapindulira liko kuthandiza makolo 
  zomati azichotsa mimbazi zimangoyangana mavuto alero osaunikira kutsogolo cholinga cha mulungu pokulola ukhale pathupi 
  ndikudziwa kutenga pathupi uli pasukulu usanapeze banja zimaoneka zolakwika zisapangitse kuchotsa pathupi chithu cholungama   ndine banda   blantyre
Label: POLITICS

Text:
kwelepeta apempha ake asiye ndale wolemba thokozani chapola phungu wa dera la zomba malosa grace kwelepeta wapempha mdera lake asiye ndale kugwirana manja popititsa patsogolo chitukuko cha deralo 
 phunguyu amalankhula phwando lomwe anakonzera mdera lake pofuna kuwathokoza pomusankha udindo wa phungu wa derali chisankho chomwe chapitachi 
 kwelepeta yemwenso wachiwiri kwa nduna yowona za kusasiyana pakati amayi abambo ana olumala chisamaliro cha walonjeza apereka galimoto la wa ambulance izithandiza mderalo ya ndale inatha ino ya chitukuko tikalimbikira ndale dera lino silitukuka ayi anatero kwelepeta 
 mmawu ake group village headman mtogolo anagwirizana phunguyu nkhani ya mgwirizano mderalo osiyana zipani za ndale 
 chitukuko chiyende tikuyenera kugwira ntchito limodzi phungu wathu ndiye ndikuona zimenezi zoona zofunika kwambiri inatero mfumu mtogolo 
 mfumuyi yati mdera lake okonda chitukuko alimbikitsa ake agwirane manja phunguyu athetse mavuto ochuluka omwe mderalo
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
kugwiririra ana kudzatha pafupufupi tsiku lililonse tikumamva malipoti akuti mwana wagwiririridwa penapake 
  omangidwa akumangidwa kugwira ndende ndiye kosakamba zikuoneka zilango zomwe zinaikidwa kwa ogwirira zikulephera kuthetsa mchitidwewu 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kuphatikiza apo pali zilango zina zoti anthuwa akapatsidwa iwe wakumva umagwa nazo mphwayi kukhumudwa kumene 
  malamulo lino amati chilango chokulitsitsa kwa munthu wogwiririra mwana wochepera zaka 14 kukakhala kundede moyo wonse pamene wopezeka wolakwa pongofuna kugwiririra mwana amayenera kukakhala kundende zaka 14 
  malamulowa chonchi pali oti akagwiririra mwana amangopatsidwa ndede ya zaka zisanu 
  makhoti mphamvu zosiyana pakaperekedwe ka chilango pakuyenera kupezeka njira ina yoonetsetsa ogwiririra ana apatsidwe ndende yowawa 
  zilango zingonozingonozi zapeputsa nkhanza yogwiririra ana zikulephera kuopseza ofuna kugwiririra ana 
  mwachitsanzo wina akauzidwa singanga chizimba chopezera chuma kugwiririra mwana nkwapafupi munthuyu kupirira ndende ya zaka zisanu aziti ndikatuluka kundede ndidzasambira mchuma choposa 
  kugwiririridwa chipsinjo chosaiwalika kwa olakwiridwa amatha kusokonekera mutu kumene 
  nchifukwa chake maiko amaika dongosolo loti ochitiridwa nkhanzayi athandizidwe akatakwe momwe munthu amaganizira moyo wawo usasokonekere 
  zina zomwe unduna mabungwe oona za ana angamaganizireko pambali powerengetsa ana amene akuchitiridwa nkhanza zamtunduwu 
  koposetsa malingaliro alunjike popeza njira zoti munthu aziopera kutalitali kukhudza mwana mosayenera 
  njira yapafupi ndiyo kukhwimitsa chilango kwa ogwiririra ana powapatsa ndende ya moyo wonse kapenanso kuwadula ziwalo zimene akuononga nazo miyoyo ya ana osalakwa
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
nthambi za boma zikulephera kulipira mabilu madzi wolemba thokozani chapola mw wp content uploads/2019/09 nankhumwa.jpg alt= width="368 height="326 />unduna ulowelerapo nankhumwa nduna yoona za ulimi mthilira chitukuko cha madzi kondwani nankhumwa lachisanu lapitali ati nthambi maofesi ambiri boma akuti akulephera kupereka ngongole zawo zamadzi ku bungwe la southern region water board srwb 
 nankhumwa anena paulendo wao oyendera ntchito za bungwe li pomwe anakayendera malo angapo omwe bungwe li likugwira ntchito zake ku malo dam la mlunguzi mzinda wa zomba 
 ati kusaperekedwa kwa mabilu wa amodzi mwa mavuto omwe mabungwe opereka madzi akukomana nawo mdziko muno ati boma liyesetsa kuchitapo kanthu cholinga choti ntchito za bungweli zipite patsogolo 
 nkhani zimenezi zikulepheretsa mabungwe opereka madzi mdziko muno agwire ntchito yawo moyenera boma tichitapo kanthu nthambi za boma zomwe zili ngongole ku mabungwe onse opereka madzi mdziko muno abweza ngongolezo anatero nankhumwa 
 malipoti akusonyeza bungwe la southern region water board lili ngongole zokwana 12.5 billion kwacha zomwe likuyenera kutolera ku nthambi zosiyanasiyana za boma
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
president mutharika wavomereza ansah atule pansi udindo mtsogoleri wa lino professor arthur peter mutharika wavomereza dr jane ansah sc atule pansi udindo wawo wapampando wa bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno la malawi electoral commission mec 
 wazisiya ansah lachinayi usiku dr ansah anafotokoza walembera kalata akuluakulu omwe adamuika udindowu za ganizo loti akufuna kuyima udindowu osati chokakamizidwa ati amalemekeza malamulo polankhula radio maria malawi mneneri wa mtsogoleri wa lino mgeme kalirani wati povomera ganizo la mayiyu president mutharika wati dr ansah munthu okonda lake 
 ndizoona president professor arthur peter mutharika wavomereza khumbo la dr ansah sc chotula pansi undindo chairperson wa bungwe la mec mmawu president ati ansah munthu wokonda lawo anagwira ntchito yotamandika ku bungweli awafunira zabwino ntchito zina zomwe azigwira pamene achoka udindowu anatero kalirani 
 chidwi cha chili mutharika pamenepa kalirani wati president yu achita machawi posankhanso munthu wina woti alowe mmalo mwa dr ansah pokonzekera chisankho chomwe chikudzachi 
 sipatenga yaitali ntchito imeneyi president ayithamangitsa ichitike mwachangu potengera chisankho chomwe chikubwerachi anatero kalirani 
 mwazina kalirani wati mtsogoleri wa lino mphamvu yolembanso ntchito makomishonala bungwe la mec omwe alipo dakalipano pamene contract yawo ifike kumapeto 5 june

Text:
