  ndazama mchikondi agogo ndimadziwa pachibwenzi uli pasukulu zolakwika nanga nditani ndine mtsikana wa zaka 16 ndili mchikondi mnyamata wina yemwe timakondana kwambiri timathandizana nkhani za sukulu za kutchalitchi zina zotero tinalonjezana sitidzagonana mpaka titakwatirana vuto loti kwathu amandikaniza kupanga chibwenzi ati zimalakwitsa sukulu utha kutenga mimba ndimayesetsa ndithetse chibwenzichi ndimakanika ndimamukonda kwambiri ndiye nditani amene akukuuza zoti chibwenzi uli pasukulu sakulakwa mwanawe uwamvere poyamba zimayamba choncho malonjezo kuthandizana kenaka mutu umaima pamene uzidzati hii ndapanga chiyani zako zitada

Text:

 sanamvetse mphepo muchikalata chomwe chipani cha aford chatulutsa chasayinidwa wofalitsa nkhani chipanichi khumbo mwaungulu chati chipani chawo ndichokhumudwa zomwe yi analankhula francis mphepo

Text:

Text:
nandolo mpatali ubwino wa nandolo si uli kupeza ndalama zochuluka kokha zina zambiri watero woona za mbewu za mgulu la wa nyemba ku bvumbwe research station richard andasiki 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu andasiki adati pambali poti mbewuyi imodzi mwa mbewu zimene alimi angaphe nazo makwacha ochuluka ilinso chakudya chabwino chomanga thupi imabwezeretsa chonde mnthaka siyivuta kulima yosavuta kusunga ngakhalenso kusamalira pamene ili mmunda adatinso mitengo ya nandolo nkhuni zabwino 
  nandolo amabwezeretsa chonde mnthaka munjira ziwiri poyamba masamba ake akayoyokera mmunda amaola mosavuta amakhala manyowa amphamvu mizu ya nandolo imakhala tizinthu tooneka totupa tomwe timakhala tizilombo tobwezeretsa michere yotchedwa nitrogen mchingerezi yomwe yofunika kwambiri ku mbewu adatero 
  nandolo phindu lochuluka andasiki adafotokoza cha kubwezeretsa chonde mnthakaku mbewu zina chimanga zimapindula 
  adati nandolo salira zipangizo zochuluka feteleza safuna chisamaliro chochuluka nchifukwa chake abzalidwe pamodzi chimanga kotero safunanso chisamaliro chapadera pamene mlimi akusamalira chimanga chake amakhala akusamaliranso mbewuyi wabzalidwa payekha chachikulu kupalira basi 
  isaac mpunga mwa alimi nandolo mboma la nsanje adati mbewuyi yomwe yachita kwambiri kudera kwawoko mvula inadukiza 
  nandolo amafuna mvula yochepa nchifukwa chake amatha kukula kubereka mvula italeka kotero mbewu yothandiza adatero 
  zili chomwechi alimi nandolo chaka chino adandaula mbewuyi yayamba mtengo otsika kwambiri kusiyana chaka chatha 
  jonath goliath mwa alimi omwe amalima mbewuyi mochuluka bizinesi yake wa mboma la neno wati ndizokhumudwitsa kwambiri mtengowu sukupereka chiyembekezo chilichonse 
  padakalipano nandolo k100 kilogalamu chonsecho chaka chatha adayamba pamtengo wa k500 kilogalamu adachita kutsika nkufika k250 kilogalamu zikudabwitsa akachoka pamenepa afika pati adatero 
  goliath adadabwa boma lidaika mtengo wotsikitsitsa wa nandolo k320 pakilogalamu ogula akugula k100 mitengo yopendereza alimife ogulawa akuitenga adadabwa 
  mlimiyo adati zaka za mmbuyomu mbewu ya nandolo yomwe idali phindu panopa siikulongosoka zomwe zikusowetsa alimi pothawira 
  arthur ngwende woona za malonda kukampani ya farmers organisation limited fol imalimbikitsa alimi kugwiritsa ntchito mbewu zamakono mankhwala othandiza nandolo akule ndiponso imatha kudziwa za momwe misika ya mbewuyi ikuyendera wati alimi akhonza kudikirira kaye kufikira nandolo wawo atauma bwinobwino 
  nandolo wangokololedwa kumene kotero amakhala wolemera kwambiri amakhala akadali madzi choncho zikhonza kutheka ogulawa akuchitira dala kumagula pamtengo woterewu nchifukwa chake alimi sakuyenera kuthamangira adatero 
  ngwende adatinso la india limene limagula mbewuyi kwambiri mdziko lino layamba kulima lokha choncho silikugulanso nandolo wochuluka kale 
  andasiki adavomereza alimi akuyeneradi kusunga kaye mbewuyi ayambe aona momwe mitengo ikhalire miyezi ikubwerayi 
  adati asungike kwa yaitali choyambirira amuumitse kufikira chinyontho chisapyole 12 peresenti akatero amuthire mankhwala kupanda kutero amafumbwa
Label: FARMING

Text:

 polankhula radio maria malawi mlomole ati awiriwa sapikisana nawonso mmaudindowa kaamba koti atsiriza materemu okhalira mipandoyi

  pagulu ponsepa amene amavina inuyo amavina leroli anasankha ndivine mwaonanso abambo ambiri akuyamikira ndavina n kuikira kumbuyo khalidwe loipa wolemba rabecca nsomba zina amayi amene akukwatiwa amauzidwa asakasiyire wa ntchito kuphika wantchitoyo akhoza kulanda banja enanso nkumamulangiza asakaleke kudzisamala kuopa akathawidwa 
  tikaonetsetsa palibe vuto kusamala pakhomo kudzisamalira zina zotero nzolakwika zinthuzi zida zothandizira banja lisathe

  nchifukwa chiyani zimaoneka zabwinobwino abambo azilephera kupirira nkufika pomasirira naphiri mpaka apange naye chibwenzi waphika abambo otere ngachimasomaso amakhala naphiriyo amamusirira kale 
  pali abambo autchisi oti akavula nsapato fungo nyumba yonse sudzamupeza akuti bola joni okonza maluwa amadzisamalirako mmalo mwake amayesetsa akonze nsapato sokosi za mwamuna fungo lichepe 
  mzimayi akamveka thukuta ndiye chomveka choti akasake chibwenzi osamuuza mkazi wako za vuto lake bwa mundimvetse sindikuti amayi atayirire tizindikire amayi amakhala zofooka tsono zofooka za amayi zisakhale zifukwa zokwanira zoti abambo azinka nasaka akazi

Text:
akudyerera obwela malawi akhala akuingidwa nkhuku mmaiko akafuna thandizo la chipatala nzika zakunja kumadzawamwera mazira zikafika mdziko muno ponama nzika za lino 
  izitu zakhala zikuchitika chosowa chiphaso cha unzika lero mpumulo wafika kwa amalawi pamene akhale mwayi wokhala chiphaso chosonyeza unzika wa lino 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kuthithikana mzipatala zina kumadza cha kunja zili chonchi malinga ntchito yomwe bungwe la national registration bureau nrb poyamba kalembera wa unzika amene adayamba akuluakulu aboma maboma 11 
  akufotokozera senior chief kanduku wa mboma la mwanza boma lake limalandira nzika zambiri mdziko la mozambique 
  pafupifupi atatu mwa 10 alionse amene amafuna thandizo lachipatala kuno amakhala ku mozambique vuto ndiloti kuyambira zobue mpaka ku tete mdziko la mozambique palibe chipatala posowa kolowera adera limeneli amathandizidwa mzipatala za la malawi adatero kanduku 
  tayandikana dzikolo satilola kupita mdziko lawo kukalandira thandizo la chipatala amalawi angapo akhala akuthamangitsidwa suthandizidwa anzathuwo zitupa za unzika adaonjeza motero 
  naye senior chief kabunduli ya mboma la nkhata bay adati kumeneko nzika za maiko tanzania zimalowa pafupifupi tsiku lililonse kumalandira thandizo lomwe amalawi amayenera kulandira 
  akafika kuno amakhala maina chimalawi zomwe ndizovuta kuwakaikira si nzika zathu mankhwala pachipatala amatha mwachangu kumavutika pamene kwawo zipatala zomwe zingawathandize adatero kabunduli 
  kungofika chintheche pali ambiri amaiko burundi sangapitenso kwawo akulandira chithandizo chilichonse chomwe chimayenera chipite kwa amalawi kwawo sungayerekeze kupanga zimenezi ifeyo amationa kupusa adaonjeza kabunduli 
  munthu ulandire thandizo lachipatala cha boma mmaiko zambia zimbabwe mozambique tanzania umayenera kuonetsa chitupa chosonyeza ndiwe nzika kuno kwathu sizichitika kulibe ziphasozi 
  akufotokozera norman fulatira yemwe mneneri wa nrb iyi mwina nkukhala mbiri yakale mmalawi weniweni azidziwika chiphaso chomwe adulitse 
  mavuto amenewa akhala mbiri yakale posakhalitsapa pamene ntchito yodula ziphaso za unzika yayamba gawo loyamba tayamba kupanga ziphaso za aphungu nyumba ya malamulo akuluakulu mboma midzi 27 mmaboma 11 adatero fulatila 
  mabomawa chitipa mzimba nkhotakota lilongwe salima dowa mchinji blantyre mangochi chikwawa thyolo zitupazo azidula mmidzi iwiri boma lililonse 
  ili gawo loyamba gawoli likufuna lingotithandiza momwe ntchito ikhalire ili ntchito yoyeserera kaye alandira ziphaso zawo mudzi ulionse takonza zoyamba 200 gawoli likamatha 5 000 akhala ziphaso zawo adatero mneneriyu 
  adati gawo lachiwiri la ntchitoyi 95 000 ndiwo adzakhale mwayi wokhala ziphasozi gawoli likuyembekezereka kudzatha december chaka chino 
  chaka chamawa bungweli likuyembekezera ntchitoyi idzafalikira lonse pomwe 9 miliyoni akuyembekezeka kulandira zitupa zawo 
  fulatira adati amene wakwanitsa zaka 15 ndiye akuyenera kudulitsa ziphasozi watinso uli nzika ya lino uyenera kudulitsa ziphasozi posatengera zikhulupiriro zako mpingo 
  naye wa bungwe loona zaumoyo la malawi health equity network mhen george jobe wati ntchitoyi ipindulira amalawi boma 
  apapa ndiye thandizo la mabungwe boma lizipitadi mmanja mwa amalawi enieni kusiyana poyamba pamene timaphangirana obwera adatero 
  kwa amene ataye chiphasochi akuti ayenera kudzalipira k3 500 amupangirenso chiphaso china malinga fulatira mtengowu ukhala ukusinthasintha
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
kudali kumapemphero mulungu amati kodi simudziwa akutumikira za mkachisi amadya za mkachisi mulunguwa adakwaniritsidwa pomwe rose cross adakumana koyamba nkudyererana maso ephod mahorya kumapemphero 
  panthawiyo rose ankapembedza kumpingo wa living word ephod adali wa mpingo wa church of nazarene ankapemphera kumipingo yosiyana awiriwa ankakumana kumapemphero mkati mwa sabata 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi tsopano thupi limodzi rose ephod patsiku la ukwati wawo rose woyamba kubadwa mbanja la ana atatu akugwira ntchito ku unduna wa zofalitsa nkhani komwe mtolankhani wa malawi news agency mana pomwe ephod wachitatu kubadwa mbanja la ana asanu awiri amagwira ntchito msungichuma kubungwe la compassionate stewards 
  rose adati atakumana adayamba kucheza munthu mnzake kumapeto kwa chaka cha 2013 pomwe ephod adamumasulira rose za chikondi chomwe chinkasefukira mumtima mwake rose naye adaulula za mumtima mwake uku kudali kuyamba kwa chikondi chawo 
  awiriwa adamanga ukwati woyera mumzinda wa mzuzu 4 july chaka chino mwambo womanga banjalo udachitikira ku church of nazarene kenaka madyerero adachitikira ku victory temple komwe adachita perekaniperekani wamphamvu nkudyerera kumwerera mwachimwemwe 
  ephod amachokera mmudzi mwa mumbo mfumu jenala mboma la phalombe pomwe rose wa mmudzi mwa yohane jere inkosi mtwalo mboma la mzimba 
  ndimamukonda ephod makamaka cha mtima wokonda mulungu munthu wachikondi kwambiri satopa kuthandiza ovutika adatero rose monyadira 
  ephod naye sadabise adati amamukonda rose kaamba ka khalidwe lake labwino mtima wansangala wachikondi
Label: RELIGION

Text:
papa wapereka mafuno abwino pasaka kwa akatolika mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wafunira zabwino akhristu mpingowu pomwe akhala akuchita chaka cha kuuka kwa ambuye yesu 
 papa francisko malingana malipoti awailesi ya vatican papa amalankhula uthenga pomwe nawo njira ya mtanda ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican 
 chaka chino mapempherowa achitika popanda potsata ndondomeko zomwe zayikidwa zoteteza kufala kwa nthenda ya covid-19 akhristu mpingo wu anatsatira mwambo wu kudzera kanema wayilesi makina intaneti 
 mapemphero chaka chino njira ya mtanda adakonzedwa ku ndende ya padua mdziko la italy
Label: RELIGION

Text:
akupitilira kukumana zokhoma kamba ka ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi mdera la mfumu mwambo mboma la zomba ati akupitilirabe kukumana zokhoma ngozi yadzidzidzi yomwe inagwa mderalo chaka chatha 
 mwa mzika za derali peter taibu anena lachitatu mkumano omwe bungwe lowona za chitukuko mpingo wa katolika la catholic development commission in malawi cadecom linakonza pakati anthuwa akuluakulu khonsolo ya boma la zomba komwe amakambirana njira zomwe angayike pofuna kuthana ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi mderalo 
 ngozi zinadzetsa mavuto ochuluka anthuwa apempha boma liwamangire malo oti adzithawirako pamene madzi asefukira cholinga choti asamasokoneze maphunziro kaamba koti ati nthawiyi amakabisala msukulu 
 azikathawira ku nyumba zomwe zimangidwe zija ndiye ana azipitabe ku sukulu pali misewu yovuta kuwoloka komwe ma bridge anatero taibu 
 poyankhapo nkhaniyi mwa akuluakulu khonsolo ya boma la zomba chriss nawata khonsoloyo ikudziwa za mavuto omwe akukumana mkati mokonza dongosolo lolimbikitsa adzichita mabizinesi osawononga zachilengedwe ulimi wothilira pofuna adzitha kupedza zosoweka miyoyo yawo 
 bungwe lowona zachitukuko mpingo wa katolika la catholic development commission in malawi cadecom lomwe linakonza mkumanowu lati likufunitsitsa kuwona miyoyo ya akumudzi yotetezeka ku mavuto kwa nyengo mwa akuluakulu bungweli mdziko muno aerone kandiwo ntaya ati bungwe lawo likhala likutsatira zomwe khonsolo ya boma la zomba yalonjeza ichita mderali 
 bungwe la cadecom likugwira ntchitoyi mmaboma zomba balaka machinga thandizo lochokera ku boma la scotland kudzera ku mabungwe trocaire scalf
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
dpp kasambara trade barbs witnesses scared there was drama in the high court in lilongwe yesterday when former student and her lecturer locked horns across the divide of the prosecution and defence in the ongoing paul mphwiyo shooting trial 
  private practice lawyer and accused person ralph kasambara and director of public prosecutions dpp mary kachale exchanged tough words with the former minister of justice and constitutional affairs accusing the prosecution of personal persecution 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi kachale l the allegations are far from the truth kasambara belittled kachales concerns that he and other accused persons had intimidated state witnesses who she said fear for their lives but kasambara said the dpp was just being dramatic 
  said kasambara the drama being played by the dpp is obvious she knew she was dealing with elusive witnesses all this is for dramatic effect to castigate us all this is intended to play with the public and the media all just to attack me 
  he alleged that police officer from blantyre alex phiri had been making night phone calls threatening his wife and brother in law with prosecution if they did not comply to testifying against the senior counsel but kachale vehemently denied the allegations 
  kasambara during an earlier court appearance kasambara further accused kachale of favouring another accused person oswald lutepo who is not subject of bail revocation 
  she shot back that as her former boss and trainer she had lot of respect for kasambara hence she could not have personal vendetta against him 
  this prosecuting kasambara was not an easy decision for me to take but i took it the allegations he is making here are far from the truth we do not intend as the state to call his wife as state witness these serious allegations are casting slur on my character as well kachale charged back 
  on allegations of favouring lutepo kachale said if he were her favourite she would not have added him to the case once she examined the evidence and affidavits when she came into the office of the dpp 
  kachale insisted that the prosecution had evidence to show witness tampering but in the meantime they would ask the court to subpoena them to appear in court by force even though they might become hostile witnesses 
  another defence lawyer john gift mwakhwawa intervened in the heated exchange and recommended that the state should use the machinery at its disposal to bring the state witnesses to court 
  earlier the dpp told the court that state witnesses were not willing to testify against the six accused persons claiming that they fear for their lives 
  some of the witnesses have been given police protection but they said they are still afraid to testify against kasambara macdonald kumwembe and pika manondo who are answering charges of attempted murder and conspiracy to commit murder 
  kachale said she was forced to ask for an adjournment after the witnesses lined up to testify including chalunda and defeneya ballistics expert from the malawi police service police investigator and officials from airtel malawi who have since been withdrawn as witnesses 
  chalunda and defeneya approached the prosecution and recorded statements in which they made allegations of intimidation from the accused persons only to change tact and claim that the prosecution was forcing them to change witness statements 
  she added that the prosecution had concrete evidence to show the level of intimidation the witnesses have undergone 
  presiding high court judge michael mtambo is yet to make ruling on an application to revoke bail for the accused persons who she accused of engaging in mafia like operations to intimidate witnesses and prevent them from testifying against them 
  the other accused persons are dauka manondo lutepo and robert kadzuwa whose bail has since been revoked for failing to show up for trial for two consecutive sessions
Label: POLITICS

Text:
phindu kawawa ulimi wa tsabola akulipirira ana awiri ku sekondale wagula mbuzi 19 nkhuku 30 njinga ziwiya za pakhomo banja lake silikugona njala nkhani ya jimmy maliwu mlimi wa tsabola ku mulanje chitsanzo ulimi wa tsabolawu kawawa bobby kabango akucheza mlimiyu   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu maliwu ndidagulitsa mosavuta wawa achikumbe wawa imani komweko musafike kuno kwa alimi okhaokha 
  kuli chiyani mukuchita kukanizira   tikusankha tsabola ndiye mphepo yake inuyo simungayandikire mukuona akungoyetsemula 
  ndiye tidziwanetu ndine mlimi wa tsabola dzina ndine jimmy maliwu wa mmudzi mwa sazola kwa senior chief mabuka mboma la mulanje 
  mudayamba liti ulimiwu   1999 pamene ndidayamba kulima tsabola 
  chidachitika nchiyani muyambe ulimiwu   nthawiyo nkuti ndikulima chimanga mbewu zina ndiye ndinkafuna ndichite ulimi wina womwe ndizipezerapo ndalama apa pamene ndidasankha tsabola 
  chiyani mudasankha ulimi wa tsabola   ndinkafuna ulimi wa fodya kuno sachita ulimi wa tsabola omwe ndidaona akuphamo ndalama 
  mudayamba   ndidalima mizere yochepa ndimafuna ndione ndingathe msika uchite zidayenda osati kwambiri ndidaikamo chidwi 
  chidayenda nchiyani kumunda zidatheka pamsika ndidagulitsa mosavutika mtengo udali wolira 
  mtengo udali   ndidagulitsa k39 kilogalamu pamene alimi amagulitsa k50 
  kuchoka 1999 kufika lero ulimiwu ukuyenda mitengo ndiyo yakhala yovuta kumunda ndiye zonse zili ndidaonjezera munda ndikulima wokula mamita 35 mulitali 17 mlifupi 
  munda umenewu mukukolola wochuluka   ndikumapeza tsabola makilogalamu 150 mvula yagwa matenda sadafike 
  chaka chatha zidayenda nanga pamsika padali   chaka chatha ndidakumana vuto la matenda ndiye ulimi udavuta moti ndidapeza makilogalamu 45 okha alangizi adafika mochedwa pamsika ndiye zidali amagula k2 500 kilogalamu 
  matenda ati amene adavuta   tsabola amapanga zilonda mitengo imauma zikatere zimakhala zovuta abereke panopa matendawa tawakonzekera tidali maphunziro momwe tingathanirane matendawa vuto lomwe lidalipo tikumane matendawo nchifukwa cha manyowa amene tidagwiritsira ntchito 
  tsabola wakupindulirani   muli ndalama chaka chatha ndidapeza k112 500 mmakilogalamu 45 amene ndidakolola ndagula mbuzi 19 nkhuku 30 ndili ana atatu fomu 2 wina 4 wina ku pulaimale onsewa ndalama zake zikuchokera tsabola sindinagonepo njala ulimiwu umandisuntha 
  tifotokozereni za kumunda kuli panopa tikuwokera pamene mitengo ya chaka chatha tikuthyolera ipange nthambi

Text:

 mwa akuluakulu ku ofesi ya zophunzitsa ku bungweli edward kamvabingu omwe anena lachiwiri msonkhano wa akuluakulu mabungwe osiyanasiyana kumanso atolankhani mzinda wa mzuzu 
 ati ndondomeko yachiwiri yomwe inakhazikitsidwa chaka cha 2019 ya national ant corruption strategy ikubweretsa pamodzi magulu osiyanasisyana pogwira ntchito bungwe la acb pofuna kuthetsa wa ziphuphu katangale mdziko muno 
 mmawu ake wa bungwe la youth and society yas la national anti corruption alliance charles kajoloweka mhango wati nkhani yothana katangale mdziko imagwirizana utsogoleri wabwino

Text:
chaka cha chibalalitso chichitikira ku st pius parish wolemba sylvester kasitomu maria.mw/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/st-pius.jpg alt= width="533 height="399 />chaka cha chibalalitso chidzachitikira tchalitchi limeneli arkidayosizi ya mpingo wakatolika ya blantyre yalangiza parish ya st pius iyambepo kukonzekera miyambo ya chipembedzo yomwe imachitika pokonzera tsiku la chibalalitso cha mpingowu mwezi wa october 
 alfred chaima omwe mlembi wa zautumiki arkdayosiziyi alankhula pambuyo ulendo oyendera atsogoleri parishiyi cholinga chowakonzekeretsa chaka chapadera cha chibalalitsochi

 timafuna tikumane adindo ansembe kuno ku st pius parish popeza amene tsogolo kono kumalawi kuyendetsa chaka chachibalalitso mwezi wa mawa extraordinary mission month tikuyembekezera zabwino ku parish imeneyi malinga mmene apap francisco akuphunzitsira anatero chaima 
 mwazina chaima ati chakachi chidzakhale chopambana akhristu mparishiyi akuyenera kuzikonzekeretsa maka ku miyambo yosiyanasiyana ya chipembedzo malembo kucheza ambuye yesu okhala sacrament la ukalisiya ngakhalenso kukonzekera kupereka molowa manja chopereka cha tsikuli

Text:

   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka chilima kukhazikitsa utm bwalo la masintha ku lilongwe tili masomphenya aakulu omwe amangiririka ndondomeko 12 zosinthira lino aku lilongwe alawa kale zina mwa zinthu zomwe adatero malunga 
  msonkhanowu udayenera kukachitikira bwalo la sukulu ya nyambadwe malunga adati asintha kaamba koti bwalolo lalingono 
  wapampando wa gululi noel masangwi adati ukatha msonkhano wa ku blantyre akakhazikitsanso gululo mchigawo cha kumpoto 
  sabata yatha utm idakhazikitsidwa bwalo la masintha mzinda wa lilongwe chinantindi cha chidafika pamwambowo 
  mwa omwe adafika sipika wa nyumba ya malamulo richard msowoya akazi atsogoleri akale lino callista mutharika patricia shanil dzimbiri phungu wa mboma la balaka lucius banda aphungu dpp mboma la mulanje bon kalindo patricia kaliati

Text:
maule akusambabe wamkaka khomo la ukwati silisowa mbanja la nyasa big bullets kudakali chisangalalo chipambano chawo pobabata asilikali ku mzuzu moyale barracks 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu inde asilikali loweruka lapitali adalira kukukuta mano atadzidzimutsidwa bullets yomwe idachita ukali kumapeto kwa masewerowo pamene moyale imafuna iyambe kusangalala 
  ichotu chidali chikho cha presidential cup chomwe wopambana adatenga k10 miliyoni wogonja kutenga k5 miliyoni 
  moyale idachinya mphindi 38 mchigawo choyamba kudzera mwa wiseman kamanga idalimba poteteza chigolicho mpaka mphindi 90 mchigawo chomaliza 
  ochemerera bullets kusamba mkaka goloboyi wa moyale juma chikwenga osewera onse moyale adayamba kupha apo woimbira duncan lengani akuganiza zothetsa masewerowo ikangotha yoonjezera 
  mpanipani udali ku bullets mphunzitsi wawo franco ndawa adalowetsa osewera kutsogolo anayi chiukepo msowoya diverson mlozi mussa manyenje aimable nikiyiza bullets imadza mbandakucha 
  patatha mphindi 93 wosewera wa moyale adachita thengenenge mpaka kugwira mpira kupezetsa bullets penote msowoya adachinya masewerowo alowe mmapenote 
  pilirani zonda msowoya adaphonya mapenote bullets pamene yamikani fodya miracle gabeya nikiyiza fisher kondowe adachinya 
  love jere chrispine fukizi moyale adagwiritsa mapenote sandress munthali mtopijo njewa timothy nyirenda adamwetsa boy boy chima adamenyetsa chitsulo kupangitsa maule atenge chikhochi 
  ochemerera bullets adayenda mimba kuvula zovala kusamba mkaka kusangalala timu yawo yatenga chikho osewera moyale adagwa pansi kulira mosatonthozeka 
  fodya adati loto tsopano lasanduza zochitika mulungu adali mbali yathu zidali zovuta mulungu wazitheketsa adatero
Label: SPORTS

Text:
dayosizi ya karonga iyamba kukakamiza akhristu kuvala face mask ku tchalitchi dayosizi ya mpingo wakatolika ya karonga yakhazikitsa dongosolo loti akhristu adzivala face mask tchalitchi pofuna kupewa matenda covid-19 
 malinga kalata yomwe diyosiziyi yalembera akhristu ake dongosolori liyamba mwezi uno 18 july kumapita mtsogolo 
 wa dayosiziyo ambuye mtumbuka kalatayi yati palibe mkhristu yemwe adzaloredwe kulowa chalitchi adzakhale asanavale face mask 
 malinga mlembi wa diocese yi joseph moloka sikwese dongosolori akhristu akulidziwa kale ati sakukhulupilira papezeka mkhristu onyalanyaza 
 mpingo wa dayosizi ya karonga tikukhulupirira sipakhala mkhristu onyalanyaza kuvala ma face mask choti takhala tikupereka maphunziro ophunzitsa akhritsu onse kuwopsa kwa matenda covid-19 tikhulupirira akhristuwa azindikira iyi njira imodzi yopewera matendawa anatero bamboo sikwesi 
 atinso dayosiziyi ili ndikuthekera kochita kamba koti parish iliyonse inaphunzitsa atelala omwe dayosizi inawapasa nsalu asoke ma mask wa omwe akugulitsidwa mtengo wa 250 kwacha
Label: HEALTH

Text:
ndime ya vakabu yapita samalani mwa okhala mumzinda wa mzuzu ati bwalo lounika za malamulo oyendetsera lino lidati lamulo la vakabu nlosayenera apolisi ayenera tcheru pogwiritsa ntchito malamulo owapatsa mphamvu zomanga opanda chilolezo cha bwalo la milandu(warrant of arrest)kuopa zigawenga kutengerapo mpata wozunguza usiku 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu lachiwiri lapitali oweruza milandu atatu zione ntaba micheal mtambo sylvester kalembera adalamula gawo 184(1 c ya malamulo lino ngolakwika sakugwirizana ulamuliro wa demokalase omwe uli mdziko lino 
  venda wina wogulitsa majumbo mayeso gwanda ndiye adatengera nkhaniyi ku bwaloli mothandizidwa woimira milandu mandala mambulasa 
  kadadzera asadere nkhawa pomwe msangulutso udacheza mwa okhala mzinda wa mzuzu mwa anthuwa chrissy phiri yemwe amakhala ku masasa mzindawu adati sadasangalale kuchotsa kwa lamuloli ata kaamba koti zigawenga zipezerapo danga lozunguza maka usiku 
  phiri adati zigandanga zambiri zimaenda usiku lamulo la vakabu apolisi amatha kuzilonda mpaka kuzigwira 
  ndili mantha zigawenga zikhonza kupezerapo mwai pakuchotsa kwa ndimeyi adatero phiri 
  pomwe frank chisale adati vakabu imalakwika poti pena apolisi amanyamula wosalakwa omwe 
  zina amanyamula opita kumapemphero ausiku omwe adatero chisale 
  adati apolisi amayenera kunyamula okhawo omwe akuganiziridwa zigawenga apalamula mlandu 
  polankhulapo mneneri wa ku likulu la polisi ku lilongwe james kadadzera adati asadere nkhawa kaamba koti apolisi azikwidzingabe oganiziridwa zigawenga pogwiritsa ntchito malamulo 
  kadadzera adati zithandiza kuchepetsa umbava umbanda achotsa ndime ina ya ya gawo 184(1 ya malamulo yomwe imakamba za vakabu adati lamuloli lithandiza kutsekera mchitokosi oganiziridwawa oyenda pansi alibe zida sazinjatidwa 
  okha okhawo omwe apezeka zida zowopsa ndiwo azikwidzingidwa unyolo mpaka kuimbidwa mlandu poyesetsa kuteteza mzika za lino adatero kadadzera 
  ndime yachotsedwayi imapatsa mphamvu apolisi kugwira kutsekera mchitokosi munthu wooneka akhoza kudzetsa chisokonezo zolinga zochita zosemphana malamulo kumene kaya msewu mmalo 
  bwaloli lidanenetsa kandime kokhaka komwe kali kosayenera ndime zina zonse mgawo lonselo zikhoza kugwiritsidwa ntchito

Text:

   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc malinga nyirenda flames idzanyamuka mdziko muno ulendo ku tanzania 4 october osachita zokonzekera timu iliyonse

Text:

  malinga maongokedwe ake queen adandipatsa chikoka choti ndimutengere panyumba mwamwayi nditaponya oti ndamukonda sadavute ndidazitenga zomwe amayembekezera adatero felix

Text:
mtolankhani mdziko la morocco amangidwa kaamba kochita zogonana asanalowe mbanja wolemba thokozani chapola 77 src="http://www.radiomaria.mw wp content uploads/2019/09 rassoin.jpg alt= width="588 height="388 > mlandu omwe mtolankhani wina wachizimayi wa mdziko la morocco amayimbidwa pomuganizira anachita zogonana asali banja anachotsa pathupi ayamba awuyimitsa uzamvedwabe mtsogolomu ziwonetsero zomwe anachita panja bwalo la milandu 
 malipoti wailei ya bbc ati zogonana usanalowe mbanja kuchotsa pakati milandu mdziko la morocco 
 mtolankhaniyu hajar raissouni yemwe amagwira ntchito ku nyumba ina yosindikiza nkhani yomwe imadzudzula kwambiri boma la dzikolo akuukana mlanduwu nkhaniyi yadzetsa mpungwepungwe kwambiri mdzikolo nkhani yokhudza maufulu wanthu 
 atolankhani mabungwe omenyera ufulu wa akukhulupilira kumangidwa kwa mtolankhaniyu kwachitika zifukwa za ndale boma la dzikolo latsutsa 
 malinga malamulo mdziko la morocco amene achita zogonana asanalowe mbanja amayenera kumangidwa kwa chaka chimodzi amene wapezeka wataya mimba amayenera kumangidwa pakati theka la chaka mpaka zaka ziwiri

Text:

 njolomole kulikumbutsa boma zomwe tinagwirizana mlembi wa bungweli madalitso njolomole wauza radio maria malawi aganiza zochita kutha kwa masiku 21 omwe anapereka ku boma likhale litakweza ntchito onse omwe agwira ntchito mboma kwa zaka zoposera zisanu chimodzi 6 
 wati kusachitapo kanthu kwa boma nkhaniyi kukusonyeza chibwana chachikulu ati kunyanyala ntchitoku kuchitika mpaka 12 june pomwe adzabwerenso ganizo lina boma silichitapobe kanthu 
 tikungofuna kulikumbutsa boma lipange zomwe tinalipempha likweze ma civil servants onse omwe akhala malo omwewomwewo kwa zaka 6 kupita mtsogolo anatero njolomole 
 ati kwa omwe padakali sakugwira ntchito apitirize mmene akukhalira kwa omwe amapita ku ntchito atha kumapitabe ati asamakakhalitseko momwe amachitira kale

Text:

  mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika adalamula apolisi kugwira aniva wa zaka 40 atauza atolankhaniwo adagona amayi ana 104 mosadziteteza potsata mwambo wa kusasafumbiumene umachitika msungwana akatha msinkhundi wa kulowakufa umachitika kwa mkazi wamasiye pofuna kukhazika pansi mzimu wa mwamuna 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka adamangidwa aniva gondwa adati akumuzenga mlandu woika miyoyo ya pachiswe mosemphana ndime 1 2 za gawo 5 ya malamulo oti pasamakhale kusiyana pakati amayi abambo pantchito adati adasintha polingalira aniva amadziwa kachilombo koyambitsa matenda edzi ka hiv amagonabe asungwana amayiwo osawauza

  aniva yemwe adakaonekera kukhoti la nsanje lachinayi akusungidwa kundende ya mbomalo pomwe apolisi akufufuzabe za nkhaniyo

Text:
lipoti la imfa ya bingu latekesa boma dpp pomwe malawi waona utsi wokhetsa misozi cha kumangidwa kwa mamulumuzana dpp amaudindo mboma akadaulo pazandale wa kafukufuku mchipanichi george chaponda ati kunjatidwa kwa akamunawa kugwedeza boma la peoples pp kutekesa dpp 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc akadaulowa joseph chunga yemwe mphunzitsi pasukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college ku zomba justine dzonzi wa bungwe la justice link ati mbalizi zingatekeseke komabe zingapereke nyonga ku dpp atsogoleri ake sangapezeke kakuda 
  ndemangazi zikudza malinga kutoledwa kwa atsogoleri angapo dpp omwe atchulidwa mlipoti la momwe mtsogoleri wa lino wa kale bingu wa mutharika adamwalirira zochitikachitika zakudza kaamba ka imfayo 
  mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda 11 june 2012 adasankha komiti yofufuza za nkhaniyo motsogozedwa jaji wopuma elton singini adapereka zotsatira za kafukufuku wawo sabata yathayi kwa pulezidenti banda 
  lipotilo lolemba 11 apolisi adanjata atsogoleri dpp mtsogoleri wa chipani peter mutharika yemwe adaali mneneri wa boma patricia kaliati mneneri wa chipani cha dpp nicholas dausi yemwe adaali nduna ya za umoyo jean kalirani yemwe adaali nduna ya maboma aangono henry mussa yemwe adaali wachiwiri kwa nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani kondwani nankhumwa yemwe adaali nduna ya zamasewero symon vuwa kaunda 
  anamandwa onjatidwa nduna yoona mapulani kayendetsedwe ka chuma goodwell gondwe mlembi wamkulu mboma bright msaka wachiwiri necton mhura enanso wachitetezo wa malemu bingu duncan mwapasa 
  pofika lachinayi nkuti zitatsimikizika yemwe adaali mlangizi wa malemu bingu allan ntata mlandu woyankha adachoka mdziko muno 
  kutoledwa kwa akamunawo kudadzetsa zipolowe mmizinda ya blantyre lilongwe maboma phalombe zomba apolisi adabalalitsa otsatira dpp omwe amaimba atsogoleriwo awatulutse 
  lachitatu omangidwawa kupatula kalirani gondwe omwe amalandira thandizo kuchipatala cha kuthamanga magazi adakawonekera kubwalo lamilandu la lilongwe majesitireti komwe adawapeza milandu isanu umodzi 6 mwapasa adatulutsidwa pabelo ya apolisi ponena mlandu udali wochepa kusiyana enawo 
  mwa milanduyo kuukira boma kulimbikitsa kuukira mlanduwu wachiwiriwu akuti adaupalamula 5 april pomwe akuti adalimbikitsa wa asirikali mdziko muno general henry odillo atenge boma adalembanso kalata yokhudza nkhaniyi 
  milanduyi imawerengedwa woweruza mlandu kubwalolo ruth chinangwa 
  mlanduwo udasamutsidwira kubwalo lalikulu lomwe limazenga milandu ikuluikulu kuukira boma 
  poona milanduyi yomwe mwa ina zilango zake kukakhala kundende moyo wonse kunyongedwa kumene atapezeka olakwa akadaulo pazandale akunenetsa zili nthenya pandale ntchito za boma 
  chaponda polankhula lachitatu adati msonkhano waukulu wa chipani chawo womwe umayembekezereka kuchitika april 19 wayimitsidwa kaye athane za milanduyi 
  tili otangwanika kumangidwa kwa akuluakulu chipani tikathana tinena za tsogolo la msonkhano wa chipani chathu adatero chaponda ponena kumangidwako nkwandale pali mavuto ambiri mdziko muno omwe boma likuyenera kukonza kusiyana milanduyo 
  dzonzi akuti dpp ingakhalebe moyo mizati ya chipanicho yatoledwa gamulo la khoti lingawaipire ndiye kukhale kugwedezeka kuchipanichi 
  chipani chilipobe dpp ili ambiri polingalira awa adali akuluakulu mwezi ukudzawu akuyembekezera kuchititsa msonkhano waukulu zikhudza chipanichi 
  ndikutero atoledwawo amakambidwa akukapikisana nawo kumsonkhanowo maudindo akuluakulu atsogoleriwa angalandire chilango chowasunga kundende ndiye zidzakhala zovuta kwa chipanichi chigulitse atsogoleri atsopano adatero dzonzi 
  adati kumangidwanso kwa msaka gondwe kukhudza boma gondwe wangolowa kumene paundunawo kuchoka kwa atupele muluzi adatinso gondwe amadziwa momwe zina zingayendere ndiye kungomumanga pena pasokonekera 
  gondwe wakhalanso mboma kwa amadziwa momwe za chuma zingayendere apa zina zivuta adatero dzonzi 
  adatinso uwu ungakhalenso mwayi ku dpp mlanduwo ungawakomere kudzakhala atsogoleri ake unyinji wa owatsatira zomwe sizidzawavuta mmasankho akudzawa 
  dzonzi adatinso kumangidwa kwa akuluakuluwa si zifukwa za ndale zimavuta nkuti wandale akamangidwa timathamangira zifukwa za ndale zomwe apa sindikuziona adatero dzonzi 
  naye chunga adagwirizana dzonzi pazina adati zonse zili mmanja mwa abwalo yemwe zikamuyendere ndani 
  pomwe tinkalemba nkhaniyi nkuti zisadadziwike tsiku lomwe boma litengere oganiziridwawa kubwalo liyambe kuzenga milanduyo

Text:
akhazikitsa tindege tothandiza zaumoyo pali chiyembekezo chakuti mavuto omwe amakumana nawo ogwira ntchito mzipatala za kumidzi okhala mmaderawo achepa makina tindege otchedwa drone mchingerezi polumikizitsa maderawa zipatala zikuluzikulu 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu unduna wa zaumoyo nthambi yoyendetsa za maulendo ndenge bungwe loyanganira za umoyo wa ana la unicef atsimikiza za ndondomekoyi yomwe ati yayamba kale kugwira ntchito mmadera 
  kamodzi mwa tindegeto mneneri wa bungwe la unicef doreen matonga wati ogwira ntchito mzipatala za kumidzi amakumana mavuto adzaoneni popereka kulandira thandizo la zaumoyo pakakhala ngozi zodza mwadzidzidzi madera amavuta kufikako 
  adati mavuto odziwika kwambiri nkhani ya mayendedwe pokatenga mankhwala kuchipatala chachikulu pokayezetsa magazi makhololo polandira zotsatira za zoyesazo 
  tidapeza pali zipatala zina zomwe ogwira ntchito amayenera kupalasa njinga mtunda pafupifupi makilomita 70 akatenge mankhwala kuchipatala chapaboma kubwereranso mtunda onga omwewo 
  kuwonjezera apo pakakhala zofunika kuyeza malungo makhololo pamatenga zikafike ku chipatala chomwe amayeza zotsatira zake zifike pomwe wodwalayo akungodikilira adatero matonga 
  wati apa azikgwiritsa ntchito tindegeto timenenso tizithandiza kujambula zithunzi za madera amene kwagwa ngozi kupititsa patsogolo ntchito za internet 
  mneneri wa unduna wa zaumoyo adrian chikumbe wati ndondomekoyi idayamba mmwezi wa february mmadera ochepa idakhazikitsidwa mwezi watha iwunikidwe ndiyothandizadi 
  ikangogwira mavuto ambiri atha nzoonadi mmadera kumidzi amakumana mavuto alandire thandizo moyenera adatero chikumbe 
  woyanganira za maulendo ndenge ku unduna wa za mtengatenga hastings jailosi wati ndondomeko yonse yaunikidwa kale bwinobwino sipazikhala kusokonezana pakati tindengeti ndenge zikuluzikulu zonyamula katundu 
  wati tindegeti tikhala mmasayizi osiyanasiyana tizinyamula katundu wa milingo yosiyanasiyana 
  tina tikhoza kunyamula katundu wolemera makilogalamu 25 tina ntocheperako adatero jailosi
Label: HEALTH

Text:
ngamba ikuwaula mmera akuchilimikabe nkhani ya ngamba siyochita momwe zikuwaukira mbewu mminda ndiumboni wakuti dzuwa lalanda malo mvula alimi ambiri manja mkhosi angofika potailatu mtima zinthu zili choncho alimi sakugonja akuti sangachoke mmunda pokhapokha ataona mbewu yomalizira yauma dzuwa loveness billy ku salima mwa alimi olimbika chonchi steven pembamoyo adacheza naye motere   escom in free for all fuel scam   wait gets longer   secrecy over party funders mlimiyo pakati munda wochititsa chidwi moni ndikudziweni 
  ndili dzina langa loveness billy ndimachokera mmudzi mwa mjunga ku salima 
  tsono pamenepa mukutani apa ndikupala udzu mchimanga mwangamu chikule mosanyozoloka chosokonezedwa udzu zomera zomwe si gawo la mbewu zanga 
  komatu chimangachi chikuoneka palibepo chomwe mungatole mmene chaumiramu 
  owonanu mukuganiza choncho mwini wakene ndikuona chiyembekezo chikadalipo mvula itangoti ibwere mukhoza kuona mmene chinganyamukire mmene ndikupala chonchimu zindithandiza chinyontho chochepa chomwe chilipo mnthakamu chigwire ntchito ku mbewu zokha osati kulimbirana udzu 
  mesa boma likuti mmene zinthu zililimu mukuyenera kukangalika mbewu zina zopirira ku ngamba zimenezo tikutsatiranso moti chakumunsi kwa mindayi kuli madimba komwe tagaula kale pompano tikabzalako mbewu zinazo nyemba kachewere mbatata chinangwa chinangwacho ndiye tidabzala kale kukabzala mbatata timasakasaka mbewu ndiye yapezeka 
  alimi anzanutu atambalala kusungira mphamvu mvula ikagwanso adzaunde mizere ya mbatata chinangwa 
  ayi amenewo ndiwosamvetsa chabe bomawo sakunena tizule kunyanyala chimanga pambali chimangacho tibzalenso mbewu zina palibetu vuto kusakaniza mbewu zinazo chimanga makamaka pomwe malo ochepa mwachitsanzo munthu akhoza kubzala mbatata mmphepete mwa mzere wa chimanga chimanga chikakula pangono amatenga mbewu ya mbatata nkubzala zonse zimakula bwinobwino 
  mumachitaponji zaulimi wa mthirira ulimi umenewonso timapanga mchilimwe tidakumba madamu okololeramo madzi omwe timagwiritsa ntchito kuonjezera omwe timapatutsa mumtsinje mtsinjewo pena madzi kutheratu nanga ogwiritsa ntchito si ambiri kuyambira kumtunda komwe udachokera mpaka kumunsi 
  mwakonzekera ulimi wa mthirira pakadalipano tikuyanganabe zipangizo zina makamaka mbewu feteleza zina madzi muja ndafotokozera kale kupatula mumtsinje tili madamu okololera madzi ikakhala ntchito ina kugaula kuunda mizire ziri mkati mmadimba pasi pakadali pofewa 
  kugawuliratu ndiye podzafika chilimwe sipadzakhala patalimbaso ayi timalawirira kukatchefula mvula ija ikangotha pansi pakayamba mbuuu siyikhalanso ntchito yowawa tikatero timadzipatsa mpata wokwanira wothira manyowa chinyontho chija dothi manyowawo zilowererane 
  mungawauze alimi anzanu omwe ataya mtima asataye mtima akhale chikhulupiliro zonse zidzakhala vuto ndilakuti akatambalala pomwe mvulayi idzabwerenso adzakhala chintchito chachikulu chofunika nkungosamala mbewu zomwe zidamera kalezi nanga sipadalowa kale zambiri mvula ikadzabweraso tizidzangopakiza momwe mbewu zaferatu
Label: FARMING

Text:
aletsa zionetsero ku nkhata bay gulu la omwe amakonza zionetsero zofuna kukakamiza boma likonze msewu waukulu wopita ku mzuzu limange msika malo oimira basi mboma la nkhata bay lidagwetsa ulesi lachitatu lathali pomwe zionetserozo zidalephereka mwadzidzidzi 
  makomiti atatu zachitukuko mmadera ma t timbiri mankhambira mkumbira ataona zitukuko zikuchedwa kukwaniritsidwa mbomalo adagwirizana zochita chionetsero kukapereka chikalata ku ofesi ya dc wa bomalo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu gululo lidagwiritsa ntchito gawo 30 la malamulo oyendetsera lino omwe amakamba za ufulu wa pachitukuko 
  tsiku la zionetserozi litafika adauzidwa bwanamkubwa dc wa bomali sadapereke chilolezo anthuwa angapitirire zionetserozi zikhala zosaloledwa 
  kaunda sakutiuza zomveka tipitirira zionetsero mwa omwe amafuna kutenga nawo mbali pazionetserozo adadzidzimuka atauzidwa atafika kale pamalo nkhumano zionetserozo zalephereka 
  nawo apolisi ovala zamawangawanga omwe adalipo 16 sadalekerere kuchoka mumzinda wa mzuzu kukasonkhana nawo pamalo nkhumanowo roadblock mbomali patatha maola awiri opanda chochitika adabwerera ku mzuzu 
  mneneri wa polisi mchigawo cha kumpoto maurice chapola adati apolisiwo adangopita kukakhala tcheru posungitsa bata zionetserozo zikadapitirira 
  msangulutso adalankhula wampando wa komiti yomwe imakonza zionetserozi mabvuto kaunda yemwe adati bwanamkubwa wa bomali amene adaletsa zionetserozi 
  mwa malamulo lino zionetsero zimachitika pokhapokha padutsa masiku awiri mutapereka kalata yanu yodziwitsa dc tidatsatira lomwe tidapereka kalata yathu loweruka sabata yatha kuwadziwitsa tichita zionetsero lachitatu adatero kaunda 
  kaunda adati adali odabwa atauzidwa dc lachiwiri zionetserozo sizikhalako kaamba koti lolemba lidali latchutchi choncho sangaliwerengere 
  ifetu zionetsero zathu zikadakhala za bata timafuna kukapereka kalata kudzera ku ofesi yawo yopita kuofesi ya mtsogoleri wa lino yoti satiyankha zakuspa pamasiku 30 tidzayamba kugona kuofesi ya bwanamkubwayu adatero kaunda 
  adati anthuwa atopa kulonjezedwa zitukuko zomwe sizikukwaniritsidwa kaunda adati boma lidayamba kulonjeza zoti likonza msewuwu ndalama zochokera ku bank ya african development bank afdb zaka zapitazo pamalopa palibe kontilakita yemwe 
  tidamvetsedwanso kudaperekedwa k368 miliyoni yomangira depoti msika zonsezi kuli zii adadandaula kaunda 
  adati bwanamkubwayu wauza komitiyi unduna wa za mayendedwe bungwe loona za misewu mdziko muno la roads authority ra akumana nawo athetse kusamvanaku 
  tikuti sakatiuza zomveka tipitirira zionetsero adatero kaunda 
  dc wa bomali alex mdooko sadapezeke lamya zake zonse ziwiri pomwe timasindikiza nkhaniyi 
  mneneri wa bungwe la ra portia kajanga adavomereza ntchitoyi yachedwadi adati apa nguluwe yalira msampha utaninga ati ntchitoyi iyamba posachedwappa 
  ntchito yatha kale inde tachedwa anthuwa asade nkhawa zitheka osati atiopseza potsatira dongosolo lake adatero kajanga 
  ntchito yomanga msewu idakhazikitsidwa mwezi wa july mchaka cha 2013 panthawiyo ntchitoyi imati itenga ndalama zokwana k14.8 biliyoni imayembekezereka kugwiridwa kwa zaka zinayi mpaka chaka cha 2017
Label: POLITICS

Text:
kuyezetsa magazi kwayenda mlembi wamkulu unduna wa zaumoyo wati sabata yolimbikitsa kuyezetsa magazi pofuna kudziwa uli kachilombo koyambitsa edzi idali yapamwamba popeza ochuluka adakayezetsa magazi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mkuluyu dr charles mwansambo wati sabatayi yatha dzulo apitirize kuyezetsa adziwe momwe mthupi mwawo mulili ndikukonza tsogolo lawo 
  adati mutu wa ntchitoyi chaka chino udali kayezetseni lero mukonze tsogolo lanu undunawo udachalira kufikira 250 000 
  ntchitoyo idayamba 6 mwezi uno mwambo wokhazikitsa sabatayi udali mboma la mangochi 
  mwansambo adati chaka chino maso adali mwapadera omwe ubwenzi mbanja 
  akayezetse adati wodziwa momwe mthupi mwake muliri chisankho chabwino cha ubwenzi ndondomeko ukwati 
  ngakhalebe tikutero sikuti taika malire kaya mwana wa zaka 13 akhoza kuyezetsa apa makolo tikuwapempha atithandize ana azidziwa momwe mthupi mwawo muliri adatero mwansambo 
  ku mulanje kwa gulupu chisinkha mdera la t mabuka ntchitoyi yayenda mophangirana 
  gulupu chisinkha yemwe timalankhula naye lachiwiri akuyezetsa magazi adati mmudzi mwake sadachite kukakamizidwa akayezetse 
  adatumiza zipangizo zokwana 2 000 ndikunena zatsala zochepa ndiye akubwerabe adatero chisinkha 
  adati mmudzi mwake adakhazikitsa lamulo lothana ndikusalana kotero amakhala womasuka kukaona momwe mthupi muliri 
  kusalana mlandu wolakwa ndimamukokera kubwalo adatero chisinkha 
  ku madera ntchitoyi idali yovutirapo 
  gulupu njobvuyalema ya kwa t ngabu mboma la chikhwawa yati pofika lachiwiri 7 achipatala adali asadafike 
  chonsecho ati nkuti achipatala atauza kumeneko ntchitoyo idzagwirika 6 7 zomwe sizidachitike 
  tadikirira zosathandiza tidakonzekera chipatala chili pamtunda wa pafupifupi makilomita 30 
  adachoka kutali kalogamudzi womaliza pakati mozambique malawikoma angobwerera adatero gulupuyu yemwe mudzi uli 3 000 
  zidavuta mwansambo adati alankhula wa chipatala cha ngabu amve chomwe chidachitika kwa njobvuyalema asalandire thandizo panthawi yake 
  mwansambo wati mwa zina ntchitoyi yayenda popeza kusalana kwachepa 
  wati poyamba ankaopa kukayezetsa poopa anzawo adziwasala akapezeka kachilombo koyambitsa edzi zomwe ati sinkhaninso asintha maganizidwe 
  ndidali ku mangochi komwe adamasuka kulankhula za momwe mthupi mwawo muliri ichi nchitsimikizo kusalana mdziko muno kwachepa adatero mwansambo 
  ntchito zokhudza matenda edzi posachedwapa zazunguliridwa manongongo mwa nkumati boma lisintha mankhwala otalikitsa moyo arv 
  mwansambo adati angoonjezera zingapo zothandiza kuthana mavuto omwe amakumana nawo akayamba kumwa mankhwalawa mmbuyomu 
  adati munthu ukamwetsa ma arv pamakhala mavuto kutupa mitsempha amadandaula akukula kumtunda 
  adati zophatikizira zatsopanozo zithana zovuta 
  pankhani ya thumba lomwe kumachokera ndalama zothandizira ntchitoyi mwansambo adatsutsa malipoti oti thandizolo likutha 
  adati padali zina zomwe eni thumbalo adafunitsitsa zifotokozedwe zonse zidatheka 
  adati thumbali likuthandiziranso kulimbana matenda chifuwa chachikulu tb malungo 
  mchaka cha 2008 sabata yoyezetsa magazi idachailira 250 000 mneneri wa unduna wa zaumoyo henry chimbali adati chiwerengerochi sichidakwanitsidwe 
  kuchokeranso chaka ichi ntchitoyi sidagwirike mmalo mwake boma ati limaunguza zofooka zikonzedwe 
  posachedwapa wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino khumbo kachali adati 50 000 mdziko muno amatenga kachirombo ka hiv pachaka 
  kachali adanena ku namitete mboma la lilongwe pamwambo wokumbukira omwe adatsikira kuli chete kaamba ka matenda edzi 
  uko wa bungwe la unaids mdziko muno patrick brenny adati lino lachita pankhani za kadyedwe koyenera kuthandiza omwe kachiromo ka hiv kudzipereza podalira pachuma kuteteza ana kupatsiridwa kachirombo ka hiv pobadwa kuthandiza omwe kachiromboka kupeza mankhwala otalikitsa moyo arv 
  malinga chimbali pafupifupi 380 000 akulandira mankhwala otalikitsa moyo pomwe pafupifupi 1 miliyoni ndiwo akudwala matendawa
Label: HEALTH

Text:
kabwira alimbikitsa sukulu za mkomba phala wolemba glory kondowe nt uploads/2019/10 kabwira.jpg alt= width="201 height="250 />kabwira tiona momwe zithere dr jessie kabwira ati kulimbikitsa ntchito za sukulu za mkomba phala chidwi ndondomekoyi kungathandize kutukula maphunziro mdziko muno 
 dr kabwira omwe phungu wa ya malamulo mdera la kumpoto chakuzambwe kwa boma la salima ati sanachite zisankho zomwe zinachitika mdziko muno mmwezi wa may chaka chino mzika yokonda lake akuyenera kuthandizirapo zinthu zina zidziyenda 
 ati litukuke pakuyenera ndondomeko zabwino adzikhala chakudya madzi ukhondo 
 zili kwa iwowo kusiyanitsa ntchito zomwe ndagwira kwa zaka 5 wina amene amusankhayo mboma la salima kumpoto chakumadzuro mboni yanga ikakhala nkhani ya madzi malo chakudya pakadali akudziwa mulungu tiona zitha anatero dr kabwila 
 ati zomwe zimawakhuza kwambiri khani ya njala apemphanso chitukuko cha sukulu madzi chakudya chipite patsogolo mderalo
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
tambulasi walangiza ophunzira apewe kulowelera ndale wolemba thokozani chapola .mw wp content uploads/2019/10 tambulasi.jpg alt= width="293 height="388 />tambulasi apewe kutenga gawo zinthu zosemphana sukulu wa sukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor professor richard tambulasi wapempha ophunzira sukuluyi apewe zionetsero pakakhala zovuta zina sukuluyi 
 professor tambulasi amalankhula mwambo wolumbiritsa president komiti yatsopano ya ophunzira sukuluyi 
 ati ophunzirawa akuyenera kutsata njira yokambirana kuthetsa mavuto amene pakati pawo 
 professor tambulasi alangizanso ophunzirawa achenjere ndale omwe amadzera mwa atsogoleri ophunzirawa akwaniritse zofuna zawo ndale 
 atsogoleri amayenera zitsanzo zabwino kwa amenyere ufulu wabwino kwa ophunzira anzawo apewe kutenga gawo zinthu zomwe zosemphana maphunziro anatero professor tambulasi 
 phunyanya chomwe tinabwelera kuno sukulu poyankhulapo president yemwe wasankhidwa kumene udindowu godfrey phunyanya wati ayesetsa kugwira ntchito mokomera ophunzira anzake 
 chomwe tinabwelera sukulu ndiye ndigwira ntchito maphunziro anzanga apite patsogolo anatero phunyanya 
 mwa omwenso asankhidwa mmaudindo osiyanasiyana annie fundi yemwe amusankha wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri sukulupo mpando wa speaker wapita kwa blessings mmamera wachiwiri atupele nsonda
Label: POLITICS

Text:
anayi aperekera umboni mlandu wa chamthunya mboni zinayi za mbali ya boma zaperekera umboni wawo mlandu omwe misonzi chanthunya akuganiziridwa anapha bwenzi lawo linda gasa mchaka cha 2010 
 mboni zinachokera ku monkey bay komwe kuli cottage ya chanthunya mboni imodzi ndiyochokera ku ofesi ya boma yoona zolowa kutuluka mdziko muno ya immigration 
 malinga lawyer oyimira boma dr steve kayuni mbonizi zilipo zisanu imodzi pali chiyembekezo choti mbonizi zikhala zikupitilira kubwera ku bwaloli kudzapereka umboni wawo 
 ogwira ntchito kwa oyimbidwa mlandu ogwira ntchitoku immigration mboni zinazo sizinabwere amagwira ntchito lachinayi masana adzapezeka adzayikire umboni anatero dr kayuni 
 polankhulapo ku mbali ya ozengedwa mlandu micheal goba chipeta ati sangayankhulepo zambiri mlanduwu udakali mkati
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
fodya nkunazale pamene alimi fodya yakaliyakali kukonzekera ulimi wa 2015/16 mlangizi wa zaulimi wa fodya mboma la rumphi charles jere walangiza alimi atsatire ndondomeko malangizo oyenera popanga nazale ya fodya pofuna kupindula ulimi wawo 
  pocheza uchikumbe posachedwapa jere adati nazale ya fodya si ili ya ndiwo zamasamba kaamba koti imafuna chisamaliro chapadera kupanda kutero palibe chimene mlimi wa fodya angapindule fodya nchifukwa chake pali akuti fodya nkunazale 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc choyamba mlimi akuyenera kupeza malo omwe aikepo nazale yake malowa akuyenera kufupi madzi oyenda omwe akuoneka opanda tizilombo toyambitsa matenda wina ulionse adatero jere 
  jere adati mlimi akuyenera kutipula nazale kutengera kukula kwa munda mlangiziyu adati paekala imodzi bedi la nazale likuyenera lotalika mamita 30 mita imodzi mlifupi pomwe hekitala imafunika mabedi atatu muyezo woterewu 
  akapanga bedi lija mlimi akuyenera kutenga mapesi chimanga nkuwasanja pabedi lija akatero awaotche cholinga chofuna kupha tizilombo tomwe tidali mudothi tomwe tikadatha kuononga fodya panazalepo 
  apa adikire masiku awiri atatu ayambe kufesa fodya panazalepo adafotokoza jere 
  adati mlimi ayenera kuthira feteleza wokwana makilogalamu atatu asadafese fodya uja akafesa fodyayo athire mankhwala aphe tizilombo nyerere zomwe zikhoza kudya mbewuyo 
  mankhwala ofunika kuthira panazale amene amapha tizilombo toyambitsa matenda mufodya adatero jere 
  malinga jere mankhwalawa kusungunula mutheka la madzi mukheni kuwathira panazale paja pataikidwa kale maudzu
Label: FARMING

Text:
wopanda chiphaso cha nzika sadzavotamec bungwe loyendetsa zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec latsimikiza chiphaso chakale chovotera sichidzanunkha kanthu pachisankho cha 2019 
  wapampando wa komiti yoona zophunzitsa kumwaza mauthenga kavotedwe commissioner moffat banda wati mmalo mwake bungwelo ligwiritsa ntchito zitupa za unzika 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka wati iyi njira yokhayo yomwe bungweli lingathanirane zachinyengo zomwe zimapezeka panthawi yachisankho ndiyokomera zipani zonse 
  njira yogwiritsa ntchito zitupa za unzika idzatithandiza kupewa osafika zaka 18 asadzaponye nawo voti idzaonetsetsa amalawi okhaokhadi omwe adzaponye voti watero banda 
  wati apa mpofunika mmalawi akalembetseretu bungwe lolemba za unzika asadzavutike panthawi yoponya voti kaamba koti zitupa zina zonse sizidzagwira ntchito 
  wa bungwe loyanganira zamomwe zisankho zimayendera la malawi electoral support network mesn steve duwa wati bungwe la mec likhoza kudzikola lokha siliyendetsa za nkhaniyi 
  duwa wati kugwiritsa ntchito ziphaso za unzika njira yothandiza kuchepetsa zachinyengo potengera malamulo oyendetsera zisankho amalawi akadali ufulu ogwiritsa ntchito zitupa zosiyanasiyana 
  malingana lamuloli munthu yemwe mmalawi adafika pamsinkhu woponya voti akhoza kugwiritsa ntchito zitupa choyendetsera galimoto choyendera mmaiko ngakhalenso kalata yochokera kwa amfumu mbale wodalirika kuntchito 
  pokhapokha akumane nkusintha lamuloli msanga malamulo omwe timadziwa amalola kugwiritsa ntchito umboni uliwonse amalawi choncho mposavuta ozindikira kudzatengera mec kukhoti adatero duwa 
  wati pakali bungwe la mec likhoza kumalengeza zomwe lakonza popanda kulankhulapo pamakhala akudikira zinthu zikamadzapsa mpomwe adzayambe kusokosa 
  mec izikonzeratu mokhota monse sizingadzakhale yothaitha adzayambe kulimbana mmakhoti pankhani yophweka iyi watero duwa 
  zipani zina za ndale zati zilibe mangawa bungwe la mec chachikulu bungwelo lidzaonetsetse munthu woyenera kuvota waonetsa khumbo adzalandire mpata 
  zanjirazo tilibe nazo ntchito tikungofuna bungwe la mec lidzapereke mpata kwa amalawi ogwiritsa ntchito ufulu wawo oponya voti pasadzapezeke nkhani yachitupa yalepheretsa munthu kuponya voti watero mlembi wa malawi congress party mcp eisenhower mkaka 
  mneneri wa chipani cha peoples party pp noah chimpeni adagwirizana mkaka chofunika nchoti amalawi asadzaphwanyiridwe ufulu wawo oponya voti 
  ilipo akufunitsitsa kudzagwiritsa ntchito njira imeneyo ndiye awonetsetse amalawi onse apatsidwa mpata wolembetsa mkaundula wa unzika adatero chimpeni 
  wapampando wa bungwe la mec jane ansah adati bungwelo lakonza ndondomeko yoti munthu sadzamanidwa mpata malingana watsatira malangizo 
  tikudziwa si amalawi onse omwe angakhale atalembetsa pofika tsiku loponya voti akhoza adalembetsa zitupa zawo sizidatuluke onsewo tawaganizira 
  tapanga njira ziwiri yoyamba omwe alembetsa chiphaso sichidatuluke adzabwere tiketi yolembetsera imene idzatithandize kuwazindikira mkaundula yachiwiri pochita kalembera wathu tidzakhala ogwira ntchito ku bungwe la kalembera wa unzika omwe azidzathandizira adatero ansah
Label: POLITICS

Text:
ku liwawadzi aponya voti ku ward ya liwawadzi mdera la kumpoto kwa boma la balaka aponya voti yofuna kusankha khansala wa deralo 
 chisankho cha chibwerezachi chikudza imfa ya yemwe anasankhidwa khansala wa derali chisankho chomwe chinachitika mdziko muno 21 may 2019 
 malinga mtolankhani wathu amene ku derali ochepa omwe akupita kukaponya voti yawo chisankhochi zomwe zikupereka chikayiko chakuti ochepa omwe atenge nawo gawo poponya voti chisankhochi 
 amene akupikisana chisankhochi alipo asanu 6 omwe precious chimtengo omwe oyima powokha falao kambiri omwe akuyimira chipani cha democratic progressive dpp mervin makwinja akuyimira chipani cha freedom harris mhere omwe akuyimira chipani cha mbakuwaku movement for development mmd ronald mphepo omwe akuyimira chipani cha peoples pp obert peter omwe akuyima pawokha 
 malinga dongosolo la bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno la malawi electoral commission mec kuponya voti kwayamba 6 koloko mmawa kukuyembekezekanso kutsekedwa ikakwana 6 koloko madzulo pambuyo pake payambe ntchito yowerengera mavotiwo 
 okwana 2482 omwe analembetsa kaundula wa voti chisankhochi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
boma lilimbana odzembetsa wolemba sylvester kasitomu unduna owona za chitetezo cha mdziko wati uyesetsa ntchito yolimbana ozembesta human trafficking umenenso wakula kwambiri mdziko muno 
 nduna undunawu nicholas dausi anena mzinda wa lilongwe mwambo wokumbukira tsiku lolimbana wozembetsa lonse 
 dausi ati ndizomvetsa chisoni wu ukuchitikira ophunzira kumene zomwe zikuyika pachiopsezo miyoyo ya ambiri choncho ati unduna wawo ugwirana manja magulu onse okhudzidwa polimbana mchitidwewu 
 zomatenga tili ntchito zoti mukagwoire mmaiko wena pamapeto pake ndikumakawagwiritsa ntchito za uhule zina tikudzidziwa zitheretu mdziko muno anatero dausi 
 polankhulapo oyanganira nkhani zozembetsa ku nthambi ya bungwe la united nations yoona nkhani zokhudza makhwala ozunguza ubongo mdziko muno maxwel matewere nthambi zonse zoona za malamulo mdziko muno ziwunika nkhaniyi itheretu omwe apezeke akhudzidwe mchitidwewu amangidwe 
 amangidwa kale pokhudzidwa milanduyi anchajidwa kale osangala boma latengapo gawo pofuna kuteteza anthuwa anatero matewere 
 amangidwa pokhudzidwa milanduyi okwana 32 mwa anthuwa 16 omwe milandu yawo inatha akugwira ukaidi kundende za mdziko lino
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
chilima wati akuluakulu nthambi zomwe zachedwa kupereka malipoti alandire chilango wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino dr saulos chilima wati akuluakulu nthambi za boma zomwe zakanika kupereka malipoti ntchito zawo kufikira 17 july chaka chino akuyenera apatsidwe chilango 
 chilima yemwenso nduna yowona za chitukuko cha kagwiridwe ntchito ka nthambi za boma 7 9 july anakumana akuluakulu nthambi za boma mchigawo chapakati chakumwera komwe anawauza pasanafike 17 july akhale atapereka malipoti momwe agwilira ntchito zawo 
 walamula akuluakulu nthambi alandire chilango kudzera kalata yomwe mneneri wa wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleriyu pilirani phiri walemba mwa nthambi 66 zomwe zimayenera kupereka malipoti 56 zomwe zinapereka malipotiwo yake pomwe 9 zapereka mochedwa nthambi imodzi yomwe ya malawi institute of management mim siyinaperekebe 
 polankhula radio maria malawi wofalitsa nkhani ku nthambi ya kagwiridwe ntchito ka nthambi za boma mccarthy mwalwimba ati wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa linoyu wokhumudwa khalidwe lomwe akuluakulu nthambi khumi zi awonetsa walamula akuluakuluwa alandire chilango 
 kalatayi yoona yachokeradi ku ofesi ya vice president padakali nthambi zomwe zalephera kupereka malipotiwa zapemphedwa kudzudzulidwa akuluakulu ku nthambi zimenezi anatero mwalwimba 
 ati padakali chilangochi sichinaziwike zitengera oyenganira mabungweyu awadzuzula motani
Label: POLITICS

Text:
apalamula poitana t kumwambo pafoni mwambo wobzala mitengo ku bula mboma la nkhata bay udasokonekera lachinayi pamene mfumu mbwana idakana kupita kumwambowu ati kaamba koti okonza mwambowo sadatsate dongosolo loitanira mfumu 
  mwambowu womwe adakonza nthambi ya zankhalango mogwirizana bungwe la temwa udaima pafupifupi mphindi 30 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka apatu nkuti akuluakuluwo akukambirana za tsogolo la mwambowo wapampando wa chitukuko kumeneko ivol nyirenda yemwe adabweretsa uthengawo 
  mlendo wolemekezeka pamwambowo yemwe wapampando wa khonsolo ya nkhata bay hastings mkandawire pamodzi akuluakulu boma adangoti kakasi kusowa chochita poti zawo zinali zitada 
  nawo ana asukulu pamodzi onse oitanidwa adali nyominyomi pamalopo pomwe adangokhala pansi kudikira za zotsatira za zokambiranazo 
  uwutu udali mwambo waukulu wokhazikitsa nyengo yobzala mitengo mchigawo cha kumpoto

Text:
malawi wapindulanji muzaka 49 umphawi wankitsa kuli ufulu pamene lino lero likukumbukira lakwanitsa zaka 49 lili ufulu wodzilamulira amalawi ati pali zina zolozeka zikuyenda zambiri zaphotchoka cha dyera la andale omwe kwawo nkudzikundikira chuma 
  maiko omwe sadasiyane malawi potenga ufulu wawo africa muno botswana 1966 mozambique 1975 south africa 1961 tanzania 1961 zimbabwe 1980 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kadaulo wa ndale kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college joseph chunga wati zaka za mma 1970 mpaka 1980 kumaoneka makamaka kumbali ya chuma kusinthaku akuti kumaonekanso 2005 mpaka 2006 zomwe wati zimapereka masomphenya kwa lino lifanana abwenzi oyandika nawo 
  la malawi lidalandira ufulu wodzilamulira 1964 chaka chimodzi la zambia malinga ndemanga malawi ndiye akutsalira kwambiri maiko omwe adalandira nawo ufulu moyandikana zaka 
  maiko omwe sadasiyane malawi potenga ufulu wawo africa muno botswana 1966 mozambique 1975 kenya 1963 tanzania 1961 zimbabwe 1980 
  chunga wati zaka za mma 1970 mpaka 1980 kumawoneka maka kumbali ya chuma kusinthaku akuti kumawonekanso 2005 mpaka 2009 zomwe wati zimapereka masomphenya kwa lino lifanana abwenzi oyandika nawo 
  mzaka zimenezi timaonetsa tikupita patsogolo pena timabwerera mwinanso kungoima pamodzimodzi osasuntha kuyambira 2010 ndiye zimaonetsanso tikubwerera nkhani zachuma sizinali 
  komwe tikulowera sikukudziwika bwezi tikumafananako maiko omwe tidatengera nawo ufulu moyandikana zambia ndiwo abwenzi athu chuma chawo sichingafanane malawi ku mozambique kudali nkhondo komabe sungafanize malawi adatero chunga 
  adati vuto atsogoleri athu akulephera kunena komwe tikupita zomwe zikuchitikazo zitifikitsa pati 
  ndiye ndakhala ndikunena andale athu alibe mtima wotukula lino zomwe amatiuza si zomwe amazichita zikuchititsa mpaka lero tikhalebe osauka adatero chunga 
  senior chief kalonga ya mboma la karonga yati ntchito za chitukuko zikuyenda motsimphina zomwe wati zikuchititsa malawi asamafanane maiko 
  vuto kwathu kuno nkuti pomwe chitukuko chabwera chimayenda pangonopangono ndizo zikuchititsa tisamafanane anzathu 
  tikufunika tizilolerana wina akuyendetsa tiyeni timupatse kumuthandiza osati kumukankhira pansi ifeyo tilamulire ndizo zikuchititsa tizingokhalabe pamodzimodzi adatero kalonga yemwe akuti pomwe lino limatenga ufuluwu nkuti alipo 
  ndidamenya nawo nkhondo moti ndidali mgulu la omwe adatentha ofesi ya dc ku karonga kuno adali mzungu ndiye timawathamangitsa mpaka tidatentha katundu adatero kalonga 
  senior chief tengani ya mboma la nsanje yati amalawi tichepetse ndale tipite chitsogolo 
  zolozeka sitingakane zachitika kuchoka mmanja mwa atsamunda chinthu choti utha kukamba mwayi woti munthu wakuda atha bwana zokambika vuto loti ufulu wathu sukutipindulira 
  zikutenga tizisunthira chitsogolo pena tikumabwereranso zikuchitika cha dyera lomwe andale nalo sakufuna kuthandiza omwe akuwatsogolera pakhale chitukuko kukokerana pansi kutsutsana kwakula tichepetse adatero tengani yemwe adati umphawi ndiwo wakakamira mmidzi 
  t champiti wa mboma la ntcheu wati zingapo zasintha ndithu kupezeka kwa sukulu mmidzi zipatala misewu sizokwana 
  kale achimwene ku ntcheu kuno kunalibe chipatala zomwe zimasautsa amayi oyembekezera sukulu zipatala zili mtalimtali komabe tikunena tili nazo 
  boma libweretse zipatala anthufe tachuluka pomwe zothangatira moyo wathu zikuchepa adatero champiti 
  pangani chimwaza wa mmudzi mwa manjeza kwa t kadewere mboma la chiradzulu wati atsogoleri athu akumadzikundikira chuma zomwe wati sizingapititse malawi patsogolo 
  atsogoleri athu sakufuna kutitukula kudzilemeretsa okha zambiri zikumakhala zawo tochepa tokha ndito akutigawira tamva za chuma cha mtsogoleri wapitayu momwe adalemerera pomwe tidamuika pampandopo tili chimodzimodzi 
  choncho sitingayembekezere tipita patsogolo atsogoleri athu atukule pambuyo zikatere ndiye tizisuntha zomwe amalonjeza zimasemphana zomwe akuchita pomwe ayamba kutilamulira adatero chimwaza 
  ruth samikwa wa mmudzi mwa mambala kwa t kwataine mboma la ntcheu wati pena tikumapita patsogolo pena tibwerera atsogoleri athu akumakhala nkhuli yofuna kudzikundikira chuma nkuiwala amalawi 
  akakhala pamipando sakumalabadira za omwe anataya powavotera kumbali ya zachuma ndiye mavuto osasimbika adatero samikwa
Label: ECONOMY

Text:

   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc bullets ili mapointi 56 yatsala masewero awiri oyamba lero imalizitsa sabata ya mawa blantyre united yomwe yatuluka mligiyi 
  moyale ili mapointi 53 nayonso yatsala magemu awiri yoyamba ya lero imalizitsa blue eagles yomwe ikuphupha ithere panambala 3 mligiyi 
  moyale ipambane lero ndiye ligiyi tidikirabe sabata yamawa ithe pamene matimuwa akudzasewera masewero womaliza 
  kulepherana mphamvu kwa matimuwa lero bullets ipambane zipereka chilimbikitso bullets yatenga ligiyi 
  zikusonyeza moyale ikuyenera kupambana masewero alero ngatidi yathemba zotenga ligiyi moyale ikapambana ndiye nkhondo ikhala zigoli zochinya zochinyitsa mapointi atatu amene atsala mmasewero asabata ya mawa 
  bullets yachinya zigoli 41 yachinyitsa zigoli 18 moyale yachinya zigoli 43 yachinyitsa zigoli 22 zikutanthauza moyale ikachinya bullets chigoli chimodzi kudzachinya eagles chigoli chimodzi ndiye bullets ikuyenera kudzachinya blantyre united zigoli zoposa ziwiri itenge ligi 
  apa nchifukwa ligiyi ili ya masamu zomwe nicholas mhango wa moyale elijah kananji wa bullets akunenetsa kupambana nkhondoyi ichepe 
  masewero andime yoyamba bullets idapambana zigoli ziwiri kwa chimodzi masewerowa adachitikira ku mzuzu lero kamuzu stadium yomwe inyamule ntchitoyi

Text:

Text:
the rain mnyamata wanthetemya ambiri otchuka makamaka amasewero oyimba azisudzo amakonda kudzitcha maina otchukira kusiya pamchombo mchitidwewu sudayambire kuno ku malawi ayi ngakhalenso kumaiko akunja ziliko tikakamba za kwathu kuno tili nawo maulendo soldier anonga piksy shakira safintra omwe atchulidwa apawa zitsanzo chabe alipo ambiri makamaka achinyamata omwe akutchuka nyimbo zamakonowa steven pembamoyo adacheza bright vitsotso mnyamata yemwe watchuka pawailesi kanema nyimbo zamakono akuti dzina lake lodyera the rain 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu vitsotso ndimagawa yanga tandifotokozera ndiwe ndani mnyamata 
  dzina langa bright vitsotso wa kwa waliranji mboma la mchinji ndikukhala ku lilongwe 
  wati bright vitsotso nanga the rain akuchoka pati the rain dzina lomwe ndimatchuka nalo pazoimbaimba pali maina awiri la the rain young star omwe otsata nyimbo zanga amadziwa 
  umaimba chamba chanji ndimaphatikiza rap hip hop zomwe ndimaziimba motsatira mingoli ya chifirika panopa ndidapanga chikole kampani yojambula nyimbo ya dash travellers entertainment ndikugwira nawo kwambiri ntchitoyi 
  luso lako lidayamba liti chilakolako choimba chidandiyamba mchaka cha 2005 pomwe ndinkaimba anzanga zidali zamasewera chabe ndikukula ndidayamba kulemba nyimbo zokhudza zinthu zochitikadi mmoyo wa munthu nkumayeserera kuziimba uku ndikudzijambula ndekha nkuona zikumveka ndithu 
  pakalipano uli nyimbo zingati ndili nyimbo zingapo yoyamba kujambula idali chikumbuntima yomwendidathandizana peter banda mabilinganya empire kenako ndidajambula swazi mabilinganya empire kenako honey yomwe ndidajambula katelele chingoma nditangomaliza imeneyi ndidajambula ndikuopa lady pace nkupuma kaye 
  nyimbo zako zimakhala uthenga wanji nyimbo zanga zimakamba za mmene moyo ulili nkhani zochitikadi sindifuna kuimba nyimbo zokhala nthano ayi zoti munthu akamamvera azitha kulumikiza zomwe ndikunena zomwe amakuna nazo kuona mmoyo 
  kupatula zoimba china chomwe umachita chiyani kupatula kuimba ndimalembanso mafilimu kuvina mpira ndidapanga za magetsi ku yunivesite ya nairobi ku kenya kenako ndidagwirapo ntchito mmapolojekiti airtel kwa zaka 5 ndikupitiriza maphunziro ku united arab emirates
Label: MUSIC

Text:
mangochi defiler gets 14 years ihl by thokozani chapola 022.jpg 413w sizes="(max width 518px 100vw 518px > senior resident magistrate court sitting in mangochi has convicted and sentenced asedi makoloni to 14 years imprisonment with hard labour for defiling girl under the age of 16 years contrary to section 138(1 of the penal code 
 state prosecutor sub inspector emmanuel kambwiri told the court that from april to june 2019 at nombo village in traditional authority jalasi in mangochi district the convict who is neighbour to the mother of the girl defiled her several times in her bedroom during night time when her mother leaves the house to attend night prayers or funeral ceremony 
 it came to light when the mother discovered that her daughter has missed menstruation upon quizzed the girl narrated the ordeal said kambwiri 
 the convict pleaded not guilty to the charge levelled against him the state paraded three witnesses who testified against him beyond any reasonable doubt that made the court to find him quilty 
 in mitigation makoloni asked for courts leniency because he believed that the girl was above 16 years but in submission the state prayed for stiff punishment citing that as neighbours the convict choose to defile the girl instead of taking fatherly role of prorecting her 
 when passing the sentence senior resident magistrate joshua nkhono concurred with the state hence he slapped makoloni to 14 years imprisonment with hard labour in order to deter would be offenders 
 makoloni 46 hails from nombo village traditional authority jalasi in mangochi district
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:

   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza lipy g amatipondeleza kodi kuimba zadansi udayamba liti kuimba ndidayamba pakale ndithu imeneyo ndili kusukulu ya sekondale pamene ndimazindikira ndili luso losangalatsa kupyolera mmaimbidwe munyimbo za dansi 
  kodi chomwe unapindulako kuchoka maimbidwe kudzera mmaimbidwe malinga ndalama zomwe ndimapeza kuchoka ku zoimbaimba zandithandiza kwambiri moti ndinatsegula malo wojambulira nyimbo amene amatchuka dzina loti future records uku ku zingwangwa mumzinda wa blanytre 
  kupatula kuimba umachitanso chiyani pamoyo wako wa tsiku tsiku inetu ndimapanga bizinesi ndine katswiri pankhani yojambula nyimbo 
  kodi chimbale chako chatsopano chituluka liti mutu chimbale changa chikuyembezereka kutuka mapeto mwezi wa october chomwe chikhale nyimbo zokwana khumi zomwe zayimbidwa chiyakhulo cha chichewa muchizungu kuyambira 15 october 2015 mpomwe ndiwadziwitse amalawi zambiri 
  kodi mavuto ati omwe oimba zadansinu mumakumana nawo mavuto omwe timakumana nawo kupita kuzoimbaimba osapatsidwa ndalama yomwe tidagwirizana kumeneku timaona tikuponderezedwa atukule luso lathu amafuna tiwapatse ndalama 
  kodi ati omwe unaimbako nawo nyimbo limodzi chiyambireni kuimba malawi inetu chiyambireni kuimba malawi ndiyimbako nyimbo ambiri blasto nepman awa akadaulo ndaimbako maiko akunja botswana south africa uganda

Text:

 wachiwiri kwa nduna yowona za kusasiyana pakati amayi abambo ana chisamaliro cha grace kwelepeta wanena ku chipatala chachingono cha domasi mdera la zomba malosa pomwe kampani ya amezam shipping company limapereka zipangizo zosiyanasiyana zozitetedzera ku kachilombo ka coronavirus 
 wati zipatala za mtauni zimalandira matenda ochokera mzipatala za mmadera kumudzi choncho kofunika kumathandiza zipatala zakumidzizi zipangizo zokwanira 
 kwambiri zipatala zantauni zimalandira matenda mmidzi tikuyenera kusamala zipatala zakuno kumidzi ndicholinga zipatala zantauni zisadzadze anatero kwelepeta

Text:
papa wapemphelera amene ntchito zawathera kaamba ka coronavirus mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wati wokhudzidwa ambiri omwe ntchito zawo zatha kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus 
 papa walankhula lolemba misa yomwe anatsogolera ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican 
 wati mliri wa coronavirus wachititsa ambiri azivutika choti ntchito zawo zatha 
 mliri wa coronavirus wabweretsa mavuto nkhaninkhani kaamba koti malo ambiri ntchito mmaiko osiyanasiyana sakuchita malonda kupeza phindu mmene zikhalira zonse cha ichi malo antchitowa akhala okakamizidwa kuchotsa ntchito ogwira ntchito 
 wati wokhudzidwa akaganizira ambiri omwe ntchito zao zatha malinga mavuto omwe mliri wa coronavirus wabweretsa mmalo ambiri ogwirira ntchito 
 ichi papa francisco wapempha onse alumikizane naye popempherera omwe akusowa ntchito ntchito zao zatha cha ichi miyoyo yao ikuyenda mwa pendapenda cha vuto la ndalama 
 ku malawi mliriwu wagwedezanso popeza malo ogwirira ntchito akhudzidwa mliriwu mwachitsanzo sukulu zambiri zomwe si za boma zikuvutika kulipira aphunzitsi kaamba koti sukuluzi zimadalira ndalama zomwe ana amalipira zithandize kulipira aphunzitsi padakali sukulu zonse zotseka kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus
Label: RELIGION

Text:
chipembedzo chikukolezera kupemphapempha mmisewu kukhulupirira chipembedzo kukukolezera wopemphapempha mmisewu zimene zachititsa ntchito yochotsa opemphawa ivute watero wa bungwe limene limachotsa ana mmisewu la chisomo childrens club 
  boma lakhala likulengeza wopezeka akupemphetsa mmisewu adzamangidwa sizikutheka sabata zingapo zapitazo bomalo limalengeza mozungulira mzinda wa blantyre wopezeka akupereka ndalama kwa opemphetsa adzamangidwa 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka akuti mulungu amavomereza kupereka kwa opempha wa bungweli auspicious ndamuwa wati ganizo lochotsa opemphetsa mmisewu silingakwaniritsidwe zipembedzo zambiri zimalimbikitsa kupereka adati chikhulupiriro chopereka chidayala nthenje pakati akhristu asilamu 
  opemphetsawo amadziwa akapita mmisewu akakumana opemphera ndiponso chisoni omwe akawapatse ndalama ana tikawatenga timawapatsa zofunikira pamoyo wawo okonda ndalama kudana sukulu amathawa nkubwerera mmisewu akanakhala sapereka ndalama vutoli bwenzi litatha adatero ndamuwa 
  akhristu akuganiziridwa kukolezera mchitidwewu pofuna kukwaniritsa machitidwe atumwi 20:35 omwe akuti mzinthu zonse ndakuonetsani mwakugwira ntchito molimbika chomwechi muthandize ofookawo muzikumbukira ambuye yesu pajatu kupatsa kumabweretsa chimwemwe chochuluka kuposa kulandira 
  ndamuwa adati asilamu akutichita cha zakati yomwe imodzi mwa ngodya za chipembedzo chawo yomwe achuma amatenga phindu lomwe apeza kugawirako osowa 
  mlembi wa blantyre city presbytery yomwe gawo la sinodi ya blantyre mbusa baxton maulidi adati mpingo umathandiza osowa osati kulimbikitsa mchitidwewu ya yesu opemphetsa adaliponso 
  adati vuto kusathandiza anthuwa mokwanira powapatsa njira zoyenera za kapezedwe ka chuma 
  kulumala ulesi umphawi zimachititsa kupita pamsewu palinso olumala ochuluka omwe akugwira ntchito kumathandiza alungalunga 
  akhristu sangasiye kuthandiza chofunika kupeza njira zokhazikika zoti azidalira osati kupempha munthu wopemphetsa yemwe petulo mbaibulo adamuchiritsa sadabwerere pamsewu adamuthandiza moyenera adatero maulidi 
  sheik alli makalani wa mzikiti wa mangochi boma adati zakati siyikukhudzana opemphetsa chisilamu chimalimbikitsa kugwira ntchito kholo kusamalira ana ake 
  wololedwa kupempha mwana wamasiye yemwe alibe womuthandiza wolumala woti sangagwire ntchito thandizo lake siliyenera kupempha kumsewu amatengedwa kukasamalilidwa kumalo oyenera sitikondwera opemphetsa mwadala adatero 
  maulidi makalani adapempha mabungwe azipembedzo boma apeze njira zokhazikika zothandiza osowa 
  mneneri wa nthambi ya zosamalira lucy bandazi adagwirizana pempholo adati ambiri kupemphetsa khalidwe chabe adapindula mundondomeko za boma zowathandiza kuima paokha 
  pali njira ya mthandizi feteleza wotsika mtengo zina mmatumba chitukuko undunawu umapereka ukadaulo wa ntchito za manja kwa omwe ulumali kudzera ku malawi council for the handicapped macoha mulanje school for the blind komwe amaphunzira kusoka kuluka ukalipentala ulimi akamaliza amapatsidwa zipangizo zoyambira moti ambiri akupemphetsa mmisewu adapindula ndondomekozi adatero 
  bandazi adati opereka ndalama kwa opemphetsawa akuthandizira kuphwanya lamulo 
  mavuto omwe amawapititsa mmisewu sangathe kupemphetsa ndondomeko za boma zofuna apeze zochita zokhazikika zomwe zipaso zake sizingaoneke yochepa udindo wa kuonetsetsa osowa akukhala umoyo wabwino osati mmsewu adatero bandazi
