Text:
apempha kupanga manyowa sukulu ya aphunzitsi development aid from people to people dapp chilangoma ku blantyre yapempha kupanga manyowa akhale mbewu zathanzi zochuluka 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu wa mapologalamu pasukuluyo hope funsani adanena lachiwiri pamwambo wopereka chimbudzi chamakono mdongosolo la school garden and nutrition sgn sukulu ya pulaimale ya samama mmudzi mwa kamowa kwa t kuntaja mbomali 
  chimbudzicho skyloo chimalimbikitsa ukhondo kupereka danga lopanga manyowa kuchoka ku ndowe za 
  chimbuzi cha skyloo pulayimale sukulu ya samama funsani adati manyowa amathandiza mbewu kupirira ku chiwawu amasunga chinyotho kwa yaitali 
  feteleza amaonongetsa ndalama sabwezeretsa chajira mnthaka timafunika kuthira chaka chilichonse manyowa amathandiza mbewu zathanzi zochuluka umathira mmene wafunira banja lililonse likhalenso polima ndiwo za masamba adatero 
  pothirira ndemanga chimbuzichi mkuluyu adati chithandiza kupanga manyowa ochuluka azipeza ndowe zawo zomwe osati za ziweto zokha 
  mfumu kamowa idayamikira dapp kaamba ka chimbuzicho idapempha thandizo upangiri omangira zambiri apindule 
  tadziwa manyowa atithandiza kuthana njala ikudza kaamba ka kwa nyengo ndilimbikitsa kuchigwiritsa ntchito tiyambe kusunga manyowa tithandizeni pomanga zambiri banja lililonse lizisunga chinyontho chake adatero kamowa 
  mphunzitsi wamkulu pasukulu ya samama lameck senzani adati aonetsetsa akugwiritsa ntchito chimbuzicho moyenera chiwapindulire
Label: FARMING

Text:
kayira challenges masamba bout on march 29 mzuzu based professional boxer laston kayira has challenged lilongwe based veteran wilson masamba in an eight round non title bout scheduled for obrigado leisure park on march 29 
  this will be the first mzuzu city fight this year 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi osgood kayuni kayira is claimimg that he has all the qualities to silence masamba we have therefore decided to give him an opportunity to prove his worth phillip ngwira of ken one and nyamaz boxing promotions told the nation on monday 
  according to ngwira the fight has attracted supporting bouts involving mwayi kamanga amos kayira patrick kayira secret chirwa israel banda and clifford yahaya 
  this will be kayiras fourth professional fight in previous bouts he defeated alex chimbalanga in knockout lost to malani kayuni on points and drew against aubrey masamba 
  kayira 24 is currently being trained by gabriel mkondowe 
  i am happy that sponsors have finally come to our rescue i want to prove that my elevation to the professional level was not fluke said kayira 
  on his part masamba said he is prepared for the fight and warned that kayira is too young to fight him 
  the two will fight under lightweight category
Label: SPORTS

Text:
ankadziwana anga kale makolo kusankhira ana munthu wokwatirana naye zinthu zidasintha makolowo akhoza kungokhala muni wowalitsa ana aonane nkukondana 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ambiri apezapo mabanja chakuti makolo abale amachezera limodzi kudzera mukucheza kwawoko ana adaonana kukondana mpaka lero banja 
  lucky sheira patsiku la chinkhowe njira iyi ndimo lidayambira banja la lucky madaika wochokera kwa chipyali mboma la balaka sheira kachitseko wa kwa bubua t makwangwala ku ntcheu 
  awiriwa akumane nchifukwa chakuti lucky ankapitapita kwa shiera malingana bizinesi yake ya zamakompyuta kukaonana sheira kasitomala 
  ukutu akuti kudali kumayambiriro chaka cha 2015 atapita kangapo kunyumbako adalephera kuugwira mtima mpaka adapempha nambala ya lamya aziimbirana nkumacheza kenako chibwenzi chidayambika 
  tidakhala pachibwenzi kwa miyezi ingapo kenako tidaganiza zopanga chinkhoswe zonse zoyenera kukaonekera kumakolo zina zitachitika chinkhoswecho chidachitikadi ku area 47 mumzinda wa lilongwe adatero sheira 
  adati mmiyezi 7 ikudzayi awiriwa adzakhala akuvekana mphete makamaka 9 july 2016 mumzinda womwewu wa lilongwe 
  lucky adati aiwiriwa amakhulupirira powalenga mulungu adakonza adzakhala limodzi poona chikondi chomwe amapatsana akuti pali zambiri zomwe onse amakonda kudana nazo
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
apempha makwaya athandize radio maria mwa atsogoleri kwaya ya st benadetta masanjala ya arkidayosizi ya blantyre felix khonje ati makwaya mpingo wa katolika udindo waukulu wothandiza radio maria malawi 
 imodzi mwa kwaya zomwe zinatenga nawo gawo festival ya radio maria khonje anena pofotokozera radio maria zazikulu zomwe wailesiyi yachitira makwaya mpingowu mdziko muno zomwe makwayawa ayenera kuyithokoza 
 ati samaonetsabe kufunika kothandiza radio maria malawi kamba ka zifukwa zawo akuyenera kudziwa wailesiyi chida cha mphamvu chothandizira kufalitsa uthenga wabwino kudzera mpingo wakatolika mdziko muno 
 radio maria ikuthandiza kwambiri makwaya mdziko muno nde njira yokhayo yobwezera ulemu kupereka thandizo lathu ku wailesiyi anatero khonje 
 kwaya ya st benadeta masanjala yomwenso inakhala katswiri chiphwando cha mayimbidwe chomwe wailesiyi inachititsa mchaka cha 2019
Label: RELIGION

Text:
boma lalowa nthenya mphunzitsi kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college blessings chinsinga wati kumangidwamangidwa kwa omwe akuoneka siabwenzi boma kukutanthauza boma la dpp lachita mpungwepungwe kotero likungofuna kuthana anthuwa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc chinsinga adalankhula msabatayi kumangidwa kwa yemwe akufuna kudzaimira pulezidenti mchipani cha udf mmasankho 2014 atupele muluzi 
  kumangidwa kwa muluzi kukutsatira kumangidwa kwa wa bungwe loona ufulu wa ogula la consumers association of malawi cama john kapito yemwe adatoledwa atapezeka ndalama zakunja 
  apolisi adamanganso woimira pamilandu ralph kasambala pomuganizira adavulaza 
  chinsinga wati boma likuonetsa lagwidwa njakata likungofuna kuthana omwe akulijejemetsa zina 
  apa wina akangokalasula khala athana naye ndidakakonda boma likadasiya amalawi azilankhula zakukhosi kwawo popanda kukokana akuganiza choncho chinsinga 
  wati zingasiye amalawi pamavuto chilichonse chikuchitika amalawi ndiwo akhale pamoto 
  kapito kasambala akhala akulankhula poyera mtsogoleri wa lino bingu wa mutharika akuyenera akapume ponena mavuto mdziko muno adza kaamba ka 
  atupele adanjatidwa lachiwiri msabatayi ku lilongwe akupita ku blantyre 
  kumangidwa kwake kumadza pomwe apolisi adabalalitsa lasabata 18 mumzindawu pomwe mkuluyu amafuna alankhule nawo 
  adamusunga ku ndende ya maula pomwe timalemba nkhaniyi lachitatu nkuti atupele atamutengera kuchipatala cha lingadzi kaamba ka vuto lakuthamanga kwa magazi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
phungu akufuna dera lake akhale luso la malonda phungu wa ya malamulo mdera la blantyre malabada ishumael rafik mkumba wati akufuna mdera lake akhale luso lochita malonda njira imodzi yosungira ndalama 
 mkumba akhale luso losunga ndalama phunguyi yemwenso wachiwiri kwa nduna ya za maphunziro luso la sayansi wanena polankhula radio maria malawi mzinda wa blantyre 
 wati potsatira kumusankha wachiwiri kwa nduna mboma la mgwirizano wa zipani za dpp udf akufuna kukwanilitsa nsanamira ya zipanizi nkhani za chitukuko 
 ifeyo udf ddp timakhulupirira atukuke pamene timapanga mgwirizano uja sizinavute zokhumba zathu zinali zofana anatero mkumba 
 ati lisakuyenda vuto si president vuto mp president amatuma mp kukawatumikira ati awaphunzitsa azisunga ndalama moyenera
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
dovu lakula ku nsanje mboma la nsanje alephera kupirira nkhuli akuphabe kugulitsa ya ngombe mbuzi nkhumba nkhosa mozemba motsutsana chiletso chomwe unduna wa zamalimidwe udakhazikitsa pofuna kuthana matenda zilonda za mmapazi mkamwa foot and mouth disease omwe adabuka mbomalo miyezi itatu yapitayo 
   escom in free for all fuel scam   wait gets longer   secrecy over party funders unduna wa zamalimidwe udaletsa kupha kugulitsa ziwetozi mbomali 8 january malinga kubuka kwa matendawo chiletsochi sichidachotsedwe akuphabe ngombe ziweto zina kugulitsa mozemba zomwe zikupereka chiopsezo matendawo atha kukhodzokera maboma 
  senior chief malemia wa mbomali watsimikiza zikuchitikadi wauza achitetezo mmidzi agwire amene amupeze akuchita 
  malire nsanje chikwawa amayenera kuponda mankhwala vuto lake anthuwa akumapha ziweto mozemba ndiye zikuvuta tiwagwira komabe tikuwafufuza tikawapeza tiwagwira adatero malemia 
  pocheza msangulutso palamya posachedwapa ernest msambo wa ku fatima kwa t mlolo mbomalo adavomereza kumeneko akupha ziweto kugulitsa yake motsutsana chiletso cha boma 
  achimwene lija nkale adaletsa azipha kugulitsa nkhuli yavuta kuno timadalira kupha kugulitsa ziweto tipeze ndalama nchifukwa chake akuchita mwakabisira pamsika sungaipeze mupeza mmakomo akudya adatero msambo 
  yemwe akulondoloza momwe nthendayi ikuyendera dr patrick chikungwa adati uku nkulakwa anthuwa samvera lamulo la boma matendawa atha kufalikira lonse 
  panopa tili mkati mothana matendawa ndiye akuchita zithu mosemphama ndondomeko yomwe takhazikitsa asokoneza zomwe tikuchita adziwe matendawa angathe kufalikira lonse akuzembetsa ziweto pogwiritsa njira zamadulira adatero chikungwa 
  maboma blantyre zomba mwanza mulanje thyolo kuchigawo cha kummwera amadalira yochokera mboma la nsanje chikwawa 
  malire bomali chikwawa sorjin phokera mtayamoyo paikidwa zipata za mankhwala madzi omwe munthu galimoto ikamatuluka mboma la nsanje akumapondapo asalowetse matenda mmadera 
  chikungwa wati sizingathandize kwenikweni akudzerabe njira zina osadzera pazipatazi 
  apapa ndiye angathe kulowetsa mmaboma podutsa njira zachidule ikalowa mmadera ndiye nakonso kufika matendawa ndiye kuthana nawo kwake kudzakhala kovuta kwambiri adatero chikungwa 
  adati kufika lero achita katemera katatu mbomalo akudikira aonetsetse nthendayi yatheratu asadalengeze ayambe kupha kugulitsa ziweto zawo 
  matendawa amapha ngombe nanga nchifukwa chiyani aletsanso nkhosa nkhumba mbuzi zisamaphedwe nzoonadi matendawa amagwira maka ngombe ziweto zinazi zili kuthekera kofalitsa matendawa mwachitsanzo nkhumba imene ili pachiopsezo chachikulu kufalitsa matendawa 
  pofuna matendawa tiwamalize mosavuta tidaletsadi ziweto zinazi zisatuluke mbomalo zisaphedwe ncholinga choti pasakhale kufalikira kwa matendawa adatero chikungwa 
  adati ngombe ikagwidwa matendawa imatenga sabata ziwiri iyambe kuonetsa zizindikiro zoti ikudwala ikagwidwa zilonda za mmapazi kukamwa imalephera kuyenda kudya zikatero imafa 
  malinga ofesi ya ziweto muunduna wa zamalimidwe boma la nsanje lili ngombe 40 000 mbuzi 147 000 nkhosa 3 000 nkhumba zoposa 20 000 
  boma la chikwawa nalo lidakhudzidwa matendawa ngombe 91 965 ndizo zidalandira katemera mchigawo choyamba cha katemerayo
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
osaiwala kuteteza mtedza ku chuku pamene mbewu ya mtedza yacha katswiri wa mbewu za mtunduwu kwa bvumbwe richard andasiki akuti alimi ateteze mbewuyi ku chuku pamene akukolola kuyanika kusenda kusunga 
  malinga katswiriyu mtedza umachita chuku mlimi akafulumira kuchedwa kukolola ukanyowa poyanika mlimi akauviika mmadzi cholinga choti asende mosavuta akasunga pachinyontho 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mtedza wopanda chuku umayenda malonda tisaiwale tikapitiriza mtedza wa chuku sitingakhale mwayi wogulitsa ku maiko akunja choncho miyoyo yathu lathu silingatukuke 
  chinthu china chomwe chikuyenera kutipatsa mantha nchoti chuku chimatulutsa poizoni yemwe amayambitsa matenda khansa kunyentchera adatero 
  kuonjezera apo mphunzitsi wa ku nthambi ya za ulangizi wa mbewu ku lilongwe university of agriculture and natural resources luanar paul fatch adati poizoniyu amachepetsa chitetezo cha mthupi chilakolako cha zakudya 
  poizoniyu akachuluka mthupi amachepetsa mphamvu yobereka adatero fatch 
  pofuna kupewa zonsezi andasiki adati choyambirira alimi akolole mtedza wokhwima akaukumba awuyanganitse kumwamba kufikira utauma akachoka apo athothole ndikuuika mmatumba ndikusunga pouma 
  katswiriyu adafotokoza mlimi akolole mtedza akaona mkati mwake makoko achita madontho akuda 
  pofuna kutsimikiza adati mlimi akuyenera kukumba mapando okwana 10 mwapatalipatali akamaliza athothole mtedza ochepa phando lililonse ndikuwusenda 
  mlimi akapeza mwa mtedza 100 omwe waswa wosachepera 80 makoko ake madonthowa ndiyekuti wakhwima ayambe kukumba adafotokoza motero 
  adati pamene mlimi akukumba mtedza akuyenera kuwuzonditsa uyangane kumwamba cholinga choti uwume dzuwa 
  mlangizi wa za ulimi wa mbewu ku dowa sangayemwe kausiwa adati alimi akuyenera kusamala pokumba wambiri usasalire mmunda 
  poyambirira adati mlimi apewe kudzula mtedza azigwiritsa ntchito khasu 
  pokumba mlimi aziima pakati mzere ndikukuma mbali zonse ziwiri mwa mphamvu cholinga choti onse unyamuke adatero kausiwa 
  mlangiziyu adati kuyenda mmunda ndikumatolera osalira kumathandizira pafupifupi mtedza wonse uchokemo 
  adaonjeza alimi apewe kuviika mtedza mmadzi usavute kuswa zimakolezera chuku 
  andasiki adafotokoza alimi apewe kusunga mtedza wosenda kwa yaitali umaonongeka 
  malo wosungira mbewuyi akhale ouma alimi ayiteteze ku makoswe adatero katswiriyu 
  moses tanazio wa mboma la ntcheu mwa alimi omwe amatsatira kwambiri malangizo ulimi wa mbewuyi 
  adati padakali sadayambe kukolola kufikira ukwaniritse zomwe alangizi adamuuza 
  mtedza wanga ukakhwima ndimakumba ndikuuyanika mmunda momwemo powuzondotsa ndimathothola pokhapokha ukauma 
  mtedza owuma umachita phokoso ukamautafuna choncho ukafika apa ndimathothola kuusankha kuulongeza mmatumba abwino ndikuunga adatero
Label: FARMING

Text:
atumiki dayosizi ya dedza asulidwa za chibalalitso wolemba thokozani chapola owona za utumiki dayosizi ya dedza peter white lachisanu lapitali ati ati msulo wowakonzekeretsa ansembe sisiteri za chaka cha chibalalitso cha mpingo umathandiza kuzindikiritsa atumikiwa ntchito yomwe nayo mpingowu 
 white omwe oyanganira za utumiki dayosiziyi amalankhula maphunziro tsiku limodzi omwe anakonzedwa office yoona za mabungwe utumiki wa apapa dayosiziyi 
 tinawona kofunika kuwasula atumikiwa amene amakhala patsogolo kutsogelera ma parishi choncho akamvetsa za chibalalitso cha mpingo zikathandizanso pomema akhristu apereke molowa manja tsikuli anatero white 
 mmawu ake wa mabungwe utumiki wa apapa dayosizi ya dedza peter madeya ati office yawo inakonza maphunzirowa ansembe athe kuzindikira za chibalalitso cha mpingo athe kuzindikiritsa akhristu zimene papa akufuna uthenga wawo wa chaka chino 
 zithandizanso atumikiwa kumvetsa zambiri za mabungwe utumiki wa papa anatero madeya 
 mwambo waukulu wa chaka cha chibalalitso mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno uchitikira ku st pius parish arkidayosizi ya blantyre 13 october 2019
Label: RELIGION

Text:
atenge gawo pothana kwa nyengo cadecom bungwe loona za chitukuko mpingo wakatolika la cadecom lati akumudzi akuyenera kutenga gawo lalikulu pofuna kuthana mavuto omwe amadza kaamba kakusintha kwa nyengo mdziko muno 
 kwa nyengo kukubweretsa mavuto awa mwa akuluakulu ku bungwe li ku likulu la mpingo wakatolika mdziko muno aron kandiwo ntaya omwe lachinai mkumano omwe bungweli linali nawo mdera la senior chief liwonde mboma la machinga pomwe amafuna kudziwa mwa mavuto omwe anthuwa akukuma nawo kaamba ka kwa kanyengo 
 ati apitiliza kuthandiza mderali cholinga chofuna kuchepetsa mavuto omwe akukumana nawo kaamba kakuonongeka kwa chilengedwe kuwapatsa maphunziro mmene angabwezeretsere chilengedwe 
 tiwapatse mphamvu akwanitse kupeza kangachepe pakhomo pawo kuthana kwa nyengo anatero kandiwo 
 polankhulapo dalisto tengani omwe mwa amene amayanganira nkhani zakusintha kwa nyengo ati mderali akukumana mavuto ambiri omwenso mwazina akupangitsa aphwanyilidwe maufulu 
 abambo tikukumana mavuto tikukanika zofuna zathu pamoyo wathu njalayi ikuchititsa tizipita ku mozambique kukasaka maganyu komwenso timavutika kwambiri anatero tengani
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
kugawana ulamuliro kungatheke ku mw pomwe mtsutso ukupitirira maganizo woti atsogoleri lino azigawana zigawo zozilamulira watenga malo nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani kondwani nankhumwa yati gwero la mtsutsowu si zotsatira za chisankho cha 20 may momwe mtsogoleri wa lino adasankhira nduna zake 
  pachisankho cha 20 may mtsogoleri wa chipani cha dpp peter mutharika adapeza mavoti 36 mwa 100 alionse kusonyeza 64 mwa 100 alionse samamufuna posankha nduna mutharika adasankha nduna 13 zakumwera za pakati zinayi za kumpoto zachititsa kunena ndibwino atsogoleri azilamulira zigawo zawo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc nankhumwa yemwenso woyanganira zisankho ku dpp adavomera nduna zambiri ndizochokera mchigawo cha kumwera adati zili choncho chipani cholamula chidapeza aphungu ambiri mchigawochi kusiyana zigawo zina 
  palibe chachilendo apa momwe zimakhalira mtsogoleri amasankha nduna aphungu omwe nawo ndiye zidachitika mtsogoleri wa lino adali maina ambiri aphungu kumwera sizingadzetse maganizo ogawana ulamuliro adatero nankhumwa 
  nankhumwa adatinso palibe chowerengera kuchuluka kwa omwe adasankha chipani cha dpp pachisankho cha 20 may 2014 zonse zimayendera mmalamulo 
  malamulo achisankho amati yemwe wapeza mavoti ambiri ndiye wapambana ndiye mtsogoleri ndiye sindikuonapo nkhani powerengera adavota angati azinena chigawo chakuti sichimamufuna akufuna azikhala atsogoleri adatero nankhumwa 
  magulu kudzanso zipani za ndale akhala akupempha zigawo za mdziko muno zikhale utsogoleri wawo chitukuko ntchito zina ziziyenda mofanana 
  akhala akudandaula zigawo zina makamaka cha kumpoto sichikutukuka mofanana zigawo zinzake zonse zili pansi paulamuliro umodzi 
  mphunzitsi wa zandale kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college blessings chinsinga adati omwe akulimbikitsa sakuphwanya lamulo lililonse akugwiritsa ntchito ufulu omwe nawo 
  adati mboma la demokalase amakhala mphamvu zosankha mmene akufunira zinthu ziziyendera adati zimayenera kutsata ndondomeko yomva maganizo podzera muvoti ya liferendamu 
  kuteroko nkukhwima maganizo pandale akusonyeza akuzindikira ufulu wawo chofunika nkutsata ndondomeko yoyenerera ya liferendamu adatero chinsinga 
  mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika lolemba adati amalawi ayenera kukambirana za nkhaniyi mutu uoneke 
  nchovomerezeka kupereka maganizo pankhani zosiyanasiyana bola maganizowo akuperekedwa mchoonadi motsata malamulo adatero mutharika 
  bungwe lounikira za momwe zinthu zikuyendera mdziko muno la public affairs committee pac lidati zomwe adanena mtsogoleri wa lino chirimbikitso 
  mneneri wa bungweli peter mulomole adati chibukireni nkhaniyi bungwe lawo lakhala likumenyerera zakuti apatsidwe mpata wopereka maganizo 
  adati nzosangalatsa atsogoleri aonetsa chidwi chopereka mpatawu zomwe adati zithandiza manongonongo onse okhudza nkhaniyi athe kudzera muchisankho chomva maganizo 
  pac tilibe mbali cholinga chathu nchakuti apatsidwe mpata wogwiritsa ntchito ufulu omwe nawo kaya anthuwo adzasankha kayendetsedwe ka kaya ayi tilibe nazo ntchito ziyendere maganizo adatero mulomole 
  chinsinga adati zili choncho pakufunika kufatsa kuteroko kukhozanso kubweretsa chisokonezo china 
  pakadalipano ambiri sakudziwabe tanthauzo la federalism chitaganya nkofunika kuwaphunzitsa kaye mokwanira amvetsetse apo ayi tikhoza kudzaonanso mavuto adatero chinsinga 
  adatinso nkofunika kuunikira uwu si mpikisano wa ndale poopa zotsatira za maganizo anthuzo zingadzatanthauziridwe molakwika potengera mwa omwe akulimbikira nkhaniyi azipani za ndale 
  nkhaniyi itangoyamba kumene mafumu akuluakulu mchigawo cha kumpoto adasonyeza kusagwirizanayo adauza nyuzipepala ya the nation lolemba pambuyo maganizowa 
  mwa mafumuwa chikulamayembe wa ku rumphi kyungu wa ku karonga adati adatsutsana maganizowa poyamba sadafunsidwe omwe amalimbikitsa za nkhaniyi adafunsidwa ayimvetsetsa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
anatchezera akundidabwitsa anatchereza   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndili chibwenzi mwamuna wina chomwe chimandidabwitsa nchoti zonse ndikamuimbira foni usiku samayankha 
  ndikamufunsa amati idali kotchajitsa gogo ndikuona mwamunayu akundiyenda njomba mkazi wina akuopa akayankha amudziwa chibwenzi 
  ndithandizeni   pk ndirande blantyre 
  pk ndikadakuthandizani mokwanira ndikadziwa chibwenzi chanu chidayamba nanga mwakhala zaka zinga muli chibwenzi nanga mwamunayo wa zaka zingati amakhala ndindani nanga chiyani ndalankhula kaamba koti ndikuona simukumudziwa 
  zambiri atsikana ambiri safufuza mokwanira asanamulole mwamuna makamaka munthuyo akakhala wachikulire 
  zotsatira zake amakagwa mchikondi mwamuna wa mwini zomwe zimaika pachiopsezo miyoyo tsogolo lawo

Text:
ganizo lokweza fizi libweretsa njirimba kudali matatalazi ku nyumba ya malamulo lachinayi lapitali pamene aphungu adapindirana ndevu mkamwa pokambirana za ganizo la boma miyezi itatu yapitayo lokweza fizi msukulu zasekonadale zaukachenjede mdziko muno sizikudziwika aphule poto ndani pankhaniyi 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu nkhaniyi idatentha mnyumba ya malamuloyi pomwe aphungu maka otsutsa oima paokha adadzudzula boma silidakhoze pokwenza fizi msukuluzi kaamba koti panthawi ino amalawi ambiri pamavuto aakulu zachuma malinga njala yomwe yagwa mdziko muno 
  mbali ya boma mnyumbayi idayesetsa nkhaniyi isakambidwe aphunguwo sadagonje mpakana mapeto ake adagwirizana nkhaniyi yofunika kuunikidwa modekha 
  adayambitsa nkhani jumbe boma kudzera muunduna wa zamaphunziro lidakweza ndalama zolipirira maphunziro msukulu za boma zasekondale zaukachenjede ati pofuna kuchepetsa chipsinjo chomwe boma lidali nacho poyendetsa sukuluzi 
  panthawiyo mneneri wa unduna wa zamaphunziro manfred ndovie adati kukwera kwa fiziku nkopindulira amalawi zithandiza maphunziro apite patsogolo 
  pali zambiri zomwe zikufunika kukonzedwa pankhani za maphunziro choyamba malo ophunziriramo zipangizo zophunzirira malo ogona chakudya zisinthe mpofunika ndalama ndiye mukudziwa kale mmene boma lilili pankhani ya zachuma adatero ndovie 
  phungu wa chigawo cha pakati mboma la salima felix jumbe yemwe wachipani cha mcp adati kukweza kwa fizi kwafika panthawi yomwe amalawi ambiri vuto la njala mavuto zachuma 
  adati zomwe boma lidaganizazi nkufuna kusautsa osalakwa omwe kale paumphawi wadzawoneni 
  aphungu ambiri adagwirizana ganizo la jumbe mwa esther jolobala woima payekha yemwe adati zomwe adanena jumbe ganizo lozama lofunika kuliona 
  ganizo lokweza sukulu fizi silidafike yabwino zimenezi zisokoneza makolo ambiri sindili muno kufuna kusangalatsa mbali ya boma yotsutsa kudera langa kummawa kwa boma la machinga adatero jolobala 
  nduna ya zachilungamo malamulo samuel tembenu idayesetsa kuletsa zokambirana nkhaniyi ponena nyumba ya malamulo ilibe mphamvu yosintha lamulo kudzera mnjira yomwe jumbe adatsata 
  naye phungu wa kummwera kwa boma la mangochi lilian patel wa chipani udf adati nkhaniyo si yofunika kukambidwa kaamba kakuti sidali pamndandanda wa nkhani zofunika kukambidwa sizidamveke zidatengera sikikala wa nyumbayo richard msowoya kulamula nkhaniyo ikambidwe kuunikidwa aphunguwo 
  pambuyo pake aphungu adagwirizana boma lisakweze fizi panopo mpaka mtsogolomu zinthu zikayambanso kuyenda kumbali ya chuma 
  potsirapo ndemanga wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe oona maphunziro akuyenda la civil society education coalition csec benedicto kondowe adati kukweza fizi nkofunika maphunziro aziyenda adati boma silidatsate ndondomeko yabwino 
  adati mmene zinthu zilili panopa yokwanira kukonzekera osangoti lero lero amalawi ambiri alibe ndalama 
  kunena chilungamo mmalawi muno muli mavuto omwe ndalama ochepa kwambiri ndiye kukweza fizi panthawi yomwe akukonzekera zaulimi si chanzeru akadayamba alengeza nkupereka yokonzekera adatero kondowe
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
mec mcp yakhutira kalembera zinthu zasintha akulembetsa mwaunyinji mgawo lachiwiri la kalembera wa zisankho zomwe zidzachitike mdziko muno chaka cha mawa 
  wa bungwe loyendetsa zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec jane ansah mneneri wa malawi congress party mcp maurice munthali adati wokhutira mmene akulembetsera mgawoli 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka ntchito ya kalembera zikusiyana kwambiri momwe kalembera adayendera mgawo loyamba momwe amabwera mosisitika moti mabungwe chipani chotsutsa boma cha mcp ati sadakhutire momwe adayendera kalembera mgawolo apempha mec ibwererenso mmabomawo 
  mgawo loyamba mec yachititsa kalembera mmaboma kasungu salima dedza pamene mgawo lachiwiri bungweli likulembetsa ku mchinji nkhotakota dowa ntchisi 
  ansah adati mec yokhutira momwe akubwerera moti mmalo odzalembetsa akumafika 700 
  kungoyambira tsiku loyamba july 13 2018 akubwera mwaunyinji kudzalembetsa moti mmalo chiwerengero cha odzalembetsa chikumafika 700 patsiku adatero 
  naye wa bungwe la national initiative for civic education nice trust ollen mwalubunju watsimikiza zoti zinthu zasintha kwambiri mgawo lachiwiri la kalembera wa zisankho 
  mwalubunju adati zinthu si zisintha 40 peresenti ya ikhala atalembetsa pofika dzulo 
  zinthu zikapitirira chonchi ndiye zolinga za demokalase zomwe nkupereka mphamvu kwa zikwaniritsidwa adatero mwalubunju 
  akupita kukalembetsa mwaunyinji akubwerera osalembetsa kaamba koti zipangizo za mec zikumaonongeka malo akumatsegulidwa mochedwa 
  zinthu zikuyenda nkhawa yathu ili makina mec omwe sakukhalira kuwonongeka adatero munthali 
  omwe adapita kwa tembwe chiwaula ku mchinji tsiku lotsegulira gawo lachiwiri la kalembera wa zisankho adabwerera kaamba koti makina bungwe loyendetsa zisankho adali atawonongeka 
  mdera la mfumu dambe mboma lomwelo makamaka kwa chankhanga nthema gaandali kapiri kudali mizere italiitali ya ofuna kulembetsa zinthu zimayenda mwapangonopangono kaamba koti makina mec amangowonongeka 
  ansah adati bungwe lake latumiza akatswiri mmaboma onse okhudzidwa azikakonza msanga makina akawonongeka 
  patsiku lotsegulira kalembera ku dowa 210 ndiwo adalembetsa kwa kainja 48 kwa pheleni 176 kwa mbido 126 kwa tsache 64 kwa msaderera sukulu ya pulayimale ya mvera padalembetsa 64 
  james gama yemwe akuyanganira zisankho mbomalo adati ntchito imayenda pangonopangono amagwiritsa ntchito makina woyendera dzuwa womwe samagwira ntchito cha nyengo 
  tikugwiritsa ntchito ma generator zinthu zasintha moti tikukhulupirira tikwanitsa chiwerengero chomwe tikuyembekezera adatero gama 
  nako ku ntchisi nkhotakota vuto lidali kusagwira ntchito kwa makina 
  malingana summy nganjo yemwe akuyanganira kalembera ku ntchisi mec ikuyembekezera kulembetsa 163 352 ambiri akubwera kudzalembetsa 
  nyakwawa galeta ya ku nkhotakota idati mmadera ogwira ntchito mec achitetezo akumabwera mochedwa 
  mlembi wamkulu wa mcp eisenhower mkaka adati momwe zinthu zikhalira mgawo zawonetsa poyenera mec idalephera ntchito mgawo loyamba 
  naye mneneri wa udf ken ndanga adati mec isapupulume kufalitsa malipoti abodza isadafufuze mokwanira chomwe chidachitika mgawo loyamba lakalembera
Label: POLITICS

Text:
ndewu ya gule kudambwe kudali fumbi koboo kudambwe la phingo mboma la chikwawa pamene gulewamkulu adaponyerana zibakera pokanganirana zovala zovinira 
  mneneri wapolisi ya chikwawa foster benjamin gule wina adavulazidwa pamene adamutema pamutu botolo adamutengera kuchipatala akamusoke 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kudavuta ku chikwawa gulewamkulu kutola mwala izitu zimachitika mmawa cha mma 7 lamulungu pamene guleyu amafuna avale atakase kudambweko 
  benjamin adati kudambweko kudasonkhana amene amafuna kuvala gulewamkulu mnyamata wina innocent tayi akuti adapitako alibe zovinira 
  zidachititsa apemphe mnzake colless tiwa amubwereke zovala zake adakanizidwa 
  tayi adakakamira mpaka ndewu idabuka pakati tiwa adatero benjamin 
  podziwa avulazidwa tayi 17 adatola botolo lagalasi kumenyera nalo tiwa pamutu mpaka kutemeka 
  malinga benjamin ammudzi ndiwo adathamangira kudambweko kukaleletsa ndewuyo 
  dambwelo lili mudzi ndiye pamene anthuwo amamva kulira adathamangirako akaone chimene chimachitika kenaka adagwira tiwa kubwera naye kupolisi komwe tidamutsekera lamulungu pamlandu wovulaza tidamutengera kuchipatala tayi adatero 
  tiwa adamutsegulira mlandu wovulaza lachiwiri tayi atatulutsidwa kuchipatala adapita kupolisiko kukathetsa mlandu 
  paramount lundu ya mbomalo yati zimachitika pena amasemphana chichewa nanga pali nkhani pamenepo simusemphana anzanu idafunsa mfumuyo 
  titafunsa mbomali muli gulewamkulu lundu adati chikwawa kuchimake kwa gulewamkulu 
  simudziwa kuno kwawo kwa gulewamkulu simukudziwa mchaka cha 1969 kamuzu banda adadzafika kuno komwe kudambwe langa kuno tili gulewamkulu adatero lundu amene adati kudambweko amakhala zovala zake 
  wa bungwe la achewa la chewa heritage foundation chefo george kanyama phiri adati zimene wapanga gulewamkulu ku chikwawa chisonyezo amenewo si ometa 
  tikamakamba za gulewamkulu timanena za chigawo chapakati ku blantyre pangono osati ku chikwawa adatero kanyama 
  muyenera kudziwa gulewamkulu mizimu imachokera kumanda sibwino kusambira gulewamkulu 
  masiku apitawa gulewamkulu amavutitsa ku mchesi mumzinda wa lilongwe pamene amagenda galimoto samupatsa ndalama
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
jb watukula amayi ntchito ikadali pamene la malawi lagwirana manja maiko padziko pokukumbukira tsiku la amayi amalawi athirapo ndemanga momwe mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda wagwirira ntchito akuti wayesetsa kutukula amayi mdziko muno pomwe sakukhutitsidwabe wakwaniritsa chiyembekezo chawo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc woyendetsa bungwe loona zomenyera ufulu wa amayi national coordinator la women and law in south africa wlsa kuchigawo cha kummwera kwa africa seodi white wa bungwe la malawi communications regulatory authority macra martha kwataine ati maudindo omwe amayi asenza lero sadayambe akhalapo nkale lomwe zomwe zikusonyeza banda wachitapo cholozeka miyezi 11 yomwe wakhala akulamulira 
  white wati udindo wa mlembi wamkulu mboma hawa ndilowe maudinso amene wasenza kwataine ku macra chitsimikizo banda wasinthako moyo wa amayi mdziko muno 
  ukakhala pulezidenti amayangana zambiri iwe komabe zili apo pulezidentiwa pena zimakhala zikuwalaka potero samaonetsa chitsanzo chabwino zimachititsa kulankhula amayiwa obalalika amakhala akubwerera mmbuyo akutero white 
  akupemphanso banda achilimike amayi mmaudindo omwe sadakhalemo sitikufuna aziti amayi gemu yawakanika 
  mmawu ake kwataine wati mwachaje satafuna pulezidenti banda wachitapo zolozeka imeneyi maka kwa amayi zomwe zikuwalitsa amayi mdziko muno 
  taona amayi akukhala nduna amayi akusenza maudindo onona zomwe zikutinyaditsa mafuta agalimoto akupezeka kusiyana ya dpp ichi chonyaditsa 
  pakalakwika timalankhula pena pakakoma tisabise amayi tisachite nsanje mnzathu akachita tisanyengerere zikakhota adatero kwataine 
  tsiku la amayi timalikumbukira 8 march chaka chino mdziko muno alikumbukira loweruka lino mutu lonjezo lonjezo yochitapo kanthu pothana nkhaza kwa amayi

Text:
nanawa mlowammalo wa kupitakufa matenda hiv edzi asokoneza miyambo ina mwambo wa kupitakufa womwe umapereka mphamvu kwa fisi akakonze maliro pocheza namfedwa kwa sabata ziwiri machezawo amachitika katatu patsiku cha matendawa kwabwera njira ya nanawa yomwe yazilalitsa mwambo wa kupitakufawu bobby kabango adali mboma la nsanje komwe adacheza mlembi wa nyakwawa masanzo kwa t mlolo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa kodi amfumu tawapeza ayi iwowa adzukirira kudimba akuyembekezereka kubwerako madzulo ntchito yakula kumeneko 
  tidalire mutithandiza vuto lathu musakaikenso ndine mlembi wa amfumuwo ndiye palibe chomwe sindikuchidziwa chokhudza mudzi uno miyambo yomwe timatsata 
  mkaka mwambo wa nanawa timangomwa mankhwala othamangitsa imfa kodi mwambo wa kupitakufa ukuchitikabe kuno zikuchitika mobisa momwe matenda edzi aopseramu sungayerekeze kumachitabe mwambowu amabungwe akhala akufika kumemeza miyambo yoipa umenewu itheretu zipatso zake zikuonekadi 
  ndiye mukutani imfa ithawe pakhomo timagwiritsa mankhwala nanawa amene amathamangitsa imfa pakhomo kuno ambiri tikutsata zimenezi 
  nanawa nchiyani mankhwala amene singanga pakhomo pamene pagwa maliro maka achibale amamwa mankhwalawo molandirana pakhomopo pamakhala 
  zimachitika yanji maliro akachitika lero mawa timakaika ndiye timasweretsa tsiku limodzi pamene timasonkhana kudzasesa yosesa mpamene mwambo wa nanawa umachitika mungathe mwambowu iliyonse kaya masana madzulo 
  kodi mankhwalawa mumatemera mumadya mankhwalawa pawiri amakhala madzi amawaika mkapu ndiye wachibale amalandirana mankhwalawo kumamwa pangono mpaka nonse achibale akukwaneni pamene mankhwala amawaika kudenga kwa nyumba yomwe mumagona malemuwo mumawasomeka kudenga mbali yomwe kuli khomo akamalowa mnyumbamo azigwira mankhwalawo 
  mukutanthauza wachibale amayenera amwe mankhwalawo zimatero kumene nonse mumalandirana kumwa pangono basi kamodzi momapatsirana 
  nanga achibale amene sadafike pamwambowo mumawatani achibale amene ya malirowo tsiku la kusesalo palibepo timawasungira mankhwalawo mankhwala ake amene tawasomeka kudenga aja tsiku lomwe akonza zodzafika pakhomopo timawalandira kuwatengera yomwe kudachitika malirowo ndiye pamene tikulowa mnyumbayo timawapatsa mankhwala aja agwire akangotero basi amabwezeretsa mankhwalawo kudengako 
  amachitanso china chiti palibe agwira mankhwalawo ndiye nawonso akonzedwa ku imfa yomwe idakangogwa pakhomopo 
  yomwe munkatsata mwambo wa kupitakufa zinkakhala maliro akachitika chonchi timapeza fisi apite yomwe kwachitika malirowo akacheze namfedwayo katatu patsiku zikavuta atha kumacheza nawo kawiri patsiku kwa sabata ziwiri fisiyu ntchito yake idali yoti achotse mzimu wa imfa womwe wakuta pakhomopo 
  mpaka katatu ndiye zidalikolikotu hahaha eeh amasangalala kwambiri zimenezi zidatha 
  nanga akamwalira wamkazi afisi aakazinso amapezeka ayi zikatere ndiye tinkapanga mankhwalawa apo ayi mupemphe banja lina likupitireni kufako

Text:

 mneneri wa nthambi yoona za chakudya ulimi ku bungweli wati thandizoli likufunika msanga dzombezi zayika pachiwopsezo nkhani ya zokolora kadyedwe kabwino 
 maiko ethiopia kenya somalia amene akhudzidwa kwambiri vutoli 
 malipoti wailesi ya bbc ati maiko ethiopia somalia sanakhudzidwepo vutoli kwa zaka makumi awiri zisanu 25 pomwe la kenya linakhudzidwapo vutoli zaka 70 zapitazo 
 malinga mneneri wa united nations yu njira yokhayo yothana dzombezi yopopera pogwiritsa ntchito ndege 
 malipoti akusonyeza dzombezi zachokera mdziko la yemen zadza kaamba ka mvula yamphamvu yomwe inagwa mdzikomo kumapeto chaka chatha yomwe inachititsa mbozizi ziswane

Text:

Text:

 wati malemuyu brave malizani 19 april chaka chino adalezera atafika adayamba kumenya ake pofuna kuziteteza bamboyo anatenga mpeni kubaya mwanayo pachifuwa

Text:
uve wanyanya mmisika akugwiritsa madzi mzithamphwi tituluka mumsika munomabutchala kafukufuku yemwe tamvani wachita sabata ino waonetsa uve wanyanya mmisika yambiri mdziko muno maka ya mmakhonsolo mizinda ya blantyre lilongwe kaamba koti mulibe madzi mmipope 
  masamba awa kutsukaasanagulitsidwe cha kusowa ukhondo mumsika waukulu mumzinda wa blantyre mabutchala aopseza khonsolo sichitapo kanthu atuluka mumsikawu akhala zaka ziwiri tsopano popanda madzi aukhondo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka akuti pakalipano akugwiritsa ntchito madzi amzithaphwi potsukira zipangizo zomwe amagwiritsa ntchito pomwe akuti kukagula madziwo kutali malo bizinesi yawo 
  zikhoza miyoyo ya ogula ogulitsa pachiopsezo yosasamalika ikhoza gwero la majeremusi omwe athanso kuononga miyoyo ya odya nyamayo 
  mneneri wa khonsoloyi anthony kasunda wati khonsolo ya blantyre sikudziwa kumsikawu kudadulidwa madzi 
  kasunda tsatirani malamulo timakhala oyanganira misika amenewo amalumikizana khonsolo nkhani za mabilu madzi magetsi zina zonse nkhani mukunenayi yachilendo kwa adatero kasunda 
  loweruka sabata yatha mabutchalawa adauza tamvani akhala akudandaulira khonsoloyi yaitali ikonze zinthu palibe chomwe chikuchitika kupatula kulonjeza 
  adati 2014 khonsoloyi idakazula mamita madzi ponena mabilu akukwera kwambiri akuti adasiya lonjezo loti nkhani yokhudza madzi aikonza 
  butchala chipinda chake chomwe amagulitsiramo pomanga msikawu chipinda chilichonse chidali mpope wamadzi 2014 khonsoloyi idadzazula mamita apo mpaka lero tilibe madzi adatero butchala wina 
  panopa tikugwiritsa ntchito madzi amene amangodzitulukira pansi msikawu pena timakagula mzigubu

  sitimvetsabe chomwe adachotsera madziwa timalipira tidadabwa akudzachotsa mamita achikhala amadzachotsa water board bwezi mwina titadziwa chake adatero

  tadandaula sizikumveka anthuwa alibe zikalata zogulitsira sakuletsedwa timadula chiphaso chophera chomwe k21 000 chipinda chogulitsira timalipira k17 000 pamwezi akuwalola kumagulitsa paliponse adatero wolankhulira mabutchalawo 
  pankhaniyi kasunda adati khonsolo sidapereke chiphanso cha bizinesi kwa ogulitsa paliponse amene amakhazikitsa bata mumzinda wathu ma rangers amalanda malonda alionse amene akuchitikira malo osayenera

Text:

 nyirenda kukhazikitsa kwa chimbalechi komwe kukachitikire ku st francis kanengo akomzekera kwambiri chimbalechi akachikhazikitsira ku lilongwe kuli abwenzi ambiri tikuwona mansomphenya abweziwa akatithandiza kwambiri abwenzi amenewa atithandiza munjira zambiri kulemba makalata okopera za chimbalechi 
 ati cholinga chenicheni cha chimbalechi kufalitsa uthenga wa mulungu kudzera nyimbo momwe mumakhalaso ulaliki wawukulu ndinso kupeza ndalama zogwilira ntchito zachifundo kuthandiza ana ovutika amasiye okalamba

Text:
chisankho chipitirirebwalo .khoti lalikulu likana pempho la mec bwalo lalikulu la milandu la supreme court lachinayi lidakana pempho la bungwe la zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec zokonzekera chisankho ziimikidwe kaye mpaka mlandu omwe bungwelo likuchita apilo bwalo la constitutional court silidagamule 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mwa zina woimira mec tamando chokotho adauza oweruza 7 mec imafuna zokonzekera chisankho ziimikidwe bungwelo lidali yochepa likonzekere constitutional court idalamula 3 february chisankho cha 21 may 2019 sichidayende chisankho china chichitike pasanathe masiku 150 
  chakwera chilima kutuluka kubwalolo chigamulo chitaperekedwa malinga chikosa silungwe yemwe woimira wodandaula woyamba mtsogoleri wa utm party saulos chilima adati majajiwo palibe adaonapo za mec 
  zikutanthauza mec iyenera kupitiriza zokonzekera chisankho chimene aphungu adati chidzakhalepo 19 may chaka chino 
  bwalo la supreme 15 april lidzayamba kumva nkhani imene mec mtsogoleri wa lino adakamangala kukhoti chigamulo choti sichidayende achitaye 
  padakalipano mec yalemba maloya ku south africa adzaimire bungwelo adzawalipira k600 miliyoni unduna wa zachuma wati sukudziwapo kanthu pankhaniyi imene akadaulo ati nkuononga chuma cha boma   zili apo khumbo la amalawi loti mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika asadikire masiku 21 omwe malamulo amampatsa asayinire mabilu omwe aphungu nyumba ya malamulo avomereza ladzutsa mavu mkhomola 
  mutharika akuyenera kusaina mabilu okhudza momwe chisankho chobwereza cha pulezidenti chiyendere masiku 21 omwe adali nawo watsala 5 malingaliro amalawi kuphatikizapo hrdc adali oti mutharika asadikire masiku 21 
  malingalirowo amachokera nkhawa yoti chisankho chomwe chikuyenera kuchitika 19 may 2020 chikudikira mabiluwo ndiye kuchedwetsa kusainira mabiluwo kukhoza kusokoneza zokonzekera za chisankhocho 
  pofuna kukakamiza mutharika kusaina mabiluwo msanga hrdc idalengeza pamsonkhano wa atolankhani 6 march 2020 idzatsogolera amalawi kukatseka nyumba za boma za kamuzu palace chikoko bay mzuzu state lodge 25 march 2020 
  potsatira chikonzerocho apolisi adamanga atsogoleri atatu hrdc omwe timothy mtambo gift trapence macdonald sembereka powaganizira adaphwanya magawo 103 124 amalamulo adziko lino kumangidwako kudadza mutharika atanena pamsonkhano apolisi ayenera kugwiritsa mphamvu zawo zionetserozo zisachitike 
  gawo 103 la malamulo polisi limaletsa munthu gulu kukakumana kufupi nyumba ya chifumu mamita ochepera 100 pomwe gawo 124 limaletsa munthu kutuntha anzake aphwanye lamulo zomwe akuluakuluwa achita idatero kalata yapolisi 
  atatuwo adatulutsidwa pabelo lachinayi bwalo lidagamula apereke ndalama yokwana k200 000 azikaonekera kulikulu la apolisi ku area 30 ku lilongwe adalangizidwanso asasokoneze zofufuza za mlanduwo apereke shulite ya k2 miliyoni 
  msabata ikuthayi chipani cha malawi congress party mcp chidaimitsa kaye zionetsero zimene chidakonza lachinayi pofuna kukakamiza apolisi kutulutsa atatuwo 
  kadaulo zamalamulo prof edge kanyongolo adati pakadalipano mutharika sadaphwanye lamulo lililonse posasayina mabiluwo potengera malamulo 
  gawo 73 la malamulo limapereka masiku 21 kwa pulezidenti asayine bilu ndiye panopo masikuwo sadakwane gawoli limati pulezidenti ufulu wobweza bilu yosasayina zifukwa adatero kanyongolo 
  adapitiriza biluyo ikabwerera ku nyumba ya malamulo zifukwazo gawo 73 4 limapereka mphamvu ku nyumba ya malamulo zifukwazo nkulibwenzanso kwa pulezidenti asayine 
  zikafika ndime iyi pulezidenti sakhalanso mwayi wosankha kusayina ayi gawoli limati pulezidentiyo asayine masiku 21 basi akalephera apo ndiye tsopano waphwanya malamulo adatero kanyongolo 
  mneneri wa pulezidenti mgeme kalirani adati mutharika sakuthamangira kusayinira mabiluwo malamulo amampatsa masiku 21 masikuwo sadakwane 
  pazokonzekera za chisankho chobwereza mneneri wa malawi electoral commission mec sangwani mwafulirwa adati bungwelo lidzatulutsa ndondomeko ya zokonzekera zonse zikapsa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
zitukuko wenela nyengo yasintha abale anzanga chikuchitika nchiyani wenela usiku winawo kudatentha zedi moti usiku onse ndimangokhalira kudzikanda 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kutembenuka ndiye kudali kosayamba thukuta lili kamukamu kungocha mphepo idali kuomba moopsa mosasula madenga tsiku linalo kudazizira wafikanso mwezi wa june chikuchitika nchiyani lero kumva kwina mphepo ya mkuntho yasasula madenga kenako kumvanso kwina mphenzi yapha chavuta nchiyani 
  tidakhala wenela tsiku limenelo kudikira moya pete ankati adzatsegulire chitukuko china tonse tidakonzeka kuitanitsa gologolo amayi chisamba aja lero asintha makaka kuchoka ku polisi palibe kupita ku dizilo petulo palibe eyatu zaka 51 za kuvina gogo ujatu adatipeza tikuvina ndiye mungaletse ndani kuvinira moya pete walakwanji tisamuvinire adafika moya pete mdipiti wa galimoto zochuluka adabwera anzake ambiri pajatu abwenzi ochuluka 
  adati tilowoloke njanji nkumalowera kanjira kachidule kopita ku mbayani tikuyenda chomwecho tidapeza liboni lomwe amaika kusonyeza pakutsegulidwa chitukuko 
  ndayamika kwambiri abale anzanga lero lino tikutsegulira msewu umenewu kwambiri gogo uja palibe chimene adapanga wenela kwambiri adatero moya pete 
  abale anzanga kodi nkhani zotsegula mipita imeneyi nkuchita kutulutsa munthu wamkulu kuchoka yachifumu ija adamanga gogo uja 
  kwambiri male chauvinist pigs siyidzatiuza zochita wenela mbamba ndikunenetsa kwambiri posachedwapa ndikatsegulira gawo la msewu wa ku amwenye ku limbe adaonjezera chomwecho 
  abale anzanga sindikudziwa za ndisaname zimandivuta kumvetsetsa zinthuzi zili adona hilida kunena akulephera kubwerera wenela palibe wawapatsa nyumba kodi zaka zonse ankagawa abakha ankagona mumtengo nchifukwa chake nanenso ndidavomereza moya pete momwe zinthu zikukhalira wenela ndithu ana obwera mtsogolo adzatitemberera

Text:
malamulo ukwati akutsutsana kutanthauzira lamulo lokhudza maukwati ana kovuta tsopano pamene pali kusemphana pakati zomwe zidalembedwa mmalamulo oyendetsera adziko lino zomwe zili mmalamulo okhudza mabanja la divorce and relations act 
  gawo 22 ndime 6 ya malamulo lino limati palibe munthu woposa zaka 18 adzaletsedwe kukwatira kukwatiwa ndime 7 imati munthu wa zaka pakati 15 18 angathe kukwatiwa kukwatira patakhala chilolezo kuchoka kwa makolo womuyanganira 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka zikusemphana zomwe zili lamulo latsopano loyendetsera maukwati zoletsa ukwati wa munthu wosaposa zaka 18 
  ku dedza t kachindamoto akuchotsa mafumu amene apezeka akuvomereza ukwati wa mwana wosaposa zaka 18 
  mwa chitsanzo nyakwawa galuanenenji idachotsedwa pampando chovomereza ukwati wa mtsikana wa zaka 15 makolo ake adavomereza ukwatiwo uchitike 
  kachindamoto akuti mphamvu akuzitenga malamulo oyendetsera maukwati momwe akuletsa ukwati wa mwana wosaposa zaka 18 tsono tichotse mfumu pampando malamulo amenewa tidachita kugwirizana tokha kuno ndiye mfumu yomwe yalakwitsa ikuchotsedwa mafumu anayi achotsedwa adatero kachindamoto 
  esmie tembenu wa blantyre child justice magistrate akuti pali kusokonekera kwazinthu cha divorce and relations act 
  cha ubwino woti ana azipita kusukulu lamulo la maukwati lomwe tikugwiritsa ntchito komabe tili mantha si zomwe zili mmalamulo adziko lino 
  wina atakutengera kubwalo la milandu angathe kukapambana mlandu malamulo adziko lino okha ndiwo mphamvu adatero tembenu 
  naye mphunzitsi wa za malamulo kusukulu ya chancellor college edge kanyongolo akuti pamenepa pali kusokonekera kwa zinthu komabe wati lamulo la lino ndilo lili mphamvu 
  masiku apitawa kanyongolo adati pofuna kugwiritsa zomwe zili lamuloli ndiye pakuyenera kukonza gawo 22 lomwe lili mmalamulo adziko lino
Label: CULTURE

Text:
njala yavuta mafumu achenjeza mafumu mdziko muno apempha boma liwathandize kuthana njala yomwe yayamba kale kusautsa maboma angapo madera ayamba kale kupulumukira zikhawo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mafumuwa t kachindamoto ku dedza tengani ku nsanje mlauli ku neno 
  zikudza patangodutsa sabata ziwiri bungwe lounikira kuchenjeza za njala la famine and early warning systems network fewsnet litachenjeza pafupifupi 1.7 miliyoni asowa chakudya mdziko muno chaka chino 
  lipoti la bungweli linaunikira za kapezekedwe ka chakudya mdziko muno kuyambira mwezi wa ogasiti chaka chino mpaka malichi chaka cha mawa kuunikiraku kunatinso ntchito zolimbana njalayi zikuoneka nzosakwanira kwenikweni zingakhale zitagugiratu pofika novembala disembala chaka chino 
  poonjezera zounikirazi zinati mwa maboma okhudzidwa nsanje chikhwawa balaka blantyre phalombe machinga zomba thyolo mulanje neno mwanza mangochi ku chigwawo cha kummwera salima ntcheu pakati mbali zina mdera la kumpoto mboma la karonga kumpoto 
  t kachindamoto wati kumeneko midzi 300 yomwe muli pafupifupi 70 000 yakhudzidwa njalayo 
  tidali msonkhano bungwe la zaulimi tidapeza tikufunika thandizo la matani 1 000 chimanga tidayesera ulimi wa mthirira zakanika mitsinje yaphwa 
  sitingalandire thandizo mpaka disembala chiyembekezo chilipo ataya miyoyo yatero mfumuyo 
  kachindamoto wati njalayi yagwa kaamba kosowekera mvula mmadera angapo kuchuluka kwa mvula mmadera 
  tidabzala kawiri kaamba ka vuto la mvula sizidaphule kanthu.kumapeto nkomwe kudabwera mvula yambiri mpaka madzi kusefukira adatero kachindamoto 
  t tengani wati galu wakuda sadasiye malo pomwe 20 000 pansi pake akhudzidwa njalayi vuto kumeneko akuti lidali lakusowa kwa mvula 
  tidafika potopa kulankhula za njala kuno.boma litithandize zipangizo tiyambe ulimi wa mthirira pafupifupi dera lililonse kuno lakhudzidwa njala idatero mfumuyi yomwe yati dera lake lili pafupifupi 35 000 
  wati posakhalitsapa ayamba kudya nyika chosowa pogwira tengani adati madera kumeneko ayamba kale kulandira ufa thandizo lachimanga 
  t mlauli wati ku neno mvula siidagwe njala yakhudza pafupifupi boma lonse.mlauli wati mmudzi mwake muli 25 903 pafupifupi onse akhudzidwa njalayo 
  thandizo mwachangu adatero mlauli 
  wa bungwe loona za ndondomeko za ulimi lomwe si laboma la civil society agriculture network cisanet tamani nkhono mvula wati alandilapo malipoti mabomawa akhudzidwa njala 
  wati kotero boma likuyenera kuvomereza mdziko muno muli njala ncholinga choti mabungwe ayambe kuthandiza adati mabungwe chile kuthandiza pena amadikira boma livomereze za vuto lomwe lagwalo 
  pena atsogoleri amatha kuvomereza kukana kulibe njala pazifukwa za ndale mabungwe amakhala omangika kuyamba kuthandizapo 
  chakudya mdziko muno chilipo chiyembekezo chilipo anthuwa apulumutsidwa adatero mkuluyu 
  mneneri wa boma moses kunkuyu wati boma layamba kale kugawa chakudya mmadera omwe akhudzidwa njalayi kotero madera omwe sadalandire thandizoli akuyenera kudziwitsa boma 
  wati msabatayi madera okhudzidwa njalayi mboma la blantyre amene amalandira thandizoli 
  malinga unduna wa zamalimidwe lino lidakolola matani 3.6 miliyoni chimanga pomwe lino limafunika matani 2.8 
  chiyambire malipoti njalawa bola lakhala likutsutsa ati lino lili chakudya chokwanira 
  mmbuyomu nduna ya mapulani chuma chitukuko atupele muluzi inati kuunikira kwa fewsnet kunali kosadalirika ati mdziko muno muli ndondomeko yomwe ingadziwe za chiwerengero chomwe chili chiopsezo cha njala 
  julaye chaka chino ndondomekoyo inati 1.63 miliyoni omwe chiopsezo 
  chiopsezochi chikudza pomwe lino likukumbukira tsiku lachakudya padziko tsiku lomwe limakumbukukiridwa mayiko oposa 150 
  tsikuli lomwe limakumbukiridwa 16 okutobala likukumbukiridwa pamutu woti mgwirizano wa mabungwe azaulimi ngodya yodyetsera
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:
papa akuyembekezeka misa yopemphelera othawa kwawo wolemba glory kondowe mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisko lamulungu wati mayiko akuyenera kumadzipereka pothandiza othawa kwawo 
 papa walankhula ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican 
 mwazina papayu wakumbutsa la mulungu likubwera li 29 september tsiku la nambala 105 lokumbukira othawa kwawo kotero akuyenera kukonzekera tsikuli lidzakhale latanthauzo 
 papa wati adzakumbukira tsikuli mwambo wa msembe ya misa yomwe adzatsogolere bwalo lalikulu la saint peters square ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican
Label: RELIGION

Text:
wodwala chikuku   amasamalidwira kutchire tsaka akachira amakhalandi mphamvu zotakata makono ano munthu wodwala chikuku amasamalidwa pakhomo kuchipatala malangizo amene kale ankatsatidwa adalekeka kalelo wodwala chikuku ankakabisidwa kunkhalango asakumane munthu thupi awiriwa akangokumana matenda akuti amakula msinkhu kuthengoko kumachitikanji nanga thupi amadana wodwalayu bobby kabango adali mmudzi mwa mphonde kwa senior chief ngabu ku chikhwawa akucheza eni tsaka motere   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi tidziwane wawa 
  dzina langa eni tsaka dzina lomwe makolo adandipatsa ndithu amaganiza ndidadzipatsa ndekha ndine mlimi wa thonje mapira mchewere ndakhalitsa mdziko la south africa moti ndidadzakhazikika mdziko muno 1974 
  komatu dzuwa kuno mukumva lero bolani palibe dzuwa apa kusiyanitsa masiku tinangozolowera nchifukwa munandipeza nditavula malaya kuno malaya sitikhalanawo chidwi cha kutenthaku 
  tikumva kuno miyambo yakalekale ikuchitikabe nzoona pali choletsa miyambo isachitike kodi mwina ndimve kwa pali choletsa chomwe akuletsera 
  ikuchitika kwambiri nchifukwa ndikuti pali choletsa tikutsata zomwe makolo ankachita adatiuza tizichita za miyambo zikhulupiriro sitidzasiya 
  kukakamira zachikale kodi zachikale zisiyike mwapita kusukulu vuto lake mukapita kusukulu mukumaona miyambo ya makolo njopanda ntchito kaamba ka tikuvulala iyi miyambo zikhulupiriro za makolo athu sitingasiye sitidzasiya 
  tamva thupi sakumana wodwala chikuku nzoona zenizeni zomwe mwauzidwazo munthu wodwala chikuku mdani thupi sayenera akumane ngozi imeneyi 
  kutentha thupi nkutani kutentha thupi kutanthauza wagonana mwamuna mkazi 
  zikachitika ndiye watentha thupi zimatero kumene thupi silimatentha popanda munthu wolitenthetsa pamayenera pakhale wina amene amachititsa thupi lija lichite juuu zimachitika mwamuna mkazi wachita motero 
  amenewa akuchokera pati akuchokera pantchito yomwe mwamuna mkazi pajatu ntchito imeneyi imachititsa thupi kutentha mawuwatu akuchokera pamenepo 
  ndiye akatentha sayenera kukumana wodwalayu asakumane ngozi iyi kuno tikupangabe zimenezi 
  kukumana kwake kotani tiyerekeze mnyumbamu mwagona wodwala thupi asayandikirenso pakhomopo azingolambalala mphepo yokhayo ingathe kupha wodwalayu mphepo yake imakhala yamoto 
  ndiye mumamusamala wodwalayu mukadziwa nthenda yafika timamutengera kuthengo loyandikana nyumba yake komwe amakakhala mpaka atachira madzulo okha timamubweretsa 
  amakakhala yani kuthengoko nanga imakhala yanji yomwe mumamubweretsa kuthengoko kumakhala makolo ake achibale ochepa awa ndiwo amamusamala pomupatsa chakudya kumumwetsa mankhwala achikukuwo usiku atagona mpomwe timabwera naye mbandakucha timamutengeranso kuthengoko 
  mumamupatsa mankhwala anji timatenga makungwa mtengo wa theza ndiye timawanyika pakapita kanthawi amafewa ndiye amananda zikafika pamenepa timamuika kukhutu mmaso zonsezi zichitikire kuthengoko mukalondoloza zonse matendawo sachedwa kuchira 
  sizitheka wodwalayu thupi lakenso lotentha aaaa munthu akudwala ndiye angakhalenso mphamvu zotenthetsa thupi sizingatheke akachira ndiye amakhala mphamvu zotakata momwe angathere 
  amachira zomwe mwanenazi zimatheka taona akuchira akapanda kutsata mwambo kumachita zinthu limodzi thupi ndiye sipatha masiku mumva wamwalira 
  mwambo wabwino kwambiri sumamva wina wamwalira cha matenda amenewa vuto chizungu talowetsa chizungu kwambiri nchifukwa tikuyesa zikhulupiriro za makolo zachabe
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
bwanamkubwa achenjeza za ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi wolemba thokozani chapola bwanankubwa wa boma la zomba dr raphael piringu wachenjeza mbomalo akonzekere ngozi zokugwa mwadzidzidzi ino pomwe mvula yatsala pangono kugwa 
 ngozi akuti zitha kuchitikanso chaka chino dr raphael piringu amayankhula lero mbomali nsonkhano wa atolankhani wauza atolankhaniwa udindo waukulu wodziwitsa zangozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi zomwe zingabwere nyengo ino ya mvula 
 dr piringu ati kaamba ka nyengo yotenntha imene ilipo padakali kumayambiliro nyengo ya mvula mphepo ya mkuntho yomwe iwononge nyumba zinthu zina
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
akuti zipolowe zichepe zipolowe kaamba ka ndale zomwe zakhala zikuchitika mdziko muno zikupereka chiopsezo kuchisankho cha chaka chamawa kutekesa mtendere wa lino akutero mafumu akwatswiri pandale mdziko muno 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc atero poona zipolowe zandale zomwe zikuchitika mdziko muno makamaka kumangidwa kwa atsogoleri zipani zina 
  dpp chipani chimene posachedwapa chidaganiziridwa chikukhudzidwa kwambiri zipolowe zamtunduwu poyamba atangomangidwa gavanala wa chipanichi mchigawo cha kummwera noel masangwi otsatirawo adasonkhana kupolisi komwe kumasungidwa anthuwa 
  atsogoleri chipanichi kuphatikizapo mtsogoleri wogwirizira mpando wa pulezidenti peter mutharika atatengedwa pokhudzidwa nkhani yofuna kutenga boma mwaupandu mtsogoleri wakale wa lino bingu wa mutharika atamwalira chaka chatha otsatira chipanichi adachita zipolowe mmizinda ya blantrye lilongwe maboma phalombe thyolo pokwiya kumangidwa kwa atsogoleriwo 
  wa zakafukufuku mchipanicho george chaponda adauza atolankhani otsatira chipaniwo adachita kutokosoledwa mneneri wa chipanichi nicholas dausi adanena zotsutsana zomwe adanena chaponda ponena chipani cha pp ndicho chidapereka makaka dpp kwa zimbalangondo akachite zipolowezo pofuna kudetsa dpp 
  pounguza amalawi ati otsatira zipani azikhala malire zotere zikapitirira zingadzabale chisankho choipa 2014 mdziko muno mungabuke ziwawa 
  ati wina atadzapambana mokayikitsa zipolowe zotere zingadzachitike amalawi sathetseratu wosafuna bwalo lamilandu liweruze oganiziridwa opalamula 
  t malemia ya mboma la nsanje wati otsatira zipani akuyenera kudziwa zinthu zikavuta kuzisiya mmanja mwa apolisi ozenga milandu apereke chigamulo 
  mfumu yomwe ikusunga azipani zosiyanasiyana ndine wokhumudwa kwambiri zimenezi sindikudziwa chomwe azipaniwa akuchitira zipolowezi chikhalirecho kuli apolisi mabwalo amilandu ili vuto la atsogoleri zipaniwa mwana wanga atapalamula vuto ndikhala posamulangiza andale akhale pansi azipani adatero malemia 
  t phambala ya ku ntcheu wati chomwe akufuna mtendere zipani zichilimike kukhazikitsa mtendere 
  chisankho chikudzachi chikufunika mtendere kumenyana ayi tonse tikuyenera kuchitapo kanthu adatero phambala 
  gulupu kayiwale ya ku rumphi yati vuto lakuti ufulu wa demokalase adaumvetsa molakwika 
  zipolowe umbuli kuli oweruza milandu apolisi timachita zotere demokalase si imeneyi tikuyenera kusiya zonse mmanja mwa malamulo agwire ntchito andale asabweretse ziwawa akhale malire adatero kayiwale 
  mlembi wamkulu ku dpp dr allan chiyembekeza akuti sitinakhale pansi tifufuze kukambirana za komabe tichitapo kanthu mumadziwa pena pake mbale wako atamangidwa zimapwetekabe padali zifukwa nchifukwa chake zidachitika zotere komabe tifufuza 
  naye wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa chipani cha pp ken msonda wati chipani chawo chimaonetsetsa chisalowerere nkhani za boma woweruza wabwino bwalo lamilandu 
  pachitika zambiri mdziko muno pomwe tikulamula sitidalowerere chilichonse mtsogoleri wa lino atalowa mboma adati akufuna momwe ndale zimachitikira ichi nchifukwa otsatira chipanichi samapezeka nawo mzisokonezozi adatero msonda 
  mneneri wa udf ken ndanga wati zipani za mdziko muno zilibe njira zodziwira otsatira chipani chawo komabe wati chipani chawo chimakhulupirira bwalo ndilo lingapereke gamulo labwino 
  tipemphenso apolisi pogwira ntchito yawo azitsatira malamulo sizichitika zingameme zipolowe mdziko muno zipolowe si zabwino tonse tidakati tizichita dpp pangakhale mpungwepungwe mdziko muno adatero ndanga 
  kadaulo zamalamulo yemwenso wa bungwe la justice link justine dzonzi wati atsogoleri andale atha kuzengedwa mlandu cha zomwe otsatira chipanicho achita patapezeka umboni 
  sipangakhale umboni ochita zipolowewo atha kuzengedwa mlandu chodzetsa chisokonezo adatero dzonzi yemwe adanenetsa zipolowe zotere si zabwino mdziko 
  19 july 2011 otsatira chipani cha dpp adayenda mmizinda ya blantyre atanyamula zikwanje mmanja kumaopseza athana wina yemwe achite ziwonetsero zomwe zidachitika 20 
  pazisankho za 2004 kudachitikapo ziwawa zitadziwika udf ndiyo yapambana pamene adali chikhulupiriro adayenera kupambana mgwirizano coalition motsogozedwa gwanda chakuamba
Label: POLITICS

Text:
amayi ndikuthekera kothana kwa nyengo cadecom bungwe loona za chitukuko mpingo wakatolika la cadecom dayosizi ya mangochi lati amayi udindo ntchito yothana vuto la kusitha kwa nyengo kuonongeka kwa nthaka 
 mlangizi wamkulu wa bungweli peter nthenda yemwe wanena polankhula mtolankhani wathu yemwe amafuna kudziwa momwe kwa nyengo kumakhudzira amayi dayosiziyo nthenda ati amayi amene amatenga gawo lalikulu ntchito zosiyanasiyana mdziko ulimi ntchito zapakhomo choncho kuthekera kothana vuto lakusintha kwa nyengo kubwezeretsa nthaka pochita ulimi wa kasakaniza 
 tikanena zakusintha kwa nyengo ku malawi kuno zinthu zimene zimayambitsa ulimi zankhalango tiona amayi ndiwo amatenga gawo lalikulu ulimi kuno ku malawi chachiwiri nchoti amayi ndiwo amatanganidwa kukonza chokudya pakhomo zomwe zimafuna khuni zambiri ndiye tikuwapempha azimayi azigwiritsa mbaula zosalirana nkhuni zambiri tikuwapempha azimayi azigwiritsa ma basiketi sungu amulaza osati ma pulasiti kubvala mitengo pofuna kubwezeretsa thaka anatero nthenda 
 polankhulapo violet kandulu ku arch dayosizi ya blantrye ati amayi sakuyenera kutaya zinthu zomwe zimaononga nthaka mwachisawawa cholinga chakuti ayiteteze 
  atiphunzintsa manphunziro akulu azimayi timataya zinyalala mmakwalala mwathu moma kutaya ma pampa ma pulasitic zomwe zikupangitsa nthaka yathu iwonongeke choncho tikhale oyamba kuchotsa zinyalala zomwe zimaonnga chilengedwe pakutero azaphunzirira kwa anatero kalundu
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
msonda tsamba loyoyoka pp yomwe akuchoka mchipani cha peoples party pp chitangogwa mboma mneneri wa chipanichi ken msonda yemwe lilime lakuthwa amayankhula mokhadzula amawayerekeza anzawowo masamba ouma amenene akuyoyoka mmitengo ya chilimwe 
  lero zagwa pamphuno 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka wachoka pp msonda kodi msonda nditsamba louma limene lathothoka mchipani chakale cholamula zichitire ubwino chipanichi wogwirizira utsogoleri wa pp uladi mussa akuti msonda wina ufulu wochoka chipanichi 
  msonda akunenetsa katakwe pandale kuchoka kwake mchipanichi sikutanthauza ukatakwe pandale watha ayi akumvera zimene mulungu akumuyankhula 
  dzana lachinayi adalonjedza auza wa malawi zifukwa zochokera mchipanichi zomwe akulingalira pamoyo mtsogolomu pamsonkhano wa atolankhani mumzinda wa blantyre dzulo adasintha thabwa kuuza atolankhani msonkhanowu walepheleka atamvera malangizo mbusa 
  abusa anga andiuza ndisapangitse msonkhano wa atolankhaniwu akuti ndidekhe kaye mpakana yoyenerera yokhazikitsidwa mulungu itakwana 
  ndikupempha andimvetsetse mmene ndanenera kale ndikufuna kuzamisa moyo wanga wa uzimu yokwanira banja langa msonda adatero 
  mkuluyu adati adayankhulana mtsogoleri wa chipani cha pp joyce bandaamene kunja kwa lino komwe akhala chigonjereni pazisankho za 2014za kuchoka kwake 
  msonda adati banda adamupempha asachoke msanga kufikira iyo atabwerera ku malawi idati sizikadagwirizana chikonzero chake chopempha mulungu amutsogolere za tsogolo lake mundale muuzimu 
  adati zomwe amayankhulira anzake powayerekeza masamba ouma amene akuthothoka mumtengo ya chilimwe zidali gawo la ntchito yake potumikira chipani 
  mmeneri wa chipani ndimayenera kuyankhulira chipani kupereka chithunzithunzi chabwino cha chipanichi kumtundu wa malawi sizikusonyeza tsamba louma lomwe latha ntchito 
  poti ndanena ndikufuna ndizame muuzimu kaye za akambe ndale ndazisiya kale apo mtsogolomu mundiona ndikuzapanga nawo mpikisano pachisankho cha aphungu ku nyumba ya malamulo 2019 msonda adatero 
  mkuluyu yemwe wakhala akusintha zipani komaso amadziwika kwambiri dzina loti foot soldier akuti panthawi yoyenera adzauza dongosolo limene akupempha mulungu amukonzere 
  msonda yemwe lilime lake lamuikako mmavuto potengeredwa kukhoti atamemeza azipha amene amagonana amuna okhaokha akazi okhaokha adalowa chipani cha pp january 2012 chipanichi chisanalowe mboma banda wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino malemu bingu wa mutharika 
  adasankhidwa mneneri wa pp udindowu udapitirira chipani cha pp chitalowa mboma potsatira imfa ya bingu wa mutharika 
  msonda yemwe adakhalakonso wothandizira mmeneri mchipani cha udf asadalowe pp wakhala akusowetsa mmtendere chipani cholamula kuyankhula kwake kokhadzula kumayambiriro chaka chino adauzapo mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika atule pansi udindo kaamba koti alephera kukonza vuto la zachuma zina 
  anayankhula kumsonkhano wa onse okhuzidwa wa public affairs committee pac)mu mzinda wa blantyre kuyankhula uku kudakwiyitsa nduna zambiri zomwe zinkatenga nawo gawo kumsonkhanowu 
  chipani cha pp chakhala chikutaya atsogoleri ake ofunikira kwambiri kuphatizapo sidik mia yemwe adatula pansi udindo pulezidenti wothandizira mchigawo cha kummwera chisankho za 2014 chitatsala pangono
Label: POLITICS

Text:
kusanthula gule wa likwata likwata mwa magule amene amavinidwa pakati ayao ndidali mboma la chiradzulu mmudzi mwa njeremba kwa t mpama komwe adapezerera gule wa likwata yemwe amamutcha namkwakwala uyutu gule amene amavina amayi atsikana kodi uyu gule wanji nanga adayamba liti mtolankhani wathuyu adakokera pambali amene amatsogolera guleyu adacheza motere   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi eee wefuwefu ameneyu kutopa kumene   hahaha padalitu ntchito pamene paja si maseweratu kuvina gule ameneyu akafika pakolasi timayenera tidzipinde basi 
  tidziwane kaye 
  ndine idesi chiwaya ndimatsogolera gululi 
  kodi gule wanji ameneyu   ameneyu gule wa namkwakwala amati likwata 
  cholinga cha guleyu nchiyani   kusangalatsa basi timavina tikasangalala zachitikira leromu tangosangalala ndiye tidakumana tivine basi adyetse maso 
  muli akazi okhaokha   ameneyu gule wa amayi nchifukwa chake simudaonemo mwamuna kupatula awiri amene akutiimbira ngoma 
  ndaonamonso tiasungwana timeneti timaloledwanso mgulumu   eya amenewo ndiye eni gululi takulatu ndiye timakhala nawo mulungu akatitenga iwowo ndiwo adzatsogolere gululi sitikufuna gule ameneyu adzafe 
  kodi guleyu saphunzitsa zoipa zoipa zanji ayi ameneyutu ntchito yake kusangalatsa basi 
  simukuona guleyu angapangitse tianamwali tija tisodzedwe mwachangu   hahaha musandiseketse amene aja adzukulu anga ndimawayanganira palibe angachite zopusa ana amenewa akukula mmanja mwanga 
  dzina limeneli lidabwera dzina la guleli liti lomwe mukukamba ndikukamba la likwata dzina basi kusonyeza gule wachikhalidwe pamene amati gule wa namkwakwala 
  chiyani kulipatsa dzina la likwata basi nawonso makolo adakonda apereke dzinali 
  si zolaula zimenezi nanga mpaka likwata   ayi palitu maina ambirimbiri mdziko muno omveka akulaulanso kodi ndiye anthuwo zomwe dzinalo limatanthauza   mukanena likwata timatanthauza gule wosangalatsa basi 
  kodi gule wa chikhalidwe chiti cha uyu gule wa anyanja ambiri akhala akunena wa alhomwe zoona zenizeni zomwe ndikunenazi 
  mavinidwe guleyu andimaliza tafotokozani momwe muchitira pamene mukuvina ngoma ija ikamalira timavina moitsatira uko tikuimba nyimbo zathu ndiye ikafika pakolasi timachita tikudumpha uko tikudula chiuno apa ndiye timagwadirira pansi kuvina momatembenuka kumatembenuka maondo kwinaku tikugundana matako aka ndiye kavinidwe kake 
  adakuphunzitsani ndani makolo athu ineyo makolo anga ankavina kwambiri atamwalira ndidapitiriza mpaka kupeza amayi anzanga tonse tilipo 10 kuphatikizapo abambo ngoma takwana 12 
  abambo savina nawo chiyani aaa inuyo mungakwanitse zomwe timachita zija eetu nchifukwa timavina amayi okha 
  mudayamba liti kuvina guleyu   chaka ndiye sindingakumbuke ndimakumbukira panthawiyo ndidali zaka 33 zaka zanga ndidaziiwala zaposa 50 
  mumavina yanji   timavina masana moti zambiri timavina pazochitika pamisonkhano tavinirapo mtsogoleri wakale bakili muluzi bingu wa mutharika 
  atsogoleriwa amakwanitsa kuduka mchiuno chonchi   ayi amangochoka pampando kumavina pangonopangono mapeto ake amapisa mthumba kutipatsa kangachepe 
  kodi momwe munavinira apamu ndiye mumathera pamenepa ayi apatu tangovina kwa mphindi 5 tikati tivine moposera mphindi zimenezi mudakaona momwe timachitira 
  malangizo kwa amene satsatira gule wa makolo amenewo azikhala makolo asataye chikhalidwe cha makolo
Label: MUSIC

Text:
bungwe la ipeqi liphunzitsa adindo za chitukuko kumidzi bungwe la institute for participatory engagement and quality improvement ipeqi lati liphunzitsa adindo omwe amayanganira ntchito za chitukuko ku madera kumidzi mboma la zomba za momwe angalimbikitsire chitukuko mmadera 
 mlangizi wamkulu wa bungweli dr zikani kaunda omwe anena lachiwiri mboma la zomba pomwe bungwe lawo limakumana alangizi zachitukuko ku madera akumidzi akuluakulu khonsolo ya boma la zomba 
 ati chikhulupiliro pakutha maphunziro amenewa adindowa adziwa momwe ndalama zogwilira ntchito za chitukuko zikuyenera kuyendera 
 mmawu ake owona za chitukuko mmadera akumidzi mboma la zomba flora mvuta ati chikhulupiliro ntchito yophunzitsa adindowa ikatha zinthu zisintha adindowa azitha kugwira ntchito yawo ponena chiwasankhire sanachitepo maphunziro aliwonse okhudza ntchito yawo
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
ophuzira msukulu za ukachenjede apempha boma litsegule sukulu ophunzira msukulu za ukachenjede mdziko muno alembera kalata boma cholinga choti litsekule sukuluzi zomwe zinatsekedwa kaamba ka mliri wa coronavirus 
 sukulu zinatsekedwa mlembi wa bungwe la ophunzira msukulu wa ukachenjede zonse za mdziko muno gospel sulebati wauza radio maria malawi ophunzirawa abwera ganizoli powona sukulu zotseka pamene ndale mdziko muno akuchita misonkhano yokopa pokonzekera chisankho chomwe chikudzachi komwenso akumasonkhanitsa ambiri malo amodzi 
 pamenepa wati chikalatachi ayikamo ndondomeko zomwe akuti azikatsatira boma lingavomere kutsekuladi sukuluzi 
 nkhani yoti boma litsegule sukulu kamba ka zomwe tikuona misonkhano ya ndale ikuchitika ndiponso ma border otsegula anatero sulebati 
 wati malinga kalata yomwe alembera bomali ati okonzeka njira zopewera matenda covid-19 sukuluzi zikatsegulidwa 
 padakalipano unduna wa zamaphunziro sunayankhulepo kanthu nkhaniyi
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
bwalo lilanga mphunzitsi wochimwitsa mwana bwalo la milandu la majisitireti la mzuzu lapeza mphunzitsi wina wolakwa pamlandu wochimwitsa mtsikana wosakwana zaka 16 kupereka mankhwala ochotsera pathupi pomwe adampatsa bwaloli likuyembekezeka kupereka chilango chake mawa 22 february 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu lachinayi sabata yatha bwaloli lidamva mtendere phiri wa zaka 31 yemwe kwawo ku bembeke t kachindamoto mboma la dedza adayamba kugonana mwanayu mwezi wa april chaka chatha 
  bwaloli lidamva phiri yemwe amaphunzitsa pasukulu ina yapulaimare ku ekwendeni mboma la mzimba adanyengerera mtsikanayu akakana chibwenzi asiya kuphunzitsa pasukulupo apita kwina 
  zidamukhudza mtsikanayu posafuna mphunzitsiyo achoke adamulola ankapita kwake mkazi akapita ku mzuzu kwa ake adawerenga majisitireti agness gondwe 
  apatu nkuti phiri yemwe adavala malaya ofiira wera mchitokosi cha bwalo la milandu naye mkazi poteropo kumvetsera majisitiretiyu 
  adapitiriza malinga umboni womwe udaperekedwa mbwalolo masiku apitawo awiriwa ankachita zadamazi kuchipinda kwa mphunzitsiyu 
  gondwe adati mtsikanayu adauzanso bwalolo poperekera umboni zadamazi zidachitika kosawerengeka phiri adamuuza akadzadutsitsa mwezi osasamba adzamudziwitse msanga 
  adati mwezi wa july msikanayu adaima atamudziwitsa mphunzitsiyu sadachedwe kumupatsa mapilitsi awiri brufen bactrim zomwe sizidaphule kanthu pathupipo sipadachoke 
  majisitiretiyu adati apa mtsikanayu adapita kutchuthi mumzinda wa mzuzu komwe pobwerera mmwezi wa september ake adamuzindikira adali pathupi 
  adati mtsikanayu adamuuzitsa asachotse mimbayo sizidathandize atakumananso mphunzitsiyo adamuuza atasunge pathupipo zake zida 
  malinga umboni womwe udaperekedwa mbwalo lino phiri adamuuza mtsikanayo apite naye kuchipatala cha banja la mtsogolo blm akamuchotse atakana adakagula mankhwala asanu anayi kuchipatalachi adatero gondwe 
  mtsikanayu atamwa pathupipo padachokadi pakati usiku adakataya zomwe zidatulukazo mchimbudzi 
  madzi adachita katondo pomwe mtsikanayu adayamba kugudubuzika ululu wa mmimba adaulula kwa ake mphunzitsiyo ndiye adali mwini nkhaniyi 
  apa adathamangira naye pachipatala chachingono cha mderali komwe adamutumiza kuchipatala chachikulu cha mzuzu central komwe adamuchotsa zotsalira 
  mwanayu molimbikitsidwa mabungwe adakamangala kupolisi komwe adamutsekera phiri september 23 chaka chatha 
  christon ghambi yemwe akuimira mphunzitsiyu adaseketsa bwaloli pomwe adalipempha limuganizire phiri posampatsa chilango chokhwima poti adapereka mankhwala ochotsera pathupiwo tsogolo la mwanayu lisaonongeke

Text:
tea akugulitsidwa motchipa kwambiri unduna wolemba sylvester kasitomu ntent uploads/2019/09 nankhumwa.jpg alt= width="388 height="344 />unduna ulowelerapo nankhumwa unduna wa za malimidwe ulimi wa mthilira chitukuko cha madzi walonjeza ulowererapo mavuto omwe alimi angonoangono akukumana nawo mdziko muno 
 nduna unduna wu kondwani nankhumwa anena lachitatu pomwe anayendera alimi tea nthochi mmaboma thyolo mulanje 
 paulendowu zadziwika alimi angono angono tea akumagulitsa mbeu yawo mtengo otsikitsitsa poyerekeza zomwe amalowetsa pochita ulimi wu 
 polankhulapo pambuyo ulendowu nankhumwa anakonza ulendowu cholinga choti ayendere alimi anthochi omwe akhala akuvutika matenda achisaka tea 
 timazayendera alimi anthochi tea tizamve tokha mavuto omwe anthuwa akukuamana nawo mderali potengera mbewu zomwe mbomali amadalira anatero nankhumwa 
 mwazina anankhumwa alonjeza akamba omwe amagula tea mmabomawa akweze mitengo yogulira kubweretsa mbewu nthochi za tsopano abzale mmaderawa 
 mtsogoleri wa alimi tea dera la maonga smallholders association wilfred kasitomu alimi angonoangono tea mbomali akukumana mavuto ochuluka kaamba koti misika sikuyenda potengera zomwe akulowetsa pochita ulimiwu 
 ifeyo ku thyolo kuno tilibe mbewu ina yoti tingadalire tea yekha kaamba koti nthaka yathu inasuluka sitipindula kaamba ka misika yomwe imatigula masamba athu mwachitsanzo timagulitsa tea mtengo wa k121 30 t yomwe yochepa kwambiri potengera zomwe timalowetsa mmunda anatero kasitomu
Label: FARMING

Text:
kanengo parish yayimitsa maulendo onse kunyanja wolemba thokozani chapola parish ya st francis kanengo arch diocese ya lilongwe yayamba yaletsa maulendo onse mabungwe ku parish yi opita ku nyanja potsatira imfa yomira mmadzi ya mwa achinyamata parish yi 
 wapampando wa parishiyi chrissy madeya alengeza za kusinthaku mwambo wa nsembe ya ukaristia lamulungu lapitali 
 ati achita ayambe afufuza kaye kupeza njira zokhazikika zothetsera ngozi za mtunduwu ku parishiyo 
 pamenepa madeya alangiza magulu mabungwe onse parishiyi ayambe ayimitsa kaye maulendo onse omwe anakonzedwa okhudza ku nyanja 
 nkhaniyi ati siyinasangalatse akhristu mparishiyi poganizira atayamba kale kukonzekera maulendo opitanso kunyanja mmasiku akubwerawa chakachi chisanathe 
 loweruka lapitali achinyamata mphakati wa 9b ku parishiyi kunyanja mboma la salima kukasangalala imodzi mwa zinthu zomwe anakonza zichitike mchakachi 
 achinyamatawa anazindikira mwa wamira imene amanyamuka adzibwelera mnyamatayu ati anamupeza atafa kale mmadzimo 
 malinga zomwe achinyamatawa afotokozera radio maria malawi malemuyu analedzera kwambiri kenako analowa mmadzi asambire pomwe anamira kufa

Text:
japan yalonjeza kukweza maphunziro ku malawi kazembe wa la japan kuno ku malawi wati lake lipitiliza kulimbika ntchito zokweza maphunziro mdziko muno 
 kazembe yu satosh iwakiri walankhula msabata yi pomwe amaika mwala wa maziko malo omwe akufuna kumangapo zipinda zophunzilira ana sukulu ya primary ya kapalamula mboma la dedza 
 wati boma la kwawo laganiza zomanga zipindazi njira imodzi yofuna kuthandiza ntchito zotukula maphunziro sukulu yi 
 polankhulanso woona za maphunziro mbomalo george ngaiyaye anathokoza boma la japan kamba kodzipereka ntchito zotukula maphunziro mbomalo 
 polankhulanso mphunzitsi wamkulu sukulu yi frolence donda wati kumangidwa kwa makalasi wa kuthandiza kwambiri ntchito zokweza maphunziro sukuluyi 
 mwa zina boma la japan limanga nyumba za makalasi 6 ophunzilira ana sukulu ya kapalamula mboma la dedza thanki ya madzi zitenga ndalama zoposera 60 million kwacha
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
chikondwerero cha amalitiri aku uganda chayimitsidwa chikondwelero cha chaka chino cha amalitiri ku uganda ati sichichitika mwansanga momwe zimakhalira zaka zonse mdzikomo 
 zili chomwechi kaamba ka ziletso zomwe boma la dzikolo lidayika poletsa mikumano ya ochuluka maulendo ndenge pamadzi mbali imodzi yoteteza kufala kwa kachilombo ka coronavirus 
 chikondwelero cha amalitiri aku uganda cha zaka zammbuyomu malinga chikalata chomwe likulu lampingo wadzikolo yatulusa yati kukonzekera chikondwererocho kumafunika kukumana ochuluka 
 kutha kovuta kuyamba kukonzekera mwambowu lero lino kamba koti yochepa chatero chikalatachi 
 abwenzi amalitiri aku uganda ku malawi ati achita chikondwelero chawo mdziko mommuno malinga mlembi ofalitsa nkhani bungwe abwenzi amalitiri aku uganda kuno ku malawi isaac mphweya achita chikondwelerochi mdziko momwe muno zones zikayenda 
 zatikhumudwitsa kwambiri kamba koti abwenzi ambiri anakonzekera ulendowu tamvetsetsa kamba ka vutoli kuno ku malawi tizakondwerera konkuno 4 october ku bvumbwe parish arkidayosizi ya blantyre anatero amphweya

Text:
apolisi akuthetsa milandu ku nthalire apolisi ku nthalire mboma la chitipa akuweruza kuthetsa milandu osaipititsa kubwalo la milandu 
  zidadziwika sabata yapitayi pomwe bungwe la national initiative for civic education nice lidachititsa msokhano mderalo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu aka si koyamba nkhani zotere ziphulike papolisipo mwa akuluakulu bungwe la catholic commission for justice and peace ccjp mbomalo john moyo atalandira malipotiwo adaitanitsa wapolisiyo mwezi wa june chaka chatha 
  tidawaitanitsa kumsonkhano onse okhudzidwa akadakhalako poyamba adati ndiwotangwanika tidakonza tsiku lina tidachita kukawatenga adavomera zimalakwika adati zitha adatero moyo 
  wa polisi ya nthalire ben mwaliwa adati pamsonkhano watsopanowu iyeyo padalibepo 
  ndikudziwa za msonkhano wa chaka chatha omwe lidakonza bungwe la ccjp pamsonkhanowu tidalonjeza kuthetsa mchitidwewu mbuyomu madandaulo amenewo adalipo zoti kukumalandiridwa ndalama ndinamapo adatero mwaliwa 
  atafunsidwa akumatumiza milandu ku bwalo la milandu adavomera polisi ya nthalire ikumatumiza milandu kubwalo la milanduyi 
  malinga ofisala wa bungweli mboma la chitipa amos ngoma akomiti za chitukuko okhudzidwa adatambasula pamsonkhano wapadera sabata yatha milandu ikumathera kupolisi komwe apolisiwa akumapatsidwa ndalama potengera kukula kwa mlandu 
  apa tidapempha oweruza milandu mderali azipita kupolisi tsiku tsiku kukatenga malipoti otsekeredwa mchitokosicho aziunika omwe angapatsidwe belo pasanathe maola 48 adatero ngoma 
  kutulutsidwa kwa asanatengeredwe kukhoti kwachititsa bwalo la majisitileti ku nthalire lisamalandire milandu zomwe zikupereka mafunso kwa mwa ogwira ntchito pabwalopo nthalire tauni yaikulundithu imenenso ili mmalire lino la zambia kupalamula nkwakukulu 
  malinga mwa ogwira ntchito pabwalopo omwe sadafune kutchulidwa maina poopa kuchitidwa chipongwe bwaloli limayembekezera kumazenga milandu itatu inayi tsiku 
  padakalipano palibe mlandu umodzi omwe ukutumizidwa kubwaloli 
  tikakafufuza kupolisi timapeza mchitokosi ndithu milanduyi ikumathera konko adatero anthuwo 
  pomwe ccjp adachititsa msonkhano june mfumu chipuwe idati mwana wamwamuna adauzidwa apereke k60 000 akatenge njinga yake yomwe idali mmanja mwa apolisi kaamba koti adachita nayo ngozi 
  nawo bwalo la milandu nthawiyo adanenetsa adadziwa china chake si chili kupolisi samalandira milandu momwe zilili 
  mneneri wa apolisi mchigawo cha kumpoto peter kalaya adati ofesi ya polisi ya chitipa ikumamvera za nkhaniyi mmisonkhano palibe wapitako kukawadandaulira za nkhaniyi 
  pena pake tikudziwa anthuwa amaopa nkhani za katangale zimakhudza awiri nawonso amaopa ziwakhudza adatero kalaya
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:

   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu malinga mfumu dumbulira ya derali chrispin mwale adayambana mlongo pankhani ya madzi osamba
