Text:
mkangano wa mafumu sukuzirala ntchito za chitukuko zagwedera mboma la neno nsanje salima kaamba ka mpungwepungwe wa mafumu womwe sukutha 
  ku neno boma lidathotha mfumu chekucheku 2014 mpaka lero boma silidabwezeretse mfumuyi zomwe zapangitsa ofesi ya dc khansala asowe wogwira naye ntchito za chitukuko 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka chekucheku amene akudikira boma limubwezeretse dc wa boma la neno khalansala phungu wa nyumba ya malamulo kumeneko akuti mdera la chekucheku chitukuko chikuvuta palibe mfumu yeniyeni yomwe angagwire nayo ntchito 
  nako ku nsanje boma lidaimitsa mfumu chimombo lidapatsa mphamvu harrison chimombo abagwirizira mpaka lero boma silidapezebe wolowa mmalo mwake zomwe zapangitsa agawanike 
  mfumu bibi kuluunda ya ku salima yomwe idaimitsidwa paudindo boma akuti maso ake ku boma amubwezeretse ufumu ndiye woyenera ufumuwo 
  boma lidaika mbale wa mfumuyi agwirizire ufumuwu kufikira mpungwepungwe utazirala 
  mafumuwa ndiwo amathandizira chitukuko cha paboma lawo chiyende pogwira ntchito makhansala ofesi ya chitukuko boma ofesi ya dc 
  mneneri wa ku unduna wa za maboma angono muhlabase mughogho akuti bata lidzabwerera pokhapokha eni banja atadya khonde kutulutsa munthu woyenerera amene angagwire ntchito boma 
  tili gawo lothandizira komabe mphamvu zili mmanja mwa abanja atipatse mfumu adatero mughogho 
  mughogho akuti boma silivomereza mfumu yogwirizira dziwani boma siligwira ntchito mfumu yogwirizira 
  zikutanthauza ku salima nsanje neno kulibe mafumu omwe boma lingagwire nawo ntchito 
  naye dc wa ku neno phiri adapempha abanja atulutse munthu amene angalowe mmalo mwa mfumu chekucheku amene adachotsedwa mwadzidzidzi kudaperekedwa maina asanu 
  sizikadatheka onse angakhale mfumu imodzi zidakanika ndiye ndivomereze mpaka tilibe mfumu chekucheku adatero phiri 
  phiri adati akugwira ntchito makomiti azachitukuko akumudzi chosowa mfumu zomwe adati nzovuta komabe chitukuko chikutheka zina zikufunika amfumu 
  khansala wa dera la chikonde kwa mfumu chekucheku macpherson dzimadzi adati ntchito yomanga midadada sukulu ya kalioni chiwamba ikukanika chosowa kwa mfumu chekucheku 
  pali ntchito yotuta mchenga njerwa kwale yomwe ikukanika ndidauza mafumu angonoangono atsogolere zikukanika palibe wamkulu amene angawalankhule zina ndikumaweruza milandu ya mafumuwa akayambana zina ndikumawatengera kwa dc adatero dzimadzi 
  ndivomere mavuto alipo chosowekera kwa mfumu chekucheku adaomba mkota dzimadzi 
  malinga ndime 23:03 gawo ii gawo la malamulo okhudza mafumu boma lidaimitsa mfumu chekucheku yemwe dzina lake francis magombo asagwirenso ntchito za ufumuwu mboma la neno kuyambira 15 may 2014 
  lachiwiri msabatayi chekucheku adauza tamvani akudikirabe boma limuvomere ayambirenso kugwira ntchito 
  ufumu uja wanga ndikungodikira mtsogoleri wa lino andibwezeretse mpandopo adatero 
  ku nsanje mamembala abanja la mfumu chimombo adalembera dc wa bomalo unduna wa maboma angono asabwezeretse chimombo amene adachotsedwa december 2012 
  mfumu yochotsedwayo stanford tukula idachotsedwa pamene imaganiziridwa milandu yosowetsa katundu 
  ku salima boma lidaimitsa mfumu kuluunda khadija habib saidi may chaka chatha chomuganizira ziphuphu 
  mpaka lero boma silinabwezeretse mfumuyi mbale wa mfumuyi ndiye akugwirizira ufumuwo 
  pocheza tamvani lachiwiri mfumuyi idati ndikudikirira aboma andibwezeretse pampando 
  katswiri zandale henry chingaipe mmbuyomu adauza tamvani lino silidafike pomagwira ntchito yake popanda mafumu 
  pakufunika chiefs act malamulo okhudza mafumu atakonzedwanso tidziwe ntchito za mafumu za mtsogoleri wa nkhani zokhudza mafumu adatero 
  sitidafikepo pomagwira ntchito popanda mafumuwa ndiwofunikabe pokhapokha titadziwa ntchito zawo pamene tili ulamuliro wa zipani zambiri 
  woyendetsa nkhani zachitukuko ku neno henry chitema akuti kusowekera kwa mfumu chekucheku kwasokoneza nkhani zachitukuko 
  chitema akuti mfumuyi imayenera kutsogolera ake mafumu ake agwire ntchito za chitukuko 
  tikawauza tigwire ntchito akumatiuza abanja lachifumu kotero sangagwire ntchito adatero 
  boma la neno lili mafumu anayi panopa tatsala ma t atatu tilibe amene angayimire kwa chekucheku zatikhudza
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:
mwambo wopha mudzi poika mfumu amakhulupirira akamwalira amayenera akaikidwe chatsonga chokhala zimachitika kwambiri pakati mafumu achingoni maka kwa maseko umu momwe zidakhalira maliro t bvumbwe wa ku thyolo mwezi wathawu yemwe adaikidwa chatsonga otere akamwalira pamakhala mwambo wopha mudzi zimachitika pokumba nyumba yoti igone mfumuyo bobby kabango akutsata momwe zimakhalira 
  pepani wawa zovutazi ndimati tichezepo pangono za miyambo ina yokhudza maikidwe mfumu yachingoni poyamba tidziwane 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc ndine opesi mangombo kwathu mommuno mwa bvumbwe 
  ndinu wa wanji   mukadzaona nsalu ya gomani chonchi mthini pamutu musadzafunse dziwani amenewo angoni ankhondo aja amene adachoka ku mozambique ku domwe moti mngoni ndili kumtundu wa bvumbwe 
  ndamva ndiye mumatsogolera adzukulu okumba manda mfumu mwamva zoona si manda onse ndinatsogolera adzukulu amene akumba manda amene tiike thupi la mfumu yathu bvumbwe 
  timamva za oti kupha mudzi pamene mukukumba manda ogona mfumu zimatanthauzanji choyamba dziwani kaye mfumu yathu igona chatsonga kupha mudzi kumachitika mukukumba manda munthu amene akaikidwe chatsonga kwa okaikidwa chogona ndiye sikukhalanso kupha mudzi mudzi malo phanga lomwe mfumuyo imaikidwako choyamba mumakumba dzenje lotalika mamita atatu theka limakhala dzenje lozungulira osati lamakona anayi zikhalira mukamaliza kukumbako ndiye mumakhala pansi kupanga mudziwo 
  fotokozaninso mwati mudzi nchiyani mudzi malo phanga lomwe mfumu igoneko pamene mwakumba kumaliza manda ndiye mumayamba kupanga phanga kukula kwake kufanane kukula kwa bokosilo zambiri mudziwo umakula mamita awiri mlitali mlifupi 
  ndiye mukati kupha mudzi mumatanthauza chiyani timatanthauza ntchito yomwe mumachita muyambe kupanga phangalo lomwe kulowe mfumu yathu 
  zimatheka mupange phanga loti muli kale mdzenje timaonetsetsa dzenjelo likhale lokula mukathe pansi kumagoba mudziwo timapangira khasu lomweli timaligulula kulizika nkhwangwa 
  mukamaliza mumatani tikafikira mlingo womwe timatenga timitengo kukhoma pakhomo mudziwo bokosi likalowa timayenera titseke pakhomopa dothi lisalowe simungapange mudzi musadayeze kukula kwa bokosi lomwe mfumu yathu igonemo 
  dothi lakenso liti   pajatu dzenjeli timalikwirira pamene taika mfumu yathu ndiye pakhomo mudzi timatsekapo dothi lisamupeze 
  cholinga chopangira mudziwu nchiyani mfumu siyenera kuthiridwa dothi pamutu mudziwu umapangidwa dala ipeze kobisala pamene tikuthira dothi 
  manda awa chiliza chake chimakhala chotani chimamangidwa mozunguliranso akuloza ziliza za mafumu pamandapo osati chogona zina zimakhalira malo ano mafumu okhaokha akazi mwana wa mfumu sagona pokhapokha wavekedwa ufumu 
  kodi uku sikungovutika chabe mwatero inuyo sitiona kuvutika kukwaniritsa chikhalidwe chathu ulemu kwa mafumu athu angoni
Label: CULTURE

Text:
teketeke popereka zikalata mzinda wa blantyre mudali teketeke msabatayi pomwe bungwe la zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec lidalandira zikalata za omwe akufuna kudzaimira nawo pachisankho cha 2 july 
  amene adaloledwa mchipinda choperekera zikalatazo ku sunbird mount soche adatsata ndondomeko zopewera matenda covid-19 chipwilikiti chidali panja pomwe samakhala motalikana 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc chakwera adzaima limodzi chilima mwa 9 omwe amayenera kupereka zikalata zawo atatu okha ndiwo adavomerezedwa kutero 
  lazarus chakwera motsatana saulos chilima adzaimira mgwirizano wa tonse alliance momwe muli zipani 9 peter kuwani adzaimira mbakuwaku movement for development motsatana archibald kalowongoma pomwe peter mutharika motsatana atupele muluzi adzaimira mgwirizano wa zipani zadpp udf 
  smart swira phunziro mvula chikomeni chirwa shaibu mustafa khwechani nkhoma levelend kaliya adakanika nawo pamndandandawo kaamba ka zolinga zina kulephera kukwanitsa zofunika 
  mutharika muluzi atapereka zikalata zawookhawo atamaliza kupereka zikalata zake chakwera adati yosintha zinthu tsopano yakwana adadzudzula kwambiri mec posayendetsa chisankho cha 21 may chaka chatha chimene bwalo lamilandu lidagamula 3 february chaka chino nchosavomerezeka 
  kuwani yemwe adasonyeza mkwiyo chisankho cha 2019 sichidabale zipatso adayamikira womutsatirayo posafooka 
  mmawu ake mutharikaadati akudziwa adapambana chisankhocho chikhulupiriro chonse apambana pachisankho chikudzachi akuimalimodzi muluzi yemwe akudziwa za chitukuko 
  polankhula opereka zikalatazo payekhapayekha wapampando wa mec jane ansah adati pochita kampeni atsogoleriwo ayenera kubwera njira zatsopano zochitira kampeni malinga matenda covid-19 boma lidati asakhale oposa 100 malo amodzi zimene zingakhudze kampeni yomwe idayamba 2 may 
  padakalipano akadaulo za ndale aikapo mlomo momwe chisankhochi chikuyendera 
  kadaulo wina humphreys mvula adachenjeza mwayi wa misonkhano uli wovuta malingana nkhani ya covid-19 zipanizi zisabwekere momwe zidachitira chisankho cha 2019 apeze njira zodzigulitsira kwa 
  taona mtima wodzichepetsa kwambiri mwa atsogoleri ndale zomwe ambiri amakayika zingatheke zatheka ndiye kwatsala nkuchilimika kukopa zidzayende pachisankho adatero mvula 
  oyendetsa ntchitoza mgwirizano wa mabungwe okhudzana zisankho wa malawi electoral support network mesn andrew kachasu adati zateremu zakhala zasonyeza zokonzekera chisankho zikuyenda adati zipani zipewe mtopola 
  zikamatere ndiye zikuyenda tsono chomwe ndingapemphe nchoti popanga kampeni zipani ziyike mtima pogulitsa zawo osati kunena za kulankhula monyodola ayi adatero kachasu 
  kadaulo za malamulo nandini patel adatanthauzira mgwirizano ubale omwe zipani ziwiri koposa apo zimapanga ncholinga choonjezera mwayi wawo wopeza mavoti ochuluka pachisankho 
  pachisankho chomwe bwalo lidatembenuza chipani cha mutharika yemwe adaimira dpp adapeza mavoti 1 940 709 kuimilira 38 100 aliwonse chakwera wa mcp adapeza 1 781 740 kuimilira 35 100 aliwonse chilima wa utm party adapeza mavoti 1 107 369 kuimira 20 100 pomwe muluzi wa udfadapeza 235 164 kuyimira 4 100.otolera steven pembamoyo wisdom chirombo idaphwanya malamulo pakayendetsedwe ka chisankhocho

Text:
pulezidenti asamale atidye nawo mafumu mphunzitsi wandale kusukulu ya ukachenjede ku chancellor college kudzanso amalawi ati wa andale posintha zipani alowe chipani cholamulachonsecho maliro mtsogoleri wakale mnyumbaungosonyeza dyera 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc akuluakuluwa ati ichi chisonyezo aphungu nduna zina sizifuna kutukula amalawi kusakaza zomwe zimayenera zitukule akumudzi 
  akuluakuluwa ati kotero pomwe chipani cha peoples pp chikulandira aphungu osomphoka kwina chisamale maka chipani chakale cholamula cha dpp akhale tcheru amadyowo 
  ndemangazi zikudza imfa yadzidzi ya mtsogoleri wakale wa lino bingu wa mutharika yemwe adamwalira lachinayi 5 mwezi uno atadwala matenda mtima 
  zitadziwika bingu atisiya yemwe adali wachiwiri wawo joyce banda adalumbiritsidwa mtsogoleri wa lino potsatira malamulo la malawi 
  msamuko banda asadalumbiritsidwe nkomwe aphungu nduna zina zidaneneratu zilowa chipani cha pp ati potsatira zomwe awauza 
  nduna aphungu akuti akhala akufika komwe kukukhala banda kuwailesi ya mbc kukalengeza zalowa chipani cha banda 
  mwa nduna ya zantchito lucious kanyumba wachiwiri kwa pulezidenti wa chipani cha dpp yunus mussa adanenetsa tsono alowa chipani cha banda ati omwe adawasankha ndiwo anena 
  apa ounikira ati ili dyera pachikhalidwe simuyenera kukamba nkhani zina pomwe maliro adakali mnyumba 
  achenjezanso banda akuyenera kusamala atidyenawo atha kudzathawanso chipanichi sichikulamula 
  t kapeni ya mboma la blantyre yati pofika lachitatu idali isadalumikizane phungu kumeneko iyo adati pamiyambo ya makolo sikololedwa kumakamba nkhani zina maliro mnyumba 
  pakhomo pakagwa azimu timadikira tiike thupiro ndiye timakhala omasuka kukamba zina zokonza kungounikira kumene 
  tikamamva zimenezi zayamba kale kuchitika zikutimvetsa chisoni sibwino ino kukamba zoterezi ichi sichingakhale chitukuko chikunenedwacho akuyenera kudikira mpaka titaika maliro idatero mfumuyi 
  aphungu adyera t kachindamoto ya mboma la dedza yati aphungu akumangonama akutsata zomwe omwe adawaika pampando anena 
  phungu wathu kuno sadabwere kudzatifunsa maganizo ake sitingalolenso tiyambe kukamba zimenezi maliro mnyumba 
  umu simmene pachikalidwe chathu zikhalira tidikire tikaike wokondedwa wathu bwinobwino pulezidenti anenera adatero kachindamoto 
  senior chief malemia ya mboma la nsanje yati phungu wawo yemwenso wachiwiri kwa nduna ya zamigodi vera chelewani adaitanitsa mafumuwo ndikuwafunsa chomwe phungu wawo ayenera 
  malemia wati zomwe adauza ndunayi nkuti igwire ntchito boma boma ndilo limaitanitsa chitukuko kumidzi mijigo milatho sukulu 
  kaya akalowa chipani kaya ayi chomwe nkuti agwire ntchito boma chitukuko chitifike 
  mafumu tilibe chipani chomwe tichita nkuthandiza boma lolamula ligwire ntchito yake 
  zambiri sizili mdziko muno kusowa kwa ndalama zakunja mafuta idatero mfumuyi 
  iyo idati sidakambe zambiri phunguyo ponena sikulondola kukamba zambiri chikhalirecho maliro mnyumba 
  sadatifunse mlimi wa mtedza chimanga nellie banda wa mmudzi mwa champiti kwa t champiti mboma la ntcheu wati phungu wawo kumeneko yemwe wachiwiri kwa sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo jones chingola sadawafunsepo za ganizo losintha mawanga 
  kuno tili mavuto kusowa sukulu milatho phunguyu palibe chomwe wachita ndiye akamati akufuna chitukuko akutanthauza martin susuwere wa mmudzi mwa godeni kwa t mpama mboma la chiradzulu wati phungu wawo kumeneko yemwenso nduna ya maboma angono henry mussa sadafikenso amve maganizo 
  abwere adzatifunse maganizo athu adatero dilaivalayu 
  apa chunga watsendera aphungu nduna zobulika ku zipani zawo lero zilibe mtima wofuna kutukula kuthandiza omwe adazisankha 
  wati nduna zina zakhala zikuchita chimodzimodzi kuchipani cha mcp udf dpp zikufunanso zichite chimodzimodzi pomwe zikufuna zilowe ku pp 
  banda asakomedwe chunga wati ufulu wolowa chipani chomwe wafuna komabe banda asakomedwe oterewa sikoyeneranso kuwapatsa maundindo 
  kastswiriyu adatsendera zonse kuyamikira komwe banda adachita pamaunduna 
  lachiwiri msabatayi banda adasintha unduna wofalitsa nkhani omwe udapita kwa moses kunkuyu yemwe adalowa mmalo mwa patricia kaliati 
  adasinthanso wa nyumba yowulutsira ya boma ya mbc pomwe adachotsa bright malopa nkuika benson tembo kuchotsa yemwe adali wa apolisi peter mukhito ndikuika loti dzonzi 
  adasinthanso mlembi wamkulu muunduna womwe umayendetsa chuma cha boma joseph mwanamvekha nkuikapo radson mwadiwa yemwe adalinso paudindowu 2009 
  banda wachenjeza onse omwe akufuna kulowa chipanichi asapite pawailesi akumane mlembi wachipanichi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
episkopi apempha amayi adzipereke pofalitsa mthenga wabwino episcope wa dayosizi ya chikwawa ambuye peter musikuwa apempha amayi akatolika mdziko muno akhale odzipereka ntchito yofalitsa uthenga wabwino ku matchalitchi amene amayiwa akupezekako 
 ambuye musikuwa omwenso woona zachipembezo ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno amalankhula lamulungu pambuyo pamwambo wa misa yotsekera msonkhano wa amayi mdziko muno womwe umachitikira ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya dmi dayosizi ya mangochi 
 umodzi mwa misonkhano ya bungwe la amayi ati mpingo ukuyembekeza kusitha kwakukulu kwa amayiwa pambuyo msonkhanowu pankhani zosamalira zachilengedwe zaumoyo kukonda kulimbikitsana bukhu loyera 
 tikuyembekezera zinthu zikasintha ku maparishi komwe amayiwa akuchokera tikukhulupilira tiwona nkhani ya zokhudza kusamalira chilengedwe zina zambiri anatero ambuye musikuwa 
 polankhulapo wachiwiri kwa wapampando wa bungwe la amayi mdziko muno magdalene masamba nkhope apempha amayi omwe anafika ku msonkhanowu akagawane anzawo mmadayosizi zomwe atenga ku msonkhanowu 
 msonkhanowu omwe unali wa masiku asanu unayamba lachitatu 11 mpaka lamulungu 15 december 2019 wachitika pamutu wakuti amayi akatolika tayitanidwa oyera mtima tiyeretse kwathunthu
Label: RELIGION

Text:
mamonitala sakupezeka kolembetsa mamonita zipani zina sakupezeka mmalo olembetsera mavoti tamvani wafukula 
  mmalo 7 mmidzi yomwe tamvani adazungulira mkati mwa sabatayi malo amodzi okha kasambwe kwa t kabudula ndiko kudapezeka monitala wa chipani cha peoples party pp mmalo onse mmangopezeka zipani za malawi congress mcp democratic progressive dpp basi 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka ansah tidauza zipani nkhaniyi yakhumudwitsa bungwe loyanganira zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec lomwe lati otere ndiwo umayambitsa kusakhutira zotsatira za chisankho 
  wa mec jane ansah adati tidapempha zipani zonse zitumize mamonitala mmalo olembetsera aziona momwe zinthu zikuyendera nkupereka malipoti ku zipani zawo takhumudwa zipani zina zilibe ma monitala watero wa mec jane ansah 
  malingana bungwe lowona za momwe ndondomeko ya zisankho ikuyendera la malawi electoral support network mesn monitala diso khutu la chipani bungwe lokhudzidwa pachisankho 
  wa bungwelo steve duwa adati monitala amayenera pamalo wolembetsera kuvotera kuwerengera zisankho mboni ya chipani bungwe lake amayenera kusayinira zotsatira pamapeto 
  nkofunika kwambiri chipani chikhale monitala kalembera chisankho zotsatira amayenera kusayinira pamapeto pake akakhutira kukana umboni woti pena pake sipadayende adatero duwa 
  zipani zina zomwe zimayembekezeka mamonitala ake mmalo olembetsera united democratic front udf alliance for democracy aford united transformation movement utm 
  mneneri wa utm joseph chidanti malunga adati msabatayi adaali kuthamanga zolembetsa gululo chipani choncho sanatumize mamonitala 
  malamulo amalola chipani chomwe chidalembetsa nchodziwika kutenga nawo mbali tidali tisadamalize mbali yolembetsayo mtsogolomu tizikhala nawo paliponse adatero malunga 
  mneneri wa udf ken ndanga adati asankhabe mamonitala mtsogolomu adati zimavuta mamonitala mpaka pamene chipani chawo chidachititsa msonkhano waukulu 
  malinga wofalitsa nkhani za pp noah chimpeni chipanicho chili chikhulupiriro mamonitala mabungwe omwe siaboma agwira ntchito yoyenera
Label: POLITICS

Text:
pasakhale oponya voti atsopano supreme court bwalo la supreme lagamula chisankho chatsopano cha president chichitikebe mdziko muno popanda atsopano kutenga nawo gawo chisankhochi 
  bwaloli lanena chigamulo chake pomwe bungwe la mec chipani cha dpp anakasuma potsutsana chigamulo chomwe bwalo la za malamulo linapereka chisankhochi chichitike mmasiku 150 kuyambira 3 february chaka chino 
 bwaloli lati amene anaphwanyiridwa ufulu amene anavota chisankho cha chaka chatha choncho palibe choti atsopano alembedwenso kaundula wa voti yi 
 tawamenya 6 0 adabwera koyamba ayimitse mlandu anamenyedwa ku constitution khoti anawakana apanso chimodzi modzi anatero chilima 
 ati bwalo la mlanduli lagamulanso onse omwe atakaponye voti omwe analembetsa chaka chatha omwe atapikisane omwe mndandandawu chaka chatha ati sakubwelera mmbuyo apitilira kuyenda limodzi lazarus chakwera chipani cha mcp mlanduwu 
 mchigamulocho bwaloli lalamula bungwe la mec libwenze ndalama zonse zomwe odandaula omwe zipani za mcp utm zawononga chiyambi cha mlanduwu
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mapemphero mvula aliko lero pamene ngamba yadzetsa chikaiko choti amalawi akhoza kukolola zochepa chaka chino mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika lero akhala nawo mapemphero mvula amene achitike mumzinda wa lilongwe 
  malinga mlangizi wa mutharika za chipembedzo timothy khoviwa mapempherowo akhalanso othokoza mulungu zochitika za chaka chatha 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mutharika led malawians in prayer mapempherowo akachitikira ku bingu international conference centre bicc pansi yakuti kudzipereka kwa mulungu posinkhasinkha mtendere chitukuko cha 
  tikakhalanso tikupempha mulungu atipatse zokolola zokwanira 2016 kuli atsogoleri mipingo yosiyanasiyana iyinso yakuti zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana akhalire pamodzi adatero khoviwa 
  mapempherowa akudza pomwe nthambi yoona za nyengo idati kudula kwa mvula kwa sabata ziwiri kwadzetsa chikaiko pakati alimi amalawi onse 
  mneneri wa nthambiyo ellina kululanga adati kudulaku kwadza cha nyengo ya el nino imene ikuchititsa madera mchigawo cha kumwera mugwe ngamba pomwe kumpoto pakati chiyembekezo chilipo mvulayi igwa 
  malinga kafukufuku wa nyuzipepala ya the nation madera ambiri mvula siyikugwa zimene zingachititse zokolola zichepe zikudza pomwe mchaka cha 2015 zokolola zidatsika makilogalamu 30 makilogalamu 100 alionse cha vuto la madzi osefukira amene adakokolola mbewu zambiri
Label: RELIGION

Text:
atuma kupha apolisi mboma la chitipa atsekera mchitokosi wina pomuganizira adatuma achiwembu kupha mkazi wakale 
  facksoni simbeye adatuma filisoni mbendera wa zaka 38 wina yemwe akungodziwika mshani kupha lyness mtawa awiriwa atasemphana maganizo pankhani zina zambanja 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka malinga mneneri wapolisi mchigawo cha kumpoto maurice chapola sizidamukomere simbeye adakonza chiwembuchi 6 mwezi uno 
  maiyu adapezeka ataphedwa mmunda wa chimanga atakhapidwa kwambiri mmutu adatero chapola 
  chapola adati mmudzi mwa fyson nyondo t mwabulambia mbomalo adatsatira mapazi pomwe maiyu adaphedwera 
  mneneriyu adati apa mapaziwa adalunjika mnyumba mwa mbendera yemwe ataona khamu la anthuli adalikumba liwiro la mtondo wadooka 
  komabe adamugwira pomwe adaulula simbeye ndiye adawatuma kupha maiyu apatu sadaugwire mtima adamtibula mpaka kumupha adatero chapola 
  mwa omwe amachokera mudzi umodzi mtawa adakana kutipatsa dzina lake adatsimikizira msangulutso simbeye ndiye adakonza chiwembuchi kaamba ka ndalama za banki mkhonde 
  bamboyo adati simbeye adavomera atagwidwa mmudzimo ndiye adakonza upowo banja lawo lidatha mwezi wa novembala atakhala zaka zoposa zisanu nkhani idagona k200 000 ya banki nkhonde yomwe mayiyo adatenga adatero bamboyu

Text:
ndege ya ufiti ikodwa ku kasungu malamulo lino amakana kumutchula munthu mfiti amalawi ambiri amakhulupirira ufitu uliko 
  mmudzi mwa gundani mboma la kasungu adodoma ataona chinthu chooneka ndege chomwe akuchiganizira ndege ya afiti chitagwa mmudzimo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi msangulutso utafufuza chomwe chidachitikita udapeza ndegeyo idagawa pakhomo yusufu abubaka yemwe akukhulupilira akola mfiti zomwe zakhala zikusautsa banja lawo 
  amenewa adalodza akazi anga mmene agwidwiramu akazi anga akhala adatero 
  mkazi wa bamboyo liness kaulongo wakhala akudwala kwa yaitali kuchipatala cha boma ku kasunguko adawauza akayesere zachikuda 
  tidapita kwa asinganga komwe adationetsa anayi omwe akusautsa banja lathu singangayo adatipatsa mankhwala omwe adati tikaike panyumba yathu ndidzakole mfiti zomwe zimanditambilazo adatero 
  adati sanadabwe kwambiri mkazi akuuza kunja kwa nyumba yawo kwagwa chinthu chooneka ndege 
  kaulongo adati adadabwa kuona chinthu chamaonekadwe ndege chili panja panyumba yayo pomwe adatuluka usiku kukataya madzi 
  mneneri wapolisi mboma la kasungu edwin kaunda adatsimikiza akusungadi chinthu chomwe chikuganiziridwa ndege yaufiti 
  adati adapita pamalopo kukakhazikitsa bata chinthucho chinkabweretsa mpungwepungwe malopo 
  tidapita kukatenga chinthucho tili nacho kuno kupolisi adatero kaunda

Text:
apolisi akwidzinga 10 ku neno akuwaganizira adatengapo mbali kupha agogo anayi apolisi mboma la neno lachinayi adanjata 10 powaganizira adatengapo mbali imfa za agogo anayi omwe adachita kuphedwa olusa powaganizira ndiwo adalenga mphenzi yomwe idapha mtsikana wa zaka 17 flora kanjete lolemba lapitalo 
  mneneri wa apolisi mbomalo raphael kaliati polankhula msangulutso lachitatu lapitali adati kufikira lachitatulo apolisi adali asadamange wina wokhudzidwa kuphwedwa kwa okalambawo podikira bata likhazikike kaye kuderalo ayambe kufufuza za imfazo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika adalowererapo polamula wa apolisi lexten kachama nkhaniyi aifufuze mmangummangu chilungamo chioneke malinga malamulo lino apezeka olakwa pamlandu wakupha alandire chilango choyenera 
  malinga chikalata chochokera ya boma chomwe adachitulutsa lachitatu mtsogoleri wa linoyu adati adali wachisoni wokhumudwa kwambiri imfa za agogowo kaamba kowaganizira za ufiti 
  chikalatacho chidati pulezidenti mutharika akuti okalamba ayenera kulandira ulemu chitetezo zonse boma lake silidzalola okalamba azitonzedwa kuvutitsidwa mnjira ina iliyonse mdziko muno 
  pofika lachinayi malingana mneneri wa polisi neno 10 kuphatikizapo anyamata asanu zaka za pakati 13 18 adanjatidwa mmanja mwa apolisi powaganizira ndiwo adakonza upo wopha agogowo 
  mwa omangidwawa staford chifundo wa zaka 36 amosi sida wa zaka 32 samuel kaudzu wa zaka 20 john harry wa zaka 21 lex mayenda wa zaka 19 onsewa kuphatikizapo anyamata achisodzerawo akuti mpachibale agogo adaphedwawo 
  kaliati adati khumiwa awatengera kubwalo la milandu la majisitireti ku neno komwe akaipereke mmanja mwa bwalo lalikulu la high court poti ndilo lili mphamvu zozenga milandu ikuluikulu ya kupha 
  adati zofufuza zidakali mkati pali chiyembekezo choti lamulo ligwirapo ntchito onse okhudzidwa nkhani yoziziritsa nkhongonoyi 
  nalo bungwe la malawi law society lidati lokhumudwa imfa za agogowo omwe adaphedwa pazifukwa zopanda mchere pongowaganizira za ufiti kaamba ka ukalamba wawo 
  omwe adakonza chiwembu chopha agogowa ayenera afufuzidwe bwinobwino akapezeka ayenera akayankhe mlandu kubwalo la milandu kulandira chilango choyenera akapezeka olakwa 
  bungwe lathu lokonzeka kupereka maloya athandize boma pozenga milanduyo chatero chikalata chomwe bungweli atulutsa pambuyo kumva za nkhani yomvetsa chisoniyi chomwe chidasainidwa pulezidenti wa bungweli john suzi banda mlembi khumbo bonzoe soko 
  oganiziridwawo adamenya agogowo mpaka kumpha zitangodziwika mphenzi yapha mtsikanayo dzuwa likuswa mtengo malinga kaliati anthuwo akukhulupirira mphenziyo idali yokonzedwa agogowo omwe adali pachibale 
  mboma la neno muli vuto la mvula chiyambireni chaka chino mvula yagwa masiku 8 okha mphenzi zakhala zikunganima kupha kumeneko 
  agogowo eliza enosi kanjete wa zaka 86 elenefa kanjete wa zaka 76 byson kanjete wa zaka 73 idesi julias kanjete wa zaka 69 onsewa adali mmudzi mwa chimbalanga 1

Text:

Text:
bungwe la st vincent lathandiza odwala ku queens bungwe la zachifundo mpingo wa katolika la society of saint vincent de paul lapempha akhrisitu akatolika mdziko muno athandize anzawo osowa nyengo ino ya lenti 
 wa bungweli charles kimu anena mzinda wa blantyre pamene bungweli limapeleka katundu osiyanasiyana chipatala chachikulu cha queen elizabeth 
 apempha magulu osiyanasiyana mpingowu azikumbukira omwe mmavuto matenda powathandiza zomwe nazo njira imodzi yoonetsa ntchito za chifundo zomwe zimalimbikitsidwa nyengo ino ya lent 
 bungwe lathu lazachifundo nde tinachiona cha nzeru tibwere kuno kuchipatala tizagawabne anzathu zochepa zomwe tiri nazo munye ngo ino ya lent yomwe timalimbikitsiidwa anatero kimu 
 naye wachinyamata ku bungweli vincent ndawu analimbikitsa achinyamata omwe akulipilidwa sukulu bungweli azitengerapo chitsanzo pakayendetsedwe ka bungweli nawo azakhale atsogoleri abwino abungweli mtsogolo

Text:
idali nyengo ya pasaka wina adapitira ntchito yokatola zochitika tchuthi chokumbukira mazunzo kuuka kwa ambuye yesu pomwe wina adapita kukapuma tchuthi mapeto ake idasanduka nyengo yoti awiriwa awone zomwe mulungu adawakonzera 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka mayamiko seyani yemwe panthawiyo amagwira ntchito ya utolankhani kukampani ya nation publications limited npl adali kalikiliki kutola zochitika zosiyanasiyana pomwe maso ake adakagwera nicra chikopa yemwe amadikira abale ake akalowe mmadzi akasambire 
  mayamiko akuti atangomuona nicra ntchito yonse idasokonezeka sadaupeze mtima mpaka adatsatira pomwe padali namwaliyo nkuyamba kucheza naye 
  mayamiko nicra tsiku la chinkhoswe chawo ndidali anzanga nthawiyo ndidawasiya nawonso adandimvetsetsa sinkadachitira mwina ayi kusendera kufupi adatero mayamiko 
  nicra akuti machezedwe mayamiko adamusangalatsa kwambiri moti adaiwala zokasambira abale ake omwe amadikira atafika 
  tidacheza oti tidadziwana kalekale pomwe ayi ndithu kadali koyamba moti adandipatsa chidwi kwambiri adatero nicra 
  chitatha tchuthi awiriwa akuti adakumananso mumzinda wa blantyre momwe onse amakhala macheza adapita patsogolo kufikira pomwe mayamiko adamasuka lilime nkufunsira 
  zonsezi akuti zinkachitika mchaka cha 2014 kuyambira apo mpaka lero chibwenzi chawo chakhala chikuyenda moti 4 october chaka chomwe chino adamanga chinkhoswe kuyembekeza ukwati oyera chaka chamawachi 
  mayamiko akuti kwa nicra mkazi yekhayo yemwe adamutenga mtima mpaka njala ya chakudya kutha akuti salotako zoti nkudzalekana naye 
  nicra naye akuti chake nchisangalalo chokhachokha popeza mwamuna wa kukhosi kwake naye akuti alibenso nkhawa za tsogolo lowala 
  palibe yemwe amada nkhawa atapeza chinthu chomwe amalakalaka mmoyo mwake ndidapeza mwamuna yemwe ndinkalakalaka wachikondi wachilimbikitso owopa mulungu adatero nicra

Text:
achitira zadama basi okhala mumzinda wa mzuzu akhala akuchitira za dama mmabasi omwe adaimikidwa kumsika wa zigwagwa pafupifupi miyezi inayi yapitayi 
  mabasiwa salinso mmanja mwa kampani ya axa banki ya fdh idawagulitsa kwa wina wa bizinesi yemwe adawaimika ku zigwagwako poyembekezera kuwagulitsa kuwaphwasula mwa 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka imodzi mwa basi amachitiramo zadamayo komatu apezerapo mwayi wochitiramo za chiwerewere maka yomwe idali magalasi osaonekera mkati tintedi 
  msangulutso udatsinidwa khutu zakhala zikuchitika madzulo usiku anthuwa amalipira kangachepe apeze mwayi wodzithandiza mbasimo 
  komatu si zadama okhawa omwe amapumira mmabasiwo ngakhalenso osowa kogona adatenga mabasiwo nyumba zogona alendo 
  pomwe msangulutso udakazungulira pamalopo udapeza mlonda chimwemwe kachali yemwe adavomereza wakhala akupezerera akuchita chiwerewere imodzi mwa mabasiwo makamaka usiku 
  amatengerapo mwayi yosaonekera mkati ndiye zomwe amachitazo sizimaoneka kunja choti chitseko chake sichitsekeka ankangolowamo adatero kachali 
  adakanitsitsa zoti adalandirapo ndalama kwa anthuwa 
  mwina popeza miyezi yapitayo tidalipo awiri mnzanga ndiye mwina yemwe amalandira ndalama sindidalandireko kanthu ambiri mwa omwe amachitira zadama mmenemo adali woti timawadziwa ndithu adatero kachali 
  adaonjezera zikuoneka komwe mabasiwo adali asadagulidwe bwana mchitidwewu umachitika adabwera makondomu ogwiritsidwa ntchito mwa zina 
  apa adatinso masiku amapezanso makondomu ogwiritsidwa kale ntchito omwe anthuwo amawataya akamaliza zadamazo 
  idafika yoti amakuwa akamadutsa mmabasimu mutuluka mwana amati aphwasulidwe kugulitsidwa mwachangu adalongosola kachali 
  adati zitafikapo abwana ake adayesa kuitseka mawaya asamalowe sizidathandize anthuwo adadula mawayawo 
  zina ndikati ndikayendere basi pakati pausiku ndimapeza mwagona anyamata achilendo zikatero ndimawathamangitsa ambiri mwa amakhala oti athamangitsidwa mnkhalango alibe kolowera adatero kachali 
  pocheza tsamba lino mwini ma basiwo george biyeni adati adagula mabasi asanu omwe adali kampani ya axa kubanki ya fdh adalemba alonda ake awiri oyanganira mabasiwo adasiya ntchito 
  biyeni adati mphekesera yoti mmabasiwo makamaka ya tintediyo mumachitika za dama idamupeza adangoganiza zoyitseka mawaya anthuwo asamalowemo 
  ndimati ndikalowa mbasimo mumaoneka amachitamo zawo ndithu ndikafunsa sindimayankhidwa bwinobwino adatero biyeni 
  adati basi yomwe zimachitika kwambiriyo waiphwasula tsopano yomwe yatsala pamalopo yoti omwe adawagulitsawo aikhonza kukonzekera kupita nayo ku blantyre 
  biyeni adaonjezera nzovuta zadamawa kugwiritsa ntchito basi inayo mwini adaikamo ake angapo omwe akugona momwemo poilondera kwinaku akuikhonza 
  polankhulapo mneneri wa polisi mchigawo cha ku mpoto peter kalaya adati ofesi yake sidalandirepo dandaulo nkhaniyi 
  tikadauzidwa tikadafufuza ochita zadamawo akadaimbidwa mlandu wa idle and disorderlykuchita zadama malo osayenera kalaya adatero

Text:
nkhanza za mbanja zikupitirira kuchuluka mzimayi uyu adakhapidwa mwamuna ku thyolo chaka chaka lino limakhala masiku 16 othana nkhanza mogwirizana maiko padziko zenizeni sizikuoneka pamene nkhani za nkhanza mmaboma zakula msinkhu 
  malinga mneneri wa polisi rhoda manjolo 2013 4 499 adachitiridwa nkhanza mwezi wa january mpaka june 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc chaka chino manjolo wati kuyambira january mpaka september nkhani zotere zakwana 9 842 chomwe chiwerengero chokwera kuyerekeza 2013 
  nkhani zoti waphedwa mwamuna waphedwa mkazi nazonso zakhala zikumveka 
  komatu zikuchitika pamene chaka chaka amabungwe padziko amakhala kampeni yomemeza asiye nkhanza kuyambira 25 november mpaka 10 december 
  lipoti lomwe unduna wa za jenda ukuyembekezereka kutulutsa sabata ikudzayi ukusonyeza nkhani zophana ndizo zidakula msinkhu mchakachi 
  mlembi muundunawu dr mary shawa dzana lachinayi adakana kuuzatamvanizomwe zili mlipotimo ponena tidikire sabata ikudzayi 
  sindinganene momwe nkhanza zachitikira mchaka chino komabe pali akutha kukanena kupolisi akachitiridwa nkhanza abambo tsopano ayamba kukadziwitsa apolisi pamene achitiridwa nkhanza adatero shawa pokambapo pangono za lipotilo 
  chaka chino ndiye pali nkhani zophana zoposa zisanu iyi nkhani yachisoni kwambiri tidali nkhani yomwe amayi atatu adagwiririra mnyamata wa zaka 13 abambonso aphedwa akazi mumva zambiri tikatulutsa lipotili 9 december adawonjeza shawa 
  wa bungwe lomwe limalimbana kuthetsa nkhanza la umunthu foundation david odali adati nzachisoni nkhanza zikungochulukira kalikiriki kudziwitsa asiye mchitidwewu 
  nzachisoni kumamva nkhani pamene tikuyenda maboma onse kudziwitsa nkhanza zikupitirirabe adadandaula odali 
  odali akuti pali zinayi zomwe zikuchititsa mchitidwewu ukhale ukukulirabe wati wa amayi amene amati akavulazidwa amuna amakathetsa nkhani kubwalo isapitirire ndicho chimodzi chikuchititsa mchitidwewu uzipitirira 
  munthu amuvulaza akuti nkhani ithe ponena mwamuna kodi zingapereke phunziro lanji amayi aphunzire kulolera lamulo lizigwira ntchito yake munthu wawavulaza adatero odali 
  adati ina salolanso nkhani zotere zikachitika zizikanenedweza kupolisi ponena nkhani ya mbanja yomwe imayenera ikambidwe wa pabanjapo 
  odali watinso abambo azikanena kupolisi achitiridwa nkhanza abambo akachitiridwa chipongwe mkazi wawo samanena amati akupirira akuchulukitsa mchidwewu pasakhale kupirira pakati abambo adatero 
  komabe adayamika nkhanzazi zikutenga malo ambiri aphunzira kumakanena kupolisi pamene achitiridwa nkhanza kusiyana kale pamene zimathera mnyumba kwa amfumu deralo 
  polankhula pomwe bungwe la amayi chikhristu la young women christian association ywca limakhazikitsa ntchito yothandiza asungwana kuzindikira za ubereki ku mulanje loweruka nduna ya za jenda patricia kaliati adati nkhanza kwa amayi asungwana zikuchuluka kwambiri adati amayi ambiri akuchitiridwa nkhanza chosowa maphunziro 
  asungwana ambiri atalimbikira maphunziro nkhanza zikhoza kuchepa akhoza kuzindikira ufulu wawo nchifukwa chake tikubweretsa lamulo lakuti ana asamakwatiwe asanafike zaka 18 
  mafumu udindo waukulu woteteza ana pokhazikitsa malamulo apadera mwachitsanzo madera mafumu adakhazikitsa malamulo akuti makolo amene akusiyitsa ana sukulu akakwatiwe amalipitsidwa dipo adatero kaliati

Text:

Text:
woganiziridwa kuba khanda anjatidwa ku mzuzu wina zake zada mumzinda wa mzuzu atamugwira ataba khanda la psuu la mnzake pachipatala chachikulu cha mzuzu sabata yatha make mwanayo akumwetulira khanda lakelo lilinso mmanja mwake   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa polisi ya mzuzu cecelia mfune watsimikiza za kumangidwa kwa mary pundi nyirenda wa mmudzi mwa chisi t/ mpherembe mboma la mzimba yemwe akumusunga palimandi kundende ya mzuzu komwe akudikirira kukaonekera kubwalo la milandu komwe akayankha mlandu woganiziridwa kuba khanda masiku akubwerawa 
  alinso limodzi wayisoni mwana atapezeka komatu khandali likadapita pakadapanda maganizo banda mlonda wa kampani ya stallion yemwe ankalondera malowa usikuwo 
  banda adati adakhala tcheru ataona nyirenda akutuluka khanda muwodiyo itatsala pangono kukwana 12 koloko usiku 
  mayiyu adatuluka katatu konse kulowera wodi ya amayi apakati yomwe ili moyandikana kwambiri wodi ya makandayi atanyamula khanda lomwe adalikulunga mushawelo yoyera amati kutuluka nkulowa 
  apa ndidadziwa china chake chasokonekera kunja kudali kukuzizira wanzeru sakadatuluka mwana imeneyo sindidamulole atuluke adatero banda 
  pocheza msangulutso make khandalo mercy wayisoni wa zaka 27 yemwe amachokera ku elunyeni mboma lomwelo kumudzi kwawo kwa nazombe t nazombe mboma la phalombe adafotokoza adafika pachipatalapo loweruka february 20 wopanda wina womudikirira 
  adati loweruka lomwelo adakumana wina kukhitchini yemwe adamufunsa womudikirira atamuuza adalibe womusamalira pachipatalapo mayiyo adamupempha akhale mnzake aziphika kudya limodzi osadziwa adali zolowere nkudyere mwana 
  apa mpomwe ubwenzi wathu udayambira kwa masiku asanu limodzi tinkadyera limodzi adatero wayisoni adati adadabwa lolemba yochira itakwana nyirenda adamuletsa kuitana wachibale amuthandizire adamuuza wachibale asadziwe zoti yake yochira idali itakwana kaamba koti alipo amuthandiza 
  wayisoni adati nyirenda adali kumutsatira kulikonse komwe amapita patsikuli mpaka kuchipinda cha opaleshoni komwe adanamiza adokotala adali wolandirira mwana adokotalawo adamuletsa kulowa mchipindamo 
  adati asadatuluke kuopaleshoniko adokotala adamudziwitsa adali mwana wamwamuna 
  wayisoni adati adazizwa pomwe adadzidzimuka pakati usiku kupeza mwana salinso kumtima kwake mnzakeyo adali atamusunthapo 
  adandiletsa kumuyangana mwana wanga kundiuza khandalo silidali langa lake kaamba koti langa lidapitirira zidandikwiyitsa ndidauza oyandikana nawo nyirenda wanditengera mwana adasinthitsa nsalu ndili mtulo adalongosola wayisoni 
  adati nawo achipatala atamva muwodimo mwauka mpungwepungwe adabwera kutsimikiza khandalo lidali la wayisoni
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
parishi ya chirimba ikufuna ya chitsanzo wolemba thokozani chapola akhristu mparish ya st martin chirimba arch diocese ya blantyre ati maso mphenya ati kutsogoloku akhale imodzi mwa parish ya chitsanzo nkhani ya umodzi ntchito za chitukuko 
 wapampando wa parishi yi peter mzolima yemwe wanena lamulungu polankhula radio maria malawi mzinda wa blantyre 
 wati pempho lomwe mpingo unapereka kwa akhristu nkhani za chitukuko lathandiza akhristu mparishi yi kumvetsa za udindo osamalira atumiki akhristu anzawo 
 ntchito za chitukuko za oyambiira kupatsidwa akhristu athu omwe akudziwa za ntchito imeneyo timakhulupilira mkhristu wathu tikamuthandiza pomupatsa chochita athandizika ku banja kwake abwera athandiza popereka mtulo chopereka cha lamulungu lililonse anatero mzolima 
 ati zimenezi zikuthandiza ntchito zogwiridwa parishiyi zikukhala zamakono zomwenso zikuthandiza mpingo kupita patsogolo 
 ansembe athu akugwira ntchito yotamandika posamalira akhristu ifenso kuwathandiza
Label: RELIGION

Text:
bonongwe wadzudzula boma kamba kosaika chidwi ulimi mwa omwe amalankhulapo nkhani zokhudza ulimi mdziko muno mathius bonongwe wadzudzula boma kaamba kosayika chidwi chokwanira nkhani za ulimi mdziko muno 
 bonongwe walankhula pothilirapo ndemanga ndondomeko ya za chuma ya 2020/2021 yomwe nduna ya za chuma joseph mwanamvekha anapereka ku nyumba ya malamulo lachisanu 12 june 2020 
 akuti boma silinaganizire alimi awa ndondomekoyo boma layika 194.9 billion kwacha ku gawo la za ulimi mwa ndalamazi 48.8 billion kwacha zogulira chimanga kuyendetsera ndondomeko ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo ya fisp kulimbana tizilombo towononga mbewu 
 pamenepa bonongwe wati ndalama zomwe boma layika ku gawo la za ulimi zochepa poyerekeza mavuto omwe alimi mdziko muno akukumana nawo 
 boma limayenera liyangane kwambiri mavuto amene mmidzi kamba koti mmalawi muno ambiri osauka atenga ochepa chabe apindule ndondomeko imeneyi ya feteleza sabuside anatero bonongwe 
 apemphanso unduna wa zaulimi uyike ndondomeko zokhwima cholinga choti ogula ma kuponi kwa alimi uchepe kamba koti omwe amagawa ma kuponi omwewonso amapita kumakawagula alimi ovutika makuponi mmidzimo zomwe akuti zochititsa kutu umphawi usathe mdziko muno
Label: FARMING

Text:
azula chamba achiyatsa ku kk nkhani zoti apolisi alanda azula chamba zina zokhudza mbewu yozunguzayi sizikukata mboma la nkhotakota 
  lachiwiri sabata ino apolisi mbomalo mogwirizana asirikali oyanganira nkhalango malo osungirako zakutchire adazula chamba mmunda wamaekala atatu 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zachitika apolisi 12 september ataotchanso matani 4.5 chamba amene adalanda kwa njonda zina 
  aka nka chi 48 nkhani za mtunduwu kuchitika mbomalo chiyambireni january chaka chino apolisi atero 
  mneneri wa polisi mbomalo williams kaponda adati munda womwe adazula chambachi uli pakati midzi ya senior chief mwadzama t mwansambo 
  tidapeza chamba chochuluka mmundawu tidachizula kuchiyatsa kufikira lero lachiwiri palibe amene wanjatidwa nkhaniyi apolisi tikufufuza tipeze mwini mundawu adatero kaponda 
  sikuti timapanga tokha tidali mboni zina akuluakulu bwalo la milandu khonsolo ya nkhotakota achipembedzo atolankhani ku parks and wildlife game reserve 
  malinga kaponda minda ina ya chamba yapezeka mmidzi ya mwalawamphasa kanjedza mboma lomweli mwa mwambi woti moto umapita kumene kwatsala tchire mmeneri wa polisiyu akuti mindayi nayonso aibutsa posachedwapa 
  nkhanizi zikudza pamene pali mtsutso kuli koyenera lino livomereze chamba azilima kugulitsa mdziko muno chamba ncholetseddwa kkaamba koti chimazunguza ubongo 
  boma la nkhotakota limatchuka kwambiri nkhani za chamba chomwe amalima mobisa mminda ya chinangwa nzimbe chimanga
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
likwata amuna aimba ngoma amayi navina likwata mwa magule amene amavinidwa pakati ayao bobby kabango adali mboma la chiradzulu mmudzi mwa njeremba kwa t mpama komwe adapezerera gule wa likwata yemwe amamutcha namkwakwala uyutu gule amene amavina amayi atsikana kodi uyu gule wanji nanga adayamba liti mtolankhani wathuyu adakokera pambali amene amatsogolera guleyu adacheza motere eee wefuwefu ameneyu kutopa kumene    chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka hahaha padalitu ntchito pamene paja si maseweratu kuvina gule ameneyu akafika pakolasi timayenera tidzipinde basi 
  tidziwane kaye 
  ndine idesi chiwaya ndimatsogolera gululi 
  kodi gule wanji ameneyu   ameneyu gule wa namkwakwala amati likwata

  chiyani kulipatsa dzina la likwata   basi nawonso makolo adakonda apereke dzinali

  mavinidwe guleyu andimaliza tafotokozani momwe muchitira pamene mukuvina ngoma ija ikamalira timavina moitsatira uko tikuimba nyimbo zathu ndiye ikafika pakolasi timachita tikudumpha uko tikudula chiuno apa ndiye timagwadirira pansi kuvina momatembenuka kumatembenuka maondo kwinaku tikugundana matako aka ndiye kavinidwe kake 
  adakuphunzitsani ndani   makolo athu ineyo makolo anga ankavina kwambiri atamwalira ndidapitiriza mpaka kupeza amayi anzanga tonse tilipo 10 kuphatikizapo abambo ngoma takwana 12

  mudayamba liti kuvina guleyu   chaka ndiye sindingakumbuke ndimakumbukira panthawiyo ndidali zaka 33 zaka zanga ndidaziiwala zaposa 50

  atsogoleriwa amakwanitsa kuduka mchiuno chonchi   ayi amangochoka pampando kumavina pangonopangono mapeto ake amapisa mthumba kutipatsa kangachepe

Text:
khansala wa dpp wapambana ku liwawadzi okhala mdera la liwawadzi dera la kumpoto kwa boma la balaka msabatayi anaponya voti pofuna kusankha khansala wa deralo imfa ya thomson titani bwanali yemwe khansala wa deralo atasankhidwa chisankho cha 21 may 2019 anamwalira mwezi wa october 2019 
 potsatira bungwe la mec lalengeza zotsatira za chisankho pomwe lati pharaoh kambiri yemwe amayimira chipani cha dpp yemwe wapambana 
 bungweli lati liwawadzi ward inali asanu omwe amapakisana omwe analembetsa adzapnya voti analipo 20,629 omwe anakaponyadi voti okwana 4 608 zomwe zikuyimira 22.34 
 mavoti osavomerezeka analipo 30 kuyimira 0.65 
 precious khwiyao chimtengo oyima pawokha anapeza mavoti 665 pharaoh kambiri oyimira chipani cha democratic progressive dpp anapeza mavoti okwana 2,615 mervin makwinja omwe amayimira chipani cha freedom fp anapeza mavoti 101 haris mhere omwe amayimira chipani cha mbakuwaku movement for development mmd anapeza mavoti 28 ronald pias mphepo omwe amayimira chipani cha peoples pp anapeza mavoti okwana 537 obedi peteromwe oyima pawokha anapeza mavoti 632

Text:
richard mbulu chilombo cha mafco fc dzina la richard mbulu lasanduka nyimbo ya mizinda yonse cha ntchito zake zomwetsa zigoli mbulu akutsogola tnm super league zigoli 11 adamwetsanso zigoli 17 presidential cup kodi mbulu ndani bobby kabango akucheza naye 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mbulu chilombo pankhani yokankha chikopa wawa mbulu mbuluyo ndiye ineyo mani 
  kodi mimbulu mbulu basi ndine mbulu dzina limeneli likuchokera ku dzina loti mimbulu tinyama tovuta kwabasi 
  ndiye iwe ndiwe wovuta   kumbali ya mpira basi kuvuta kwanga kumeneko zinazi ndiye ndine munthu wabwinobwino 
  timudziwe mbulu ndani   mbulu ineyo mnyamata wochokera ku mangochi woyamba kubadwa mbanja la ana asanu 
  mbiri yako pachikopa ndiyotani   poyamba ndimasewera ku navy fc marine mdf nditachoka kumeneko ndidakatera ku big bullets komwe ndidakhalako kwa miyezi iwiri ku navy ndidachokako nditangolemba mayeso form 4 2013 
  zidayenda ku bullets   sadandipatse mwayi woti ndisewerere mtimuyo panthawiyo amati ndine mwana ndidachoka ulendo ku mafco fc komwe adandilandira 
  chipitireni ku mafco wachinya zingati   ndachinya zigoli 108 za ligi makapu omwe apatu ndikutanthauza kuyambira 2013 mpaka lero

Text:
mpendadzuwa sulira madzi ambiri mpendadzuwa imodzi mwa mbewu zimene alimi angapindule nazo holyce kholowa adacheza maxwell chimombo wa mmudzi mwa cedrick kwa ngwelero ku zomba amene akulima mbewuyi adacheza motere kodi mbewu ya mpendadzuwa imalimidwa   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu choyamba mlimi amaunga mizere yokula kutalikana ya chimanga mlimi amayenera mbewu yabwino osati yobwafuka ya matenda kuopera ingavute kumera akatero mlimi azingodikira mvula 
  chimombo kusankha mpendadzuwa akabzale kodi mpendadzuwa umabzalidwa mvula yake iti mpendadzuwa timabzala kawiri wina timabzala limodzi chimanga mvula yoyamba ija ikangogwa pamene wina timabzala pakadutsa mwezi theka chibzalireni mbewu zina zija sumafuna madzi ambiri 
  nchifukwa chiyani mpendadzuwa sumafuna madzi ambiri mpendadzuwa wabzalidwa mvula uja ukamakololedwa wambiri umakhala mphwepwa umakhala udamwa madzi ambiri mmunda pamene wabzalidwa uja umakhwima mvula ikadukiza zimene zimachititsa nthangala zake zikhale zangwiro zimene sizivuta malonda msika 
  mwachitsanzo mlimi amene wabzala mpendadzuwa mvula yoyamba akhoza kukolola matumba 20 akamazapeta akhoza kutsala matumba 14 chimachulukitsa matumbawo mphwepwa pamene mlimi amene wabzala akhoza kukololanso matumba 20 akapeta mpendadzuwao akhoza kutsala matumba 19 choncho mpendadzuwa wabwinoyu wachiwiri 
  mwachitsanzo chimanga changa ndinabzala november 2016 ndili pakalikiliki kulima kusankha mbewu mpendadzuwa ndibzala kumapeto kwa january uno kumayambiriro kwa february 
  kodi mpendadzuwa mumabzala timabzala motalikana masentimita 75 phando lililonse phando pamayenera kubzalidwa nthangala zosaposera ziwiri mpendadzuwa ukule motakasuka usamaphangirane chakudya cha munthaka

  dothi limene limakhala kulimapo mpendadzuwa lotani mpendadzuwa umachita mdothi lililonse dothi la makande ndiye pachimake limasunga madzi pamene dothi la mchengachenga mbewuyi imabereka mosisitika madzi amalowa pansi msanga mnthaka kusiya mbewuyi pamoto 
  kodi mpendadzuwa umagwidanso tizilombo matenda mmmmmm pamenepo sindikudziwa bwinobwino chiyambireni mpendadzuwa wanga sunagwidwepo matenda chinsinsi changa chakuti mmunda mwanga mumakhala mwaukhondo zonse zimene ndikukhulupirira zimathandiza kupewa matenda tizilombo
