Text:
papa wasankha mamembala atsopano sukulu ya ukachenjede ya pontifica mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wasankha mamembala atsopano sukulu ya ukachenjede ya pontifical academy of social sciences 
 malinga malipoti vatican radio papa lachisanu wasankha mamembala atatu sukulu ya ukachenjede yomwe ili pansi ofesi ya papa yotchedwa pontifical academy of social sciences 
 sukuluyi imawunikira maphunzitso mpingo wa katolika magawo osiyana siyana moyo wa thupi wa 
 papa francisco wasankha professor pedro morand court mdziko la chile professor mario draghi mdziko la italy professor kokunre eghafona wa ku nigeria 
 mwazina professor morande court degree ya sociology ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya pontifical catholic mdziko la chile doctorate ya sociology ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya friedrich alexander mdziko la germany 
 pamene mwa zina professor mario draghi degree ya economic policy ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya sapienza ku rome professor draghi analinso executive director wa world bank 
 professor kokunre eghafona wagwirapo ntchito bungwe la united nations 
 sukulu ya pontifical academy of social sciences anaikhazikitsa papa yohane paulo wachiwiri woyera 1 january 1994 imaunikira maphunzitso mpingo wa katolika otchedwa social teaching of the catholic church magawo nkhani za chuma chikhalidwe za malamulo ndale
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
tidali maneba ku gulliver akuti mbuzi imadya pomwe aimangilira amamveka achabe zina mawuomwewa amakhala tanthauzo lopambana maka potengera zipatso zomwe abala panthawiyo 
  pachiyambi kingsley blessings chowawa loness gwazanga adali maneba chabe chinebacho chawachitira ubwino chabala chipatso chokoma chomwe awiriwa adzakhale akuchibwekera 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi kunyadirana maneba ukwati wa loness kingsley udzakhalako 3 october chaka chino awiriwa akuti kukumana kwawo ku gulliver ku area 49 nku lilongwe kudali kwa masewera poti zimaoneka kuyandikana ndiko kumawakokera kufupi zimaonekanso masewera chabe 
  ineyo ndinkakana ndinkati munthu wamkhonde zoona mwina angochitira poti ndayandikira mpakana zaka zisanu akundivutitsa kufikira mchaka cha 2011 pomwe ndidamuvomera adatero loness yemwe mtolankhani wa malawi news agency 
  adati atakumana koyamba mchaka cha 2006 sizimamukhudza mumtima adalibe naye chidwi chake mpaka lero sachidziwa 
  adaonjeza mokakamiza adayamba kucheza kinsley adamufunsira adakana akuti mnyamatayu sadagonje mmalo mwake machezawo adawathamangitsira ku chinzake mwina azichitirana manyazi mnyamata sadaimve 
  zitatheka mchaka cha 2011 awiriwa sadafune za bobobo kukaonekera kwa makolo mpaka chinkhoswe chidachitika 4 april chaka chino kuholo ya patchalitchi cha kagwa woyera ku area 49 akuti ukwati woyera udzakhalako 3 october ku chikuti ccap ku area 49 komweko madyerero adzakhala ku cherub private school ku area 47 
  kingsley akuonetsa za msungwanayu adafa mutu koopsa adachita kunenetsa azimugwiritsa tambula yagalasi kuopa kuswa 
  chomwe wavutikira chimafunika kusamala kwambiri chikatayika ululu umakhala waukulu zedi kusiyana chomwe changobwera chokha uyu ndiye ndidasankha padziko lonse adatero kingsley 
  awiriwa akuti banja si msewu wamaluwamaluwa iwowa adzayesetsa banja lawo lokha lidzakhale loyenda mkuwala lochititsa kaso pamaso mulungu 
  kingsley amachokera mmudzi mwa malembo kwa t khongoni ku lilongwe akugwira ntchito kubanki yobwereketsa ndalama ya select financial services pomwe loness amachokera mmudzi mwa kamonga t kaphuka ku dedza
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
obindikira mnyumba azengedwa mlandu bwalo la milandu la majisitireti mumzinda wa blantyre lakhazikitsa lachitatu 25 may tsiku lomwe lidzapereke chigamulo kwa banja lina lomwe lakhala likudzitsekera mnyumba kwa zaka kulephera kupereka chisamaliro kwa ana anayi 
   govt to review genset deal   mbc clean up   apm aide nabbed mneneri wa nthambi ya zachilungamo mlenga mvula watsimikizira msangulutso za nkhaniyi 
  mvula adati nkhaniyi idalowa mkhoti 13 may banjali lidakana mlandu wolephera kupereka chithandizo kwa ana ilowanso mbwaloli lachitatu likubwerali 25 may pamene oimira boma abweretse mboni 
  adakana kulakwa banda mkazi akuyankha mlandu wosapereka chisamaliro kwa ana sabata yatha apolisi ya manase mumzinda wa blantyre adanjata peterson mtchini banda wa zaka 44 mkazi agnes wa zaka 41 atatsinidwa khuku banjali silimatuluka mnyumba kuyambira mchaka cha 2013 
  mneneri wa polisi ya blantyre elizabeth divala wauza msangulutso banjali lidauza apolisiwo adachita njira imodzi yodzitetezera kwa achipongwe 
  akuti tsiku lina bamboyo adafuna kuchitidwa chipongwe nkhaniyo ati adafotokozera apolisi sadaione mutu kuyambira panthawiyo akuti adauza banja lake asadzatulukenso mnyumbamo adatero divala 
  moti tsiku lomwe tidapita kunyumbako tidagogoda sadatsegule tidagwiritsira ntchito mphamvu pothyola chitseko tidawapeza makolowo ana anayi akuoneka ofooka tidawatengera kupolisi tidzawafunse 
  banjali akuti lidauza apolisiwo akafuna ndiwo chakudya chilichonse amaitana amene ayandikana nawo kuwapatsira ndalama akawagulire zomwe akufunazo 
  nyumbayo ili kumpanda ndiye chilichonse chili kumpandako chimbudzi madzi nyumba za lendi zomwe amatolera ndalama pakutha mwezi ndalama amazipeza motero ati amadzawapatsira ndalamazo pazenera adatero divala 
  chidzitsekerereni mnyumbamo 2013 ana banjali akuti adawaleketsa sukulu mwana woyamba wa zaka 17 wina 14 wina 11 wina wa zaka zinayi 
  divala wati makolowo adawatsegulira mlandu wolephera kupereka chithandizo kwa ana
Label: RELIGION

Text:
kusanthula khansa ya mmawere petani mtonga wachiwiri kwa wa nthambi ya matenda khansa kuchipatala cha queen elizabeth mumzinda wa blantyre wati matenda akhansa akagwira mawere amatchedwa khansa ya mmawere 
  sabata yatha mtonga adati matenda khansa alipo mitundu ingapo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu malinga dotoloyu khansa ya mmawere imagwira amayi omwe afika msinkhu wobereka imatha kufalikira kuziwalo zina matendawa azindikiridwa mochedwa 
  amayi ayenera kudziyesa kaye okha matendawa sabata yatha ndidafotokoza lomwe kwambiri matenda khansa amayamba okha kotero sizitengera chiwalo chanji chomwe chakhudzidwa matendawa choncho mai amakhala pachiopsezo cha khansa ya mmawere zili chomwechi amayi osuta fodya oledzera amakhala pachiopsezo chachikulu mufodya mowa mmapezeka zinthu zomwe zimakolezera matendawa adatero 
  dotoloyu adati zizindikiro za khansa ya mmawere kutuluka zotupa mmawere zilonda mmawere kutulutsa magazi mmawere kwa mawere 
  adati wina makamaka yemwe wafika msinkhu wobereka amayenera kumadziyeza yekha pamene akusamba akamaliza angaone zinthu zodabwitsa athamangire kuchipatala pakutero imazindikiridwa mwachangu 
  amayenera kumadziyanganira pagalasi makamaka lalikulu lapakhoma athe kumadziona bwinobwino ataimirira akaona bere mawere asintha akuoneka kukula kusiyana poyamba athamangire kuchipatala 
  njira ina amatha kuimirira kugona pansi kuyamba kusindikiza bere lakumanzere chikhatho chamkono wakumanja mozungulira kubwerezanso bere lakumanja momvetserera akaona mukumveka kanthu kalikonse kachilendo athamangire ku chipatala adatero
Label: HEALTH

Text:
cmo ya blantyre ikhutira ntchito zake zomwe zagwiridwa chaka cha 2019 bungwe la umodzi wa la catholic men association arkdayosizi ya blantyre lati ndilokhutira momwe lagwilira ntchito zake mchaka ichi cha 2019 
 abambo mwanza parishi kujambulitsa limodzi abambo ku nthawira parishi martin chiwaya omwe wapampando wa bungweli arkdayosizi ya blantyre ndiwo alankhula kwa mtolankhani wathu yemwe amafuna kudziwa momwe bungweli lagwilira ntchito zake pomwe chakachi chikupita kumapeto chiwaya ati chakachi chakhala chopambana pomwe bungweli lakwanitsa kukhazikitsa mabungwe oterewa ku maparish osiyanasiyana arkdayosiziyi zomwe akwanitsa kufikira maparish ochuluka opezeka arkdayosiziyi 
 ndinene chaka cha 2019 pomwe chikupita kumapeto ndine okondwa kulengeza tafikira maparish ambiri mwa maparish 43 opezeka arkidayosiziyi tsopano tafikira maparish 35 tatsala maparish asanu atatu 8) omwe mchaka chatsopano cha 2020 tifikakonso kukakhazikitsa bungweli anatero chiwaya 5.jpg 300w https://www.radiomaria.mw/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/img-20191203-wa0019-1024x768.jpg 1024w https://www.radiomaria.mw/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/img-20191203-wa0019-768x576.jpg 768w https://www.radiomaria.mw/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/img-20191203-wa0019.jpg 1080w sizes="(max width 479px 100vw 479px />nduna ya za mdziko nicholas dausi alowa nawo bungweli mchakachi atinso mchakachi akhala mwayi wosonkhana pamodzi abambo okhaokha amu arkdayosiziyi ndikukondwelera limodzi chaka cha nkhoswe yawo yosefe mwamuna wa maria pamwambo wa nsembe ya ukaristia womwe unachitikira ku limbe cathedral unatsogoleredwa ambuye arkepiskopi thomas luke msusa womwe abambowa anatsogolera okha pachipembedzo kuyimba nyimbo kuvinira kuthandizira misa 
 chiwaya apitilizanso akhalanso mwayi wopanga maubale mabungwe oterewa madayosezi zomba arkdayosizi ya lilongwe tapanga ubale abambo anzathu aku lilongwe omwe anakhala nafe pamisa ya 1 may 15 december 2019 tinali ku zomba komwenso tinatsogolera mayimbidwe pamwambo wokhazikitsa bungwe lotereli ku parish ya holy trinity matawale ndife okonzeka kupitanso ku madayosezi chikwawa mangochi angatiyitane anapitiliza chiwaya 
 mchaka cha 2020 bungweli lipitilizanso ntchito yokhazikitsa mabungwe otere ku maparish 8 otsala kukhazikitsa makomiti abungweli mma deanery onse osayiwalanso komiti yokhazikika ya dayosizi pali chikonzero choti bungweli lizakhazikitsidwa kwenikweni dayoseziyi mwezi wa october 2020
Label: RELIGION

Text:
apha mkazi apongozi kaamba kothetsa banja mnyamata wina wa ku mangochi wagwa mmanja mwa apolisi atapha mkazi apongozi ake kaamba kothetsa banja 
  stephen sani wa zaka 25 adavomera mlandu wopha mkazi annie smoke apongozi ake enifa smoke pomwe timasindikiza nkhaniyi nkuti akuyembekezera kukaonekera ku khoti 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka sani adati adachita zaupanduzo kaamba koti makolo mtsikanayo adathetsa banja lake cholinga choti akapitirize maphunziro 
  gogo wa ophendwawo alida moyenda adati awiriwo adalowa mbanja atachimwitsana panthawiyo nkuti annie zaka 16 folomu 1 
  gogo moyenda adati poona mtsikanayo adali wamngono wanzeru kwambiri pamaphunziro adaganiza zomubwezera kusukulu mwamunayo adakana 
  timafuna annie apitirize maphunziro popeza mwamunayo amakana tidangoganiza zothetsa banja pasakhale kupingana kulikonse adatero gogoyu 
  adati banja la awiriwo lidatha august 5 2017 mtsikanayo adakayambiranso sukulu gogoyu adati banja la sani annie mudalibe mavuto aliwonse chomwe makolowo amafuna choti mkaziyo aphunzire 
  padalibe mavuto aliwonse chomwe chimatikhudza nchoti mtsikanayo adali wangono woyenera pasukulu osati pabanja adatero moyenda 
  mneneri wa polisi wa mboma la mangochi amina tepani daudi adati august 13 2017 annie amayi ake adatengana ulendo wokaona mbale wawo wina mmudzi mwa mbapi mboma lomwelo 
  popeza mwamunayo amakhala moyandikana makolo amtsikanayo adadziwa za ulendowo adawatsatira mpaka famu ya funwe pomwe adawaimitsa kuwachita chiwembu 
  titalandira uthenga woti famu ya funwe mwapezeka mitembo iwiri tidaitengera ku chipatala chachingono cha monkey bay komwe adatiuza anthuwo adamwalira kaamba ka kutaya magazi kwambiri atabaidwa mipeni pakhosi adatero daudi 
  adati apolisi adagwira sani pomuganizira ndiye adachita zaupanduzo atamufunsa adavomera mlanduwo moti akuyembekezera kuyankha mlandu wakupha womwe ukutsutsana ndime 209 ya malamulo lino 
  akapezeka wolakwa sani akagwira ndende moyo wonse 
  mkazi wa mtsogoleri wa lino gertrude mutharika wakhala akulimbikitsa atsikana omwe adalowa mbanja akadali angono abwerere kusukulu 
  malingana kafukufuku wa mabungwe osiyanasiyana kuphatikizirapo la undp atsikana ambiri mdziko muno amalowa mbanja asadafike zaka 18 
  wa bungwelo dan odallo adati vutoli lomwe likuchititsa atsikana ambiri azisiira panjira sukulu 
  pafupifupi theka la atsikana mdziko muna amalowa mbanja asadafike zaka 18 adatero odallo 
  pofuna kuthana vutoli nyumba ya malamulo idakhazikitsa malamulo woti atsikana azilowa mbanja akakwana zaka 18 kupotsera apo
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
sitima ya papa francisko ikupulumutsa miyoyo sitima ya madzi yotchedwa papa francisco ikupereka thandizo la chipatala ku madera mtsinje wa amazon mdziko la brazil 
 malinga malipoti vatican radio sitimayi ikupereka chithandizo cha zipangizo za mchipatala kumidzi ya mtsinje wa amazon kwa omwe akuvutika cha mliri wa coronavirus 
  sitimayi akuti yapulumutsa miyoyo kubweretsa chiyembekezo pakati ku deralo 
 pamene mliri wa coronavirus ukupitilira kuvutitsa maiko ambiri ku dera la mtsinje wa amazon mdziko la brazil oyamika kaamba ka sitima ina ya madzi yotchedwa papa francisco yomwe ikuthandiza ku deralo zipangizo za mchipatala iyi ya mliri wa coronavirus 
 sitimayi ili ntchito yolimbana mliri wa coronavirus pothandiza omwe akudwala kuteteza omwe sanagwide nthendayi 
 malinga joel sousa bulazala wa chipani cha francisco woyera wa ku assisi sitimayi akuti yabweretsa chiyembekezo yapulumutsa miyoyo ya ambiri ku deralo 
 sitimayi yakhala ikuthandiza ku deralo kuyambira mwezi wa july mchaka cha 2019 chithandizo cha chipatala panopa ogwira ntchito sitimayi ntchito yolimbana mliri wa coronavirus 
 bulazala ansembe chipani cha francisco woyera wa ku assisi ndiwo eni ake sitimayi akuti analimbikitsidwa ntchito yopereka chithandizo cha chipatala kwa mderalo papa francisco pomwe ku brazil chaka cha achinyamata world youth day mchaka cha 2013 
 sitima yotchedwa papa francisco yi ili 23 odziwa ntchito za chipatala zipinda momwe amalandira thandizo chipinda chopangira ma opareshoni chipinda chopimira mmene aliri mthupi mwao pongotchula zochepa chabe 
 la brazil limodzi mwa maiko omwe akhudzidwa kwambiri mliri wa coronavirus pokhala nambala 2 mndandanda wa maiko omwe chiwerengero cha omwe agwidwa nthenda ya covid 19 chokwera kwambiri 
 1.9 million agwidwa nthenda ya covid 19 mdziko la brazil la united states of america lomwe lili nambala 1 chiwerengero cha omwe agwidwa nthenda ya covid 19 
 malinga malipoti 14 july 2020 sukulu ya ukachenjede ya john hopkins 72,833 amwalira nthenda ya covid 19 mdzikolo tsiku lomweli la 14 july 2020 pomwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika lonse linalengeza papa francisco watumiza thandizo ku dzikolo la zipangizo zothandiza omwe akuvutika kupuma athe kupuma mosavutika ventilators
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
la scotland layamikira ubale malawi wolemba sylvester kasitomu mwa akuluakulu oyanganira zitukuko za lino mmaiko nicole cogan lachinayi wayamikira ubale wabwino omwe ulipo pakati la scotland la malawi 
 nicole cogan amalankhula lilongwe msonkhano wa pachaka wa bungwe la malawi scotland partnership masp 
 wati kudzera ku bungweli maiko awiriwa akupindula kwambiri zitukuko zomwe zikufikira ochuluka kulimbikirtsa ubale wabwino pakati maikowa 
 polankhulapo modzi mwa akuluakulu kuunduna owona zachuma peter simbani omwenso mlendo olemekezeka mwambowu boma lokhutira ntchito yabwino yomwe boma la scotland likugwira mdziko muno maka pothandiza lino kudzera bungwe la masp 
 kwa amene akulandila ndalama mdziko la scotiland akuyenera okhulupirika podziwa kunena kuchuluka kwa ndalama zomwe zabwera kuno ku malawi antero simbani 
 mmawu ake wa board ya masp mdziko muno dr annie phoya ayaetsetsa kumagwiritsa ntchito ndalama zomwe lino likulandila mdziko la scotland pofuna pasakhale kukaikiridwa kulikonse kupitsa ubalewu patsogolo 
 amene alandila ndalalma ku scotiland agwirire ntchitoyi akuyigwira mwaukadaulo mooneka pasakhale katangale anatero dr phoya 
 ubale wa maiko scotland malawi wakhala ukulimbikitsidwa pomwe dr david livingstone anafika mdziko muno zaka 150 zapitazo
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
layaka moto bushiri wachenjeza mneneri wa mpingo wa enlightened christian gathering ecg shepherd bushiri wachenjeza atsogoleri andale mpungwepungwe womwe uli mdziko muno utha kudzetsa mavuto akulu 
  bushiri yemwe amakhala ku south africa wapempha atsogoleriwo akonzekeretse kudzavomera zotsatira za mlandu wa chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa lino womwe uli ku khoti 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka kudali mkokemkoke ku lilongwe lachiwiri okwiya atatseka misewu matayala moto zipani za malawi congress party mcp utm zidakokera ku khoti chipani cha democratic progressive party dpp bungwe la malawi electoral commission powaganizira adabera chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa lino 
  bushiri adati kupanda kukonzekeretsa kudzalandira chigamulo cha khoti kutha kudzaonongetsa katundu wambiri kuposa yemwe waonongeka kale 
  zinthu zambiri zaonongeka kaamba ka zionetsero zomwe zakhala zikuchitika mdziko muno pofuna kukakamiza wapampando wa mec jane ansah atule pansi udindo pomuganizira sadayendetse zisankho zapatatu za may 21 
  bungwe la human rights defenders coaliation hrdc ndilo likutsogolera zionetserozo 
  ansah adakana kutula pansi udindo zomwe zachititsa hrdc ipitirize zionetsero 
  bushiri adati zionetserozi zaonetsa kale amalawi mbwadza zenizeni zazikulu zikubwera sadzavomereza zotsatira za mlanduwo 
  akutaya miyoyo posachedwapa mnyamata wamphamvu zake ku karonga adataya moyo mdzina la zionetsero 
  akumenyedwa nkumasiyidwa atatsala pangono kufa amachokera mchigawo china amatsatira chipani china atsogoleri athu akuoneka sakufuna kugwirizana adatero 
  bushiri adati sakudana zionetsero ufulu wa kutero chomwe akudana nacho zipolowe zomwe zionetsero zikudzetsa 
  adati ndiwokonzeka mkhalapakati wa mbali zonse zomwe sizikumvana nkhani ya chisankho cha may 21 2019 
  mneneri wa mcp maurice munthali adati za mtendere si zachilendo chipani chake 
  adati zomwe bushiri akunena zomwe mtsogoleri wa chipanicho lazarus chakwera amafotokozera otsatira ake   mneneri wa chipani cha dpp nicholas dausi adangoti chipani chawo + cha mtendere sadathirirepo ndemanga zomwe bushiri adalankhula
Label: RELIGION

Text:
kudya moyenera nkofunika kudya moyo woona za kadyedwe koyenera ku lilongwe university of agriculutre and natural resources luanar dr alexander kalimbira wati munthu amayenera kudya moyenera akhale umoyo wabwino 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu adati kudya moyenera gwero la umoyo wangwiro chitukuko cha 
  kalimbira adati munthu akudya moyenera molingana momwe thupi lake likufunira amakhala moyo wathanzi wosangalala kotero amagwira ntchito molimbika akudya mochepekedwa mopyola muyeso zotsatira zake matenda osiyanasiyana omwenso akutenga kwambiri miyoyo ya 
  pali magulu 6 zakudya tikati kudya moyenera sitikutanthauza munthu akuyenera kumadya nsima ndiwo zochuluka ayi kudya zakudya zamagulu okwanira pakutha patsiku mosadziunjikira munthu akudya chakudya chochepa kwambiri chosowekera michere ina zotsatira zake zimakhala kutupikana kupinimbira mavuto makamaka kwa ana munthu akudya mopyola muyeso mafuta amachuluka mthupi mapeto ake matenda osiyanasiyana mtima kudwala nthenda ya shuga kuthamanga magazi mavuto adatero 
  adati munthu amayenera kumadya chakudya cha magulu onse 6 pamlingo woyenera pali zakudya zina michere yake ikachulukitsa mthupi imayambitsa mavuto osiyanasiyana mwachitsanzo munthu akuchulutsa kwambiri nsima zakudya zamafuta kwambiri kapenanso za shuga kwambiri mapeto ake sikelo yake imadzakhala yokwera mopyola muyeso 
  mmalo modya nsima mpunga wochuluka ayenera kuonjezera tizakudya ta magulu angapo pambali masamba tinyemba chipatso pakutha zonsezo munthu umakhala okhuta osatenga michere yochuluka yomwe ikhonza kuunjikana mthupi nkuyambitsa mavuto osiyanasiyana adatero
Label: HEALTH

Text:
alangiza boma kayendetsedwe ka chuma adadza ndondomeko gondwe zipani zotsutsa boma akatswiri kayendetsedwe kabwino ka boma ati boma lisamale kwambiri mmene liyendetsere ndalama zapadera zomwe aphungu nyumba ya malamulo adavomereza boma kugwiritsa ntchito kwa 4 ikudzayi 
  nyumba ya malamulo idavomereza boma kugwiritsa ntchito ndalama zokwana k210 biliyoni lachisanu sabata yatha otsutsa akatswiri ati kusowa kwa ndondomeko yeniyeni ya mmene ndalamazi zigwirire ntchito nyambo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc wolankhulira chipani cha malawi congress party mcp pankhani za chuma mnyumba ya malamulo joseph njobvuyalema adati kunena boma igwiritsa ntchito ndalamazi si ndondomeko ya chuma cha choncho nkofunika kusamala mmene zigwiritsidwire ntchito 
  ndondomeko yeniyeni ya chuma cha imafotokoza bwinobwino mmene ndalama iliyonse igwirire ntchito kotero kumakhala kosavuta kulondoloza pomwe ndalama nzongofuna kukokera boma pomwe ndondomeko yeniyeni ikubwera adatero njobvuyalema 
  adati pachifukwachi boma likufunika kuonetsetsa ndalamazi zagwira ntchito moyenerera makamaka mnthambi zofunika kwambiri za boma 
  wolankhulira chipani cha peoples party pp ralph jooma adati nduna ya zachuma goodal gondwe amayenera kulongosola mmene nthambi za boma zipindulire ku ndalamazi kuopa osakaza 
  akatswiri zakayendetsedwe kabwino ka boma ayamikira nyumba ya malamulo povomereza ndalama zapaderazi ati zonse zili mmanja mwa boma kuonetsetsa ndalamazi zapindulira amalawi 
  wa bungwe la mpingo wa chikatolika lowona boma likuyendetsedwa mwachilungamo mtendere la catholic commission for justice and peace ccjp chris chisoni wati k210 biliyoni yokwana kupindulira boma zitagwiritsidwa ntchito 
  malamulo lino amapereka mphamvu kuboma kupempha ndalama zapadera mboma mulibe ndalama chofunika chilungamo eni ndalamazo omwe amalawi apindule nazo adatero chisoni 
  gondwe adauza nyumba ya malamulo lachisanu sabata yatha boma la dpp lidapeza mboma mulibe ndalama pomwe limatenga boma boma lapitalo lidasiya ngongole zankhaninkhani zofunika kubweza 
  nkhawa ya zipani zotsutsa akatswiri osolola ndalama za boma omwe udachititsa maiko omwe amathandiza la malawi anyanyale kuimika thandizo lawo 
  wa bungwe la institute for policy interaction ipi rafiq hajat adati kuima kwa thandizo lochoka kunja kumaimitsa ntchito zina zaboma amavutika
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
hrc yati ithandiza pomenyera ufulu wa ofalitsa nkhani bungwe lowona za maufulu mdziko muno la human rights commission lati liwonetsetsa likuthandiza pomenyera maufulu wanthu ndondomeko ya zofalitsa nkhani asapitilire kuphwanyidwa 
 semphere macra izibwera poyera wa bungweli patrick semphere wanena pambuyo mkumano womwe bungweli lachita bungwe la loyanganira nyumba zofalitsa nkhani mdziko muno la malwi communication regulatory authority macra unduna wa zofalitsa nkhani wati bungwe la macra likuyenera kugwira ntchito mosakondera ntchito yolemba ndikuwulutsa nkhani ipite patsogolo 
 pamene pali madandaulo nyumba yowulutsa ina macra izibwera poyera kuthandiza madandaulo amene alipo mmene amadandaulira kwambiri nkhani ya mapologalamu mbc anatero semphere 
 zokambiranazi bungwe la bungwe la human rights commission hrc lapempha bungwe la macra lidzigawana malipoti ntchito zawo bunweli lilimbilitse mabungwe adzigwira nayo ntchito limodzi pofuna ntchito zake zizikhala zokomera wina
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
chisangalalo chafika   samalani kuli mavuto mawa laliwisiri tsiku la khirisimasi lamulungu sabata ya mawa tsiku lokumbukira kulowa chaka cha 2017 iyi imene amasangalala kulibe mawa akadaulo anenetsa iyi yokumbukiranso kuli msilikali wamkulumwezi wa januaryamene amasiya ambiri mmatumba muli mbeee amavulala kufa kumene chosangalala mosasamala 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu katswiri zachuma henry kachaje wati matumba amabooka january cha kusakaza ndalama mosasamala nyengo ya zikondwereroyi 
  adati ndondomeko yabwino pakagwiritsidwe ntchito ka ndalama ingathandize kupeputsa mwa mavuto omwe amaoneka january ngongole zosakonzekera 
  adali pakalikiliki kugula katundu msabatayi iyi yomwe timaona akumwa kudya ngakhalenso kuvala moposa mapezedwe mchitidwewu ndiwo umabala mavuto mwezi wa january adatero kachaje 
  adati kukonzekera kwa nzeru nkuonetsetsa zinthu zofunikira kwambiri chakudya zagulidwa mokwanira nkusungidwa moyenera mapwando asadayambe 
  wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe olimbikitsa maphunziro la civil society coalition for quality education benedicto kondowe adati ana alephera kupita ku sukulu choti makolo adaononga ndalama za fizi 
  kondowe adati pomwe makolo akukonza zisangalalo zosiyanasiyana alingalirenso za ndalama za fizi ya ana asadzagwire njakata yotsegulira sukulu ikadzafika 
  chowawa kwambiri pamoyo wa mwana nkuona anzake akupita kusukulu pakhomo kaamba kosowa fizi kuli kuchepetsa chisangalalo ikafika ana adzapite kusukulu adatero kondowe 
  wa bungwe la alimi la farmers union of malawi fum prince kapondamgaga adati kusangalala nkofunika pamoyo wa munthu adachenjeza alimi asaiwale kugula zipangizo zaulimi kaamba kokomedwa zisangalalo 
  adati mlimi wanzeru amaonetsetsa chilichonse chomwe angafune paulimi chilipo asadayambe kulingalira zina iyi ndiyo njira yomwe angapindule nayo paulimi 
  amafuna kusangalala mmoyo mwake zinthu zimakoma zikamayenda kuthekera komwe kulipo osayamba maphwando ulibe zipangizo zaulimi ndiwe mlimi adatero kapondamgaga 
  wa bungwe loyanganira za ogula la consumers association of malawi cama john kapito adati asaiwale za njala yomwe iliko chaka chino 
  adati nzopanda phindu kusangalala masiku ochepa kenako nkudzavutika masiku ambiri njala zomwenso adati zingapangitse chitukuko kulowa pansi 
  tonse timadziwa munthu amagwira ntchito mkhuto ndiye njala ya chaka chinoyi nkofunika kusamala kwambiri momwe tingakonzere zisangalalo zathu tiyeni tionetsetse tasungako ndalama chakudya mmakomomu adatero kapito 
  mchikalata chake mnyengoyi bungwe loonetsetsa malonda akuyenda mokomera mdziko muno la competition and fair trading commission cftc lati nyengo iyi amalonda amafuna kukokera ponyenga ogula 
  bungweli lati nyengoyi mabizinesi amagwiritsa ntchito bodza potsatsa malonda cholinga choti akopeke kawirikawiri sazindikira apusitsidwa kaamba kakukomedwa 
  ambiri amanama atsitsa mitengo mwachitsanzo amatha kunena katundu wafika k15 000 kuchoka k25 000 chonsecho katunduyo sanagulitsidweko k25 000 lidatero bungwelo
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
lekani kulozanalozana nyengo yasinthamet nthambi yoona za kwa nyengo ya malawi meteorological services met yati adziwe nyengo ikusintha aleke kulozana zala palibe akuchititsa 
  wa nthambiyi jolamu nkhokwe adalankhula lachitatu pamene nthambiyi imakumbukira tsiku la zanyengo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka zikavuta choncho mmunda amaloza chala anzawo nkhokwe adati nthambi yawo zonse imapereka uthenga wa momwe nyengo ikuyendera akudabwa akukhalabe moyo wachikale womaloza zizindikiro za kwa nyengo zikaoneka 
  ambiri sakudziwabe pali kwa nyengo dziwani nyengo yasintha zikuoneka kudzera mnjira zambiri kusowa kwa mvula kusefukira kwa madzi 
  agwiritsire ntchito uthenga womwe tikuwapatsa atsatizire za kwa nyengo tsiku lililonse tikumatulutsa uthenga wa momwe nyengo ilili tikudabwa akukhala moyo wachikale adatero nkhokwe 
  kulankhula kwa nkhokwe kukudza pamene mdziko muno okalamba akukwapulidwa kuwapha kumene powaganizira akutseka mvula 
  ku chiradzulu mwezi wathawu ndiye 7 adaothetsedwa moto masanasana adawasiya atalonjeza mvula ibwera 
  nkhoswe adati zachisoni palibe amene angatseke kumasula mvula wapempha azitsatira zomwe nthambi yawo ikutulutsa kukhudzana momwe nyengo ikhalire 
  malawi limodzi mwa maiko amene akhudzidwa kwa nyengo moti mvula chaka chino yagwa mwanjomba kupangitsa asaphulemo kanthu mminda yawo
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
zochitika ku mwambo wa kulamba loweruka lapitalo kudali chaka ku likulu la mfumu ya achewa mmaiko malawi zambia mozambique kalonga gawa undi ku mkaika mboma la katete ku zambia khamu la ochokera mmaikowa lidapita kumeneko kukachita nawo mwambo wa kulamba 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc malinga kufotokoza kwa wa bungwe la chewa heritage foundation chefo dr justin malewezi mwambowu umayanjanitsa achewa ochokera mmaiko atatuwa la malawi ndilo lili mafumu chichewa ambiri kuposa maiko enawa malawi ili mafumu 136 achewa pomwe ku zambia aliko 36 pomwe ku mozambique aliko 42 
  malewezi adati mmaboma onse la malawi muli mafumu achewa kupatula maboma balaka rumphi mzimba karonga 
  mmaiko atatuwa muli achewa 14 miliyoni omwe 9 miliyoni mwa akuchokera ku malawi 
  nanga nchifukwa chiyani mwambowu umachitikira ku zambia osati ku malawi komwe kuli mafumu achewa ochuluka malewezi adayankha mwambowu umachitikira komwe kuli likulu la kalonga gawa undi pochokera ku zaire kalekalelo likulu la achewa lidali ku mankhamba ku mtakataka mboma la dedza kenako lidasamukira ku mozambique kumeneko apwitikizi amadana mafumu kalonga wanthawiyo adamangidwa kwa zaka 20 atatulutsidwa adasamukira ku zambia komwe mpaka lero mwambowu umachitikira 
  adafotokoza kalonga gawa undi tanthauzo lakuya kalonga akuchoka ku liwu lakuti kulonga mphamvu zolonga ufumu akutchedwa gawa mphamvu yogawa malo undi amateteza ake 
  nanga chimachitika pamwambowu nchiyani mwambowu umakhala ukuchitika kwa sabata zingapo umafika pachimake loweruka lomaliza la mwezi wa ogasiti patsikulo pamakhala magule osiyanasiyana mafumu chichewa amapereka mphatso kwa kalongayo kuthokoza apa pachokera akuti kulamba 
  mwambowu umachitika atamaliza kukolola akukonzekera mvula yotsatira mafumuwo amapereka mphatso kwa mfumuyo mothokoza amaifotokozera momwe zinthu zilili mmaiko mwawo pankhani ya chakudya matenda zina zotero adatero malewezi 
  chochititsanso chidwi patsikulo ndichakuti kalonga gawa undi amakapereka moni kwa ake nyangu chinanso chochititsa chidwi udali mpando wachifumu kalonga gawa undi adakhalapo mozungulilidwa asilikali ake makhansala ake 
  mmbali mwa mpandowu mumayalidwa minyanga ya njovu kutsogolo kwake mbali ya kumanzere kuli mutu wa kambuku pomwe kumanja kuli mutu wa mkango zikusonyeza mphamvu ya mfumuyo poteteza ake 
  mwambowu udathetsedwa atsamunda kwa zaka zambiri kufikira mchaka cha 1981 pomwe udayambikanso iyi imene achewa mmaiko atatuwa amayanjana ndikusangalala za chikhalidwe chawo adatero malewezi 
  pambali magule mchezo adakhwasula zosiyanasiyana za kuthengo kuphatikizapo njati 
  gule wamkulu adaliko mitundu yambiri kuphatikizapo maria makanja nyolonyo gologolo chilembwe kudalinso magule manganje soopa utse chisamba
Label: CULTURE

Text:
anatchereza amandimenya anatchereza   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi ndine mtsikana wa zaka 19 ndili bwenzi la zaka 21 yemwe ndili naye mwana dandaulo langa loti akandipeza ndikucheza anyamata amandimenya sitinakwatirane iyeyo amachezanso atsikana sindiyankhulapo kanthu ina adandimenya mpaka kukomoka nditani agogo anga lwt chilobwe blantyre lwt ndamva vuto lako mwana wanga kuchitirana nkhanza mbanja kaya pachibwenzi si chinthu chololedwa pangono wochitira mnzake nkhanza zamtundu uliwonse akulakwira malamulo atasumiridwa ayenera kulangidwa ameneyo zimatheka okondana azichitirananso nkhanza pomenyana wachita kubweretsa vuto lako poyera alipo amene akumachitiridwa nkhanza okondeka zimangothera mmimba ati kumenyana mankhwala banja si zoona zimenezi tsono iwe utamenyedwa bwenzi lakolo mpaka kukomoka basi udangokhala duu nawenso ndiye wopepera adzakuphatu ameneyo ukapanda kusamala naye zikadzachitikanso uyenera kukamuneneza kupolisi kumabungwe amene amayanganira za maufulu adzakuthandize akukuphwanyira ufulu wako ameneyo nditengerepo mwayi wolangiza achinyamata ana musadalowe mbanja zotsatira zake zimakhala zimenezi chibwana basi zichepe chonde 
  ndikumukondabe zikomo anatchereza ndine wa zaka 30 ndili ana awiri vuto lomwe ndili nalo loti mkazi ndinabereka naye ana anandithawa miyezi 11 yapitayo ati ndimamuvutitsa pakalipano ndapeza mkazi wa zaka 20 akunetsa amandikonda ndinamuuza chilungamo chonse chokhudzana ana adamvetsa ndithandizeni maganizo poti wakaleyo ndimamukondabe limodzi ana anga wapanopayunso pathupi panga ndithandizeni chonde 
  ztb ztb nkhani yanu yovuta sindidziwa ndikuthandizani choyamba mwanena mkazi wanu woyamba amene muli naye ana awiri adakuthawani ati ndinu wovuta kuvuta kwake kotani mukuti mumamukondabe ana mulinso pachibwenzi wa zaka 20 yemwe ndo woyembekezera mafunso nawa mkazi adakuthawaniyo mumamukondadi mudachitaponji mubwererane mumamukondadi chidachitika nchiyani mugwenso mchikondi mtsikana wa zaka 20 mpakana kumupatsa pathupi musanamukwatire chimene ndikuona apa chinyengo kumbali yanu ndinu wovutadi abambo ndinu wachimasomaso ntheradi poti munthu sudziloza chala mwina mkazi wanu woyambayo adaona ndinu wovuta nkhani yokonda akazi muli pabanja tsono mutabwererana mkazi adathawayo nanga mwana wa eni mwamutupitsa mchomboyo mumutani zofunatu mukuvutitsa ana osalakwa za zii ndikufuna anga anatchereza ndine efrida lungu kwa kayembe t wimbe ku kasungu ndimangomva bamboo anga lungu achitumbuka akuti alipo ndimafunitsitsa nditawaona akuti ankaphunzitsa chamama school chimbowe akuti adandisiya ndili zaka ziwiri ndili zaka 19 ndili form 4 amene angawadziwe chonde tilumikizane 0999 810 665/0885 831 843/0997 249 347 ambuye akudalitseni 
  ofuna banja ndine wa zaka 26 ndikufuna mwamuna wa zaka 28 ndili mwana mwamunayo akhale mkatolika wondifuna aimbe 0884 484 963
Label: RELATIONSHIPS

Text:
kusefukira kwa madzi kupha 21 21 atsikira kuli chete pamene 100 000 kakasi kusowa kopita mvula ya mphamvu yomwe yasakaza katundu kusamutsa mdziko muno   izitu zachitika kuyambira mwezi wa july chaka chatha mpaka mwezi uno wa january    chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka malinga nthambi ya boma yoona za ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi ya department of disaster management affairs dodma maboma 24 omwe akhudzidwa mavutowo   mwa mabomawo maboma 12 mchigawo cha kummwera 8 chigawo chapakati pamene anayi mchigawo chakumpoto   malinga mneneri wa dodma chipiliro khamula pofika lamulungu 13 january ngoziyi nkuti itapha 21   mwa anthuwo 12 adamwalira ataombedwa mphenzi pamene ovulala pangoziyo adalipo 38 adatero khamula 
  adati boma lakhala likuwapatsa okhudzidwawo thandizo chakudya zofunda ndowa zina malo okhala mongoyembekezera   ntchitoyo ikupitilira tikadafikirabe madera omwe ma makhonsolo atidziwitsa za ngozi adatero khamula 
  nthambi yoona zakusintha kwa nyengo ya department of climate change and meteorological services met yati kuliraku sikutha sabata ino mvula yosefula madzi ikatamuka   mwa maboma okhudzidwa nsanje karonga mulanje chikwawa balaka lilongwe 
  polankhula tamvani dc wa boma la mulanje charles makanga adati madzi osefukira ochokera mumtsinje wa thuchira lolemba 14 adaononga minda ya 520 ochokera mmidzi ya kada nongwe kwa mfumu nkanda 
  apapa ndiye anthuwo akufunikira thandizo la mbewu zofunikira zina minda yawo yakokoloka adalongosola makanga 
  adatinso 680 mdera lina komweko kakasi mvula ya mphepo itasakaza nyumba zawo 
  tikuyesetsa kupereka thandizo loyenera kwa anthuwo tikudikirabe thandizo lofika kwa omwe kakasi ochokera kumsika wa njala komwenso mvula ya mphepo idasakaza katundu adalongosola makanga   sabata yathayo awiri adamwalira mboma la balaka wina mboma la mangochi chipupa cha nyumba yawo chitawagwera mvula yomwe idagwa mmabomawo 
  ku mzimba kwa mberwa jalavikuwa ntwalo mabulabo mabanja pafupifupi 1000 akhudziwa mvula ya matalala madzi osefukira 
  dc wa bomalo thomas chirwa adati choti madera ambiri akhudzidwa pakamodzi ambiri sadalandirebe thandizo   mzinda wa lilongwe malo enanso omwe madzi adazunguza sabata yatha 176 adasamutsidwa madzi katundu adaonongeka   nduna ya zachitetezo mdziko muno yomwe yakhala ikuyendera okhudzidwawo nicholus dausi idati ngozizo zanyanya chaka chino mpofunika akhale osamalitsa kukamagwa mvula mphepo
Label: FLOODING

Text:
ntchito yomanga njanji iima ntchito yomanga njanji yochoka ku kachaso kupita ku nkaya ayiimitsa mpaka kampani ya mota engel ogwira ntchito kukampaniyo atamvana chimodzi 
  ogwira ntchitowo akunyanyala pofuna kukakamiza mabwana awakwezere malipiro nzika 300 za ku thailand zipakire 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc kunyanyalaku kudayambira lolemba 24 june lachiwiri nduna ya za ntchito eunice makangala idatsetserekera kumeneko kukalankhula ogwira ntchitowa abwerere kuntchito sizidaphule kanthu pofika lachitatu mmawa nkuti ogwira ntchitowa asadabwerere kuntchito 
  mwa ogwira ntchito kumeneko akuchita nawo sitalakayo sadafune kutchulidwa dzina adauza tamvani lachitatu sagwira ntchito mpaka dandaulo lawo litamveka 
  ndikukamba anzathu akubwera ku mwanza kudzatithandiza sitalakayi sitibwerera kuntchito mpaka titaona malipiro athu akukwera omwe achoka mdziko la thailand akubwerera kwawo adatero mkuluyo 
  padakhota nyani mchira mpakuti kampaniyi sabata zapita akuti inathotha gulu la ogwira ntchito kumeneko omwe mdziko muno kulemba ochokera ku thailand 
  anthuwa akuti pafupifupi 300 chenicheni chomwe amabwerera mdziko muno sichioneka sadziwa ntchito kuphunzitsidwa amalawi 
  chodabwitsa nchakuti malipiro akunjawo adali okwera kuposa amalawi omwe amatha ntchito 
  ntchito yake yomwe akugwira kuyendetsa mathirakitala mabewula zomwe amalawi timatha mwa alendowo sakuthanso kugwira ntchito tikuwaphunzitsa ndife tikudabwa zikuchitika nanga nchifukwa chiyani akulandira ndalama zoposa omwe tikutha ntchito adadabwa mkuluyo 
  malinga amalawi akulandira ndalama yosaposa k30 000 pomwe akamuna akunjawa akumatula makwacha owaposa 
  makangala adati walankhula akuluakulu kampaniyi mamulumuzana mdziko la thailand omwe alibe ukadaulo wa ntchito apakire azipita 
  lolemba wa kampaniyi jose denis da silva wati akuluakulu kampaniyi akukambiranabe ogwira ntchitowa adapereka chiyembekezo kusamvanaku kutha popanda zovuta 
  mota engel kampani yomwe yalemba kampani ya ku brazil yotchedwa vale imange njanjiyi yomwe ikuchokera ku moatize ku tete mpaka ku nacala port mdziko la mozambique kudutsira mdziko la malawi 
  malinga yemwe amatitsina khuku pankhaniyi pofika lachinayi akuti mbali ziwirizi zinalepherabe kugwirizana zomwe auzana nkuti zokambirana zidzachitike lachiwiri sabata ikudzayi 
  zikusonyeza sitigwira ntchito mpaka lachiwiri lomwe tidzagwirizane zenizeni tisanabwerere ku ntchito pazokambiranazo akutinso kubwera akuluakulu kampaniyi ochokera mmayiko mbali ya boma 
  sitikusinthika zathu akuluakulu la thailand azipita timva pomwe tikumane lachiwiriro atiuza zotani adatero mkuluyo 
  pomwe timalemba nkhaniyi nkuti yankho kunyanyalako lisanadziwike 
  kampani ya mota idalemba amalawi oposa 3 000 omwe akugwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana kumeneko
Label: TRANSPORT

Text:
red cross igawa magombeza 6 720 bungwe la zachifundo la malawi red cross society mrcs layambapo ntchito yogawira amalawi ovutika ana amasiye okalambammaboma 14 mdziko muno 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc ntchitoyi idayamba sabata yatha mboma la mangochi komwe 480 adalandira zofundazi zomwe zidachokera kubungwe lina lotchedwa japanese blankets for africa campaign la ku japan zadya ndalama zokwana k40 miliyoni 
  wachiwiri kwa wamkulu wa bungweli lizzie mwambazi aduza tamvani chaka chilichonse bungweli limagawa magombezawa nyengo yozizira ikafika pofuna kuthandiza ovutika 
  takwanitsa zaka 20 tsopano tikugwira ntchito imeneyi tagawapo magombeza okwana 250 000 kwa ana amasiye okalamba ovutikitsitsa chaka chino talandira magombeza 6 720 omwe tigawe mmaboma 14 kutanthauza boma lililonse 480 ndiwo achite mwayi adatero mwambazi 
  adati bungwe lawo limapereka thandizo losiyanasiyana kwa potengera nyengo zomwe zikusowa kwambiri panthawiyo adaona nyengo yozizira ambiri ovutika amakongwa 
  woyendetsa ntchito za kuofesi ya dc mboma la mangochi bissaih mtayamanja adapempha omwe adalandira nawo magombezawo asagulitse akagwiritse ntchito yake podzitchinjiriza kumphepo 
  adapempha omwe sadalandire nawo magombezawo asadandaule thandizo limeneli lochokera kumabungwe limafika pangonopangono anthunso azilandira pangonopangono 
  tikudziwa ofunika kulandira thandizo limeneli alipo ambiri ochepa okha ndiwo achite mwayi lero kukadzabwera thandizo lina enanso adzalandirako choncho osachitirana nkhanza nsanje ayi adatero mtayamanja 
  adapemphanso akufuna kwabwino omwe kangachepe atengerepo mtima womwe amaonetsa ku japan poperekako kangachepeko anzawo ovutika azipezako thandizo 
  gulupu mapira yemwe mwambo wogawa magombezawo udachitikira mdera lake adati nzomvetsa chisoni mabungwe akufuna kwabwino akamabwera thandizo omwe amapatsidwa udindo wosankha kugawa chinyengo 
  adapempha mmaboma momwe katunduyu akupita aonetsetse ovutika zenizeni ndiwo akulembedwa pamndandanda wa olandira nawo osati abale anzawo 
  kulandira thandizo ili sikoyamba zimadandaulitsa omwe amayeneradi kulandira nawo akubwerera kwawo manja mkhosi umenewu umachitika pogawa chakudya zipangizo zaulimi ziwiya za mnyumba kwa omwe akhudzidwa ngozi zadzidzidzi adatero mapira 
  adapempha mwapadera mabungwe asaiwale kukhazikitsa ntchito yogawa chakudya madera ambiri sakolola mokwanira kaamba ka momwe mvula idagwera chaka chino
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
ndidamuona koyamba shoprite kwangotsala sabata ziwiri zokha adzathyole dansi paphwando la ukwati wa evance mwale tiwonge nundwe 4 may 
  evance amagwira ntchito ku sinodi ya ccap ya livingstonia pomwe bwenzi lakelo muulutsi wailesi ya voice of livingstonia 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu awiriwa akhala ubwenzi kwa zaka 
  chikondi cha evans tiwonge chidazama kuntchito malinga mwale adamuona koyamba nundwe shoprite ku mzuzu adamusangalatsa 
  tidakumana koyamba mchaka cha 2015 shoprite adandipatsa chidwi mpaka ndidayamba kumufufuza ndithu ndimudziwe lomwe kwawo kudziwa zomwe adalongosola mwale 
  adati akufuna kwabwino adamuuza zonse za namwaliyu 
  komatu mwale adali mwayi mchaka chomwecho adapeza danga lokagwira ntchito kuofesi ya nundwe komwe sadachitenso za bo bo!bo kuyamba kucheza mtsikanayo 
  pofika chaka cha 2016 ubwenzi wa ponda apa nane ndipondepo udayambika pakati awiriwa 
  ndidamufunsira ndine adalibe nane chidwi olo pangono nkukhala nane paubwenzi wokathera mbanja zidanditengera miyezi isanu umodzi andipatse danga lokhala naye ubwenzi adalongosola mwale 
  komatu zikhalira ubwenzi uliwonse umakhala zokhoma zake nawo awiriwa akumana nazo zokhoma zofuna kuwalekanitsa chauta waikapo amange banja 
  pomwe mwale adamutsira diso nundwe koyamba shoprite namwaliyo adamuona koyamba mwale pomwe adakayamba kuphunzira ntchito kusinodiyi 
  kumayambiliro timacheza munthu mnzake sindidaganizeko zoti awirife nkukhala paubwenzi tidayamba kucheza kwambiri mpaka kumaona tili paubwenzi nthawiyo pomwe sizidali chomwechi adalongosola nundwe 
  adati chikondi cha awiriwa chidayambira pomwe ankapitira limodzi kokadya nkhomaliro mmalo odyera mumzinda wa mzuzu

Text:
sukulu ya mpiri yatsekedwanso maphunziro sukulu ya pulaimale ya mpingo wa katolika ya mpiri mboma la machinga ayimitsidwa ziwawa zomwe zinachitika sukuluyo pakati asilamu akhristu 
 mphunzitsi wamkulu sukuluyi cornelius mua atsimikiza za nkhaniyi polankhula radio maria malawi ati zachitika pamene otsatira chipembedzo cha chisilamu amafuna kukakamiza atsogoleri sukuluyo azilora ana achitsikana maphunziro sukuluyi atavala chovala chotedwa hijab kumutu kwawo 
 maphunziro asokonekera tinagwirizana mmene sukuluyi imayambiranso 17 february paja wophunzira akuyenera malamulo omwe mpingo unakhazikitsa sukuluyi ya mpingo maphunziro sabata imeneyi anayenda kufikira lolemba 24 february 
 anabwera mashehe atatu omwe amatsogolera gulu lina lomwe linazayambitsa zamtopola sukulupa anayamba kumenya school committee akuluakulu anatero mua 
 mua ati lachinayi likudzali msonkhano wa mafumu mbali zonse zokhudzidwa akambirane kuwunika njira zomwe ayenera kutsata sukuluyi ingatsekulidwenso 
 aka sukuluyi itsekedwe mchaka chino chokha kutsekedwa koyamba mwezi wa january inatsekulidwanso 17 february
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
samalani maso popewa khungu khungu amodzi mwa matenda maso opeweka 
  katswiri wa maso chipatala cha chiradzlu frank mwamadi wati zimachitika munthu akasamalira maso ake 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu adati munthu wakhungu amene maso ake onse sakuona 
  mwamadi khungu lopeweka khungu limadza mwadzidzidzi pangonopangono adatero mkuluyu 
  mwamadi adati khungu amodzi mwa matenda omwe amabwezera mmbuyo chitukuku cha munthu 
  munthu wakhungu amakanika kugwira ntchito kupanga maphunziro kuyenda kusonkhana anzake zochitika zosiyanasiyana adatero katswiriyu 
  khungu loopsa katswiriyu watsindika pali kuthekera kothana nalo asayale maziko moyo wa munthu 
  adapereka chitsanzo kuyezetsa maso pafupipafupi ku chipatala kupereka zakudya za vitamini kwa ana ukhondo 
  pamene ana akupatsidwa vitamini wokwanira akuluakulu akuyenera kuchititsa opaleshoni diso maso akapanga ngala imaika maso chiopsezo cha khungu adatero katswiriyu 
  mwamadi adalangiza pamene akukumana vuto la maso azithamangira ku chipatala osati kugwiritsa ntchito mankhwala azitsamba
Label: HEALTH

Text:
kulambira kalonga gawa undi tamvapo zambiri za mwambo wa kulamba mongokumbutsana kulamba mwambo womwe mafumu achichewa mmaiko malawi mozambique zambia amapezerapo danga lokapereka uthenga wa mmene zinthu zikuyendera mmadera kwa mfumu yawo kalonga gawa undi lero tati tisanthule zina zina zomwe zimaloledwa kusachita pamaso mfumu ya achewayi steven pembamoyo adacheza senior chief lukwa wa ku kasungu kumwambo wa kulamba wa chaka chino motere ndikudziweni mfumu    chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc ndine senior chief lukwa mwa mafumu akuluakulu pakati achewa ku malawi ndimachokera mboma la kasungu 
  tandifotokozerani zokhudza ulemu wa kalonga gawa undi kuyambira mmene mumaperekera moni 
  kalonga gawa undi mfumu kwambiri pakati achewa kotero ulemu wonse womalizira pakati achewa umayenera kupita kwa kalonga gawa undi pachifukwa ichi palibe munthu yemwe amaloledwa kugwirana chanza kalonga gawa undi pokhapokha kalongayo atayamba yekha kupereka mkono sayenera kukhudzidwa mwanjira iliyonse 
  nanga popereka mphatso kwa kalonga gawa undi zimakhala uwu mwambo wina wapadera womwe umafunika kusamala kwambiri popereka mphatso kwa kalonga gawa undi munthu amayenera mphatsoyo pansi pagome lomwe lakhazikitsidwa mwini akuona akatero imodzi mwa nduna zake za kalongayo amakatenga mphatsoyo nkukaika pamalo oyenera osati kumupatsira mmanja ayi zonse kumakumbuka kalonga munthu wamkulu 
  nanga pokumana kalonga gawa undi munthu amayenera kutani   pokumana kalonga gawa undi munthu amayenera pansi chotambalala osati chokhwinyata ayi mipando itakhalapo yambiri motani munthu amayenera pansi pokhapokhapo mwini kalongayo wakukakamiza ukhale pampando uli mchewa weniweni kalonga atakukakamiza chotani umayenerabe kukana pansi basi nkofunika kukumbukira kutambalala osapinda miyendo pamaso kalonga gawa undi 
  nanga ungatani kalonga gawa undi akupatse mpata wolankhula naye funso limeneli limavuta zambiri amaona kalonga gawa undi amangolankhula chisawawa pomwe kalonga waperekera mpata wolankhulana naye si ukufuna kulankhula naye umayenera kuomba mmanja kulankhula mokwenza akuti yooh gawa katatu mpata akhoza kukupatsa mwayi wolankhulana naye 
  nanga mfumu ya achewa ubale wotani gulewamkulu choyamba gulewamkulu alibe mphamvu iliyonse kwa kalonga gawa unidi chimodzimodzinso naye kalonga alibe yopanga za gulewamkulu ntchito imeneyi amalekera mafumu ake aziyendetsa kalonga akamayenda amayenera kuzunguliridwa mbumba zake amai oimba nyimbo 
  nchifukwa chiyani mbumba osati nduna pamwambo wa achewa amayi ndiwo amakhala mphamvu zosankha mfumu pachifukwachi amayi amapatsidwa ulemu wapadera popanda kasankhidwe ka mfumu kamasokonekera kalonga gawa undi amadziwa zonsezi ndiye pofuna kulemekeza udindo womwe amayi nawo nchifukwa amafuna mbumba ndizo zizimuperekeza

Text:
pac iwopseza boma bilo yachisankho lisafike lachitatu sabata ya mawa musanabweretse bilo yokhudza chisankho maboma angono latero bungwe la amipingo la public affairs committee pac lachinayi msabatayi 
  zimanenedwa pamene bungweli lidayenda ulendo ku nyumba ya malamulo komwe limakapereka mfundozi bungweli lati sizitheka boma liyembekezere zionetsero zokwiya boma 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka atavala mikanjo makolala akuluakulu amipingowa motsogozedwa wa pac mbusa felix chingota adayenda ndawala ku area 18 mumzinda wa lilongwe mpaka kukafika ku nyumba ya malamulo komwe adakapereka zawo kwa mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika sipikala wa nyumbayo 
  izitu zikuchitika pamene pac akuluakulu malamulo amabungwe akhala akufunsira nzeru biloyi 
  nayo nduna ya zamalamulo samuel tembenu adalonjeza amalawi pamene amalankhula mnyumbayi biloyi ikambidwa aphungu nyumba ya malamulo chilankhulireni boma lapinda manja pamene silikulankhulapo 
  zomwe pac yalemba zati pamene biloyi ikubwera ku nyumba ya malamulo boma lionetsetse aphungu akambiranenso zokhudza lamulo loti opambana pachisankho cha mtsogoleri wa lino azipeza mavoti oposa 50 100 alionse 
  sizikambidwa mpaka 29 november 2017 sitichitira mwina zionetsero lonse idatero mbali ya kalatayo 
  polandira kalatayo mmalo mwa mutharika wa khonsolo ya mzinda wa lilongwe charles makanga adalonjeza pac nkhaniyi saikhalira ikamupeza mutharika onse ofunikira
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mswati akhale chitsanzo kwa achinyamata pulezidenti joyce banda wati mfumu yachingoni yomwe angoidzoza kumene mswati kanjedza gomani yachisanu ikhale chitsanzo kwa achinyamata 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc banda amalankhula lamulungu 5 ogasiti pomwe adali mlendo wolemekezeka ku mwabowo ku lizulu mboma la ntcheu 
  mwazina banda adapempha andale asasokoneze mfumuyi yomwe ya zaka 17 
  tithandize mfumu yathu igwire ntchito fumu ikhale yachilungamo yodziwa kuweruza milandu amati milandu sagula chipanda cha mowa 
  boma ndife osangalala mfumu yachinyamata imeneyi ikhala chitsanzo chabwino kwa achinyamata 
  zomwe izichita mfumuyi achinyamata adzitengera iyo adatero banda 
  mswati gomani walowa ufumuwo imfa ya ake willard kanjedza gomani yachinayi yomwe idamwalira mwezi wa sepitembala 2009 
  pamwambowo kudabwera akuluakulu andale amabungwe 
  nayo mfumu ya angoni mdziko la mozambique t zimtambira idali nawo pamwambowo
Label: POLITICS

Text: ndisathandize mwana wanga wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mkazi wanga tidalekana titakhala pabanja zaka ziwiri mkaziyu ndidakukwatira titachimwitsana Text:
tidakumana padali pagalaja ku area 25 garage malo okonzera galimoto ukachita mphumi malowa uthanso kudya nawo momwe mike tembo adachitira 
  iyetu adasodzerapo msoti womwe akumanga nawo banja 7 may sana multi purpose hall mumzinda wa lilongwe 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mike tembo amagwira ntchito ku leyland motors amadziwika kwambiri cha udindo womwe adali nawo kutimu ya silver strikers komwe ankagwira mlembi njole yomwe mkuluyu watola annie nkhandwe yomwe ikugwira ntchito ku jti 
  annie mike patsiku la send off mike akuti mudali december 2013 pamene mulungu adayamba kulumikizitsa awiriwa akuti adapita kugalaja ya ku area 25 komwe amakakonzetsa galimoto amadikira mpaka aikonze 
  akutitu mpaka cha mma 6 koloko madzulo pomwepo atayamba kuweruka apa naye annie ataweruka amadutsira mbali yomwe kudali mike apa nkuti awiriwa asakudziwana 
  likalemba lalemba basi mike adanunkhiza mafungo adamulonda mtsikanayo samamudziwa moni amene adali woyamba adasiyana atangofunsana maina 
  mosachedwa galimotoyo akuti adamaliza kukonza annie nkuti atanyamuka kale 
  sindidachedwe kukailiza kuyamba kumulonda mpaka ndidamuona akulowa pageti yakwawo ndidamukuwira iyeamvekere you were following me apo ndidalankhula molimba mtima ndimvekere ndimafuna ndidzaone pamene my future wife akukhala adaseka ulendo adamusereula motero 
  kuchoka apa awiriwa akuti amakumanabe mike akuti adapanga kaulendo kokaonera mpira wa zambia taytaz mmbali mwa msewu wa mchinji osadziwa mkuluyu alindi zina zoti achite kupatula mpirawo 
  chichewa chidagwa namwali adayesera kuzemba mike sadasinthe njoleyi akuti idangomuuza ukhale kaye serious mike adaonetsa ubwenzi udayamba 
  awiriwa apanga kale send off sabata yatha pamene akukonzekera ukwati 
  mike amachokera mmudzi mwa kamuthuleni tembo kwa inkosi mtwalo mboma la mzimba pomwe annie wa mmudzi mwa kamunthambani nkhandwe kwa mtwalo komweko onse akuchokera kumabanja achifumu

Text:
kukweza mafumu kwalowa ndalemafumu mkwezakweza wa mafumu womwe mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda wachita chitengereni mpandowu wanyanyula mafumu apempha mtsogoleriyu aziona zingapo asanakweza mafumu 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mafumuwa omwe sadafune kutchulidwa maina boma lomwe akuchokera ati pamiyezi 7 theka yomwe mtsogoleriyu wakhala akulamula zosamveka angakhale atakweza kale mafumu ochuluka chotere mmipando yawo 
  omwe akuganiza kukweza kwa mafumuku kumadza pazifukwa za ndale ati akudabwa mmaboma mulibe mfumu yandodo senior chief pokweza mafumu akumakakwezanso mmaboma omwe ma senior chief alipo kale 
  mwachitsanzo mboma la mwanza muli ma t awiri sub t mulibe senior chief yemwenso madera amatchedwa mfumu yandodo 
  mboma la mwanza muli ma t anayi mulibenso mfumu yandodo 
  mmaboma kasungu mfumu zandodo zilipo zinayi karonga imodzi rumphi imodzi chitipa ziwiri nsanje ziwiri mzimba ziwiri ntcheu ziwirinso 
  ifenso tikudabwa kodi apulezidentiwa akuyangananji akamakweza mafumu zonse akumati akuyangana ntchito zawo kodi kanthawi komweka mafumu awakwezawa awawona mmaboma akukhazikitsa atambala awiri pamene tilibe tambala idatero mfumu ina yomwe idati zotere zichititsa mafumuwa azichita zosangalatsa pulezidenti ncholinga choti akwezedwe 
  ntchito yathu tikugwira mokayika tikufooka sitikudziwa amene awakwezawo akumawayangananji idatero mfumuyo 
  nduna ya maboma aangono grace zinenani maseko yati sithirapo ndemanga nkhaniyi pokhapokha apeze mafumu omwe akudandaulawo 
  ndiyankhulapo pankhaniyi ndikapeza mafumu omwe akudandaulawo sindikutanthauza sindiyankhula ndipeze kaye odandaulawo sindingakuuzeni tsiku lomwe ndipeze mafumuwa adatero maseko 
  bester mandele bwanamkubwa wa boma la rumphi komwe kwakwezedwa t mwankhunikira sta wati bwanamkubwa samatengapo gawo pakukwezedwa kwa mafumu 
  timapereka malipoti momwe mafumu akugwirira ntchito boma lonse za mfumu yomwe ikwezedwe ndiye sizitimakhudza adatero bwanamkubwayo 
  senior chief kalonga ya mboma la karonga yati singayankhire nkhaniyi nayonso idakwezedwa 
  t chekucheku ya mboma la neno yati boma lililonse likhale mfumu yandodo ikudabwanso kumeneko kulibe mfumu yandodo 
  ufumu wa chekucheku uli mbiri yabwino mmene ulili ufumu wa kwataine takhala tikudikira nafenso tikhale mfumu chifukwatu imatithandiza zambiri idatero mfumuyo 
  senior chief kaomba ya mboma la kasungu yati singaikire ndemanga pankhaniyi pakufunika pokweza ufumu pazitsatidwa ndondomeko yake maka mbiri ya mfumuyo 
  kaomba adati zimenezi sizikutsatidwa ndiye kukwezaku kukuchitika mwandale 
  zikudza pamene bungwe loona za malamulo la malawi law commission lili mkati kuchititsa misonkhano yokozanso malamulo okhudza mafumu 
  malamulo lino okhudza ufumu adakonzedwa 29 disembala 1967 malamulowa amapereka mphamvu kwa mtsogoleri wa malinga gawo 4 1 atha kusankha paramount chief senior chief 
  boma kudzera unduna wa maboma aangono ndilo lidapereka ntchito yokonzanso malamulowa misonkhano yomva maganizo yachitika mzigawo zonse za lino 
  lachinayi 27 sepitembala 2012 msonkhanowu udachitikira ku hotel victoria mumzinda wa blantyre osiyanasiyana kuphatikiza mafumu mmaboma la zomba chiradzulu blantyre neno mwanza nsanje maboma adasonkhana 
  yomwe idakula pamsonkhanowo yoti malamulowa akonzedwe mtsogoleri wa asamakweze mfumu pongoloza azidutsa kwa abanja bwanamkubwa wa bomalo 
  mafumuwo adati zipani zolamula ndizo zikuwononga mbiri ntchito ya mafumu powakweza sakumayangana mbiri ya ufumuwo khalidwe la mfumuyo 
  wapampando wa bungwe lomwe likuchititsa kafukufukuyu anaclet chipeta wati ntchito yomva maganizo yatha atumiza lipoti lazomwe apeza kwa nduna ya za chilungamo
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:

Text:
bwanamkubwa wapempha mabungwe athandize khonsolo polimbana coronavirus bwanamkubwa wa boma la zomba dr raphael piringu wapempha mabungwe omwe akugwira ntchito zawo mboma la zomba athandidze zipangizo zosiyanasiyana zothandiza asatenge kachirombo ka coronavirus 
 piringu owona odwala mchipatala akuchuluka dr piringu amayankhula idzi lachitatu ku zomba pomwe amakumana akulu akulu mabungwe oyimililira zipembedzo pastors fraternal 
 apemphanso mabungwewa apereke uthenga mzipatala owona odwala asamachuluke dr piringu ati misika yambiri ya mbomalo ilibe mipanda choncho apemphanso mabungwewa aphunzitse nkhani yosamba mmanja 
 mmau ake wapampando wa mabungwe omwe si boma mboma la zomba newton sindo apempha mabungwewa akamapereka zinthu kwa mmadera akumidzi ndibwino adziwaphunzitsa kagwiritsidwe ntchito kazinthu zomwe aperekazo

Text:
