Text:
chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc bungwe la human rights defenders coalition hrdc lati maso ake akadali otsegula ncholinga choti boma la tonse alliance lisaphwanye ufulu wa amalawi 
  wa bungweli gift trapence wauza tamvani hrdc iwonetsetsa mtsogoleri wa lino lazarus chakwera wakwaniritsa zomwe adalonjeza lolemba achepetsa mphamvu zake 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa trapence maso   adakali otsegula   chakwera adapereka lonjezolo pamwambo wokondwerera la malawi latha zaka 56 lili ufulu wodzilamulira 
  mtsogoleriyu adalonjezanso azipita ku nyumba ya malamulo kukayankha mafunso okhudza momwe akuyendetsera lino 
  chakwera adati awonetsetsanso lamulo loti akupeza mauthenga boma mosavuta access to information layamba kugwira ntchito ncholinga cholimbikitsa zinthu poyera kuchepetsa ziphuphu katangale 
  adalonjeza achotsa mphamvu zina za pulezidenti mphamvu zimenezi zikhudze ku nthambi ya zachitetezo pulezidenti akakhala mphamvu zambiri nthambi ya chitetezo imasanduka yake osati ya adatero trapence 
  adapempha chakwera awonetsetse ku mboma lake mulibe katangale ziphuphu 
  mphekesera za katangale zifufuzidwe mutu uzioneka adatero
Label: POLITICS

Text:
maepiskopi malawi zambia zimbabwe ayambitsa bungwe lawo ma episkopi mpingo wa katolika mmaiko malawi zambia zimbabwe agwirizana zoyambitsa bungwe lawo 
 ma episkopiwa agwirizana mkumano wawo omwe unachitikira mdziko la zambia kuyambira 3 mpaka 5 february 2020 
 maepiskopi ku malawi zambia zimbabwe malinga zokambiranazi kuthandiza kwambiri kupititsa patsogolo mpingo wakatolika mmaiko atatuwa utukuke koposa ma episkopiwa ati akuchita motsata malamulo mpingo wa katolika canon law gawo 341 
 mtsogoleri wa la zambia edgar lungu wayamikira maganizo ma episkopi mpingo wa katolika maiko malawi zambia zimbabwe ogwilira ntchito limodzi 
 polankhula lolemba pomwe amatsegulira msonkhano wa ma episkopi wa omwe ukuchitikira mdziko la zambia lungu chikhulupiliro ubale omwe ulipo pakati atsogoleri mpingowu mmaikowa uthandiza pokweza ntchito za chitukuko mmaiko onsewa ayika chidwi pothandiza mpingowu njira zosiyanasiyana 
 omwe anachita mkumanowu wapampando wa bungwe la maepiskopi mdziko la zambia la zambia conference of catholic bishops bishop george cosmass zumaire lungu wapampando wa ngwe la maepiskopi mdziko la malawi archbishop thomas luke msusa wapampando wa bungwe la maepiskopi mdziko la zimbabwe archbishop robert ndhlovu
Label: RELIGION

Text:
mbusa wa ccap alimbikitsa akhristu kuthandiza radio maria wolemba thokozani chapola mbusa joseph maganga wa mpingo wa ccap mboma la zomba loweruka wapempha akonde kuthandiza radio maria malawi 
 mbusa maganga wavala jekete lofiira mwa amayi omwe nawo ulendowu mbusa maganga walankhula ulendo womwe amayi mpingowu ku tchalitchi la mpsyupsyu nawo pomwe anakayendera likulu la wailesiyi ku mangochi 
 wati mpingo wawo uli wailesi ina amawona mkofunika kuthandiza radio maria ponena ntchito ya utumiki imodzi 
 apitirize kuthandiza radio maria posatengera mpingo waniji tili nayo wailesi yathu ya blantyre synod ndimawona mkofunika kumathandiza radio maria ntchito yomwe tikugwira ya utumiki imodzi anatero mbusa maganga 
 ati anawona amayi ambiri amakonda kumvera radio maria choncho akufuna kudzala mtima wokonda kuthandiza wailesiyi mwa amayiwa 
 chaka chaka ndimabweretsa amayi mpingo wathu wa ccap mulungu tonse tikutumikira iyeyo ndimafuna aziyamikira ntchito za radio maria kutinso akhale chidwi choyithandiza anatero abusawo 
 ati akufunitsitsa utumiki wa radio maria upite patsogolo uthenga umveke lonse
Label: RELIGION

Text:
kutentha koonjeza kuzinga maiko nthambi yoona za nyengo mdziko muno auza amalawi alimbe mtima nyengo yotentha yomwe yakhala mdziko muno kwa sabata ziwiri zapitazi kupitirira kwa sabata zikubwerazi 
  sabata yatha lino lakhala likutentha nganjo ya moto moti madera kunsi kwa chigwa cha mtsinje wa shire kutenthaku kumafika 450c pomwe madera kumafika 350c 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka akhala akudandaula kutenthaku kukusowetsa mtendere 
  zikuoneka nyengo yotenthayi yatikakamira nthambi yoona zanyengo adalengeza lolemba amalawi angovala zilimbe nyengoyi ipitirira kwa sabata zikubwerazi 
  komatu si lino lokha lomwe lakhaula kutenthaku maiko ambiri mdera la kummwera africa la southern african development community sadc botswana eswathini mozambique 
  malinga kalata yomwe idatulutsa nthambi yoona za nyengo mbungwe la sadc lolemba october 28 yachenjeza kutentha molapitsa mmaiko mderali 
  pomwe kalata yochokera ku nthambi yoona za nyengo mdziko muno ya climate change and meteorological services yomwe adatulutsa wa nthambiyo jolamu nkhokwe idalongosola lamulungu october 27 kufika november 3 kutentha dzuwa kupitirira 
  kalatayo yati sabata yapitayi madera lengwe national park mboma la chikwawa kudatentha 45c pomwe ku mwanza nsanje kudafika 44c 
  lachitatu november 30 mitambo iyamba kumangana mmadera lino zomwe zikhonza kubweretsa mvula ya mphepo ya mkuntho ziphaliwali ikutero kalatayi 
  malinga nkhokwe aka si koyamba mdziko muno mutenthe chonchi maka mmadera kunsi kwa chigwa cha mtsinje wa shire chaka chino lonse lomwe latentha 
  nkhokwe adati ana achikulire ngofunika chisamaliro kwambiri nthawiyi   katswiri nkhani za sayansi chilengedwe yemwenso amadziwa za kwa nyengo professor sosten chiotha adati kutenthaku zina mwa zizindikiro za kwa nyengo 
  timadziwa timakhala nyengo zosiyana mmene zikuyenera kukhalira kusinthaku kukakhala kowonjeza kuposa mmene zikuyenera kukhalira zimalowa mgulu la kwa nyengo adalongosola chiotha 
  adalongosolanso mwachindunji nyengo ikangosintha kamodzi sikusintha kwa nyengo kusinthaku kumayenera kukhale kwa yaitali 
  malinga chiotha malipoti zanyengo mdziko muno akuonetsa kusinthaku kwakhala kukuchitika kwa yaitali ndithu 
  naye bwanamkubwa wa mboma la karonga frank kalilombe adati bomalinso kwakhala kukutentha molapitsa sabata yapitayi 
  adati mpofunika kupeza njira zoti ana achikulire adziwe zoyenera panthawiyi poopa ngozi zodza mwadzidzidzi kukomoka zina kaamba ka kutenthaku
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
mabungwe akufuna prophet manyozo anjatidwenso wolemba thokozani chapola mgwirizano wa mabungwe omwe si boma mboma la mangochi apempha chilungamo chiwoneke nkhani yogwililira yokhudza prophet samson manyozo msungwana wina wachichepere 
 wapampando wa mabungwewa aggrey mfune prophet manyozo anatulutsidwa belo ya khothi kaamba koti msungwanayu pamodzi ake anasowa mderali poganizira awiriwa tsopano abweleranso pakufunika nkhaniyi ibwelerenso ku bwalo la milandu 
 ati zomwe anachita mneneriyu zochititsa manyazi potengera udindo mdziko muno ati mkuyenera lamulo ligwire ntchito mosayangana nkhope 
 prophet manyozo muntu wa uemu zomwe anachita zija zikupereka chithunzithunzi choyipa kwa timagwira ntchito amipingo izizi sitingasekelere zomwe zinamuchitikira mwana uja sazayiwala mmoyo onse chilungamo chiwoneke nkhnaiyi anatero mfune 
 mfune ati padakalipano mabungwewa akayitula kale nkhaniyi mmanja mwa apolisi apolisiwo alonjeza alondoloza za nkhaniyi 
 ati mabungwewa apitiriza kumenyenera maufulu wanthu kuphatikizapo ana achichepere wapempha boma lizenge mlandu wa mwanayu sawonetsa chidwi choperekera umboni nkhaniyi 
 kuthawa kwa mayiyu mwana kukudabwitsa kwambiri komwe kunachititsa manyozo atuluke belo mayiyo akukana kupereka umboni boma limatenga udindo wozenga mlandu mayiyo wobisa chilungamo zomwe zichitike chilungamo chiwoneke anatero mfune 
 prophet manyozo anapalamula mlanduwu mmwezi wa june pomwe anagwililira msungwana wachichepere yemwe padakalipano akuphunzira sukulu ya pulaimale ya st augustine 3 mboma la mangochi 
 padakalipano mneneri wa apolisi mboma la mangochi inspector roderick maida wakana kuthirapo mlomo ponena nkhaniyi idakali ku bwalo la milandu
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
manja mkhosi kupsa kwa misika pamene nkhani yakupsa kwa misika yayala nthenje mdziko muno amalonda achita jenkha kusowa mtengo wogwira katundu wawo atasakazidwa moto 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   escom in free for all fuel scam   wait gets longer posakhalitsapa misika ya area 18 ku lilongwe wa kasungu vigwagwa ku mzuzu kamuzu road ku salima wa karonga yapsa katundu wa nkhaninkhani wasakazidwa 
  mwa okhudzidwa kuyaka kwa msika wa vigwagwa wati akusowa mtengo wogwira pamene katundu wa k1.3 miliyoni adayakiratu 
  kupsa kwa misika ndiyo nkhani ili mkamwamkamwa ndithandiza abale anga 11 omwe amadalira chopweteka kwambiri nchakuti ndidali nditangotenga ndalama kumene kukagula katunduyo adatero banda 
  wapampando wa komiti ya pamsika wa vigwagwa gerald maulana adati komiti yoona za ngozi za moto yapangidwa yomwe iziona za momwe angathanirane ngozizo kupezeka kwa madzi ozimitsira moto azikhala 
  maulana adati omwe adali ngongole akuwathandiza powalembera makalata opita kukhonsolo mabungwe opereka ngongole umboni katundu wawo adapsa 
  adati zaka za mmbuyozo ankagwiritsa ntchito moto njira yobela katundu apolisi adakhwimitsa chitetezo palibe amene adadandaula kubedwa kwa katundu ya moto 
  lachitatu polankhula phungu wa pakati mboma la kasungu amon nkhata atapereka simenti yokwana k1.5 miliyoni yogulira matumba 200 simenti msika wa kasungu umangidwenso wapampando wa mavenda mumsikawo burnet saudi adati padakalipano manja mkhosi 
  tikupempha akufuna kwabwino athandize mnjira zosiyanasiyana mavuto ndiye ngambiri adatero 
  padakalipano mneneri wapolisi mdziko muno rhoda manjolo wati apolisi amayamba afufuza kaye asanamange munthu mawuwa adadza pamene mneneri wa unduna wa maboma aangono muhlabase mughogho adati kusamangidwa kwa ootcha misika ndiko kukuchititsa mchitidwewu ukule 
  mughogho adati palibe chasintha za chikalata chimene undunawo udatulutsa chaka chatha 
  malinga chikalata cha chaka chathacho makhonsolo ayenera zozimira moto zokwanira mmisika ngozi itagwa asasowe mtengo wogwira
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
6.9 miliyoni alembetsa mavoti zotsatira za kalembera wa mavoti zomwe bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec latulutsa zasonyeza 6 856 295 ndiwo alembetsa mdziko lonse adzaponye nawo voti chaka cha mawa 
  bungwe la mec limayembekezera kulemba 8 510 625 mmaboma onse mmagawo onse 8 cha zovuta zina zomwe bungweli limakumana nazo mkati mwa ndime 1 654 330 sadalembetse 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka pachisankho cha 2014 7 520 816 ndiwo adalembetsa mkaundula kutanthauza odzavota pachisankho cha ulendo uno akuchepera 664 521 kwa omwe adalembetsa akavote 2014 
  mneneri wa mec sangwani mwafulirwa wanenetsa chiwerengerochi chikhoza bungwe la mec likayamba ntchito ya kalondolondo wa kalembera mmalo onse omwe amalembetserako 
  nzotsatira zomwe zili mkaundula potengera mapeto kalembera tiyamba ntchito ya kauni mkauni amapezeka adalembetsa kawiri zolinga zawo ndiye mayina otero timachotsa kumodzi nkusiya kumodzi choncho asadzadabwe kudzamva ma figala asintha watero mwafulirwa 
  mwa omwe alembetsawa 3 045 766 abambo pomwe 3 810 625 amayi lilongwe ndiyo yalembetsa ambiri 1 013 414 pomwe likoma ndilo chimtseka khomo 6 946 
  zina mwa zovuta zomwe bungwe la mec lidakumana nazo mkati mwa kalembera kuonongeka kwa makina opangira kalembera kuvuta kwa mphamvu ya magetsi yoyatsira makina ndikunyanyala ntchito kwa ochita kalembera pofuna malipiro makamaka kumayambiriro 
  mabungwe zipani zotsutsa boma zidapereka nkhawa zawo ku bungwe la mec zokhudza kutsika kwa chiwerengero cha olembetsa adapempha nkotheka kalembera akuyenera kudzabwerezedwa mmadera omwe zidanyanya 
  zotsatira za kalembera sizikukhala zabwino si vuto la akupita mmalo molembetsera akubwerera bungwe la mec likuyenera kuchitapo kanthu kalembera adzabwerezedwe adatero mneneri wa malawi congress party mcp reverend maurice munthali 
  wa bungwe loona za ufulu wa la centyre for human rights and rehabilitation chrr timothy mtambo adati kupanda kupereka mpata wina wa kalembera nkuphwanya ufulu wa 
  mtambo akutanthauza ufulu wodzaponya voti wa 1 654 330 omwe sadalembetse waphwanyidwa akuyenera kupatsidwa mpata wolembetsa nawo adzakhale danga loponya voti 
  kalembera wa mkaundulayu gawo limodzi la zokonzekera chisankho cha 2019 bungwe la mec silidabwere poyera nkunena liganizire pempho lobwereza kalembera ayi potsatira pempho la mabungwe zipani
Label: POLITICS

Text:
covid-19 yakolera chiwerengero cha amalawi amene apezeka kachirombo ka coronavirus chatumphuka msabata ikuthayi kuchoka 101 kufika 203 
  zachitika pamene komiti yoona za matenda covid-19 lachinayi idalengeza adapeza 102 amene adachokera ku zimbabwe south africa adapezeka matendawa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mwa omwe adafika ku kamuzu stadium amalawi 441 amene adafika mdziko muno kuchoka mdziko la south africa msabatayi adathawa kumalo amene amawasunga ku kamuzu stadium mumzinda wa blantyre dzikoli limyembekeza kulandiranso pafupifupi 300 ku south africa dzulo 
  msonkhano wapadera wa komiti ya covid-19 omwe udali ku bingu international convention centre mumzinda wa lilongwe lachinayi udakambirana mwakuya nkhani zina zina za matendawa adagwirizana kuthawa kwa ku kamuzu stadium kudachitika kaamba ka kunyozera 
  chiwerengero chambiri cha omwe adapezeka coronavirus mdziko muno mwezi umodzi wapitawu amakhala omwe adangofika kumene kuchoka mmayiko okhudzidwa kwambiri tanzania south africa 
  unduna wa zaumoyo wati kubwera kwa abalewa kusabweretse nkhawa iliyonse boma lapanga kale zoyenera anthuwo apimidwe nkutsimikizika asadabwerere mnyumba zawo 
  mneneri waundunawu joshua malango wati boma likupanga zotheka kubwera kwa anthuwo kusasokoneze nkhondo yolimbana coronavirus nawo udindo waukulu 
  takhala tikunena asilikali amphamvu nkhondoyi eni ake akuyenera zomwe amauzidwa kupanga apewe matendawo basi adatero malango 
  mwa obwererawo amene sanafune kutchulidwa wadandaula boma silikuonetsa chidwi anthuwo likuwasunga pamtetete kubwalo la masewero la kamuzu stadium ku blantyre 
  chifikireni tikungokhala kuno akuti tidikire zotsatira za zomwe adatiyeza tabwera nkachilomboko ayi tikukhala pamtetete adatero odandaulayo 
  apo nkuti anthuwo asanathawe 
  polankhula kwa atolankhani lachinayi wapampando wa komiti yapadera ya covid-19 dr john phuka adati kuthawa kwa anthuwo komwe kudachitika enanso atathawa malo osungirako kwa kameza mumzinda wa blantyre phunziro 
  takhazikitsa komiti yapadera imene iziunikira momwe ofika kuchoka kunja tikuwalandirira cholinga choti mavuto awa asaonekenso ndipepese kwa onse ochoka kunja amene akuoneka anatopa ulendo wochoka ku joni zochitika adatero phuka 
  malango wati boma lakonza kale malo omwe anthuwo akasungidweko likhala likulengeza za malo kusamutsa anthuwo kupita nawo mmalowo 
  boma likamapanga zinthu limakhala litakonza kale mapulani zonsezo zili kale mmapulani aboma adatero malango 
  woyendetsa ntchito za zaumoyo dr charles mwansambo adati bwalo la kamuzu stadium lidasankhidwa pofikira chabe potsata mpata woti anthuwo asathinane malo amodzi mpaka atatengedwera kumalo okhazikika 
  la malawi lidazemba mbindikiro wa mnyumba wa masiku 21 kuyambira 18 april 2020 mpaka 9 may 2020 gulu la zaufulu wa la hrdc litakatenga chiletso polingalira ambiri adalibe chakudya cha panthawi yonse ya mbindikirowo 
  mmaiko omwe mbindikirowo udatheka boma limathandiza ake chakudya ndalama zogulira zinthu zogwiritsa ntchito mbindikirowo
Label: HEALTH

Text:
tsogolo la fizi silikudziwika zenizeni pankhani yoti fizi yokwera msukulu za sekondale sukulu za ukachechenjede za boma ipitilire ayi zidziwika posachedwapa unduna wa zamaphunziro ukamanga mneneri wa undunawu wauza tamvani 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu iyi nkhani yomwe amalawi ambiri akumva nayo litsipa polingalira mwezi wamawawu akuyenera kubowola matumba pankhani ya fizi zomwe posachedwapa unduna wa zamaphunziro udalengeza zakwera 
  malingana mneneri wa undunawu rebecca phwitiko undunawu ukudikira kalata yochokera ku nyumba ya malamulo yokhudza zomwe nyumbayi idamanga pankhaniyi 
  ophunzira pasekondale ya zingwangwa mumzinda wa blantyre sapitiriza sukulu kaamba ka kukwera kwa fizi sukulu zonse wonse amalawi udziwitsidwa za tsogolo la nkhaniyi posachedwa tikalandira kalata ya ku nyumba ya malamulo zomwe idamanga adatero phwitiko 
  nkhaniyi idakambidwa mnyumbayi pamkhumano womwe wangothawu pomwe aphungu otsutsa boma adadzudzula kukwenza ka fiziku kwabwera panthawi yolakwika 
  padali zovuta zingapo aphunguwo adakambirana nkhaniyo mpaka kugwirizana yofunika kuwunikidwa bwinobwino 
  mneneri wa nyumbayi leonard mengezi adati pakadalipano sangapereke yankho lokhudza zomwe aphunguwo adakambirana poti nkhani ikakambidwa mnyumbayi imayenda mndondomeko zosiyanasiyana isadakhazikitsidwe 
  mmene zidakambidwira mnyumba ya malamulo muja nkhaniyi imayenera kupita mmanja mwa komiti ya zamaphunziro kenako komiti yovomereza za boma isanapite kuunduna ndiye chitsekereni mkhumano mpaka sindidamve kalikonse adatero mengezi 
  adati nkomuvuta kulondoloza nkhaniyi makomitiwo kaamba koti patchuthi ndiye sangapereke yankho logwira pokhapokha atabwerera mmaofesi tchuthi chikatha 
  nkhawa fizi yokwerayi ikaloledwa ana asukulu omwe alibe pogwira kaamba koti akhoza kulephera kuphunzira atakhala anzeru 
  phwitiko adati nkhani ya mthumba isabweretse njengunje pali ndondomeko zothandizira ovutikitsitsa omwe sangakwanitse kulipira fizi zokwerazi 
  tikudziwa pali ovutikitsitsa oti fizi zisadakwere ankalephera kulipira pali njira yothandizira oterewa ngongole kwa ophunzira msukulu za ukachenjede komansothandizo la ulere kwa ophunzira msukulu za sekondale adatero phwitiko 
  adati zili chonchi pali ndondomeko yomwe ophunzira amayenera kutsata apeze nawo mwayiwu pofuna okhawo ovutikitsitsa ndiwo azipindula nawo 
  kusankha ovutikitsitsawa kumachitika mmaboma ndimo muli omwe amadziwa chilungamo cha anthuwo zimafunika mfumu ya kumudzi kwa munthuyo ofesi ya dc ofesi ya maphunziro dem),adatero phwitiko.phwitiko adati ophunzira ovutika omwe abale omwe njira zopezera ndalama sadawaike mgulu lopata ngongole thandizo la fizi pofuna kupereka mpata kwa omwe alibiretu podalira 
  adati thumba lomwe kumachokera ndalama zothandizirali loperewera kufikira nchifukwa chake pali kusefaku 
  tidachita dala kupereka ntchito yosefayi mmanja mwa maboma omwe ophunzirawo amakhala ndiwo angadziwe wovutika weniweni azifuna kupata nawo ndiye sitingadziwe wovutika weniweni uti adatero phwitiko.iye adati kulengeza za tsogolo la fizi zitengera zokambirana zatenga yaitali 
  nkhaniyi ili apo maofesi ambiri kuphatikizapo mboma patchuthi cha khrisimasi chaka cha tsopano 
  mabungwe omwe si aboma la mipingo la public affairs committee pac la zamaphunziro la civil society education coalition csec adati kukwenza fizi nkofunika kutengera momwe chuma chikuyendera 
  wa bungwe la csec benedicto kondowe adati kukwenza fizi njira yokhawo yotukulira maphunziro mdziko muno polingalira zinthu zidakwera momwe chuma chikuvutira mboma mpovuta kutiboma palokha lingakwanitse kupereka ndalama zamaphunziro 
  kondowe adati vuto yomwe boma lakwezera fiziyi polingalira sadakonzekere
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
veteran hymnist nyathole buried victoria nqabile thole celebrated locally for her hymn writing skills was buried last week in mzimba 
  coincidentally nyathole as she was fondly called was the mother of the late singer and composer griffin mhango who founded kalimba band 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   her touch on murals nyatholes coffin nyathole was the daughter of reverand pz thole whose compositions appear in the tumbuka hymn book she composed numerous spiritual songs some of which have made it into the newer edition of tumbuka hymns 
  according to her grandson current kalimba band leader vita chirwa nyathole was born in 1924 
  she initially worked for malawi young pioneers myp in mzuzu then was transferred to nansawa training base where she worked as matron under former president bakili muluzi who was then principal of the base she eventually went to ghana and later germany for technical training and when she returned she helped to shape various malawi women into productive citizens he said 
  according to chirwa nyathole was later transferred to myp headquarters in kanjedza where she continued with her noble work until her retirement in 1975 
  she later became one of president kamuzu bandas nominated mps for mzimba and served two successive terms after which she quit politics and devoted her time to serving the lord through singing and preaching he said 
  she came from elangeni village in mzimba where she was laid to rest
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
kuwani wati alimbikitsa mgwirizano akumidzi mtsogoleri wa chipani cha mbakuwaku movement for development mmd peter driver sinosi kuwani wati chipani chake chidzatukula miyoyo ya mmadera kumidzi akazasankhidwa mtsogoleri wa lino chisankho cha president chomwe chichitike 2 july chaka chino 
 kuwani amalankhula lachitatu mzinda wa blantyre atamaliza kupereka zikalata zake zowonetsa chidwi chodzapikitsana nawo chisankhochi 
 zipani zomwe amadziona zikulu zikulu mdziko muno zilibe upangiri wabwino ofuna kupititsa patsogolo miyoyo ya mmadera akumidzi 
 ifetu mbakuwaku movement of development sitinayambe zandale choti tasowa chochita tufuna tikonze pophwasula akamberembere anatero kuwani 
 wati ichi chake chipani cha mbakuwaku chinakana kulowa mgwirizano zipani zina pokonzekera chisankhochi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
samalani sikelo za chinyengombs yokolola yakwana pomwe alimi amataya zokolola zawo kwa mavenda akuba amene amamanga sikelo pofuna kuliza alimi 
  bungwe loona zoyezayeza za malonda la malawi bureau of standards mbs lati malonda akuyenera aonetsetse sikelo zawo zayezedwa zili pamlingo wabwino 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka wachiwiri kwa wa bungweli willy muyila wati bungwe lake lokhalo lomwe lingapime sikelo zisanayambe kugwira ntchito 
  tili zida zoyenera kupima zoyezera zomwe amalonda akugwiritsa ntchito zida zathu zimapimidwa maiko akunja kotero ndife wothekera kuyeza zida za amalonda onse mdziko muno adatero muyila 
  tikukambatu masikero oyeza zamadzi katundu wolemera zipangizo zakuchipatala zomwe timazipima zisanayambe kugwira ntchito zikhale zili pamlingo wabwino adatero muyila 
  adati amalonda amene amaphika kupanga katundu wosiyanasiyana ayenera aonetsetse zipangizo zawo zapimidwa bungweli 
  izitu zimalankhulidwa pamene bungweli lidaitana amalonda kumsonkhano wa zopimapima womwe umachitikira mumzinda wa blantyre lachiwiri msabatayi 
  muyila adati posakhalitsa bungwe lake likhala likuyenda mmidzi akapime masikero amene mavenda akugwiritsa ntchito 
  tsiku lomwe tikupita sitinena kuopa kuwachenjeza mavendawo tiyenda paliponse kupima masikero adatero 
  woona za kapangidwe ka katundu kampani ya candlex ltd aaron nkhoma yemwe adalinawo mkumanowo adati zokambiranazo zidali zothandiza 
  sikelo ikhale pamlingo tidziwa zoyenera popanga katundu wathu sopo tidziwe kukula kwa sopo amene kupanga adatero nkhoma

Text:
akufuna mwana akufuna mwana zikomo gogo banja mwamuna wanga lidatha 2011 ndidapeza mwamuna wina yemwe timamvana tidakayezetsa komwe adatipeza tilibe kachilombo koyambitsa edzi vuto lakuti bwenzi langalo limakonda zogonana limandiletsa za kulera wina adandiuza bwenzi langalo lili mkazi nditamufunsa adakana tsiku lina ndidaimba foni 5 koloko mbandakucha ndidamva kulira kwa mwana wakhanda nditamufunsa adakana adati wa khomo loyandikana nalo nadula foni yomweyo ndizimukondabe r chiradzulu r mwakumana chilombo cha bodza wakunamizani akufuna mwana chonsecho pansi mtima akudziwa akakupatsani mwana adzakuthawani nkupitiriza mkazi wakunamizaninso mwana amalira woyandikana nawo nyumba zili zoona adadula foni asakutayitseni ameneyo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi ndimamupitirira wawagogo ndili zaka 17 pali mnyamata wina wa zaka 20 yemwe akundifuna ndimamukonda vuto lakuti iyeyo wamfupi kuposa ndimachita manyazi ndikamayenda naye ndimulole c c sindikuonapo vuto loti musamulolere kutalika kukhale nkhani chikondi chimachoka mumtima sichiyenera kuona wina wamtali wamfupi woonda wonenepa woona wosaona zina zotero chabwino nchiyani mudzapeze mnyamata wamtali kukuposani alibe chikondi mwamuna ameneyu yemwe amakukondani nanunso mukumukonda muloleni ameneyo basi 
  amakonda ndalama anatchereza ndakhala paubwenzi msungwana wina vuto lake akuoneka wokonda ndalama tikangokumana amandipempha ndalama timalankhulana zambiri pafoni mwezi ukangotha amati tikumane kodi ichi chikondi m lilongwe 
  m ameneyo sakuthandizani mkazi woika ndalama patsogolo si wabwino taonani akuonetsa mawanga ake muli pachibwenzi nanga mukadzakwatirana zidzatha mudzaona pakati mwezi mavuto okhaokha mbanja ukangotha mwezi sikusekerera kuchitsakano kwake mpeweni 
  mtendere palibe kuyambira pomwe tidalowa mbanja sitinathe mwezi tili pamtendere amati si mwamuna amene ankakhumba iyetu wobadwanso mwatsopano akati agwe pemphero mukhoza kuona ayi amapemphera uyu amati zivute zitani tidzasiyana basi kodi ndidikire adzandisiye ndilowere kwanga inetu ndimamukonda m blantyre

Text:
chitetezo chalowa nthenya mmalawi akulanga okha amene akuwaganizira kuba uyu chitetezo mdziko muno chaphwasuka akuyenda mwamantha pamene akuphedwa katundu akubedwa molapitsa 
  sabata yangothayi zigawenga 8 zakhapa mfumu chisesele ku madziabango mboma la blantyre mpaka kuipha kubanso ndalama mafoni nako ku ntchisi zigawenga zakhapa wina mpaka kupha lachitatu msabatayi 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc izitu zikutsatira kuphedwa kwa awiri mboma la dedza awiri mboma la ntcheu zomwe zapangitsa chiwerengero cha ophedwa miyezi ya june july yokha chifike 51 
  mmadera blantyre lilongwe mzuzu ayamba kulanga okha agwira wakuba posakhulupiriranso apolisi 
  mmiyezi yomweyi chaka chatha chiwerengero cha amene adaphedwa ulamuliro wa pp chidalinso chokwera 
  wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa polisi mdziko muno mable msefula akutsimikiza 51 ndiwo aphedwa mmiyezi iwiriyi mwezi wa july sudathe 
  mwa amene aphedwawa zikusonyeza ambiri akuphedwera mmalo omwera mowa mwachitsanzo ku ntchisi wina waphedwa mnzake atasemphana chichewa adatero msefula poyankha tamvani msabatayi 
  nduna ya zachitetezo paul chibingu yati boma ndilokhumudwa nkhani zophanazi kuba katundu komwe kwafika ponyanya 
  chibingu wati akuchitira dala umbandawu malinga kwa boma wachenjeza wina aona mbwadza 
  angopezerapo mwayi cha kwa boma akuchita mwadala unduna wanga ukudziwa sitikugona kufuna kupeza njira zothanirana mchitidwewu amene akuchita adziwe aona polekera adatero chibingu pouza tamvani sadanene zomwe unduna ukuchita pofuna kuthana umbanda umbava 
  chibingu adati asataye mtima cholinga cha boma la dpp nkuti likhwimitse chitetezo chomwe chamasuka 
  kubwera kwa dpp kudapereka chiyembekezo chitetezo chibwereranso mdziko muno malinga momwe chipanichi chidachitira panthawi yomwe chimalamula 
  pulezidenti wakale yemwenso adali mtsogoleri wa chipani cholamula cha dpp malemu bingu wa mutharika adalamula apolisi aziombera kupheratu zimbalangodo zoba mfuti lamuloli silidakomere omenyera ufulu wachibadwidwe umbanda umbava udacheperako kaamba koti zimbalangondo zidayamba kuopa 
  dpp chitengereninso boma may chaka chino ayamba kufika pakhomo masana kuopa zimbalangondo zomwe zikupha kuba katundu 
  chibingu akuti pakakhala kwa boma amalitosa dala aone ukali 
  akufuna kuyeserera tikudziwa akupanga dala apolisi athu ophunzitsidwa zida zonse alinazo boma la dpp labwera chitetezo zimenezi zitheka asadandaule 
  chipani cha pp chitangolowa mboma april 2012 chitetezo chidagwedezekanso september adayamba kupempha mtsogoleri wa nthawiyo joyce banda abwezeretse lamulo lowombera kupheratu shoot to kill lomwe lidakhazikitsidwa malemu mutharika 
  kodi dpp ibweretsanso lamuloli apolisi amakhala mfuti amadziwa yomwe angagwiritse ntchito sungawauze chochita mukawauza za shoot to kill amazitengera pena mosagwirizanso zomwe tikutanthauza chibingu adatero
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
katsoka mutu wa alakatuli ulakatuli limodzi mwa maluso omwe akuphukira kumene mdziko muno zaka zambiri zapitazo samatenga ndakatulo njira yofalitsira uthenga kuphunzitsa momwe zikukhalira pazaka zochepa zokha alakatuli mdziko muno atumphuka ambiri ayamba kukonda ndakatulo alakatuliwa adakhazikitsa bungwe lawo lomwe mtsogoleri felix njonjonjo katsoka steven pembamoyo adacheza naye motere katsoka ndidayamba 1994 tandiuza dzina lako komwe umachokera 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ndine felix njonjonjo katsoka ndimachokera mmudzi mwa chingamba mboma la ntcheu ndikukhala ku nkhotakota ndidaphunzira za uphunzitsi ndimagwira ntchito ya zaumoyo kumbali ya zakudya zamagulu 
  utsogoleri wa alakatuli udaulowa liti ndidauyamba mchaka cha 2009 malingana malamulo athu timayenera zisankho zaka zisanu 5 zilizonse moti panopa tili kalikiriki kuthamangathamanga tipeze ndalama zopangitsira nkhumano ina komwe tidzakhalenso zisankho 
  kodi bungwe limeneli lidayamba liti bungweli lidayamba mchaka cha 1997 pomwe alakatuli adakumana kubwalo la masewero la kamuzu stadium mwa akatakwe omwe adali kumeneko laurent namarakha malemu aubrey nazombe edward chitseko malemu george chiingeni 4 september 1998 bungweli lidalembetsedwa kunthambi ya kalembera wa mabungwe 
  cholinga chake nchiya cholinga cha bungweli kufuna kutukula luso la ulakatuli mmalawi muno kufuna kufalitsa mauthenga kuphunzitsa kudzera mndakatulo momwe amachitira azisudzo oyimba 
  iweyo udayamba liti ndakatulo   ndidayamba ulakatuli mchaka cha 1994 ndili pasukulu ya sekondale ya likuni boys 
  uli masomphenya anji ndakatulo mmalawi muno masomphenya anga akuti ndakatulo zidzafike pabizinesi momwe maluso alili zidzatheke mpofunika kupeza akatswiri oti adzatithandize moti boma mabungwe atalowererapo zikhoza kutithandiza kwambiri njira ina yakuti alakatuli onse azilembetsa ntchito zawo kubungwe la cosoma tizitha chithunzithunzi chenicheni cha chiwerengero cha alakatuli omwe tili nawo
Label: ARTS AND CRAFTS

Text:
nam yapindulanji   tigresses bungwe la malawi national council of sports tsopano layeretsa timu ya tigresses nam ndiyo yolakwa pankhani yoti timuyi ichotsedwe mchikho cha presidential initiative for sports idaseweretsa wotupa mchombo 
  tithokoze chilungamo chadziwika timuyi ipikisanabe mchikho cha apulezidenti 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc tilangizeko nam sibwino zinthu mwa nkhwidzi zigamulo zinazi tiyeni tizilowa mmalamulo zikusokoneza 
  taonani chikho cha apulezidenti chidayima pamene timati tikupseda onaninso osewera timuyi asiyidwa ku australia ndalama zawonongeka mwasokoneza timu ya lino 
  nam sibwino kumaonetsa poyera matimu amene mumakwera timu yapamtima sikoletsedwa zimafunika matimu onse azithandizidwa mofanana 
  zotere musadzachitenso aka kakhale komaliza pajatu timuyi ili panambala yoyamba africa muno ndiye sitikufuna ichoke pamenepo mwaphunzirapo kanthu chonde sinthani kusanade 
  tifunire zabwino zonse timu ya lino yomwe ili mdziko la australia kukapikisana matimu anayi mary waya griffin saenda gwirani ntchito osewera 12 mwatengawo tikuyembekezera zabwino 
  aganyu msabatayi timakambirana za mphunzitsi wabwino mdziko muno zikuonetsa aphunzitsi odziwa ntchito alipo amene mwina utawapatsa mwayi atha kunyamula flames 
  aganyu ambiri akukambabe za mphunzitsi wakale kinnah phiri ndiye wabwino akukamba za elijah kananji wa blantyre united pamene fam ikusakasaka mphunzitsi wa flames chonde tawunguzani mdziko muno
Label: SPORTS

Text:
maphunziro chidyerano cha chimbudzi athandiza moyo wasintha kamphepo kayaziyazi kakudutsa tsopano mmidzi 13 yozungulira dera la t njewa ku lilongwe atasintha khalidwe lochitira chimbudzi paliponse nkuyamba kugwiritsa ntchito zimbudzi 
  zaka 51 chilandirireni ufulu odzilamulira kuderali amadalirabe tchire kuseli kwa mitengo akafuna kudzithandiza kufikira pomwe bungwe la plan international lidawafikira maphunziro akuipa kochitira chimbudzi paliponse 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka bungweli lidaphunzitsa anthuwa akamachitira chimbudzi paliponse ndiye akuchita chidyerano cha zopambukazo pakati wina mnzake zomwe zingawabweretsere matenda otsegula mmimba mmapapo kaamba kafungo loipa 
  njewa adatsimikiza kwanthawi yaitali mdera lake samadziwa kufunika kwa chimbudzi mmimba mukafunda amangolowa patchire nkukadzithandiza adati pachifukwachi mderali mumabuka matenda osiyanasiyana pafupipafupi 
  padalibe zoti wamkulu mwana ayi amati akamva mmimba kokapumira kudali kutchire ndiye padalibe zaulemu zina mwana amatha kupezerera wamkulu akudzipeputsa matenda samati abwera liti adatero njewa 
  adati zina alendo amadziwira fungo afika mdera la njewa chimbudzi chidali ponseponse mpaka liti adatero njewa 
  adati zina alendo amadziwira fungo afika mdera la njewa chimbudzi chidali ponseponse mpaka kumachita nkhawa poyenda mtchire kuopa kuponda chimbudzi cha munthu wina choyamba adafotokozera anthuwo amadyerana chimbudzi pazomwe amachitazo 
  mlongoti adafotokoza zidawatengera miyezi iwiri amvetsetse momwe amadyera chimbudzi cha anzawocho atamvetsetsa adayamba kukumba zimbudzi zomwe akugwiritsa ntchito 
  lidali dera lomvetsa chisoni kwambiri pankhani yaukhondo poona tivutika kumvana nawo msanga tidagwiritsa ntchito chionetsero
Label: WILDLIFE/ENVIRONMENT

Text:
chipatala cha pirimiti chasankhidwa chizisunga odwala nthenda ya covid-19 chipatala cha pirimiti chomwe cha mpingo wa katolika dayosizi ya zomba chasankhidwa boma chikhale malo osungira omwe angapezeke kachirombo ka coronavirus 
 wa chipatalachi sister mary njukuna atsimikiza za nkhaniyi poyankhula radio maria malawi 
 ati padakali ntchito yokonza malowa ilimkati ayamba kugwira ntchito posachedwapa pamene boma bungwe la save the children alonjedza athandiza zipangizo zogwiritsira ntchito mabedi ma face mask ma glovesi zina zambiri 
 pirimiti inasankhiswa boma ikhale isolation center padakali siinayambe kutero popeza zipangizo sizinafike anatero sister njukuna 
 ati akuyemnekezera kulandira chithandizochi ku boma kwa mabungwe omwe si aboma
Label: HEALTH

Text:
papa apemphelera bata mdziko la cameroon wolemba thokozani chapola p content uploads/2019/09 pp.jpg alt= width="580 height="328 />papa ulendo wa africa mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisko wati khumbo lake mavuto ndale mdziko la cameroon athe kudzera zokambirana 
 papa fransisko walankhula la mulungu ku likulu la mpingowu ku vatican atatha mapemphero amasana mthenga wa mnjelo 
 wati khumbo lake zokambirana zomwe zayamba lolemba mdziko la cameroon zomwe zothandiza kubweretsa umodzi mtendere mdzikolo 
 pamenepa wapempha onse apempherere mtendere mavuto omwe okhudza kusamvana nkhani za ndale omwe akhala akuchitika mdzikomo kwa zaka zambiri athetsedwe ptsatira zokambiranazo 
 mtsogoleri wa dzikolo paul biya amene wadzichepetsa kuyitanitsa msonkhano wa zokambirana zofuna kuthetsa kusamvana nkhani za ndale komwe kwakhala kukuchitika mdziko la cameroon
Label: RELIGION

Text:
tauni ya mangochi idakali misewu ya fumbi wolemba thokozani chapola phungu wa ya malamulo wadera la pakati mboma la mangochi victoria kingstone wadandaula kaamba ka kuipa kwa misewu yozungulira tawuni ya mangochi 
 kingstone ndapempha kale ku boma nduna alonjeza akonza misewuyi padakali misewuyi ya fumbi ya mvula imakhala matope kaamba koti ilibe phula zomwe malinga sizoyenera tawuni yomwe posachedwapa ikhale mzinda 
 pamenepa wati wakambirana unduna woona za maboma aangono chitukuko chakumidzi misewuyi ikonzedwe poyika phula 
 nditapita ku nyumba ya malamulo ndinapempha olemekezeka ben phiri omwe nduna za maboma aangono andiyankha kale mzaka zikubwerazi misewu yonse ya boma ikhala tala anatero kingstone kingstone amalankhula msonkhano womwe anachititsa sukulu ya pulaimale ya milambe womwe cholinga chake chinali kuthokoza omwe anamusankha udindowu 
 wati zimenezi zithandizanso popititsa patsogolo ntchito zokopa alendo mbomalo polingaliranso boma lili malingaliro omanga hotela yapamwamba bwalo la ndege mbomalo 
 zikudza patapita pafupifupi chaka pomwe ochita bizinesi ya kabaza mbomalo anachita ziwonetsero pofuna kukakamiza akuluakulu khonsoloyo akonze misewu yozungulira tauniyi zomwe sizinachitikebe mpakana padakalipano 
 za tsikuli wati anawona koyenera apite ku dera kwake kukathokoza omwe anamusankha udindowu kudya kusangalala nawo limodzi achita miyambo ya imeneyi mmalo onse oponyera voti dera lake omwe alipo okwana 25 
 patsikuli mwazina anakumbutsanso anthuwa za malonjezo ake omwe akuchita nyengo yokopa azamuvotere zomwe anawatsimikizira zichitikadi 
 chimodzi mwa icho ndinawalonjeza amayi theka la malipiro anga lizipita kwa iwowo ndikuwatsimikizira ndalama zomwe zikubwera mwezi uno theka lake ndiwapatsa azichitira bizinesi anatero kingstone
Label: POLITICS

Text:
dpp udf asayinira mgwirizano zipani za united democratic front udf democratic progressive dpp zati zokonzeka kugwilira ntchito limodzi potukula la malawi 
 muluzi kumanzere mutharika kusonyeza mgwirizano wawo zipanizi zanena lachiwiri yachifumu ku lilongwe pomwe zimasayinirana mgwirizano zigwilira ntchito limodzi pamene akukonzekera chisankho cha pulezident chomwe chichitike 19 may chaka chino 
 atsogoleri zipani ziwirizi peter mutharika atupele muluzi ati okonzeka kugwilira ntchito limodzi kamba koti zipani zawo zimatsatira zofanana 
 amayi dpp udf kuvinira limodzi 3 february chaka chino bwalo la milandu ya zamalamulo linalamula chisankho chomwe chinachitika mdziko muno 21 may chaka chatha chosavomerezeka chichitikenso pasanathe masiku 150 patsikuli nyumba ya malamulo yagwirizana chisankhochi chichitike 19 may 2020
Label: POLITICS

Text:
gulani mbewu kwa ogulitsa ovomerezekaunduna unduna wa malimidwe walangiza alimi ayenera kugula mbewu kwa ogulitsa ovomerezeka okha poopa kugulitsidwa mbewu zoonongeka 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza mlembi wamkulu muundunawu erica maganga wati alimi aike patsogolo mbewu zopezeka msitolo mabungwe amene adalembetsa ku undunawu 
  alimi ayenera kugula mbewu malo ovomerezeka okha kugulitsa mbewu popanda chilolezo chochoka ku undunawu mlandu waukulu 
  mbewu iyenera kugulitsidwa okhawo mgwirizano kampani zopanga mbewu 
  ogulitsa mbewu otere amaphunzitsidwa za kagulitsidwe ka mbewuzo kasungidwe kake adatero maganga 
  malinga maganga ogulitsa mbewu ovomerezeka amalandira chiphaso chogulitsira mbewu chomwe chimagwira ntchito kwa chaka chimodzi 
  adati onse ofuna kugulitsa mbewu ayenera kulembera kalata ku nthambi yoona za mbewu muundunawu ya seed certification and control unit 
  ogulitsa amene sakwaniritsa ndondomeko zomwe amapatsidwa pogulitsa mbewu amalandidwa chiphasocho cholinga chachikulu nchakuti alimi azigula mbewu zovomerezeka zomwe sizidaonongeke adatero maganga
Label: FARMING

Text:
papa wasankha woona zachuma ku vatican mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wasankha wa bungwe loyangana momwe chuma chiyendera ku likulu la mpingo ku vatican 
 malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa francisco wasankha giuseppe schlitzer kulowa mmalo mwa tommaso di russa yemwe yake yokhalira udindowu inatha mwezi wa january chaka chonchino 
 likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku vatican lalengeza za kusankhidwa kwa akuluakulu awiri oyanganira bungwe la mpingowu loona momwe chuma chiyendera 
 wa bungweli lomwe limadziwika chingerezi financial intelligence authority giuseppe schlitzer womutsatira federico antellini russo 
 awiriwa akulowa mmalo mwa tommaso di russa yemwe adatsiriza ntchito yake 20 january chaka chonchino atakhala udindowu kwa zaka zisanu 
 mwa zina bungweli limalimbana machitidwe wozembetsa ndalama money laundering 
 papa benedicto wa 16 ndiyemwe adakhazikitsa bungwe la financial intelligence authority mchaka cha 2010 liziona momwe ndalama zimagwiritsidwira ntchito ku likulu la mpingo ku vatican ndondomeko za chuma zomwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika limatsata nzogwirizana momwe mabungwe maiko achitira
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
aganyu okhala ziphaso mwa zina zidabweretsa woti tawuni ya limbe imalira ochenjera kuberedwa kwa katundu munthu yemwe udamukhulupirira akunyamulire wa ganyu tsopano padepoti ya fumbi pali dongosolo lowumbanso chikhulupiriro chomwe chidagumuka pakati aganyu mabwana madona temwa mhone adakumana kassimu sitande wa anyamatawa adacheza motere sitande wachitatu kumanja mwa aganyu akutanthauza anyamatawa ponena ovomerezeka   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu nkhani ya chiphaso ichi chilolezo chawo ganyu padepoti ya fumbi ino mabwana madona asadere nkhawa katundu wawo asowetsedwa 
  ganyu mpaka ziphaso tilipo 34 ndiye umboni wogwirika umafunika osati kungoyankhula waganyu zongodziwana zimene zatiyika mmavuto kwambiri zaka zapitazo kwina kulibe dongosololi ntchito unzika wa zimafuna chiphaso ndithu 
  fotokozani zifukwa zokhazikitsira ziphaso pakati panu akhulupirire si okuba uku kukhwimitsa chitetezo cha mabwana madona waganyu kubwezeretsa chikhulupiriro mwa aganyu wothandiza limbe muno kunyamula katundu wawo kumbukirani vakabu yakhala ikutivuta kulepheretsa kupeza ndalama zochuluka apolisi ankatimanga pamlanduwu womwe timayenera kulipa ndalama zambiri sakutinyamulitsanso katundu iyinso njira yoti azidziwa wanyamula katundu cholinga choti akathawa apezeke mosavuta bwana atenge chiphaso amubwezere wa ganyu akafika komwe amapita kumulipira tikubweretsa dongosolo 
  mkalabongo umakuchotsani ulemu iyayi zimenezo zakale zomwe zatsala aganyu osati pofika popanga ziphaso ndife ana odziwa dongosolo loweruka 2 koloko masana timakhala maphunziro mmene tingalemekezere mwini katundu amwe mkalabongo amadziwa kasitomala ofuna ulemu apeze yomwera mawa chakudya cha mabwana madona akanyamulitsa katundu adziwe dzina la mnyamata zimapezeka pachiphasochi akachitidwa chipongwe akuyenera kubwera athandizidwe 
  zidatani mupange gululi kusiyanitsa akuba aganyu lidalinso khumbo lomathandizana muzilinganizo zina mavuto mukudziwa maliro amafuna ndalama zambiri ndiye tidaganiza zomatengera wodwala kumudzi kwawo zikavuta abale apepukidwe kuzondana wina akadwala ya vakabu ija timasonkherana ndalama yokawombola mnzathu akamangidwa kupolisi 
  chiyani chomuyenereza munthu waganyu chidwi chonyamula basi abwere kuofesi amve malamulo akagwirizana nawo mfulu 
  chiyani anyamatawa akusiya ziphaso poweruka iyi njira imodzi yoteteza chiphaso angataye kuwabera kumowa akhonza kukaba kwina chipongwe pochitaya chiphaso kupachika mnyamata wathu ntchito timayamba 6 koloko mmawa yomwe timagawira ziphasozi kuweruka 5 koloko madzulo paja malo ano mlatho pamtsinje wa limbe athu amachitidwanso chipongwe ndiye timaweruka 5 koloko zisatikhudze za chifwambazo 
  ofesi yanu imachitanso chiyani timagwira ntchito mabungwe osiyanasiyana polimbikitsa anyamatawa kuyezetsa magazi okwatira kumalera tili dongosolo lopereka peshoni k4 000 kwa waganyu yemwe adakula 15 mwezi uliwonse asachite kusowa ya sopo ndalamazi zomwe mamembala timapereka sabata pakadalipano tikudikira yankho kupolisi ya limbe pempho lathu logwira nawo ntchito pokhwimitsa chitetezo 
  mavuto omwe mumakumana nawo ati kukanika kwa kutipatsa ntchito cha zikhomo adakumana nazo kale amatinyozanso kuiwala tonse sitingakhale mabwana sitizitengera podziwa mulungu amatithokoza kaamba ka madongosolo obweretsa bata limbe
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
mnyamata asiya sukulu cha mantha makhumbira atakhala msirikali popanda moyo ntchitoyi singatheke lero christopher robert mnyamata wachialubino wasankha kaye moyo posiya sukulu yomwe ati ikadamuphetsa 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu zochitika 6 may 2016 pamene mnyamata wina wosamudziwa adafika pasukulu pawo kudzamutenga zomwe zachititsa thupi la christopher lichite tsembwe mantha moyo ukhoza pachiswe walembera aphunzitsi ake wasiya sukulu 
  mphunzitsi wamkulu pasukulu ya mwatonga kwa t kasumbu mboma la dedza wauza msangulutso patsikulo mnyamata wina adafika pasukulupo nkunena watumidwa kudzamutenga christopher wa zaka 18 yemwe kalasi 6 akumufuna kupolisi ya dedza 
  amati watumidwa nditaimba kupolisi adandiuza ndimumange ndidaterodi adatero mphunzitsiyu felix mussa 
  akuti moyo uli pachiopsezo christopher adatsagana ake christopher achitetezo cha mmudzi ulendo kupolisi komwe ati adakadzidzimuka akuuzidwa amupepese mnyamatayo chomunjata popanda 
  limodzi christopher achitetezo tidamupepesa adamumasula pomwepo adatero mussa 
  mnyamatayo yemwe wabisinesi adauza msangulutso adati ndikatenge amfumu makolo mwana mwanayo abwere kupolisi adzafunse zina zina amati kwawo kudapitako amene ankafuna akamube adatero 
  mathedwe nkhaniyi adatutumutsa christopher mantha adayanga thupi lake nchifukwa adaganiza zolembera mphunzitsi wamkuluyu sukulu waisiya 
  zikomo ahedi muli kudziwitsidwa ndayamba ndasiya sukulu cha nkhani yomwe inachitika lachisanu ndiye ndaona sindingathe kuphunzira ndingathe kumakhala maganizo poweruka ndimakhala ndekha ndiye njira ndiyaitali chosadziwika chondichitikra munjiramu pamene ndili ndekha paja poyamba ndinafotokoza kale ndiye panopa ndili pankhawa pangakhale kusamvetsa pazomwe ndanenazi munene tsiku ndibwere tidzakhambirane zimene ndinafuna kudziwitsani zomwezi ndine christopher ikutero kalaya yomwe adalemba christopher 
  mtolankhani wa msangulutso atamupeza kunyumbako kudali kovuta alankhulane naye 
  adadzitsekera mnyumba ahedi mussa amfumu achibale adamuuza asaope adakanitsitsa poganiza mtolankhaniyu wabwera kudzamuba 
  padatha mphindi 30 christopher adatuluka ake atakambira naye nkhope yakugwa adakhala patali mtolankhaniyu 
  ndili wachisoni ndasiya sukulu ndimakhumbira nditakhala msirikali basi sindidzakhalanso msirikali sukulu ndasiya adayamba kufotokoza christopher amene adakhala nambala 4 mkalasi teremu yatha 
  adati sakuganizanso atabwerera kusukulu chilungamo sichidayende pankhani yake 
  andiphere pakhomo kusiyana akandiphere kusukulu zidandipatsa mantha ndidaganiza zolemba kalatayo ndasiya sukulu nakonso kukwaya sindikupita ndikungodzitsekera mnyumbamu adatero christopher amene ake banja lidatha ake 
  wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa polisi ya dedza cassim manda adavomera mnyamata amene adapita kusukulu ya christopher adamutulutsa adamangidwa mlandu wosaudziwa 
  tifufuze kaye ndiye tamutulutsa kungoti pali zomwe zidachitika ndiye tikufufuza adatero manda ponena sangayankhe mafunso ambiri pafoni pamaso 
  mutu weniweni wa nkhaniyi sukudziwika bwinobwino christopher akuti sabwereranso kusukulu komwe amayenda makilomita 7 kuchoka kwawo 
  padakalipano mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika wapempha amipingo athandizepo wopha kusowetsa achialubino otheretu
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
ambuye stima apempha akatolika apewe nawo ziwawa ndale episkopi wa mpingo wa katolika dayosizi ya mangochi ambuye montfort stima wapempha akhristu mpingowu apewe kupezeka mmagulu omwe akulimbikitsa zipolowe zokhudza ndale mdziko muno 
 stima mkatolika asapezeke mmagulu ochita ziwawa ambuye stima anena pakutha mwambo wa misa ya chaka cha utatu woyera yomwe anatsogolera lamulungu ku tchalitchi la st john yomwe nthambi ya kausi parish dayosiziyo 
 ati mkhristu wa mpingo wa katolika akuyenera kudziwa chifanizo cha mulungu mwa muli mulungu atate mulungu mwana mulungu mzimu woyera kotero sakuyenera kumapezeka mmagulu ochita chisokonezo kulimbika ntchito yothandiza kudzetsa bata mtendere 
 mkatolika sakuyenera kumapezeka nawo mmagulu opanga ziwawa amakhulupilira mulungu amayenera kuonetsa mtima wachikondi wolezerana wofunira zabwino anatero ambuye stima 
 ambuye stima apemphanso akhristu akhale odzetsa umodzi malo paliponse pomwe amapezeka

Text:
kwaipa ku chipatala mankhwala atha mwa mankhwala 100 amene amayenera kupezeka mzipatala za boma asanu okha ndiwo alipo nduna ya zaumoyo catherine gotani hara idatero ku lilongwe lolemba 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc polankhula akulandira mankhwala osiyanasiyana ndalama zokwanira k170 miliyoni ku bungwe la americares gotani hara adati kusowa mankhwala mzipatala za boma kwankitsa 
  mankhwala akusowa chonchi chigulireni mankhwala ochuluka 2009 boma silinagulenso mankhwala awa adali mankhwala okwanira chaka chimodzi idatero ndunayo 
  kusowa mankhwala kwafika pena mpaka madotolo 15 adalembera kalata mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda achitepo kanthu zakusowa kwa mankhwala akumwalira nthenda zochizika 
  woyanganira nkhokwe za mankhwala feston kaupa adati mankhwala afikawo sachedwa kutha aperekedwa kwa amene samalandira mmbuyomu 
  wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe oona za umoyo la malawi health equity network mehn martha kwataine naye adati zanyanya adati walembera komiti ya zaumoyo younikira za bajeti ku nyumba ya malamulo alingalire zakuti zipatala zikuluzikulu zizingopereka mankhwala nthenda za mgonagona basi
Label: HEALTH

Text:

 wapampando wopuma wa bungwe li paul chibwana wanena polankhula radio maria malawi pambuyo msonkhano wawo waukulu omwe unachitikira ku st patricks parish ku area 18 mzinda wa lilongwe 
 malinga chibwana kusonkhana kwa achinyamatawa kumathandiza kwambiri pakuzamitsa moyo wauzimu wathupinso kaamba kaziphunzitso zosiyanasiyana zomwe zimakhala ku mabungwe wa

Text:
akakhala ku ndende zaka 7 kamba ka mmemo by thokozani chapola bwalo lachiwiri la milandu ku limbe mzinda wa blantyre lalamula wina wa zaka 22 chikondi lester akakhale ku ndende kukagwira ntchito ya kalavulagaga kwa zaka zisanu ziwiri kamba komu peza olakwa mulandu wovulaza mzake kamba ka mmemo 
 malinga wapolisi wotengera milandu ku khoti polisi ya limbe ian ntaba anauza bwalo la milandu 8 june gulu la anthuwa linkagwira ganyu nsika wa machinjiri ya nkhomaliro itakwana adagwilizana asonkhe briton mchetsera wa zaka 24 zakubadwa sanakwanitse kusonkha analoledwa adye nawo chakudyacho zomwe zinakwiyitsa lester anafika pokankha kuvulaza mzawoyi pomugenda duka 
 akufuna kwa omwe anatengera bamboyu kuchipatala cha queen elizabeth komwe anakathandiza yi

Text:
papa achita misa yokumbukira ulendo wokacheza chilumba cha lampedusa mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco lachitatu likudzali achita misa yokumbukira ulendo wokacheza chilumba cha lampedusa 
 malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa achita misa yi 8 july 2020 pokumbukira patha zaka zisanu ziwiri pomwe anakacheza chilumba cha lampedusa mdziko la italy patangopita miyezi yochepa atamusankha papa 13 march 2013 papa francisco anakacheza chilumba cha lampedusa mdziko la italy 8 july 2013 uwu unali ulendo woyamba kunja kwa mzinda wa rome 
 zikutanthauza chaka chino padutsa zaka zisanu ziwiri papa francisco atakacheza chilumbachi 
 likulu la mpingo wa katolika lonse vatican lalengeza tsikuli lachitatu 8 july 2020 papayu achita misa yokumbukira ulendo wokacheza chilumba cha lampedusa 
 papa francisco achita misayi mtchalichi lalingono la casa santa marta ku vatican 
 malinga mliri wa coronavirus ochepa chabe omwe akhale nao misayi yomwe ikuyembekezeka kuyamba 11 koloko mmawa ya ku rome malawi 
 zadziwika ogwira ntchito office yomwe imaona za chitukuko cha thunthu cha munthu ku likulu la mpingowu dicastery for promoting integral human development omwe akhale nao misayi popeza nkhani ya othawa kwao zifukwa zosiyana siyana ili pansi officeyi 
 katolika lonse la pansi mwayi wotsatira misayi wayilesi ya kanema makina intaneti 
 ulendo wa papa francisco wokacheza chilumba cha lampedusa udaonetsa poyera chidwi chomwe papayu nacho nkhani ya othawa kwao zifukwa zosiyana siyana 
 chilumba cha lampedusa chimalandira othawa mmaiko zifukwa zosiyana siyana ambiri ochokera mmaiko ku africa 
 papa francisco adaganiza zokacheza chilumbachi atawerenga nkhani zomvetsa chisoni za ochokera ku africa omwe amayenda ulendo wa utali madzi pokasakasaka moyo wina ku maiko ku ulaya ambiri anthuwa amafera mnjira 
 chilumba cha lampedusa papayu adachita misa adaponya nkhata ya maluwa mmadzi nyanja ya mediterranean pokumbukira onse omwe amamira madzi ulendo wopita ku chilumbachi 
 malinga malipoti 3 october mchaka cha 2013 oposa 360 omwe amachokera ku libya anamira nyanja ya mediterranean asanafike chilumba cha lampedusa
Label: RELIGION

Text:
chipani cha dpp chilimbikitsa bata pambuyo chigamulo mwa akuluakulu chipani cha democratic progressive dpp mwayi kamuyambeni wapempha otsatira chipanichi adzavomereze chigamulo cha bwalo la milandu nkhani yokhudza chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa 
 apemphedwa adzasunge bata otsatira chipani cha dpp kamuyambeni yemwenso phungu wa dera la kumadzulo kwa boma la ntcheu amalankhula lachisanu mmudzi mwa eneya mdera la mfumu kwataine mwambo wokondwelera kutsanzikana chaka cha 2019 
 wati pempho lake adzagwirizane chigamulochi la malawi lipitilire la bata mtendere 
 polankhulaponso mosiyana wa achinyamata mchipani cha democratic progressive dpp mchigawo chakumvuma kwa lino steven bamusi apempha achinyamata onse mchigawochi adzalemekeze malamulo kupewa ziwawa yomwe bwalo la milandu lidzapereke chigamulo chake nkhani yokhudza zotsatira za chisankho cha president 
 bamusi omwenso khansala wa dera la mbedza mzinda wa zomba ati zimenezi zomwe akuluakulu oyanganira achinyamata mchipanichi mzigawo zonse za lino agwirizana raphael likaka analankhula bamusi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
akwizinga wogwirira wamisala apolisi ya kanengo ku lilongwe anjata wa zaka 46 nelson chiudzu pomuganizira adagwirira mai wa zaka 49 maria 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu apolosi ati abale mai ogwiririrayo adagwira chiudzu akuchotsa ulemu maiyo nkumutengera kupolisi akuyembekezera kukaonekera kubwalo la milandu kukayankha mlandu ogonana munthu wamisala zomwe zimatsutsana ndime 139 ya malamulo lino 
  mtambo zalakwika nzoonadi tamumanga sitidapeze cholinga chake chidali chiyani mlandu walembedwa kale moti iliyonse akaonekera kubwalo la milandu zomwe adachitazo adatero mneneri wapoliasi ya kanengo laban makalani 
  wati chiudzu wauza apolisi wakhala paubwenzi wamseri mai wozungulira mutuyo kuyambira mwezi wa december 2017 ati samaona cholakwika chilichonse pazomwe amachitazo 
  oona za ufulu wa timothy mtambo wadzudzula mchitidwewu maiyo saganiza akhoza kulola chilichonse osadziwa zotsatira zake 
  ichi nchifukwa chake boma lidakhazikitsa malamulo munthu wa nzeru zake sangagone kupanga ubwenzi wamisala mwana sadziwa chomwe akuchita adatrero mtambo 
  adati alunga udindo oyanganira olumala omwe wamisala mgulu alungawo akuyambitsa nkhanza oyenera kuwaterewo ndiye miyoyo ufulu wawo zili pachiopsezo 
  mtambo wati abale amisala akuyenera maso komwe mbale wawoyo akupita kulowera oyipa mtima amawapezerera komwe okhaokha amadziwa alibe mphamvu yokana chilichonse 
  mai asina rajab mboma la salima ati zina nkhanza zotere siziyamba cha chilakolako chokha zikhulupiriro zomwe asinganga amanamiza ofuna kukhwima 
  adati munthu wamisala mwana yemwe sangathe kudzisamalira yekha mkazi ndiye zimadabwitsa abambo amalimba mtima nkumagona munthu otereyo osalingalira za ukhondo mkazi 
  pamoyo wa mkazi pamachitika zambiri amayenera kudzisamalira mwapadera tsono zimadabwitsa abambo saona zimenezi mpaka kumagona naye sichabe ayi pali zifukwa zina adatero rajab

Text:
akhumudwa kutsika kwa nandolo alimi nandolo mboma la mulanje ati nkhawa kutsika mtengo kwa nandolo modzidzimutsa pamsika zomwe zikukayikitsa alimiwo apindule naye chaka chino 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mwa alimiwo henry kapalasa wa mmudzi mwa chabwera kwa t mabuka mbomalo adati nandolo watsika mtengo kwambiri padakalipano zomwe alimi sadayembekezere zingatero popeza malonda adayamba mmadera ambiri 
  pamene akolola nandolo wina akadali mmunda aume kapalasa yemwe gogo wa zilumika zoposa 90 adati chiyembekezo chake mbewuyo chayamba kumira mmadzi popeza lingaliro loti apeza makwacha nkhaninkhani pakutha pamsikawo ayamba kukayikitsa 
  kuno alimi ambiri tapeza nandolo wochuluka tsopano tagwira njakata momwe zilili pamsika popeza miyezi yapitayi nandolo tinkagulitsa mtengo wa k600 kilogalamu tsopano lero wafika k300 kilo kutsika kotereku sikunachitikepo nkale lonse adatero kapalasa 
  akuganiza mchitidwewu nkubera alimi omwe amadalira ulimi wokhawo chaka apeze makwacha otukulira banja lake 
  chaka chino chimanga sichinachite kudera lino moti ambiri tayamba kale kukumana mavuto adzaoneni kukwera kwa mtengo wa chimanga popeza thumba la chimanga cholemera makilogalamu 50 lafika kale k12 000 maso athu adali nganganga nandolo mwina tikagulitsa tipeza ndalama zogulira chimanga pamenepa tasowa pogwira anadandaula 
  kapalasa akufunitsitsa boma likadalowererapo msanga ncholinga choti alimi apeze phindu lokwanira ulimiwo 
  gogoyo akuganiza kupanga magulu zingathandize alimiwo kupeza phindu lamnanu ulimiwo 
  alimi ambiri mboma la mulanje adakolola nandolo wochuluka ndiponso wina adakali mminda kulindira awume moyenera 
  masiku apitawo wa bungwe la alimi nandolo la nandolo association of malawi susan chimbayo adapempha alimi asagulitse msanga nandolo wawo akonze magulu azikagulitsa ku makampani kumene mtengo umakhalako
