Text:
kolondoloza mwambo wokaona mwana wa inkosi kumayambiriro kwa chaka chino angoni ochokera mboma la mzimba adali chimwemwe tsaya kaamba ka kubadwa kwa mwana wamwamuna kubanja lachifumu la inkosi ya makhosi mmbelwa ku edingeni mboma la mzimba mwa mwambo wa angoni mwanayu ndiye akuyembekezereka kudzalowa ufumuwu mtsogolo muno martha chirambo adacheza ndabazake thole mlembi wamkulu wa bungwe la mzimba heritage yemwe akulongosola za momwe mwambowu udayendera motere ndakupezani wawa ndamvetsedwa mudapita kokaona mphatso ku edingeni talongosolani kodi mwambowu umayenda   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka poyamba ndinene koyambirira kwa chaka chino angoni tidasangalala kwambiri kubadwa kwa mwana wa mwamuna kwa inkosi ya makhosi mmbelwa paja ufumu wa agonifetu timaupitiriza kubadwa kwa mwana wamwamuna kubanja lachifumu zikatero timakhala chikhulupiriro chonse ufumu upitirira timapemphera mwamphamvu mulungu amuteteze mwanayu 
  zikomo wawa pitirizani kulongosola za mwambowu tsopano 
  mwanayu atabadwa uthenga udatumizidwa kwa makhosi onse nditi mafumu onse achingoni ku ekwendeni elangeni ndinso ku emucisweni midzi ina yonse uthengawu udatipezanso 
  mutalandira uthenga mudachitapo tidayamba kutsata ndondomeko yake yoti tikaone mwanayu sikuti umangodzuka lero lero basi ndikukaona mwana ayi sititero ulendo wathu udali zolinga kukamuona mwanayu kukadziwa dzina lake kukapereka mphatso tidapempha kudzera kwa inkosi mpherembe yomwe mlembi wamkulu wa khonsolo ya mafumu mwa mmbelwa kupatula apo tidapemphanso kwa nduna ya komwe kulikulu ku edingeni yomwe idatiloleza tidabwereranso kwa mpherembe kukapemphanso chilolezo 
  yokaona mwana itakwana zidatani adatipatsa inkosikazi mtwalo ndiyo itsogorere ulendowu pajatu ntchito yokaona mwana imaimira kwambiri azimayinu mwa ichi pagulu lathu abambo tidalipo ochepa kulekana amayi 
  mwakambapo zokapereka mphatso mudanyamula mphatso zanji azimayi adatenga ufa shuga zina zina zokhudza mwana pomwe madoda tidanyamula kandiwo kake tidatenga mbuzi ndiwo nanga ufa umayenda wopanda ndiwo zake tsopano mutafika ku edingeni mudayambira pati madoda tidapereka malonje sitidakambeko kalikonse zokhudza kuona mwana pajatu tati ntchitoyi eniake enieni amayi inkosikazi ndiyo idafotokoza cholinga cha ulendowo womwe tidapita mzimba heritage ochokera ku mzuzu mzimba boma ku lilongwe apa tidapereka mphatso 
  mudapereka mwana musadamuone talongosolani pamenepa 
  iyo idali ya malonje chabe angoni tisadamuone mwana uja pamakhala mboni iyi ndalama yomwe timaika mmbale yosonyeza mtima wathudi tikufunitsitsa timuone mwanayu posakhalitsa amayi agogo ake aakazi mwana adatutuluka naye komatu tonse sitidamugwire kupatula inkosikazi uyu mwana wachifumu 
  zonsezi zimachitika musadadziwebe dzina eya udali mwambo wopatsa chidwitu wosangalatsa kwambiri tidaperekanso mboni ina tidziwe dzina makolo ake adatiuza londisizwe lomwe likutanthauza mtetezi wa mvikiliri wa charo mchitumbuka atangotchula dzina azimayi adalulutira kuvina bungwe tidayamba tsopano kutumiza mauthenga palamya paintaneti kwa abale abwenzi za dzina dzina la mwana wa inkosi ya makhosi sumangouzidwa basi pamakhala mboni momwe zidachitikiramo 
  kodi akadabadwa mwana wamkazi chisangalalo chikadakhala chimodzimodzi pachikhalidwe chathu akakhala mwana wamkazi zimapereka maganizo ndithu kwa poganizira ufumuwu salowa munthu wamkazi akakhala mtsikana timadziwa tsiku lina adzakwatiwa adzachoka pamudzi
Label: CULTURE

Text:
atsogoleri akwangula kampeni lero migwirizano ya zipani pachisankho chikudzachi zikuomba mkota wa za kampeni lero atsogoleri mmigwirizanoyo akhala mbweee kutolera mavoti otsalira 
  bungwe la chisankho la malawi electoral commission mec dzulo lidati misonkhano ya kampeni itsekedwa pokwana 6 koloko mawa mmawa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mutharika kumanzere chakwera ndiwo atengetsana kwambiri malingana woyanganira za kampeni mchipani cha malawi congress party mcp moses kunkuyu mtsogoleri wa mcp lazarus chakwera akhala pabwalo la masintha ku lilongwe pomwe othandizana naye mgwirizano wa tonse saulos chilima wa utm akhala ku blantyre 
  tikumbutse zathu tidadutsamo kale tikawakumbutse kuwatsimikizira takonzeka kulowa mboma adatero kunkuyu 
  lachinayi mgeme kalilani yemwe mneneri wa mtsogoleri wa mgwirizano wa dpp udf peter mutharika adati pulogalamu ya momwe mutharika akwangulire kampeni yake siyidatsimikizike 
  mutharika akupangira limodzi kampeni atupele muluzi wa udf yemwe wotsagana naye mumgwirizano wawo 
  panyengoyi migwirizano ya tonse alliance dpp udf zalonjeza zosiyanasiyana zachitukuko umoyo wabwino 
  mwa zina mgwirizano wa tonse alliance udatsindika zotsitsa mtengo wa feteleza kufika k4 500 thumba la makilogalamu 50 kulemba ntchito achinyamata omwe paulova zoyenereza kuthetsa wa tsankho kuyambitsa ndondomeko yoti okalamba azilandira ndalama pamwezi kutukula ntchito zamalimidwe zaumoyo kulemekeza malamulo 
  mgwirizano wa dpp udf zake mudali nkhani yolimbikitsa kutukula achinyamata powaphunzitsa ntchito zamanja kuwapatsa ngongole kutukula amayi pantchito zosiyanasiyana kulimbikitsa umodzi chilungamo kutukula ulimi popitiriza pulogalamu ya sabuside kutukula ntchito za makina kompyuta pogawa mayuniti intaneti aulere kupitiriza pulogalamu yolemba achinyamata ntchito 
  kampeni yafika kumapeto chonchi migwirizanoyi yayenda mowirira makamaka nkhani ya zipolowe kuchitirana zamtopola zosiyanasiyana 
  kumbali zonse adamenyedwa kuvulazidwa kuphwanyiridwa kuotcheredwa katundu chopezeka mmadera omwe amaona samayenera kupezekako 
  mneneri wapolisi james kadadzera adatsimikiza apolisi adalandira malipoti oti amachitira zamtopola anzawo pakampeni adalonjeza akufufuza malipotiwo 
  zokwangula kampeni lero kadadzera wati apolisi ayesetsa kupezeka paliponse makamaka komwe kuchitikire misonkhano pasakhale za mtopola zilizonse 
  cholinga chathu amvetsetse zotsiriza ukapita mwayi uwu sadzapezanso mpata omva za atsogoleri pachisankhochi ndiye ntchito yathu kukhazikitsa bata adatero kadadzera 
  zipangizo zovotera pachisankhochi zafika dzulo mzinda wa lilongwe bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec likhala likutumiza zipangizozo mmaboma
Label: POLITICS

Text:
abwenzi   ayamikira dongosolo la mariatona wolemba richard makombe abwenzi radio maria malawi ati okhutira momwe nyengo ya mariatona yayendera chaka chino 
 mariatona nyengo imene radio maria imakonza chaka chilichonse pofuna kupeza thandizo loyendetsera ntchito za wayilesiyi kubwenza ngongole zomwe wayilesiyi ili nazo 
 mwa abwenzi wailesiyi ku mwambo wotsekera mariatona ku dedza wapampando wa abwenzi radio maria dayosizi ya blantyre james ngombe awuza radio maria malawi kuyambira pomwe mariatona inayamba mwezi wa may akhala akutsatira mwa chidwi osangalala zinthu zayenda mpaka kufikira kumapeto pomwe nyengo ya mariatona yatsekedwa 
 ngomba ati panali zovuta zina kusowa kwa mabuku olembapo mmene munthu waperekera thandizo lake ambiri ayesetsa kuthandiza wayilesiyi 
 ndipemphe kwa akuluakulu ayesetse mabuku olemberapo maina omwe apereka thandizo lawo ku wayilesiyi azifikira aku midzi komwe nawo azithandiza wayilesiyi anatero ngomba 
 ngomba apempha akhristu antu apitilize kuthandiza wayilesiyi mariatona yatsekedwa 27 july 2019 
 poyankhulapo wapa mpando wa abwenzi radio maria dayosizi ya dedza elina tcheza wati ndiokondwa zomwe anakonza zichitike potsekera mariatona zachitika zayenda 
 ndithokoze onse omwe anatengapo mbali poonesetsa mariatona wa chaka chino akhale wapamwambaanatero tcheza 
 tcheza ati panali zovuta zina komabe zambiri zayenda kamba koti ambiri athandiza katundu osiyansiyana 
 mariatona inatsegulidwa 4 may ku zomba cathedral yatskedwa ku mtendere parish dayosizi ya dedza
Label: RELIGION

Text:
kwavuta kumsika wa nkhotakota kunjatidwa kwa wina mboma la nkhotakota kwavumbulutsa nkhani yosalana mumsika wa mbomali 
  woyendetsa ntchito za polisi ya mbomali station officer mwiza nyoni watsimikiza za kunjatidwa kwa shaban nyambalo mphepo wa zaka 37 yemwe akuti adamutsekera pomuganizira adabutsa malo omwe wina joseph kambwembwe wa zaka 56 amagulitsirapo mbewa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc katundu woletsedwa mumsika wa nkhotakota malo saloledwa kugulitsa mbewa zili mumpanizi akuti akumuganizira adachita pofuna kukakamiza kambwembwe achoke pamalopo amagulitsa malonda osaloledwa mumsikamo 
  tamutsegulira mlandu malo mwadala zomwe zimatsutsana ndime 337 ya malamulo lino malingana zomwe tapezako akuti mumsikawu adakhazikitsa lamulo loti onse ogulitsa ya nkhumba mbewa akhale mbali yawo kunja kwa msika 
  tikufufuza adalamula ndani akuti malo omwe anthuwo adapatsidwa ochepa moti kambwembwe sadasamuke mumsikamo zomwe zidapangitsa nyambaloyo kukatentha malowo adatero nyoni 
  kambwembwe adauza msangulutso lachinayi lapitali palamya wakhala akugulitsa mbewa pamalopo kwa zaka zambiri palibe chachilendo chomwe chidachitikapo mumsikamo kaamba ka malonda akewo 
  adati akuona nkhaniyi si yokakamira malo zifukwa zina zomwe sadazitchule adati zivute zitani chomwe akufuna katundu yemwe adaonongeka pachiwembucho 
  chilungamo chimafunika paliponse mtendere ukhalepo asandipusitse nkhani yokakamira pamalo ochitira malonda ayi chilipo chomwe chili kumtima kwawo sakuchinena 
  zogawana mbali zidalephereka kalekale akhonsolo adalephera kutipezera mbali enafe ndiye tizingokhala chomwe ndikufuna katundu wanga yemwe adaonongedwa basi adatero kambwembwe 
  bwanamkubwa wa bomali felix mkandawire adati palibe munthu yemwe mphamvu zothamangitsa mnzake mumsika uli mmanja mwa khonsolo 
  adatsimikiza ofesi yawo idakamba nkhaniyi pofuna kukhazikitsa bata pakati mitundu zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana adapereka nkhaniyo mmanja mwa apolisi nawo aunike mbali yomwe ikuwakhudza 
  mkandawire adavomera khonsolo idalephera kupeza malo osamutsirako ogulitsa ya nkhumba mbewa momwe amalonda amafunira adati sangaletse munthu bizinesi yomwe imamubweretsera ndalama 
  amayenera kugwira ntchito bizinesi adzizithandiza ndiye sitingaletse munthu bizinesi chomwe chidatidabwitsa nchakuti anthuwa akuti sakuwafuna amadula matikiti mumsika adatero mkandawire 
  adadzudzula gulu lomwe lidachita zachiwembulo lidalakwitsa potengera mphamvu mmanja mmalo mokadandaula kukonsolo eni msika aone chochita 
  bwanamkubwayu adati kambwembwe adati katundu yemwe adamuonongera wandalama zokwana k15 000 munthu wina wakufuna kwabwino adapereka ndalamazo kukhonsolo imupatse ayambirenso bizinesi yakeyo 
  ndalamazo timupatsa lero lachinayi dzulo tidatuma kukafufuza malo apadera angapezeke atiuza apeza malo omwe tikaikeko ogulitsa ya nkhumba mbewa mwina ziwawa zithe adatero mkandawire
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
zionetsero zilipo la chiwiri 13 january wamenyetsa nkhwangwa pamwala mtambo zafika payerepayere mabungwe 20 omwe si aboma amenyetsa nkhwangwa pamwala ponena zivute zitani palibe chomwe chingalepheretse zionetsero za lonse zomwe akonza kudzachita lachiwiri likebwerali ati pofuna kuonetsa mkwiyo mmene zinthu zikuyendera mdziko muno 
  imodzi mwa nkhani zikuluzikulu zomwe zakwiyitsa mabungwewa ndalama zomwe bungwe loyendetsa ntchito zolimbana matenda edzi la national aids commission nac lidapereka kumagulu omwe sakhudzidwa pankhondo yolimbana matendawa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mneneri wa mabungwe omwe akukonza zionetserozi timothy mtambo yemwe wa bungwe la centre for human rights and rehabilitation chrr adati cholinga cha zionetserozi nkudzudzula boma mmene likuyendetsera zinthu zomwe adati zikupweteketsa amalawi 
  mwa zina mabungwe omwe si abomawa akuti sakukhutira momwe chuma cha boma chikuyendera kuchepa kwa chitetezo kusalemekeza ufulu wa amalawi 
  atinso boma likuwonetsa kuphangira mphamvu posalemekeza nthambi zina za boma nthambi ya zamalamulo zomwe zidayambitsa sitalaka ya nthambiyi ambiri akuzunzika mndende kudikira milandu yawo 
  mabungwewa akudzudzula nkhani ya ndalama zokwana k5 miliyoni zomwe bungwe la nac lidapereka kubungwe la wa fuko gertrude mutharika la beautify malawi beam zomwe lidaperekanso ku gulu la muhlakho wa alhomwe 
  pomwe mabungwewa akukonza mabungwe omwenso si aboma bungwe la achinyamata la youth empowerment and civic education yece ati sadzatenga nawo mbali paziwonetserozi 
  wa bungweli lucky mbewe wati omwe akukonza zionetserozi sadatsate njira yoyenera posafunsa maganizo mabungwe 
  zinthu zimafunika kukambirana osati kungobwera maganizo omangamanga tichita zakuti ayi zimenezi nzomwe zatipangitsa tisatenge nawo mbali adatero mbewe 
  mtambo akuti mabungwe omwe akupatuka akugwiritsidwa ntchito boma asokoneze zionetserozo 
  mavenda ku lilongwe nawo ati sakugwirizana ganizo lodzachita zionetsero polingalira zomwe zidaoneka pazionetsero zamtunduwu zomwe zidachitika 20 july 2011 
  zomwe zidachitika 20 july 2011 zimatipatsabe mantha moti apa sitikufuna kutenga nawo mbali vuto lina lakuti zikakhala chonchi malonda athu amasokonekera ndiye ayi adatero james yelayela soko venda wakalekale yemwe adatsogolerapo mavenda mumzinda wa lilongwe 
  atafunsidwa akudziwapo kanthu zionetsero zimene zikukonzedwazi mneneri wa likulu la polisi rhoda manjolo adati apolisi sadalandire pempho lililonse la munthu gulu lofuna kupanga zionetsero 
  mneneri wa khonsolo ya lilongwe tamala chafunya lachiwiri lapitali adati ofesiyi sidalandire kalata iliyonse yopempha adzachite zionetsero 
  poikapo maganizo ake katswiri wa zandale blessings chinsinga adati zionetserozo si zolakwika njira imodzi yodzudzulira pomwe boma likulephera 
  adati mabungwe omwe si aboma ntchito yawo kuonetsetsa boma silikuphotchola pakagwiridwe kake ka ntchito ndiye zinthu zikupotoka akuyenera kupeza njira yowongolera 
  adati njira yabwino yowongolera mokhota nkukambirana njirayi yakanika mabungwe ayenera kupeza njira zina kukonza zionetserozo 
  wa bungwe loyanganira mabungwe onse omwe si aboma la congoma macbain mkandawire adakana kunenapo bungwe la congoma likugwirizana kutsutsana ziwonetserozi 
  adati bungweli lili mkati mwa zokambirana mabungwe omwe akukonza ziwonetserowo aunike nkofunika kutero ayi 
  mafumu nawo aperekapo maganizo osiyanasiyana pankhaniyi 
  mfumu liwonde ya ku machinga idati zionetsero nkutaya chabe palibe phindu lomwe limaoneka 
  inkosi chindi ya ku mzimba idati akuona penapake sipadayende ufulu zionetserozo aonetse kusakondwa kwawoko polakwikwapo pakonzedwe 
  nayo t nkukula ya ku lilongwe idati magulu okhudzidwawa adakambirana pazolakwikazo nkulepherana zionetsero nzosalakwika
Label: POLITICS

Text:
papa walimbikitsa umodzi pakati zipembedzo mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika lonse papa francisco wati umodzi ofunika pakati zipembedzo zosiyana siyana 
 malinga malipoti wayilesi ya vatican papa francisco walankhula lachinayi tsiku lomwe zipembedzo zosiyana siyana mapemphero opempha chithandizo cha mulungu mliri wa coronavirus uthe 
 lachinayi 14 may zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana lonse la pansi anachita mapemphero opempha chithandizo cha mulungu mliri wa coronavirus 
 mmawu ake tsikuli papa francisco watsindika za kufunika kwa umodzi pakati onse angakhale asiyane zipembedzo ponena onse ana banja limodzi 
 wati akuyenera kupitiriza kupemphera mulungu amve kulira kwa ake ndikuthetsa mliri wa coronavirus wapitiriza kunena udindo poyetsetsa kuchitapo kanthu mliriwu uthe 
 papa francisco wachenjeza omwe sadagwidwe nthenda ya covid 19 asanyadire apulumuke akuyenera kuzindikira mavuto omwe mliriwu wabweretsa mwa chitsanzo nkhani ya maphunziro chuma 
 wati pambali mliri wa coronavirus pali njala nkhondo wati mavuto amenewa akusowa mapemphero mphamvu mulungu achitire chisoni ake 
 lamulungu 3 may papa francisco adalengeza za mapemphero zipembedzo zosiyana siyana omwe achitika tsiku lachinayiwa 14 may potsatira ganizo la komiti ya ochokera ku zipembedzo zosiyana siyana higher committee of human fraternity lomwe adavomereza loti pakhale mapemphero opempha chithandizo cha mulungu mliri wa coronavirus womwe wakhudza lonse la pansi uthe
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
lonjezo la jb   lasanduka loto ake adamwalira chiyembekezo chidali womupeza nawonso adamukhumudwitsa pomugwiririra nkumupatsa pathupi bwalo la milandu lidamugamula akaseweze kundende zaka 13 moyo wakhala wowawitsa loto lodzakhala wapolisi lidasanduka la chumba 
   escom in free for all fuel scam   wait gets longer   secrecy over party funders 18 march 2013 chiyembekezo cha zione tangomupatsa dzinali chidatukusira pamene yemwe adali mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda adamulonjeza kudzamulipirira maphunziro ake mpaka kuyunivesite 
  malinga mphunzitsi wa zione dziwa nazombe mbewe banda adalonjeza zione patsiku lomwe amayendera ku one stop centre kuchipatala cha queen elizabeth central mumzinda wa blantyre 
  patsikulo ogwira ntchito ku one stop centre adandiimbira apulezidenti akhala akuyendera malowo ndiye akufuna zione akalankhule zomwe zidamuchitikira 
  ndidapita naye apulezidenti adafika mchipinda chathu momwe adacheza zione yemwe panthawiyo adali zaka 13 atamufunsa za sukulu adati akufuna apitirize apa mpamene apulezidenti adati amulipirira sukulu yake adatero nazombe mbewe 
  tsogolo sakuliona zione kumanzere aphunzitsi ake nazombe mbewe adati banda adauza lingalireni mihowa amene adali nawo panthawiyo ndiwo azilumikizana nawo pankhani ya thandizolo 
  chimwemwe chidadza mmawa kwa zione zoti adachitidwa chipongwe ake zidaiwalika tsopano loto lodzakhala wapolisi lidayamba kuoneka tsogolo lake 
  ndidali chimwemwe titangotuluka ndidaimbira foni malume anga ku balaka kudziwitsa anzanga akusukulu zomwe apulezidenti adandilonjeza ndidasangalala kwambiri adatero zione 
  chidatsala nkuti zione yemwe panthawiyo adali sitandede 8 akhoze mayeso ndidakalimbikira kusukulu ndidakhozadi adatero 
  apa mpamene mphunzitsiyu adakambirana mihowa zione akalowe fomu 1 kusekondale 
  ndidapita kuofesi kwawo tidakambirana poti panthawiyo nkuti zione adali asadabereke adati tidikire abereke kaye abwerere kusukulu adatero nazombe mbewe 
  9 january 2014 mwana adabadwa ati adagwirizana pakatha miyezi 7 zione akayambe sukulu july mwana adamuleketsa kuyamwa abwerere kusukulu 
  nazombe mbewe adayesera kutsatizira nkhaniyo sinaoneke mutu 
  ndidapita kuofesi kwawo adati andiimbira poona sakuimba ndidapitanso adandiuza ndisiye nambala aimba sadaimbe ndidadzapitanso pamene adati ndilembe nkhani ya zione aitsatizira sizidatero mpaka lero pamene ndatopa adatero nazombe mbewe 
  mphunzitsiyu adalembera ofesi ya mihowa kalata zokumbutsa za lonjezolo komabe palibe chidachitika mpaka lero 
  msangulutso utaimbira foni mihowa adati tilankhule levi mwase amene amayendetsa nkhaniyo mwase adati sindine mneneri wa joyce banda imbirani mneneri tusekere mwanyongo 
  mwanyongo adati nzovuta anene chenicheni chomwe lonjezolo silidatheke wati mwina padalibe kulumikizana kwabwino 
  joyce banda akhala akuthandiza mpaka lero akuthandizabe ana ambiri asukulu nkutheka padalibe kulumikizana kwabwino mtsikanayo adatero 
  mthandizi wa banda andekuche chanthunya akuti ndondomeko zoyenera sizidatsatidwe nchifukwa mtsikanayu sadathandizidwe 
  samayenera apite kwa mihowa abwere kwa kwa levi mwase akufuna kuthandizidwa akuyenera atsatire ndondomeko adatero 
  njovu zikamamenyana udzu ndiwo umavutika kuponyerana chichewaku sikukuthandizabe zione amene akusungidwa banja lina ku chirimba mumzinda wa blantyre 
  banja lomwe likusunga zione silingakwanitsenso kumutumiza kusukulu wa pabanjapo evance milanzie wati moyo wa zione wafika pomvetsa chisoni 
  mwana wanzeru zangovuta lonjezolo silidatheke adatero milanzie 
  aka si koyamba mtsogoleri wa alonjeze mwana osakwanitsa lonjezolo 2004 mtsogoleri wakale bingu wa mutharika adalonjezanso marietta mhango wa mmudzi mwa mawelera kwa paramount kyungu mboma la karonga adzamulipirira sukulu 
  mutharika adalonjeza marietta pamsonkhano adzamulipirira atanena ndakatulo adatsindika za thandizolo sizidatheke lero marietta akutuwa 
  kodi zimatero chiyani mphunzitsi wa zandale kusukulu ya chancellor collage joseph chunga akuti mtima wofuna awaone omwe umachititsa 
  amafuna mwina aoneke mtima wabwino cholinga akalonjeza apateko mavoti cha mtima womwe aonetsa nzachisoni adatero chunga 
  pamene zili chonchi zione wokhumudwa zasokoneza moyo katswiri kumbali ya kaganizidwe ka munthu chiwoza bandawe akuti zione wachichepere zingakhudze moyo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
zizindikiro za kufa kwa ziwalo dotolo wa chipatala cha gulupu mboma la blantyre lerato mambulu wati kufa kwa ziwalo zambiri kumachitika mwadzidzidzi 
  pachifukwa ichi kumakhala kovuta munthu kumva kuonetsa zizindikiro zoti afa ziwalo 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu munthu amatha kungomva kupweteka mutu amumenya mwina chitsulo ndikugwa pansi basi kufa kwa ziwalo nkukhala komweko adatero 
  mambulu adafotokoza zimachitika kwa amene misempha yawo ya magazi yaphulika mbali ya thupi yomwe yafayo 
  adati misemphayi ikaphulika magazi sayenda kupita ku ubongo zotsatira zake sipakhala kulumikizana kulikonse pakati ubongo mbali yomwe sikukufika magaziko 
  dotoloyu adati zinthu zikafika pamenepa mbaliyo imaleka kugwira ntchito 
  amatha kufa ziwalo kusiya kuyankhula kwa maola ochepa okha ndikuchira ichi chizindikiro chachikulu cha matendawa adatero 
  mambulu adati zili chomwechi oterewa amakhala pachiopsezo chachikulu choti atha kuzakhala vutoli mokhazikika mtsogolo 
  pachifukwa ichi dotoloyu adati munthu akaona asazitenge mwa chizolowezi momwe ndimachitira athamangire ku chipatala kukapeza thandizo mtsogolo lisadzakhale vuto lokhazikiza 
  adati zili chomwechi ochepa okha omwe amatha kuyamba motere 
  kwa omwe bp yawo imakhala yokwera amamva kuwawa kwa mutu kwambiri nkhope imatha kuonetsa zizindikiro zofooka kusonyeza ina iliyonse ziwalo zikhoza kufa adatero 
  tsabata ya mawa tizafotokoza zinthu zomwe zimamuika munthu chiopsezo cha matenda kufa kwa ziwalo
Label: HEALTH

Text:
mazanamazana akusowa pokhala ku bahamas wolemba sylvester kasitomu okhala chilumba cha nyanja ya caribean cha bahamas akusowa pokhala nyumba zawo zitagwa kaamba ka mpempo ya mphanvu ya mafunde yomwe ikuomba panyanjayi 
 malipoti akusonyeza mphepiyi imene ikuombayi ya mphanvu kwambiri yomwe ikuyenda pamtunda wa 250 kilometer ora 
 mwazina malipoti kaamba ka mphepoyi kulumikizana kudzera makina internet kukuvutnso kuonongeka kwa zida zotumizira mauthenga 
 boma la la bahamas lamanga misasa yodikiliramo omwe akusowa pokhala yokwana 14 mwa anthuwa akukhala mmasukulu mmatchalitchi 
 aka kachisanu chaka cha 2016 chilumbachi chikhudzidwe mphepoyi padakali muthu wa zaka zisanu 8 yemwe wafa ngpoziyi
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
kuthana vuto kwa zaka 20 gulu la alimi ngombe za mkaka la namahoya la mboma la thyolo silimapeza phindu mnyengo ya mvula limangogulitsa mkaka wokwana magawo 10 100 aliwonse zina osagulitsa ndikomwe 
  wapampando wa gulili taulo chisoso adati zimachitika ogula akayeza mkaka umaupeza uli madzi wochuluka 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu wyson kudyetsera udzu ngombe yake padakali mkuluyu adati vutoli adathana nalo 
  kwa zaka zonsezi nyengo ya mvula ikafika kwambiri tinkangodyetsera udzu wauwisi umapezeka wochuluka osadziwa tikuzionongera msika adatero chisoso yemwe gulu lake lili mamembala 550 
  2016 tidapeza ulangizi woti kudyetsera kwambiri ngombe za mkaka msipu wobiriwira kumachulukitsa madzi ku mkaka titaleka taona chaka chonse chatha mpaka lero sudabwererepo pamsika adatero chisoso 
  mlimiyu adati kampani yomwe imawagula imafuna mkaka wabatala loyambira magawo 20 100 aliwonse 
  akalephera kukwaniritsa amaubweza 
  membala wa gululi chrissie wyton adati mmbuyomu nyengo ya mvula ikafika amadyesera msipu wauwisi wabwiri deya amakwera mtengo samapanga mfutso wa ziweto 
  padakali ndidaleka kudyetsera udzu wauwisi wochuluka ndimapanga mfutso pophatikiza msipu wa mitundu yosiyanasiyana zikamadya zizipeza michere yokwanira mthupi 
  kuonjezera apa ndimasunga madeya ndazindikira ulimiwu bizinesi choncho ndikuyenera kumaikirapo mtima adatero 
  mlangizi wa ziweto ku mzuzu agriculture development division mzaad jacob mwasinga adafotokoza kudyetsera kwambiri ngombe za mkaka msipu wa uwisi kumakhala mlimi akuzipatsa madzi ambiri chakudya chochepa 
  zili chomwechi msipuwu umangochuluka madzi michere imachepa   mkaka umakhala wochuluka kungouyangana umaoneka wathiridwa madzi choncho sungayembekezere zabwino pamsika adatero 
  mwasinga adafotokoza udzu umakhala michere yochulukirapo mapeto mwezi wa february mayambiriro march 
  adati zili chomwechi umakhala wakula ukupita kokhwima kotero umakhala michere yochulukirapo 
  mlangiziyu adati ichi nchifukwa chake alimi amayenera kupanga mfutso wa ziweto udzu ukafika pamenepa 
  pothirirapo ndemanga mphunzitsi wa ziweto wa ku lilongwe university of agriculture and natural resources luanar jonathan tanganyika adati msipu wodalirika ulimi wa ziweto alimi azichulutsa chakudya choonjezera nyengo ya mvula
Label: FARMING

Text:

 malinga wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa apolisi mbomali sergeant dickson matemba malemuyu feston sulupi usiku wa 6 july mmundawu omwe uli mphephete mwa mtsinje wa shire kukathyola nyembazi momwemo ozungulira derali anamugwira kuyamba kumumenya 
 mbale wawo wa malemuwa anafotokoza mchimwene wawo kukaba nyemba ku madimba omwe mphepete mwa mtsinje wa shire kumeneko anayamba kumumenya komwe anakomoka anatero matemba

Text:
joyce banda wamema aku zomba adzavotere dr chakwera mtsogoleri wakale wa lino dr joyce banda wapempha mdziko muno akavotere mtsogoleri wa mgwirizano wa tonse dr lazarus chakwera chisankho chomwe chikudzachi 
 banda anena lero msonkhano omwe anachititsa bwalo la zamasewero la naisi mboma la zomba 
 banda tizapitiriza kumangira nyumba ovutika ati mgwirizanowu uli zabwino kulemba ntchito achinyamata ochuluka kumangira nyumba ovutikisitsa kuthetsa njala mwazina 
 atsogoleri awiri onsewa agwirizana nkhani imene ndimayikonda nkhani yomangira nyumba ovutika tizalembanso ntchito achinyamata oposa 1 million anatero dr banda 
 polankhulapo msonkhano omwewu wachiwiri kwa president wa chipani cha utm dr micheal usi wapempha atsogoleri zipani zina za ndale aleke kugwiritsa ntchito zipembedzo pofuna kukopa awavotere 
 chisankho ichi sitikukavotera shehe angaliba tikukasankha tsogoleri oti ayendetse lino osati zomwe akuganizazo anatero dr usi 
 enanso mwa atsogoleri tonse alliance omwe analankhula mwambowu wachiwiri kwa president wa chipani cha malawi congress mcp sidik mia mtsogoleri wag ulu la ndale la citizens for transformation cft timothy mtambo omwenso anapempha mdizko muno adzavotere mgwirizano wa tonse chisankho chomwe chikudzachi
Label: POLITICS

Text:
chitamponi kanthu za fisp wapampando wa komiti ya zaulimi mnyumba ya malamulo felix jumbe wati boma lichitepo kanthu za mmene ndondomeko ya farm input subsidy programme fisp ya zipangizo zaulimi zotsika mtengo ikuyendera polingalira ikutha 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu jumbe adalankhula pocheza uchikumbe potsatira lipoti la 5 january la mmene ntchitoyi ikuyendera lomwe likusonyeza kufika pamatumba 100 alionse feteleza 76 okha ndiwo adafika kumalo ogulitsirako zipangizozi 
  agula kale zipangizo madera sizidafike malingana jumbe iyi nkhani yoopsa mbewu zimakhala nyengo yake yomwe zimachita zikalandira feteleza kuthira feteleza nyengoyi itadutsa kale sikungapindule kanthu kwa mlimi 
  fetelezatu sangothirapo poti wapezeka ayi pali nyengo yake malingana mmene mbewu zikukulira zikadutsa pena pake kuthira feteleza kumangokhala kuononga chabe 
  mwachitsanzo munthu ungamathire feteleza wokulitsa chimanga chitayamba kale ngaiyaye nkumati ukuchitapo kanthu mwezi wa january alimi amayenera zipangizo nazo adatero jumbe 
  nyuzipepala ya the nation ya 8 january idasindikiza zotsatira za mkhumano wa pakati nduna ya zamalimidwe ulimi wamthirira chitukuko cha madzi allan chiyembekeza eni makampani omwe zikunyamula zipangizozi adagwirizana ntchitoyi ikuyenera kutha pofika 31 december 2015 
  malingana jumbe pomafika 5 january ntchitoyi inali ikadali mkati zikusonyeza pena pake pali vuto mndondomekoyi mpofunika akuluakulu omwe akuyendetsa ntchitoyi achitepo kanthu msanga 
  nduna ya zachuma chitukuko goodall gondwe adauza nyuzipepala yomweyi akupupuluma kufalitsa zolakwika za pulogalamuyi zomwe zikusemphana momwe ikuyendetsedwera chaka chino 
  adati nzomvetsa chisoni zaka zingapo chiyambireni pulogalamuyi amaganizabe idayambitsidwa cholinga chothetsa umphawi pomwe cholinga chake nchakuti azikhala chakudya chokwanira 
  cholinga cha pulogalamuyi nchakuti azikolola chakudya chokwanira amaganiza idabwera kudzathetsa umphawi maganizo otere ndiwo amachititsa aziyembekeza kuthandizidwa chaka chaka adatero gongwe
Label: POLITICS

Text:
malonjezo enawa kaya zidali zoona kaya zabodza zimamveka imene bakili muluzi ankafuna mpando wa upulezidenti adalonjeza zinthu zingapo adalonjeza adzakhala nsapato onenawo nkumatinso muluziyo adalonjeza adzapereka fetereza wa ulele 
  komatu atatenga mpando muluzi atcheya adanenetsa sadalonjeze nsapato nanga ndingadziwe munthu wa ku chitipa amavala sayizi yanji adazizwa 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu nkhani ya feteleza adati sindinati ndidzabweretsa fetereza wa ulele ayi 
  ndidati fetereza wa uleya 
  izitu ndakumbukira cha zimene andale agundika kulonjeza 
  zimandichititsa chidwi zimene andale amalankhula akafuna mpando 
  ndikumbuka lomwe joyce banda yomwe amafuna amusankhe pachisankho cha 2014 amati akafika ku nkhata bay amanena kwathu kuno akafika ku zomba chimodzimodzi kulikonse kumene wafika amati kwawo 
  si zayamba lero dr hastings kamuzu banda ankanena akufuna ake azigona nyumba zosathonya kukamagwa mvula azivala asamagone njala mmawwu ake amanena dzikoli walifikitsa patali zedi pomwe palibenso angalifikitse 
  pofuna utsogoleri andale amalonjeza zambiri richard nixon mtsogoleri wa la america 20 july 1969 amapherezera adati atsogoleri ambiri amalonjeza adzawapatsa mwezi osawapatsa adati yekha amene adapereka mwezi adalonjeza adanena neil armstrong edward aldrin atakhala oyamba padziko la pansi kuyenda ku mwezi zidadza nixon adaika ndalama zochuluka ku kafukufuku wa za mlengalenga 
  komatu tonse tikudziwa nixon adatula pansi udindo 1972 kaamba ka nkhani ya watergate inde komwe tidabera dzina la cashgate 
  tsono nchifukwa chiyani ndikunena zonsezi ndakhala ndikutsatira zimene amalankhula saulos chilima misonkhano yokopa adzamuvotere kungobenthula chabe poyamba adanena chipani chake cha utm chidzalipirira amene adzaimire chipanicho ukhansala uphungu lonjezo ilo 
  akutinso adzabweretsa sitima yothamanga zedi yoyendera magetsi pamene njanji zathu zidamera mitengo tizingodikira 
  zimandipatsa chidwi amalankhula zogwirizana dera limene malonjezo amakhala ochuluka ku nkhotakota adalokambapo zolimbikitsa ulimi wa chamba osati chosuta ku mwanza adalonjeza kulimbikitsa ulimi wa zipatso mpaka mafakitale 
  malonjezo awa si kudzatitsamwa   zili apo palinso atsogoleri amene amafuna kutionetsa adabadwa nawo utsogoleri
Label: POLITICS

Text:

 nyumba ya delamere ikuyaka moto wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mzinda wu augustus nkhwazi watsimikiza za nkhaniyi wati ngozi yi yachitika lero mmawa wati ngozi yi katundu wambiri wasakazika ntchito yofufuza gwero la ngozi yi ili mkati 
 motowu unayamba cha mma 7 mamawa unakhudza gawo lomwe kukukhala kachere institute of health and development anatero nkhwazi 
 ati amene wavulalayu micheal wataya yemwe wowerengetsera ndalama wa delemere properties wagonekedwa chipatala cha blantyre adventist mzinda omwewo wa blantyre 
 pamenepa nkhwazi walimbikitsa mzindawo azikhala tcheru osamala pofuna kupewa ngozi za moto zomwe wati zikuchulukira kwambiri mzindawo zifukwa zosiyanasiyana

Text:

 mfumu parish yi henry chiwaya omwe anena polankhula mntolankhani wathu ati momwe zinthu zikyendera parishi yo zayamba kuonetsa ntchito zotukula mpingo wu zikuyenda 
 mwazina ati parish yawo mbuyomu imatumikiridwa ansembe achizungu zomwe zimapangitsa akhristu ozungulira parishiyi kuphatikizapo malimana azikhla ulesi othandiza mpingo maka popereka molowa manja zithu zothandizira parishiyi 
 kale kunali kovuta akhristu azitengapo mbali nkhani yothandiza mpingo kaamba koti parishi yathu imayendetsedwa thandizo lochokera kwa ansembe achizungu mmene tawaphunzitsa njira za momwe angathandizire mpingo tikuona akhristu akunvetsa akuthandza kuperekela mphatso za ku nsembe zina anatero chiwaya 
 parishiyi ili malimana osaposera 75 kufika bambowa akwanitsa kuyendera limana lililonse paokhapokha kupereka maphunzirowa

Text:
radio maria yalimbikitsa omvera ake asatope kuithandiza mnyengo ya coronavirus radio maria malawi yalimbikitsa omvera ake asasiye kuthandiza wayilesiyi thandizo lililonse lomwe angakhale nalo ntchito zake zipitilire kuyenda pomwe matenda covid -19 ayimitsa ntchito zambiri mdziko muno 
 phiri coronavirus wayimitsa zokonzekera zonse oyendetsa ntchito za wayilesiyi louis phiri ndiyemwe wanena pomwe amalankhulapo momwe matendawa asokonezera zokonzekera za nyengo ya mariatona yomwe imayenera kuyamba la mulungu likudzali 3 may 
 wati zokonzekera za nyengoyi zidayima kaye mpaka mtsogolomu akhristu onse akufuna kwabwino omwe amakonda kumvera wayilesiyi akuyenera atenge udindo waukulu othandiza wailesiyi ntchito zake zipite patsogolo 
 kuno ku radio maria tinali malingaliro oti tikatsegulire mariatona ku lutchenza cha mliri wa coronavirus wu takanika kutero anatero phiri
Label: RELIGION

Text:
ccjp yalimbikitsa alimi kugwiritsa ntchito manyowa bungwe la chilungamo mtendere mpingo wa katolika la catholic commission for justice and peace ccjp akidayosizi ya blantyre lati ulimu wogwiritsa nthito manyowa uli kuthekela kobwezeretsa chonde nthaka alimi atatsatira ndondomeko zoyenera pogwiritsa ntchito mayowa wa 
 chasowa kuphunzitsa alangizi bungweli lanena mboma la thyolo lolemba 24 february 2020 pambuyo maphunziro alangizi ulimu bungweli mbomali wowunikira purojekiti ya bungweli yolimbikitsa alimi kugwiritsa ntchito mayowa yowazindikilitsa zokhuza ufulu wawo nkhani za malo 
 mau ake modzi mwa akulu akulu bungweli ku akidiosizi ya blantyre joseph kampango kupatulapo manyowa osavuta kupeza safuna upangili ozama komabe ndikofunika ayambe kuzindikila kugwilitsa mayowa umboni bungwe ubwino wa manyowa 
 kupatulapo kukolora zokolora zokwana alimi akugwiritsa ntchito manyowa kugwilitsa ntchito manyowa kuli kuthekela kobwezeletsa chonde nthaka kusiyana feteleza anatero kampango 
 alangizi zaulimi bungwe la ccjp mboma la thyolo omwe anachita maphunzirowo kampango anapitiliza kunena purojekitiyi yakwanitsa kupeza njira zina zopangira mayowa manyowa amadzi omwenso ndiosavuta kunyamula kuthila mminda 
 alimi amenenso akugwitsa ntchito mayowa amadziwa minda mwawo muli mmela wazaoneni anawonjedzela motero kampango 
 mmau ake modzi mwa alangidzi azaulimi wa boma mboma la thyolo esinta chasowa nthaka inaguga china chimene chikupangisa azikhala zokola zochepa chomcho alimi akuyenela kuzalanso mbeyu zomwe zimabwezeletsa chonde munthaka azikolora zokolora zokwana 
 mbewu za guru la nyemba zimakwanitsa kubweretsa chonde nthaka anatero chasowa 
 chasowa anapitiliza kunena kuphuzitsa alimi njira zowathandiza kukolora chakudya chambiri sizikukukwanira opanda kuwaphuzitsanso momwe angasamalire chakudyacho 
 alimi akhoza kukolora zambiri saphunzitsidwa momwe angasamalire zokolorazi zonse zili chabe kuononga chakudya kumayambira pokolora mpaka pakhomo analankhula motero chasowa 
 pothilirapo ndemanga mwa mlangizi wa alimi wa bungweli amene anatenga nawo gawo maphuzirowa joyce gatoma anayamikira bungwe la ccjp kamba ka maphuzirowa ponena awathandiza kuzindikira njira zina zotsogola zopangila manyowa kasamalidwe ka chakudya 
 gatoma anapempha mabungwe omwe akukhuzidwa pophuzitsa alimi agwirane manja aziphunzitsa alimi zofanana 
 ndizovuta munthu usatilere ziti mabungwewa amabwela ndizosiyana choncho ndikoyenela mabungwe agwilane manja potiphunzitsa chimodzi nafe tizikaphunzitsa zolondora kwa alimi anadandaula motero gatoma bungwe la ccjp likugwira ntchitoyi mboma la thyolo kwa ma t asanu modzi omwe ngolongoliwa nanseta bvumbwe chimaliro kapichi nchiramwela
Label: FARMING

Text:
boma la zomba lati lakonzeka kuthana covid -19 ofesi ya zaumoyo mboma la zomba yati bomalo lidayamba kale kukonza malo operekera chithandizo kwa odwala nthenda ya covid-19 
 wa za umoyo mbomalo dr alexander chijuwa wanena polankhula radio maria malawi 
 wati mwa malowa chipatala cha chikulu cha zomba central chipatala cha matawale pirimiti chancellor college kumeneko komwe azisunga omwe azipezeka kachirombo ka coronavirus 
 kukonzekera kunayambika pamene tinamva mthendayi yafika mmaiko taonetsetsa zipangizo zoyenera zafika kele mmalowa anatero chijuwa 
 ati akupitirizabe kupereka mauthenga kwa ayeza ochuluka padakali munthu yemwe wapezeka nthendayi mboma la zomba
Label: HEALTH

Text:

  kwa msundwe ku lilongwe kudali nkhondo yoopsa pakati apolisi mpaka wapolisi usumani imedi adaphedwa miyala 
   csos in pay back our money campaign   govt to review genset deal   govt moves to audit firearms anthuwo zionetsero zokwiya mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika amachititsa msonkhano ku lilongweko atatsegulira ndondomeko yomanga sukulu zasekondale 250 mdziko muno 
  mneneri wapolisi james kadadzera adavomereza wapolisiyo yemwe adali wotsogolera anzake pokakhazikitsa bata adafera pantchito 
  amachokera c company ku lilongwe adatumidwa kukatsogolera gulu la apolisi okakhazikitsa bata kwa msundwe adangozindikira amuzungulira nkuyamba kumumenya nkumamugenda mpaka adafa adatero kadadzera 
  kumeneko kudali kutentha mateyala kuswa magolosale kutseka msewu odutsa azilipira akukhoma msonkho 
  kwa msundwe zili mkati kwa mpingu nako mboma lomwelo la lilongwe kudali utsi okhaokha atakwiya zidatengera asilikali nkhondo anthuwo abalalike 
  mutharika adapanga msonkhano wachitukuko woyamba mchigawo pabwalo la kamuzu institute chilumbilireni mtsogoleri wa chitachitika chisankho cha 21 may 2019 
  kadadzera adati pofika madzulo lachiwiri pomwe zonsezi zimachitika apolisi adali atamanga 12 oganiziridwa adatenga nawo mbali pazipolowezo 
  mtsogoleri wachipani cha malawi congress party mcp lazarus chakwera adati zoti adapanga chiwembu chopha wapolisi ndani wachipani chanji zilibe ntchito zomwe zidachitikazo nzolakwika

Text:
kuwonongeka kwa nkhalango ya amazon kutha kubweretsa chiwopsezo lonse wolemba glory kondowe malinga kafukufuku yemwe akatswiri azasayansi achita wasonyeza kusakazika kwa za chilengedwe nkhalango ya amazon yomwe ikupezeka mdziko la brazil kutha kudzetsa mavuto aakulu miyoyo ya lonse 
 kafukufuku yi wachitika potsatira kukwera kwa nambala ya ngozi zosiyana siyana ngozi za moto zome zakhala zikusakaza mitengo zina zachilengedwe mkhalangozi kwathawi yayitali 
 malingana malipoti bbc zikusonyeza ngozi za moto mkhalango yi zakwera 83 percent mchakachi zomwe zikupereka chiopsezo chakuti zinenezi zipitilire ndiye mitengo yambiri yomwe imathandiza kuchepetsa kutentha kwa woyipa ndinso kuthandizira pakangidwe ka mvula zina zambiri zitha kusokonekera chatchitidwewu   mwazina president wa dzikolo jair bolosonaro wati pakadari wokhudzidwa kwambiri ngozi za moto zomwe zikupitilira kuchitika mkhalango yi kotero wati boma lake liyesetsa lidzipereke ntchito zotetedza mkhalango yi 
 mkhalango ya amazon imodzi mwa mkhalango zikulu zikulu zomwe zimathandiza kuteteza lonse ku wotenthandipo kusakazika kwa mkhalango yi akuti kutha kudzetsa mavuto akulu miyoyo ya lonse

  chisoni chakuta mudzi wa lumwira kwa mfumu kasumbu mbomali cha imfa ya sipeniya david wa zaka 35 
  malinga mneneri wapolisi mbomalo cassim manda kasumbu adaphedwa usiku wa lamulungu kucha kwa lolemba 
  manda adati apolisi omwe adaona thupi la david akuchita kukanika kulongosola momwe simthawika sibombe wa zaka 40 adamukhapira mkazi wakeyo 
  manda adati sibombe yemwe amachokera mmudzi mwa chiphuka kwa mfumu kasumbu komweko adakwatirana david zaka 7 zapitazo 
  banjali silimamvana sibombe amamuchitira mkazi wakeyo nsanje yodabwitsa adalongosola manda 
  adati zonse zidayamba lamulunguli ili cha mma 4 koloko masana pomwe david adali paulendo wopita kokazonda mchemwali yemwe adagonekedwa pachipatala cha kanyama chomwe chili mderalo 
  apa mwamuna wakeyu yemwe adambisalira david manda omwe mderalo adavumbuluka ndikufikira kumukhapa mkaziyu manja onse mmutu david adafera pomwepo pomwe sibombe adathawa atangochita adalongosola motero manda 
  adati sibombe sadapezekebe mpaka apolisi amutsekulira mlandu wopha munthu mosemphana gawo 209 la malamulo lino 
  awiriwo ana awiri.chiwerengero cha ophana chakhala chikukwera mboma la dedza mchaka cha 2018 20 ndiwo adaphedwa pomwe 31 adaphedwa chaka chatha
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
takonzeka kuvotaamalawi pamene kwangotsala masiku awiri amalawi 6.8 miliyoni aponye voti yosankha mtsogoleri wa lino amalawi asonyeza chidwi akonzeka kukavota lachiwiri 
  tamvani idazungulira kuona momwe akukonzekera aonetsa lachiwiri adzakhala pikitipikiti kukaponya voti 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc apapa atasintha votiyo ikhale lero ndipita kukavota sindikulira wina kupanga kampeni paine chisankho ndidapanga kale adatero macdonald kalimba wa ku mchinji 
  joel ngoma wa ku mzimba adati chomwe ndimadikira nchoti tidzavota liti ndiye poti tsiku likudziwika ndikungondikira mmawa wa lachiwiri basi kukavota 
  amayi nawo ati akonzeka kukaponya voti lachiwiri la malawi likhale mtsogoleri wovomerezeka 
  tonse tikudziwa zinthu zambiri zidaima cha ndalezi ndiye mpofunika lachiwiri lifike msanga mtsogoleri adziwike tiyambe kusuntha chitsogolo adatero shupekile mlotha wa ku karonga 
  pomwe patuma usumani wa ku phalombe adati tidavota pazifukwa zina akuti tikavotenso ndiye likafika tsikulo tikavota tikhazikike zokokanakokana sizitithandiza 
  nalo bungwe lophunzitsa la national initiative for civic education nice trust lati lazungulira lonse kuphunzitsa zakavotedwe likukhulupilira akavota mwaunyinji 
  mneneri wabungwelo grace hara wati bungwelo lidamwaza mauthenga mnjira zosiyanasiyana amalawi akumudzi kwambiri amve za chisankho cha mkujachi 
  ulendo uno bungwe lathu lokha lomwe lidali kalikiliki kuphunzitsa kumema zachisankhochi kupatula zipani zomwe zomamemanso chokondweretsa nchoti akuonetsa alandira uthenga mokwanira adarero hara 
  kadaulo kayendetsedwe ka zinthu mdziko vincent kondowe wati chisankho chimenecho chofunika umunthu zinthu zidzayende 
  wati munthu akuyenera kuzindikira ufulu wokaponya voti ufulu wa enanso choncho lachiwirilo akaponye voti yake akathana nazo nkumapita kwawo kukadikira zotsatira 
  amalawi apite mwaunyinji kukavota voti yawo tsogolo lawo la ana adzatsogoze umunthu osati kudzikonda ayi timanena zonse dzikoli lathu olichengetera ndife tomwe adatero kondowe 
  kadaulo pandale george phiri wati amalawi adapanga kale chiganizo cha kavotedwe adati mpofunika asankhe mtsogoleri yemwe wawauza zomveka pakampeni kuopa kudzagwira fuwa lamoto 
  munthu wofuna voti amayenera kupanga kampeni kuuza zomwe wakonza kungovotera ndakonda uyu mawa podzafunsa zitukuko amadzati nnalonjeza liti basi kakasi adatero phiri 
  kwa atsogoleri omwe akudzaima nawo phiri wati potengera malamulo kampeni ikuyenera kutsekedwa mawa lamulungu 6 koloko mmawa ndiye akuyenera atsindika zawo moyenera 
  wati voti ya lachiwiri mwayi wachiwiri kwa amalawi kusankha mtsogoleri wakumtima kotero akuyembekeza amalawi akavota mwaunyinji 
  wampando wa bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec chifundo kachale adauza atolankhani sabata yatha bungwelo lokonzeka kuyendetsa chisankhocho palo mavuto 
  vuto lalikulu lomwe lolipo ndikupelewera kwa ndalama k7.8 biliyoni bajeti yonse ya chisankho 
  potengera zipsinjo zomwe zidaoneka kampeni mneneri wa polisi james kadadzera wati apolisi adzaonetsetsa wavota mwamtendere lachiwirilo 
  takhala tikupereka chitetezo ku zipani zonse kampeni tipitirira mpaka avote tidzapitirira kuteteza anthuwo adatero kadadzera 
  chisankhochi chichitika khoti lidapeza chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa cha 2019 sichidayende potsatira dandaulo la lazarus chakwera wa mcp saulos chilima wa utm omwe akupita kuchisankhochi mgwirizano 
  pachisankhochi apikisane mgwirizano wa mcp utm zipani zina zisanu nziwiri mgwirizanowo akuutcha tonse alliance mgwirizano wa dpp udf mbakuwaku movement for development mmd 
  chakwera akuimilira tonse alliance peter mutharika akuimira mgwirizano wa dpp udf pomwe peter kuwani akuimira mmd
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mavuto ambulasi anyanya mzipatala lachiwiri mmawa tili nyumba yachisoni pachipatala cha gulupu mzinda wa blantyre rose kaphesi mwana achibale atambalala padzuwa maso kunjira kudikira ambulasi 
  sabata yatha chitulukireni mchipatala ambulasi yoti iwatengere kumudzi kwawo ku nsanje palibe 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka sindikudziwa ambulasi ibwera liti timayenera tinyamuke lamulungu mpaka lero adatero kaphesi 
  awa ndiye mavuto omwe ayanga mzipatala za boma mdziko muno zomwe zakhumudwitsa wa bungwe lopititsa patsogolo ntchito zaumoyo la malawi health equity network mhen george jobe 
  tamvani yapezanso amayi 15 adaberekera panjira chaka chino chokha pachipatala chachingono cha kandeu mboma la ntcheu pamene amapita kuchipatala cha boma cha ntcheu akathandizidwe 
  mwa ogwira ntchito pachipatalapo amene sadafune kutchulidwa adati vuto lakusowa kwa ambulasi lafika powawa 
  tidauzidwa tilandira ambulasi 2009 adati timange malo wosungira ambulasiyo mpaka kuli chuu adatero 
  kandeu ili pamtunda wa makilomita 36 kukafika kuchipatala chaboma akuti amatengedwa machila panjinga popita kuchipatala chachikulu 
  zina amatengedwa matola amalipira k20 000 akawasiye kuchipatala adaonjeza wachipatalayu chaka chino chokha 15 aberekera panjira adamwalira mnjira 
  nako kuchipatala cha chilipa mboma la mangochi akuti awiri amwalira chaka chino pamene amadikirira ambulasi idzawatenge 
  wapampando wa chipatala cha chilipa nyakwawa nkaya ya mdera la t chilipa yati ambulasi imodzi yokha yomwe ikutumikira zipatala zisanu 
  tili chipatala cha chilipa katema mtimabi phirilongwe kapire komwe ikutumikira mitunda yotalikirana makilomita 40 misewu yake siyabwino idatero mfumuyi 
  wati wakhala akudandaula yankho palibe ambulasi ichokere ku mtimabi kudzafika ku chilipa yaitali ndizomwe zidachititsa awiri amwalire amene atumizidwe kuchipatala cha mangochi adatero nkaya 
  pachipatala cha masasa ku dedza balaka odwala amawauza agule mafuta ambulasi iwatumikire 
  pachipatala chaboma cha rumphi mavuto akulanso malinga mneneri wachipatalachi bwanalori mwamlima 
  tidali ambulasi 6 4 sizikuyenda mavuto alipo tikafike ku hewe komwe mtunda wa makilomota 60 adatero mwamlima 
  chipatala cha nkhotakota pali ambulasi imodzi yokha pachipatalachi jimmy phiri wati kusayenda kwa ambulasi zina kwadzetsa mavuto akulu 
  jobe akuganiza unduna wa zaumoyo udakapatsidwa ndalama zambiri mavutowa akadachepa 
  tili mavuto ambiri mzipatala amene akufunika ndalama zambiri pali mavuto azakudya mayendedwe mavutowa athe pakufunika ndalama zambiri 
  maboma ambulasi akulephera kukonzetsa vuto kuchepa kwa madalaivala zina vuto mafuta womwe akuchititsa wodwala azisonkha ndalama ambulasi iyende nzachisoni boma lichitepo kanthu msanga adaonjeza jobe 
  mwa akuluakulu aku unduna wa zaumoyo beston chisamile wati boma lili mapulani ogula ambulasi zina 
  mavuto alipo tili mapulani oti tigule ambulasi zina adatero chisamile
Label: HEALTH

Text:
amayi alindi ufulu opititsa patsogolo ntchito zampingo ccjp wolemba glory kondowe bungwe la chilungamo mtendere dayosizi ya dedza lati amayi alindi udindo opititsa patsogolo ntchito za mpingo wakatolika 
 kasudze omwe modzi wa akulu abungweli dayosizi ya dedza powonjezerapo ati kafukufuku yemwe bungwe lawo lachilungamo mtendere lachita akusonyeza amayi ambiri sakutenga nawo gawo pogwira ntchito zikulu zikulu zomwe mpingo wakatolika umalimbikitsa maka posapezeka mmaudindo akulu akulu komaso kupereka maganizo ku ntchito zomwe mpingo ukugwira 
 mwazina kasudze akhazikitsa magulu omwe azigwira ma parish awiri kasina bembeke azimayi azikhala pansi kukambirana mavuto omwe amayi akukumana nawo 
 zomwe kafukufuku tapedza zoti amayi azikhala nawo pampando amayi akumachitilidwa nkhaza zosiyanasiyana zomwe zimawapangitsa kubwedzeretsa moyo wawo wachikhristu anatero kasudze 
 padakalipano amayiwa apatsidwa maphunziro oyenera aziwawunikira muzikhomo zomwe akudutsamo za gender equality act
Label: RELIGION

Text:
kudali ku presbyterian church of malawi kudali kuphwanya mafupa ku dream centre assemblies of god mumzinda wa blantyre loweruka 2 may pamene faith mussa amachititsa ukwati bwenzi lake brenda chitika 
  kanamwali kopanda banga kopanda chipsera thupi losalala kathupi lomva mafuta 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu ikokatu ka mmudzi mwa sikoya kwa t chikumbu mboma la mulanje iko kachinayi kubadwa mbanja la ana asanu 
  faith mussa kuimbira namwali kanyimbo kachikondi faith amene adatchuka kwambiri nyimbo ya desperate akuti ubongo udasokonekera pamene adaona njoleyi lamulungu 2009 pomwe mnyamatayu adapita kumpingo wa brenda wa presbyterian church of malawi pcm mumzinda wa blantyre kukatsitsimuka 
  faith adatsitsimuka zenizeni kusalalanso kwa njoleyi kudaziziritsa mtima tsikuli mulungu adakumana chosowa chakedi 
  ndili mumpingomo foni idaitana ndiye ndidapita panja kukayankha ndili panjapo kulankhula fonipo ndidaona namwaliyu chapakataliko akutonthoza mwana akutero faith 
  maso adali namwali khuku lidali foni samasunthika pena brenda akuti amathawitsa diso lake asaphane maso mnyamatayu faith samasunthika 
  zidatanthauza kanthu kena mumtima mwa faith nkhani yonse idakambidwa patangotha mwezi 
  titaweruka mchimwene wanga tidaperekeza namwaliyu ndinene apa mwana amatonthozayo sadali 
  poyamba brenda amacheza mbale wanga ndiye pamenepa ndidadziwiratu ndikuyenera kanthu adatero faith 
  pangonopangono awiriwa adakhazikitsa macheza faith sadachedwetse kugwetsera oti adzalumikize awiriwa banja 
  padatha kuli zii za yankho tidakayika 28 august 2009 ndidangolandira foni kundiuza wagwirizana mbalume zomwe ndidamuuza adatero faith wachiwiri kubadwa mbanja la anyamata atatu
Label: RELIGION

Text:
mam idzudzula adus pophwanya ufulu wa maphunziro wa ana wolemba thokozani chapola bungwe lalikulu la chipembedzo cha chisilamu mdziko muno la muslim association of malawi ladzudzula mpingo wa anglican dayosizi ya uppershire ukuphwanya ufulu wamaphunziro kwa ophunzira msukulu za pulayimale sekondale za mmanga mboma la balaka 
 mneneri wa bungwe lomwe lomwe limawona za chovala cha hijab ku muslim association of malawi abdul salaam fadweck wanena potsatira kutsekedwa kwa sukuluzi zomwe za mpingo wa anglican kamba ka kusamvana pamene mpingowu unayika lamulo lakuti pasapezeke mwana wovala chovala cha hijab ya maphunziro sukuluzi 
 sukuluzi zakhala zili zotseka kwa sabata zoposa malinga fadweck zimenezi zikupereka chiopsezo kuufulu wa maphunziro kwa ophunzira sukuluzi 
 pomwe ndikunena sukuluyi yotseka kwa sabata zoposa tsopano zomwe sizoyenera kwa mwana wa sukulu poganiziranso mwa akuyembekezeka kulemba mayeso standade 8 anatero fadweck 
 ati mdziko muno palibe amene ufulu wotseka sukulu kupatula unduna wa zamaphunziro wokha basi apempha mpingo wa anglican utsekule sukuluyi msanga 
 sukulu imeneyi imathandizidwa boma aphunzitsi amalandira ndalama za ku boma zomwe zikutanthauza misonkho yathunso ikumapita ku sukulu imeneyi 
 pakafunika ntchito zachitukuko kaya makalasi makolo amathandizira ambiri mwa amapita atavala hijab ndiye amalora kholo kukagwira ntchito atavala hijab kumukanira mwana kulowa mkalasi atavala hijab anadabwa motero fadweck 
 woyendetsa ntchito za maphunziro dayosizi ya uppershire ya mpingo wa anglican canon jailosi anakana kulankhulapo kanthu nkhani yi 
 padakalipano unduna wa zamaphunziro sunanenebe za tsogolo la maphunziro sukulupa pomwe ikupitilira yotseka
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
amangidwa kamba kogwilira msungwana ozelezeka apolisi mboma la chikwawa akusunga mchitokosi wina wa zaka 35 zakubadwa charles mikeyasi kamba komuganizira wagwilira mtsikana wa zaka 18 zakubadwa yemwe wozelezeka 
 malinga wachiwiri kwa mneneri wa apolisi mbomali sergeant dickson matemba zachitika 18 mwezi uno pomwe bamboyu yemwe amachokera ku mowa anakumana msungwanayu pomwe anamukokera tchire lina la kufupi komwe mtsikanayu amachokera kumugwilira 
 ozungulira omwe anagwira bamboyu kukamutula mmanja mwa apolisi 
 ndizoonadi apolisi kuno ku chikwawa tamanga wina yemwe wagwirira mzimayi wa zaka 18 yemwe ulumali wa ubongo pamene amachokera ku mowa anatero sergeant matemba 
 ati bamboyu akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwa pakadali apolisi achenjeza ku derali adzisamalira ana omwe ma ulumali onga awa pomayenda nawo limodzi 
 charles mikeyasi amachokera mmudzi mwa bwalo mfumu kasisi mboma la chikwawa
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
ntchito yomanga njanji ya ku nkaya yaima   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   ntchito yomanga njanji yochoka ku kachaso kupita ku nkaya ayiimitsa mpaka kampani ya mota engel ogwira ntchito kukampaniyo atamvana chimodzi 
  ogwira ntchitowo akunyanyala pofuna kukakamiza mabwana awakwezere malipiro nzika 300 za ku thailand zipakire 
  kunyanyalaku kudayambira lolemba 24 june lachiwiri nduna ya za ntchito eunice makangala idatsetserekera kumeneko kukalankhula ogwira ntchitowa abwerere kuntchito sizidaphule kanthu pofika lachitatu mmawa nkuti ogwira ntchitowa asadabwerere kuntchito 
  mwa ogwira ntchito kumeneko akuchita nawo sitalakayo sadafune kutchulidwa dzina adauzatamvanilachitatu sagwira ntchito mpaka dandaulo lawo litamveka 
  ndikukamba anzathu akubwera ku mwanza kudzatithandiza sitalakayi sitibwerera kuntchito mpaka titaona malipiro athu akukwera omwe achoka mdziko la thailand akubwerera kwawo adatero mkuluyo 
  padakhota nyani mchira mpakuti kampaniyi sabata zapita akuti inathotha gulu la ogwira ntchito kumeneko omwe mdziko muno kulemba ochokera ku thailand 
  anthuwa akuti pafupifupi 300 chenicheni chomwe amabwerera mdziko muno sichioneka sadziwa ntchito kuphunzitsidwa amalawi 
  chodabwitsa nchakuti malipiro akunjawo adali okwera kuposa amalawi omwe amatha ntchito 
  ntchito yake yomwe akugwira kuyendetsa mathirakitala mabewula zomwe amalawi timatha mwa alendowo sakuthanso kugwira ntchito tikuwaphunzitsa ndife tikudabwa zikuchitika nanga nchifukwa chiyani akulandira ndalama zoposa omwe tikutha ntchito adadabwa mkuluyo 
  malinga amalawi akulandira ndalama yosaposa k30 000 pomwe akamuna akunjawa akumatula makwacha owaposa 
  makangala adati walankhula akuluakulu kampaniyi mamulumuzana mdziko la thailand omwe alibe ukadaulo wa ntchito apakire azipita 
  lolemba wa kampaniyi jose denis da silva wati akuluakulu kampaniyi akukambiranabe ogwira ntchitowa adapereka chiyembekezo kusamvanaku kutha popanda zovuta 
  mota engel kampani yomwe yalemba kampani ya ku brazil yotchedwa vale imange njanjiyi yomwe ikuchokera ku moatize ku tete mpaka ku nacala port mdziko la mozambique kudutsira mdziko la malawi 
  malinga yemwe amatitsina khuku pankhaniyi pofika lachinayi akuti mbali ziwirizi zinalepherabe kugwirizana zomwe auzana nkuti zokambirana zidzachitike lachiwiri sabata ikudzayi 
  zikusonyeza sitigwira ntchito mpaka lachiwiri lomwe tidzagwirizane zenizeni tisanabwerere ku ntchito pazokambiranazo akutinso kubwera akuluakulu kampaniyi ochokera mmayiko mbali ya boma 
  sitikusinthika zathu akuluakulu la thailand azipita timva pomwe tikumane lachiwiriro atiuza zotani adatero mkuluyo 
  pomwe timalemba nkhaniyi nkuti yankho kunyanyalako lisanadziwike 
  kampani ya mota idalemba amalawi oposa 3 000 omwe akugwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana kumeneko
Label: TRANSPORT

Text:
mmera watuluka samalani atero katswiri mmera watuluka momwe zikuonekera alimi ambiri akhoza mphumi chaka chino zinthu zikapanda makamaka pakagwedwe ka mvula katswiri wa zamalimidwe wati mvula ili apo mpofunikanso njira zoyenera paulimi 
  woyanganira za ulangizi njira zamakono zamalimidwe dr wilfred lipita wati mmene mvula yayambira mwayi wa alimi kutsata njira zoti asadzakumane zomwe zidaoneka chaka chatha 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka poyankhula uchikumbe mkuluyu adati mwa zina ino ndiye yabwino yoti alimi akhoza kukolola kusunga madzi ambiri kutabwera ngamba mwadzidzidzi asadzanongoneze bondo mmera wawo omwe watuluka kale bwinowu ukufota 
  tiyeni tichilimike panopa pomwe mvula ikugwamu tiyeni tikolole madzi ambiri kudzera mnjira zosiyanasiyana zomwe timadziwa zija nkusunga madzi ambiri njira yokolola madzi imodzi mwa njira zodalirika tsopano adatero lipita 
  adati alimi asalole udzu zitsamba kutasa mminda zimaononga chakudya cha mbewu mmalo moti mbewu zidye chakudya chokwanira kukula msanga mothamangitsana mvula 
  mvula yosadalirika iyi masiku ano moti ikamagwa chonchi yoti alimi tiigwiritse ntchito osalola mwayi utiphonye mmunda mukangooneka udzu zitsamba lowamoni msangamsanga nkupalira chakudya chomwe chili mnthaka chikhale cha mbewu zanu zokha adatero lipita 
  mkuluyu adatinso pomwe pali mwayi wa manyowa feteleza alimi asazengereze kuthira motsatira malangizo ochokera kwa alangizi momwe unduna wa zamalimidwe umanenera 
  zambiri mvula ikachuluka mizere mbewu zimakokoloka kaamba kosowa chitetezo chimzere chotchinga mmbalimmbali mwa munda milaga kukwezera mizere msanga 
  mukaona madzi akuchuluka mmunda dziwani iliyonse mizere mbewu zanu zikhoza kukokoloka ndiye njira yabwino nkuunda chimzere chachikulu mmphepete mwa mundawo milaga kukwezera mizereyo msanga madzi asadachuluke mphamvu 
  malangizo uwu amaperekedwa mwaulere akuona pali vuto lililonse mmunda mwawo kudera kwawoko kuli alangizi zamalimidwe omwe okonzeka kuwathandiza iliyonse adatero lipita 
  uchikumbe wathu sabata yatha katswiriyu adalangiza alimi abzale mbewu zocha msanga zopirira ku ngamba sabata ino wawonjezerapo mmapando momwe mbeu zidakanika kumera mofunika kupakizamo msanga 
  adati kupakiza msanga kumathandiza mbewu zisasiyane kwambiri mmunda zizilandira dzuwa kuwala kofanana kuopa zina zingatchingike zinzake kaamba kochedwa kumera 
  ndikhulupirira alimi amadziwa kupatula mchere wa mnthaka madzi mbewu zimafunanso dzuwa kuwala zizibiriwira mbewu zokulira pamthunzi zimakhala zonyozoloka zachikasu ndiye pachifukwachi sipafunika mbewuzo zizisiyana makulidwe ake adatero katswiriyu
Label: FARMING

Text:
awiri afa atamira mmadzi ku ntchisi awiri akuti apezeka atafa ngozi yomira mmadzi mboma la ntchisi 
 malingana wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomalo sub inspector richard kaponda ngozi yoyamba idachitika 7 may pomwe mwana wa miyezi 6 adapezeka atafa atagwera mmadzi omwe beseni zinachitikira mmudzi wa mwamulo mdera la mfumu yayikulu malenga mbomalo 
 munthu wina amene wakhudzidwanso imfa ya mtunduwu wina wamisala yemwe sakudziwika kwawo anapezeka atafera mtsinje wa mdambo ukupezekanso mmudzi mwa mdambo mdera la mfumu yayikulu malenga mboma lomwelo la ntchisi zinachitika 8 mwezi omwe uno 
 mwazina sub inspector kaponda wapempha omwe ana omwe vuto la ubongo aziwayanganitsitsa zomwe akuchita pofuna kupewa imfa za mtunduwu
Label: SOCIAL

Text:

Text:

 mwa akuluakulu bungweli grey kalindekafe anena ku zomba maphunziro tsiku limodzi olimbikitsa zamtendere omwe bungweli linakonzera mafumu akuluakulu zipani zandale makhansala aphungu ya malamulo mboma la zomba 
 ati atsogoleri ndale udindo wozindikiritsa omwe amawatsatira za momwe zotsatira za chisankho zimakhalira cholinga chakuti zotsatira zikadzabwera mosemphana momwe amaganizira pasadzakhale wa ziwawa 
 polankhula woyimilira zipani zandale zomwe zinabwera pankumanowu wa achinyamata chipani cha utm mchigawo chakummawa henderson waya ati zomwe bungweli lachita pobweretsa maphunziro zithandiza chinthunzithunzi chabwino momwe angalandilire zotsatira za chisankhochi

Text:
sitilembetsa mayeso aphunzitsi amene alembetse mayeso fomu 4 chaka chino omwe ayambe 22 june aopseza sadzagwira ntchitoyo unduna wa maphunziro salandira ndalama zomwe amapatsidwa akamapita kutchuthi 
  zikudza pamene ophunzira makolo msukulu za pulaimale akudandaula sitalaka ya aphunzitsi isokoneza kukonzekera mayeso temu yachitatu omwe ayambe kumayambiriro kwa mwezi wa july aphunzitsi pafupifupi 63 000 akuchita sitalaka pofuna kukakamiza boma liwapatse ndalama zomwe amalandira akamapita kutchuthi za chaka cha boma cha 2016 2017 chomwe chithe 30 june 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka apolisi adathamangitsa ana ku chileka tamvani wapeza pambali sitalaka imene yachititsanso ana sukulu za pulaimale zina apite pamsewu kudandaula sakuphunzira zokonzekera mayeso fomu 4 zili gwedegwede kusamvana pakati boma aphunzitsi kukupitirira 
  mlembi wa teachers union of malawi tum charles kumchenga adati palibe mphunzitsi alembetse mayeso msukulu kuyanganira mayeso msce asadalandire ndalama ya tchuthi pachaka 
  boma limayenera kusamalira umoyo wa oyanganira mayeso omwe aphunzitsi ophunzira akulangika cha kholo lathu boma boma lidalemba ntchito mphunzitsi asamalire ana kumidzi lili mayankho mavuto onsewa adatero 
  naye wa tum willie malimba adati aphunzitsi okhumudwa boma onse okhudzidwa akukanirana zofuna zawo 
  adati boma lingopereka ndalamazi osati kumangoyankhula zomwe zina zikulowa mabodza 
  bungweli lati lipereka chenjezo ku boma nthambi ya mayeso ya malawi national examination board maneb palibe mphunzitsi ayanganire mayeso asadalandirenso ndalama ya ntchitoyi 
  wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe za maphunziro mdziko muno la civil society education coalition csec benedicto kondowe wati mayeso msce akhoza kupepuka malinga zomwe zikuchitikazi 
  kukhumudwa komwe kulipo kudzetsa kubera mayeso choopsa chichitika maphunziro mdziko muno sitisamala kulemba kwa mayeso gawo lachitatu msukulu za pulaimale july nkosathandiza umafunsa zomwe waphunzitsa apa ana sakuphunzira tisaiwalenso awa mayeso woti ana apite kalasi ina adatero 
  adati wokhumudwa kulekerera kwa boma nkhani ya ndalama ya tchuthiyi mavuto aphunzitsi omwe likuyenera kukonza 
  boma silimvera zokhumba za aphunzitsi avutika kwa yaitali yakwana yokakamiza boma kupereka zomwe zawo boma lilimbikitse maphunziro abwino makolo alimbe mtima kulifunsa chomwe ana sakuphunzira ndiponso ana achite zomwezo adatero kondowe 
  msabatayi aphunzitsi adalowa sabata yachiwiri akuchita sitalaka ana nawo adalowerera sitalakayo ana ophunzira msukulu zina ku blantyre ntcheu balaka adapita pamsewu kuyambira lolemba pofuna kukakamiza boma kumva kulira kwa aphunzitsi 
  pambali potseka misewu ina ana enanso adamenya kuvulaza apolisi atatu ku lunzu mumzinda wa blantyre pomwe 23 kuphatikizapo ophunzira 9 adamangidwa ku ntcheu apolisi adathamangitsa ana ku ndirande utsi okhetsa misozi 
  kafukufuku wa tamvani adasonyeza ana mmaboma ambiri mdziko muno sakuphunzira ana aphunzitsi sakupita kusukulu komwe 
  mwachitsanzo pasukulu ya pulaimale sekondale ya katoto mumzinda wa mzuzu tidapeza ana khumakhuma kulingalira za tsogolo lawo adali mpira 
  sindkuona za kutsogoloku tikawafunsa aphunzitsi sitalaka itha liti akutiyankha sakudziwa si zili mmanja mwawo chifundo akumatiphunzitsa zina adatero wophunzira wa fomu 2
Label: EDUCATION

Text:

Text:
bungwe la agricos lati ulimi wa nthochi ubwelera mchimake wolemba glory kondowe bungwe lothandiza alimi luso lapadera la agricos lachitatu lati lili chiyembekezo chakuti ulimi wa nthochi ubwereranso mchimake zaka zikubwerazi 
 oyendetsa bungweri justin kaliwo anena mzinda wa blantyre maphunziro alimi mbewuyi 
 chinthunzi chosonyeza imodzi mwa matenda mbewu ya nthochi tsikuli kaliwo anafotokodza zamene angatukulire ulimi wa nthochi nyemba omwe bungweli ukulimbikitsa 
 ati bungwe lawo lapeza misika yabwino kunja kwa lino komwe nthochi ikufunika yochuluka ulimiwu unalowa pansi kamba ka matenda omwe anagwira mbewuyi zaka zapitazi 
 bungwe la agricos layika chidwi chothandiza alimi mbewu ya nthochi mbewu za nyemba omwe mwayi wa misika yabwino anatero kaliwo 
 kaliwo bungwe lawo likufuna kuthandiza alimi nthochi ulimuwu uyambenso kuyenda athandiza alimi pothetsa matenda omwe anawononga mbewuyi zomwe zinachititsa alimi ataye ndalama za nkhaninkhani 
 mwazina bungwe la agrigos limathandiza alimi omwe mamembala ake luso la malimidwe makono momwe angapezere misika ya mbewu zawo
Label: FARMING

Text:

 malinga mtolankhani wathu amene anayankhula wa madalaivala wa kunyanyala ntchitoku kukuchitika mmadera onse olowera kutulukira mdziko lino ku karonga mchinji mwanza ku blantyre ku kanengo mzinda wa lilongwe 
 mwa atsogoleri madalaivalawa masautso chagomerana wati amalandira ndalama zochepa poyerekeza ndalama zomwe madalaivala anzawo ammaiko mchigawo cha sadc amalandira 
 tinapempha mabwana athu atiwonjezere ndalama zina zokhudza ntchito sizinasinthe tinalemba makalata ku unduna mpaka palibe yankho limene tikulandira anatero chagomerana 
 ati akufunitsitsa madalaivalawa adzilandira ndalama kuyambira 400 000 kwacha mpaka 500 000 kwacha kaamba koti padakali mwa amalandira ndalama ysapyola 50,000 kwacha 
 madalaivalawa ati achita sitirakayi kufikira boma lizalowelerepo nkhaniyi

Text:
kamatira nthenda yosautsa thenda zina ukazimva mmakutu kuwawa chakuwopsa kwake ambiri amataya mtima matenda aja edzi komatu kunjaku kulinso matenda omvetsa ululu wadzawoneni mwa matenda otere aja amawatcha kamatira steven pembamoyo adacheza socrates mbewe zokhudza matendawa machezawo adali motere   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mbewe tandifotokozerani mumachokera mumatani 
  choyamba kwathu ku sawawa kwa mfumu chikowi ku zomba ndili muno mzinda wa lilongwe kuthandiza makamaka pankhani ya mankhwala azitsamba mwachidule ndine singanga 
  mbewe ndachiritsa ambiri odwala kamatira ndimangomva za matenda kamatira kodi amenewa matenda anji malume amenewa matenda osautsa kwabasi munthu amangomva mseru kubaya kupotokola mmimba achite chimbudzi kapenanso kutaya madzi amalephera ndiye amakhala akumva ululu koopsa 
  kwenikweni matenda amenewa amayamba pali njira zosiyanasiyana zina zachilengedwe zomwe angafotokoze achipatala pali njira za mwa zochita kuponyerana zomwe kuthana nazo kwake kuchikuda basi 
  kuwazindikira kwake akamayamba ungawazindikire ndilankhula kwambiri kumbali yachikudayi ndiko ndimadziwa kwambiri ndanena kale matenda amenewa mitundu pawiri pali kamatira wamoto yemwe munthu amangomva kutentha mmimba mchikhodzodzo kumalephera kudzithandiza sadathandizidwe masiku 7 ambiri akhoza kupita wina wa kamatira wozizira yemwe munthu amatha sabata akungomva ululu 
  inuyo mudathandizako munthu wa vuto limeneli ambirimbiri amabweranso okha kudzandithokoza cha chikumbumtima cha ululu chomwe amakhala nacho ndathandiza ambiri mmadera osiyanasiyana osati kuno kokhanso ayi 
  mankhwala ake mumatani pali zizimba zake chachikulu nchakuti timasema mtengo wa mankhwalawo nkuusakaniza bwinobwino ndiye munthu uja amathira theka la supuni yaingono muphala nkumwa akatero amatsegula mmimba kwambiri zotulukazo zimakhala zakuda kwambiri makala okanyakanya 
  komano oponyerayo pali njira zosiyanasiyana machitidwe ake amodzi amatapa chimbudzi mkodzo olo madindo amatako amagwiritsa ntchito nsima yotsala kwa munthu yemwe akufuna kulodzayo nkhoko zampoto momwe mudaphikidwa nsimayo machitidwe ake amatenga zomwe ndatchulazi nkusakaniza mankhwala kenako nkuika muchithu chosachucha kudontha ambiri amakonda bango mkatimo amasakanizamo singano kuwonjezera ululu uja 
  ndiye kuchira kwake kwa asinganga basi palibenso njira ina zili zoponyeredwa apo bii ndiye wolodzayo akhululuke nkumumasula mnzakeyo zikakhala zachilengedwe ndiye mapilitsi aliko kuchipatala munthu amatha kumwa nkutsekula mmimba bwinobwino chachikulu choti mudziwe nchakuti si onse omwe amadziwa mankhwala ake sadziwa amangokakamira chofuna makobidi singanga weniweni akaunika zili zachilengedwe amamuuza chilungamo munthu 
  muzonse zomwe mwakumana nazo inuyo mumapeza chimachititsa kuponyerana nthenda yoopsayi nchiyani nkani imakhala dumbo munthu wina nawe nsanje ndiye akuganiza njira yokuzunzira adayambana ndiye winayo akufuna kumvetsa mnzakeyo kuwawa mpamene zimachitika

Text:
aphungu aku nyumba ya malamulo apitilira kupempha zitukuko byrichard makombe content uploads/2019/07 parl3 300x168.jpg alt= width="712 height="399 > aphungu nyumba ya malamulo ya malawi aphungu ya malamulo lachitatu sabata ino anapitilira kupempha zitukuko zosiyanasiyana zomwe akufuna boma liwachitire ku madera 
 ambiri mwa aphunguwa apempha boma liganizire zomanga misewu zipatala sukulu pofuna kuthandiza adzipeza thandizo losiyanasiyana mosavuta 
 mwa aphungu yemwe akuyimira dela la dowa ngala arthur sungitsa apempha boma kupyolera ku unduna wa zaumoyo limange chipatala ku derali pofuna kuthandiza adzipeza thandizo la zaumoyo mosavuta 
 ku dera komwe ndikuimira kwakhala kulibe chipatala cha boma kwa yaitali zomwe zimaika pachiwopsezo miyoyo ya ambiri anatero sungitsa 
 sungitsa ati aku derali akuvutika kulipira ndalama zambiri kuchitala chomwe sichaboma choncho chiyembekezo boma limanga chipatala pofuna kuthetsa vutoli 
 mavuto akula kwambiri amwalira kuchapatala cholipilitsacho eni ake amakaniza kumasula mtembo zomwe zili zosakhala nchifukwa chake ndikuyesetsa kuchitapo kanthu boma limange chipatalaanatero sungitsa 
 poyankhulapo phungu wa dera la mangochi malombe misolo mussa kapichira ati akufuna boma likonze zipatala ku dera kwawo komwe padakali zinthu sizili 
 mmawu mussa adandaula kusowa chidwi kwa nduna zina za boma zomwe ati sizimamvetsera zomwe aphunguwa amafotokoza zokhudza madera 
 kapichira anapitilira kudandaula khalidwe la nduna zina zomwe zimango yenda yenda pomwe aphungu amayankhula mnyumbayi zomwe akuti zimapereka nkhawa zatsogolo la zomwe aphunguwa akupempha
Label: ECONOMY
