Text:
cron idzudzula katuni wa malawi news mgwirizano wa mabungwe omwe umawona za ufulu wa ana mdziko muno wa child rights organisations network wadzudzula chomwe chimadziwika dzina loti achalume cartoon chomwe chidatuluka news paper ya malawi news yapa 28 december chaka chatha chokamba zosemphana ufulu wamwana wankazi pankhani yogonana 
 chomwe chinadzudzulidwacho mgwirizanowu muli mabungwe save the children world vision plan international malawi sos childrens village malawi anena kudzera chikalata chomwe mabungwewa chomwe chati zomwe anajambula haswell kunyenje cartoon yawo yotchedwa achalume zinali zokhumudwitsa pomwe analemba mamuna wina adagonana mtsikana wangono wadzaka 16 mtsikanayo anapereka matenda opatsilana pogonana kwa bamboyo 
 ati mwana yemwe sadafike zaka 18 ayenera kumalimbikitsidwa ku nkhani yamaphunziro osati nkhani zogonana mabungwewa ati malamulo adziko lino amaletsa kukamba nkhani zogonana mwana yemwe sanakwanitse dzaka 18 zakubadwa kutero mulandu waukulu 
 mai edith tsikidzani mwa ogwira ntchito ku bungwe la save the children ndizomvetsa chisoni mpaka mdziko muno akugwiritsa ntchito mphanvu kutchuka kwawo pofuna kuchitira ana zachipongwe kulimbikitsa mchitidwewu komwe ndikupha tsogolo la anawa 
 ifeyo ndife okhudzika kaamba ka katoon imeneyi yomwe ikukolezera abambo ambiri azichita zosayenera wana aatsikana omwe sanakwane zaka 18 chomwe chitonzo chzchikulu kwa anawa amayi mdziko muno anatero tsikidzani 
 mwazina tsikidzani katoon imeneyi ndikukolezera mchitidwewu kwa abambo omwe amakhala maganizo ofuna kugona ana mmalo moika uthenga oti utha kuthandiza kuteteza anawa
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
usi wapempha amalawi alemekeze mutharika pomuchotsa mpando wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa chipani cha utm dr micheal usi walangiza mdziko muno akavote chisankho chikudzachi cholinga chochotsa president peter mutharika pampando 
 dr usi amalankhula mboma la mangochi pamene amalandira yusuf kusweje omwe anayimira phungu mchipani cha udf mdera lapakati mboma la mangochi yemwenso wachiwiri kwa wokopa mchipanichi yemwe tsopano walowa chipani cha utm akuluakulu asanu ochokeranso ku udf 
 dr usi ati ulemu waukulu amalawi angapereke kwa president mutharika kukavota asakhalenso mtsogoleri wa lino azipuma 
 pamenepa ati kulowa kwa mchipanichi kukuwonetsa poyera chikhulupiliro chomwe nacho utsogoleri wa dr saulos chilima 
 tachilandira kwambiri chilichonse chimayangana mtsogoleri mmene zakhaliramu zasonyeza ayamba kuzindikira anatero usi 
 polankhulapo yusuf kusweje ati achita kampeni yamphamvu mboma la mangochi cholinga chakuti mgwirizano wa utm mcp upeze mavoti ochuluka mbomalo
Label: POLITICS

Text:
kulimbana alaliki ndidakhala wenela tsikulo kubwira uku ndikuitanira basi 
  ndirande iyi machinjiri iyo ntcheu balaka cha uko ndidali kutero 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza pajatu masiku ndikati ndilowe three engine kuitanira basi imodzi zimatheka 
  ya ntcheu balaka ija itadzaza ndidapita ndikatenge zanga kaya ikafika ku balaka ndilibe nazo ntchito itapezeka pofika mdeka mwangotsala atatu zingandikhudze nditafika uko ndidapeza munthu wa mulungu akulalikira keupempherera apaulendo ayende 
  ndikunena ziwanda za pamsewu zakonzeka kukulikhani ziwanda za linthipe zakonzeka kumwa magazi anu simutetezedwa inde ziwanda zochoka pansi madzi zikusautsani simulapa adali kutero mlaliki 
  abale anzanga ulaliki wamtundu wanji uwu wokhala amalankhula nazo ziwanda kodi mlaliki ameneyu atati wakatumikira kuchipatala sanganene ochimwa lapani lero lino nditi lapana simutero zifuwa zanuzo zikutengerani kugahena kusaweruzika kwanuko wa kumoto basi 
  mwayi omwe utumiki wa kuchipatala udamusempha kodi sindinganene akuopa kuchipatalako sakatulukako loboola ilo amapeza wenela nkhani ya alaliki ili mkamwamkamwa ya mlaliki makala funeral mumudziwa woimba uja ankakamba za mfumu betisezala zolembalemba pakhoma tikumva zinavutatu uko ku mangalande 
  mwachidule zikumveka mlaliki adacheza mnzake wa abiti patuma wina pangongole ndiye lero nkhani yonse ili mbalambanda 
  akungomulakwira mlaliki tikudziwa ankamwa kusuta mpaka kugona mchimbudzi kalelo asanalape lero taonani nkhani zikuphulikazi adatero abiti patuma titakhala malo aja timakonda wenela madzulo tsikulo 
  apa nkuti akundionetsa zithunzi mavidiyo pafoni yake akuonetsa chikondi cha mlaliki uyu msangwana wa kwa msamati 
  nkhanizi zikumavuta kuyankhira chiwanda choipa chalowa pamudzi taonani mudabweretsa za uyu wojambula mizimu wopalasa mlengalenga naye uyu wa matama galimoto zake tsono mukutinso za mlaliki wathu wa ku chilomoni adafunsa gervazzio 
  musandifunse nkhaniyi imayenda nanenso sindikudziwa chomwe ndikudziwiratu nchakuti awa masiku otsiriza kuyalutsa mulungu ana njoka akuchitenga cha fasho
Label: RELIGION

Text:
papa ayendera odwala- mdziko la thailand w sizes="(max width 453px 100vw 453px />papa chipatala cha st louis mdziko la thailand mtsogoleri wa mpingo wakatolika papa francisko anakayendera odwala chipatala cha st louis mzinda wa bangkok ulendo omwe akucheza mdziko la thailand 
 polankhula ogwira ntchito chipatalachi okwana 700 okondwa anakayendera chipatalachi omwe akusoweka thandizo makamaka la uzimu 
 malipoti wailesi ya vatican ati chipatalachi anachitsegulira chaka cha 1898 ake ochitsogolera akuti pamene pali chikondi mulungu amakhalanso pomwepo 
 padakali chipatalachi chimayendetsedwa madotolo anamwino ochita za kafukufuku thandizo lochokera ku nthambi yoona za zipatala
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
ukhansala uli malirenice bungwe lophunzitsa zosiyanasiyana la national initiative for civic education nice lalangiza makhansala mumzinda wa zomba azikhala malire pogwira ntchito zawo 
  woyendetsa ntchito za bungwelo ku zomba albertina nsongolo ndiye adalankhula pamsonkhano wa mafumu makhansala mabungwe chitukuko cha mmadera mumzindawo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc chimene chidatsitsa dzaye bungwelo lisonkhanitse atsogoleriwa khalidwe la makhansala amene akumalumpha mafumu akafuna chitukuko mmadera mwawo 
  nsongolo adati chitukuko chingapite patsogolo kubwerera mmbuyo mfumu ikuyenera kutsinidwa khutu ili nsanamira ya dera kulikonse 
  kuipa kwa kumalumpha mafumu pankhani za chitukuko koti chitukukocho chimakhala chopanda maziko makhansala akachoka pampando munthu wopitiriza chitukukocho amasowa adatero nsongolo 
  nsongolo adaonjezera makhansala alekenso kudumpha atsogoleri makomiti chitukuko cha kumadera atsogoleri amenewa amene amakhala chidziwitso cha chitukuko chimene chikuyenera kubwera kumadera 
  chuma chambiri cha boma chimaonongeka akamakana kugwiritsa ntchito zinthu mijigo milatho zina zambiri zimene khansala wabweretsa kudera asadafunse kaye kuderalo akufuna chiyani adatero 
  gulupu mtiya wa mumzindawu adayamikira bungweli cha mkhumanowu adati chimkulirano chimene chidalipo pakati makhansala mafumu chachedwetsa kubwera kwa zitukuko zosiyana siyana mumzindawu 
  yambiri yatayika polimbana wamkulu ndani msonkhanowu watitsegula mmaso mtsogoleri malire ake ogwirira ntchito adatero gulupuyo 
  pothirirapo ndemanga davie maunde amene akugwirizira mpando wa meya wa mzinda wa zomba adalimbikitsa makhansala azidzichepetsa pamaso mafumuwa pozindikira akuluakulu mdambo mozimira moto
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:
zefinati alick kadaulo posema ziboliboli aluso onse luso losema ziboliboli si lachibwana limafunika khama munthu wolimba mtima golomoti mboma la dedza pali malo otchedwa golomoti curios group amene amapanga kugulitsa ziboliboli zefinati alick zonse amakhala pamalopa kugulitsa katundu uku akupanga wina bobby kabango adacheza naye za luso lake motere tidziwane wawa ndine zefinati alick ano malo anga zones ndikupangira limodzi wanga amenenso adandiphunzitsa ntchitoyi 
  alick ziboliboli zake kodi malo ano adatsekulidwa liti adatsekulidwa 2012 ineyo ndidayamba kusema ziboliboli 1998 panthawiyo ndinkagwirira ntchitoyi ku mua kenaka ndinkapangira kwanga 2012 mpamene timatsekula malo ano 
  zinthu ziti mumasema timasema ulionse wa zinyama womwe munthu akufuna chifaniziro cha munthu maria chifaniziro cha amtundu wachingoni galimoto zina zambiri zomwe sindingakwanitse kuzitchula 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi mukugwiritsira ntchito mtengo wanji pali mitengo yambiri yomwe amagwiritsira ntchito timakonda mtengo wa mtumbu 
  mumagwiritsira zida ziti popanga katunduyu mukakadula mtengowo mumayenera muyambe kusema sompho chikwanjenso chimafunika tchizulo sandpaper polishi zida zina zina chomwe tikusemacho chioneke 
  kodi chomwe mwanyamulacho nchiyani nanga zimatenga masiku angati ntchito itheke mutiuzenso mitengo yake ichi chifaniziro cha ya chipembere chimatenga sabata ziwiri mwina osafikanso malinga yomwe uli nayo chithe chimenechi chikugulitsidwa k10 000 chinachi chifaniziro cha wachingoni ameneyu amatha mofanana chinyamachi bola ukhale mayiyu timagulitsa k15 000 
  mwathandizika ntchitoyi ndagula nyumba ndimalipirira ana sukulu feteleza ndimagula ntchitoyi ndipezereponso mwayi kuwauza timapanga chilichonse chomwe akufuna momwe akufuna chionekere
Label: ARTS AND CRAFTS

Text:
mgwirizano ungathetse zipolowe mgwirizano pakati atsogoleri asemphane maganizo ndale ndiko kungathetse zipolowe mikangano ya ndale atero akadaulo 
  adanena potsatira chiwembu chofuna kuotcha maofesi bungwe loona z ku lilongwe sabata yatha kuotchedwa kwa galimoto ziwiri za otsatira gulu la united transformation movement utm masiku apitawo kuopsezedwa kwa otsatira utm ku nyumba ya malamulo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka throsell zokhumudwitsa kadaulo wa zandale ku chancellor college mustafa hussein adatamanda mtsogoleri wa chipani chachikulu cha mcp lazarus chakwera mtsogoleri wa utm saulos chilima pogwirana chanza kusekererana ku mwambo wa angoni maseko wa umhlangano adati zimathandiza otsatira zipani zawo aziyanjana osakhala maganizo chiwembu kwa amene akutsutsana nawo maganizo 
  nzofunika atsogoleri akusonyeza chikondi chimvano chotere mpovuta otsatira zipani zawo azipanga ziwawa aziopa kukhumudwitsa atsogoleriwo adatero hussein 
  kadaulo wina george phiri wa ku university of livingstonia unilia adati atsogoleri awiriwa ngofunika kuwayamikira chopachika kusiyana kwawo pandale nkudzichepetsa pamaso owatsatira 
  nzachidziwikire kumwambo umenewo kudali otsatira zipani zonse adaona zomwe atsogoleri adachita kotero anthuwo atakhala cholinga cha zipolowe akhonza maganizo adatero phiri 
  adati idakwana yoti amalawi azindikire tanthauzo lenileni la ndale za demokalase mpikisano ofuna kutukula osati kunyozana kuchitana ziwembi 
  ndale za demokalase zimafunika zipani zizipikisana pamfundo za chitukuko utsogoleri zambiri timaona otsatira zipani akulimbana simtundu umodzi adatero phiri 
  bungwe la mgwirizano wa maiko la united nations un lidadzudzula wa zipolowe ukupita patsogolo pomwe tikulowera ku chisankho cha 21 may 2019 
  mneneri wa un nkhani za ufulu wa liz throssell adati zipolowe zimene zakhala zikumvekazi nzosakoneza 
  galimoto ya phungu wina agness nyalonje idaotchedwa ku mangochi mmwezi wa august phungu winaso patricia kaliati adakumana mazangazime akufuna kulowa mnyumba ya malamulo mmwezi wa april atsogoleri amabungwe osiyanasiyana akhala akuwopsezedwa zikupereka chiopsezo demokalase adatero throssell
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mafumu akuopa ebola boma likuyeza kubwalo la ndege nanga oyenda pansi mantha matenda ebola agwira okhala mmalire lino pamene othawa mmaiko akulowabe mdziko muno nthendayi ikupitirira kufala 
  zapangitsa mafumu mmabomawa kupempha unduna wa zaumoyo ukhwimitse chitetezo ponena chiyambireni nthendayi undunawu sudafike mmadera kuwaphunzitsa za matendawa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mwachitsanzo msabatayi apolisi mboma la karonga kwa paramount kyungu adagwira 52 othawa mmaiko amene adalowa mdziko muno popanda zitupa 
  senior chief kalonga ya mbomalo ikuti mbomalo mantha cha anthuwa kunoko sikuli pafupifupi tsiku lililonse kukulowa mophwanya lamulo vuto lakenso akagwidwa akupatsidwa chilango chochepa zomwe sizikupereka mantha kwa anthuwa mantha athu ndiwoti kodi amenewa bwinobwino matenda ebola satipatsira wadandaula kalonga amene wati kwinanso komwe kwachuluka mchitidwewu ku chitipa 
  adati ambiri olowa mdzikomo amachokera ku tanzania ambiri mwa amakhala ochokera maiko drc burundi rwanda ethiopia ngakhalenso somalia 
  naye senior chief nthache ya mboma la mwanza kabunduli ya mboma la nkhata bay akuti mmaboma chitetezo sichili zomwe ati zingalowetsa matendawa mosavuta mdziko muno 
  kungoyambira pachipata cha chitipa karonga mpaka kutsidya kwa nkhata bay mpaka ku likoma chitetezo mulibe mmene mabwato amayendera likoma umangozindikira alowa mdziko muno adatero kabunduli 
  tili pachiopsezo chachikulu chiyambireni nthendayi unduna wa zaumoyo sudafike kuno sitikudziwa munthu wa ebola amaoneka tingaipewe 
  mfumuyi yati ikuchita mantha phiri lina ku tukombo moyandikana nyanja komwe ati ndiko kumafikira othawa kwawo pafupifupi tsiku lililonse 
  naye nthache akuti boma la mwanza limalandira ambiri amene akutulukira mdziko la mozambique anthuwa sakupimidwa matendawa 
  timalandira ambiri ku zobue mdziko la mozambique ku malawi kuno akumapita kumeneko mosaunikidwa abwera zikutipatsa mantha vuto lake sitikudziwa za matendawa momwe tingawapewere momwe tingatengere adatero ntchache 
  sabata yatha undunawu udayamba kukhwimitsa chitetezo mmabwalo ndege amene akulowa mdziko muno azipimidwa 
  nanga undunawu ukuchitanji pothana amene akulowa mdziko muno mozemba mlembi undunawu chris kangombe akuti asachite mantha ayamba kalikiliki wofikira maboma onse 
  tayamba kudziwitsa za matendawa kudzera mmawailesi mnyuzipepala takhala tikufika mmaderawa kudziwitsa za matendawa adatero kangombe 
  akaona othawa kwawowa azikadziwitsa apolisi kudziwitsa amene amaona za otuluka olowa mdziko muno wolowa azipimidwa 
  amene amapereka maganizo poimba foni pawailesi ya matindi lachiwiri amapempha undunawu uchitepo kanthu 
  anthuwa amene ambiri amayimbira mmaboma mulanje nsanje chikwawa blantyre phalombe mwanza neno amati chiyambireni matendawa sadauzidwe kanthu aundunawa 
  matenda ebola apha kale oposa 1 200 makamaka maiko kumwera kwa africa nigeria liberia sierra leone guinea 
  matendawa alibe mankhwala akatswiri akuyeserayesera kupeza mankhwala matendawa 
  pofika ku zimbabwe lachiwiri mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika adati padakalipano palibe ndalama zapadera zimene zaikidwa zithandindire kuthana matendawa atalowa mdziko muno
Label: HEALTH

Text:
atumiki ofunika palimbana covid-19   ngoma ansembe asisiteri dayosizi ya chikwawa awatsimikizira ofunikira kwambiri ntchito yolimbana kufala kwa mliri wa covid-19 omwe ukuyamba kachirombo ka coronavirus 
 mlembi wamkulu ofesi ya nthambi ya zaumoyo dayosiziyi louis ngoma anena lolemba ku chikwawa cathedral maphunziro omwe unduna wa zaumoyo kudzera chipatala cha boma la chikwawa anakonzera atumikiwa 
 ngoma atumikiwa ntchito yayikulu yofalitsa uthenga kwa akhristu kapewedwe koyenera ka matenda covid-19   polankhulanso ku mwambowu matthews semba omwe amayanganira nthambi ya zaumoyo dayosiziyi ayamikira za umoyo pofika maphunzirowa kwa atumuki mpingo dayosiziyi 
 pambuyo maphunzirowa nthambi ya zaumoyo mpingowu dayosiziyi inaperekanso zipangizo zodzitetezera ku kachilombo ka coronavirus kwa ansembe asisiteri zonse za ndalama zokwana 1 million kwacha
Label: HEALTH

Text:
oposa 20 afa ngozi ya galimoto ku ntcheu 20 afa 31 avulala galimoto yayikulu yonyamula katundu itawagunda msika wa kampepuza mboma la ntcheu 
 wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mbomali sub inspector hastings chigalu wati galimotoyi nambala yake 1152 imachokera ku lilongwe kupita ku balaka itafika msikapa dalaivala wa galimoto yi analephera kuyiongolera inaphonya msewu kukagunda wo 
 pali chiyembekezo choti chiwerengero cha omwe afa chitha kukwera kaamba koti agonekedwa ku chipatala cha boma la balaka ku kamuzu central hospital padakalipano boma lati lichita chilichonse chotheka kuthandiza omwe avulalawa liyendetsa mwambo wonse wa maliro omwe afa ngoziyi
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
atsogoleri hrdc atuluka belo bwalo la milandu ku lilongwe lero lapereka belo kwa akuluakulu bungwe lomenyera ufulu wa la human rights defenders coalition hrdc 
  akuluakuluwa omwe timothy mtambo gift trapence macdonald sembereka omwe ananjatidwa lamulungu awalamula apereke ndalama zokwa 100 thousand kwacha 2 million kwacha apereke zitupa zawo zoyendera 
 judge violet chipawo yemwe wapereka chigamulochi watinso akuluakuluwa akuyenera kumakawonekera ku bwalo la milandu ku lilongwe lachisanu lililonse 
 ndine okondwa anga atuluka chomwe ndikudziwa chakuti sanayambe alakwapio mdziko muno amangoganiziridwa kuganiziridwa zosiyana kupezeka olakwa anatero mchizi 
 polankhulapo wapampando wa bungwe la hrdc timothy mtambo wati kumangidwaku kwawapatsa mangolomera apitirizabe ntchito zawo 
 tasangalala luti tatuluka panopa ndiye kumene tinaliku kwatiwonjezera mphamvu sitibweleranso mbuyo ayi amene akufuna kulimbana lamulo akumana nalo anatero mtambo 
 mtambo wati tsopano akupezako malipoti omwe anamveka anadwala pamene kundendeku
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
wayilesi ya vatican ikondwelera zaka 70 zowulutsa maprogram ku africa wayilesi ya likulu la mpingo wa katolika lonse ya vatican chaka chino ichita chikondwerero chokumbukira papita zaka 70 ikuwulutsa ma pologalamu ake ku africa 
 malipoti akuti wayilesiyi inayamba kuwulutsa ma pologalamu ake ku africa mchaka cha 1950 
  wayilesiyi chida cha mphamvu chomwe likulu la mpingo wa katolika lonse limagwiritsa ntchito pofalitsa mauthenga papa nkhani zosiyanasiyana 
 papita zaka 89 pomwe vatican radio yomwenso imadziwika wayilesi ya papa the popes radio idakhazikitsidwa mchaka cha 1931 papa pio wa 11 yemwe adawulutsa koyamba wayilesiyi uthenga wa papa pio wa 11 womwe udali chilatini udawuluka 12 february 1931 
 ma pologalamu chingerezi adayamba kuwulutsidwa mchaka cha 1937 ma pologalamu chingerezi opita kwa ku africa adayamba mchaka cha 1950 zomwe zikutanthauza chaka chino papita zaka 70 vatican radio ikuwulutsa ma pologalamu ake ku africa 
 ma pologalamu oyambirira chingerezi opita kwa ku africa okhudza nkhani za likulu la mpingowu maphunzitso katikisimu wa katolika mbiri za oyera miyambi ya ku africa 
 pambali mapologalamu owuluka wayilesiyi amawajambulanso ma cassette ku watumiza ku africa 
 zaka zikupita vatican radio inayamba kuwulutsanso ziyankhulo za ku africa kiswahili hausa 
 itachitika sinodi ya ku africa vatican radio inayamba kukonzanso ma pologalamu okhudza magawo osiyana siyana moyo wa chilungamo mtendere ma pologalamu chitukuko ku africa 
 padakali ma pologalamu vatican radio akuwulutsidwanso ma wayilesi ambiri chikatolika ku africa radio maria 
 padakali wayilesiyi ikuwulutsa ma pologalamu ake ziyankhulo 47 ansembe chipani cha ma jesuit society of jesus omwe amayendetsa wayilesiyi
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
chilima alangiza ogwira ntchito mboma wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa lino dr saulos chilima yemwenso mtsogoleri wa chipani cha utm wati ogwira ntchito mboma ayenera kumagwira ntchito zawo mokomera osati kukwanilitsa zofuna zawo zokha 
 wadzudzula ogwira ku mec mbc chilima dr chilima amalankhula msonkhano wa atolankhani womwe anachititsa lachitatu ku likulu la chipanichi mzinda wa lilongwe chigamulo cha bwalo la milandu chisankho cha mtsogoleri wa lino chichitikenso ponena chinali zolakwika zambiri 
 wati zili chomwechi kamba koti bungwe la mec lidachita zinthu mofuna kukondweletsa owerengeka osati nzika zochuluka za lino choncho onse ogwira ntchito mboma ayenera kutengerapo phunziro 
 pamenepa dr chilima wati wapampando wa bungwe la mec dr jane ansah makomishonala onse mec atule pansi ma udindo alowe mmalo adzayendetse chisankho chomwe chikubwerachi
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
boma lati dongosolo la zachuma lithandza kupeza ngongole wolemba sylvester kasitomu w.radiomaria.mw/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/botomani.jpg alt= width="294 height="333 />wati apeza ngongole mosavuta botomani boma lati dongosolo la zachuma la mchaka cha 2019 mpaka 2020 lithandiza adzitha kubwereka ndalama zoti adzitha kutukulira maanja kaamba koti boma laika ndalamazi dongosololi 
 nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani mark botomani anena pachilumba cha chisi nyanja ya chirwa mboma la zomba pamsonkhano othokoza pachilumbacho powavotera chisankho cha 21 may chaka chino 
 botomani omwenso phungu wa ya malamulo mdera la zomba chisi ati mwa omwe adzapindule ngongoleyi asodzi omwe amapha msomba chilumbacho 
 pankhani za umoyo ati boma liyesetsa chipinda chochilira amai oyembekezera pachilumbacho powonjezera apo ati boma lachotsanso msonkho omwe amaitanitsira magetsi mphamvu ya dzuwa cholinga choti adzitha kugula magetsiwa 
 mmawu ake gulupu village headman tchuka ya chilumbacho yapempha asiye nyumba za udzu okhaokha mmadzi mnyanja ya chirwa pofuna kuchepetsa vuto lakuphwa kwa madzi nyanjayo 
 ambiri omwe akumanga mbowera zawo mmphepete mwa nyanjayi amagwiritsa ntchito udzu omwe amaumweta mphepete mwa nyanjayi choncho tipepha boma libweretse achitetezo ku nyanjayi athamangite omwe akumanga zimbowera zawo mphepete mwa nyanjayi anatero group tchuka 
 mwazina iyo yapempha boma lipereke achitetezo omwe adzithamangitsa asodzi omwe akumamanga mbowelazi mmadzimo
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
chidwi pantchito ya uphunzitsi chizilala bungwe la aphunzitsi mdziko muno la teachers union of malawi tum lati zomwe lachita boma pokhazikitsa yoti ofuna kuphunzira ntchito ya uphunzitsi mmakoleji boma teachers training collegettc ayambe kulipira zichititsa ambiri asakhale chidwi cholowa uphunzitsi 
  woyendetsa ntchito za bungweli charles kumchenga adanena pothirirapo ndemanga ganizo la boma loti ophunzira ntchito ya uphunzitsi mmakoleji 8 boma azilipira ndalama zokwana k105 000 pachaka kuonjezera ndalama zomwe boma limapereka 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi pakalipano mwana wapulayimale kumufunsa ntchito yomwe amafuna kudzagwira ambiri satchula ya uphunzitsi amaona okha mmene aphunzitsi akuvutikira ndiye akuti munthu uzilipiranso ndalama zambirimbiri ukhale mphunzitsiambiri chidwi sakhalanso nacho adatero kumchenga pouza tamvani 
  kumchenga adati zinthu zambiri sizili nkale mmakoleji aphunzitsizi zonse boma limathamangira ndalama ndizo zavuta likafunsidwa kukonza zina mwa zinthuzo 
  zoonadi boma lati aphunzitsi azilipira aphunzire ntchito nkhawa yathu ili pakuti kodi zisintha zinthu msukulu zophunzitsiramo aphunzitsizi pali zambiri zofunika kukonza malo ogona chakudya ngakhalenso malo ophunziriramo adatero kumchenga 
  adati zomvetsa chisoni ntchito ya uphunzitsi imatengedwa yotsalira kwambiri pomwe ndiyo gwero la ntchito ina iliyonse 
  kumchenga adatchulapo kusowa kwa nyumba zokhalamo aphunzitsi kuchedwa kukwezedwa pantchito malipiro ochepa kuchedwa kwa malipiro ndalama yolimbikitsira aphunzitsi akumidzi mwa mavuto omwe amalowetsa pansi ntchito za maphunziro 
  poikira kumbuyo zomwe boma lachita mlembi wamkulu muunduna wa zamaphunziro lonely magreta wati boma lidaganiza zoyambitsa kulipira mma ttc msukulu zina pofuna kutukula ntchito za maphunziro 
  adati kudalira boma lokha sikungapindule kanthu lili zambiri zofunika ndiye kugawana udindo kungathandize zinthu zisinthe msanga 
  cholinga chathu nchakuti ntchito za maphunziro zipite patsogolo mwa zina tikufunitsitsa zipangizo zophunzitsira zophunzirira zizikhala zokwanira wophunzira azikhala buku lakelake panthawi yophunzira adatero magreta 
  adati wophunzira ku ttc azipereka k105 000 pachaka yomwe ikuyimirira k20 k100 iliyonse yomwe imafunika kusula mphunzitsi pachaka kutanthauza boma limafunika ndalama zokwana k525 000 mphunzitsi 
  kupatula kuyambitsa zolipira mma ttc boma latinso wofuna kukachita maphunziro ku domasi komwe aphunzitsi amakaonjezera maphunziro azilipira yekha wadipuloma azilipira k180 000 wofuna digiri k280 000 pachaka kusinthaku kwakhudzanso sukulu za sekondale komwe fizi yakwera kufika k12 000 ku mcde k10 000 kusekondale yoyendera msekondale zothandizidwa boma k75 000 kuyunivesite komwe akuti azilipira payekha fizi k275 000 pachaka pomwe mmbuyomu osankhidwira kumakoleji university of malawi ankalipira k55 000 yokha pachaka pamene ofuna kudzilipilira ankalipira k275 000 
  kuphatikiza apa boma lati lasiya kupereka alawansi yomwe ophunzira ankalandira iziwathandiza pogulira zipangizo mabulu zowathandiza pamaphunziro 
  wa mgwirizano wa mabungwe oyanganira zamaphunziro mdziko muno la civil society education coalition csec benedicto kondowe waati ganizo la bomali lili labwera molakwika 
  pocheza tamvani lachiwiri lapitali kondowe adati zomwe lachita boma polengeza kusinthaku modzidzimutsa zichititsa ambiri omwe adali chilakolako cha sukulu alephere maphunziro sadakonzekere mokwanira 
  mwachitsanzo mukatengera ndalama zomwe amalandira aphunzitsi wa pt4 wongoyamba kumene ntchito amalandira k54 angati angakwanitse kusunga ndalama yokalipira ku domasi akaonjezere maphunziro zikutanthauza aphunzitsi ambiri aimira pomwe alipo basi ndiye maphunziro sangatukuke choncho adatero kondowe 
  adati boma limafunikira kukonza ndondomekoyi kulengeza panthawi yabwino akonzekere osati kungowadzidzimutsa ayi
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
ulumali sanachite chisankho mub bungwe lomenyera maufulu wanthu osaona mdziko muno la malawi union of the blind mub lati ambiri osaona omwe anapikitsana nawo chisankho chapitachi sanachite kamba koti ambiri mdziko muno adakalibe maganizo oti osaona sangathe kuwathandiza ntchito zotukula lino 
 wa wabungwe li mdziko muno ezekiel kumwenda amayankhula kwa mtolankhani wathu amene amafuna kudziwa nambala ya osaona omwe anapambana mipando yosiyanasiyana yomwe amapikitsana nawo chisankhochi 
 kumwenda ambiri sanawakhulupilire osawona kumwenda ati zomvetsa chisoni mwa asanu 6 omwe amapikisana nawo pachisankhochi yekha amene wapambana mpando wa ukhansala mdera lina mboma la machinga 
 ambiri sanawakhulupilire osaona angawatsogolere mipando yosiyanasiyana anatero kumwenda 
 anaonjezera vuto la kusowa kwa ndalama zochititsira misonkhano yokopa lomwe lawonjezeranso wa asachite zisankhozi 
 kumwenda ati chiyembekezo chiwerengero cha osaona omwe adzapikisane nawo chisankhochi mchaka cha 2024 chidzakhala chokwera kamba koti chimenechi chinali chiyambi chabe
Label: POLITICS

Text:
akagwira jere zaka zinayi kaamba kobaya mlamu bwalo la mangochi first grade magistrate lalamula wina wa zaka 28 akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka zinayi kaamba kobaya kuvulaza mlamu 
 bwaloli linamva kwa woyimira boma mlandu sub inspector regina makwinja mkuluyu joseph kamanga anabaya mlamu prisca yomwe amateteza mchemwali mwandida pomwe amamenyedwa mamuna wakeyu 
 makwinja 11 march 2020 joseph amamwa mowa malo msika mpondasi mbomalo mkazi anafikanso pamalopo kudzapereka chakudya kwa mchemwali 
 mkaziyu akuti anayamba kumwa mowa ataledzera anayamba kucheza amuna omwe pamalopo zomwe zinakwiyitsa mamunayo kuyamba kumumenya 
 pamene prisca adaganiza zolanditsa mchemwali wakeyo pamene joseph adatenga galasi kumubaya mlamu wakeyu pakhosi 
 popereka chigamulo chake first grade magistrate roy kakutu wapereka chilango cha mtunduwu atengerepo phunziro 
 joseph kamanga amachokera mmudzi mwa mtalimanja mfumu mponda mboma lomwelo la mangochi
Label: LAW/ORDER

Text:
wodzaima mpando wa pulezidenti azapereka k2 m bungwe la malawi electoral support network mesn ladzudzula bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec pokweza ndalama zomwe ofuna kudzaima nawo zisankho zapatatu za chaka cha mawa azipereka 
  wa bungwe la mec jane ansah lachiwiri mzinda wa lilongwe adalengeza yemwe akufuna kudzaima nawo zisankho za mtsogoleri wa lino akuyenera kudzapereka k2 miliyoni pamene abambo omwe adzapikitsane nawo mipando ya aphungu nyumba ya malamulo adzapereka k500 000 amayi adzapereka k250 000 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka adzaimira mcp chakwera ansah adalengezanso abambo omwe akufuna kudzapikitsana nawo makhansala akuyenera kudzapereka k40 000 pamene amayi adzapereka k20 000 
  wa bungwe la mesn steve duwa wauza tamvani kusinthaku kubwezera mmbuyo omwe akufuna kudzapikitsana nawo zisankhozo mthumba mwawo moperewera 
  duwa wati ndiwokhumudwa sipadathe yayitali mec chikwezereni ndalamazo 
  mec idakwezanso ndalamazo zisankho zapatatu za 2014 mabungwe osiyanasiyana omwe akulimbikitsa amayi kutenga nawo gawo ndale za lino adadandaulanso kusinthako kubwezera mmbuyo kampeni yawo 
  mec yapupuluma imayenera kudikira papite zisankho zingapo isadakwezenso osati kumangokweza chisankho chilichonse uku nkupweteka omwe sangakwanitsa kupeza ndalama adatero duwa 
  adzaimira dpp mutharika malamulo oyendetsera zisankho amapereka mphamvu kwa bungwe la mec kukweza ndalama zomwe amapereka duwa adati mphamvuzo nzofunika kuzigwiritsa ntchito moyenera pokambirana zipani za ndale kukwezako kusadachitike 
  ansah adati akuluakulu bungwelo adakambirana adaona kukwezako nkoyenera 
  mkuluyu adati ndondomeko zina zonse zoyendetsera zisankho sizidasinthe 
  ansah adapempha zipani zandale zitsatire ndondomeko zonse kaamba koti munthu akadzapezeka ndiwosayenera adzamuthothola sipadzakhala mwayi woti chipani chake chidzapereke dzina la munthu wina 
  ansah adakumbutsanso zipani onse omwe akufuna kudzaima nawo zisankho za chaka cha mawa amene amagwira ntchito mboma akufuna kudzapikisana nawo zisankhozo akuyenera kutula kaye pansi udindo asadabwere poyera 
  padakali zipani zina za ndale zomwe zidaonetsa chidwi chofuna kudzapikisana nawo zisankhozo zidapangitsa kale misonkhano yawo yosankha atsogoleri moti panopa zikupangitsa mapulayimale wosankha omwe adzaziimire mipando ya aphungu makhansala 
  chipani cha malawi congress mcp chidasankha mtsogoleri lazarus chakwera ndiye adzachiimire zisankho za chaka cha mawa pamene mtsogoleri wa democratic progressive dpp peter mutharika adzaimira chipanicho
Label: POLITICS

Text:
ulimi wa mthirira nchuma tikudziweni ndine moffat mtalimanja mkazi wanga effie timachokera mmudzi wa kaunde ku namadidi kwa senior chief mlumbe mboma la zomba ndife alimi amene timaweta ziweto zosiyanasiyana kuphatikizaponso ulimi wa mbeu zosiyanasiyana ulimi wa mbeuzi timachita onse wa mvula wa mthirira 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi ulimi wa mthirira mudauyamba liti ulimiwu tidauyamba mzaka za mma 1970 pamene amagwira ntchito ku portland cement ku changalume chimene chidatiyambitsa ulimiwu kupewa kugula ndiwo za masamba omwe zimene timaona tikhonza kuzikwanitsa kumazilimira kumadzidyetsa tokha 
  mkati mwa njira pamene tidaona mbeu za masambazi mpamba waukulu ozungulira kuno adayamba kumabwera kumatigula pamene tidaonjezera moto kumachita ulimiwu mwakathithi 
  mbewu ziti zimene mumalima masambawo kuthirira tomato kabichi anyezi beetroot brocolli nyemba chimanga mbeu zina zambiri malinga kukonda kwa ogula 
  1970 pali mtunda ndithu chinsinsi chake chagona pati muzilimabe mpaka ulimi wa mthirira uli chuma chobisika chimene alimi ambiri sanachitulukire mnyengo ya mvula mbeu zambiri zikalimidwa zikakhwima pamsika zimakhala mbweee zimagulitsidwa mitengo yolira pamene mnyengo yopanda mvula mmene za masamba zimakhala zochepa ogula ambiri apa mpamene mlimi wa nzeru amayenera kugwira mpini 
  phindu lotani limene mumapeza ulimiwu phindu limene timapeza mulimvetsetse kuwerengera pakutha mwezi amagwiritsa ntchito ndalama zingati pogula tomato masamba azidya tsiku tsiku pakhomo pawo mukhoza kuona amagwiritsa ntchito ndalama zambiri zimene akanati masambawa alima okha ndiye ndalama zimenezi akanapangira zinthu zina zofunika pakhomo pawo 
  pachifukwa chimenechi sitigula chilichonse chokhudza masamba timagulitsa masambawa kusonyeza timapha mbalame ziwiri ulimi wa nthilirawu ichi ndalama zimene taziteteza posagula masambazo timapangira chitukuko chosiyanasiyana pakhomo pathu 
  zovuta zotani zimene mukukumana nazo mumathana nazo motani vuto lalikulu madzi malo amene timalimawa tidayetsetsa kusaka madzi tikumbe chitsime madzi sanapezeke kotero madzi adapezeka patali ndithu pamene tinakumba chitsimecho choncho tinalemba ntchito amene amakatunga madzi chitsimepo ndikumazathira migolo imene timatungamo kumathilira mbeuzi 
  pakadali tili malingaliro opeza makina opepera madzi amene adzipopa madzi pachitsimepo ndikumabweretsa ku dimba kuno ulimiwu ufike mponda chimera 
  ulimi wa mthirira uli phindu kwambiri mwachitsanzo talima tomato mitengo 650 mbeu yakeyi imabereka imatha kubereka tomato osachepera 50 ndiye mitengo 650 mtengo uliwonse ubereke tomato osachepera 50 ndiye mwachitsanzo tomato adzigulitsidwa k50 mukapanga masamu mukupeza bwa kabichi amene timalima mbeu amene timagulitsa k250 ndiye tadzala oposa 100 mukhoza kuona paphedwa makwacha ochuluka chimanga chachiwisi nacho cha nthilira chikachita chimasanduka chitsulo cha ndege msika kotero walima chochuluka mlimi satola chikwama mbeu zina nyemba tanaposi beetroot brocolli nazo golide kale mchilengedwe chake kotero mlimi akulima zimenezi mwakathithi umphawi ungakhale ulamuliro moyo titani ulimi wa nthilira udzipindulira dzikoli chofunika alimi asinthe kaganizidwe avomereze ulimi wa nthilira ulalo opititsa chuma chawo chomwe cha tsogolo zimatiwawa kumaona munda uli msinje wakuti suphwera palibe chikulimidwapo kudikilira mvula basi uku kumakhala kuseweretsa ndalama 
  boma mabungwe amene amalimbikitsa ulimi ayedzeke chidwi chawo powapatsa mphamvu alimi zipangizo zimene zingatakasile ulimi wa nthilira upite tsogolo nthaka madzi mdziko muno zambiri tikukwanitsa ulimi madzi chitsime tsono amene minda yawo ili madziyo angapindule bwa tilimbikitsenso achinyamata pamene akusakasaka ntchito zamu ofesi aganizirenso zochita ulimi ulimi ukhoza miyoyo yawo nkuthwanima kwa diso 
  ubwino wotani ulipo ochita ulimi banja pamakhala kudalirana kwakulu mwachitsanzo ulimi umenewu amene amakhala patsogolo ndimangothandizira mapeto ake nzeru zawo zanga tikaziphatikiza pamodzi zimene zimachititsa zinthu zizitiyendera chotere muli mphamvu mukudalirana
Label: ECONOMY

Text:
zomba cathedral iyamikira gulu la tingathe wolemba thokozani chapola gulu la tingathe nawo holo mparish ya sacread aliyamikira kamba kakudzipereka kwake potenga nawo mbali pomanga holo 
 mwa akuluakulu omwe akuyanganira ntchito yomanga holoyi vito sandifolo ayamikira gululi lamulungu pomwe linakonza fundraising yogulitsa zakudya zosiyanasiyana tchalitchi la zomba cathedral 
 gululi lakhala likuthandiza ntchitoyi mnjira zosiyanasiyana apempha akhristu mparishyi kugwirana manja pothandiza ntchitoyi yomwe padakali ikusoweka ndalama zosachepera 50 million kwacha 
 ntchito imene akugwira ikutithandiza kwambiri apitirize thandiza asatope nafe mmene akuwonekera okonzeka kutero kubwera kwawo kwachititsa ntchito yomanga holo isativute kwambiri anatero sandifolo 
 ati akhristu atha kupereka chilichonse chomwe angakwanitse chingathandizire ntchitoyi osati ndalama zokha 
 mmawu ake mwa mamembala gulu la tingathe kumanag nawo holo lucia mphande ati gulu lawo limadziwa mpingo pawokha sungakwanitse chilichonse 
 mpingo wathu wa katolika ukulimbikitsa mpingo wodzidalira tikutsatira zimenezi mwinanso kutsogoloku amne tizayigwiritse ntchito kwambiri ndifeyo achinyamata chake tinawona titengepo gawo anatero mphande 
 gulu la tingathe lili mamembala asnu awiri 7 pomwe atsikana alipo asanu anyamata alipo awiri padakalipano gululi lakwanitsa kuthandiza moiyala ya kwale njerwa ntchitoyi 
 ntchito yomanga holo ya sacred heart parish ikusoweka ndalama zokwana 150 million kwacha
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
boma liyamikira yoneco h="305 height="345 />anayendera wailesi ya yoneco botomani boma layamikira ntchito yabwino yomwe bungwe wayilesi ya yoneco ikugwira polimbikitsa kupititsa patsogolo mauthenga atsopano ict kulimbikitsa mapologalamu ambiri othandiza achinyamata ana amayi 
 nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani maluso otumizira mauthenga amakono mark botomani omwenso phungu wakunyumba yamalamulo wadera la zomba chisi yemwe wanena lachisanu pambuyo poyendera wayilesi ya yoneco mzinda wa zomba 
 ndunayi yati yokondwa kamba koti luso lopititsa patsogolo mauthenga atsopano kudzera njira zosiyanasiyana zikukonzedwa achinyamata zomwe ati zikufunika kupeza njira zabwino zodzitezera lusoli lisabedwe
Label: SOCIAL

Text:
nkhuku yoweta sagula pamsika achewa njira zosiyanasiyana zoperekera malango pakati pawo njira zina nthano magule ndakatulo chinamwali miyambi zininga lero nkhani yathu yagona miyambi tifukula mwambi wakuti nkhuku yoweta sagula pamsika steven pemabmoyo adacheza mfumu njewa ya ku lilongwe yomwe ikutambasula za mwambiwu 
  choyamba mfumu tafotokozani za momwe nkhani ya chikhalidwe cha makolo ilili kuno 
   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu kwathu kuno dera limodzi lomwe sataya chikhalidwe cha makolo mukhale pakati pathu kwa masiku angapo mukhoza kuona poyerekeza zomwe mudazolowera kuona kuno adamva mwambo adausunga 
  njewa kufotokoza za tanthauzo la mwambiwo tsono mukati adamva mwambo mukufuna kunena adaumva pakati achewa mwambo chuma chosiyirana makolo kalero adasiyira ana omwe adasiyiranso ana chonchoo mpakana lero timangosiyirana mpakana kalekale wathu usadzasokonekere ayi 
  ndikufuna kudziwa kusiyiranako mumachita kupatsana pamanja ayi mwambo si chithu choti mungachione kuchigwira imakwana yoti makolo amadziwa mwana uyu akufunika kudziwa zakuti ndiye amakonza njira yomupatsira mwambo womwe ukufunikawo pali njira zingapo kutengera mwana kutsimba kudambwe kumuitanira anamkungwi kudzera mmiyambi yomwe amatolamo tanthauzo 
  eya pamenepo pali mwambi uja amati nkhuku yoweta sagula pamsika mwambi umenewu uli tanthauzo ndithu kwabasi mwambi uja uli tanthauzo lozama kwambiri mwachita kusankha mwambi umenewu umakhudzana moyo wa munthu makamaka akakula akukalowa mbanja nkukayamba moyo wina 
  ndikufuna mumasule bwinobwino nkhuku ikubweramo 
  chabwino ndiyambe kumasulira motere munthu ukafuna nkhuku yoti uwete supita pamsika akhoza kukugulitsa yodzimwera mazira yoti idatopa kale kuikira ndiye palibe chomwe wachitapo pokagula nkhuku yoweta umafika pakhomo pomwe pali khola umafunsa umboni woti nkhukuyo ikadaikira isadayambe nkomwe umaikira motani apa zimatanthauza munthu akafuna banja sangangopita pamsewu nkutengana mkazi mwamuna osadziwa mbiri yake komwe amachokera mtima 
  amayenera kutani munthu wanzeru amayenera kupita kwa makolo abale munthu yemwe wamukonda kukaonako kuphunzira khalidwe lawo akhozanso kufufuza kudzera kwa adera omwe amakhala kufupi munthuyo akakhutira akhoza kuyambapo dongosolo zomwe makolo amatanthauza mmwambiwu 
  paliso pena pomwe mwambiwu ungagwire ntchito kwinako zikhoza kutengera pali nkhani yanji bola tanthauzo lake likhale loti pakufunika kusamala makamaka kafukufuku osangophwanyirira pochita zinthu gwero lenileni makolowo poyambitsa mwambiwu adayambitsira nkhani ya maukwati
Label: OPINION/ESSAY

Text:
mutharika asankha nduna pangotha maola sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo richard msowoya atagwirizana atsogoleri zipani za mnyumba ya malamulo asankhe komiti yoti iziyendetsa zochitika mnyumbamo kaamba ka kusowa kwa nduna mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika adasankha nduna zina mbandakucha wa lachinayi 
  zinthu zidaima mnyumbayo lachitatu pomwe aphungu adasowa chochita komiti yomwe imasankha nkhani zimene aphungu akambirane patsiku padalibe komitiyo imayenera wapampando yemwe nduna ya boma 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc msowoya adaimitsa msonkhano wa aphunguwo ayambenso kukambirana 9:30 lachinayi pomwe kumacha nkuti mutharika atasankha nduna zatsopano 9 zimene zidalumbiritsidwa cha mma 8 
  mwa ndunazi amayi awiri dr jean kalirani amene nduna ya zaumoyo nduna ya zamasewero achinyamata chikhalidwe grace obama chiumia chiumia wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa aphungu kumbali ya boma 
  nduna 6 nzochokera mchigawo cha kumwera ziwiri za pakati pomwe ziwiri tikaphatikizapo nduna ya zachuma goodall gondwe yemwe adali woyambirira kusankhidwa nduna za kumpoto 
  samuel tembenu yemwe nduna ya zalamulo nduna yokhayo imene si phungu adalephera kupeza mpando wauphungu mavoti ochepa kwambiri mdera la pakati ku salima zikusonyeza mutharika wasankha nduna ziwiri zomwe si aphungu nduna ya zachuma goodall gondwe amene adasankhidwa pampandowo mmbuyomu adalephera kupeza mpando wa uphungu kumpoto mboma la mzimba 
  nduna ya zamtengatenga francis kasaila amene adalephera sipikala wa nyumba ya malamulo atagonja kwa msowoya lolemba pomwe nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani kondwani nakhumwa nduna ya zaulimi dr allan chiyembekeza yemwe adali wapampando wa komiti ya zaulimi mnyumba ya malamulo ya pakati 2009 2014 
  henry mussa amene wa aphungu boma mnyumbayo nduna ya zantchito pomwe emmanuel fabiano amene adakhalapo wa sukulu ya ukachenjede ya polytechnic nduna ya maphunziro george chaponda nduna yoona za maiko akunja 
  zikusonyeza boma la mutharika tsopano likuyendetsedwa 12 kuphatikiza mtsogoleri wa linoyu wachiwiri saulos chilima mwandunazi zisanu zidakhalapo nduna mboma la wa mtsogoleri wa bingu 
  wa bungwe loona maphunziro apamwamba la civil society education coalition benedicto kondowe adati kusankha nduna zambiri zochokera dera limodzi kungachititse madera asapindule 
  ndunazi zikhoza kumakondera madera pachitukuko choncho madera angamve kuwawa ulamulirowu adatero kondowe 
  mwa akadaulo ndale mustafa hussein adati ambiri mwa omwe adasankhidwawo adali ulamuliro bingu
Label: POLITICS

Text:
dpp yalonjeza kampeni ya bata chipani cha democratic progressive dpp chati chipereka uthenga wa chitukuko woyanjanitsa malawi ino yokopa pofuna akavotere mtsogoleri wa lino professor arthur peter mutharika 
 nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani mark botomani omwe anena lachinayi bwalo la zamasewero la naisi mboma la zomba pomwe amakhazikitsa nyengo yokopa ya chipani cha dpp mbomalo 
 botomani ati ayembekezere misonkhano yokopa ya mtendere kuyendera zitukuko zosiyanasiyana mmadera onse mboma la zomba 
 kampeni ya chaka chino yosiyana ina yonse tikuyendera zitukuko tikuchita door to door campaign yatha tsopano tikulowa kwambiri mmidzi tiwafotokozere nkhani za chitukuko osati kutukwana kunyozana anatero botomani 
 ati mgwirizano wa zipani za dpp udf ulibe mbiri ya ziwawa motero apempha adzavotere mgwirizano wa zipani ziwirizi 
 polankhulanso msonkhanowo nduna yowona za kusasiyana pakati amayi abambo yemwenso phungu wa derail grace kwelepeta boma lamanga msika wa songani chipinda chophunzilira sukulu ya kanjedza mbomalo 
 anatinso boma likuyembekezeka nsewu wa phula songani kukafika kwa kasonga anapempha avotere mgwirizanowu chitukukochi chitheke
Label: POLITICS

Text:
achotsa mavenda popanda ziwawa ku lilongwe kunali njinga yapulula machaka ku lilongwe lachisanu lapitalo pomwe mazanamazana amabwerera mmakwawo opanda kanthu mmanja atalephera kukolola posalima akuluakulu awochita malonda munzindawu atatsogolera ntchito yochotsa ogulitsa malonda mphepete mwa misewu 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc mazanamazana achinyamata ochokera mmadera osiyanasiyana adakhamukira munzindawu okonzeka ntchitoyo ikanathera mziwawa zimachitikira mmbuyomu ndiye apindula pothyola sitolo za anzawo ndikutolamo katundu 
  mmbuyomu ntchito yomweyi imayendetsedwa apolisi okhaokha imatha tsiku latunthu mwinanso kulowelera linalo kaamba kakuti achinyamata ambiri amapezerapo danga lakuba msitolo ulendo uno ntchitoyi idatenga maola atatu okha kunalibe chiwawa chodetsa nkhawa 
  mneneri wapolisi wa chigawo cha pakati john namalenga adati ntchitoyi idayenda akuluakulu aochita malondawo adali patsogolo pantchitoyi ochita malondawo amaopa angadzawapange chikuwawe aonekere akudzetsa chisokonezo 
  ntchitoyi inayenda cha njira yomwe tinagwiritsa ntchito potsogoza atsogoleli aochita malondawo njirayi ndiyothandiza kwambiri akanakhala apolisi okhaokha akanazitengera pamgongo ndiye sizikanayenda tikuthokoza atsogoleriwo polola kugwira nafe ntchitoyi adatero namalenga 
  tsikulo apolisi atayalana kale mzindawu adali atayambapo kale kuletsa mwaochita malonda omwe atayamba kale kuyala malonda awowo pamaoneka kusanvana 
  posakhalitsa galimoto za polisi ziwiri zidatulukila zitadzala komiti yoyanganira mavenda munzindawu atavala mabibo polisi adayamba kusamutsa anzawowo omwe sadavute 
  mwa ochita malonda mumzindawu ibrahim yotamu adati mavendawo sakadalimbana ndiakuluakulu awowo ndiamene angawapatse mwayi opeza malo ochitirapo malonda mumsika wobvomelezeka waboma zinthu zingavutiletu 
  awa ndiye timati eni malo mumsikamu ndiye nawo masewera ukhoza kudziotcha zala tipeze malo mumsikamu timadzera mwa iwowa ndiye uoneke dolo ukhoza kulirira kuutsi adatero yotamu
Label: ECONOMY

Text:

 mavolontiya kumvetsera maphunzitso chimbalanga mfumu parish ya utale ii dayosizi ya mangochi saulos chimbalanga anena loweruka mboma la balaka pambuyo mbindikiro wa otumikira omwe amatumikira wailesiyi mzigawo zonse za lino 
 ati atumiki mthenga wabwino akuyenera azikhala oyambilira popindula uthenga wabwino amafalitsa 
 mavolontiya udindo waukulu wofalitsa uthenga wa mulungu yemwe oyera choncho nawonso akhale oyeretsedwa anatero chimbalanga 
 polankhulapo joseph kimu director wailesiyi ati okondwa momwe mbindikirowu wayendera 
 atilimbikitsa kukonda kupemphera tizichita zomwe timawauza achite anatero kimu 
 mbindikirowu unayitanitsa mavolontiya onse wailesiyi ku ntambi zake zonse zisanu imodzi za mdziko muno

Text:
papsa tonola kusolola kwaphweka ku kapitolo ambiri agwidwa manjolo kwagwa papsa tonola kulikulu la lino capital hill ku lilongwe komwe akuluakulu ogwira ntchito zowerengera chuma cha boma akuyendera zija amati mbuzi imadya pomwe aimangirira 
  sabata yokha ino akuluakulu awiri ogwira ntchito yowerengera ndalama za boma anjatidwa atapezeka ndalama zokwana k10.8 million ndalama zina zakunja zokwana $ 25,400 pafupifupi k10 miliyoni zomwe akuganiziridwa adasolola mchikwama cha 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   escom in free for all fuel scam mneneri wa polisi mdziko muno rhoda manjolo wati awiriwa martha banda wa zaka 35 yemwe amagwira ntchito yothandizira wowerengera chuma kunthambi yoyanganira chuma cha lino yemwe adapezeka ndalama zokwana k7.8 miliyoni mnyumba mwake lachitatu lapitali 
  manjolo wati banda adagwidwa patangotha tsiku limodzi wamkulu wowerengera chuma cha lino roosevelt franklyn ndovi atamangidwa kaamba kopezeka ndalama zokwana k3 miliyoni mgalimoto mwake $ 25,400 kwake ku area 25 
  tidakapanga chipikisheni kwa banda ku area 49 ku lilongwe njira yofuna kufukula zomwe zimachitika mmaofesi owerengera chuma zonse zidayamba lolemba titagwira wowerengera ndalama za yemwe amafuna kutuluka ndalama zokwana k3 miliyoni kuchoka kulikulu la tidakapanga chipikisheni kwake komwe tidakapeza ndalama zakunja zokwana $ 25,400 adatero manjolo pouza tamvani 
  adati kutengera mmene kafukufuku wa polisi akuyendera ambiri ogwira ntchito kulikuluku amangidwa pakuoneka kusololaku kumayenda mmanja ambiri 
  panopa komiti ya nyumba ya malamulo yowona mmene ndalama za zikuyendera la public accounts committee pac lalamula boma liunike mmene ndalama za boma zikuyendera kulikuluku 
  wachiwiri kwa wapampando wa komitiyi davieson nyadani wati komitiyi yaganiza zoti ofesi ya woyanganira za chuma ofesi yomwe imayendetsa chuma cha boma ziunikidwe mwachifatse boma lilengeze zotsatira zake adziwe momwe ndalama zawo zikuyendera 
  mgwirizano wa mabungwe omwe si aboma wa civil society organisations grand coalition wapereka masiku 30 kuboma likonze chisokonezo chonse chomwe chafungatira kayendetsedwe ka boma 
  chisokonezochi chikukhudza katangale kuba katundu wa boma kuulula chuma chomwe akuluakulu boma nacho 
  mchikalata chomwe mgwirizanowu walemba mabungwewa akuti boma likalephera kukonza zolakwikazi pakhala zionetsero zosiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo kuletsa kudula msonkho 
  zikuoneka palowa chibwana zikungokhala palibe wotsogolera mmene zinthu zikuyenera kuyendera chatero chikalatacho 
  mabungwe omwe alemba chikalatacho catholic commission for justice and peace ccjp council for non governmental organisations in malawi congoma civil society education coalition csec centre for human rights and rehabilitation chrr centre for the development of people cedep centre for youth and children affairs ceyca 
  citizens for justice cfj civic and political space cps church and society livingstonia synod malawi health equity network mhen human rights consultative committee hrcc ngo gender coordination network ngo gcn the governance platform gp malawi economic justice network mejn public affairs committee pac malawi congress for trade unions mctu 
  mwezi wathawu apolisi adagwira wina patrick sithole wogwira ntchito yaukalaliki mboma atamupeza ndalama zokwana k120 miliyoni mgalimoto yake ya toyota fortuner zomwe akumuganizira adasolola mboma zidachitika woyanganira chuma mboma budget director paul mphwiyo asadawomberedwe 
  tikumbamba mphwiyo adakali kuchipatala cha milpark ku south africa komwe akulandandira chithandizo cha mankhwala atamuchotsa zipolopolo zinayi mmutu

Text:
mkokemkoke patsiku la chisankho zipani zotsutsa boma zalembera bwalo la milandu la supreme court lifotokoze za yemwe akuyenera kusankha tsiku loti amalawi adzasankhe mtsogoleri wa lino 
  zikudza pomwe mpaka lero zikuoneka tsiku lenileni silinakhazikike pomwe bwalo la constitutional court lidalengeza chisankhocho chichitikenso pasanathe masiku 150 3 february 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc msukwa tiadasankha june 23 apo aphungu nyumba ya malamulo adasankha chisankhocho chichitike 19 may mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika adakana kusainira biloyo apa bungwe la zisankho la malawi electoral commission mec lidalengeza likukonza zoti chisankhocho chidzachitike 2 july patangotsala tsiku limodzi masiku 150 akwane 
  lachinayi komiti ya nyumba ya malamulo younikira za malamulo idakumana wapampando wa mec jane ansah mlangizi wa boma pamilandu kalekeni kaphale adagwirizana chisankhocho chidzakhaleko 23 june 
  potsatira woimira zipani zotsutsa dzulo adakapempha bwalo la supreme court litambasule yemwe akuyenera kusankha tsiku lochititsa chisankhocho 
  woimira mtsogoleri wa utm party khumbo bonzoe soko adati adakamangala kubwalolo lomwe lidavomerezana bwalo la constitutional court chisankho cha chaka chatha sichinayende china chichitikenso 
  pounikira chigamulo cha supreme court poona za malamulo chisankho sizikumveka woyenera kusankha tsiku latsopano mec nyumba ya malamulo 
  polankhula atakambirana kaphale ansah wapampando wa komitiyo kezzie msukwa adati adamvana chisankho chikhalepo 23 june 
   tinawafunsa mec atitsimikizira zokonzekera zili mmalo mwake moti chomwe chatsala nkusandutsa tsikuli lamulo basi adatero msukwa 
  malinga kaphale ntchito yake patsikulo idali kuunikira mwina mwina tsikulo lisanasankhidwe 
  ntchito yanga idali kungounikira basi osati kupanga tsiku ndiye ndaunikira mofunikiramo chofunika kwambiri chomwe ndawauza nkutsata zomwe malamulo lonse okhudza chisankho chovomerezeka amanena adatero kaphale 
  pankhani yoti makomishona ntchito ikutha 5 june 2020 msukwa adati si ntchito ya komitiyo kukambirana poti mutharika akudziwa kale zonsezo akudziwa choyenera 
  ntchito yathu idali kupanga tsiku tapanga zinazo udindo wa mtsogoleri wa lino ku mec kuli likulu ndikukhulupirira akudziwa chochita chisankho chidzapitirire ntchito ya makomishona itatha adatero msukwa
Label: POLITICS

Text:
mafumu akusunga zitupa za pamene gawo lachitatu la kalembera wa chisankho cha 21 may 2019 akuyembekezeka kutha mawa mboma la lilongwe adandaula akulephera kulembetsa mafumu akusunga ziphaso zawo 
  mmadera omwe tamvani adazunguliramo adandaula mafumu adawalanda ziphaso za unzika akupereka ndalama awabwezere zitupazo popita kokalembetsa pomwe mmadera akuti akulephera kukalembetsa cha miyambo 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka zopingazi zaululika pomwe zipsinjo zimene zidalipo mgawo loyamba lachiwiri makamaka zokhudza kuvutavuta kwa zipangizo kamemedwe ka zikuoneka zakonzedwa 
  pamalo olembetsera malembo kwa t khongoni mbomali lolemba adati akulephera kukalembetsa zitupa zawo za unzika zili mafumu omwe akufuna ndalama awabwenzere zitupazo 
  mndondomeko ya kalembera wa ulendo uno bungwe la malawi electoral commission mec likugwiritsa ntchito chitupa cha unzika chokha umboni woti munthu alembetse mkaundula popanda chitupachi munthu sakuloledwa kulembetsa 
  mwa anthuwo moses phiri wa mmudzi mwa salamba adati mafumu adatenga zitupazo ati pofuna kulongosola za kaundula wa sabuside 
  mafumu zamalimidwe adatenga apangire kaundula wa makuponi sabuside akuti pali chikonzero choti mudzi ulionse upereke ndalama yopangira kaundulayo ndiye tikupereka ndalama kwa amfumu akulembe kenako nkukubwezera chitupa chako adatero phiri ataombola chitupa chake k500 
  woyanganira malo olembetserawo ezala nacford adatsimikiza zitupa za ambiri zili mafumu zomwe zikupangitsa anthuwo azilephera kulembetsa 
  tabweza mafumu angapo atabwera zitupa zambirimbiri adzalembetsere malamulo salola titafufuza tapeza eni zitupazo akulephera kukazitenga sakupereka ndalama adatero nacford 
  woyanganira za zisankho ku bungwe la mec sammy alfandika lachiwiri adati kusunga chitupa cha wina mlandu adachenjeza yemwe chitupa cha mnzake akuyenera kubweza 
  ayenera kusunga yekha chitupa chake chingafunike iliyonse osati ya kalembera yokha adatero alfandika 
  t khongoni adadabwa atamva nkhaniyi adati aitanitsa mafumu onse mdera lake awafunse nkhaniyo akatsimikiza aona momwe athanirane mafumu omwe akukhudzidwa mchitidwewu 
  mmalo sonkhwe tsachiti kasemba kamphata kwa t kalumbu ogwira ntchito adadandaula sakufika mwaunyinji kukalembetsa cha miyambo 
  sonkhwe 1 698 ndiwo akuyembekezeka kulembetsa pofika lolemba lapitalo 866 ndiwo adali atalembetsa woyanganira pamalowo lemson solomon adati zinthu sizikuyenda cha miyambo 
  kukuoneka ino nyengo ya ziliza maukwati koamnso chiyambireni kalembera kwachitika maliro akuluakulu angapo zomwe zachititsa azitanganidwa mmidzi adatero solomon 
  pamalo olembetsera tsachiti 2 120 akuyenera kulembetsa pofika lolemba 1 115 ndiwo adali atalembetsa woyanganira malowo david chikumba adati mmasiku 6 oyambirira kudagwa maliro anayi mmidzi yozungulira 
  kupatula maliro woyanganira malo olembetsera kasemba laika palikena adati mderalo mudali miyambo ya ufumu iwiri ziliza zomwe zidatangwanitsa 
  poyamba kudali mwambo okwenza amfumu chimbalame mwambo olonga umfumu wa ndunga uli mkati kupatula apo kudali maliro atatu ziliza ndiye zinthu sizikuyenda ayi adatero palikena 
  wa bungwe la mec jane ansah adati zopinga zokhudza miyambo nzokulira bungwelo nzongofunika kukambirana mafumu awone momwe angakonzere zinthu kalembera asasokonekere 
  miyambo imeneyi maliro zinthu zomwe zimakhalako zonse chaka chonse kaya kuli kalembera ayi ndiye nzotikulira tiyesetsa kukambirana mafumu adatero ansah 
  zili chonchi bungwe la national initiative for civic education nice trust lati akukhulupilira akwanitsa chiwerengero cha omwe akuyembekezera kulemba mgawoli
Label: LOCALCHIEFS

Text:
alimbikitsa chitetezo cha   okhala mmalire covid-19 bungwe la farmers union of malawi fum lati pakufunika kulimbikitsa chitetezo cha mmadera akumidzi omwe mmalire lino maiko pofuna kupewa kufala kwa matenda covid-19 
  mlangizi wamkulu wa bungweli mboma la mwanza caswel kachingwe adanena sabata latha pamwambo wopereka mabeseni ndowa sopo kumidzi ya kwa mfumu nthache govati mbomalo polimbikitsa kusamba mmanja njira yopewera matendawa 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi nthache kumanzere kwachingwe kumanja kusamba mmanja mwambowo 
  maderawa omwe mmalire la mozambique komwe bungwelo likuchitako pulojekiti yolimbikitsa kadyedwe kabwino 
  nthendayi yavuta mmaiko oyandikana nawo mozambique kwa nthache govati ayandikana dzikoli moti akhonza kugwidwa mliliwu satetezedwa kulimbikitsidwa kutsata njira zopewera tathandiza zinthuzi tionetsetsa zigwire ntchito popeza kupewa kumaposa kuchiza adatero kachingwe 
  adati zipangizozi zikaikidwa mmalo omwe amadutsa kwambiri mokumanirana 
  woona za umoyo mbomalo ireen zuze adavomerezana kachingwe zolimbikitsa chitetezo cha mmaderawo 
  zipangizo zothandiza kupewa makamaka azisamba mmanja sopo pafupifupi zikufunika tikuthokoza fum pothangatira ntchito yathu yolimbikitsa umoyo wabwino mboma lino adatero zuze 
  mfumu nthache idali yokondwa kunena ukhondo uyanja dera lake chitetezo ku covid-19 chikula
Label: HEALTH

Text:
mgodi wa kanyika   waika pamoto okhala ku kanyika mboma la mzimba pachiopsezo chachikulu cha umphawi njala ataletsedwa boma kampani ya globe metals and mining kupanga chitukuko komaso kulima kuderali zaka zapitazo pofuna kupereka mpata woti kampaniyi iyambe kukumba miyala ya mtengo wapatali kumeneko 
  mabanja 248 ndiwo akukhudzidwa nkhaniyi sadapatsidwebe chipukuta misozi malo oti azikakhalako adalonjezedwa apatsidwa ndalama malowo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zadzetsa mavuto kuderali kaamba koti nyumba zidayamba kugwa choti sizikusamalidwa padali chiyembekezo choti achoka nyumba 45 zidagweratu moti akukhala muzisakasa makhitchini zotsalira za nyumba adapita kwa achibale 
  bungwe la chikatolika loona za maufulu la catholic commission for justice and peace ccjp masiku apitawa lidakonza ulendo wa atolankhani akadzionere okha mavuto omwe agwamo 
  mavuto omwe akukumana nawo chetechete wa boma kampaniyi zapangitsa mafumu kuderali sachitapo kanthu za chipukuta misozi pofika 31 march apanga zoti kampaniyi ichoke basi 
  mavutowa afikaso popsesa mtima inkosi ya makhosi mmbelwa yemwe akuti kampaniyi boma sali okonzeka kuyamba ntchito ya mgodi awasiye azikhala mmene akhalira mmbuyomo woyongana za miyala nthaka wa ku globe metals and mining chris ngwena adati kampani yawo singalankhulepo pankhaniyi kaamba koti pali zokambirana boma 
  mlembi wamkulu kuunduna wa zachilengwe migodi ben botolo adati adekhe kampani ya globe ikuyangana makampani oti ithe kugwira nawo ntchito
Label: HEALTH

Text:
amayi omwe kachilombo akufuna mudzi wawo amayi omwe kachilombo koyambitsa matenda edzi ka hiv kwa t kalolo ku lilongwe apempha boma liwapatse mudzi wawo azipindula nawo ndondomeko ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo ya sabuside 
  amayiwa ati mafumu mmidzi yomwe akukhala amawasala mnjira zambiri kuphatikizapo kagawidwe ka makuponi ogulira zipangizozi zomwe zimapangitsa mabanja azikhala njala chaka chaka 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc adapereka pempholi pamsonkhano omwe bungwe lowona za maufulu la centre for human rights and rehabilitation chrr lidakonza kumudzi wa kalolo ku lilongweko amaiwa akumane akuluakulu osiyanasiyana apereke madandaulo pazovuta zomwe amakumana nazo 
  wa gulu lina la amayi omwe kachilombo la kalolo community aids coordinating committee tisauke nazoni wati amaiwa amaphonya kamwedwe ka mankhwala obwezeretsa chitetezo mthupi ma arv chosowa chakudya zomwe zimaika miyoyo yawo pachiopsezo 
  nzokhumudwitsa kuona makuponi akuperekedwa kwa oti mphamvu oti akhoza kudzipezera zipangizo mosavuta tikati tiyesere kudandaula amati tipalamula ma arv chakudya chokwanira zina timalephera kumwa palibe chakudya timatha njala kuyambira mmawa mpaka madzulo adatero nazoni 
  woyendetsa ntchito zaulimi ku chileka epa komwe amaiwa amachokera chrissie chiusiwa wati pempho la amaiwo silingatheke midzi yolandira zipangizozi imatengera malire ma t omwe amapereka ndondomeko kuboma 
  adapempha amaiwo akadandaule kuofesi yoyendetsa za ulimi kuofesi ya bwanamkubwa wa lilongwe akawathandize 
  mfumu sakuzamutu idavomereza mafumu angonoangono za chinyengo kupondereza 
  adati aitanitsa mafumu onse akhale nawo pansi kukambirana nawo mchitidwewu uthe 
  ndizachisoni amenewa ndiamene boma limaganizira mmapologalamu awa sabuside tsono mafumu akutenga zinthuzi ndikumagawira amphamvu kale ndiye tikuchitapo chiyani tikhala nawo pasi tikonze zonse adatero sakuzamutu

Text:
adakumana mchakacho ankadzapepesa maliro mkazi wanga   ukwati chinthu chabwino mulungu amasangalala nacho chaka cha 2015 mulungu adadalitsa mabanja lero tingochita molawitsa mwa ochepa amene adalandira madalitso olowa mbanja 
   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc   masankhidwe nduna autsa mapiri chigwa   malonjezo ayamba kuoneka precious kachingoni kake patsiku la chinkhoswe tiyambe excello zidana amene adakumana nthiti yake katerina mtambo kudzeranso mmphamvu ya mulungu 
  zidana mkonzi wa pologalamu ya ulimi walero ku mbc adakumana nthiti yakeyi malo angapo yeniyeni idali pamene katerina amakapepesa excello imfa ya mkazi 
  katerina adataya wokondedwa chimodzimodzinso excello awiriwa akuti adapepesana za imfayo kumapeto kwake adatolana kumangitsa woyera 
  kudali kosoketsa nsapato   wina waluso pakapezedwe ka namwali richard chipuwa goloboyi wa be forward wanderers 
  kuonongeka kwa nsapato ya chipuwa udali mwayi poti pokakonzetsa nsapatoyo adakabatha namwali yemwe adapangitsa naye chinkhoswe mchaka changothachi 
  kukumanako akuti kudali kosavuta asoke chichewa chokhetsa dovu la dinnah hxaviel ndiye idali ntchito yoposa pagolo 
  njoleyi amaletsetsa mwana wawo asayerekeze kuyenda anyamata idakwana kutinso makolowo sakadakwanitsa kuletsa pamene adakumana mwamuna weniweniyu 
  adali kasitomala wanga wa tchipisi wina steve nthala yemwe wa nyimbo mgulu la area 36 anglican choir ku lilongwe amene adapeza njole yomwe idali kasitomala wa tchipisi 
  akuti adagwa mchikondi chrissy malipa yemwe adali kabwerebwere wa tchipisi chomwe mnyamatayu ankakazinga pachiwaya 
  steve akuti namwaliyu amati akamadzagula tchipisi pachiwaya chake mtima umagunda amangomuyezera chambiri chidali chiyambi mgwirizano wolowa mbanja 
  timakayangana osewera mpira ku kasungu   ulendo wa timu ya surestream wokayangana osewera mboma la kasungu udali waphindu kwa team manager wa timuyi honest nkhwazi 
  honest adapeza chamwayi asodzekonso chisomo nkhoma yemwe wapolisi papolisi ya kasungu akhale wachikondi sadaope yunifomu ya polisi pali chikondi palibe mantha 
  awiriwa adachititsa chinkhoswe mboma la kasungu amangoyembekezera ukwati tsopano uchitike abusa agwire ntchito yodalitsa awiriwa 
  awa ochepa chabe amene tidawatulutsa patsamba lino kutifotokozera omwe adakumanirana okondeka mchakachi achite mphumi ndani dzina la yesu ndilo lidachititsa   akulu adati dzina limapereka kulanda mwayi wa munthu nzoonadi taonera noel nthala yemwe mumzinda wa lilongwe amadziwika dzina lakuti yesu mwa masapota akuluakulu timu ya silver strikers 
  ambiri mumzinda wa lilongwe amakhala chidwi akamva za yesu poganiza mwina ndiye wa ku yerusalemu ichi ndicho chidatchukitsa mnyamatayu yemwe wapeza nthiti zuziwe nyondo 
  kukumana kwa nthala zuziwe mwina sikungadabwitse ambiri mumzindawu amazizwa dzinali nkutheka namwaliyu naye amafunitsitsa atamuona 
  ndimamuona ndikamachokera kuntchito tsiku lina nditalimba mtima ndidamuimitsa nkumulonjera nditamuuza dzina langa adaoneka wodzidzimuka sindidatengere zimenezo mtima wanga udali iyeyo basi adatero nthala 
  naye zuziwe adati dzina lokhalo amangolimva samadziwa munthu nkukhala mmene amawonekera nthala ayi

Text:
kusowa kwa mpikisano nkwachabe pali mantha zipani za mdziko muno zingayoyoke makatani mipando yonona yachipani wa pulezidenti wachiwiri ipitirire yongotola popanda wopikisana naye ku misonkhano ya zipani 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zaunikidwa otsogolera zitukuko kumidzi katswiri pandale potsatira zochitika kumsonkhano waukulu wa chipani cha peoples party pp komwe mpando wa pulezidenti wachiwiri kuchigawo cha kumpoto padalibe kupikisana 
  kusapezeka opikisana mmipandoyo kudapereka danga mwini chipanichi yemwenso mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda adutse popanda omugwedeza 
  naye wachiwiri kwa banda khumbo kachali adadutsa moyera 
  mboma lomwe langopita kumene la dpp mwini chipanicho yemwe adaali pulezidenti bingu wa mutharika samachititsa msonkhano waukuluwu nkomwe mmalo mwake amangoloza mmaudindo mchipanicho 
  chitsanzo mutharika adaloza hetherwick ntaba mneneri wachipani 
  mtsogoleri wakale yemwenso adali pulezidenti mchipani cha udf bakili muluzi atangotula udindo kwa friday jumbe kudali kukokanakokana mpaka pomwe chipanichi chagawikana 
  zitadziwika msonkhano waukulu kuchipani cha pp wina wa bizinesi caesar fatch adabwera poyera adzapikisana banda 
  poyandikira chisankhocho fatch adalengeza wazisiya ati adzayeseranso kutsogoloku 
  malinga operekera ndemangawa ndizo zikuchititsa zipani za mdziko muno zizisokonekera pomwe pulezidenti wachipanicho wachoka paudindo ofuna mpandowo amakhala akukokana nkumathiothoka mchipani 
  katswiri wa zandale blessings chinsinga wati zipanizi zitamakhala msonkhanowu nkupezekanso olimbirana nawo mmaudindo onse achipani si bwezi mavuto omwe adachitika ku udf dpp atachitika 
  si zachilendo mdziko mmaiko akunja mavutowa alipo mathero zonse chipani chimatha amayamba kukokana pomwe pulezidentiyo wachoka pampando 
  ndibwino mipandoyi idziphangiridwa pomwe pulezidenti wachoka amene adayamba kupikisana naye ndiwo amakhala patsogolo adatero chinsinga 
  makiyi matukuta wa bungwe la malawi carer ku mayani mboma la dedza wati kumeneko adali odabwa kumva banda wadutsa pampando wa pulezidenti popanda opikisana naye 
  padzikhala kupikisana amakhala chidwi kumva zomwe opikisanawo akonza zateremu ndiye ufune usafune mtsogoleri wanu amakhala yemwe wadutsayo 
  zimapha chidwi cha omwe amafuna adzasankhe mtsogoleri yemwe amukonda adatero matukuta
Label: ECONOMY

Text:

Text:

Text:

Text:
eni minibus ati ufulu wokweza mitengo mwa amene amatsatira nkhani za nsewu mdziko muno coxley kamange wati unduna wa za mtengamtenga ukuyenera njira zabwino pofuna kukamiza eni minibus atsitse mitengo yokwelera minibus mdziko muno kaamba ka kutsika kwa mafuta galimoto 
 kamange tili ufulu wokwezabe kamange anena pamene amathilira ndemanga chikalata chomwe undunawu unatulutsa chonena kuyambira 15 june undunawu uyamba kugwira ma minibus onse omwe sakutsitsa mitengo yawo zikuphinja ufulu wa okwera nyengo ino ya coronavirus 
 ati minibus iyende sifuna mafuta okha pali zinthu zina zofunika ishulansi choncho kwabwino undunawu uwunikenso mitengo yolipilira ishulansi maka nyengo ino yomwe lino laphinjika mliri wa coronavirus 
 mitengo ya mafuta yatsika tili ufulube opitiriza kugwiritsa ntchito mitengo yokwera minibus simayendera mafuta okha minibus yoti imanyamula 16 ikunyamula 8 8pa sakutichoseranso inshulansi anatero kamange 
 apempha boma likambirane makampani ishuransi litsitse mitengo ya misonkho nyengo ya covid-19 
 padakalipano unduna wa za mtengatenga zomangamanga sunayankhepo kanthu nkhaniyi
Label: TRANSPORT

Text:
kachali apepesa kulankhula motumbwa kuthe mabungwe omwe siaboma katswiri pandale kudzanso mfumu ina ati andale asamaledzere maudindo nkufika poiwala kulemekeza omwe adawaika mmipando 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc zatuluka msabatayi wachiwiri kwa pulezidenti wa lino khumbo kachali atapalamula chitedze potsekulira malo otumizira mauthenga lupaso telecentre ku karonga sabata yathayi 
  pamwambowo ati pothira mphepo odzudzula boma pamodzi mtsogoleri wa lino joyce banda aonjeza maulendo uku nkuononga chuma cha boma kachali adati ulamuliro sungatule pansi udindo cha chidzudzulocho ati samayenda mmakomo mwa abambo amayi odzudzulawo kuyendera ndalama zawo 
  tsopano kachali wapepesa payekha kuonjezera kupepesa kudzera mwa mneneri wa boma yemwenso ndunda yofalitsa nkhani moses kunkuyu akuti kachali kupepesako nkosakwana kachali saali mtima wofuna kulemekeza ake 
  kachali asadapepese payekha wa bungwe loona ufulu wa la malawi watch billy banda mfumu ina adati kachali apite kwa amalawi omwe adawalankhulira mawuwo kukawapepesa 
  banda adati uku nkulankhula kodzimva kosalemekeza omwe amaika andale mmaudindo kotero mtsogoleri wa lino achite kanthu kachali ati akapanda kutero zisonyeza akugwirizana zomwe adalankhulazo 
  kachali sadasankhidwe akuyenera kuwalemekeza ziwatengera aiwale kuzamukhulupiriranso adatero banda 
  mfumu ina ku mwanza yomwe sidafune kutchulidwa yati kachali angachotsere chidwi mwa utsogoleri 
  uku nkunyazitsa sindidayembekezere mawuwa angachokere pakamwa pawo idatero mfumuyo 
  wa bungwe loona ufulu wa ogula la consumers association of malawi cama john kapito wati kachali ngolakwika kotero achotsedwe 
  mtsogoleri wa lino yemwe adasankha kachali paudindowu akuyenera achitepo kanthu mwachangu pomuchotsa adatero kapito mchikalata chodzudzula kachali 
  naye katswiri ndale blessings chinsinga wati atsogoleri athu alekerera kukadakhala kumaiko kenya kachali anakayankha mlandu kubwalo lamilandu 
  sikale pomwe timakhala limodzi kachali kudzudzula malankhulidwe otere kumva lero akulankhula zotere zikusonyeza anthuwa amayiwala pomwe pabwino 
  amalawi tisalekerere malankhulidwe otere tidzudzulepo chipani cha pp chilankhule kachali adatero chinsinga 
  kagemulo kanyenda wa mmudzi mwa mwaswa kwa t kyungu mboma la karonga wati kachali akapepese yekha 
  edward chimkwita wa mmudzi mwa malika kwa t mpama mboma la chiradzulu wati kulankhula kwa kachali kwasonyezeratu kutsogoloku sangadzathandie lino 
  wangolowa kumene tikumva zimenezi apa sitingataye tawona sangatithandize adatero chimkwita 
  mneneri wa boma moses kunkuyu wati amvetse kupepesa kwa kachali kukuchokera pansi pamtima 
  kulankhula mokhadzula mosakomera si kwachilendo mwa atsogoleri ndale mdziko muno 
  posachedwapa mkazi wa mtsogoleri wakale wa lino callista mutharika adanyanyulanso pomwe adati atsogoleri amabungwe omwe siaboma akagwere akumudzi sasowa ndalama zakunja mafuta agalimoto 
  uko kunali ku mzimba 2 ogasiti 2011 pomwe amatsekulira chipatala cha matuli cha k50 miliyoni 
  adati boma likudziwa zamavuto kusowa kwa mafuta agalimoto ndalama zakunja amabungwe akagwere sizikhudza akumudzi 
  kachali adasankhidwa epulo wachiwiri kwa pulezidenti potsatira imfa ya yemwe adali mtsogoleri wa lino bingu wa mutharika 
  malinga malamulo banda yemwe panthawiyo adali wachiwiri adakhala pulezidenti adasankha kachali wachiwiri
Label: POLITICS

Text:
supports non fiction writers the malawi writer union has thrown its weight behind the establishment of separate writers body the malawi union of academic and non fiction authors muana 
  muana is the third body of writers after and the poetry association of malawi pam 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   wenela pasintha zedi sambalikagwa mvona with support from the norwegian non fiction writers and translators association the new body was established to promote non fiction and academic research and publication after noticing that and pam were mainly promoting fiction writing 
  as we are happy with the establishment of the new body in fact it did not come as surprise as we have been part of series meetings that have given birth to muana explained president sambalikagwa mvona 
  he said despite that it has affected the membership he is happy as the establishment of new body is step in the right direction 
  we have lost few of our members but in the positive because they have formed an equally important body this is good for the nation and we are empowering others to grow wings he said 
  muana is headed by max iphani who is book editor at the malawi institute of education 
  some of muanas goals include ensuring that there is sound professional and legal relationships between authors and publishers assist authors in publishing contracts as well as striving to build capacity of non fiction and academic authors and lobby for increased numbers of malawian textbooks in institutions of learning
Label: EDUCATION

Text:
tame mwawa phwete ndiye kudya kwake sewero la tikuferanji limodzi mwa masewero omwe amapereka phunziro kwa pazochitika mmoyo wa tsiku tsiku msangulutso kwa ambiri seweroli limaonetsedwa pakanema kumveka pawailesi ya mbc steven pembamoyo adachita chidwi mwa omwe nawo seweroli tame mwawa yemwe ambiri amamudziwa chiphwanya museweromo adacheza naye motere   wenela pasintha zedi   anatchereza   tidakumana ku sukulu ku chiradzulu mwawa ndidabadwa wazisudzo ndikudziwe mnzanga 
  ndine tame mwawa ndimakhala ku machinjiri ku blantyre kwathu nku chiradzulu mmudzi mwa kambalame t mpama 
  udabadwa mchaka chanji ndidabadwa 26 october 1977 ndine woyamba mbanja la ana 7 amuna 5 asungwana awiri 
  mbiri yako pazisudzo yotani ndikhoza kunena ndidabadwa wazisudzo kale abale anga amandiuza ndili wamngono ndikadziongola ndikamalira amandiunjirira nkumaseka makolo anga adadziwiratu ndidzakhala msangalatsi kusukulu anzanga ngakhalenso aphunzitsi ankachita kudziwa tame wabwera zilango ndiye zidali zosatha zina ndinkalembedwa olongolola pomwe sindidapite kusukulu nkomwe pachikondwerero chokumbukira ufulu wa ndinkapanga nawo zisudzo malipiro ake adali fanta mpunga wa ndinkapanganso sewero la ambuye yesu 
  udapezeka musewero la tikuferanji ina yake ankakajambula seweroli kwathu ndiye penapake pamafunika singanga munthu amasowa tsono ndidadzipereka ndiyesere nkuchita basi kulowa mseweroli kudali kumeneko panthawi imeneyo ndidadziwana akuluakulu azisudzo frank yalu nginde yemwe adanditenga kukalowa gulu lake la zisudzo lotchedwa kasupe arts theatre ndidadziwika kwambiri moti ndimapezeka mmagulu azisudzo osiyanasiyana kwathu mumafilimi osiyanasiyana imodzi mwa mafilimu omwe ndilimo ya chinganingani yomwe ikuoneka pakanema ya malawi ndidayambitsa nawo pologalamu ya phwete kanema yomweyi pawayilesi ndimapanga nawo sewero la sabata ino 
  dzina la chiphwanya lidayamba kumudzi kwathu ku chiradzulu kuli wina dzina lake chiphwanya yemwe wolongolola wosachedwa kupsa mtima ndiye nditaona malo omwe ndimapatsidwa mmasewero ambiri ndidaona dzinali londiyenera 
  nzoona pakhomo pako udadzala zikho zambiri eya ndimadziwiratu mbali zomwe anzanga amakonda kundipatsa pazisudzo motero ndidadzala zikho zambiri mikanda pakhomo panga ili mbweee moti amaona ndimapangadi zausinganga
Label: SOCIAL ISSUES

Text:
pac iunguza za boma la chifedulo nthumwi zomwe zimakumana mumzinda wa blantyre kukambirana za nkhani yakuti zigawo za lino zizikhala mtsogoleri wakewake pansi mtsogoleri wa zati nkhaniyi iyende mpofunika malamulo 
  mfundoyi ikugwirizana zomwe adanena mphunzitsi wa za ndale kusukulu ya ukachenjede ya chancellor college blessings chinsinga popanda malamulo nkhaniyi ikhoza kudzetsa chisokonezo 
   chisale watuluka nkumangidwanso   sipakala waimitsa nyumba ya malamulo   chakwera akwanitse malonjezohrdc choyamba tiunike malamulo athu akutinji mukhoza zigawo zodziyimira pazokha zomwe zingamakolanenso cha malamulo omwe mukutsata adatero chinsinga 
  msonkhanowo udakonzedwa bungwe la mipingo la public affairs committee pac cholinga chake chidali chomwe chidayambitsa nkhaniyi kukambirana momwe ingayendere 
  malinga wapampando wa bungwe la pac mbusa felix chingota nthumwi za kumsonkhanowo zidapeza nkhaniyo idachokera pakusamvetsetsana momwe zinthu zina zikuyendera 
  nthumwi zidapeza nkhani kusankhana kochokera kukondera pakasankhidwe ka maudindo kusiyanitsa pakagawidwe ka zinthu kupondereza zitukuko zomwe atsogoleri adayamba zina mwa zinthu zomwe akuona aziyendetsa okha zinthu adatero chingota 
  mlangizi wa mtsogoleri wa lino pankhani za mgwirizano wa mdziko muno vuwa kaunda adati cholinga cha mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika azipereka maganizo zinthu ziziyenda 
  kaunda adati mutharika adalumbira adzalemekeza malamulo lino omwe amapereka mwayi kwa amalawi wolankhula zakukhosi kwawo 
  mafumu nawo ayamikira zomwe lidachita bungwe la pac pokonza msonkhanowo zomwe nthumwi zidagwirizanazo 
  paramount chief chikulamayembe wa ku rumphi adati nzopatsa chidwi boma mabungwe akugwirizana pankhani yofuna kudzetsa umodzi mtendere pomanga zoyendetsera nkhani zikuluzikulu imeneyi 
  apa ndiye zinthu ziyenda kusiyana nkuti azingopanga phokoso lopanda tsogolo lake tionera kwa akuluakuluwo akonza zotani adatero chikulamayembe 
  malinga chinsinga nkhaniyi ingaphweke amalawi atalangizidwa momwe ulamuliro wotere ungayendere adati nzomvetsa chisoni kuchititsa mantha amalawi akungotsatira maganizo anzawo chosamvetsetsa 
  iyitu si nkhani yaingono pakuoneka ambiri sakumvetsetsa mutuwu mmalo mwake angotsatirapo poti walankhulayo amamukhulupirira mpofunikanso kumasulira bwinobwino tanthauzo la nkhaniyi nkuphunzitsa amalawi azipereka maganizo enieni adatero chinsinga 
  adati ulamuliro wotere njira yoyendetsera boma yomwe limagawidwa mmagawo omwe amayendetsa okha ntchito za chitukuko pansi ulamuliro wa mtsogoleri 
  adati kutengera pamgongo nkhani yotereyi kukhoza kubweretsa kusamvana chisokonezo pazinthu zingonongono 
  muganizire apa dzikoli lalingono kwambiri njira zobweretsa ndalama nzochepa pofuna kugawa mpofunika bwinobwino mmene malire akhalire chigawo chanji chitenga chiyani adatero chinsinga 
  wa bungwe la pac robert phiri adati msonkhano womwe bungweli lidakonza udakambirana zina mwa nkhani zoterezi 
  msonkhanowo udachitika lolemba lachiwiri mumzinda wa blantyre udabweretsa pamodzi akuluakulu mnthambi za boma mabungwe oyima paokha otsata mbiri ya lino 
  phiri adati zomwe adakambirana akuluakuluwo azitulutsa kuzipereka kuboma mabungwe zipereke chithunzithunzi cha mmene angagwirire ntchito pankhaniyi 
  mmbuyomu kafukufuku yemwe nyuzipepala ya the nation idachita adasonyeza aphungu 61 mwa 100 alionse adati nkhaniyi itapita ku nyumba ya malamulo akhoza kuikana nyuzipepalayi itafunsa aphungu 122 mwa 193 75 adati angakane mfundoyi aphungu 17 adali asanaganize angaivomereze ayi pomwe aphungu 30 adati angavomereze za mfundoyi 
  mchaka cha 2006 mtsogoleri wa lino peter mutharika adanena boma la mtunduwu likhoza kuthandiza pachitukuko cha lino uku kudali msonkhano wounikira malamulo lino masiku ano mutharika amatsutsana maganizowa ati kugawa 
  pamsonkhanowo padali zipani zosiyanasiyana mafumu azipembedzo mabungwe omwe si aboma amayendetsa zokambiranazo sipikala wakale wa nyumba ya malamulo henry chimunthu banda wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wakale wa lino justin malewezi
Label: POLITICS
